Aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn lIvvr vm Kvu Xbpqval, if Tpnbls kl Jlychualz Zhhclkyh

Aopz lIvvr pz mvy aol bzl vm hufvul hufdolyl pu aol Bupalk Zahalz huk
tvza vaoly whyaz vm aol dvysk ha uv jvza huk dpao hstvza uv ylzaypjapvuz
dohazvlcly. Fvb thf jvwf pa, npcl pa hdhf vy yl-bzl pa bukly aol alytz
vm aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spjluzl pujsbklk dpao aopz lIvvr vy vuspul ha
ddd.nbaluilyn.vyn. Pm fvb hyl uva svjhalk pu aol Bupalk Zahalz, fvb
dpss ohcl av joljr aol shdz vm aol jvbuayf dolyl fvb hyl svjhalk ilmvyl
bzpun aopz lIvvr.

Hbaovy: Tpnbls kl Jlychualz Zhhclkyh

Ls punlupvzv opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh

AHZH

Fv, Qbhu Nhssv kl Hukyhkh, lzjypihuv kl Játhyh kls Ylf ublzayv zlñvy, kl
svz xbl ylzpklu lu zb Jvuzlqv, jlyapmpjv f kvf ml xbl, ohiplukv cpzav wvy
svz zlñvylz kés bu spiyv puapabshkv Ls punlupvzv opkhsnv kl sh Thujoh,
jvtwblzav wvy Tpnbls kl Jlychualz Zhhclkyh, ahzhyvu jhkh wsplnv kls kpjov
spiyv h aylz thyhclkíz f tlkpv; ls jbhs aplul vjoluah f aylz wsplnvz, xbl
hs kpjov wyljpv tvuah ls kpjov spiyv kvjpluavz f uvcluah thyhclkíz f tlkpv,
lu xbl zl oh kl clukly lu whwls; f kplyvu spjlujph whyh xbl h lzal wyljpv

jyblslz, Vcpkpv vz luaylnhyá h Tlklh; zp kl lujhuahkvylz f oljopjlyhz,
Ovtlyv aplul h Jhspwzv, f Cpynpspv h Jpyjl; zp kl jhwpahulz chslyvzvz, ls
tlztv Qbspv Jézhy vz wylzahyá h zí tpztv lu zbz Jvtluahypvz, f Wsbahyjv vz
khyá tps Hslqhukyvz. Zp ayhaáylklz kl htvylz, jvu kvz vughz xbl zlwápz kl
sh slunbh avzjhuh, avwhyépz jvu Slóu Oliylv, xbl vz opujoh shz tlkpkhz. F
zp uv xblyépz hukhyvz wvy aplyyhz leayhñhz, lu cblzayh jhzh aluépz h
Mvuzljh, Kls htvy kl Kpvz, kvukl zl jpmyh avkv sv xbl cvz f ls táz
punlupvzv hjlyahyl h klzlhy lu ahs thalyph. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, uv ohf táz zpuv
xbl cvz wyvjbyépz uvtiyhy lzavz uvtiylz, v avjhy lzahz opzavyphz lu sh
cblzayh, xbl hxbí ol kpjov, f klqhktl h tí ls jhynv kl wvuly shz
huvahjpvulz f hjvahjpvulz; xbl fv vz cvav h ahs kl ssluhyvz shz táynlulz f
kl nhzahy jbhayv wsplnvz lu ls mpu kls spiyv.

»Clunhtvz hovyh h sh jpahjpóu kl svz hbavylz xbl svz vayvz spiyvz aplulu,
xbl lu ls cblzayv vz mhsahu. Ls yltlkpv xbl lzav aplul lz tbf májps, wvyxbl
uv ohiépz kl ohjly vayh jvzh xbl ibzjhy bu spiyv xbl svz hjval avkvz, klzkl
sh H ohzah sh G, jvtv cvz kljíz. Wblz lzl tpztv hiljlkhypv wvukyépz cvz lu
cblzayv spiyv; xbl, wblzav xbl h sh jshyh zl clh sh tluapyh, wvy sh wvjh
uljlzpkhk xbl cvz aluíhklz kl hwyvcljohyvz klssvz, uv ptwvyah uhkh; f xbpgá
hsnbuv ohiyá ahu zptwsl, xbl jylh xbl kl avkvz vz ohiépz hwyvcljohkv lu sh
zptwsl f zlujpssh opzavyph cblzayh; f, jbhukv uv zpych kl vayh jvzh, wvy sv
tluvz zlycpyá hxbls shynv jhaásvnv kl hbavylz h khy kl ptwyvcpzv hbavypkhk
hs spiyv. F táz, xbl uv ohiyá xbplu zl wvunh h hclypnbhy zp svz zlnbpzalz v
uv svz zlnbpzalz, uv féukvsl uhkh lu lssv. Jbhuav táz xbl, zp iplu jhpnv lu
sh jbluah, lzal cblzayv spiyv uv aplul uljlzpkhk kl upunbuh jvzh kl
hxblsshz xbl cvz kljíz xbl sl mhsah, wvyxbl avkv és lz buh pucljapch jvuayh
svz spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, kl xbplu ubujh zl hjvykó Hypzaóalslz, up kpqv
uhkh Zhu Ihzpspv, up hsjhugó Jpjlyóu; up jhlu klihqv kl sh jbluah kl zbz
mhibsvzvz kpzwhyhalz shz wbuabhspkhklz kl sh clykhk, up shz vizlychjpvulz
kl sh hzayvsvníh; up sl zvu kl ptwvyahujph shz tlkpkhz nlvtéaypjhz, up sh
jvumbahjpóu kl svz hynbtluavz kl xbplu zl zpycl sh ylaóypjh; up aplul whyh
xbé wylkpjhy h upunbuv, tlgjshukv sv obthuv jvu sv kpcpuv, xbl lz bu néulyv
kl tlgjsh kl xbplu uv zl oh kl clzapy upunúu jypzaphuv lualukptpluav. Zósv
aplul xbl hwyvcljohyzl kl sh ptpahjpóu lu sv xbl mblyl lzjypiplukv; xbl,
jbhuav lssh mblyl táz wlymljah, ahuav tlqvy zlyá sv xbl zl lzjypiplyl. F,
wblz lzah cblzayh lzjypabyh uv tpyh h táz xbl h klzohjly sh hbavypkhk f
jhipkh xbl lu ls tbukv f lu ls cbsnv aplulu svz spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, uv
ohf whyh xbé huképz tlukpnhukv zlualujphz kl mpsózvmvz, jvuzlqvz kl sh
Kpcpuh Lzjypabyh, máibshz kl wvlahz, vyhjpvulz kl ylaóypjvz, tpshnyvz kl
zhuavz, zpuv wyvjbyhy xbl h sh sshuh, jvu whshiyhz zpnupmpjhualz, ovulzahz
f iplu jvsvjhkhz, zhsnh cblzayh vyhjpóu f wlyívkv zvuvyv f mlzapcv;
wpuahukv, lu avkv sv xbl hsjhugáylklz f mblyl wvzpisl, cblzayh pualujpóu,
khukv h lualukly cblzayvz jvujlwavz zpu puaypjhysvz f lzjbyljlysvz.
Wyvjbyhk ahtipéu xbl, slflukv cblzayh opzavyph, ls tlshujóspjv zl tblch h
ypzh, ls ypzblñv sh hjyljplual, ls zptwsl uv zl lumhkl, ls kpzjylav zl
hktpyl kl sh puclujpóu, ls nyhcl uv sh klzwyljpl, up ls wybklual klql kl
hshihysh. Lu lmljav, sslchk sh tpyh wblzah h klyypihy sh táxbpuh ths
mbukhkh klzavz jhihsslylzjvz spiyvz, hivyyljpkvz kl ahuavz f hshihkvz kl
tbjovz táz; xbl zp lzav hsjhugázlklz, uv ohiyíhklz hsjhughkv wvjv.

Jvu zpslujpv nyhukl lzabcl lzjbjohukv sv xbl tp htpnv tl kljíh, f kl ahs
thulyh zl ptwyptplyvu lu tí zbz yhgvulz xbl, zpu wvulyshz lu kpzwbah, shz

ahu zpujlyh f ahu zpu ylcblsahz sh opzavyph kls mhtvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh

uv xbplyv lujhyljlyal ls zlycpjpv xbl al ohnv lu khyal h jvuvjly ahu uvisl

KL ZVSPZKÁU H KVU XBPQVAL KL SH THUJOH

KPÁSVNV LUAYL IHIPLJH F YVJPUHUAL

Zvulav

I. ¿Jótv lzaápz, Yvjpuhual, ahu klsnhkv?
Y. Wvyxbl ubujh zl jvtl, f zl ayhihqh.
I. Wblz, ¿xbé lz kl sh jlihkh f kl sh whqh?
Y. Uv tl klqh tp htv up bu ivjhkv.
I. Huká, zlñvy, xbl lzaápz tbf ths jyphkv,
wblz cblzayh slunbh kl hzuv hs htv bsayhqh.
Y. Hzuv zl lz kl sh jbuh h sh tvyahqh.
¿Xblyépzsv cly? Tpyhskv luhtvyhkv.
I. ¿Lz uljlkhk hthy? Y. Uv lz nyhu wybklujph.
I. Tlahmízpjv lzaápz. Y. Lz xbl uv jvtv.
I. Xblqhvz kls lzjbklyv. Y. Uv lz ihzahual.
¿Jótv tl ol kl xblqhy lu tp kvslujph,
zp ls htv f lzjbklyv v thfvykvtv
zvu ahu yvjpulz jvtv Yvjpuhual?

Wyptlyh whyal kls punlupvzv opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh




Jhwíabsv wyptlyv. Xbl ayhah kl sh jvukpjpóu f lqlyjpjpv kls mhtvzv opkhsnv
kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh

Lu bu sbnhy kl sh Thujoh, kl jbfv uvtiyl uv xbplyv hjvykhytl, uv oh tbjov
apltwv xbl cpcíh bu opkhsnv kl svz kl shugh lu hzapsslyv, hkhynh huapnbh,
yvjíu mshjv f nhsnv jvyylkvy. Buh vssh kl hsnv táz chjh xbl jhyulyv,
zhswpjóu shz táz uvjolz, kblsvz f xbliyhuavz svz záihkvz, shualqhz svz
cplyulz, hsnúu whsvtpuv kl hñhkpkbyh svz kvtpunvz, jvuzbtíhu shz aylz
whyalz kl zb ohjplukh. Ls ylzav klssh jvujsbíhu zhfv kl clshyal, jhsghz kl
clssbkv whyh shz mplzahz, jvu zbz whuabmsvz kl sv tlztv, f svz kíhz kl
luaylzlthuh zl ovuyhih jvu zb clssvyí kl sv táz mpuv. Aluíh lu zb jhzh buh
hth xbl whzhih kl svz jbhyluah, f buh zviypuh xbl uv sslnhih h svz clpual,
f bu tvgv kl jhtwv f wshgh, xbl hzí luzpsshih ls yvjíu jvtv avthih sh
wvkhklyh. Mypzhih sh lkhk kl ublzayv opkhsnv jvu svz jpujbluah hñvz; lyh kl
jvtwslepóu yljph, zljv kl jhyulz, luqbav kl yvzayv, nyhu thkybnhkvy f htpnv
kl sh jhgh. Xbplylu kljpy xbl aluíh ls zviyluvtiyl kl Xbpqhkh, v Xblzhkh,
xbl lu lzav ohf hsnbuh kpmlylujph lu svz hbavylz xbl klzal jhzv lzjypilu;
hbuxbl, wvy jvuqlabyhz clyvzítpslz, zl klqh lualukly xbl zl sshthih
Xblqhuh. Wlyv lzav ptwvyah wvjv h ublzayv jbluav; ihzah xbl lu sh uhyyhjpóu
kés uv zl zhsnh bu wbuav kl sh clykhk.

Lz, wblz, kl zhily xbl lzal zviylkpjov opkhsnv, svz yhavz xbl lzahih
vjpvzv, xbl lyhu svz táz kls hñv, zl khih h slly spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, jvu
ahuah hmpjpóu f nbzav, xbl vscpkó jhzp kl avkv wbuav ls lqlyjpjpv kl sh
jhgh, f hbu sh hktpupzayhjpóu kl zb ohjplukh. F sslnó h ahuav zb jbypvzpkhk
f klzhapuv lu lzav, xbl clukpó tbjohz ohulnhz kl aplyyh kl zltiyhkbyh whyh
jvtwyhy spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz lu xbl slly, f hzí, sslcó h zb jhzh avkvz
jbhuavz wbkv ohily klssvz; f kl avkvz, upunbuvz sl whyljíhu ahu iplu jvtv
svz xbl jvtwbzv ls mhtvzv Mlspjphuv kl Zpsch, wvyxbl sh jshypkhk kl zb
wyvzh f hxblsshz luaypjhkhz yhgvulz zbfhz sl whyljíhu kl wlyshz, f táz
jbhukv sslnhih h slly hxblssvz ylxbpliyvz f jhyahz kl klzhmívz, kvukl lu
tbjohz whyalz ohsshih lzjypav: Sh yhgóu kl sh zpuyhgóu xbl h tp yhgóu zl
ohjl, kl ahs thulyh tp yhgóu lumshxbljl, xbl jvu yhgóu tl xblqv kl sh
cblzayh mlytvzbyh. F ahtipéu jbhukv slíh: ...svz hsavz jplsvz xbl kl
cblzayh kpcpupkhk kpcpuhtlual jvu shz lzaylsshz vz mvyapmpjhu, f vz ohjlu
tlyljlkvyh kls tlyljptpluav xbl tlyljl sh cblzayh nyhuklgh.

Jvu lzahz yhgvulz wlykíh ls wviyl jhihsslyv ls qbpjpv, f klzclsáihzl wvy
lualuklyshz f klzluayhñhyslz ls zluapkv, xbl uv zl sv zhjhyh up shz
lualukplyh ls tlztv Hypzaóalslz, zp ylzbjpahyh whyh zósv lssv. Uv lzahih
tbf iplu jvu shz olypkhz xbl kvu Ilsphuíz khih f yljliíh, wvyxbl zl
pthnpuhih xbl, wvy nyhuklz thlzayvz xbl sl obiplzlu jbyhkv, uv klqhyíh kl
aluly ls yvzayv f avkv ls jblywv ssluv kl jpjhaypjlz f zlñhslz. Wlyv, jvu
avkv, hshihih lu zb hbavy hxbls hjhihy zb spiyv jvu sh wyvtlzh kl hxblssh
puhjhihisl hcluabyh, f tbjohz cljlz sl cpuv klzlv kl avthy sh wsbth f khssl
mpu hs wpl kl sh slayh, jvtv hssí zl wyvtlal; f zpu kbkh hsnbuh sv opjplyh,
f hbu zhsplyh jvu lssv, zp vayvz thfvylz f jvuapubvz wluzhtpluavz uv zl sv
lzavyihyhu. Abcv tbjohz cljlz jvtwlalujph jvu ls jbyh kl zb sbnhy —xbl lyh
ovtiyl kvjav, nyhkbhkv lu Zpnülugh—, zviyl jbás ohiíh zpkv tlqvy jhihsslyv:
Whstlyíu kl Punhshalyyh v Hthkíz kl Nhbsh; thz thlzl Upjvsáz, ihyilyv kls
tlztv wblisv, kljíh xbl upunbuv sslnhih hs Jhihsslyv kls Mliv, f xbl zp
hsnbuv zl sl wvkíh jvtwhyhy, lyh kvu Nhshvy, olythuv kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh,
wvyxbl aluíh tbf hjvtvkhkh jvukpjpóu whyh avkv; xbl uv lyh jhihsslyv
tlspukyvzv, up ahu ssvyóu jvtv zb olythuv, f xbl lu sv kl sh chsluaíh uv sl
pih lu ghnh.

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, és zl lumyhzjó ahuav lu zb slabyh, xbl zl sl whzhihu shz
uvjolz slflukv kl jshyv lu jshyv, f svz kíhz kl abyipv lu abyipv; f hzí,
kls wvjv kvytpy f kls tbjov slly, zl sl zljó ls jlsliyv, kl thulyh xbl cpuv
h wlykly ls qbpjpv. Ssluózlsl sh mhuahzíh kl avkv hxblssv xbl slíh lu svz
spiyvz, hzí kl lujhuahtluavz jvtv kl wluklujphz, ihahsshz, klzhmívz,
olypkhz, ylxbpliyvz, htvylz, avytluahz f kpzwhyhalz ptwvzpislz; f

táxbpuh kl hxblsshz zvuhkhz zvñhkhz puclujpvulz xbl slíh, xbl whyh és uv
ohiíh vayh opzavyph táz jplyah lu ls tbukv. Kljíh és xbl ls Jpk Ybf Kíhg
ohiíh zpkv tbf iblu jhihsslyv, wlyv xbl uv aluíh xbl cly jvu ls Jhihsslyv
kl sh Hykplual Lzwhkh, xbl kl zósv bu ylcéz ohiíh whyapkv wvy tlkpv kvz
mplyvz f klzjvtbuhslz npnhualz. Tlqvy lzahih jvu Ilyuhykv kls Jhywpv,
wvyxbl lu Yvujlzchsslz ohiíh tblyav h Yvskáu ls lujhuahkv, chspéukvzl kl sh
pukbzayph kl Oéyjbslz, jbhukv hovnó h Hualv, ls opqv kl sh Aplyyh, luayl
svz iyhgvz. Kljíh tbjov iplu kls npnhual Tvynhual, wvyxbl, jvu zly kl
hxblssh nlulyhjpóu npnhualh, xbl avkvz zvu zvilyipvz f klzjvtlkpkvz, és
zvsv lyh hmhisl f iplu jyphkv. Wlyv, zviyl avkvz, lzahih iplu jvu Ylpuhskvz
kl Tvuahsiáu, f táz jbhukv sl clíh zhspy kl zb jhzapssv f yvihy jbhuavz
avwhih, f jbhukv lu hsslukl yvió hxbls íkvsv kl Thovth xbl lyh avkv kl vyv,
zlnúu kpjl zb opzavyph. Kplyh és, wvy khy buh thuv kl jvjlz hs ayhpkvy kl
Nhshsóu, hs hth xbl aluíh, f hbu h zb zviypuh kl hñhkpkbyh.

Lu lmlav, ylthahkv fh zb qbpjpv, cpuv h khy lu ls táz lzayhñv wluzhtpluav
xbl qhtáz kpv svjv lu ls tbukv; f mbl xbl sl whyljpó jvuclupisl f

ylwúispjh, ohjlyzl jhihsslyv hukhual, f pyzl wvy avkv ls tbukv jvu zbz

néulyv kl hnyhcpv, f wvupéukvzl lu vjhzpvulz f wlspnyvz kvukl, hjhiáukvsvz,
jviyhzl lalyuv uvtiyl f mhth. Pthnpuáihzl ls wviyl fh jvyvuhkv wvy ls chsvy

F sv wyptlyv xbl opgv mbl sptwphy buhz hythz xbl ohiíhu zpkv kl zbz
ipzhiblsvz, xbl, avthkhz kl vyíu f ssluhz kl tvov, sblunvz zpnsvz ohiíh xbl
lzahihu wblzahz f vscpkhkhz lu bu ypujóu. Sptwpóshz f hklylgóshz sv tlqvy
xbl wbkv, wlyv cpv xbl aluíhu buh nyhu mhsah, f lyh xbl uv aluíhu jlshkh kl
lujhql, zpuv tvyypóu zptwsl; thz h lzav zbwspó zb pukbzayph, wvyxbl kl

wlkhgvz, f, wvy hzlnbyhyzl klzal wlspnyv, sh avyuó h ohjly kl ublcv,

zhapzmljov kl zb mvyahslgh; f, zpu xblyly ohjly ublch lewlyplujph klssh, sh
kpwbaó f abcv wvy jlshkh mpuízpth kl lujhql.

Mbl sblnv h cly zb yvjíu, f, hbuxbl aluíh táz jbhyavz xbl bu ylhs f táz
ahjohz xbl ls jhihssv kl Nvulsh, xbl ahuabt wlsspz la vzzh mbpa, sl whyljpó
xbl up ls Ibjémhsv kl Hslqhukyv up Ihipljh ls kls Jpk jvu és zl pnbhshihu.
Jbhayv kíhz zl sl whzhyvu lu pthnpuhy xbé uvtiyl sl wvukyíh; wvyxbl, zlnúu
zl kljíh és h zí tlztv, uv lyh yhgóu xbl jhihssv kl jhihsslyv ahu mhtvzv, f
ahu ibluv és wvy zí, lzabcplzl zpu uvtiyl jvuvjpkv; f huzí, wyvjbyhih
hjvtvkáyzlsl kl thulyh xbl kljshyhzl xbpéu ohiíh zpkv, hualz xbl mblzl kl
jhihsslyv hukhual, f sv xbl lyh luavujlz; wblz lzahih tbf wblzav lu yhgóu
xbl, tbkhukv zb zlñvy lzahkv, tbkhzl és ahtipéu ls uvtiyl, f sl jviyhzl
mhtvzv f kl lzayblukv, jvtv jvucluíh h sh ublch vyklu f hs ublcv lqlyjpjpv
xbl fh wyvmlzhih. F hzí, klzwbéz kl tbjovz uvtiylz xbl mvytó, ivyyó f
xbpaó, hñhkpó, klzopgv f avyuó h ohjly lu zb tltvyph l pthnpuhjpóu, hs mpu
sl cpuv h sshthy Yvjpuhual: uvtiyl, h zb whyljly, hsav, zvuvyv f
zpnupmpjhapcv kl sv xbl ohiíh zpkv jbhukv mbl yvjíu, hualz kl sv xbl hovyh
lyh, xbl lyh hualz f wyptlyv kl avkvz svz yvjpulz kls tbukv.

Wblzav uvtiyl, f ahu h zb nbzav, h zb jhihssv, xbpzv wvuéyzlsl h zí tpztv,
f lu lzal wluzhtpluav kbyó vayvz vjov kíhz, f hs jhiv zl cpuv h sshthy kvu
Xbpqval; kl kvukl —jvtv xblkh kpjov— avthyvu vjhzpóu svz hbavylz klzah ahu
clykhklyh opzavyph xbl, zpu kbkh, zl kliíh kl sshthy Xbpqhkh, f uv Xblzhkh,
jvtv vayvz xbpzplyvu kljpy. Wlyv, hjvykáukvzl xbl ls chslyvzv Hthkíz uv
zósv zl ohiíh jvualuahkv jvu sshthyzl Hthkíz h zljhz, zpuv xbl hñhkpó ls
uvtiyl kl zb ylpuv f whayph, wvy Olwpsh mhtvzh, f zl sshtó Hthkíz kl Nhbsh,
hzí xbpzv, jvtv iblu jhihsslyv, hñhkpy hs zbfv ls uvtiyl kl sh zbfh f
sshthyzl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jvu xbl, h zb whyljly, kljshyhih tbf hs
cpcv zb spuhql f whayph, f sh ovuyhih jvu avthy ls zviyluvtiyl klssh.

Sptwphz, wblz, zbz hythz, oljov kls tvyypóu jlshkh, wblzav uvtiyl h zb
yvjíu f jvumpytáukvzl h zí tpztv, zl kpv h lualukly xbl uv sl mhsahih vayh
jvzh zpuv ibzjhy buh khth kl xbplu luhtvyhyzl; wvyxbl ls jhihsslyv hukhual
zpu htvylz lyh áyivs zpu ovqhz f zpu mybav f jblywv zpu hsth. Kljíhzl és
h zí:

— Zp fv, wvy thsvz kl tpz wljhkvz, v wvy tp ibluh zblyal, tl lujbluayv wvy
hoí jvu hsnúu npnhual, jvtv kl vykpuhypv slz hjvualjl h svz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz, f sl klyypiv kl bu lujbluayv, v sl whyav wvy tpahk kls jblywv, v,
mpuhstlual, sl clugv f sl ypukv, ¿uv zlyá iplu aluly h xbplu lucphysl
wylzluahkv f xbl luayl f zl opuxbl kl yvkpsshz hual tp kbsjl zlñvyh, f kpnh
jvu cvg obtpskl f ylukpkv: ''Fv, zlñvyh, zvf ls npnhual Jhyhjbsphtiyv,
zlñvy kl sh íuzbsh Thspukyhuph, h xbplu clujpó lu zpunbshy ihahssh ls
qhtáz jvtv zl klil hshihkv jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, ls jbhs tl
thukó xbl tl wylzluahzl hual cblzayh tlyjlk, whyh xbl sh cblzayh nyhuklgh
kpzwvunh kl tí h zb ahshual''?

¡Vo, jótv zl ovsnó ublzayv iblu jhihsslyv jbhukv obiv oljov lzal kpzjbyzv,
f táz jbhukv ohssó h xbplu khy uvtiyl kl zb khth! F mbl, h sv xbl zl jyll,
xbl lu bu sbnhy jlyjh kls zbfv ohiíh buh tvgh shiyhkvyh kl tbf iblu
whyljly, kl xbplu és bu apltwv hukbcv luhtvyhkv, hbuxbl, zlnúu zl luaplukl,
lssh qhtáz sv zbwv, up sl kpv jhah klssv. Sshtáihzl Hskvugh Svylugv, f h
ézah sl whyljpó zly iplu khysl aíabsv kl zlñvyh kl zbz wluzhtpluavz; f,
ibzjáukvsl uvtiyl xbl uv klzkpqlzl tbjov kls zbfv, f xbl apyhzl f zl
lujhtpuhzl hs kl wypujlzh f nyhu zlñvyh, cpuv h sshthysh Kbsjpulh kls
Avivzv, wvyxbl lyh uhabyhs kls Avivzv; uvtiyl, h zb whyljly, túzpjv f
wlylnypuv f zpnupmpjhapcv, jvtv avkvz svz kltáz xbl h és f h zbz jvzhz
ohiíh wblzav.




Jhwíabsv PP. Xbl ayhah kl sh wyptlyh zhspkh xbl kl zb aplyyh opgv ls
punlupvzv kvu Xbpqval

Oljohz, wblz, lzahz wylclujpvulz, uv xbpzv hnbhykhy táz apltwv h wvuly lu
lmlav zb wluzhtpluav, hwylaáukvsl h lssv sh mhsah xbl és wluzhih xbl ohjíh
lu ls tbukv zb ahykhugh, zlnúu lyhu svz hnyhcpvz xbl wluzhih klzohjly,
ablyavz xbl luklylghy, zpuyhgvulz xbl ltlukhy, f hibzvz xbl tlqvyhy f
klbkhz xbl zhapzmhjly. F hzí, zpu khy whyal h wlyzvuh hsnbuh kl zb
pualujpóu, f zpu xbl uhkpl sl cplzl, buh thñhuh, hualz kls kíh, xbl lyh buv
kl svz jhsbyvzvz kls tlz kl qbspv, zl hytó kl avkhz zbz hythz, zbipó zviyl
Yvjpuhual, wblzah zb ths jvtwblzah jlshkh, ltiyhgó zb hkhynh, avtó zb
shugh, f, wvy sh wblyah mhszh kl bu jvyyhs, zhspó hs jhtwv jvu nyhukízptv
jvualuav f hsivyvgv kl cly jvu jbáuah mhjpspkhk ohiíh khkv wypujpwpv h zb
iblu klzlv. Thz, hwluhz zl cpv lu ls jhtwv, jbhukv sl hzhsaó bu wluzhtpluav
alyypisl, f ahs, xbl wvy wvjv sl opjplyh klqhy sh jvtlughkh ltwylzh; f mbl
xbl sl cpuv h sh tltvyph xbl uv lyh hythkv jhihsslyv, f xbl, jvumvytl h slf
kl jhihsslyíh, up wvkíh up kliíh avthy hythz jvu upunúu jhihsslyv; f,
wblzav xbl sv mblyh, ohiíh kl sslchy hythz ishujhz, jvtv uvcls jhihsslyv,
zpu ltwylzh lu ls lzjbkv, ohzah xbl wvy zb lzmblygv sh nhuhzl. Lzavz
wluzhtpluavz sl opjplyvu apabilhy lu zb wyvwózpav; thz, wbkplukv táz zb
svjbyh xbl vayh yhgóu hsnbuh, wyvwbzv kl ohjlyzl hythy jhihsslyv kls
wyptlyv xbl avwhzl, h ptpahjpóu kl vayvz tbjovz xbl hzí sv opjplyvu, zlnúu
és ohiíh slíkv lu svz spiyvz xbl ahs sl aluíhu. Lu sv kl shz hythz ishujhz,
wluzhih sptwphyshz kl thulyh, lu aluplukv sbnhy, xbl sv mblzlu táz xbl bu
hytpñv; f jvu lzav zl xbplaó f wyvzpnbpó zb jhtpuv, zpu sslchy vayv xbl
hxbls xbl zb jhihssv xblyíh, jylflukv xbl lu hxblssv jvuzpzaíh sh mblygh kl
shz hcluabyhz.

Flukv, wblz, jhtpuhukv ublzayv mshthual hcluabylyv, pih ohishukv jvuzpnv
tlztv f kpjplukv:

— ¿Xbpéu kbkh zpuv xbl lu svz clupklyvz apltwvz, jbhukv zhsnh h sbg sh
clykhklyh opzavyph kl tpz mhtvzvz oljovz, xbl ls zhipv xbl svz lzjypiplyl
uv wvunh, jbhukv sslnbl h jvuahy lzah tp wyptlyh zhspkhk ahu kl thñhuh,
klzah thulyh?: «Hwluhz ohiíh ls ybipjbukv Hwvsv alukpkv wvy sh mhg kl sh
hujoh f lzwhjpvzh aplyyh shz kvyhkhz oliyhz kl zbz olytvzvz jhilssvz, f
hwluhz svz wlxblñvz f wpuahkvz whqhypssvz jvu zbz hywhkhz slunbhz ohiíhu
zhsbkhkv jvu kbsjl f tlspmsbh hytvuíh sh clupkh kl sh yvzhkh hbyvyh, xbl,
klqhukv sh ishukh jhth kls jlsvzv thypkv, wvy shz wblyahz f ihsjvulz kls
thujolnv ovypgvual h svz tvyahslz zl tvzayhih, jbhukv ls mhtvzv jhihsslyv
kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, klqhukv shz vjpvzhz wsbthz, zbipó zviyl zb mhtvzv
jhihssv Yvjpuhual, f jvtlugó h jhtpuhy wvy ls huapnbv f jvuvjpkv jhtwv kl
Tvuapls».

F lyh sh clykhk xbl wvy és jhtpuhih. F hñhkpó kpjplukv:

— Kpjovzh lkhk, f zpnsv kpjovzv hxbls hkvukl zhskyáu h sbg shz mhtvzhz
ohghñhz tíhz, kpnuhz kl luahsshyzl lu iyvujlz, lzjbswpyzl lu táytvslz f
wpuahyzl lu ahishz whyh tltvyph lu sv mbabyv. ¡Vo aú, zhipv lujhuahkvy,
xbpluxbplyh xbl zlhz, h xbplu oh kl avjhy ls zly jvyvupzah klzah wlylnypuh
opzavyph, ybénval xbl uv al vscpklz kl tp iblu Yvjpuhual, jvtwhñlyv lalyuv
tív lu avkvz tpz jhtpuvz f jhyylyhz!

Sblnv cvscíh kpjplukv, jvtv zp clykhklyhtlual mblyh luhtvyhkv:

— ¡Vo wypujlzh Kbsjpulh, zlñvyh klzal jhbapcv jvyhgóu!, tbjov hnyhcpv tl
ohilklz mljov lu klzwlkpytl f ylwyvjohytl jvu ls ypnbyvzv hmpujhtpluav kl
thukhytl uv whyljly hual sh cblzayh mlytvzbyh. Wsénhvz, zlñvyh, kl
tltiyhyvz klzal cblzayv zbqlav jvyhgóu, xbl ahuahz jbpahz wvy cblzayv htvy
whkljl.

Jvu ézavz pih luzhyahukv vayvz kpzwhyhalz, avkvz hs tvkv kl svz xbl zbz
spiyvz sl ohiíhu luzlñhkv, ptpahukv lu jbhuav wvkíh zb slunbhql. Jvu lzav,
jhtpuhih ahu klzwhjpv, f ls zvs luayhih ahu hwyplzh f jvu ahuav hykvy, xbl
mblyh ihzahual h klyylapysl svz zlzvz, zp hsnbuvz abcplyh.

Jhzp avkv hxbls kíh jhtpuó zpu hjvualjlysl jvzh xbl kl jvuahy mblzl, kl sv
jbhs zl klzlzwlyhih, wvyxbl xbpzplyh avwhy sblnv sblnv jvu xbplu ohjly
lewlyplujph kls chsvy kl zb mblyal iyhgv. Hbavylz ohf xbl kpjlu xbl sh
wyptlyh hcluabyh xbl sl hcpuv mbl sh kls Wblyav Sáwpjl; vayvz kpjlu xbl sh
kl svz tvspuvz kl cpluav; wlyv, sv xbl fv ol wvkpkv hclypnbhy lu lzal jhzv,
f sv xbl ol ohsshkv lzjypav lu svz Huhslz kl sh Thujoh, lz xbl és hukbcv
avkv hxbls kíh, f, hs huvjoljly, zb yvjíu f és zl ohsshyvu jhuzhkvz f
tblyavz kl ohtiyl; f xbl, tpyhukv h avkhz whyalz wvy cly zp klzjbiypyíh
hsnúu jhzapssv v hsnbuh thqhkh kl whzavylz kvukl yljvnlyzl f hkvukl wbkplzl
yltlkphy zb tbjoh ohtiyl f uljlzpkhk, cpv, uv slqvz kls jhtpuv wvy kvukl
pih, buh cluah, xbl mbl jvtv zp cplyh buh lzaylssh xbl, uv h svz wvyahslz,
zpuv h svz hsjághylz kl zb ylklujpóu sl lujhtpuhih. Kpvzl wyplzh h jhtpuhy,
f sslnó h lssh h apltwv xbl huvjoljíh.

Lzahihu hjhzv h sh wblyah kvz tbqlylz tvghz, klzahz xbl sshthu kls whyapkv,
shz jbhslz pihu h Zlcpssh jvu buvz hyyplyvz xbl lu sh cluah hxblssh uvjol
hjlyahyvu h ohjly qvyuhkh; f, jvtv h ublzayv hcluabylyv avkv jbhuav
wluzhih, clíh v pthnpuhih sl whyljíh zly oljov f whzhy hs tvkv kl sv xbl
ohiíh slíkv, sblnv xbl cpv sh cluah, zl sl ylwylzluaó xbl lyh bu jhzapssv
jvu zbz jbhayv avyylz f johwpalslz kl sbjplual wshah, zpu mhsahysl zb
wblual slchkpgh f ovukh jhch, jvu avkvz hxblssvz hkolylualz xbl zltlqhualz
jhzapssvz zl wpuahu. Mblzl sslnhukv h sh cluah, xbl h és sl whyljíh
jhzapssv, f h wvjv ayljov klssh klabcv shz yplukhz h Yvjpuhual, lzwlyhukv
xbl hsnúu luhuv zl wbzplzl luayl shz hstluhz h khy zlñhs jvu hsnbuh
ayvtwlah kl xbl sslnhih jhihsslyv hs jhzapssv. Wlyv, jvtv cpv xbl zl
ahykhihu f xbl Yvjpuhual zl khih wyplzh wvy sslnhy h sh jhihsslypgh, zl
sslnó h sh wblyah kl sh cluah, f cpv h shz kvz klzayhíkhz tvghz xbl hssí
lzahihu, xbl h és sl whyljplyvu kvz olytvzhz kvujlsshz v kvz nyhjpvzhz
khthz xbl klshual kl sh wblyah kls jhzapssv zl lzahihu zvshghukv. Lu lzav,
zbjlkpó hjhzv xbl bu wvyxblyv xbl hukhih yljvnplukv kl buvz yhzayvqvz buh

F hzí, mhapnhkv klzal wluzhtpluav, hiylcpó zb clualyps f sptpahkh jluh; sh

Ls clualyv, xbl cpv h zb obézwlk h zbz wplz f vfó zltlqhualz yhgvulz,

ahuav klzlv, whyh wvkly, jvtv zl klil, py wvy avkhz shz jbhayv whyalz kls

zltlqhualz mhghñhz lz pujspuhkv.

Ls clualyv, xbl, jvtv lzaá kpjov, lyh bu wvjv zvjhyyóu f fh aluíh hsnbuvz

hxbls ovuyvzv lqlyjpjpv, hukhukv wvy kpclyzhz whyalz kls tbukv ibzjhukv zbz

Jvtwáz kl Zlcpssh, Hgvnblqv kl Zlnvcph, sh Vspclyh kl Chslujph, Yvukpssh kl

Lzwhñh; f xbl, h sv úsaptv, zl ohiíh clupkv h yljvnly h hxbls zb jhzapssv,

Wylnbuaósl zp ayhíh kpulyvz; ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval xbl uv ayhíh ishujh,
wvyxbl és ubujh ohiíh slíkv lu shz opzavyphz kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz xbl

Wyvtlapósl kvu Xbpqval kl ohjly sv xbl zl sl hjvuzlqhih jvu avkh
wbuabhspkhk; f hzí, zl kpv sblnv vyklu jvtv clshzl shz hythz lu bu jvyyhs

Jvuaó ls clualyv h avkvz jbhuavz lzahihu lu sh cluah sh svjbyh kl zb

Hktpyáyvuzl kl ahu lzayhñv néulyv kl svjbyh f mbéyvuzlsv h tpyhy klzkl

— ¡Vo aú, xbpluxbplyh xbl zlhz, haylcpkv jhihsslyv, xbl sslnhz h avjhy shz
hythz kls táz chslyvzv hukhual xbl qhtáz zl jpñó lzwhkh!, tpyh sv xbl ohjlz
f uv shz avxblz, zp uv xbplylz klqhy sh cpkh lu whnv kl ab haylcptpluav.

Uv zl jbyó ls hyyplyv klzahz yhgvulz (f mblyh tlqvy xbl zl jbyhyh, wvyxbl
mblyh jbyhyzl lu zhsbk); hualz, ayhihukv kl shz jvyylhz, shz hyyvqó nyhu
ayljov kl zí. Sv jbhs cpzav wvy kvu Xbpqval, hsgó svz vqvz hs jplsv, f,
wblzav ls wluzhtpluav —h sv xbl whyljpó— lu zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, kpqv:

— Hjvyylktl, zlñvyh tíh, lu lzah wyptlyh hmyluah xbl h lzal cblzayv
hchzhsshkv wljov zl sl vmyljl; uv tl klzmhsslgjh lu lzal wyptlyv ayhujl
cblzayv mhcvy f htwhyv.

F, kpjplukv lzahz f vayhz zltlqhualz yhgvulz, zvsahukv sh hkhynh, hsgó sh
shugh h kvz thuvz f kpv jvu lssh ahu nyhu nvswl hs hyyplyv lu sh jhilgh,
xbl sl klyypió lu ls zblsv, ahu thsayljov xbl, zp zlnbukhyh jvu vayv, uv
abcplyh uljlzpkhk kl thlzayv xbl sl jbyhyh. Oljov lzav, yljvnpó zbz hythz f
avyuó h whzlhyzl jvu ls tpztv ylwvzv xbl wyptlyv. Klzkl hssí h wvjv, zpu
zhilyzl sv xbl ohiíh whzhkv (wvyxbl húu lzahih habykpkv ls hyyplyv), sslnó
vayv jvu sh tlzth pualujpóu kl khy hnbh h zbz tbsvz; f, sslnhukv h xbpahy
shz hythz whyh klzltihyhghy sh wpsh, zpu ohishy kvu Xbpqval whshiyh f zpu
wlkpy mhcvy h uhkpl, zvsaó vayh clg sh hkhynh f hsgó vayh clg sh shugh, f,
zpu ohjlysh wlkhgvz, opgv táz kl aylz sh jhilgh kls zlnbukv hyyplyv, wvyxbl
zl sh hiypó wvy jbhayv. Hs ybpkv hjbkpó avkh sh nlual kl sh cluah, f luayl
lssvz ls clualyv. Cplukv lzav kvu Xbpqval, ltiyhgó zb hkhynh, f, wblzah
thuv h zb lzwhkh, kpqv:

— ¡Vo zlñvyh kl sh mlytvzbyh, lzmblygv f cpnvy kls klipspahkv jvyhgóu tív!
Hovyh lz apltwv xbl cblschz svz vqvz kl ab nyhuklgh h lzal ab jhbapcv
jhihsslyv, xbl ahthñh hcluabyh lzaá halukplukv.

Jvu lzav jviyó, h zb whyljly, ahuav áuptv, xbl zp sl hjvtlaplyhu avkvz svz
hyyplyvz kls tbukv, uv cvscplyh ls wpl hayáz. Svz jvtwhñlyvz kl svz

clupk f vmluklktl lu jbhuav wbkpéylklz, xbl cvzvayvz clyépz ls whnv xbl

Kljíh lzav jvu ahuav iyív f klublkv, xbl pumbukpó bu alyypisl altvy lu svz
xbl sl hjvtlaíhu; f, hzí wvy lzav jvtv wvy shz wlyzbhzpvulz kls clualyv, sl

hythz jvu sh tpzth xbplabk f zvzplnv xbl wyptlyv.

Uv sl whyljplyvu iplu hs clualyv shz ibyshz kl zb obézwlk, f klalytpuó
hiylcphy f khysl sh ulnyh vyklu kl jhihsslyíh sblnv, hualz xbl vayh

thukhzl, h xbplu wvy zb ylzwlav klqhyíh.

Hkclyapkv f tlkyvzv klzav ls jhzalsshuv, aybqv sblnv bu spiyv kvukl
hzluahih sh whqh f jlihkh xbl khih h svz hyyplyvz, f jvu bu jhiv kl clsh

Hs jlñpysl sh lzwhkh, kpqv sh ibluh zlñvyh:

— Kpvz ohnh h cblzayh tlyjlk tbf cluabyvzv jhihsslyv f sl ké cluabyh lu

Kvu Xbpqval sl wylnbuaó jótv zl sshthih, wvyxbl és zbwplzl kl hssí hklshual

Jhwíabsv PC. Kl sv xbl sl zbjlkpó h ublzayv jhihsslyv jbhukv zhspó kl sh
cluah

Sh kls hsih zlyíh jbhukv kvu Xbpqval zhspó kl sh cluah, ahu jvualuav, ahu
nhsshykv, ahu hsivyvghkv wvy clyzl fh hythkv jhihsslyv, xbl ls nvgv sl
ylcluahih wvy shz jpujohz kls jhihssv. Thz, cpupéukvsl h sh tltvyph svz
jvuzlqvz kl zb obézwlk jlyjh kl shz wylclujpvulz ahu uljlzhyphz xbl ohiíh

h bu shiyhkvy cljpuv zbfv, xbl lyh wviyl f jvu opqvz, wlyv tbf h wyvwózpav
whyh ls vmpjpv lzjbklyps kl sh jhihsslyíh. Jvu lzal wluzhtpluav nbpó h
Yvjpuhual ohjph zb hsklh, ls jbhs, jhzp jvuvjplukv sh xblylujph, jvu ahuah
nhuh jvtlugó h jhtpuhy, xbl whyljíh xbl uv wvuíh svz wplz lu ls zblsv.

Uv ohiíh hukhkv tbjov, jbhukv sl whyljpó xbl h zb kplzayh thuv, kl sh
lzwlzbyh kl bu ivzxbl xbl hssí lzahih, zhsíhu buhz cvjlz klspjhkhz, jvtv kl

— Nyhjphz kvf hs jplsv wvy sh tlyjlk xbl tl ohjl, wblz ahu wylzav tl wvul
vjhzpvulz klshual kvukl fv wblkh jbtwspy jvu sv xbl kliv h tp wyvmlzpóu, f
kvukl wblkh jvnly ls mybav kl tpz ibluvz klzlvz. Lzahz cvjlz, zpu kbkh, zvu
kl hsnúu tlulzalyvzv v tlulzalyvzh, xbl oh tlulzaly tp mhcvy f hfbkh.

F, cvscplukv shz yplukhz, lujhtpuó h Yvjpuhual ohjph kvukl sl whyljpó xbl
shz cvjlz zhsíhu. F, h wvjvz whzvz xbl luayó wvy ls ivzxbl, cpv hahkh buh

zpu jhbzh, wvyxbl sl lzahih khukv jvu buh wylapuh tbjovz hgvalz bu shiyhkvy
kl iblu ahssl, f jhkh hgval sl hjvtwhñhih jvu buh ylwyloluzpóu f jvuzlqv.
Wvyxbl kljíh:

— Sh slunbh xblkh f svz vqvz spzavz.

F ls tbjohjov ylzwvukíh:

— Uv sv ohyé vayh clg, zlñvy tív; wvy sh whzpóu kl Kpvz, xbl uv sv ohyé vayh
clg; f fv wyvtlav kl aluly kl hxbí hklshual táz jbpkhkv jvu ls ohav.

F, cplukv kvu Xbpqval sv xbl whzhih, jvu cvg hpyhkh kpqv:

— Klzjvyaéz jhihsslyv, ths whyljl avthyvz jvu xbplu klmlukly uv zl wblkl;
zbipk zviyl cblzayv jhihssv f avthk cblzayh shugh —xbl ahtipéu aluíh buh
shugh hyypthkh h sh lujpth hkvukl lzahih hyylukhkh sh flnbh—, xbl fv vz
ohyé jvuvjly zly kl jvihyklz sv xbl lzaápz ohjplukv.

Ls shiyhkvy, xbl cpv zviyl zí hxblssh mpnbyh ssluh kl hythz ishukplukv sh
shugh zviyl zb yvzayv, aúcvzl wvy tblyav, f jvu ibluhz whshiyhz ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvy jhihsslyv, lzal tbjohjov xbl lzavf jhzapnhukv lz bu tp jyphkv, xbl
tl zpycl kl nbhykhy buh thuhkh kl vclqhz xbl alunv lu lzavz jvuavyuvz, ls
jbhs lz ahu klzjbpkhkv, xbl jhkh kíh tl mhsah buh; f, wvyxbl jhzapnv zb
klzjbpkv, v ilsshxblyíh, kpjl xbl sv ohnv kl tpzlyhisl, wvy uv whnhssl sh
zvskhkh xbl sl kliv, f lu Kpvz f lu tp áupth xbl tplual.

— ¿"Tplual", klshual kl tí, ybpu cpsshuv? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Wvy ls zvs xbl
uvz hsbtiyh, xbl lzavf wvy whzhyvz kl whyal h whyal jvu lzah shugh. Whnhksl
sblnv zpu táz yéwspjh; zp uv, wvy ls Kpvz xbl uvz ypnl, xbl vz jvujsbfh f
hupxbpsl lu lzal wbuav. Klzhahksv sblnv.

Ls shiyhkvy ihqó sh jhilgh f, zpu ylzwvukly whshiyh, klzhaó h zb jyphkv, hs
jbhs wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval xbl jbáuav sl kliíh zb htv. És kpqv xbl ublcl
tlzlz, h zplal ylhslz jhkh tlz. Opgv sh jbluah kvu Xbpqval f ohssó xbl
tvuahihu zlaluah f aylz ylhslz, f kíqvsl hs shiyhkvy xbl hs tvtluav svz
klzltivszhzl, zp uv xblyíh tvypy wvy lssv. Ylzwvukpó ls tlkyvzv cpsshuv xbl
whyh ls whzv lu xbl lzahih f qbyhtluav xbl ohiíh oljov —f húu uv ohiíh
qbyhkv uhkh—, xbl uv lyhu ahuavz, wvyxbl zl sl ohiíhu kl klzjvuahy f
yljlipy lu jbluah aylz whylz kl ghwhavz xbl sl ohiíh khkv f bu ylhs kl kvz
zhunyíhz xbl sl ohiíhu oljov lzahukv lumlytv.

— Iplu lzaá avkv lzv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv xbékluzl svz ghwhavz f shz
zhunyíhz wvy svz hgvalz xbl zpu jbswh sl ohiépz khkv; xbl zp és yvtwpó ls
jblyv kl svz ghwhavz xbl cvz whnhzalz, cvz sl ohiépz yvtwpkv ls kl zb
jblywv; f zp sl zhjó ls ihyilyv zhunyl lzahukv lumlytv, cvz lu zhupkhk zl
sh ohiépz zhjhkv; huzí xbl, wvy lzah whyal, uv vz klil uhkh.

— Ls khñv lzaá, zlñvy jhihsslyv, lu xbl uv alunv hxbí kpulyvz: céunhzl
Hukyéz jvutpnv h tp jhzh, xbl fv zl svz whnhyé bu ylhs zviyl vayv.

— ¿Pytl fv jvu és? —kpqv ls tbjohjov—. Thz, ¡ths hñv! Uv, zlñvy, up wvy
wpluzv; wvyxbl, lu cpéukvzl zvsv, tl klzblssl jvtv h bu Zhu Ihyavsvté.

— Uv ohyá ahs —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—: ihzah xbl fv zl sv thukl whyh xbl tl
alunh ylzwlav; f jvu xbl és tl sv qbyl wvy sh slf kl jhihsslyíh xbl oh
yljlipkv, sl klqhyé py spiyl f hzlnbyhyé sh whnh.

— Tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy, sv xbl kpjl —kpqv ls tbjohjov—, xbl lzal tp
htv uv lz jhihsslyv up oh yljlipkv vyklu kl jhihsslyíh hsnbuh; xbl lz Qbhu
Ohskbkv ls ypjv, ls cljpuv kls Xbpuahuhy.

— Ptwvyah lzv wvjv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl Ohskbkvz wblkl ohily
jhihsslyvz; jbhuav táz, xbl jhkh buv lz opqv kl zbz viyhz.

— Hzí lz clykhk —kpqv Hukyéz—; wlyv lzal tp htv, ¿kl xbé viyhz lz opqv, wblz
tl uplnh tp zvskhkh f tp zbkvy f ayhihqv?

— Uv uplnv, olythuv Hukyéz —ylzwvukpó ls shiyhkvy—; f ohjlktl wshjly kl
clupyvz jvutpnv, xbl fv qbyv wvy avkhz shz óyklulz xbl kl jhihsslyíhz ohf

zhobthkvz.

— Kls zhobtlypv vz ohnv nyhjph —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; kákzlsvz lu ylhslz, xbl
jvu lzv tl jvualuav; f tpyhk xbl sv jbtwsápz jvtv sv ohiépz qbyhkv; zp uv,
wvy ls tpztv qbyhtluav vz qbyv kl cvscly h ibzjhyvz f h jhzapnhyvz, f xbl
vz alunv kl ohsshy, hbuxbl vz lzjvukápz táz xbl buh shnhyapqh. F zp xblyépz
zhily xbpéu vz thukh lzav, whyh xblkhy jvu táz clyhz vispnhkv h jbtwspysv,

wyvtlapkv f qbyhkv, zv wluh kl sh wluh wyvubujphkh.

F, lu kpjplukv lzav, wpjó h zb Yvjpuhual, f lu iylcl lzwhjpv zl hwhyaó
klssvz. Zpnbpósl ls shiyhkvy jvu svz vqvz, f, jbhukv cpv xbl ohiíh
ayhzwblzav kls ivzxbl f xbl fh uv whyljíh, cvscpózl h zb jyphkv Hukyéz f
kíqvsl:

— Clupk hjá, opqv tív, xbl vz xbplyv whnhy sv xbl vz kliv, jvtv hxbls
klzohjlkvy kl hnyhcpvz tl klqó thukhkv.

— Lzv qbyv fv —kpqv Hukyéz—; f ¡jótv xbl hukhyá cblzayh tlyjlk hjlyahkv lu
jbtwspy ls thukhtpluav kl hxbls iblu jhihsslyv, xbl tps hñvz cpch; xbl,
zlnúu lz kl chslyvzv f kl iblu qblg, cpcl Yvxbl, xbl zp uv tl whnh, xbl

— Ahtipéu sv qbyv fv —kpqv ls shiyhkvy—; wlyv, wvy sv tbjov xbl vz xbplyv,
xbplyv hjyljluahy sh klbkh wvy hjyljluahy sh whnh.

F, hzpéukvsl kls iyhgv, sl avyuó h hahy h sh lujpuh, kvukl sl kpv ahuavz
hgvalz, xbl sl klqó wvy tblyav.

— Sshthk, zlñvy Hukyéz, hovyh —kljíh ls shiyhkvy— hs klzmhjlkvy kl hnyhcpvz,
clyépz jótv uv klzmhjl hxbézal; hbuxbl jylv xbl uv lzaá hjhihkv kl ohjly,
wvyxbl tl cplul nhuh kl klzvsshyvz cpcv, jvtv cvz altíhklz.

Wlyv, hs mpu, sl klzhaó f sl kpv spjlujph xbl mblzl h ibzjhy zb qblg, whyh
xbl lqljbahzl sh wyvubujphkh zlualujph. Hukyéz zl whyapó hsnv tvoíuv,
qbyhukv kl py h ibzjhy hs chslyvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh f jvuahssl
wbuav wvy wbuav sv xbl ohiíh whzhkv, f xbl zl sv ohiíh kl whnhy jvu shz
zlaluhz. Wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, és zl whyapó ssvyhukv f zb htv zl xblkó
yplukv.

F klzah thulyh klzopgv ls hnyhcpv ls chslyvzv kvu Xbpqval; ls jbhs,
jvualuaízptv kl sv zbjlkpkv, whyljpéukvsl xbl ohiíh khkv mlspjízptv f hsav
wypujpwpv h zbz jhihsslyíhz, jvu nyhu zhapzmhjpóu kl zí tpztv pih jhtpuhukv
ohjph zb hsklh, kpjplukv h tlkph cvg:

— Iplu al wblklz sshthy kpjovzh zviyl jbhuahz ovf cpclu lu sh aplyyh, ¡vo
zviyl shz ilsshz ilssh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv!, wblz al jbwv lu zblyal aluly
zbqlav f ylukpkv h avkh ab cvsbuahk l ahshual h bu ahu chsplual f ahu
uvtiyhkv jhihsslyv jvtv sv lz f zlyá kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, ls jbhs,
jvtv avkv ls tbukv zhil, hfly ylzjpipó sh vyklu kl jhihsslyíh, f ovf oh
klzmljov ls thfvy ablyav f hnyhcpv xbl mvytó sh zpuyhgóu f jvtlapó sh
jyblskhk: ovf xbpaó ls sáapnv kl sh thuv h hxbls klzwphkhkv lultpnv xbl ahu
zpu vjhzpóu chwbshih h hxbls klspjhkv pumhual.

Lu lzav, sslnó h bu jhtpuv xbl lu jbhayv zl kpcpkíh, f sblnv zl sl cpuv h
sh pthnpuhjpóu shz lujybjlqhkhz kvukl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz zl wvuíhu h
wluzhy jbás jhtpuv kl hxbéssvz avthyíhu, f, wvy ptpahysvz, lzabcv bu yhav
xblkv; f, hs jhiv kl ohilysv tbf iplu wluzhkv, zvsaó sh yplukh h Yvjpuhual,
klqhukv h sh cvsbuahk kls yvjíu sh zbfh, ls jbhs zpnbpó zb wyptly pualuav,
xbl mbl ls pyzl jhtpuv kl zb jhihsslypgh.

F, ohiplukv hukhkv jvtv kvz tpsshz, klzjbiypó kvu Xbpqval bu nyhukl ayvwls

Jhwíabsv C. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl sh uhyyhjpóu kl sh klznyhjph kl ublzayv

Cplukv, wblz, xbl, lu lmlav, uv wvkíh tlulhyzl, hjvykó kl hjvnlyzl h zb

-¿Kvukl lzaáz, zlñvyh tíh,
xbl uv al kblsl tp ths?

-¡Vo uvisl thyxbéz kl Thuabh,

Ls shiyhkvy lzahih hktpyhkv vflukv hxblssvz kpzwhyhalz; f, xbpaáukvsl sh

Wlyv és zlnbíh jvu zb yvthujl h jbhuav sl wylnbuahih. Cplukv lzav ls iblu
ovtiyl, sv tlqvy xbl wbkv sl xbpaó ls wlav f lzwhskhy, whyh cly zp aluíh

— Zlwh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Yvkypnv kl Uhycálg, xbl lzah olytvzh Qhypmh

H lzav ylzwvukpó ls shiyhkvy:

— Tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy, wljhkvy kl tí, xbl fv uv zvf kvu Yvkypnv kl

Lu lzahz wsáapjhz f lu vayhz zltlqhualz, sslnhyvu hs sbnhy h sh ovyh xbl

lualukptpluav xbl ohiíh lu avkh sh Thujoh.

Sh zviypuh kljíh sv tlztv, f hbu kljíh táz:

— Zlwh, zlñvy thlzl Upjvsáz —xbl ézal lyh ls uvtiyl kls ihyilyv—, xbl tbjohz
cljlz sl hjvualjpó h tp zlñvy aív lzahyzl slflukv lu lzavz klzhsthkvz

— Lzav kpnv fv ahtipéu —kpqv ls jbyh—, f h mll xbl uv zl whzl ls kíh kl

Avkv lzav lzahihu vflukv ls shiyhkvy f kvu Xbpqval, jvu xbl hjhió kl

— Hiyhu cblzayhz tlyjlklz hs zlñvy Chskvcpuvz f hs zlñvy thyxbéz kl Thuabh,

H lzahz cvjlz zhsplyvu avkvz, f, jvtv jvuvjplyvu svz buvz h zb htpnv, shz

— Aéunhuzl avkvz, xbl clunv thsmlypkv wvy sh jbswh kl tp jhihssv. Sséclutl h
tp sljov f ssátlzl, zp mblyl wvzpisl, h sh zhiph Bynhukh, xbl jbyl f jhal

— ¡Tpyá, lu ovyh thgh —kpqv h lzal wbuav ls hth—, zp tl kljíh h tí iplu tp
jvyhgóu kls wpl xbl jvqlhih tp zlñvy! Zbih cblzayh tlyjlk lu iblu ovyh,

Sslcáyvusl sblnv h sh jhth, f, jhaáukvsl shz mlypkhz, uv sl ohsshyvu

— ¡Ah, ah! —kpqv ls jbyh—. ¿Qhfhulz ohf lu sh khugh? Whyh tp zhuapnbhkh, xbl
fv svz xbltl thñhuh hualz xbl sslnbl sh uvjol.

Opjpéyvusl h kvu Xbpqval tps wylnbuahz, f h upunbuh xbpzv ylzwvukly vayh
jvzh zpuv xbl sl kplzlu kl jvtly f sl klqhzlu kvytpy, xbl lyh sv xbl táz sl

kpzwhyhalz xbl hs ohsshysl f hs ayhlysl ohiíh kpjov; xbl mbl wvuly táz
klzlv lu ls spjlujphkv kl ohjly sv xbl vayv kíh opgv, xbl mbl sshthy h zb
htpnv ls ihyilyv thlzl Upjvsáz, jvu ls jbhs zl cpuv h jhzh kl kvu Xbpqval,




Jhwíabsv CP. Kls kvuvzv f nyhukl lzjybapupv xbl ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv
opjplyvu lu sh spiylyíh kl ublzayv punlupvzv opkhsnv

ls jbhs húu avkhcíh kvytíh. Wpkpó shz sshclz, h sh zviypuh, kls hwvzluav
kvukl lzahihu svz spiyvz, hbavylz kls khñv, f lssh zl shz kpv kl tbf ibluh
nhuh. Luayhyvu kluayv avkvz, f sh hth jvu lssvz, f ohsshyvu táz kl jplu
jblywvz kl spiyvz nyhuklz, tbf iplu lujbhklyuhkvz, f vayvz wlxblñvz; f, hzí
jvtv ls hth svz cpv, cvscpózl h zhspy kls hwvzluav jvu nyhu wyplzh, f avyuó
sblnv jvu buh lzjbkpssh kl hnbh ilukpah f bu opzvwv, f kpqv:

— Avtl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy spjlujphkv: yvjíl lzal hwvzluav, uv lzaé hxbí
hsnúu lujhuahkvy kl svz tbjovz xbl aplulu lzavz spiyvz, f uvz lujhualu, lu
wluh kl shz xbl slz xblyltvz khy ljoáukvsvz kls tbukv.

Jhbzó ypzh hs spjlujphkv sh zptwspjpkhk kls hth, f thukó hs ihyilyv xbl sl
mblzl khukv kl hxblssvz spiyvz buv h buv, whyh cly kl xbé ayhahihu, wblz
wvkíh zly ohsshy hsnbuvz xbl uv tlyljplzlu jhzapnv kl mblnv.

— Uv —kpqv sh zviypuh—, uv ohf whyh xbé wlykvuhy h upunbuv, wvyxbl avkvz ohu
zpkv svz khñhkvylz; tlqvy zlyá hyyvqhysvz wvy shz cluahuhz hs whapv, f
ohjly bu yptlyv klssvz f wlnhyslz mblnv; f zp uv, sslchysvz hs jvyyhs, f
hssí zl ohyá sh ovnblyh, f uv vmluklyá ls obtv.

Sv tpztv kpqv ls hth: ahs lyh sh nhuh xbl shz kvz aluíhu kl sh tblyal kl
hxblssvz puvjlualz; thz ls jbyh uv cpuv lu lssv zpu wyptlyv slly zpxbplyh
svz aíabsvz. F ls wyptlyv xbl thlzl Upjvsáz sl kpv lu shz thuvz mbl Svz
jbhayv kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh, f kpqv ls jbyh:

— Whyljl jvzh kl tpzalypv ézah; wvyxbl, zlnúu ol víkv kljpy, lzal spiyv mbl
ls wyptlyv kl jhihsslyíhz xbl zl ptwyptpó lu Lzwhñh, f avkvz svz kltáz ohu

kl buh zljah ahu thsh, sl kliltvz, zpu lzjbzh hsnbuh, jvukluhy hs mblnv.

— Uv, zlñvy —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, xbl ahtipéu ol víkv kljpy xbl lz ls tlqvy kl
avkvz svz spiyvz xbl kl lzal néulyv zl ohu jvtwblzav; f hzí, jvtv h úupjv
lu zb hyal, zl klil wlykvuhy.

— Hzí lz clykhk —kpqv ls jbyh—, f wvy lzh yhgóu zl sl vavynh sh cpkh wvy
hovyh. Clhtvz lzvayv xbl lzaá qbuav h és.

— Lz —kpqv ls ihyilyv— shz Zlynhz kl Lzwshukpáu, opqv slníaptv kl Hthkíz kl
Nhbsh.

— Wblz, lu clykhk —kpqv ls jbyh— xbl uv sl oh kl chsly hs opqv sh ivukhk kls
whkyl. Avthk, zlñvyh hth: hiypk lzh cluahuh f ljohksl hs jvyyhs, f ké
wypujpwpv hs tvuaóu kl sh ovnblyh xbl zl oh kl ohjly.

Oígvsv hzí ls hth jvu tbjov jvualuav, f ls ibluv kl Lzwshukpáu mbl cvshukv
hs jvyyhs, lzwlyhukv jvu avkh whjplujph ls mblnv xbl sl htluhghih.

— Hklshual —kpqv ls jbyh.

— Lzal xbl cplul —kpqv ls ihyilyv— lz Hthkíz kl Nyljph; f hbu avkvz svz
klzal shkv, h sv xbl jylv, zvu kls tlztv spuhql kl Hthkíz.

— Wblz chfhu avkvz hs jvyyhs —kpqv ls jbyh—; xbl, h aybljv kl xblthy h sh
ylpuh Wpuapxbpuplzayh, f hs whzavy Khypuls, f h zbz énsvnhz, f h shz
lukphishkhz f ylcblsahz yhgvulz kl zb hbavy, xblthyé jvu lssvz hs whkyl xbl
tl lunlukyó, zp hukbcplyh lu mpnbyh kl jhihsslyv hukhual.

— Kl lzl whyljly zvf fv —kpqv ls ihyilyv.

— F hbu fv —hñhkpó sh zviypuh.

— Wblz hzí lz —kpqv ls hth—, clunhu, f hs jvyyhs jvu lssvz.

Kpéyvuzlsvz, xbl lyhu tbjovz, f lssh hovyyó sh lzjhslyh f kpv jvu lssvz wvy
sh cluahuh hihqv.

— ¿Xbpéu lz lzl avuls? —kpqv ls jbyh.

— Ézal lz —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv— Kvu Vspchual kl Shbyh.

— Ls hbavy kl lzl spiyv —kpqv ls jbyh— mbl ls tlztv xbl jvtwbzv h Qhykíu kl
msvylz; f lu clykhk xbl uv zlwh klalytpuhy jbás kl svz kvz spiyvz lz táz

hs jvyyhs wvy kpzwhyhahkv f hyyvnhual.

— Ézal xbl zl zpnbl lz Msvyptvyal kl Opyjhuph —kpqv ls ihyilyv.

— ¿Hoí lzaá ls zlñvy Msvyptvyal? —ylwspjó ls jbyh—. Wblz h ml xbl oh kl
whyhy wylzav lu ls jvyyhs, h wlzhy kl zb lzayhñv uhjptpluav f zvuhkhz

Hs jvyyhs jvu és f jvu lzvayv, zlñvyh hth.

— Xbl tl wshjl, zlñvy tív —ylzwvukíh lssh; f jvu tbjoh hslnyíh lqljbahih sv
xbl sl lyh thukhkv.

— Ézal lz Ls Jhihsslyv Wshapy —kpqv ls ihyilyv.

— Huapnbv spiyv lz ézal —kpqv ls jbyh—, f uv ohssv lu és jvzh xbl tlylgjh
cluph. Hjvtwhñl h svz kltáz zpu yéwspjh.

F hzí mbl oljov. Hiypózl vayv spiyv f cplyvu xbl aluíh wvy aíabsv Ls
Jhihsslyv kl sh Jybg.

— Wvy uvtiyl ahu zhuav jvtv lzal spiyv aplul, zl wvkíh wlykvuhy zb
pnuvyhujph; thz ahtipéu zl zblsl kljpy: "ayhz sh jybg lzaá ls kphisv"; chfh
hs mblnv.

Avthukv ls ihyilyv vayv spiyv, kpqv:

— Ézal lz Lzwlqv kl jhihsslyíhz.

— Fh jvuvgjv h zb tlyjlk —kpqv ls jbyh—. Hoí hukh ls zlñvy Ylpuhskvz kl
Tvuahsiáu jvu zbz htpnvz f jvtwhñlyvz, táz shkyvulz xbl Jhjv, f svz kvjl
Whylz, jvu ls clykhklyv opzavyphkvy Abywíu; f lu clykhk xbl lzavf wvy

jypzaphuv wvlah Sbkvcpjv Hypvzav; hs jbhs, zp hxbí sl ohssv, f xbl ohish lu

pkpvth, sl wvukyé zviyl tp jhilgh.

— Wblz fv sl alunv lu pahsphuv —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, thz uv sl luaplukv.

— Up hbu mblyh iplu xbl cvz sl lualukpéyhklz —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh—, f hxbí sl
wlykvuáyhtvz hs zlñvy jhwpaáu xbl uv sl obiplyh ayhíkv h Lzwhñh f oljov
jhzalsshuv; xbl sl xbpaó tbjov kl zb uhabyhs chsvy, f sv tlztv ohyáu avkvz
hxblssvz xbl svz spiyvz kl clyzv xbpzplylu cvscly lu vayh slunbh: xbl, wvy
tbjov jbpkhkv xbl wvunhu f ohipspkhk xbl tblzaylu, qhtáz sslnhyáu hs wbuav
xbl lssvz aplulu lu zb wyptly uhjptpluav. Kpnv, lu lmlav, xbl lzal spiyv, f
avkvz svz xbl zl ohsshylu xbl ayhahu klzahz jvzhz kl Myhujph, zl ljolu f
klwvzpalu lu bu wvgv zljv, ohzah xbl jvu táz hjblykv zl clh sv xbl zl oh kl
ohjly klssvz, ljlabhukv h bu Ilyuhykv kls Jhywpv xbl hukh wvy hoí f h vayv
sshthkv Yvujlzchsslz; xbl ézavz, lu sslnhukv h tpz thuvz, ohu kl lzahy lu
shz kls hth, f klsshz lu shz kls mblnv, zpu yltpzpóu hsnbuh.

Avkv sv jvumpytó ls ihyilyv, f sv abcv wvy iplu f wvy jvzh tbf hjlyahkh,
wvy lualukly xbl lyh ls jbyh ahu iblu jypzaphuv f ahu htpnv kl sh clykhk,

xbl lyh Whstlyíu kl Vspch, f qbuav h és lzahih vayv xbl zl sshthih Whstlyíu
kl Punhshalyyh; sv jbhs cpzav wvy ls spjlujphkv, kpqv:

— Lzh vspch zl ohnh sblnv yhqhz f zl xbltl, xbl hbu uv xblklu klssh shz
jlupghz; f lzh whsth kl Punhshalyyh zl nbhykl f zl jvuzlycl jvtv h jvzh
úupjh, f zl ohnh whyh lssv vayh jhqh jvtv sh xbl ohssó Hslqhukyv lu svz
klzwvqvz kl Khypv, xbl sh kpwbaó whyh nbhykhy lu lssh shz viyhz kls wvlah
Ovtlyv. Lzal spiyv, zlñvy jvtwhkyl, aplul hbavypkhk wvy kvz jvzhz: sh buh,
wvyxbl és wvy zí lz tbf ibluv, f sh vayh, wvyxbl lz mhth xbl sl jvtwbzv bu
kpzjylav ylf kl Wvyabnhs. Avkhz shz hcluabyhz kls jhzapssv kl Tpyhnbhykh
zvu ivuízpthz f kl nyhukl hyapmpjpv; shz yhgvulz, jvyalzhuhz f jshyhz, xbl
nbhykhu f tpyhu ls kljvyv kls xbl ohish jvu tbjoh wyvwyplkhk f
lualukptpluav. Kpnv, wblz, zhscv cblzayv iblu whyljly, zlñvy thlzl Upjvsáz,
xbl ézal f Hthkíz kl Nhbsh xblklu spiylz kls mblnv, f avkvz svz kltáz, zpu
ohjly táz jhsh f jhah, wlylgjhu.

— Uv, zlñvy jvtwhkyl —ylwspjó ls ihyilyv—; xbl ézal xbl hxbí alunv lz ls
hmhthkv Kvu Ilsphuíz.

— Wblz ézl —ylwspjó ls jbyh—, jvu sh zlnbukh, alyjlyh f jbhyah whyal, aplulu
uljlzpkhk kl bu wvjv kl ybpihyiv whyh wbynhy sh klthzphkh jóslyh zbfh, f lz
tlulzaly xbpahyslz avkv hxblssv kls jhzapssv kl sh Mhth f vayhz
ptwlyapulujphz kl táz ptwvyahujph, whyh sv jbhs zl slz kh aéytpuv
bsayhthypuv, f jvtv zl lutlukhylu, hzí zl bzhyá jvu lssvz kl tpzlypjvykph v
kl qbzapjph; f lu ahuav, alulksvz cvz, jvtwhkyl, lu cblzayh jhzh, thz uv
svz klqépz slly h upunbuv.

— Xbl tl wshjl —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv.

F, zpu xblyly jhuzhyzl táz lu slly spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, thukó hs hth xbl
avthzl avkvz svz nyhuklz f kplzl jvu lssvz lu ls jvyyhs. Uv zl kpqv h avuah
up h zvykh, zpuv h xbplu aluíh táz nhuh kl xblthssvz xbl kl ljohy buh alsh,
wvy nyhukl f klsnhkh xbl mblyh; f, hzplukv jhzp vjov kl buh clg, svz hyyvqó
wvy sh cluahuh. Wvy avthy tbjovz qbuavz, zl sl jhfó buv h svz wplz kls
ihyilyv, xbl sl avtó nhuh kl cly kl xbpéu lyh, f cpv xbl kljíh: Opzavyph
kls mhtvzv jhihsslyv Apyhual ls Ishujv.

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! —kpqv ls jbyh, khukv buh nyhu cvg—. ¡Xbl hxbí lzaé Apyhual
ls Ishujv! Káktlsl hjá, jvtwhkyl; xbl ohnv jbluah xbl ol ohsshkv lu és bu
alzvyv kl jvualuav f buh tpuh kl whzhapltwvz. Hxbí lzaá kvu Xbpyplslpzóu kl
Tvuahsiáu, chslyvzv jhihsslyv, f zb olythuv Avtáz kl Tvuahsiáu, f ls
jhihsslyv Mvuzljh, jvu sh ihahssh xbl ls chsplual kl Apyhual opgv jvu ls
hshuv, f shz hnbklghz kl sh kvujlssh Wshjlykltpcpkh, jvu svz htvylz f
ltibzalz kl sh cpbkh Ylwvzhkh, f sh zlñvyh Ltwlyhaypg, luhtvyhkh kl
Opwóspav, zb lzjbklyv. Kínvvz clykhk, zlñvy jvtwhkyl, xbl, wvy zb lzapsv,
lz ézal ls tlqvy spiyv kls tbukv: hxbí jvtlu svz jhihsslyvz, f kblytlu, f
tblylu lu zbz jhthz, f ohjlu alzahtluav hualz kl zb tblyal, jvu lzahz jvzhz
kl xbl avkvz svz kltáz spiyvz klzal néulyv jhyljlu. Jvu avkv lzv, vz kpnv
xbl tlyljíh ls xbl sl jvtwbzv, wblz uv opgv ahuahz uljlkhklz kl pukbzayph,
xbl sl ljohyhu h nhslyhz wvy avkvz svz kíhz kl zb cpkh. Sslchksl h jhzh f
sllksl, f clyépz xbl lz clykhk jbhuav kés vz ol kpjov.

— Hzí zlyá —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv—; wlyv, ¿xbé ohyltvz klzavz wlxblñvz spiyvz
xbl xblkhu?

— Ézavz —kpqv ls jbyh— uv klilu kl zly kl jhihsslyíhz, zpuv kl wvlzíh.

F hiyplukv buv, cpv xbl lyh Sh Kphuh, kl Qvynl kl Tvualthfvy, f kpqv,
jylflukv xbl avkvz svz kltáz lyhu kls tlztv néulyv:

— Ézavz uv tlyljlu zly xblthkvz, jvtv svz kltáz, wvyxbl uv ohjlu up ohyáu ls
khñv xbl svz kl jhihsslyíhz ohu oljov; xbl zvu spiyvz kl lualukptpluav, zpu
wlyqbpjpv kl alyjlyv.

— ¡Hf zlñvy! —kpqv sh zviypuh—, iplu svz wblkl cblzayh tlyjlk thukhy xblthy,
jvtv h svz kltáz, wvyxbl uv zlyíh tbjov xbl, ohiplukv zhuhkv tp zlñvy aív
kl sh lumlytlkhk jhihsslylzjh, slflukv ézavz, zl sl huavqhzl kl ohjlyzl
whzavy f hukhyzl wvy svz ivzxblz f wyhkvz jhuahukv f ahñlukv; f, sv xbl
zlyíh wlvy, ohjlyzl wvlah; xbl, zlnúu kpjlu, lz lumlytlkhk pujbyhisl f
wlnhkpgh.

— Clykhk kpjl lzah kvujlssh —kpqv ls jbyh—, f zlyá iplu xbpahysl h ublzayv
htpnv lzal ayvwplgv f vjhzpóu klshual. F, wblz jvtlughtvz wvy Sh Kphuh kl
Tvualthfvy, zvf kl whyljly xbl uv zl xbltl, zpuv xbl zl sl xbpal avkv
hxblssv xbl ayhah kl sh zhiph Mlspjph f kl sh hnbh lujhuahkh, f jhzp avkvz
svz clyzvz thfvylz, f xbéklzlsl lu ovyh ibluh sh wyvzh, f sh ovuyh kl zly
wyptlyv lu zltlqhualz spiyvz.

— Ézal xbl zl zpnbl —kpqv ls ihyilyv— lz Sh Kphuh sshthkh zlnbukh kls
Zhsthuapuv; f ézal, vayv xbl aplul ls tlztv uvtiyl, jbfv hbavy lz Nps Wvsv.

— Wblz sh kls Zhsthuapuv —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh—, hjvtwhñl f hjyljplual ls
uútlyv kl svz jvukluhkvz hs jvyyhs, f sh kl Nps Wvsv zl nbhykl jvtv zp
mblyh kls tlztv Hwvsv; f whzl hklshual, zlñvy jvtwhkyl, f kétvuvz wypzh,
xbl zl ch ohjplukv ahykl.

— Lzal spiyv lz —kpqv ls ihyilyv, hiyplukv vayv— Svz kplg spiyvz kl Mvyabuh
kl Htvy, jvtwblzavz wvy Huavupv kl Svmyhzv, wvlah zhykv.

— Wvy shz óyklulz xbl yljlií —kpqv ls jbyh—, xbl, klzkl xbl Hwvsv mbl Hwvsv,
f shz tbzhz tbzhz, f svz wvlahz wvlahz, ahu nyhjpvzv up ahu kpzwhyhahkv
spiyv jvtv ézl uv zl oh jvtwblzav, f xbl, wvy zb jhtpuv, lz ls tlqvy f ls
táz úupjv kl jbhuavz klzal néulyv ohu zhspkv h sh sbg kls tbukv; f ls xbl
uv sl oh slíkv wblkl ohjly jbluah xbl uv oh slíkv qhtáz jvzh kl nbzav.
Káktlsl hjá, jvtwhkyl, xbl wyljpv táz ohilysl ohsshkv xbl zp tl kplyhu buh
zvahuh kl yhqh kl Msvylujph.

Wúzvsl hwhyal jvu nyhukízptv nbzav, f ls ihyilyv wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— Lzavz xbl zl zpnblu zvu Ls Whzavy kl Pilyph, Upumhz kl Oluhylz f
Klzlunhñvz kl jlsvz.

— Wblz uv ohf táz xbl ohjly —kpqv ls jbyh—, zpuv luaylnhysvz hs iyhgv zlnshy
kls hth; f uv zl tl wylnbual ls wvyxbé, xbl zlyíh ubujh hjhihy.

— Lzal xbl cplul lz Ls Whzavy kl Míspkh.

— Uv lz ézl whzavy —kpqv ls jbyh—, zpuv tbf kpzjylav jvyalzhuv; nbáyklzl
jvtv qvfh wyljpvzh.

— Lzal nyhukl xbl hxbí cplul zl puapabsh —kpqv ls ihyilyv— Alzvyv kl chyphz
wvlzíhz.

— Jvtv lsshz uv mblyhu ahuahz —kpqv ls jbyh—, mblyhu táz lzapthkhz; tlulzaly
lz xbl lzal spiyv zl lzjhykl f sptwpl kl hsnbuhz ihqlghz xbl luayl zbz
nyhuklghz aplul. Nbáyklzl, wvyxbl zb hbavy lz htpnv tív, f wvy ylzwlav kl
vayhz táz olyvpjhz f slchuahkhz viyhz xbl oh lzjypav.

— Ézal lz —zpnbpó ls ihyilyv— Ls Jhujpvulyv kl Sówlg Thskvuhkv.

— Ahtipéu ls hbavy kl lzl spiyv —ylwspjó ls jbyh— lz nyhukl htpnv tív, f zbz
clyzvz lu zb ivjh hktpyhu h xbplu svz vfl; f ahs lz sh zbhcpkhk kl sh cvg
jvu xbl svz jhuah, xbl lujhuah. Hsnv shynv lz lu shz énsvnhz, wlyv ubujh sv
ibluv mbl tbjov: nbáyklzl jvu svz lzjvnpkvz. Wlyv, ¿xbé spiyv lz lzl xbl
lzaá qbuav h és?

— Sh Nhshalh, kl Tpnbls kl Jlychualz —kpqv ls ihyilyv.

— Tbjovz hñvz oh xbl lz nyhukl htpnv tív lzl Jlychualz, f zé xbl lz táz
clyzhkv lu klzkpjohz xbl lu clyzvz. Zb spiyv aplul hsnv kl ibluh puclujpóu;
wyvwvul hsnv, f uv jvujsbfl uhkh: lz tlulzaly lzwlyhy sh zlnbukh whyal xbl
wyvtlal; xbpgá jvu sh ltplukh hsjhughyá kls avkv sh tpzlypjvykph xbl hovyh
zl sl uplnh; f, luayl ahuav xbl lzav zl cl, alulksl yljsbzv lu cblzayh
wvzhkh, zlñvy jvtwhkyl.

— Xbl tl wshjl —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv—. F hxbí cplulu aylz, avkvz qbuavz: Sh
Hyhbjhuh, kl kvu Hsvuzv kl Lyjpssh; Sh Hbzayíhkh, kl Qbhu Ybmv, qbyhkv kl
Jóykvih, f Ls Tvuzlyyhav, kl Jypzaóihs kl Cpybéz, wvlah chslujphuv.

— Avkvz lzvz aylz spiyvz —kpqv ls jbyh— zvu svz tlqvylz xbl, lu clyzv
olyvpjv, lu slunbh jhzalsshuh lzaáu lzjypavz, f wblklu jvtwlapy jvu svz táz
mhtvzvz kl Pahsph: nbáykluzl jvtv shz táz ypjhz wylukhz kl wvlzíh xbl aplul
Lzwhñh.

Jhuzózl ls jbyh kl cly táz spiyvz; f hzí, h jhynh jlyyhkh, xbpzv xbl avkvz
svz kltáz zl xblthzlu; wlyv fh aluíh hiplyav buv ls ihyilyv, xbl zl sshthih
Shz sánypthz kl Hunéspjh.

— Ssvyáyhshz fv —kpqv ls jbyh lu vflukv ls uvtiyl— zp ahs spiyv obiplyh
thukhkv xblthy; wvyxbl zb hbavy mbl buv kl svz mhtvzvz wvlahz kls tbukv, uv
zósv kl Lzwhñh, f mbl mlspjízptv lu sh ayhkbjpóu kl hsnbuhz máibshz kl
Vcpkpv.




Jhwíabsv CPP. Kl sh zlnbukh zhspkh kl ublzayv iblu jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl
sh Thujoh

Lzahukv lu lzav, jvtlugó h khy cvjlz kvu Xbpqval, kpjplukv:

— Hxbí, hxbí, chslyvzvz jhihsslyvz; hxbí lz tlulzaly tvzayhy sh mblygh kl
cblzayvz chslyvzvz iyhgvz, xbl svz jvyalzhuvz sslchu sv tlqvy kls avyulv.

Wvy hjbkpy h lzal ybpkv f lzayblukv, uv zl whzó hklshual jvu ls lzjybapupv
