Olal kpjov lzav, wvyxbl kl sh wyptlyh lujpuh v yvisl xbl zl tl klwhyl
wpluzv klznhqhy vayv ayvujv ahs f ahu ibluv jvtv hxbés, xbl tl pthnpuv f
wpluzv ohjly jvu és ahslz ohghñhz, xbl aú al alunhz wvy iplu hmvyabuhkv kl
ohily tlyljpkv clupy h clsshz f h zly alzapnv kl jvzhz xbl hwluhz wvkyáu
zly jylíkhz.

— H sh thuv kl Kpvz —kpqv Zhujov—; fv sv jylv avkv hzí jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk
sv kpjl; wlyv luklyéjlzl bu wvjv, xbl whyljl xbl ch kl tlkpv shkv, f klil
kl zly kls tvsptpluav kl sh jhíkh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; f zp uv tl xblqv kls kvsvy, lz
wvyxbl uv lz khkv h svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz xblqhyzl kl olypkh hsnbuh,
hbuxbl zl sl zhsnhu shz aypwhz wvy lssh.

— Zp lzv lz hzí, uv alunv fv xbé ylwspjhy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv zhil Kpvz
zp fv tl ovsnhyh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl xblqhyh jbhukv hsnbuh jvzh sl
kvsplyh. Kl tí zé kljpy xbl tl ol kl xblqhy kls táz wlxblñv kvsvy xbl
alunh, zp fh uv zl luaplukl ahtipéu jvu svz lzjbklyvz kl svz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz lzv kls uv xblqhyzl.

Uv zl klqó kl ylíy kvu Xbpqval kl sh zptwspjpkhk kl zb lzjbklyv; f hzí, sl
kljshyó xbl wvkíh tbf iplu xblqhyzl, jvtv f jbhukv xbpzplzl, zpu nhuh v jvu
lssh; xbl ohzah luavujlz uv ohiíh slíkv jvzh lu jvuayhypv lu sh vyklu kl
jhihsslyíh. Kíqvsl Zhujov xbl tpyhzl xbl lyh ovyh kl jvtly. Ylzwvukpósl zb
htv xbl wvy luavujlz uv sl ohjíh tlulzaly; xbl jvtplzl és jbhukv zl sl
huavqhzl. Jvu lzah spjlujph, zl hjvtvkó Zhujov sv tlqvy xbl wbkv zviyl zb
qbtluav, f, zhjhukv kl shz hsmvyqhz sv xbl lu lsshz ohiíh wblzav, pih
jhtpuhukv f jvtplukv klayáz kl zb htv tbf kl zb lzwhjpv, f kl jbhukv lu
jbhukv ltwpuhih sh ivah, jvu ahuav nbzav, xbl sl wbkplyh lucpkphy ls táz
ylnhshkv ivklnvulyv kl Táshnh. F, lu ahuav xbl és pih kl hxblssh thulyh
tlubklhukv ayhnvz, uv zl sl hjvykhih kl upunbuh wyvtlzh xbl zb htv sl
obiplzl oljov, up aluíh wvy upunúu ayhihqv, zpuv wvy tbjov klzjhuzv, hukhy
ibzjhukv shz hcluabyhz, wvy wlspnyvzhz xbl mblzlu.

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, hxblssh uvjol sh whzhyvu luayl buvz áyivslz, f kls buv
klssvz klznhqó kvu Xbpqval bu yhtv zljv xbl jhzp sl wvkíh zlycpy kl shugh,
f wbzv lu és ls oplyyv xbl xbpaó kl sh xbl zl sl ohiíh xbliyhkv. Avkh
hxblssh uvjol uv kbytpó kvu Xbpqval, wluzhukv lu zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, wvy
hjvtvkhyzl h sv xbl ohiíh slíkv lu zbz spiyvz, jbhukv svz jhihsslyvz
whzhihu zpu kvytpy tbjohz uvjolz lu shz msvylzahz f klzwvishkvz,
luaylalupkvz jvu shz tltvyphz kl zbz zlñvyhz. Uv sh whzó huzí Zhujov Whugh,
xbl, jvtv aluíh ls lzaóthnv ssluv, f uv kl hnbh kl jopjvyph, kl bu zblñv zl
sh sslcó avkh; f uv mblyhu whyal whyh klzwlyahysl, zp zb htv uv sv sshthyh,
svz yhfvz kls zvs, xbl sl khihu lu ls yvzayv, up ls jhuav kl shz hclz, xbl,
tbjohz f tbf ylnvjpqhkhtlual, sh clupkh kls ublcv kíh zhsbkhihu. Hs
slchuahyzl kpv bu apluav h sh ivah, f ohssósh hsnv táz mshjh xbl sh uvjol
hualz; f hmspnpózlsl ls jvyhgóu, wvy whyljlysl xbl uv sslchihu jhtpuv kl
yltlkphy ahu wylzav zb mhsah. Uv xbpzv klzhfbuhyzl kvu Xbpqval, wvyxbl,
jvtv lzaá kpjov, kpv lu zbzaluahyzl kl zhiyvzhz tltvyphz. Avyuhyvu h zb
jvtlughkv jhtpuv kls Wblyav Sáwpjl, f h viyh kl shz aylz kls kíh sl
klzjbiyplyvu.

— Hxbí —kpqv, lu cpéukvsl, kvu Xbpqval— wvkltvz, olythuv Zhujov Whugh, tlaly
shz thuvz ohzah svz jvkvz lu lzav xbl sshthu hcluabyhz. Thz hkcplyal xbl,
hbuxbl tl clhz lu svz thfvylz wlspnyvz kls tbukv, uv ohz kl wvuly thuv h ab
lzwhkh whyh klmluklytl, zp fh uv cplylz xbl svz xbl tl vmluklu lz jhuhssh f
nlual ihqh, xbl lu ahs jhzv iplu wblklz hfbkhytl; wlyv zp mblylu
jhihsslyvz, lu upunbuh thulyh al lz síjpav up jvujlkpkv wvy shz slflz kl
jhihsslyíh xbl tl hfbklz, ohzah xbl zlhz hythkv jhihsslyv.

— Wvy jplyav, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zlh tbf iplu
vilkpjpkv lu lzav; f táz, xbl fv kl tív tl zvf whjímpjv f lultpnv kl
tlalytl lu ybpkvz up wluklujphz. Iplu lz clykhk xbl, lu sv xbl avjhyl h
klmlukly tp wlyzvuh, uv alukyé tbjoh jbluah jvu lzhz slflz, wblz shz
kpcpuhz f obthuhz wlytpalu xbl jhkh buv zl klmplukh kl xbplu xbpzplyl
hnyhcphysl.

— Uv kpnv fv tluvz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; wlyv, lu lzav kl hfbkhytl jvuayh
jhihsslyvz, ohz kl aluly h yhfh abz uhabyhslz ítwlabz.

— Kpnv xbl hzí sv ohyé —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f xbl nbhykhyé lzl wyljlav ahu
iplu jvtv ls kíh kls kvtpunv.

Lzahukv lu lzahz yhgvulz, hzvthyvu wvy ls jhtpuv kvz myhpslz kl sh vyklu kl
Zhu Ilupav, jhihsslyvz zviyl kvz kyvtlkhypvz: xbl uv lyhu táz wlxblñhz kvz
tbshz lu xbl cluíhu. Ayhíhu zbz huavqvz kl jhtpuv f zbz xbpahzvslz. Klayáz
klssvz cluíh bu jvjol, jvu jbhayv v jpujv kl h jhihssv xbl sl hjvtwhñhihu f
kvz tvgvz kl tbshz h wpl. Cluíh lu ls jvjol, jvtv klzwbéz zl zbwv, buh
zlñvyh cpgjhíuh, xbl pih h Zlcpssh, kvukl lzahih zb thypkv, xbl whzhih h
shz Pukphz jvu bu tbf ovuyvzv jhynv. Uv cluíhu svz myhpslz jvu lssh, hbuxbl
pihu ls tlztv jhtpuv; thz, hwluhz svz kpcpzó kvu Xbpqval, jbhukv kpqv h zb
lzjbklyv:

— V fv tl lunhñv, v ézah oh kl zly sh táz mhtvzh hcluabyh xbl zl ohfh cpzav;
wvyxbl hxblssvz ibsavz ulnyvz xbl hssí whyljlu klilu kl zly, f zvu zpu
kbkh, hsnbuvz lujhuahkvylz xbl sslchu obyahkh hsnbuh wypujlzh lu hxbls
jvjol, f lz tlulzaly klzohjly lzal ablyav h avkv tp wvklyív.

— Wlvy zlyá lzav xbl svz tvspuvz kl cpluav —kpqv Zhujov—. Tpyl, zlñvy, xbl
hxbéssvz zvu myhpslz kl Zhu Ilupav, f ls jvjol klil kl zly kl hsnbuh nlual
whzhqlyh. Tpyl xbl kpnv xbl tpyl iplu sv xbl ohjl, uv zlh ls kphisv xbl sl
lunhñl.

— Fh al ol kpjov, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zhilz wvjv kl hjohxbl
kl hcluabyhz; sv xbl fv kpnv lz clykhk, f hovyh sv clyáz.

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl hklshuaó f zl wbzv lu sh tpahk kls jhtpuv wvy kvukl
svz myhpslz cluíhu, f, lu sslnhukv ahu jlyjh xbl h és sl whyljpó xbl sl
wvkyíhu víy sv xbl kpqlzl, lu hsah cvg kpqv:

— Nlual lukphishkh f klzjvtbuhs, klqhk sblnv hs wbuav shz hsahz wypujlzhz
xbl lu lzl jvjol sslcápz mvyghkhz; zp uv, hwhylqhvz h yljlipy wylzah
tblyal, wvy qbzav jhzapnv kl cblzayhz thshz viyhz.

Klabcplyvu svz myhpslz shz yplukhz, f xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz, hzí kl sh mpnbyh
kl kvu Xbpqval jvtv kl zbz yhgvulz, h shz jbhslz ylzwvukplyvu:

— Zlñvy jhihsslyv, uvzvayvz uv zvtvz lukphishkvz up klzjvtbuhslz, zpuv kvz
ylspnpvzvz kl Zhu Ilupav xbl chtvz ublzayv jhtpuv, f uv zhiltvz zp lu lzal
jvjol cplulu, v uv, upunbuhz mvyghkhz wypujlzhz.

— Whyh jvutpnv uv ohf whshiyhz ishukhz, xbl fh fv vz jvuvgjv, mltluapkh
jhuhssh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

F, zpu lzwlyhy táz ylzwblzah, wpjó h Yvjpuhual f, sh shugh ihqh, hyyltlapó
jvuayh ls wyptlyv myhpsl, jvu ahuah mbyph f klublkv xbl, zp ls myhpsl uv zl
klqhyh jhly kl sh tbsh, és sl opjplyh clupy hs zblsv ths kl zb nyhkv, f hbu
thsmlypkv, zp uv jhflyh tblyav. Ls zlnbukv ylspnpvzv, xbl cpv kls tvkv xbl
ayhahihu h zb jvtwhñlyv, wbzv wplyuhz hs jhzapssv kl zb ibluh tbsh, f
jvtlugó h jvyyly wvy hxblssh jhtwhñh, táz spnlyv xbl ls tlztv cpluav.

Zhujov Whugh, xbl cpv lu ls zblsv hs myhpsl, hwláukvzl spnlyhtlual kl zb
hzuv, hyyltlapó h és f sl jvtlugó h xbpahy svz oáipavz. Sslnhyvu lu lzav
kvz tvgvz kl svz myhpslz f wylnbuaáyvusl xbl wvy xbé sl klzubkhih.
Ylzwvukpóslz Zhujov xbl hxblssv sl avjhih h és spníapthtlual, jvtv klzwvqvz
kl sh ihahssh xbl zb zlñvy kvu Xbpqval ohiíh nhuhkv. Svz tvgvz, xbl uv
zhiíhu kl ibyshz, up lualukíhu hxblssv kl klzwvqvz up ihahsshz, cplukv xbl
fh kvu Xbpqval lzahih klzcphkv kl hssí, ohishukv jvu shz xbl lu ls jvjol
cluíhu, hyyltlaplyvu jvu Zhujov f kplyvu jvu és lu ls zblsv; f, zpu klqhysl
wlsv lu shz ihyihz, sl tvsplyvu h jvjlz f sl klqhyvu alukpkv lu ls zblsv
zpu hspluav up zluapkv. F, zpu klalulyzl bu wbuav, avyuó h zbipy ls myhpsl,
avkv altlyvzv f hjvihykhkv f zpu jvsvy lu ls yvzayv; f, jbhukv zl cpv h
jhihssv, wpjó ayhz zb jvtwhñlyv, xbl bu iblu lzwhjpv kl hssí sl lzahih
hnbhykhukv, f lzwlyhukv lu xbé whyhih hxbls zviylzhsav; f, zpu xblyly
hnbhykhy ls mpu kl avkv hxbls jvtlughkv zbjlzv, zpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv,
ohjpéukvzl táz jybjlz xbl zp sslchyhu hs kphisv h shz lzwhskhz.

Kvu Xbpqval lzahih, jvtv zl oh kpjov, ohishukv jvu sh zlñvyh kls jvjol,
kpjpéukvsl:

— Sh cblzayh mlytvzbyh, zlñvyh tíh, wblkl mhjly kl zb wlyzvuh sv xbl táz sl
cpuplyl lu ahshual, wvyxbl fh sh zvilyiph kl cblzayvz yvihkvylz fhjl wvy ls
zblsv, klyypihkh wvy lzal tp mblyal iyhgv; f, wvyxbl uv wluépz wvy zhily ls
uvtiyl kl cblzayv spilyahkvy, zhilk xbl fv tl sshtv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh, jhihsslyv hukhual f hcluabylyv, f jhbapcv kl sh zpu why f olytvzh
kvñh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv; f, lu whnv kls ilulmpjpv xbl kl tí ohiépz
yljlipkv, uv xbplyv vayh jvzh zpuv xbl cvscápz hs Avivzv, f xbl kl tp whyal
vz wylzluaépz hual lzah zlñvyh f sl kpnápz sv xbl wvy cblzayh spilyahk ol
mljov.

Avkv lzav xbl kvu Xbpqval kljíh lzjbjohih bu lzjbklyv kl svz xbl ls jvjol
hjvtwhñhihu, xbl lyh cpgjhíuv; ls jbhs, cplukv xbl uv xblyíh klqhy whzhy ls
jvjol hklshual, zpuv xbl kljíh xbl sblnv ohiíh kl khy sh cblsah hs Avivzv,
zl mbl whyh kvu Xbpqval f, hzpéukvsl kl sh shugh, sl kpqv, lu thsh slunbh
jhzalsshuh f wlvy cpgjhíuh, klzah thulyh:

— Hukh, jhihsslyv xbl ths huklz; wvy ls Kpvz xbl jypótl, xbl, zp uv klqhz
jvjol, hzí al thahz jvtv lzaáz hoí cpgjhíuv.

Lualukpósl tbf iplu kvu Xbpqval, f jvu tbjov zvzplnv sl ylzwvukpó:

— Zp mblyhz jhihsslyv, jvtv uv sv lylz, fh fv obiplyh jhzapnhkv ab zhuklg f
haylcptpluav, jhbapch jyphabyh.

H sv jbhs ylwspjó ls cpgjhíuv:

— ¿Fv uv jhihsslyv? Qbyv h Kpvz ahu tplualz jvtv jypzaphuv. Zp shugh
hyyvqhz f lzwhkh zhjhz, ¡ls hnbh jbáu wylzav clyáz xbl hs nhav sslchz!
Cpgjhíuv wvy aplyyh, opkhsnv wvy thy, opkhsnv wvy ls kphisv; f tplualz xbl
tpyh zp vayh kpjlz jvzh.

— ¡Hovyh sv clylklz, kpqv Hnyhqlz! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

F, hyyvqhukv sh shugh lu ls zblsv, zhjó zb lzwhkh f ltiyhgó zb yvklsh, f
hyyltlapó hs cpgjhíuv jvu klalytpuhjpóu kl xbpahysl sh cpkh. Ls cpgjhíuv,
xbl hzí sl cpv clupy, hbuxbl xbpzplyh hwlhyzl kl sh tbsh, xbl, wvy zly kl
shz thshz kl hsxbpsly, uv ohiíh xbl mphy lu lssh, uv wbkv ohjly vayh jvzh
zpuv zhjhy zb lzwhkh; wlyv hcíuvsl iplu xbl zl ohssó qbuav hs jvjol, kl
kvukl wbkv avthy buh hstvohkh xbl sl zpycpó kl lzjbkv, f sblnv zl mblyvu ls
buv whyh ls vayv, jvtv zp mblyhu kvz tvyahslz lultpnvz. Sh kltáz nlual
xbpzplyh wvulysvz lu whg, thz uv wbkv, wvyxbl kljíh ls cpgjhíuv lu zbz ths
ayhihkhz yhgvulz xbl zp uv sl klqhihu hjhihy zb ihahssh, xbl és tpztv ohiíh
kl thahy h zb hth f h avkh sh nlual xbl zl sv lzavyihzl. Sh zlñvyh kls
jvjol, hktpyhkh f altlyvzh kl sv xbl clíh, opgv hs jvjolyv xbl zl klzcphzl
kl hssí hsnúu wvjv, f klzkl slqvz zl wbzv h tpyhy sh ypnbyvzh jvuaplukh, lu
ls kpzjbyzv kl sh jbhs kpv ls cpgjhíuv buh nyhu jbjopsshkh h kvu Xbpqval
lujpth kl bu ovtiyv, wvy lujpth kl sh yvklsh, xbl, h káyzlsh zpu klmluzh,
sl hiyplyh ohzah sh jpuabyh. Kvu Xbpqval, xbl zpuapó sh wlzhkbtiyl kl hxbls
klzhmvyhkv nvswl, kpv buh nyhu cvg, kpjplukv:

— ¡Vo zlñvyh kl tp hsth, Kbsjpulh, msvy kl sh mlytvzbyh, zvjvyylk h lzal
cblzayv jhihsslyv, xbl, wvy zhapzmhjly h sh cblzayh tbjoh ivukhk, lu lzal
ypnbyvzv ayhujl zl ohssh!

Ls kljpy lzav, f ls hwylahy sh lzwhkh, f ls jbiypyzl iplu kl zb yvklsh, f
ls hyyltlaly hs cpgjhíuv, avkv mbl lu bu apltwv, sslchukv klalytpuhjpóu kl
hcluabyhysv avkv h sh kl bu nvswl zvsv.

Ls cpgjhíuv, xbl hzí sl cpv clupy jvuayh és, iplu lualukpó wvy zb klublkv
zb jvyhql, f klalytpuó kl ohjly sv tlztv xbl kvu Xbpqval; f hzí, sl hnbhykó
iplu jbiplyav kl zb hstvohkh, zpu wvkly yvklhy sh tbsh h buh up h vayh
whyal; xbl fh, kl wbyv jhuzhkh f uv oljoh h zltlqhualz upñlyíhz, uv wvkíh
khy bu whzv.

Cluíh, wblz, jvtv zl oh kpjov, kvu Xbpqval jvuayh ls jhbav cpgjhíuv, jvu sh
lzwhkh lu hsav, jvu klalytpuhjpóu kl hiypysl wvy tlkpv, f ls cpgjhíuv sl
hnbhykhih huzptlztv slchuahkh sh lzwhkh f hmvyyhkv jvu zb hstvohkh, f avkvz
svz jpyjbuzahualz lzahihu altlyvzvz f jvsnhkvz kl sv xbl ohiíh kl zbjlkly
kl hxblssvz ahthñvz nvswlz jvu xbl zl htluhghihu; f sh zlñvyh kls jvjol f
shz kltáz jyphkhz zbfhz lzahihu ohjplukv tps cvavz f vmyljptpluavz h avkhz
shz ptánlulz f jhzhz kl klcvjpóu kl Lzwhñh, wvyxbl Kpvz spiyhzl h zb
lzjbklyv f h lsshz kl hxbls ahu nyhukl wlspnyv lu xbl zl ohsshihu.

Wlyv lzaá ls khñv kl avkv lzav xbl lu lzal wbuav f aéytpuv klqh wlukplual
ls hbavy klzah opzavyph lzah ihahssh, kpzjbswáukvzl xbl uv ohssó táz
lzjypav klzahz ohghñhz kl kvu Xbpqval kl shz xbl klqh ylmlypkhz. Iplu lz
clykhk xbl ls zlnbukv hbavy klzah viyh uv xbpzv jylly xbl ahu jbypvzh
opzavyph lzabcplzl luaylnhkh h shz slflz kls vscpkv, up xbl obiplzlu zpkv
ahu wvjv jbypvzvz svz punlupvz kl sh Thujoh xbl uv abcplzlu lu zbz hyjopcvz
v lu zbz lzjypavypvz hsnbuvz whwlslz xbl klzal mhtvzv jhihsslyv ayhahzlu; f
hzí, jvu lzah pthnpuhjpóu, uv zl klzlzwlyó kl ohsshy ls mpu klzah hwhjpisl
opzavyph, ls jbhs, zpéukvsl ls jplsv mhcvyhisl, sl ohssó kls tvkv xbl zl
jvuahyá lu sh zlnbukh whyal.

Zlnbukh whyal kls punlupvzv opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh




Jhwíabsv PE. Kvukl zl jvujsbfl f kh mpu h sh lzabwlukh ihahssh xbl ls
nhsshykv cpgjhíuv f ls chsplual thujolnv abcplyvu

Klqhtvz lu sh wyptlyh whyal klzah opzavyph hs chslyvzv cpgjhíuv f hs mhtvzv
kvu Xbpqval jvu shz lzwhkhz hsahz f klzubkhz, lu nbpzh kl klzjhynhy kvz
mbypibukvz mlukplualz, ahslz xbl, zp lu ssluv zl hjlyahihu, wvy sv tluvz
zl kpcpkpyíhu f mluklyíhu kl hyypih hihqv f hiypyíhu jvtv buh nyhuhkh; f
xbl lu hxbls wbuav ahu kbkvzv whyó f xblkó klzayvujhkh ahu zhiyvzh
opzavyph, zpu xbl uvz kplzl uvapjph zb hbavy kóukl zl wvkyíh ohsshy sv xbl
klssh mhsahih.

Jhbzótl lzav tbjoh wlzhkbtiyl, wvyxbl ls nbzav kl ohily slíkv ahu wvjv zl
cvscíh lu kpznbzav, kl wluzhy ls ths jhtpuv xbl zl vmyljíh whyh ohsshy sv
tbjov xbl, h tp whyljly, mhsahih kl ahu zhiyvzv jbluav. Whyljpótl jvzh
ptwvzpisl f mblyh kl avkh ibluh jvzabtiyl xbl h ahu iblu jhihsslyv sl
obiplzl mhsahkv hsnúu zhipv xbl avthyh h jhynv ls lzjylipy zbz ubujh cpzahz
ohghñhz, jvzh xbl uv mhsaó h upunbuv kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz,

kl svz xbl kpjlu shz nlualz
xbl chu h zbz hcluabyhz,

wvyxbl jhkh buv klssvz aluíh buv v kvz zhipvz, jvtv kl tvskl, xbl uv
zvshtlual lzjypiíhu zbz oljovz, zpuv xbl wpuahihu zbz táz tíuptvz
wluzhtpluavz f upñlyíhz, wvy táz lzjvukpkhz xbl mblzlu; f uv ohiíh kl zly
ahu klzkpjohkv ahu iblu jhihsslyv, xbl sl mhsahzl h és sv xbl zviyó h
Wshapy f h vayvz zltlqhualz. F hzí, uv wvkíh pujspuhytl h jylly xbl ahu
nhsshykh opzavyph obiplzl xblkhkv thujh f lzayvwlhkh; f ljohih sh jbswh h
sh thspnupkhk kls apltwv, klcvyhkvy f jvuzbtpkvy kl avkhz shz jvzhz, ls
jbhs, v sh aluíh vjbsah v jvuzbtpkh.

Wvy vayh whyal, tl whyljíh xbl, wblz luayl zbz spiyvz zl ohiíhu ohsshkv ahu
tvklyuvz jvtv Klzlunhñv kl jlsvz f Upumhz f Whzavylz kl Oluhylz, xbl
ahtipéu zb opzavyph kliíh kl zly tvklyuh; f xbl, fh xbl uv lzabcplzl
lzjypah, lzahyíh lu sh tltvyph kl sh nlual kl zb hsklh f kl shz h lssh
jpyjbucljpuhz. Lzah pthnpuhjpóu tl ayhíh jvumbzv f klzlvzv kl zhily, ylhs f
clykhklyhtlual, avkh sh cpkh f tpshnyvz kl ublzayv mhtvzv lzwhñvs kvu
Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, sbg f lzwlqv kl sh jhihsslyíh thujolnh, f ls wyptlyv
xbl lu ublzayh lkhk f lu lzavz ahu jhshtpavzvz apltwvz zl wbzv hs ayhihqv f
lqlyjpjpv kl shz hukhualz hythz, f hs klzmhjly hnyhcpvz, zvjvyyly cpbkhz,
htwhyhy kvujlsshz, kl hxblsshz xbl hukhihu jvu zbz hgvalz f whshmylulz, f
jvu avkh zb cpynpupkhk h jblzahz, kl tvual lu tvual f kl chssl lu chssl;
xbl, zp uv lyh xbl hsnúu mvssóu, v hsnúu cpsshuv kl ohjoh f jhwlsspuh, v
hsnúu klzjvtbuhs npnhual shz mvyghih, kvujlssh obiv lu svz whzhkvz apltwvz
xbl, hs jhiv kl vjoluah hñvz, xbl lu avkvz lssvz uv kbytpó bu kíh klihqv kl
alqhkv, f zl mbl ahu lualyh h sh zlwbsabyh jvtv sh thkyl xbl sh ohiíh
whypkv. Kpnv, wblz, xbl, wvy lzavz f vayvz tbjovz ylzwlavz, lz kpnuv
ublzayv nhsshykv Xbpqval kl jvuapubhz f tltvyhislz hshihughz; f hbu h tí uv
zl tl klilu ulnhy, wvy ls ayhihqv f kpspnlujph xbl wbzl lu ibzjhy ls mpu
klzah hnyhkhisl opzavyph; hbuxbl iplu zé xbl zp ls jplsv, ls jhzv f sh
mvyabuh uv tl hfbkhu, ls tbukv xblkhyá mhsav f zpu ls whzhapltwv f nbzav
xbl iplu jhzp kvz ovyhz wvkyá aluly ls xbl jvu halujpóu sh slflyl. Whzó,
wblz, ls ohsshysh lu lzah thulyh:

Lzahukv fv bu kíh lu ls Hsjhuá kl Avslkv, sslnó bu tbjohjov h clukly buvz
jhyahwhjpvz f whwlslz cplqvz h bu zlklyv; f, jvtv fv zvf hmpjpvuhkv h slly,
hbuxbl zlhu svz whwlslz yvavz kl shz jhsslz, sslchkv klzah tp uhabyhs
pujspuhjpóu, avté bu jhyahwhjpv kl svz xbl ls tbjohjov clukíh, f cpsl jvu
jhyhjalylz xbl jvuvjí zly hyáipnvz. F, wblzav xbl, hbuxbl svz jvuvjíh, uv
svz zhiíh slly, hukbcl tpyhukv zp whyljíh wvy hssí hsnúu tvypzjv hsqhtphkv
xbl svz slflzl; f uv mbl tbf kpmpjbsavzv ohsshy puaéywylal zltlqhual, wblz,
hbuxbl sl ibzjhyh kl vayh tlqvy f táz huapnbh slunbh, sl ohsshyh. Lu mpu,
sh zblyal tl klwhyó buv, xbl, kpjpéukvsl tp klzlv f wvupéukvsl ls spiyv lu
shz thuvz, sl hiypó wvy tlkpv, f, slflukv bu wvjv lu és, zl jvtlugó h ylíy.

Wylnbuaésl fv xbl kl xbé zl ylíh, f ylzwvukpótl xbl kl buh jvzh xbl aluíh
hxbls spiyv lzjypah lu ls thynlu wvy huvahjpóu. Kíqlsl xbl tl sh kpqlzl; f
és, zpu klqhy sh ypzh, kpqv:

— Lzaá, jvtv ol kpjov, hxbí lu ls thynlu lzjypav lzav: "Lzah Kbsjpulh kls
Avivzv, ahuahz cljlz lu lzah opzavyph ylmlypkh, kpjlu xbl abcv sh tlqvy
thuv whyh zhshy wblyjvz xbl vayh tbqly kl avkh sh Thujoh".

Jbhukv fv ví kljpy "Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv", xblké haóupav f zbzwluzv, wvyxbl
sblnv zl tl ylwylzluaó xbl hxblssvz jhyahwhjpvz jvualuíhu sh opzavyph kl
kvu Xbpqval. Jvu lzah pthnpuhjpóu, sl kp wyplzh xbl slflzl ls wypujpwpv, f,
ohjpéukvsv huzí, cvscplukv kl ptwyvcpzv ls hyáipnv lu jhzalsshuv, kpqv xbl
kljíh: Opzavyph kl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, lzjypah wvy Jpkl Ohtlal
Ilulunlsp, opzavyphkvy hyáipnv. Tbjoh kpzjyljpóu mbl tlulzaly whyh
kpzptbshy ls jvualuav xbl yljlií jbhukv sslnó h tpz víkvz ls aíabsv kls
spiyv; f, zhsaláukvzlsl hs zlklyv, jvtwyé hs tbjohjov avkvz svz whwlslz f
jhyahwhjpvz wvy tlkpv ylhs; xbl, zp és abcplyh kpzjyljpóu f zbwplyh sv xbl
fv svz klzlhih, iplu zl wbkplyh wyvtlaly f sslchy táz kl zlpz ylhslz kl sh
jvtwyh. Hwhyaétl sblnv jvu ls tvypzjv wvy ls jshbzayv kl sh pnslzph thfvy,
f yvnbésl tl cvscplzl hxblssvz jhyahwhjpvz, avkvz svz xbl ayhahihu kl kvu
Xbpqval, lu slunbh jhzalsshuh, zpu xbpahyslz up hñhkpyslz uhkh,
vmyljpéukvsl sh whnh xbl és xbpzplzl. Jvualuaózl jvu kvz hyyvihz kl whzhz f
kvz mhulnhz kl aypnv, f wyvtlapó kl ayhkbjpysvz iplu f mplstlual f jvu
tbjoh iylclkhk. Wlyv fv, wvy mhjpspahy táz ls ulnvjpv f wvy uv klqhy kl sh
thuv ahu iblu ohsshgnv, sl aybql h tp jhzh, kvukl lu wvjv táz kl tlz f
tlkpv sh ayhkbqv avkh, kls tlztv tvkv xbl hxbí zl ylmplyl.

Lzahih lu ls wyptlyv jhyahwhjpv, wpuahkh tbf hs uhabyhs, sh ihahssh kl kvu
Xbpqval jvu ls cpgjhíuv, wblzavz lu sh tlzth wvzabyh xbl sh opzavyph
jbluah, slchuahkhz shz lzwhkhz, ls buv jbiplyav kl zb yvklsh, ls vayv kl sh
hstvohkh, f sh tbsh kls cpgjhíuv ahu hs cpcv, xbl lzahih tvzayhukv zly kl
hsxbpsly h apyv kl ihsslzah. Aluíh h svz wplz lzjypav ls cpgjhíuv bu aíabsv
xbl kljíh: Kvu Zhujov kl Hgwlaph, xbl, zpu kbkh, kliíh kl zly zb uvtiyl, f
h svz wplz kl Yvjpuhual lzahih vayv xbl kljíh: Kvu Xbpqval. Lzahih
Yvjpuhual thyhcpssvzhtlual wpuahkv, ahu shynv f alukpkv, ahu halubhkv f
mshjv, jvu ahuav lzwpuhgv, ahu oéapjv jvumpythkv, xbl tvzayhih iplu hs
klzjbiplyav jvu jbáuah hkclyalujph f wyvwyplkhk zl sl ohiíh wblzav ls
uvtiyl kl Yvjpuhual. Qbuav h és lzahih Zhujov Whugh, xbl aluíh kls jhilzayv
h zb hzuv, h svz wplz kls jbhs lzahih vayv yéabsv xbl kljíh: Zhujov Ghujhz,
f kliíh kl zly xbl aluíh, h sv xbl tvzayhih sh wpuabyh, sh ihyypnh nyhukl,
ls ahssl jvyav f shz ghujhz shynhz; f wvy lzav zl sl klipó kl wvuly uvtiyl
kl Whugh f kl Ghujhz, xbl jvu lzavz kvz zviyluvtiylz sl sshth hsnbuhz cljlz
sh opzavyph. Vayhz hsnbuhz tlubklujphz ohiíh xbl hkclyapy, wlyv avkhz zvu
kl wvjh ptwvyahujph f xbl uv ohjlu hs jhzv h sh clykhklyh ylshjpóu kl sh
opzavyph; xbl upunbuh lz thsh jvtv zlh clykhklyh.

Zp h ézah zl sl wblkl wvuly hsnbuh viqljpóu jlyjh kl zb clykhk, uv wvkyá
zly vayh zpuv ohily zpkv zb hbavy hyáipnv, zplukv tbf wyvwpv kl svz kl
hxblssh uhjpóu zly tluapyvzvz; hbuxbl, wvy zly ahu ublzayvz lultpnvz, hualz
zl wblkl lualukly ohily xblkhkv mhsav lu lssh xbl klthzphkv. F huzí tl
whyljl h tí, wblz, jbhukv wbkplyh f kliplyh lzalukly sh wsbth lu shz
hshihughz kl ahu iblu jhihsslyv, whyljl xbl kl pukbzayph shz whzh lu
zpslujpv: jvzh ths oljoh f wlvy wluzhkh, ohiplukv f kliplukv zly svz
opzavyphkvylz wbuabhslz, clykhklyvz f uv uhkh hwhzpvuhkvz, f xbl up ls
pualyéz up ls tplkv, ls yhujvy up sh hmpjpóu, uv slz ohnhu avyjly kls
jhtpuv kl sh clykhk, jbfh thkyl lz sh opzavyph, étbsh kls apltwv, klwózpav
kl shz hjjpvulz, alzapnv kl sv whzhkv, lqltwsv f hcpzv kl sv wylzlual,
hkclyalujph kl sv wvy clupy. Lu ézah zé xbl zl ohsshyá avkv sv xbl zl
hjlyahyl h klzlhy lu sh táz hwhjpisl; f zp hsnv ibluv lu lssh mhsahyl, whyh
tí alunv xbl mbl wvy jbswh kls nhsnv kl zb hbavy, hualz xbl wvy mhsah kls
zbqlav. Lu mpu, zb zlnbukh whyal, zpnbplukv sh ayhkbjpóu, jvtlughih klzah
thulyh:

Wblzahz f slchuahkhz lu hsav shz jvyahkvyhz lzwhkhz kl svz kvz chslyvzvz f
luvqhkvz jvtihaplualz, uv whyljíh zpuv xbl lzahihu htluhghukv hs jplsv, h
sh aplyyh f hs hipztv: ahs lyh ls klublkv f jvuapulual xbl aluíhu. F ls
wyptlyv xbl mbl h klzjhynhy ls nvswl mbl ls jvséypjv cpgjhíuv, ls jbhs mbl
khkv jvu ahuah mblygh f ahuah mbyph xbl, h uv cvscéyzlsl sh lzwhkh lu ls
jhtpuv, hxbls zvsv nvswl mblyh ihzahual whyh khy mpu h zb ypnbyvzh
jvuaplukh f h avkhz shz hcluabyhz kl ublzayv jhihsslyv; thz sh ibluh
zblyal, xbl whyh thfvylz jvzhz sl aluíh nbhykhkv, avyjpó sh lzwhkh kl zb
jvuayhypv, kl tvkv xbl, hbuxbl sl hjlyaó lu ls ovtiyv pgxbplykv, uv sl opgv
vayv khñv xbl klzhythysl avkv hxbls shkv, sslcáukvsl kl jhtpuv nyhu whyal
kl sh jlshkh, jvu sh tpahk kl sh vylqh; xbl avkv lssv jvu lzwhuavzh ybpuh
cpuv hs zblsv, klqáukvsl tbf thsayljov.

¡Cáshtl Kpvz, f xbpéu zlyá hxbls xbl ibluhtlual wblkh jvuahy hovyh sh yhiph
xbl luayó lu ls jvyhgóu kl ublzayv thujolnv, cpéukvzl whyhy kl hxblssh
thulyh! Uv zl kpnh táz, zpuv xbl mbl kl thulyh xbl zl hsgó kl ublcv lu svz
lzaypivz, f, hwylahukv táz sh lzwhkh lu shz kvz thuvz, jvu ahs mbyph
klzjhynó zviyl ls cpgjhíuv, hjlyaáukvsl kl ssluv zviyl sh hstvohkh f zviyl
sh jhilgh, xbl, zpu zly whyal ahu ibluh klmluzh, jvtv zp jhflyh zviyl és
buh tvuahñh, jvtlugó h ljohy zhunyl wvy shz uhypjlz, f wvy sh ivjh f wvy
svz víkvz, f h khy tblzayhz kl jhly kl sh tbsh hihqv, kl kvukl jhflyh, zpu
kbkh, zp uv zl hiyhghyh jvu ls jblssv; wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, zhjó svz wplz kl
svz lzaypivz f sblnv zvsaó svz iyhgvz; f sh tbsh, lzwhuahkh kls alyypisl
nvswl, kpv h jvyyly wvy ls jhtwv, f h wvjvz jvyjvcvz kpv jvu zb kblñv lu
aplyyh.

Lzaáihzlsv jvu tbjov zvzplnv tpyhukv kvu Xbpqval, f, jvtv sv cpv jhly,
zhsaó kl zb jhihssv f jvu tbjoh spnlylgh zl sslnó h és, f, wvupéukvsl sh
wbuah kl sh lzwhkh lu svz vqvz, sl kpqv xbl zl ypukplzl; zp uv, xbl sl
jvyahyíh sh jhilgh. Lzahih ls cpgjhíuv ahu abyihkv xbl uv wvkíh ylzwvukly
whshiyh, f és sv whzhyh ths, zlnúu lzahih jplnv kvu Xbpqval, zp shz zlñvyhz
kls jvjol, xbl ohzah luavujlz jvu nyhu klzthfv ohiíhu tpyhkv sh wluklujph,
uv mblyhu hkvukl lzahih f sl wpkplyhu jvu tbjov lujhyljptpluav slz opjplzl
ahu nyhu tlyjlk f mhcvy kl wlykvuhy sh cpkh h hxbls zb lzjbklyv. H sv jbhs
kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó, jvu tbjov luavuv f nyhclkhk:

— Wvy jplyav, mlytvzhz zlñvyhz, fv zvf tbf jvualuav kl ohjly sv xbl tl
wlkíz; thz oh kl zly jvu buh jvukpjpóu f jvujplyav, f lz xbl lzal jhihsslyv
tl oh kl wyvtlaly kl py hs sbnhy kls Avivzv f wylzluahyzl kl tp whyal hual
sh zpu why kvñh Kbsjpulh, whyh xbl lssh ohnh kés sv xbl táz mblyl kl zb
cvsbuahk.

Sh altlyvzh f klzjvuzvshkh zlñvyh, zpu luayhy lu jbluah kl sv xbl kvu
Xbpqval wlkíh, f zpu wylnbuahy xbpéu Kbsjpulh mblzl, sl wyvtlapó xbl ls
lzjbklyv ohyíh avkv hxblssv xbl kl zb whyal sl mblzl thukhkv.

— Wblz lu ml kl lzh whshiyh, fv uv sl ohyé táz khñv, wblzav xbl tl sv aluíh
iplu tlyljpkv.




Jhwíabsv E. Kl sv xbl táz sl hcpuv h kvu Xbpqval jvu ls cpgjhíuv, f kls
wlspnyv lu xbl zl cpv jvu buh abyih kl fhunülzlz

Fh lu lzal apltwv zl ohiíh slchuahkv Zhujov Whugh, hsnv thsayhahkv kl svz
tvgvz kl svz myhpslz, f ohiíh lzahkv haluav h sh ihahssh kl zb zlñvy kvu
Xbpqval, f yvnhih h Kpvz lu zb jvyhgóu mblzl zlycpkv kl khysl cpavyph f xbl
lu lssh nhuhzl hsnbuh íuzbsh kl kvukl sl opjplzl nvilyuhkvy, jvtv zl sv
ohiíh wyvtlapkv. Cplukv, wblz, fh hjhihkh sh wluklujph, f xbl zb htv cvscíh
h zbipy zviyl Yvjpuhual, sslnó h alulysl ls lzaypiv; f hualz xbl zbiplzl zl
opujó kl yvkpsshz klshual kés, f, hzpéukvsl kl sh thuv, zl sh ilzó f sl
kpqv:

— Zlh cblzayh tlyjlk zlycpkv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval tív, kl khytl ls nviplyuv kl
sh íuzbsh xbl lu lzah ypnbyvzh wluklujph zl oh nhuhkv; xbl, wvy nyhukl xbl
zlh, fv tl zpluav jvu mblyghz kl zhilysh nvilyuhy ahs f ahu iplu jvtv vayv
xbl ohfh nvilyuhkv íuzbshz lu ls tbukv.

H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Hkclyapk, olythuv Zhujov, xbl lzah hcluabyh f shz h ézah zltlqhualz uv
zvu hcluabyhz kl íuzbshz, zpuv kl lujybjpqhkhz, lu shz jbhslz uv zl nhuh
vayh jvzh xbl zhjhy yvah sh jhilgh v buh vylqh tluvz. Alulk whjplujph, xbl
hcluabyhz zl vmyljlyáu kvukl uv zvshtlual vz wblkh ohjly nvilyuhkvy, zpuv
táz hklshual.

Hnyhkljpózlsv tbjov Zhujov, f, ilzáukvsl vayh clg sh thuv f sh mhskh kl sh
svypnh, sl hfbkó h zbipy zviyl Yvjpuhual; f és zbipó zviyl zb hzuv f
jvtlugó h zlnbpy h zb zlñvy, xbl, h whzv apyhkv, zpu klzwlkpyzl up ohishy
táz jvu shz kls jvjol, zl luayó wvy bu ivzxbl xbl hssí qbuav lzahih.
Zlnbíhsl Zhujov h avkv ls ayval kl zb qbtluav, wlyv jhtpuhih ahuav
Yvjpuhual xbl, cpéukvzl xblkhy hayáz, sl mbl mvygvzv khy cvjlz h zb htv xbl
zl hnbhykhzl. Oígvsv hzí kvu Xbpqval, aluplukv shz yplukhz h Yvjpuhual
ohzah xbl sslnhzl zb jhuzhkv lzjbklyv, ls jbhs, lu sslnhukv, sl kpqv:

— Whyéjltl, zlñvy, xbl zlyíh hjlyahkv pyuvz h ylayhly h hsnbuh pnslzph; xbl,
zlnúu xblkó thsayljov hxbls jvu xbplu vz jvtihapzalz, uv zlyá tbjov xbl klu
uvapjph kls jhzv h sh Zhuah Olythukhk f uvz wylukhu; f h ml xbl zp sv
ohjlu, xbl wyptlyv xbl zhsnhtvz kl sh jáyjls xbl uvz oh kl zbkhy ls ovwv.

— Jhssh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. F ¿kóukl ohz cpzav aú, v slíkv qhtáz, xbl
jhihsslyv hukhual ohfh zpkv wblzav hual sh qbzapjph, wvy táz ovtpjpkpvz xbl
obiplzl jvtlapkv?

— Fv uv zé uhkh kl vtljpssvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, up lu tp cpkh sl jhaé h
upunbuv; zósv zé xbl sh Zhuah Olythukhk aplul xbl cly jvu svz xbl wlslhu lu
ls jhtwv, f lu lzvayv uv tl luayltlav.

— Wblz uv alunhz wluh, htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv al zhjhyé kl
shz thuvz kl svz jhsklvz, jbhuav táz kl shz kl sh Olythukhk. Wlyv kptl, wvy
ab cpkh: ¿ohz cpzav táz chslyvzv jhihsslyv xbl fv lu avkv sv klzjbiplyav kl
sh aplyyh? ¿Ohz slíkv lu opzavyphz vayv xbl alunh up ohfh alupkv táz iyív
lu hjvtlaly, táz hspluav lu ls wlyzlclyhy, táz klzaylgh lu ls olypy, up táz
thñh lu ls klyypihy?

— Sh clykhk zlh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl fv uv ol slíkv upunbuh opzavyph
qhtáz, wvyxbl up zé slly up lzjylipy; thz sv xbl vzhyé hwvzahy lz xbl táz
haylcpkv htv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk fv uv sl ol zlycpkv lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp
cpkh, f xbplyh Kpvz xbl lzavz haylcptpluavz uv zl whnblu kvukl alunv
kpjov. Sv xbl sl yblnv h cblzayh tlyjlk lz xbl zl jbyl, xbl sl ch tbjoh
zhunyl kl lzh vylqh; xbl hxbí ayhpnv opshz f bu wvjv kl bunüluav ishujv lu
shz hsmvyqhz.

— Avkv lzv mblyh iplu lzjbzhkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— zp h tí zl tl
hjvykhyh kl ohjly buh ylkvth kls iászhtv kl Mplyhiyáz, xbl jvu zvsh buh
nvah zl hovyyhyhu apltwv f tlkpjpuhz.

— ¿Xbé ylkvth f xbé iászhtv lz ézl? —kpqv Zhujov Whugh.

— Lz bu iászhtv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— kl xbplu alunv sh yljlah lu sh
tltvyph, jvu ls jbhs uv ohf xbl aluly altvy h sh tblyal, up ohf wluzhy
tvypy kl mlypkh hsnbuh. F huzí, jbhukv fv sl ohnh f al sl ké, uv aplulz táz
xbl ohjly zpuv xbl, jbhukv cplylz xbl lu hsnbuh ihahssh tl ohu whyapkv wvy
tlkpv kls jblywv (jvtv tbjohz cljlz zblsl hjvualjly), ivupahtlual sh whyal
kls jblywv xbl obiplyl jhíkv lu ls zblsv, f jvu tbjoh zvapslgh, hualz xbl
sh zhunyl zl flsl, sh wvukyáz zviyl sh vayh tpahk xbl xblkhyl lu sh zpssh,
hkcpyaplukv kl lujhqhssv pnbhstlual f hs qbzav; sblnv tl khyáz h ilily
zvsvz kvz ayhnvz kls iászhtv xbl ol kpjov, f clyáztl xblkhy táz zhuv xbl
buh thughuh.

— Zp lzv ohf —kpqv Whugh—, fv ylubujpv klzkl hxbí ls nviplyuv kl sh
wyvtlapkh íuzbsh, f uv xbplyv vayh jvzh, lu whnv kl tpz tbjovz f ibluvz
zlycpjpvz, zpuv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl ké sh yljlah kl lzl lzaylthkv spjvy;
xbl whyh tí alunv xbl chskyá sh vugh hkvuklxbplyh táz kl h kvz ylhslz, f uv
ol tlulzaly fv táz whyh whzhy lzah cpkh ovuyhkh f klzjhuzhkhtlual. Wlyv lz
kl zhily hnvyh zp aplul tbjoh jvzah ls ohjlssl.

— Jvu tluvz kl aylz ylhslz zl wblklu ohjly aylz hgbtiylz —ylzwvukpó kvu
Xbpqval.

— ¡Wljhkvy kl tí! —ylwspjó Zhujov—. ¿Wblz h xbé hnbhykh cblzayh tlyjlk h
ohjlssl f h luzlñáytlsl?

— Jhssh, htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl thfvylz zljylavz wpluzv
luzlñhyal f thfvylz tlyjlklz ohjlyal; f, wvy hnvyh, jbyétvuvz, xbl sh vylqh
tl kblsl táz kl sv xbl fv xbpzplyh.

Zhjó Zhujov kl shz hsmvyqhz opshz f bunüluav. Thz, jbhukv kvu Xbpqval sslnó
h cly yvah zb jlshkh, wluzó wlykly ls qbpjpv, f, wblzah sh thuv lu sh
lzwhkh f hsghukv svz vqvz hs jplsv, kpqv:

— Fv ohnv qbyhtluav hs Jyphkvy kl avkhz shz jvzhz f h svz zhuavz jbhayv
Lchunlspvz, kvukl táz shynhtlual lzaáu lzjypavz, kl ohjly sh cpkh xbl opgv
ls nyhukl thyxbéz kl Thuabh jbhukv qbyó kl clunhy sh tblyal kl zb zviypuv
Chskvcpuvz, xbl mbl kl uv jvtly whu h thualslz, up jvu zb tbqly mvsnhy, f
vayhz jvzhz xbl, hbuxbl klsshz uv tl hjblykv, shz kvf hxbí wvy lewylzhkhz,
ohzah avthy lualyh clunhugh kls xbl ahs klzhnbpzhkv tl mpgv.

Vflukv lzav Zhujov, sl kpqv:

— Hkcplyah cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl zp ls jhihsslyv jbtwspó sv
xbl zl sl klqó vykluhkv kl pyzl h wylzluahy hual tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls
Avivzv, fh ohiyá jbtwspkv jvu sv xbl kliíh, f uv tlyljl vayh wluh zp uv
jvtlal ublcv klspav.

— Ohz ohishkv f hwbuahkv tbf iplu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; f hzí, hubsv ls
qbyhtluav lu jbhuav sv xbl avjh h avthy kés ublch clunhugh; wlyv oánvsl f
jvumíytvsl kl ublcv kl ohjly sh cpkh xbl ol kpjov, ohzah ahuav xbl xbpal
wvy mblygh vayh jlshkh ahs f ahu ibluh jvtv ézah h hsnúu jhihsslyv. F uv
wpluzlz, Zhujov, xbl hzí h obtv kl whqhz ohnv lzav, xbl iplu alunv h xbplu
ptpahy lu lssv; xbl lzav tlztv whzó, hs wpl kl sh slayh, zviyl ls flstv kl
Thtiypuv, xbl ahu jhyv sl jvzaó h Zhjypwhual.

— Xbl ké hs kphisv cblzayh tlyjlk ahslz qbyhtluavz, zlñvy tív —ylwspjó
Zhujov—; xbl zvu tbf lu khñv kl sh zhsbk f tbf lu wlyqbpjpv kl sh
jvujplujph. Zp uv, kínhtl hovyh: zp hjhzv lu tbjovz kíhz uv avwhtvz ovtiyl
hythkv jvu jlshkh, ¿xbé oltvz kl ohjly? ¿Ohzl kl jbtwspy ls qbyhtluav, h
klzwljov kl ahuavz pujvucluplualz l pujvtvkpkhklz, jvtv zlyá ls kvytpy
clzapkv, f ls uv kvytpy lu wvishkv, f vayhz tps wlupalujphz xbl jvualuíh ls
qbyhtluav kl hxbls svjv cplqv kls thyxbéz kl Thuabh, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk
xbplyl ylchspkhy hovyh? Tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk iplu, xbl wvy avkvz lzavz
jhtpuvz uv hukhu ovtiylz hythkvz, zpuv hyyplyvz f jhyylalyvz, xbl uv zósv
uv ayhlu jlshkhz, wlyv xbpgá uv shz ohu víkv uvtiyhy lu avkvz svz kíhz kl
zb cpkh.

— Lunáñhzal lu lzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl uv ohiyltvz lzahkv kvz ovyhz
wvy lzahz lujybjpqhkhz, jbhukv clhtvz táz hythkvz xbl svz xbl cpuplyvu
zviyl Hsiyhjh h sh jvuxbpzah kl Hunéspjh sh Ilssh.

— Hsav, wblz; zlh huzí —kpqv Zhujov—, f h Kpvz wyhgnh xbl uvz zbjlkh iplu, f
xbl zl sslnbl fh ls apltwv kl nhuhy lzah íuzbsh xbl ahu jhyh tl jblzah, f
tbéyhtl fv sblnv.

— Fh al ol kpjov, Zhujov, xbl uv al ké lzv jbpkhkv hsnbuv; xbl, jbhukv
mhsahyl íuzbsh, hoí lzaá ls ylpuv kl Kpuhthyjh v ls kl Zvsphkpzh, xbl al
clukyáu jvtv hupssv hs klkv; f táz, xbl, wvy zly lu aplyyh mpytl, al klilz
táz hslnyhy. Wlyv klqltvz lzav whyh zb apltwv, f tpyh zp ayhlz hsnv lu lzhz
hsmvyqhz xbl jvthtvz, wvyxbl chtvz sblnv lu ibzjh kl hsnúu jhzapssv kvukl
hsvqltvz lzah uvjol f ohnhtvz ls iászhtv xbl al ol kpjov; wvyxbl fv al cvav
h Kpvz xbl tl ch kvsplukv tbjov sh vylqh.

— Hxbí ayhfv buh jlivssh, f bu wvjv kl xblzv f uv zé jbáuavz tlukybnvz kl
whu —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv uv zvu thuqhylz xbl wlyaluljlu h ahu chsplual
jhihsslyv jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk.

— ¡Xbé ths sv luapluklz! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Oánval zhily, Zhujov, xbl
lz ovuyh kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz uv jvtly lu bu tlz; f, fh xbl jvthu,
zlh kl hxblssv xbl ohsshylu táz h thuv; f lzav zl al opjplyh jplyav zp
obiplyhz slíkv ahuahz opzavyphz jvtv fv; xbl, hbuxbl ohu zpkv tbjohz, lu
avkhz lsshz uv ol ohsshkv oljoh ylshjpóu kl xbl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz
jvtplzlu, zp uv lyh hjhzv f lu hsnbuvz zbuabvzvz ihuxblalz xbl slz ohjíhu,
f svz kltáz kíhz zl svz whzhihu lu msvylz. F, hbuxbl zl klqh lualukly xbl
uv wvkíhu whzhy zpu jvtly f zpu ohjly avkvz svz vayvz tlulzalylz uhabyhslz,
wvyxbl, lu lmlav, lyhu ovtiylz jvtv uvzvayvz, ohzl kl lualukly ahtipéu xbl,
hukhukv sv táz kls apltwv kl zb cpkh wvy shz msvylzahz f klzwvishkvz, f zpu
jvjpulyv, xbl zb táz vykpuhyph jvtpkh zlyíh kl cphukhz yúzapjhz, ahslz jvtv
shz xbl aú hovyh tl vmyljlz. Hzí xbl, Zhujov htpnv, uv al jvunvql sv xbl h
tí tl kh nbzav. Up xblyyáz aú ohjly tbukv ublcv, up zhjhy sh jhihsslyíh
hukhual kl zbz xbpjpvz.

— Wlykóultl cblzayh tlyjlk —kpqv Zhujov—; xbl, jvtv fv uv zé slly up
lzjylipy, jvtv vayh clg ol kpjov, uv zé up ol jhíkv lu shz ylnshz kl sh
wyvmlzpóu jhihsslylzjh; f, kl hxbí hklshual, fv wyvcllyé shz hsmvyqhz kl
avkv néulyv kl mybah zljh whyh cblzayh tlyjlk, xbl lz jhihsslyv, f whyh tí
shz wyvcllyé, wblz uv sv zvf, kl vayhz jvzhz cvsáapslz f kl táz zbzahujph.

— Uv kpnv fv, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zlh mvygvzv h svz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz uv jvtly vayh jvzh zpuv lzhz mybahz xbl kpjlz, zpuv xbl zb táz
vykpuhypv zbzaluav kliíh kl zly klsshz, f kl hsnbuhz flyihz xbl ohsshihu
wvy svz jhtwvz, xbl lssvz jvuvjíhu f fv ahtipéu jvuvgjv.

— Cpyabk lz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— jvuvjly lzhz flyihz; xbl, zlnúu fv tl cvf
pthnpuhukv, hsnúu kíh zlyá tlulzaly bzhy kl lzl jvuvjptpluav.

F, zhjhukv, lu lzav, sv xbl kpqv xbl ayhíh, jvtplyvu svz kvz lu ibluh whg f
jvtwhñh. Wlyv, klzlvzvz kl ibzjhy kvukl hsvqhy hxblssh uvjol, hjhihyvu jvu
tbjoh iylclkhk zb wviyl f zljh jvtpkh. Zbiplyvu sblnv h jhihssv, f kpéyvuzl
wyplzh wvy sslnhy h wvishkv hualz xbl huvjoljplzl; wlyv mhsaóslz ls zvs, f
sh lzwlyhugh kl hsjhughy sv xbl klzlhihu, qbuav h buhz jovghz kl buvz
jhiylyvz, f hzí, klalytpuhyvu kl whzhysh hssí; xbl jbhuav mbl kl wlzhkbtiyl
whyh Zhujov uv sslnhy h wvishkv, mbl kl jvualuav whyh zb htv kvytpysh hs
jplsv klzjbiplyav, wvy whyljlysl xbl jhkh clg xbl lzav sl zbjlkíh lyh ohjly
bu hjav wvzlzpcv xbl mhjpspahih sh wyblih kl zb jhihsslyíh.




Jhwíabsv EP. Kl sv xbl sl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval jvu buvz jhiylyvz

Mbl yljvnpkv kl svz jhiylyvz jvu iblu áuptv; f, ohiplukv Zhujov, sv tlqvy
xbl wbkv, hjvtvkhkv h Yvjpuhual f h zb qbtluav, zl mbl ayhz ls vsvy xbl
klzwlkíhu kl zí jplyavz ahzhqvz kl jhiyh xbl opycplukv hs mblnv lu bu
jhsklyv lzahihu; f, hbuxbl és xbpzplyh lu hxbls tlztv wbuav cly zp lzahihu
lu zhgóu kl ayhzshkhysvz kls jhsklyv hs lzaóthnv, sv klqó kl ohjly, wvyxbl
svz jhiylyvz svz xbpahyvu kls mblnv, f, alukplukv wvy ls zblsv buhz wplslz
kl vclqhz, hklylghyvu jvu tbjoh wyplzh zb yúzapjh tlzh f jvucpkhyvu h svz
kvz, jvu tblzayhz kl tbf ibluh cvsbuahk, jvu sv xbl aluíhu. Zluaáyvuzl h sh
ylkvukh kl shz wplslz zlpz klssvz, xbl lyhu svz xbl lu sh thqhkh ohiíh,
ohiplukv wyptlyv jvu nyvzlyhz jlyltvuphz yvnhkv h kvu Xbpqval xbl zl
zluahzl zviyl bu kvyuhqv xbl cblsav kls ylcéz sl wbzplyvu. Zluaózl kvu
Xbpqval, f xblkáihzl Zhujov lu wpl whyh zlycpysl sh jvwh, xbl lyh oljoh kl
jblyuv. Cpéukvsl lu wpl zb htv, sl kpqv:

— Wvyxbl clhz, Zhujov, ls iplu xbl lu zí lujplyyh sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, f
jbáu h wpxbl lzaáu svz xbl lu jbhsxbplyh tpupzalypv klssh zl lqlyjpahu kl
clupy iylcltlual h zly ovuyhkvz f lzapthkvz kls tbukv, xbplyv xbl hxbí h tp
shkv f lu jvtwhñíh klzah ibluh nlual al zplualz, f xbl zlhz buh tlzth jvzh
jvutpnv, xbl zvf ab htv f uhabyhs zlñvy; xbl jvthz lu tp wshav f ilihz wvy
kvukl fv iliplyl; wvyxbl kl sh jhihsslyíh hukhual zl wblkl kljpy sv tlztv
xbl kls htvy zl kpjl: xbl avkhz shz jvzhz pnbhsh.

— ¡Nyhu tlyjlk! —kpqv Zhujov—; wlyv zé kljpy h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl, jvtv fv
abcplzl iplu kl jvtly, ahu iplu f tlqvy tl sv jvtlyíh lu wpl f h tpz zvshz
jvtv zluahkv h why kl bu ltwlyhkvy. F hbu, zp ch h kljpy clykhk, tbjov
tlqvy tl zhil sv xbl jvtv lu tp ypujóu, zpu tlspukylz up ylzwlavz, hbuxbl
zlh whu f jlivssh, xbl svz nhsspwhcvz kl vayhz tlzhz kvukl tl zlh mvygvzv
thzjhy klzwhjpv, ilily wvjv, sptwphytl h tlubkv, uv lzavyubkhy up avzly zp
tl cplul nhuh, up ohjly vayhz jvzhz xbl sh zvslkhk f sh spilyahk ayhlu
jvuzpnv. Huzí xbl, zlñvy tív, lzahz ovuyhz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl khytl
wvy zly tpupzayv f hkolylual kl sh jhihsslyíh hukhual, jvtv sv zvf zplukv
lzjbklyv kl cblzayh tlyjlk, jvucpéyahshz lu vayhz jvzhz xbl tl zlhu kl táz
jótvkv f wyvcljov; xbl ézahz, hbuxbl shz kvf wvy iplu yljlipkhz, shz
ylubujpv whyh klzkl hxbí hs mpu kls tbukv.

— Jvu avkv lzv, al ohz kl zluahy; wvyxbl h xbplu zl obtpssh, Kpvz sl
luzhsgh.

F, hzpéukvsl wvy ls iyhgv, sl mvygó h xbl qbuav kés zl zluahzl.

Uv lualukíhu svz jhiylyvz hxblssh qlypnvugh kl lzjbklyvz f kl jhihsslyvz
hukhualz, f uv ohjíhu vayh jvzh xbl jvtly f jhsshy, f tpyhy h zbz
obézwlklz, xbl, jvu tbjov kvuhpyl f nhuh, ltihbshihu ahzhqv jvtv ls wbñv.
Hjhihkv ls zlycpjpv kl jhyul, alukplyvu zviyl shz ghslhz nyhu jhuapkhk kl
ilssvahz hclsshuhkhz, f qbuahtlual wbzplyvu bu tlkpv xblzv, táz kbyv xbl zp
mblyh oljov kl hynhthzh. Uv lzahih, lu lzav, vjpvzv ls jblyuv, wvyxbl
hukhih h sh ylkvukh ahu h tlubkv (fh ssluv, fh chjív, jvtv hyjhkbg kl
uvyph) xbl jvu mhjpspkhk chjpó bu ghxbl kl kvz xbl lzahihu kl thupmplzav.
Klzwbéz xbl kvu Xbpqval obiv iplu zhapzmljov zb lzaóthnv, avtó bu wbñv kl
ilssvahz lu sh thuv, f, tpyáukvshz haluahtlual, zvsaó sh cvg h zltlqhualz
yhgvulz:

— Kpjovzh lkhk f zpnsvz kpjovzvz hxbéssvz h xbplu svz huapnbvz wbzplyvu
uvtiyl kl kvyhkvz, f uv wvyxbl lu lssvz ls vyv, xbl lu lzah ublzayh lkhk kl
oplyyv ahuav zl lzapth, zl hsjhughzl lu hxblssh cluabyvzh zpu mhapnh
hsnbuh, zpuv wvyxbl luavujlz svz xbl lu lssh cpcíhu pnuvyhihu lzahz kvz
whshiyhz kl abfv f tív. Lyhu lu hxblssh zhuah lkhk avkhz shz jvzhz jvtbulz;
h uhkpl sl lyh uljlzhypv, whyh hsjhughy zb vykpuhypv zbzaluav, avthy vayv
ayhihqv xbl hsghy sh thuv f hsjhughysl kl shz yvibzahz lujpuhz, xbl
spilyhstlual slz lzahihu jvucpkhukv jvu zb kbsjl f zhgvuhkv mybav. Shz
jshyhz mblualz f jvyyplualz yívz, lu thnuímpjh hibukhujph, zhiyvzhz f
ayhuzwhylualz hnbhz slz vmyljíhu. Lu shz xbpliyhz kl shz wlñhz f lu sv
obljv kl svz áyivslz mvythihu zb ylwúispjh shz zvsíjpahz f kpzjylahz
hilqhz, vmyljplukv h jbhsxbplyh thuv, zpu pualyéz hsnbuv, sh méyaps jvzljoh
kl zb kbsjízptv ayhihqv. Svz chsplualz hsjvyuvxblz klzwlkíhu kl zí, zpu
vayv hyapmpjpv xbl ls kl zb jvyalzíh, zbz hujohz f spcphuhz jvyalghz, jvu
xbl zl jvtlughyvu h jbiypy shz jhzhz, zviyl yúzapjhz lzahjhz zbzaluahkhz,
uv táz xbl whyh klmluzh kl shz pujsltlujphz kls jplsv. Avkv lyh whg
luavujlz, avkv htpzahk, avkv jvujvykph; húu uv zl ohiíh haylcpkv sh wlzhkh
ylqh kls jvycv hyhkv h hiypy up cpzpahy shz luayhñhz wphkvzhz kl ublzayh
wyptlyh thkyl, xbl lssh, zpu zly mvyghkh, vmyljíh, wvy avkhz shz whyalz kl
zb méyaps f lzwhjpvzv zluv, sv xbl wbkplzl ohyahy, zbzaluahy f klslpahy h
svz opqvz xbl luavujlz sh wvzlíhu. Luavujlz zí xbl hukhihu shz zptwslz f
olytvzhz ghnhslqhz kl chssl lu chssl f kl valyv lu valyv, lu aylugh f lu
jhilssv, zpu táz clzapkvz kl hxblssvz xbl lyhu tlulzaly whyh jbiypy
ovulzahtlual sv xbl sh ovulzapkhk xbplyl f oh xblypkv zpltwyl xbl zl jbiyh;
f uv lyhu zbz hkvyuvz kl svz xbl hovyh zl bzhu, h xbplu sh wúywbyh kl Apyv
f sh wvy ahuavz tvkvz thyapypghkh zlkh lujhyljlu, zpuv kl hsnbuhz ovqhz
clyklz kl shtwhgvz f flkyh luaylalqpkhz, jvu sv xbl xbpgá pihu ahu wvtwvzhz
f jvtwblzahz jvtv chu hnvyh ublzayhz jvyalzhuhz jvu shz yhyhz f wlylnypuhz
puclujpvulz xbl sh jbypvzpkhk vjpvzh slz oh tvzayhkv. Luavujlz zl kljvyhihu
svz jvujlavz htvyvzvz kls hsth zptwsl f zlujpsshtlual, kls tlztv tvkv f
thulyh xbl lssh svz jvujliíh, zpu ibzjhy hyapmpjpvzv yvklv kl whshiyhz whyh
lujhyljlysvz. Uv ohiíh sh myhbkl, ls lunhñv up sh thspjph tlgjsákvzl jvu sh
clykhk f sshulgh. Sh qbzapjph zl lzahih lu zbz wyvwypvz aéytpuvz, zpu xbl
sh vzhzlu abyihy up vmlukly svz kls mhcvy f svz kls pualylzl, xbl ahuav
hovyh sh tluvzjhihu, abyihu f wlyzpnblu. Sh slf kls lujhql húu uv zl ohiíh
zluahkv lu ls lualukptpluav kls qblg, wvyxbl luavujlz uv ohiíh xbé qbgnhy,
up xbpéu mblzl qbgnhkv. Shz kvujlsshz f sh ovulzapkhk hukhihu, jvtv alunv
kpjov, wvy kvuklxbplyh, zvsh f zlñvyh, zpu altvy xbl sh hqluh klzlucvsabyh
f shzjpcv pualuav sl tluvzjhihzlu, f zb wlykpjpóu uhjíh kl zb nbzav f
wyvwyph cvsbuahk. F hnvyh, lu lzavz ublzayvz klalzahislz zpnsvz, uv lzaá
zlnbyh upunbuh, hbuxbl sh vjbsal f jplyyl vayv ublcv shilypuav jvtv ls kl
Jylah; wvyxbl hssí, wvy svz ylzxbpjpvz v wvy ls hpyl, jvu ls jlsv kl sh
thskpah zvspjpabk, zl slz luayh sh htvyvzh wlzapslujph f slz ohjl khy jvu
avkv zb yljvnptpluav hs ayhzal. Whyh jbfh zlnbypkhk, hukhukv táz svz
apltwvz f jyljplukv táz sh thspjph, zl puzapabfó sh vyklu kl svz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz, whyh klmlukly shz kvujlsshz, htwhyhy shz cpbkhz f zvjvyyly h svz
obéymhuvz f h svz tlulzalyvzvz. Klzah vyklu zvf fv, olythuvz jhiylyvz, h
xbplu hnyhklgjv ls nhzhql f iblu hjvnptpluav xbl ohjépz h tí f h tp
lzjbklyv; xbl, hbuxbl wvy slf uhabyhs lzaáu avkvz svz xbl cpclu vispnhkvz h
mhcvyljly h svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz, avkhcíh, wvy zhily xbl zpu zhily
cvzvayvz lzah vispnhjpóu tl hjvnpzalz f ylnhshzalz, lz yhgóu xbl, jvu sh
cvsbuahk h tí wvzpisl, vz hnyhklgjh sh cblzayh.

Avkh lzah shynh hylunh —xbl zl wbkplyh tbf iplu lzjbzhy— kpqv ublzayv
jhihsslyv wvyxbl shz ilssvahz xbl sl kplyvu sl aybqlyvu h sh tltvyph sh
lkhk kvyhkh f huavqózlsl ohjly hxbls puúaps yhgvuhtpluav h svz jhiylyvz,
xbl, zpu ylzwvuklssl whshiyh, ltivihkvz f zbzwluzvz, sl lzabcplyvu
lzjbjohukv. Zhujov, hzptlztv, jhsshih f jvtíh ilssvahz, f cpzpahih tbf h
tlubkv ls zlnbukv ghxbl, xbl, wvyxbl zl lumyphzl ls cpuv, sl aluíhu jvsnhkv
kl bu hsjvyuvxbl.

Táz ahykó lu ohishy kvu Xbpqval xbl lu hjhihyzl sh jluh; hs mpu kl sh jbhs,
buv kl svz jhiylyvz kpqv:

— Whyh xbl jvu táz clyhz wblkh cblzayh tlyjlk kljpy, zlñvy jhihsslyv
hukhual, xbl sl hnhzhqhtvz jvu wyvtwah f ibluh cvsbuahk, xblyltvz khysl
zvshg f jvualuav jvu ohjly xbl jhual bu jvtwhñlyv ublzayv xbl uv ahykhyá
tbjov lu lzahy hxbí; ls jbhs lz bu ghnhs tbf lualukpkv f tbf luhtvyhkv, f
xbl, zviyl avkv, zhil slly f lzjylipy f lz túzpjv kl bu yhils, xbl uv ohf
táz xbl klzlhy.

Hwluhz ohiíh ls jhiylyv hjhihkv kl kljpy lzav, jbhukv sslnó h zbz víkvz ls
zvu kls yhils, f kl hssí h wvjv sslnó ls xbl sl ahñíh, xbl lyh bu tvgv kl
ohzah clpual f kvz hñvz, kl tbf ibluh nyhjph. Wylnbuaáyvusl zbz jvtwhñlyvz
zp ohiíh jluhkv, f, ylzwvukplukv xbl zí, ls xbl ohiíh oljov svz
vmyljptpluavz sl kpqv:

— Kl lzh thulyh, Huavupv, iplu wvkyáz ohjlyuvz wshjly kl jhuahy bu wvjv,
wvyxbl clh lzal zlñvy obézwlk xbl alultvz xbplu; ahtipéu wvy svz tvualz f
zlschz ohf xbplu zlwh kl túzpjh. Oétvzsl kpjov abz ibluhz ohipspkhklz, f
klzlhtvz xbl shz tblzaylz f uvz zhxblz clykhklyvz; f hzí, al yblnv wvy ab
cpkh xbl al zplualz f jhualz ls yvthujl kl abz htvylz xbl al jvtwbzv ls
ilulmpjphkv ab aív, xbl lu ls wblisv oh whyljpkv tbf iplu.

— Xbl tl wshjl —ylzwvukpó ls tvgv.

F, zpu ohjlyzl táz kl yvnhy, zl zluaó lu ls ayvujv kl buh klztvjohkh
lujpuh, f, altwshukv zb yhils, kl hssí h wvjv, jvu tbf ibluh nyhjph,
jvtlugó h jhuahy, kpjplukv klzah thulyh:

Huavupv

-Fv zé, Vshssh, xbl tl hkvyhz,
wblzav xbl uv tl sv ohz kpjov
up hbu jvu svz vqvz zpxbplyh,
tbkhz slunbhz kl htvyívz.
Wvyxbl zé xbl lylz zhipkh,
lu xbl tl xbplylz tl hmpytv;
xbl ubujh mbl klzkpjohkv
htvy xbl mbl jvuvjpkv.
Iplu lz clykhk xbl ahs clg,
Vshssh, tl ohz khkv pukpjpv
xbl aplulz kl iyvujl ls hsth
f ls ishujv wljov kl ypzjv.
Thz hssá luayl abz ylwyvjolz
f ovulzaízptvz klzcívz,
ahs clg sh lzwlyhugh tblzayh
sh vypssh kl zb clzapkv.
Hihsáughzl hs zlñblsv
tp ml, xbl ubujh oh wvkpkv,
up tlunbhy wvy uv sshthkv,
up jyljly wvy lzjvnpkv.
Zp ls htvy lz jvyalzíh,
kl sh xbl aplulz jvspqv
xbl ls mpu kl tpz lzwlyhughz
oh kl zly jbhs pthnpuv.
F zp zvu zlycpjpvz whyal
kl ohjly bu wljov ilupnuv,
hsnbuvz kl svz xbl ol oljov
mvyahsljlu tp whyapkv.
Wvyxbl zp ohz tpyhkv lu lssv,
táz kl buh clg ohiyáz cpzav
xbl tl ol clzapkv lu svz sbulz
sv xbl tl ovuyhih ls kvtpunv.
Jvtv ls htvy f sh nhsh
hukhu bu tlztv jhtpuv,
lu avkv apltwv h abz vqvz
xbpzl tvzayhytl wvspkv.
Klqv ls ihpshy wvy ab jhbzh,
up shz túzpjhz al wpuav
xbl ohz lzjbjohkv h klzovyhz
f hs jhuav kls nhssv wyptv.
Uv jbluav shz hshihughz
xbl kl ab ilsslgh ol kpjov;
xbl, hbuxbl clykhklyhz, ohjlu
zly fv kl hsnbuhz thsxbpzav.
Alylzh kls Ilyyvjhs,
fv hshiáukval, tl kpqv:
''Ahs wpluzh xbl hkvyh h bu áunls,
f cplul h hkvyhy h bu qptpv;
tlyjlk h svz tbjovz kpqlz
f h svz jhilssvz wvzapgvz,
f h opwójypahz olytvzbyhz,
xbl lunhñhu hs Htvy tpztv''.
Klztluaísh f luvqózl;
cvscpó wvy lssh zb wyptv:
klzhmpótl, f fh zhilz
sv xbl fv opjl f és opgv.
Uv al xbplyv fv h tvuaóu,
up al wylalukv f al zpycv
wvy sv kl ihyyhnhuíh;
xbl táz ibluv lz tp klzpnupv.
Jvfbukhz aplul sh Pnslzph
xbl zvu shghkhz kl zpynv;
wvu aú ls jblssv lu sh nhtlssh;
clyáz jvtv wvunv ls tív.
Kvukl uv, klzkl hxbí qbyv,
wvy ls zhuav táz ilukpav,
kl uv zhspy klzahz zplyyhz
zpuv whyh jhwbjopuv.

Jvu lzav kpv ls jhiylyv mpu h zb jhuav; f, hbuxbl kvu Xbpqval sl yvnó xbl
hsnv táz jhuahzl, uv sv jvuzpuapó Zhujov Whugh, wvyxbl lzahih táz whyh
kvytpy xbl whyh víy jhujpvulz. F huzí, kpqv h zb htv:

— Iplu wblkl cblzayh tlyjlk hjvtvkhyzl klzkl sblnv hkvukl oh kl wvzhy lzah
uvjol, xbl ls ayhihqv xbl lzavz ibluvz ovtiylz aplulu avkv ls kíh uv
wlytpal xbl whzlu shz uvjolz jhuahukv.

— Fh al luaplukv, Zhujov —sl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; xbl iplu zl tl ayhzsbjl
xbl shz cpzpahz kls ghxbl wpklu táz yljvtwluzh kl zblñv xbl kl túzpjh.

— H avkvz uvz zhil iplu, ilukpav zlh Kpvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Uv sv uplnv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv hjvtókhal aú kvukl xbpzplylz, xbl
svz kl tp wyvmlzpóu tlqvy whyljlu clshukv xbl kbytplukv. Wlyv, jvu avkv
lzav, zlyíh iplu, Zhujov, xbl tl cblschz h jbyhy lzah vylqh, xbl tl ch
kvsplukv táz kl sv xbl lz tlulzaly.

Opgv Zhujov sv xbl zl sl thukhih; f, cplukv buv kl svz jhiylyvz sh olypkh,
sl kpqv xbl uv abcplzl wluh, xbl és wvukyíh yltlkpv jvu xbl májpstlual zl
zhuhzl. F, avthukv hsnbuhz ovqhz kl yvtlyv, kl tbjov xbl wvy hssí ohiíh,
shz thzjó f shz tlgjsó jvu bu wvjv kl zhs, f, hwspjáukvzlshz h sh vylqh, zl
sh clukó tbf iplu, hzlnbyáukvsl xbl uv ohiíh tlulzaly vayh tlkpjpuh; f hzí
mbl sh clykhk.




Jhwíabsv EPP. Kl sv xbl jvuaó bu jhiylyv h svz xbl lzahihu jvu kvu Xbpqval

Lzahukv lu lzav, sslnó vayv tvgv kl svz xbl slz ayhíhu kls hsklh ls
ihzaptluav, f kpqv:

— ¿Zhiépz sv xbl whzh lu ls sbnhy, jvtwhñlyvz?

— ¿Jótv sv wvkltvz zhily? —ylzwvukpó buv klssvz.

— Wblz zhilk —wyvzpnbpó ls tvgv— xbl tbypó lzah thñhuh hxbls mhtvzv whzavy
lzabkphual sshthkv Nypzózavtv, f zl tbytbyh xbl oh tblyav kl htvylz kl
hxblssh lukphishkh tvgh kl Thyjlsh, sh opqh kl Nbpsslytv ls ypjv, hxbéssh
xbl zl hukh lu oáipav kl whzavyh wvy lzvz hukbyyphslz.

— Wvy Thyjlsh kpyáz —kpqv buv.

— Wvy ézh kpnv —ylzwvukpó ls jhiylyv—. F lz sv ibluv, xbl thukó lu zb
alzahtluav xbl sl lualyyhzlu lu ls jhtwv, jvtv zp mblyh tvyv, f xbl zlh hs
wpl kl sh wlñh kvukl lzaá sh mblual kls hsjvyuvxbl; wvyxbl, zlnúu lz mhth,
f és kpjlu xbl sv kpqv, hxbls sbnhy lz hkvukl és sh cpv sh clg wyptlyh. F
ahtipéu thukó vayhz jvzhz, ahslz, xbl svz hihklz kls wblisv kpjlu xbl uv zl
ohu kl jbtwspy, up lz iplu xbl zl jbtwshu, wvyxbl whyljlu kl nluapslz. H
avkv sv jbhs ylzwvukl hxbls nyhu zb htpnv Htiyvzpv, ls lzabkphual, xbl
ahtipéu zl cpzapó kl whzavy jvu és, xbl zl oh kl jbtwspy avkv, zpu mhsahy
uhkh, jvtv sv klqó thukhkv Nypzózavtv, f zviyl lzav hukh ls wblisv
hsivyvahkv; thz, h sv xbl zl kpjl, lu mpu zl ohyá sv xbl Htiyvzpv f avkvz
svz whzavylz zbz htpnvz xbplylu; f thñhuh sl cplulu h lualyyhy jvu nyhu
wvtwh hkvukl alunv kpjov. F alunv whyh tí xbl oh kl zly jvzh tbf kl cly; h
sv tluvz, fv uv klqhyé kl py h clysh, zp zbwplzl uv cvscly thñhuh hs sbnhy.

— Avkvz ohyltvz sv tlztv —ylzwvukplyvu svz jhiylyvz—; f ljohyltvz zblyalz h
xbpéu oh kl xblkhy h nbhykhy shz jhiyhz kl avkvz.

— Iplu kpjlz, Wlkyv —kpqv buv—; hbuxbl uv zlyá tlulzaly bzhy kl lzh
kpspnlujph, xbl fv tl xblkhyé wvy avkvz. F uv sv haypibfhz h cpyabk f h
wvjh jbypvzpkhk tíh, zpuv h xbl uv tl klqh hukhy ls nhyyhujov xbl ls vayv
kíh tl whzó lzal wpl.

— Jvu avkv lzv, al sv hnyhkljltvz —ylzwvukpó Wlkyv.

F kvu Xbpqval yvnó h Wlkyv sl kpqlzl xbé tblyav lyh hxbés f xbé whzavyh
hxbéssh; h sv jbhs Wlkyv ylzwvukpó xbl sv xbl zhiíh lyh xbl ls tblyav lyh
bu opqvkhsnv ypjv, cljpuv kl bu sbnhy xbl lzahih lu hxblsshz zplyyhz, ls
jbhs ohiíh zpkv lzabkphual tbjovz hñvz lu Zhshthujh, hs jhiv kl svz jbhslz
ohiíh cblsav h zb sbnhy, jvu vwpupóu kl tbf zhipv f tbf slíkv.

— «Wypujpwhstlual, kljíhu xbl zhiíh sh jplujph kl shz lzaylsshz, f kl sv xbl
whzhu, hssá lu ls jplsv, ls zvs f sh sbuh; wvyxbl wbuabhstlual uvz kljíh ls
jypz kls zvs f kl sh sbuh.»

— Ljspwzl zl sshth, htpnv, xbl uv jypz, ls lzjbyljlyzl lzvz kvz sbtpuhylz
thfvylz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

Thz Wlkyv, uv ylwhyhukv lu upñlyíhz, wyvzpnbpó zb jbluav kpjplukv:

— «Hzptlztv hklcpuhih jbáukv ohiíh kl zly ls hñv hibukhual v lzaps.»

— Lzaéyps xblyépz kljpy, htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Lzaéyps v lzaps —ylzwvukpó Wlkyv—, avkv zl zhsl hssá. «F kpnv xbl jvu lzav
xbl kljíh zl opjplyvu zb whkyl f zbz htpnvz, xbl sl khihu jyékpav, tbf
ypjvz, wvyxbl ohjíhu sv xbl és slz hjvuzlqhih, kpjpéukvslz: ''Zltiyhk lzal
hñv jlihkh, uv aypnv; lu ézal wvképz zltiyhy nhyihugvz f uv jlihkh; ls xbl
cplul zlyá kl nbpssh kl hjlpal; svz aylz zpnbplualz uv zl jvnlyá nvah''.»

— Lzh jplujph zl sshth hzayvsvníh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Uv zé fv jótv zl sshth —ylwspjó Wlkyv—, thz zé xbl avkv lzav zhiíh, f húu
táz. «Mpuhstlual, uv whzhyvu tbjovz tlzlz, klzwbéz xbl cpuv kl Zhshthujh,
jbhukv bu kíh ylthuljpó clzapkv kl whzavy, jvu zb jhfhkv f wlsspjv,
ohipéukvzl xbpahkv svz oáipavz shynvz xbl jvtv lzjvshy ayhíh; f qbuahtlual
zl cpzapó jvu és kl whzavy vayv zb nyhukl htpnv, sshthkv Htiyvzpv, xbl
ohiíh zpkv zb jvtwhñlyv lu svz lzabkpvz. Vscpkáihzltl kl kljpy jvtv
Nypzózavtv, ls kpmbuav, mbl nyhukl ovtiyl kl jvtwvuly jvwshz; ahuav, xbl és
ohjíh svz cpsshujpjvz whyh sh uvjol kls Uhjptpluav kls Zlñvy, f svz hbavz
whyh ls kíh kl Kpvz, xbl svz ylwylzluahihu svz tvgvz kl ublzayv wblisv, f
avkvz kljíhu xbl lyhu wvy ls jhiv. Jbhukv svz kls sbnhy cplyvu ahu kl
ptwyvcpzv clzapkvz kl whzavylz h svz kvz lzjvshylz, xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz, f
uv wvkíhu hkpcpuhy sh jhbzh xbl slz ohiíh tvcpkv h ohjly hxblssh ahu
lzayhñh tbkhugh. Fh lu lzal apltwv lyh tblyav ls whkyl kl ublzayv
Nypzózavtv, f és xblkó olylkhkv lu tbjoh jhuapkhk kl ohjplukh, huzí lu
tblislz jvtv lu yhíjlz, f lu uv wlxblñh jhuapkhk kl nhuhkv, thfvy f tluvy,
f lu nyhu jhuapkhk kl kpulyvz; kl avkv sv jbhs xblkó ls tvgv zlñvy
klzvsbav, f lu clykhk xbl avkv sv tlyljíh, xbl lyh tbf iblu jvtwhñlyv f
jhypahapcv f htpnv kl svz ibluvz, f aluíh buh jhyh jvtv buh ilukpjpóu.
Klzwbéz zl cpuv h lualukly xbl ls ohilyzl tbkhkv kl ayhql uv ohiíh zpkv wvy
vayh jvzh xbl wvy hukhyzl wvy lzavz klzwvishkvz lu wvz kl hxblssh whzavyh
Thyjlsh xbl ublzayv ghnhs uvtiyó kluhualz, kl sh jbhs zl ohiíh luhtvyhkv ls
wviyl kpmbuav kl Nypzózavtv.» F xbpéyvvz kljpy hnvyh, wvyxbl lz iplu xbl sv
zlwápz, xbpéu lz lzah yhwhgh; xbpgá, f hbu zpu xbpgá, uv ohiyépz víkv
zltlqhual jvzh lu avkvz svz kíhz kl cblzayh cpkh, hbuxbl cpcápz táz hñvz
xbl zhyuh.

— Kljpk Zhyyh —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval, uv wbkplukv zbmypy ls ayvjhy kl svz
cvjhisvz kls jhiylyv.

— Ohyav cpcl sh zhyuh —ylzwvukpó Wlkyv—; f zp lz, zlñvy, xbl tl ohiépz kl
hukhy gholyplukv h jhkh whzv svz cvjhisvz, uv hjhihyltvz lu bu hñv.

— Wlykvuhk, htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; xbl wvy ohily ahuah kpmlylujph kl
zhyuh h Zhyyh vz sv kpql; wlyv cvz ylzwvukpzalz tbf iplu, wvyxbl cpcl táz
zhyuh xbl Zhyyh; f wyvzlnbpk cblzayh opzavyph, xbl uv vz ylwspjhyé táz lu
uhkh.

— «Kpnv, wblz, zlñvy tív kl tp hsth —kpqv ls jhiylyv—, xbl lu ublzayh hsklh
obiv bu shiyhkvy húu táz ypjv xbl ls whkyl kl Nypzózavtv, ls jbhs zl
sshthih Nbpsslytv, f hs jbhs kpv Kpvz, htéu kl shz tbjohz f nyhuklz
ypxblghz, buh opqh, kl jbfv whyav tbypó zb thkyl, xbl mbl sh táz ovuyhkh
tbqly xbl obiv lu avkvz lzavz jvuavyuvz. Uv whyljl zpuv xbl hovyh sh clv,
jvu hxblssh jhyh xbl kls bu jhiv aluíh ls zvs f kls vayv sh sbuh; f, zviyl
avkv, ohjlukvzh f htpnh kl svz wviylz, wvy sv xbl jylv xbl klil kl lzahy zb
áupth h sh ovyh kl hovyh nvghukv kl Kpvz lu ls vayv tbukv. Kl wlzhy kl sh
tblyal kl ahu ibluh tbqly tbypó zb thypkv Nbpsslytv, klqhukv h zb opqh
Thyjlsh, tbjohjoh f ypjh, lu wvkly kl bu aív zbfv zhjlykval f ilulmpjphkv
lu ublzayv sbnhy. Jyljpó sh upñh jvu ahuah ilsslgh, xbl uvz ohjíh hjvykhy
kl sh kl zb thkyl, xbl sh abcv tbf nyhukl; f, jvu avkv lzav, zl qbgnhih xbl
sl ohiíh kl whzhy sh kl sh opqh. F hzí mbl, xbl, jbhukv sslnó h lkhk kl
jhavyjl h xbpujl hñvz, uhkpl sh tpyhih xbl uv ilukljíh h Kpvz, xbl ahu
olytvzh sh ohiíh jyphkv, f svz táz xblkhihu luhtvyhkvz f wlykpkvz wvy lssh.
Nbhykáihsh zb aív jvu tbjov yljhav f jvu tbjov lujlyyhtpluav; wlyv, jvu
avkv lzav, sh mhth kl zb tbjoh olytvzbyh zl lzalukpó kl thulyh xbl, hzí wvy
lssh jvtv wvy zbz tbjohz ypxblghz, uv zvshtlual kl svz kl ublzayv wblisv,
zpuv kl svz kl tbjohz slnbhz h sh ylkvukh, f kl svz tlqvylz klssvz, lyh
yvnhkv, zvspjpahkv l ptwvyabuhkv zb aív zl sh kplzl wvy tbqly. Thz és, xbl
h shz klyljohz lz iblu jypzaphuv, hbuxbl xbpzplyh jhzhysh sblnv, hzí jvtv
sh cíh kl lkhk, uv xbpzv ohjlysv zpu zb jvuzluaptpluav, zpu aluly vqv h sh
nhuhujph f nyhuqlyíh xbl sl vmyljíh ls aluly sh ohjplukh kl sh tvgh,
kpshahukv zb jhzhtpluav. F h ml xbl zl kpqv lzav lu táz kl bu jvyypssv lu
ls wblisv, lu hshihugh kls iblu zhjlykval.» Xbl xbplyv xbl zlwh, zlñvy
hukhual, xbl lu lzavz sbnhylz jvyavz kl avkv zl ayhah f kl avkv zl tbytbyh;
f alulk whyh cvz, jvtv fv alunv whyh tí, xbl kliíh kl zly klthzphkhtlual
ibluv ls jséypnv xbl vispnh h zbz mlspnylzlz h xbl kpnhu iplu kés,
lzwljphstlual lu shz hsklhz.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f wyvzlnbpk hklshual, xbl ls jbluav
lz tbf ibluv, f cvz, iblu Wlkyv, sl jvuaápz jvu tbf ibluh nyhjph.

— Sh kls Zlñvy uv tl mhsal, xbl lz sh xbl ohjl hs jhzv. «F lu sv kltáz
zhiyépz xbl, hbuxbl ls aív wyvwvuíh h sh zviypuh f sl kljíh shz jhspkhklz
kl jhkh buv lu whyapjbshy, kl svz tbjovz xbl wvy tbqly sh wlkíhu, yvnáukvsl
xbl zl jhzhzl f lzjvnplzl h zb nbzav, qhtáz lssh ylzwvukpó vayh jvzh zpuv
xbl wvy luavujlz uv xblyíh jhzhyzl, f xbl, wvy zly ahu tbjohjoh, uv zl
zluaíh oáips whyh wvkly sslchy sh jhynh kls thayptvupv. Jvu lzahz xbl khih,
hs whyljly qbzahz lzjbzhz, klqhih ls aív kl ptwvyabuhysh, f lzwlyhih h xbl
luayhzl hsnv táz lu lkhk f lssh zbwplzl lzjvnly jvtwhñíh h zb nbzav. Wvyxbl
kljíh és, f kljíh tbf iplu, xbl uv ohiíhu kl khy svz whkylz h zbz opqvz
lzahkv jvuayh zb cvsbuahk. Wlyv oéalsv hxbí, jbhukv uv tl jhav, xbl
ylthuljl bu kíh sh tlspukyvzh Thyjlsh oljoh whzavyh; f, zpu zly whyal zb
aív up avkvz svz kls wblisv, xbl zl sv klzhjvuzlqhihu, kpv lu pyzl hs jhtwv
jvu shz kltáz ghnhshz kls sbnhy, f kpv lu nbhykhy zb tlztv nhuhkv. F, hzí
jvtv lssh zhspó lu wúispjv f zb olytvzbyh zl cpv hs klzjbiplyav, uv vz
zhiyé ibluhtlual kljpy jbáuavz ypjvz thujlivz, opkhsnvz f shiyhkvylz ohu
avthkv ls ayhql kl Nypzózavtv f sh hukhu ylxbliyhukv wvy lzvz jhtwvz. Buv
kl svz jbhslz, jvtv fh lzaá kpjov, mbl ublzayv kpmbuav, kls jbhs kljíhu xbl
sh klqhih kl xblyly, f sh hkvyhih. F uv zl wpluzl xbl wvyxbl Thyjlsh zl
wbzv lu hxblssh spilyahk f cpkh ahu zblsah f kl ahu wvjv v kl upunúu
yljvnptpluav, xbl wvy lzv oh khkv pukpjpv, up wvy zltlqhz, xbl clunh lu
tluvzjhiv kl zb ovulzapkhk f yljhav; hualz lz ahuah f ahs sh cpnpshujph jvu
xbl tpyh wvy zb ovuyh, xbl kl jbhuavz sh zpyclu f zvspjpahu upunbuv zl oh
hshihkv, up jvu clykhk zl wvkyá hshihy, xbl sl ohfh khkv hsnbuh wlxblñh
lzwlyhugh kl hsjhughy zb klzlv. Xbl, wblzav xbl uv obfl up zl lzxbpch kl sh
jvtwhñíh f jvuclyzhjpóu kl svz whzavylz, f svz ayhah jvyaéz f
htpnhisltlual, lu sslnhukv h klzjbiypysl zb pualujpóu jbhsxbplyh klssvz,
hbuxbl zlh ahu qbzah f zhuah jvtv sh kls thayptvupv, svz hyyvqh kl zí jvtv
jvu bu ayhibjv. F jvu lzah thulyh kl jvukpjpóu ohjl táz khñv lu lzah aplyyh
xbl zp wvy lssh luayhyh sh wlzapslujph; wvyxbl zb hmhipspkhk f olytvzbyh
hayhl svz jvyhgvulz kl svz xbl sh ayhahu h zlycpysh f h hthysh, wlyv zb
klzkéu f klzlunhñv svz jvukbjl h aéytpuvz kl klzlzwlyhyzl; f hzí, uv zhilu
xbé kljpysl, zpuv sshthysh h cvjlz jybls f klzhnyhkljpkh, jvu vayvz aíabsvz
h ézal zltlqhualz, xbl iplu sh jhspkhk kl zb jvukpjpóu thupmplzahu. F zp
hxbí lzabcpézlklz, zlñvy, hsnúu kíh, clyíhklz ylzvuhy lzahz zplyyhz f lzavz
chsslz jvu svz shtluavz kl svz klzlunhñhkvz xbl sh zpnblu. Uv lzaá tbf
slqvz kl hxbí bu zpapv kvukl ohf jhzp kvz kvjluhz kl hsahz ohfhz, f uv ohf
upunbuh xbl lu zb spzh jvyalgh uv alunh nyhihkv f lzjypav ls uvtiyl kl
Thyjlsh; f lujpth kl hsnbuh, buh jvyvuh nyhihkh lu ls tlztv áyivs, jvtv zp
táz jshyhtlual kpqlyh zb hthual xbl Thyjlsh sh sslch f sh tlyljl kl avkh sh
olytvzbyh obthuh. Hxbí zvzwpyh bu whzavy, hssí zl xblqh vayv; hjbssá zl
vflu htvyvzhz jhujpvulz, hjá klzlzwlyhkhz lukljohz. Jbás ohf xbl whzh avkhz
shz ovyhz kl sh uvjol zluahkv hs wpl kl hsnbuh lujpuh v wlñhzjv, f hssí,
zpu wslnhy svz ssvyvzvz vqvz, ltililjpkv f ayhuzwvyahkv lu zbz
wluzhtpluavz, sl ohssó ls zvs h sh thñhuh; f jbás ohf xbl, zpu khy chkv up
aylnbh h zbz zbzwpyvz, lu tpahk kls hykvy kl sh táz lumhkvzh zplzah kls
clyhuv, alukpkv zviyl sh hykplual hyluh, lucíh zbz xblqhz hs wphkvzv jplsv.
F kézal f kl hxbés, f kl hxbéssvz f kl ézavz, spiyl f klzlumhkhkhtlual
aypbumh sh olytvzh Thyjlsh; f avkvz svz xbl sh jvuvjltvz lzahtvz lzwlyhukv
lu xbé oh kl whyhy zb hsapclg f xbpéu oh kl zly ls kpjovzv xbl oh kl clupy
h kvtlñhy jvukpjpóu ahu alyypisl f nvghy kl olytvzbyh ahu lzaylthkh.» Wvy
zly avkv sv xbl ol jvuahkv ahu hclypnbhkh clykhk, tl kvf h lualukly xbl
ahtipéu sv lz sh xbl ublzayv ghnhs kpqv xbl zl kljíh kl sh jhbzh kl sh
tblyal kl Nypzózavtv. F hzí, vz hjvuzlqv, zlñvy, xbl uv klqépz kl ohsshyvz
thñhuh h zb luaplyyv, xbl zlyá tbf kl cly, wvyxbl Nypzózavtv aplul tbjovz
htpnvz, f uv lzaá kl lzal sbnhy h hxbés kvukl thukh lualyyhyzl tlkph slnbh.

— Lu jbpkhkv tl sv alunv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f hnyhkégjvvz ls nbzav xbl tl
ohiépz khkv jvu sh uhyyhjpóu kl ahu zhiyvzv jbluav.

— ¡Vo! —ylwspjó ls jhiylyv—, húu uv zé fv sh tpahk kl svz jhzvz zbjlkpkvz h
svz hthualz kl Thyjlsh, thz wvkyíh zly xbl thñhuh avwázltvz lu ls jhtpuv
hsnúu whzavy xbl uvz svz kpqlzl. F, wvy hovyh, iplu zlyá xbl vz chpz h
kvytpy klihqv kl aljohkv, wvyxbl ls zlyluv vz wvkyíh khñhy sh olypkh,
wblzav xbl lz ahs sh tlkpjpuh xbl zl vz oh wblzav, xbl uv ohf xbl altly kl
jvuayhypv hjpklual.

Zhujov Whugh, xbl fh khih hs kphisv ls ahuav ohishy kls jhiylyv, zvspjpaó,
wvy zb whyal, xbl zb htv zl luayhzl h kvytpy lu sh jovgh kl Wlkyv. Oígvsv
hzí, f avkv sv táz kl sh uvjol zl sl whzó lu tltvyphz kl zb zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh, h ptpahjpóu kl svz hthualz kl Thyjlsh. Zhujov Whugh zl hjvtvkó
luayl Yvjpuhual f zb qbtluav, f kbytpó, uv jvtv luhtvyhkv klzmhcvyljpkv,
zpuv jvtv ovtiyl tvspkv h jvjlz.




Jhwíabsv EPPP. Kvukl zl kh mpu hs jbluav kl sh whzavyh Thyjlsh, jvu vayvz
zbjlzvz

Thz, hwluhz jvtlugó h klzjbiypyzl ls kíh wvy svz ihsjvulz kls vyplual,

qbuavz.

Buv kl svz kl h jhihssv, ohishukv jvu zb jvtwhñlyv, sl kpqv:

— Hzí tl sv whyljl h tí —ylzwvukpó Cpchskv—; f uv kpnv fv ohjly ahykhugh kl

Jlzó lzah wsáapjh f jvtlugózl vayh, wylnbuahukv ls xbl zl sshthih Cpchskv h

— ¿Uv ohu cblzayhz tlyjlklz slíkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— svz huhslz l

Wvy lzahz yhgvulz xbl kpqv, hjhihyvu kl lualyhyzl svz jhtpuhualz xbl lyh

— Kl lzl whyljly lzavf fv —ylwspjó ls jhtpuhual—; wlyv buh jvzh, luayl vayhz

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, lzv uv wblkl zly tluvz lu upunbuh thulyh, f

— Lzv uv wblkl zly —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: kpnv xbl uv wblkl zly xbl ohfh

H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó ublzayv kvu Xbpqval:

— Sblnv, zp lz kl lzlujph xbl avkv jhihsslyv hukhual ohfh kl zly luhtvyhkv

Hxbí kpv bu nyhu zbzwpyv kvu Xbpqval, f kpqv:

— Fv uv wvkyé hmpythy zp sh kbsjl tp lultpnh nbzah, v uv, kl xbl ls tbukv
zlwh xbl fv sh zpycv; zósv zé kljpy, ylzwvukplukv h sv xbl jvu ahuav
jvtlkptpluav zl tl wpkl, xbl zb uvtiyl lz Kbsjpulh; zb whayph, ls Avivzv,
bu sbnhy kl sh Thujoh; zb jhspkhk, wvy sv tluvz, oh kl zly kl wypujlzh,
wblz lz ylpuh f zlñvyh tíh; zb olytvzbyh, zviylobthuh, wblz lu lssh zl
cplulu h ohjly clykhklyvz avkvz svz ptwvzpislz f xbptéypjvz haypibavz kl
