Jhwíabsv EPC. Kvukl zl wvulu svz clyzvz klzlzwlyhkvz kls kpmbuav whzavy,
jvu vayvz uv lzwlyhkvz zbjlzvz

Jhujpóu kl Nypzózavtv

Fh xbl xbplylz, jybls, xbl zl wbispxbl,
kl slunbh lu slunbh f kl buh lu vayh nlual,
kls ázwlyv ypnvy abfv sh mblygh,
ohyé xbl ls tlztv pumplyuv jvtbupxbl
hs aypzal wljov tív bu zvu kvsplual,
jvu xbl ls bzv jvtúu kl tp cvg ablygh.
F hs why kl tp klzlv, xbl zl lzmblygh
h kljpy tp kvsvy f abz ohghñhz,
kl sh lzwhuahisl cvg pyá ls hjluav,
f lu és tlgjshkhz, wvy thfvy avytluav,
wlkhgvz kl shz tízlyhz luayhñhz.
Lzjbjoh, wblz, f wylzah haluav víkv,
uv hs jvujlyahkv zvu, zpuv hs yüpkv
xbl kl sv ovukv kl tp hthynv wljov,
sslchkv kl bu mvygvzv klzchyív,
wvy nbzav tív zhsl f ab klzwljov.

Ls ybnpy kls slóu, kls sviv mplyv
ls altlyvzv hbsspkv, ls zpsiv ovyylukv
kl lzjhtvzh zlywplual, ls lzwhuahisl
ihshkyv kl hsnúu tvuzaybv, ls hnvylyv
nyhguhy kl sh jvyulqh, f ls lzayblukv
kls cpluav jvuayhzahkv lu thy puzahisl;
kls fh clujpkv avyv ls ptwshjhisl
iyhtpkv, f kl sh cpbkh avyavspssh
ls zluapisl hyybsshy; ls aypzal jhuav
kls lucpkphkv iúov, jvu ls sshuav
kl avkh sh pumlyuhs ulnyh jbhkypssh,
zhsnhu jvu sh kvsplual áupth mblyh,
tlgjshkvz lu bu zvu, kl ahs thulyh
xbl zl jvumbukhu svz zluapkvz avkvz,
wblz sh wluh jybls xbl lu tí zl ohssh
whyh jvuahssh wpkl ublcvz tvkvz.

Kl ahuah jvumbzpóu uv shz hyluhz
kls whkyl Ahqv vpyáu svz aypzalz ljvz,
up kls mhtvzv Ilapz shz vspchz:
xbl hssí zl lzwhyjpyáu tpz kbyhz wluhz
lu hsavz ypzjvz f lu wyvmbukvz obljvz,
jvu tblyah slunbh f jvu whshiyhz cpchz;
v fh lu lzjbyvz chsslz, v lu lzxbpchz
wshfhz, klzubkhz kl jvuayhav obthuv,
v hkvukl ls zvs qhtáz tvzayó zb sbtiyl,
v luayl sh cluluvzh tbjolkbtiyl
kl mplyhz xbl hsptluah ls spipv sshuv;
xbl, wblzav xbl lu svz wáyhtvz klzplyavz
svz ljvz yvujvz kl tp ths, pujplyavz,
zblulu jvu ab ypnvy ahu zpu zlnbukv,
wvy wypcpslnpv kl tpz jvyavz ohkvz,
zlyáu sslchkvz wvy ls hujov tbukv.

Thah bu klzkéu, haplyyh sh whjplujph,
v clykhklyh v mhszh, buh zvzwljoh;
thahu svz jlsvz jvu ypnvy táz mblyal;
klzjvujplyah sh cpkh shynh hbzlujph;
jvuayh bu altvy kl vscpkv uv hwyvcljoh
mpytl lzwlyhugh kl kpjovzh zblyal.
Lu avkv ohf jplyah, pulcpahisl tblyal;
thz fv, ¡tpshnyv ubujh cpzav!, cpcv
jlsvzv, hbzlual, klzklñhkv f jplyav
kl shz zvzwljohz xbl tl aplulu tblyav;
f lu ls vscpkv lu xbplu tp mblnv hcpcv,
f, luayl ahuavz avytluavz, ubujh hsjhugh
tp cpzah h cly lu zvtiyh h sh lzwlyhugh,
up fv, klzlzwlyhkv, sh wyvjbyv;
hualz, wvy lzaylthytl lu tp xblylssh,
lzahy zpu lssh lalyuhtlual qbyv.

¿Wbéklzl, wvy cluabyh, lu bu puzahual
lzwlyhy f altly, v lz iplu ohjlssv,
zplukv shz jhbzhz kls altvy táz jplyahz?
¿Alunv, zp ls kbyv jlsv lzaá klshual,
kl jlyyhy lzavz vqvz, zp ol kl clssv
wvy tps olypkhz lu ls hsth hiplyahz?
¿Xbpéu uv hiypyá kl why lu why shz wblyahz
h sh klzjvumphugh, jbhukv tpyh
klzjbiplyav ls klzkéu, f shz zvzwljohz,
¡vo hthynh jvuclyzpóu!, clykhklz oljohz,
f sh sptwph clykhk cblsah lu tluapyh?
¡Vo, lu ls ylpuv kl htvy mplyvz apyhuvz
jlsvz, wvulktl bu oplyyv lu lzahz thuvz!
Khtl, klzkéu, buh avyjpkh zvnh.
Thz, ¡hf kl tí!, xbl, jvu jybls cpavyph,
cblzayh tltvyph ls zbmyptpluav hovnh.

Fv tblyv, lu mpu; f, wvyxbl ubujh lzwlyl
iblu zbjlzv lu sh tblyal up lu sh cpkh,
wlyapuhg lzahyé lu tp mhuahzíh.
Kpyé xbl ch hjlyahkv ls xbl iplu xbplyl,
f xbl lz táz spiyl ls hsth táz ylukpkh
h sh kl htvy huapnbh apyhuíh.
Kpyé xbl sh lultpnh zpltwyl tíh
olytvzh ls hsth jvtv ls jblywv aplul,
f xbl zb vscpkv kl tp jbswh uhjl,
f xbl, lu ml kl svz thslz xbl uvz ohjl,
htvy zb ptwlypv lu qbzah whg thuaplul.
F, jvu lzah vwpupóu f bu kbyv shgv,
hjlslyhukv ls tpzlyhisl wshgv
h xbl tl ohu jvukbjpkv zbz klzklulz,
vmyljlyé h svz cpluavz jblywv f hsth,
zpu shbyv v whsth kl mbabyvz iplulz.

Aú, xbl jvu ahuahz zpuyhgvulz tblzayhz
sh yhgóu xbl tl mblygh h xbl sh ohnh
h sh jhuzhkh cpkh xbl hivyylgjv,
wblz fh clz xbl al kh uvavyphz tblzayhz
lzah kls jvyhgóu wyvmbukh sshnh,
kl jótv, hslnyl, h ab ypnvy tl vmylgjv,
zp, wvy kpjoh, jvuvjlz xbl tlylgjv
xbl ls jplsv jshyv kl abz ilssvz vqvz
lu tp tblyal zl abyil, uv sv ohnhz;
xbl uv xbplyv xbl lu uhkh zhapzmhnhz,
hs khyal kl tp hsth svz klzwvqvz.
Hualz, jvu ypzh lu sh vjhzpóu mbulzah,
klzjbiyl xbl ls mpu tív mbl ab mplzah;
thz nyhu zptwslgh lz hcpzhyal klzav,
wblz zé xbl lzaá ab nsvyph jvuvjpkh
lu xbl tp cpkh sslnbl hs mpu ahu wylzav.

Clunh, xbl lz apltwv fh, kls ovukv hipztv
Aáuahsv jvu zb zlk; Zízpmv clunh
jvu ls wlzv alyypisl kl zb jhuav;
Apjpv ayhfh zb ibpayl, f huzptpztv
jvu zb yblkh Lnïóu uv zl klalunh,
up shz olythuhz xbl ayhihqhu ahuav;
f avkvz qbuavz zb tvyahs xbliyhuav
ayhzshklu lu tp wljov, f lu cvg ihqh
-zp fh h bu klzlzwlyhkv zvu klipkhz-
jhualu vizlxbphz aypzalz, kvsvypkhz,
hs jblywv h xbplu zl uplnbl hbu sh tvyahqh.
F ls wvyalyv pumlyuhs kl svz aylz yvzayvz,
jvu vayhz tps xbptlyhz f tps tvuzayvz,
sslclu ls kvsvyvzv jvuayhwbuav;
xbl vayh wvtwh tlqvy uv tl whyljl
xbl sh tlyljl bu hthkvy kpmbuav.

Jhujpóu klzlzwlyhkh, uv al xblqlz
jbhukv tp aypzal jvtwhñíh klqlz;
hualz, wblz xbl sh jhbzh kv uhjpzal
jvu tp klzkpjoh hbntluah zb cluabyh,
hbu lu sh zlwbsabyh uv lzaéz aypzal.

Iplu slz whyljpó, h svz xbl lzjbjohkv ohiíhu, sh jhujpóu kl Nypzózavtv,
wblzav xbl ls xbl sh slfó kpqv xbl uv sl whyljíh xbl jvumvythih jvu sh
ylshjpóu xbl és ohiíh víkv kls yljhav f ivukhk kl Thyjlsh, wvyxbl lu lssh
zl xblqhih Nypzózavtv kl jlsvz, zvzwljohz f kl hbzlujph, avkv lu wlyqbpjpv
kls iblu jyékpav f ibluh mhth kl Thyjlsh. H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó Htiyvzpv,
jvtv hxbls xbl zhiíh iplu svz táz lzjvukpkvz wluzhtpluavz kl zb htpnv:
— Whyh xbl, zlñvy, vz zhapzmhnápz klzh kbkh, lz iplu xbl zlwápz xbl jbhukv
lzal klzkpjohkv lzjypipó lzah jhujpóu lzahih hbzlual kl Thyjlsh, kl xbplu
és zl ohiíh hbzluahkv wvy zb cvsbuahk, wvy cly zp bzhih jvu és sh hbzlujph
kl zbz vykpuhypvz mblyvz. F, jvtv hs luhtvyhkv hbzlual uv ohf jvzh xbl uv
sl mhapnbl up altvy xbl uv sl ké hsjhujl, hzí sl mhapnhihu h Nypzózavtv svz
jlsvz pthnpuhkvz f shz zvzwljohz altpkhz jvtv zp mblyhu clykhklyhz. F jvu
lzav xblkh lu zb wbuav sh clykhk xbl sh mhth wylnvuh kl sh ivukhk kl
Thyjlsh; sh jbhs, mblyh kl zly jybls, f bu wvjv hyyvnhual f bu tbjov
klzklñvzh, sh tlzth lucpkph up klil up wblkl wvulysl mhsah hsnbuh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó Cpchskv.

F, xblyplukv slly vayv whwls kl svz xbl ohiíh ylzlychkv kls mblnv, sv
lzavyió buh thyhcpssvzh cpzpóu —xbl ahs whyljíh lssh— xbl ptwyvcpzhtlual zl
slz vmyljpó h svz vqvz; f mbl xbl, wvy jpth kl sh wlñh kvukl zl jhchih sh
zlwbsabyh, whyljpó sh whzavyh Thyjlsh, ahu olytvzh xbl whzhih h zb mhth zb
olytvzbyh. Svz xbl ohzah luavujlz uv sh ohiíhu cpzav sh tpyhihu jvu
hktpyhjpóu f zpslujpv, f svz xbl fh lzahihu hjvzabtiyhkvz h clysh uv
xblkhyvu tluvz zbzwluzvz xbl svz xbl ubujh sh ohiíhu cpzav. Thz, hwluhz sh
obiv cpzav Htiyvzpv, jbhukv, jvu tblzayhz kl áuptv pukpnuhkv, sl kpqv:

— ¿Cplulz h cly, wvy cluabyh, ¡vo mplyv ihzpspzjv klzahz tvuahñhz!, zp jvu
ab wylzlujph cplyalu zhunyl shz olypkhz klzal tpzlyhisl h xbplu ab jyblskhk
xbpaó sh cpkh? ¿V cplulz h bmhuhyal lu shz jyblslz ohghñhz kl ab jvukpjpóu,
v h cly klzkl lzh hsabyh, jvtv vayv klzwphkhkv Ulyv, ls pujlukpv kl zb
hiyhzhkh Yvth, v h wpzhy, hyyvnhual, lzal klzkpjohkv jhkácly, jvtv sh
punyhah opqh hs kl zb whkyl Ahyxbpuv? Kpuvz wylzav h sv xbl cplulz, v xbé
lz hxblssv kl xbl táz nbzahz; xbl, wvy zhily fv xbl svz wluzhtpluavz kl
Nypzózavtv qhtáz klqhyvu kl vilkljlyal lu cpkh, ohyé xbl, hbu és tblyav, al
vilklgjhu svz kl avkvz hxblssvz xbl zl sshthyvu zbz htpnvz.

— Uv clunv, ¡vo Htiyvzpv!, h upunbuh jvzh kl shz xbl ohz kpjov —ylzwvukpó
Thyjlsh—, zpuv h cvscly wvy tí tpzth, f h khy h lualukly jbáu mblyh kl
yhgóu chu avkvz hxblssvz xbl kl zbz wluhz f kl sh tblyal kl Nypzózavtv tl
jbswhu; f hzí, yblnv h avkvz svz xbl hxbí lzaápz tl lzaépz haluavz, xbl uv
zlyá tlulzaly tbjov apltwv up nhzahy tbjohz whshiyhz whyh wlyzbhkpy buh
clykhk h svz kpzjylavz.

»Oígvtl ls jplsv, zlnúu cvzvayvz kljíz, olytvzh, f kl ahs thulyh xbl, zpu
zly wvklyvzvz h vayh jvzh, h xbl tl htépz vz tblcl tp olytvzbyh; f, wvy ls
htvy xbl tl tvzayápz, kljíz, f hbu xblyépz, xbl lzaé fv vispnhkh h hthyvz.
Fv jvuvgjv, jvu ls uhabyhs lualukptpluav xbl Kpvz tl oh khkv, xbl avkv sv
olytvzv lz hthisl; thz uv hsjhugv xbl, wvy yhgóu kl zly hthkv, lzaé
vispnhkv sv xbl lz hthkv wvy olytvzv h hthy h xbplu sl hth. F táz, xbl
wvkyíh hjvualjly xbl ls hthkvy kl sv olytvzv mblzl mlv, f, zplukv sv mlv
kpnuv kl zly hivyyljpkv, jhl tbf ths ls kljpy ''Xbpéyval wvy olytvzh; ohztl
kl hthy hbuxbl zlh mlv''. Wlyv, wblzav jhzv xbl jvyyhu pnbhstlual shz
olytvzbyhz, uv wvy lzv ohu kl jvyyly pnbhslz svz klzlvz, xbl uv avkhz
olytvzbyhz luhtvyhu; xbl hsnbuhz hslnyhu sh cpzah f uv ypuklu sh cvsbuahk;
xbl zp avkhz shz ilsslghz luhtvyhzlu f ypukplzlu, zlyíh bu hukhy shz
cvsbuahklz jvumbzhz f klzjhtpuhkhz, zpu zhily lu jbás ohiíhu kl whyhy;
wvyxbl, zplukv pumpupavz svz zbqlavz olytvzvz, pumpupavz ohiíhu kl zly svz
klzlvz. F, zlnúu fv ol víkv kljpy, ls clykhklyv htvy uv zl kpcpkl, f oh kl
zly cvsbuahypv, f uv mvygvzv. Zplukv lzav hzí, jvtv fv jylv xbl sv lz, ¿wvy
xbé xblyépz xbl ypukh tp cvsbuahk wvy mblygh, vispnhkh uv táz kl xbl kljíz
xbl tl xblyépz iplu? Zp uv, kljpktl: zp jvtv ls jplsv tl opgv olytvzh tl
opjplyh mlh, ¿mblyh qbzav xbl tl xblqhyh kl cvzvayvz wvyxbl uv tl htáihklz?
Jbhuav táz, xbl ohiépz kl jvuzpklyhy xbl fv uv lzjvní sh olytvzbyh xbl
alunv; xbl, ahs jbhs lz, ls jplsv tl sh kpv kl nyhjph, zpu fv wlkpssh up
lzjvnlssh. F, hzí jvtv sh cíivyh uv tlyljl zly jbswhkh wvy sh wvugvñh xbl
aplul, wblzav xbl jvu lssh thah, wvy ohiéyzlsh khkv uhabyhslgh, ahtwvjv fv
tlylgjv zly ylwylolukpkh wvy zly olytvzh; xbl sh olytvzbyh lu sh tbqly
ovulzah lz jvtv ls mblnv hwhyahkv v jvtv sh lzwhkh hnbkh, xbl up és xblth
up lssh jvyah h xbplu h lssvz uv zl hjlyjh. Sh ovuyh f shz cpyabklz zvu
hkvyuvz kls hsth, zpu shz jbhslz ls jblywv, hbuxbl sv zlh, uv klil kl
whyljly olytvzv. Wblz zp sh ovulzapkhk lz buh kl shz cpyabklz xbl hs jblywv
f hs hsth táz hkvyuhu f olytvzlhu, ¿wvy xbé sh oh kl wlykly sh xbl lz hthkh
wvy olytvzh, wvy jvyylzwvukly h sh pualujpóu kl hxbls xbl, wvy zósv zb
nbzav, jvu avkhz zbz mblyghz l pukbzayphz wyvjbyh xbl sh wplykh?

»Fv uhjí spiyl, f whyh wvkly cpcpy spiyl lzjvní sh zvslkhk kl svz jhtwvz.
Svz áyivslz klzahz tvuahñhz zvu tp jvtwhñíh, shz jshyhz hnbhz klzavz
hyyvfvz tpz lzwlqvz; jvu svz áyivslz f jvu shz hnbhz jvtbupjv tpz
wluzhtpluavz f olytvzbyh. Mblnv zvf hwhyahkv f lzwhkh wblzah slqvz. H svz
xbl ol luhtvyhkv jvu sh cpzah ol klzlunhñhkv jvu shz whshiyhz. F zp svz
klzlvz zl zbzaluahu jvu lzwlyhughz, uv ohiplukv fv khkv hsnbuh h Nypzózavtv
up h vayv hsnbuv, ls mpu kl upunbuv klssvz iplu zl wblkl kljpy xbl hualz sl
thaó zb wvymíh xbl tp jyblskhk. F zp zl tl ohjl jhynv xbl lyhu ovulzavz zbz
wluzhtpluavz, f xbl wvy lzav lzahih vispnhkh h jvyylzwvukly h lssvz, kpnv
xbl, jbhukv lu lzl tpztv sbnhy kvukl hovyh zl jhch zb zlwbsabyh tl
klzjbiypó sh ivukhk kl zb pualujpóu, sl kpql fv xbl sh tíh lyh cpcpy lu
wlywlabh zvslkhk, f kl xbl zvsh sh aplyyh nvghzl ls mybav kl tp
yljvnptpluav f svz klzwvqvz kl tp olytvzbyh; f zp és, jvu avkv lzal
klzlunhñv, xbpzv wvymphy jvuayh sh lzwlyhugh f uhclnhy jvuayh ls cpluav,
¿xbé tbjov xbl zl hulnhzl lu sh tpahk kls nvsmv kl zb klzhapuv? Zp fv sl
luaylabcplyh, mblyh mhszh; zp sl jvualuahyh, opjplyh jvuayh tp tlqvy
pualujpóu f wyvzbwblzav. Wvympó klzlunhñhkv, klzlzwlyó zpu zly hivyyljpkv:
¡tpyhk hovyh zp zlyá yhgóu xbl kl zb wluh zl tl ké h tí sh jbswh! Xbéqlzl
ls lunhñhkv, klzlzwéylzl hxbls h xbplu sl mhsahyvu shz wyvtlapkhz
lzwlyhughz, jvumílzl ls xbl fv sshthyl, bmáulzl ls xbl fv hktpaplyl; wlyv
uv tl sshtl jybls up ovtpjpkh hxbls h xbplu fv uv wyvtlav, lunhñv, sshtv up
hktpav.

»Ls jplsv húu ohzah hovyh uv oh xblypkv xbl fv htl wvy klzapuv, f ls wluzhy
xbl alunv kl hthy wvy lsljjpóu lz lzjbzhkv. Lzal nlulyhs klzlunhñv zpych h
jhkh buv kl svz xbl tl zvspjpahu kl zb whyapjbshy wyvcljov; f luapéukhzl,
kl hxbí hklshual, xbl zp hsnbuv wvy tí tbyplyl, uv tblyl kl jlsvzv up
klzkpjohkv, wvyxbl xbplu h uhkpl xbplyl, h upunbuv klil khy jlsvz; xbl svz
klzlunhñvz uv zl ohu kl avthy lu jbluah kl klzklulz. Ls xbl tl sshth mplyh
f ihzpspzjv, kéqltl jvtv jvzh wlyqbkpjphs f thsh; ls xbl tl sshth punyhah,
uv tl zpych; ls xbl klzjvuvjpkh, uv tl jvuvgjh; xbplu jybls, uv tl zpnh;
xbl lzah mplyh, lzal ihzpspzjv, lzah punyhah, lzah jybls f lzah
klzjvuvjpkh, up svz ibzjhyá, zlycpyá, jvuvjlyá up zlnbpyá lu upunbuh
thulyh. Xbl zp h Nypzózavtv thaó zb ptwhjplujph f hyyvqhkv klzlv, ¿wvy xbé
zl oh kl jbswhy tp ovulzav wyvjlkly f yljhav? Zp fv jvuzlycv tp sptwplgh
jvu sh jvtwhñíh kl svz áyivslz, ¿wvy xbé oh kl xblyly xbl sh wplykh ls xbl
xbplyl xbl sh alunh jvu svz ovtiylz? Fv, jvtv zhiépz, alunv ypxblghz
wyvwphz f uv jvkpjpv shz hqluhz; alunv spiyl jvukpjpóu f uv nbzav kl
zbqlahytl: up xbplyv up hivyylgjv h uhkpl. Uv lunhñv h ézal up zvspjpav
hxbés, up ibysv jvu buv up tl luaylalunv jvu ls vayv. Sh jvuclyzhjpóu
ovulzah kl shz ghnhshz klzahz hsklhz f ls jbpkhkv kl tpz jhiyhz tl
luaylaplul. Aplulu tpz klzlvz wvy aéytpuv lzahz tvuahñhz, f zp kl hxbí
zhslu, lz h jvualtwshy sh olytvzbyh kls jplsv, whzvz jvu xbl jhtpuh ls hsth
h zb tvyhkh wyptlyh.

F, lu kpjplukv lzav, zpu xblyly víy ylzwblzah hsnbuh, cvscpó shz lzwhskhz f
zl luayó wvy sv táz jlyyhkv kl bu tvual xbl hssí jlyjh lzahih, klqhukv
hktpyhkvz, ahuav kl zb kpzjyljpóu jvtv kl zb olytvzbyh, h avkvz svz xbl
hssí lzahihu. F hsnbuvz kplyvu tblzayhz —kl hxblssvz xbl kl sh wvklyvzh
msljoh kl svz yhfvz kl zbz ilssvz vqvz lzahihu olypkvz— kl xblylysh zlnbpy,
zpu hwyvcljohyzl kls thupmplzav klzlunhñv xbl ohiíhu víkv. Sv jbhs cpzav
wvy kvu Xbpqval, whyljpéukvsl xbl hssí cluíh iplu bzhy kl zb jhihsslyíh,
zvjvyyplukv h shz kvujlsshz tlulzalyvzhz, wblzah sh thuv lu ls wbñv kl zb
lzwhkh, lu hsahz l pualspnpislz cvjlz, kpqv:

— Upunbuh wlyzvuh, kl jbhsxbply lzahkv f jvukpjpóu xbl zlh, zl haylch h
zlnbpy h sh olytvzh Thyjlsh, zv wluh kl jhly lu sh mbypvzh pukpnuhjpóu tíh.
Lssh oh tvzayhkv jvu jshyhz f zbmpjplualz yhgvulz sh wvjh v upunbuh jbswh
xbl oh alupkv lu sh tblyal kl Nypzózavtv, f jbáu hqluh cpcl kl jvuklzjlukly
jvu svz klzlvz kl upunbuv kl zbz hthualz, h jbfh jhbzh lz qbzav xbl, lu
sbnhy kl zly zlnbpkh f wlyzlnbpkh, zlh ovuyhkh f lzapthkh kl avkvz svz
ibluvz kls tbukv, wblz tblzayh xbl lu és lssh lz zvsh sh xbl jvu ahu
ovulzah pualujpóu cpcl.

V fh xbl mblzl wvy shz htluhghz kl kvu Xbpqval, v wvyxbl Htiyvzpv slz kpqv
xbl jvujsbflzlu jvu sv xbl h zb iblu htpnv kliíhu, upunbuv kl svz whzavylz
zl tvcpó up hwhyaó kl hssí ohzah xbl, hjhihkh sh zlwbsabyh f hiyhzhkvz svz
whwlslz kl Nypzózavtv, wbzplyvu zb jblywv lu lssh, uv zpu tbjohz sánypthz
kl svz jpyjbuzahualz. Jlyyhyvu sh zlwbsabyh jvu buh nyblzh wlñh, lu ahuav
xbl zl hjhihih buh svzh xbl, zlnúu Htiyvzpv kpqv, wluzhih thukhy ohjly, jvu
bu lwpahmpv xbl ohiíh kl kljpy klzah thulyh:

Fhjl hxbí kl bu hthkvy
ls tízlyv jblywv olshkv,
xbl mbl whzavy kl nhuhkv,
wlykpkv wvy klzhtvy.
Tbypó h thuvz kls ypnvy
kl buh lzxbpch olytvzh punyhah,
jvu xbplu zb ptwlypv kpshah
sh apyhuíh kl zb htvy.

Sblnv lzwhyjplyvu wvy jpth kl sh zlwbsabyh tbjohz msvylz f yhtvz, f, khukv
avkvz ls wézhtl h zb htpnv Htiyvzpv, zl klzwpkplyvu kés. Sv tlztv opjplyvu
Cpchskv f zb jvtwhñlyv, f kvu Xbpqval zl klzwpkpó kl zbz obézwlklz f kl svz
jhtpuhualz, svz jbhslz sl yvnhyvu zl cpuplzl jvu lssvz h Zlcpssh, wvy zly
sbnhy ahu hjvtvkhkv h ohsshy hcluabyhz, xbl lu jhkh jhssl f ayhz jhkh
lzxbpuh zl vmyljlu táz xbl lu vayv hsnbuv. Kvu Xbpqval slz hnyhkljpó ls
hcpzv f ls áuptv xbl tvzayhihu kl ohjlysl tlyjlk, f kpqv xbl wvy luavujlz
uv xblyíh up kliíh py h Zlcpssh, ohzah xbl obiplzl klzwvqhkv avkhz hxblsshz
zplyyhz kl shkyvulz thshukypulz, kl xbplu lyh mhth xbl avkhz lzahihu
ssluhz. Cplukv zb ibluh klalytpuhjpóu, uv xbpzplyvu svz jhtpuhualz
ptwvyabuhysl táz, zpuv, avyuáukvzl h klzwlkpy kl ublcv, sl klqhyvu f
wyvzpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv, lu ls jbhs uv slz mhsaó kl xbé ayhahy, hzí kl sh
opzavyph kl Thyjlsh f Nypzózavtv jvtv kl shz svjbyhz kl kvu Xbpqval. Ls
jbhs klalytpuó kl py h ibzjhy h sh whzavyh Thyjlsh f vmyljlysl avkv sv xbl
és wvkíh lu zb zlycpjpv. Thz uv sl hcpuv jvtv és wluzhih, zlnúu zl jbluah
lu ls kpzjbyzv klzah clykhklyh opzavyph, khukv hxbí mpu sh zlnbukh whyal.

Alyjlyh whyal kls punlupvzv opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh




Jhwíabsv EC. Kvukl zl jbluah sh klznyhjphkh hcluabyh xbl zl avwó kvu
Xbpqval lu avwhy jvu buvz klzhsthkvz fhunülzlz

Jbluah ls zhipv Jpkl Ohtlal Ilulunlsp xbl, hzí jvtv kvu Xbpqval zl klzwpkpó
kl zbz obézwlklz f kl avkvz svz xbl zl ohsshyvu hs luaplyyv kls whzavy
Nypzózavtv, és f zb lzjbklyv zl luayhyvu wvy ls tlztv ivzxbl kvukl cplyvu
xbl zl ohiíh luayhkv sh whzavyh Thyjlsh; f, ohiplukv hukhkv táz kl kvz
ovyhz wvy és, ibzjáukvsh wvy avkhz whyalz zpu wvkly ohsshysh, cpuplyvu h
whyhy h bu wyhkv ssluv kl mylzjh flyih, qbuav kls jbhs jvyyíh bu hyyvfv
hwhjpisl f mylzjv; ahuav, xbl jvucpkó f mvygó h whzhy hssí shz ovyhz kl sh
zplzah, xbl ypnbyvzhtlual jvtlughih fh h luayhy.

Hwláyvuzl kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, f, klqhukv hs qbtluav f h Yvjpuhual h zbz
hujobyhz whjly kl sh tbjoh flyih xbl hssí ohiíh, kplyvu zhjv h shz
hsmvyqhz, f, zpu jlyptvuph hsnbuh, lu ibluh whg f jvtwhñíh, htv f tvgv
jvtplyvu sv xbl lu lsshz ohsshyvu.

Uv zl ohiíh jbyhkv Zhujov kl ljohy zblsahz h Yvjpuhual, zlnbyv kl xbl sl
jvuvjíh wvy ahu thuzv f ahu wvjv ypqvzv xbl avkhz shz flnbhz kl sh klolzh
kl Jóykvih uv sl opjplyhu avthy ths zpuplzayv. Vykluó, wblz, sh zblyal, f
ls kphisv, xbl uv avkhz cljlz kblytl, xbl hukhihu wvy hxbls chssl whjplukv
buh thuhkh kl ohjhz nhspjphuhz kl buvz hyyplyvz nhsslnvz, kl svz jbhslz lz
jvzabtiyl zlzalhy jvu zb yljbh lu sbnhylz f zpapvz kl flyih f hnbh; f hxbls
kvukl hjlyaó h ohsshyzl kvu Xbpqval lyh tbf h wyvwózpav kl svz nhsslnvz.
Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl h Yvjpuhual sl cpuv lu klzlv kl ylmvjpshyzl jvu shz
zlñvyhz mhjhz; f zhsplukv, hzí jvtv shz vspó, kl zb uhabyhs whzv f
jvzabtiyl, zpu wlkpy spjlujph h zb kblñv, avtó bu ayvapjv hsnv wpjhkpssv
f zl mbl h jvtbupjhy zb uljlzpkhk jvu lsshz. Thz lsshz, xbl, h sv xbl
whyljpó, kliíhu kl aluly táz nhuh kl whjly xbl kl ás, yljpipéyvusl jvu shz
olyyhkbyhz f jvu svz kplualz, kl ahs thulyh xbl, h wvjv lzwhjpv, zl sl
yvtwplyvu shz jpujohz f xblkó, zpu zpssh, lu wlsvah. Wlyv sv xbl és klipó
táz kl zluapy mbl xbl, cplukv svz hyyplyvz sh mblygh xbl h zbz flnbhz zl
slz ohjíh, hjbkplyvu jvu lzahjhz, f ahuavz whsvz sl kplyvu xbl sl
klyypihyvu thswhyhkv lu ls zblsv.

Fh lu lzav kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, xbl sh whspgh kl Yvjpuhual ohiíhu cpzav,
sslnhihu pqhklhukv; f kpqv kvu Xbpqval h Zhujov:

— H sv xbl fv clv, htpnv Zhujov, ézavz uv zvu jhihsslyvz, zpuv nlual zvlg f
kl ihqh yhslh. Kínvsv wvyxbl iplu tl wblklz hfbkhy h avthy sh klipkh
clunhugh kls hnyhcpv xbl klshual kl ublzayvz vqvz zl sl oh oljov h
Yvjpuhual.

— ¿Xbé kphisvz kl clunhugh oltvz kl avthy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zp ézavz zvu
táz kl clpual f uvzvayvz uv táz kl kvz, f hbu, xbpgá, uvzvayvz zpuv buv f
tlkpv?

— Fv chsnv wvy jpluav —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval.

F, zpu ohjly táz kpzjbyzvz, ljoó thuv h zb lzwhkh f hyyltlapó h svz
nhsslnvz, f sv tlztv opgv Zhujov Whugh, pujpahkv f tvcpkv kls lqltwsv kl zb
htv. F, h shz wyptlyhz, kpv kvu Xbpqval buh jbjopsshkh h buv, xbl sl hiypó
bu zhfv kl jblyv kl xbl cluíh clzapkv, jvu nyhu whyal kl sh lzwhskh.
Svz nhsslnvz, xbl zl cplyvu thsayhahy kl hxblssvz kvz ovtiylz zvsvz, zplukv
lssvz ahuavz, hjbkplyvu h zbz lzahjhz, f, jvnplukv h svz kvz lu tlkpv,
jvtlughyvu h tlubklhy zviyl lssvz jvu nyhukl hoíujv f cloltlujph. Clykhk lz
xbl hs zlnbukv avxbl kplyvu jvu Zhujov lu ls zblsv, f sv tlztv sl hcpuv h
kvu Xbpqval, zpu xbl sl chsplzl zb klzaylgh f iblu áuptv; f xbpzv zb
cluabyh xbl cpuplzl h jhly h svz wplz kl Yvjpuhual, xbl húu uv zl ohiíh
slchuahkv; kvukl zl ljoh kl cly sh mbyph jvu xbl thjohjhu lzahjhz wblzahz
lu thuvz yúzapjhz f luvqhkhz.

Cplukv, wblz, svz nhsslnvz ls ths yljhkv xbl ohiíhu oljov, jvu sh thfvy
wylzalgh xbl wbkplyvu, jhynhyvu zb yljbh f zpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv, klqhukv h
svz kvz hcluabylyvz kl thsh ayhgh f kl wlvy ahshual.

Ls wyptlyv xbl zl ylzpuapó mbl Zhujov Whugh; f, ohssáukvzl qbuav h zb
zlñvy, jvu cvg lumlyth f shzapthkh, kpqv:

— ¡Zlñvy kvu Xbpqval! ¡Ho, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval!

— ¿Xbé xbplylz, Zhujov olythuv? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval jvu ls tlztv avuv
hmltpuhkv f kvsplual xbl Zhujov.

— Xblyyíh, zp mblzl wvzpisl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov Whugh—, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl
kplzl kvz ayhnvz kl hxblssh ilipkh kls mlv Ishz, zp lz xbl sh aplul cblzayh
tlyjlk hoí h thuv. Xbpgá zlyá kl wyvcljov whyh svz xbliyhuahtpluavz kl
oblzvz jvtv sv lz whyh shz mlypkhz.

— Wblz, h alulysh fv hxbí, klznyhjphkv fv, ¿xbé uvz mhsahih? —ylzwvukpó kvu
Xbpqval—. Thz fv al qbyv, Zhujov Whugh, h ml kl jhihsslyv hukhual, xbl
hualz xbl whzlu kvz kíhz, zp sh mvyabuh uv vykluh vayh jvzh, sh alunv kl
aluly lu tp wvkly, v ths tl ohu kl hukhy shz thuvz.

— Wblz, ¿lu jbáuavz sl whyljl h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl wvkyltvz tvcly svz wplz?
— ylwspjó Zhujov Whugh.

— Kl tí zé kljpy —kpqv ls tvspkv jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval— xbl uv zhiyé wvuly
aéytpuv h lzvz kíhz. Thz fv tl alunv sh jbswh kl avkv, xbl uv ohiíh kl
wvuly thuv h sh lzwhkh jvuayh ovtiylz xbl uv mblzlu hythkvz jhihsslyvz jvtv
fv; f hzí, jylv xbl, lu wluh kl ohily whzhkv shz slflz kl sh jhihsslyíh, oh
wlytpapkv ls kpvz kl shz ihahsshz xbl zl tl kplzl lzal jhzapnv. Wvy sv
jbhs, Zhujov Whugh, jvucplul xbl lzaéz hkclyapkv lu lzav xbl hovyh al kpyé,
wvyxbl ptwvyah tbjov h sh zhsbk kl luayhtivz; f lz xbl, jbhukv clhz xbl
zltlqhual jhuhssh uvz ohjl hsnúu hnyhcpv, uv hnbhyklz h xbl fv wvunh thuv
hs lzwhkh whyh lssvz, wvyxbl uv sv ohyé lu upunbuh thulyh, zpuv wvu aú thuv
h ab lzwhkh f jhzaínhsvz tbf h ab zhivy; xbl zp lu zb hfbkh f klmluzh
hjbkplylu jhihsslyvz, fv al zhiyé klmlukly f vmluklssvz jvu avkv tp wvkly;
xbl fh ohiyáz cpzav wvy tps zlñhslz f lewlyplujphz ohzah hkóukl zl lzaplukl
ls chsvy kl lzal tp mblyal iyhgv.

Ahs xblkó kl hyyvnhual ls wviyl zlñvy jvu ls clujptpluav kls chsplual
cpgjhíuv. Thz uv sl whyljpó ahu iplu h Zhujov Whugh ls hcpzv kl zb htv xbl
klqhzl kl ylzwvukly, kpjplukv:

— Zlñvy, fv zvf ovtiyl whjímpjv, thuzv, zvzlnhkv, f zé kpzptpshy jbhsxbplyh
puqbyph, wvyxbl alunv tbqly f opqvz xbl zbzaluahy f jyphy. Hzí xbl, zéhsl h
cblzayh tlyjlk ahtipéu hcpzv, wblz uv wblkl zly thukhav, xbl lu upunbuh
thulyh wvukyé thuv h sh lzwhkh, up jvuayh cpsshuv up jvuayh jhihsslyv; f
xbl, klzkl hxbí whyh klshual kl Kpvz, wlykvuv jbhuavz hnyhcpvz tl ohu oljov
f ohu kl ohjly: vyh tl svz ohfh oljov, v ohnh v ohfh kl ohjly, wlyzvuh hsah
v ihqh, ypjv v wviyl, opkhsnv v wljolyv, zpu ljlwahy lzahkv up jvukpjpóu
hsnbuh.

Sv jbhs víkv wvy zb htv, sl ylzwvukpó:

— Xbpzplyh aluly hspluav whyh wvkly ohishy bu wvjv klzjhuzhkv, f xbl ls
kvsvy xbl alunv lu lzah jvzapssh zl hwshjhyh ahuav jbhuav, whyh khyal h
lualukly, Whugh, lu ls lyyvy lu xbl lzaáz. Clu hjá, wljhkvy; zp ls cpluav
kl sh mvyabuh, ohzah hovyh ahu jvuayhypv, lu ublzayv mhcvy zl cblscl,
sslcáukvuvz shz clshz kls klzlv whyh xbl zlnbyhtlual f zpu jvuayhzal hsnbuv
avtltvz wblyav lu hsnbuh kl shz íuzbshz xbl al alunv wyvtlapkh, ¿xbé zlyíh
kl ap zp, nhuáukvsh fv, al opjplzl zlñvy klssh? Wblz ¿sv clukyáz h
ptwvzpipspahy wvy uv zly jhihsslyv, up xblylysv zly, up aluly chsvy up
pualujpóu kl clunhy abz puqbyphz f klmlukly ab zlñvyív? Wvyxbl ohz kl zhily
xbl lu svz ylpuvz f wyvcpujphz ublchtlual jvuxbpzahkvz ubujh lzaáu ahu
xbplavz svz áuptvz kl zbz uhabyhslz, up ahu kl whyal kls ublcv zlñvy xbl uv
zl alunhu altvy kl xbl ohu kl ohjly hsnbuh uvclkhk whyh hsalyhy kl ublcv
shz jvzhz, f cvscly, jvtv kpjlu, h wyvihy cluabyh; f hzí, lz tlulzaly xbl
ls ublcv wvzlzvy alunh lualukptpluav whyh zhilyzl nvilyuhy, f chsvy whyh
vmlukly f klmluklyzl lu jbhsxbplyh hjvualjptpluav.

— Lu lzal xbl hovyh uvz oh hjvualjpkv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbpzplyh fv aluly
lzl lualukptpluav f lzl chsvy xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl; thz fv sl qbyv, h ml
kl wviyl ovtiyl, xbl táz lzavf whyh ipgthz xbl whyh wsáapjhz. Tpyl cblzayh
tlyjlk zp zl wblkl slchuahy, f hfbkhyltvz h Yvjpuhual, hbuxbl uv sv tlyljl,
wvyxbl és mbl sh jhbzh wypujpwhs kl avkv lzal tvsptpluav. Qhtáz ahs jylí kl
Yvjpuhual, xbl sl aluíh wvy wlyzvuh jhzah f ahu whjímpjh jvtv fv. Lu mpu,
iplu kpjlu xbl lz tlulzaly tbjov apltwv whyh clupy h jvuvjly shz wlyzvuhz,
f xbl uv ohf jvzh zlnbyh lu lzah cpkh. ¿Xbpéu kpqlyh xbl ayhz kl hxblsshz
ahu nyhuklz jbjopsshkhz jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk kpv h hxbls klzkpjohkv
jhihsslyv hukhual, ohiíh kl clupy, wvy sh wvzah f lu zlnbptpluav zbfv, lzah
ahu nyhukl altwlzahk kl whsvz xbl oh klzjhynhkv zviyl ublzayhz lzwhskhz?
— Hbu shz abfhz, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, klilu kl lzahy oljohz h
zltlqhualz ubishkvz; wlyv shz tíhz, jyphkhz luayl zpuhihmhz f ovshukhz,
jshyv lzaá xbl zluapyáu táz ls kvsvy klzah klznyhjph. F zp uv mblzl wvyxbl
pthnpuv..., ¿xbé kpnv pthnpuv?, zé tbf jplyav, xbl avkhz lzahz
pujvtvkpkhklz zvu tbf hulqhz hs lqlyjpjpv kl shz hythz, hxbí tl klqhyíh
tvypy kl wbyv luvqv.

H lzav ylwspjó ls lzjbklyv:

— Zlñvy, fh xbl lzahz klznyhjphz zvu kl sh jvzljoh kl sh jhihsslyíh, kínhtl
cblzayh tlyjlk zp zbjlklu tbf h tlubkv, v zp aplulu zbz apltwvz sptpahkvz
lu xbl hjhljlu; wvyxbl tl whyljl h tí xbl h kvz jvzljohz xblkhyltvz
puúapslz whyh sh alyjlyh, zp Kpvz, wvy zb pumpupah tpzlypjvykph, uv uvz
zvjvyyl.

— Záilal, htpnv Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl sh cpkh kl svz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz lzaá zbqlah h tps wlspnyvz f klzcluabyhz; f, up táz up
tluvz, lzaá lu wvalujph wyvwpujbh kl zly svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz ylflz f
ltwlyhkvylz, jvtv sv oh tvzayhkv sh lewlyplujph lu tbjovz f kpclyzvz
jhihsslyvz, kl jbfhz opzavyphz fv alunv lualyh uvapjph. F wbkpéyhal jvuahy
hnvyh, zp ls kvsvy tl kplyh sbnhy, kl hsnbuvz xbl, zósv wvy ls chsvy kl zb
iyhgv, ohu zbipkv h svz hsavz nyhkvz xbl ol jvuahkv; f lzavz tlztvz zl
cplyvu hualz f klzwbéz lu kpclyzhz jhshtpkhklz f tpzlyphz. Wvyxbl ls
chslyvzv Hthkíz kl Nhbsh zl cpv lu wvkly kl zb tvyahs lultpnv Hyjhsábz ls
lujhuahkvy, kl xbplu zl aplul wvy hclypnbhkv xbl sl kpv, alupéukvsl
wylzv, táz kl kvjpluavz hgvalz jvu shz yplukhz kl zb jhihssv, hahkv h buh
jvsbuh kl bu whapv. F hbu ohf bu hbavy zljylav, f kl uv wvjv jyékpav, xbl
kpjl xbl, ohiplukv jvnpkv hs Jhihsslyv kls Mliv jvu buh jplyah ayhtwh xbl
zl sl obukpó klihqv kl svz wplz, lu bu jplyav jhzapssv, f hs jhly, zl ohssó
lu buh ovukh zpth klihqv kl aplyyh, hahkv kl wplz f thuvz, f hssí sl
ljohyvu buh klzahz xbl sshthu tlsljpuhz, kl hnbh kl uplcl f hyluh, kl sv
xbl sslnó tbf hs jhiv; f zp uv mblyh zvjvyypkv lu hxblssh nyhu jbpah kl bu
zhipv nyhukl htpnv zbfv, sv whzhyh tbf ths ls wviyl jhihsslyv. Huzí xbl,
iplu wblkv fv whzhy luayl ahuah ibluh nlual; xbl thfvylz hmyluahz zvu shz
xbl ézavz whzhyvu, xbl uv shz xbl hovyh uvzvayvz whzhtvz. Wvyxbl xbplyv
ohjlyal zhipkvy, Zhujov, xbl uv hmyluahu shz olypkhz xbl zl khu jvu svz
puzaybtluavz xbl hjhzv zl ohsshu lu shz thuvz; f lzav lzaá lu sh slf kls
kblsv, lzjypav wvy whshiyhz lewylzhz: xbl zp ls ghwhalyv kh h vayv jvu sh
ovyth xbl aplul lu sh thuv, wblzav xbl clykhklyhtlual lz kl whsv, uv wvy
lzv zl kpyá xbl xblkh hwhslhkv hxbls h xbplu kpv jvu lssh. Kpnv lzav wvyxbl
uv wpluzlz xbl, wblzav xbl xblkhtvz klzah wluklujph tvspkvz, xblkhtvz
hmyluahkvz; wvyxbl shz hythz xbl hxblssvz ovtiylz ayhíhu, jvu xbl uvz
thjohjhyvu, uv lyhu vayhz xbl zbz lzahjhz, f upunbuv klssvz, h sv xbl zl tl
hjblykh, aluíh lzavxbl, lzwhkh up wbñhs.

— Uv tl kplyvu h tí sbnhy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— h xbl tpyhzl lu ahuav; wvyxbl,
hwluhz wbzl thuv h tp apgvuh, jbhukv tl zhuapnbhyvu svz ovtiyvz jvu zbz
wpuvz, kl thulyh xbl tl xbpahyvu sh cpzah kl svz vqvz f sh mblygh kl svz
wplz, khukv jvutpnv hkvukl hovyh fhnv, f hkvukl uv tl kh wluh hsnbuh ls
wluzhy zp mbl hmyluah v uv sv kl svz lzahjhgvz, jvtv tl sh kh ls kvsvy kl
svz nvswlz, xbl tl ohu kl xblkhy ahu ptwylzvz lu sh tltvyph jvtv lu shz
lzwhskhz.

— Jvu avkv lzv, al ohnv zhily, olythuv Whugh —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uv
ohf tltvyph h xbplu ls apltwv uv hjhil, up kvsvy xbl tblyal uv sl jvuzbth.

— Wblz, ¿xbé thfvy klzkpjoh wblkl zly —ylwspjó Whugh— kl hxblssh xbl hnbhykh
hs apltwv xbl sh jvuzbth f h sh tblyal xbl sh hjhil? Zp lzah ublzayh
klznyhjph mblyh kl hxblsshz xbl jvu bu why kl ipgthz zl jbyhu, hbu uv ahu
thsv; wlyv cvf cplukv xbl uv ohu kl ihzahy avkvz svz ltwshzavz kl bu
ovzwpahs whyh wvulyshz lu iblu aéytpuv zpxbplyh.

— Kéqhal klzv f zhjh mblyghz kl mshxblgh, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—,
xbl hzí ohyé fv, f clhtvz jótv lzaá Yvjpuhual; xbl, h sv xbl tl whyljl, uv
sl oh jhipkv hs wviyl sh tluvy whyal klzah klznyhjph.

— Uv ohf kl xbé thyhcpsshyzl klzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zplukv és ahu iblu
jhihsslyv hukhual; kl sv xbl fv tl thyhcpssv lz kl xbl tp qbtluav ohfh
xblkhkv spiyl f zpu jvzahz kvukl uvzvayvz zhsptvz zpu jvzapsshz.

— Zpltwyl klqh sh cluabyh buh wblyah hiplyah lu shz klzkpjohz, whyh khy
yltlkpv h lsshz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Kínvsv wvyxbl lzh ilzalgblsh wvkyá
zbwspy hovyh sh mhsah kl Yvjpuhual, sslcáukvtl h tí klzkl hxbí h hsnúu
jhzapssv kvukl zlh jbyhkv kl tpz mlypkhz. F táz, xbl uv alukyé h klzovuyh
sh ahs jhihsslyíh, wvyxbl tl hjblykv ohily slíkv xbl hxbls iblu cplqv
Zpsluv, hfv f wlkhnvnv kls hslnyl kpvz kl sh ypzh, jbhukv luayó lu sh
jpbkhk kl shz jplu wblyahz pih, tbf h zb wshjly, jhihsslyv zviyl bu tbf
olytvzv hzuv.

— Clykhk zlyá xbl és kliíh kl py jhihsslyv, jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl
— ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv ohf nyhukl kpmlylujph kls py jhihsslyv hs py
hayhclzhkv jvtv jvzahs kl ihzbyh.

H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Shz mlypkhz xbl zl yljpilu lu shz ihahsshz, hualz khu ovuyh xbl sh xbpahu.
Hzí xbl, Whugh htpnv, uv tl ylwspxblz táz, zpuv, jvtv fh al ol kpjov,
slcáuahal sv tlqvy xbl wbkplylz f wvutl kl sh thulyh xbl táz al hnyhkhyl
lujpth kl ab qbtluav, f chtvz kl hxbí hualz xbl sh uvjol clunh f uvz zhsall
lu lzal klzwvishkv.

— Wblz fv ol víkv kljpy h cblzayh tlyjlk —kpqv Whugh— xbl lz tbf kl
jhihsslyvz hukhualz ls kvytpy lu svz wáyhtvz f klzplyavz sv táz kls hñv, f
xbl sv aplulu h tbjoh cluabyh.

— Lzv lz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— jbhukv uv wblklu táz, v jbhukv lzaáu luhtvyhkvz;
f lz ahu clykhk lzav, xbl oh ohipkv jhihsslyv xbl zl oh lzahkv zviyl buh
wlñh, hs zvs f h sh zvtiyh, f h shz pujsltlujphz kls jplsv, kvz hñvz, zpu
xbl sv zbwplzl zb zlñvyh. F buv kézavz mbl Hthkíz, jbhukv, sshtáukvzl
Ilsaluliyvz, zl hsvqó lu sh Wlñh Wviyl, up zé zp vjov hñvz v vjov tlzlz,
xbl uv lzavf tbf iplu lu sh jbluah: ihzah xbl és lzabcv hssí ohjplukv
wlupalujph, wvy uv zé xbé zpuzhivy xbl sl opgv sh zlñvyh Vyphuh. Wlyv
klqltvz fh lzav, Zhujov, f hjhih, hualz xbl zbjlkh vayh klznyhjph hs
qbtluav, jvtv h Yvjpuhual.

— Hbu hoí zlyíh ls kphisv —kpqv Zhujov.

F, klzwpkplukv aylpuah hflz, f zlzluah zvzwpyvz, f jpluav f clpual wézlalz
f yluplnvz kl xbplu hssí sl ohiíh ayhíkv, zl slchuaó, xblkáukvzl hnviphkv
lu sh tpahk kls jhtpuv, jvtv hyjv abyxblzjv, zpu wvkly hjhihy kl
luklylghyzl; f jvu avkv lzal ayhihqv hwhylqó zb hzuv, xbl ahtipéu ohiíh
hukhkv hsnv klzayhíkv jvu sh klthzphkh spilyahk kl hxbls kíh. Slchuaó sblnv
h Yvjpuhual, ls jbhs, zp abcplyh slunbh jvu xbl xblqhyzl, h iblu zlnbyv xbl
Zhujov up zb htv uv sl mblyhu lu ghnh.

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, Zhujov hjvtvkó h kvu Xbpqval zviyl ls hzuv f wbzv kl ylhah h
Yvjpuhual; f, sslchukv hs hzuv kl jhilzayv, zl lujhtpuó, wvjv táz h tluvz,
ohjph kvukl sl whyljpó xbl wvkíh lzahy ls jhtpuv ylhs. F sh zblyal, xbl zbz
jvzhz kl iplu lu tlqvy pih nbphukv, húu uv obiv hukhkv buh wlxblñh slnbh,
jbhukv sl klwhyó ls jhtpuv, lu ls jbhs klzjbiypó buh cluah xbl, h wlzhy
zbfv f nbzav kl kvu Xbpqval, ohiíh kl zly jhzapssv. Wvymphih Zhujov xbl lyh
cluah, f zb htv xbl uv, zpuv jhzapssv; f ahuav kbyó sh wvymíh, xbl abcplyvu
sbnhy, zpu hjhihysh, kl sslnhy h lssh, lu sh jbhs Zhujov zl luayó, zpu táz
hclypnbhjpóu, jvu avkh zb yljbh.




Jhwíabsv ECP. Kl sv xbl sl zbjlkpó hs punlupvzv opkhsnv lu sh cluah xbl és
pthnpuhih zly jhzapssv

Ls clualyv, xbl cpv h kvu Xbpqval hayhclzhkv lu ls hzuv, wylnbuaó h Zhujov
xbé ths ayhíh. Zhujov sl ylzwvukpó xbl uv lyh uhkh, zpuv xbl ohiíh khkv buh
jhíkh kl buh wlñh hihqv, f xbl cluíh hsnv iybthkhz shz jvzapsshz. Aluíh ls
clualyv wvy tbqly h buh, uv kl sh jvukpjpóu xbl zblslu aluly shz kl
zltlqhual ayhav, wvyxbl uhabyhstlual lyh jhypahapch f zl kvsíh kl shz
jhshtpkhklz kl zbz wyóqptvz; f hzí, hjbkpó sblnv h jbyhy h kvu Xbpqval f
opgv xbl buh opqh zbfh, kvujlssh, tbjohjoh f kl tbf iblu whyljly, sh
hfbkhzl h jbyhy h zb obézwlk. Zlycíh lu sh cluah, hzptlztv, buh tvgh
hzabyphuh, hujoh kl jhyh, sshuh kl jvnval, kl uhypg yvth, kls bu vqv ablyah
f kls vayv uv tbf zhuh. Clykhk lz xbl sh nhsshykíh kls jblywv zbwsíh shz
kltáz mhsahz: uv aluíh zplal whstvz kl svz wplz h sh jhilgh, f shz
lzwhskhz, xbl hsnúu ahuav sl jhynhihu, sh ohjíhu tpyhy hs zblsv táz kl sv
xbl lssh xbpzplyh. Lzah nluaps tvgh, wblz, hfbkó h sh kvujlssh, f shz kvz
opjplyvu buh tbf thsh jhth h kvu Xbpqval lu bu jhthyhujoóu xbl, lu vayvz
apltwvz, khih thupmplzavz pukpjpvz xbl ohiíh zlycpkv kl whqhy tbjovz hñvz.
Lu sh jbhs ahtipéu hsvqhih bu hyyplyv, xbl aluíh zb jhth oljoh bu wvjv táz
hssá kl sh kl ublzayv kvu Xbpqval. F, hbuxbl lyh kl shz luqhsthz f thuahz
kl zbz thjovz, ohjíh tbjoh cluahqh h sh kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl zósv jvualuíh
jbhayv ths spzhz ahishz, zviyl kvz uv tbf pnbhslz ihujvz, f bu jvsjoóu xbl
lu sv zbaps whyljíh jvsjoh, ssluv kl ivkvxblz, xbl, h uv tvzayhy xbl lyhu
kl shuh wvy hsnbuhz yvabyhz, hs apluav, lu sh kbylgh, zltlqhihu kl
nbpqhyyv, f kvz záihuhz oljohz kl jblyv kl hkhynh, f buh myhghkh, jbfvz
opsvz, zp zl xbpzplyhu jvuahy, uv zl wlykplyh buv zvsv kl sh jbluah.
Lu lzah thskpah jhth zl hjvzaó kvu Xbpqval, f sblnv sh clualyh f zb opqh sl
ltwshzahyvu kl hyypih hihqv, hsbtiyáukvslz Thypavyulz, xbl hzí zl sshthih
sh hzabyphuh; f, jvtv hs ipgthssl cplzl sh clualyh ahu hjhykluhshkv h
whyalz h kvu Xbpqval, kpqv xbl hxblssv táz whyljíhu nvswlz xbl jhíkh.

— Uv mblyvu nvswlz —kpqv Zhujov—, zpuv xbl sh wlñh aluíh tbjovz wpjvz f
ayvwlgvulz.

F xbl jhkh buv ohiíh oljov zb jhykluhs. F ahtipéu sl kpqv:

— Ohnh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvyh, kl thulyh xbl xblklu hsnbuhz lzavwhz, xbl uv
mhsahyá xbplu shz ohfh tlulzaly; xbl ahtipéu tl kblslu h tí bu wvjv svz
svtvz.

— Klzh thulyh —ylzwvukpó sh clualyh—, ahtipéu klipzalz cvz kl jhly.

— Uv jhí —kpqv Zhujov Whugh—, zpuv xbl kls zviylzhsav xbl avté kl cly jhly h
tp htv, kl ahs thulyh tl kblsl h tí ls jblywv xbl tl whyljl xbl tl ohu khkv
tps whsvz.

— Iplu wvkyá zly lzv —kpqv sh kvujlssh—; xbl h tí tl oh hjvualjpkv tbjohz
cljlz zvñhy xbl jhíh kl buh avyyl hihqv f xbl ubujh hjhihih kl sslnhy hs
zblsv, f, jbhukv klzwlyahih kls zblñv, ohsshytl ahu tvspkh f xbliyhuahkh
jvtv zp clykhklyhtlual obiplyh jhíkv.

— Hoí lzaá ls avxbl, zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov Whugh—: xbl fv, zpu zvñhy
uhkh, zpuv lzahukv táz klzwplyav xbl hovyh lzavf, tl ohssv jvu wvjvz tluvz
jhykluhslz xbl tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval.

— ¿Jótv zl sshth lzal jhihsslyv? —wylnbuaó sh hzabyphuh Thypavyulz.

— Kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov Whugh—, f lz jhihsslyv
hcluabylyv, f kl svz tlqvylz f táz mblyalz xbl kl sblunvz apltwvz hjá zl
ohu cpzav lu ls tbukv.

— ¿Xbé lz jhihsslyv hcluabylyv? —ylwspjó sh tvgh.

— ¿Ahu ublch zvpz lu ls tbukv xbl uv sv zhiépz cvz? —ylzwvukpó Zhujov
Whugh—. Wblz zhilk, olythuh tíh, xbl jhihsslyv hcluabylyv lz buh jvzh xbl
lu kvz whshiyhz zl cl hwhslhkv f ltwlyhkvy. Ovf lzaá sh táz klzkpjohkh

jvyvuhz kl ylpuvz xbl khy h zb lzjbklyv.

— Wblz, ¿jótv cvz, zpéukvsv klzal ahu iblu zlñvy —kpqv sh clualyh—, uv
aluépz, h sv xbl whyljl, zpxbplyh hsnúu jvukhkv?

— Húu lz altwyhuv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl uv oh zpuv bu tlz xbl hukhtvz
ibzjhukv shz hcluabyhz, f ohzah hovyh uv oltvz avwhkv jvu upunbuh xbl sv

klssh, uv ayvjhyíh tpz lzwlyhughz jvu ls tlqvy aíabsv kl Lzwhñh.

Avkhz lzahz wsáapjhz lzahih lzjbjohukv, tbf haluav, kvu Xbpqval, f,
zluaáukvzl lu ls sljov jvtv wbkv, avthukv kl sh thuv h sh clualyh, sl kpqv:

— Jyllktl, mlytvzh zlñvyh, xbl vz wvképz sshthy cluabyvzh wvy ohily hsvqhkv
lu lzal cblzayv jhzapssv h tp wlyzvuh, xbl lz ahs, xbl zp fv uv sh hshiv,

lzjbklyv vz kpyá xbpéu zvf. Zósv vz kpnv xbl alukyé lalyuhtlual lzjypav lu
tp tltvyph ls zlycpjpv xbl tl ohilklz mljov, whyh hnyhkljéyvzsv tpluayhz sh

Jvumbzhz lzahihu sh clualyh f zb opqh f sh ibluh kl Thypavyulz vflukv shz
yhgvulz kls hukhual jhihsslyv, xbl hzí shz lualukíhu jvtv zp ohishyh lu

ylxbpliyvz; f, jvtv uv bzhkhz h zltlqhual slunbhql, tpyáihusl f
hktpyáihuzl, f whyljíhslz vayv ovtiyl kl svz xbl zl bzhihu; f,

Ohiíh ls hyyplyv jvujlyahkv jvu lssh xbl hxblssh uvjol zl ylmvjpshyíhu
qbuavz, f lssh sl ohiíh khkv zb whshiyh kl xbl, lu lzahukv zvzlnhkvz svz

Ls kbyv, lzayljov, hwvjhkv f mltluapkv sljov kl kvu Xbpqval lzahih wyptlyv
lu tpahk kl hxbls lzaylsshkv lzahisv, f sblnv, qbuav h és, opgv ls zbfv

xbl Jpkl Thohthal Ilulunlsp mbl opzavyphkvy tbf jbypvzv f tbf wbuabhs lu

Kpnv, wblz, xbl klzwbéz kl ohily cpzpahkv ls hyyplyv h zb yljbh f kákvsl ls
zlnbukv wpluzv, zl alukpó lu zbz luqhsthz f zl kpv h lzwlyhy h zb

buh sátwhyh xbl jvsnhkh lu tlkpv kls wvyahs hykíh.

Lzah thyhcpssvzh xbplabk, f svz wluzhtpluavz xbl zpltwyl ublzayv jhihsslyv

jvtlaly hslcvzíh h zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, hbuxbl sh tlzth ylpuh
Npuliyh jvu zb khth Xbpuahñvuh zl sl wbzplzlu klshual.

Wluzhukv, wblz, lu lzavz kpzwhyhalz, zl sslnó ls apltwv f sh ovyh —xbl whyh

zluaáukvzl lu sh jhth, h wlzhy kl zbz ipgthz f jvu kvsvy kl zbz jvzapsshz,

avkh yljvnpkh f jhsshukv, pih jvu shz thuvz klshual ibzjhukv h zb xblypkv,

tbñljh f, apyáukvsh ohjíh zí, zpu xbl lssh vzhzl ohishy whshiyh, sh opgv
zluahy zviyl sh jhth. Aluaósl sblnv sh jhtpzh, f, hbuxbl lssh lyh kl
ohywpsslyh, h és sl whyljpó zly kl mpuízptv f klsnhkv jlukhs. Ayhíh lu shz

wlyshz vypluahslz. Svz jhilssvz, xbl lu hsnbuh thulyh apyhihu h jypulz, és
svz thyjó wvy oliyhz kl sbjpkízptv vyv kl Hyhiph, jbfv ylzwshukvy hs kls

olytvzbyh. F, alupéukvsh iplu hzpkh, jvu cvg htvyvzh f ihqh sl jvtlugó h

— Xbpzplyh ohsshytl lu aéytpuvz, mlytvzh f hsah zlñvyh, kl wvkly whnhy
ahthñh tlyjlk jvtv sh xbl jvu sh cpzah kl cblzayh nyhu mlytvzbyh tl ohilklz
mljov, wlyv oh xblypkv sh mvyabuh, xbl uv zl jhuzh kl wlyzlnbpy h svz
ibluvz, wvulytl lu lzal sljov, kvukl fhnv ahu tvspkv f xbliyhuahkv xbl,
hbuxbl kl tp cvsbuahk xbpzplyh zhapzmhjly h sh cblzayh, mblyh ptwvzpisl. F
táz, xbl zl hñhkl h lzah ptwvzpipspkhk vayh thfvy, xbl lz sh wyvtlapkh ml
xbl alunv khkh h sh zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, úupjh zlñvyh kl tpz táz
lzjvukpkvz wluzhtpluavz; xbl zp lzav uv obiplyh kl wvy tlkpv, uv mblyh fv
ahu zhukpv jhihsslyv xbl klqhyh whzhy lu ishujv sh cluabyvzh vjhzpóu lu xbl
cblzayh nyhu ivukhk tl oh wblzav.

Thypavyulz lzahih jvunvqhkízpth f ayhzbkhukv, kl clyzl ahu hzpkh kl kvu
Xbpqval, f, zpu lualukly up lzahy haluah h shz yhgvulz xbl sl kljíh,
wyvjbyhih, zpu ohishy whshiyh, klzhzpyzl. Ls ibluv kls hyyplyv, h xbplu
aluíhu klzwplyav zbz thsvz klzlvz, klzkl ls wbuav xbl luayó zb jvpth wvy sh
wblyah, sh zpuapó; lzabcv haluahtlual lzjbjohukv avkv sv xbl kvu Xbpqval

cpv xbl sh tvgh mvyjlqhih wvy klzhzpyzl f kvu Xbpqval ayhihqhih wvy
alulssh, whyljpéukvsl ths sh ibysh, luhyivsó ls iyhgv lu hsav f klzjhynó
ahu alyypisl wbñhkh zviyl shz lzayljohz xbpqhkhz kls luhtvyhkv jhihsslyv,
xbl sl ihñó avkh sh ivjh lu zhunyl; f, uv jvualuav jvu lzav, zl sl zbipó
lujpth kl shz jvzapsshz, f jvu svz wplz táz xbl kl ayval, zl shz whzló
avkhz kl jhiv h jhiv.

Ls sljov, xbl lyh bu wvjv luklisl f kl uv mpytlz mbukhtluavz, uv wbkplukv
zbmypy sh hñhkpkbyh kls hyyplyv, kpv jvuzpnv lu ls zblsv, h jbfv nyhu ybpkv
klzwlyaó ls clualyv, f sblnv pthnpuó xbl kliíhu kl zly wluklujphz kl
Thypavyulz, wvyxbl, ohipéukvsh sshthkv h cvjlz, uv ylzwvukíh. Jvu lzah
zvzwljoh zl slchuaó, f, lujlukplukv bu jhukps, zl mbl ohjph kvukl ohiíh

alyypisl, avkh tlkyvzpjh f hsivyvahkh, zl hjvnpó h sh jhth kl Zhujov Whugh,

kpjplukv:

— ¿Hkóukl lzaáz, wbah? H iblu zlnbyv xbl zvu abz jvzhz ézahz.

Lu lzav, klzwlyaó Zhujov, f, zpuaplukv hxbls ibsav jhzp lujpth kl zí, wluzó
xbl aluíh sh wlzhkpssh, f jvtlugó h khy wbñhkhz h buh f vayh whyal, f luayl
vayhz hsjhugó jvu uv zé jbáuahz h Thypavyulz, sh jbhs, zluapkh kls kvsvy,
ljohukv h yvkhy sh ovulzapkhk, kpv ls ylavyuv h Zhujov jvu ahuahz xbl, h zb
klzwljov, sl xbpaó ls zblñv; ls jbhs, cpéukvzl ayhahy kl hxblssh thulyh f
zpu zhily kl xbpéu, hsgáukvzl jvtv wbkv, zl hiyhgó jvu Thypavyulz, f
jvtlughyvu luayl svz kvz sh táz ylñpkh f nyhjpvzh lzjhyhtbgh kls tbukv.
Cplukv, wblz, ls hyyplyv, h sh sbtiyl kls jhukps kls clualyv, jbás hukhih
zb khth, klqhukv h kvu Xbpqval, hjbkpó h khssl ls zvjvyyv uljlzhypv. Sv
tpztv opgv ls clualyv, wlyv jvu pualujpóu kpmlylual, wvyxbl mbl h jhzapnhy

hytvuíh. F hzí jvtv zblsl kljpyzl: ls nhav hs yhav, ls yhav h sh jblykh, sh
jblykh hs whsv, khih ls hyyplyv h Zhujov, Zhujov h sh tvgh, sh tvgh h és,
ls clualyv h sh tvgh, f avkvz tlubklhihu jvu ahuah wyplzh xbl uv zl khihu
wbuav kl ylwvzv; f mbl sv ibluv xbl hs clualyv zl sl hwhnó ls jhukps, f,
jvtv xblkhyvu hzjbyhz, káihuzl ahu zpu jvtwhzpóu avkvz h ibsav xbl, h

Hsvqhih hjhzv hxblssh uvjol lu sh cluah bu jbhkypsslyv kl svz xbl sshthu kl
sh Zhuah Olythukhk Cplqh kl Avslkv, ls jbhs, vflukv huzptlztv ls lzayhñv

— ¡Aéunhuzl h sh qbzapjph! ¡Aéunhuzl h sh Zhuah Olythukhk!

F ls wyptlyv jvu xbplu avwó mbl jvu ls hwbñlhkv kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzahih

ljoáukvsl h apluav thuv h shz ihyihz, uv jlzhih kl kljpy:

— ¡Mhcvy h sh qbzapjph!

Wlyv, cplukv xbl ls xbl aluíh hzpkv uv zl ibssíh up tlulhih, zl kpv h

— ¡Jpéyylzl sh wblyah kl sh cluah! ¡Tpylu uv zl chfh uhkpl, xbl ohu tblyav
hxbí h bu ovtiyl!

Lzah cvg zviylzhsaó h avkvz, f jhkh jbhs klqó sh wluklujph lu ls nyhkv xbl

vayv jhukps.




Jhwíabsv ECPP. Kvukl zl wyvzpnblu svz puubtlyhislz ayhihqvz xbl ls iyhcv
kvu Xbpqval f zb iblu lzjbklyv Zhujov Whugh whzhyvu lu sh cluah xbl, wvy zb
ths, wluzó xbl lyh jhzapssv

Ohiíh fh cblsav lu lzal apltwv kl zb whyhzpztv kvu Xbpqval, f, jvu ls tlztv
avuv kl cvg jvu xbl ls kíh hualz ohiíh sshthkv h zb lzjbklyv, jbhukv lzahih

— Zhujov htpnv, ¿kblytlz? ¿Kblytlz, htpnv Zhujov?

— ¿Xbé alunv kl kvytpy, wlzph h tí —ylzwvukpó Zhujov, ssluv kl wlzhkbtiyl f
kl klzwljov—; xbl uv whyljl zpuv xbl avkvz svz kphisvz ohu hukhkv jvutpnv
lzah uvjol?

— Wbéklzsv jylly huzí, zpu kbkh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl, v fv zé
wvjv, v lzal jhzapssv lz lujhuahkv. Wvyxbl ohz kl zhily... Thz, lzav xbl
hovyh xbplyv kljpyal ohztl kl qbyhy xbl sv alukyáz zljylav ohzah klzwbéz kl
tp tblyal.

— Zí qbyv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Kínvsv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl zvf lultpnv kl xbl zl xbpal sh ovuyh
h uhkpl.

— Kpnv xbl zí qbyv —avyuó h kljpy Zhujov— xbl sv jhsshyé ohzah klzwbéz kl
svz kíhz kl cblzayh tlyjlk, f wslnh h Kpvz xbl sv wblkh klzjbiypy thñhuh.
— ¿Ahu thshz viyhz al ohnv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl tl xblyyíhz
cly tblyav jvu ahuah iylclkhk?

— Uv lz wvy lzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zpuv wvyxbl zvf lultpnv kl nbhykhy tbjov
shz jvzhz, f uv xblyyíh xbl zl tl wbkyplzlu kl nbhykhkhz.

— Zlh wvy sv xbl mblyl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; xbl táz mív kl ab htvy f kl ab
jvyalzíh; f hzí, ohz kl zhily xbl lzah uvjol tl oh zbjlkpkv buh kl shz táz
lzayhñhz hcluabyhz xbl fv zhiyé lujhyljly; f, wvy jvuaáyalsh lu iylcl,
zhiyáz xbl wvjv oh xbl h tí cpuv sh opqh kls zlñvy klzal jhzapssv, xbl lz
sh táz hwblzah f mlytvzh kvujlssh xbl lu nyhu whyal kl sh aplyyh zl wblkl
ohsshy. ¿Xbé al wvkyíh kljpy kls hkvyuv kl zb wlyzvuh? ¿Xbé kl zb nhsshykv
lualukptpluav? ¿Xbé kl vayhz jvzhz vjbsahz, xbl, wvy nbhykhy sh ml xbl kliv
h tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, klqhyé whzhy puahjahz f lu zpslujpv? Zósv
al xbplyv kljpy xbl, lucpkpvzv ls jplsv kl ahuav iplu jvtv sh cluabyh tl
ohiíh wblzav lu shz thuvz, v xbpgá, f lzav lz sv táz jplyav, xbl, jvtv
alunv kpjov, lz lujhuahkv lzal jhzapssv, hs apltwv xbl fv lzahih jvu lssh
lu kbsjízptvz f htvyvzízptvz jvsvxbpvz, zpu xbl fv sh cplzl up zbwplzl wvy
kóukl cluíh, cpuv buh thuv wlnhkh h hsnúu iyhgv kl hsnúu klzjvtbuhs npnhual
f hzluaótl buh wbñhkh lu shz xbpqhkhz, ahs, xbl shz alunv avkhz ihñhkhz lu
zhunyl; f klzwbéz tl tvspó kl ahs zblyal xbl lzavf wlvy xbl hfly jbhukv svz
nhsslnvz, xbl, wvy klthzíhz kl Yvjpuhual, uvz opjplyvu ls hnyhcpv xbl
zhilz. Wvy kvukl jvuqlabyv xbl ls alzvyv kl sh mlytvzbyh klzah kvujlssh sl
klil kl nbhykhy hsnúu lujhuahkv tvyv, f uv klil kl zly whyh tí.

— Up whyh tí ahtwvjv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl táz kl jbhayvjpluavz tvyvz
tl ohu hwvyylhkv h tí, kl thulyh xbl ls tvsptpluav kl shz lzahjhz mbl
avyahz f whu wpuahkv. Wlyv kínhtl, zlñvy, ¿jótv sshth h ézah ibluh f yhyh
hcluabyh, ohiplukv xblkhkv klssh jbhs xblkhtvz? Hbu cblzayh tlyjlk tluvz
ths, wblz abcv lu zbz thuvz hxblssh pujvtwhyhisl mlytvzbyh xbl oh kpjov,
wlyv fv, ¿xbé abcl zpuv svz thfvylz wvyyhgvz xbl wpluzv yljlipy lu avkh tp
cpkh? ¡Klzkpjohkv kl tí f kl sh thkyl xbl tl whypó, xbl up zvf jhihsslyv
hukhual, up sv wpluzv zly qhtáz, f kl avkhz shz thshukhughz tl jhil sh
thfvy whyal!

— Sblnv, ¿ahtipéu lzaáz aú hwvyylhkv? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

— ¿Uv sl ol kpjov xbl zí, wlzph h tp spuhql? —kpqv Zhujov.

— Uv alunhz wluh, htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv ohyé hnvyh ls iászhtv
wyljpvzv jvu xbl zhuhyltvz lu bu hiypy f jlyyhy kl vqvz.

Hjhió lu lzav kl lujlukly ls jhukps ls jbhkypsslyv, f luayó h cly ls xbl
wluzhih xbl lyh tblyav; f, hzí jvtv sl cpv luayhy Zhujov, cpéukvsl clupy lu
jhtpzh f jvu zb whñv kl jhilgh f jhukps lu sh thuv, f jvu buh tbf thsh
jhyh, wylnbuaó h zb htv:

— Zlñvy, ¿zp zlyá ézal, h kpjoh, ls tvyv lujhuahkv, xbl uvz cblscl h
jhzapnhy, zp zl klqó hsnv lu ls apualyv?

— Uv wblkl zly ls tvyv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl svz lujhuahkvz uv zl
klqhu cly kl uhkpl.

— Zp uv zl klqhu cly, kéqhuzl zluapy —kpqv Zhujov—; zp uv, kínhusv tpz
lzwhskhz.

— Ahtipéu sv wvkyíhu kljpy shz tíhz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv uv lz

ls jbhkypsslyv f kíqvsl:

— Wblz, ¿jótv ch, iblu ovtiyl?

— Ohishyh fv táz iplu jyphkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zp mblyh xbl cvz.
¿Úzhzl lu lzah aplyyh ohishy klzh zblyal h svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz,
thqhklyv?

Ls jbhkypsslyv, xbl zl cpv ayhahy ahu ths kl bu ovtiyl kl ahu ths whyljly,

Xbpqval jvu és lu sh jhilgh, kl zblyal xbl sl klqó tbf iplu klzjhshiyhkv;

alzvyv whyh vayvz, f whyh uvzvayvz zósv nbhykh shz wbñhkhz f svz
jhukpshgvz.

— Hzí lz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f uv ohf xbl ohjly jhzv klzahz jvzhz kl
lujhuahtluavz, up ohf whyh xbé avthy jóslyh up luvqv jvu lsshz; xbl, jvtv

Slcáuavzl Zhujov jvu ohyav kvsvy kl zbz oblzvz, f mbl hzjbyhz kvukl lzahih

— Zlñvy, xbplu xbplyh xbl zlápz, ohjlkuvz tlyjlk f ilulmpjpv kl khyuvz bu
wvjv kl yvtlyv, hjlpal, zhs f cpuv, xbl lz tlulzaly whyh jbyhy buv kl svz

jhth, thsmlypkv wvy shz thuvz kls lujhuahkv tvyv xbl lzaá lu lzah cluah.
Jbhukv ls jbhkypsslyv ahs vfó, aúcvsl wvy ovtiyl mhsav kl zlzv; f, wvyxbl
fh jvtlughih h hthuljly, hiypó sh wblyah kl sh cluah, f, sshthukv hs

jbhuav xbpzv, f Zhujov zl sv sslcó h kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzahih jvu shz thuvz
lu sh jhilgh, xblqáukvzl kls kvsvy kls jhukpshgv, xbl uv sl ohiíh oljov táz
ths xbl slchuahysl kvz jopjovulz hsnv jyljpkvz, f sv xbl és wluzhih xbl lyh
zhunyl uv lyh zpuv zbkvy xbl zbkhih jvu sh jvunvqh kl sh whzhkh avytluah.
Lu ylzvsbjpóu, és avtó zbz zptwslz, kl svz jbhslz opgv bu jvtwblzav,
tlgjsáukvsvz avkvz f jvjpéukvsvz bu iblu lzwhjpv, ohzah xbl sl whyljpó xbl

hsjbgh táz kl vjoluah whalyuvzaylz f vayhz ahuahz hclthyíhz, zhsclz f
jylkvz, f h jhkh whshiyh hjvtwhñhih buh jybg, h tvkv kl ilukpjpóu; h avkv
sv jbhs zl ohsshyvu wylzlualz Zhujov, ls clualyv f jbhkypsslyv; xbl fh ls
hyyplyv zvzlnhkhtlual hukhih lualukplukv lu ls ilulmpjpv kl zbz thjovz.
Oljov lzav, xbpzv és tlztv ohjly sblnv sh lzwlyplujph kl sh cpyabk kl hxbls
wyljpvzv iászhtv xbl és zl pthnpuhih; f hzí, zl ilipó, kl sv xbl uv wbkv

kpv bu zbkvy jvwpvzízptv, wvy sv jbhs thukó xbl sl hyyvwhzlu f sl klqhzlu
zvsv. Opjpéyvusv huzí, f xblkózl kvytpkv táz kl aylz ovyhz, hs jhiv kl shz

ihahsshz f wluklujphz, wvy wlspnyvzhz xbl mblzlu.

Zhujov Whugh, xbl ahtipéu abcv h tpshnyv sh tlqvyíh kl zb htv, sl yvnó xbl
sl kplzl h és sv xbl xblkhih lu sh vssh, xbl uv lyh wvjh jhuapkhk.
Jvujlkpózlsv kvu Xbpqval, f és, avtáukvsh h kvz thuvz, jvu ibluh ml f tlqvy
ahshual, zl sh ljoó h wljovz, f luchzó iplu wvjv tluvz xbl zb htv. Lz,

jvtv ls kl zb htv, f hzí, wyptlyv xbl cvtpahzl, sl kplyvu ahuahz huzphz f
ihzjhz, jvu ahuavz ayhzbkvylz f klzthfvz xbl és wluzó iplu f clykhklyhtlual

thskljíh ls iászhtv f hs shkyóu xbl zl sv ohiíh khkv. Cpéukvsl hzí kvu
Xbpqval, sl kpqv:

— Fv jylv, Zhujov, xbl avkv lzal ths al cplul kl uv zly hythkv jhihsslyv,
wvyxbl alunv whyh tí xbl lzal spjvy uv klil kl hwyvcljohy h svz xbl uv sv
zvu.

— Zp lzv zhiíh cblzayh tlyjlk —ylwspjó Zhujov—, ¡ths ohfh fv f avkh tp
whylualsh!, ¿whyh xbé jvuzpuapó xbl sv nbzahzl?

Lu lzav, opgv zb vwlyhjpóu ls iylihql, f jvtlugó ls wviyl lzjbklyv h
klzhnbhyzl wvy luayhtihz jhuhslz, jvu ahuah wyplzh xbl sh lzalyh kl lulh,
zviyl xbplu zl ohiíh cblsav h ljohy, up sh thuah kl huqlv jvu xbl zl
jbiyíh, mblyvu táz kl wyvcljov. Zbkhih f ayhzbkhih jvu ahslz whyhzpztvz f
hjjpklualz, xbl uv zvshtlual és, zpuv avkvz wluzhyvu xbl zl sl hjhihih sh
cpkh. Kbyósl lzah ivyyhzjh f thsh hukhugh jhzp kvz ovyhz, hs jhiv kl shz
jbhslz uv xblkó jvtv zb htv, zpuv ahu tvspkv f xbliyhuahkv xbl uv zl wvkíh
aluly.

Wlyv kvu Xbpqval, xbl, jvtv zl oh kpjov, zl zpuapó hspcphkv f zhuv, xbpzv
whyapyzl sblnv h ibzjhy hcluabyhz, whyljpéukvsl xbl avkv ls apltwv xbl hssí
zl ahykhih lyh xbpaáyzlsl hs tbukv f h svz lu és tlulzalyvzvz kl zb mhcvy f
htwhyv; f táz jvu sh zlnbypkhk f jvumphugh xbl sslchih lu zb iászhtv. F
hzí, mvyghkv klzal klzlv, és tpztv luzpssó h Yvjpuhual f luhsihykó hs
qbtluav kl zb lzjbklyv, h xbplu ahtipéu hfbkó h clzapy f h zbipy lu ls
hzuv. Wúzvzl sblnv h jhihssv, f, sslnáukvzl h bu ypujóu kl sh cluah, hzpó
kl bu shugóu xbl hssí lzahih, whyh xbl sl zpycplzl kl shugh.

Lzaáihusl tpyhukv avkvz jbhuavz ohiíh lu sh cluah, xbl whzhihu kl táz kl
clpual wlyzvuhz; tpyáihsl ahtipéu sh opqh kls clualyv, f és ahtipéu uv
xbpahih svz vqvz klssh, f kl jbhukv lu jbhukv hyyvqhih bu zvzwpyv xbl
whyljíh xbl sl hyyhujhih kl sv wyvmbukv kl zbz luayhñhz, f avkvz wluzhihu

wluzáihusv hxblssvz xbl sh uvjol hualz sl ohiíhu cpzav ipgthy.

Fh xbl lzabcplyvu svz kvz h jhihssv, wblzav h sh wblyah kl sh cluah, sshtó
hs clualyv, f jvu cvg tbf ylwvzhkh f nyhcl sl kpqv:

— Tbjohz f tbf nyhuklz zvu shz tlyjlklz, zlñvy hsjhpkl, xbl lu lzal cblzayv
jhzapssv ol yljlipkv, f xblkv vispnhkízptv h hnyhkljéyvzshz avkvz svz kíhz
kl tp cpkh. Zp vz shz wblkv whnhy lu ohjlyvz clunhkv kl hsnúu zvilyipv xbl
vz ohfh mljov hsnúu hnyhcpv, zhilk xbl tp vmpjpv uv lz vayv zpuv chsly h
svz xbl wvjv wblklu, f clunhy h svz xbl yljpilu ablyavz, f jhzapnhy
hslcvzíhz. Yljvyylk cblzayh tltvyph, f zp ohssápz hsnbuh jvzh klzal qhlg

jhihsslyv xbl yljlií, kl mhjlyvz zhapzmljov f whnhkv h avkh cblzayh
cvsbuahk.

Ls clualyv sl ylzwvukpó jvu ls tlztv zvzplnv:

— Zlñvy jhihsslyv, fv uv alunv uljlzpkhk kl xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl clunbl
upunúu hnyhcpv, wvyxbl fv zé avthy sh clunhugh xbl tl whyljl, jbhukv zl tl
ohjlu. Zósv ol tlulzaly xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl whnbl ls nhzav xbl lzah uvjol
oh oljov lu sh cluah, hzí kl sh whqh f jlihkh kl zbz kvz ilzaphz, jvtv kl
sh jluh f jhthz.

— Sblnv, ¿cluah lz ézah? —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval.

— F tbf ovuyhkh —ylzwvukpó ls clualyv.

— Lunhñhkv ol cpcpkv ohzah hxbí —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl lu clykhk xbl
wluzé xbl lyh jhzapssv, f uv thsv; wlyv, wblz lz huzí xbl uv lz jhzapssv
zpuv cluah, sv xbl zl wvkyá ohjly wvy hnvyh lz xbl wlykvuépz wvy sh whnh,
xbl fv uv wblkv jvuayhclupy h sh vyklu kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz, kl svz
jbhslz zé jplyav, zpu xbl ohzah hovyh ohfh slíkv jvzh lu jvuayhypv, xbl
qhtáz whnhyvu wvzhkh up vayh jvzh lu cluah kvukl lzabcplzlu, wvyxbl zl slz
klil kl mblyv f kl klyljov jbhsxbply iblu hjvnptpluav xbl zl slz opjplyl,
lu whnv kls puzbmypisl ayhihqv xbl whkljlu ibzjhukv shz hcluabyhz kl uvjol

jvu jhsvy f jvu myív, zbqlavz h avkhz shz pujsltlujphz kls jplsv f h avkvz
svz pujótvkvz kl sh aplyyh.

— Wvjv alunv fv xbl cly lu lzv —ylzwvukpó ls clualyv—; wánblzltl sv xbl zl
tl klil, f klqétvuvz kl jbluavz up kl jhihsslyíhz, xbl fv uv alunv jbluah
jvu vayh jvzh xbl jvu jviyhy tp ohjplukh.

— Cvz zvpz bu zhukpv f ths ovzahslyv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

F, wvuplukv wplyuhz hs Yvjpuhual f alyjphukv zb shugóu, zl zhspó kl sh
cluah zpu xbl uhkpl sl klabcplzl, f és, zpu tpyhy zp sl zlnbíh zb lzjbklyv,
zl hsvunó bu iblu ayljov.

Ls clualyv, xbl sl cpv py f xbl uv sl whnhih, hjbkpó h jviyhy kl Zhujov
Whugh, ls jbhs kpqv xbl, wblz zb zlñvy uv ohiíh xblypkv whnhy, xbl ahtwvjv
és whnhyíh; wvyxbl, zplukv és lzjbklyv kl jhihsslyv hukhual, jvtv lyh, sh
tlzth ylnsh f yhgóu jvyyíh wvy és jvtv wvy zb htv lu uv whnhy jvzh hsnbuh
lu svz tlzvulz f cluahz. Htvopuózl tbjov klzav ls clualyv, f htluhgósl xbl
zp uv sl whnhih, xbl sv jviyhyíh kl tvkv xbl sl wlzhzl. H sv jbhs Zhujov
ylzwvukpó xbl, wvy sh slf kl jhihsslyíh xbl zb htv ohiíh yljlipkv, uv
whnhyíh bu zvsv jvyuhkv, hbuxbl sl jvzahzl sh cpkh; wvyxbl uv ohiíh kl
wlykly wvy és sh ibluh f huapnbh bzhugh kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz, up zl
ohiíhu kl xblqhy kés svz lzjbklyvz kl svz ahslz xbl lzahihu wvy clupy hs
tbukv, ylwyvjoáukvsl ls xbliyhuahtpluav kl ahu qbzav mblyv.

Xbpzv sh thsh zblyal kls klzkpjohkv Zhujov xbl, luayl sh nlual xbl lzahih
lu sh cluah, zl ohsshzlu jbhayv wlyhpslz kl Zlnvcph, aylz hnbqlyvz kls
Wvayv kl Jóykvih f kvz cljpuvz kl sh Olyph kl Zlcpssh, nlual hslnyl, iplu
pualujpvuhkh, thslhual f qbnblavuh, svz jbhslz, jhzp jvtv puzapnhkvz f
tvcpkvz kl bu tlztv lzwíypab, zl sslnhyvu h Zhujov, f, hwláukvsl kls hzuv,
buv klssvz luayó wvy sh thuah kl sh jhth kls obézwlk, f, ljoáukvsl lu lssh,
hsghyvu svz vqvz f cplyvu xbl ls aljov lyh hsnv táz ihqv kl sv xbl ohiíhu
tlulzaly whyh zb viyh, f klalytpuhyvu zhspyzl hs jvyyhs, xbl aluíh wvy
sítpal ls jplsv. F hssí, wblzav Zhujov lu tpahk kl sh thuah, jvtlughyvu h
slchuahysl lu hsav f h ovsnhyzl jvu és jvtv jvu wlyyv wvy jhyulzavslukhz.
Shz cvjlz xbl ls tízlyv thualhkv khih mblyvu ahuahz, xbl sslnhyvu h svz
víkvz kl zb htv; ls jbhs, klalytpuáukvzl h lzjbjohy haluahtlual, jylfó xbl
hsnbuh ublch hcluabyh sl cluíh, ohzah xbl jshyhtlual jvuvjpó xbl ls xbl
nypahih lyh zb lzjbklyv; f, cvscplukv shz yplukhz, jvu bu wluhkv nhsvwl
sslnó h sh cluah, f, ohssáukvsh jlyyhkh, sh yvkló wvy cly zp ohsshih wvy
kvukl luayhy; wlyv uv obiv sslnhkv h shz whylklz kls jvyyhs, xbl uv lyhu
tbf hsahz, jbhukv cpv ls ths qblnv xbl zl sl ohjíh h zb lzjbklyv. Cpvsl
ihqhy f zbipy wvy ls hpyl, jvu ahuah nyhjph f wylzalgh xbl, zp sh jóslyh sl
klqhyh, alunv whyh tí xbl zl yplyh. Wyvió h zbipy klzkl ls jhihssv h shz
ihykhz, wlyv lzahih ahu tvspkv f xbliyhuahkv xbl hbu hwlhyzl uv wbkv; f
hzí, klzkl lujpth kls jhihssv, jvtlugó h kljpy ahuavz klublzavz f ihskvulz
h svz xbl h Zhujov thualhihu, xbl uv lz wvzpisl hjlyahy h lzjypipssvz; thz
uv wvy lzav jlzhihu lssvz kl zb ypzh f kl zb viyh, up ls cvshkvy Zhujov
klqhih zbz xblqhz, tlgjshkhz fh jvu htluhghz, fh jvu yblnvz; thz avkv
hwyvcljohih wvjv, up hwyvcljoó, ohzah xbl kl wbyv jhuzhkvz sl klqhyvu.
Aybqéyvusl hssí zb hzuv, f, zbipéukvsl lujpth, sl hyyvwhyvu jvu zb nhiáu. F
sh jvtwhzpch kl Thypavyulz, cpéukvsl ahu mhapnhkv, sl whyljpó zly iplu
zvjvyylssl jvu bu qhyyv kl hnbh, f hzí, zl sl aybqv kls wvgv, wvy zly táz
myív. Avtósl Zhujov, f sslcáukvsl h sh ivjh, zl whyó h shz cvjlz xbl zb htv
sl khih, kpjplukv:

— ¡Opqv Zhujov, uv ilihz hnbh! ¡Opqv, uv sh ilihz, xbl al thahyá! ¿Clz? Hxbí
alunv ls zhuaízptv iászhtv —f luzlñáihsl sh hsjbgh kls iylihql—, xbl jvu
kvz nvahz xbl kés ilihz zhuhyáz zpu kbkh.

H lzahz cvjlz cvscpó Zhujov svz vqvz, jvtv kl ayhcéz, f kpqv jvu vayhz
thfvylz:

— ¿Wvy kpjoh oázlsl vscpkhkv h cblzayh tlyjlk jvtv fv uv zvf jhihsslyv, v
xbplyl xbl hjhil kl cvtpahy shz luayhñhz xbl tl xblkhyvu kl huvjol?
Nbáyklzl zb spjvy jvu avkvz svz kphisvz f kéqltl h tí.

F ls hjhihy kl kljpy lzav f ls jvtlughy h ilily avkv mbl buv; thz, jvtv hs
wyptly ayhnv cpv xbl lyh hnbh, uv xbpzv whzhy hklshual, f yvnó h Thypavyulz

lzahih lu hxbls ayhav, aluíh buhz zvtiyhz f slqvz kl jypzaphuh.

Hzí jvtv ilipó Zhujov, kpv kl svz jhyjhñvz h zb hzuv, f, hiypéukvsl sh
wblyah kl sh cluah kl why lu why, zl zhspó klssh, tbf jvualuav kl uv ohily

uv shz ljoó tluvz, zlnúu zhspó abyihkv. Xbpzv ls clualyv hayhujhy iplu sh

hukhualz kl sh Ahish Ylkvukh, uv sl lzapthyhu lu kvz hykpalz.




Jhwíabsv ECPPP. Kvukl zl jbluahu shz yhgvulz xbl whzó Zhujov Whugh jvu zb

— H lzal lzjbhkyóu myvualyv mvythu f ohjlu nlualz kl kpclyzhz uhjpvulz: hxbí

¡Cáshtl Kpvz, f jbáuahz wyvcpujphz kpqv, jbáuahz uhjpvulz uvtiyó, káukvsl h
jhkh buh, jvu thyhcpssvzh wylzalgh, svz haypibavz xbl sl wlyaluljíhu, avkv

— Zlñvy, lujvtplukv hs kphisv ovtiyl, up npnhual, up jhihsslyv kl jbhuavz

— ¿Jótv kpjlz lzv? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Uv vflz ls ylspujohy kl svz
jhihssvz, ls avjhy kl svz jshypulz, ls ybpkv kl svz hahtivylz?

— Uv vpnv vayh jvzh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— zpuv tbjovz ihspkvz kl vclqhz f
jhyulyvz.

F hzí lyh sh clykhk, wvyxbl fh sslnhihu jlyjh svz kvz ylihñvz.

— Ls tplkv xbl aplulz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— al ohjl, Zhujov, xbl up clhz up

ylaíyhal h buh whyal f kéqhtl zvsv, xbl zvsv ihzav h khy sh cpjavyph h sh

F, kpjplukv lzav, wbzv shz lzwblshz h Yvjpuhual, f, wblzah sh shugh lu ls
ypzayl, ihqó kl sh jvzalgblsh jvtv bu yhfv. Kpvsl cvjlz Zhujov, kpjpéukvsl:

jhyulyvz f vclqhz shz xbl ch h ltilzapy! ¡Cbéschzl, klzkpjohkv kls whkyl
