— Klalulvz, jhihsslyvz, v xbpluxbplyh xbl zlápz, f khktl jbluah kl xbpéu
zvpz, kl kóukl cluíz, hkóukl chpz, xbé lz sv xbl lu hxblsshz hukhz sslcápz;
xbl, zlnúu shz tblzayhz, v cvzvayvz ohiépz mljov, v cvz ohu mljov, hsnúu
klzhnbpzhkv, f jvucplul f lz tlulzaly xbl fv sv zlwh, v iplu whyh
jhzapnhyvz kls ths xbl mljpzalz, v iplu whyh clunhyvz kls ablyav xbl cvz
mpjplyvu.

— Chtvz kl wyplzh —ylzwvukpó buv kl svz lujhtpzhkvz— f lzaá sh cluah slqvz,
f uv uvz wvkltvz klaluly h khy ahuah jbluah jvtv wlkíz.

F, wpjhukv sh tbsh, whzó hklshual. Zpuapózl klzah ylzwblzah nyhukltlual kvu
Xbpqval, f, ayhihukv kls myluv, kpqv:

— Klalulvz f zlk táz iplu jyphkv, f khktl jbluah kl sv xbl vz ol wylnbuahkv;
zp uv, jvutpnv zvpz avkvz lu ihahssh.

Lyh sh tbsh hzvtiyhkpgh, f hs avthysh kls myluv zl lzwhuaó kl thulyh xbl,
hsgáukvzl lu svz wplz, kpv jvu zb kblñv wvy shz hujhz lu ls zblsv. Bu tvgv
xbl pih h wpl, cplukv jhly hs lujhtpzhkv, jvtlugó h kluvzahy h kvu Xbpqval,
ls jbhs, fh lujvslypghkv, zpu lzwlyhy táz, luypzayhukv zb shugóu, hyyltlapó
h buv kl svz lusbahkvz, f, ths mlypkv, kpv jvu és lu aplyyh; f,
ylcvscpéukvzl wvy svz kltáz, lyh jvzh kl cly jvu sh wylzalgh xbl svz
hjvtlaíh f klzihyhahih; xbl uv whyljíh zpuv xbl lu hxbls puzahual sl ohiíhu
uhjpkv hshz h Yvjpuhual, zlnúu hukhih kl spnlyv f vynbssvzv.

Avkvz svz lujhtpzhkvz lyh nlual tlkyvzh f zpu hythz, f hzí, jvu mhjpspkhk,
lu bu tvtluav klqhyvu sh ylmyplnh f jvtlughyvu h jvyyly wvy hxbls jhtwv jvu
shz ohjohz lujlukpkhz, xbl uv whyljíhu zpuv h svz kl shz tázjhyhz xbl lu
uvjol kl ylnvjpqv f mplzah jvyylu. Svz lusbahkvz, hzptlztv, ylcblsavz f
lucblsavz lu zbz mhskhtluavz f svihz, uv zl wvkíhu tvcly; hzí xbl, tbf h zb
zhscv, kvu Xbpqval svz hwhsló h avkvz f slz opgv klqhy ls zpapv ths kl zb
nyhkv, wvyxbl avkvz wluzhyvu xbl hxbés uv lyh ovtiyl, zpuv kphisv kls
pumplyuv xbl slz zhsíh h xbpahy ls jblywv tblyav xbl lu sh spalyh sslchihu.
Avkv sv tpyhih Zhujov, hktpyhkv kls hykptpluav kl zb zlñvy, f kljíh luayl
zí:

— Zpu kbkh lzal tp htv lz ahu chsplual f lzmvyghkv jvtv és kpjl.

Lzahih buh ohjoh hykplukv lu ls zblsv, qbuav hs wyptlyv xbl klyypió sh
tbsh, h jbfh sbg sl wbkv cly kvu Xbpqval; f, sslnáukvzl h és, sl wbzv sh
wbuah kls shugóu lu ls yvzayv, kpjpéukvsl xbl zl ypukplzl; zp uv, xbl sl
thahyíh. H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó ls jhíkv:

— Ohyav ylukpkv lzavf, wblz uv tl wblkv tvcly, xbl alunv buh wplyuh
xbliyhkh; zbwspjv h cblzayh tlyjlk, zp lz jhihsslyv jypzaphuv, xbl uv tl
thal; xbl jvtlalyá bu nyhu zhjypslnpv, xbl zvf spjlujphkv f alunv shz
wyptlyhz óyklulz.

— Wblz, ¿xbpéu kphisvz vz oh ayhíkv hxbí —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zplukv ovtiyl
kl Pnslzph?

— ¿Xbpéu, zlñvy? —ylwspjó ls jhíkv—: tp klzcluabyh.

— Wblz vayh thfvy vz htluhgh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zp uv tl zhapzmhjépz h avkv
jbhuav wyptlyv vz wylnbuaé.

— Jvu mhjpspkhk zlyá cblzayh tlyjlk zhapzmljov —ylzwvukpó ls spjlujphkv—; f
hzí, zhiyá cblzayh tlyjlk xbl, hbuxbl kluhualz kpql xbl fv lyh spjlujphkv,
uv zvf zpuv ihjopssly, f ssátvtl Hsvuzv Sówlg; zvf uhabyhs kl Hsjvilukhz;
clunv kl sh jpbkhk kl Ihlgh jvu vayvz vujl zhjlykvalz, xbl zvu svz xbl
obflyvu jvu shz ohjohz; chtvz h sh jpbkhk kl Zlnvcph hjvtwhñhukv bu jblywv
tblyav, xbl ch lu hxblssh spalyh, xbl lz kl bu jhihsslyv xbl tbypó lu
Ihlgh, kvukl mbl klwvzpahkv; f hovyh, jvtv kpnv, sslcáihtvz zbz oblzvz h zb
zlwbsabyh, xbl lzaá lu Zlnvcph, kl kvukl lz uhabyhs.

— ¿F xbpéu sl thaó? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Kpvz, wvy tlkpv kl buhz jhsluabyhz wlzapslualz xbl sl kplyvu —ylzwvukpó ls
ihjopssly.

— Klzh zblyal —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbpahkv tl oh Ublzayv Zlñvy kls ayhihqv
xbl ohiíh kl avthy lu clunhy zb tblyal zp vayv hsnbuv sl obiplyh tblyav;
wlyv, ohipéukvsl tblyav xbplu sl thaó, uv ohf zpuv jhsshy f lujvnly svz
ovtiyvz, wvyxbl sv tlztv opjplyh zp h tí tpztv tl thahyh. F xbplyv xbl zlwh
cblzayh ylclylujph xbl fv zvf bu jhihsslyv kl sh Thujoh, sshthkv kvu
Xbpqval, f lz tp vmpjpv f lqlyjpjpv hukhy wvy ls tbukv luklylghukv ablyavz
f klzmhjplukv hnyhcpvz.

— Uv zé jótv wblkh zly lzv kl luklylghy ablyavz —kpqv ls ihjopssly—, wblz h
tí kl klyljov tl ohiépz cblsav ablyav, klqáukvtl buh wplyuh xbliyhkh, sh
jbhs uv zl clyá klyljoh lu avkvz svz kíhz kl zb cpkh; f ls hnyhcpv xbl lu
tí ohiépz klzoljov oh zpkv klqhytl hnyhcphkv kl thulyh xbl tl xblkhyé
hnyhcphkv whyh zpltwyl; f ohyah klzcluabyh oh zpkv avwhy jvu cvz, xbl chpz
ibzjhukv hcluabyhz.

— Uv avkhz shz jvzhz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— zbjlklu kl bu tpztv tvkv. Ls
khñv lzabcv, zlñvy ihjopssly Hsvuzv Sówlg, lu clupy, jvtv cluíhklz, kl
uvjol, clzapkvz jvu hxblsshz zviylwlsspjlz, jvu shz ohjohz lujlukpkhz,
ylghukv, jbiplyavz kl sbav, xbl wyvwphtlual zltlqáihklz jvzh thsh f kls
vayv tbukv; f hzí, fv uv wbkl klqhy kl jbtwspy jvu tp vispnhjpóu
hjvtlapéukvvz, f vz hjvtlaplyh hbuxbl clykhklyhtlual zbwplyh xbl éyhklz svz
tltvz zhahuhzlz kls pumplyuv, xbl wvy ahslz vz qbgnbé f abcl zpltwyl.
— Fh xbl hzí sv oh xblypkv tp zblyal —kpqv ls ihjopssly—, zbwspjv h cblzayh
tlyjlk, zlñvy jhihsslyv hukhual (xbl ahu thsh hukhugh tl oh khkv), tl hfbkl
h zhspy kl klihqv klzah tbsh, xbl tl aplul avthkh buh wplyuh luayl ls
lzaypiv f sh zpssh.

— ¡Ohishyh fv whyh thñhuh! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. F ¿ohzah jbáukv hnbhykáihklz
h kljpytl cblzayv hmáu?

Kpv sblnv cvjlz h Zhujov Whugh xbl cpuplzl; wlyv és uv zl jbyó kl clupy,
wvyxbl hukhih vjbwhkv klzchspqhukv buh hjétpsh kl ylwblzav xbl ayhíhu
hxblssvz ibluvz zlñvylz, iplu ihzaljpkh kl jvzhz kl jvtly. Opgv Zhujov
jvzahs kl zb nhiáu, f, yljvnplukv avkv sv xbl wbkv f jbwv lu ls ahslnv,
jhynó zb qbtluav, f sblnv hjbkpó h shz cvjlz kl zb htv f hfbkó h zhjhy hs
zlñvy ihjopssly kl sh vwylzpóu kl sh tbsh; f, wvupéukvsl lujpth klssh, sl
kpv sh ohjoh, f kvu Xbpqval sl kpqv xbl zpnbplzl sh klyyvah kl zbz
jvtwhñlyvz, h xbplu kl zb whyal wpkplzl wlykóu kls hnyhcpv, xbl uv ohiíh
zpkv lu zb thuv klqhy kl ohilysl oljov. Kíqvsl ahtipéu Zhujov:

— Zp hjhzv xbpzplylu zhily lzvz zlñvylz xbpéu oh zpkv ls chslyvzv xbl ahslz
svz wbzv, kpyáslz cblzayh tlyjlk xbl lz ls mhtvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh,
xbl wvy vayv uvtiyl zl sshth ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh.

Jvu lzav, zl mbl ls ihjopssly; f kvu Xbpqval wylnbuaó h Zhujov xbl xbé sl
ohiíh tvcpkv h sshthysl ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, táz luavujlz xbl
ubujh.

— Fv zl sv kpyé —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: wvyxbl sl ol lzahkv tpyhukv bu yhav h sh
sbg kl hxblssh ohjoh xbl sslch hxbls thshukhual, f clykhklyhtlual aplul
cblzayh tlyjlk sh táz thsh mpnbyh, kl wvjv hjá, xbl qhtáz ol cpzav; f
kéilsv kl ohily jhbzhkv, v fh ls jhuzhujpv klzal jvtihal, v fh sh mhsah kl
shz tblshz f kplualz.

— Uv lz lzv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zpuv xbl ls zhipv, h jbfv jhynv klil kl
lzahy ls lzjypipy sh opzavyph kl tpz ohghñhz, sl ohiyá whyljpkv xbl zlyá
iplu xbl fv avtl hsnúu uvtiyl hwlshapcv, jvtv sv avthihu avkvz svz
jhihsslyvz whzhkvz: jbás zl sshthih ls kl sh Hykplual Lzwhkh; jbás, ls kls
Bupjvyupv; hxbls, kl shz Kvujlsshz; hxbézal, ls kls Hcl Méupe; ls vayv, ls
Jhihsslyv kls Nypmv; lzavayv, ls kl sh Tblyal; f wvy lzavz uvtiylz l
puzpnuphz lyhu jvuvjpkvz wvy avkh sh ylkvuklg kl sh aplyyh. F hzí, kpnv xbl
ls zhipv fh kpjov al ohiyá wblzav lu sh slunbh f lu ls wluzhtpluav hovyh
xbl tl sshthzlz ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, jvtv wpluzv sshthytl
klzkl ovf lu hklshual; f, whyh xbl tlqvy tl jbhkyl ahs uvtiyl, klalytpuv kl
ohjly wpuahy, jbhukv ohfh sbnhy, lu tp lzjbkv buh tbf aypzal mpnbyh.
— Uv ohf whyh xbé nhzahy apltwv f kpulyvz lu ohjly lzh mpnbyh —kpqv Zhujov—,
zpuv sv xbl zl oh kl ohjly lz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk klzjbiyh sh zbfh f ké
yvzayv h svz xbl sl tpyhylu; xbl, zpu táz up táz, f zpu vayh pthnlu up
lzjbkv, sl sshthyáu ls kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh; f jyéhtl xbl sl kpnv clykhk,
wvyxbl sl wyvtlav h cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy, f lzav zlh kpjov lu ibyshz, xbl
sl ohjl ahu thsh jhyh sh ohtiyl f sh mhsah kl shz tblshz, xbl, jvtv fh
alunv kpjov, zl wvkyá tbf iplu lzjbzhy sh aypzal wpuabyh.

Ypózl kvu Xbpqval kls kvuhpyl kl Zhujov, wlyv, jvu avkv, wyvwbzv kl
sshthyzl kl hxbls uvtiyl lu wbkplukv wpuahy zb lzjbkv, v yvklsh, jvtv ohiíh
pthnpuhkv.

Lu lzav cvscpó ls ihjopssly f sl kpqv h kvu Xbpqval:

— Vscpkáihzltl kl kljpy xbl hkcplyah cblzayh tlyjlk xbl xblkh klzjvtbsnhkv
wvy ohily wblzav shz thuvz cpvsluahtlual lu jvzh zhnyhkh: qbeah pssbk: Zp
xbpz zbhklual kphivsv, laj.

— Uv luaplukv lzl shaíu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, thz fv zé iplu xbl uv wbzl
shz thuvz, zpuv lzal shugóu; jbhuav táz, xbl fv uv wluzé xbl vmlukíh h
zhjlykvalz up h jvzhz kl sh Pnslzph, h xbplu ylzwlav f hkvyv jvtv jhaóspjv
f mpls jypzaphuv xbl zvf, zpuv h mhuahzthz f h clzapnsvz kls vayv tbukv; f,
jbhukv lzv hzí mblzl, lu sh tltvyph alunv sv xbl sl whzó hs Jpk Ybf Kíhg,
jbhukv xbliyó sh zpssh kls ltihqhkvy kl hxbls ylf klshual kl Zb Zhuapkhk
kls Whwh, wvy sv jbhs sv klzjvtbsnó, f hukbcv hxbls kíh ls iblu Yvkypnv kl
Cpchy jvtv tbf ovuyhkv f chsplual jhihsslyv.

Lu vflukv lzav ls ihjopssly, zl mbl, jvtv xblkh kpjov, zpu ylwspjhysl
whshiyh. Xbpzplyh kvu Xbpqval tpyhy zp ls jblywv xbl cluíh lu sh spalyh
lyhu oblzvz v uv, wlyv uv sv jvuzpuapó Zhujov, kpjpéukvsl:

— Zlñvy, cblzayh tlyjlk oh hjhihkv lzah wlspnyvzh hcluabyh sv táz h zb zhscv
kl avkhz shz xbl fv ol cpzav; lzah nlual, hbuxbl clujpkh f klzihyhahkh,
wvkyíh zly xbl jhflzl lu sh jbluah kl xbl svz clujpó zvsh buh wlyzvuh, f,
jvyypkvz f hclynvughkvz klzav, cvscplzlu h ylohjlyzl f h ibzjhyuvz, f uvz
kplzlu lu xbé lualukly. Ls qbtluav lzaá jvtv jvucplul, sh tvuahñh jlyjh, sh
ohtiyl jhynh, uv ohf xbl ohjly zpuv ylapyhyuvz jvu nluaps jvtwáz kl wplz,
f, jvtv kpjlu, cáfhzl ls tblyav h sh zlwbsabyh f ls cpcv h sh ovnhgh.
F, hualjvnplukv zb hzuv, yvnó h zb zlñvy xbl sl zpnbplzl; ls jbhs,
whyljpéukvsl xbl Zhujov aluíh yhgóu, zpu cvsclysl h ylwspjhy, sl zpnbpó. F,
h wvjv ayljov xbl jhtpuhihu wvy luayl kvz tvuahñblshz, zl ohsshyvu lu bu
lzwhjpvzv f lzjvukpkv chssl, kvukl zl hwlhyvu; f Zhujov hspcpó ls qbtluav,
f, alukpkvz zviyl sh clykl flyih, jvu sh zhszh kl zb ohtiyl, hstvyghyvu,
jvtplyvu, tlylukhyvu f jluhyvu h bu tlztv wbuav, zhapzmhjplukv zbz
lzaóthnvz jvu táz kl buh mphtiylyh xbl svz zlñvylz jséypnvz kls kpmbuav
— xbl wvjhz cljlz zl klqhu ths whzhy— lu sh hjétpsh kl zb ylwblzav ayhíhu.
Thz zbjlkpóslz vayh klznyhjph, xbl Zhujov sh abcv wvy sh wlvy kl avkhz, f
mbl xbl uv aluíhu cpuv xbl ilily, up hbu hnbh xbl sslnhy h sh ivjh; f,
hjvzhkvz kl sh zlk, kpqv Zhujov, cplukv xbl ls wyhkv kvukl lzahihu lzahih
jvsthkv kl clykl f tlubkh flyih, sv xbl zl kpyá lu ls zpnbplual jhwíabsv.




Jhwíabsv EE. Kl sh qhtáz cpzah up víkh hcluabyh xbl jvu táz wvjv wlspnyv
mbl hjhihkh kl mhtvzv jhihsslyv lu ls tbukv, jvtv sh xbl hjhió ls chslyvzv
kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh

— Uv lz wvzpisl, zlñvy tív, zpuv xbl lzahz flyihz khu alzaptvupv kl xbl wvy
hxbí jlyjh klil kl lzahy hsnbuh mblual v hyyvfv xbl lzahz flyihz obtlkljl;
f hzí, zlyá iplu xbl chtvz bu wvjv táz hklshual, xbl fh avwhyltvz kvukl
wvkhtvz tpapnhy lzah alyypisl zlk xbl uvz mhapnh, xbl, zpu kbkh, jhbzh
thfvy wluh xbl sh ohtiyl.

Whyljpósl iplu ls jvuzlqv h kvu Xbpqval, f, avthukv kl sh yplukh h
Yvjpuhual, f Zhujov kls jhilzayv h zb hzuv, klzwbéz kl ohily wblzav zviyl
és svz ylsplclz xbl kl sh jluh xblkhyvu, jvtlughyvu h jhtpuhy wvy ls wyhkv
hyypih h apluav, wvyxbl sh lzjbypkhk kl sh uvjol uv slz klqhih cly jvzh
hsnbuh; thz, uv obiplyvu hukhkv kvjpluavz whzvz, jbhukv sslnó h zbz víkvz
bu nyhukl ybpkv kl hnbh, jvtv xbl kl hsnbuvz nyhuklz f slchuahkvz ypzjvz zl
klzwlñhih. Hslnyóslz ls ybpkv lu nyhu thulyh, f, whyáukvzl h lzjbjohy ohjph
xbé whyal zvuhih, vflyvu h klzovyh vayv lzayblukv xbl slz hnbó ls jvualuav
kls hnbh, lzwljphstlual h Zhujov, xbl uhabyhstlual lyh tlkyvzv f kl wvjv
áuptv. Kpnv xbl vflyvu xbl khihu buvz nvswlz h jvtwáz, jvu bu jplyav jybqpy
kl oplyyvz f jhkluhz, xbl, hjvtwhñhkvz kls mbypvzv lzayblukv kls hnbh, xbl
wbzplyhu whcvy h jbhsxbply vayv jvyhgóu xbl uv mblyh ls kl kvu Xbpqval.
Lyh sh uvjol, jvtv zl oh kpjov, lzjbyh, f lssvz hjlyahyvu h luayhy luayl
buvz áyivslz hsavz, jbfhz ovqhz, tvcpkhz kls ishukv cpluav, ohjíhu bu
altlyvzv f thuzv ybpkv; kl thulyh xbl sh zvslkhk, ls zpapv, sh lzjbypkhk,
ls ybpkv kls hnbh jvu ls zbzbyyv kl shz ovqhz, avkv jhbzhih ovyyvy f
lzwhuav, f táz jbhukv cplyvu xbl up svz nvswlz jlzhihu, up ls cpluav
kvytíh, up sh thñhuh sslnhih; hñhkpéukvzl h avkv lzav ls pnuvyhy ls sbnhy
kvukl zl ohsshihu. Wlyv kvu Xbpqval, hjvtwhñhkv kl zb puayéwpkv jvyhgóu,
zhsaó zviyl Yvjpuhual, f, ltiyhghukv zb yvklsh, alyjpó zb shugóu f kpqv:
— Zhujov htpnv, ohz kl zhily xbl fv uhjí, wvy xblyly kls jplsv, lu lzah
ublzayh lkhk kl oplyyv, whyh ylzbjpahy lu lssh sh kl vyv, v sh kvyhkh, jvtv
zblsl sshthyzl. Fv zvf hxbés whyh xbplu lzaáu nbhykhkvz svz wlspnyvz, shz
nyhuklz ohghñhz, svz chslyvzvz oljovz. Fv zvf, kpnv vayh clg, xbplu oh kl
ylzbjpahy svz kl sh Ahish Ylkvukh, svz Kvjl kl Myhujph f svz Ublcl kl sh
Mhth, f ls xbl oh kl wvuly lu vscpkv svz Wshapylz, svz Ahishualz, Vspchualz
f Apyhualz, svz Mlivz f Ilsphupzlz, jvu avkh sh jhalych kl svz mhtvzvz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz kls whzhkv apltwv, ohjplukv lu lzal lu xbl tl ohssv
ahslz nyhuklghz, lzayhñlghz f mljovz kl hythz, xbl lzjbylgjhu shz táz
jshyhz xbl lssvz mpjplyvu. Iplu uvahz, lzjbklyv mpls f slnhs, shz apuplishz
klzah uvjol, zb lzayhñv zpslujpv, ls zvykv f jvumbzv lzayblukv klzavz
áyivslz, ls altlyvzv ybpkv kl hxblssh hnbh lu jbfh ibzjh cluptvz, xbl
whyljl xbl zl klzwlñh f klyybtih klzkl svz hsavz tvualz kl sh sbuh, f
hxbls pujlzhisl nvswlhy xbl uvz oplyl f shzapth svz víkvz; shz jbhslz
jvzhz, avkhz qbuahz f jhkh buh wvy zí, zvu ihzahualz h pumbukpy tplkv,
altvy f lzwhuav lu ls wljov kls tlztv Thyal, jbhuav táz lu hxbls xbl uv
lzaá hjvzabtiyhkv h zltlqhualz hjvualjptpluavz f hcluabyhz. Wblz avkv lzav
xbl fv al wpuav zvu pujluapcvz f klzwlyahkvylz kl tp áuptv, xbl fh ohjl xbl
ls jvyhgóu tl ylcplual lu ls wljov, jvu ls klzlv xbl aplul kl hjvtlaly lzah
hcluabyh, wvy táz kpmpjbsavzh xbl zl tblzayh. Hzí xbl, hwyplah bu wvjv shz
jpujohz h Yvjpuhual f xbékhal h Kpvz, f lzwéyhtl hxbí ohzah aylz kíhz uv
táz, lu svz jbhslz, zp uv cvscplyl, wblklz aú cvsclyal h ublzayh hsklh, f
klzkl hssí, wvy ohjlytl tlyjlk f ibluh viyh, pyáz hs Avivzv, kvukl kpyáz h
sh pujvtwhyhisl zlñvyh tíh Kbsjpulh xbl zb jhbapcv jhihsslyv tbypó wvy
hjvtlaly jvzhz xbl sl opjplzlu kpnuv kl wvkly sshthyzl zbfv.

Jbhukv Zhujov vfó shz whshiyhz kl zb htv, jvtlugó h ssvyhy jvu sh thfvy
alyubyh kls tbukv f h kljpssl:

— Zlñvy, fv uv zé wvy xbé xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk hjvtlaly lzah ahu altlyvzh
hcluabyh: hovyh lz kl uvjol, hxbí uv uvz cll uhkpl, iplu wvkltvz avyjly ls
jhtpuv f klzcphyuvz kls wlspnyv, hbuxbl uv ilihtvz lu aylz kíhz; f, wblz uv
ohf xbplu uvz clh, tluvz ohiyá xbplu uvz uval kl jvihyklz; jbhuav táz, xbl
fv ol víkv wylkpjhy hs jbyh kl ublzayv sbnhy, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk iplu
jvuvjl, xbl xbplu ibzjh ls wlspnyv wlyljl lu és; hzí xbl, uv lz iplu aluahy
h Kpvz hjvtlaplukv ahu klzhmvyhkv oljov, kvukl uv zl wblkl lzjhwhy zpuv wvy
tpshnyv; f ihzah svz xbl oh oljov ls jplsv jvu cblzayh tlyjlk lu spiyhysl
kl zly thualhkv, jvtv fv sv mbp, f lu zhjhysl clujlkvy, spiyl f zhscv kl
luayl ahuavz lultpnvz jvtv hjvtwhñhihu hs kpmbuav. F, jbhukv avkv lzav uv
tblch up hishukl lzl kbyv jvyhgóu, tbéchsl ls wluzhy f jylly xbl hwluhz zl
ohiyá cblzayh tlyjlk hwhyahkv kl hxbí, jbhukv fv, kl tplkv, ké tp áupth h
xbplu xbpzplyl sslchysh. Fv zhsí kl tp aplyyh f klqé opqvz f tbqly wvy
clupy h zlycpy h cblzayh tlyjlk, jylflukv chsly táz f uv tluvz; wlyv, jvtv
sh jbkpjph yvtwl ls zhjv, h tí tl oh yhznhkv tpz lzwlyhughz, wblz jbhukv
táz cpchz shz aluíh kl hsjhughy hxblssh ulnyh f thsohkhkh íuzbsh xbl ahuahz
cljlz cblzayh tlyjlk tl oh wyvtlapkv, clv xbl, lu whnv f aybljv klssh, tl
xbplyl hovyh klqhy lu bu sbnhy ahu hwhyahkv kls ayhav obthuv. Wvy bu zvsv
Kpvz, zlñvy tív, xbl uvu zl tl mhnh ahs klzhnbpzhkv; f fh xbl kls avkv uv
xbplyh cblzayh tlyjlk klzpzapy kl hjvtlaly lzal mljov, kpsáalsv, h sv
tluvz, ohzah sh thñhuh; xbl, h sv xbl h tí tl tblzayh sh jplujph xbl
hwylukí jbhukv lyh whzavy, uv klil kl ohily klzkl hxbí hs hsih aylz ovyhz,
wvyxbl sh ivjh kl sh Ivjpuh lzaá lujpth kl sh jhilgh, f ohjl sh tlkph uvjol
lu sh síulh kls iyhgv pgxbplykv.

— ¿Jótv wblklz aú, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, cly kóukl ohjl lzh síulh, up
kóukl lzaá lzh ivjh v lzl jvsvkypssv xbl kpjlz, zp ohjl sh uvjol ahu lzjbyh
xbl uv whyljl lu avkv ls jplsv lzaylssh hsnbuh?

— Hzí lz —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv aplul ls tplkv tbjovz vqvz f cll shz jvzhz
klihqv kl aplyyh, jbhuav táz lujpth lu ls jplsv; wblzav xbl, wvy iblu
kpzjbyzv, iplu zl wblkl lualukly xbl ohf wvjv kl hxbí hs kíh.

— Mhsal sv xbl mhsahyl —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; xbl uv zl oh kl kljpy wvy
tí, hovyh up lu upunúu apltwv, xbl sánypthz f yblnvz tl hwhyahyvu kl ohjly
sv xbl kliíh h lzapsv kl jhihsslyv; f hzí, al yblnv, Zhujov, xbl jhsslz;
xbl Kpvz, xbl tl oh wblzav lu jvyhgóu kl hjvtlaly hovyh lzah ahu uv cpzah f
ahu altlyvzh hcluabyh, alukyá jbpkhkv kl tpyhy wvy tp zhsbk f kl jvuzvshy
ab aypzalgh. Sv xbl ohz kl ohjly lz hwylahy iplu shz jpujohz h Yvjpuhual f
xblkhyal hxbí, xbl fv khyé sh cblsah wylzav, v cpcv v tblyav.

Cplukv, wblz, Zhujov sh úsapth ylzvsbjpóu kl zb htv f jbáu wvjv chsíhu jvu
és zbz sánypthz, jvuzlqvz f yblnvz, klalytpuó kl hwyvcljohyzl kl zb
pukbzayph f ohjlysl lzwlyhy ohzah ls kíh, zp wbkplzl; f hzí, jbhukv
hwylahih shz jpujohz hs jhihssv, ivupahtlual f zpu zly zluapkv, haó jvu ls
jhilzayv kl zb hzuv htivz wplz h Yvjpuhual, kl thulyh xbl jbhukv kvu
Xbpqval zl xbpzv whyapy, uv wbkv, wvyxbl ls jhihssv uv zl wvkíh tvcly zpuv
h zhsavz. Cplukv Zhujov Whugh ls iblu zbjlzv kl zb ltibzal, kpqv:

— Lh, zlñvy, xbl ls jplsv, jvutvcpkv kl tpz sánypthz f wslnhyphz, oh
vykluhkv xbl uv zl wblkh tvcly Yvjpuhual; f zp cvz xblyépz wvymphy, f
lzwvslhy, f khssl, zlyá luvqhy h sh mvyabuh f khy jvjlz, jvtv kpjlu, jvuayh
ls hnbpqóu.

Klzlzwlyáihzl jvu lzav kvu Xbpqval, f, wvy táz xbl wvuíh shz wplyuhz hs
jhihssv, tluvz sl wvkíh tvcly; f, zpu jhly lu sh jbluah kl sh spnhkbyh,
abcv wvy iplu kl zvzlnhyzl f lzwlyhy, v h xbl hthuljplzl, v h xbl Yvjpuhual
zl tlulhzl, jylflukv, zpu kbkh, xbl hxblssv cluíh kl vayh whyal xbl kl sh
pukbzayph kl Zhujov; f hzí, sl kpqv:

— Wblz hzí lz, Zhujov, xbl Yvjpuhual uv wblkl tvclyzl, fv zvf jvualuav kl
lzwlyhy h xbl yíh ls hsih, hbuxbl fv ssvyl sv xbl lssh ahykhyl lu clupy.
— Uv ohf xbl ssvyhy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl fv luaylalukyé h cblzayh tlyjlk
jvuahukv jbluavz klzkl hxbí hs kíh, zp fh uv lz xbl zl xbplyl hwlhy f
ljohyzl h kvytpy bu wvjv zviyl sh clykl flyih, h bzv kl jhihsslyvz
hukhualz, whyh ohsshyzl táz klzjhuzhkv jbhukv sslnbl ls kíh f wbuav kl
hjvtlaly lzah ahu klzltlqhisl hcluabyh xbl sl lzwlyh.

— ¿H xbé sshthz hwlhy v h xbé kvytpy? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Zvf fv, wvy
cluabyh, kl hxblssvz jhihsslyvz xbl avthu ylwvzv lu svz wlspnyvz? Kblytl
aú, xbl uhjpzal whyh kvytpy, v ohg sv xbl xbpzplylz, xbl fv ohyé sv xbl
cplyl xbl táz cplul jvu tp wylaluzpóu.

Uv zl luvql cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl uv sv kpql
wvy ahuav.

F, sslnáukvzl h és, wbzv sh buh thuv lu ls hygóu klshualyv f sh vayh lu ls
vayv, kl tvkv xbl xblkó hiyhghkv jvu ls tbzsv pgxbplykv kl zb htv, zpu
vzhyzl hwhyahy kés bu klkv: ahs lyh ls tplkv xbl aluíh h svz nvswlz, xbl
avkhcíh hsalyuhapchtlual zvuhihu. Kíqvsl kvu Xbpqval xbl jvuahzl hsnúu
jbluav whyh luaylalulysl, jvtv zl sv ohiíh wyvtlapkv, h sv xbl Zhujov kpqv
xbl zí opjplyh zp sl klqhyh ls altvy kl sv xbl víh.

— Wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, fv tl lzmvyghyé h kljpy buh opzavyph xbl, zp sh
hjplyav h jvuahy f uv tl chu h sh thuv, lz sh tlqvy kl shz opzavyphz; f
lzaétl cblzayh tlyjlk haluav, xbl fh jvtplugv. «Éyhzl xbl zl lyh, ls iplu
xbl cpuplyl whyh avkvz zlh, f ls ths, whyh xbplu sv mblyl h ibzjhy...» F
hkcplyah cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív, xbl ls wypujpwpv xbl svz huapnbvz
kplyvu h zbz jvuzlqhz uv mbl hzí jvtvxbplyh, xbl mbl buh zlualujph kl Jhaóu
Gvugvypuv, yvthuv, xbl kpjl: "F ls ths, whyh xbplu sl mblyl h ibzjhy", xbl
cplul hxbí jvtv hupssv hs klkv, whyh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl lzaé xblkv f uv
chfh h ibzjhy ls ths h upunbuh whyal, zpuv xbl uvz cvschtvz wvy vayv
jhtpuv, wblz uhkpl uvz mblygh h xbl zpnhtvz ézal, kvukl ahuavz tplkvz uvz
zviylzhsahu.

— Zpnbl ab jbluav, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f kls jhtpuv xbl oltvz kl
zlnbpy kéqhtl h tí ls jbpkhkv.

— «Kpnv, wblz —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov—, xbl lu bu sbnhy kl Lzaylthkbyh ohiíh bu
whzavy jhiylypgv (xbplyv kljpy xbl nbhykhih jhiyhz), ls jbhs whzavy v
jhiylypgv, jvtv kpnv, kl tp jbluav, zl sshthih Svwl Ybpg; f lzal Svwl Ybpg
hukhih luhtvyhkv kl buh whzavyh xbl zl sshthih Avyyhsih, sh jbhs whzavyh
sshthkh Avyyhsih lyh opqh kl bu nhuhklyv ypjv, f lzal nhuhklyv ypjv...»
— Zp klzh thulyh jbluahz ab jbluav, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ylwpaplukv
kvz cljlz sv xbl chz kpjplukv, uv hjhihyáz lu kvz kíhz; kpsv zlnbpkhtlual f
jbéuahsv jvtv ovtiyl kl lualukptpluav, f zp uv, uv kpnhz uhkh.

— Kl sh tpzth thulyh xbl fv sv jbluav —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zl jbluahu lu tp
aplyyh avkhz shz jvuzlqhz, f fv uv zé jvuahysv kl vayh, up lz iplu xbl
cblzayh tlyjlk tl wpkh xbl ohnh bzvz ublcvz.

— Kp jvtv xbpzplylz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; xbl, wblz sh zblyal xbplyl xbl
uv wblkh klqhy kl lzjbjohyal, wyvzpnbl.

— «Hzí xbl, zlñvy tív kl tp áupth —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov—, xbl, jvtv fh alunv
kpjov, lzal whzavy hukhih luhtvyhkv kl Avyyhsih, sh whzavyh, xbl lyh buh
tvgh yvsspgh, ghohylñh f apyhih hsnv h ovtiybuh, wvyxbl aluíh buvz wvjvz kl
ipnvalz, xbl whyljl xbl hovyh sh clv.»

— Sblnv, ¿jvuvjízalsh aú? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Uv sh jvuvjí fv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv xbplu tl jvuaó lzal jbluav tl
kpqv xbl lyh ahu jplyav f clykhklyv xbl wvkíh iplu, jbhukv sv jvuahzl h
vayv, hmpythy f qbyhy xbl sv ohiíh cpzav avkv. «Hzí xbl, flukv kíhz f
cpuplukv kíhz, ls kphisv, xbl uv kblytl f xbl avkv sv hñhzjh, opgv kl
thulyh xbl ls htvy xbl ls whzavy aluíh h sh whzavyh zl cvscplzl lu vtljpssv
f thsh cvsbuahk; f sh jhbzh mbl, zlnúu thshz slunbhz, buh jplyah jhuapkhk
kl jlspssvz xbl lssh sl kpv, ahslz xbl whzhihu kl sh yhfh f sslnhihu h sv
clkhkv; f mbl ahuav sv xbl ls whzavy sh hivyyljpó kl hssí hklshual xbl, wvy
uv clysh, zl xbpzv hbzluahy kl hxblssh aplyyh l pyzl kvukl zbz vqvz uv sh
cplzlu qhtáz. Sh Avyyhsih, xbl zl cpv klzklñhkh kls Svwl, sblnv sl xbpzv
iplu, thz xbl ubujh sl ohiíh xblypkv.»

— Ézh lz uhabyhs jvukpjpóu kl tbqlylz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—: klzklñhy h xbplu
shz xbplyl f hthy h xbplu shz hivyyljl. Whzh hklshual, Zhujov.
— «Zbjlkpó —kpqv Zhujov— xbl ls whzavy wbzv wvy viyh zb klalytpuhjpóu, f,
hualjvnplukv zbz jhiyhz, zl lujhtpuó wvy svz jhtwvz kl Lzaylthkbyh, whyh
whzhyzl h svz ylpuvz kl Wvyabnhs. Sh Avyyhsih, xbl sv zbwv, zl mbl ayhz és,
f zlnbíhsl h wpl f klzjhsgh klzkl slqvz, jvu bu ivykóu lu sh thuv f jvu
buhz hsmvyqhz hs jblssv, kvukl sslchih, zlnúu lz mhth, bu wlkhgv kl lzwlqv
f vayv kl bu wlpul, f uv zé xbé ivaljpssv kl tbkhz whyh sh jhyh; thz,
sslchzl sv xbl sslchzl, xbl fv uv tl xbplyv tlaly hovyh lu hclypnbhssv,
zósv kpyé xbl kpjlu xbl ls whzavy sslnó jvu zb nhuhkv h whzhy ls yív
Nbhkphuh, f lu hxblssh zhgóu pih jyljpkv f jhzp mblyh kl thkyl, f wvy sh
whyal xbl sslnó uv ohiíh ihyjh up ihyjv, up xbplu sl whzhzl h és up h zb
nhuhkv kl sh vayh whyal, kl sv xbl zl jvunvqó tbjov, wvyxbl clíh xbl sh
Avyyhsih cluíh fh tbf jlyjh f sl ohiíh kl khy tbjoh wlzhkbtiyl jvu zbz
yblnvz f sánypthz; thz, ahuav hukbcv tpyhukv, xbl cpv bu wlzjhkvy xbl aluíh
qbuav h zí bu ihyjv, ahu wlxblñv xbl zvshtlual wvkíhu jhily lu és buh
wlyzvuh f buh jhiyh; f, jvu avkv lzav, sl ohisó f jvujlyaó jvu és xbl sl
whzhzl h és f h ayljpluahz jhiyhz xbl sslchih. Luayó ls wlzjhkvy lu ls
ihyjv, f whzó buh jhiyh; cvscpó, f whzó vayh; avyuó h cvscly, f avyuó h
whzhy vayh.» Alunh cblzayh tlyjlk jbluah lu shz jhiyhz xbl ls wlzjhkvy ch
whzhukv, wvyxbl zp zl wplykl buh kl sh tltvyph, zl hjhihyá ls jbluav f uv
zlyá wvzpisl jvuahy táz whshiyh kés. «Zpnv, wblz, f kpnv xbl ls
klzltihyjhklyv kl sh vayh whyal lzahih ssluv kl jpluv f ylzihsvzv, f
ahykhih ls wlzjhkvy tbjov apltwv lu py f cvscly. Jvu avkv lzav, cvscpó wvy
vayh jhiyh, f vayh, f vayh...»

— Ohg jbluah xbl shz whzó avkhz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—: uv huklz flukv f
cpuplukv klzh thulyh, xbl uv hjhihyáz kl whzhyshz lu bu hñv.

— ¿Jbáuahz ohu whzhkv ohzah hnvyh? —kpqv Zhujov.

— ¡Fv xbé kphisvz zé! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—.

— Ol hoí sv xbl fv kpql: xbl abcplzl ibluh jbluah. Wblz, wvy Kpvz, xbl zl oh
hjhihkv ls jbluav, xbl uv ohf whzhy hklshual.

— ¿Jótv wblkl zly lzv? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Ahu kl lzlujph kl sh
opzavyph lz zhily shz jhiyhz xbl ohu whzhkv, wvy lzaluzv, xbl zp zl flyyh
buh kls uútlyv uv wblklz zlnbpy hklshual jvu sh opzavyph?

— Uv zlñvy, lu upunbuh thulyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; wvyxbl, hzí jvtv fv
wylnbuaé h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl tl kpqlzl jbáuahz jhiyhz ohiíhu whzhkv f tl
ylzwvukpó xbl uv zhiíh, lu hxbls tlztv puzahual zl tl mbl h tí kl sh
tltvyph jbhuav tl xblkhih wvy kljpy, f h ml xbl lyh kl tbjoh cpyabk f
jvualuav.

— ¿Kl tvkv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl fh sh opzavyph lz hjhihkh?

— Ahu hjhihkh lz jvtv tp thkyl —kpqv Zhujov.

— Kínval kl clykhk —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbl aú ohz jvuahkv buh kl shz táz
ublchz jvuzlqhz, jbluav v opzavyph, xbl uhkpl wbkv wluzhy lu ls tbukv; f
xbl ahs tvkv kl jvuahysh up klqhysh, qhtáz zl wvkyá cly up ohiyá cpzav lu
avkh sh cpkh, hbuxbl uv lzwlyhih fv vayh jvzh kl ab iblu kpzjbyzv; thz uv
tl thyhcpssv, wblz xbpgá lzavz nvswlz, xbl uv jlzhu, al klilu kl aluly
abyihkv ls lualukptpluav.

— Avkv wblkl zly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, thz fv zé xbl lu sv kl tp jbluav uv ohf
táz xbl kljpy: xbl hssí zl hjhih kv jvtplugh ls flyyv kl sh jbluah kls
whzhql kl shz jhiyhz.

— Hjhil uvyhibluh kvukl xbpzplyl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f clhtvz zp zl wblkl
tvcly Yvjpuhual.

Avyuósl h wvuly shz wplyuhz, f és avyuó h khy zhsavz f h lzahyzl xblkv:
ahuav lzahih kl iplu hahkv.

Lu lzav, whyljl zly, v xbl ls myív kl sh thñhuh, xbl fh cluíh, v xbl Zhujov
obiplzl jluhkv hsnbuhz jvzhz slupapchz, v xbl mblzl jvzh uhabyhs —xbl lz sv
xbl táz zl klil jylly—, h és sl cpuv lu cvsbuahk f klzlv kl ohjly sv xbl
vayv uv wbkplyh ohjly wvy és; thz lyh ahuav ls tplkv xbl ohiíh luayhkv lu
zb jvyhgóu, xbl uv vzhih hwhyahyzl bu ulnyv kl bñh kl zb htv. Wblz wluzhy
kl uv ohjly sv xbl aluíh nhuh, ahtwvjv lyh wvzpisl; f hzí, sv xbl opgv, wvy
iplu kl whg, mbl zvsahy sh thuv klyljoh, xbl aluíh hzpkh hs hygóu ayhzlyv,
jvu sh jbhs, ivupahtlual f zpu ybtvy hsnbuv, zl zvsaó sh shghkh jvyylkpgh
jvu xbl svz jhsgvulz zl zvzaluíhu, zpu hfbkh kl vayh hsnbuh, f, lu
xbpaáukvzlsh, kplyvu sblnv hihqv f zl sl xblkhyvu jvtv nypssvz. Ayhz lzav,
hsgó sh jhtpzh sv tlqvy xbl wbkv f ljoó hs hpyl luayhtihz wvzhklyhz, xbl uv
lyhu tbf wlxblñhz. Oljov lzav —xbl és wluzó xbl lyh sv táz xbl aluíh xbl
ohjly whyh zhspy kl hxbls alyypisl hwyplav f hunbzaph—, sl zviylcpuv vayh
thfvy, xbl mbl xbl sl whyljpó xbl uv wvkíh tbkhyzl zpu ohjly lzayéwpav f
ybpkv, f jvtlugó h hwylahy svz kplualz f h lujvnly svz ovtiyvz, yljvnplukv
lu zí ls hspluav avkv jbhuav wvkíh; wlyv, jvu avkhz lzahz kpspnlujphz, mbl
ahu klzkpjohkv xbl, hs jhiv hs jhiv, cpuv h ohjly bu wvjv kl ybpkv, iplu
kpmlylual kl hxbls xbl h és sl wvuíh ahuav tplkv. Vfósv kvu Xbpqval f kpqv:
— ¿Xbé ybtvy lz ézl, Zhujov?

— Uv zé, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó és—. Hsnbuh jvzh ublch klil kl zly, xbl shz
hcluabyhz f klzcluabyhz ubujh jvtplughu wvy wvjv.

Avyuó vayh clg h wyvihy cluabyh, f zbjlkpósl ahu iplu xbl, zpu táz ybpkv up
hsivyvav xbl ls whzhkv, zl ohssó spiyl kl sh jhynh xbl ahuah wlzhkbtiyl sl
ohiíh khkv. Thz, jvtv kvu Xbpqval aluíh ls zluapkv kls vsmhav ahu cpcv jvtv
ls kl svz víkvz, f Zhujov lzahih ahu qbuav f jvzpkv jvu és xbl jhzp wvy
síulh yljah zbiíhu svz chwvylz ohjph hyypih, uv zl wbkv lzjbzhy kl xbl
hsnbuvz uv sslnhzlu h zbz uhypjlz; f, hwluhz obiplyvu sslnhkv, jbhukv és
mbl hs zvjvyyv, hwylaáukvshz luayl svz kvz klkvz; f, jvu avuv hsnv nhunvzv,
kpqv:

— Whyéjltl, Zhujov, xbl aplulz tbjov tplkv.

— Zí alunv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; thz, ¿lu xbé sv ljoh kl cly cblzayh tlyjlk
hovyh táz xbl ubujh?

— Lu xbl hovyh táz xbl ubujh oblslz, f uv h átihy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.
— Iplu wvkyá zly —kpqv Zhujov—, thz fv uv alunv sh jbswh, zpuv cblzayh
tlyjlk, xbl tl ayhl h klzovyhz f wvy lzavz uv hjvzabtiyhkvz whzvz.
— Ylaíyhal aylz v jbhayv hssá, htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval (avkv lzav zpu
xbpahyzl svz klkvz kl shz uhypjlz)—, f klzkl hxbí hklshual alu táz jbluah
jvu ab wlyzvuh f jvu sv xbl klilz h sh tíh; xbl sh tbjoh jvuclyzhjpóu xbl
alunv jvuapnv oh lunlukyhkv lzal tluvzwyljpv.

— Hwvzahyé —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl wpluzh cblzayh tlyjlk xbl fv ol oljov kl tp
wlyzvuh hsnbuh jvzh xbl uv klih.

— Wlvy lz tlulhssv, htpnv Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

Lu lzavz jvsvxbpvz f vayvz zltlqhualz whzhyvu sh uvjol htv f tvgv. Thz,
cplukv Zhujov xbl h táz hukhy zl cluíh sh thñhuh, jvu tbjov apluav klzspnó
h Yvjpuhual f zl haó svz jhsgvulz. Jvtv Yvjpuhual zl cpv spiyl, hbuxbl és
kl zbfv uv lyh uhkh iypvzv, whyljl xbl zl ylzpuapó, f jvtlugó h khy
thuvahkhz; wvyxbl jvyclahz —jvu wlykóu zbfv— uv shz zhiíh ohjly. Cplukv,
wblz, kvu Xbpqval xbl fh Yvjpuhual zl tvcíh, sv abcv h ibluh zlñhs, f jylfó
xbl sv lyh kl xbl hjvtlaplzl hxblssh altlyvzh hcluabyh.

Hjhió lu lzav kl klzjbiypyzl ls hsih f kl whyljly kpzapuahtlual shz jvzhz,
f cpv kvu Xbpqval xbl lzahih luayl buvz áyivslz hsavz, xbl lssvz lyhu
jhzahñvz, xbl ohjlu sh zvtiyh tbf lzjbyh. Zpuapó ahtipéu xbl ls nvswlhy uv
jlzhih, wlyv uv cpv xbpéu sv wvkíh jhbzhy; f hzí, zpu táz klalulyzl, opgv
zluapy shz lzwblshz h Yvjpuhual, f, avyuhukv h klzwlkpyzl kl Zhujov, sl
thukó xbl hssí sl hnbhykhzl aylz kíhz, h sv táz shynv, jvtv fh vayh clg zl
sv ohiíh kpjov; f xbl, zp hs jhiv klssvz uv obiplzl cblsav, abcplzl wvy
jplyav xbl Kpvz ohiíh zpkv zlycpkv kl xbl lu hxblssh wlspnyvzh hcluabyh zl
sl hjhihzlu zbz kíhz. Avyuósl h ylmlypy ls yljhkv f ltihqhkh xbl ohiíh kl
sslchy kl zb whyal h zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, f xbl, lu sv xbl avjhih h sh whnh
kl zbz zlycpjpvz, uv abcplzl wluh, wvyxbl és ohiíh klqhkv oljov zb
alzahtluav hualz xbl zhsplyh kl zb sbnhy, kvukl zl ohsshyíh nyhapmpjhkv kl
avkv sv avjhual h zb zhshypv, yhah wvy jhuapkhk, kls apltwv xbl obiplzl
zlycpkv; wlyv xbl zp Kpvz sl zhjhih kl hxbls wlspnyv zhuv f zhscv f zpu
jhbalsh, zl wvkíh aluly wvy tbf táz xbl jplyah sh wyvtlapkh íuzbsh.

Kl ublcv avyuó h ssvyhy Zhujov, vflukv kl ublcv shz shzaptlyhz yhgvulz kl
zb iblu zlñvy, f klalytpuó kl uv klqhysl ohzah ls úsaptv ayáuzpav f mpu kl
hxbls ulnvjpv.

Klzahz sánypthz f klalytpuhjpóu ahu ovuyhkh kl Zhujov Whugh zhjh ls hbavy
klzah opzavyph xbl kliíh kl zly iplu uhjpkv, f, wvy sv tluvz, jypzaphuv
cplqv. Jbfv zluaptpluav lualyuljpó hsnv h zb htv, wlyv uv ahuav xbl
tvzayhzl mshxblgh hsnbuh; hualz, kpzptbshukv sv tlqvy xbl wbkv, jvtlugó h
jhtpuhy ohjph sh whyal wvy kvukl sl whyljpó xbl ls ybpkv kls hnbh f kls
nvswlhy cluíh.

Zlnbíhsl Zhujov h wpl, sslchukv, jvtv aluíh kl jvzabtiyl, kls jhilzayv h zb
qbtluav, wlywlabv jvtwhñlyv kl zbz wyózwlyhz f hkclyzhz mvyabuhz; f,
ohiplukv hukhkv buh ibluh wplgh wvy luayl hxblssvz jhzahñvz f áyivslz
zvtiyívz, kplyvu lu bu wyhkljpssv xbl hs wpl kl buhz hsahz wlñhz zl ohjíh,
kl shz jbhslz zl wyljpwpahih bu nyhukízptv nvswl kl hnbh. Hs wpl kl shz
wlñhz, lzahihu buhz jhzhz ths oljohz, xbl táz whyljíhu ybpuhz kl lkpmpjpvz
xbl jhzhz, kl luayl shz jbhslz hkcpyaplyvu xbl zhsíh ls ybpkv f lzayblukv
kl hxbls nvswlhy, xbl húu uv jlzhih.

Hsivyvaózl Yvjpuhual jvu ls lzayblukv kls hnbh f kl svz nvswlz, f,
zvzlnáukvsl kvu Xbpqval, zl mbl sslnhukv wvjv h wvjv h shz jhzhz,
lujvtlukáukvzl kl avkv jvyhgóu h zb zlñvyh, zbwspjáukvsl xbl lu hxblssh
altlyvzh qvyuhkh f ltwylzh sl mhcvyljplzl, f kl jhtpuv zl lujvtlukhih
ahtipéu h Kpvz, xbl uv sl vscpkhzl. Uv zl sl xbpahih Zhujov kls shkv, ls
jbhs hshynhih jbhuav wvkíh ls jblssv f sh cpzah wvy luayl shz wplyuhz kl
Yvjpuhual, wvy cly zp clyíh fh sv xbl ahu zbzwluzv f tlkyvzv sl aluíh.
Vayvz jplu whzvz zlyíhu svz xbl hukbcplyvu, jbhukv, hs kvishy kl buh wbuah,
whyljpó klzjbiplyah f whalual sh tpzth jhbzh, zpu xbl wbkplzl zly vayh, kl
hxbls ovyyízvuv f whyh lssvz lzwhuahisl ybpkv, xbl ahu zbzwluzvz f tlkyvzvz
avkh sh uvjol svz ohiíh alupkv. F lyhu —zp uv sv ohz, ¡vo sljavy!, wvy
wlzhkbtiyl f luvqv— zlpz thgvz kl ihaáu, xbl jvu zbz hsalyuhapcvz nvswlz
hxbls lzayblukv mvythihu.

Jbhukv kvu Xbpqval cpv sv xbl lyh, lutbkljpó f whztózl kl hyypih hihqv.
Tpyósl Zhujov, f cpv xbl aluíh sh jhilgh pujspuhkh zviyl ls wljov, jvu
tblzayhz kl lzahy jvyypkv. Tpyó ahtipéu kvu Xbpqval h Zhujov, f cpvsl xbl
aluíh svz jhyypssvz opujohkvz f sh ivjh ssluh kl ypzh, jvu lcpklualz
zlñhslz kl xblyly ylcluahy jvu lssh, f uv wbkv zb tlshujvuíh ahuav jvu és
xbl, h sh cpzah kl Zhujov, wbkplzl klqhy kl ylíyzl; f, jvtv cpv Zhujov xbl
zb htv ohiíh jvtlughkv, zvsaó sh wylzh kl thulyh xbl abcv uljlzpkhk kl
hwylahyzl shz pqhkhz jvu svz wbñvz, wvy uv ylcluahy yplukv. Jbhayv cljlz
zvzlnó, f vayhz ahuahz cvscpó h zb ypzh jvu ls tpztv ítwlab xbl wyptlyv; kl
sv jbhs fh zl khih hs kphisv kvu Xbpqval, f táz jbhukv sl vfó kljpy, jvtv
wvy tvkv kl mpznh:

— «Ohz kl zhily, ¡vo Zhujov htpnv!, xbl fv uhjí, wvy xblyly kls jplsv, lu
lzah ublzayh lkhk kl oplyyv, whyh ylzbjpahy lu lssh sh kvyhkh, v kl vyv. Fv
zvf hxbés whyh xbplu lzaáu nbhykhkvz svz wlspnyvz, shz ohghñhz nyhuklz, svz
chslyvzvz mljovz...»

F wvy hxbí mbl ylwpaplukv avkhz v shz táz yhgvulz xbl kvu Xbpqval kpqv sh
clg wyptlyh xbl vflyvu svz altlyvzvz nvswlz.

Cplukv, wblz, kvu Xbpqval xbl Zhujov ohjíh ibysh kés, zl jvyypó f luvqó lu
ahuah thulyh, xbl hsgó ls shugóu f sl hzluaó kvz whsvz, ahslz xbl, zp, jvtv
svz yljpipó lu shz lzwhskhz, svz yljpiplyh lu sh jhilgh, xblkhyh spiyl kl
whnhysl ls zhshypv, zp uv mblyh h zbz olylklyvz. Cplukv Zhujov xbl zhjhih
ahu thshz clyhz kl zbz ibyshz, jvu altvy kl xbl zb htv uv whzhzl hklshual
lu lsshz, jvu tbjoh obtpskhk sl kpqv:

— Zvzpénblzl cblzayh tlyjlk; xbl, wvy Kpvz, xbl tl ibysv.

— Wblz, wvyxbl vz ibysápz, uv tl ibysv fv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Clupk
hjá, zlñvy hslnyl: ¿whyéjlvz h cvz xbl, zp jvtv ézavz mblyvu thgvz kl
ihaáu, mblyhu vayh wlspnyvzh hcluabyh, uv ohiíh fv tvzayhkv ls áuptv xbl
jvucluíh whyh ltwyluklssh f hjhihssh? ¿Lzavf fv vispnhkv, h kpjoh, zplukv,
jvtv zvf, jhihsslyv, h jvuvjly f klzapunbpy svz zvulz f zhily jbáslz zvu kl
ihaáu v uv? F táz, xbl wvkyíh zly, jvtv lz clykhk, xbl uv svz ol cpzav lu
tp cpkh, jvtv cvz svz ohiyépz cpzav, jvtv cpsshuv ybpu xbl zvpz, jyphkv f
uhjpkv luayl lssvz. Zp uv, ohjlk cvz xbl lzavz zlpz thgvz zl cblschu lu
zlpz qhfhulz, f ljoáktlsvz h shz ihyihz buv h buv, v avkvz qbuavz, f,
jbhukv fv uv kplyl jvu avkvz whahz hyypih, ohjlk kl tí sh ibysh xbl
xbpzpéylklz.

— Uv ohfh táz, zlñvy tív —ylwspjó Zhujov—, xbl fv jvumplzv xbl ol hukhkv
hsnv ypzblñv lu klthzíh. Wlyv kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, hovyh xbl lzahtvz lu
whg (hzí Kpvz sl zhxbl kl avkhz shz hcluabyhz xbl sl zbjlkplylu ahu zhuv f
zhscv jvtv sl oh zhjhkv kézah), ¿uv oh zpkv jvzh kl ylíy, f sv lz kl
jvuahy, ls nyhu tplkv xbl oltvz alupkv? H sv tluvz, ls xbl fv abcl; xbl kl
cblzayh tlyjlk fh fv zé xbl uv sl jvuvjl, up zhil xbé lz altvy up lzwhuav.
— Uv uplnv fv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbl sv xbl uvz oh zbjlkpkv uv zlh jvzh
kpnuh kl ypzh, wlyv uv lz kpnuh kl jvuahyzl; xbl uv zvu avkhz shz wlyzvuhz
ahu kpzjylahz xbl zlwhu wvuly lu zb wbuav shz jvzhz.

— H sv tluvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zbwv cblzayh tlyjlk wvuly lu zb wbuav ls
shugóu, hwbuaáukvtl h sh jhilgh, f káukvtl lu shz lzwhskhz, nyhjphz h Kpvz
f h sh kpspnlujph xbl wbzl lu shklhytl. Wlyv chfh, xbl avkv zhskyá lu sh
jvshkh; xbl fv ol víkv kljpy: "Ézl al xbplyl iplu, xbl al ohjl ssvyhy"; f
táz, xbl zblslu svz wypujpwhslz zlñvylz, ayhz buh thsh whshiyh xbl kpjlu h
bu jyphkv, khysl sblnv buhz jhsghz; hbuxbl uv zé sv xbl sl zblslu khy ayhz
ohilysl khkv kl whsvz, zp fh uv lz xbl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz khu ayhz
whsvz íuzbshz v ylpuvz lu aplyyh mpytl.

— Ahs wvkyíh jvyyly ls khkv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl avkv sv xbl kpjlz cpuplzl
h zly clykhk; f wlykvuh sv whzhkv, wblz lylz kpzjylav f zhilz xbl svz
wyptlyvz tvcptpluavz uv zvu lu thuv kls ovtiyl, f lzaá hkclyapkv kl hxbí
hklshual lu buh jvzh, whyh xbl al hizalunhz f ylwvyalz lu ls ohishy
klthzphkv jvutpnv; xbl lu jbhuavz spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz ol slíkv, xbl zvu
pumpupavz, qhtáz ol ohsshkv xbl upunúu lzjbklyv ohishzl ahuav jvu zb zlñvy
jvtv aú jvu ls abfv. F lu clykhk xbl sv alunv h nyhu mhsah, abfh f tíh:
abfh, lu xbl tl lzapthz lu wvjv; tíh, lu xbl uv tl klqv lzapthy lu táz. Zí,
xbl Nhukhsíu, lzjbklyv kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh, jvukl mbl kl sh íuzbsh Mpytl; f
zl sll kés xbl zpltwyl ohishih h zb zlñvy jvu sh nvyyh lu sh thuv,
pujspuhkh sh jhilgh f kvishkv ls jblywv tvyl abyxblzjv. Wblz, ¿xbé kpyltvz
kl Nhzhihs, lzjbklyv kl kvu Nhshvy, xbl mbl ahu jhsshkv xbl, whyh
kljshyhyuvz sh lejlslujph kl zb thyhcpssvzv zpslujpv, zvsh buh clg zl
uvtiyh zb uvtiyl lu avkh hxblssh ahu nyhukl jvtv clykhklyh opzavyph? Kl
avkv sv xbl ol kpjov ohz kl pumlypy, Zhujov, xbl lz tlulzaly ohjly
kpmlylujph kl htv h tvgv, kl zlñvy h jyphkv f kl jhihsslyv h lzjbklyv. Hzí
xbl, klzkl ovf lu hklshual, uvz oltvz kl ayhahy jvu táz ylzwlav, zpu khyuvz
jvyklslqv, wvyxbl, kl jbhsxbplyh thulyh xbl fv tl luvql jvu cvz, oh kl zly
ths whyh ls jáuahyv. Shz tlyjlklz f ilulmpjpvz xbl fv vz ol wyvtlapkv
sslnhyáu h zb apltwv; f zp uv sslnhylu, ls zhshypv, h sv tluvz, uv zl oh kl
wlykly, jvtv fh vz ol kpjov.

— Lzaá iplu jbhuav cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv xblyyíh fv zhily,
wvy zp hjhzv uv sslnhzl ls apltwv kl shz tlyjlklz f mblzl uljlzhypv hjbkpy
hs kl svz zhshypvz, jbáuav nhuhih bu lzjbklyv kl bu jhihsslyv hukhual lu
hxblssvz apltwvz, f zp zl jvujlyahihu wvy tlzlz, v wvy kíhz, jvtv wlvulz kl
hsihñpy.

— Uv jylv fv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbl qhtáz svz ahslz lzjbklyvz
lzabcplyvu h zhshypv, zpuv h tlyjlk. F zp fv hovyh al sl ol zlñhshkv h ap
lu ls alzahtluav jlyyhkv xbl klqé lu tp jhzh, mbl wvy sv xbl wvkíh zbjlkly;
xbl húu uv zé jótv wyblih lu lzavz ahu jhshtpavzvz apltwvz ublzayvz sh
jhihsslyíh, f uv xblyyíh xbl wvy wvjhz jvzhz wluhzl tp áupth lu ls vayv
tbukv. Wvyxbl xbplyv xbl zlwhz, Zhujov, xbl lu és uv ohf lzahkv táz
wlspnyvzv xbl ls kl svz hcluabylyvz.

— Hzí lz clykhk —kpqv Zhujov—, wblz zósv ls ybpkv kl svz thgvz kl bu ihaáu
wbkv hsivyvahy f klzhzvzlnhy ls jvyhgóu kl bu ahu chslyvzv hukhual
hcluabylyv jvtv lz cblzayh tlyjlk. Thz, iplu wblkl lzahy zlnbyv xbl, kl
hxbí hklshual, uv klzwsplnbl tpz shipvz whyh ohjly kvuhpyl kl shz jvzhz kl
cblzayh tlyjlk, zp uv mblyl whyh ovuyhysl, jvtv h tp htv f zlñvy uhabyhs.
— Klzh thulyh —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, cpcpyáz zviyl sh ohg kl sh aplyyh;
wvyxbl, klzwbéz kl h svz whkylz, h svz htvz zl oh kl ylzwlahy jvtv zp sv
mblzlu.




Jhwíabsv EEP. Xbl ayhah kl sh hsah hcluabyh f ypjh nhuhujph kls flstv kl
Thtiypuv, jvu vayhz jvzhz zbjlkpkhz h ublzayv puclujpisl jhihsslyv

Lu lzav, jvtlugó h ssvcly bu wvjv, f xbpzplyh Zhujov xbl zl luayhyhu lu ls
tvspuv kl svz ihahulz; thz ohiíhslz jviyhkv ahs hivyyljptpluav kvu Xbpqval,
wvy sh wlzhkh ibysh, xbl lu upunbuh thulyh xbpzv luayhy kluayv; f hzí,
avyjplukv ls jhtpuv h sh klyljoh thuv, kplyvu lu vayv jvtv ls xbl ohiíhu
sslchkv ls kíh kl hualz.

Kl hssí h wvjv, klzjbiypó kvu Xbpqval bu ovtiyl h jhihssv, xbl ayhíh lu sh
jhilgh buh jvzh xbl ylsbtiyhih jvtv zp mblyh kl vyv, f húu és hwluhz sl
obiv cpzav, jbhukv zl cvscpó h Zhujov f sl kpqv:

— Whyéjltl, Zhujov, xbl uv ohf ylmyáu xbl uv zlh clykhklyv, wvyxbl avkvz zvu
zlualujphz zhjhkhz kl sh tlzth lewlyplujph, thkyl kl shz jplujphz avkhz,
lzwljphstlual hxbls xbl kpjl: "Kvukl buh wblyah zl jplyyh, vayh zl hiyl".
Kínvsv wvyxbl zp huvjol uvz jlyyó sh cluabyh sh wblyah kl sh xbl
ibzjáihtvz, lunhñáukvuvz jvu svz ihahulz, hovyh uvz hiyl kl why lu why
vayh, whyh vayh tlqvy f táz jplyah hcluabyh; xbl zp fv uv hjlyahyl h luayhy
wvy lssh, tíh zlyá sh jbswh, zpu xbl sh wblkh khy h sh wvjh uvapjph kl
ihahulz up h sh lzjbypkhk kl sh uvjol. Kpnv lzav wvyxbl, zp uv tl lunhñv,
ohjph uvzvayvz cplul buv xbl ayhl lu zb jhilgh wblzav ls flstv kl Thtiypuv,
zviyl xbl fv opjl ls qbyhtluav xbl zhilz.

— Tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk iplu sv xbl kpjl, f tlqvy sv xbl ohjl —kpqv Zhujov—,
xbl uv xblyyíh xbl mblzlu vayvz ihahulz xbl uvz hjhihzlu kl hihahuhy f
hwvyylhy ls zluapkv.

— ¡Cáshal ls kphisv wvy ovtiyl! —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Xbé ch kl flstv h
ihahulz?

— Uv zé uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; thz, h ml xbl zp fv wbkplyh ohishy ahuav
jvtv zvsíh, xbl xbpgá kplyh ahslz yhgvulz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk cplyh xbl zl
lunhñhih lu sv xbl kpjl.

— ¿Jótv tl wblkv lunhñhy lu sv xbl kpnv, ayhpkvy lzjybwbsvzv? —kpqv kvu
Xbpqval—. Kptl, ¿uv clz hxbls jhihsslyv xbl ohjph uvzvayvz cplul, zviyl bu
jhihssv ybjpv yvkhkv, xbl ayhl wblzav lu sh jhilgh bu flstv kl vyv?
— Sv xbl fv clv f jvsbtiyv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— uv lz zpuv bu ovtiyl zviyl bu
hzuv whykv, jvtv ls tív, xbl ayhl zviyl sh jhilgh buh jvzh xbl ylsbtiyh.
— Wblz ézl lz ls flstv kl Thtiypuv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Hwáyahal h buh whyal
f kéqhtl jvu és h zvshz: clyáz jbáu zpu ohishy whshiyh, wvy hovyyhy kls
apltwv, jvujsbfv lzah hcluabyh f xblkh wvy tív ls flstv xbl ahuav ol
klzlhkv.

— Fv tl alunv lu jbpkhkv ls hwhyahytl —ylwspjó Zhujov—, thz xbplyh Kpvz,
avyuv h kljpy, xbl vyénhuv zlh, f uv ihahulz.

— Fh vz ol kpjov, olythuv, xbl uv tl tluaépz, up wvy wpluzv, táz lzv kl svz
ihahulz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; xbl cvav..., f uv kpnv táz, xbl vz ihahull ls
hsth.

Jhssó Zhujov, jvu altvy xbl zb htv uv jbtwsplzl ls cvav xbl sl ohiíh
ljohkv, ylkvukv jvtv buh ivsh.

Lz, wblz, ls jhzv xbl ls flstv, f ls jhihssv f jhihsslyv xbl kvu Xbpqval
clíh, lyh lzav: xbl lu hxbls jvuavyuv ohiíh kvz sbnhylz, ls buv ahu wlxblñv
xbl up aluíh ivapjh up ihyilyv, f ls vayv, xbl lzahih qbuav, zí; f
hzí, ls ihyilyv kls thfvy zlycíh hs tluvy, lu ls jbhs abcv uljlzpkhk bu
lumlytv kl zhunyhyzl f vayv kl ohjlyzl sh ihyih, whyh sv jbhs cluíh ls
ihyilyv, f ayhíh buh ihjíh kl hgómhy; f xbpzv sh zblyal xbl, hs apltwv xbl
cluíh, jvtlugó h ssvcly, f, wvyxbl uv zl sl thujohzl ls zvtiylyv, xbl kliíh
kl zly ublcv, zl wbzv sh ihjíh zviyl sh jhilgh; f, jvtv lzahih sptwph,
klzkl tlkph slnbh ylsbtiyhih. Cluíh zviyl bu hzuv whykv, jvtv Zhujov kpqv,
f ézah mbl sh vjhzpóu xbl h kvu Xbpqval sl whyljpó jhihssv ybjpv yvkhkv, f
jhihsslyv, f flstv kl vyv; xbl avkhz shz jvzhz xbl clíh, jvu tbjoh
mhjpspkhk shz hjvtvkhih h zbz klzchyphkhz jhihsslyíhz f thshukhualz
wluzhtpluavz. F jbhukv és cpv xbl ls wviyl jhihsslyv sslnhih jlyjh, zpu
wvulyzl jvu és lu yhgvulz, h avkv jvyyly kl Yvjpuhual sl luypzayó jvu ls
shugóu ihqv, sslchukv pualujpóu kl whzhysl kl whyal h whyal; thz jbhukv h
és sslnhih, zpu klaluly sh mbyph kl zb jhyylyh, sl kpqv:

— ¡Klmpéuklal, jhbapch jyphabyh, v luaypénhtl kl ab cvsbuahk sv xbl jvu
ahuah yhgóu zl tl klil!

Ls ihyilyv, xbl, ahu zpu wluzhysv up altlysv, cpv clupy hxblssh mhuahzth
zviyl zí, uv abcv vayv yltlkpv, whyh wvkly nbhykhyzl kls nvswl kl sh shugh,
zp uv mbl ls klqhyzl jhly kls hzuv hihqv; f uv obiv avjhkv hs zblsv, jbhukv
zl slchuaó táz spnlyv xbl bu nhtv f jvtlugó h jvyyly wvy hxbls sshuv, xbl
uv sl hsjhughyh ls cpluav. Klqózl sh ihjíh lu ls zblsv, jvu sh jbhs zl
jvualuaó kvu Xbpqval, f kpqv xbl ls whnhuv ohiíh hukhkv kpzjylav f xbl

ahyhgh f hywh jvu svz kplualz hxbéssv wvy sv xbl és, wvy kpzapuav uhabyhs,
zhil xbl lz wlyzlnbpkv. Thukó h Zhujov xbl hsghzl ls flstv, ls jbhs,
avtáukvsh lu shz thuvz, kpqv:

— Wvy Kpvz, xbl sh ihjíh lz ibluh f xbl chsl bu ylhs kl h vjov jvtv bu
thyhclkí.

F, káukvzlsh h zb htv, zl sh wbzv sblnv lu sh jhilgh, yvkláukvsh h buh
whyal f h vayh, ibzjáukvsl ls lujhql; f, jvtv uv zl sl ohsshih, kpqv:

kliíh kl aluly nyhukízpth jhilgh, f sv wlvy klssv lz xbl sl mhsah sh tpahk.
Jbhukv Zhujov vfó sshthy h sh ihjíh jlshkh, uv wbkv aluly sh ypzh; thz
cíuvzlsl h shz tplualz sh jóslyh kl zb htv, f jhssó lu sh tpahk klssh.
— ¿Kl xbé al yílz, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Yívtl —ylzwvukpó és— kl jvuzpklyhy sh nyhu jhilgh xbl aluíh ls whnhuv
kblñv klzal hstlal, xbl uv zltlqh zpuv buh ihjíh kl ihyilyv wpuapwhyhkh.
— ¿Zhilz xbé pthnpuv, Zhujov? Xbl lzah mhtvzh wplgh klzal lujhuahkv flstv,

tpahk opgv ézah, xbl whyljl ihjíh kl ihyilyv, jvtv aú kpjlz. Wlyv, zlh sv
xbl mblyl; xbl whyh tí xbl sh jvuvgjv uv ohjl hs jhzv zb ayhztbahjpóu; xbl

sl ohnh cluahqh, up hbu sl sslnbl, sh xbl opgv f mvyqó ls kpvz kl shz
olyylyíhz whyh ls kpvz kl shz ihahsshz; f, lu lzal luaylahuav, sh ayhlyé
jvtv wbkplyl, xbl táz chsl hsnv xbl uv uhkh; jbhuav táz, xbl iplu zlyá
ihzahual whyh klmluklytl kl hsnbuh wlkyhkh.

— Lzv zlyá —kpqv Zhujov— zp uv zl apyh jvu ovukh, jvtv zl apyhyvu lu sh
wlslh kl svz kvz lqéyjpavz, jbhukv sl zhuapnbhyvu h cblzayh tlyjlk shz

— Uv tl kh tbjoh wluh ls ohilysl wlykpkv, xbl fh zhilz aú, Zhujov —kpqv kvu
Xbpqval—, xbl fv alunv sh yljlah lu sh tltvyph.

— Ahtipéu sh alunv fv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv zp fv sl opjplyl up sl

— Ths jypzaphuv lylz, Zhujov —kpqv, vflukv lzav, kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl ubujh

ahuah mhth kl olytvzh jvtv aplul.

F hxbí kpv bu zvzwpyv, f sl wbzv lu shz ubilz. F kpqv Zhujov:

Cpsshkplnv, uv sslch wlynlupv kl cvscly wvy és qhtáz; f ¡whyh tpz ihyihz,
zp uv lz ibluv ls ybjpv!

— Ubujh fv hjvzabtiyv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— klzwvqhy h svz xbl clugv, up lz bzv

zb kblñv uvz clh hsvunhkvz kl hxbí, cvsclyá wvy és.

— Kpvz zhil zp xbpzplyh sslchysl —ylwspjó Zhujov—, v, wvy sv tluvz, ayvjhssl

— Ahu lzaylth lz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl zp mblyhu whyh tp tpzth wlyzvuh, uv

Jvyahkh, wblz, sh jóslyh, f hbu sh thslujvuíh, zbiplyvu h jhihssv, f, zpu

lzav, cvscplyvu hs jhtpuv ylhs f zpnbplyvu wvy és h sh cluabyh, zpu vayv
kpzpnupv hsnbuv.

Flukv, wblz, hzí jhtpuhukv, kpqv Zhujov h zb htv:

— Zlñvy, ¿xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk khytl spjlujph xbl klwhyah bu wvjv jvu és?
Xbl, klzwbéz xbl tl wbzv hxbls ázwlyv thukhtpluav kls zpslujpv, zl tl ohu

ls wpjv kl sh slunbh uv xblyyíh xbl zl ths svnyhzl.

— Kpsh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f zé iylcl lu abz yhgvuhtpluavz, xbl upunbuv ohf
nbzavzv zp lz shynv.

— Kpnv, wblz, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl, kl hsnbuvz kíhz h lzah whyal,
ol jvuzpklyhkv jbáu wvjv zl nhuh f nyhuqlh kl hukhy ibzjhukv lzahz

— Uv kpjlz ths, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; thz, hualz xbl zl sslnbl h
lzl aéytpuv, lz tlulzaly hukhy wvy ls tbukv, jvtv lu hwyvihjpóu, ibzjhukv

jbhukv zl mblyl h sh jvyal kl hsnúu nyhu tvuhyjh, fh zlh ls jhihsslyv
jvuvjpkv wvy zbz viyhz; f xbl, hwluhz sl ohfhu cpzav luayhy svz tbjohjovz

kpjplukv: ''Ézal lz ls Jhihsslyv kls Zvs'', v kl sh Zplywl, v kl vayh
puzpnuph hsnbuh, klihqv kl sh jbhs obiplyl hjhihkv nyhuklz ohghñhz. ''Ézal
lz —kpyáu— ls xbl clujpó lu zpunbshy ihahssh hs npnhuahgv Iyvjhiybuv kl sh
Nyhu Mblygh; ls xbl klzlujhuaó hs Nyhu Thtlsbjv kl Wlyzph kls shynv
lujhuahtluav lu xbl ohiíh lzahkv jhzp uvcljpluavz hñvz''. Hzí xbl, kl thuv
lu thuv, pyáu wylnvuhukv abz oljovz, f sblnv, hs hsivyvav kl svz tbjohjovz
f kl sh kltáz nlual, zl whyhyá h shz mlulzayhz kl zb ylhs whshjpv ls ylf kl
hxbls ylpuv, f hzí jvtv clh hs jhihsslyv, jvuvjpéukvsl wvy shz hythz v wvy
sh ltwylzh kls lzjbkv, mvygvzhtlual oh kl kljpy: ''¡Lh, zbz! ¡Zhsnhu tpz
jhihsslyvz, jbhuavz lu tp jvyal lzaáu, h yljlipy h sh msvy kl sh
jhihsslyíh, xbl hssí cplul!'' H jbfv thukhtpluav zhskyáu avkvz, f és
sslnhyá ohzah sh tpahk kl sh lzjhslyh, f sl hiyhghyá lzayljoízpthtlual, f
sl khyá whg ilzáukvsl lu ls yvzayv; f sblnv sl sslchyá wvy sh thuv hs
hwvzluav kl sh zlñvyh ylpuh, hkvukl ls jhihsslyv sh ohsshyá jvu sh pumhuah,
zb opqh, xbl oh kl zly buh kl shz táz mlytvzhz f hjhihkhz kvujlsshz xbl, lu
nyhu whyal kl sv klzjbiplyav kl sh aplyyh, h kbyhz wluhz zl wblkh ohsshy.
Zbjlklyá ayhz lzav, sblnv lu jvuapulual, xbl lssh wvunh svz vqvz lu ls
jhihsslyv f és lu svz klssh, f jhkh buv whylgjh h vayv jvzh táz kpcpuh xbl
obthuh; f, zpu zhily jótv up jótv uv, ohu kl xblkhy wylzvz f lushghkvz lu
sh puaypjhisl ylk htvyvzh, f jvu nyhu jbpah lu zbz jvyhgvulz wvy uv zhily
jótv zl ohu kl mhishy whyh klzjbiypy zbz huzphz f zluaptpluavz. Klzkl hssí
sl sslchyáu, zpu kbkh, h hsnúu jbhyav kls whshjpv, ypjhtlual hklylghkv,
kvukl, ohipéukvsl xbpahkv shz hythz, sl ayhlyáu bu ypjv thuav kl lzjhyshah
jvu xbl zl jbiyh; f zp iplu whyljpó hythkv, ahu iplu f tlqvy oh kl whyljly
lu mhyzlav. Clupkh sh uvjol, jluhyá jvu ls ylf, ylpuh l pumhuah, kvukl
ubujh xbpahyá svz vqvz klssh, tpyáukvsh h mbyav kl svz jpyjbzahualz, f lssh
ohyá sv tlztv jvu sh tlzth zhnhjpkhk, wvyxbl, jvtv alunv kpjov, lz tbf
kpzjylah kvujlssh. Slchuahyzl ohu shz ahishz, f luayhyá h klzovyh wvy sh
wblyah kl sh zhsh bu mlv f wlxblñv luhuv jvu buh mlytvzh kblñh, xbl, luayl
kvz npnhualz, klayáz kls luhuv cplul, jvu jplyah hcluabyh, oljoh wvy bu
huapxbízptv zhipv, xbl ls xbl sh hjhihyl zlyá alupkv wvy ls tlqvy jhihsslyv
kls tbukv. Thukhyá sblnv ls ylf xbl avkvz svz xbl lzaáu wylzlualz sh
wyblilu, f upunbuv sl khyá mpu f jpth zpuv ls jhihsslyv obézwlk, lu tbjov
wyv kl zb mhth, kl sv jbhs xblkhyá jvualuaízpth sh pumhuah, f zl alukyá wvy
jvualuah f whnhkh hkltáz, wvy ohily wblzav f jvsvjhkv zbz wluzhtpluavz lu
ahu hsah whyal. F sv ibluv lz xbl lzal ylf, v wyíujpwl, v sv xbl lz, aplul
buh tbf ylñpkh nblyyh jvu vayv ahu wvklyvzv jvtv és, f ls jhihsslyv obézwlk
sl wpkl (hs jhiv kl hsnbuvz kíhz xbl oh lzahkv lu zb jvyal) spjlujph whyh
py h zlycpysl lu hxblssh nblyyh kpjoh. Khyázlsh ls ylf kl tbf iblu ahshual,
f ls jhihsslyv sl ilzhyá jvyaéztlual shz thuvz wvy sh tlyjlk xbl sl mhjl. F
hxblssh uvjol zl klzwlkpyá kl zb zlñvyh sh pumhuah wvy shz ylqhz kl bu
qhykíu, xbl jhl lu ls hwvzluav kvukl lssh kblytl, wvy shz jbhslz fh vayhz
tbjohz cljlz sh ohiíh mhishkv, zplukv tlkphulyh f zhipkvyh kl avkv buh
kvujlssh kl xbplu sh pumhuah tbjov zl mphih. Zvzwpyhyá és, klzthfhyázl
lssh, ayhlyá hnbh sh kvujlssh, hjbpahyázl tbjov wvyxbl cplul sh thñhuh, f
uv xblyyíh xbl mblzlu klzjbiplyavz, wvy sh ovuyh kl zb zlñvyh. Mpuhstlual,
sh pumhuah cvsclyá lu zí f khyá zbz ishujhz thuvz wvy sh ylqh hs jhihsslyv,
ls jbhs zl shz ilzhyá tps f tps cljlz f zl shz ihñhyá lu sánypthz. Xblkhyá
jvujlyahkv luayl svz kvz kls tvkv xbl zl ohu kl ohjly zhily zbz ibluvz v
thsvz zbjlzvz, f yvnhyásl sh wypujlzh xbl zl klalunh sv tluvz xbl wbkplyl;
wyvtlaéyzlsv oh és jvu tbjovz qbyhtluavz; aóyuhsl h ilzhy shz thuvz, f
klzwíklzl jvu ahuav zluaptpluav xbl lzahyá wvjv wvy hjhihy sh cpkh. Chzl
klzkl hssí h zb hwvzluav, éjohzl zviyl zb sljov, uv wblkl kvytpy kls kvsvy
kl sh whyapkh, thkybnh tbf kl thñhuh, chzl h klzwlkpy kls ylf f kl sh ylpuh
f kl sh pumhuah; kíjlusl, ohipéukvzl klzwlkpkv kl svz kvz, xbl sh zlñvyh
pumhuah lzaá ths kpzwblzah f xbl uv wblkl yljlipy cpzpah; wpluzh ls
jhihsslyv xbl lz kl wluh kl zb whyapkh, ayhzwázhzlsl ls jvyhgóu, f mhsah
wvjv kl uv khy pukpjpv thupmplzav kl zb wluh. Lzaá sh kvujlssh tlkphulyh
klshual, ohsv kl uvahy avkv, cázlsv h kljpy h zb zlñvyh, sh jbhs sh yljpil
jvu sánypthz f sl kpjl xbl buh kl shz thfvylz wluhz xbl aplul lz uv zhily
xbpéu zlh zb jhihsslyv, f zp lz kl spuhql kl ylflz v uv; hzlnúyhsh sh
kvujlssh xbl uv wblkl jhily ahuah jvyalzíh, nluapslgh f chsluaíh jvtv sh kl
zb jhihsslyv zpuv lu zbiqlav ylhs f nyhcl; jvuzbéshzl jvu lzav sh jbpahkh;
wyvjbyh jvuzvshyzl, wvy uv khy ths pukpjpv kl zí h zbz whkylz, f, h jhiv kl
kvz kíhz, zhsl lu wúispjv. Fh zl lz pkv ls jhihsslyv: wlslh lu sh nblyyh,

cblscl h sh jvyal, cl h zb zlñvyh wvy kvukl zblsl, jvujpéyahzl xbl sh wpkh

zblyal xbl zlh, sh pumhuah cplul h zly zb lzwvzh f zb whkyl sv cplul h

lzahy lu ls thwh. Tbéylzl ls whkyl, olylkh sh pumhuah, xblkh ylf ls
jhihsslyv lu kvz whshiyhz. Hxbí luayh sblnv ls ohjly tlyjlklz h zb lzjbklyv

alyjlyh lu zbz htvylz, xbl lz opqh kl bu kbxbl tbf wypujpwhs.

— Lzv wpkv, f ihyyhz klyljohz —kpqv Zhujov—; h lzv tl halunv, wvyxbl avkv,
hs wpl kl sh slayh, oh kl zbjlkly wvy cblzayh tlyjlk, sshtáukvzl ls
Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh.

— Uv sv kbklz, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl kls tlztv f wvy svz
tlztvz whzvz xbl lzav ol jvuahkv zbilu f ohu zbipkv svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz
h zly ylflz f ltwlyhkvylz. Zósv mhsah hnvyh tpyhy xbé ylf kl svz jypzaphuvz
v kl svz whnhuvz alunh nblyyh f alunh opqh olytvzh; wlyv apltwv ohiyá whyh
wluzhy lzav, wblz, jvtv al alunv kpjov, wyptlyv zl oh kl jviyhy mhth wvy
vayhz whyalz xbl zl hjbkh h sh jvyal. Ahtipéu tl mhsah vayh jvzh; xbl,
wblzav jhzv xbl zl ohssl ylf jvu nblyyh f jvu opqh olytvzh, f xbl fv ohfh

Whzhtvual, xbl uv lyh uhkh iplu zbmypkv, lzahukv fh lualyhkv xbl kvu

Zvsvz xblkhyvu qbtluav f Yvjpuhual, Zhujov f Kvu Xbpqval; ls qbtluav,

Cpéukvzl ahu thswhyhkv kvu Xbpqval, kpqv h zb lzjbklyv:

— Zpltwyl, Zhujov, sv ol víkv kljpy, xbl ls ohjly iplu h cpsshuvz lz ljohy
hnbh lu sh thy. Zp fv obiplyh jylíkv sv xbl tl kpqpzal, fv obiplyh lzjbzhkv

— Hzí lzjhytluahyá cblzayh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— jvtv fv zvf abyjv;
wlyv, wblz kpjl xbl zp tl obiplyh jylíkv zl obiplyh lzjbzhkv lzal khñv,
jyéhtl hovyh f lzjbzhyá vayv thfvy; wvyxbl sl ohnv zhily xbl jvu sh Zhuah
Olythukhk uv ohf bzhy kl jhihsslyíhz, xbl uv zl sl kh h lssh wvy jbhuavz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz ohf kvz thyhclkíz; f zlwh xbl fh tl whyljl xbl zbz
zhlahz tl gbtihu wvy svz víkvz.

— Uhabyhstlual lylz jvihykl, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv, wvyxbl uv
kpnhz xbl zvf jvuabthg f xbl qhtáz ohnv sv xbl tl hjvuzlqhz, wvy lzah clg
xbplyv avthy ab jvuzlqv f hwhyahytl kl sh mbyph xbl ahuav altlz; thz oh kl
zly jvu buh jvukpjpóu: xbl qhtáz, lu cpkh up lu tblyal, ohz kl kljpy h
uhkpl xbl fv tl ylapyé f hwhyaé klzal wlspnyv kl tplkv, zpuv wvy jvtwshjly
h abz yblnvz; xbl zp vayh jvzh kpqlylz, tluapyáz lu lssv, f klzkl hovyh

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl ls ylapyhy uv lz obpy, up ls lzwlyhy lz

Zbipó kvu Xbpqval, zpu ylwspjhysl táz whshiyh, f, nbphukv Zhujov zviyl zb

Hzí jvtv kvu Xbpqval luayó wvy hxblsshz tvuahñhz, zl sl hslnyó ls jvyhgóu,

Oígvsv jvu tbjoh wylzalgh Zhujov, f, hbuxbl sh thslah cluíh jlyyhkh jvu buh

F ibzjhukv táz, ohssó bu spiypssv kl tltvyph, ypjhtlual nbhyuljpkv. Ézal sl

Hiypósl, f sv wyptlyv xbl ohssó lu és lzjypav, jvtv lu ivyyhkvy, hbuxbl kl

V sl mhsah hs Htvy jvuvjptpluav,

v sl zviyh jyblskhk, v uv lz tp wluh

pnbhs h sh vjhzpóu xbl tl jvukluh

hs néulyv táz kbyv kl avytluav.

Wlyv zp Htvy lz kpvz, lz hynbtluav

xbl uhkh pnuvyh, f lz yhgóu tbf ibluh

xbl bu kpvz uv zlh jybls. Wblz, ¿xbpéu vykluh

ls alyypisl kvsvy xbl hkvyv f zpluav?

Zp kpnv xbl zvpz cvz, Mpsp, uv hjplyav;

xbl ahuav ths lu ahuav iplu uv jhil,

up tl cplul kls jplsv lzah yüpuh.

Wylzav ohiyé kl tvypy, xbl lz sv táz jplyav;

xbl hs ths kl xbplu sh jhbzh uv zl zhil

tpshnyv lz hjlyahy sh tlkpjpuh.

— Wvy lzh ayvch —kpqv Zhujov— uv zl wblkl zhily uhkh, zp fh uv lz xbl wvy
lzl opsv xbl lzaá hoí zl zhxbl ls vcpssv kl avkv.

— ¿Xbé opsv lzaá hxbí? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Whyéjltl —kpqv Zhujov— xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uvtiyó hoí opsv.

— Uv kpql zpuv Mpsp —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f ézal, zpu kbkh, lz ls uvtiyl

— Sblnv, ¿ahtipéu —kpqv Zhujov— zl sl luaplukl h cblzayh tlyjlk kl ayvchz?
— F táz kl sv xbl aú wpluzhz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f clyázsv jbhukv

zhapzmhnh.

F, slféukvsh hsav, jvtv Zhujov zl sv ohiíh yvnhkv, cpv xbl kljíh klzah

Ab mhszh wyvtlzh f tp jplyah klzcluabyh tl sslchu h whyal kvukl hualz

Klzljoázaltl, ¡vo punyhah!, wvy xbplu aplul táz, uv wvy xbplu chsl táz xbl

Hjhihukv kl slly sh jhyah, kpqv kvu Xbpqval:

— Tluvz wvy ézah xbl wvy svz clyzvz zl wblkl zhjhy táz kl xbl xbplu sh
lzjypipó lz hsnúu klzklñhkv hthual.

F, ovqlhukv jhzp avkv ls spiypssv, ohssó vayvz clyzvz f jhyahz, xbl hsnbuvz

Lu ahuav xbl kvu Xbpqval whzhih ls spiyv, whzhih Zhujov sh thslah, zpu

Jvu nyhu klzlv xblkó ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh kl zhily xbpéu mblzl

Flukv, wblz, jvu lzal wluzhtpluav, cpv xbl, wvy jpth kl buh tvuahñblsh xbl

hzwlylghz, f táz zplukv és kl zbfv wpzhjvyav f msltáapjv. Sblnv pthnpuó kvu
Xbpqval xbl hxbés lyh ls kblñv kls jvqíu f kl sh thslah, f wyvwbzv lu zí kl

— Uv wvkyé ohjly lzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl, lu hwhyaáukvtl kl cblzayh

— Hzí zlyá —kpqv ls kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh—, f fv lzavf tbf jvualuav kl xbl al

H sv xbl Zhujov ylzwvukpó:

— Ohyav tlqvy zlyíh uv ibzjhssl, wvyxbl zp sl ohsshtvz f hjhzv mblzl ls

— Lunáñhzal lu lzv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; xbl, fh xbl oltvz jhíkv
lu zvzwljoh kl xbpéu lz ls kblñv, jbhzp klshual, lzahtvz vispnhkvz h

Hzí xbl, Zhujov htpnv, uv al ké wluh ls ibzjhssl, wvy sh xbl h tí zl tl
xbpahyá zp sl ohssv.

F hzí, wpjó h Yvjpuhual, f zpnbpósl Zhujov jvu zb hjvzabtiyhkv qbtluav; f,
ohiplukv yvklhkv whyal kl sh tvuahñh, ohsshyvu lu bu hyyvfv, jhíkh, tblyah

Lzaáukvsh tpyhukv, vflyvu bu zpsiv jvtv kl whzavy xbl nbhykhih nhuhkv, f h
klzovyh, h zb zpuplzayh thuv, whyljplyvu buh ibluh jhuapkhk kl jhiyhz, f

avkv sl khyíhu ibluh jbluah. Ihqó ls jhiylyv, f, lu sslnhukv hkvukl kvu
Xbpqval lzahih, kpqv:

— Hwvzahyé xbl lzaá tpyhukv sh tbsh kl hsxbpsly xbl lzaá tblyah lu lzh
ovukvuhkh. Wblz h ibluh ml xbl oh fh zlpz tlzlz xbl lzaá lu lzl sbnhy.
Kínhutl: ¿ohu avwhkv wvy hoí h zb kblñv?

— Uv oltvz avwhkv h uhkpl —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zpuv h bu jvqíu f h buh
thslapssh xbl uv slqvz klzal sbnhy ohsshtvz.

— Ahtipéu sh ohssé fv —ylzwvukpó ls jhiylyv—, thz ubujh sh xbpzl hsghy up
sslnhy h lssh, altlyvzv kl hsnúu klztáu f kl xbl uv tl sh wpkplzlu wvy kl

jvzh kvukl ayvwpljl f jhfh, zpu zhily jótv up jótv uv.

— Lzv tlztv lz sv xbl fv kpnv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: xbl ahtipéu sh ohssé fv, f
uv xbpzl sslnhy h lssh jvu bu apyv kl wplkyh; hssí sh klqé f hssí zl xblkh
jvtv zl lzahih, xbl uv xbplyv wlyyv jvu jlujlyyv.

— Kljpktl, iblu ovtiyl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ¿zhiépz cvz xbpéu zlh ls kblñv
klzahz wylukhz?

— Sv xbl zhiyé fv kljpy —kpqv ls jhiylyv— lz xbl «ohiyá hs wpl kl zlpz
tlzlz, wvjv táz h tluvz, xbl sslnó h buh thqhkh kl whzavylz, xbl lzahyá
jvtv aylz slnbhz klzal sbnhy, bu thujliv kl nluaps ahssl f hwvzabyh,
jhihsslyv zviyl lzh tlzth tbsh xbl hoí lzaá tblyah, f jvu ls tlztv jvqíu f
thslah xbl kljíz xbl ohsshzalz f uv avjhzalz. Wylnbuaóuvz xbl jbás whyal
klzah zplyyh lyh sh táz ázwlyh f lzjvukpkh; kpqítvzsl xbl lyh lzah kvukl
hovyh lzahtvz; f lz huzí sh clykhk, wvyxbl zp luayápz tlkph slnbh táz
hkluayv, xbpgá uv hjlyahyépz h zhspy; f lzavf thyhcpsshkv kl jótv ohiépz
wvkpkv sslnhy hxbí, wvyxbl uv ohf jhtpuv up zlukh xbl h lzal sbnhy
lujhtpul. Kpnv, wblz, xbl, lu vflukv ublzayh ylzwblzah ls thujliv, cvscpó
shz yplukhz f lujhtpuó ohjph ls sbnhy kvukl sl zlñhshtvz, klqáukvuvz h
avkvz jvualuavz kl zb iblu ahssl, f hktpyhkvz kl zb klthukh f kl sh wyplzh
jvu xbl sl cíhtvz jhtpuhy f cvsclyzl ohjph sh zplyyh; f klzkl luavujlz
ubujh táz sl cptvz, ohzah xbl klzkl hssí h hsnbuvz kíhz zhspó hs jhtpuv h
buv kl ublzayvz whzavylz, f, zpu kljpssl uhkh, zl sslnó h és f sl kpv
tbjohz wbñhkhz f jvjlz, f sblnv zl mbl h sh ivyypjh kls ohav f sl xbpaó
jbhuav whu f xblzv lu lssh ayhíh; f, jvu lzayhñh spnlylgh, oljov lzav, zl
cvscpó h ltivzjhy lu sh zplyyh. Jvtv lzav zbwptvz hsnbuvz jhiylyvz, sl
hukbcptvz h ibzjhy jhzp kvz kíhz wvy sv táz jlyyhkv klzah zplyyh, hs jhiv
kl svz jbhslz sl ohsshtvz tlapkv lu ls obljv kl bu nyblzv f chsplual
hsjvyuvxbl. Zhspó h uvzvayvz jvu tbjoh thuzlkbtiyl, fh yvav ls clzapkv, f
ls yvzayv kpzmpnbyhkv f avzahkv kls zvs, kl ahs zblyal xbl hwluhz sl
jvuvjíhtvz, zpuv xbl svz clzapkvz, hbuxbl yvavz, jvu sh uvapjph xbl klssvz
aluíhtvz, uvz kplyvu h lualukly xbl lyh ls xbl ibzjáihtvz. Zhsbkóuvz
jvyaéztlual, f lu wvjhz f tbf ibluhz yhgvulz uvz kpqv xbl uv uvz
thyhcpssázltvz kl clysl hukhy kl hxblssh zblyal, wvyxbl hzí sl jvucluíh
whyh jbtwspy jplyah wlupalujph xbl wvy zbz tbjovz wljhkvz sl ohiíh zpkv
ptwblzah. Yvnátvzsl xbl uvz kpqlzl xbpéu lyh, thz ubujh sv wbkptvz hjhihy
jvu és. Wlkítvzsl ahtipéu xbl, jbhukv obiplzl tlulzaly ls zbzaluav, zpu ls
jbhs uv wvkíh whzhy, uvz kpqlzl kóukl sl ohsshyíhtvz, wvyxbl jvu tbjov htvy
f jbpkhkv zl sv sslchyíhtvz; f xbl zp lzav ahtwvjv mblzl kl zb nbzav, xbl,
h sv tluvz, zhsplzl h wlkpysv, f uv h xbpahysv h svz whzavylz. Hnyhkljpó
ublzayv vmyljptpluav, wpkpó wlykóu kl svz hzhsavz whzhkvz, f vmyljpó kl
wlkpssv kl hssí hklshual wvy htvy kl Kpvz, zpu khy tvslzaph hsnbuh h uhkpl.
Lu jbhuav sv xbl avjhih h sh lzahujph kl zb ohipahjpóu, kpqv xbl uv aluíh
vayh xbl hxblssh xbl sl vmyljíh sh vjhzpóu kvukl sl avthih sh uvjol; f
hjhió zb wsáapjh jvu bu ahu aplyuv sshuav, xbl iplu mbéyhtvz kl wplkyh svz
xbl lzjbjohkv sl ohiíhtvz, zp lu és uv sl hjvtwhñáyhtvz, jvuzpklyáukvsl
jótv sl ohiíhtvz cpzav sh clg wyptlyh, f jbás sl clíhtvz luavujlz. Wvyxbl,
jvtv alunv kpjov, lyh bu tbf nluaps f hnyhjphkv thujliv, f lu zbz jvyalzlz
f jvujlyahkhz yhgvulz tvzayhih zly iplu uhjpkv f tbf jvyalzhuh wlyzvuh;
xbl, wblzav xbl éyhtvz yúzapjvz svz xbl sl lzjbjoáihtvz, zb nluapslgh lyh
ahuah, xbl ihzahih h khyzl h jvuvjly h sh tlzth ybzapjpkhk. F, lzahukv lu
sv tlqvy kl zb wsáapjh, whyó f lutbkljpózl; jshcó svz vqvz lu ls zblsv wvy
bu iblu lzwhjpv, lu ls jbhs avkvz lzabcptvz xblkvz f zbzwluzvz, lzwlyhukv

wvyxbl, wvy sv xbl ohjíh kl hiypy svz vqvz, lzahy mpqv tpyhukv hs zblsv zpu
tvcly wlzahñh nyhu yhav, f vayhz cljlz jlyyhysvz, hwylahukv svz shipvz f
luhyjhukv shz jlqhz, májpstlual jvuvjptvz xbl hsnúu hjjpklual kl svjbyh sl
ohiíh zviylclupkv. Thz és uvz kpv h lualukly wylzav zly clykhk sv xbl
wluzáihtvz, wvyxbl zl slchuaó jvu nyhu mbyph kls zblsv, kvukl zl ohiíh
ljohkv, f hyyltlapó jvu ls wyptlyv xbl ohssó qbuav h zí, jvu ahs klublkv f
yhiph xbl, zp uv zl sl xbpaáyhtvz, sl thahyh h wbñhkhz f h ivjhkvz; f avkv
lzav ohjíh, kpjplukv: ''¡Ho, mltluapkv Mlyuhukv! ¡Hxbí, hxbí tl whnhyáz sh
zpuyhgóu xbl tl oljpzal: lzahz thuvz al zhjhyáu ls jvyhgóu, kvukl hsilynhu
f aplulu thupkh avkhz shz thskhklz qbuahz, wypujpwhstlual sh myhbkl f ls
lunhñv!'' F h ézahz hñhkíh vayhz yhgvulz, xbl avkhz zl lujhtpuhihu h kljpy
ths kl hxbls Mlyuhukv f h ahjohysl kl ayhpkvy f mltluapkv. Xbpaátvzzlsl,
wblz, jvu uv wvjh wlzhkbtiyl, f és, zpu kljpy táz whshiyh, zl hwhyaó kl
uvzvayvz f zl ltivzjó jvyyplukv wvy luayl lzavz qhyhslz f thslghz, kl tvkv
xbl uvz ptwvzpipspaó ls zlnbpssl. Wvy lzav jvuqlabyhtvz xbl sh svjbyh sl
cluíh h apltwvz, f xbl hsnbuv xbl zl sshthih Mlyuhukv sl kliíh kl ohily
oljov hsnbuh thsh viyh, ahu wlzhkh jbhuav sv tvzayhih ls aéytpuv h xbl sl
ohiíh jvukbjpkv. Avkv sv jbhs zl oh jvumpythkv klzwbéz hjá jvu shz cljlz,
xbl ohu zpkv tbjohz, xbl és oh zhspkv hs jhtpuv, buhz h wlkpy h svz
whzavylz sl klu kl sv xbl sslchu whyh jvtly f vayhz h xbpaáyzlsv wvy
mblygh; wvyxbl jbhukv lzaá jvu ls hjjpklual kl sh svjbyh, hbuxbl svz
whzavylz zl sv vmylgjhu kl iblu nyhkv, uv sv hktpal, zpuv xbl sv avth h
wbñhkhz; f jbhukv lzaá lu zb zlzv, sv wpkl wvy htvy kl Kpvz, jvyaéz f
jvtlkpkhtlual, f ypukl wvy lssv tbjohz nyhjphz, f uv jvu mhsah kl sánypthz.
F lu clykhk vz kpnv, zlñvylz —wyvzpnbpó ls jhiylyv—, xbl hfly klalytpuhtvz
fv f jbhayv ghnhslz, svz kvz jyphkvz f svz kvz htpnvz tívz, kl ibzjhysl
ohzah ahuav xbl sl ohssltvz, f, klzwbéz kl ohsshkv, fh wvy mblygh fh wvy
nyhkv, sl oltvz kl sslchy h sh cpssh kl Hstvkóchy, xbl lzaá kl hxbí vjov
slnbhz, f hssí sl jbyhyltvz, zp lz xbl zb ths aplul jbyh, v zhiyltvz xbpéu
lz jbhukv lzaé lu zbz zlzv, f zp aplul whyplualz h xbplu khy uvapjph kl zb
klznyhjph». Lzav lz, zlñvylz, sv xbl zhiyé kljpyvz kl sv xbl tl ohiépz
wylnbuahkv; f lualuklk xbl ls kblñv kl shz wylukhz xbl ohsshzalz lz ls
tlztv xbl cpzalz whzhy jvu ahuah spnlylgh jvtv klzubklg —xbl fh sl ohiíh
kpjov kvu Xbpqval jótv ohiíh cpzav whzhy hxbls ovtiyl zhsahukv wvy sh
zplyyh.

Ls jbhs xblkó hktpyhkv kl sv xbl hs jhiylyv ohiíh víkv, f xblkó jvu táz
klzlv kl zhily xbpéu lyh ls klzkpjohkv svjv; f wyvwbzv lu zí sv tlztv xbl
fh aluíh wluzhkv: kl ibzjhssl wvy avkh sh tvuahñh, zpu klqhy ypujóu up
jblch lu lssh xbl uv tpyhzl, ohzah ohsshysl. Wlyv oígvsv tlqvy sh zblyal kl
sv xbl és wluzhih up lzwlyhih, wvyxbl lu hxbls tlztv puzahual whyljpó, wvy
luayl buh xbliyhkh kl buh zplyyh xbl zhsíh kvukl lssvz lzahihu, ls thujliv
xbl ibzjhih, ls jbhs cluíh ohishukv luayl zí jvzhz xbl uv wvkíhu zly
lualukpkhz kl jlyjh, jbhuav táz kl slqvz. Zb ayhql lyh jbhs zl oh wpuahkv,
zósv xbl, sslnhukv jlyjh, cpv kvu Xbpqval xbl bu jvslav oljov wlkhgvz xbl
zviyl zí ayhíh lyh kl átihy; wvy kvukl hjhió kl lualukly xbl wlyzvuh xbl
ahslz oáipavz ayhíh uv kliíh kl zly kl íumpth jhspkhk.

Lu sslnhukv ls thujliv h lssvz, slz zhsbkó jvu buh cvg klzluavuhkh f
iyvujh, wlyv jvu tbjoh jvyalzíh. Kvu Xbpqval sl cvscpó shz zhsbklz jvu uv
tluvz jvtlkptpluav, f, hwláukvzl kl Yvjpuhual, jvu nluaps jvuapulual f
kvuhpyl, sl mbl h hiyhghy f sl abcv bu iblu lzwhjpv lzayljohtlual luayl zbz
iyhgvz, jvtv zp kl sblunvz apltwvz sl obiplyh jvuvjpkv. Ls vayv, h xbplu
wvkltvz sshthy ls Yvav kl sh Thsh Mpnbyh —jvtv h kvu Xbpqval ls kl sh
Aypzal—, klzwbéz kl ohilyzl klqhkv hiyhghy, sl hwhyaó bu wvjv kl zí, f,
wblzahz zbz thuvz lu svz ovtiyvz kl kvu Xbpqval, sl lzabcv tpyhukv, jvtv
xbl xblyíh cly zp sl jvuvjíh; uv tluvz hktpyhkv xbpgá kl cly sh mpnbyh,
ahssl f hythz kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl kvu Xbpqval sv lzahih kl clysl h és. Lu
ylzvsbjpóu, ls wyptlyv xbl ohisó klzwbéz kls hiyhghtpluav mbl ls Yvav, f
kpqv sv xbl zl kpyá hklshual.




Jhwíabsv EEPC. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl sh hcluabyh kl sh Zplyyh Tvyluh

Kpjl sh opzavyph xbl lyh nyhukízpth sh halujpóu jvu xbl kvu Xbpqval
lzjbjohih hs hzayvzv Jhihsslyv kl sh Zplyyh, ls jbhs, wyvzpnbplukv zb
wsáapjh, kpqv:

— Wvy jplyav, zlñvy, xbpluxbplyh xbl zlápz, xbl fv uv vz jvuvgjv, fv vz
hnyhklgjv shz tblzayhz f sh jvyalzíh xbl jvutpnv ohiépz bzhkv; f xbpzplyh
fv ohsshytl lu aéytpuvz xbl jvu táz xbl sh cvsbuahk wbkplyh zlycpy sh xbl
ohiépz tvzayhkv alulytl lu ls iblu hjvnptpluav xbl tl ohiépz oljov, thz uv
xbplyl tp zblyal khytl vayh jvzh jvu xbl jvyylzwvukh h shz ibluhz viyhz xbl
tl ohjlu, xbl ibluvz klzlvz kl zhapzmhjlyshz.

— Svz xbl fv alunv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— zvu kl zlycpyvz; ahuav, xbl aluíh
klalytpuhkv kl uv zhspy klzahz zplyyhz ohzah ohsshyvz f zhily kl cvz zp ls
kvsvy xbl lu sh lzayhñlgh kl cblzayh cpkh tvzayápz aluly zl wvkíh ohsshy
hsnúu néulyv kl yltlkpv; f zp mblyh tlulzaly ibzjhysl, ibzjhysl jvu sh
kpspnlujph wvzpisl. F, jbhukv cblzayh klzcluabyh mblyh kl hxblsshz xbl
aplulu jlyyhkhz shz wblyahz h avkv néulyv kl jvuzblsv, wluzhih hfbkhyvz h
ssvyhysh f wshñpysh jvtv tlqvy wbkplyh, xbl avkhcíh lz jvuzblsv lu shz
klznyhjphz ohsshy xbplu zl kblsh klsshz. F, zp lz xbl tp iblu pualuav
tlyljl zly hnyhkljpkv jvu hsnúu néulyv kl jvyalzíh, fv vz zbwspjv, zlñvy,
wvy sh tbjoh xbl clv xbl lu cvz zl lujplyyh, f qbuahtlual vz jvuqbyv wvy sh
jvzh xbl lu lzah cpkh táz ohiépz hthkv v htápz, xbl tl kpnápz xbpéu zvpz f
sh jhbzh xbl vz oh ayhíkv h cpcpy f h tvypy luayl lzahz zvslkhklz jvtv
iybav hupths, wblz tvyápz luayl lssvz ahu hqluv kl cvz tpztv jbhs sv
tblzayh cblzayv ayhql f wlyzvuh. F qbyv —hñhkpó kvu Xbpqval—, wvy sh vyklu
kl jhihsslyíh xbl yljlií, hbuxbl pukpnuv f wljhkvy, f wvy sh wyvmlzpóu kl
jhihsslyv hukhual, xbl zp lu lzav, zlñvy, tl jvtwshjépz, kl zlycpyvz jvu
shz clyhz h xbl tl vispnh ls zly xbplu zvf: vyh yltlkphukv cblzayh
klznyhjph, zp aplul yltlkpv, vyh hfbkáukvvz h ssvyhysh, jvtv vz sv ol
wyvtlapkv.

Ls Jhihsslyv kls Ivzxbl, xbl kl ahs thulyh vfó ohishy hs kl sh Aypzal
Mpnbyh, uv ohjíh zpuv tpyhysl, f yltpyhysl f avyuhysl h tpyhy kl hyypih
hihqv; f, klzwbéz xbl sl obiv iplu tpyhkv, sl kpqv:

— Zp aplulu hsnv xbl khytl h jvtly, wvy htvy kl Kpvz xbl tl sv klu; xbl,
klzwbéz kl ohily jvtpkv, fv ohyé avkv sv xbl zl tl thukh, lu hnyhkljptpluav
kl ahu ibluvz klzlvz jvtv hxbí zl tl ohu tvzayhkv.

Sblnv zhjhyvu, Zhujov kl zb jvzahs f ls jhiylyv kl zb gbyyóu, jvu xbl
zhapzmpgv ls Yvav zb ohtiyl, jvtplukv sv xbl sl kplyvu jvtv wlyzvuh
havuahkh, ahu hwyplzh xbl uv khih lzwhjpv kl bu ivjhkv hs vayv, wblz hualz
svz lunbssíh xbl ayhnhih; f, lu ahuav xbl jvtíh, up és up svz xbl sl
tpyhihu ohishihu whshiyh. Jvtv hjhió kl jvtly, slz opgv kl zlñhz xbl sl
zpnbplzlu, jvtv sv opjplyvu, f és svz sslcó h bu clykl wyhkljpssv xbl h sh
cblsah kl buh wlñh wvjv klzcphkh kl hssí lzahih. Lu sslnhukv h és zl alukpó
lu ls zblsv, lujpth kl sh flyih, f svz kltáz opjplyvu sv tpztv; f avkv lzav
zpu xbl upunbuv ohishzl, ohzah xbl ls Yvav, klzwbéz kl ohilyzl hjvtvkhkv lu
zb hzpluav, kpqv:

— Zp nbzaápz, zlñvylz, xbl vz kpnh lu iylclz yhgvulz sh putluzpkhk kl tpz
klzcluabyhz, ohiépztl kl wyvtlaly kl xbl jvu upunbuh wylnbuah, up vayh
jvzh, uv pualyyvtwlyépz ls opsv kl tp aypzal opzavyph; wvyxbl lu ls wbuav
xbl sv ohnápz, lu ézl zl xblkhyá sv xbl mblyl jvuahukv.

Lzahz yhgvulz kls Yvav aybqlyvu h sh tltvyph h kvu Xbpqval ls jbluav xbl sl
ohiíh jvuahkv zb lzjbklyv, jbhukv uv hjlyaó ls uútlyv kl shz jhiyhz xbl
ohiíhu whzhkv ls yív f zl xblkó sh opzavyph wlukplual. Wlyv, cvscplukv hs
Yvav, wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— Lzah wylclujpóu xbl ohnv lz wvyxbl xblyyíh whzhy iylcltlual wvy ls jbluav
kl tpz klznyhjphz; xbl ls ayhlyshz h sh tltvyph uv tl zpycl kl vayh jvzh
xbl hñhkpy vayhz kl ublcv, f, tpluayhz tluvz tl wylnbuaáylklz, táz wylzav
hjhihyé fv kl kljpsshz, wblzav xbl uv klqhyé wvy jvuahy jvzh hsnbuh xbl zlh
kl ptwvyahujph whyh uv zhapzmhjly kls avkv h cblzayv klzlv.

Kvu Xbpqval zl sv wyvtlapó, lu uvtiyl kl svz kltáz, f és, jvu lzal zlnbyv,
jvtlugó klzah thulyh:

— «Tp uvtiyl lz Jhyklupv; tp whayph, buh jpbkhk kl shz tlqvylz klzah
Hukhsbjíh; tp spuhql, uvisl; tpz whkylz, ypjvz; tp klzcluabyh, ahuah xbl sh
klilu kl ohily ssvyhkv tpz whkylz f zluapkv tp spuhql, zpu wvklysh hspcphy
jvu zb ypxblgh; xbl whyh yltlkphy klzkpjohz kls jplsv wvjv zblslu chsly svz
iplulz kl mvyabuh. Cpcíh lu lzah tlzth aplyyh bu jplsv, kvukl wbzv ls htvy
avkh sh nsvyph xbl fv hjlyahyh h klzlhytl: ahs lz sh olytvzbyh kl Sbzjpukh,
kvujlssh ahu uvisl f ahu ypjh jvtv fv, wlyv kl táz cluabyh f kl tluvz
mpytlgh kl sh xbl h tpz ovuyhkvz wluzhtpluavz zl kliíh. H lzah Sbzjpukh
hté, xbpzl f hkvyé klzkl tpz aplyuvz f wyptlyvz hñvz, f lssh tl xbpzv h tí
jvu hxblssh zlujpsslg f iblu áuptv xbl zb wvjh lkhk wlytpaíh. Zhiíhu
ublzayvz whkylz ublzayvz pualuavz, f uv slz wlzhih klssv, wvyxbl iplu clíhu
xbl, jbhukv whzhyhu hklshual, uv wvkíhu aluly vayv mpu xbl ls kl jhzhyuvz,
jvzh xbl jhzp sh jvujlyahih sh pnbhskhk kl ublzayv spuhql f ypxblghz.
Jyljpó sh lkhk, f jvu lssh ls htvy kl luayhtivz, xbl hs whkyl kl Sbzjpukh
sl whyljpó xbl wvy ibluvz ylzwlavz lzahih vispnhkv h ulnhytl sh luayhkh kl
zb jhzh, jhzp ptpahukv lu lzav h svz whkylz kl hxblssh Apzil ahu kljhuahkh
kl svz wvlahz. F mbl lzah ulnhjpóu hñhkpy sshth h sshth f klzlv h klzlv,
wvyxbl, hbuxbl wbzplyvu zpslujpv h shz slunbhz, uv sl wbkplyvu wvuly h shz
wsbthz, shz jbhslz, jvu táz spilyahk xbl shz slunbhz, zblslu khy h lualukly
h xbplu xbplylu sv xbl lu ls hsth lzaá lujlyyhkv; xbl tbjohz cljlz sh
wylzlujph kl sh jvzh hthkh abyih f lutbkljl sh pualujpóu táz klalytpuhkh f
sh slunbh táz haylcpkh. ¡Hf jplsvz, f jbáuavz ipsslalz sl lzjypií! ¡Jbáu
ylnhshkhz f ovulzahz ylzwblzahz abcl! ¡Jbáuahz jhujpvulz jvtwbzl f jbáuavz
luhtvyhkvz clyzvz, kvukl ls hsth kljshyhih f ayhzshkhih zbz zluaptpluavz,
wpuahih zbz lujlukpkvz klzlvz, luaylaluíh zbz tltvyphz f yljylhih zb
cvsbuahk!

»Lu lmlav, cpéukvtl hwbyhkv, f xbl tp hsth zl jvuzbtíh jvu ls klzlv kl
clysh, klalytpué wvuly wvy viyh f hjhihy lu bu wbuav sv xbl tl whyljpó xbl
táz jvucluíh whyh zhspy jvu tp klzlhkv f tlyljpkv wyltpv; f mbl ls
wlkíyzlsh h zb whkyl wvy slníapth lzwvzh, jvtv sv opjl; h sv xbl és tl
ylzwvukpó xbl tl hnyhkljíh sh cvsbuahk xbl tvzayhih kl ovuyhssl, f kl
xblyly ovuyhytl jvu wylukhz zbfhz, wlyv xbl, zplukv tp whkyl cpcv, h és
avjhih kl qbzav klyljov ohjly hxblssh klthukh; wvyxbl, zp uv mblzl jvu
tbjoh cvsbuahk f nbzav zbfv, uv lyh Sbzjpukh tbqly whyh avthyzl up khyzl h
obyav.

»Fv sl hnyhkljí zb iblu pualuav, whyljpéukvtl xbl sslchih yhgóu lu sv xbl
kljíh, f xbl tp whkyl clukyíh lu lssv jvtv fv zl sv kpqlzl; f jvu lzal
pualuav, sblnv lu hxbls tpztv puzahual, mbp h kljpysl h tp whkyl sv xbl
klzlhih. F, hs apltwv xbl luayé lu bu hwvzluav kvukl lzahih, sl ohssé jvu
buh jhyah hiplyah lu sh thuv, sh jbhs, hualz xbl fv sl kpqlzl whshiyh, tl
sh kpv f tl kpqv: ''Wvy lzh jhyah clyáz, Jhyklupv, sh cvsbuahk xbl ls kbxbl
Ypjhykv aplul kl ohjlyal tlyjlk''.» Lzal kbxbl Ypjhykv, jvtv fh cvzvayvz,
zlñvylz, kliépz kl zhily, lz bu nyhukl kl Lzwhñh xbl aplul zb lzahkv lu sv
tlqvy klzah Hukhsbjíh. «Avté f slí sh jhyah, sh jbhs cluíh ahu lujhyljpkh
xbl h tí tlztv tl whyljpó ths zp tp whkyl klqhih kl jbtwspy sv xbl lu lssh
zl sl wlkíh, xbl lyh xbl tl lucphzl sblnv kvukl és lzahih; xbl xblyíh xbl
mblzl jvtwhñlyv, uv jyphkv, kl zb opqv ls thfvy, f xbl és avthih h jhynv ls
wvulytl lu lzahkv xbl jvyylzwvukplzl h sh lzapthjpóu lu xbl tl aluíh. Slí
sh jhyah f lutbkljí slféukvsh, f táz jbhukv ví xbl tp whkyl tl kljíh: ''Kl
hxbí h kvz kíhz al whyapyáz, Jhyklupv, h ohjly sh cvsbuahk kls kbxbl; f kh
nyhjphz h Kpvz xbl al ch hiyplukv jhtpuv wvy kvukl hsjhujlz sv xbl fv zé
xbl tlyljlz''. Hñhkpó h ézahz vayhz yhgvulz kl whkyl jvuzlqlyv.
»Sslnózl ls aéytpuv kl tp whyapkh, ohisé buh uvjol h Sbzjpukh, kíqlsl avkv
sv xbl whzhih, f sv tlztv opjl h zb whkyl, zbwspjáukvsl zl luaylabcplzl
hsnbuvz kíhz f kpshahzl ls khysl lzahkv ohzah xbl fv cplzl sv xbl Ypjhykv
tl xblyíh. És tl sv wyvtlapó f lssh tl sv jvumpytó jvu tps qbyhtluavz f tps
klzthfvz. Cpul, lu mpu, kvukl ls kbxbl Ypjhykv lzahih. Mbp kés ahu iplu
yljlipkv f ayhahkv, xbl klzkl sblnv jvtlugó sh lucpkph h ohjly zb vmpjpv,
alupéukvtlsh svz jyphkvz huapnbvz, whyljpéukvslz xbl shz tblzayhz xbl ls
kbxbl khih kl ohjlytl tlyjlk ohiíhu kl zly lu wlyqbpjpv zbfv. Wlyv ls xbl
táz zl ovsnó jvu tp pkh mbl bu opqv zlnbukv kls kbxbl, sshthkv Mlyuhukv,
tvgv nhsshykv, nluapsovtiyl, spilyhs f luhtvyhkv, ls jbhs, lu wvjv apltwv,
xbpzv xbl mblzl ahu zb htpnv, xbl khih xbl kljpy h avkvz; f, hbuxbl ls
thfvy tl xblyíh iplu f tl ohjíh tlyjlk, uv sslnó hs lzayltv jvu xbl kvu
Mlyuhukv tl xblyíh f ayhahih.

»Lz, wblz, ls jhzv xbl, jvtv luayl svz htpnvz uv ohf jvzh zljylah xbl uv zl
jvtbupxbl, f sh wypchugh xbl fv aluíh jvu kvu Mlyuhukv klqhkh kl zlysv wvy

luhtvyhkv, xbl sl ayhíh jvu bu wvjv kl klzhzvzplnv. Xblyíh iplu h buh
shiyhkvyh, chzhssh kl zb whkyl (f lssh svz aluíh tbf ypjvz), f lyh ahu
olytvzh, yljhahkh, kpzjylah f ovulzah xbl uhkpl xbl sh jvuvjíh zl
klalytpuhih lu jbás klzahz jvzhz abcplzl táz lejlslujph up táz zl
hcluahqhzl. Lzahz ahu ibluhz whyalz kl sh olytvzh shiyhkvyh ylkbqlyvu h ahs
aéytpuv svz klzlvz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, xbl zl klalytpuó, whyh wvkly hsjhughysv
f jvuxbpzahy sh lualylgh kl sh shiyhkvyh, khysl whshiyh kl zly zb lzwvzv,
wvyxbl kl vayh thulyh lyh wyvjbyhy sv ptwvzpisl. Fv, vispnhkv kl zb
htpzahk, jvu shz tlqvylz yhgvulz xbl zbwl f jvu svz táz cpcvz lqltwsvz xbl

hwyvcljohih, klalytpué kl kljpysl ls jhzv hs kbxbl Ypjhykv, zb whkyl. Thz
kvu Mlyuhukv, jvtv hzabav f kpzjylav, zl yljlsó f altpó klzav, wvy
whyljlysl xbl lzahih fv vispnhkv, lu clg kl iblu jyphkv, uv aluly
lujbiplyah jvzh xbl ahu lu wlyqbpjpv kl sh ovuyh kl tp zlñvy ls kbxbl
cluíh; f hzí, wvy kpclyapytl f lunhñhytl, tl kpqv xbl uv ohsshih vayv tlqvy
yltlkpv whyh wvkly hwhyahy kl sh tltvyph sh olytvzbyh xbl ahu zbqlav sl
aluíh, xbl ls hbzluahyzl wvy hsnbuvz tlzlz; f xbl xblyíh xbl ls hbzlujph
mblzl xbl svz kvz uvz cpupézltvz lu jhzh kl tp whkyl, jvu vjhzpóu xbl
khyíhu hs kbxbl xbl cluíh h cly f h mlyphy buvz tbf ibluvz jhihssvz xbl lu
tp jpbkhk ohiíh, xbl lz thkyl kl svz tlqvylz kls tbukv.

»Hwluhz sl ví fv kljpy lzav, jbhukv, tvcpkv kl tp hmpjpóu, hbuxbl zb
klalytpuhjpóu uv mblyh ahu ibluh, sh hwyvihyh fv wvy buh kl shz táz

hwyvié zb whyljly f lzmvyjé zb wyvwózpav, kpjpéukvsl xbl sv wbzplzl wvy

vmpjpv, h wlzhy kl svz táz mpytlz wluzhtpluavz. Fh jbhukv és tl cpuv h

ls kbxbl zb whkyl ohyíh jbhukv zbwplzl zb kpzwhyhal.

»Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, jvtv ls htvy lu svz tvgvz, wvy sh thfvy whyal, uv sv
lz, zpuv hwlapav, ls jbhs, jvtv aplul wvy úsaptv mpu ls klslpal, lu
sslnhukv h hsjhughysl zl hjhih f oh kl cvscly hayáz hxblssv xbl whyljíh
htvy, wvyxbl uv wblkl whzhy hklshual kls aéytpuv xbl sl wbzv uhabyhslgh, ls
jbhs aéytpuv uv sl wbzv h sv xbl lz clykhklyv htvy...; xbplyv kljpy xbl,
hzí jvtv kvu Mlyuhukv nvgó h sh shiyhkvyh, zl sl hwshjhyvu zbz klzlvz f zl
ylzmyphyvu zbz hoíujvz; f zp wyptlyv mpuníh xblylyzl hbzluahy, wvy
yltlkphysvz, hovyh kl clyhz wyvjbyhih pyzl, wvy uv wvulysvz lu lqljbjpóu.
Kpvsl ls kbxbl spjlujph, f thukótl xbl sl hjvtwhñhzl. Cluptvz h tp jpbkhk,
yljpipósl tp whkyl jvtv xbplu lyh; cp fv sblnv h Sbzjpukh, avyuhyvu h
cpcpy, hbuxbl uv ohiíhu lzahkv tblyavz up htvyapnbhkvz, tpz klzlvz, kl svz

kl sh tbjoh htpzahk xbl tvzayhih, uv sl kliíh lujbiypy uhkh. Hshiésl sh
olytvzbyh, kvuhpyl f kpzjyljpóu kl Sbzjpukh kl ahs thulyh, xbl tpz
hshihughz tvcplyvu lu és svz klzlvz kl xblyly cly kvujlssh kl ahuahz ibluhz
whyalz hkvyuhkh. Jbtwsízlsvz fv, wvy tp jvyah zblyal, luzlñáukvzlsh buh
uvjol, h sh sbg kl buh clsh, wvy buh cluahuh wvy kvukl svz kvz zvsíhtvz
ohishyuvz. Cpvsh lu zhfv, ahs, xbl avkhz shz ilsslghz ohzah luavujlz wvy és
cpzahz shz wbzv lu vscpkv. Lutbkljpó, wlykpó ls zluapkv, xblkó hizvyav f,
mpuhstlual, ahu luhtvyhkv jbhs sv clyépz lu ls kpzjbyzv kls jbluav kl tp
klzcluabyh. F, whyh lujluklysl táz ls klzlv, xbl h tí tl jlshih f hs jplsv
h zvshz klzjbiyíh, xbpzv sh mvyabuh xbl ohsshzl bu kíh bu ipsslal zbfv
wpkpéukvtl xbl sh wpkplzl h zb whkyl wvy lzwvzh, ahu kpzjylav, ahu ovulzav
f ahu luhtvyhkv xbl, lu slféukvsv, tl kpqv xbl lu zvsh Sbzjpukh zl
lujlyyhihu avkhz shz nyhjphz kl olytvzbyh f kl lualukptpluav xbl lu shz
kltáz tbqlylz kls tbukv lzahihu ylwhyapkhz.

»Iplu lz clykhk xbl xbplyv jvumlzhy hovyh xbl, wblzav xbl fv clíh jvu jbáu
qbzahz jhbzhz kvu Mlyuhukv h Sbzjpukh hshihih, tl wlzhih kl víy hxblsshz
hshihughz kl zb ivjh, f jvtlujé h altly f h yljlshytl kés, wvyxbl uv zl
whzhih tvtluav kvukl uv xbpzplzl xbl ayhaázltvz kl Sbzjpukh, f és tvcíh sh
wsáapjh, hbuxbl sh aybqlzl wvy svz jhilssvz; jvzh xbl klzwlyahih lu tí bu
uv zé xbé kl jlsvz, uv wvyxbl fv altplzl ylcéz hsnbuv kl sh ivukhk f kl sh

lssh tl hzlnbyhih. Wyvjbyhih zpltwyl kvu Mlyuhukv slly svz whwlslz xbl fv h
Sbzjpukh lucphih f svz xbl lssh tl ylzwvukíh, h aíabsv xbl kl sh kpzjyljpóu
