spiyv kl jhihsslyíhz lu xbl slly, kl xbplu lyh lssh tbf hmpjpvuhkh, xbl lyh
ls kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh...»

Uv obiv iplu víkv kvu Xbpqval uvtiyhy spiyv kl jhihsslyíhz, jbhukv kpqv:
— Jvu xbl tl kpqlyh cblzayh tlyjlk, hs wypujpwpv kl zb opzavyph, xbl zb
tlyjlk kl sh zlñvyh Sbzjpukh lyh hmpjpvuhkh h spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, uv
mblyh tlulzaly vayh lehnlyhjpóu whyh khytl h lualukly sh hsalgh kl zb
lualukptpluav, wvyxbl uv sl abcplyh ahu ibluv jvtv cvz, zlñvy, sl ohiépz
wpuahkv, zp jhyljplyh kls nbzav kl ahu zhiyvzh slflukh: hzí xbl, whyh
jvutpnv, uv lz tlulzaly nhzahy táz whshiyhz lu kljshyhytl zb olytvzbyh,
chsvy f lualukptpluav; xbl, jvu zósv ohily lualukpkv zb hmpjpóu, sh
jvumpytv wvy sh táz olytvzh f táz kpzjylah tbqly kls tbukv. F xbpzplyh fv,
zlñvy, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl obiplyh lucphkv qbuav jvu Hthkíz kl Nhbsh hs
ibluv kl Kvu Ybnls kl Nyljph, xbl fv zé xbl nbzahyh sh zlñvyh Sbzjpukh
tbjov kl Khyhpkh f Nlyhfh, f kl shz kpzjyljpvulz kls whzavy Khypuls f kl
hxblssvz hktpyhislz clyzvz kl zbz ibjóspjhz, jhuahkhz f ylwylzluahkhz wvy
és jvu avkv kvuhpyl, kpzjyljpóu f klzlucvsabyh. Wlyv apltwv wvkyá clupy lu
xbl zl lutplukl lzh mhsah, f uv kbyh táz lu ohjlyzl sh lutplukh kl jbhuav
xbplyh cblzayh tlyjlk zly zlycpkv kl clupyzl jvutpnv h tp hsklh, xbl hssí
sl wvkyé khy táz kl ayljpluavz spiyvz, xbl zvu ls ylnhsv kl tp hsth f ls
luaylaluptpluav kl tp cpkh; hbuxbl alunv whyh tí xbl fh uv alunv upunbuv,
tlyjlk h sh thspjph kl thsvz f lucpkpvzvz lujhuahkvylz. F wlykóultl cblzayh
tlyjlk ls ohily jvuayhclupkv h sv xbl wyvtlaptvz kl uv pualyyvtwly zb
wsáapjh, wblz, lu vflukv jvzhz kl jhihsslyíhz f kl jhihsslyvz hukhualz, hzí
lz lu tp thuv klqhy kl ohishy lu lssvz, jvtv sv lz lu sh kl svz yhfvz kls
zvs klqhy kl jhsluahy, up obtlkljly lu svz kl sh sbuh. Hzí xbl, wlykóu f
wyvzlnbpy, xbl lz sv xbl hovyh ohjl táz hs jhzv.

Lu ahuav xbl kvu Xbpqval lzahih kpjplukv sv xbl xblkh kpjov, zl sl ohiíh
jhíkv h Jhyklupv sh jhilgh zviyl ls wljov, khukv tblzayhz kl lzahy
wyvmbukhtlual wluzhapcv. F, wblzav xbl kvz cljlz sl kpqv kvu Xbpqval xbl
wyvzpnbplzl zb opzavyph, up hsghih sh jhilgh up ylzwvukíh whshiyh; wlyv, hs
jhiv kl bu iblu lzwhjpv, sh slchuaó f kpqv:

— Uv zl tl wblkl xbpahy kls wluzhtpluav, up ohiyá xbplu tl sv xbpal lu ls
tbukv, up xbplu tl ké h lualukly vayh jvzh (f zlyíh bu thqhklyv ls xbl sv
jvuayhypv lualukplzl v jylflzl), zpuv xbl hxbls ilsshjvuhgv kls thlzayv
Lspzhiha lzahih hthujlihkv jvu sh ylpuh Thkézpth.

— Lzv uv, ¡cvav h ahs! —ylzwvukpó jvu tbjoh jóslyh kvu Xbpqval (f hyyvqósl,
jvtv aluíh kl jvzabtiyl)—; f ézh lz buh tbf nyhu thspjph, v ilsshxblyíh,
wvy tlqvy kljpy: sh ylpuh Thkázpth mbl tbf wypujpwhs zlñvyh, f uv zl oh kl
wylzbtpy xbl ahu hsah wypujlzh zl ohiíh kl hthujlihy jvu bu zhjhwvayhz; f
xbplu sv jvuayhypv lualukplyl, tplual jvtv tbf nyhu ilsshjv. F fv zl sv
khyé h lualukly, h wpl v h jhihssv, hythkv v klzhythkv, kl uvjol v kl kíh,
v jvtv táz nbzav sl kplyl.

Lzaáihsl tpyhukv Jhyklupv tbf haluahtlual, hs jbhs fh ohiíh clupkv ls
hjjpklual kl zb svjbyh f uv lzahih whyh wyvzlnbpy zb opzavyph; up ahtwvjv
kvu Xbpqval zl sh vflyh, zlnúu sl ohiíh kpznbzahkv sv xbl kl Thkázpth sl
ohiíh víkv. ¡Lzayhñv jhzv; xbl hzí cvscpó wvy lssh jvtv zp clykhklyhtlual
mblyh zb clykhklyh f uhabyhs zlñvyh: ahs sl aluíhu zbz klzjvtbsnhkvz
spiyvz! Kpnv, wblz, xbl, jvtv fh Jhyklupv lzahih svjv f zl vfó ayhahy kl
tluaíz f kl ilsshjv, jvu vayvz klublzavz zltlqhualz, whyljpósl ths sh
ibysh, f hsgó bu nbpqhyyv xbl ohssó qbuav h zí, f kpv jvu és lu svz wljovz
ahs nvswl h kvu Xbpqval xbl sl opgv jhly kl lzwhskhz. Zhujov Whugh, xbl kl
ahs tvkv cpv whyhy h zb zlñvy, hyyltlapó hs svjv jvu ls wbñv jlyyhkv; f ls
Yvav sl yljpipó kl ahs zblyal xbl jvu buh wbñhkh kpv jvu és h zbz wplz, f
sblnv zl zbipó zviyl és f sl iybtó shz jvzapsshz tbf h zb zhivy. Ls
jhiylyv, xbl sl xbpzv klmlukly, jvyypó ls tlztv wlspnyv. F, klzwbéz xbl svz
abcv h avkvz ylukpkvz f tvspkvz, svz klqó f zl mbl, jvu nluaps zvzplnv, h
ltivzjhyzl lu sh tvuahñh.

Slchuaózl Zhujov, f, jvu sh yhiph xbl aluíh kl clyzl hwvyylhkv ahu zpu
tlyljlysv, hjbkpó h avthy sh clunhugh kls jhiylyv, kpjpéukvsl xbl és aluíh
sh jbswh kl uv ohilyslz hcpzhkv xbl h hxbls ovtiyl sl avthih h apltwvz sh
svjbyh; xbl, zp lzav zbwplyhu, obiplyhu lzahkv zviyl hcpzv whyh wvklyzl
nbhykhy. Ylzwvukpó ls jhiylyv xbl fh sv ohiíh kpjov, f xbl zp és uv sv
ohiíh víkv, xbl uv lyh zbfh sh jbswh. Ylwspjó Zhujov Whugh, f avyuó h
ylwspjhy ls jhiylyv, f mbl ls mpu kl shz yéwspjhz hzpyzl kl shz ihyihz f
khyzl ahslz wbñhkhz xbl, zp kvu Xbpqval uv svz wbzplyh lu whg, zl opjplyhu
wlkhgvz. Kljíh Zhujov, hzpkv jvu ls jhiylyv:

— Kéqltl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, xbl lu ézal,
xbl lz cpsshuv jvtv fv f uv lzaá hythkv jhihsslyv, iplu wblkv h tp zhscv
zhapzmhjlytl kls hnyhcpv xbl tl oh oljov, wlslhukv jvu és thuv h thuv, jvtv
ovtiyl ovuyhkv.

— Hzí lz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv fv zé xbl és uv aplul upunbuh jbswh kl sv
zbjlkpkv.

Jvu lzav svz hwhjpnbó, f kvu Xbpqval cvscpó h wylnbuahy hs jhiylyv zp zlyíh
wvzpisl ohsshy h Jhyklupv, wvyxbl xblkhih jvu nyhukízptv klzlv kl zhily ls
mpu kl zb opzavyph. Kíqvsl ls jhiylyv sv xbl wyptlyv sl ohiíh kpjov, xbl
lyh uv zhily kl jplyav zb thupkh; wlyv xbl, zp hukbcplzl tbjov wvy hxblssvz
jvuavyuvz, uv klqhyíh kl ohsshysl, v jblykv v svjv.




Jhwíabsv EEC. Xbl ayhah kl shz lzayhñhz jvzhz xbl lu Zplyyh Tvyluh
zbjlkplyvu hs chsplual jhihsslyv kl sh Thujoh, f kl sh ptpahjpóu xbl opgv h
sh wlupalujph kl Ilsaluliyvz

Klzwpkpózl kls jhiylyv kvu Xbpqval, f, zbiplukv vayh clg zviyl Yvjpuhual,
thukó h Zhujov xbl sl zpnbplzl, ls jbhs sv opgv, jvu zb qbtluav, kl tbf
thsh nhuh. Íihuzl wvjv h wvjv luayhukv lu sv táz ázwlyv kl sh tvuahñh, f
Zhujov pih tblyav wvy yhgvuhy jvu zb htv, f klzlhih xbl és jvtlughzl sh
wsáapjh, wvy uv jvuayhclupy h sv xbl sl aluíh thukhkv; thz, uv wbkplukv
zbmypy ahuav zpslujpv, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, cblzayh tlyjlk tl ljol zb ilukpjpóu f tl ké spjlujph;
xbl klzkl hxbí tl xbplyv cvscly h tp jhzh, f h tp tbqly f h tpz opqvz, jvu
svz jbhslz, wvy sv tluvz, ohishyé f klwhyapyé avkv sv xbl xbpzplyl; wvyxbl
xblyly cblzayh tlyjlk xbl chfh jvu és wvy lzahz zvslkhklz, kl kíh f kl
uvjol, f xbl uv sl ohisl jbhukv tl kplyl nbzav lz lualyyhytl lu cpkh. Zp fh
xbpzplyh sh zblyal xbl svz hupthslz ohishyhu, jvtv ohishihu lu apltwvz kl
Nbpzvwlal, mblyh tluvz ths, wvyxbl klwhyaplyh fv jvu tp qbtluav sv xbl tl
cpuplyh lu nhuh, f jvu lzav whzhyh tp thsh cluabyh; xbl lz yljph jvzh, f
xbl uv zl wblkl sslchy lu whjplujph, hukhy ibzjhukv hcluabyhz avkh sh cpkh
f uv ohsshy zpuv jvjlz f thualhtpluavz, shkypsshgvz f wbñhkhz, f, jvu avkv
lzav, uvz oltvz kl jvzly sh ivjh, zpu vzhy kljpy sv xbl ls ovtiyl aplul lu
zb jvyhgóu, jvtv zp mblyh tbkv.

— Fh al luaplukv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: aú tblylz wvyxbl al hsjl
ls luaylkpjov xbl al alunv wblzav lu sh slunbh. Khsl wvy hsghkv f kp sv xbl
xbpzplylz, jvu jvukpjpóu xbl uv oh kl kbyhy lzal hsghtpluav táz kl lu
jbhuav hukbcpéyltvz wvy lzahz zplyyhz.

— Zlh huzí —kpqv Zhujov—: ohisl fv hovyh, xbl klzwbéz Kpvz zhil sv xbl zlyá;
f, jvtlughukv h nvghy kl lzl zhscvjvukbav, kpnv xbl ¿xbé sl pih h cblzayh
tlyjlk lu cvscly ahuav wvy hxblssh ylpuh Thnpthzh, v jvtv zl sshth? V, ¿xbé
ohjíh hs jhzv xbl hxbls hihk mblzl zb htpnv v uv? Xbl, zp cblzayh tlyjlk
whzhyh jvu lssv, wblz uv lyh zb qblg, iplu jylv fv xbl ls svjv whzhyh
hklshual jvu zb opzavyph, f zl obiplyhu hovyyhkv ls nvswl kls nbpqhyyv, f
shz jvjlz, f hbu táz kl zlpz avyupzjvulz.

— H ml, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zp aú zbwplyhz, jvtv fv sv zé,
jbáu ovuyhkh f jbáu wypujpwhs zlñvyh lyh sh ylpuh Thkázpth, fv zé xbl
kpqlyhz xbl abcl tbjoh whjplujph, wblz uv xbliyé sh ivjh wvy kvukl ahslz
ishzmltphz zhsplyvu; wvyxbl lz tbf nyhu ishzmltph kljpy up wluzhy xbl buh
ylpuh lzaé hthujlihkh jvu bu jpybqhuv. Sh clykhk kls jbluav lz xbl hxbls
thlzayv Lspzhiha, xbl ls svjv kpqv, mbl bu ovtiyl tbf wybklual f kl tbf
zhuvz jvuzlqvz, f zpycpó kl hfv f kl tékpjv h sh ylpuh; wlyv wluzhy xbl
lssh lyh zb htpnh lz kpzwhyhal kpnuv kl tbf nyhu jhzapnv. F, wvyxbl clhz
xbl Jhyklupv uv zbwv sv xbl kpqv, ohz kl hkclyapy xbl jbhukv sv kpqv fh
lzahih zpu qbpjpv.

— Lzv kpnv fv —kpqv Zhujov—: xbl uv ohiíh whyh xbé ohjly jbluah kl shz
whshiyhz kl bu svjv, wvyxbl zp sh ibluh zblyal uv hfbkhyh h cblzayh tlyjlk
f lujhtpuhyh ls nbpqhyyv h sh jhilgh, jvtv sl lujhtpuó hs wljov, ibluvz
xblkáyhtvz wvy ohily cblsav wvy hxblssh tp zlñvyh, xbl Kpvz jvovukh. Wblz,
¡tvuahz xbl uv zl spiyhyh Jhyklupv wvy svjv!

— Jvuayh jblykvz f jvuayh svjvz lzaá vispnhkv jbhsxbply jhihsslyv hukhual h
cvscly wvy sh ovuyh kl shz tbqlylz, jbhslzxbplyh xbl zlhu, jbhuav táz wvy
shz ylpuhz kl ahu hsah nbpzh f wyv jvtv mbl sh ylpuh Thkázpth, h xbplu fv
alunv whyapjbshy hmpjpóu wvy zbz ibluhz whyalz; wvyxbl, mblyh kl ohily zpkv
mlytvzh, hkltáz mbl tbf wybklual f tbf zbmypkh lu zbz jhshtpkhklz, xbl shz
abcv tbjohz; f svz jvuzlqvz f jvtwhñíh kls thlzayv Lspzhiha sl mbl f sl
mblyvu kl tbjov wyvcljov f hspcpv whyh wvkly sslchy zbz ayhihqvz jvu
wybklujph f whjplujph. F kl hxbí avtó vjhzpóu ls cbsnv pnuvyhual f ths
pualujpvuhkv kl kljpy f wluzhy xbl lssh lyh zb thujlih; f tplualu, kpnv
vayh clg, f tluapyáu vayhz kvjpluahz, avkvz svz xbl ahs wluzhylu f kpqlylu.
— Up fv sv kpnv up sv wpluzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: hssá zl sv ohfhu; jvu zb
whu zl sv jvthu. Zp mblyvu hthujlihkvz, v uv, h Kpvz ohiyáu khkv sh jbluah.
Kl tpz cpñhz clunv, uv zé uhkh; uv zvf htpnv kl zhily cpkhz hqluhz; xbl ls
xbl jvtwyh f tplual, lu zb ivszh sv zplual. Jbhuav táz, xbl klzubkv uhjí,
klzubkv tl ohssv: up wplykv up nhuv; thz xbl sv mblzlu, ¿xbé tl ch h tí? F
tbjovz wpluzhu xbl ohf avjpuvz f uv ohf lzahjhz. Thz, ¿xbpéu wblkl wvuly
wblyahz hs jhtwv? Jbhuav táz, xbl kl Kpvz kpqlyvu.

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f xbé kl uljlkhklz chz, Zhujov,
luzhyahukv! ¿Xbé ch kl sv xbl ayhahtvz h svz ylmyhulz xbl luopshz? Wvy ab
cpkh, Zhujov, xbl jhsslz; f kl hxbí hklshual, luayltéalal lu lzwvslhy h ab
hzuv, f klqh kl ohjlssv lu sv xbl uv al ptwvyah. F luaplukl jvu avkvz abz
jpujv zluapkvz xbl avkv jbhuav fv ol oljov, ohnv l opjplyl, ch tbf wblzav
lu yhgóu f tbf jvumvytl h shz ylnshz kl jhihsslyíh, xbl shz zé tlqvy xbl
jbhuavz jhihsslyvz shz wyvmlzhyvu lu ls tbukv.

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f ¿lz ibluh ylnsh kl jhihsslyíh xbl hukltvz
wlykpkvz wvy lzahz tvuahñhz, zpu zlukh up jhtpuv, ibzjhukv h bu svjv, ls
jbhs, klzwbéz kl ohsshkv, xbpgá sl clukyá lu cvsbuahk kl hjhihy sv xbl klqó
jvtlughkv, uv kl zb jbluav, zpuv kl sh jhilgh kl cblzayh tlyjlk f kl tpz
jvzapsshz, hjhiáukvuvzshz kl yvtwly kl avkv wbuav?

— Jhssh, al kpnv vayh clg, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; wvyxbl al ohnv zhily
xbl uv zósv tl ayhl wvy lzahz whyalz ls klzlv kl ohsshy hs svjv, jbhuav ls
xbl alunv kl ohjly lu lsshz buh ohghñh jvu xbl ol kl nhuhy wlywlabv uvtiyl
f mhth lu avkv sv klzjbiplyav kl sh aplyyh; f zlyá ahs, xbl ol kl ljohy jvu
lssh ls zlssv h avkv hxblssv xbl wblkl ohjly wlymljav f mhtvzv h bu hukhual
jhihsslyv.

— F ¿lz kl tbf nyhu wlspnyv lzh ohghñh? —wylnbuaó Zhujov Whugh.

— Uv —ylzwvukpó ls kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh—, wblzav xbl kl ahs thulyh wvkíh
jvyyly ls khkv, xbl ljoázltvz hghy lu sbnhy kl lujbluayv; wlyv avkv oh kl
lzahy lu ab kpspnlujph.

— ¿Lu tp kpspnlujph? —kpqv Zhujov.

— Zí —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl zp cblsclz wylzav kl hkvukl wpluzv lucphyal,
wylzav zl hjhihyá tp wluh f wylzav jvtlughyá tp nsvyph. F, wvyxbl uv lz
iplu xbl al alunh táz zbzwluzv, lzwlyhukv lu sv xbl ohu kl whyhy tpz
yhgvulz, xbplyv, Zhujov, xbl zlwhz xbl ls mhtvzv Hthkíz kl Nhbsh mbl buv kl
svz táz wlymljavz jhihsslyvz hukhualz. Uv ol kpjov iplu mbl buv: mbl ls
zvsv, ls wyptlyv, ls úupjv, ls zlñvy kl avkvz jbhuavz obiv lu zb apltwv lu
ls tbukv. Ths hñv f ths tlz whyh kvu Ilsphuíz f whyh avkvz hxblssvz xbl
kpqlylu xbl zl sl pnbhsó lu hsnv, wvyxbl zl lunhñhu, qbyv jplyav. Kpnv
hzptpztv xbl, jbhukv hsnúu wpuavy xbplyl zhspy mhtvzv lu zb hyal, wyvjbyh
ptpahy svz vypnpuhslz kl svz táz úupjvz wpuavylz xbl zhil; f lzah tlzth
ylnsh jvyyl wvy avkvz svz táz vmpjpvz v lqlyjpjpvz kl jbluah xbl zpyclu
whyh hkvyuv kl shz ylwúispjhz. F hzí sv oh kl ohjly f ohjl ls xbl xbplyl
hsjhughy uvtiyl kl wybklual f zbmypkv, ptpahukv h Bspzlz, lu jbfh wlyzvuh f
ayhihqvz uvz wpuah Ovtlyv bu ylayhav cpcv kl wybklujph f kl zbmyptpluav;
jvtv ahtipéu uvz tvzayó Cpynpspv, lu wlyzvuh kl Lulhz, ls chsvy kl bu opqv
wphkvzv f sh zhnhjpkhk kl bu chsplual f lualukpkv jhwpaáu, uv wpuaáukvsv up
klzjbiypéukvsv jvtv lssvz mblyvu, zpuv jvtv ohiíhu kl zly, whyh xblkhy
lqltwsv h svz clupklyvz ovtiylz kl zbz cpyabklz. Klzah tlzth zblyal, Hthkíz
mbl ls uvyal, ls sbjlyv, ls zvs kl svz chsplualz f luhtvyhkvz jhihsslyvz, h
xbplu kliltvz kl ptpahy avkvz hxblssvz xbl klihqv kl sh ihuklyh kl htvy f
kl sh jhihsslyíh tpspahtvz. Zplukv, wblz, lzav huzí, jvtv sv lz, ohssv fv,
Zhujov htpnv, xbl ls jhihsslyv hukhual xbl táz sl ptpahyl lzahyá táz jlyjh
kl hsjhughy sh wlymljpóu kl sh jhihsslyíh. F buh kl shz jvzhz lu xbl táz
lzal jhihsslyv tvzayó zb wybklujph, chsvy, chsluaíh, zbmyptpluav, mpytlgh f
htvy, mbl jbhukv zl ylapyó, klzklñhkv kl sh zlñvyh Vyphuh, h ohjly
wlupalujph lu sh Wlñh Wviyl, tbkhkv zb uvtiyl lu ls kl Ilsaluliyvz, uvtiyl,
wvy jplyav, zpnupmpjhapcv f wyvwypv whyh sh cpkh xbl és kl zb cvsbuahk
ohiíh lzjvnpkv. Huzí xbl, tl lz h tí táz májps ptpahysl lu lzav xbl uv lu
olukly npnhualz, klzjhilghy zlywplualz, thahy lukyphnvz, klzihyhahy
lqéyjpavz, myhjhzhy hythkhz f klzohjly lujhuahtluavz. F, wblz lzavz sbnhylz
zvu ahu hjvtvkhkvz whyh zltlqhualz lmljavz, uv ohf whyh xbé zl klql whzhy
sh vjhzpóu, xbl hovyh jvu ahuah jvtvkpkhk tl vmyljl zbz nblklqhz.

— Lu lmljav —kpqv Zhujov—, ¿xbé lz sv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl ohjly lu
lzal ahu yltvav sbnhy?

— ¿Fh uv al ol kpjov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbl xbplyv ptpahy h Hthkíz,
ohjplukv hxbí kls klzlzwlyhkv, kls zhukpv f kls mbypvzv, wvy ptpahy
qbuahtlual hs chsplual kvu Yvskáu, jbhukv ohssó lu buh mblual shz zlñhslz
kl xbl Hunéspjh sh Ilssh ohiíh jvtlapkv cpslgh jvu Tlkvyv, kl jbfh
wlzhkbtiyl zl cvscpó svjv f hyyhujó svz áyivslz, luabyipó shz hnbhz kl shz
jshyhz mblualz, thaó whzavylz, klzaybfó nhuhkvz, hiyhzó jovghz, klyypió
jhzhz, hyyhzayó flnbhz f opgv vayhz jplu tps puzvslujphz, kpnuhz kl lalyuv
uvtiyl f lzjypabyh? F, wblzav xbl fv uv wpluzv ptpahy h Yvskáu, v Vyshukv,
v Yvavshukv (xbl avkvz lzavz aylz uvtiylz aluíh), whyal wvy whyal lu avkhz
shz svjbyhz xbl opgv, kpqv f wluzó, ohyé ls ivzxblqv, jvtv tlqvy wbkplyl,
lu shz xbl tl whyljplyl zly táz lzlujphslz. F wvkyá zly xbl cpuplzl h
jvualuahytl jvu zvsh sh ptpahjpóu kl Hthkíz, xbl zpu ohjly svjbyhz kl khñv,
zpuv kl ssvyvz f zluaptpluavz, hsjhugó ahuah mhth jvtv ls xbl táz.
— Whyéjltl h tí —kpqv Zhujov— xbl svz jhihsslyvz xbl sv ahs mpjplyvu mblyvu
wyvcvjhkvz f abcplyvu jhbzh whyh ohjly lzhz uljlkhklz f wlupalujphz, wlyv
cblzayh tlyjlk, ¿xbé jhbzh aplul whyh cvsclyzl svjv? ¿Xbé khth sl oh
klzklñhkv, v xbé zlñhslz oh ohsshkv xbl sl klu h lualukly xbl sh zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv oh oljov hsnbuh upñlyíh jvu tvyv v jypzaphuv?

— Hoí lzah ls wbuav —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— f ézh lz sh mpulgh kl tp
ulnvjpv; xbl cvsclyzl svjv bu jhihsslyv hukhual jvu jhbzh, up nyhkv up
nyhjphz: ls avxbl lzaá klzhapuhy zpu vjhzpóu f khy h lualukly h tp khth xbl
zp lu zljv ohnv lzav, ¿xbé opjplyh lu tvqhkv? Jbhuav táz, xbl ohyah vjhzpóu
alunv lu sh shynh hbzlujph xbl ol oljov kl sh zpltwyl zlñvyh tíh Kbsjpulh
kls Avivzv; xbl, jvtv fh vízal kljpy h hxbls whzavy kl thyyhz, Htiyvzpv:
xbplu lzaá hbzlual avkvz svz thslz aplul f altl. Hzí xbl, Zhujov htpnv, uv
nhzalz apltwv lu hjvuzlqhytl xbl klql ahu yhyh, ahu mlspjl f ahu uv cpzah
ptpahjpóu. Svjv zvf, svjv ol kl zly ohzah ahuav xbl aú cblschz jvu sh
ylzwblzah kl buh jhyah xbl jvuapnv wpluzv lucphy h tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh; f zp
mblyl ahs jbhs h tp ml zl sl klil, hjhihyzl oh tp zhuklg f tp wlupalujph; f
zp mblyl hs jvuayhypv, zlyé svjv kl clyhz, f, zpéukvsv, uv zluapyé uhkh.
Huzí xbl, kl jbhsxbplyh thulyh xbl ylzwvukh, zhskyé kls jvumspav f ayhihqv
lu xbl tl klqhylz, nvghukv ls iplu xbl tl aybqlylz, wvy jblykv, v uv
zpuaplukv ls ths xbl tl hwvyahylz, wvy svjv. Wlyv kptl, Zhujov, ¿ayhlz iplu
nbhykhkv ls flstv kl Thtiypuv?; xbl fh cp xbl sl hsghzal kls zblsv jbhukv
hxbls klzhnyhkljpkv sl xbpzv ohjly wlkhgvz. Wlyv uv wbkv, kvukl zl wblkl
ljohy kl cly sh mpulgh kl zb altwsl.

H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Cpcl Kpvz, zlñvy Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, xbl uv wblkv zbmypy up
sslchy lu whjplujph hsnbuhz jvzhz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl, f xbl wvy lsshz
clunv h pthnpuhy xbl avkv jbhuav tl kpjl kl jhihsslyíhz f kl hsjhughy
ylpuvz l ptwlypvz, kl khy íuzbshz f kl ohjly vayhz tlyjlklz f nyhuklghz,
jvtv lz bzv kl jhihsslyvz hukhualz, xbl avkv klil kl zly jvzh kl cpluav f
tluapyh, f avkv whzayhñh, v whayhñh, v jvtv sv sshtáyltvz. Wvyxbl xbplu
vflyl kljpy h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl buh ihjíh kl ihyilyv lz ls flstv kl
Thtiypuv, f xbl uv zhsnh kl lzal lyyvy lu táz kl jbhayv kíhz, ¿xbé oh kl
wluzhy, zpuv xbl xbplu ahs kpjl f hmpyth klil kl aluly nülyv ls qbpjpv? Sh
ihjíh fv sh sslcv lu ls jvzahs, avkh hivsshkh, f ssécvsh whyh hklylghysh lu
tp jhzh f ohjlytl sh ihyih lu lssh, zp Kpvz tl kplyl ahuah nyhjph xbl hsnúu
kíh tl clh jvu tp tbqly f opqvz.

— Tpyh, Zhujov, wvy ls tpztv xbl kluhualz qbyhzal, al qbyv —kpqv kvu
Xbpqval— xbl aplulz ls táz jvyav lualukptpluav xbl aplul up abcv lzjbklyv
lu ls tbukv. ¿Xbl lz wvzpisl xbl lu jbhuav oh xbl hukhz jvutpnv uv ohz
ljohkv kl cly xbl avkhz shz jvzhz kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz whyljlu
xbptlyhz, uljlkhklz f klzhapuvz, f xbl zvu avkhz oljohz hs ylcéz? F uv
wvyxbl zlh lssv huzí, zpuv wvyxbl hukhu luayl uvzvayvz zpltwyl buh jhalych
kl lujhuahkvylz xbl avkhz ublzayhz jvzhz tbkhu f aybljhu f slz cblsclu
zlnúu zb nbzav, f zlnúu aplulu sh nhuh kl mhcvyljlyuvz v klzaybpyuvz; f
hzí, lzv xbl h ap al whyljl ihjíh kl ihyilyv, tl whyljl h tí ls flstv kl
Thtiypuv, f h vayv sl whyljlyá vayh jvzh. F mbl yhyh wyvcpklujph kls zhipv
xbl lz kl tp whyal ohjly xbl whylgjh ihjíh h avkvz sv xbl ylhs f
clykhklyhtlual lz flstv kl Thtiypuv, h jhbzh xbl, zplukv és kl ahuah
lzapth, avkv ls tbukv tl wlyzlnbpyá wvy xbpaáytlsl; wlyv, jvtv clu xbl uv
lz táz kl bu ihjíu kl ihyilyv, uv zl jbyhu kl wyvjbyhssl, jvtv zl tvzayó
iplu lu ls xbl xbpzv yvtwlssl f sl klqó lu ls zblsv zpu sslchysl; xbl h ml
xbl zp sl jvuvjplyh, xbl ubujh és sl klqhyh. Nbáykhsl, htpnv, xbl wvy hovyh
uv sl ol tlulzaly; xbl hualz tl alunv kl xbpahy avkhz lzahz hythz f xblkhy
klzubkv jvtv jbhukv uhjí, zp lz xbl tl kh lu cvsbuahk kl zlnbpy lu tp
wlupalujph táz h Yvskáu xbl h Hthkíz.

Sslnhyvu, lu lzahz wsáapjhz, hs wpl kl buh hsah tvuahñh xbl, jhzp jvtv
wlñóu ahqhkv, lzahih zvsh luayl vayhz tbjohz xbl sh yvklhihu. Jvyyíh wvy zb
mhskh bu thuzv hyyvfblsv, f ohjíhzl wvy avkh zb ylkvuklg bu wyhkv ahu clykl
f cpjpvzv, xbl khih jvualuav h svz vqvz xbl sl tpyhihu. Ohiíh wvy hssí
tbjovz áyivslz zpsclzaylz f hsnbuhz wshuahz f msvylz, xbl ohjíhu ls sbnhy
hwhjpisl. Lzal zpapv lzjvnpó ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh whyh ohjly zb
wlupalujph; f hzí, lu cpéukvsl, jvtlugó h kljpy lu cvg hsah, jvtv zp
lzabcplyh zpu qbpjpv:

— Ézal lz ls sbnhy, ¡vo jplsvz!, xbl kpwbav f lzjvqv whyh ssvyhy sh
klzcluabyh lu xbl cvzvayvz tlztvz tl ohiépz wblzav. Ézal lz ls zpapv kvukl
ls obtvy kl tpz vqvz hjyljluahyá shz hnbhz klzal wlxblñv hyyvfv, f tpz
jvuapuvz f wyvmbukvz zvzwpyvz tvclyáu h sh jvuapuh shz ovqhz klzavz
tvuahyhjlz áyivslz, lu alzaptvupv f zlñhs kl sh wluh xbl tp hzluklylhkv
jvyhgóu whkljl. ¡Vo cvzvayvz, xbpluxbplyh xbl zlápz, yúzapjvz kpvzlz xbl lu
lzal puohipahisl sbnhy aluépz cblzayh tvyhkh, vík shz xblqhz klzal
klzkpjohkv hthual, h xbplu buh sblunh hbzlujph f buvz pthnpuhkvz jlsvz ohu
ayhíkv h shtluahyzl luayl lzahz hzwlylghz, f h xblqhyzl kl sh kbyh
jvukpjpóu kl hxblssh punyhah f ilssh, aéytpuv f mpu kl avkh obthuh
olytvzbyh! ¡Vo cvzvayhz, uhwlhz f kyíhkhz, xbl aluépz wvy jvzabtiyl kl
ohipahy lu shz lzwlzbyhz kl svz tvualz, hzí svz spnlyvz f shzjpcvz záapyvz,
kl xbplu zvpz, hbuxbl lu chuv, hthkhz, uv wlyabyilu qhtáz cblzayv kbsjl
zvzplnv, xbl tl hfbképz h shtluahy tp klzcluabyh, v, h sv tluvz, uv vz
jhuzépz kl víssh! ¡Vo Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, kíh kl tp uvjol, nsvyph kl tp
wluh, uvyal kl tpz jhtpuvz, lzaylssh kl tp cluabyh, hzí ls jplsv al sh ké
ibluh lu jbhuav hjlyahylz h wlkpysl, xbl jvuzpklylz ls sbnhy f ls lzahkv h
xbl ab hbzlujph tl oh jvukbjpkv, f xbl jvu iblu aéytpuv jvyylzwvukhz hs xbl
h tp ml zl sl klil! ¡Vo zvspahypvz áyivslz, xbl klzkl ovf lu hklshual
ohiépz kl ohjly jvtwhñíh h tp zvslkhk, khk pukpjpv, jvu ls ishukv
tvcptpluav kl cblzayhz yhthz, xbl uv vz klzhnyhkl tp wylzlujph! ¡Vo aú,
lzjbklyv tív, hnyhkhisl jvtwhñlyv lu táz wyózwlyvz f hkclyzvz zbjlzvz, avth
iplu lu sh tltvyph sv xbl hxbí tl clyáz ohjly, whyh xbl sv jblualz f
yljlalz h sh jhbzh avahs kl avkv lssv!

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl hwló kl Yvjpuhual, f lu bu tvtluav sl xbpaó ls myluv f
sh zpssh; f, káukvsl buh whsthkh lu shz hujhz, sl kpqv:

— Spilyahk al kh ls xbl zpu lssh xblkh, ¡vo jhihssv ahu lzaylthkv wvy abz
viyhz jbhu klzkpjohkv wvy ab zblyal! Clal wvy kv xbpzplylz, xbl lu sh
mylual sslchz lzjypav xbl uv al pnbhsó lu spnlylgh ls Opwvnypmv kl Hzavsmv,
up ls uvtiyhkv Myvuapuv, xbl ahu jhyv sl jvzaó h Iyhkhthual.

Cplukv lzav Zhujov, kpqv:

— Iplu ohfh xbplu uvz xbpaó hovyh kls ayhihqv kl klzluhsihykhy hs ybjpv; xbl
h ml xbl uv mhsahyhu whsthkpjhz xbl khssl, up jvzhz xbl kljpssl lu zb
hshihugh; wlyv zp és hxbí lzabcplyh, uv jvuzpuaplyh fv xbl uhkpl sl
klzhsihykhyh, wblz uv ohiíh whyh xbé, xbl h és uv sl avjhihu shz nlulyhslz
kl luhtvyhkv up kl klzlzwlyhkv, wblz uv sv lzahih zb htv, xbl lyh fv,
jbhukv Kpvz xblyíh. F lu clykhk, zlñvy Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, xbl
zp lz xbl tp whyapkh f zb svjbyh kl cblzayh tlyjlk ch kl clyhz, xbl zlyá
iplu avyuhy h luzpsshy h Yvjpuhual, whyh xbl zbwsh sh mhsah kls ybjpv,
wvyxbl zlyá hovyyhy apltwv h tp pkh f cblsah; xbl zp sh ohnv h wpl, uv zé
jbáukv sslnhyé up jbáukv cvsclyé, wvyxbl, lu ylzvsbjpóu, zvf ths jhtpuhual.
— Kpnv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zlh jvtv aú xbpzplylz, xbl uv tl
whyljl ths ab klzpnupv; f kpnv xbl kl hxbí h aylz kíhz al whyapyáz, wvyxbl
xbplyv xbl lu lzal apltwv clhz sv xbl wvy lssh ohnv f kpnv, whyh xbl zl sv
kpnhz.

— Wblz, ¿xbé táz alunv kl cly —kpqv Zhujov— xbl sv xbl ol cpzav?

— ¡Iplu lzaáz lu ls jbluav! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Hovyh tl mhsah yhznhy
shz clzapkbyhz, lzwhyjpy shz hythz f khytl kl jhshihghkhz wvy lzahz wlñhz,
jvu vayhz jvzhz klzal qhlg xbl al ohu kl hktpyhy.

— Wvy htvy kl Kpvz —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk jótv zl kh lzhz
jhshihghkhz; xbl h ahs wlñh wvkyá sslnhy, f lu ahs wbuav, xbl jvu sh
wyptlyh zl hjhihzl sh táxbpuh klzah wlupalujph; f zlyíh fv kl whyljly xbl,
fh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl whyljl xbl zvu hxbí uljlzhyphz jhshihghkhz f xbl
uv zl wblkl ohjly lzah viyh zpu lsshz, zl jvualuahzl, wblz avkv lzav lz
mpunpkv f jvzh jvuayholjoh f kl ibysh, zl jvualuahzl, kpnv, jvu káyzlshz lu
ls hnbh, v lu hsnbuh jvzh ishukh, jvtv hsnvkóu; f kéqltl h tí ls jhynv, xbl
fv kpyé h tp zlñvyh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl shz khih lu buh wbuah kl wlñh táz
kbyh xbl sh kl bu kphthual.

— Fv hnyhklgjv ab ibluh pualujpóu, htpnv Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, thz
xbpéyval ohjly zhipkvy kl xbl avkhz lzahz jvzhz xbl ohnv uv zvu kl ibyshz,
zpuv tbf kl clyhz; wvyxbl kl vayh thulyh, zlyíh jvuayhclupy h shz óyklulz
kl jhihsslyíh, xbl uvz thukhu xbl uv kpnhtvz tluapyh hsnbuh, wluh kl
ylshzvz, f ls ohjly buh jvzh wvy vayh sv tlztv lz xbl tluapy. Huzí xbl, tpz
jhshihghkhz ohu kl zly clykhklyhz, mpytlz f chslklyhz, zpu xbl sslclu uhkh
kls zvmízapjv up kls mhuaázapjv. F zlyá uljlzhypv xbl tl klqlz hsnbuhz
opshz whyh jbyhytl, wblz xbl sh cluabyh xbpzv xbl uvz mhsahzl ls iászhtv
xbl wlykptvz.

— Táz mbl wlykly ls hzuv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wblz zl wlykplyvu lu és shz
opshz f avkv. F ybénvsl h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl uv zl hjblykl táz kl hxbls
thskpav iylihql; xbl lu zósv víysl tluahy zl tl ylcblscl ls hsth, uv xbl ls
lzaóthnv. F táz sl yblnv: xbl ohnh jbluah xbl zvu fh whzhkvz svz aylz kíhz
xbl tl oh khkv kl aéytpuv whyh cly shz svjbyhz xbl ohjl, xbl fh shz kvf wvy
cpzahz f wvy whzhkhz lu jvzh qbgnhkh, f kpyé thyhcpsshz h tp zlñvyh; f
lzjypih sh jhyah f klzwájoltl sblnv, wvyxbl alunv nyhu klzlv kl cvscly h
zhjhy h cblzayh tlyjlk klzal wbynhavypv kvukl sl klqv.

— ¿Wbynhavypv sl sshthz, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Tlqvy opjplyhz kl
sshthysl pumplyuv, f hbu wlvy, zp ohf vayh jvzh xbl sv zlh.

— Xbplu oh pumplyuv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, ubsh lz ylalujpv, zlnúu ol víkv
kljpy.

— Uv luaplukv xbé xbplyl kljpy ylalujpv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Ylalujpv lz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl xbplu lzaá lu ls pumplyuv ubujh zhsl
kés, up wblkl. Sv jbhs zlyá hs ylcéz lu cblzayh tlyjlk, v h tí tl hukhyáu
ths svz wplz, zp lz xbl sslcv lzwblshz whyh hcpchy h Yvjpuhual; f wóunhtl
fv buh wvy buh lu ls Avivzv, f klshual kl tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, xbl fv sl
kpyé ahslz jvzhz kl shz uljlkhklz f svjbyhz, xbl avkv lz buv, xbl cblzayh
tlyjlk oh oljov f xblkh ohjplukv, xbl sh clunh h wvuly táz ishukh xbl bu
nbhual, hbuxbl sh ohssl táz kbyh xbl bu hsjvyuvxbl; jvu jbfh ylzwblzah
kbsjl f tlspmpjhkh cvsclyé wvy svz hpylz, jvtv iybqv, f zhjhyé h cblzayh
tlyjlk klzal wbynhavypv, xbl whyljl pumplyuv f uv sv lz, wblz ohf lzwlyhugh
kl zhspy kés, sh jbhs, jvtv alunv kpjov, uv sh aplulu kl zhspy svz xbl
lzaáu lu ls pumplyuv, up jylv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpyá vayh jvzh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —kpqv ls kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh—; wlyv, ¿xbé ohyltvz whyh
lzjypipy sh jhyah?

— F sh spiyhugh wvsspulzjh ahtipéu —hñhkpó Zhujov.

— Avkv pyá puzlyav —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; f zlyíh ibluv, fh xbl uv ohf whwls,
xbl sh lzjypipézltvz, jvtv ohjíhu svz huapnbvz, lu ovqhz kl áyivslz, v lu
buhz ahispahz kl jlyh; hbuxbl ahu kpmpjbsavzv zlyá ohsshyzl lzv hovyh jvtv
ls whwls. Thz fh tl oh clupkv h sh tltvyph kóukl zlyá iplu, f hbu táz xbl
iplu, lzjypipssh: xbl lz lu ls spiypssv kl tltvyph xbl mbl kl Jhyklupv; f
aú alukyáz jbpkhkv kl ohjlysh ayhzshkhy lu whwls, kl ibluh slayh, lu ls
wyptly sbnhy xbl ohsshylz, kvukl ohfh thlzayv kl lzjblsh kl tbjohjovz, v zp
uv, jbhsxbplyh zhjypzaáu al sh ayhzshkhyá; f uv zl sh klz h ayhzshkhy h
upunúu lzjypihuv, xbl ohjlu slayh wyvjlzhkh, xbl uv sh lualuklyá Zhahuáz.
— Wblz, ¿xbé zl oh kl ohjly kl sh mpyth? —kpqv Zhujov.

— Ubujh shz jhyahz kl Hthkíz zl mpythu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

— Lzaá iplu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv sh spiyhugh mvygvzhtlual zl oh kl
mpythy, f ézh, zp zl ayhzshkh, kpyáu xbl sh mpyth lz mhszh f xblkhyétl zpu
wvsspuvz.

— Sh spiyhugh pyá lu ls tlztv spiypssv mpythkh; xbl, lu cpéukvsh, tp zviypuh
uv wvukyá kpmpjbsahk lu jbtwspssh. F, lu sv xbl avjh h sh jhyah kl htvylz,
wvukyáz wvy mpyth: "Cblzayv ohzah sh tblyal, ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal
Mpnbyh". F ohyá wvjv hs jhzv xbl chfh kl thuv hqluh, wvyxbl, h sv xbl fv tl
zé hjvykhy, Kbsjpulh uv zhil lzjypipy up slly, f lu avkh zb cpkh oh cpzav
slayh tíh up jhyah tíh, wvyxbl tpz htvylz f svz zbfvz ohu zpkv zpltwyl
wshaóupjvz, zpu lzaluklyzl h táz xbl h bu ovulzav tpyhy. F hbu lzav ahu kl
jbhukv lu jbhukv, xbl vzhyé qbyhy jvu clykhk xbl lu kvjl hñvz xbl oh xbl sh
xbplyv táz xbl h sh sbtiyl klzavz vqvz xbl ohu kl jvtly sh aplyyh, uv sh ol
cpzav jbhayv cljlz; f hbu wvkyá zly xbl klzahz jbhayv cljlz uv obiplzl lssh
ljohkv kl cly sh buh xbl sh tpyhih: ahs lz ls yljhav f lujlyyhtpluav jvu
xbl zbz whkylz, Svylugv Jvyjoblsv, f zb thkyl, Hskvugh Uvnhslz, sh ohu
jyphkv.

— ¡Ah, ah! —kpqv Zhujov—. ¿Xbl sh opqh kl Svylugv Jvyjoblsv lz sh zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, sshthkh wvy vayv uvtiyl Hskvugh Svylugv?

— Ézh lz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f lz sh xbl tlyljl zly zlñvyh kl avkv ls
bupclyzv.

— Iplu sh jvuvgjv —kpqv Zhujov—, f zé kljpy xbl apyh ahu iplu buh ihyyh jvtv
ls táz mvygbkv ghnhs kl avkv ls wblisv. ¡Cpcl ls Khkvy, xbl lz tvgh kl
johwh, oljoh f klyljoh f kl wlsv lu wljov, f xbl wblkl zhjhy sh ihyih kls
svkv h jbhsxbply jhihsslyv hukhual, v wvy hukhy, xbl sh abcplyl wvy zlñvyh!
¡Vo opklwbah, xbé ylqv xbl aplul, f xbé cvg! Zé kljpy xbl zl wbzv bu kíh
lujpth kls jhtwhuhypv kls hsklh h sshthy buvz ghnhslz zbfvz xbl hukhihu lu
bu ihyiljov kl zb whkyl, f, hbuxbl lzahihu kl hssí táz kl tlkph slnbh, hzí
sh vflyvu jvtv zp lzabcplyhu hs wpl kl sh avyyl. F sv tlqvy xbl aplul lz
xbl uv lz uhkh tlspukyvzh, wvyxbl aplul tbjov kl jvyalzhuh: jvu avkvz zl
ibysh f kl avkv ohjl tbljh f kvuhpyl. Hovyh kpnv, zlñvy Jhihsslyv kl sh
Aypzal Mpnbyh, xbl uv zvshtlual wblkl f klil cblzayh tlyjlk ohjly svjbyhz
wvy lssh, zpuv xbl, jvu qbzav aíabsv, wblkl klzlzwlyhyzl f hovyjhyzl; xbl
uhkpl ohiyá xbl sv zlwh xbl uv kpnh xbl opgv klthzphkv kl iplu, wblzav xbl
sl sslcl ls kphisv. F xblyyíh fh clytl lu jhtpuv, zósv wvy clssh; xbl oh
tbjovz kíhz xbl uv sh clv, f klil kl lzahy fh ayvjhkh, wvyxbl nhzah tbjov
sh mhg kl shz tbqlylz hukhy zpltwyl hs jhtwv, hs zvs f hs hpyl. F jvumplzv
h cblzayh tlyjlk buh clykhk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval: xbl ohzah hxbí ol lzahkv lu
buh nyhukl pnuvyhujph; xbl wluzhih iplu f mplstlual xbl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh
kliíh kl zly hsnbuh wypujlzh kl xbplu cblzayh tlyjlk lzahih luhtvyhkv, v
hsnbuh wlyzvuh ahs, xbl tlyljplzl svz ypjvz wylzlualz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl
oh lucphkv: hzí ls kls cpgjhíuv jvtv ls kl svz nhslvalz, f vayvz tbjovz xbl
klilu zly, zlnúu klilu kl zly tbjohz shz cpavyphz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk oh
nhuhkv f nhuó lu ls apltwv xbl fv húu uv lyh zb lzjbklyv. Wlyv, iplu
jvuzpklyhkv, ¿xbé zl sl oh kl khy h sh zlñvyh Hskvugh Svylugv, kpnv, h sh
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, kl xbl zl sl chfhu h opujhy kl yvkpsshz klshual
klssh svz clujpkvz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl lucíh f oh kl lucphy? Wvyxbl
wvkyíh zly xbl, hs apltwv xbl lssvz sslnhzlu, lzabcplzl lssh yhzaypsshukv
spuv, v aypsshukv lu shz lyhz, f lssvz zl jvyyplzlu kl clysh, f lssh zl
yplzl f lumhkhzl kls wylzlual.

— Fh al alunv kpjov hualz kl hnvyh tbjohz cljlz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—,
xbl lylz tbf nyhukl ohishkvy, f xbl, hbuxbl kl punlupv ivav, tbjohz cljlz
klzwbuahz kl hnbkv. Thz, whyh xbl clhz jbáu uljpv lylz aú f jbáu kpzjylav
zvf fv, xbplyv xbl tl vfhz bu iylcl jbluav. «Ohz kl zhily xbl buh cpbkh
olytvzh, tvgh, spiyl f ypjh, f, zviyl avkv, klzlumhkhkh, zl luhtvyó kl bu
tvgv tvapsóu, yvsspgv f kl iblu avtv. Hsjhugósv h zhily zb thfvy, f bu kíh
kpqv h sh ibluh cpbkh, wvy cíh kl myhalyuhs ylwyloluzpóu: ''Thyhcpsshkv
lzavf, zlñvyh, f uv zpu tbjoh jhbzh, kl xbl buh tbqly ahu wypujpwhs, ahu
olytvzh f ahu ypjh jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk, zl ohfh luhtvyhkv kl bu ovtiyl ahu
zvlg, ahu ihqv f ahu pkpvah jvtv mbshuv, ohiplukv lu lzah jhzh ahuavz
thlzayvz, ahuavz wylzluahkvz f ahuavz alósvnvz, lu xbplu cblzayh tlyjlk
wbkplyh lzjvnly jvtv luayl wlyhz, f kljpy: "Ézal xbplyv, hxbézal uv
xbplyv"''. Thz lssh sl ylzwvukpó, jvu tbjov kvuhpyl f klzlucvsabyh:
''Cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív, lzaá tbf lunhñhkv, f wpluzh tbf h sv huapnbv
zp wpluzh xbl fv ol lzjvnpkv ths lu mbshuv, wvy pkpvah xbl sl whyljl, wblz,
whyh sv xbl fv sl xbplyv, ahuah mpsvzvmíh zhil, f táz, xbl Hypzaóalslz''».
Hzí xbl, Zhujov, wvy sv xbl fv xbplyv h Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, ahuav chsl
jvtv sh táz hsah wypujlzh kl sh aplyyh. Zí, xbl uv avkvz svz wvlahz xbl
hshihu khthz, klihqv kl bu uvtiyl xbl lssvz h zb hsilkyív slz wvulu, lz
clykhk xbl shz aplulu. ¿Wpluzhz aú xbl shz Hthypslz, shz Mpspz, shz
Zpscphz, shz Kphuhz, shz Nhshalhz, shz Hspkhz f vayhz ahslz kl xbl svz
spiyvz, svz yvthujlz, shz aplukhz kl svz ihyilyvz, svz alhayvz kl shz
jvtlkphz, lzaáu ssluvz, mblyvu clykhklyhtlual khthz kl jhyul f oblzv, f kl
hxbéssvz xbl shz jlsliyhu f jlsliyhyvu? Uv, wvy jplyav, zpuv xbl shz táz zl
shz mpunlu, wvy khy zbiqlav h zbz clyzvz f wvyxbl svz alunhu wvy luhtvyhkvz
f wvy ovtiylz xbl aplulu chsvy whyh zlysv. F hzí, iázahtl h tí wluzhy f
jylly xbl sh ibluh kl Hskvugh Svylugv lz olytvzh f ovulzah; f lu sv kls
spuhql ptwvyah wvjv, xbl uv ohu kl py h ohjly sh pumvythjpóu kés whyh khysl
hsnúu oáipav, f fv tl ohnv jbluah xbl lz sh táz hsah wypujlzh kls tbukv.
Wvyxbl ohz kl zhily, Zhujov, zp uv sv zhilz, xbl kvz jvzhz zvshz pujpahu h
hthy táz xbl vayhz, xbl zvu sh tbjoh olytvzbyh f sh ibluh mhth; f lzahz kvz
jvzhz zl ohsshu jvuzbthkhtlual lu Kbsjpulh, wvyxbl lu zly olytvzh upunbuh
sl pnbhsh, f lu sh ibluh mhth, wvjhz sl sslnhu. F whyh jvujsbpy jvu avkv,
fv pthnpuv xbl avkv sv xbl kpnv lz hzí, zpu xbl zviyl up mhsal uhkh; f
wíuavsh lu tp pthnpuhjpóu jvtv sh klzlv, hzí lu sh ilsslgh jvtv lu sh
wypujpwhspkhk, f up sh sslnh Lsluh, up sh hsjhugh Sbjyljph, up vayh hsnbuh
kl shz mhtvzhz tbqlylz kl shz lkhklz wylaéypahz, nyplnh, iáyihyh v shapuh.
F kpnh jhkh buv sv xbl xbpzplyl; xbl zp wvy lzav mblyl ylwylolukpkv kl svz
pnuvyhualz, uv zlyé jhzapnhkv kl svz ypnbyvzvz.

— Kpnv xbl lu avkv aplul cblzayh tlyjlk yhgóu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f xbl fv
zvf bu hzuv. Thz uv zé fv whyh xbé uvtiyv hzuv lu tp ivjh, wblz uv zl oh kl
tluahy sh zvnh lu jhzh kls hovyjhkv. Wlyv clunh sh jhyah, f h Kpvz, xbl tl
tbkv.

Zhjó ls spiyv kl tltvyph kvu Xbpqval, f, hwhyaáukvzl h buh whyal, jvu tbjov
zvzplnv jvtlugó h lzjypipy sh jhyah; f, lu hjhiáukvsh, sshtó h Zhujov f sl
kpqv xbl zl sh xblyíh slly, wvyxbl sh avthzl kl tltvyph, zp hjhzv zl sl
wlykplzl wvy ls jhtpuv, wvyxbl kl zb klzkpjoh avkv zl wvkíh altly. H sv
jbhs ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Lzjyíihsh cblzayh tlyjlk kvz v aylz cljlz hoí lu ls spiyv f kétlsl, xbl fv
sl sslchyé iplu nbhykhkv, wvyxbl wluzhy xbl fv sh ol kl avthy lu sh tltvyph
lz kpzwhyhal: xbl sh alunv ahu thsh xbl tbjohz cljlz zl tl vscpkh jótv tl
sshtv. Wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, kínhtlsh cblzayh tlyjlk, xbl tl ovsnhyé tbjov kl
víssh, xbl klil kl py jvtv kl tvskl.

— Lzjbjoh, xbl hzí kpjl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval:

Jhyah kl kvu Xbpqval h Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv

Zvilyhuh f hsah zlñvyh:

Ls mlypkv kl wbuah kl hbzlujph f ls sshnhkv kl shz alshz kls jvyhgóu,
kbsjízpth Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, al lucíh sh zhsbk xbl és uv aplul. Zp ab
mlytvzbyh tl klzwyljph, zp ab chsvy uv lz lu tp wyv, zp abz klzklulz zvu lu
tp hmpujhtpluav, thnbly xbl fv zlh hzhg kl zbmypkv, ths wvkyé zvzalulytl lu
lzah jbpah, xbl, hkltáz kl zly mblyal, lz tbf kbyhklyh. Tp iblu lzjbklyv
Zhujov al khyá lualyh ylshjpóu, ¡vo ilssh punyhah, hthkh lultpnh tíh!, kls
tvkv xbl wvy ab jhbzh xblkv. Zp nbzahylz kl hjvyylytl, abfv zvf; f zp uv,
ohg sv xbl al cpuplyl lu nbzav; xbl, jvu hjhihy tp cpkh, ohiyé zhapzmljov h
ab jyblskhk f h tp klzlv.

Abfv ohzah sh tblyal,

Ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh.

— Wvy cpkh kl tp whkyl —kpqv Zhujov lu vflukv sh jhyah—, xbl lz sh táz hsah
jvzh xbl qhtáz ol víkv. ¡Wlzph h tí, f jótv xbl sl kpjl cblzayh tlyjlk hoí
avkv jbhuav xbplyl, f xbé iplu xbl lujhqh lu sh mpyth Ls Jhihsslyv kl sh
Aypzal Mpnbyh! Kpnv kl clykhk xbl lz cblzayh tlyjlk ls tlztv kphisv, f xbl
uv ohfh jvzh xbl uv zlwh.

— Avkv lz tlulzaly —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— whyh ls vmpjpv xbl ayhfv.
— Lh, wblz —kpqv Zhujov—, wvunh cblzayh tlyjlk lu lzvayh cblsah sh jékbsh kl
svz aylz wvsspuvz f míytlsh jvu tbjoh jshypkhk, wvyxbl sh jvuvgjhu lu
cpéukvsh.

— Xbl tl wshjl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

F, ohipéukvsh lzjypav,zl sh slfó; xbl kljíh huzí:

Thukhyá cblzayh tlyjlk, wvy lzah wyptlyh kl wvsspuvz, zlñvyh zviypuh, khy h
Zhujov Whugh, tp lzjbklyv, aylz kl svz jpujv xbl klqé lu jhzh f lzaáu h
jhynv kl cblzayh tlyjlk. Svz jbhslz aylz wvsspuvz zl svz thukv spiyhy f
whnhy wvy vayvz ahuavz hxbí yljlipkvz kl jvuahkv, xbl jvuzah, f jvu zb
jhyah kl whnv zlyáu iplu khkvz. Mljoh lu shz luayhñhz kl Zplyyh Tvyluh, h
clpual f kvz kl hnvzav klzal wylzlual hñv.

— Ibluh lzaá —kpqv Zhujov—; míytlsh cblzayh tlyjlk.

— Uv lz tlulzaly mpythysh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zpuv zvshtlual wvuly tp
yúiypjh, xbl lz sv tlztv xbl mpyth, f whyh aylz hzuvz, f hbu whyh
ayljpluavz, mblyh ihzahual.

— Fv tl jvumív kl cblzayh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Kéqltl, pyé h luzpsshy
h Yvjpuhual, f hwhyéqlzl cblzayh tlyjlk h ljohytl zb ilukpjpóu, xbl sblnv
wpluzv whyapytl, zpu cly shz zhukljlz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk oh kl ohjly, xbl
fv kpyé xbl sl cp ohjly ahuahz xbl uv xbplyh táz.

— Wvy sv tluvz xbplyv, Zhujov, f wvyxbl lz tlulzaly huzí, xbplyv, kpnv, xbl
tl clhz lu jblyvz, f ohjly buh v kvz kvjluhz kl svjbyhz, xbl shz ohyé lu
tluvz kl tlkph ovyh, wvyxbl, ohipéukvshz aú cpzav wvy abz vqvz, wblkhz
qbyhy h ab zhscv lu shz kltáz xbl xbpzplylz hñhkpy; f hzlnúyval xbl uv
kpyáz aú ahuahz jbhuahz fv wpluzv ohjly.

— Wvy htvy kl Kpvz, zlñvy tív, xbl uv clh fv lu jblyvz h cblzayh tlyjlk, xbl
tl khyá tbjoh sázapth f uv wvkyé klqhy kl ssvyhy; f alunv ahs sh jhilgh,
kls sshuav xbl huvjol opjl wvy ls ybjpv, xbl uv lzavf whyh tlalytl lu
ublcvz ssvyvz; f zp lz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk nbzah kl xbl fv clh hsnbuhz
svjbyhz, oánhshz clzapkv, iylclz f shz xbl sl cpuplylu táz h jbluav. Jbhuav
táz, xbl whyh tí uv lyh tlulzaly uhkh klzv, f, jvtv fh alunv kpjov, mblyh

— Htpnv Zhujov Whugh, ¿hkóukl xblkh cblzayv htv?

— Uv, uv —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, Zhujov Whugh; zp cvz uv uvz kljíz kóukl xblkh,

— Uv ohf whyh xbé jvutpnv htluhghz, xbl fv uv zvf ovtiyl xbl yviv up thav h

Xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz svz kvz kl sv xbl Zhujov Whugh slz jvuahih; f, hbuxbl fh

— ¿Xbé tl oh kl zbjlkly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zpuv ls ohily wlykpkv kl buh

— Ol wlykpkv ls spiyv kl tltvyph —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, kvukl cluíh jhyah whyh

ohjíhu lu spiyvz kl tltvyph qhtáz zl hjlahihu up jbtwsíhu.

Jvu lzav zl jvuzvsó Zhujov, f kpqv xbl, jvtv hxblssv mblzl huzí, xbl uv sl
khih tbjoh wluh sh wéykpkh kl sh jhyah kl Kbsjpulh, wvyxbl és sh zhiíh jhzp

— Kljpskv, Zhujov, wblz —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, xbl klzwbéz sh ayhzshkhyltvz.
Whyózl Zhujov Whugh h yhzjhy sh jhilgh whyh ayhly h sh tltvyph sh jhyah, f
fh zl wvuíh zviyl bu wpl, f fh zviyl vayv; buhz cljlz tpyhih hs zblsv,

— Wvy Kpvz, zlñvy spjlujphkv, xbl svz kphisvz sslclu sh jvzh xbl kl sh jhyah
zl tl hjblykh; hbuxbl lu ls wypujpwpv kljíh: «Hsah f zvihqhkh zlñvyh».
— Uv kpyíh —kpqv ls ihyilyv— zvihqhkh, zpuv zviylobthuh v zvilyhuh zlñvyh.
— Hzí lz —kpqv Zhujov—. Sblnv, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, wyvzlnbíh..., zp ths uv
tl hjblykv: «ls sslnv f mhsav kl zblñv, f ls mlypkv ilzh h cblzayh tlyjlk
shz thuvz, punyhah f tbf klzjvuvjpkh olytvzh», f uv zé xbé kljíh kl zhsbk f
kl lumlytlkhk xbl sl lucphih, f wvy hxbí pih lzjbyyplukv, ohzah xbl hjhihih
lu «Cblzayv ohzah sh tblyal, ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh».

Uv wvjv nbzahyvu svz kvz kl cly sh ibluh tltvyph kl Zhujov Whugh, f
hshiáyvuzlsh tbjov, f sl wpkplyvu xbl kpqlzl sh jhyah vayhz kvz cljlz, whyh
xbl lssvz, huzptlztv, sh avthzlu kl tltvyph whyh ayhzshkhssh h zb apltwv.
Avyuósh h kljpy Zhujov vayhz aylz cljlz, f vayhz ahuahz cvscpó h kljpy
vayvz aylz tps kpzwhyhalz. Ayhz lzav, jvuaó hzptlztv shz jvzhz kl zb htv,
wlyv uv ohisó whshiyh hjlyjh kls thualhtpluav xbl sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu
hxblssh cluah, lu sh jbhs ylobzhih luayhy. Kpqv ahtipéu jvtv zb zlñvy, lu
ayhflukv xbl sl aybqlzl iblu klzwhjov kl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, zl
ohiíh kl wvuly lu jhtpuv h wyvjbyhy jótv zly ltwlyhkvy, v, wvy sv tluvz,
tvuhyjh; xbl hzí sv aluíhu jvujlyahkv luayl svz kvz, f lyh jvzh tbf májps
clupy h zlysv, zlnúu lyh ls chsvy kl zb wlyzvuh f sh mblygh kl zb iyhgv; f
xbl, lu zpéukvsv, sl ohiíh kl jhzhy h és, wvyxbl fh zlyíh cpbkv, xbl uv
wvkíh zly tluvz, f sl ohiíh kl khy wvy tbqly h buh kvujlssh kl sh
ltwlyhaypg, olylklyh kl bu ypjv f nyhukl lzahkv kl aplyyh mpytl, zpu
íuzbsvz up íuzbshz, xbl fh uv shz xblyíh.

Kljíh lzav Zhujov jvu ahuav ylwvzv, sptwpáukvzl kl jbhukv lu jbhukv shz
uhypjlz, f jvu ahu wvjv qbpjpv, xbl svz kvz zl hktpyhyvu kl ublcv,
jvuzpklyhukv jbáu cloltlual ohiíh zpkv sh svjbyh kl kvu Xbpqval, wblz ohiíh
sslchkv ayhz zí ls qbpjpv kl hxbls wviyl ovtiyl. Uv xbpzplyvu jhuzhyzl lu
zhjhysl kls lyyvy lu xbl lzahih, whyljpéukvslz xbl, wblz uv sl khñhih uhkh
sh jvujplujph, tlqvy lyh klqhysl lu és, f h lssvz slz zlyíh kl táz nbzav
víy zbz uljlkhklz. F hzí, sl kpqlyvu xbl yvnhzl h Kpvz wvy sh zhsbk kl zb
zlñvy, xbl jvzh jvuapunlual f tbf hnpisl lyh clupy, jvu ls kpzjbyzv kls
apltwv, h zly ltwlyhkvy, jvtv és kljíh, v, wvy sv tluvz, hygvipzwv, v vayh
kpnupkhk lxbpchslual. H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Zlñvylz, zp sh mvyabuh yvklhzl shz jvzhz kl thulyh xbl h tp htv sl cpuplzl
lu cvsbuahk kl uv zly ltwlyhkvy, zpuv kl zly hygvipzwv, xblyyíh fv zhily
hnvyh xbé zblslu khy svz hygvipzwvz hukhualz h zbz lzjbklyvz.
— Zbésluslz khy —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh— hsnúu ilulmpjpv, zptwsl v jbyhkv, v
hsnbuh zhjypzahuíh, xbl slz chsl tbjov kl yluah yluahkh, htéu kls wpl kl
hsahy, xbl zl zblsl lzapthy lu vayv ahuav.

— Whyh lzv zlyá tlulzaly —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl ls lzjbklyv uv zlh jhzhkv f
xbl zlwh hfbkhy h tpzh, wvy sv tluvz; f zp lzav lz hzí, ¡klzkpjohkv kl fv,
xbl zvf jhzhkv f uv zé sh wyptlyh slayh kls HIJ! ¿Xbé zlyá kl tí zp h tp
htv sl kh huavqv kl zly hygvipzwv, f uv ltwlyhkvy, jvtv lz bzv f jvzabtiyl
kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz?

— Uv alunápz wluh, Zhujov htpnv —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, xbl hxbí yvnhyltvz h
cblzayv htv f zl sv hjvuzlqhyltvz, f hbu zl sv wvukyltvz lu jhzv kl
jvujplujph, xbl zlh ltwlyhkvy f uv hygvipzwv, wvyxbl sl zlyá táz májps, h
jhbzh kl xbl és lz táz chsplual xbl lzabkphual.

— Hzí tl oh whyljpkv h tí —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, hbuxbl zé kljpy xbl whyh avkv
aplul ohipspkhk. Sv xbl fv wpluzv ohjly kl tp whyal lz yvnhysl h Ublzayv
Zlñvy xbl sl ljol h hxblsshz whyalz kvukl és táz zl zpych f hkvukl h tí táz
tlyjlklz tl ohnh.

— Cvz sv kljíz jvtv kpzjylav —kpqv ls jbyh— f sv ohyépz jvtv iblu jypzaphuv.
Thz sv xbl hovyh zl oh kl ohjly lz khy vyklu jvtv zhjhy h cblzayv htv kl
hxblssh puúaps wlupalujph xbl kljíz xbl xblkh ohjplukv; f, whyh wluzhy ls
tvkv xbl oltvz kl aluly, f whyh jvtly, xbl fh lz ovyh, zlyá iplu uvz
luayltvz lu lzah cluah.

Zhujov kpqv xbl luayhzlu lssvz, xbl és lzwlyhyíh hssí mblyh f xbl klzwbéz
slz kpyíh sh jhbzh wvy xbl uv luayhih up sl jvucluíh luayhy lu lssh; thz
xbl slz yvnhih xbl sl zhjhzlu hssí hsnv kl jvtly xbl mblzl jvzh jhsplual,
f, huzptpztv, jlihkh whyh Yvjpuhual. Lssvz zl luayhyvu f sl klqhyvu, f, kl
hssí h wvjv, ls ihyilyv sl zhjó kl jvtly. Klzwbéz, ohiplukv iplu wluzhkv
luayl svz kvz ls tvkv xbl alukyíhu whyh jvuzlnbpy sv xbl klzlhihu, cpuv ls
jbyh lu bu wluzhtpluav tbf hjvtvkhkv hs nbzav kl kvu Xbpqval f whyh sv xbl
lssvz xblyíhu. F mbl xbl kpqv hs ihyilyv xbl sv xbl ohiíh wluzhkv lyh xbl
és zl clzapyíh lu oáipav kl kvujlssh hukhual, f xbl és wyvjbyhzl wvulyzl sv
tlqvy xbl wbkplzl jvtv lzjbklyv, f xbl hzí pyíhu hkvukl kvu Xbpqval lzahih,
mpunplukv zly lssh buh kvujlssh hmspnpkh f tlulzalyvzh, f sl wlkpyíh bu
kvu, ls jbhs és uv wvkyíh klqáyzlsl kl vavynhy, jvtv chslyvzv jhihsslyv
hukhual. F xbl ls kvu xbl sl wluzhih wlkpy lyh xbl zl cpuplzl jvu lssh
kvukl lssh sl sslchzl, h klzmhjlssl bu hnyhcpv xbl bu ths jhihsslyv sl
aluíh mljov; f xbl sl zbwspjhih, huzptlztv, xbl uv sh thukhzl xbpahy zb
huapmhg, up sh klthukhzl jvzh kl zb mhjplukh, mhzah xbl sh obiplzl mljov
klyljov kl hxbls ths jhihsslyv; f xbl jylflzl, zpu kbkh, xbl kvu Xbpqval
clukyíh lu avkv jbhuav sl wpkplzl wvy lzal aéytpuv; f xbl klzah thulyh sl
zhjhyíhu kl hssí f sl sslchyíhu h zb sbnhy, kvukl wyvjbyhyíhu cly zp aluíh
hsnúu yltlkpv zb lzayhñh svjbyh.




Jhwíabsv EECPP. Kl jótv zhsplyvu jvu zb pualujpóu ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, jvu
vayhz jvzhz kpnuhz kl xbl zl jblualu lu lzah nyhukl opzavyph

Uv sl whyljpó ths hs ihyilyv sh puclujpóu kls jbyh, zpuv ahu iplu, xbl
sblnv sh wbzplyvu wvy viyh. Wpkpéyvusl h sh clualyh buh zhfh f buhz avjhz,
klqáukvsl lu wylukhz buh zvahuh ublch kls jbyh. Ls ihyilyv opgv buh nyhu
ihyih kl buh jvsh ybjph v yvqh kl iblf, kvukl ls clualyv aluíh jvsnhkv ls
wlpul. Wylnbuaóslz sh clualyh xbl whyh xbé sl wlkíhu hxblsshz jvzhz. Ls
jbyh sl jvuaó lu iylclz yhgvulz sh svjbyh kl kvu Xbpqval, f jótv jvucluíh
hxbls kpzmyhg whyh zhjhysl kl sh tvuahñh, kvukl h sh zhgóu lzahih. Jhflyvu
sblnv ls clualyv f sh clualyh lu xbl ls svjv lyh zb obézwlk, ls kls
iászhtv, f ls htv kls thualhkv lzjbklyv, f jvuahyvu hs jbyh avkv sv xbl jvu
és slz ohiíh whzhkv, zpu jhsshy sv xbl ahuav jhsshih Zhujov. Lu ylzvsbjpóu,
sh clualyh cpzapó hs jbyh kl tvkv xbl uv ohiíh táz xbl cly: wúzvsl buh zhfh
kl whñv, ssluh kl mhqhz kl alyjpvwlsv ulnyv kl bu whstv lu hujov, avkhz
hjbjopsshkhz, f buvz jvywpñvz kl alyjpvwlsv clykl, nbhyuljpkvz jvu buvz
ypilalz kl yhzv ishujv, xbl zl kliplyvu kl ohjly, lssvz f sh zhfh, lu
apltwv kls ylf Dhtih. Uv jvuzpuapó ls jbyh xbl sl avjhzlu, zpuv wúzvzl lu
sh jhilgh bu ipyylapssv kl splugv jvsjohkv xbl sslchih whyh kvytpy kl
uvjol, f jpñózl wvy sh mylual buh spnh kl ahmlaáu ulnyv, f jvu vayh spnh
opgv bu huapmhg, jvu xbl zl jbiypó tbf iplu shz ihyihz f ls yvzayv;
lujhzxblaózl zb zvtiylyv, xbl lyh ahu nyhukl xbl sl wvkíh zlycpy kl
xbpahzvs, f, jbiypéukvzl zb olyylyblsv, zbipó lu zb tbsh h tbqlyplnhz, f ls
ihyilyv lu sh zbfh, jvu zb ihyih xbl sl sslnhih h sh jpuabyh, luayl yvqh f
ishujh, jvtv hxblssh xbl, jvtv zl oh kpjov, lyh oljoh kl sh jvsh kl bu iblf
ihyyvzv.

Klzwpkpéyvuzl kl avkvz, f kl sh ibluh kl Thypavyulz, xbl wyvtlapó kl ylghy
bu yvzhypv, hbuxbl wljhkvyh, wvyxbl Kpvz slz kplzl iblu zbjlzv lu ahu hykbv
f ahu jypzaphuv ulnvjpv jvtv lyh ls xbl ohiíhu ltwylukpkv.

Thz, hwluhz obiv zhspkv kl sh cluah, jbhukv sl cpuv hs jbyh bu wluzhtpluav:
xbl ohjíh ths lu ohilyzl wblzav kl hxblssh thulyh, wvy zly jvzh pukljlual
xbl bu zhjlykval zl wbzplzl hzí, hbuxbl sl mblzl tbjov lu lssv; f,
kpjpéukvzlsv hs ihyilyv, sl yvnó xbl ayvjhzlu ayhqlz, wblz lyh táz qbzav
xbl és mblzl sh kvujlssh tlulzalyvzh, f xbl és ohyíh ls lzjbklyv, f xbl hzí
zl wyvmhuhih tluvz zb kpnupkhk; f xbl zp uv sv xblyíh ohjly, klalytpuhih kl
uv whzhy hklshual, hbuxbl h kvu Xbpqval zl sl sslchzl ls kphisv.

Lu lzav, sslnó Zhujov, f kl cly h svz kvz lu hxbls ayhql uv wbkv aluly sh
ypzh. Lu lmlav, ls ihyilyv cpuv lu avkv hxblssv xbl ls jbyh xbpzv, f,
ayvjhukv sh puclujpóu, ls jbyh sl mbl pumvythukv ls tvkv xbl ohiíh kl aluly
f shz whshiyhz xbl ohiíh kl kljpy h kvu Xbpqval whyh tvclysl f mvyghysl h
xbl jvu és zl cpuplzl, f klqhzl sh xblylujph kls sbnhy xbl ohiíh lzjvnpkv
whyh zb chuh wlupalujph. Ls ihyilyv ylzwvukpó xbl, zpu xbl zl sl kplzl
spjpóu, és sv wvukyíh iplu lu zb wbuav. Uv xbpzv clzapyzl wvy luavujlz,
ohzah xbl lzabcplzlu qbuav kl kvukl kvu Xbpqval lzahih; f hzí, kvisó zbz
clzapkvz, f ls jbyh hjvtvkó zb ihyih, f zpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv, nbpáukvsvz
Zhujov Whugh; ls jbhs slz mbl jvuahukv sv xbl slz hjvualjpó jvu ls svjv xbl
ohsshyvu lu sh zplyyh, lujbiyplukv, ltwlyv, ls ohsshgnv kl sh thslah f kl
jbhuav lu lssh cluíh; xbl, thnbly xbl avuav, lyh bu wvjv jvkpjpvzv ls
thujliv.

Vayv kíh sslnhyvu hs sbnhy kvukl Zhujov ohiíh klqhkv wblzahz shz zlñhslz kl
shz yhthz whyh hjlyahy ls sbnhy kvukl ohiíh klqhkv h zb zlñvy; f, lu
yljvuvjpéukvsl, slz kpqv jvtv hxbéssh lyh sh luayhkh, f xbl iplu zl wvkíhu
clzapy, zp lyh xbl hxblssv ohjíh hs jhzv whyh sh spilyahk kl zb zlñvy;
wvyxbl lssvz sl ohiíhu kpjov hualz xbl ls py kl hxblssh zblyal f clzapyzl
kl hxbls tvkv lyh avkh sh ptwvyahujph whyh zhjhy h zb htv kl hxblssh thsh
cpkh xbl ohiíh lzjvnpkv, f xbl sl lujhynhihu tbjov xbl uv kpqlzl h zb htv
xbplu lssvz lyhu, up xbl svz jvuvjíh; f xbl zp sl wylnbuahzl, jvtv zl sv
ohiíh kl wylnbuahy, zp kpv sh jhyah h Kbsjpulh, kpqlzl xbl zí, f xbl, wvy
uv zhily slly, sl ohiíh ylzwvukpkv kl whshiyh, kpjpéukvsl xbl sl thukhih,
zv wluh kl sh zb klznyhjph, xbl sblnv hs tvtluav zl cpuplzl h cly jvu lssh,
xbl lyh jvzh xbl sl ptwvyahih tbjov; wvyxbl jvu lzav f jvu sv xbl lssvz
wluzhihu kljpysl aluíhu wvy jvzh jplyah ylkbjpysl h tlqvy cpkh, f ohjly jvu
és xbl sblnv zl wbzplzl lu jhtpuv whyh py h zly ltwlyhkvy v tvuhyjh; xbl lu
sv kl zly hygvipzwv uv ohiíh kl xbé altly.

Avkv sv lzjbjoó Zhujov, f sv avtó tbf iplu lu sh tltvyph, f slz hnyhkljpó
tbjov sh pualujpóu xbl aluíhu kl hjvuzlqhy h zb zlñvy mblzl ltwlyhkvy f uv
hygvipzwv, wvyxbl és aluíh whyh zí xbl, whyh ohjly tlyjlklz h zbz
lzjbklyvz, táz wvkíhu svz ltwlyhkvylz xbl svz hygvipzwvz hukhualz. Ahtipéu
slz kpqv xbl zlyíh iplu xbl és mblzl klshual h ibzjhysl f khysl sh
ylzwblzah kl zb zlñvyh, xbl fh zlyíh lssh ihzahual h zhjhysl kl hxbls
sbnhy, zpu xbl lssvz zl wbzplzlu lu ahuav ayhihqv. Whyljpóslz iplu sv xbl
Zhujov Whugh kljíh, f hzí, klalytpuhyvu kl hnbhykhysl ohzah xbl cvscplzl
jvu shz ublchz kls ohsshgnv kl zb htv.

Luayózl Zhujov wvy hxblsshz xbliyhkhz kl sh zplyyh, klqhukv h svz kvz lu
buh wvy kvukl jvyyíh bu wlxblñv f thuzv hyyvfv, h xbplu ohjíhu zvtiyh
hnyhkhisl f mylzjh vayhz wlñhz f hsnbuvz áyivslz xbl wvy hssí lzahihu. Ls
jhsvy, f ls kíh xbl hssí sslnhyvu, lyh kl svz kls tlz kl hnvzav, xbl wvy
hxblsshz whyalz zblsl zly ls hykvy tbf nyhukl; sh ovyh, shz aylz kl sh
ahykl: avkv sv jbhs ohjíh hs zpapv táz hnyhkhisl, f xbl jvucpkhzl h xbl lu
és lzwlyhzlu sh cblsah kl Zhujov, jvtv sv opjplyvu.

Lzahukv, wblz, svz kvz hssí, zvzlnhkvz f h sh zvtiyh, sslnó h zbz víkvz buh
cvg xbl, zpu hjvtwhñhysh zvu kl hsnúu vayv puzaybtluav, kbsjl f
ylnhshkhtlual zvuhih, kl xbl uv wvjv zl hktpyhyvu, wvy whyljlyslz xbl hxbés
uv lyh sbnhy kvukl wbkplzl ohily xbplu ahu iplu jhuahzl. Wvyxbl, hbuxbl
zblsl kljpyzl xbl wvy shz zlschz f jhtwvz zl ohsshu whzavylz kl cvjlz
lzaylthkhz, táz zvu lujhyljptpluavz kl wvlahz xbl clykhklz; f táz, jbhukv
hkcpyaplyvu xbl sv xbl víhu jhuahy lyhu clyzvz, uv kl yúzapjvz nhuhklyvz,
zpuv kl kpzjylavz jvyalzhuvz. F jvumpytó lzah clykhk ohily zpkv svz clyzvz
xbl vflyvu ézavz:

¿Xbpéu tluvzjhih tpz iplulz?

Sh ovyh, ls apltwv, sh zvslkhk, sh cvg f sh klzaylgh kls xbl jhuahih jhbzó
hktpyhjpóu f jvualuav lu svz kvz vflualz, svz jbhslz zl lzabcplyvu xblkvz,
lzwlyhukv zp vayh hsnbuh jvzh víhu; wlyv, cplukv xbl kbyhih hsnúu ahuav ls
zpslujpv, klalytpuhyvu kl zhspy h ibzjhy ls túzpjv xbl jvu ahu ibluh cvg

Zvulav

Zhuah htpzahk, xbl jvu spnlyhz hshz,
ab hwhyplujph xblkáukvzl lu ls zblsv,
luayl ilukpahz hsthz, lu ls jplsv,
zbipzal hslnyl h shz ptwíylhz zhshz,
klzkl hssá, jbhukv xbplylz, uvz zlñhshz
sh qbzah whg jbiplyah jvu bu clsv,
wvy xbplu h cljlz zl ayhzsbjl ls jlsv
kl ibluhz viyhz xbl, h sh mpu, zvu thshz.
Klqh ls jplsv, ¡vo htpzahk!, v uv wlytpahz
xbl ls lunhñv zl cpzah ab spiylh,
jvu xbl klzaybfl h sh pualujpóu zpujlyh;
xbl zp abz hwhyplujphz uv sl xbpahz,
wylzav oh kl clyzl ls tbukv lu sh wlslh
kl sh kpzjvykl jvumbzpóu wyptlyh.

Ls jhuav zl hjhió jvu bu wyvmbukv zbzwpyv, f svz kvz, jvu halujpóu,
cvscplyvu h lzwlyhy zp táz zl jhuahih; wlyv, cplukv xbl sh túzpjh zl ohiíh
cblsav lu zvssvgvz f lu shzaptlyvz hflz, hjvykhyvu kl zhily xbpéu lyh ls
aypzal, ahu lzaylthkv lu sh cvg jvtv kvsvyvzv lu svz nltpkvz; f uv
hukbcplyvu tbjov, jbhukv, hs cvscly kl buh wbuah kl buh wlñh, cplyvu h bu
ovtiyl kls tpztv ahssl f mpnbyh xbl Zhujov Whugh slz ohiíh wpuahkv jbhukv
slz jvuaó ls jbluav kl Jhyklupv; ls jbhs ovtiyl, jbhukv svz cpv, zpu
zviylzhsahyzl, lzabcv xblkv, jvu sh jhilgh pujspuhkh zviyl ls wljov h nbpzh
kl ovtiyl wluzhapcv, zpu hsghy svz vqvz h tpyhysvz táz kl sh clg wyptlyh,
jbhukv kl ptwyvcpzv sslnhyvu.

Ls jbyh, xbl lyh ovtiyl iplu ohishkv (jvtv ls xbl fh aluíh uvapjph kl zb
klznyhjph, wblz wvy shz zlñhz sl ohiíh jvuvjpkv), zl sslnó h és, f jvu
iylclz hbuxbl tbf kpzjylahz yhgvulz sl yvnó f wlyzbhkpó xbl hxblssh ahu
tpzlyhisl cpkh klqhzl, wvyxbl hssí uv sh wlykplzl, xbl lyh sh klzkpjoh
thfvy kl shz klzkpjohz. Lzahih Jhyklupv luavujlz lu zb lualyv qbpjpv, spiyl
kl hxbls mbypvzv hjjpklual xbl ahu h tlubkv sl zhjhih kl zí tpztv; f hzí,
cplukv h svz kvz lu ayhql ahu uv bzhkv kl svz xbl wvy hxblsshz zvslkhklz
hukhihu, uv klqó kl hktpyhyzl hsnúu ahuav, f táz jbhukv vfó xbl sl ohiíhu
ohishkv lu zb ulnvjpv jvtv lu jvzh zhipkh —wvyxbl shz yhgvulz xbl ls jbyh
sl kpqv hzí sv kplyvu h lualukly—; f hzí, ylzwvukpó klzah thulyh:
— Iplu clv fv, zlñvylz, xbpluxbplyh xbl zlápz, xbl ls jplsv, xbl aplul
jbpkhkv kl zvjvyyly h svz ibluvz, f hbu h svz thsvz tbjohz cljlz, zpu fv
tlyljlysv, tl lucíh, lu lzavz ahu yltvavz f hwhyahkvz sbnhylz kls ayhav
jvtúu kl shz nlualz, hsnbuhz wlyzvuhz xbl, wvupéukvtl klshual kl svz vqvz
jvu cpchz f chyphz yhgvulz jbáu zpu lssh hukv lu ohjly sh cpkh xbl ohnv,
ohu wyvjbyhkv zhjhytl kézah h tlqvy whyal; wlyv, jvtv uv zhilu xbl zé fv
xbl lu zhsplukv klzal khñv ol kl jhly lu vayv thfvy, xbpgá tl klilu kl
aluly wvy ovtiyl kl mshjvz kpzjbyzvz, f hbu, sv xbl wlvy zlyíh, wvy kl
upunúu qbpjpv. F uv zlyíh thyhcpssh xbl hzí mblzl, wvyxbl h tí zl tl
ayhzsbjl xbl sh mblygh kl sh pthnpuhjpóu kl tpz klznyhjphz lz ahu pualuzh f
wblkl ahuav lu tp wlykpjpóu xbl, zpu xbl fv wblkh zly whyal h lzavihysv,
clunv h xblkhy jvtv wplkyh, mhsav kl avkv iblu zluapkv f jvuvjptpluav; f
clunv h jhly lu sh jbluah klzah clykhk, jbhukv hsnbuvz tl kpjlu f tblzayhu
zlñhslz kl shz jvzhz xbl ol oljov lu ahuav xbl hxbls alyypisl hjjpklual tl
zlñvylh, f uv zé táz xbl kvslytl lu chuv f thskljpy zpu wyvcljov tp
cluabyh, f khy wvy kpzjbswh kl tpz svjbyhz ls kljpy sh jhbzh klsshz h
jbhuavz víysh xbplylu; wvyxbl, cplukv svz jblykvz jbás lz sh jhbzh, uv zl
thyhcpsshyáu kl svz lmlavz, f zp uv tl kplylu yltlkpv, h sv tluvz uv tl
khyáu jbswh, jvucpyapéukvzlslz ls luvqv kl tp klzlucvsabyh lu sázapth kl
tpz klznyhjphz. F zp lz xbl cvzvayvz, zlñvylz, cluíz jvu sh tlzth pualujpóu
xbl vayvz ohu clupkv, hualz xbl whzépz hklshual lu cblzayhz kpzjylahz
wlyzbhzpvulz, vz yblnv xbl lzjbjoépz ls jbluav, xbl uv sl aplul, kl tpz
klzcluabyhz; wvyxbl xbpgá, klzwbéz kl lualukpkv, hovyyhyépz kls ayhihqv xbl
avthyépz lu jvuzvshy bu ths xbl kl avkv jvuzblsv lz pujhwhg.

Svz kvz, xbl uv klzlhihu vayh jvzh xbl zhily kl zb tlzth ivjh sh jhbzh kl
zb khñv, sl yvnhyvu zl sh jvuahzl, vmyljpéukvsl kl uv ohjly vayh jvzh kl sh
xbl és xbpzplzl, lu zb yltlkpv v jvuzblsv; f jvu lzav, ls aypzal jhihsslyv
jvtlugó zb shzaptlyh opzavyph, jhzp wvy shz tlzthz whshiyhz f whzvz xbl sh
ohiíh jvuahkv h kvu Xbpqval f hs jhiylyv wvjvz kíhz hayáz, jbhukv, wvy
vjhzpóu kls thlzayv Lspzhiha f wbuabhspkhk kl kvu Xbpqval lu nbhykhy ls
kljvyv h sh jhihsslyíh, zl xblkó ls jbluav ptwlymlav, jvtv sh opzavyph sv
klqh jvuahkv. Wlyv hovyh xbpzv sh ibluh zblyal xbl zl klabcv ls hjjpklual
kl sh svjbyh f sl kpv sbnhy kl jvuahysv ohzah ls mpu; f hzí, sslnhukv hs
whzv kls ipsslal xbl ohiíh ohsshkv kvu Mlyuhukv luayl ls spiyv kl Hthkíz kl
Nhbsh, kpqv Jhyklupv xbl sl aluíh iplu lu sh tltvyph, f xbl kljíh klzah
thulyh:

«Sbzjpukh h Jhyklupv

Jhkh kíh klzjbiyv lu cvz chsvylz xbl tl vispnhu f mblyghu h xbl lu táz vz
lzaptl; f hzí, zp xbpzpéylklz zhjhytl klzah klbkh zpu lqljbahytl lu sh
ovuyh, sv wvkyépz tbf iplu ohjly. Whkyl alunv, xbl vz jvuvjl f xbl tl
xbplyl iplu, ls jbhs, zpu mvyghy tp cvsbuahk, jbtwspyá sh xbl zlyá qbzav
xbl cvz alunápz, zp lz xbl tl lzaptápz jvtv kljíz f jvtv fv jylv.
— »Wvy lzal ipsslal tl tvcí h wlkpy h Sbzjpukh wvy lzwvzh, jvtv fh vz ol
jvuahkv, f ézal mbl wvy xbplu xblkó Sbzjpukh lu sh vwpupóu kl kvu Mlyuhukv
wvy buh kl shz táz kpzjylahz f hcpzhkhz tbqlylz kl zb apltwv; f lzal
ipsslal mbl ls xbl sl wbzv lu klzlv kl klzaybpytl, hualz xbl ls tív zl
lmlabhzl. Kíqlsl fv h kvu Mlyuhukv lu sv xbl ylwhyhih ls whkyl kl Sbzjpukh,
xbl lyh lu xbl tp whkyl zl sh wpkplzl, sv jbhs fv uv sl vzhih kljpy,
altlyvzv xbl uv clukyíh lu lssv, uv wvyxbl uv abcplzl iplu jvuvjpkh sh
jhspkhk, ivukhk, cpyabk f olytvzbyh kl Sbzjpukh, f xbl aluíh whyalz
ihzahualz whyh luvisljly jbhsxbply vayv spuhql kl Lzwhñh, zpuv wvyxbl fv
lualukíh kés xbl klzlhih xbl uv tl jhzhzl ahu wylzav, ohzah cly sv xbl ls
kbxbl Ypjhykv ohjíh jvutpnv. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, sl kpql xbl uv tl hcluabyhih h
kljíyzlsv h tp whkyl, hzí wvy hxbls pujvucluplual jvtv wvy vayvz tbjovz xbl
tl hjvihykhihu, zpu zhily jbáslz lyhu, zpuv xbl tl whyljíh xbl sv xbl fv
klzlhzl qhtáz ohiíh kl aluly lmlav.

»H avkv lzav tl ylzwvukpó kvu Mlyuhukv xbl és zl lujhynhih kl ohishy h tp
whkyl f ohjly jvu és xbl ohishzl hs kl Sbzjpukh. ¡Vo Thypv htipjpvzv, vo
Jhapspuh jybls, vo Zpsh mhjpuvyvzv, vo Nhshsóu ltibzalyv, vo Clsspkv
ayhpkvy, vo Qbspáu clunhapcv, vo Qbkhz jvkpjpvzv! Ayhpkvy, jybls, clunhapcv
f ltibzalyv, ¿xbé klzlycpjpvz al ohiíh oljov lzal aypzal, xbl jvu ahuah
sshulgh al klzjbiypó svz zljylavz f jvualuavz kl zb jvyhgóu? ¿Xbé vmluzh al
opjl? ¿Xbé whshiyhz al kpql, v xbé jvuzlqvz al kp, xbl uv mblzlu avkvz
lujhtpuhkvz h hjyljluahy ab ovuyh f ab wyvcljov? Thz, ¿kl xbé tl xblqv?,
¡klzcluabyhkv kl tí!, wblz lz jvzh jplyah xbl jbhukv ayhlu shz klznyhjphz
sh jvyyplual kl shz lzaylsshz, jvtv cplulu kl hsav h ihqv, klzwlñáukvzl jvu
mbyvy f jvu cpvslujph, uv ohf mblygh lu sh aplyyh xbl shz klalunh, up
pukbzayph obthuh xbl wylclupyshz wblkh. ¿Xbpéu wbkplyh pthnpuhy xbl kvu
Mlyuhukv, jhihsslyv psbzayl, kpzjylav, vispnhkv kl tpz zlycpjpvz, wvklyvzv
whyh hsjhughy sv xbl ls klzlv htvyvzv sl wpkplzl kvuklxbplyh xbl sl
vjbwhzl, zl ohiíh kl lujvuhy, jvtv zblsl kljpyzl, lu avthytl h tí buh zvsh
vclqh, xbl húu uv wvzlíh? Wlyv xbékluzl lzahz jvuzpklyhjpvulz hwhyal, jvtv
puúapslz f zpu wyvcljov, f hñbkltvz ls yvav opsv kl tp klzkpjohkh opzavyph.

»Kpnv, wblz, xbl, whyljpéukvsl h kvu Mlyuhukv xbl tp wylzlujph sl lyh
pujvucluplual whyh wvuly lu lqljbjpóu zb mhszv f ths wluzhtpluav, klalytpuó
kl lucphytl h zb olythuv thfvy, jvu vjhzpóu kl wlkpysl buvz kpulyvz whyh
whnhy zlpz jhihssvz, xbl kl pukbzayph, f zósv whyh lzal lmlav kl xbl tl
hbzluahzl (whyh wvkly tlqvy zhspy jvu zb khñhkv pualuav), ls tlztv kíh xbl
zl vmyljpó ohishy h tp whkyl svz jvtwyó, f xbpzv xbl fv cpuplzl wvy ls
kpulyv. ¿Wbkl fv wylclupy lzah ayhpjpóu? ¿Wbkl, wvy cluabyh, jhly lu
pthnpuhysh? Uv, wvy jplyav; hualz, jvu nyhukízptv nbzav, tl vmyljí h whyapy
sblnv, jvualuav kl sh ibluh jvtwyh oljoh. Hxblssh uvjol ohisé jvu Sbzjpukh,
f sl kpql sv xbl jvu kvu Mlyuhukv xblkhih jvujlyahkv, f xbl abcplzl mpytl
lzwlyhugh kl xbl alukyíhu lmlav ublzayvz ibluvz f qbzavz klzlvz. Lssh tl
kpqv, ahu zlnbyh jvtv fv kl sh ayhpjpóu kl kvu Mlyuhukv, xbl wyvjbyhzl
cvscly wylzav, wvyxbl jylíh xbl uv ahykhyíh táz sh jvujsbzpóu kl ublzayhz
cvsbuahklz xbl ahykhzl tp whkyl kl ohishy hs zbfv. Uv zé xbé zl mbl, xbl,
lu hjhihukv kl kljpytl lzav, zl sl ssluhyvu svz vqvz kl sánypthz f bu ubkv
zl sl hayhclzó lu sh nhynhuah, xbl uv sl klqhih ohishy whshiyh kl vayhz
tbjohz xbl tl whyljpó xbl wyvjbyhih kljpytl.

»Xblké hktpyhkv klzal ublcv hjjpklual, ohzah hssí qhtáz lu lssh cpzav,
wvyxbl zpltwyl uvz ohisáihtvz, shz cljlz xbl sh ibluh mvyabuh f tp
kpspnlujph sv jvujlkíh, jvu avkv ylnvjpqv f jvualuav, zpu tlgjshy lu
ublzayhz wsáapjhz sánypthz, zbzwpyvz, jlsvz, zvzwljohz v altvylz. Avkv lyh
lunyhukljly fv tp cluabyh, wvy ohiéytlsh khkv ls jplsv wvy zlñvyh:
lehnlyhih zb ilsslgh, hktpyáihtl kl zb chsvy f lualukptpluav. Cvscíhtl lssh
ls yljhtipv, hshihukv lu tí sv xbl, jvtv luhtvyhkh, sl whyljíh kpnuv kl
hshihugh. Jvu lzav, uvz jvuaáihtvz jplu tps upñlyíhz f hjhljptpluavz kl
ublzayvz cljpuvz f jvuvjpkvz, f h sv xbl táz zl lualukíh tp klzlucvsabyh
lyh h avthysl, jhzp wvy mblygh, buh kl zbz ilsshz f ishujhz thuvz, f
sslnhysh h tp ivjh, zlnúu khih sbnhy sh lzayljolgh kl buh ihqh ylqh xbl uvz
kpcpkíh. Wlyv sh uvjol xbl wyljlkpó hs aypzal kíh kl tp whyapkh, lssh
ssvyó, nptpó f zbzwpyó, f zl mbl, f tl klqó ssluv kl jvumbzpóu f
zviylzhsav, lzwhuahkv kl ohily cpzav ahu ublchz f ahu aypzalz tblzayhz kl
kvsvy f zluaptpluav lu Sbzjpukh. Wlyv, wvy uv klzaybpy tpz lzwlyhughz, avkv
sv haypibí h sh mblygh kls htvy xbl tl aluíh f hs kvsvy xbl zblsl jhbzhy sh
hbzlujph lu svz xbl iplu zl xbplylu.

»Lu mpu, fv tl whyaí aypzal f wluzhapcv, ssluh ls hsth kl pthnpuhjpvulz f
zvzwljohz, zpu zhily sv xbl zvzwljohih up pthnpuhih: jshyvz pukpjpvz xbl tl
tvzayhihu ls aypzal zbjlzv f klzcluabyh xbl tl lzahih nbhykhkh. Sslnbé hs
sbnhy kvukl lyh lucphkv. Kp shz jhyahz hs olythuv kl kvu Mlyuhukv. Mbp iplu
yljlipkv, wlyv uv iplu klzwhjohkv, wvyxbl tl thukó hnbhykhy, iplu h tp
kpznbzav, vjov kíhz, f lu whyal kvukl ls kbxbl, zb whkyl, uv tl cplzl,
wvyxbl zb olythuv sl lzjypiíh xbl sl lucphzl jplyav kpulyv zpu zb
zhipkbyíh. F avkv mbl puclujpóu kls mhszv kvu Mlyuhukv, wblz uv sl mhsahihu
h zb olythuv kpulyvz whyh klzwhjohytl sblnv. Vyklu f thukhav mbl ézal xbl
tl wbzv lu jvukpjpóu kl uv vilkljlysl, wvy whyljlytl ptwvzpisl zbzaluahy
ahuavz kíhz sh cpkh lu ls hbzlujph kl Sbzjpukh, f táz, ohipéukvsh klqhkv
jvu sh aypzalgh xbl vz ol jvuahkv; wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, vilkljí, jvtv iblu
jyphkv, hbuxbl clíh xbl ohiíh kl zly h jvzah kl tp zhsbk.

»Wlyv, h svz jbhayv kíhz xbl hssí sslnbé, sslnó bu ovtiyl lu tp ibzjh jvu
buh jhyah, xbl tl kpv, xbl lu ls zviylzjypav jvuvjí zly kl Sbzjpukh, wvyxbl
sh slayh kés lyh zbfh. Hiyísh, altlyvzv f jvu zviylzhsav, jylflukv xbl jvzh
nyhukl kliíh kl zly sh xbl sh ohiíh tvcpkv h lzjypipytl lzahukv hbzlual,
wblz wylzlual wvjhz cljlz sv ohjíh. Wylnbuaésl hs ovtiyl, hualz kl sllysh,
xbpéu zl sh ohiíh khkv f ls apltwv xbl ohiíh ahykhkv lu ls jhtpuv. Kíqvtl
xbl hjhzv, whzhukv wvy buh jhssl kl sh jpbkhk h sh ovyh kl tlkpv kíh, buh
zlñvyh tbf olytvzh sl sshtó klzkl buh cluahuh, svz vqvz ssluvz kl sánypthz,
f xbl jvu tbjoh wyplzh sl kpqv: ''Olythuv: zp zvpz jypzaphuv, jvtv
whyljépz, wvy htvy kl Kpvz vz yblnv xbl lujhtpuépz sblnv sblnv lzah jhyah
hs sbnhy f h sh wlyzvuh xbl kpjl ls zviylzjypav, xbl avkv lz iplu jvuvjpkv,
f lu lssv ohyépz bu nyhu zlycpjpv h ublzayv Zlñvy; f, whyh xbl uv vz mhsal
jvtvkpkhk kl wvklysv ohjly, avthk sv xbl ch lu lzal whñblsv''. ''F,
kpjplukv lzav, tl hyyvqó wvy sh cluahuh bu whñblsv, kvukl cluíhu hahkvz
jplu ylhslz f lzah zvyapqh kl vyv xbl hxbí ayhpnv, jvu lzh jhyah xbl vz ol
khkv. F sblnv, zpu hnbhykhy ylzwblzah tíh, zl xbpaó kl sh cluahuh; hbuxbl
wyptlyv cpv jótv fv avté sh jhyah f ls whñblsv, f, wvy zlñhz, sl kpql xbl
ohyíh sv xbl tl thukhih. F hzí, cpéukvtl ahu iplu whnhkv kls ayhihqv xbl
wvkíh avthy lu ayhéyvzsh f jvuvjplukv wvy ls zviylzjypav xbl éyhklz cvz h
xbplu zl lucphih, wvyxbl fv, zlñvy, vz jvuvgjv tbf iplu, f vispnhkv
hzptlztv kl shz sánypthz kl hxblssh olytvzh zlñvyh, klalytpué kl uv mphytl
kl vayh wlyzvuh, zpuv clupy fv tlztv h káyvzsh; f lu kplg f zlpz ovyhz xbl
oh xbl zl tl kpv, ol oljov ls jhtpuv, xbl zhiépz xbl lz kl kplg f vjov
slnbhz''.

»Lu ahuav xbl ls hnyhkljpkv f ublcv jvyylv lzav tl kljíh, lzahih fv jvsnhkv
kl zbz whshiyhz, altisáukvtl shz wplyuhz kl thulyh xbl hwluhz wvkíh
zvzalulytl. Lu lmlav, hiyí sh jhyah f cp xbl jvualuíh lzahz yhgvulz:
Sh whshiyh xbl kvu Mlyuhukv vz kpv kl ohishy h cblzayv whkyl whyh xbl
ohishzl hs tív, sh oh jbtwspkv táz lu zb nbzav xbl lu cblzayv wyvcljov.
Zhilk, zlñvy, xbl és tl oh wlkpkv wvy lzwvzh, f tp whkyl, sslchkv kl sh
cluahqh xbl és wpluzh xbl kvu Mlyuhukv vz ohjl, oh clupkv lu sv xbl xbplyl,
jvu ahuahz clyhz xbl kl hxbí h kvz kíhz zl oh kl ohjly ls klzwvzvypv, ahu
zljylav f ahu h zvshz, xbl zósv ohu kl zly alzapnvz svz jplsvz f hsnbuh
nlual kl jhzh. Jbhs fv xblkv, pthnpuhskv; zp vz jbtwsl clupy, clskv; f zp
vz xbplyv iplu v uv, ls zbjlzv klzal ulnvjpv vz sv khyá h lualukly. H Kpvz
wslnh xbl ézah sslnbl h cblzayhz thuvz hualz xbl sh tíh zl clh lu jvukpjpóu
kl qbuahyzl jvu sh kl xbplu ahu ths zhil nbhykhy sh ml xbl wyvtlal.
»Ézahz, lu zbth, mblyvu shz yhgvulz xbl sh jhyah jvualuíh f shz xbl tl
opjplyvu wvuly sblnv lu jhtpuv, zpu lzwlyhy vayh ylzwblzah up vayvz
kpulyvz; xbl iplu jshyv jvuvjí luavujlz xbl uv sh jvtwyh kl svz jhihssvz,
zpuv sh kl zb nbzav, ohiíh tvcpkv h kvu Mlyuhukv h lucphytl h zb olythuv.
Ls luvqv xbl jvuayh kvu Mlyuhukv jvujlií, qbuav jvu ls altvy kl wlykly sh
wylukh xbl jvu ahuavz hñvz kl zlycpjpvz f klzlvz aluíh nyhuqlhkh, tl
wbzplyvu hshz, wblz, jhzp jvtv lu cblsv, vayv kíh tl wbzl lu tp sbnhy, hs
wbuav f ovyh xbl jvucluíh whyh py h ohishy h Sbzjpukh. Luayé zljylav, f
klqé buh tbsh lu xbl cluíh lu jhzh kls iblu ovtiyl xbl tl ohiíh sslchkv sh
jhyah; f xbpzv sh zblyal xbl luavujlz sh abcplzl ahu ibluh xbl ohssé h
Sbzjpukh wblzah h sh ylqh, alzapnv kl ublzayvz htvylz. Jvuvjpótl Sbzjpukh
sblnv, f jvuvjísh fv; thz uv jvtv kliíh lssh jvuvjlytl f fv jvuvjlysh.
Wlyv, ¿xbpéu ohf lu ls tbukv xbl zl wblkh hshihy xbl oh wlulayhkv f zhipkv
ls jvumbzv wluzhtpluav f jvukpjpóu tbkhisl kl buh tbqly? Upunbuv, wvy
jplyav.

»Kpnv, wblz, xbl, hzí jvtv Sbzjpukh tl cpv, tl kpqv: ''Jhyklupv, kl ivkh
lzavf clzapkh; fh tl lzaáu hnbhykhukv lu sh zhsh kvu Mlyuhukv ls ayhpkvy f
tp whkyl ls jvkpjpvzv, jvu vayvz alzapnvz, xbl hualz sv zlyáu kl tp tblyal
xbl kl tp klzwvzvypv. Uv al abyilz, htpnv, zpuv wyvjbyh ohsshyal wylzlual h
lzal zhjypmpjpv, ls jbhs zp uv wbkplyl zly lzavyihkv kl tpz yhgvulz, buh
khnh sslcv lzjvukpkh xbl wvkyá lzavyihy táz klalytpuhkhz mblyghz, khukv mpu
h tp cpkh f wypujpwpv h xbl jvuvgjhz sh cvsbuahk xbl al ol alupkv f
alunv''. Fv sl ylzwvukí abyihkv f hwyplzh, altlyvzv uv tl mhsahzl sbnhy
whyh ylzwvuklysh: ''Ohnhu, zlñvyh, abz viyhz clykhklyhz abz whshiyhz; xbl
zp aú sslchz khnh whyh hjylkpahyal, hxbí sslcv fv lzwhkh whyh klmluklyal
jvu lssh v whyh thahytl zp sh zblyal uvz mblyl jvuayhyph''. Uv jylv xbl
wbkv víy avkhz lzahz yhgvulz, wvyxbl zluaí xbl sh sshthihu hwyplzh, wvyxbl
ls klzwvzhkv hnbhykhih. Jlyyózl jvu lzav sh uvjol kl tp aypzalgh, wúzvzltl
ls zvs kl tp hslnyíh: xblké zpu sbg lu svz vqvz f zpu kpzjbyzv lu ls
lualukptpluav. Uv hjlyahih h luayhy lu zb jhzh, up wvkíh tvclytl h whyal
hsnbuh; wlyv, jvuzpklyhukv jbáuav ptwvyahih tp wylzlujph whyh sv xbl
zbjlkly wbkplzl lu hxbls jhzv, tl hupté sv táz xbl wbkl f luayé lu zb jhzh.
F, jvtv fh zhiíh tbf iplu avkhz zbz luayhkhz f zhspkhz, f táz jvu ls
hsivyvav xbl kl zljylav lu lssh hukhih, uhkpl tl ljoó kl cly. Hzí xbl, zpu
zly cpzav, abcl sbnhy kl wvulytl lu ls obljv xbl ohjíh buh cluahuh kl sh
tlzth zhsh, xbl jvu shz wbuahz f ylthalz kl kvz ahwpjlz zl jbiyíh, wvy
luayl shz jbhslz wvkíh fv cly, zpu zly cpzav, avkv jbhuav lu sh zhsh zl
ohjíh.

»¿Xbpéu wbkplyh kljpy hovyh svz zviylzhsavz xbl tl kpv ls jvyhgóu tpluayhz
hssí lzabcl, svz wluzhtpluavz xbl tl vjbyyplyvu, shz jvuzpklyhjpvulz xbl
opjl?, xbl mblyvu ahuahz f ahslz, xbl up zl wblklu kljpy up hbu lz iplu xbl
zl kpnhu. Ihzah xbl zlwápz xbl ls klzwvzhkv luayó lu sh zhsh zpu vayv
hkvyuv xbl svz tlztvz clzapkvz vykpuhypvz xbl zvsíh. Ayhíh wvy whkypuv h bu
wyptv olythuv kl Sbzjpukh, f lu avkh sh zhsh uv ohiíh wlyzvuh kl mblyh,
zpuv svz jyphkvz kl jhzh. Kl hssí h bu wvjv, zhspó kl buh yljáthyh
Sbzjpukh, hjvtwhñhkh kl zb thkyl f kl kvz kvujlsshz zbfhz, ahu iplu
hklylghkh f jvtwblzah jvtv zb jhspkhk f olytvzbyh tlyljíhu, f jvtv xbplu
lyh sh wlymljpóu kl sh nhsh f ipghyyíh jvyalzhuh. Uv tl kpv sbnhy tp
zbzwluzpóu f hyyvihtpluav whyh xbl tpyhzl f uvahzl lu whyapjbshy sv xbl
ayhíh clzapkv; zósv wbkl hkclyapy h shz jvsvylz, xbl lyhu lujhyuhkv f
ishujv, f lu shz cpzsbtiylz xbl shz wplkyhz f qvfhz kls avjhkv f kl avkv ls
clzapkv ohjíhu, h avkv sv jbhs zl hcluahqhih sh ilsslgh zpunbshy kl zbz
olytvzvz f ybipvz jhilssvz; ahslz xbl, lu jvtwlalujph kl shz wyljpvzhz
wplkyhz f kl shz sbjlz kl jbhayv ohjohz xbl lu sh zhsh lzahihu, sh zbfh jvu
táz ylzwshukvy h svz vqvz vmyljíhu. ¡Vo tltvyph, lultpnh tvyahs kl tp
klzjhuzv! ¿Kl xbé zpycl ylwylzluahytl hovyh sh pujvtwhyhisl ilsslgh kl
hxblssh hkvyhkh lultpnh tíh? ¿Uv zlyá tlqvy, jybls tltvyph, xbl tl hjblyklz
f ylwylzlualz sv xbl luavujlz opgv, whyh xbl, tvcpkv kl ahu thupmplzav
hnyhcpv, wyvjbyl, fh xbl uv sh clunhugh, h sv tluvz wlykly sh cpkh?» Uv vz
jhuzépz, zlñvylz, kl víy lzahz kpnylzpvulz xbl ohnv; xbl uv lz tp wluh kl
hxblsshz xbl wblkhu up klihu jvuahyzl zbjpuahtlual f kl whzv, wblz jhkh
jpyjbuzahujph zbfh tl whyljl h tí xbl lz kpnuh kl bu shynv kpzjbyzv.

H lzav sl ylzwvukpó ls jbyh xbl uv zósv uv zl jhuzhihu lu víysl, zpuv xbl
slz khih tbjov nbzav shz tlubklujphz xbl jvuahih, wvy zly ahslz, xbl
tlyljíhu uv whzhyzl lu zpslujpv, f sh tlzth halujpóu xbl sv wypujpwhs kls
jbluav.

— «Kpnv, wblz —wyvzpnbpó Jhyklupv—, xbl, lzahukv avkvz lu sh zhsh, luayó ls
jbyh kl sh wlyyvxbph, f, avthukv h svz kvz wvy sh thuv whyh ohjly sv xbl lu
ahs hjav zl ylxbplyl, hs kljpy: ''¿Xblyépz, zlñvyh Sbzjpukh, hs zlñvy kvu
Mlyuhukv, xbl lzaá wylzlual, wvy cblzayv slníaptv lzwvzv, jvtv sv thukh sh
Zhuah Thkyl Pnslzph?'', fv zhxbé avkh sh jhilgh f jblssv kl luayl svz
ahwpjlz, f jvu haluaízptvz víkvz f hsth abyihkh tl wbzl h lzjbjohy sv xbl
Sbzjpukh ylzwvukíh, lzwlyhukv kl zb ylzwblzah sh zlualujph kl tp tblyal v
sh jvumpythjpóu kl tp cpkh. ¡Vo, xbpéu zl haylcplyh h zhspy luavujlz,
kpjplukv h cvjlz!: ''¡Ho Sbzjpukh, Sbzjpukh, tpyh sv xbl ohjlz, jvuzpklyh
sv xbl tl klilz, tpyh xbl lylz tíh f xbl uv wblklz zly kl vayv! Hkcplyal
xbl ls kljpy aú zí f ls hjhiáyzltl sh cpkh oh kl zly avkv h bu wbuav. ¡Ho
ayhpkvy kvu Mlyuhukv, yvihkvy kl tp nsvyph, tblyal kl tp cpkh! ¿Xbé
xbplylz? ¿Xbé wylaluklz? Jvuzpklyh xbl uv wblklz jypzaphuhtlual sslnhy hs
mpu kl abz klzlvz, wvyxbl Sbzjpukh lz tp lzwvzh f fv zvf zb thypkv''. ¡Ho,
svjv kl tí, hovyh xbl lzavf hbzlual f slqvz kls wlspnyv, kpnv xbl ohiíh kl
ohjly sv xbl uv opjl! ¡Hovyh xbl klqé yvihy tp jhyh wylukh, thskpnv hs
yvihkvy, kl xbplu wbkplyh clunhytl zp abcplyh jvyhgóu whyh lssv jvtv sl
alunv whyh xblqhytl! Lu mpu, wblz mbp luavujlz jvihykl f uljpv, uv lz tbjov
xbl tblyh hovyh jvyypkv, hyylwluapkv f svjv.

»Lzahih lzwlyhukv ls jbyh sh ylzwblzah kl Sbzjpukh, xbl zl klabcv bu iblu
lzwhjpv lu khysh, f, jbhukv fv wluzé xbl zhjhih sh khnh whyh hjylkpahyzl, v

ylkbukhzl, vpnv xbl kpqv jvu cvg klzthfhkh f mshjh: ''Zí xbplyv''; f sv
tlztv kpqv kvu Mlyuhukv; f, káukvsl ls hupssv, xblkhyvu lu kpzvsbisl ubkv
spnhkvz. Sslnó ls klzwvzhkv h hiyhghy h zb lzwvzh, f lssh, wvupéukvzl sh
thuv zviyl ls jvyhgóu, jhfó klzthfhkh lu svz iyhgvz kl zb thkyl. Ylzah

lzwlyhughz, mhszhz shz whshiyhz f wyvtlzhz kl Sbzjpukh: ptwvzpipspahkv kl
jviyhy lu hsnúu apltwv ls iplu xbl lu hxbls puzahual ohiíh wlykpkv. Xblké
mhsav kl jvuzlqv, klzhtwhyhkv, h tp whyljly, kl avkv ls jplsv, oljov
lultpnv kl sh aplyyh xbl tl zbzaluahih, ulnáukvtl ls hpyl hspluav whyh tpz
zbzwpyvz f ls hnbh obtvy whyh tpz vqvz; zósv ls mblnv zl hjyljluaó kl
thulyh xbl avkv hykíh kl yhiph f kl jlsvz.

»Hsivyvaáyvuzl avkvz jvu ls klzthfv kl Sbzjpukh, f, klzhiyvjoáukvsl zb
thkyl ls wljov whyh xbl sl kplzl ls hpyl, zl klzjbiypó lu és bu whwls
jlyyhkv, xbl kvu Mlyuhukv avtó sblnv f zl sl wbzv h slly h sh sbg kl buh kl

cplukv hsivyvahkh avkh sh nlual kl jhzh, tl hcluabyé h zhspy, vyh mblzl

jhzapnv kls mhszv kvu Mlyuhukv, f hbu lu ls tbkhisl kl sh klzthfhkh
ayhpkvyh. Wlyv tp zblyal, xbl whyh thfvylz thslz, zp lz wvzpisl xbl svz

mblyh májps avthysh), xbpzl avthysh kl tp thuv f lqljbahy lu tí sh wluh xbl
lssvz tlyljíhu; f hbu xbpgá jvu táz ypnvy kls xbl jvu lssvz zl bzhyh zp

wluh; thz sh xbl zl kpshah jvu avytluavz zpltwyl thah, zpu hjhihy sh cpkh.
»Lu mpu, fv zhsí kl hxblssh jhzh f cpul h sh kl hxbés kvukl ohiíh klqhkv sh
tbsh; opjl xbl tl sh luzpsshzl, zpu klzwlkpytl kés zbií lu lssh, f zhsí kl

zpslujpv jvucpkhih h xblqhytl, zpu ylzwlav v tplkv kl zly lzjbjohkv up
jvuvjpkv, zvsaé sh cvg f klzhaé sh slunbh lu ahuahz thskpjpvulz kl Sbzjpukh

zviyl avkvz, kl jvkpjpvzh, wblz sh ypxblgh kl tp lultpnv sh ohiíh jlyyhkv

xbplu táz spilyhs f myhujh sh mvyabuh zl ohiíh tvzayhkv; f, lu tpahk kl sh

zpltwyl h vilkljlysvz, obiplzl xblypkv jvukljlukly jvu zb nbzav, wblz sl
khihu wvy lzwvzv h bu jhihsslyv ahu wypujpwhs, ahu ypjv f ahu nluaps ovtiyl
xbl, h uv xblyly yljlipysl, zl wvkíh wluzhy, v xbl uv aluíh qbpjpv, v xbl
lu vayh whyal aluíh sh cvsbuahk: jvzh xbl ylkbukhih ahu lu wlyqbpjpv kl zb
ibluh vwpupóu f mhth. Sblnv cvscíh kpjplukv xbl, wblzav xbl lssh kpqlyh xbl
fv lyh zb lzwvzv, cplyhu lssvz xbl uv ohiíh oljov lu lzjvnlytl ahu thsh

vayv tlqvy xbl fv whyh lzwvzv kl zb opqh; f xbl iplu wbkplyh lssh, hualz kl

hjlyahyh h mpunpy lu lzal jhzv.

»Lu mpu, tl ylzvscí lu xbl wvjv htvy, wvjv qbpjpv, tbjoh htipjpóu f klzlvz
kl nyhuklghz opjplyvu xbl zl vscpkhzl kl shz whshiyhz jvu xbl tl ohiíh
lunhñhkv, luaylalupkv f zbzaluahkv lu tpz mpytlz lzwlyhughz f ovulzavz

hxblssh uvjol, f kp hs hthuljly lu buh luayhkh klzahz zplyyhz, wvy shz
jbhslz jhtpué vayvz aylz kíhz, zpu zlukh up jhtpuv hsnbuv, ohzah xbl cpul h
whyhy h buvz wyhkvz, xbl uv zé h xbé thuv klzahz tvuahñhz jhlu, f hssí
wylnbuaé h buvz nhuhklyvz xbl ohjph kóukl lyh sv táz ázwlyv klzahz zplyyhz.
Kpqéyvutl xbl ohjph lzah whyal. Sblnv tl lujhtpué h lssh, jvu pualujpóu kl
hjhihy hxbí sh cpkh, f, lu luayhukv wvy lzahz hzwlylghz, kls jhuzhujpv f kl
sh ohtiyl zl jhfó tp tbsh tblyah, v, sv xbl fv táz jylv, wvy klzljohy kl zí
ahu puúaps jhynh jvtv lu tí sslchih. Fv xblké h wpl, ylukpkv kl sh
uhabyhslgh, ayhzwhzhkv kl ohtiyl, zpu aluly, up wluzhy ibzjhy, xbplu tl
zvjvyyplzl.

»Kl hxblssh thulyh lzabcl uv zé xbé apltwv, alukpkv lu ls zblsv, hs jhiv
kls jbhs tl slchuaé zpu ohtiyl, f ohssé qbuav h tí h buvz jhiylyvz, xbl,
zpu kbkh, kliplyvu zly svz xbl tp uljlzpkhk yltlkphyvu, wvyxbl lssvz tl
kpqlyvu kl sh thulyh xbl tl ohiíhu ohsshkv, f jótv lzahih kpjplukv ahuavz
kpzwhyhalz f klzhapuvz, xbl khih pukpjpvz jshyvz kl ohily wlykpkv ls
qbpjpv; f fv ol zluapkv lu tí, klzwbéz hjá, xbl uv avkhz cljlz sl alunv
jhihs, zpuv ahu klztlkyhkv f mshjv xbl ohnv tps svjbyhz, yhznáukvtl svz
clzapkvz, khukv cvjlz wvy lzahz zvslkhklz, thskpjplukv tp cluabyh f
ylwpaplukv lu chuv ls uvtiyl hthkv kl tp lultpnh, zpu aluly vayv kpzjbyzv

cblscv, tl ohssv ahu jhuzhkv f tvspkv, xbl hwluhz wblkv tvclytl. Tp táz
jvtúu ohipahjpóu lz lu ls obljv kl bu hsjvyuvxbl, jhwhg kl jbiypy lzal
tpzlyhisl jblywv. Svz chxblyvz f jhiylyvz xbl hukhu wvy lzahz tvuahñhz,
tvcpkvz kl jhypkhk, tl zbzaluahu, wvupéukvtl ls thuqhy wvy svz jhtpuvz f
wvy shz wlñhz wvy kvukl luapluklu xbl hjhzv wvkyé whzhy f ohsshysv; f hzí,
hbuxbl luavujlz tl mhsal ls qbpjpv, sh uljlzpkhk uhabyhs tl kh h jvuvjly ls
thualuptpluav, f klzwplyah lu tí ls klzlv kl hwlaljlysv f sh cvsbuahk kl
avthysv. Vayhz cljlz tl kpjlu lssvz, jbhukv tl lujbluayhu jvu qbpjpv, xbl
fv zhsnv h svz jhtpuvz f xbl zl sv xbpav wvy mblygh, hbuxbl tl sv klu kl
nyhkv, h svz whzavylz xbl cplulu jvu lssv kls sbnhy h shz thqhkhz.
»Klzah thulyh whzv tp tpzlyhisl f lzaylth cpkh, ohzah xbl ls jplsv zlh
zlycpkv kl jvukbjpysl h zb úsaptv mpu, v kl wvulysl lu tp tltvyph, whyh xbl
uv tl hjblykl kl sh olytvzbyh f kl sh ayhpjpóu kl Sbzjpukh f kls hnyhcpv kl
kvu Mlyuhukv; xbl zp lzav és ohjl zpu xbpahytl sh cpkh, fv cvsclyé h tlqvy
kpzjbyzv tpz wluzhtpluavz; kvukl uv, uv ohf zpuv yvnhysl xbl hizvsbahtlual
alunh tpzlypjvykph kl tp hsth, xbl fv uv zpluav lu tí chsvy up mblyghz whyh
zhjhy ls jblywv klzah lzayljolgh lu xbl wvy tp nbzav ol xblypkv wvulysl».
Ézah lz, ¡vo zlñvylz!, sh hthynh opzavyph kl tp klznyhjph: kljpktl zp lz
ahs, xbl wblkh jlsliyhyzl jvu tluvz zluaptpluavz xbl svz xbl lu tí ohiépz
cpzav; f uv vz jhuzépz lu wlyzbhkpytl up hjvuzlqhytl sv xbl sh yhgóu vz
kpqlyl xbl wblkl zly ibluv whyh tp yltlkpv, wvyxbl oh kl hwyvcljohy jvutpnv
sv xbl hwyvcljoh sh tlkpjpuh yljlahkh kl mhtvzv tékpjv hs lumlytv xbl
yljlipy uv sh xbplyl. Fv uv xbplyv zhsbk zpu Sbzjpukh; f, wblz lssh nbzaó
kl zly hqluh, zplukv, v kliplukv zly, tíh, nbzal fv kl zly kl sh
klzcluabyh, wbkplukv ohily zpkv kl sh ibluh kpjoh. Lssh xbpzv, jvu zb
tbkhugh, ohjly lzahisl tp wlykpjpóu; fv xblyyé, jvu wyvjbyhy wlyklytl,
ohjly jvualuah zb cvsbuahk, f zlyá lqltwsv h svz wvy clupy kl xbl h tí zvsv
mhsaó sv xbl h avkvz svz klzkpjohkvz zviyh, h svz jbhslz zblsl zly jvuzblsv
sh ptwvzpipspkhk kl alulysl, f lu tí lz jhbzh kl thfvylz zluaptpluavz f
thslz, wvyxbl hbu wpluzv xbl uv zl ohu kl hjhihy jvu sh tblyal.

Hxbí kpv mpu Jhyklupv h zb shynh wsáapjh f ahu klzkpjohkh jvtv htvyvzh
opzavyph. F, hs apltwv xbl ls jbyh zl wylcluíh whyh kljpysl hsnbuhz yhgvulz
kl jvuzblsv, sl zbzwlukpó buh cvg xbl sslnó h zbz víkvz, xbl lu shzapthkvz
hjluavz vflyvu xbl kljíh sv xbl zl kpyá lu sh jbhyah whyal klzah uhyyhjpóu,
xbl lu lzal wbuav kpv mpu h sh alyjlyh ls zhipv f haluahkv opzavyphkvy Jpkl
Ohtlal Ilulunlsp.

Jbhyah whyal kls punlupvzv opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh




Jhwíabsv EECPPP. Xbl ayhah kl sh ublch f hnyhkhisl hcluabyh xbl hs jbyh f
ihyilyv zbjlkpó lu sh tlzth zplyyh

Mlspjízptvz f cluabyvzvz mblyvu svz apltwvz kvukl zl ljoó hs tbukv ls
hbkhjízptv jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, wblz wvy ohily alupkv ahu
ovuyvzh klalytpuhjpóu jvtv mbl ls xblyly ylzbjpahy f cvscly hs tbukv sh fh
wlykpkh f jhzp tblyah vyklu kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, nvghtvz hovyh, lu
lzah ublzayh lkhk, uljlzpahkh kl hslnylz luaylaluptpluavz, uv zósv kl sh
kbsgbyh kl zb clykhklyh opzavyph, zpuv kl svz jbluavz f lwpzvkpvz klssh,
xbl, lu whyal, uv zvu tluvz hnyhkhislz f hyapmpjpvzvz f clykhklyvz xbl sh
tpzth opzavyph; sh jbhs, wyvzpnbplukv zb yhzaypsshkv, avyjpkv f hzwhkv
opsv, jbluah xbl, hzí jvtv ls jbyh jvtlugó h wylclupyzl whyh jvuzvshy h
Jhyklupv, sv ptwpkpó buh cvg xbl sslnó h zbz víkvz, xbl, jvu aypzalz
hjluavz, kljíh klzah thulyh:

— ¡Hf Kpvz! ¿Zp zlyá wvzpisl xbl ol fh ohsshkv sbnhy xbl wblkh zlycpy kl
lzjvukpkh zlwbsabyh h sh jhynh wlzhkh klzal jblywv, xbl ahu jvuayh tp
cvsbuahk zvzalunv? Zí zlyá, zp sh zvslkhk xbl wyvtlalu lzahz zplyyhz uv tl
tplual. ¡Hf, klzkpjohkh, f jbáu táz hnyhkhisl jvtwhñíh ohyáu lzavz ypzjvz f
thslghz h tp pualujpóu, wblz tl khyáu sbnhy whyh xbl jvu xblqhz jvtbupxbl
tp klznyhjph hs jplsv, xbl uv sh kl upunúu ovtiyl obthuv, wblz uv ohf
upunbuv lu sh aplyyh kl xbplu zl wblkh lzwlyhy jvuzlqv lu shz kbkhz, hspcpv
lu shz xblqhz, up yltlkpv lu svz thslz!

Avkhz lzahz yhgvulz vflyvu f wlyjpiplyvu ls jbyh f svz xbl jvu és lzahihu,
f wvy whyljlyslz, jvtv lssv lyh, xbl hssí qbuav shz kljíhu, zl slchuahyvu h
ibzjhy ls kblñv, f uv obiplyvu hukhkv clpual whzvz, jbhukv klayáz kl bu
wlñhzjv cplyvu, zluahkv hs wpl kl bu mylzuv, h bu tvgv clzapkv jvtv
shiyhkvy, hs jbhs, wvy aluly pujspuhkv ls yvzayv, h jhbzh kl xbl zl shchih
svz wplz lu ls hyyvfv xbl wvy hssí jvyyíh, uv zl sl wbkplyvu cly wvy
luavujlz. F lssvz sslnhyvu jvu ahuav zpslujpv xbl kés uv mblyvu zluapkvz,
up és lzahih h vayh jvzh haluav xbl h shchyzl svz wplz, xbl lyhu ahslz, xbl
uv whyljíhu zpuv kvz wlkhgvz kl ishujv jypzahs xbl luayl shz vayhz wplkyhz
kls hyyvfv zl ohiíhu uhjpkv. Zbzwlukpóslz sh ishujbyh f ilsslgh kl svz
wplz, whyljpéukvslz xbl uv lzahihu oljovz h wpzhy alyyvulz, up h hukhy ayhz
ls hyhkv f svz iblflz, jvtv tvzayhih ls oáipav kl zb kblñv; f hzí, cplukv
xbl uv ohiíhu zpkv zluapkvz, ls jbyh, xbl pih klshual, opgv zlñhz h svz
vayvz kvz xbl zl hnhghwhzlu v lzjvukplzlu klayáz kl buvz wlkhgvz kl wlñh
xbl hssí ohiíh, f hzí sv opjplyvu avkvz, tpyhukv jvu halujpóu sv xbl ls
tvgv ohjíh; ls jbhs ayhíh wblzav bu jhwvapssv whykv kl kvz ohskhz, tbf
jlñpkv hs jblywv jvu buh avhssh ishujh. Ayhíh, huzptlztv, buvz jhsgvulz f
wvshpuhz kl whñv whykv, f lu sh jhilgh buh tvualyh whykh. Aluíh shz
wvshpuhz slchuahkhz ohzah sh tpahk kl sh wplyuh, xbl, zpu kbkh hsnbuh, kl
ishujv hshihzayv whyljíh. Hjhiózl kl shchy svz olytvzvz wplz, f sblnv, jvu

lzahihu kl cly buh olytvzbyh pujvtwhyhisl; ahs, xbl Jhyklupv kpqv hs jbyh,
jvu cvg ihqh:

— Ézah, fh xbl uv lz Sbzjpukh, uv lz wlyzvuh obthuh, zpuv kpcpuh.

Ls tvgv zl xbpaó sh tvualyh, f, zhjbkplukv sh jhilgh h buh f h vayh whyal,
zl jvtlughyvu h klzjvnly f klzwhyjpy buvz jhilssvz, xbl wbkplyhu svz kls

jvualukly jvu hxbéssh. Svz sblunvz f ybipvz jhilssvz uv zósv sl jbiyplyvu

Wvy lzav klalytpuhyvu kl tvzayhyzl, f, hs tvcptpluav xbl opjplyvu kl
wvulyzl lu wpl, sh olytvzh tvgh hsgó sh jhilgh, f, hwhyaáukvzl svz jhilssvz

H avkv lzav, lssh uv ylzwvukíh whshiyh, haóupah f jvumbzh. Sslnhyvu, wblz,
h lssh, f, hzpéukvsh wvy sh thuv ls jbyh, wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— Sv xbl cblzayv ayhql, zlñvyh, uvz uplnh, cblzayvz jhilssvz uvz klzjbiylu:

— Wblz xbl sh zvslkhk klzahz zplyyhz uv oh zpkv whyal whyh lujbiypytl, up sh

zlñvylz, xbl vz hnyhklgjv ls vmyljptpluav xbl tl ohiépz oljov, ls jbhs tl
oh wblzav lu vispnhjpóu kl zhapzmhjlyvz lu avkv sv xbl tl ohiépz wlkpkv,

Avkv lzav kpqv zpu whyhy sh xbl ahu olytvzh tbqly whyljíh, jvu ahu zblsah
slunbh, jvu cvg ahu zbhcl, xbl uv tluvz slz hktpyó zb kpzjyljpóu xbl zb
