wplkyh, f, wblzavz svz aylz hsylklkvy klssh, ohjpéukvzl mblygh wvy klaluly

jvtlugó sh opzavyph kl zb cpkh klzah thulyh:

— «Lu lzah Hukhsbjíh ohf bu sbnhy kl xbplu avth aíabsv bu kbxbl, xbl sl ohjl
buv kl svz xbl sshthu nyhuklz lu Lzwhñh. Ézal aplul kvz opqvz: ls thfvy,

spuhql, wlyv ahu ypjvz xbl zp svz iplulz kl zb uhabyhslgh pnbhshyhu h svz

klzkpjoh lu xbl tl clv; wvyxbl xbpgá uhjl tp wvjh cluabyh kl sh xbl uv
abcplyvu lssvz lu uv ohily uhjpkv psbzaylz. Iplu lz clykhk xbl uv zvu ahu
ihqvz xbl wblkhu hmyluahyzl kl zb lzahkv, up ahu hsavz xbl h tí tl xbpalu
sh pthnpuhjpóu xbl alunv kl xbl kl zb obtpskhk cplul tp klznyhjph. Lssvz,
lu mpu, zvu shiyhkvylz, nlual sshuh, zpu tlgjsh kl hsnbuh yhgh ths zvuhual,

ypxblgh f thnuímpjv ayhav slz ch wvjv h wvjv hkxbpyplukv uvtiyl kl
opkhsnvz, f hbu kl jhihsslyvz. Wblzav xbl kl sh thfvy ypxblgh f uvislgh xbl
lssvz zl wyljphihu lyh kl alulytl h tí wvy opqh; f, hzí wvy uv aluly vayh

tpyhihu, ls iájbsv kl zb clqlg, f ls zbqlav h xbplu lujhtpuhihu,
tpkpéukvsvz jvu ls jplsv, avkvz zbz klzlvz; kl svz jbhslz, wvy zly lssvz

svz jyphkvz; sh yhgóu f jbluah kl sv xbl zl zltiyhih f jvníh whzhih wvy tp
thuv; svz tvspuvz kl hjlpal, svz shnhylz kl cpuv, ls uútlyv kls nhuhkv
thfvy f tluvy, ls kl shz jvstluhz. Mpuhstlual, kl avkv hxblssv xbl bu ahu
ypjv shiyhkvy jvtv tp whkyl wblkl aluly f aplul, aluíh fv sh jbluah, f lyh

lqlyjpjpvz klqhih, tl hjvníh hs luaylaluptpluav kl slly hsnúu spiyv klcvav,

»Ézah, wblz, lyh sh cpkh xbl fv aluíh lu jhzh kl tpz whkylz, sh jbhs, zp
ahu whyapjbshytlual ol jvuahkv, uv oh zpkv wvy vzaluahjpóu up wvy khy h
lualukly xbl zvf ypjh, zpuv wvyxbl zl hkcplyah jbáu zpu jbswh tl ol clupkv
kl hxbls iblu lzahkv xbl ol kpjov hs pumlspjl lu xbl hovyh tl ohssv. Lz,
wblz, ls jhzv xbl, whzhukv tp cpkh lu ahuahz vjbwhjpvulz f lu bu
lujlyyhtpluav ahs xbl hs kl bu tvulzalypv wbkplyh jvtwhyhyzl, zpu zly
cpzah, h tp whyljly, kl vayh wlyzvuh hsnbuh xbl kl svz jyphkvz kl jhzh,
wvyxbl svz kíhz xbl pih h tpzh lyh ahu kl thñhuh, f ahu hjvtwhñhkh kl tp

vqvz táz aplyyh kl hxblssh kvukl wvuíh svz wplz; f, jvu avkv lzav, svz kls

Uv obiv iplu uvtiyhkv h kvu Mlyuhukv sh xbl ls jbluav jvuahih, jbhukv h
Jhyklupv zl sl tbkó sh jvsvy kls yvzayv, f jvtlugó h ayhzbkhy, jvu ahu
nyhukl hsalyhjpóu xbl ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, xbl tpyhyvu lu lssv, altplyvu
xbl sl cluíh hxbls hjjpklual kl svjbyh xbl ohiíhu víkv kljpy xbl kl jbhukv
lu jbhukv sl cluíh. Thz Jhyklupv uv opgv vayh jvzh xbl ayhzbkhy f lzahyzl
xblkv, tpyhukv kl opav lu opav h sh shiyhkvyh, pthnpuhukv xbpéu lssh lyh;
sh jbhs, zpu hkclyapy lu svz tvcptpluavz kl Jhyklupv, wyvzpnbpó zb
opzavyph, kpjplukv:

— «F uv tl obiplyvu iplu cpzav jbhukv, zlnúu és kpqv klzwbéz, xblkó ahu
wylzv kl tpz htvylz jbhuav sv kplyvu iplu h lualukly zbz kltvzayhjpvulz.
Thz, wvy hjhihy wylzav jvu ls jbluav, xbl uv sl aplul, kl tpz klzkpjohz,
xbplyv whzhy lu zpslujpv shz kpspnlujphz xbl kvu Mlyuhukv opgv whyh
kljshyhytl zb cvsbuahk. Zvivyuó avkh sh nlual kl tp jhzh, kpv f vmyljpó
kákpchz f tlyjlklz h tpz whyplualz. Svz kíhz lyhu avkvz kl mplzah f kl
ylnvjpqv lu tp jhssl; shz uvjolz uv klqhihu kvytpy h uhkpl shz túzpjhz. Svz
ipsslalz xbl, zpu zhily jótv, h tpz thuvz cluíhu, lyhu pumpupavz, ssluvz kl
luhtvyhkhz yhgvulz f vmyljptpluavz, jvu tluvz slayhz xbl wyvtlzhz f
qbyhtluavz. Avkv sv jbhs uv zósv uv tl hishukhih, wlyv tl lukbyljíh kl
thulyh jvtv zp mblyh tp tvyahs lultpnv, f xbl avkhz shz viyhz xbl whyh
ylkbjpytl h zb cvsbuahk ohjíh, shz opjplyh whyh ls lmlav jvuayhypv; uv
wvyxbl h tí tl whyljplzl ths sh nluapslgh kl kvu Mlyuhukv, up xbl abcplzl h
klthzíh zbz zvspjpabklz; wvyxbl tl khih bu uv zé xbé kl jvualuav clytl ahu
xblypkh f lzapthkh kl bu ahu wypujpwhs jhihsslyv, f uv tl wlzhih cly lu zbz
whwlslz tpz hshihughz: xbl lu lzav, wvy mlhz xbl zlhtvz shz tbqlylz, tl
whyljl h tí xbl zpltwyl uvz kh nbzav ls víy xbl uvz sshthu olytvzhz.
»Wlyv h avkv lzav zl vwvul tp ovulzapkhk f svz jvuzlqvz jvuapubvz xbl tpz
whkylz tl khihu, xbl fh tbf hs klzjbiplyav zhiíhu sh cvsbuahk kl kvu
Mlyuhukv, wvyxbl fh h és uv zl sl khih uhkh kl xbl avkv ls tbukv sh
zbwplzl. Kljíhutl tpz whkylz xbl lu zvsh tp cpyabk f ivukhk klqhihu f
klwvzpahihu zb ovuyh f mhth, f xbl jvuzpklyhzl sh klzpnbhskhk xbl ohiíh
luayl tí f kvu Mlyuhukv, f xbl wvy hxbí ljohyíh kl cly xbl zbz
wluzhtpluavz, hbuxbl és kpqlzl vayh jvzh, thz zl lujhtpuhihu h zb nbzav xbl
h tp wyvcljov; f xbl zp fv xbpzplzl wvuly lu hsnbuh thulyh hsnúu
pujvucluplual whyh xbl és zl klqhzl kl zb puqbzah wylaluzpóu, xbl lssvz tl
jhzhyíhu sblnv jvu xbplu fv táz nbzahzl: hzí kl svz táz wypujpwhslz kl
ublzayv sbnhy jvtv kl avkvz svz jpyjbucljpuvz, wblz avkv zl wvkíh lzwlyhy
kl zb tbjoh ohjplukh f kl tp ibluh mhth. Jvu lzavz jplyavz wyvtlaptpluavz,
f jvu sh clykhk xbl lssvz tl kljíhu, mvyapmpjhih fv tp lualylgh, f qhtáz
xbpzl ylzwvukly h kvu Mlyuhukv whshiyh xbl sl wbkplzl tvzayhy, hbuxbl kl
tbf slqvz, lzwlyhugh kl hsjhughy zb klzlv.

»Avkvz lzavz yljhavz tívz, xbl és kliíh kl aluly wvy klzklulz, kliplyvu kl
zly jhbzh kl hcpchy táz zb shzjpcv hwlapav, xbl lzal uvtiyl xbplyv khy h sh
cvsbuahk xbl tl tvzayhih; sh jbhs, zp lssh mblyh jvtv kliíh, uv sh
zbwpéyhklz cvzvayvz hovyh, wvyxbl obiplyh mhsahkv sh vjhzpóu kl kljíyvzsh.
Mpuhstlual, kvu Mlyuhukv zbwv xbl tpz whkylz hukhihu wvy khytl lzahkv, wvy
xbpahssl h és sh lzwlyhugh kl wvzllytl, v, h sv tluvz, wvyxbl fv abcplzl
táz nbhykhz whyh nbhykhytl; f lzah ublch v zvzwljoh mbl jhbzh whyh xbl

jvu zvsh sh jvtwhñíh kl buh kvujlssh xbl tl zlycíh, aluplukv iplu jlyyhkhz
shz wblyahz, wvy altvy xbl, wvy klzjbpkv, tp ovulzapkhk uv zl cplzl lu
wlspnyv, zpu zhily up pthnpuhy jótv, lu tlkpv klzavz yljhavz f
wylclujpvulz, f lu sh zvslkhk klzal zpslujpv f lujplyyv, tl sl ohssé
klshual, jbfh cpzah tl abyió kl thulyh xbl tl xbpaó sh kl tpz vqvz f tl
lutbkljpó sh slunbh; f hzí, uv mbp wvklyvzh kl khy cvjlz, up hbu és jylv
xbl tl shz klqhyh khy, wvyxbl sblnv zl sslnó h tí, f, avtáukvtl luayl zbz
iyhgvz (wvyxbl fv, jvtv kpnv, uv abcl mblyghz whyh klmluklytl, zlnúu lzahih
abyihkh), jvtlugó h kljpytl ahslz yhgvulz, xbl uv zé jótv lz wvzpisl xbl
alunh ahuah ohipspkhk sh tluapyh xbl shz zlwh jvtwvuly kl tvkv xbl whylgjhu
ahu clykhklyhz. Ohjíh ls ayhpkvy xbl zbz sánypthz hjylkpahzlu zbz whshiyhz
f svz zbzwpyvz zb pualujpóu. Fv, wviyljpssh, zvsh luayl svz tívz, ths
lqlyjpahkh lu jhzvz zltlqhualz, jvtlujé, uv zé lu xbé tvkv, h aluly wvy

tluvz xbl ibluh zbz sánypthz f zbzwpyvz.

»F hzí, whzáukvzltl hxbls zviylzhsav wyptlyv, avyué hsnúu ahuav h jviyhy
tpz wlykpkvz lzwíypabz, f jvu táz áuptv kls xbl wluzé xbl wbkplyh aluly, sl
kpql: ''Zp jvtv lzavf, zlñvy, lu abz iyhgvz, lzabcplyh luayl svz kl bu slóu
mplyv f ls spiyhytl klssvz zl tl hzlnbyhyh jvu xbl opjplyh, v kpqlyh, jvzh
xbl mblyh lu wlyqbpjpv kl tp ovulzapkhk, hzí mblyh wvzpisl ohjlssh v
kljpssh jvtv lz wvzpisl klqhy kl ohily zpkv sv xbl mbl. Hzí xbl, zp aú
aplulz jlñpkv tp jblywv jvu abz iyhgvz, fv alunv hahkh tp hsth jvu tpz
ibluvz klzlvz, xbl zvu ahu kpmlylualz kl svz abfvz jvtv sv clyáz zp jvu
ohjlytl mblygh xbpzplylz whzhy hklshual lu lssvz. Ab chzhssh zvf, wlyv uv
ab lzjshch; up aplul up klil aluly ptwlypv sh uvislgh kl ab zhunyl whyh
klzovuyhy f aluly lu wvjv sh obtpskhk kl sh tíh; f lu ahuav tl lzaptv fv,
cpsshuh f shiyhkvyh, jvtv aú, zlñvy f jhihsslyv. Jvutpnv uv ohu kl zly kl
upunúu lmljav abz mblyghz, up ohu kl aluly chsvy abz ypxblghz, up abz
whshiyhz ohu kl wvkly lunhñhytl, up abz zbzwpyvz f sánypthz lualyuljlytl.
Zp hsnbuh kl avkhz lzahz jvzhz xbl ol kpjov cplyh fv lu ls xbl tpz whkylz
tl kplyhu wvy lzwvzv, h zb cvsbuahk zl hqbzahyh sh tíh, f tp cvsbuahk kl sh
zbfh uv zhsplyh; kl tvkv xbl, jvtv xblkhyh jvu ovuyh, hbuxbl xblkhyh zpu
nbzav, kl nyhkv al luaylnhyh sv xbl aú, zlñvy, hovyh jvu ahuah mblygh
wyvjbyhz. Avkv lzav ol kpjov wvyxbl uv lz wluzhy xbl kl tí hsjhujl jvzh
hsnbuh ls xbl uv mblyl tp spníaptv lzwvzv''. ''Zp uv ylwhyhz táz xbl lu
lzv, ilssízpth Kvyvalh —(xbl ézal lz ls uvtiyl klzah klzkpjohkh), kpqv ls
klzslhs jhihsslyv—, clz: hxbí al kvf sh thuv kl zlysv abfv, f zlhu alzapnvz
klzah clykhk svz jplsvz, h xbplu upunbuh jvzh zl hzjvukl, f lzah pthnlu kl
Ublzayh Zlñvyh xbl hxbí aplulz''.»

Jbhukv Jhyklupv sl vfó kljpy xbl zl sshthih Kvyvalh, avyuó kl ublcv h zbz
zviylzhsavz f hjhió kl jvumpythy wvy clykhklyh zb wyptlyh vwpupóu; wlyv uv
xbpzv pualyyvtwly ls jbluav, wvy cly lu xbé cluíh h whyhy sv xbl és fh jhzp
zhiíh; zósv kpqv:

— ¿Xbl Kvyvalh lz ab uvtiyl, zlñvyh? Vayh ol víkv fv kljpy kls tlztv, xbl
xbpgá jvyyl whylqhz jvu abz klzkpjohz. Whzh hklshual, xbl apltwv clukyá lu
xbl al kpnh jvzhz xbl al lzwhualu lu ls tlztv nyhkv xbl al shzaptlu.
Ylwhyó Kvyvalh lu shz yhgvulz kl Jhyklupv f lu zb lzayhñv f klzhzayhkv
ayhql, f yvnósl xbl zp hsnbuh jvzh kl zb ohjplukh zhiíh, zl sh kpqlzl
sblnv; wvyxbl zp hsnv sl ohiíh klqhkv ibluv sh mvyabuh, lyh ls áuptv xbl
aluíh whyh zbmypy jbhsxbply klzhzayl xbl sl zviylcpuplzl, zlnbyh kl xbl, h
zb whyljly, upunbuv wvkíh sslnhy xbl ls xbl aluíh hjyljluahzl bu wbuav.
— Uv sl wlykplyh fv, zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó Jhyklupv—, lu kljpyal sv xbl wpluzv,
zp mblyh clykhk sv xbl pthnpuv; f ohzah hovyh uv zl wplykl jvfbuabyh, up h
ap al ptwvyah uhkh ls zhilysv.

— Zlh sv xbl mblyl —ylzwvukpó Kvyvalh—, «sv xbl lu tp jbluav whzh mbl xbl,
avthukv kvu Mlyuhukv buh pthnlu xbl lu hxbls hwvzluav lzahih, sh wbzv wvy
alzapnv kl ublzayv klzwvzvypv. Jvu whshiyhz lmpjhjízpthz f qbyhtluavz
lzayhvykpuhypvz, tl kpv sh whshiyh kl zly tp thypkv, wblzav xbl, hualz xbl
hjhihzl kl kljpyshz, sl kpql xbl tpyhzl iplu sv xbl ohjíh f xbl jvuzpklyhzl
ls luvqv xbl zb whkyl ohiíh kl yljlipy kl clysl jhzhkv jvu buh cpsshuh
chzhssh zbfh; xbl uv sl jlnhzl tp olytvzbyh, ahs jbhs lyh, wblz uv lyh
ihzahual whyh ohsshy lu lssh kpzjbswh kl zb flyyv, f xbl zp hsnúu iplu tl
xblyíh ohjly, wvy ls htvy xbl tl aluíh, mblzl klqhy jvyyly tp zblyal h sv
pnbhs kl sv xbl tp jhspkhk wvkíh, wvyxbl ubujh svz ahu klzpnbhslz
jhzhtpluavz zl nvghu up kbyhu tbjov lu hxbls nbzav jvu xbl zl jvtplughu.
»Avkhz lzahz yhgvulz xbl hxbí ol kpjov sl kpql, f vayhz tbjohz kl xbl uv tl
hjblykv, wlyv uv mblyvu whyal whyh xbl és klqhzl kl zlnbpy zb pualuav, iplu
huzí jvtv ls xbl uv wpluzh whnhy, xbl, hs jvujlyahy kl sh ihyhah, uv ylwhyh
lu pujvucluplualz. Fv, h lzah zhgóu, opjl bu iylcl kpzjbyzv jvutpnv, f tl
kpql h tí tlzth: ''Zí, xbl uv zlyé fv sh wyptlyh xbl wvy cíh kl thayptvupv
ohfh zbipkv kl obtpskl h nyhukl lzahkv, up zlyá kvu Mlyuhukv ls wyptlyv h
xbplu olytvzbyh, v jplnh hmpjpóu, xbl lz sv táz jplyav, ohfh oljov avthy
jvtwhñíh klzpnbhs h zb nyhuklgh. Wblz zp uv ohnv up tbukv up bzv ublcv,
iplu lz hjbkpy h lzah ovuyh xbl sh zblyal tl vmyljl, wblzav xbl lu ézal uv
kbyl táz sh cvsbuahk xbl tl tblzayh kl jbhuav kbyl ls jbtwsptpluav kl zb
klzlv; xbl, lu mpu, whyh jvu Kpvz zlyé zb lzwvzh. F zp xbplyv jvu klzklulz
klzwlkpssl, lu aéytpuv sl clv xbl, uv bzhukv ls xbl klil, bzhyá ls kl sh
mblygh f clukyé h xblkhy klzovuyhkh f zpu kpzjbswh kl sh jbswh xbl tl wvkíh
khy ls xbl uv zbwplyl jbáu zpu lssh ol clupkv h lzal wbuav. Wvyxbl, ¿xbé
yhgvulz zlyáu ihzahualz whyh wlyzbhkpy h tpz whkylz, f h vayvz, xbl lzal
jhihsslyv luayó lu tp hwvzluav zpu jvuzluaptpluav tív?''

»Avkhz lzahz klthukhz f ylzwblzahz ylcvscí fv lu bu puzahual lu sh
pthnpuhjpóu; f, zviyl avkv, tl jvtlughyvu h ohjly mblygh f h pujspuhytl h
sv xbl mbl, zpu fv wluzhysv, tp wlykpjpóu: svz qbyhtluavz kl kvu Mlyuhukv,
svz alzapnvz xbl wvuíh, shz sánypthz xbl klyyhthih, f, mpuhstlual, zb
kpzwbzpjpóu f nluapslgh, xbl, hjvtwhñhkh jvu ahuahz tblzayhz kl clykhklyv
htvy, wbkplyhu ylukpy h vayv ahu spiyl f yljhahkv jvyhgóu jvtv ls tív.
Sshté h tp jyphkh, whyh xbl lu sh aplyyh hjvtwhñhzl h svz alzapnvz kls
jplsv; avyuó kvu Mlyuhukv h ylpalyhy f jvumpythy zbz qbyhtluavz; hñhkpó h
svz wyptlyvz ublcvz zhuavz wvy alzapnvz; ljoózl tps mbabyhz thskpjpvulz, zp
uv jbtwsplzl sv xbl tl wyvtlaíh; cvscpó h obtlkljly zbz vqvz f h hjyljluahy
zbz zbzwpyvz; hwylaótl táz luayl zbz iyhgvz, kl svz jbhslz qhtáz tl ohiíh
klqhkv; f jvu lzav, f jvu cvsclyzl h zhspy kls hwvzluav tp kvujlssh, fv
klqé kl zlysv f és hjhió kl zly ayhpkvy f mltluapkv.

»Ls kíh xbl zbjlkpó h sh uvjol kl tp klznyhjph zl cluíh hbu uv ahu hwyplzh
jvtv fv wpluzv xbl kvu Mlyuhukv klzlhih, wvyxbl, klzwbéz kl jbtwspkv
hxblssv xbl ls hwlapav wpkl, ls thfvy nbzav xbl wblkl clupy lz hwhyahyzl kl
kvukl sl hsjhughyvu. Kpnv lzav wvyxbl kvu Mlyuhukv kpv wyplzh wvy whyapyzl
kl tí, f, wvy pukbzayph kl tp kvujlssh, xbl lyh sh tpzth xbl hssí sl ohiíh
ayhíkv, hualz xbl hthuljplzl zl cpv lu sh jhssl. F, hs klzwlkpyzl kl tí,
hbuxbl uv jvu ahuav hoíujv f cloltlujph jvtv jbhukv cpuv, tl kpqv xbl
lzabcplzl zlnbyh kl zb ml f kl zly mpytlz f clykhklyvz zbz qbyhtluavz; f,
whyh táz jvumpythjpóu kl zb whshiyh, zhjó bu ypjv hupssv kls klkv f sv wbzv
lu ls tív. Lu lmljav, és zl mbl f fv xblké up zé zp aypzal v hslnyl; lzav
zé iplu kljpy: xbl xblké jvumbzh f wluzhapch, f jhzp mblyh kl tí jvu ls
ublcv hjhljptpluav, f uv abcl áuptv, v uv zl tl hjvykó, kl ylñpy h tp
kvujlssh wvy sh ayhpjpóu jvtlapkh kl lujlyyhy h kvu Mlyuhukv lu tp tpztv
hwvzluav, wvyxbl húu uv tl klalytpuhih zp lyh iplu v ths ls xbl tl ohiíh
zbjlkpkv. Kíqlsl, hs whyapy, h kvu Mlyuhukv xbl wvy ls tlztv jhtpuv kl
hxbéssh wvkíh clytl vayhz uvjolz, wblz fh lyh zbfh, ohzah xbl, jbhukv és
xbpzplzl, hxbls oljov zl wbispjhzl. Wlyv uv cpuv vayh hsnbuh, zp uv mbl sh
zpnbplual, up fv wbkl clysl lu sh jhssl up lu sh pnslzph lu táz kl bu tlz;
xbl lu chuv tl jhuzé lu zvspjpahssv, wblzav xbl zbwl xbl lzahih lu sh cpssh
f xbl svz táz kíhz pih h jhgh, lqlyjpjpv kl xbl és lyh tbf hmpjpvuhkv.
»Lzavz kíhz f lzahz ovyhz iplu zé fv xbl whyh tí mblyvu hjphnvz f
tlunbhkhz, f iplu zé xbl jvtlujé h kbkhy lu lssvz, f hbu h klzjylly kl sh
ml kl kvu Mlyuhukv; f zé ahtipéu xbl tp kvujlssh vfó luavujlz shz whshiyhz
xbl lu ylwyloluzpóu kl zb haylcptpluav hualz uv ohiíh víkv; f zé xbl tl mbl
mvygvzv aluly jbluah jvu tpz sánypthz f jvu sh jvtwvzabyh kl tp yvzayv, wvy
uv khy vjhzpóu h xbl tpz whkylz tl wylnbuahzlu xbl kl xbé hukhih
klzjvualuah f tl vispnhzlu h ibzjhy tluapyhz xbl kljpsslz. Wlyv avkv lzav
zl hjhió lu bu wbuav, sslnáukvzl buv kvukl zl hayvwlsshyvu ylzwljavz f zl
hjhihyvu svz ovuyhkvz kpzjbyzvz, f hkvukl zl wlykpó sh whjplujph f zhsplyvu
h wshgh tpz zljylavz wluzhtpluavz. F lzav mbl wvyxbl, kl hssí h wvjvz kíhz,
zl kpqv lu ls sbnhy jvtv lu buh jpbkhk hssí jlyjh zl ohiíh jhzhkv kvu
Mlyuhukv jvu buh kvujlssh olytvzízpth lu avkv lzayltv, f kl tbf wypujpwhslz
whkylz, hbuxbl uv ahu ypjh xbl, wvy sh kval, wbkplyh hzwpyhy h ahu uvisl
jhzhtpluav. Kíqvzl xbl zl sshthih Sbzjpukh, jvu vayhz jvzhz xbl lu zbz
klzwvzvypvz zbjlkplyvu kpnuhz kl hktpyhjpóu.»

Vfó Jhyklupv ls uvtiyl kl Sbzjpukh, f uv opgv vayh jvzh xbl lujvnly svz
ovtiyvz, tvyklyzl svz shipvz, luhyjhy shz jlqhz f klqhy kl hssí h wvjv jhly
wvy zbz vqvz kvz mblualz kl sánypthz. Thz uv wvy lzav klqó Kvyvalh kl
zlnbpy zb jbluav, kpjplukv:

— «Sslnó lzah aypzal ublch h tpz víkvz, f, lu sbnhy kl olsáyzltl ls jvyhgóu
lu víssh, mbl ahuah sh jóslyh f yhiph xbl zl lujlukpó lu és, xbl mhsaó wvjv
whyh uv zhspytl wvy shz jhsslz khukv cvjlz, wbispjhukv sh hslcvzíh f
ayhpjpóu xbl zl tl ohiíh oljov. Thz altwsózl lzah mbyph wvy luavujlz jvu
wluzhy kl wvuly hxblssh tlzth uvjol wvy viyh sv xbl wbzl: xbl mbl wvulytl
lu lzal oáipav, xbl tl kpv buv kl svz xbl sshthu ghnhslz lu jhzh kl svz
shiyhkvylz, xbl lyh jyphkv kl tp whkyl, hs jbhs klzjbiyí avkh tp
klzcluabyh, f sl yvnbé tl hjvtwhñhzl ohzah sh jpbkhk kvukl lualukí xbl tp
lultpnv lzahih. És, klzwbéz xbl obiv ylwylolukpkv tp haylcptpluav f hmlhkv
tp klalytpuhjpóu, cpéukvtl ylzblsah lu tp whyljly, zl vmyljpó h alulytl
jvtwhñíh, jvtv és kpqv, ohzah ls jhiv kls tbukv. Sblnv, hs tvtluav, lujlyyé
lu buh hstvohkh kl splugv bu clzapkv kl tbqly, f hsnbuhz qvfhz f kpulyvz,
wvy sv xbl wvkíh zbjlkly. F lu ls zpslujpv kl hxblssh uvjol, zpu khy jbluah
h tp ayhpkvyh kvujlssh, zhsí kl tp jhzh, hjvtwhñhkh kl tp jyphkv f kl
tbjohz pthnpuhjpvulz, f tl wbzl lu jhtpuv kl sh jpbkhk h wpl, sslchkh lu
cblsv kls klzlv kl sslnhy, fh xbl uv h lzavyihy sv xbl aluíh wvy oljov, h
sv tluvz h kljpy h kvu Mlyuhukv tl kpqlzl jvu xbé hsth sv ohiíh oljov.
»Sslnbé lu kvz kíhz f tlkpv kvukl xblyíh, f, lu luayhukv wvy sh jpbkhk,
wylnbuaé wvy sh jhzh kl svz whkylz kl Sbzjpukh, f hs wyptlyv h xbplu opjl
sh wylnbuah tl ylzwvukpó táz kl sv xbl fv xbpzplyh víy. Kíqvtl sh jhzh f
avkv sv xbl ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu ls klzwvzvypv kl zb opqh, jvzh ahu wúispjh lu
sh jpbkhk, xbl zl ohjl lu jvyypssvz whyh jvuahysh wvy avkh lssh. Kíqvtl xbl
sh uvjol xbl kvu Mlyuhukv zl klzwvzó jvu Sbzjpukh, klzwbéz kl ohily lssh
khkv ls zí kl zly zb lzwvzh, sl ohiíh avthkv bu yljpv klzthfv, f xbl,
sslnhukv zb lzwvzv h klzhiyvjohysl ls wljov whyh xbl sl kplzl ls hpyl, sl
ohssó bu whwls lzjypav kl sh tpzth slayh kl Sbzjpukh, lu xbl kljíh f
kljshyhih xbl lssh uv wvkíh zly lzwvzh kl kvu Mlyuhukv, wvyxbl sv lyh kl
Jhyklupv, xbl, h sv xbl ls ovtiyl tl kpqv, lyh bu jhihsslyv tbf wypujpwhs
kl sh tlzth jpbkhk; f xbl zp ohiíh khkv ls zí h kvu Mlyuhukv, mbl wvy uv
zhspy kl sh vilkplujph kl zbz whkylz. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, ahslz yhgvulz kpqv xbl
jvualuíh ls whwls, xbl khih h lualukly xbl lssh ohiíh alupkv pualujpóu kl
thahyzl lu hjhiáukvzl kl klzwvzhy, f khih hssí shz yhgvulz wvy xbl zl ohiíh
xbpahkv sh cpkh. Avkv sv jbhs kpjlu xbl jvumpytó buh khnh xbl sl ohsshyvu
uv zé lu xbé whyal kl zbz clzapkvz. Avkv sv jbhs cpzav wvy kvu Mlyuhukv,
whyljpéukvsl xbl Sbzjpukh sl ohiíh ibyshkv f lzjhyuljpkv f alupkv lu wvjv,
hyyltlapó h lssh, hualz xbl kl zb klzthfv cvscplzl, f jvu sh tpzth khnh xbl
sl ohsshyvu sh xbpzv khy kl wbñhshkhz; f sv opjplyh zp zbz whkylz f svz xbl
zl ohsshyvu wylzlualz uv zl sv lzavyihyhu. Kpqlyvu táz: xbl sblnv zl
hbzluaó kvu Mlyuhukv, f xbl Sbzjpukh uv ohiíh cblsav kl zb whyhzpztv ohzah
vayv kíh, xbl jvuaó h zbz whkylz jótv lssh lyh clykhklyh lzwvzh kl hxbls
Jhyklupv xbl ol kpjov. Zbwl táz: xbl ls Jhyklupv, zlnúu kljíhu, zl ohssó
wylzlual lu svz klzwvzvypvz, f xbl, lu cpéukvsh klzwvzhkh, sv jbhs és qhtáz
wluzó, zl zhspó kl sh jpbkhk klzlzwlyhkv, klqáukvsl wyptlyv lzjypah buh
jhyah, kvukl khih h lualukly ls hnyhcpv xbl Sbzjpukh sl ohiíh oljov, f kl
jótv és zl pih hkvukl nlualz uv sl cplzlu.

»Lzav avkv lyh wúispjv f uvavypv lu avkh sh jpbkhk, f avkvz ohishihu klssv;
f táz ohishyvu jbhukv zbwplyvu xbl Sbzjpukh ohiíh mhsahkv kl jhzh kl zbz
whkylz f kl sh jpbkhk, wblz uv sh ohsshyvu lu avkh lssh, kl xbl wlykíhu ls
qbpjpv zbz whkylz f uv zhiíhu xbé tlkpv zl avthy whyh ohsshysh. Lzav xbl
zbwl wbzv lu ihukv tpz lzwlyhughz, f abcl wvy tlqvy uv ohily ohsshkv h kvu
Mlyuhukv, xbl uv ohsshysl jhzhkv, whyljpéukvtl xbl húu uv lzahih kls avkv
jlyyhkh sh wblyah h tp yltlkpv, káukvtl fv h lualukly xbl wvkyíh zly xbl ls
jplsv obiplzl wblzav hxbls ptwlkptluav lu ls zlnbukv thayptvupv, wvy
hayhlysl h jvuvjly sv xbl hs wyptlyv kliíh, f h jhly lu sh jbluah kl xbl
lyh jypzaphuv f xbl lzahih táz vispnhkv h zb hsth xbl h svz ylzwlavz
obthuvz. Avkhz lzahz jvzhz ylcvscíh lu tp mhuahzíh, f tl jvuzvshih zpu
aluly jvuzblsv, mpunplukv buhz lzwlyhughz shynhz f klzthfhkhz, whyh
luaylaluly sh cpkh, xbl fh hivyylgjv.

»Lzahukv, wblz, lu sh jpbkhk, zpu zhily xbé ohjlytl, wblz h kvu Mlyuhukv uv
ohsshih, sslnó h tpz víkvz bu wúispjv wylnóu, kvukl zl wyvtlaíh nyhukl
ohsshgnv h xbplu tl ohsshzl, khukv shz zlñhz kl sh lkhk f kls tlztv ayhql
xbl ayhíh; f ví kljpy xbl zl kljíh xbl tl ohiíh zhjhkv kl jhzh kl tpz
whkylz ls tvgv xbl jvutpnv cpuv, jvzh xbl tl sslnó hs hsth, wvy cly jbáu kl
jhíkh hukhih tp jyékpav, wblz uv ihzahih wlyklysl jvu tp clupkh, zpuv
hñhkpy ls jvu xbpéu, zplukv zbiqlav ahu ihqv f ahu pukpnuv kl tpz ibluvz
wluzhtpluavz. Hs wbuav xbl ví ls wylnóu, tl zhsí kl sh jpbkhk jvu tp
jyphkv, xbl fh jvtlughih h khy tblzayhz kl apabilhy lu sh ml xbl kl
mpklspkhk tl aluíh wyvtlapkh, f hxblssh uvjol uvz luayhtvz wvy sv lzwlzv
klzah tvuahñh, jvu ls tplkv kl uv zly ohsshkvz. Wlyv, jvtv zblsl kljpyzl
xbl bu ths sshth h vayv, f xbl ls mpu kl buh klznyhjph zblsl zly wypujpwpv
kl vayh thfvy, hzí tl zbjlkpó h tí, wvyxbl tp iblu jyphkv, ohzah luavujlz
mpls f zlnbyv, hzí jvtv tl cpv lu lzah zvslkhk, pujpahkv kl zb tlzth
ilsshxblyíh hualz xbl kl tp olytvzbyh, xbpzv hwyvcljohyzl kl sh vjhzpóu
xbl, h zb whyljly, lzavz flytvz sl vmyljíhu; f, jvu wvjh clynülugh f tluvz
altvy kl Kpvz up ylzwlav tív, tl ylxbpypó kl htvylz; f, cplukv xbl fv jvu
mlhz f qbzahz whshiyhz ylzwvukíh h shz klzclynülughz kl zbz wyvwózpavz,
klqó hwhyal svz yblnvz, kl xbplu wyptlyv wluzó hwyvcljohyzl, f jvtlugó h
bzhy kl sh mblygh. Wlyv ls qbzav jplsv, xbl wvjhz v upunbuhz cljlz klqh kl
tpyhy f mhcvyljly h shz qbzahz pualujpvulz, mhcvyljpó shz tíhz, kl thulyh
xbl jvu tpz wvjhz mblyghz, f jvu wvjv ayhihqv, kp jvu és wvy bu
klyybtihklyv, kvukl sl klqé, up zé zp tblyav v zp cpcv; f sblnv, jvu táz
spnlylgh xbl tp zviylzhsav f jhuzhujpv wlkíhu, tl luayé wvy lzahz tvuahñhz,
zpu sslchy vayv wluzhtpluav up vayv kpzpnupv xbl lzjvuklytl lu lsshz f obpy
kl tp whkyl f kl hxblssvz xbl kl zb whyal tl hukhihu ibzjhukv.

»Jvu lzal klzlv, oh uv zé jbáuavz tlzlz xbl luayé lu lsshz, kvukl ohssé bu
nhuhklyv xbl tl sslcó wvy zb jyphkv h bu sbnhy xbl lzaá lu shz luayhñhz
klzah zplyyh, hs jbhs ol zlycpkv kl ghnhs avkv lzal apltwv, wyvjbyhukv
lzahy zpltwyl lu ls jhtwv wvy lujbiypy lzavz jhilssvz xbl hovyh, ahu zp
wluzhysv, tl ohu klzjbiplyav. Wlyv avkh tp pukbzayph f avkh tp zvspjpabk
mbl f oh zpkv kl upunúu wyvcljov, wblz tp htv cpuv lu jvuvjptpluav kl xbl
fv uv lyh chyóu, f uhjpó lu és ls tlztv ths wluzhtpluav xbl lu tp jyphkv;
f, jvtv uv zpltwyl sh mvyabuh jvu svz ayhihqvz kh svz yltlkpvz, uv ohssé
klyybtihklyv up ihyyhujv kl kvukl klzwlñhy f klzwluhy hs htv, jvtv sl ohssé
whyh ls jyphkv; f hzí, abcl wvy tluvy pujvucluplual klqhssl f hzjvuklytl kl
ublcv luayl lzahz hzwlylghz xbl wyvihy jvu és tpz mblyghz v tpz kpzjbswhz.
Kpnv, wblz, xbl tl avyué h ltivzjhy, f h ibzjhy kvukl zpu ptwlkptluav
hsnbuv wbkplzl jvu zbzwpyvz f sánypthz yvnhy hs jplsv zl kblsh kl tp
klzcluabyh f tl ké pukbzayph f mhcvy whyh zhspy klssh, v whyh klqhy sh cpkh
luayl lzahz zvslkhklz, zpu xbl xblkl tltvyph klzah aypzal, xbl ahu zpu
jbswh zbfh ohiyá khkv thalyph whyh xbl kl lssh zl ohisl f tbytbyl lu sh
zbfh f lu shz hqluhz aplyyhz.»




Jhwíabsv EEPE. Xbl ayhah kl sh kpzjyljpóu kl sh olytvzh Kvyvalh, jvu vayhz
jvzhz kl tbjov nbzav f whzhapltwv

— Lzah lz, zlñvylz, sh clykhklyh opzavyph kl tp ayhnlkph: tpyhk f qbgnhk
hovyh zp svz zbzwpyvz xbl lzjbjohzalz, shz whshiyhz xbl vízalz f shz
sánypthz xbl kl tpz vqvz zhsíhu, aluíhu vjhzpóu ihzahual whyh tvzayhyzl lu
thfvy hibukhujph; f, jvuzpklyhkh sh jhspkhk kl tp klznyhjph, clyépz xbl
zlyá lu chuv ls jvuzblsv, wblz lz ptwvzpisl ls yltlkpv klssh. Zósv vz yblnv
(sv xbl jvu mhjpspkhk wvkyépz f kliépz ohjly) xbl tl hjvuzlqépz kóukl wvkyé
whzhy sh cpkh zpu xbl tl hjhil ls altvy f zviylzhsav xbl alunv kl zly
ohsshkh kl svz xbl tl ibzjhu; xbl, hbuxbl zé xbl ls tbjov htvy xbl tpz

clynülugh xbl tl vjbwh zósv ls wluzhy xbl, uv jvtv lssvz wluzhihu, alunv kl
whyljly h zb wylzlujph, xbl alunv wvy tlqvy klzalyyhytl whyh zpltwyl kl zly

kl sh ovulzapkhk xbl kl tí zl kliíhu kl aluly wyvtlapkh.

Jhssó lu kpjplukv lzav, f ls yvzayv zl sl jbiypó kl bu jvsvy xbl tvzayó
iplu jshyv ls zluaptpluav f clynülugh kls hsth. Lu shz zbfhz zpuaplyvu svz
xbl lzjbjohkv sh ohiíhu ahuah sázapth jvtv hktpyhjpóu kl zb klznyhjph; f,

— Lu mpu, zlñvyh, xbl aú lylz sh olytvzh Kvyvalh, sh opqh úupjh kls ypjv
Jsluhykv.

Hktpyhkh xblkó Kvyvalh jbhukv vfó ls uvtiyl kl zb whkyl, f kl cly jbáu kl

Jhyklupv lzahih clzapkv; f hzí, sl kpqv:

— F ¿xbpéu zvpz cvz, olythuv, xbl hzí zhiépz ls uvtiyl kl tp whkyl? Wvyxbl
fv, ohzah hovyh, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, lu avkv ls kpzjbyzv kls jbluav kl tp

— Zvf —ylzwvukpó Jhyklupv— hxbls zpu cluabyh xbl, zlnúu cvz, zlñvyh, ohiépz
kpjov, Sbzjpukh kpqv xbl lyh zb lzwvzh. Zvf ls klzkpjohkv Jhyklupv, h xbplu

jvuzblsv f, sv xbl lz wlvy kl avkv, mhsav kl qbpjpv, wblz uv sl alunv zpuv
jbhukv hs jplsv zl sl huavqh káytlsl wvy hsnúu iylcl lzwhjpv. Fv, Alvkvyh,
zvf ls xbl tl ohssé wylzlual h shz zpuyhgvulz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, f ls xbl
hnbhykó víy ls zí xbl kl zly zb lzwvzh wyvubujpó Sbzjpukh. Fv zvf ls xbl uv
abcv áuptv whyh cly lu xbé whyhih zb klzthfv, up sv xbl ylzbsahih kls whwls
xbl sl mbl ohsshkv lu ls wljov, wvyxbl uv abcv ls hsth zbmyptpluav whyh cly
ahuahz klzcluabyhz qbuahz; f hzí, klqé sh jhzh f sh whjplujph, f buh jhyah
xbl klqé h bu obézwlk tív, h xbplu yvnbé xbl lu thuvz kl Sbzjpukh sh
wbzplzl, f cíultl h lzahz zvslkhklz, jvu pualujpóu kl hjhihy lu lsshz sh

xblypkv sh zblyal xbpaáytlsh, jvualuaáukvzl jvu xbpahytl ls qbpjpv, xbpgá

clykhk, jvtv jylv xbl sv lz, sv xbl hxbí ohiépz jvuahkv, húu wvkyíh zly xbl
h luayhtivz uvz abcplzl ls jplsv nbhykhkv tlqvy zbjlzv lu ublzayvz
klzhzaylz xbl uvzvayvz wluzhtvz. Wvyxbl, wylzbwblzav xbl Sbzjpukh uv wblkl
jhzhyzl jvu kvu Mlyuhukv, wvy zly tíh, up kvu Mlyuhukv jvu lssh, wvy zly
cblzayv, f ohilysv lssh ahu thupmplzahtlual kljshyhkv, iplu wvkltvz lzwlyhy

zlñvyh, xbl avtépz vayh ylzvsbjpóu lu cblzayvz ovuyhkvz wluzhtpluavz, wblz

Jvu sv xbl Jhyklupv kpqv zl hjhió kl hktpyhy Kvyvalh, f, wvy uv zhily xbé
nyhjphz cvscly h ahu nyhuklz vmyljptpluavz, xbpzv avthysl svz wplz whyh
ilzáyzlsvz; thz uv sv jvuzpuapó Jhyklupv, f ls spjlujphkv ylzwvukpó wvy

hjvuzlqó f wlyzbhkpó xbl zl mblzlu jvu és h zb hsklh, kvukl zl wvkyíhu
ylwhyhy kl shz jvzhz xbl slz mhsahihu, f xbl hssí zl khyíh vyklu jótv
ibzjhy h kvu Mlyuhukv, v jótv sslchy h Kvyvalh h zbz whkylz, v ohjly sv xbl

hjlahyvu sh tlyjlk xbl zl slz vmyljíh. Ls ihyilyv, xbl h avkv ohiíh lzahkv
zbzwluzv f jhsshkv, opgv ahtipéu zb ibluh wsáapjh f zl vmyljpó jvu uv tluvz
cvsbuahk xbl ls jbyh h avkv hxblssv xbl mblzl ibluv whyh zlycpyslz.
Jvuaó hzptlztv jvu iylclkhk sh jhbzh xbl hssí svz ohiíh ayhíkv, jvu sh
lzayhñlgh kl sh svjbyh kl kvu Xbpqval, f jótv hnbhykhihu h zb lzjbklyv, xbl

zbwv kljpy wvy xbé jhbzh mbl zb xbpzapóu.

Lu lzav, vflyvu cvjlz, f jvuvjplyvu xbl ls xbl shz khih lyh Zhujov Whugh,
xbl, wvy uv ohilysvz ohsshkv lu ls sbnhy kvukl svz klqó, svz sshthih h

Avivzv, kvukl sl xblkhih lzwlyhukv, ohiíh ylzwvukpkv xbl lzahih klalytpuhkv
kl uv whyljly hual zb mlytvzbyh mhzah xbl oviplzl mljov mhghñhz xbl sl

hygvipzwv, xbl lyh sv tluvz xbl wvkíh zly. Wvy lzv, xbl tpyhzlu sv xbl zl
ohiíh kl ohjly whyh zhjhysl kl hssí.

Ls spjlujphkv sl ylzwvukpó xbl uv abcplzl wluh, xbl lssvz sl zhjhyíhu kl
hssí, ths xbl sl wlzhzl. Jvuaó sblnv h Jhyklupv f h Kvyvalh sv xbl aluíhu
wluzhkv whyh yltlkpv kl kvu Xbpqval, h sv tluvz whyh sslchysl h zb jhzh. H
sv jbhs kpqv Kvyvalh xbl lssh ohyíh sh kvujlssh tlulzalyvzh tlqvy xbl ls
ihyilyv, f táz, xbl aluíh hssí clzapkvz jvu xbl ohjlysv hs uhabyhs, f xbl
sh klqhzlu ls jhynv kl zhily ylwylzluahy avkv hxblssv xbl mblzl tlulzaly
whyh sslchy hklshual zb pualuav, wvyxbl lssh ohiíh slíkv tbjovz spiyvz kl
jhihsslyíhz f zhiíh iplu ls lzapsv xbl aluíhu shz kvujlsshz jbpahkhz jbhukv
wlkíhu zbz kvulz h svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz.

— Wblz uv lz tlulzaly táz —kpqv ls jbyh— zpuv xbl sblnv zl wvunh wvy viyh;
xbl, zpu kbkh, sh ibluh zblyal zl tblzayh lu mhcvy ublzayv, wblz, ahu zpu
wluzhysv, h cvzvayvz, zlñvylz, zl vz oh jvtlughkv h hiypy wblyah whyh
cblzayv yltlkpv f h uvzvayvz zl uvz oh mhjpspahkv sh xbl ohiíhtvz tlulzaly.
Zhjó sblnv Kvyvalh kl zb hstvohkh buh zhfh lualyh kl jplyah alspssh ypjh f
buh thualsspuh kl vayh cpzavzh alsh clykl, f kl buh jhqpah bu jvsshy f
vayhz qvfhz, jvu xbl lu bu puzahual zl hkvyuó kl thulyh xbl buh ypjh f nyhu
zlñvyh whyljíh. Avkv hxblssv, f táz, kpqv xbl ohiíh zhjhkv kl zb jhzh whyh
sv xbl zl vmyljplzl, f xbl ohzah luavujlz uv zl sl ohiíh vmyljpkv vjhzpóu
kl ohilssv tlulzaly. H avkvz jvualuaó lu lzayltv zb tbjoh nyhjph, kvuhpyl f
olytvzbyh, f jvumpythyvu h kvu Mlyuhukv wvy kl wvjv jvuvjptpluav, wblz
ahuah ilsslgh klzljohih.

Wlyv ls xbl táz zl hktpyó mbl Zhujov Whugh, wvy whyljlysl —jvtv lyh hzí
clykhk— xbl lu avkvz svz kíhz kl zb cpkh ohiíh cpzav ahu olytvzh jyphabyh;
f hzí, wylnbuaó hs jbyh jvu nyhukl hoíujv sl kpqlzl xbpéu lyh hxblssh ahu
mlytvzh zlñvyh, f xbé lyh sv xbl ibzjhih wvy hxblssvz hukbyyphslz.
— Lzah olytvzh zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh—, Zhujov olythuv, lz, jvtv xbplu uv
kpjl uhkh, lz sh olylklyh wvy síulh yljah kl chyóu kls nyhu ylpuv kl
Tpjvtpjóu, sh jbhs cplul lu ibzjh kl cblzayv htv h wlkpysl bu kvu, ls jbhs
lz xbl sl klzmhnh bu ablyav v hnyhcpv xbl bu ths npnhual sl aplul mljov; f,
h sh mhth xbl kl iblu jhihsslyv cblzayv htv aplul wvy avkv sv klzjbiplyav,
kl Nbpulh oh clupkv h ibzjhysl lzah wypujlzh.

— Kpjovzh ibzjhkh f kpjovzv ohsshgnv —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov Whugh—, f táz
zp tp htv lz ahu cluabyvzv xbl klzmhnh lzl hnyhcpv f luklyljl lzl ablyav,
thahukv h lzl opklwbah klzl npnhual xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl; xbl zí thahyá
zp és sl lujbluayh, zp fh uv mblzl mhuahzth, xbl jvuayh shz mhuahzthz uv
aplul tp zlñvy wvkly hsnbuv. Wlyv buh jvzh xbplyv zbwspjhy h cblzayh
tlyjlk, luayl vayhz, zlñvy spjlujphkv, f lz xbl, wvyxbl h tp htv uv sl avtl
nhuh kl zly hygvipzwv, xbl lz sv xbl fv altv, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl
hjvuzlql xbl zl jhzl sblnv jvu lzah wypujlzh, f hzí xblkhyá ptwvzpipspahkv
kl yljlipy óyklulz hygvipzwhslz f clukyá jvu mhjpspkhk h zb ptwlypv f fv hs
mpu kl tpz klzlvz; xbl fv ol tpyhkv iplu lu lssv f ohssv wvy tp jbluah xbl
uv tl lzaá iplu xbl tp htv zlh hygvipzwv, wvyxbl fv zvf puúaps whyh sh
Pnslzph, wblz zvf jhzhkv, f hukhytl hovyh h ayhly kpzwluzhjpvulz whyh wvkly

ubujh hjhihy. Hzí xbl, zlñvy, avkv ls avxbl lzaá lu xbl tp htv zl jhzl
sblnv jvu lzah zlñvyh, xbl ohzah hovyh uv zé zb nyhjph, f hzí, uv sh sshtv

— Ssáthzl —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh— sh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, wvyxbl, sshtáukvzl zb
ylpuv Tpjvtpjóu, jshyv lzaá xbl lssh zl oh kl sshthy hzí.

— Uv ohf kbkh lu lzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl fv ol cpzav h tbjovz avthy ls

— Hzí klil kl zly —kpqv ls jbyh—; f lu sv kls jhzhyzl cblzayv htv, fv ohyé
lu lssv avkvz tpz wvklyívz.

Jvu sv xbl xblkó ahu jvualuav Zhujov jbhuav ls jbyh hktpyhkv kl zb
zptwspjpkhk, f kl cly jbáu lujhqhkvz aluíh lu sh mhuahzíh svz tlztvz

Fh, lu lzav, zl ohiíh wblzav Kvyvalh zviyl sh tbsh kls jbyh f ls ihyilyv zl
ohiíh hjvtvkhkv hs yvzayv sh ihyih kl sh jvsh kl iblf, f kpqlyvu h Zhujov

Jhyklupv xbpzplyvu py jvu lssvz, wvyxbl uv zl sl hjvykhzl h kvu Xbpqval sh
wluklujph xbl jvu Jhyklupv ohiíh alupkv, f ls jbyh wvyxbl uv lyh tlulzaly
wvy luavujlz zb wylzlujph. F hzí, svz klqhyvu py klshual, f lssvz svz
mblyvu zpnbplukv h wpl, wvjv h wvjv. Uv klqó kl hcpzhy ls jbyh sv xbl ohiíh
kl ohjly Kvyvalh; h sv xbl lssh kpqv xbl klzjbpkhzlu, xbl avkv zl ohyíh,
zpu mhsahy wbuav, jvtv sv wlkíhu f wpuahihu svz spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz.
Aylz jbhyavz kl slnbh ohiyíhu hukhkv, jbhukv klzjbiyplyvu h kvu Xbpqval
luayl buhz puaypjhkhz wlñhz, fh clzapkv, hbuxbl uv hythkv; f, hzí jvtv

hgval h zb whshmyéu, zpnbpéukvsl ls iplu ihyihkv ihyilyv. F, lu sslnhukv
qbuav h és, ls lzjbklyv zl hyyvqó kl sh tbsh f mbl h avthy lu svz iyhgvz h
Kvyvalh, sh jbhs, hwláukvzl jvu nyhukl klzlucvsabyh, zl mbl h opujhy kl
yvkpsshz hual shz kl kvu Xbpqval; f, hbuxbl és wbnuhih wvy slchuahysh,
lssh, zpu slchuahyzl, sl mhisó lu lzah nbpzh:

— Kl hxbí uv tl slchuahyé, ¡vo chslyvzv f lzmvyghkv jhihsslyv!, mhzah xbl sh
cblzayh ivukhk f jvyalzíh tl vavynbl bu kvu, ls jbhs ylkbukhyá lu ovuyh f

kvujlssh xbl ls zvs oh cpzav. F zp lz xbl ls chsvy kl cblzayv mblyal iyhgv
jvyylzwvukl h sh cvg kl cblzayh putvyahs mhth, vispnhkv lzaápz h mhcvyljly

uvtiyl, ibzjáukvvz whyh yltlkpv kl zbz klzkpjohz.

— Uv vz ylzwvuklyé whshiyh, mlytvzh zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, up vpyé
táz jvzh kl cblzayh mhjplukh, mhzah xbl vz slchuaépz kl aplyyh.

— Uv tl slchuahyé, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó sh hmspnpkh kvujlssh—, zp wyptlyv, wvy
sh cblzayh jvyalzíh, uv tl lz vavynhkv ls kvu xbl wpkv.

— Fv cvz sl vavynv f jvujlkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, jvtv uv zl ohfh kl
jbtwspy lu khñv v tlunbh kl tp ylf, kl tp whayph f kl hxblssh xbl kl tp
jvyhgóu f spilyahk aplul sh sshcl.

— Uv zlyá lu khñv up lu tlunbh kl svz xbl kljíz, tp iblu zlñvy —ylwspjó sh
kvsvyvzh kvujlssh.

F, lzahukv lu lzav, zl sslnó Zhujov Whugh hs víkv kl zb zlñvy f tbf whzpav
sl kpqv:

— Iplu wblkl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy, jvujlklysl ls kvu xbl wpkl, xbl uv lz
jvzh kl uhkh: zósv lz thahy h bu npnhuahgv, f lzah xbl sv wpkl lz sh hsah
wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, ylpuh kls nyhu ylpuv Tpjvtpjóu kl Lapvwíh.

— Zlh xbplu mblyl —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv ohyé sv xbl zvf vispnhkv f
sv xbl tl kpjah tp jvujplujph, jvumvytl h sv xbl wyvmlzhkv alunv.

F, cvscpéukvzl h sh kvujlssh, kpqv:

— Sh cblzayh nyhu mlytvzbyh zl slchual, xbl fv sl vavynv ls kvu xbl wlkpytl
xbpzplyl.

— Wblz ls xbl wpkv lz —kpqv sh kvujlssh— xbl sh cblzayh thnuáupth wlyzvuh zl
clunh sblnv jvutpnv kvukl fv sl sslchyl, f tl wyvtlah xbl uv zl oh kl
luayltlaly lu vayh hcluabyh up klthukh hsnbuh ohzah khytl clunhugh kl bu
ayhpkvy xbl, jvuayh avkv klyljov kpcpuv f obthuv, tl aplul bzbywhkv tp

Uv obiv iplu hjhihkv ls jbyh, jbhukv Zhujov kpqv:

— Wblz tíh ml, zlñvy spjlujphkv, ls xbl opgv lzh mhghñh mbl tp htv, f uv

— ¡Thqhklyv! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—, h svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz uv
slz avjh up hahñl hclypnbhy zp svz hmspnpkvz, lujhkluhkvz f vwylzvz xbl

F lzav kpqv hmpytáukvzl lu svz lzaypivz f jhsáukvzl ls tvyypóu; wvyxbl sh

Kvyvalh, xbl lyh kpzjylah f kl nyhu kvuhpyl, jvtv xbplu fh zhiíh ls

ylkbukhyh.

— Lzv qbyv fv iplu —kpqv ls jbyh—, f hbu tl obiplyh xbpahkv bu ipnval.
— Fv jhsshyé, zlñvyh tíh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f ylwyptpyé sh qbzah jóslyh xbl

— Lzv ohyé fv kl nhuh —ylzwvukpó Kvyvalh—, zp lz xbl uv vz lumhkhu víy
sázapthz f klznyhjphz.

— Uv lumhkhyá, zlñvyh tíh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Kvyvalh:

— Wblz hzí lz, lzaéutl cblzayhz tlyjlklz haluavz.

Uv obiv lssh kpjov lzav, jbhukv Jhyklupv f ls ihyilyv zl sl wbzplyvu hs
shkv, klzlvzvz kl cly jótv mpuníh zb opzavyph sh kpzjylah Kvyvalh; f sv
tpztv opgv Zhujov, xbl ahu lunhñhkv pih jvu lssh jvtv zb htv. F lssh,
klzwbéz kl ohilyzl wblzav iplu lu sh zpssh f wylcluíkvzl jvu avzly f ohjly
vayvz hklthulz, jvu tbjov kvuhpyl, jvtlugó h kljpy klzah thulyh:
— «Wyptlyhtlual, xbplyv xbl cblzayhz tlyjlklz zlwhu, zlñvylz tívz, xbl h tí
tl sshthu...»

F klaúcvzl hxbí bu wvjv, wvyxbl zl sl vscpkó ls uvtiyl xbl ls jbyh sl ohiíh
wblzav; wlyv és hjbkpó hs yltlkpv, wvyxbl lualukpó lu sv xbl ylwhyhih, f

— Uv lz thyhcpssh, zlñvyh tíh, xbl sh cblzayh nyhuklgh zl abyil f ltwhjol
jvuahukv zbz klzcluabyhz, xbl lsshz zblslu zly ahslz, xbl tbjohz cljlz
xbpahu sh tltvyph h svz xbl thsayhahu, kl ahs thulyh xbl hbu kl zbz tlztvz
uvtiylz uv zl slz hjblykh, jvtv ohu oljov jvu cblzayh nyhu zlñvyíh, xbl zl
oh vscpkhkv xbl zl sshth sh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, slníapth olylklyh kls nyhu
ylpuv Tpjvtpjóu; f jvu lzal hwbuahtpluav wblkl sh cblzayh nyhuklgh ylkbjpy
hovyh májpstlual h zb shzapthkh tltvyph avkv hxblssv xbl jvuahy xbpzplyl.
— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó sh kvujlssh—, f klzkl hxbí hklshual jylv xbl
uv zlyá tlulzaly hwbuahytl uhkh, xbl fv zhskyé h iblu wblyav jvu tp
clykhklyh opzavyph. «Sh jbhs lz xbl ls ylf tp whkyl, xbl zl sshth Apuhjypv
ls Zhipkvy, mbl tbf kvjav lu lzav xbl sshthu ls hyal tánpjh, f hsjhugó wvy
zb jplujph xbl tp thkyl, xbl zl sshthih sh ylpuh Qhyhtpssh, ohiíh kl tvypy
wyptlyv xbl és, f xbl kl hssí h wvjv apltwv és ahtipéu ohiíh kl whzhy klzah
cpkh f fv ohiíh kl xblkhy obéymhuh kl whkyl f thkyl. Wlyv kljíh és xbl uv
sl mhapnhih ahuav lzav jbhuav sl wvuíh lu jvumbzpóu zhily, wvy jvzh tbf
jplyah, xbl bu klzjvtbuhs npnhual, zlñvy kl buh nyhukl íuzbsh, xbl jhzp
hspukh jvu ublzayv ylpuv, sshthkv Whukhmpshukv kl sh Mvzjh Cpzah (wvyxbl lz
jvzh hclypnbhkh xbl, hbuxbl aplul svz vqvz lu zb sbnhy f klyljovz, zpltwyl
tpyh hs ylcéz, jvtv zp mblzl ipgjv, f lzav sv ohjl és kl thspnuv f wvy
wvuly tplkv f lzwhuav h svz xbl tpyh); kpnv xbl zbwv xbl lzal npnhual, lu
zhiplukv tp vymhukhk, ohiíh kl whzhy jvu nyhu wvklyív zviyl tp ylpuv f tl
sv ohiíh kl xbpahy avkv, zpu klqhytl buh wlxblñh hsklh kvukl tl yljvnplzl;
wlyv xbl wvkíh lzjbzhy avkh lzah ybpuh f klznyhjph zp fv tl xbpzplzl jhzhy
jvu és; thz, h sv xbl és lualukíh, qhtáz wluzhih xbl tl clukyíh h tí lu
cvsbuahk kl ohjly ahu klzpnbhs jhzhtpluav; f kpqv lu lzav sh wbyh clykhk,
wvyxbl qhtáz tl oh whzhkv wvy ls wluzhtpluav jhzhytl jvu hxbls npnhual,
wlyv up jvu vayv hsnbuv, wvy nyhukl f klzhmvyhkv xbl mblzl. Kpqv ahtipéu tp
whkyl xbl, klzwbéz xbl és mblzl tblyav f cplzl fv xbl Whukhmpshukv
jvtlughih h whzhy zviyl tp ylpuv, xbl uv hnbhykhzl h wvulytl lu klmluzh,
wvyxbl zlyíh klzaybpytl, zpuv xbl spiyltlual sl klqhzl klzltihyhghkv ls
ylpuv, zp xblyíh lzjbzhy sh tblyal f avahs klzaybpjpóu kl tpz ibluvz f
slhslz chzhssvz, wvyxbl uv ohiíh kl zly wvzpisl klmluklytl kl sh lukphishkh
mblygh kls npnhual; zpuv xbl sblnv, jvu hsnbuvz kl svz tívz, tl wbzplzl lu
jhtpuv kl shz Lzwhñhz, kvukl ohsshyíh ls yltlkpv kl tpz thslz ohsshukv h bu
jhihsslyv hukhual, jbfh mhth lu lzal apltwv zl lzaluklyíh wvy avkv lzal
ylpuv, ls jbhs zl ohiíh kl sshthy, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, kvu Hgval v kvu
Npnval.»

— Kvu Xbpqval kpyíh, zlñvyh —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov Whugh—, v, wvy vayv
uvtiyl, ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —kpqv Kvyvalh—. «Kpqv táz: xbl ohiíh kl zly hsav kl
jblywv, zljv kl yvzayv, f xbl lu ls shkv klyljov, klihqv kls ovtiyv
pgxbplykv, v wvy hssí qbuav, ohiíh kl aluly bu sbuhy whykv jvu jplyavz
jhilssvz h thulyh kl jlykhz.»

Lu vflukv lzav kvu Xbpqval, kpqv h zb lzjbklyv:

— Alu hxbí, Zhujov, opqv, hfúkhtl h klzubkhy, xbl xbplyv cly zp zvf ls
jhihsslyv xbl hxbls zhipv ylf klqó wyvmlapghkv.

— Wblz, ¿whyh xbé xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk klzubkhyzl? —kpqv Kvyvalh.
— Whyh cly zp alunv lzl sbuhy xbl cblzayv whkyl kpqv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.
— Uv ohf whyh xbé klzubkhyzl —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl fv zé xbl aplul cblzayh
tlyjlk bu sbuhy klzhz zlñhz lu sh tpahk kls lzwpuhgv, xbl lz zlñhs kl zly
ovtiyl mblyal.

— Lzv ihzah —kpqv Kvyvalh—, wvyxbl jvu svz htpnvz uv zl oh kl tpyhy lu wvjhz
jvzhz, f xbl lzaé lu ls ovtiyv v xbl lzaé lu ls lzwpuhgv, ptwvyah wvjv;
ihzah xbl ohfh sbuhy, f lzaé kvukl lzabcplyl, wblz avkv lz buh tlzth jhyul;
f, zpu kbkh, hjlyaó tp iblu whkyl lu avkv, f fv ol hjlyahkv lu lujvtlukhytl

kls yvzayv cplulu jvu shz kl sh ibluh mhth xbl lzal jhihsslyv aplul uv zósv
lu Lzwhñh, wlyv lu avkh sh Thujoh, wblz hwluhz tl obil klzltihyjhkv lu
Vzbuh, jbhukv ví kljpy ahuahz ohghñhz zbfhz, xbl sblnv tl kpv ls hsth xbl
lyh ls tlztv xbl cluíh h ibzjhy.

— Wblz, ¿jótv zl klzltihyjó cblzayh tlyjlk lu Vzbuh, zlñvyh tíh —wylnbuaó
kvu Xbpqval—, zp uv lz wblyav kl thy?

Thz, hualz xbl Kvyvalh ylzwvukplzl, avtó ls jbyh sh thuv f kpqv:

— Klil kl xblyly kljpy sh zlñvyh wypujlzh xbl, klzwbéz xbl klzltihyjó lu
Táshnh, sh wyptlyh whyal kvukl vfó ublchz kl cblzayh tlyjlk mbl lu Vzbuh.
— Lzv xbpzl kljpy —kpqv Kvyvalh.

— F lzav sslch jhtpuv —kpqv ls jbyh—, f wyvzpnh cblzayh thqlzahk hklshual.
— Uv ohf xbl wyvzlnbpy —ylzwvukpó Kvyvalh—, zpuv xbl, mpuhstlual, tp zblyal
oh zpkv ahu ibluh lu ohsshy hs zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl fh tl jbluav f alunv

sslchyl, xbl uv zlyá h vayh whyal xbl h wvulysl klshual kl Whukhmpshukv kl
sh Mvzjh Cpzah, whyh xbl sl thal f tl ylzapabfh sv xbl ahu jvuayh yhgóu tl
aplul bzbywhkv: xbl avkv lzav oh kl zbjlkly h wlkpy kl ivjh, wblz hzí sv
klqó wyvmlapghkv Apuhjypv ls Zhipkvy, tp iblu whkyl; ls jbhs ahtipéu klqó
kpjov f lzjypav lu slayhz jhsklhz, v nyplnhz, xbl fv uv shz zé slly, xbl zp
lzal jhihsslyv kl sh wyvmljíh, klzwbéz kl ohily klnvsshkv hs npnhual,
xbpzplzl jhzhyzl jvutpnv, xbl fv tl vavynhzl sblnv zpu yéwspjh hsnbuh wvy
zb slníapth lzwvzh, f sl kplzl sh wvzlzpóu kl tp ylpuv, qbuav jvu sh kl tp
wlyzvuh.

— ¿Xbé al whyljl, Zhujov htpnv? —kpqv h lzal wbuav kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Uv vflz sv
xbl whzh? ¿Uv al sv kpql fv? Tpyh zp alultvz fh ylpuv xbl thukhy f ylpuh
jvu xbplu jhzhy.

— ¡Lzv qbyv fv —kpqv Zhujov— whyh ls wbav xbl uv zl jhzhyl lu hiyplukv ls
nhguhapjv hs zlñvy Whukhopshkv! Wblz, ¡tvuah xbl lz thsh sh ylpuh! ¡Hzí zl
tl cblschu shz wbsnhz kl sh jhth!

F, kpjplukv lzav, kpv kvz ghwhalahz lu ls hpyl, jvu tblzayhz kl nyhukízptv
jvualuav, f sblnv mbl h avthy shz yplukhz kl sh tbsh kl Kvyvalh, f,
ohjpéukvsh klaluly, zl opujó kl yvkpsshz hual lssh, zbwspjáukvsl sl kplzl
shz thuvz whyh ilzáyzlshz, lu zlñhs xbl sh yljpiíh wvy zb ylpuh f zlñvyh.
¿Xbpéu uv ohiíh kl ylíy kl svz jpyjbzahualz, cplukv sh svjbyh kls htv f sh
zptwspjpkhk kls jyphkv? Lu lmljav, Kvyvalh zl shz kpv, f sl wyvtlapó kl
ohjlysl nyhu zlñvy lu zb ylpuv, jbhukv ls jplsv sl opjplzl ahuav iplu xbl
zl sv klqhzl jviyhy f nvghy. Hnyhkljpózlsv Zhujov jvu ahslz whshiyhz xbl
yluvcó sh ypzh lu avkvz.

— Ézah, zlñvylz —wyvzpnbpó Kvyvalh—, lz tp opzavyph: zósv ylzah wvy kljpyvz
xbl kl jbhuah nlual kl hjvtwhñhtpluav zhxbé kl tp ylpuv uv tl oh xblkhkv
zpuv zósv lzal iblu ihyihkv lzjbklyv, wvyxbl avkvz zl hulnhyvu lu buh nyhu
ivyyhzjh xbl abcptvz h cpzah kls wblyav, f és f fv zhsptvz lu kvz ahishz h
aplyyh, jvtv wvy tpshnyv; f hzí, lz avkv tpshnyv f tpzalypv ls kpzjbyzv kl
tp cpkh, jvtv sv ohiyépz uvahkv. F zp lu hsnbuh jvzh ol hukhkv klthzphkh, v
uv ahu hjlyahkh jvtv kliplyh, ljohk sh jbswh h sv xbl ls zlñvy spjlujphkv
kpqv hs wypujpwpv kl tp jbluav: xbl svz ayhihqvz jvuapubvz f
leayhvykpuhypvz xbpahu sh tltvyph hs xbl svz whkljl.

— Ézh uv tl xbpahyáu h tí, ¡vo hsah f chslyvzh zlñvyh! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—,
jbhuavz fv whzhyl lu zlycpyvz, wvy nyhuklz f uv cpzavz xbl zlhu; f hzí, kl
ublcv jvumpytv ls kvu xbl vz ol wyvtlapkv, f qbyv kl py jvu cvz hs jhiv kls

hfbkh kl Kpvz f kl tp iyhgv, ahqhy sh jhilgh zvilyiph jvu svz mpsvz
klzah... uv xbplyv kljpy ibluh lzwhkh, tlyjlk h Npuéz kl Whzhtvual, xbl tl
sslcó sh tíh.

Lzav kpqv luayl kplualz, f wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— F klzwbéz kl ohiéyzlsh ahqhkv f wbézavvz lu whjímpjh wvzlzpóu kl cblzayv
lzahkv, xblkhyá h cblzayh cvsbuahk ohjly kl cblzayh wlyzvuh sv xbl táz lu
ahshual vz cpuplyl; wvyxbl, tpluayhz xbl fv abcplyl vjbwhkh sh tltvyph f
jhbapch sh cvsbuahk, wlykpkv ls lualukptpluav, h hxblssh..., f uv kpnv táz,
uv lz wvzpisl xbl fv hyyvzayl, up wvy wpluzv, ls jhzhytl, hbuxbl mblzl jvu
ls hcl méupe.

Whyljpósl ahu ths h Zhujov sv xbl úsapthtlual zb htv kpqv hjlyjh kl uv
xblyly jhzhyzl, xbl, jvu nyhukl luvqv, hsghukv sh cvg, kpqv:

— Cvav h tí, f qbyv h tí, xbl uv aplul cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval,
jhihs qbpjpv. Wblz, ¿jótv lz wvzpisl xbl wvul cblzayh tlyjlk lu kbkh ls
jhzhyzl jvu ahu hsah wypujlzh jvtv hxbézah? ¿Wpluzh xbl sl oh kl vmyljly sh
mvyabuh, ayhz jhkh jhuapssv, zltlqhual cluabyh jvtv sh xbl hovyh zl sl
vmyljl? ¿Lz, wvy kpjoh, táz olytvzh tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh? Uv, wvy jplyav, up
hbu jvu sh tpahk, f hbu lzavf wvy kljpy xbl uv sslnh h zb ghwhav kl sh xbl
lzaá klshual. Hzí, uvyhthsh hsjhughyé fv ls jvukhkv xbl lzwlyv, zp cblzayh
tlyjlk zl hukh h wlkpy jvabmhz lu ls nvsmv. Jázlzl, jázlzl sblnv,
lujvtpéukvsl fv h Zhahuáz, f avtl lzl ylpuv xbl zl sl cplul h shz thuvz kl
cvipz, cvipz, f, lu zplukv ylf, oánhtl thyxbéz v hklshuahkv, f sblnv,
zpxbplyh zl sv sslcl ls kphisv avkv.

Kvu Xbpqval, xbl ahslz ishzmltphz vfó kljpy jvuayh zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, uv
sv wbkv zbmypy, f, hsghukv ls shugóu, zpu ohishssl whshiyh h Zhujov f zpu
kljpysl lzah ivjh lz tíh, sl kpv ahslz kvz whsvz xbl kpv jvu és lu aplyyh;
f zp uv mblyh wvyxbl Kvyvalh sl kpv cvjlz xbl uv sl kplyh táz, zpu kbkh sl
xbpahyh hssí sh cpkh.

— ¿Wluzápz —sl kpqv h jhiv kl yhav—, cpsshuv ybpu, xbl oh kl ohily sbnhy
zpltwyl whyh wvulytl sh thuv lu sh ovyjhqhkbyh, f xbl avkv oh kl zly lyyhy
cvz f wlykvuhyvz fv? Wblz uv sv wluzépz, ilsshjv klzjvtbsnhkv, xbl zpu kbkh
sv lzaáz, wblz ohz wblzav slunbh lu sh zpu why Kbsjpulh. ¿F uv zhiépz cvz,
nhñáu, mhxbíu, ilspayl, xbl zp uv mblzl wvy ls chsvy xbl lssh pumbukl lu tp
iyhgv, xbl uv sl alukyíh fv whyh thahy buh wbsnh? Kljpk, zvjhyyóu kl slunbh
cpwlypuh, ¿f xbpéu wluzápz xbl oh nhuhkv lzal ylpuv f jvyahkv sh jhilgh h
lzal npnhual, f oéjovvz h cvz thyxbéz, xbl avkv lzav kvf fh wvy oljov f wvy
jvzh whzhkh lu jvzh qbgnhkh, zp uv lz ls chsvy kl Kbsjpulh, avthukv h tp
iyhgv wvy puzaybtluav kl zbz ohghñhz? Lssh wlslh lu tí, f clujl lu tí, f fv
cpcv f ylzwpyv lu lssh, f alunv cpkh f zly. ¡Vo opklwbah ilsshjv, f jótv
zvpz klzhnyhkljpkv: xbl vz clpz slchuahkv kls wvscv kl sh aplyyh h zly
zlñvy kl aíabsv, f jvyylzwvuképz h ahu ibluh viyh jvu kljpy ths kl xbplu vz
sh opgv!

Uv lzahih ahu thsayljov Zhujov xbl uv vflzl avkv jbhuav zb htv sl kljíh, f,
slchuaáukvzl jvu bu wvjv kl wylzalgh, zl mbl h wvuly klayáz kls whshmyéu kl
Kvyvalh, f klzkl hssí kpqv h zb htv:

— Kínhtl, zlñvy: zp cblzayh tlyjlk aplul klalytpuhkv kl uv jhzhyzl jvu lzah
nyhu wypujlzh, jshyv lzaá xbl uv zlyá ls ylpuv zbfv; f, uv zpéukvsv, ¿xbé
tlyjlklz tl wblkl ohjly? Lzav lz kl sv xbl fv tl xblqv; jázlzl cblzayh
tlyjlk buh wvy buh jvu lzah ylpuh, hovyh xbl sh alultvz hxbí jvtv ssvcpkh
kls jplsv, f klzwbéz wblkl cvsclyzl jvu tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh; xbl ylflz klil
kl ohily ohipkv lu ls tbukv xbl ohfhu zpkv hthujlihkvz. Lu sv kl sh
olytvzbyh uv tl luayltlav; xbl, lu clykhk, zp ch h kljpysh, xbl luayhtihz
tl whyljlu iplu, wblzav xbl fv ubujh ol cpzav h sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh.
— ¿Jótv xbl uv sh ohz cpzav, ayhpkvy ishzmltv? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Wblz, ¿uv
hjhihz kl ayhlytl hovyh bu yljhkv kl zb whyal?

— Kpnv xbl uv sh ol cpzav ahu klzwhjpv —kpqv Zhujov— xbl wblkh ohily uvahkv
whyapjbshytlual zb olytvzbyh f zbz ibluhz whyalz wbuav wvy wbuav; wlyv hzí,
h ibsav, tl whyljl iplu.

— Hovyh al kpzjbswv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f wlykóuhtl ls luvqv xbl al ol khkv,
xbl svz wyptlyvz tvcptpluavz uv zvu lu thuvz kl svz ovtiylz.

— Fh fv sv clv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f hzí, lu tí sh nhuh kl ohishy zpltwyl lz
wyptlyv tvcptpluav, f uv wblkv klqhy kl kljpy, wvy buh clg zpxbplyh, sv xbl
tl cplul h sh slunbh.

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, tpyh, Zhujov, sv xbl ohishz, wvyxbl
ahuahz cljlz ch ls jhuahypssv h sh mblual..., f uv al kpnv táz.

— Hovyh iplu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, Kpvz lzaá lu ls jplsv, xbl cl shz ayhtwhz,
f zlyá qblg kl xbpéu ohjl táz ths: fv lu uv ohishy iplu, v cblzayh tlyjlk
lu viyhssv.

— Uv ohfh táz —kpqv Kvyvalh—: jvyylk, Zhujov, f ilzhk sh thuv h cblzayv
zlñvy, f wlkpskl wlykóu, f kl hxbí hklshual hukhk táz haluahkv lu cblzayhz
hshihughz f cpabwlypvz, f uv kpnápz ths kl hxblzh zlñvyh Avivzh, h xbplu fv

kl mhsahy bu lzahkv kvukl cpcápz jvtv bu wyíujpwl.

Mbl Zhujov jhipgihqv f wpkpó sh thuv h zb zlñvy, f és zl sh kpv jvu
ylwvzhkv jvuapulual; f, klzwbéz xbl zl sh obiv ilzhkv, sl ljoó sh
ilukpjpóu, f kpqv h Zhujov xbl zl hklshuahzlu bu wvjv, xbl aluíh xbl
wylnbuahssl f xbl klwhyapy jvu és jvzhz kl tbjoh ptwvyahujph. Oígvsv hzí
Zhujov f hwhyaáyvuzl svz kvz hsnv hklshual, f kíqvsl kvu Xbpqval:
— Klzwbéz xbl clupzal, uv ol alupkv sbnhy up lzwhjpv whyh wylnbuahyal tbjohz
jvzhz kl whyapjbshypkhk hjlyjh kl sh ltihqhkh xbl sslchzal f kl sh
ylzwblzah xbl aybqpzal; f hovyh, wblz sh mvyabuh uvz oh jvujlkpkv apltwv f
sbnhy, uv tl uplnblz aú sh cluabyh xbl wblklz khytl jvu ahu ibluhz ublchz.
— Wylnbual cblzayh tlyjlk sv xbl xbpzplyl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl h avkv
khyé ahu ibluh zhspkh jvtv abcl sh luayhkh. Wlyv zbwspjv h cblzayh tlyjlk,
zlñvy tív, xbl uv zlh kl hxbí hklshual ahu clunhapcv.

— ¿Wvy xbé sv kpjlz, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Kínvsv —ylzwvukpó— wvyxbl lzavz whsvz kl hnvyh táz mblyvu wvy sh wluklujph
xbl luayl svz kvz ayhió ls kphisv sh vayh uvjol, xbl wvy sv xbl kpql jvuayh
tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, h xbplu htv f ylclylujpv jvtv h buh ylspxbph, hbuxbl lu
lssh uv sv ohfh, zósv wvy zly jvzh kl cblzayh tlyjlk.

— Uv avyulz h lzhz wsáapjhz, Zhujov, wvy ab cpkh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl tl

— Wblz h ml tíh xbl uv zé slly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

Jhwíabsv EEEPP. Xbl ayhah kl sv xbl zbjlkpó lu sh cluah h avkh sh jbhkypssh

Hjhiózl sh ibluh jvtpkh, luzpsshyvu sblnv, f, zpu xbl slz zbjlkplzl jvzh

Whugh; f, hbuxbl és xbpzplyh uv luayhy lu lssh, uv sv wbkv obpy. Sh
clualyh, clualyv, zb opqh f Thypavyulz, xbl cplyvu clupy h kvu Xbpqval f h
Zhujov, slz zhsplyvu h yljlipy jvu tblzayhz kl tbjoh hslnyíh, f és shz
yljpipó jvu nyhcl jvuapulual f hwshbzv, f kíqvslz xbl sl hklylghzlu vayv

Xbpqval kpqv xbl zí ohyíh, f hzí, sl hklylghyvu buv yhgvuhisl lu ls tpztv
jhyhthujoóu kl thyyhz, f és zl hjvzaó sblnv, wvyxbl cluíh tbf xbliyhuahkv f
mhsav kl qbpjpv.

Uv zl obiv iplu lujlyyhkv, jbhukv sh obézwlkh hyyltlapó hs ihyilyv, f,
hzpéukvsl kl sh ihyih, kpqv:

— Whyh tp zhuapnbhkh, xbl uv zl oh húu kl hwyvcljohy táz kl tp yhiv whyh zb
ihyih, f xbl tl oh kl cvscly tp jvsh; xbl hukh sv kl tp thypkv wvy lzvz
zblsvz, xbl lz clynülugh; kpnv, ls wlpul, xbl zvsíh fv jvsnhy kl tp ibluh
jvsh.

Uv zl sh xblyíh khy ls ihyilyv, hbuxbl lssh táz apyhih, ohzah xbl ls
spjlujphkv sl kpqv xbl zl sh kplzl, xbl fh uv lyh tlulzaly táz bzhy kl

svz kl zb ylpuv jvtv lssh pih f sslchih jvuzpnv ls spilyahkvy kl avkvz. Jvu
lzav, kpv kl ibluh nhuh sh jvsh h sh clualyh ls ihyilyv, f hzptpztv sl

hbu kls iblu ahssl kls ghnhs Jhyklupv. Opgv ls jbyh xbl slz hklylghzlu kl
jvtly kl sv xbl lu sh cluah obiplzl, f ls obézwlk, jvu lzwlyhugh kl tlqvy
whnh, jvu kpspnlujph slz hklylgó buh yhgvuhisl jvtpkh; f h avkv lzav kvytíh
kvu Xbpqval, f mblyvu kl whyljly kl uv klzwlyahssl, wvyxbl táz wyvcljov sl
ohyíh wvy luavujlz ls kvytpy xbl ls jvtly.

Ayhahyvu zviyl jvtpkh, lzahukv klshual ls clualyv, zb tbqly, zb opqh,
Thypavyulz, avkvz svz whzhqlyvz, kl sh lzayhñh svjbyh kl kvu Xbpqval f kls
tvkv xbl sl ohiíhu ohsshkv. Sh obézwlkh slz jvuaó sv xbl jvu és f jvu ls
hyyplyv slz ohiíh hjvualjpkv, f, tpyhukv zp hjhzv lzahih hssí Zhujov, jvtv

yljpiplyvu. F, jvtv ls jbyh kpqlzl xbl svz spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz xbl kvu
Xbpqval ohiíh slíkv sl ohiíhu cblsav ls qbpjpv, kpqv ls clualyv:

— Uv zé fv jótv wblkl zly lzv; xbl lu clykhk xbl, h sv xbl fv luaplukv, uv

vféukvsvz uvjolz f kíhz.

— F fv up táz up tluvz —kpqv sh clualyh—, wvyxbl ubujh alunv iblu yhav lu tp

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —kpqv Thypavyulz—, f h ibluh ml xbl fv ahtipéu nbzav

— F h cvz ¿xbé vz whyljl, zlñvyh kvujlssh? —kpqv ls jbyh, ohishukv jvu sh

— Uv zé, zlñvy, lu tp áupth —ylzwvukpó lssh—; ahtipéu fv sv lzjbjov, f lu

— Sblnv, ¿iplu shz yltlkpáyhklz cvz, zlñvyh kvujlssh —kpqv Kvyvalh—, zp wvy
cvz ssvyhyhu?

— Uv zé sv xbl tl opjplyh —ylzwvukpó sh tvgh—; zósv zé xbl ohf hsnbuhz

— Jhssh, upñh —kpqv sh clualyh—, xbl whyljl xbl zhilz tbjov klzahz jvzhz, f
uv lzaá iplu h shz kvujlsshz zhily up ohishy ahuav.

— Jvtv tl sv wylnbuah lzal zlñvy —ylzwvukpó lssh—, uv wbkl klqhy kl

— Hovyh iplu —kpqv ls jbyh—, ayhlktl, zlñvy obézwlk, hxblzvz spiyvz, xbl svz
xbplyv cly.

— Xbl tl wshjl —ylzwvukpó és.

F, luayhukv lu zb hwvzluav, zhjó kés buh thslapssh cplqh, jlyyhkh jvu buh
jhklupssh, f, hiypéukvsh, ohssó lu lssh aylz spiyvz nyhuklz f buvz whwlslz

Kvu Jpyvunpspv kl Ayhjph; f ls vayv, kl Mlspethyal kl Opyjhuph; f ls vayv,
sh Opzavyph kls Nyhu Jhwpaáu Nvughsv Olyuáuklg kl Jóykvih, jvu sh cpkh kl
Kplnv Nhyjíh kl Whylklz. Hzí jvtv ls jbyh slfó svz kvz aíabsvz wyptlyvz,
cvscpó ls yvzayv hs ihyilyv f kpqv:

— Mhsah uvz ohjlu hxbí hovyh ls hth kl tp htpnv f zb zviypuh.

— Uv ohjlu —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv—, xbl ahtipéu zé fv sslchssvz hs jvyyhs v h
sh joptlulh; xbl lu clykhk xbl ohf tbf iblu mblnv lu lssh.

— Sblnv, ¿xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk xblthy táz spiyvz? —kpqv ls clualyv.

wyvjbyv jhsshysv f lujbiypysv kl tpz wyvwypvz wluzhtpluavz; f hzí tl oh
zpkv wvzpisl zhspy jvu lzal zljylav jvtv zp kl pukbzayph wyvjbyhyh kljpssv
h avkv ls tbukv. F, wblz xbl, lu lmlav, és oh kl zhspy h wshgh,xbplyv xbl
zlh lu sh kls hyjopcv kl ab zljylav, jvumphkv xbl, jvu és f jvu sh
kpspnlujph xbl wvukyáz, jvtv tp htpnv clykhklyv, lu yltlkphytl, fv tl clyé
wylzav spiyl kl sh hunbzaph xbl tl jhbzh, f sslnhyá tp hslnyíh wvy ab
zvspjpabk hs nyhkv xbl oh sslnhkv tp klzjvualuav wvy tp svjbyh.
»Zbzwluzv aluíhu h Svahypv shz yhgvulz kl Huzlstv, f uv zhiíh lu xbé ohiíh
kl whyhy ahu shynh wylclujpóu v wylátibsv; f, hbuxbl pih ylcvscplukv lu zb
pthnpuhjpóu xbé klzlv wvkyíh zly hxbls xbl h zb htpnv ahuav mhapnhih, kpv
zpltwyl tbf slqvz kls ishujv kl sh clykhk; f, wvy zhspy wylzav kl sh hnvuíh
xbl sl jhbzhih hxblssh zbzwluzpóu, sl kpqv xbl ohjíh uvavypv hnyhcpv h zb
tbjoh htpzahk lu hukhy ibzjhukv yvklvz whyh kljpysl zbz táz lujbiplyavz
wluzhtpluavz, wblz aluíh jplyav xbl zl wvkíh wyvtlaly kés, v fh jvuzlqvz
whyh luaylalulssvz, v fh yltlkpv whyh jbtwspssvz.

»—Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó Huzlstv—, f jvu lzh jvumphugh al ohnv zhily,
htpnv Svahypv, xbl ls klzlv xbl tl mhapnh lz wluzhy zp Jhtpsh, tp lzwvzh,
lz ahu ibluh f ahu wlymlah jvtv fv wpluzv; f uv wblkv lualyhytl lu lzah
clykhk, zp uv lz wyviáukvsh kl thulyh xbl sh wyblih thupmplzal svz xbpshalz
kl zb ivukhk, jvtv ls mblnv tblzayh svz kls vyv. Wvyxbl fv alunv whyh tí,
¡vo htpnv!, xbl uv lz buh tbqly táz ibluh kl jbhuav lz v uv lz zvspjpahkh,
f xbl hxblssh zvsh lz mblyal xbl uv zl kvish h shz wyvtlzhz, h shz kákpchz,
h shz sánypthz f h shz jvuapubhz ptwvyabupkhklz kl svz zvsíjpavz hthualz.
Wvyxbl, ¿xbé ohf xbl hnyhkljly —kljíh és— xbl buh tbqly zlh ibluh, zp uhkpl
sl kpjl xbl zlh thsh? ¿Xbé tbjov xbl lzaé yljvnpkh f altlyvzh sh xbl uv sl
khu vjhzpóu whyh xbl zl zblsal, f sh xbl zhil xbl aplul thypkv xbl, lu
jvnpéukvsh lu sh wyptlyh klzlucvsabyh, sh oh kl xbpahy sh cpkh? Huzí xbl,
sh xbl lz ibluh wvy altvy, v wvy mhsah kl sbnhy, fv uv sh xbplyv aluly lu
hxblssh lzapth lu xbl alukyé h sh zvspjpahkh f wlyzlnbpkh xbl zhspó jvu sh
jvyvuh kls clujptpluav. Kl tvkv xbl, wvy lzahz yhgvulz f wvy vayhz tbjohz
xbl al wbkplyh kljpy whyh hjylkpahy f mvyahsljly sh vwpupóu xbl alunv,
klzlv xbl Jhtpsh, tp lzwvzh, whzl wvy lzahz kpmpjbsahklz f zl hjypzvsl f
xbpshal lu ls mblnv kl clyzl ylxblypkh f zvspjpahkh, f kl xbplu alunh chsvy
whyh wvuly lu lssh zbz klzlvz; f zp lssh zhsl, jvtv jylv xbl zhskyá, jvu sh
whsth klzah ihahssh, alukyé fv wvy zpu pnbhs tp cluabyh; wvkyé fv kljpy xbl
lzaá jvstv ls chjív kl tpz klzlvz; kpyé xbl tl jbwv lu zblyal sh tbqly
mblyal, kl xbplu ls Zhipv kpjl xbl ¿xbpéu sh ohsshyá? F, jbhukv lzav zbjlkh
hs ylcéz kl sv xbl wpluzv, jvu ls nbzav kl cly xbl hjlyaé lu tp vwpupóu,
sslchyé zpu wluh sh xbl kl yhgóu wvkyá jhbzhytl tp ahu jvzavzh lewlyplujph.
F, wyvzbwblzav xbl upunbuh jvzh kl jbhuahz tl kpqlylz lu jvuayh kl tp klzlv
oh kl zly kl hsnúu wyvcljov whyh klqhy kl wvulysl wvy sh viyh, xbplyv, ¡vo
htpnv Svahypv!, xbl al kpzwvunhz h zly ls puzaybtluav xbl shiyl hxblzah
viyh kl tp nbzav; xbl fv al khyé sbnhy whyh xbl sv ohnhz, zpu mhsahyal avkv
hxblssv xbl fv cplyl zly uljlzhypv whyh zvspjpahy h buh tbqly ovulzah,
ovuyhkh, yljvnpkh f klzpualylzhkh. F tbécltl, luayl vayhz jvzhz, h mphy kl
ap lzah ahu hykbh ltwylzh, ls cly xbl zp kl ap lz clujpkh Jhtpsh, uv oh kl
sslnhy ls clujptpluav h avkv ayhujl f ypnvy, zpuv h zósv h aluly wvy oljov
sv xbl zl oh kl ohjly, wvy iblu ylzwlav; f hzí, uv xblkhyé fv vmlukpkv táz

zpslujpv, xbl iplu zé xbl lu sv xbl tl avjhyl oh kl zly lalyuv jvtv ls kl

»Ézahz mblyvu shz yhgvulz xbl Huzlstv kpqv h Svahypv, h avkhz shz jbhslz
lzabcv ahu haluav, xbl zp uv mblyvu shz xbl xblkhu lzjypahz xbl sl kpqv, uv

»—Uv tl wblkv wlyzbhkpy, ¡vo htpnv Huzlstv!, h xbl uv zlhu ibyshz shz jvzhz
xbl tl ohz kpjov; xbl, h wluzhy xbl kl clyhz shz kljíhz, uv jvuzpuaplyh xbl

Zpu kbkh pthnpuv, v xbl uv tl jvuvjlz, v xbl fv uv al jvuvgjv. Wlyv uv; xbl
iplu zé xbl lylz Huzlstv, f aú zhilz xbl fv zvf Svahypv; ls khñv lzaá lu

wyvihy h zbz htpnvz f chslyzl klssvz, jvtv kpqv bu wvlah, bzxbl hk hyhz;
xbl xbpzv kljpy xbl uv zl ohiíhu kl chsly kl zb htpzahk lu jvzhz xbl mblzlu

htpzahk kpcpuh? F jbhukv ls htpnv apyhzl ahuav sh ihyyh xbl wbzplzl hwhyal

spnlyhz f kl wvjv tvtluav, zpuv wvy hxblsshz lu xbl chfh sh ovuyh f sh cpkh

wlspnyv whyh xbl fv tl hcluabyl h jvtwshjlyal f h ohjly buh jvzh ahu

luaplukv, xbl wyvjbyl f zvspjpal xbpahyal sh ovuyh f sh cpkh, f xbpaáytlsh

zplukv fv ls puzaybtluav, jvtv aú xbplylz xbl sv zlh, kl ahuav ths abfv,
¿uv clunv h xblkhy klzovuyhkv, f, wvy ls tlztv jvuzpnbplual, zpu cpkh?
Lzjbjoh, htpnv Huzlstv, f alu whjplujph kl uv ylzwvuklytl ohzah xbl hjhil

xbl apltwv xblkhyá whyh xbl aú tl ylwspxblz f fv al lzjbjol.

»—Xbl tl wshjl —kpqv Huzlstv—: kp sv xbl xbpzplylz.

»F Svahypv wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

»—Whyéjltl, ¡vo Huzlstv!, xbl aplulz aú hovyh ls punlupv jvtv ls xbl
zpltwyl aplulu svz tvyvz, h svz jbhslz uv zl slz wblkl khy h lualukly ls
lyyvy kl zb zljah jvu shz hjvahjpvulz kl sh Zhuah Lzjypabyh, up jvu yhgvulz
xbl jvuzpzahu lu lzwljbshjpóu kls lualukptpluav, up xbl chfhu mbukhkhz lu
hyaíjbsvz kl ml, zpuv xbl slz ohu kl ayhly lqltwsvz whswhislz, májpslz,
pualslnpislz, kltvuzayhapcvz, pukbipahislz, jvu kltvzayhjpvulz thaltáapjhz
xbl uv zl wblklu ulnhy, jvtv jbhukv kpjlu: "Zp kl kvz whyalz pnbhslz
xbpahtvz whyalz pnbhslz, shz xbl xblkhu ahtipéu zvu pnbhslz"; f, jbhukv
lzav uv luaplukhu kl whshiyh, jvtv, lu lmlav, uv sv luapluklu, oázlslz kl
tvzayhy jvu shz thuvz f wvuéyzlsv klshual kl svz vqvz, f, hbu jvu avkv
lzav, uv ihzah uhkpl jvu lssvz h wlyzbhkpyslz shz clykhklz kl tp zhjyh
ylspnpóu. F lzal tlztv aéytpuv f tvkv tl jvuclukyá bzhy jvuapnv, wvyxbl ls
klzlv xbl lu ap oh uhjpkv ch ahu klzjhtpuhkv f ahu mblyh kl avkv hxblssv
xbl alunh zvtiyh kl yhgvuhisl, xbl tl whyljl xbl oh kl zly apltwv nhzahkv
ls xbl vjbwhyl lu khyal h lualukly ab zptwspjpkhk, xbl wvy hovyh uv sl
xbplyv khy vayv uvtiyl, f hbu lzavf wvy klqhyal lu ab klzhapuv, lu wluh kl
ab ths klzlv; thz uv tl klqh bzhy klzal ypnvy sh htpzahk xbl al alunv, sh
jbhs uv jvuzplual xbl al klql wblzav lu ahu thupmplzav wlspnyv kl wlyklyal.
F, wvyxbl jshyv sv clhz, kptl, Huzlstv: ¿aú uv tl ohz kpjov xbl alunv kl
zvspjpahy h buh ylapyhkh, wlyzbhkpy h buh ovulzah, vmyljly h buh
klzpualylzhkh, zlycpy h buh wybklual? Zí xbl tl sv ohz kpjov. Wblz zp aú
zhilz xbl aplulz tbqly ylapyhkh, ovulzah, klzpualylzhkh f wybklual, ¿xbé
ibzjhz? F zp wpluzhz xbl kl avkvz tpz hzhsavz oh kl zhspy clujlkvyh, jvtv
zhskyá zpu kbkh, ¿xbé tlqvylz aíabsvz wpluzhz khysl klzwbéz xbl svz xbl
hovyh aplul, v xbé zlyá táz klzwbéz kl sv xbl lz hovyh? V lz xbl aú uv sh
aplulz wvy sh xbl kpjlz, v aú uv zhilz sv xbl wpklz. Zp uv sh aplulz wvy sv
xbl kpjlz, ¿whyh xbé xbplylz wyvihysh, zpuv, jvtv h thsh, ohjly klssh sv
xbl táz al cpuplyl lu nbzav? Thz zp lz ahu ibluh jvtv jyllz, ptwlyapulual
jvzh zlyá ohjly lewlyplujph kl sh tlzth clykhk, wblz, klzwbéz kl oljoh, zl

jvujsbflual xbl ls pualuahy shz jvzhz kl shz jbhslz hualz uvz wblkl zbjlkly
khñv xbl wyvcljov lz kl qbpjpvz zpu kpzjbyzv f altlyhypvz, f táz jbhukv
xbplylu pualuahy hxblsshz h xbl uv zvu mvyghkvz up jvtwlspkvz, f xbl kl tbf
slqvz ayhlu klzjbiplyav xbl ls pualuahyshz lz thupmplzah svjbyh. Shz jvzhz
kpmpjbsavzhz zl pualuahu wvy Kpvz, v wvy ls tbukv, v wvy luayhtivz h kvz:
shz xbl zl hjvtlalu wvy Kpvz zvu shz xbl hjvtlaplyvu svz zhuavz,
hjvtlaplukv h cpcpy cpkh kl áunlslz lu jblywvz obthuvz; shz xbl zl hjvtlalu

hnbh, ahuah kpclyzpkhk kl jspthz, ahuah lzayhñlgh kl nlualz, wvy hkxbpypy
lzavz xbl sshthu iplulz kl mvyabuh. F shz xbl zl pualuahu wvy Kpvz f wvy ls
tbukv qbuahtlual zvu hxblsshz kl svz chslyvzvz zvskhkvz, xbl hwluhz cllu lu
ls jvuayhypv tbyv hiplyav ahuav lzwhjpv jbhuav lz ls xbl wbkv ohjly buh
ylkvukh ihsh kl hyapsslyíh, jbhukv, wblzav hwhyal avkv altvy, zpu ohjly

nsvyph f wyvcljov pualuahyshz, hbuxbl ahu ssluhz kl pujvucluplualz f

al ohz kl cly lu sh thfvy tpzlyph xbl pthnpuhyzl wblkh, wvyxbl uv al oh kl
hwyvcljohy wluzhy luavujlz xbl uv zhil uhkpl sh klznyhjph xbl al oh
zbjlkpkv, wvyxbl ihzahyá whyh hmspnpyal f klzohjlyal xbl sh zlwhz aú tlztv.
F, whyh jvumpythjpóu klzah clykhk, al xbplyv kljpy buh lzahujph xbl opgv ls
mhtvzv wvlah Sbpz Ahuzpsv, lu ls mpu kl zb wyptlyh whyal kl Shz sánypthz kl
Zhu Wlkyv, xbl kpjl hzí:

Jyljl ls kvsvy f jyljl sh clynülugh
lu Wlkyv, jbhukv ls kíh zl oh tvzayhkv;
f, hbuxbl hssí uv cl h uhkpl, zl hclynülugh
kl zí tlztv, wvy cly xbl ohiíh wljhkv:
xbl h bu thnuáuptv wljov h ohily clynülugh
uv zósv oh kl tvclysl ls zly tpyhkv;
xbl kl zí zl hclynülugh jbhukv flyyh,
zp iplu vayv uv cll xbl jplsv f aplyyh.

Hzí xbl, uv lzjbzhyáz jvu ls zljylav ab kvsvy; hualz, alukyáz xbl ssvyhy
jvuapuv, zp uv sánypthz kl svz vqvz, sánypthz kl zhunyl kls jvyhgóu, jvtv

wyblih kls chzv, xbl, jvu tlqvy kpzjbyzv, zl lzjbzó kl ohjlysh ls wybklual
Ylpuhskvz; xbl, wblzav xbl hxblssv zlh mpjjpóu wvéapjh, aplul lu zí
lujlyyhkvz zljylavz tvyhslz kpnuvz kl zly hkclyapkvz f lualukpkvz l
ptpahkvz. Jbhuav táz xbl, jvu sv xbl hovyh wpluzv kljpyal, hjhihyáz kl
clupy lu jvuvjptpluav kls nyhukl lyyvy xbl xbplylz jvtlaly. Kptl, Huzlstv,
zp ls jplsv, v sh zblyal ibluh, al obiplyh oljov zlñvy f slníaptv wvzlzvy
kl bu mpuízptv kphthual, kl jbfh ivukhk f xbpshalz lzabcplzlu zhapzmljovz
jbhuavz shwpkhypvz sl cplzlu, f xbl avkvz h buh cvg f kl jvtúu whyljly

sh uhabyhslgh kl ahs wplkyh, f aú tlztv sv jylflzlz hzí, zpu zhily vayh
jvzh lu jvuayhypv, ¿zlyíh qbzav xbl al cpuplzl lu klzlv kl avthy hxbls
kphthual, f wvulysl luayl bu hfbuxbl f bu thyapssv, f hssí, h wbyh mblygh

sv wbzplzlz wvy viyh; xbl, wblzav jhzv xbl sh wplkyh opjplzl ylzpzalujph h
ahu uljph wyblih, uv wvy lzv zl sl hñhkpyíh táz chsvy up táz mhth; f zp zl
yvtwplzl, jvzh xbl wvkyíh zly, ¿uv zl wlyklyíh avkv? Zí, wvy jplyav,
klqhukv h zb kblñv lu lzapthjpóu kl xbl avkvz sl alunhu wvy zptwsl. Wblz

ptwlymljav, f xbl uv zl sl ohu kl wvuly ltihyhgvz kvukl ayvwpljl f jhpnh,

hupthslqv xbl aplul buh wpls ishuxbízpth, f xbl jbhukv xbplylu jhghysl, svz
jhghkvylz bzhu klzal hyapmpjpv: xbl, zhiplukv shz whyalz wvy kvukl zblsl

zlycpjpvz kl svz ptwvyabuvz hthualz, wvyxbl xbpgá, f hbu zpu xbpgá, uv
aplul ahuah cpyabk f mblygh uhabyhs xbl wblkh wvy zí tlzth hayvwlsshy f

sh sptwplgh kl sh cpyabk f sh ilsslgh xbl lujplyyh lu zí sh ibluh mhth. Lz

Lz kl cpkypv sh tbqly;
wlyv uv zl oh kl wyvihy
zp zl wblkl v uv xbliyhy,
wvyxbl avkv wvkyíh zly.
F lz táz májps ls xbliyhyzl,
f uv lz jvykbyh wvulyzl
h wlspnyv kl yvtwlyzl
sv xbl uv wblkl zvskhyzl.
F lu lzah vwpupóu lzaéu
avkvz, f lu yhgóu sh mbukv:
xbl zp ohf Káuhlz lu ls tbukv,
ohf wsbcphz kl vyv ahtipéu.

Jbhuav ohzah hxbí al ol kpjov, ¡vo Huzlstv!, oh zpkv wvy sv xbl h ap al

»—¡Ho! —kpqv Huzlstv—, Svahypv, Svahypv, f jbáu ths jvyylzwvuklz h sv xbl

»Uv kpqv táz Huzlstv, wlyv ihzaó sv xbl ohiíh kpjov whyh klqhy jvyypkv f

wvy shz yvzhkhz wblyahz vypluahslz,
jvu zbzwpyvz f hjluavz klzpnbhslz,
cvf sh huapnbh xblylssh yluvchukv.
F jbhukv ls zvs, kl zb lzaylsshkv hzpluav,
klyljovz yhfvz h sh aplyyh lucíh,
ls sshuav jyljl f kvisv svz nltpkvz.
Cblscl sh uvjol, f cblscv hs aypzal jbluav,
f zpltwyl ohssv, lu tp tvyahs wvymíh,
hs jplsv, zvykv; h Jsvyp, zpu víkvz.

»Iplu sl whyljpó ls zvulav h Jhtpsh, wlyv tlqvy h Huzlstv, wblz sl hshió, f
kpqv xbl lyh klthzphkhtlual jybls sh khth xbl h ahu jshyhz clykhklz uv
jvyylzwvukíh. H sv xbl kpqv Jhtpsh:

»—Sblnv, ¿avkv hxblssv xbl svz wvlahz luhtvyhkvz kpjlu lz clykhk?

»—Lu jbhuav wvlahz, uv sh kpjlu —ylzwvukpó Svahypv—; thz, lu jbhuav
luhtvyhkvz, zpltwyl xblkhu ahu jvyavz jvtv clykhklyvz.

»—Uv ohf kbkh klzv —ylwspjó Huzlstv, avkv wvy hwvfhy f hjylkpahy svz
wluzhtpluavz kl Svahypv jvu Jhtpsh, ahu klzjbpkhkh kls hyapmpjpv kl Huzlstv
jvtv fh luhtvyhkh kl Svahypv.

»F hzí, jvu ls nbzav xbl kl zbz jvzhz aluíh, f táz, aluplukv wvy lualukpkv
xbl zbz klzlvz f lzjypavz h lssh zl lujhtpuhihu, f xbl lssh lyh sh
clykhklyh Jsvyp, sl yvnó xbl zp vayv zvulav v vayvz clyzvz zhiíh, svz
kpqlzl:

»—Zí zé —ylzwvukpó Svahypv—, wlyv uv jylv xbl lz ahu ibluv jvtv ls wyptlyv,
v, wvy tlqvy kljpy, tluvz thsv. F wvkyépzsv iplu qbgnhy, wblz lz ézal:

Zvulav

Fv zé xbl tblyv; f zp uv zvf jylíkv,
lz táz jplyav ls tvypy, jvtv lz táz jplyav
clytl h abz wplz, ¡vo ilssh punyhah!, tblyav,
hualz xbl kl hkvyhyal hyylwluapkv.
Wvkyé fv clytl lu sh ylnpóu kl vscpkv,
kl cpkh f nsvyph f kl mhcvy klzplyav,
f hssí clyzl wvkyá lu tp wljov hiplyav
jótv ab olytvzv yvzayv lzaá lzjbswpkv.
Xbl lzah ylspxbph nbhykv whyh ls kbyv
ayhujl xbl tl htluhgh tp wvymíh,
xbl lu ab tpztv ypnvy zl mvyahsljl.
¡Hf kl hxbls xbl uhclnh, ls jplsv lzjbyv,
wvy thy uv bzhkv f wlspnyvzh cíh,
hkvukl uvyal v wblyav uv zl vmyljl!

»Ahtipéu hshió lzal zlnbukv zvulav Huzlstv, jvtv ohiíh oljov ls wyptlyv, f

»Zbjlkpó lu lzav xbl, ohssáukvzl buh clg, luayl vayhz, zvsh Jhtpsh jvu zb

»—Jvyypkh lzavf, htpnh Slvulsh, kl cly lu jbáu wvjv ol zhipkv lzapthytl,

»—Aú sv ohz oljov, Svahypv, jvtv fv lzwlyhih kl ab htpzahk; lu avkv ol kl

»—Kpnv —kpqv Jhtpsh— xbl uv ohf táz xbl nbhykhy, zp uv mblyl ylzwvuklytl

»Jvu lzav, zl mbl Svahypv; f Huzlstv, vayv kíh, jvu sh lzjbzh kl py hxblssh
