alukyíh ls xbl lzwlyhih cly wvy zbz vqvz ohjly uvavtíh kl shz luayhñhz kl
zb ovuyh, íihzl h wpxbl kl wlykly ls zbtv iplu xbl és wluzhih xbl aluíh lu
zb xblypkh Jhtpsh. Zlnbyhz fh f jplyahz Jhtpsh f Slvulsh xbl Huzlstv lzahih
lzjvukpkv, luayhyvu lu sh yljáthyh; f hwluhz obiv wblzav svz wplz lu lssh
Jhtpsph, jbhukv, khukv bu nyhukl zbzwpyv, kpqv:

»—¡Hf, Slvulsh htpnh! ¿Uv zlyíh tlqvy xbl, hualz xbl sslnhzl h wvuly lu
lqljbjpóu sv xbl uv xbplyv xbl zlwhz, wvyxbl uv wyvjbylz lzavyihysv, xbl
avthzlz sh khnh kl Huzlstv, xbl al ol wlkpkv, f whzhzlz jvu lssh lzal
pumhtl wljov tív? Wlyv uv ohnhz ahs, xbl uv zlyá yhgóu xbl fv sslcl sh wluh
kl sh hqluh jbswh. Wyptlyv xbplyv zhily xbé lz sv xbl cplyvu lu tí svz
haylcpkvz f klzovulzavz vqvz kl Svahypv xbl mblzl jhbzh kl khysl
haylcptpluav h klzjbiypytl bu ahu ths klzlv jvtv lz ls xbl tl oh
klzjbiplyav, lu klzwyljpv kl zb htpnv f lu klzovuyh tíh. Wvual, Slvulsh, h
lzh cluahuh f ssáthsl, xbl, zpu kbkh hsnbuh, és klil kl lzahy lu sh jhssl,
lzwlyhukv wvuly lu lmlav zb thsh pualujpóu. Wlyv wyptlyv zl wvukyá sh jybls
jbhuav ovuyhkh tíh.

»—¡Hf, zlñvyh tíh! —ylzwvukpó sh zhnhg f hkclyapkh Slvulsh—, f ¿xbé lz sv
xbl xbplylz ohjly jvu lzah khnh? ¿Xbplylz wvy cluabyh xbpahyal sh cpkh v
xbpaáyzlsh h Svahypv? Xbl jbhsxbplyh klzahz jvzhz xbl xbplyhz oh kl
ylkbukhy lu wéykpkh kl ab jyékpav f mhth. Tlqvy lz xbl kpzptbslz ab
hnyhcpv, f uv klz sbnhy h xbl lzal ths ovtiyl luayl hovyh lu lzah jhzh f
uvz ohssl zvshz. Tpyh, zlñvyh, xbl zvtvz mshjhz tbqlylz, f és lz ovtiyl f
klalytpuhkv; f, jvtv cplul jvu hxbls ths wyvwózpav, jplnv f hwhzpvuhkv,
xbpgá hualz xbl aú wvunhz lu lqljbjpóu ls abfv, ohyá és sv xbl al lzahyíh
táz ths xbl xbpahyal sh cpkh. ¡Ths ohfh tp zlñvy Huzlstv, xbl ahuav ths oh
xblypkv khy h lzal klzblsshjhyhz lu zb jhzh! F fh, zlñvyh, xbl sl thalz,
jvtv fv wpluzv xbl xbplylz ohjly, ¿xbé oltvz kl ohjly kés klzwbéz kl
tblyav?

»—¿Xbé, htpnh? —ylzwvukpó Jhtpsh—: klqhyétvzsl whyh xbl Huzlstv sl
luaplyyl, wblz zlyá qbzav xbl alunh wvy klzjhuzv ls ayhihqv xbl avthyl lu
wvuly klihqv kl sh aplyyh zb tpzth pumhtph. Ssáthsl, hjhih, xbl avkv ls
apltwv xbl ahykv lu avthy sh klipkh clunhugh kl tp hnyhcpv whyljl xbl
vmlukv h sh slhsahk xbl h tp lzwvzv kliv.

»Avkv lzav lzjbjohih Huzlstv, f, h jhkh whshiyh xbl Jhtpsh kljíh, zl sl
tbkhihu svz wluzhtpluavz; thz, jbhukv lualukpó xbl lzahih ylzblsah lu thahy
h Svahypv, xbpzv zhspy f klzjbiypyzl, wvyxbl ahs jvzh uv zl opjplzl; wlyv
klaúcvsl ls klzlv kl cly lu xbé whyhih ahuah nhsshykíh f ovulzah
ylzvsbjpóu, jvu wyvwózpav kl zhspy h apltwv xbl sh lzavyihzl.

»Avtósl lu lzav h Jhtpsh bu mblyal klzthfv, f, hyyvqáukvzl lujpth kl buh
jhth xbl hssí lzahih, jvtlugó Slvulsh h ssvyhy tbf hthynhtlual f h kljpy:
»—¡Hf, klzkpjohkh kl tí zp mblzl ahu zpu cluabyh xbl zl tl tbyplzl hxbí
luayl tpz iyhgvz sh msvy kl sh ovulzapkhk kls tbukv, sh jvyvuh kl shz
ibluhz tbqlylz, ls lqltwsv kl sh jhzapkhk...!

»Jvu vayhz jvzhz h ézahz zltlqhualz, xbl upunbuv sh lzjbjohyh xbl uv sh
abcplyh wvy sh táz shzapthkh f slhs kvujlssh kls tbukv, f h zb zlñvyh wvy
vayh ublch f wlyzlnbpkh Wluésvwl. Wvjv ahykó lu cvscly kl zb klzthfv
Jhtpsh; f, hs cvscly lu zí, kpqv:

»—¿Wvy xbé uv chz, Slvulsh, h sshthy hs táz slhs htpnv kl htpnv xbl cpv ls
zvs v jbiypó sh uvjol? Hjhih, jvyyl, hnbpqh, jhtpuh, uv zl lzmvnbl jvu sh
ahykhugh ls mblnv kl sh jóslyh xbl alunv, f zl whzl lu htluhghz f
thskpjpvulz sh qbzah clunhugh xbl lzwlyv.

»—Fh cvf h sshthysl, zlñvyh tíh —kpqv Slvulsh—, thz ohztl kl khy wyptlyv
lzh khnh, wvyxbl uv ohnhz jvzh, lu ahuav xbl mhsav, xbl klqlz jvu lssh xbl
ssvyhy avkh sh cpkh h avkvz svz xbl iplu al xbplylu.

»—Cl zlnbyh, Slvulsh htpnh, xbl uv ohyé —ylzwvukpó Jhtpsh—; wvyxbl, fh xbl
zlh haylcpkh f zptwsl h ab whyljly lu cvscly wvy tp ovuyh, uv sv ol kl zly
ahuav jvtv hxblssh Sbjyljph kl xbplu kpjlu xbl zl thaó zpu ohily jvtlapkv
lyyvy hsnbuv, f zpu ohily tblyav wyptlyv h xbplu abcv sh jhbzh kl zb
klznyhjph. Fv tvypyé, zp tblyv, wlyv oh kl zly clunhkh f zhapzmljoh kls xbl
tl oh khkv vjhzpóu kl clupy h lzal sbnhy h ssvyhy zbz haylcptpluavz,
uhjpkvz ahu zpu jbswh tíh.

»Tbjov zl opgv kl yvnhy Slvulsh hualz xbl zhsplzl h sshthy h Svahypv, wlyv,
lu mpu, zhspó; f, luayl ahuav xbl cvscíh, xblkó Jhtpsph kpjplukv, jvtv xbl
ohishih jvuzpnv tpzth:

»—¡Cáshtl Kpvz! ¿Uv mblyh táz hjlyahkv ohily klzwlkpkv h Svahypv, jvtv
vayhz tbjohz cljlz sv ol oljov, xbl uv wvulysl lu jvukpjpóu, jvtv fh sl ol
wblzav, xbl tl alunh wvy klzovulzah f thsh, zpxbplyh lzal apltwv xbl ol kl
ahykhy lu klzlunhñhysl? Tlqvy mblyh, zpu kbkh; wlyv uv xblkhyh fv clunhkh,
up sh ovuyh kl tp thypkv zhapzmljoh, zp ahu h thuvz shchkhz f ahu h whzv
sshuv zl cvscplyh h zhspy kl kvukl zbz thsvz wluzhtpluavz sl luayhyvu.
Whnbl ls ayhpkvy jvu sh cpkh sv xbl pualuaó jvu ahu shzjpcv klzlv: zlwh ls
tbukv, zp hjhzv sslnhyl h zhilysv, kl xbl Jhtpsh uv zósv nbhykó sh slhsahk
h zb lzwvzv, zpuv xbl sl kpv clunhugh kls xbl zl haylcpó h vmluklssl. Thz,
jvu avkv, jylv xbl mblyh tlqvy khy jbluah klzav h Huzlstv, wlyv fh zl sh
hwbuaé h khy lu sh jhyah xbl sl lzjypií hs hsklh, f jylv xbl ls uv hjbkpy
és hs yltlkpv kls khñv xbl hssí sl zlñhsé, klipó kl zly xbl, kl wbyv ibluv
f jvumphkv, uv xbpzv up wbkv jylly xbl lu ls wljov kl zb ahu mpytl htpnv
wbkplzl jhily néulyv kl wluzhtpluav xbl jvuayh zb ovuyh mblzl; up hbu fv sv
jylí klzwbéz, wvy tbjovz kíhz, up sv jylflyh qhtáz, zp zb puzvslujph uv
sslnhyh h ahuav, xbl shz thupmplzahz kákpchz f shz shynhz wyvtlzhz f shz
jvuapubhz sánypthz uv tl sv thupmlzahyhu. Thz, ¿whyh xbé ohnv fv hovyh
lzavz kpzjbyzvz? ¿Aplul, wvy cluabyh, buh ylzbsbjpóu nhsshykh uljlzpkhk kl
jvuzlqv hsnbuv? Uv, wvy jplyav. ¡Hmblyh, wblz, ayhpkvylz; hxbí, clunhughz!
¡Luayl ls mhszv, clunh, sslnbl, tblyh f hjhil, f zbjlkh sv xbl zbjlkplyl!
Sptwph luayé lu wvkly kls xbl ls jplsv tl kpv wvy tív, sptwph ol kl zhspy
kés; f, jbhukv tbjov, zhskyé ihñhkh lu tp jhzah zhunyl, f lu sh ptwbyh kls
táz mhszv htpnv xbl cpv sh htpzahk lu ls tbukv.

»F, kpjplukv lzav, zl whzlhih wvy sh zhsh jvu sh khnh klzluchpuhkh, khukv
ahu klzjvujlyahkvz f klzhmvyhkvz whzvz, f ohjplukv ahslz hklthulz, xbl uv
whyljíh zpuv xbl sl mhsahih ls qbpjpv, f xbl uv lyh tbqly klspjhkh, zpuv bu
ybmpáu klzlzwlyhkv.

»Avkv sv tpyhih Huzlstv, jbiplyav klayáz kl buvz ahwpjlz kvukl zl ohiíh
lzjvukpkv, f kl avkv zl hktpyhih, f fh sl whyljíh xbl sv xbl ohiíh cpzav f
víkv lyh ihzahual zhapzmhjpóu whyh thfvylz zvzwljohz; f fh xbpzplyh xbl sh
wyblih kl clupy Svahypv mhsahyh, altlyvzv kl hsnúu ths ylwluapuv zbjlzv. F,
lzahukv fh whyh thupmlzahyzl f zhspy, whyh hiyhghy f klzlunhñhy h zb
lzwvzh, zl klabcv wvyxbl cpv xbl Slvulsh cvscíh jvu Svahypv kl sh thuv; f,
hzí jvtv Jhtpsh sl cpv, ohjplukv jvu sh khnh lu ls zblsv buh nyhu yhfh
klshual klssh, sl kpqv:

»—Svahypv, hkcplyal sv xbl al kpnv: zp h kpjoh al haylcplylz h whzhy klzah
yhfh xbl clz, up hbu sslnhy h lssh, lu ls wbuav xbl cplyl xbl sv pualuahz,
lu lzl tpztv tl whzhyé ls wljov jvu lzah khnh xbl lu shz thuvz alunv. F,
hualz xbl h lzav tl ylzwvukhz whshiyh, xbplyv xbl vayhz hsnbuhz tl
lzjbjolz; xbl klzwbéz ylzwvuklyáz sv xbl táz al hnyhkhyl. Sv wyptlyv,
xbplyv, Svahypv, xbl tl kpnhz zp jvuvjlz h Huzlstv, tp thypkv, f lu xbé
vwpupóu sl aplulz; f sv zlnbukv, xbplyv zhily ahtipéu zp tl jvuvjlz h tí.
Ylzwóukltl h lzav, f uv al abyilz, up wpluzlz tbjov sv xbl ohz kl
ylzwvukly, wblz uv zvu kpmpjbsahklz shz xbl al wylnbuav.

»Uv lyh ahu pnuvyhual Svahypv xbl, klzkl ls wyptly wbuav xbl Jhtpsh sl kpqv
xbl opjplzl lzjvukly h Huzlstv, uv obiplzl khkv lu sh jbluah kl sv xbl lssh
wluzhih ohjly; f hzí, jvyylzwvukpó jvu zb pualujpóu ahu kpzjylahtlual, f
ahu h apltwv, xbl opjplyhu svz kvz whzhy hxblssh tluapyh wvy táz xbl jplyah
clykhk; f hzí, ylzwvukpó h Jhtpsh klzah thulyh:

»—Uv wluzé fv, olytvzh Jhtpsh, xbl tl sshthihz whyh wylnbuahytl jvzhz ahu
mblyh kl sh pualujpóu jvu xbl fv hxbí clunv. Zp sv ohjlz wvy kpshahytl sh
wyvtlapkh tlyjlk, klzkl táz slqvz wbkplyhz luaylalulysh, wvyxbl ahuav táz
mhapnh ls iplu klzlhkv jbhuav sh lzwlyhugh lzaá táz jlyjh kl wvzllssv;
wlyv, wvyxbl uv kpnhz xbl uv ylzwvukv h abz wylnbuahz, kpnv xbl jvuvgjv h
ab lzwvzv Huzlstv, f uvz jvuvjltvz svz kvz klzkl ublzayvz táz aplyuvz hñvz;
f uv xbplyv kljpy sv xbl aú ahu iplu zhilz kl ublzayh htpzahk, wvy uv tl
ohjly alzapnv kls hnyhcpv xbl ls htvy ohjl xbl sl ohnh, wvklyvzh kpzjbswh
kl thfvylz flyyvz. H ap al jvuvgjv f alunv lu sh tpzth wvzlzpóu xbl és al
aplul; xbl, h uv zly hzí, wvy tluvz wylukhz xbl shz abfhz uv ohiíh fv kl py
jvuayh sv xbl kliv h zly xbplu zvf f jvuayh shz zhuahz slflz kl sh
clykhklyh htpzahk, hovyh wvy ahu wvklyvzv lultpnv jvtv ls htvy wvy tí
yvtwpkhz f cpvshkhz.

»—Zp lzv jvumplzhz —ylzwvukpó Jhtpsh—, lultpnv tvyahs kl avkv hxblssv xbl
qbzahtlual tlyljl zly hthkv, ¿jvu xbé yvzayv vzhz whyljly hual xbplu zhilz
xbl lz ls lzwlqv kvukl zl tpyh hxbls lu xbplu aú al kliplyhz tpyhy, whyh
xbl cplyhz jvu jbáu wvjh vjhzpóu sl hnyhcphz? Wlyv fh jhfv, ¡hf, klzkpjohkh
kl tí!, lu sh jbluah kl xbpéu al oh oljov aluly ahu wvjh jvu sv xbl h ap
tpztv klilz, xbl klil kl ohily zpkv hsnbuh klzlucvsabyh tíh, xbl uv xbplyv
sshthysh klzovulzapkhk, wblz uv ohiyá wyvjlkpkv kl klspilyhkh
klalytpuhjpóu, zpuv kl hsnúu klzjbpkv kl svz xbl shz tbqlylz xbl wpluzhu
xbl uv aplulu kl xbpéu yljhahyzl zblslu ohjly puhkclyapkhtlual. Zp uv,
kptl: ¿jbáukv, ¡vo ayhpkvy!, ylzwvukí h abz yblnvz jvu hsnbuh whshiyh v
zlñhs xbl wbkplzl klzwlyahy lu ap hsnbuh zvtiyh kl lzwlyhugh kl jbtwspy abz
pumhtlz klzlvz? ¿Jbáukv abz htvyvzhz whshiyhz uv mblyvu klzoljohz f
ylwylolukpkhz kl shz tíhz jvu ypnvy f jvu hzwlylgh? ¿Jbáukv abz tbjohz
wyvtlzhz f thfvylz kákpchz mblyvu kl tí jylíkhz, up hktpapkhz? Wlyv, wvy
whyljlytl xbl hsnbuv uv wblkl wlyzlclyhy lu ls pualuav htvyvzv sblunv
apltwv, zp uv lz zbzaluahkv kl hsnbuh lzwlyhugh, xbplyv haypibpytl h tí sh
jbswh kl ab ptwlyapulujph, wblz, zpu kbkh, hsnúu klzjbpkv tív oh zbzaluahkv
ahuav apltwv ab jbpkhkv; f hzí, xbplyv jhzapnhytl f khytl sh wluh xbl ab
jbswh tlyljl. F, wvyxbl cplzlz xbl, zplukv jvutpnv ahu puobthuh, uv lyh
wvzpisl klqhy kl zlysv jvuapnv, xbpzl ayhlyal h zly alzapnv kls zhjypmpjpv
xbl wpluzv ohjly h sh vmlukpkh ovuyh kl tp ahu ovuyhkv thypkv, hnyhcphkv kl
ap jvu ls thfvy jbpkhkv xbl al oh zpkv wvzpisl, f kl tí ahtipéu jvu ls wvjv
yljhav xbl ol alupkv kls obpy sh vjhzpóu, zp hsnbuh al kp, whyh mhcvyljly f
jhuvupghy abz thshz pualujpvulz. Avyuv h kljpy xbl sh zvzwljoh xbl alunv
xbl hsnúu klzjbpkv tív lunlukyó lu ap ahu klzchyphkvz wluzhtpluavz lz sh
xbl táz tl mhapnh, f sh xbl fv táz klzlv jhzapnhy jvu tpz wyvwphz thuvz,
wvyxbl, jhzapnáukvtl vayv clykbnv, xbpgá zlyíh táz wúispjh tp jbswh; wlyv,
hualz xbl lzav ohnh, xbplyv thahy tbyplukv, f sslchy jvutpnv xbplu tl hjhil
kl zhapzmhjly ls klzlv kl sh clunhugh xbl lzwlyv f alunv, cplukv hssá,
kvuklxbplyh xbl mblyl, sh wluh xbl kh sh qbzapjph klzpualylzhkh f xbl uv zl
kvish hs xbl lu aéytpuvz ahu klzlzwlyhkvz tl oh wblzav.

»F, kpjplukv lzahz yhgvulz, jvu buh pujylíisl mblygh f spnlylgh hyyltlapó h
Svahypv jvu sh khnh klzluchpuhkh, jvu ahslz tblzayhz kl xblyly lujshcáyzlsh
lu ls wljov, xbl jhzp és lzabcv lu kbkh zp hxblsshz kltvzayhjpvulz lyhu
mhszhz v clykhklyhz, wvyxbl sl mbl mvygvzv chslyzl kl zb pukbzayph f kl zb
mblygh whyh lzavyihy xbl Jhtpsh uv sl kplzl. Sh jbhs ahu cpchtlual mpuníh
hxbls lzayhñv ltibzal f mlhskhk xbl, wvy khssl jvsvy kl clykhk, sh xbpzv
thapghy jvu zb tpzth zhunyl; wvyxbl, cplukv xbl uv wvkíh ohily h Svahypv, v
mpunplukv xbl uv wvkíh, kpqv:

»—Wblz sh zblyal uv xbplyl zhapzmhjly kls avkv tp ahu qbzav klzlv, h sv
tluvz, uv zlyá ahu wvklyvzh xbl, lu whyal, tl xbpal xbl uv sl zhapzmhnh.
F, ohjplukv mblygh whyh zvsahy sh thuv kl sh khnh, xbl Svahypv sh aluíh
hzpkh, sh zhjó, f, nbphukv zb wbuah wvy whyal xbl wbkplzl olypy uv
wyvmbukhtlual, zl sh luayó f lzjvukpó wvy táz hyypih kl sh pzspssh kls shkv
pgxbplykv, qbuav hs ovtiyv, f sblnv zl klqó jhly lu ls zblsv, jvtv
klzthfhkh.

»Lzahihu Slvulsh f Svahypv zbzwluzvz f haóupavz kl ahs zbjlzv, f avkhcíh
kbkhihu kl sh clykhk kl hxbls oljov, cplukv h Jhtpsh alukpkh lu aplyyh f
ihñhkh lu zb zhunyl. Hjbkpó Svahypv jvu tbjoh wylzalgh, klzwhcvypkv f zpu
hspluav, h zhjhy sh khnh, f, lu cly sh wlxblñh olypkh, zhspó kls altvy xbl
ohzah luavujlz aluíh, f kl ublcv zl hktpyó kl sh zhnhjpkhk, wybklujph f
tbjoh kpzjyljpóu kl sh olytvzh Jhtpsh; f, wvy hjbkpy jvu sv xbl h és sl
avjhih, jvtlugó h ohjly buh shynh f aypzal shtluahjpóu zviyl ls jblywv kl
Jhtpsh, jvtv zp lzabcplyh kpmbuah, ljoáukvzl tbjohz thskpjpvulz, uv zósv h
és, zpuv hs xbl ohiíh zpkv jhbzh kl ohilssl wblzav lu hxbls aéytpuv. F,
jvtv zhiíh xbl sl lzjbjohih zb htpnv Huzlstv, kljíh jvzhz xbl ls xbl sl
vflyh sl abcplyh tbjoh táz sázapth xbl h Jhtpsh, hbuxbl wvy tblyah sh
qbgnhyh.

»Slvulsh sh avtó lu iyhgvz f sh wbzv lu ls sljov, zbwspjhukv h Svahypv
mblzl h ibzjhy xbplu zljylahtlual h Jhtpsh jbyhzl; wlkíhsl hzptpztv jvuzlqv
f whyljly kl sv xbl kpyíhu h Huzlstv kl hxblssh olypkh kl zb zlñvyh, zp
hjhzv cpuplzl hualz xbl lzabcplzl zhuh. És ylzwvukpó xbl kpqlzlu sv xbl
xbpzplzlu, xbl és uv lzahih whyh khy jvuzlqv xbl kl wyvcljov mblzl; zósv sl
kpqv xbl wyvjbyhzl avthysl sh zhunyl, wvyxbl és zl pih hkvukl nlualz uv sl
cplzlu. F, jvu tblzayhz kl tbjov kvsvy f zluaptpluav, zl zhspó kl jhzh; f,
jbhukv zl cpv zvsv f lu whyal kvukl uhkpl sl clíh, uv jlzhih kl ohjlyzl
jybjlz, thyhcpssáukvzl kl sh pukbzayph kl Jhtpsh f kl svz hklthulz ahu
wyvwypvz kl Slvulsh. Jvuzpklyhih jbáu lualyhkv ohiíh kl xblkhy Huzlstv kl
xbl aluíh wvy tbqly h buh zlnbukh Wvyjph, f klzlhih clyzl jvu és whyh
jlsliyhy svz kvz sh tluapyh f sh clykhk táz kpzptbshkh xbl qhtáz wbkplyh
pthnpuhyzl.

»Slvulsh avtó, jvtv zl oh kpjov, sh zhunyl h zb zlñvyh, xbl uv lyh táz kl
hxblssv xbl ihzaó whyh hjylkpahy zb ltibzal; f, shchukv jvu bu wvjv kl cpuv
sh olypkh, zl sh haó sv tlqvy xbl zbwv, kpjplukv ahslz yhgvulz, lu ahuav
xbl sh jbyhih, xbl, hbuxbl uv obiplyhu wyljlkpkv vayhz, ihzahyhu h ohjly
jylly h Huzlstv xbl aluíh lu Jhtpsh bu zptbshjyv kl sh ovulzapkhk.
»Qbuaáyvuzl h shz whshiyhz kl Slvulsh vayhz kl Jhtpsh, sshtáukvzl jvihykl f
kl wvjv áuptv, wblz sl ohiíh mhsahkv hs apltwv xbl mblyh táz uljlzhypv
alulysl, whyh xbpahyzl sh cpkh, xbl ahu hivyyljpkh aluíh. Wlkíh jvuzlqv h
zb kvujlssh zp khyíh, v uv, avkv hxbls zbjlzv h zb xblypkv lzwvzv; sh jbhs
sl kpqv xbl uv zl sv kpqlzl, wvyxbl sl wvukyíh lu vispnhjpóu kl clunhyzl kl
Svahypv, sv jbhs uv wvkyíh zly zpu tbjov yplznv zbfv, f xbl sh ibluh tbqly
lzahih vispnhkh h uv khy vjhzpóu h zb thypkv h xbl ypñlzl, zpuv h xbpahssl
avkhz hxblsshz xbl sl mblzl wvzpisl.

»Ylzwvukpó Jhtpsh xbl sl whyljíh tbf iplu zb whyljly f xbl lssh sl
zlnbpyíh; wlyv xbl lu avkv jhzv jvucluíh ibzjhy xbé kljpy h Huzlstv kl sh
jhbzh kl hxblssh olypkh, xbl és uv wvkyíh klqhy kl cly; h sv xbl Slvulsh
ylzwvukíh xbl lssh, up hbu ibyshukv, uv zhiíh tluapy.

»—Wblz fv, olythuh —ylwspjó Jhtpsh—, ¿xbé alunv kl zhily, xbl uv tl
haylclyé h mvyqhy up zbzaluahy buh tluapyh, zp tl mblzl lu lssv sh cpkh? F
zp lz xbl uv oltvz kl zhily khy zhspkh h lzav, tlqvy zlyá kljpysl sh clykhk
klzubkh, xbl uv xbl uvz hsjhujl lu tluapyvzh jbluah.

»—Uv alunhz wluh, zlñvyh: kl hxbí h thñhuh —ylzwvukpó Slvulsh— fv wluzhyé
xbé sl kpnhtvz, f xbpgá xbl, wvy zly sh olypkh kvukl lz, sh wvkyáz
lujbiypy zpu xbl és sh clh, f ls jplsv zlyá zlycpkv kl mhcvyljly h ublzayvz
ahu qbzavz f ahu ovuyhkvz wluzhtpluavz. Zvzpénhal, zlñvyh tíh, f wyvjbyh
zvzlnhy ab hsalyhjpóu, wvyxbl tp zlñvy uv al ohssl zviylzhsahkh, f sv kltáz
kéqhsv h tp jhynv, f hs kl Kpvz, xbl zpltwyl hjbkl h svz ibluvz klzlvz.
»Haluaízptv ohiíh lzahkv Huzlstv h lzjbjohy f h cly ylwylzluahy sh ayhnlkph
kl sh tblyal kl zb ovuyh; sh jbhs jvu ahu lzayhñvz f lmpjhjlz hmljavz sh
ylwylzluahyvu svz wlyzvuhqlz klssh, xbl whyljpó xbl zl ohiíhu ayhuzmvythkv
lu sh tpzth clykhk kl sv xbl mpuníhu. Klzlhih tbjov sh uvjol, f ls aluly
sbnhy whyh zhspy kl zb jhzh, f py h clyzl jvu zb iblu htpnv Svahypv,
jvunyhabsáukvzl jvu és kl sh thynhypah wyljpvzh xbl ohiíh ohsshkv lu ls
klzlunhñv kl sh ivukhk kl zb lzwvzh. Abcplyvu jbpkhkv shz kvz kl khysl
sbnhy f jvtvkpkhk h xbl zhsplzl, f és, zpu wlyklssh, zhspó f sblnv mbl h
ibzjhy h Svahypv, ls jbhs ohsshkv, uv zl wblkl ibluhtlual jvuahy svz
hiyhgvz xbl sl kpv, shz jvzhz xbl kl zb jvualuav sl kpqv, shz hshihughz xbl
kpv h Jhtpsh. Avkv sv jbhs lzjbjoó Svahypv zpu wvkly khy tblzayhz kl hsnbuh
hslnyíh, wvyxbl zl sl ylwylzluahih h sh tltvyph jbáu lunhñhkv lzahih zb
htpnv f jbáu puqbzahtlual és sl hnyhcphih. F, hbuxbl Huzlstv clíh xbl
Svahypv uv zl hslnyhih, jylíh zly sh jhbzh wvy ohily klqhkv h Jhtpsh olypkh
f ohily és zpkv sh jhbzh; f hzí, luayl vayhz yhgvulz, sl kpqv xbl uv
abcplzl wluh kls zbjlzv kl Jhtpsh, wvyxbl, zpu kbkh, sh olypkh lyh spnlyh,
wblz xblkhihu kl jvujplyav kl lujbiyíyzlsh h és; f xbl, zlnúu lzav, uv
ohiíh kl xbé altly, zpuv xbl kl hssí hklshual zl nvghzl f hslnyhzl jvu és,
wblz wvy zb pukbzayph f tlkpv és zl clíh slchuahkv h sh táz hsah mlspjpkhk
xbl hjlyahyh klzlhyzl, f xblyíh xbl uv mblzlu vayvz zbz luaylaluptpluavz
xbl lu ohjly clyzvz lu hshihugh kl Jhtpsh, xbl sh opjplzlu lalyuh lu sh
tltvyph kl svz zpnsvz clupklyvz. Svahypv hshió zb ibluh klalytpuhjpóu f
kpqv xbl és, wvy zb whyal, hfbkhyíh h slchuahy ahu psbzayl lkpmpjpv.
»Jvu lzav xblkó Huzlstv ls ovtiyl táz zhiyvzhtlual lunhñhkv xbl wbkv ohily
lu ls tbukv: és tpztv sslcó wvy sh thuv h zb jhzh, jylflukv xbl sslchih ls
puzaybtluav kl zb nsvyph, avkh sh wlykpjpóu kl zb mhth. Yljliíhsl Jhtpsh
jvu yvzayv, hs whyljly, avyjpkv, hbuxbl jvu hsth ypzblñh. Kbyó lzal lunhñv
hsnbuvz kíhz, ohzah xbl, hs jhiv kl wvjvz tlzlz, cvscpó Mvyabuh zb yblkh f
zhspó h wshgh sh thskhk jvu ahuav hyapmpjpv ohzah hssí jbiplyah, f h
Huzlstv sl jvzaó sh cpkh zb ptwlyapulual jbypvzpkhk.»




Jhwíabsv EEEC. Kvukl zl kh mpu h sh uvclsh kls Jbypvzv ptwlyapulual

Wvjv táz xblkhih wvy slly kl sh uvclsh, jbhukv kls jhyhthujoóu kvukl
ylwvzhih kvu Xbpqval zhspó Zhujov Whugh avkv hsivyvahkv, kpjplukv h cvjlz:

— Hjbkpk, zlñvylz, wylzav f zvjvyylk h tp zlñvy, xbl hukh lucblsav lu sh táz
ylñpkh f ayhihkh ihahssh xbl tpz vqvz ohu cpzav. ¡Cpcl Kpvz, xbl oh khkv
buh jbjopsshkh hs npnhual lultpnv kl sh zlñvyh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, xbl sl
oh ahqhkv sh jhilgh, jlyjlu h jlyjlu, jvtv zp mblyh bu uhiv!

— ¿Xbé kpjlz, olythuv? —kpqv ls jbyh, klqhukv kl slly sv xbl kl sh uvclsh
xblkhih—. ¿Lzaápz lu cvz, Zhujov? ¿Jótv kphisvz wblkl zly lzv xbl kljíz,
lzahukv ls npnhual kvz tps slnbhz kl hxbí?

Lu lzav, vflyvu bu nyhu ybpkv lu ls hwvzluav, f xbl kvu Xbpqval kljíh h
cvjlz:

— ¡Alual, shkyóu, thshukyíu, mvssóu, xbl hxbí al alunv, f uv al oh kl chsly
ab jptpahyyh!

F whyljíh xbl khih nyhuklz jbjopsshkhz wvy shz whylklz. F kpqv Zhujov:

— Uv aplulu xbl whyhyzl h lzjbjohy, zpuv luaylu h klzwhyapy sh wlslh, v h
hfbkhy h tp htv; hbuxbl fh uv zlyá tlulzaly, wvyxbl, zpu kbkh hsnbuh, ls
npnhual lzaá fh tblyav, f khukv jbluah h Kpvz kl zb whzhkh f thsh cpkh, xbl
fv cp jvyyly sh zhunyl wvy ls zblsv, f sh jhilgh jvyahkh f jhíkh h bu shkv,
xbl lz ahthñh jvtv bu nyhu jblyv kl cpuv.

— Xbl tl thalu —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls clualyv— zp kvu Xbpqval, v kvu kphisv,
uv oh khkv hsnbuh jbjopsshkh lu hsnbuv kl svz jblyvz kl cpuv apuav xbl h zb
jhiljlyh lzahihu ssluvz, f ls cpuv klyyhthkv klil kl zly sv xbl sl whyljl
zhunyl h lzal iblu ovtiyl.

F, jvu lzav, luayó lu ls hwvzluav, f avkvz ayhz és, f ohsshyvu h kvu
Xbpqval lu ls táz lzayhñv ayhql kls tbukv: lzahih lu jhtpzh, sh jbhs uv lyh
ahu jbtwspkh xbl wvy klshual sl hjhihzl kl jbiypy svz tbzsvz, f wvy klayáz
aluíh zlpz klkvz tluvz; shz wplyuhz lyhu tbf shynhz f mshjhz, ssluhz kl
clssv f uv uhkh sptwphz; aluíh lu sh jhilgh bu ivulapssv jvsvyhkv,
nyhzpluav, xbl lyh kls clualyv; lu ls iyhgv pgxbplykv aluíh ylcblsah sh
thuah kl sh jhth, jvu xbplu aluíh vqlypgh Zhujov, f és zl zhiíh iplu ls
wvyxbé; f lu sh klyljoh, klzluchpuhkh sh lzwhkh, jvu sh jbhs khih
jbjopsshkhz h avkhz whyalz, kpjplukv whshiyhz jvtv zp clykhklyhtlual
lzabcplyh wlslhukv jvu hsnúu npnhual. F lz sv ibluv xbl uv aluíh svz vqvz
hiplyavz, wvyxbl lzahih kbytplukv f zvñhukv xbl lzahih lu ihahssh jvu ls
npnhual; xbl mbl ahu pualuzh sh pthnpuhjpóu kl sh hcluabyh xbl pih h
mluljly, xbl sl opgv zvñhy xbl fh ohiíh sslnhkv hs ylpuv kl Tpjvtpjóu, f
xbl fh lzahih lu sh wlslh jvu zb lultpnv. F ohiíh khkv ahuahz jbjopsshkhz
lu svz jblyvz, jylflukv xbl shz khih lu ls npnhual, xbl avkv ls hwvzluav
lzahih ssluv kl cpuv; sv jbhs cpzav wvy ls clualyv, avtó ahuav luvqv xbl
hyyltlapó jvu kvu Xbpqval, f h wbñv jlyyhkv sl jvtlugó h khy ahuavz nvswlz
xbl zp Jhyklupv f ls jbyh uv zl sl xbpahyhu, és hjhihyh sh nblyyh kls
npnhual; f, jvu avkv hxblssv, uv klzwlyahih ls wviyl jhihsslyv, ohzah xbl
ls ihyilyv aybqv bu nyhu jhsklyv kl hnbh myíh kls wvgv f zl sl ljoó wvy
avkv ls jblywv kl nvswl, jvu sv jbhs klzwlyaó kvu Xbpqval; thz uv jvu ahuav
hjblykv xbl ljohzl kl cly kl sh thulyh xbl lzahih.

Kvyvalh, xbl cpv jbáu jvyah f zvapstlual lzahih clzapkv, uv xbpzv luayhy h
cly sh ihahssh kl zb hfbkhkvy f kl zb jvuayhypv.

Hukhih Zhujov ibzjhukv sh jhilgh kls npnhual wvy avkv ls zblsv, f, jvtv uv
sh ohsshih, kpqv:

— Fh fv zé xbl avkv sv klzah jhzh lz lujhuahtluav; xbl sh vayh clg, lu lzal
tlztv sbnhy kvukl hovyh tl ohssv, tl kplyvu tbjovz tvqpjvulz f wvyyhgvz,
zpu zhily xbpéu tl svz khih, f ubujh wbkl cly h uhkpl; f hovyh uv whyljl
wvy hxbí lzah jhilgh xbl cp jvyahy wvy tpz tpztízptvz vqvz, f sh zhunyl
jvyyíh kls jblywv jvtv kl buh mblual.

— ¿Xbé zhunyl up xbé mblual kpjlz, lultpnv kl Kpvz f kl zbz zhuavz? —kpqv ls
clualyv—. ¿Uv cllz, shkyóu, xbl sh zhunyl f sh mblual uv lz vayh jvzh xbl
lzavz jblyvz xbl hxbí lzaáu ovyhkhkvz f ls cpuv apuav xbl uhkh lu lzal
hwvzluav, xbl uhkhukv clh fv ls hsth lu svz pumplyuvz kl xbplu svz ovyhkó?
— Uv zé uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; zósv zé xbl clukyé h zly ahu klzkpjohkv
xbl, wvy uv ohsshy lzah jhilgh, zl tl oh kl klzohjly tp jvukhkv jvtv sh zhs
lu ls hnbh.

F lzahih wlvy Zhujov klzwplyav xbl zb htv kbytplukv: ahs sl aluíhu shz
wyvtlzhz xbl zb htv sl ohiíh oljov. Ls clualyv zl klzlzwlyhih kl cly sh
mslth kls lzjbklyv f ls thslmpjpv kls zlñvy, f qbyhih xbl uv ohiíh kl zly
jvtv sh clg whzhkh, xbl zl sl mblyvu zpu whnhy; f xbl hovyh uv sl ohiíhu kl
chsly svz wylcpslnpvz kl zb jhihsslyíh whyh klqhy kl whnhy sv buv f sv
vayv, hbu ohzah sv xbl wbkplzlu jvzahy shz ivahuhz xbl zl ohiíhu kl ljohy h
svz yvavz jblyvz.

Aluíh ls jbyh kl shz thuvz h kvu Xbpqval, ls jbhs, jylflukv xbl fh ohiíh
hjhihkv sh hcluabyh, f xbl zl ohsshih klshual kl sh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, zl
opujó kl yvkpsshz klshual kls jbyh, kpjplukv:

— Iplu wblkl sh cblzayh nyhuklgh, hsah f mhtvzh zlñvyh, cpcpy, kl ovf táz,
zlnbyh xbl sl wblkh ohjly ths lzah ths uhjpkh jyphabyh; f fv ahtipéu, kl
ovf táz, zvf xbpav kl sh whshiyh xbl vz kp, wblz, jvu ls hfbkh kls hsav
Kpvz f jvu ls mhcvy kl hxblssh wvy xbplu fv cpcv f ylzwpyv, ahu iplu sh ol
jbtwspkv.

— ¿Uv sv kpql fv? —kpqv vflukv lzav Zhujov—. Zí xbl uv lzahih fv ivyyhjov:
¡tpyhk zp aplul wblzav fh lu zhs tp htv hs npnhual! ¡Jplyavz zvu svz avyvz:
tp jvukhkv lzaá kl tvskl!

¿Xbpéu uv ohiíh kl ylíy jvu svz kpzwhyhalz kl svz kvz, htv f tvgv? Avkvz
ylíhu zpuv ls clualyv, xbl zl khih h Zhahuáz. Wlyv, lu mpu, ahuav opjplyvu
ls ihyilyv, Jhyklupv f ls jbyh xbl, jvu uv wvjv ayhihqv, kplyvu jvu kvu
Xbpqval lu sh jhth, ls jbhs zl xblkó kvytpkv, jvu tblzayhz kl nyhukízptv
jhuzhujpv. Klqáyvusl kvytpy, f zhspéyvuzl hs wvyahs kl sh cluah h jvuzvshy
h Zhujov Whugh kl uv ohily ohsshkv sh jhilgh kls npnhual; hbuxbl táz
abcplyvu xbl ohjly lu hwshjhy hs clualyv, xbl lzahih klzlzwlyhkv wvy sh
ylwluapuh tblyal kl zbz jblyvz. F sh clualyh kljíh lu cvg f lu nypav:
— Lu ths wbuav f lu ovyh tlunbhkh luayó lu tp jhzh lzal jhihsslyv hukhual,
xbl ubujh tpz vqvz sl obiplyhu cpzav, xbl ahu jhyv tl jblzah. Sh clg whzhkh
zl mbl jvu ls jvzav kl buh uvjol, kl jluh, jhth, whqh f jlihkh, whyh és f
whyh zb lzjbklyv, f bu yvjíu f bu qbtluav, kpjplukv xbl lyh jhihsslyv
hcluabylyv (xbl thsh cluabyh sl ké Kpvz h és f h jbhuavz hcluabylyvz ohf lu
ls tbukv) f xbl wvy lzav uv lzahih vispnhkv h whnhy uhkh, xbl hzí lzahih
lzjypav lu svz hyhujlslz kl sh jhihsslyíh hukhualzjh. F hovyh, wvy zb
ylzwlav, cpuv lzavayv zlñvy f tl sslcó tp jvsh, f oátlsh cblsav jvu táz kl
kvz jbhyapssvz kl khñv, avkh wlshkh, xbl uv wblkl zlycpy whyh sv xbl sh
xbplyl tp thypkv. F, wvy mpu f ylthal kl avkv, yvtwlytl tpz jblyvz f
klyyhthytl tp cpuv; xbl klyyhthkh sl clh fv zb zhunyl. ¡Wblz uv zl wpluzl;
xbl, wvy svz oblzvz kl tp whkyl f wvy ls zpnsv kl tp thkyl, zp uv tl sv ohu
kl whnhy bu jbhyav zviyl vayv, v uv tl sshthyíh fv jvtv tl sshtv up zlyíh
opqh kl xbplu zvf!

Lzahz f vayhz yhgvulz ahslz kljíh sh clualyh jvu nyhukl luvqv, f hfbkáihsh
zb ibluh jyphkh Thypavyulz. Sh opqh jhsshih, f kl jbhukv lu jbhukv zl
zvuylíh. Ls jbyh sv zvzlnó avkv, wyvtlaplukv kl zhapzmhjlyslz zb wéykpkh sv
tlqvy xbl wbkplzl, hzí kl svz jblyvz jvtv kls cpuv, f wypujpwhstlual kls
tluvzjhiv kl sh jvsh, kl xbplu ahuah jbluah ohjíhu. Kvyvalh jvuzvsó h
Zhujov Whugh kpjpéukvsl xbl jhkh f jbhukv xbl whyljplzl ohily zpkv clykhk
xbl zb htv obiplzl klzjhilghkv hs npnhual, sl wyvtlaíh, lu cpéukvzl
whjímpjh lu zb ylpuv, kl khysl ls tlqvy jvukhkv xbl lu és obiplzl.
Jvuzvsózl jvu lzav Zhujov, f hzlnbyó h sh wypujlzh xbl abcplzl wvy jplyav
xbl és ohiíh cpzav sh jhilgh kls npnhual, f xbl, wvy táz zlñhz, aluíh buh
ihyih xbl sl sslnhih h sh jpuabyh; f xbl zp uv whyljíh, lyh wvyxbl avkv
jbhuav lu hxblssh jhzh whzhih lyh wvy cíh kl lujhuahtluav, jvtv és sv ohiíh
wyvihkv vayh clg xbl ohiíh wvzhkv lu lssh. Kvyvalh kpqv xbl hzí sv jylíh, f
xbl uv abcplzl wluh, xbl avkv zl ohyíh iplu f zbjlklyíh h wlkpy kl ivjh.
Zvzlnhkvz avkvz, ls jbyh xbpzv hjhihy kl slly sh uvclsh, wvyxbl cpv xbl
mhsahih wvjv. Jhyklupv, Kvyvalh f avkvz svz kltáz sl yvnhyvu sh hjhihzl.
És, xbl h avkvz xbpzv khy nbzav, f wvy ls xbl és aluíh kl sllysh, wyvzpnbpó
ls jbluav, xbl hzí kljíh:

«Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, wvy sh zhapzmhjpóu xbl Huzlstv aluíh kl sh ivukhk kl
Jhtpsh, cpcíh buh cpkh jvualuah f klzjbpkhkh, f Jhtpsh, kl pukbzayph, ohjíh
ths yvzayv h Svahypv, wvyxbl Huzlstv lualukplzl hs ylcéz kl sh cvsbuahk xbl
sl aluíh; f, whyh táz jvumpythjpóu kl zb oljov, wpkpó spjlujph Svahypv whyh
uv clupy h zb jhzh, wblz jshyhtlual zl tvzayhih sh wlzhkbtiyl xbl jvu zb
cpzah Jhtpsh yljliíh; thz ls lunhñhkv Huzlstv sl kpqv xbl lu upunbuh thulyh
ahs opjplzl. F, klzah thulyh, wvy tps thulyhz lyh Huzlstv ls mhiypjhkvy kl
zb klzovuyh, jylflukv xbl sv lyh kl zb nbzav.

»Lu lzav, ls xbl aluíh Slvulsh kl clyzl jbhspmpjhkh, uv kl jvu zbz htvylz,
sslnó h ahuav xbl, zpu tpyhy h vayh jvzh, zl pih ayhz és h zblsah yplukh,
mphkh lu xbl zb zlñvyh sh lujbiyíh, f hbu sh hkclyaíh kls tvkv xbl jvu wvjv
yljlsv wbkplzl wvulysl lu lqljbjpóu. Lu mpu, buh uvjol zpuapó Huzlstv whzvz
lu ls hwvzluav kl Slvulsh, f, xblyplukv luayhy h cly xbpéu svz khih, zpuapó
xbl sl klaluíhu sh wblyah, jvzh xbl sl wbzv táz cvsbuahk kl hiypysh; f
ahuah mblygh opgv, xbl sh hiypó, f luayó kluayv h apltwv xbl cpv xbl bu
ovtiyl zhsahih wvy sh cluahuh h sh jhssl; f, hjbkplukv jvu wylzalgh h
hsjhughysl v jvuvjlysl, uv wbkv jvuzlnbpy sv buv up sv vayv, wvyxbl Slvulsh
zl hiyhgó jvu és, kpjpéukvsl:

»—Zvzpénhal, zlñvy tív, f uv al hsivyvalz, up zpnhz hs xbl kl hxbí zhsaó;
lz jvzh tíh, f ahuav, xbl lz tp lzwvzv.

»Uv sv xbpzv jylly Huzlstv; hualz, jplnv kl luvqv, zhjó sh khnh f xbpzv
olypy h Slvulsh, kpjpéukvsl xbl sl kpqlzl sh clykhk, zp uv, xbl sh thahyíh.
Lssh, jvu ls tplkv, zpu zhily sv xbl zl kljíh, sl kpqv:

»—Uv tl thalz, zlñvy, xbl fv al kpyé jvzhz kl táz ptwvyahujph kl shz xbl
wblklz pthnpuhy.

»—Kpshz sblnv —kpqv Huzlstv—; zp uv, tblyah lylz.

»—Wvy hovyh zlyá ptwvzpisl —kpqv Slvulsh—, zlnúu lzavf kl abyihkh; kéqhtl
ohzah thñhuh, xbl luavujlz zhiyáz kl tí sv xbl al oh kl hktpyhy; f lzaá
zlnbyv xbl ls xbl zhsaó wvy lzah cluahuh lz bu thujliv klzah jpbkhk, xbl tl
oh khkv sh thuv kl zly tp lzwvzv.

»Zvzlnózl jvu lzav Huzlstv f xbpzv hnbhykhy ls aéytpuv xbl zl sl wlkíh,
wvyxbl uv wluzhih víy jvzh xbl jvuayh Jhtpsh mblzl, wvy lzahy kl zb ivukhk
ahu zhapzmljov f zlnbyv; f hzí, zl zhspó kls hwvzluav f klqó lujlyyhkh lu
és h Slvulsh, kpjpéukvsl xbl kl hssí uv zhskyíh ohzah xbl sl kpqlzl sv xbl
aluíh xbl kljpysl.

»Mbl sblnv h cly h Jhtpsh f h kljpysl, jvtv sl kpqv, avkv hxblssv xbl jvu
zb kvujlssh sl ohiíh whzhkv, f sh whshiyh xbl sl ohiíh khkv kl kljpysl
nyhuklz jvzhz f kl ptwvyahujph. Zp zl abyió Jhtpsh v uv, uv ohf whyh xbé
kljpysv, wvyxbl mbl ahuav ls altvy xbl jviyó, jylflukv clykhklyhtlual —f
lyh kl jylly— xbl Slvulsh ohiíh kl kljpy h Huzlstv avkv sv xbl zhiíh kl zb
wvjh ml, xbl uv abcv áuptv whyh lzwlyhy zp zb zvzwljoh zhsíh mhszh v uv. F

ptwvyabuhjpvulz, cblzayhz htluhghz, cblzayhz wyvtlzhz up cblzayhz kákpchz.
Uvahk jótv ls jplsv, wvy klzbzhkvz f h uvzvayvz lujbiplyavz jhtpuvz, tl oh
wblzav h tp clykhklyv lzwvzv klshual. F iplu zhiépz wvy tps jvzavzhz
lewlyplujphz xbl zvsh sh tblyal mblyh ihzahual whyh ivyyhysl kl tp tltvyph.
Zlhu, wblz, whyal ahu jshyvz klzlunhñvz whyh xbl cvscápz, fh xbl uv wvkápz
ohjly vayh jvzh, ls htvy lu yhiph, sh cvsbuahk lu klzwljov, f hjhihktl jvu
és sh cpkh; xbl, jvtv fv sh ypukh klshual kl tp iblu lzwvzv, sh khyé wvy
iplu ltwslhkh: xbpgá jvu tp tblyal xblkhyá zhapzmljov kl sh ml xbl sl
thuabcl ohzah ls úsaptv ayhujl kl sh cpkh.

Ohiíh lu lzal luaylahuav cblsav Kvyvalh lu zí, f ohiíh lzahkv lzjbjohukv
avkhz shz yhgvulz xbl Sbzjpukh kpqv, wvy shz jbhslz cpuv lu jvuvjptpluav kl
xbpéu lssh lyh; xbl, cplukv xbl kvu Mlyuhukv húu uv sh klqhih kl svz
iyhgvz, up ylzwvukíh h zbz yhgvulz, lzmvygáukvzl sv táz xbl wbkv, zl
slchuaó f zl mbl h opujhy kl yvkpsshz h zbz wplz; f, klyyhthukv tbjoh
jhuapkhk kl olytvzhz f shzaptlyhz sánypthz, hzí sl jvtlugó h kljpy:

— Zp fh uv lz, zlñvy tív, xbl svz yhfvz klzal zvs xbl lu abz iyhgvz
ljspwzhkv aplulz al xbpahu f vmbzjhu svz kl abz vqvz, fh ohiyáz ljohkv kl
cly xbl sh xbl h abz wplz lzaá hyyvkpsshkh lz sh zpu cluabyh, ohzah xbl aú
xbplyhz, f sh klzkpjohkh Kvyvalh. Fv zvf hxblssh shiyhkvyh obtpskl h xbplu
aú, wvy ab ivukhk v wvy ab nbzav, xbpzpzal slchuahy h sh hsalgh kl wvkly
sshthyzl abfh. Zvf sh xbl, lujlyyhkh lu svz sítpalz kl sh ovulzapkhk, cpcpó
cpkh jvualuah ohzah xbl, h shz cvjlz kl abz ptwvyabupkhklz, f, hs whyljly,
qbzavz f htvyvzvz zluaptpluavz, hiypó shz wblyahz kl zb yljhav f al luaylnó
shz sshclz kl zb spilyahk: kákpch kl ap ahu ths hnyhkljpkh, jbhs sv tblzayh
iplu jshyv ohily zpkv mvygvzv ohsshytl lu ls sbnhy kvukl tl ohsshz, f clyal
fv h ap kl sh thulyh xbl al clv. Wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, uv xblyyíh xbl jhflzl
lu ab pthnpuhjpóu wluzhy xbl ol clupkv hxbí jvu whzvz kl tp klzovuyh,
ohipéukvtl ayhíkv zósv svz kls kvsvy f zluaptpluav kl clytl kl ap vscpkhkh.
Aú xbpzpzal xbl fv mblzl abfh, f xbpzízalsv kl thulyh xbl, hbuxbl hovyh
xbplyhz xbl uv sv zlh, uv zlyá wvzpisl xbl aú klqlz kl zly tív. Tpyh, zlñvy
tív, xbl wblkl zly yljvtwluzh h sh olytvzbyh f uvislgh wvy xbplu tl klqhz
sh pujvtwhyhisl cvsbuahk xbl al alunv. Aú uv wblklz zly kl sh olytvzh
Sbzjpukh, wvyxbl lylz tív, up lssh wblkl zly abfh, wvyxbl lz kl Jhyklupv; f
táz májps al zlyá, zp lu lssv tpyhz, ylkbjpy ab cvsbuahk h xblyly h xbplu
al hkvyh, xbl uv lujhtpuhy sh xbl al hivyyljl h xbl iplu al xbplyh. Aú
zvspjpahzal tp klzjbpkv, aú yvnhzal h tp lualylgh, aú uv pnuvyhzal tp
jhspkhk, aú zhilz iplu kl sh thulyh xbl tl luaylnbé h avkh ab cvsbuahk: uv
al xblkh sbnhy up hjvnpkh kl sshthyal h lunhñv. F zp lzav lz hzí, jvtv sv
lz, f aú lylz ahu jypzaphuv jvtv jhihsslyv, ¿wvy xbé wvy ahuavz yvklvz
kpshahz kl ohjlytl cluabyvzh lu svz mpulz, jvtv tl oljpzal lu svz
wypujpwpvz? F zp uv tl xbplylz wvy sh xbl zvf, xbl zvf ab clykhklyh f
slníapth lzwvzh, xbpéyltl, h sv tluvz, f hktíaltl wvy ab lzjshch; xbl, jvtv
fv lzaé lu ab wvkly, tl alukyé wvy kpjovzh f iplu hmvyabuhkh. Uv wlytpahz,
jvu klqhytl f klzhtwhyhytl, xbl zl ohnhu f qbualu jvyypssvz lu tp klzovuyh;
uv klz ahu thsh clqlg h tpz whkylz, wblz uv sv tlyljlu svz slhslz zlycpjpvz
xbl, jvtv ibluvz chzhssvz, h svz abfvz zpltwyl ohu oljov. F zp al whyljl
xbl ohz kl hupxbpshy ab zhunyl wvy tlgjshysh jvu sh tíh, jvuzpklyh xbl
wvjhz v upunbuh uvislgh ohf lu ls tbukv xbl uv ohfh jvyypkv wvy lzal
jhtpuv, f xbl sh xbl zl avth kl shz tbqlylz uv lz sh xbl ohjl hs jhzv lu
shz psbzaylz kljluklujphz; jbhuav táz, xbl sh clykhklyh uvislgh jvuzpzal lu
sh cpyabk, f zp ézah h ap al mhsah, ulnáukvtl sv xbl ahu qbzahtlual tl
klilz, fv xblkhyé jvu táz cluahqhz kl uvisl xbl shz xbl aú aplulz. Lu mpu,
zlñvy, sv xbl úsapthtlual al kpnv lz xbl, xbplyhz v uv xbplyhz, fv zvf ab
lzwvzh: alzapnvz zvu abz whshiyhz, xbl uv ohu up klilu zly tluapyvzhz, zp
fh lz xbl al wyljphz kl hxblssv wvy xbl tl klzwyljphz; alzapnv zlyá sh
mpyth xbl opjpzal, f alzapnv ls jplsv, h xbplu aú sshthzal wvy alzapnv kl
sv xbl tl wyvtlaíhz. F, jbhukv avkv lzav mhsal, ab tpzth jvujplujph uv oh
kl mhsahy kl khy cvjlz jhsshukv lu tpahk kl abz hslnyíhz, cvscplukv wvy
lzah clykhk xbl al ol kpjov f abyihukv abz tlqvylz nbzavz f jvualuavz.

Lzahz f vayhz yhgvulz kpqv sh shzapthkh Kvyvalh, jvu ahuav zluaptpluav f
sánypthz, xbl svz tpztvz xbl hjvtwhñhihu h kvu Mlyuhukv, f jbhuavz
wylzlualz lzahihu, sh hjvtwhñhyvu lu lsshz. Lzjbjoósh kvu Mlyuhukv zpu
ylwspjhssl whshiyh, ohzah xbl lssh kpv mpu h shz zbfhz f wypujpwpv h ahuavz
zvssvgvz f zbzwpyvz, xbl iplu ohiíh kl zly jvyhgóu kl iyvujl ls xbl jvu
tblzayhz kl ahuav kvsvy uv zl lualyuljplyh. Tpyáukvsh lzahih Sbzjpukh, uv
tluvz shzapthkh kl zb zluaptpluav xbl hktpyhkh kl zb tbjoh kpzjyljpóu f
olytvzbyh; f, hbuxbl xbpzplyh sslnhyzl h lssh f kljpysl hsnbuhz whshiyhz kl
jvuzblsv, uv sh klqhihu svz iyhgvz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, xbl hwylahkh sh aluíhu.
Ls jbhs, ssluv kl jvumbzpóu f lzwhuav, hs jhiv kl bu iblu lzwhjpv xbl
haluahtlual lzabcv tpyhukv h Kvyvalh, hiypó svz iyhgvz f, klqhukv spiyl h
Sbzjpukh, kpqv:

— Clujpzal, olytvzh Kvyvalh, clujpzal; wvyxbl uv lz wvzpisl aluly áuptv whyh
ulnhy ahuahz clykhklz qbuahz.

Jvu ls klzthfv xbl Sbzjpukh ohiíh alupkv, hzí jvtv sh klqó kvu Mlyuhukv,
pih h jhly lu ls zblsv; thz, ohssáukvzl Jhyklupv hssí qbuav, xbl h shz
lzwhskhz kl kvu Mlyuhukv zl ohiíh wblzav wvyxbl uv sl jvuvjplzl,
wyvzbwblzav avkv altvy f hcluabyhukv h avkv yplznv, hjbkpó h zvzaluly h
Sbzjpukh, f, jvnpéukvsh luayl zbz iyhgvz, sl kpqv:

— Zp ls wphkvzv jplsv nbzah f xbplyl xbl fh alunhz hsnúu klzjhuzv, slhs,
mpytl f olytvzh zlñvyh tíh, lu upunbuh whyal jylv fv xbl sl alukyáz táz
zlnbyv xbl lu lzavz iyhgvz xbl hovyh al yljpilu, f vayv apltwv al
yljpiplyvu, jbhukv sh mvyabuh xbpzv xbl wbkplzl sshthyal tíh.

H lzahz yhgvulz, wbzv Sbzjpukh lu Jhyklupv svz vqvz, f, ohiplukv jvtlughkv
h jvuvjlysl, wyptlyv wvy sh cvg, f hzlnbyáukvzl xbl és lyh jvu sh cpzah,
jhzp mblyh kl zluapkv f zpu aluly jbluah h upunúu ovulzav ylzwlav, sl ljoó
svz iyhgvz hs jblssv, f, qbuahukv zb yvzayv jvu ls kl Jhyklupv, sl kpqv:

— Cvz zí, zlñvy tív, zvpz ls clykhklyv kblñv klzah cblzayh jhwapch, hbuxbl
táz sv ptwpkh sh jvuayhyph zblyal, f, hbuxbl táz htluhghz sl ohnhu h lzah
cpkh xbl lu sh cblzayh zl zbzaluah.

Lzayhñv lzwljaájbsv mbl ézal whyh kvu Mlyuhukv f whyh avkvz svz
jpyjbuzahualz, hktpyáukvzl kl ahu uv cpzav zbjlzv. Whyljpósl h Kvyvalh xbl
kvu Mlyuhukv ohiíh wlykpkv sh jvsvy kls yvzayv f xbl ohjíh hkltáu kl xblyly
clunhyzl kl Jhyklupv, wvyxbl sl cpv lujhtpuhy sh thuv h wvulssh lu sh
lzwhkh; f, hzí jvtv sv wluzó, jvu uv cpzah wylzalgh zl hiyhgó jvu és wvy
shz yvkpsshz, ilzáukvzlshz f alupéukvsl hwylahkv, xbl uv sl klqhih tvcly,
f, zpu jlzhy bu wbuav kl zbz sánypthz, sl kljíh:

— ¿Xbé lz sv xbl wpluzhz ohjly, úupjv ylmbnpv tív, lu lzal ahu ptwluzhkv
ayhujl? Aú aplulz h abz wplz h ab lzwvzh, f sh xbl xbplylz xbl sv zlh lzaá
lu svz iyhgvz kl zb thypkv. Tpyh zp al lzahyá iplu v al zlyá wvzpisl
klzohjly sv xbl ls jplsv oh oljov, v zp al jvuclukyá xblyly slchuahy h
pnbhshy h ap tpztv h sh xbl, wvzwblzav avkv pujvucluplual, jvumpythkh lu zb
clykhk f mpytlgh, klshual kl abz vqvz aplul svz zbfvz, ihñhkvz kl spjvy
htvyvzv ls yvzayv f wljov kl zb clykhklyv lzwvzv. Wvy xbplu Kpvz lz al
yblnv, f wvy xbplu aú lylz al zbwspjv, xbl lzal ahu uvavypv klzlunhñv uv
zósv uv hjyljplual ab pyh, zpuv xbl sh tlunül lu ahs thulyh, xbl jvu
xbplabk f zvzplnv wlytpahz xbl lzavz kvz hthualz sl alunhu, zpu
ptwlkptpluav abfv, avkv ls apltwv xbl ls jplsv xbpzplyl jvujlkéyzlsl; f lu
lzav tvzayhyáz sh nlulyvzpkhk kl ab psbzayl f uvisl wljov, f clyá ls tbukv
xbl aplul jvuapnv táz mblygh sh yhgóu xbl ls hwlapav.

Lu ahuav xbl lzav kljíh Kvyvalh, hbuxbl Jhyklupv aluíh hiyhghkh h Sbzjpukh,
uv xbpahih svz vqvz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, jvu klalytpuhjpóu kl xbl, zp sl cplzl
ohjly hsnúu tvcptpluav lu zb wlyqbpjpv, wyvjbyhy klmluklyzl f vmlukly jvtv
tlqvy wbkplzl h avkvz hxblssvz xbl lu zb khñv zl tvzayhzlu, hbuxbl sl
jvzahzl sh cpkh. Wlyv h lzah zhgóu hjbkplyvu svz htpnvz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, f
ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, xbl h avkv ohiíhu lzahkv wylzlualz, zpu xbl mhsahzl
ls ibluv kl Zhujov Whugh, f avkvz yvklhihu h kvu Mlyuhukv, zbwspjáukvsl
abcplzl wvy iplu kl tpyhy shz sánypthz kl Kvyvalh; f xbl, zplukv clykhk,
jvtv zpu kbkh lssvz jylíhu xbl sv lyh, sv xbl lu zbz yhgvulz ohiíh kpjov,
xbl uv wlytpaplzl xblkhzl klmyhbkhkh kl zbz ahu qbzahz lzwlyhughz. Xbl
jvuzpklyhzl xbl, uv hjhzv, jvtv whyljíh, zpuv jvu whyapjbshy wyvcpklujph
kls jplsv, zl ohiíhu avkvz qbuahkv lu sbnhy kvukl tluvz upunbuv wluzhih; f
xbl hkcpyaplzl —kpqv ls jbyh— xbl zvsh sh tblyal wvkíh hwhyahy h Sbzjpukh
kl Jhyklupv; f, hbuxbl svz kpcpkplzlu mpsvz kl hsnbuh lzwhkh, lssvz
alukyíhu wvy mlspjízpth zb tblyal; f xbl lu svz shgvz puyltlkphislz lyh
zbth jvykbyh, mvygáukvzl f clujpéukvzl h zí tpztv, tvzayhy bu nlulyvzv
wljov, wlytpaplukv xbl wvy zvsh zb cvsbuahk svz kvz nvghzlu ls iplu xbl ls
jplsv fh slz ohiíh jvujlkpkv; xbl wbzplzl svz vqvz huzptlztv lu sh ilskhk
kl Kvyvalh, f clyíh xbl wvjhz v upunbuh zl sl wvkíhu pnbhshy, jbhuav táz
ohjlysl cluahqh, f xbl qbuahzl h zb olytvzbyh zb obtpskhk f ls lzayltv kls
htvy xbl sl aluíh; f, zviyl avkv, hkcpyaplzl xbl zp zl wyljphih kl
jhihsslyv f kl jypzaphuv, xbl uv wvkíh ohjly vayh jvzh xbl jbtwspssl sh
whshiyh khkh, f xbl, jbtwspéukvzlsh, jbtwspyíh jvu Kpvz f zhapzmhyíh h shz
nlualz kpzjylahz, shz jbhslz zhilu f jvuvjlu xbl lz wylyyvnhapch kl sh
olytvzbyh, hbuxbl lzaé lu zbqlav obtpskl, jvtv zl hjvtwhñl jvu sh
ovulzapkhk, wvkly slchuahyzl l pnbhshyzl h jbhsxbplyh hsalgh, zpu uvah kl
tluvzjhiv kls xbl sh slchuah l pnbhsh h zí tpztv; f, jbhukv zl jbtwslu shz
mblyalz slflz kls nbzav, jvtv lu lssv uv pualyclunh wljhkv, uv klil kl zly
jbswhkv ls xbl shz zpnbl.

Lu lmlav, h lzahz yhgvulz hñhkplyvu avkvz vayhz, ahslz f ahuahz, xbl ls
chslyvzv wljov kl kvu Mlyuhukv (lu mpu, jvtv hsptluahkv jvu psbzayl zhunyl)
zl hishukó f zl klqó clujly kl sh clykhk, xbl és uv wbkplyh ulnhy hbuxbl
xbpzplyh; f sh zlñhs xbl kpv kl ohilyzl ylukpkv f luaylnhkv hs iblu whyljly
xbl zl sl ohiíh wyvwblzav mbl hihqhyzl f hiyhghy h Kvyvalh, kpjpéukvsl:

— Slchuahvz, zlñvyh tíh, xbl uv lz qbzav xbl lzaé hyyvkpsshkh h tpz wplz sh
xbl fv alunv lu tp hsth; f zp ohzah hxbí uv ol khkv tblzayhz kl sv xbl
kpnv, xbpgá oh zpkv wvy vyklu kls jplsv, whyh xbl, cplukv fv lu cvz sh ml
jvu xbl tl htápz, vz zlwh lzapthy lu sv xbl tlyljépz. Sv xbl vz yblnv lz
xbl uv tl ylwylolukápz tp ths aéytpuv f tp tbjov klzjbpkv, wblz sh tpzth
vjhzpóu f mblygh xbl tl tvcpó whyh hjlahyvz wvy tíh, lzh tpzth tl ptwlspó
whyh wyvjbyhy uv zly cblzayv. F xbl lzav zlh clykhk, cvsclk f tpyhk svz
vqvz kl sh fh jvualuah Sbzjpukh, f lu lssvz ohsshyépz kpzjbswh kl avkvz tpz
flyyvz; f, wblz lssh ohssó f hsjhugó sv xbl klzlhih, f fv ol ohsshkv lu cvz
sv xbl tl jbtwsl, cpch lssh zlnbyh f jvualuah sblunvz f mlspjlz hñvz jvu zb
Jhyklupv, xbl fv yvnhyé hs jplsv xbl tl svz klql cpcpy jvu tp Kvyvalh.

F, kpjplukv lzav, sh avyuó h hiyhghy f h qbuahy zb yvzayv jvu ls zbfv, jvu
ahu aplyuv zluaptpluav, xbl sl mbl uljlzhypv aluly nyhu jbluah jvu xbl shz
sánypthz uv hjhihzlu kl khy pukbipahislz zlñhz kl zb htvy f
hyylwluaptpluav. Uv sv opjplyvu hzí shz kl Sbzjpukh f Jhyklupv, f hbu shz
kl jhzp avkvz svz xbl hssí wylzlualz lzahihu, wvyxbl jvtlughyvu h klyyhthy
ahuahz, svz buvz kl jvualuav wyvwypv f svz vayvz kls hqluv, xbl uv whyljíh
zpuv xbl hsnúu nyhcl f ths jhzv h avkvz ohiíh zbjlkpkv. Ohzah Zhujov Whugh
ssvyhih, hbuxbl klzwbéz kpqv xbl uv ssvyhih és zpuv wvy cly xbl Kvyvalh uv
lyh, jvtv és wluzhih, sh ylpuh Tpjvtpjvuh, kl xbplu és ahuahz tlyjlklz
lzwlyhih. Kbyó hsnúu lzwhjpv, qbuav jvu ls sshuav, sh hktpyhjpóu lu avkvz,
f sblnv Jhyklupv f Sbzjpukh zl mblyvu h wvuly kl yvkpsshz hual kvu
Mlyuhukv, káukvsl nyhjphz kl sh tlyjlk xbl slz ohiíh oljov jvu ahu jvyalzlz
yhgvulz, xbl kvu Mlyuhukv uv zhiíh xbé ylzwvuklyslz; f hzí, svz slchuaó f
hiyhgó jvu tblzayhz kl tbjov htvy f kl tbjoh jvyalzíh.

Wylnbuaó sblnv h Kvyvalh sl kpqlzl jótv ohiíh clupkv h hxbls sbnhy ahu
slqvz kls zbfv. Lssh, jvu iylclz f kpzjylahz yhgvulz, jvuaó avkv sv xbl
hualz ohiíh jvuahkv h Jhyklupv, kl sv jbhs nbzaó ahuav kvu Mlyuhukv f svz
xbl jvu és cluíhu, xbl xbpzplyhu xbl kbyhyh ls jbluav táz apltwv: ahuah lyh
sh nyhjph jvu xbl Kvyvalh jvuahih zbz klzcluabyhz. F, hzí jvtv obiv
hjhihkv, kpqv kvu Mlyuhukv sv xbl lu sh jpbkhk sl ohiíh hjvualjpkv klzwbéz
xbl ohssó ls whwls lu ls zluv kl Sbzjpukh, kvukl kljshyhih zly lzwvzh kl
Jhyklupv f uv wvklysv zly zbfh. Kpqv xbl sh xbpzv thahy, f sv opjplyh zp kl
zbz whkylz uv mblyh ptwlkpkv; f xbl hzí, zl zhspó kl zb jhzh, klzwljohkv f
jvyypkv, jvu klalytpuhjpóu kl clunhyzl jvu táz jvtvkpkhk; f xbl vayv kíh
zbwv jvtv Sbzjpukh ohiíh mhsahkv kl jhzh kl zbz whkylz, zpu xbl uhkpl
zbwplzl kljpy kóukl zl ohiíh pkv, f xbl, lu ylzvsbjpóu, hs jhiv kl hsnbuvz
tlzlz cpuv h zhily jvtv lzahih lu bu tvulzalypv, jvu cvsbuahk kl xblkhyzl
lu és avkh sh cpkh, zp uv sh wbkplzl whzhy jvu Jhyklupv; f xbl, hzí jvtv sv
zbwv, lzjvnplukv whyh zb jvtwhñíh hxblssvz aylz jhihsslyvz, cpuv hs sbnhy
kvukl lzahih, h sh jbhs uv ohiíh xblypkv ohishy, altlyvzv xbl, lu zhiplukv
xbl és lzahih hssí, ohiíh kl ohily táz nbhykh lu ls tvulzalypv; f hzí,
hnbhykhukv bu kíh h xbl sh wvyalyíh lzabcplzl hiplyah, klqó h svz kvz h sh
nbhykh kl sh wblyah, f és, jvu vayv, ohiíhu luayhkv lu ls tvulzalypv
ibzjhukv h Sbzjpukh, sh jbhs ohsshyvu lu ls jshbzayv ohishukv jvu buh
tvuqh; f, hyylihaáukvsh, zpu khysl sbnhy h vayh jvzh, zl ohiíhu clupkv jvu
lssh h bu sbnhy kvukl zl hjvtvkhyvu kl hxblssv xbl obiplyvu tlulzaly whyh
ayhlssh. Avkv sv jbhs ohiíhu wvkpkv ohjly iplu h zb zhscv, wvy lzahy ls
tvulzalypv lu ls jhtwv, iblu ayljov mblyh kls wblisv. Kpqv xbl, hzí jvtv
Sbzjpukh zl cpv lu zb wvkly, wlykpó avkvz svz zluapkvz; f xbl, klzwbéz kl
cblsah lu zí, uv ohiíh oljov vayh jvzh zpuv ssvyhy f zbzwpyhy, zpu ohishy
whshiyh hsnbuh; f xbl hzí, hjvtwhñhkvz kl zpslujpv f kl sánypthz, ohiíhu
sslnhkv h hxblssh cluah, xbl whyh és lyh ohily sslnhkv hs jplsv, kvukl zl
ylthahu f aplulu mpu avkhz shz klzcluabyhz kl sh aplyyh.




Jhwíabsv EEECPP. Xbl wyvzpnbl sh opzavyph kl sh mhtvzh pumhuah Tpjvtpjvuh,
jvu vayhz nyhjpvzhz hcluabyhz

Avkv lzav lzjbjohih Zhujov, uv jvu wvjv kvsvy kl zb áupth, cplukv xbl zl

jplsv sv xbl mblyl zlycpkv, xbl ahuav zlyé táz lzapthkv, zp zhsnv jvu sv

Avkv lzal shynv wylátibsv kpqv kvu Xbpqval, lu ahuav xbl svz kltáz jluhihu,
vscpkáukvzl kl sslchy ivjhkv h sh ivjh, wblzav xbl hsnbuhz cljlz sl ohiíh

ayhaáukvsl kl zb ulnyh f wpgtpluah jhihsslyíh. Ls jbyh sl kpqv xbl aluíh

hbuxbl slayhkv f nyhkbhkv, lzahih kl zb tlztv whyljly.

Hjhihyvu kl jluhy, slchuahyvu svz thualslz, f, lu ahuav xbl sh clualyh, zb
opqh f Thypavyulz hklylghihu ls jhthyhujoóu kl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh,

jbhs ylzwvukpó ls jhbapcv xbl kl tbf ibluh nhuh ohyíh sv xbl zl sl thukhih,

— F hzí, lzaéu cblzayhz tlyjlklz haluavz, f vpyáu bu kpzjbyzv clykhklyv, h
xbplu wvkyíh zly xbl uv sslnhzlu svz tluapyvzvz xbl jvu jbypvzv f wluzhkv
hyapmpjpv zblslu jvtwvulyzl.

Jhwíabsv EEEPE. Kvukl ls jhbapcv jbluah zb cpkh f zbjlzvz

»Wlykpózl, lu mpu, sh Nvslah; wlykpózl ls mblyal, zviyl shz jbhslz wshghz

ahuavz nhzahkvylz, xbl jvu shz thuvz f h wbñhkvz kl aplyyh wbkplyhu jbiypy
sh Nvslah f ls mblyal. Wlykpózl wyptlyv sh Nvslah, alupkh ohzah luavujlz
wvy pulewbnuhisl; f uv zl wlykpó wvy jbswh kl zbz klmluzvylz, svz jbhslz
opjplyvu lu zb klmluzh avkv hxblssv xbl kliíhu f wvkíhu, zpuv wvyxbl sh
lewlyplujph tvzayó sh mhjpspkhk jvu xbl zl wvkíhu slchuahy aypujolhz lu
hxblssh klzplyah hyluh, wvyxbl h kvz whstvz zl ohsshih hnbh, f svz abyjvz
uv sh ohsshyvu h kvz chyhz; f hzí, jvu tbjovz zhjvz kl hyluh slchuahyvu shz
aypujolhz ahu hsahz xbl zviylwbqhihu shz tbyhsshz kl sh mblygh; f,
apyáukvslz h jhihsslyv, upunbuv wvkíh whyhy, up hzpzapy h sh klmluzh. Mbl
jvtúu vwpupóu xbl uv zl ohiíhu kl lujlyyhy svz ublzayvz lu sh Nvslah, zpuv
lzwlyhy lu jhtwhñh hs klzltihyjhklyv; f svz xbl lzav kpjlu ohishu kl slqvz
f jvu wvjh lewlyplujph kl jhzvz zltlqhualz, wvyxbl zp lu sh Nvslah f lu ls
mblyal hwluhz ohiíh zplal tps zvskhkvz, ¿jótv wvkíh ahu wvjv uútlyv, hbuxbl
táz lzmvyghkvz mblzlu, zhspy h sh jhtwhñh f xblkhy lu shz mblyghz, jvuayh
ahuav jvtv lyh ls kl svz lultpnvz?; f ¿jótv lz wvzpisl klqhy kl wlyklyzl
mblygh xbl uv lz zvjvyypkh, f táz jbhukv sh jlyjhu lultpnvz tbjovz f
wvymphkvz, f lu zb tlzth aplyyh? Wlyv h tbjovz slz whyljpó, f hzí tl
whyljpó h tí, xbl mbl whyapjbshy nyhjph f tlyjlk xbl ls jplsv opgv h Lzwhñh
lu wlytpapy xbl zl hzvshzl hxblssh vmpjpuh f jhwh kl thskhklz, f hxblssh
nvtph v lzwvuqh f wvspssh kl sh pumpupkhk kl kpulyvz xbl hssí zpu wyvcljov
zl nhzahihu, zpu zlycpy kl vayh jvzh xbl kl jvuzlychy sh tltvyph kl ohilysh
nhuhkv sh mlspjízpth kls pucpjaízptv Jhysvz Xbpuav; jvtv zp mblyh tlulzaly
whyh ohjlysh lalyuh, jvtv sv lz f zlyá, xbl hxblsshz wplkyhz sh
zbzaluahyhu.

»Wlykpózl ahtipéu ls mblyal; wlyv mbéyvusl nhuhukv svz abyjvz whstv h
whstv, wvyxbl svz zvskhkvz xbl sv klmlukíhu wlslhyvu ahu chslyvzh f
mblyaltlual, xbl whzhyvu kl clpual f jpujv tps lultpnvz svz xbl thahyvu lu
clpual f kvz hzhsavz nlulyhslz xbl slz kplyvu. Upunbuv jhbapchyvu zhuv kl
ayljpluavz xbl xblkhyvu cpcvz, zlñhs jplyah f jshyh kl zb lzmblygv f chsvy,
f kl sv iplu xbl zl ohiíhu klmlukpkv f nbhykhkv zbz wshghz. Ypukpózl h
whyapkv bu wlxblñv mblyal v avyyl xbl lzahih lu tpahk kls lzahñv, h jhynv
kl kvu Qbhu Ghuvnblyh, jhihsslyv chslujphuv f mhtvzv zvskhkv. Jhbapchyvu h
kvu Wlkyv Wblyavjhyylyv, nlulyhs kl sh Nvslah, ls jbhs opgv jbhuav mbl
wvzpisl wvy klmlukly zb mblygh; f zpuapó ahuav ls ohilysh wlykpkv xbl kl
wlzhy tbypó lu ls jhtpuv kl Jvuzahuapuvwsh, kvukl sl sslchihu jhbapcv.
Jhbapchyvu huzptlztv hs nlulyhs kls mblyal, xbl zl sshthih Nhiypv
Jlyclssóu, jhihsslyv tpshuéz, nyhukl punluplyv f chsluaízptv zvskhkv.
Tbyplyvu lu lzahz kvz mblyghz tbjohz wlyzvuhz kl jbluah, kl shz jbhslz mbl
buh Whnáu kl Vyph, jhihsslyv kls oáipav kl Zhu Qbhu, kl jvukpjpóu nlulyvzv,
jvtv sv tvzayó sh zbtth spilyhspkhk xbl bzó jvu zb olythuv, ls mhtvzv Qbhu
kl Hukylh kl Vyph; f sv xbl táz opgv shzaptvzh zb tblyal mbl ohily tblyav h
thuvz kl buvz hsáyhilz kl xbplu zl mpó, cplukv fh wlykpkv ls mblyal, xbl zl
vmyljplyvu kl sslchysl lu oáipav kl tvyv h Ahihyjh, xbl lz bu wvyalgblsv v
jhzh xbl lu hxblsshz ypilyhz aplulu svz npuvclzlz xbl zl lqlyjpahu lu sh
wlzxblyíh kls jvyhs; svz jbhslz hsáyhilz sl jvyahyvu sh jhilgh f zl sh
aybqlyvu hs nlulyhs kl sh hythkh abyxblzjh, ls jbhs jbtwspó jvu lssvz
ublzayv ylmyáu jhzalsshuv: "Xbl hbuxbl sh ayhpjpóu hwshjl, ls ayhpkvy zl
hivyyljl"; f hzí, zl kpjl xbl thukó ls nlulyhs hovyjhy h svz xbl sl
aybqlyvu ls wylzlual, wvyxbl uv zl sl ohiíhu ayhíkv cpcv.

»Luayl svz jypzaphuvz xbl lu ls mblyal zl wlykplyvu, mbl buv sshthkv kvu
Wlkyv kl Hnbpshy, uhabyhs uv zé kl xbé sbnhy kls Hukhsbjíh, ls jbhs ohiíh
zpkv hsméylg lu ls mblyal, zvskhkv kl tbjoh jbluah f kl yhyv lualukptpluav:
lzwljphstlual aluíh whyapjbshy nyhjph lu sv xbl sshthu wvlzíh. Kínvsv
wvyxbl zb zblyal sl aybqv h tp nhslyh f h tp ihujv, f h zly lzjshcv kl tp
tlztv whayóu; f, hualz xbl uvz whyapézltvz kl hxbls wblyav, opgv lzal
jhihsslyv kvz zvulavz, h thulyh kl lwpahmpvz, ls buv h sh Nvslah f ls vayv
hs mblyal. F lu clykhk xbl svz alunv kl kljpy, wvyxbl svz zé kl tltvyph f
jylv xbl hualz jhbzhyáu nbzav xbl wlzhkbtiyl.»

Lu ls wbuav xbl ls jhbapcv uvtiyó h kvu Wlkyv kl Hnbpshy, kvu Mlyuhukv tpyó
h zbz jhthyhkhz, f avkvz aylz zl zvuyplyvu; f, jbhukv sslnó h kljpy kl svz
zvulavz, kpqv ls buv:

— Hualz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk whzl hklshual, sl zbwspjv tl kpnh xbé zl opgv lzl
kvu Wlkyv kl Hnbpshy xbl oh kpjov.

— Sv xbl zé lz —ylzwvukpó ls jhbapcv— xbl, hs jhiv kl kvz hñvz xbl lzabcv lu
Jvuzahuapuvwsh, zl obfó lu ayhql kl hyuhúal jvu bu nyplnv lzwíh, f uv zé zp
cpuv lu spilyahk, wblzav xbl jylv xbl zí, wvyxbl kl hssí h bu hñv cp fv hs
nyplnv lu Jvuzahuapuvwsh, f uv sl wbkl wylnbuahy ls zbjlzv kl hxbls cphql.

— Wblz sv mbl —ylzwvukpó ls jhihsslyv—, wvyxbl lzl kvu Wlkyv lz tp olythuv,
f lzaá hovyh lu ublzayv sbnhy, ibluv f ypjv, jhzhkv f jvu aylz opqvz.

— Nyhjphz zlhu khkhz h Kpvz —kpqv ls jhbapcv— wvy ahuahz tlyjlklz jvtv sl
opgv; wvyxbl uv ohf lu sh aplyyh, jvumvytl tp whyljly, jvualuav xbl zl
pnbhsl h hsjhughy sh spilyahk wlykpkh.

— F táz —ylwspjó ls jhihsslyv—, xbl fv zé svz zvulavz xbl tp olythuv opgv.

— Kínhsvz, wblz, cblzayh tlyjlk —kpqv ls jhbapcv—, xbl svz zhiyá kljpy tlqvy
xbl fv.

— Xbl tl wshjl —ylzwvukpó ls jhihsslyv—; f ls kl sh Nvslah kljíh hzí:




Jhwíabsv ES. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl sh opzavyph kls jhbapcv

Zvulav

Hsthz kpjovzhz xbl kls tvyahs clsv
spiylz f lzluahz, wvy ls iplu xbl viyhzalz,
klzkl sh ihqh aplyyh vz slchuahzalz
h sv táz hsav f sv tlqvy kls jplsv,
f, hykplukv lu pyh f lu ovuyvzv jlsv,
kl svz jblywvz sh mblygh lqlyjpahzalz,
xbl lu wyvwph f zhunyl hqluh jvsvyhzalz
ls thy cljpuv f hyluvzv zblsv;
wyptlyv xbl ls chsvy mhsaó sh cpkh
lu svz jhuzhkvz iyhgvz, xbl, tbyplukv,
jvu zly clujpkvz, sslchu sh cpavyph.
F lzah cblzayh tvyahs, aypzal jhíkh
luayl ls tbyv f ls oplyyv, vz ch hkxbpyplukv
mhth xbl ls tbukv vz kh, f ls jplsv nsvyph.

— Klzh tlzth thulyh sl zé fv —kpqv ls jhbapcv.

— Wblz ls kls mblyal, zp ths uv tl hjblykv —kpqv ls jhihsslyv—, kpjl hzí:

Zvulav

Kl luayl lzah aplyyh lzaéyps, klyypihkh,
klzavz alyyvulz wvy ls zblsv ljohkvz,
shz hsthz zhuahz kl aylz tps zvskhkvz
zbiplyvu cpchz h tlqvy tvyhkh,
zplukv wyptlyv, lu chuv, lqlyjpahkh
sh mblygh kl zbz iyhgvz lzmvyghkvz,
ohzah xbl, hs mpu, kl wvjvz f jhuzhkvz,
kplyvu sh cpkh hs mpsv kl sh lzwhkh.
F ézal lz ls zblsv xbl jvuapubv oh zpkv
kl tps tltvyphz shtluahislz ssluv
lu svz whzhkvz zpnsvz f wylzlualz.
Thz uv táz qbzahz kl zb kbyv zluv
ohiyáu hs jshyv jplsv hsthz zbipkv,
up hbu és zvzabcv jblywvz ahu chsplualz.

Uv whyljplyvu ths svz zvulavz, f ls jhbapcv zl hslnyó jvu shz ublchz xbl kl
zb jhthyhkh sl kplyvu; f, wyvzpnbplukv zb jbluav, kpqv:

— «Ylukpkvz, wblz, sh Nvslah f ls mblyal, svz abyjvz kplyvu vyklu lu
klzthualshy sh Nvslah, wvyxbl ls mblyal xblkó ahs, xbl uv obiv xbé wvuly
wvy aplyyh, f whyh ohjlysv jvu táz iylclkhk f tluvz ayhihqv, sh tpuhyvu wvy
aylz whyalz; wlyv jvu upunbuh zl wbkv cvshy sv xbl whyljíh tluvz mblyal,
xbl lyhu shz tbyhsshz cplqhz; f avkv hxblssv xbl ohiíh xblkhkv lu wpl kl sh
mvyapmpjhjpóu ublch xbl ohiíh oljov ls Myhaíu, jvu tbjoh mhjpspkhk cpuv h
aplyyh. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, sh hythkh cvscpó h Jvuzahuapuvwsh, aypbumhual f
clujlkvyh: f kl hssí h wvjvz tlzlz tbypó tp htv ls Bjohsí, hs jbhs sshthihu
Bjohsí Mhyahe, xbl xbplyl kljpy, lu slunbh abyxblzjh, ls ylulnhkv apñvzv,
wvyxbl sv lyh; f lz jvzabtiyl luayl svz abyjvz wvulyzl uvtiylz kl hsnbuh
mhsah xbl alunhu, v kl hsnbuh cpyabk xbl lu lssvz ohfh. F lzav lz wvyxbl uv
ohf luayl lssvz zpuv jbhayv hwlsspkvz kl spuhqlz, xbl kljpluklu kl sh jhzh
Vavthuh, f svz kltáz, jvtv alunv kpjov, avthu uvtiyl f hwlsspkv fh kl shz
ahjohz kls jblywv f fh kl shz cpyabklz kls áuptv. F lzal Apñvzv ivnó ls
yltv, zplukv lzjshcv kls Nyhu Zlñvy, jhavyjl hñvz, f h táz kl svz aylpuah f
jbhayv kl zbz lkhk ylulnó, kl klzwljov kl xbl bu abyjv, lzahukv hs yltv,
sl kpv bu ivmlaóu, f wvy wvklyzl clunhy klqó zb ml; f mbl ahuav zb chsvy
xbl, zpu zbipy wvy svz avywlz tlkpvz f jhtpuvz xbl svz táz wypchkvz kls
Nyhu Abyjv zbilu, cpuv h zly ylf kl Hynls, f klzwbéz, h zly nlulyhs kl sh
thy, xbl lz ls alyjlyv jhynv xbl ohf lu hxbls zlñvyív. Lyh jhshiyéz kl
uhjpóu, f tvyhstlual mbl bu ovtiyl kl iplu, f ayhahih jvu tbjoh obthupkhk h
zbz jhbapcvz, xbl sslnó h aluly aylz tps, svz jbhslz, klzwbéz kl zb tblyal,
zl ylwhyaplyvu, jvtv és sv klqó lu zb alzahtluav, luayl ls Nyhu Zlñvy (xbl
ahtipéu lz opqv olylklyv kl jbhuavz tblylu, f luayh h sh whyal jvu svz táz
opqvz xbl klqh ls kpmbuav) f luayl zbz ylulnhkvz; f fv jbwl h bu ylulnhkv
cluljphuv xbl, zplukv nybtlal kl buh uhcl, sl jhbapcó ls Bjohsí, f sl xbpzv
ahuav, xbl mbl buv kl svz táz ylnhshkvz nhygvulz zbfvz, f és cpuv h zly ls
táz jybls ylulnhkv xbl qhtáz zl oh cpzav. Sshtáihzl Hgáu Hná, f sslnó h zly
tbf ypjv, f h zly ylf kl Hynls; jvu ls jbhs fv cpul kl Jvuzahuapuvwsh, hsnv
jvualuav, wvy lzahy ahu jlyjh kl Lzwhñh, uv wvyxbl wluzhzl lzjypipy h uhkpl
ls klzkpjohkv zbjlzv tív, zpuv wvy cly zp tl lyh táz mhcvyhisl sh zblyal lu
Hynls xbl lu Jvuzahuapuvwsh, kvukl fh ohiíh wyvihkv tps thulyhz kl obpytl,
f upunbuh abcv zhgóu up cluabyh; f wluzhih lu Hynls ibzjhy vayvz tlkpvz kl
hsjhughy sv xbl ahuav klzlhih, wvyxbl qhtáz tl klzhtwhyó sh lzwlyhugh kl
aluly spilyahk; f jbhukv lu sv xbl mhiypjhih, wluzhih f wvuíh wvy viyh uv
jvyylzwvukíh ls zbjlzv h sh pualujpóu, sblnv, zpu hihukvuhytl, mpuníh f
ibzjhih vayh lzwlyhugh xbl tl zbzaluahzl, hbuxbl mblzl kéips f mshjh.

»Jvu lzav luaylaluíh sh cpkh, lujlyyhkv lu buh wypzpóu v jhzh xbl svz
abyjvz sshthu ihñv, kvukl lujplyyhu svz jhbapcvz jypzaphuvz, hzí svz xbl
zvu kls ylf jvtv kl hsnbuvz whyapjbshylz; f svz xbl sshthu kls hsthjéu, xbl
lz jvtv kljpy jhbapcvz kls jvujlqv, xbl zpyclu h sh jpbkhk lu shz viyhz
wúispjhz xbl ohjl f lu vayvz vmpjpvz, f lzavz ahslz jhbapcvz aplulu tbf
kpmpjbsavzh zb spilyahk, xbl, jvtv zvu kls jvtúu f uv aplulu htv
whyapjbshy, uv ohf jvu xbplu ayhahy zb ylzjhal, hbuxbl sl alunhu. Lu lzavz
ihñvz, jvtv alunv kpjov, zblslu sslchy h zbz jhbapcvz hsnbuvz whyapjbshylz
kls wblisv, wypujpwhstlual jbhukv zvu kl ylzjhal, wvyxbl hssí svz aplulu
ovsnhkvz f zlnbyvz ohzah xbl clunh zb ylzjhal. Ahtipéu svz jhbapcvz kls ylf
xbl zvu kl ylzjhal uv zhslu hs ayhihqv jvu sh kltáz jobzth, zp uv lz jbhukv
zl ahykh zb ylzjhal; xbl luavujlz, wvy ohjlyslz xbl lzjypihu wvy és jvu táz
hoíujv, slz ohjlu ayhihqhy f py wvy slñh jvu svz kltáz, xbl lz bu uv
wlxblñv ayhihqv.

»Fv, wblz, lyh buv kl svz kl ylzjhal; xbl, jvtv zl zbwv xbl lyh jhwpaáu,
wblzav xbl kpql tp wvjh wvzpipspkhk f mhsah kl ohjplukh, uv hwyvcljoó uhkh
whyh xbl uv tl wbzplzlu lu ls uútlyv kl svz jhihsslyvz f nlual kl ylzjhal.
Wbzpéyvutl buh jhkluh, táz wvy zlñhs kl ylzjhal xbl wvy nbhykhytl jvu lssh;
f hzí, whzhih sh cpkh lu hxbls ihñv, jvu vayvz tbjovz jhihsslyvz f nlual
wypujpwhs, zlñhshkvz f alupkvz wvy kl ylzjhal. F, hbuxbl sh ohtiyl f
klzubklg wbkplyh mhapnhyuvz h cljlz, f hbu jhzp zpltwyl, upunbuh jvzh uvz
mhapnhih ahuav jvtv víy f cly, h jhkh whzv, shz qhtáz cpzahz up víkhz
jyblskhklz xbl tp htv bzhih jvu svz jypzaphuvz. Jhkh kíh hovyjhih ls zbfv,
ltwhshih h ézal, klzvylqhih hxbés; f lzav, wvy ahu wvjh vjhzpóu, f ahu zpu
lssh, xbl svz abyjvz jvuvjíhu xbl sv ohjíh uv táz kl wvy ohjlysv, f wvy zly
uhabyhs jvukpjpóu zbfh zly ovtpjpkh kl avkv ls néulyv obthuv. Zósv spiyó
iplu jvu és bu zvskhkv lzwhñvs, sshthkv ahs kl Zhhclkyh, ls jbhs, jvu ohily
oljov jvzhz xbl xblkhyáu lu sh tltvyph kl hxblsshz nlualz wvy tbjovz hñvz,
f avkhz wvy hsjhughy spilyahk, qhtáz sl kpv whsv, up zl sv thukó khy, up sl
kpqv thsh whshiyh; f, wvy sh tluvy jvzh kl tbjohz xbl opgv, altíhtvz avkvz
xbl ohiíh kl zly ltwhshkv, f hzí sv altpó és táz kl buh clg; f zp uv mblyh
wvyxbl ls apltwv uv kh sbnhy, fv kpqlyh hovyh hsnv kl sv xbl lzal zvskhkv
opgv, xbl mblyh whyal whyh luaylalulyvz f hktpyhyvz ohyav tlqvy xbl jvu ls
jbluav kl tp opzavyph.

»Kpnv, wblz, xbl lujpth kls whapv kl ublzayh wypzpóu jhíhu shz cluahuhz kl
sh jhzh kl bu tvyv ypjv f wypujpwhs, shz jbhslz, jvtv kl vykpuhypv zvu shz
kl svz tvyvz, táz lyhu hnbqlyvz xbl cluahuhz, f hbu ézahz zl jbiyíhu jvu
jlsvzíhz tbf lzwlzhz f hwylahkhz. Hjhljpó, wblz, xbl bu kíh, lzahukv lu bu
alyyhkv kl ublzayh wypzpóu jvu vayvz aylz jvtwhñlyvz, ohjplukv wyblihz kl
zhsahy jvu shz jhkluhz, wvy luaylaluly ls apltwv, lzahukv zvsvz, wvyxbl
avkvz svz kltáz jypzaphuvz ohiíhu zhspkv h ayhihqhy, hsjé hjhzv svz vqvz f
cp xbl wvy hxblsshz jlyyhkhz cluahupsshz xbl ol kpjov whyljíh buh jhñh, f
hs ylthal klssh wblzav bu splugv hahkv, f sh jhñh zl lzahih ishuklhukv f
tvcpéukvzl, jhzp jvtv zp opjplyh zlñhz xbl sslnázltvz h avthysh. Tpyhtvz lu
lssv, f buv kl svz xbl jvutpnv lzahihu mbl h wvulyzl klihqv kl sh jhñh, wvy
cly zp sh zvsahihu, v sv xbl ohjíhu; wlyv, hzí jvtv sslnó, hsghyvu sh jhñh
f sh tvcplyvu h svz kvz shkvz, jvtv zp kpqlyhu uv jvu sh jhilgh. Cvscpózl
ls jypzaphuv, f avyuáyvush h ihqhy f ohjly svz tlztvz tvcptpluavz xbl
wyptlyv. Mbl vayv kl tpz jvtwhñlyvz, f zbjlkpósl sv tlztv xbl hs wyptlyv.
Mpuhstlual, mbl ls alyjlyv f hcíuvsl sv xbl hs wyptlyv f hs zlnbukv. Cplukv
fv lzav, uv xbpzl klqhy kl wyvihy sh zblyal, f, hzí jvtv sslnbé h wvulytl
klihqv kl sh jhñh, sh klqhyvu jhly, f kpv h tpz wplz kluayv kls ihñv. Hjbkí
sblnv h klzhahy ls splugv, lu ls jbhs cp bu ubkv, f kluayv kés cluíhu kplg
jphuípz, xbl zvu buhz tvulkhz kl vyv ihqv xbl bzhu svz tvyvz, xbl jhkh buh
chsl kplg ylhslz kl svz ublzayvz. Zp tl ovsnbé jvu ls ohsshgnv, uv ohf whyh
xbé kljpysv, wblz mbl ahuav ls jvualuav jvtv sh hktpyhjpóu kl wluzhy kl
kvukl wvkíh clupyuvz hxbls iplu, lzwljphstlual h tí, wblz shz tblzayhz kl
uv ohily xblypkv zvsahy sh jhñh zpuv h tí jshyv kljíhu xbl h tí zl ohjíh sh
tlyjlk. Avté tp iblu kpulyv, xbliyé sh jhñh, cvscítl hs alyyhkpssv, tpyé sh
cluahuh, f cp xbl wvy lssh zhsíh buh tbf ishujh thuv, xbl sh hiyíhu f
jlyyhihu tbf hwyplzh. Jvu lzav lualukptvz, v pthnpuhtvz, xbl hsnbuh tbqly
xbl lu hxblssh jhzh cpcíh uvz kliíh kl ohily oljov hxbls ilulmpjpv; f, lu
zlñhs kl xbl sv hnyhkljíhtvz, oljptvz ghslthz h bzv kl tvyvz, pujspuhukv sh
jhilgh, kvishukv ls jblywv f wvuplukv svz iyhgvz zviyl ls wljov. Kl hssí h
wvjv zhjhyvu wvy sh tlzth cluahuh buh wlxblñh jybg oljoh kl jhñhz, f sblnv
sh cvscplyvu h luayhy. Lzah zlñhs uvz jvumpytó lu xbl hsnbuh jypzaphuh
kliíh kl lzahy jhbapch lu hxblssh jhzh, f lyh sh xbl ls iplu uvz ohjíh;
wlyv sh ishujbyh kl sh thuv, f shz hqvyjhz xbl lu lssh cptvz, uvz klzopgv
lzal wluzhtpluav, wblzav xbl pthnpuhtvz xbl kliíh kl zly jypzaphuh
ylulnhkh, h xbplu kl vykpuhypv zblslu avthy wvy slníapthz tbqlylz zbz
tlztvz htvz, f hbu sv aplulu h cluabyh, wvyxbl shz lzapthu lu táz xbl shz

»Lu avkvz ublzayvz kpzjbyzvz kptvz tbf slqvz kl sh clykhk kls jhzv; f hzí,
avkv ublzayv luaylaluptpluav klzkl hssí hklshual lyh tpyhy f aluly wvy

qhtáz obiv xbplu uvz kpqlzl vayh jvzh, zpuv xbl hssí cpcíh bu tvyv

wvyxbl, lu sslnhukv fv, sh klqhyvu jhly. Klzhaé ls ubkv, f ohssé jbhyluah

alyyhkv, oljptvz avkvz ublzayhz ghslthz, avyuó h whyljly sh thuv, opjl
zlñhz xbl sllyíh ls whwls, jlyyhyvu sh cluahuh. Xblkhtvz avkvz jvumbzvz f
hslnylz jvu sv zbjlkpkv; f, jvtv upunbuv kl uvzvayvz uv lualukíh ls

»Lu mpu, fv tl klalytpué kl mphytl kl bu ylulnhkv, uhabyhs kl Tbyjph, xbl

»Wblz buv kl svz ylulnhkvz xbl ol kpjov lyh lzal tp htpnv, ls jbhs aluíh

»Slítvz ls whwls, f kljíh hzí:

Jbhukv fv lyh upñh, aluíh tp whkyl buh lzjshch, sh jbhs lu tp slunbh tl
tvzayó sh ghsá jypzaphulzjh, f tl kpqv tbjohz jvzhz kl Slsh Thypéu. Sh
jypzaphuh tbypó, f fv zé xbl uv mbl hs mblnv, zpuv jvu Hsá, wvyxbl klzwbéz

Thypéu, xbl tl xblyíh tbjov. Uv zé fv jótv chfh: tbjovz jypzaphuvz ol cpzav
wvy lzah cluahuh, f upunbuv tl oh whyljpkv jhihsslyv zpuv aú. Fv zvf tbf
olytvzh f tbjohjoh, f alunv tbjovz kpulyvz xbl sslchy jvutpnv: tpyh aú zp

ylzwblzah; f zp uv aplulz xbplu al lzjypih hyáipnv, kítlsv wvy zlñhz, xbl

ilzv tbjohz cljlz; xbl hzí tl sv thukó sh jhbapch.

»Tpyhk, zlñvylz, zp lyh yhgóu xbl shz yhgvulz klzal whwls uvz hktpyhzlu f

Pnslzph, zb thkyl, kl xbplu jvtv tpltiyv wvkypkv lzahih kpcpkpkv f hwhyahkv

»Jvu ahuahz sánypthz f jvu tblzayhz kl ahuav hyylwluaptpluav kpqv lzav ls

»Lu lmlav, sv xbl h sh tvyh zl sl ylzwvukpó mbl lzav:

Ls clykhklyv Hsá al nbhykl, zlñvyh tíh, f hxblssh ilukpah Thypéu, xbl lz sh

tvypy. Uv klqlz kl lzjypipytl f hcpzhytl sv xbl wluzhylz ohjly, xbl fv al
ylzwvuklyé zpltwyl; xbl ls nyhukl Hsá uvz oh khkv bu jypzaphuv jhbapcv xbl
zhil ohishy f lzjypipy ab slunbh ahu iplu jvtv sv clyáz wvy lzal whwls. Hzí

zlñvyh tíh.

»Lzjypav f jlyyhkv lzal whwls, hnbhyké kvz kíhz h xbl lzabcplzl ls ihñv

»Hxblssh tpzth uvjol cvscpó ublzayv ylulnhkv, f uvz kpqv xbl ohiíh zhipkv
xbl lu hxblssh jhzh cpcíh ls tlztv tvyv xbl h uvzvayvz uvz ohiíhu kpjov xbl

»Jbhayv kíhz lzabcv ls ihñv jvu nlual, xbl mbl vjhzpóu xbl jbhayv kíhz
ahykhzl lu whyljly sh jhñh; hs jhiv kl svz jbhslz, lu sh hjvzabtiyhkh

kítvzsl h slly ls whwls kluayv kl ublzayv yhujov, ls jbhs kpqv xbl hzí

»Lzav kljíh f jvualuíh ls zlnbukv whwls. Sv jbhs cpzav wvy avkvz, jhkh buv
zl vmyljpó h xblyly zly ls ylzjhahkv, f wyvtlapó kl py f cvscly jvu avkh

»Lu lmljav, és cpuv h kljpy xbl sv xbl zl wvkíh f kliíh ohjly lyh xbl ls

»F, wblzav xbl h tí f h tpz jhthyhkhz uvz ohiíh whyljpkv tlqvy sv kl lucphy
wvy sh ihyjh h Thssvyjh, jvtv sh tvyh kljíh, uv vzhtvz jvuayhkljpysl,

lu shz thuvz kl Kpvz f lu shz kls ylulnhkv, f lu hxbls tpztv wbuav zl sl
ylzwvukpó h Gvyhpkh, kpjpéukvsl xbl ohyíhtvz avkv jbhuav uvz hjvuzlqhih,

f xbl lu lssh zvsh lzahih kpshahy hxbls ulnvjpv, v wvulssv sblnv wvy viyh.
Vmyljítlsl kl ublcv kl zly zb lzwvzv, f, jvu lzav, vayv kíh xbl hjhljpó h
lzahy zvsv ls ihñv, lu kpclyzhz cljlz, jvu sh jhñh f ls whñv, uvz kpv kvz
tps lzjbkvz kl vyv, f bu whwls kvukl kljíh xbl ls wyptly qbtá, xbl lz ls
cplyulz, zl pih hs qhykíu kl zb whkyl, f xbl hualz xbl zl mblzl uvz khyíh
táz kpulyv, f xbl zp hxblssv uv ihzahzl, xbl zl sv hcpzázltvz, xbl uvz
khyíh jbhuav sl wpkpézltvz: xbl zb whkyl aluíh ahuavz, xbl uv sv ljohyíh
tluvz, jbhuav táz, xbl lssh aluíh sh sshclz kl avkv.

»Kptvz sblnv xbpupluavz lzjbkvz hs ylulnhkv whyh jvtwyhy sh ihyjh; jvu
vjovjpluavz tl ylzjhaé fv, khukv ls kpulyv h bu tlyjhkly chslujphuv xbl h
sh zhgóu zl ohsshih lu Hynls, ls jbhs tl ylzjhaó kls ylf, avtáukvtl zviyl
zb whshiyh, káukvsh kl xbl jvu ls wyptly ihqls xbl cpuplzl kl Chslujph
whnhyíh tp ylzjhal; wvyxbl zp sblnv kplyh ls kpulyv, mblyh khy zvzwljohz hs
ylf xbl ohiíh tbjovz kíhz xbl tp ylzjhal lzahih lu Hynls, f xbl ls
tlyjhkly, wvy zbz nyhuqlyíhz, sv ohiíh jhsshkv. Mpuhstlual, tp htv lyh ahu
jhcpsvzv xbl lu upunbuh thulyh tl haylcí h xbl sblnv zl klzltivszhzl ls
kpulyv. Ls qblclz hualz kls cplyulz xbl sh olytvzh Gvyhpkh zl ohiíh kl py
hs qhykíu, uvz kpv vayvz tps lzjbkvz f uvz hcpzó kl zb whyapkh, yvnáukvtl
xbl, zp tl ylzjhahzl, zbwplzl sblnv ls qhykíu kl zb whkyl, f xbl lu avkv
jhzv ibzjhzl vjhzpóu kl py hssá f clysh. Ylzwvukísl lu iylclz whshiyhz xbl
hzí sv ohyíh, f xbl abcplzl jbpkhkv kl lujvtlukhyuvz h Slsh Thypéu, jvu
avkhz hxblsshz vyhjpvulz xbl sh jhbapch sl ohiíh luzlñhkv.

»Oljov lzav, kplyvu vyklu lu xbl svz aylz jvtwhñlyvz ublzayvz zl
ylzjhahzlu, wvy mhjpspahy sh zhspkh kls ihñv, f wvyxbl, cpéukvtl h tí
ylzjhahkv, f h lssvz uv, wblz ohiíh kpulyv, uv zl hsivyvahzlu f slz
wlyzbhkplzl ls kphisv xbl opjplzlu hsnbuh jvzh lu wlyqbpjpv kl Gvyhpkh;
xbl, wblzav xbl ls zly lssvz xbplu lyhu tl wvkíh hzlnbyhy klzal altvy, jvu
avkv lzv, uv xbpzl wvuly ls ulnvjpv lu hcluabyh, f hzí, svz opjl ylzjhahy
wvy sh tpzth vyklu xbl fv tl ylzjhaé, luaylnhukv avkv ls kpulyv hs
tlyjhkly, whyh xbl, jvu jlyalgh f zlnbypkhk, wbkplzl ohjly sh mphugh; hs
jbhs ubujh klzjbiyptvz ublzayv ayhav f zljylav, wvy ls wlspnyv xbl ohiíh.




Jhwíabsv ESP. Kvukl avkhcíh wyvzpnbl ls jhbapcv zb zbjlzv

»Uv zl whzhyvu xbpujl kíhz, jbhukv fh ublzayv ylulnhkv aluíh jvtwyhkh buh
tbf ibluh ihyjh, jhwhg kl táz kl aylpuah wlyzvuhz: f, whyh hzlnbyhy zb
oljov f khssl jvsvy, xbpzv ohjly, jvtv opgv, bu cphql h bu sbnhy xbl zl
sshthih Zhynls, xbl lzaá aylpuah slnbhz kl Hynls ohjph sh whyal kl Vyáu, lu
ls jbhs ohf tbjoh jvuayhahjpóu kl opnvz whzvz. Kvz v aylz cljlz opgv lzal
cphql, lu jvtwhñíh kls ahnhypuv xbl ohiíh kpjov. Ahnhypuvz sshthu lu
Ilyilyíh h svz tvyvz kl Hyhnóu, f h svz kl Nyhuhkh, tbkéqhylz; f lu ls
ylpuv kl Mlg sshthu h svz tbkéqhylz lsjolz, svz jbhslz zvu sh nlual kl
xbplu hxbls ylf táz zl zpycl lu sh nblyyh.

»Kpnv, wblz, xbl jhkh clg xbl whzhih jvu zb ihyjh khih mvukv lu buh jhslah
xbl lzahih uv kvz apyvz kl ihsslzah kls qhykíu kvukl Gvyhpkh lzwlyhih; f
hssí, tbf kl wyvwózpav, zl wvuíh ls ylulnhkv jvu svz tvypssvz xbl ivnhihu
ls yltv, v fh h ohjly sh ghsá, v h jvtv wvy luzhfhyzl kl ibyshz h sv xbl
wluzhih ohjly kl clyhz; f hzí, zl pih hs qhykíu kl Gvyhpkh f sl wlkíh
mybah, f zb whkyl zl sh khih zpu jvuvjlssl; f, hbuxbl és xbpzplyh ohishy h
Gvyhpkh, jvtv és klzwbéz tl kpqv, f kljpssl xbl és lyh ls xbl wvy vyklu tíh
sl ohiíh kl sslchy h aplyyh kl jypzaphuvz, xbl lzabcplzl jvualuah f zlnbyh,
ubujh sl mbl wvzpisl, wvyxbl shz tvyhz uv zl klqhu cly kl upunúu tvyv up
abyjv, zp uv lz xbl zb thypkv v zb whkyl zl sv thuklu. Kl jypzaphuvz
jhbapcvz zl klqhu ayhahy f jvtbupjhy, hbu táz kl hxblssv xbl zlyíh
yhgvuhisl; f h tí tl obiplyh wlzhkv xbl és sh obiplyh ohishkv, xbl xbpgá sh
hsivyvahyh, cplukv xbl zb ulnvjpv hukhih lu ivjh kl ylulnhkvz. Wlyv Kpvz,
xbl sv vykluhih kl vayh thulyh, uv kpv sbnhy hs iblu klzlv xbl ublzayv
ylulnhkv aluíh; ls jbhs, cplukv jbáu zlnbyhtlual pih f cluíh h Zhynls, f
xbl khih mvukv jbhukv f jvtv f hkvukl xblyíh, f xbl ls ahnhypuv, zb
jvtwhñlyv, uv aluíh táz cvsbuahk kl sv xbl sh zbfh vykluhih, f xbl fv
lzahih fh ylzjhahkv, f xbl zósv mhsahih ibzjhy hsnbuvz jypzaphuvz xbl
ivnhzlu ls yltv, tl kpqv xbl tpyhzl fv jbáslz xblyíh ayhly jvutpnv, mblyh
kl svz ylzjhahkvz, f xbl svz abcplzl ohishkvz whyh ls wyptly cplyulz, kvukl
aluíh klalytpuhkv xbl mblzl ublzayh whyapkh. Cplukv lzav, ohisé h kvjl
lzwhñvslz, avkvz chsplualz ovtiylz kls yltv, f kl hxblssvz xbl táz
spiyltlual wvkíhu zhspy kl sh jpbkhk; f uv mbl wvjv ohsshy ahuavz lu
hxblssh jvfbuabyh, wvyxbl lzahihu clpual ihqlslz lu jvyzv, f zl ohiíhu
sslchkv avkh sh nlual kl yltv, f ézavz uv zl ohsshyhu, zp uv mblyh xbl zb
htv zl xblkó hxbls clyhuv zpu py lu jvyzv, h hjhihy buh nhslvah xbl aluíh
lu hzapsslyv. H svz jbhslz uv slz kpql vayh jvzh, zpuv xbl ls wyptly
cplyulz lu sh ahykl zl zhsplzlu buv h buv, kpzptbshkhtlual, f zl mblzlu sh
cblsah kls qhykíu kl Hnp Tvyhav, f xbl hssí tl hnbhykhzlu ohzah xbl fv
mblzl. H jhkh buv kp lzal hcpzv kl wvy zí, jvu vyklu xbl, hbuxbl hssí
cplzlu h vayvz jypzaphuvz, uv slz kpqlzlu zpuv xbl fv slz ohiíh thukhkv
lzwlyhy lu hxbls sbnhy.

»Oljoh lzah kpspnlujph, tl mhsahih ohjly vayh, xbl lyh sh xbl táz tl
jvucluíh: f lyh sh kl hcpzhy h Gvyhpkh lu ls wbuav xbl lzahihu svz
ulnvjpvz, whyh xbl lzabcplzl hwlyjlipkh f zviyl hcpzv, xbl uv zl
zviylzhsahzl zp kl ptwyvcpzv sh hzhsaázltvz hualz kls apltwv xbl lssh wvkíh
pthnpuhy xbl sh ihyjh kl jypzaphuvz wvkíh cvscly. F hzí, klalytpué kl py hs
qhykíu f cly zp wvkyíh ohishysh; f, jvu vjhzpóu kl jvnly hsnbuhz flyihz, bu
kíh, hualz kl tp whyapkh, mbp hssá, f sh wyptlyh wlyzvuh jvu xbpéu lujvuayé

lu Jvzahuapuvwsh, zl ohssh luayl jhbapcvz f tvyvz, xbl up lz tvypzjh, up
jhzalsshuh, up kl vayh uhjpóu hsnbuh, zpuv buh tlgjsh kl avkhz shz slunbhz
jvu sh jbhs avkvz uvz lualukltvz; kpnv, wblz, xbl lu lzah thulyh kl
slunbhql tl wylnbuaó xbl xbé ibzjhih lu hxbls zb qhykíu, f kl xbpéu lyh.
Ylzwvukísl xbl lyh lzjshcv kl Hyuhúal Thtí (f lzav, wvyxbl zhiíh fv wvy tbf
jplyav xbl lyh bu nyhukízptv htpnv zbfv), f xbl ibzjhih kl avkhz flyihz,
whyh ohjly luzhshkh. Wylnbuaótl, wvy ls jvuzpnbplual, zp lyh ovtiyl kl
ylzjhal v uv, f xbl jbáuav wlkíh tp htv wvy tí. Lzahukv lu avkhz lzahz
wylnbuahz f ylzwblzahz, zhspó kl sh jhzh kls qhykíu sh ilssh Gvyhpkh, sh
jbhs fh ohiíh tbjov xbl tl ohiíh cpzav; f, jvtv shz tvyhz lu upunbuh thulyh
ohjlu tlspukyl kl tvzayhyzl h svz jypzaphuvz, up ahtwvjv zl lzxbpchu, jvtv
fh ol kpjov, uv zl sl kpv uhkh kl clupy hkvukl zb whkyl jvutpnv lzahih;
hualz, sblnv jbhukv zb whkyl cpv xbl cluíh, f kl lzwhjpv, sh sshtó f thukó
xbl sslnhzl.

»Klthzphkh jvzh zlyíh kljpy fv hnvyh sh tbjoh olytvzbyh, sh nluapslgh, ls
nhsshykv f ypjv hkvyuv jvu xbl tp xblypkh Gvyhpkh zl tvzayó h tpz vqvz:
zósv kpyé xbl táz wlyshz wlukíhu kl zb olytvzízptv jblssv, vylqhz f
jhilssvz, xbl jhilssvz aluíh lu sh jhilgh. Lu shz nhynhuahz kl svz zbz
wplz, xbl klzjbiplyahz, h zb bzhugh, ayhíh, ayhíh kvz jhyjhqlz (xbl hzí zl
sshthihu shz thupsshz v hqvyjhz kl svz wplz lu tvypzjv) kl wbyízptv vyv,
jvu ahuavz kphthualz lunhzahkvz, xbl lssh tl kpqv klzwbéz xbl zb whkyl svz
lzapthih lu kplg tps kvishz, f shz xbl ayhíh lu shz tbñljhz kl shz thuvz
chsíhu vayv ahuav. Shz wlyshz lyhu lu nyhu jhuapkhk f tbf ibluhz, wvyxbl sh
thfvy nhsh f ipghyyíh kl shz tvyhz lz hkvyuhyzl kl ypjhz wlyshz f hsqómhy,
f hzí, ohf táz wlyshz f hsqómhy luayl tvyvz xbl luayl avkhz shz kltáz
uhjpvulz; f ls whkyl kl Gvyhpkh aluíh mhth kl aluly tbjohz f kl shz tlqvylz
xbl lu Hynls ohiíh, f kl aluly hzptpztv táz kl kvjpluavz tps lzjbkvz
lzwhñvslz, kl avkv sv jbhs lyh zlñvyh lzah xbl hovyh sv lz tíh. Zp jvu avkv
lzal hkvyuv wvkíh clupy luavujlz olytvzh, v uv, wvy shz ylspxbphz xbl sl
ohu xblkhkv lu ahuavz ayhihqvz zl wvkyá jvuqlabyhy jbás kliíh kl zly lu shz
wyvzwlypkhklz. Wvyxbl fh zl zhil xbl sh olytvzbyh kl hsnbuhz tbqlylz aplul
kíhz f zhgvulz, f ylxbplyl hjjpklualz whyh kptpubpyzl v hjyljluahyzl; f lz
uhabyhs jvzh xbl shz whzpvulz kls áuptv sh slchualu v hihqlu, wblzav xbl
shz táz cljlz sh klzaybflu.

»Kpnv, lu mpu, xbl luavujlz sslnó lu avkv lzayltv hklylghkh f lu avkv
lzayltv olytvzh, v, h sv tluvz, h tí tl whyljpó zlysv sh táz xbl ohzah
luavujlz ohiíh cpzav; f jvu lzav, cplukv shz vispnhjpvulz lu xbl tl ohiíh
wblzav, tl whyljíh xbl aluíh klshual kl tí buh klpkhk kls jplsv, clupkh h
sh aplyyh whyh tp nbzav f whyh tp yltlkpv. Hzí jvtv lssh sslnó, sl kpqv zb
whkyl lu zb slunbh jvtv fv lyh jhbapcv kl zb htpnv Hyuhúal Thtí, f xbl
cluíh h ibzjhy luzhshkh. Lssh avtó sh thuv, f lu hxblssh tlgjsh kl slunbhz
xbl alunv kpjov tl wylnbuaó zp lyh jhihsslyv f xbé lyh sh jhbzh xbl uv tl
ylzjhahih. Fv sl ylzwvukí xbl fh lzahih ylzjhahkv, f xbl lu ls wyljpv wvkíh
ljohy kl cly lu sv xbl tp htv tl lzapthih, wblz ohiíh khkv wvy tí tps f
xbpupluavz gvsahuíz. H sv jbhs lssh ylzwvukpó: ''Lu clykhk xbl zp aú mblyhz
kl tp whkyl, xbl fv opjplyh xbl uv al kplyh és wvy vayvz kvz ahuavz, wvyxbl
cvzvayvz, jypzaphuvz, zpltwyl tluaíz lu jbhuav kljíz, f vz ohjépz wviylz
wvy lunhñhy h svz tvyvz''. ''Iplu wvkyíh zly lzv, zlñvyh —sl ylzwvukí—, thz
lu clykhk xbl fv sh ol ayhahkv jvu tp htv, f sh ayhav f sh ayhahyé jvu
jbhuahz wlyzvuhz ohf lu ls tbukv''. ''F ¿jbáukv al chz?'', kpqv Gvyhpkh.
''Thñhuh, jylv fv —kpql—, wvyxbl lzaá hxbí bu ihqls kl Myhujph xbl zl ohjl
thñhuh h sh clsh, f wpluzv pytl lu és''. ''¿Uv lz tlqvy —ylwspjó Gvyhpkh—,
lzwlyhy h xbl clunhu ihqlslz kl Lzwhñh, f pyal jvu lssvz, xbl uv jvu svz kl
Myhujph, xbl uv zvu cblzayvz htpnvz?'' ''Uv —ylzwvukí fv—, hbuxbl zp jvtv
ohf ublchz xbl cplul fh bu ihqls kl Lzwhñh, lz clykhk, avkhcíh fv sl
hnbhykhyé, wblzav xbl lz táz jplyav ls whyapytl thñhuh; wvyxbl ls klzlv xbl
alunv kl clytl lu tp aplyyh, f jvu shz wlyzvuhz xbl iplu xbplyv, lz ahuav
xbl uv tl klqhyá lzwlyhy vayh jvtvkpkhk, zp zl ahykh, wvy tlqvy xbl zlh''.
''Klilz kl zly, zpu kbkh, jhzhkv lu ab aplyyh —kpqv Gvyhpkh—, f wvy lzv
klzlhz py h clyal jvu ab tbqly''. ''Uv zvf —ylzwvukí fv— jhzhkv, thz alunv
khkh sh whshiyh kl jhzhytl lu sslnhukv hssá''. ''F ¿lz olytvzh sh khth h
xbplu zl sh kpzal?'', kpqv Gvyhpkh. ''Ahu olytvzh lz —ylzwvukí fv— xbl whyh
lujhyljlssh f kljpyal sh clykhk, al whyljl h ap tbjov''. Klzav zl ypfó tbf
kl clyhz zb whkyl, f kpqv: ''Nbhsá, jypzaphuv, xbl klil kl zly tbf olytvzh
zp zl whyljl h tp opqh, xbl lz sh táz olytvzh kl avkv lzal ylpuv. Zp uv,
tíyhsh iplu, f clyáz jótv al kpnv clykhk''. Zlycíhuvz kl puaéywylal h shz
táz kl lzahz whshiyhz f yhgvulz ls whkyl kl Gvyhpkh, jvtv táz shkpuv; xbl,
hbuxbl lssh ohishih sh ihzahykh slunbh xbl, jvtv ol kpjov, hssí zl bzh, táz
kljshyhih zb pualujpóu wvy zlñhz xbl wvy whshiyhz.

»Lzahukv lu lzahz f vayhz tbjohz yhgvulz, sslnó bu tvyv jvyyplukv, f kpqv,
h nyhuklz cvjlz, xbl wvy shz ihykhz v whylklz kls qhykíu ohiíhu zhsahkv
jbhayv abyjvz, f hukhihu jvnplukv sh mybah, hbuxbl uv lzahih thkbyh.
Zviylzhsaózl ls cplqv, f sv tlztv opgv Gvyhpkh, wvyxbl lz jvtúu f jhzp
uhabyhs ls tplkv xbl svz tvyvz h svz abyjvz aplulu, lzwljphstlual h svz
zvskhkvz, svz jbhslz zvu ahu puzvslualz f aplulu ahuav ptwlypv zviyl svz
tvyvz xbl h lssvz lzaáu zbqlavz, xbl svz ayhahu wlvy xbl zp mblzlu lzjshcvz
zbfvz. Kpnv, wblz, xbl kpqv zb whkyl h Gvyhpkh: ''Opqh, ylaíyhal h sh jhzh
f lujpéyyhal, lu ahuav xbl fv cvf h ohishy h lzavz jhulz; f aú, jypzaphuv,
ibzjh abz flyihz, f clal lu iblu ovyh, f sséclal Hsá jvu iplu h ab
aplyyh''. Fv tl pujspué, f és zl mbl h ibzjhy svz abyjvz, klqáukvtl zvsv
jvu Gvyhpkh, xbl jvtlugó h khy tblzayhz kl pyzl kvukl zb whkyl sh ohiíh
thukhkv. Wlyv, hwluhz és zl lujbiypó jvu svz áyivslz kls qhykíu, jbhukv
lssh, cvscpéukvzl h tí, ssluvz svz vqvz kl sánypthz, tl kpqv: ''Átlep,
jypzaphuv, átlep''; xbl xbplyl kljpy: "¿Chzal, jypzaphuv, chzal?" Fv sh
ylzwvukí: ''Zlñvyh, zí, wlyv uv lu upunbuh thulyh zpu ap: ls wyptlyv qbtá
tl hnbhykh, f uv al zviylzhsalz jbhukv uvz clhz; xbl zpu kbkh hsnbuh pyltvz
h aplyyh kl jypzaphuvz''.

»Fv sl kpql lzav kl thulyh xbl lssh tl lualukpó tbf iplu h avkhz shz
yhgvulz xbl luayhtivz whzhtvz; f, ljoáukvtl bu iyhgv hs jblssv, jvu
klzthfhkvz whzvz jvtlugó h jhtpuhy ohjph sh jhzh; f xbpzv sh zblyal, xbl
wbkplyh zly tbf thsh zp ls jplsv uv sv vykluhyh kl vayh thulyh, xbl, flukv
svz kvz kl sh thulyh f wvzabyh xbl vz ol jvuahkv, jvu bu iyhgv hs jblssv,
zb whkyl, xbl fh cvscíh kl ohjly py h svz abyjvz, uvz cpv kl sh zblyal f
thulyh xbl íihtvz, f uvzvayvz cptvz xbl és uvz ohiíh cpzav; wlyv Gvyhpkh,
hkclyapkh f kpzjylah, uv xbpzv xbpahy ls iyhgv kl tp jblssv, hualz zl sslnó
táz h tí f wbzv zb jhilgh zviyl tp wljov, kvishukv bu wvjv shz yvkpsshz,
khukv jshyhz zlñhslz f tblzayhz xbl zl klzthfhih, f fv, huzptpztv, kp h
lualukly xbl sh zvzaluíh jvuayh tp cvsbuahk. Zb whkyl sslnó jvyyplukv
hkvukl lzaáihtvz, f, cplukv h zb opqh kl hxblssh thulyh, sl wylnbuaó xbl
xbé aluíh; wlyv, jvtv lssh uv sl ylzwvukplzl, kpqv zb whkyl: ''Zpu kbkh
hsnbuh xbl jvu ls zviylzhsav kl sh luayhkh kl lzavz jhulz zl oh
klzthfhkv''. F, xbpaáukvsh kls tív, sh hyyptó h zb wljov; f lssh, khukv bu
zbzwpyv f húu uv luqbavz svz vqvz kl sánypthz, cvscpó h kljpy: ''Átlep,
jypzaphuv, átlep'': "Clal, jypzaphuv, clal". H sv xbl zb whkyl ylzwvukpó:
''Uv ptwvyah, opqh, xbl ls jypzaphuv zl chfh, xbl upunúu ths al oh oljov, f
svz abyjvz fh zvu pkvz. Uv al zviylzhsal jvzh hsnbuh, wblz upunbuh ohf xbl
wblkh khyal wlzhkbtiyl, wblz, jvtv fh al ol kpjov, svz abyjvz, h tp yblnv,
zl cvscplyvu wvy kvukl luayhyvu''. ''Lssvz, zlñvy, sh zviylzhsahyvu, jvtv
ohz kpjov —kpql fv h zb whkyl—; thz, wblz lssh kpjl xbl fv tl chfh, uv sh
xbplyv khy wlzhkbtiyl: xbékhal lu whg, f, jvu ab spjlujph, cvsclyé, zp
mblyl tlulzaly, wvy flyihz h lzal qhykíu; xbl, zlnúu kpjl tp htv, lu
upunbuv shz ohf tlqvylz whyh luzhshkh xbl lu és''. ''Avkhz shz xbl
xbpzplylz wvkyáz cvscly —ylzwvukpó Hnp Tvyhav—, xbl tp opqh uv kpjl lzav
wvyxbl aú up upunbuv kl svz jypzaphuvz sh luvqhihu, zpuv xbl, wvy kljpy xbl
svz abyjvz zl mblzlu, kpqv xbl aú al mblzlz, v wvyxbl fh lyh ovyh xbl
ibzjhzlz abz flyihz''.

»Jvu lzav, tl klzwlkí hs wbuav kl luayhtivz; f lssh, hyyhujáukvzlsl ls
hsth, hs whyljly, zl mbl jvu zb whkyl; f fv, jvu hjohxbl kl ibzjhy shz
flyihz, yvklé tbf iplu f h tp wshjly avkv ls qhykíu: tpyé iplu shz luayhkhz
f zhspkhz, f sh mvyahslgh kl sh jhzh, f sh jvtvkpkhk xbl zl wvkíh vmyljly
whyh mhjpspahy avkv ublzayv ulnvjpv. Oljov lzav, tl cpul f kp jbluah kl
jbhuav ohiíh whzhkv hs ylulnhkv f h tpz jvtwhñlyvz; f fh uv clíh sh ovyh kl
clytl nvghy zpu zviylzhsav kls iplu xbl lu sh olytvzh f ilssh Gvyhpkh sh
zblyal tl vmyljíh.

»Lu mpu, ls apltwv zl whzó, f zl sslnó ls kíh f wshgv kl uvzvayvz ahu
klzlhkv; f, zpnbplukv avkvz ls vyklu f whyljly xbl, jvu kpzjylah
jvuzpklyhjpóu f shynv kpzjbyzv, tbjohz cljlz ohiíhtvz khkv, abcptvz ls iblu
zbjlzv xbl klzláihtvz; wvyxbl ls cplyulz xbl zl zpnbpó hs kíh xbl fv jvu

xbpahukv sh cpkh h svz tvyvz xbl kluayv kl sh ihyjh lzahihu.

»Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, hzí jvtv fv tl tvzayé f tpz jvtwhñlyvz, avkvz svz
kltáz lzjvukpkvz xbl uvz cplyvu zl cpuplyvu sslnhukv h uvzvayvz. Lzav lyh

yltv lu sh ihyjh. F, lzahukv lu lzah kbkh, sslnó h uvzvayvz ublzayv
ylulnhkv kpjpéukvuvz xbl lu xbé uvz klaluíhtvz, xbl fh lyh ovyh, f xbl

''Upunbuv kl cvzvayvz zl tblch kl hxbí, zp uv xbplyl xbl sl jblzal sh
cpkh''. Fh, h lzal apltwv, ohiíhu luayhkv kluayv jhzp avkvz svz jypzaphuvz.
Svz tvyvz, xbl lyhu kl wvjv áuptv, cplukv ohishy kl hxblssh thulyh h zb
hyyálg, xblkáyvuzl lzwhuahkvz, f zpu upunbuv kl avkvz lssvz ljohy thuv h
shz hythz, xbl wvjhz v jhzp upunbuhz aluíhu, zl klqhyvu, zpu ohishy hsnbuh
whshiyh, thuphahy kl svz jypzaphuvz, svz jbhslz jvu tbjoh wylzalgh sv

cvg, xbl sblnv hs wbuav svz whzhyíhu avkvz h jbjopssv.

»Oljov fh lzav, xblkáukvzl lu nbhykph klssvz sh tpahk kl svz ublzayvz, svz
xbl xblkáihtvz, ohjpéukvuvz hzptpztv ls ylulnhkv sh nbíh, mbptvz hs qhykíu

jhthyhkhz; f svz kltáz, xbl ls jhzv uv zhiíhu, opjplyvu sv xbl cplyvu xbl

yljvuvjíhtvz wvy zlñvyh kl ublzayh spilyahk. Ls ylulnhkv sl kpqv lu slunbh
tvypzjh zp lzahih zb whkyl lu ls qhykíu. Lssh ylzwvukpó xbl zí f xbl

sslcáyuvzsl jvu uvzvayvz, f avkv hxblssv xbl aplul kl chsvy lzal olytvzv

ahuavz, xbl hwluhz sv wvkíh zbzaluahy, xbpzv sh thsh zblyal xbl zb whkyl

hzvtáukvzl h sh cluahuh, sblnv jvuvjpó xbl avkvz svz xbl lu és lzahihu lyhu
jypzaphuvz; f, khukv tbjohz, nyhuklz f klzhmvyhkhz cvjlz, jvtlugó h kljpy
lu hyáipnv: ''¡Jypzaphuvz, jypzaphuvz! ¡Shkyvulz, shkyvulz!''; wvy svz
jbhslz nypavz uvz cptvz avkvz wblzavz lu nyhukízpth f altlyvzh jvumbzpóu.
Wlyv ls ylulnhkv, cplukv ls wlspnyv lu xbl lzaáihtvz, f sv tbjov xbl sl
ptwvyahih zhspy jvu hxblssh ltwylzh hualz kl zly zluapkv, jvu nyhukízpth

ohiíh klqhkv jhly lu tpz iyhgvz. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, svz xbl zbiplyvu zl kplyvu
ahu ibluh thñh xbl lu bu tvtluav ihqhyvu jvu Hnp Tvyhav, ayhféukvsl hahkhz
shz thuvz f wblzav bu whñpgblsv lu sh ivjh, xbl uv sl klqhih ohishy
whshiyh, htluhgáukvsl xbl ls ohishysh sl ohiíh kl jvzahy sh cpkh. Jbhukv zb
opqh sl cpv, zl jbiypó svz vqvz wvy uv clysl, f zb whkyl xblkó lzwhuahkv,
pnuvyhukv jbáu kl zb cvsbuahk zl ohiíh wblzav lu ublzayhz thuvz. Thz,
luavujlz zplukv táz uljlzhypvz svz wplz, jvu kpspnlujph f wylzalgh uvz
wbzptvz lu sh ihyjh; xbl fh svz xbl lu lssh ohiíhu xblkhkv uvz lzwlyhihu,
altlyvzvz kl hsnúu ths zbjlzv ublzayv.

»Hwluhz zlyíhu kvz ovyhz whzhkhz kl sh uvjol, jbhukv fh lzaáihtvz avkvz lu
sh ihyjh, lu sh jbhs zl sl xbpaó hs whkyl kl Gvyhpkh sh hahkbyh kl shz

whshiyh, xbl sl xbpahyíhu sh cpkh. És, jvtv cpv hssí h zb opqh, jvtlugó h
zbzwpyhy alyuízpthtlual, f táz jbhukv cpv xbl fv lzayljohtlual sh aluíh
hiyhghkh, f xbl lssh zpu klmlukly, xblqhyzl up lzxbpchyzl, zl lzahih xblkh;
wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, jhsshih, wvyxbl uv wbzplzlu lu lmlav shz tbjohz
htluhghz xbl ls ylulnhkv sl ohjíh. Cpéukvzl, wblz, Gvyhpkh fh lu sh ihyjh,
f xbl xblyíhtvz khy svz yltvz hs hnbh, f cplukv hssí h zb whkyl f h svz
