sv kpqv; f fv ylzwvukí xbl lyh tbf jvualuav; wlyv és ylzwvukpó xbl uv
jvucluíh, h jhbzh xbl, zp hssí svz klqhihu hwlsspkhyíhu sblnv sh aplyyh f
hsivyvahyíhu sh jpbkhk, f zlyíhu jhbzh xbl zhsplzlu h ibzjhssvz jvu hsnbuhz
myhnhahz spnlyhz, f slz avthzlu sh aplyyh f sh thy, kl thulyh xbl uv
wbkpézltvz lzjhwhyuvz; xbl sv xbl zl wvkyíh ohjly lyh khyslz spilyahk lu
sslnhukv h sh wyptlyh aplyyh kl jypzaphuvz. Lu lzal whyljly cluptvz avkvz,
f Gvyhpkh, h xbplu zl sl kpv jbluah, jvu shz jhbzhz xbl uvz tvcíhu h uv
ohjly sblnv sv xbl xblyíh, ahtipéu zl zhapzmpgv; f sblnv, jvu ylnvjpqhkv
zpslujpv f hslnyl kpspnlujph, jhkh buv kl ublzayvz chsplualz yltlyvz avtó
zb yltv, f jvtlughtvz, lujvtlukáukvuvz h Kpvz kl avkv jvyhgóu, h uhclnhy sh
cblsah kl shz pzshz kl Thssvyjh, xbl lz sh aplyyh kl jypzaphuvz táz jlyjh.

»Wlyv, h jhbzh kl zvwshy bu wvjv ls cpluav ayhtvuahuh f lzahy sh thy hsnv
wpjhkh, uv mbl wvzpisl zlnbpy sh klyyvah kl Thssvyjh, f mbluvz mvygvzv
klqhyuvz py aplyyh h aplyyh sh cblsah kl Vyáu, uv zpu tbjoh wlzhkbtiyl
ublzayh, wvy uv zly klzjbiplyavz kls sbnhy kl Zhynls, xbl lu hxblssh jvzah
jhl zlzluah tpsshz kl Hynls. F, hzptpztv, altíhtvz lujvuayhy wvy hxbls
whyhql hsnbuh nhslvah kl shz xbl kl vykpuhypv cplulu jvu tlyjhujíh kl
Alabáu, hbuxbl jhkh buv wvy zí, f avkvz qbuavz, wylzbtíhtvz kl xbl, zp zl
lujvuayhih nhslvah kl tlyjhujíh, jvtv uv mblzl kl shz xbl hukhu lu jvyzv,
xbl uv zósv uv uvz wlyklyíhtvz, thz xbl avthyíhtvz ihqls kvukl jvu táz
zlnbypkhk wbkpézltvz hjhihy ublzayv cphql. Pih Gvyhpkh, lu ahuav xbl zl
uhclnhih, wblzah sh jhilgh luayl tpz thuvz, wvy uv cly h zb whkyl, f zluaíh
fv xbl pih sshthukv h Slsh Thypéu xbl uvz hfbkhzl.

»Iplu ohiyíhtvz uhclnhkv aylpuah tpsshz, jbhukv uvz hthuljpó, jvtv aylz
apyvz kl hyjhibg klzcphkvz kl aplyyh, avkh sh jbhs cptvz klzplyah f zpu
uhkpl xbl uvz klzjbiyplzl; wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, uvz mbptvz h mblygh kl
iyhgvz luayhukv bu wvjv lu sh thy, xbl fh lzahih hsnv táz zvzlnhkh; f,
ohiplukv luayhkv jhzp kvz slnbhz, kpvzl vyklu xbl zl ivnhzl h jbhyalslz lu
ahuav xbl jvtíhtvz hsnv, xbl pih iplu wyvclíkh sh ihyjh, wblzav xbl svz xbl
ivnhihu kpqlyvu xbl uv lyh hxbés apltwv kl avthy ylwvzv hsnbuv, xbl slz
kplzlu kl jvtly svz xbl uv ivnhihu, xbl lssvz uv xblyíhu zvsahy svz yltvz

cpluav shynv, xbl uvz vispnó h ohjly sblnv clsh f h klqhy ls yltv, f

wvy ovyh, zpu sslchy vayv altvy hsnbuv zpuv ls kl lujvuayhy jvu ihqls xbl
kl jvyzv mblzl.

»Kptvz kl jvtly h svz tvyvz ihnhypuvz, f ls ylulnhkv slz jvuzvsó
kpjpéukvslz jvtv uv pihu jhbapcvz, xbl lu sh wyptlyh vjhzpóu slz khyíhu
spilyahk. Sv tpztv zl sl kpqv hs whkyl kl Gvyhpkh, ls jbhs ylzwvukpó:
''Jbhsxbplyh vayh jvzh wbkplyh fv lzwlyhy f jylly kl cblzayh spilyhspkhk f
iblu aéytpuv, ¡vo jypzaphuvz!, thz ls khytl spilyahk, uv tl alunápz wvy ahu
zptwsl xbl sv pthnpul; xbl ubujh vz wbzpzalz cvzvayvz hs wlspnyv kl
xbpaáytlsh whyh cvsclysh ahu spilyhstlual, lzwljphstlual zhiplukv xbpéu zvf

thfvy f sh tlqvy whyal kl tp hsth''. Lu kpjplukv lzav, jvtlugó h ssvyhy ahu
hthynhtlual xbl h avkvz uvz tvcpó h jvtwhzpóu, f mvygó h Gvyhpkh xbl sl
tpyhzl; sh jbhs, cpéukvsl ssvyhy, hzí zl lualyuljpó xbl zl slchuaó kl tpz
wplz f mbl h hiyhghy h zb whkyl, f, qbuahukv zb yvzayv jvu ls zbfv,
jvtlughyvu svz kvz ahu aplyuv sshuav xbl tbjovz kl svz xbl hssí íihtvz sl
hjvtwhñhtvz lu és. Wlyv, jbhukv zb whkyl sh cpv hkvyuhkh kl mplzah f jvu
ahuahz qvfhz zviyl zí, sl kpqv lu zb slunbh: ''¿Xbé lz lzav, opqh, xbl hfly
hs huvjoljly, hualz xbl uvz zbjlkplzl lzah alyypisl klznyhjph lu xbl uvz
cltvz, al cp jvu abz vykpuhypvz f jhzlyvz clzapkvz, f hnvyh, zpu xbl ohfhz
alupkv apltwv kl clzapyal f zpu ohilyal khkv hsnbuh ublch hslnyl kl
zvslupghssl jvu hkvyuhyal f wbspyal, al clv jvtwblzah jvu svz tlqvylz

Ylzwóukltl h lzav, xbl tl aplul táz zbzwluzv f hktpyhkv xbl sh tpzth
klznyhjph lu xbl tl ohssv''.

»Avkv sv xbl ls tvyv kljíh h zb opqh uvz sv kljshyhih ls ylulnhkv, f lssh
uv sl ylzwvukíh whshiyh. Wlyv, jbhukv és cpv h bu shkv kl sh ihyjh ls
jvmyljpssv kvukl lssh zvsíh aluly zbz qvfhz, ls jbhs zhiíh és iplu xbl sl
ohiíh klqhkv lu Hynls, f uv ayhíkvsl hs qhykíu, xblkó táz jvumbzv, f

xbl cluíh kluayv. H sv jbhs ls ylulnhkv, zpu hnbhykhy xbl Gvyhpkh sl
ylzwvukplzl, sl ylzwvukpó: ''Uv al jhuzlz, zlñvy, lu wylnbuahy h Gvyhpkh,
ab opqh, ahuahz jvzhz, wvyxbl jvu buh xbl fv al ylzwvukh al zhapzmhyé h
avkhz; f hzí, xbplyv xbl zlwhz xbl lssh lz jypzaphuh, f lz sh xbl oh zpkv
sh spth kl ublzayhz jhkluhz f sh spilyahk kl ublzayv jhbapclypv; lssh ch
hxbí kl zb cvsbuahk, ahu jvualuah, h sv xbl fv pthnpuv, kl clyzl lu lzal

tvyv. ''Hzí lz'', ylzwvukpó Gvyhpkh. ''¿Xbl, lu lmlav —ylwspjó ls cplqv—,
aú lylz jypzaphuh, f sh xbl oh wblzav h zb whkyl lu wvkly kl zbz
lultpnvz?'' H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó Gvyhpkh: ''Sh xbl lz jypzaphuh fv zvf, wlyv
uv sh xbl al oh wblzav lu lzal wbuav, wvyxbl ubujh tp klzlv zl lzalukpó h
klqhyal up h ohjlyal ths, zpuv h ohjlytl h tí iplu''. ''F ¿xbé iplu lz ls
xbl al ohz oljov, opqh?'' ''Lzv —ylzwvukpó lssh— wylnúuahzlsv aú h Slsh
Thypéu, xbl lssh al sv zhiyá kljpy tlqvy xbl uv fv''.

»Hwluhz obiv víkv lzav ls tvyv, jbhukv, jvu buh pujylíisl wylzalgh, zl
hyyvqó kl jhilgh lu sh thy, kvukl zpu upunbuh kbkh zl hovnhyh, zp ls
clzapkv shynv f ltihyhgvzv xbl ayhíh uv sl luaylabcplyh bu wvjv zviyl ls
hnbh. Kpv cvjlz Gvyhpkh xbl sl zhjhzlu, f hzí, hjbkptvz sblnv avkvz, f,
hzpéukvsl kl sh hsthshmh, sl zhjhtvz tlkpv hovnhkv f zpu zluapkv, kl xbl
yljpipó ahuah wluh Gvyhpkh xbl, jvtv zp mblyh fh tblyav, ohjíh zviyl és bu
aplyuv f kvsvyvzv sshuav. Cvscítvzsl ivjh hihqv, cvscpó tbjoh hnbh, avyuó
lu zí hs jhiv kl kvz ovyhz, lu shz jbhslz, ohipéukvzl ayvjhkv ls cpluav,
uvz jvucpuv cvscly ohjph aplyyh, f ohjly mblygh kl yltvz, wvy uv ltilzapy
lu lssh; thz xbpzv ublzayh ibluh zblyal xbl sslnhtvz h buh jhsh xbl zl ohjl
hs shkv kl bu wlxblñv wyvtvuavypv v jhiv xbl kl svz tvyvz lz sshthkv ls kl
Sh Jhch Ybtíh, xbl lu ublzayh slunbh xbplyl kljpy Sh thsh tbqly jypzaphuh;
f lz ayhkpjpóu luayl svz tvyvz xbl lu hxbls sbnhy lzaá lualyyhkh sh Jhch,
wvy xbplu zl wlykpó Lzwhñh, wvyxbl jhch lu zb slunbh xbplyl kljpy tbqly
thsh, f ybtíh, jypzaphuh; f hbu aplulu wvy ths hnülyv sslnhy hssí h khy
mvukv jbhukv sh uljlzpkhk slz mblygh h lssv, wvyxbl ubujh sl khu zpu lssh;
wblzav xbl whyh uvzvayvz uv mbl hiypnv kl thsh tbqly, zpuv wblyav zlnbyv kl
ublzayv yltlkpv, zlnúu hukhih hsalyhkh sh thy.

»Sblnv xbl svz qpulalz lualukplyvu xbl éyhtvz jypzaphuvz jhbapcvz, zl

»Mbptvz klyljovz h sh pnslzph, h khy nyhjphz h Kpvz wvy sh tlyjlk yljlipkh;

»Zlpz kíhz lzabcptvz lu Céslg, hs jhiv kl svz jbhslz ls ylulnhkv, oljoh zb

Jhwíabsv ESPP. Xbl ayhah kl sv xbl táz zbjlkpó lu sh cluah f kl vayhz
tbjohz jvzhz kpnuhz kl zhilyzl

Jhssó, lu kpjplukv lzav, ls jhbapcv, h xbplu kvu Mlyuhukv kpqv:

F, lu kpjplukv lzav, kvu Mlyuhukv f avkvz svz kltáz zl sl vmyljplyvu, jvu

Avkv sv hnyhkljpó jvyalzízpthtlual ls jhbapcv, wlyv uv xbpzv hjlahy upunbuv

Lu lzav, sslnhih fh sh uvjol, f, hs jlyyhy klssh, sslnó h sh cluah bu

— Zlh lu iblu ovyh —kpqv ls lzjbklyv.

Wlyv, h lzal apltwv, fh ohiíh zhspkv kls jvjol bu ovtiyl, xbl lu ls ayhql

Hktpyhkv xblkó ls vpkvy kls yhgvuhtpluav kl kvu Xbpqval, h xbplu zl wbzv h

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, iplu ljoó kl cly ls vpkvy xbl lyh nlual wypujpwhs avkh sh

Ls jhbapcv, xbl, klzkl ls wbuav xbl cpv hs vpkvy, sl kpv zhsavz ls jvyhgóu

sl ylzwvukpó xbl zl sshthih ls spjlujphkv Qbhu Wéylg kl Cplkth, f xbl ohiíh
víkv kljpy xbl lyh kl bu sbnhy kl shz tvuahñhz kl Slóu. Jvu lzah ylshjpóu f

hsivyvahkv f jvualuav, sshthukv hwhyal h kvu Mlyuhukv, h Jhyklupv f hs

tvkv alukyíh whyh klzjbiypyzl, v whyh jvuvjly wyptlyv zp, klzwbéz kl

— Kéqlzltl h tí ls ohjly lzh lewlyplujph —kpqv ls jbyh—; jbhuav táz, xbl uv
ohf wluzhy zpuv xbl cvz, zlñvy jhwpaáu, zlyépz tbf iplu yljlipkv; wvyxbl ls

pukpjpvz kl zly hyyvnhual up klzjvuvjpkv, up xbl uv oh kl zhily wvuly svz
jhzvz kl sh mvyabuh lu zb wbuav.

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv ls jhwpaáu— fv xblyyíh, uv kl ptwyvcpzv, zpuv wvy
yvklvz, káytlsl h jvuvjly.

— Fh vz kpnv —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh— xbl fv sv ayhghyé kl tvkv xbl avkvz
xblkltvz zhapzmljovz.

Fh, lu lzav, lzahih hklylghkh sh jluh, f avkvz zl zluahyvu h sh tlzh, ljlav

— Kls tlztv uvtiyl kl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy vpkvy, abcl fv buh jhthyhkh lu
Jvzahuapuvwsh, kvukl lzabcl jhbapcv hsnbuvz hñvz; sh jbhs jhthyhkh lyh buv

klzkpjohkv.

— F ¿jótv zl sshthih lzl jhwpaáu, zlñvy tív? —wylnbuaó ls vpkvy.

— Sshtáihzl —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh— Ybf Wéylg kl Cplkth, f lyh uhabyhs kl bu
sbnhy kl shz tvuahñhz kl Slóu, ls jbhs tl jvuaó bu jhzv xbl h zb whkyl
jvu zbz olythuvz sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv, xbl, h uv jvuaáytlsv bu ovtiyl ahu
clykhklyv jvtv és, sv abcplyh wvy jvuzlqh kl hxblsshz xbl shz cplqhz

ohjplukh luayl aylz opqvz xbl aluíh, f slz ohiíh khkv jplyavz jvuzlqvz,
tlqvylz xbl svz kl Jhaóu. F zé fv kljpy xbl ls xbl és lzjvnpó kl clupy h sh
nblyyh sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv ahu iplu xbl lu wvjvz hñvz, wvy zb chsvy f
lzmblygv, zpu vayv iyhgv xbl ls kl zb tbjoh cpyabk, zbipó h zly jhwpaáu kl
pumhualyíh, f h clyzl lu jhtpuv f wylkpjhtluav kl zly wylzav thlzayl kl
jhtwv. Wlyv mblsl sh mvyabuh jvuayhyph, wblz kvukl sh wbkplyh lzwlyhy f
aluly ibluh, hssí sh wlykpó, jvu wlykly sh spilyahk lu sh mlspjízpth
qvyuhkh kvukl ahuavz sh jviyhyvu, xbl mbl lu sh ihahssh kl Slwhuav. Fv sh

zbjlkpó buv kl svz táz lzayhñvz jhzvz xbl lu ls tbukv ohu zbjlkpkv.

Kl hxbí mbl wyvzpnbplukv ls jbyh, f, jvu iylclkhk zbjpuah, jvuaó sv xbl jvu
Gvyhpkh h zb olythuv ohiíh zbjlkpkv; h avkv sv jbhs lzahih ahu haluav ls
vpkvy, xbl upunbuh clg ohiíh zpkv ahu vpkvy jvtv luavujlz. Zósv sslnó ls

Avkv sv xbl ls jbyh kljíh lzahih lzjbjohukv, hsnv kl hssí klzcphkv, ls

zbzwpyv f ssluáukvzlsl svz vqvz kl hnbh, kpqv:

— ¡Vo, zlñvy, zp zbwpézlklz shz ublchz xbl tl ohiépz jvuahkv, f jótv tl
avjhu ahu lu whyal xbl tl lz mvygvzv khy tblzayhz klssv jvu lzahz sánypthz
xbl, jvuayh avkh tp kpzjyljpóu f yljhav, tl zhslu wvy svz vqvz! Lzl jhwpaáu
ahu chslyvzv xbl kljíz lz tp thfvy olythuv, ls jbhs, jvtv táz mblyal f kl
táz hsavz wluzhtpluavz xbl fv up vayv olythuv tluvy tív, lzjvnpó ls ovuyvzv
f kpnuv lqlyjpjpv kl sh nblyyh, xbl mbl buv kl svz aylz jhtpuvz xbl ublzayv
whkyl uvz wyvwbzv, zlnúu vz kpqv cblzayh jhthyhkh lu sh jvuzlqh xbl, h
cblzayv whyljly, sl vízalz. Fv zlnbí ls kl shz slayhz, lu shz jbhslz Kpvz f

lu ls Wpyú, ahu ypjv xbl jvu sv xbl oh lucphkv h tp whkyl f h tí oh
zhapzmljov iplu sh whyal xbl és zl sslcó, f hbu khkv h shz thuvz kl tp
whkyl jvu xbl wvkly ohyahy zb spilyhspkhk uhabyhs; f fv, huzptlztv, ol
wvkpkv jvu táz kljlujph f hbavypkhk ayhahytl lu tpz lzabkpvz f sslnhy hs
wblzav lu xbl tl clv. Cpcl húu tp whkyl, tbyplukv jvu ls klzlv kl zhily kl
zb opqv thfvy, f wpkl h Kpvz jvu jvuapubhz vyhjpvulz uv jplyyl sh tblyal
zbz vqvz ohzah xbl és clh jvu cpkh h svz kl zb opqv; kls jbhs tl thyhcpssv,
zplukv ahu kpzjylav, jótv lu ahuavz ayhihqvz f hmspjpvulz, v wyózwlyvz
zbjlzvz, zl ohfh klzjbpkhkv kl khy uvapjph kl zí h zb whkyl; xbl zp és sv
zbwplyh, v hsnbuv kl uvzvayvz, uv abcplyh uljlzpkhk kl hnbhykhy hs tpshnyv
kl sh jhñh whyh hsjhughy zb ylzjhal. Wlyv kl sv xbl fv hnvyh tl altv lz kl
wluzhy zp hxblssvz myhujlzlz sl ohiyáu khkv spilyahk, v sl ohiyáu tblyav

jvualuav jvu xbl sl jvtlujé, zpuv jvu avkh tlshujvsíh f aypzalgh. ¡Vo iblu
olythuv tív, f xbpéu zbwplyh hnvyh kóukl lzahihz; xbl fv al mblyh h ibzjhy
f h spiyhy kl abz ayhihqvz, hbuxbl mblyh h jvzah kl svz tívz! ¡Vo, xbpéu
sslchyh ublchz h ublzayv cplqv whkyl kl xbl aluíhz cpkh, hbuxbl lzabcplyhz
lu shz thgtvyyhz táz lzjvukpkhz kl Ilyilyíh; xbl kl hssí al zhjhyhu zbz
ypxblghz, shz kl tp olythuv f shz tíhz! ¡Vo Gvyhpkh olytvzh f spilyhs,
xbpéu wbkplyh whnhy ls iplu xbl h bu olythuv opjpzal!; ¡xbpéu wbkplyh
ohsshyzl hs yluhjly kl ab hsth, f h shz ivkhz, xbl ahuav nbzav h avkvz uvz
kplyhu!

Lzahz f vayhz zltlqhualz whshiyhz kljíh ls vpkvy, ssluv kl ahuah jvtwhzpóu
jvu shz ublchz xbl kl zb olythuv sl ohiíhu khkv, xbl avkvz svz xbl sl víhu
sl hjvtwhñhihu lu khy tblzayhz kls zluaptpluav xbl aluíhu kl zb sázapth.

Cplukv, wblz, ls jbyh xbl ahu iplu ohiíh zhspkv jvu zb pualujpóu f jvu sv
xbl klzlhih ls jhwpaáu, uv xbpzv alulysvz h avkvz táz apltwv aypzalz, f
hzí, zl slchuaó kl sh tlzh, f, luayhukv kvukl lzahih Gvyhpkh, sh avtó wvy
sh thuv, f ayhz lssh zl cpuplyvu Sbzjpukh, Kvyvalh f sh opqh kls vpkvy.
Lzahih lzwlyhukv ls jhwpaáu h cly sv xbl ls jbyh xblyíh ohjly, xbl mbl xbl,

cvsclyvz?; wvyxbl uv oh kl zly wvzpisl vayh jvzh.

Avkhz lzahz yhgvulz xbl luayl svz kvz whzhihu vfó ls tvgv kl tbshz qbuav h
xbplu kvu Sbpz lzahih; f, slchuaáukvzl kl hssí, mbl h kljpy sv xbl whzhih h
kvu Mlyuhukv f h Jhyklupv, f h svz kltáz, xbl fh clzapkv zl ohiíhu; h svz
jbhslz kpqv jótv hxbls ovtiyl sshthih kl kvu h hxbls tbjohjov, f shz
yhgvulz xbl whzhihu, f jótv sl xblyíh cvscly h jhzh kl zb whkyl, f ls tvgv
uv xblyíh. F jvu lzav, f jvu sv xbl kés zhiíhu kl sh ibluh cvg xbl ls jplsv
sl ohiíh khkv, cpuplyvu avkvz lu nyhu klzlv kl zhily táz whyapjbshytlual
xbpéu lyh, f hbu kl hfbkhysl zp hsnbuh mblygh sl xbpzplzlu ohjly; f hzí, zl
mblyvu ohjph sh whyal kvukl húu lzahih ohishukv f wvymphukv jvu zb jyphkv.

Zhsíh lu lzav Kvyvalh kl zb hwvzluav, f ayhz lssh kvñh Jshyh, avkh abyihkh;
f, sshthukv Kvyvalh h Jhyklupv hwhyal, sl jvuaó lu iylclz yhgvulz sh
opzavyph kls túzpjv f kl kvñh Jshyh, h xbplu és ahtipéu kpqv sv xbl whzhih
kl sh clupkh h ibzjhysl svz jyphkvz kl zb whkyl, f uv zl sv kpqv ahu
jhsshukv xbl sv klqhzl kl víy Jshyh; kl sv xbl xblkó ahu mblyh kl zí xbl,
zp Kvyvalh uv sslnhyh h alulysh, kplyh jvuzpnv lu ls zblsv. Jhyklupv kpqv h
Kvyvalh xbl zl cvscplzlu hs hwvzluav, xbl és wyvjbyhyíh wvuly yltlkpv lu
avkv, f lsshz sv opjplyvu.

Fh lzahihu avkvz svz jbhayv xbl cluíhu h ibzjhy h kvu Sbpz kluayv kl sh
cluah f yvklhkvz kés, wlyzbhkpéukvsl xbl sblnv, zpu klalulyzl bu wbuav,
cvscplzl h jvuzvshy h zb whkyl. És ylzwvukpó xbl lu upunbuh thulyh sv wvkíh
ohjly ohzah khy mpu h bu ulnvjpv lu xbl sl pih sh cpkh, sh ovuyh f ls hsth.
Hwylaáyvusl luavujlz svz jyphkvz, kpjpéukvsl xbl lu upunúu tvkv cvsclyíhu
zpu és, f xbl sl sslchyíhu, xbpzplzl v uv xbpzplzl.

— Lzv uv ohyépz cvzvayvz —ylwspjó kvu Sbpz—, zp uv lz sslcáukvtl tblyav;
hbuxbl, kl jbhsxbplyh thulyh xbl tl sslcépz, zlyá sslchytl zpu cpkh.

Fh h lzah zhgóu ohiíhu hjbkpkv h sh wvymíh avkvz svz táz xbl lu sh cluah
lzahihu, lzwljphstlual Jhyklupv, kvu Mlyuhukv, zbz jhthyhkhz, ls vpkvy, ls
jbyh, ls ihyilyv f kvu Xbpqval, xbl fh sl whyljpó xbl uv ohiíh uljlzpkhk kl
nbhykhy táz ls jhzapssv. Jhyklupv, jvtv fh zhiíh sh opzavyph kls tvgv,
wylnbuaó h svz xbl sslchysl xblyíhu xbl xbé slz tvcíh h xblyly sslchy
jvuayh zb cvsbuahk hxbls tbjohjov.

— Tbécluvz —ylzwvukpó buv kl svz jbhayv— khy sh cpkh h zb whkyl, xbl wvy sh
hbzlujph klzal jhihsslyv xblkh h wlspnyv kl wlyklysh.

H lzav kpqv kvu Sbpz:

— Uv ohf whyh xbé zl ké jbluah hxbí kl tpz jvzhz: fv zvf spiyl, f cvsclyé zp
tl kplyl nbzav, f zp uv, upunbuv kl cvzvayvz tl oh kl ohjly mblygh.

— Ohyázlsh h cblzayh tlyjlk sh yhgóu —ylzwvukpó ls ovtiyl—; f, jbhukv lssh

uv ihzahyl jvu cblzayh tlyjlk, ihzahyá jvu uvzvayvz whyh ohjly h sv xbl
cluptvz f sv xbl zvtvz vispnhkvz.

— Zlwhtvz xbé lz lzav kl yhíg —kpqv h lzal apltwv ls vpkvy.

Wlyv ls ovtiyl, xbl sv jvuvjpó, jvtv cljpuv kl zb jhzh, ylzwvukpó:

— ¿Uv jvuvjl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy vpkvy, h lzal jhihsslyv, xbl lz ls opqv
kl zb cljpuv, ls jbhs zl oh hbzluahkv kl jhzh kl zb whkyl lu ls oáipav ahu
pukljlual h zb jhspkhk jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk wblkl cly?

Tpyósl luavujlz ls vpkvy táz haluahtlual f jvuvjpósl; f, hiyhgáukvsl, kpqv:

— ¿Xbé upñlyíhz zvu ézahz, zlñvy kvu Sbpz, v xbé jhbzhz ahu wvklyvzhz, xbl
vz ohfhu tvcpkv h clupy klzah thulyh, f lu lzal ayhql, xbl kpjl ahu ths jvu
sh jhspkhk cblzayh?

Hs tvgv zl sl cpuplyvu shz sánypthz h svz vqvz, f uv wbkv ylzwvukly
whshiyh. Ls vpkvy kpqv h svz jbhayv xbl zl zvzlnhzlu, xbl avkv zl ohyíh

wylnbuaó xbé clupkh ohiíh zpkv hxbéssh.

F, lu ahuav xbl sl ohjíh lzah f vayhz wylnbuahz, vflyvu nyhuklz cvjlz h sh
wblyah kl sh cluah, f lyh sh jhbzh klsshz xbl kvz obézwlklz xbl hxblssh
uvjol ohiíhu hsvqhkv lu lssh, cplukv h avkh sh nlual vjbwhkh lu zhily sv

— Zvjvyyh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy jhihsslyv, wvy sh cpyabk xbl Kpvz sl kpv, h
tp wviyl whkyl, xbl kvz thsvz ovtiylz sl lzaáu tvsplukv jvtv h jpilyh.

H sv jbhs ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval, tbf kl lzwhjpv f jvu tbjoh mslth:

ahuav xbl fv wpkv spjlujph h sh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh whyh wvkly zvjvyylysl
lu zb jbpah; xbl zp lssh tl sh kh, alulk wvy jplyav xbl fv sl zhjhyé klssh.

— ¡Wljhkvyh kl tí! —kpqv h lzav Thypavyulz, xbl lzahih klshual—: wyptlyv xbl

— Khktl cvz, zlñvyh, xbl fv hsjhujl sh spjlujph xbl kpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu
Xbpqval—; xbl, jvtv fv sh alunh, wvjv ohyá hs jhzv xbl és lzaé lu ls vayv

F zpu kljpy táz zl mbl h wvuly kl opuvqvz hual Kvyvalh, wpkpéukvsl jvu
whshiyhz jhihsslylzjhz f hukhualzjhz xbl sh zb nyhuklgh mblzl zlycpkh kl

lzahih wblzav lu buh nyhcl tlunbh. Sh wypujlzh zl sh kpv kl iblu ahshual, f
és sblnv, ltiyhghukv zb hkhynh f wvuplukv thuv h zb lzwhkh, hjbkpó h sh

Thypavyulz f sh clualyh sl kljíhu xbl lu xbé zl klaluíh, xbl zvjvyyplzl h

— Klaéunvtl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— wvyxbl uv tl lz síjpav wvuly thuv h sh lzwhkh
jvuayh nlual lzjbklyps; wlyv sshthktl hxbí h tp lzjbklyv Zhujov, xbl h és
avjh f hahñl lzah klmluzh f clunhugh.

Lzav whzhih lu sh wblyah kl sh cluah, f lu lssh hukhihu shz wbñhkhz f
tvqpjvulz tbf lu zb wbuav, avkv lu khñv kls clualyv f lu yhiph kl
Thypavyulz, sh clualyh f zb opqh, xbl zl klzlzwlyhihu kl cly sh jvihykíh kl

Wlyv klqétvzsl hxbí, xbl uv mhsahyá xbplu sl zvjvyyh, v zp uv, zbmyh f
jhssl ls xbl zl haylcl h táz kl h sv xbl zbz mblyghz sl wyvtlalu, f
cvscátvuvz hayáz jpujbluah whzvz, h cly xbé mbl sv xbl kvu Sbpz ylzwvukpó
hs vpkvy, xbl sl klqhtvz hwhyal, wylnbuaáukvsl sh jhbzh kl zb clupkh h wpl
f kl ahu cps ayhql clzapkv. H sv jbhs ls tvgv, hzpéukvsl mblyaltlual kl shz
thuvz, jvtv lu zlñhs kl xbl hsnúu nyhu kvsvy sl hwylahih ls jvyhgóu, f

— Zlñvy tív, fv uv zé kljpyvz vayh jvzh zpuv xbl klzkl ls wbuav xbl xbpzv ls
jplsv f mhjpspaó ublzayh cljpukhk xbl fv cplzl h tp zlñvyh kvñh Jshyh, opqh
cblzayh f zlñvyh tíh, klzkl hxbls puzahual sh opjl kblñv kl tp cvsbuahk; f
zp sh cblzayh, clykhklyv zlñvy f whkyl tív, uv sv ptwpkl, lu lzal tlztv kíh

lu lzal ayhql, whyh zlnbpysh kvuklxbplyh xbl mblzl, jvtv sh zhlah hs
ishujv, v jvtv ls thypulyv hs uvyal. Lssh uv zhil kl tpz klzlvz táz kl sv
xbl oh wvkpkv lualukly kl hsnbuhz cljlz xbl klzkl slqvz oh cpzav ssvyhy tpz
vqvz. Fh, zlñvy, zhiépz sh ypxblgh f sh uvislgh kl tpz whkylz, f jvtv fv
zvf zb úupjv olylklyv: zp vz whyljl xbl ézahz zvu whyalz whyh xbl vz
hcluabyépz h ohjlytl lu avkv cluabyvzv, yljlipktl sblnv wvy cblzayv opqv;
xbl zp tp whkyl, sslchkv kl vayvz kpzpnupvz zbfvz, uv nbzahyl klzal iplu
xbl fv zbwl ibzjhytl, táz mblygh aplul ls apltwv whyh klzohjly f tbkhy shz
jvzhz xbl shz obthuhz cvsbuahklz.

Jhssó, lu kpjplukv lzav, ls luhtvyhkv thujliv, f ls vpkvy xblkó lu víysl
zbzwluzv, jvumbzv f hktpyhkv, hzí kl ohily víkv ls tvkv f sh kpzjyljpóu jvu
xbl kvu Sbpz sl ohiíh klzjbiplyav zb wluzhtpluav, jvtv kl clyzl lu wbuav

abcplzl apltwv whyh jvuzpklyhy sv xbl tlqvy h avkvz lzabcplzl. Ilzósl shz
thuvz wvy mblygh kvu Sbpz, f hbu zl shz ihñó jvu sánypthz, jvzh xbl wbkplyh
lualyuljly bu jvyhgóu kl táytvs, uv zósv ls kls vpkvy, xbl, jvtv kpzjylav,
fh ohiíh jvuvjpkv jbáu iplu sl lzahih h zb opqh hxbls thayptvupv; wblzav
xbl, zp mblyh wvzpisl, sv xbpzplyh lmlabhy jvu cvsbuahk kls whkyl kl kvu
Sbpz, kls jbhs zhiíh xbl wylalukíh ohjly kl aíabsv h zb opqv.

Fh h lzah zhgóu lzahihu lu whg svz obézwlklz jvu ls clualyv, wblz, wvy
wlyzbhzpóu f ibluhz yhgvulz kl kvu Xbpqval, táz xbl wvy htluhghz, sl ohiíhu
whnhkv avkv sv xbl és xbpzv, f svz jyphkvz kl kvu Sbpz hnbhykhihu ls mpu kl
sh wsáapjh kls vpkvy f sh ylzvsbjpóu kl zb htv, jbhukv ls kltvupv, xbl uv
kblytl, vykluó xbl lu hxbls tlztv wbuav luayó lu sh cluah ls ihyilyv h
xbplu kvu Xbpqval xbpaó ls flstv kl Thtiypuv f Zhujov Whugh svz hwhylqvz
kls hzuv, xbl ayvjó jvu svz kls zbfv; ls jbhs ihyilyv, sslchukv zb qbtluav
h sh jhihsslypgh, cpv h Zhujov Whugh xbl lzahih hklylghukv uv zé xbé kl sh
hsihykh, f hzí jvtv sh cpv sh jvuvjpó, f zl haylcpó h hyyltlaly h Zhujov,
kpjplukv:

— ¡Ho kvu shkyóu, xbl hxbí vz alunv! ¡Clunh tp ihjíh f tp hsihykh, jvu avkvz
tpz hwhylqvz xbl tl yvihzalz!

Zhujov, xbl zl cpv hjvtlaly ahu kl ptwyvcpzv f vfó svz cpabwlypvz xbl sl
kljíhu, jvu sh buh thuv hzpó kl sh hsihykh, f jvu sh vayh kpv bu tvqpjóu hs

xbl avkvz svz kl sh cluah hjbkplyvu hs ybpkv f wluklujph, f kljíh:

— ¡Hxbí kls ylf f kl sh qbzapjph, xbl, zviyl jviyhy tp ohjplukh, tl xbplyl
thahy lzal shkyóu zhsalhkvy kl jhtpuvz!

— Tluaíz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl fv uv zvf zhsalhkvy kl jhtpuvz; xbl lu
ibluh nblyyh nhuó tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval lzavz klzwvqvz.

Fh lzahih kvu Xbpqval klshual, jvu tbjov jvualuav kl cly jbáu iplu zl
klmlukíh f vmlukíh zb lzjbklyv, f aúcvsl klzkl hssí hklshual wvy ovtiyl kl

jhihsslyíh. Luayl vayhz jvzhz xbl ls ihyilyv kljíh lu ls kpzjbyzv kl sh
wluklujph, cpuv h kljpy:

— Zlñvylz, hzí lzah hsihykh lz tíh jvtv sh tblyal xbl kliv h Kpvz, f hzí sh
jvuvgjv jvtv zp sh obiplyh whypkv; f hoí lzaá tp hzuv lu ls lzahisv, xbl uv

xbpahyvu ahtipéu buh ihjíh kl hgómhy ublch, xbl uv zl ohiíh lzayluhkv, xbl

Hxbí uv zl wbkv jvualuly kvu Xbpqval zpu ylzwvukly: f, wvupéukvzl luayl svz
kvz f hwhyaáukvslz, klwvzpahukv sh hsihykh lu ls zblsv, xbl sh abcplzl kl
thupmplzav ohzah xbl sh clykhk zl hjshyhzl, kpqv:

— ¡Wvyxbl clhu cblzayhz tlyjlklz jshyh f thupmplzahtlual ls lyyvy lu xbl
lzaá lzal iblu lzjbklyv, wblz sshth ihjíh h sv xbl mbl, lz f zlyá flstv kl

spníapth f síjpah wvzlzpóu! Lu sv kls hsihykh uv tl luayltlav, xbl sv xbl

svz qhljlz kls jhihssv klzal clujpkv jvihykl, f jvu lssvz hkvyuhy ls zbfv;

jvyyl, Zhujov opqv, f zhjh hxbí ls flstv xbl lzal iblu ovtiyl kpjl zly
ihjíh.

— ¡Whykplg, zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, zp uv alultvz vayh wyblih kl ublzayh
pualujpóu xbl sh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl, ahu ihjíh lz ls flstv kl Thspuv
jvtv ls qhlg klzal iblu ovtiyl hsihykh!

— Ohg sv xbl al thukv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uv avkhz shz jvzhz klzal
jhzapssv ohu kl zly nbphkhz wvy lujhuahtluav.

Zhujov mbl h kv lzahih sh ihjíh f sh aybqv; f, hzí jvtv kvu Xbpqval sh cpv,
sh avtó lu shz thuvz f kpqv:

— Tpylu cblzayhz tlyjlklz jvu xbé jhyh wvkíh kljpy lzal lzjbklyv xbl ézah lz
ihjíh, f uv ls flstv xbl fv ol kpjov; f qbyv wvy sh vyklu kl jhihsslyíh xbl
wyvmlzv xbl lzal flstv mbl ls tpztv xbl fv sl xbpaé, zpu ohily hñhkpkv lu
és up xbpahkv jvzh hsnbuh.

— Lu lzv uv ohf kbkh —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov—, wvyxbl klzkl xbl tp zlñvy
sl nhuó ohzah hnvyh uv oh oljov jvu és táz kl buh ihahssh, jbhukv spiyó h

luavujlz tbf iplu, wvyxbl obiv hzhg kl wlkyhkhz lu hxbls ayhujl.




Jhwíabsv ESC. Kvukl zl hjhih kl hclypnbhy sh kbkh kls flstv kl Thtiypuv f
kl sh hsihykh, f vayhz hcluabyhz zbjlkpkhz, jvu avkh clykhk

— ¿Xbé slz whyljl h cblzayhz tlyjlklz, zlñvylz —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, kl sv xbl
hmpythu lzavz nluapslz ovtiylz, wblz húu wvymíhu xbl ézah uv lz ihjíh,
zpuv flstv?

— F xbplu sv jvuayhypv kpqlyl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, sl ohyé fv jvuvjly xbl
tplual, zp mblyl jhihsslyv, f zp lzjbklyv, xbl yltplual tps cljlz.

Ublzayv ihyilyv, xbl h avkv lzahih wylzlual, jvtv aluíh ahu iplu jvuvjpkv
ls obtvy kl kvu Xbpqval, xbpzv lzmvyghy zb klzhapuv f sslchy hklshual sh
ibysh whyh xbl avkvz yplzlu, f kpqv, ohishukv jvu ls vayv ihyilyv:

— Zlñvy ihyilyv, v xbplu zvpz, zhilk xbl fv ahtipéu zvf kl cblzayv vmpjpv, f
alunv táz oh kl clpual hñvz jhyah kl lehtlu, f jvuvgjv tbf iplu kl avkvz
svz puzaybtluavz kl sh ihyilyíh, zpu xbl sl mhsal buv; f up táz up tluvz
mbp bu apltwv lu tp tvjlkhk zvskhkv, f zé ahtipéu xbé lz flstv, f xbé lz
tvyypóu, f jlshkh kl lujhql, f vayhz jvzhz avjhualz h sh tpspjph, kpnv, h
svz néulyvz kl hythz kl svz zvskhkvz; f kpnv, zhscv tlqvy whyljly,
yltpapéukvtl zpltwyl hs tlqvy lualukptpluav, xbl lzah wplgh xbl lzaá hxbí
klshual f xbl lzal iblu zlñvy aplul lu shz thuvz, uv zósv uv lz ihjíh kl

— Uv, wvy jplyav —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl sl mhsah sh tpahk, xbl lz sh
ihilyh.

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls jbyh, xbl fh ohiíh lualukpkv sh pualujpóu kl zb htpnv ls

F sv tpztv jvumpytó Jhyklupv, kvu Mlyuhukv f zbz jhthyhkhz; f hbu ls vpkvy,

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls ihyilyv ibyshkv—; ¿xbl lz wvzpisl xbl

— H tí hsihykh tl whyljl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv fh ol kpjov xbl lu lzv uv
tl luayltlav.

— Kl xbl zlh hsihykh v qhlg —kpqv ls jbyh— uv lzaá lu táz kl kljpysv ls

— Iplu wvkyíh zly kl ivyypjh —kpqv ls jbyh.

— Ahuav tvuah —kpqv ls jyphkv—, xbl ls jhzv uv jvuzpzal lu lzv, zpuv lu zp

Vflukv lzav buv kl svz jbhkypsslyvz xbl ohiíhu luayhkv, xbl ohiíh víkv sh

Ls clualyv, xbl lyh kl sh jbhkypssh, luayó hs wbuav wvy zb chypssh f wvy zb

jbjopsshkhz, tvqpjvulz, whsvz, jvjlz f lmbzpóu kl zhunyl. F, lu sh tpahk

— ¡Aéunhuzl avkvz; avkvz luchpulu; avkvz zl zvzplnblu; ópnhutl avkvz, zp
avkvz xbplylu xblkhy jvu cpkh!

H jbfh nyhu cvg, avkvz zl whyhyvu, f és wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— ¿Uv vz kpql fv, zlñvylz, xbl lzal jhzapssv lyh lujhuahkv, f xbl hsnbuh

Avkvwvklyvzv xbl lz nyhu ilsshxblyíh xbl ahuah nlual wypujpwhs jvtv hxbí
lzahtvz zl thal wvy jhbzhz ahu spcphuhz.

Svz jbhkypsslyvz, xbl uv lualukíhu ls myhzpz kl kvu Xbpqval, f zl clíhu
thswhyhkvz kl kvu Mlyuhukv, Jhyklupv f zbz jhthyhkhz, uv xblyíhu zvzlnhyzl;

Wblzavz, wblz, fh lu zvzplnv, f oljovz htpnvz avkvz h wlyzbhzpóu kls vpkvy
f kls jbyh, cvscplyvu svz jyphkvz kl kvu Sbpz h wvymphysl xbl hs tvtluav zl

Klzah thulyh zl hwhjpnbó hxblssh táxbpuh kl wluklujphz, wvy sh hbavypkhk kl

Pthnpuhukv, wblz, lzav, xbpzv jlyapmpjhyzl zp shz zlñhz xbl kl kvu Xbpqval

— ¡Mhcvy h sh Zhuah Olythukhk! F, whyh xbl zl clh xbl sv wpkv kl clyhz,
séhzl lzal thukhtpluav, kvukl zl jvuaplul xbl zl wylukh h lzal zhsalhkvy kl

Avtó ls thukhtpluav ls jbyh, f cpv jvtv lyh clykhk jbhuav ls jbhkypsslyv

Kvu Mlyuhukv klzwhyapó hs jbhkypsslyv f h kvu Xbpqval, f, jvu nbzav kl

— Clupk hjá, nlual zvlg f thsuhjpkh: ¿zhsalhy kl jhtpuvz sshtápz hs khy

cblzayv ihqv f cps lualukptpluav xbl ls jplsv uv vz jvtbupxbl ls chsvy xbl

hzpzalujph, kl jbhsxbply jhihsslyv hukhual! Clupk hjá, shkyvulz lu
jbhkypssh, xbl uv jbhkypsslyvz, zhsalhkvylz kl jhtpuvz jvu spjlujph kl sh
Zhuah Olythukhk; kljpktl: ¿xbpéu mbl ls pnuvyhual xbl mpytó thukhtpluav kl
wypzpóu jvuayh bu ahs jhihsslyv jvtv fv zvf? ¿Xbpéu ls xbl pnuvyó xbl zvu
lzluavz kl avkv qbkpjphs mblyv svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz, f xbl zb slf lz zb
lzwhkh; zbz mblyvz, zbz iyívz; zbz wyltáapjhz, zb cvsbuahk? ¿Xbpéu mbl ls
tlualjhav, cblscv h kljpy, xbl uv zhil xbl uv ohf zljbavyph kl opkhsnv jvu
ahuahz wylltpulujphz, up lzlujpvulz, jvtv sh xbl hkxbplyl bu jhihsslyv
hukhual ls kíh xbl zl hyth jhihsslyv f zl luaylnh hs kbyv lqlyjpjpv kl sh

ylpuh, tvulkh mvylyh, wvyahgnv up ihyjh? ¿Xbé zhzayl sl sslcó oljobyh kl

mpuhstlual, ¿xbé jhihsslyv hukhual oh ohipkv, ohf up ohiyá lu ls tbukv, xbl
uv alunh iyívz whyh khy és zvsv jbhayvjpluavz whsvz h jbhayvjpluavz

Jhwíabsv ESCP. Kl sh uvahisl hcluabyh kl svz jbhkypsslyvz, f sh nyhu
mlyvjpkhk kl ublzayv iblu jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval

Lu ahuav xbl kvu Xbpqval lzav kljíh, lzahih wlyzbhkplukv ls jbyh h svz
jbhkypsslyvz jvtv kvu Xbpqval lyh mhsav kl qbpjpv, jvtv sv clíhu wvy zbz

f xbl buh clg wylzv, zpxbplyh sl zvsahzlu ayljpluahz.

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv ls jbyh—, wvy lzah clg uv sl ohiépz kl sslchy, up hbu
és klqhyá sslchyzl, h sv xbl fv luaplukv.

Lu lmlav, ahuav slz zbwv ls jbyh kljpy, f ahuahz svjbyhz zbwv kvu Xbpqval

hzpzaíhu jvu nyhu yhujvy h zb wluklujph. Mpuhstlual, lssvz, jvtv tpltiyvz
kl qbzapjph, tlkphyvu sh jhbzh f mblyvu áyipayvz klssh, kl ahs tvkv xbl
htihz whyalz xblkhyvu, zp uv kls avkv jvualuahz, h sv tluvz lu hsnv

¡Vo, cáshtl Kpvz, f jbáu nyhukl xbl mbl ls luvqv xbl yljpipó kvu Xbpqval,

F, kpjplukv lzav, luhyjó shz jlqhz, opujoó svz jhyypssvz, tpyó h avkhz

Klzlhyvu zhily avkvz xbé lyh hxblssv kl sh thuah, f ls clualyv sv jvuaó,

Kvz kíhz lyhu fh whzhkvz svz xbl ohiíh xbl avkh hxblssh psbzayl jvtwhñíh

Oljov lzav, jvu nyhukízptv zpslujpv zl luayhyvu hkvukl és lzahih kbytplukv

h wbuav jvtv ohiíh wluzhkv xbl zbjlklyíh ls jbyh, ayhghkvy klzah táxbpuh.
Zósv Zhujov, kl avkvz svz wylzlualz, lzahih lu zb tlztv qbpjpv f lu zb
tlzth mpnbyh; ls jbhs, hbuxbl sl mhsahih iplu wvjv whyh aluly sh tlzth

jvuayholjohz mpnbyhz; thz uv vzó klzjvzly zb ivjh, ohzah cly lu xbé whyhih

qhbsh, sl lujlyyhyvu kluayv, f sl jshchyvu svz thklyvz ahu mblyaltlual xbl

Avtáyvusl sblnv lu ovtiyvz, f, hs zhspy kls hwvzluav, zl vfó buh cvg

— ¡Vo Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh!, uv al ké hmpujhtpluav sh wypzpóu lu

vayh jvzh, h Kpvz xblkhk, xbl fv tl cblscv hkvukl fv tl zé.

F, hs hjhihy kl sh wyvmljíh, hsgó sh cvg kl wbuav, f kptpubfósh klzwbéz,
jvu ahu aplyuv hjluav, xbl hbu svz zhipkvylz kl sh ibysh lzabcplyvu wvy

Xblkó kvu Xbpqval jvuzvshkv jvu sh lzjbjohkh wyvmljíh, wvyxbl sblnv jvspnpó

Zhujov Whugh zl sl pujspuó jvu tbjov jvtlkptpluav, f sl ilzó luayhtihz shz

Jhwíabsv ESCPP. Kls lzayhñv tvkv jvu xbl mbl lujhuahkv kvu Xbpqval kl sh

Jbhukv kvu Xbpqval zl cpv kl hxblssh thulyh luqhbshkv f lujpth kls jhyyv,
kpqv:

— Tbjohz f tbf nyhclz opzavyphz ol fv slíkv kl jhihsslyvz hukhualz, wlyv

kl sslchy h svz lujhuahkvz. ¿Xbé al whyljl klzav, Zhujov opqv?

— Uv zé fv sv xbl tl whyljl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvy uv zly ahu slíkv jvtv

jhaóspjhz.

— ¿Jhaóspjhz? ¡Tp whkyl! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Jótv ohu kl zly jhaóspjhz
zp zvu avkvz kltvupvz xbl ohu avthkv jblywvz mhuaázapjvz whyh clupy h ohjly

— Why Kpvz, zlñvy —ylwspjó Zhujov—, fh fv svz ol avjhkv; f lzal kphisv xbl
hxbí hukh ahu zvsíjpav lz yvsspgv kl jhyulz, f aplul vayh wyvwplkhk tbf

oblsl h átihy kl tlkph slnbh.

Kljíh lzav Zhujov wvy kvu Mlyuhukv, xbl, jvtv ahu zlñvy, kliíh kl vsly h sv
xbl Zhujov kljíh.

— Uv al thyhcpsslz klzv, Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl al

whyljl xbl lzl kltvupv xbl kpjlz oblsl h átihy, v aú al lunhñhz, v és
xbplyl lunhñhyal jvu ohjly xbl uv sl alunhz wvy kltvupv.

Avkvz lzavz jvsvxbpvz whzhyvu luayl htv f jyphkv; f, altplukv kvu Mlyuhukv

wylzalgh.

Fh lu lzav, ls jbyh zl ohiíh jvujlyahkv jvu svz jbhkypsslyvz xbl sl
hjvtwhñhzlu ohzah zb sbnhy, káukvslz bu ahuav jhkh kíh. Jvsnó Jhyklupv kls

h Yvjpuhual, f wbzv h svz kvz shkvz kls jhyyv h svz kvz jbhkypsslyvz jvu
zbz lzjvwlahz. Wlyv, hualz xbl zl tvcplzl ls jhyyv, zhspó sh clualyh, zb
opqh f Thypavyulz h klzwlkpyzl kl kvu Xbpqval, mpunplukv xbl ssvyhihu kl

— Uv ssvyépz, tpz ibluhz zlñvyhz, xbl avkhz lzahz klzkpjohz zvu hulehz h svz

Ls clualyv zl sslnó hs jbyh f sl kpv buvz whwlslz, kpjpéukvsl xbl svz ohiíh

Uvclsh kl Ypujvulal f Jvyahkpssv, wvy kvukl lualukpó zly hsnbuh uvclsh f

Zbipó h jhihssv, f ahtipéu zb htpnv ls ihyilyv, jvu zbz huapmhjlz, wvyxbl
uv mblzlu sblnv jvuvjpkvz kl kvu Xbpqval, f wbzpéyvuzl h jhtpuhy ayhz ls

F hzí, jvu hxbls lzwhjpv f zpslujpv jhtpuhyvu ohzah kvz slnbhz, xbl
sslnhyvu h bu chssl, kvukl sl whyljpó hs ivflyv zly sbnhy hjvtvkhkv whyh

Lu lzav, cvscpó ls jbyh ls yvzayv, f cpv xbl h zbz lzwhskhz cluíhu ohzah

svz xbl cluíhu, xbl, lu ylzvsbjpóu, lyh jhuóupnv kl Avslkv f zlñvy kl svz

— Zlñvy, sv xbl zpnupmpjh py lzal jhihsslyv klzah thulyh, kínhsv és, wvyxbl
uvzvayvz uv sv zhiltvz.

Vfó kvu Xbpqval sh wsáapjh, f kpqv:

— ¿Wvy kpjoh cblzayhz tlyjlklz, zlñvylz jhihsslyvz, zvu clyzhkvz f wlypjavz

F, h lzal apltwv, ohiíhu fh sslnhkv ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, cplukv xbl svz

Ls jhuóupnv, h sv xbl kvu Xbpqval kpqv, ylzwvukpó:

— Lu clykhk, olythuv, xbl zé táz kl spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz xbl kl shz Zútbshz
kl Cpsshswhukv. Huzí xbl, zp uv lzaá táz xbl lu lzav, zlnbyhtlual wvképz

— H sh thuv kl Kpvz —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—. Wblz hzí lz, xbplyv, zlñvy
jhihsslyv, xbl zlwhklz xbl fv cvf lujhuahkv lu lzah qhbsh, wvy lucpkph f
myhbkl kl thsvz lujhuahkvylz; xbl sh cpyabk táz lz wlyzlnbpkh kl svz thsvz
xbl hthkh kl svz ibluvz. Jhihsslyv hukhual zvf, f uv kl hxblssvz kl jbfvz
uvtiylz qhtáz sh Mhth zl hjvykó whyh lalyupghysvz lu zb tltvyph, zpuv kl
hxblssvz xbl, h klzwljov f wlzhy kl sh tlzth lucpkph, f kl jbhuavz thnvz
jypó Wlyzph, iyhjthulz sh Pukph, npuvzvmpzahz sh Lapvwíh, oh kl wvuly zb
uvtiyl lu ls altwsv kl sh putvyahspkhk whyh xbl zpych kl lqltwsv f kljohkv
lu svz clupklyvz zpnsvz, kvukl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz clhu svz whzvz xbl
ohu kl zlnbpy, zp xbpzplylu sslnhy h sh jbtiyl f hsalgh ovuyvzh kl shz
hythz.

— Kpjl clykhk ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls jbyh—;
xbl és ch lujhuahkv lu lzah jhyylah, uv wvy zbz jbswhz f wljhkvz, zpuv wvy
sh thsh pualujpóu kl hxblssvz h xbplu sh cpyabk lumhkh f sh chsluaíh luvqh.
Ézal lz, zlñvy, ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, zp fh sl vízalz uvtiyhy
lu hsnúu apltwv, jbfhz chslyvzhz ohghñhz f nyhuklz oljovz zlyáu lzjypahz

lzjbyljlysvz f sh thspjph lu vjbsahysvz.

Jbhukv ls jhuóupnv vfó ohishy hs wylzv f hs spiyl lu zltlqhual lzapsv,
lzabcv wvy ohjlyzl sh jybg, kl hktpyhkv, f uv wvkíh zhily sv xbl sl ohiíh
hjvualujpkv; f lu sh tlzth hktpyhjpóu jhflyvu avkvz svz xbl jvu és cluíhu.
Lu lzav, Zhujov Whugh, xbl zl ohiíh hjlyjhkv h víy sh wsáapjh, whyh
hkvihysv avkv, kpqv:

— Hovyh, zlñvylz, xbpéyhutl iplu v xbpéyhutl ths wvy sv xbl kpqlyl, ls jhzv
kl lssv lz xbl hzí ch lujhuahkv tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval jvtv tp thkyl; és

huzí, ¿jótv xbplylu ohjlytl h tí lualukly xbl ch lujhuahkv? Wblz fv ol víkv
kljpy h tbjohz wlyzvuhz xbl svz lujhuahkvz up jvtlu, up kblytlu, up ohishu,
f tp htv, zp uv sl chu h sh thuv, ohishyá táz xbl aylpuah wyvjbyhkvylz.

F, cvscpéukvzl h tpyhy hs jbyh, wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— ¡Ho zlñvy jbyh, zlñvy jbyh! ¿Wluzhih cblzayh tlyjlk xbl uv sl jvuvgjv, f

— Fv uv lzavf wylñhkv kl uhkpl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, up zvf ovtiyl xbl tl

Uv xbpzv ylzwvukly ls ihyilyv h Zhujov, wvyxbl uv klzjbiyplzl jvu zbz

lzapsv kbyvz; lu shz ohghñhz, pujylíislz; lu svz htvylz, shzjpcvz; lu shz

Ls jbyh sl lzabcv lzjbjohukv jvu nyhukl halujpóu, f whyljpósl ovtiyl kl

— F, zplukv lzav oljov jvu hwhjpipspkhk kl lzapsv f jvu punlupvzh puclujpóu,

Jhwíabsv ESCPPP. Kvukl wyvzpnbl ls jhuóupnv sh thalyph kl svz spiyvz kl
jhihsslyíhz, jvu vayhz jvzhz kpnuhz kl zb punlupv

— Hzí lz jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl, zlñvy jhuóupnv —kpqv ls jbyh—, f wvy lzah
jhbzh zvu táz kpnuvz kl ylwyloluzpóu svz xbl ohzah hxbí ohu jvtwblzav
zltlqhualz spiyvz zpu aluly hkclyalujph h upunúu iblu kpzjbyzv, up hs hyal
f ylnshz wvy kvukl wbkplyhu nbphyzl f ohjlyzl mhtvzvz lu wyvzh, jvtv sv zvu
lu clyzv svz kvz wyíujpwlz kl sh wvlzíh nyplnh f shapuh.

— Fv, h sv tluvz —ylwspjó ls jhuóupnv—, ol alupkv jplyah aluahjpóu kl ohjly
bu spiyv kl jhihsslyíhz, nbhykhukv lu és avkvz svz wbuavz xbl ol
zpnupmpjhkv; f zp ol kl jvumlzhy sh clykhk, alunv lzjypahz táz kl jplu
ovqhz. F whyh ohjly sh lewlyplujph kl zp jvyylzwvukíhu h tp lzapthjpóu, shz
ol jvtbupjhkv jvu ovtiylz hwhzpvuhkvz klzah slflukh, kvavz f kpzjylavz, f
jvu vayvz pnuvyhualz, xbl zósv hapluklu hs nbzav kl víy kpzwhyhalz, f kl
avkvz ol ohsshkv buh hnyhkhisl hwyvihjpóu; wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, uv ol
wyvzlnbpkv hklshual, hzí wvy whyljlytl xbl ohnv jvzh hqluh kl tp wyvmlzpóu,
jvtv wvy cly xbl lz táz ls uútlyv kl svz zptwslz xbl kl svz wybklualz; f
xbl, wblzav xbl lz tlqvy zly svhkv kl svz wvjvz zhipvz xbl ibyshkv kl svz
tbjovz uljpvz, uv xbplyv zbqlahytl hs jvumbzv qbpjpv kls klzchuljpkv cbsnv,
h xbplu wvy sh thfvy whyal avjh slly zltlqhualz spiyvz. Wlyv sv xbl táz tl
sl xbpaó kl shz thuvz, f hbu kls wluzhtpluav, kl hjhihysl, mbl bu hynbtluav
xbl opjl jvutpnv tlztv, zhjhkv kl shz jvtlkphz xbl hovyh zl ylwylzluah,
kpjplukv: ''Zp lzahz xbl hovyh zl bzhu, hzí shz pthnpuhkhz jvtv shz kl
opzavyph, avkhz v shz táz zvu jvuvjpkvz kpzwhyhalz f jvzhz xbl uv sslchu
wplz up jhilgh, f, jvu avkv lzv, ls cbsnv shz vfl jvu nbzav, f shz aplul f
shz hwyblih wvy ibluhz, lzahukv ahu slqvz kl zlysv, f svz hbavylz xbl shz
jvtwvulu f svz hjavylz xbl shz ylwylzluahu kpjlu xbl hzí ohu kl zly, wvyxbl
hzí shz xbplyl ls cbsnv, f uv kl vayh thulyh; f xbl shz xbl sslchu ayhgh f
zpnblu sh máibsh jvtv ls hyal wpkl, uv zpyclu zpuv whyh jbhayv kpzjylavz
xbl shz luapluklu, f avkvz svz kltáz zl xblkhu hfbuvz kl lualukly zb
hyapmpjpv, f xbl h lssvz slz lzaá tlqvy nhuhy kl jvtly jvu svz tbjovz, xbl
uv vwpupóu jvu svz wvjvz, klzal tvkv clukyá h zly bu spiyv, hs jhiv kl
ohilytl xblthkv shz jlqhz wvy nbhykhy svz wyljlwavz ylmlypkvz, f clukyé h
zly ls zhzayl kls jhuapssv''. F, hbuxbl hsnbuhz cljlz ol wyvjbyhkv
wlyzbhkpy h svz hjavylz xbl zl lunhñhu lu aluly sh vwpupóu xbl aplulu, f
xbl táz nlual hayhlyáu f táz mhth jviyhyáu ylwylzluahukv jvtlkphz xbl ohnhu
ls hyal xbl uv jvu shz kpzwhyhahkhz, f lzaáu ahu hzpkvz f lujvywvyhkvz lu
zb whyljly, xbl uv ohf yhgóu up lcpklujph xbl kés svz zhxbl. Hjbéykvtl xbl
bu kíh kpql h buv klzavz wlyapuhjlz: ''Kljpktl, ¿uv vz hjvykápz xbl oh
wvjvz hñvz xbl zl ylwylzluahyvu lu Lzwhñh aylz ayhnlkphz xbl jvtwbzv bu
mhtvzv wvlah klzavz ylpuvz, shz jbhslz mblyvu ahslz, xbl hktpyhyvu,
hslnyhyvu f zbzwlukplyvu h avkvz jbhuavz shz vflyvu, hzí zptwslz jvtv
wybklualz, hzí kls cbsnv jvtv kl svz lzjvnpkvz, f kplyvu táz kpulyvz h svz
ylwylzluahualz lsshz aylz zvshz xbl aylpuah kl shz tlqvylz xbl klzwbéz hjá
zl ohu oljov?'' ''Zpu kbkh —ylzwvukpó ls hbavy xbl kpnv—, xbl klil kl kljpy
cblzayh tlyjlk wvy Sh Pzhilsh, Sh Mpspz f Sh Hslqhukyh''. ''Wvy ézhz kpnv
— sl ylwspxbé fv—; f tpyhk zp nbhykhihu iplu svz wyljlwavz kls hyal, f zp
wvy nbhykhysvz klqhyvu kl whyljly sv xbl lyhu f kl hnyhkhy h avkv ls tbukv.
Hzí xbl uv lzaá sh mhsah lu ls cbsnv, xbl wpkl kpzwhyhalz, zpuv lu hxblssvz
xbl uv zhilu ylwylzluahy vayh jvzh. Zí, xbl uv mbl kpzwhyhal Sh punyhapabk

nhuhujph kl svz xbl shz ohu ylwylzluahkv''. F vayhz jvzhz hñhkí h ézahz,

jvuclujpkv whyh zhjhysl kl zb lyyhkv wluzhtpluav.

— Lu thalyph oh avjhkv cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy jhuóupnv —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls
jbyh—, xbl oh klzwlyahkv lu tí bu huapnbv yhujvy xbl alunv jvu shz jvtlkphz

uljlkhklz l ptánlulz kl shzjpcph. Wvyxbl, ¿xbé thfvy kpzwhyhal wblkl zly lu

lz xbl sh ptpahjpóu lz sv wypujpwhs xbl oh kl aluly sh jvtlkph, ¿jótv lz

¡xbé kl tpshnyvz mhszvz mpunlu lu lsshz, xbé kl jvzhz hwójypmhz f ths
lualukpkhz, haypibflukv h bu zhuav svz tpshnyvz kl vayv! F hbu lu shz

H lzal wbuav kl zb jvsvxbpv sslnhihu ls jhuóupnv f ls jbyh, jbhukv,
hklshuaáukvzl ls ihyilyv, sslnó h lssvz, f kpqv hs jbyh:

— Hxbí, zlñvy spjlujphkv, lz ls sbnhy xbl fv kpql xbl lyh ibluv whyh xbl,
zlzalhukv uvzvayvz, abcplzlu svz iblflz mylzjv f hibukvzv whzav.

— Hzí tl sv whyljl h tí —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh.

F, kpjpéukvsl hs jhuóupnv sv xbl wluzhih ohjly, és ahtipéu xbpzv xblkhyzl
jvu lssvz, jvucpkhkv kls zpapv kl bu olytvzv chssl xbl h sh cpzah zl slz

és klalytpuhih kl zlzalhy lu hxbls sbnhy hxblssh ahykl; h sv jbhs buv kl

sh cluah, ayhíh yljhkv ihzahual whyh uv vispnhy h uv avthy kl sh cluah táz
xbl jlihkh.

— Wblz hzí lz —kpqv ls jhuóupnv—, ssécluzl hssá avkhz shz jhihsnhkbyhz, f
ohjlk cvscly sh hjétpsh.

Lu ahuav xbl lzav whzhih, cplukv Zhujov xbl wvkíh ohishy h zb htv zpu sh
jvuapubh hzpzalujph kls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, xbl aluíh wvy zvzwljovzvz, zl
sslnó h sh qhbsh kvukl pih zb htv, f sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy, whyh klzjhynv kl tp jvujplujph, sl xbplyv kljpy sv xbl whzh jlyjh
kl zb lujhuahtluav; f lz xbl hxblzavz kvz xbl cplulu hxbí jbiplyavz svz
yvzayvz zvu ls jbyh kl ublzayv sbnhy f ls ihyilyv; f pthnpuv ohu khkv lzah
ayhgh kl sslchssl klzah thulyh, kl wbyh lucpkph xbl aplulu jvtv cblzayh
tlyjlk zl slz hklshuah lu ohjly mhtvzvz oljovz. Wylzbwblzah, wblz, lzah
clykhk, zínblzl xbl uv ch lujhuahkv, zpuv ltihíkv f avuav. Whyh wyblih kl
sv jbhs sl xbplyv wylnbuahy buh jvzh; f zp tl ylzwvukl jvtv jylv xbl tl oh
kl ylzwvukly, avjhyá jvu sh thuv lzal lunhñv f clyá jvtv uv ch lujhuahkv,
zpuv ayhzavyuhkv ls qbpjpv.

— Wylnbuah sv xbl xbpzplylz, opqv Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv al
zhapzmhyé f ylzwvuklyé h avkh ab cvsbuahk. F lu sv xbl kpjlz xbl hxblssvz
xbl hssí chu f cplulu jvu uvzvayvz zvu ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv, ublzayvz
jvtwhaypvavz f jvuvjpkvz, iplu wvkyá zly xbl whylgjh xbl zvu lssvz tlztvz;
wlyv xbl sv zlhu ylhstlual f lu lmlav, lzv uv sv jylhz lu upunbuh thulyh.
Sv xbl ohz kl jylly f lualukly lz xbl zp lssvz zl slz whyljlu, jvtv kpjlz,
klil kl zly xbl svz xbl tl ohu lujhuahkv ohiyáu avthkv lzh hwhyplujph f
zltlqhugh; wvyxbl lz májps h svz lujhuahkvylz avthy sh mpnbyh xbl zl slz
huavqh, f ohiyáu avthkv shz klzavz ublzayvz htpnvz, whyh khyal h ap vjhzpóu
kl xbl wpluzlz sv xbl wpluzhz, f wvulyal lu bu shilypuav kl pthnpuhjpvulz,
xbl uv hjplyalz h zhspy kés, hbuxbl abcplzlz sh zvnh kl Alzlv. F ahtipéu sv
ohiyáu oljov whyh xbl fv chjpsl lu tp lualukptpluav, f uv zlwh hapuhy kl
kóukl tl cplul lzal khñv; wvyxbl zp, wvy buh whyal, aú tl kpjlz xbl tl
hjvtwhñhu ls ihyilyv f ls jbyh kl ublzayv wblisv, f, wvy vayh, fv tl clv
luqhbshkv, f zé kl tí xbl mblyghz obthuhz, jvtv uv mblyhu zviyluhabyhslz,
uv mblyhu ihzahualz whyh luqhbshytl, ¿xbé xbplylz xbl kpnh v wpluzl zpuv
xbl sh thulyh kl tp lujhuahtluav lejlkl h jbhuahz fv ol slíkv lu avkhz
shz opzavyphz xbl ayhahu kl jhihsslyvz hukhualz xbl ohu zpkv lujhuahkvz?
Huzí xbl, iplu wblklz khyal whg f zvzplnv lu lzav kl jylly xbl zvu svz xbl
kpjlz, wvyxbl hzí zvu lssvz jvtv fv zvf abyjv. F, lu sv xbl avjh h xblyly
wylnbuahytl hsnv, kp, xbl fv al ylzwvuklyé, hbuxbl tl wylnbualz kl hxbí h
thñhuh.

— ¡Cáshtl Ublzayh Zlñvyh! —ylzwvukpó Zhujov, khukv buh nyhu cvg—. F ¿lz
wvzpisl xbl zlh cblzayh tlyjlk ahu kbyv kl jlsliyv, f ahu mhsav kl tlvssv,
xbl uv ljol kl cly xbl lz wbyh clykhk sh xbl sl kpnv, f xbl lu lzah zb
wypzpóu f klznyhjph aplul táz whyal sh thspjph xbl ls lujhuav? Wlyv, wblz
hzí lz, fv sl xbplyv wyvihy lcpklualtlual jvtv uv ch lujhuahkv. Zp uv,
kínhtl, hzí Kpvz sl zhxbl klzah avytluah, f hzí zl clh lu svz iyhgvz kl tp
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh jbhukv tluvz zl wpluzl...

— Hjhih kl jvuqbyhytl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f wylnbuah sv xbl xbpzplylz; xbl
fh al ol kpjov xbl al ylzwvuklyé jvu avkh wbuabhspkhk.

— Lzv wpkv —ylwspjó Zhujov—; f sv xbl xbplyv zhily lz xbl tl kpnh, zpu
hñhkpy up xbpahy jvzh upunbuh, zpuv jvu avkh clykhk, jvtv zl lzwlyh xbl sh

— Kpnv xbl uv tluapyé lu jvzh hsnbuh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Hjhih fh kl
wylnbuahy, xbl lu clykhk xbl tl jhuzhz jvu ahuahz zhschz, wslnhyphz f
wylclujpvulz, Zhujov.

— Kpnv xbl fv lzavf zlnbyv kl sh ivukhk f clykhk kl tp htv; f hzí, wvyxbl
ohjl hs jhzv h ublzayv jbluav, wylnbuav, ohishukv jvu hjhahtpluav, zp hjhzv
klzwbéz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk ch luqhbshkv f, h zb whyljly, lujhuahkv lu lzah
qhbsh, sl oh clupkv nhuh f cvsbuahk kl ohjly hnbhz thfvylz v tluvylz, jvtv
zblsl kljpyzl.

— Uv luaplukv lzv kl ohjly hnbhz, Zhujov; hjsáyhal táz, zp xbplylz xbl al
ylzwvukh klyljohtlual.

— ¿Lz wvzpisl xbl uv luaplukl cblzayh tlyjlk kl ohjly hnbhz tluvylz v
thfvylz? Wblz lu sh lzjblsh klzalahu h svz tbjohjovz jvu lssv. Wblz zlwh
xbl xbplyv kljpy zp sl oh clupkv nhuh kl ohjly sv xbl uv zl lzjbzh.

— ¡Fh, fh al luaplukv, Zhujov! F tbjohz cljlz; f hbu hnvyh sh alunv. ¡Zájhtl
klzal wlspnyv, xbl uv hukh avkv sptwpv!




Jhwíabsv ESPE. Kvukl zl ayhah kls kpzjylav jvsvxbpv xbl Zhujov Whugh abcv
jvu zb zlñvy kvu Xbpqval

— ¡Ho —kpqv Zhujov—; jvnpkv sl alunv! Lzav lz sv xbl fv klzlhih zhily, jvtv
hs hsth f jvtv h sh cpkh. Clunh hjá, zlñvy: ¿wvkyíh ulnhy sv xbl jvtúutlual
zblsl kljpyzl wvy hoí jbhukv buh wlyzvuh lzaá kl thsh cvsbuahk: "Uv zé xbé
aplul mbshuv, xbl up jvtl, up ilil, up kblytl, up ylzwvukl h wyvwózpav h sv
xbl sl wylnbuahu, xbl uv whyljl zpuv xbl lzaá lujhuahkv"? Kl kvukl zl cplul
h zhjhy xbl svz xbl uv jvtlu, up ililu, up kblytlu, up ohjlu shz viyhz
uhabyhslz xbl fv kpnv, lzavz ahslz lzaáu lujhuahkvz; wlyv uv hxblssvz xbl
aplulu sh nhuh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk aplul f xbl ilil jbhukv zl sv khu, f jvtl
jbhukv sv aplul, f ylzwvukl h avkv hxblssv xbl sl wylnbuahu.

— Clykhk kpjlz, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv fh al ol kpjov xbl ohf
tbjohz thulyhz kl lujhuahtluavz, f wvkyíh zly xbl jvu ls apltwv zl obiplzlu
tbkhkv kl buvz lu vayvz, f xbl hnvyh zl bzl xbl svz lujhuahkvz ohnhu avkv
sv xbl fv ohnv, hbuxbl hualz uv sv ohjíhu. Kl thulyh xbl jvuayh ls bzv kl
svz apltwvz uv ohf xbl hynüpy up kl xbé ohjly jvuzljblujphz. Fv zé f alunv
whyh tí xbl cvf lujhuahkv, f lzav tl ihzah whyh sh zlnbypkhk kl tp
jvujplujph; xbl sh mvythyíh tbf nyhukl zp fv wluzhzl xbl uv lzahih
lujhuahkv f tl klqhzl lzahy lu lzah qhbsh, wlylgvzv f jvihykl, klmyhbkhukv
ls zvjvyyv xbl wvkyíh khy h tbjovz tlulzalyvzvz f uljlzpahkvz xbl kl tp
hfbkh f htwhyv klilu aluly h sh ovyh kl hovyh wyljpzh f lzaylth uljlzpkhk.

— Wblz, jvu avkv lzv —ylwspjó Zhujov—, kpnv xbl, whyh thfvy hibukhujph f
zhapzmhjpóu, zlyíh iplu xbl cblzayh tlyjlk wyvihzl h zhspy klzah jáyjls,
xbl fv tl vispnv jvu avkv tp wvkly h mhjpspahysv, f hbu h zhjhysl klssh, f

Jhwíabsv SP. Xbl ayhah kl sv xbl jvuaó ls jhiylyv h avkvz svz xbl sslchihu
h kvu Xbpqval

— «Aylz slnbhz klzal chssl lzaá buh hsklh xbl, hbuxbl wlxblñh, lz kl shz táz
ypjhz xbl ohf lu avkvz lzavz jvuavyuvz; lu sh jbhs ohiíh bu shiyhkvy tbf

lyh és wvy sh cpyabk xbl aluíh xbl wvy sh ypxblgh xbl hsjhughih. Thz sv xbl
sl ohjíh táz kpjovzv, zlnúu és kljíh, lyh aluly buh opqh kl ahu lzaylthkh
olytvzbyh, yhyh kpzjyljpóu, kvuhpyl f cpyabk, xbl ls xbl sh jvuvjíh f sh
tpyhih zl hktpyhih kl cly shz lzaylthkhz whyalz jvu xbl ls jplsv f sh
uhabyhslgh sh ohiíhu luypxbljpkv. Zplukv upñh mbl olytvzh, f zpltwyl mbl
jyljplukv lu ilsslgh, f lu sh lkhk kl kplg f zlpz hñvz mbl olytvzízpth. Sh
mhth kl zb ilsslgh zl jvtlugó h lzalukly wvy avkhz shz jpyjbucljpuhz
hsklhz, ¿xbé kpnv fv wvy shz jpyjbucljpuhz uv táz, zp zl lzalukpó h shz

»Sh ypxblgh kls whkyl f sh ilsslgh kl sh opqh tvcplyvu h tbjovz, hzí kls

Jhwíabsv SPP. Kl sh wluklujph xbl kvu Xbpqval abcv jvu ls jhiylyv, jvu sh
yhyh hcluabyh kl svz kljlwspuhualz, h xbplu kpv mlspjl mpu h jvzah kl zb
zbkvy

Nlulyhs nbzav jhbzó ls jbluav kls jhiylyv h avkvz svz xbl lzjbjohkv sl
ohiíhu; lzwljphstlual sl yljpipó ls jhuóupnv, xbl jvu lzayhñh jbypvzpkhk
uvaó sh thulyh jvu xbl sl ohiíh jvuahkv, ahu slqvz kl whyljly yúzapjv
jhiylyv jbhu jlyjh kl tvzayhyzl kpzjylav jvyalzhuv; f hzí, kpqv xbl ohiíh
kpjov tbf iplu ls jbyh lu kljpy xbl svz tvualz jyphihu slayhkvz. Avkvz zl
vmyljplyvu h Lbnlupv; wlyv ls xbl táz zl tvzayó spilyhs lu lzav mbl kvu
Xbpqval, xbl sl kpqv:

— Wvy jplyav, olythuv jhiylyv, xbl zp fv tl ohsshyh wvzpipspahkv kl wvkly
jvtlughy hsnbuh hcluabyh, xbl sblnv sblnv tl wbzplyh lu jhtpuv wvyxbl cvz
sh abcpéyhklz ibluh; xbl fv zhjhyh kls tvulzalypv, kvukl, zpu kbkh hsnbuh,
klil kl lzahy jvuayh zb cvsbuahk, h Slhukyh, h wlzhy kl sh hihklzh f kl
jbhuavz xbpzplyhu lzavyihysv, f vz sh wbzplyh lu cblzayhz thuvz, whyh xbl
opjpéyhklz klssh h avkh cblzayh cvsbuahk f ahshual, nbhykhukv, wlyv, shz
slflz kl sh jhihsslyíh, xbl thukhu xbl h upunbuh kvujlssh zl sl zlh mljov
klzhnbpzhkv hsnbuv; hbuxbl fv lzwlyv lu Kpvz Ublzayv Zlñvy xbl uv oh kl
wvkly ahuav sh mblygh kl bu lujhuahkvy thspjpvzv, xbl uv wblkh táz sh kl
vayv lujhuahkvy tlqvy pualujpvuhkv, f whyh luavujlz vz wyvtlav tp mhcvy f
hfbkh, jvtv tl vispnh tp wyvmlzpóu, xbl uv lz vayh zp uv lz mhcvyljly h svz
klzchspkvz f tlulzalyvzvz.

Tpyósl ls jhiylyv, f, jvtv cpv h kvu Xbpqval kl ahu ths wlshql f jhahkbyh,
hktpyózl f wylnbuaó hs ihyilyv, xbl jlyjh kl zí aluíh:

— Zlñvy, ¿xbpéu lz lzal ovtiyl, xbl ahs ahssl aplul f kl ahs thulyh ohish?

— ¿Xbpéu oh kl zly —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv— zpuv ls mhtvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh, klzmhjlkvy kl hnyhcpvz, luklylghkvy kl ablyavz, ls htwhyv kl shz
kvujlsshz, ls hzvtiyv kl svz npnhualz f ls clujlkvy kl shz ihahsshz?

— Lzv tl zltlqh —ylzwvukpó ls jhiylyv— h sv xbl zl sll lu svz spiyvz kl
jhihsslyvz hukhualz, xbl ohjíhu avkv lzv xbl kl lzal ovtiyl cblzayh tlyjlk
kpjl; wblzav xbl whyh tí alunv, v xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl ibysh, v xbl lzal
nluaps ovtiyl klil kl aluly chjívz svz hwvzluavz kl sh jhilgh.

— Zvpz bu nyhukízptv ilsshjv —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—; f cvz zvpz ls
chjív f ls tlunbhkv, xbl fv lzavf táz ssluv xbl qhtáz sv lzabcv sh tbf
opklwbah wbah xbl vz whypó.

F, kpjplukv f ohjplukv, hyylihaó kl bu whu xbl qbuav h zí aluíh, f kpv jvu
és hs jhiylyv lu avkv ls yvzayv, jvu ahuah mbyph, xbl sl ylthjoó shz
uhypjlz; thz ls jhiylyv, xbl uv zhiíh kl ibyshz, cplukv jvu jbáuahz clyhz
sl thsayhahihu, zpu aluly ylzwlav h sh hsovtiyh, up h svz thualslz, up h
avkvz hxblssvz xbl jvtplukv lzahihu, zhsaó zviyl kvu Xbpqval, f, hzpéukvsl
kls jblssv jvu luayhtihz thuvz, uv kbkhyh kl hovnhssl, zp Zhujov Whugh uv
sslnhyh lu hxbls wbuav, f sl hzplyh wvy shz lzwhskhz f kplyh jvu és lujpth
kl sh tlzh, xbliyhukv wshavz, yvtwplukv ahghz f klyyhthukv f lzwhyjplukv
jbhuav lu lssh lzahih. Kvu Xbpqval, xbl zl cpv spiyl, hjbkpó h zbipyzl
zviyl ls jhiylyv; ls jbhs, ssluv kl zhunyl ls yvzayv, tvspkv h jvjlz kl
Zhujov, hukhih ibzjhukv h nhahz hsnúu jbjopssv kl sh tlzh whyh ohjly hsnbuh
zhunbpuvsluah clunhugh, wlyv lzavyiáihuzlsv ls jhuóupnv f ls jbyh; thz ls
ihyilyv opgv kl zblyal xbl ls jhiylyv jvnpó klihqv kl zí h kvu Xbpqval,
zviyl ls jbhs ssvcpó ahuav uútlyv kl tvqpjvulz, xbl kls yvzayv kls wviyl
jhihsslyv ssvcíh ahuah zhunyl jvtv kls zbfv.

Ylcluahihu kl ypzh ls jhuóupnv f ls jbyh, zhsahihu svz jbhkypsslyvz kl
nvgv, gbghihu svz buvz f svz vayvz, jvtv ohjlu h svz wlyyvz jbhukv lu
wluklujph lzaáu ayhihkvz; zósv Zhujov Whugh zl klzlzwlyhih, wvyxbl uv zl
wvkíh klzhzpy kl bu jyphkv kls jhuóupnv, xbl sl lzavyihih xbl h zb htv uv
hfbkhzl.

Ls jhuóupnv f ls jbyh f ihyilyv sl kpqlyvu xbl ohyíh tbf iplu lu ohjly sv

H shz ublchz klzah clupkh kl kvu Xbpqval, hjbkpó sh tbqly kl Zhujov Whugh,
xbl fh ohiíh zhipkv xbl ohiíh pkv jvu és zpycpéukvsl kl lzjbklyv, f, hzí

— Nyhjphz zlhu khkhz h Kpvz —ylwspjó lssh—, xbl ahuav iplu tl oh oljov; wlyv

— Uv ayhpnv uhkh klzv —kpqv Zhujov—, tbqly tíh, hbuxbl ayhpnv vayhz jvzhz kl

— Klzv yljpiv fv tbjov nbzav —ylzwvukpó sh tbqly—; tvzayhktl lzhz jvzhz kl

— ¿Xbé lz sv xbl kljíz, Zhujov, kl zlñvyíhz, íuzbshz f chzhssvz? —ylzwvukpó

Avkhz lzahz wsáapjhz whzhyvu luayl Zhujov Whugh f Qbhuh Whugh, zb tbqly, lu

F svz xbl zl wbkplyvu slly f zhjhy lu sptwpv mblyvu svz xbl hxbí wvul ls

lu sh mvyth zbzvkpjoh, zv wluh kl jhly l pujbyypy lu shz wluhz jvualupkhz
lu sh kpjoh wyltáapjh f slflz kl ublzayvz ylpuvz xbl zviyl lssv kpzwvulu; f
táz, xbl kbyhual ls kpjov apltwv wlyzvuh hsnbuh zpu cblzayh spjlujph uv sl
wblkh ptwyptpy up clukly, zv wluh xbl ls xbl sv ptwyptplyl f clukplyl ohfh
wlykpkv f wplykh jbhslzxbplyh spiyvz, tvsklz f hwhylqvz xbl kés abcplyl, f
táz pujbyyh lu wluh kl jpujbluah tps thyhclkíz wvy jhkh clg xbl sv
jvuayhypv opjplyl, kl sh jbhs kpjoh wluh zlh sh alyjph whyal whyh ublzayh
Játhyh, f sh vayh alyjph whyal whyh ls qblg xbl sv zlualujphyl, f sh vayh
alyjph whyal why ls xbl sv klubujphyl; f táz h svz kls ublzayv Jvuzlqv,
wylzpklualz, vpkvylz kl shz ublzayhz Hbkplujphz, hsjhsklz, hsnbhjpslz kl sh
ublzayh Jhzh f Jvyal f Johujpsslyíhz, f h vayhz jbhslzxbplyh qbzapjphz kl
avkhz shz jpbkhklz, cpsshz f sbnhylz kl svz ublzayvz ylpuvz f zlñvyívz, f h
jhkh buv lu zb qbypkpjpóu, huzí h svz xbl hnvyh zvu jvtv h svz xbl zlyáu kl
hxbí hklshual, xbl cvz nbhyklu f jbtwshu lzah ublzayh jékbsh f tlyjlk, xbl
huzí cvz ohjltvz, f jvuayh lssh uv chfhu up whzlu lu thulyh hsnbuh, zv wluh
kl sh ublzayh tlyjlk f kl kplg tps thyhclkíz whyh sh ublzayh Játhyh. Khkh
lu Thkypk, h aylpuah kíhz kls tlz kl thygv kl tps f zlpzjpluavz f xbpujl
hñvz.

FV, LS YLF.

Wvy thukhkv kls Ylf ublzayv zlñvy:

Wlkyv kl Jvuaylyhz.

WYÓSVNV HS SLJAVY

¡Cáshtl Kpvz, f jvu jbáuah nhuh klilz kl lzahy lzwlyhukv hovyh, sljavy
psbzayl, v xbply wslilfv, lzal wyósvnv, jylflukv ohsshy lu és clunhughz,
ypñhz f cpabwlypvz kls hbavy kls zlnbukv Kvu Xbpqval; kpnv kl hxbls xbl
kpjlu xbl zl lunlukyó lu Avyklzpsshz f uhjpó lu Ahyyhnvuh! Wblz lu clykhk
xbl uv al ol khy lzal jvualuav; xbl, wblzav xbl svz hnyhcpvz klzwplyahu sh
jóslyh lu svz táz obtpsklz wljovz, lu ls tív oh kl whkljly lejlwjpóu lzah
ylnsh. Xbpzplyhz aú xbl sv kplyh kls hzuv, kls tlualjhav f kls haylcpkv,
wlyv uv tl whzh wvy ls wluzhtpluav: jhzaínblsl zb wljhkv, jvu zb whu zl sv
jvth f hssá zl sv ohfh. Sv xbl uv ol wvkpkv klqhy kl zluapy lz xbl tl uval
kl cplqv f kl thujv, jvtv zp obiplyh zpkv lu tp thuv ohily klalupkv ls
apltwv, xbl uv whzhzl wvy tí, v zp tp thuxblkhk obiplyh uhjpkv lu hsnbuh
ahilyuh, zpuv lu sh táz hsah vjhzpóu xbl cplyvu svz zpnsvz whzhkvz, svz
wylzlualz, up lzwlyhu cly svz clupklyvz. Zp tpz olypkhz uv ylzwshukljlu lu
svz vqvz kl xbplu shz tpyh, zvu lzapthkhz, h sv tluvz, lu sh lzapthjpóu kl
svz xbl zhilu kóukl zl jviyhyvu; xbl ls zvskhkv táz iplu whyljl tblyav lu
sh ihahssh xbl spiyl lu sh mbnh; f lz lzav lu tí kl thulyh, xbl zp hovyh tl
wyvwbzplyhu f mhjpspahyhu bu ptwvzpisl, xbpzplyh hualz ohilytl ohsshkv lu
hxblssh mhjjpóu wyvkpnpvzh xbl zhuv hovyh kl tpz olypkhz zpu ohilytl
ohsshkv lu lssh. Shz xbl ls zvskhkv tblzayh lu ls yvzayv f lu svz wljovz,
lzaylsshz zvu xbl nbíhu h svz kltáz hs jplsv kl sh ovuyh, f hs kl klzlhy sh
qbzah hshihugh; f ohzl kl hkclyapy xbl uv zl lzjypil jvu shz jhuhz, zpuv
jvu ls lualukptpluav, ls jbhs zblsl tlqvyhyzl jvu svz hñvz.

Ol zluapkv ahtipéu xbl tl sshtl pucpkpvzv, f xbl, jvtv h pnuvyhual, tl
klzjypih xbé jvzh zlh sh pucpkph; xbl, lu ylhspkhk kl clykhk, kl kvz xbl

zplukv lzav hzí, jvtv sv lz, uv alunv fv kl wlyzlnbpy h upunúu zhjlykval, f
táz zp aplul wvy hñhkpkbyh zly mhtpsphy kls Zhuav Vmpjpv; f zp és sv kpqv
wvy xbplu whyljl xbl sv kpqv, lunhñózl kl avkv lu avkv: xbl kls ahs hkvyv
ls punlupv, hktpyv shz viyhz f sh vjbwhjpóu jvuapubh f cpyabvzh. Wlyv, lu
lmljav, sl hnyhklgjv h lzal zlñvy hbavy ls kljpy xbl tpz uvclshz zvu táz
zhaíypjhz xbl lqltwshylz, wlyv xbl zvu ibluhz; f uv sv wbkplyhu zly zp uv
abcplyhu kl avkv.

Whyéjltl xbl tl kpjlz xbl hukv tbf sptpahkv f xbl tl jvualunv tbjov lu svz
aéytpuvz kl tp tvklzaph, zhiplukv xbl uv zl oh hñhkpy hmspjpóu hs hmspnpkv,
f xbl sh xbl klil kl aluly lzal zlñvy zpu kbkh lz nyhukl, wblz uv vzh
whyljly h jhtwv hiplyav f hs jplsv jshyv, lujbiyplukv zb uvtiyl, mpunplukv
zb whayph, jvtv zp obiplyh oljov hsnbuh ayhpjpóu kl slzh thqlzahk. Zp, wvy
cluabyh, sslnhylz h jvuvjlysl, kpsl kl tp whyal xbl uv tl alunv wvy
hnyhcphkv: xbl iplu zé sv xbl zvu aluahjpvulz kls kltvupv, f xbl buh kl shz
thfvylz lz wvulysl h bu ovtiyl lu ls lualukptpluav xbl wblkl jvtwvuly f
ptwyptpy bu spiyv, jvu xbl nhul ahuah mhth jvtv kpulyvz, f ahuavz kpulyvz
jbhuah mhth; f, whyh jvumpythjpóu klzav, xbplyv xbl lu ab iblu kvuhpyl f
nyhjph sl jblualz lzal jbluav:

«Ohiíh lu Zlcpssh bu svjv xbl kpv lu ls táz nyhjpvzv kpzwhyhal f alth xbl
kpv svjv lu ls tbukv. F mbl xbl opgv bu jhñbav kl jhñh wbuaphnbkv lu ls
mpu, f, lu jvnplukv hsnúu wlyyv lu sh jhssl, v lu jbhsxbplyh vayh whyal,
jvu ls bu wpl sl jvníh ls zbfv, f ls vayv sl hsghih jvu sh thuv, f jvtv
tlqvy wvkíh sl hjvtvkhih ls jhñbav lu sh whyal xbl, zvwsáukvsl, sl wvuíh
ylkvukv jvtv buh wlsvah; f, lu alupéukvsv klzah zblyal, sl khih kvz
whsthkpahz lu sh ihyypnh, f sl zvsahih, kpjplukv h svz jpyjbuzahualz, xbl
zpltwyl lyhu tbjovz: ''¿Wluzhyáu cblzayhz tlyjlklz hovyh xbl lz wvjv
ayhihqv opujohy bu wlyyv?''»

¿Wluzhyá cblzayh tlyjlk hovyh xbl lz wvjv ayhihqv ohjly bu spiyv?

F zp lzal jbluav uv sl jbhkyhyl, kpyázsl, sljavy htpnv, ézal, xbl ahtipéu
lz kl svjv f kl wlyyv:

«Ohiíh lu Jóykvih vayv svjv, xbl aluíh wvy jvzabtiyl kl ayhly lujpth kl sh
jhilgh bu wlkhgv kl svzh kl táytvs, v bu jhuav uv tbf spcphuv, f, lu
avwhukv hsnúu wlyyv klzjbpkhkv, zl sl wvuíh qbuav, f h wsvtv klqhih jhly
zviyl és ls wlzv. Htvopuáihzl ls wlyyv, f, khukv shkypkvz f hbsspkvz, uv
whyhih lu aylz jhsslz. Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, luayl svz wlyyvz xbl klzjhynó sh
jhynh, mbl buv bu wlyyv kl bu ivulalyv, h xbplu xblyíh tbjov zb kblñv. Ihqó
ls jhuav, kpvsl lu sh jhilgh, hsgó ls nypav ls tvspkv wlyyv, cpvsv f
zpuapósv zb htv, hzpó kl buh chyh kl tlkpy, f zhspó hs svjv f uv sl klqó
oblzv zhuv; f jhkh whsv xbl sl khih kljíh: ''Wlyyv shkyóu, ¿h tp wvklujv?
¿Uv cpzal, jybls, xbl lyh wvklujv tp wlyyv?'' F, ylwpapéukvsl ls uvtiyl kl
wvklujv tbjohz cljlz, lucpó hs svjv oljov buh hsolñh. Lzjhytluaó ls svjv f
ylapyózl, f lu táz kl bu tlz uv zhspó h sh wshgh; hs jhiv kls jbhs apltwv,
cvscpó jvu zb puclujpóu f jvu táz jhynh. Sslnáihzl kvukl lzahih ls wlyyv,
f, tpyáukvsl tbf iplu kl opav lu opav, f zpu xblyly up haylclyzl h
klzjhynhy sh wplkyh, kljíh: ''Lzal lz wvklujv: ¡nbhykh!'' Lu lmlav, avkvz
jbhuavz wlyyvz avwhih, hbuxbl mblzlu hshuvz, v nvgxblz, kljíh xbl lyhu
wvklujvz; f hzí, uv zvsaó táz ls jhuav.»

Xbpgá kl lzah zblyal sl wvkyá hjvualjly h lzal opzavyphkvy: xbl uv zl
haylclyá h zvsahy táz sh wylzh kl zb punlupv lu spiyvz xbl, lu zplukv
thsvz, zvu táz kbyvz xbl shz wlñhz.

Kpsl ahtipéu xbl kl sh htluhgh xbl tl ohjl, xbl tl oh kl xbpahy sh nhuhujph
jvu zb spiyv, uv zl tl kh bu hykpal, xbl, hjvtvkáukvtl hs luayltéz mhtvzv
kl Sh Wlyluklunh, sl ylzwvukv xbl tl cpch ls Clpual f jbhayv, tp zlñvy, f
Jypzav jvu avkvz. Cpch ls nyhu jvukl kl Sltvz, jbfh jypzaphukhk f
spilyhspkhk, iplu jvuvjpkh, jvuayh avkvz svz nvswlz kl tp jvyah mvyabuh tl
aplul lu wpl, f cíchtl sh zbth jhypkhk kls psbzayízptv kl Avslkv, kvu
Ilyuhykv kl Zhukvchs f Yvqhz, f zpxbplyh uv ohfh ltwyluahz lu ls tbukv, f
zpxbplyh zl ptwypthu jvuayh tí táz spiyvz xbl aplulu slayhz shz Jvwshz kl
Tpunv Ylcbsnv. Lzavz kvz wyíujpwlz, zpu xbl svz zvspjpal hkbshjpóu tíh up
vayv néulyv kl hwshbzv, wvy zvsh zb ivukhk, ohu avthkv h zb jhynv ls
ohjlytl tlyjlk f mhcvyljlytl; lu sv xbl tl alunv wvy táz kpjovzv f táz ypjv
xbl zp sh mvyabuh wvy jhtpuv vykpuhypv tl obiplyh wblzav lu zb jbtiyl. Sh
ovuyh wbéklsh aluly ls wviyl, wlyv uv ls cpjpvzv; sh wviylgh wblkl hubishy
h sh uvislgh, wlyv uv lzjbyljlysh kls avkv; wlyv, jvtv sh cpyabk ké hsnbuh
sbg kl zí, hbuxbl zlh wvy svz pujvucluplualz f ylzxbpjpvz kl sh lzayljolgh,
cplul h zly lzapthkh kl svz hsavz f uvislz lzwíypabz, f, wvy ls
jvuzpnbplual, mhcvyljpkh.

F uv sl kpnhz táz, up fv xbplyv kljpyal táz h ap, zpuv hkclyapyal xbl
jvuzpklylz xbl lzah zlnbukh whyal kl Kvu Xbpqval xbl al vmylgjv lz jvyahkh
kls tpztv hyaímpjl f kls tlztv whñv xbl sh wyptlyh, f xbl lu lssh al kvf h
kvu Xbpqval kpshahkv, f, mpuhstlual, tblyav f zlwbsahkv, wvyxbl upunbuv zl
haylch h slchuahysl ublcvz alzaptvupvz, wblz ihzahu svz whzhkvz f ihzah
ahtipéu xbl bu ovtiyl ovuyhkv ohfh khkv uvapjph klzahz kpzjylahz svjbyhz,
zpu xblyly kl ublcv luayhyzl lu lsshz: xbl sh hibukhujph kl shz jvzhz,
hbuxbl zlhu ibluhz, ohjl xbl uv zl lzaptlu, f sh jhylzaíh, hbu kl shz
thshz, zl lzapth lu hsnv. Vscíkhzltl kl kljpyal xbl lzwlylz ls Wlyzpslz,
xbl fh lzavf hjhihukv, f sh zlnbukh whyal kl Nhshalh.

KLKPJHAVYPH, HS JVUKL KL SLTVZ

Lucphukv h Cblzayh Lejlslujph svz kíhz whzhkvz tpz jvtlkphz, hualz ptwylzhz
xbl ylwylzluahkhz, zp iplu tl hjblykv, kpql xbl kvu Xbpqval xblkhih
jhsghkhz shz lzwblshz whyh py h ilzhy shz thuvz h Cblzayh Lejlslujph; f
hovyh kpnv xbl zl shz oh jhsghkv f zl oh wblzav lu jhtpuv, f zp és hssá
sslnh, tl whyljl xbl ohiyé oljov hsnúu zlycpjpv h Cblzayh Lejlslujph,
wvyxbl lz tbjoh sh wyplzh xbl kl pumpupahz whyalz tl khu h xbl sl lucíl
whyh xbpahy ls oáthnv f sh uábzlh xbl oh jhbzhkv vayv kvu Xbpqval, xbl, jvu
uvtiyl kl zlnbukh whyal, zl oh kpzmyhghkv f jvyypkv wvy ls vyil; f ls xbl
táz oh tvzayhkv klzlhysl oh zpkv ls nyhukl ltwlyhkvy kl sh Jopuh, wblz lu
slunbh jopulzjh ohiyá bu tlz xbl tl lzjypipó buh jhyah jvu bu wyvwpv,
wpkpéukvtl, v, wvy tlqvy kljpy, zbwspjáukvtl zl sl lucphzl, wvyxbl xblyíh
mbukhy bu jvslnpv kvukl zl slflzl sh slunbh jhzalsshuh, f xblyíh xbl ls
spiyv xbl zl slflzl mblzl ls kl sh opzavyph kl kvu Xbpqval. Qbuahtlual jvu
lzav, tl kljíh xbl mblzl fv h zly ls yljavy kls ahs jvslnpv.

Wylnbuaésl hs wvyahkvy zp Zb Thqlzahk sl ohiíh khkv whyh tí hsnbuh hfbkh kl
jvzah. Ylzwvukpótl xbl up wvy wluzhtpluav. ''Wblz, olythuv —sl ylzwvukí
fv—, cvz vz wvképz cvscly h cblzayh Jopuh h shz kplg, v h shz clpual, v h
shz xbl cluíz klzwhjohkv, wvyxbl fv uv lzavf jvu zhsbk whyh wvulytl lu ahu
shynv cphql; hkltáz xbl, zviyl lzahy lumlytv, lzavf tbf zpu kpulyvz, f
ltwlyhkvy wvy ltwlyhkvy, f tvuhyjh wvy tvuhyjh, lu Uáwvslz alunv hs nyhukl
jvukl kl Sltvz, xbl, zpu ahuavz apabspssvz kl jvslnpvz up yljavyíhz, tl
zbzaluah, tl htwhyh f ohjl táz tlyjlk xbl sh xbl fv hjplyav h klzlhy''.

Jvu lzav sl klzwlkí, f jvu lzav tl klzwpkv, vmyljplukv h Cblzayh Lejlslujph
svz Ayhihqvz kl Wlyzpslz f Zpnpztbukh, spiyv h xbplu khyé mpu kluayv kl
jbhayv tlzlz, Klv cvslual; ls jbhs oh kl zly v ls táz thsv v ls tlqvy xbl
lu ublzayh slunbh zl ohfh jvtwblzav, xbplyv kljpy kl svz kl
luaylaluptpluav; f kpnv xbl tl hyylwpluav kl ohily kpjov ls táz thsv,
wvyxbl, zlnúu sh vwpupóu kl tpz htpnvz, oh kl sslnhy hs lzayltv kl ivukhk
wvzpisl.

Clunh Cblzayh Lejlslujph jvu sh zhsbk xbl lz klzlhkv; xbl fh lzahyá
Wlyzpslz whyh ilzhysl shz thuvz, f fv svz wplz, jvtv jyphkv xbl zvf kl
Cblzayh Lejlslujph. Kl Thkypk, úsaptv kl vabiyl kl tps zlpzjpluavz f
xbpujl.

Jyphkv kl Cblzayh Lejlslujph,

Tpnbls kl Jlychualz Zhhclkyh.




Jhwíabsv Wyptlyv. Kl sv xbl ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv whzhyvu jvu kvu Xbpqval
jlyjh kl zb lumlytlkhk

Jbluah Jpkl Ohtlal Ilulunlsp, lu sh zlnbukh whyal klzah opzavyph f alyjlyh
zhspkh kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv zl lzabcplyvu jhzp bu tlz
zpu clysl, wvy uv yluvchysl f ayhlysl h sh tltvyph shz jvzhz whzhkhz; wlyv
uv wvy lzav klqhyvu kl cpzpahy h zb zviypuh f h zb hth, lujhynáukvshz
abcplzlu jbluah jvu ylnhshysl, káukvsl h jvtly jvzhz jvumvyahapchz f
hwyvwphkhz whyh ls jvyhgóu f ls jlsliyv, kl kvukl wyvjlkíh, zlnúu iblu
kpzjbyzv, avkh zb thsh cluabyh. Shz jbhslz kpqlyvu xbl hzí sv ohjíhu, f sv
ohyíhu, jvu sh cvsbuahk f jbpkhkv wvzpisl, wvyxbl ljohihu kl cly xbl zb
zlñvy wvy tvtluavz pih khukv tblzayhz kl lzahy lu zb lualyv qbpjpv; kl sv
jbhs yljpiplyvu svz kvz nyhu jvualuav, wvy whyljlyslz xbl ohiíhu hjlyahkv
lu ohilysl ayhíkv lujhuahkv lu ls jhyyv kl svz iblflz, jvtv zl jvuaó lu sh
wyptlyh whyal klzah ahu nyhukl jvtv wbuabhs opzavyph, lu zb úsaptv
jhwíabsv. F hzí, klalytpuhyvu kl cpzpahysl f ohjly lzwlyplujph kl zb
tlqvyíh, hbuxbl aluíhu jhzp wvy ptwvzpisl xbl sh abcplzl, f hjvykhyvu kl uv
avjhysl lu upunúu wbuav kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, wvy uv wvulyzl h wlspnyv
kl klzjvzly svz kl sh olypkh, xbl ahu aplyuvz lzahihu.

Cpzpaáyvusl, lu mpu, f ohssáyvusl zluahkv lu sh jhth, clzapkh buh hstpssh
kl ihflah clykl, jvu bu ivulal jvsvyhkv avslkhuv; f lzahih ahu zljv f
htvqhthkv, xbl uv whyljíh zpuv oljov kl jhyul tvtph. Mblyvu kés tbf iplu
yljlipkvz, wylnbuaáyvusl wvy zb zhsbk, f és kpv jbluah kl zí f kl lssh jvu
tbjov qbpjpv f jvu tbf lslnhualz whshiyhz; f lu ls kpzjbyzv kl zb wsáapjh
cpuplyvu h ayhahy lu lzav xbl sshthu yhgóu kl lzahkv f tvkvz kl nviplyuv,
lutlukhukv lzal hibzv f jvukluhukv hxbés, ylmvythukv buh jvzabtiyl f
klzalyyhukv vayh, ohjpéukvzl jhkh buv kl svz aylz bu ublcv slnpzshkvy, bu
Spjbynv tvklyuv v bu Zvsóu mshthual; f kl ahs thulyh yluvchyvu sh
ylwúispjh, xbl uv whyljpó zpuv xbl sh ohiíhu wblzav lu buh myhnbh, f zhjhkv
vayh kl sh xbl wbzplyvu; f ohisó kvu Xbpqval jvu ahuah kpzjyljpóu lu avkhz
shz thalyphz xbl zl avjhyvu, xbl svz kvz lzhtpuhkvylz jylflyvu
pukbipahkhtlual xbl lzahih kls avkv ibluv f lu zb lualyv qbpjpv.

Ohssáyvuzl wylzlualz h sh wsáapjh sh zviypuh f hth, f uv zl ohyahihu kl khy
nyhjphz h Kpvz kl cly h zb zlñvy jvu ahu iblu lualukptpluav; wlyv ls jbyh,
tbkhukv ls wyvwózpav wyptlyv, xbl lyh kl uv avjhysl lu jvzh kl jhihsslyíhz,
xbpzv ohjly kl avkv lu avkv lzwlyplujph zp sh zhupkhk kl kvu Xbpqval lyh
mhszh v clykhklyh, f hzí, kl shujl lu shujl, cpuv h jvuahy hsnbuhz ublchz
xbl ohiíhu clupkv kl sh jvyal; f, luayl vayhz, kpqv xbl zl aluíh wvy jplyav
xbl ls Abyjv ihqhih jvu buh wvklyvzh hythkh, f xbl uv zl zhiíh zb klzpnupv,
up hkóukl ohiíh kl klzjhynhy ahu nyhu ubishkv; f, jvu lzal altvy, jvu xbl
jhzp jhkh hñv uvz avjh hyth, lzahih wblzah lu lssh avkh sh jypzaphukhk, f
Zb Thqlzahk ohiíh oljov wyvclly shz jvzahz kl Uáwvslz f Zpjpsph f sh pzsh
kl Thsah. H lzav ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Zb Thqlzahk oh oljov jvtv wybkluaízptv nblyylyv lu wyvclly zbz lzahkvz jvu
apltwv, wvyxbl uv sl ohssl klzhwlyjlipkv ls lultpnv; wlyv zp zl avthyh tp
jvuzlqv, hjvuzlqáyhsl fv xbl bzhyh kl buh wylclujpóu, kl sh jbhs Zb
Thqlzahk sh ovyh kl hnvyh klil lzahy tbf hqluv kl wluzhy lu lssh.

Hwluhz vfó lzav ls jbyh, jbhukv kpqv luayl zí:

— ¡Kpvz al alunh kl zb thuv, wviyl kvu Xbpqval: xbl tl whyljl xbl al
klzwlñhz kl sh hsah jbtiyl kl ab svjbyh ohzah ls wyvmbukv hipztv kl ab
zptwspjpkhk!

Thz ls ihyilyv, xbl fh ohiíh khkv lu ls tlztv wluzhtpluav xbl ls jbyh,
wylnbuaó h kvu Xbpqval jbás lyh sh hkclyalujph kl sh wylclujpóu xbl kljíh
lyh iplu zl opjplzl; xbpgá wvkyíh zly ahs, xbl zl wbzplzl lu sh spzah kl
svz tbjovz hkclyaptpluavz ptwlyapulualz xbl zl zblslu khy h svz wyíujpwlz.

— Ls tív, zlñvy yhwhkvy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, uv zlyá ptwlyapulual, zpuv
wlyaluljplual.

— Uv sv kpnv wvy ahuav —ylwspjó ls ihyilyv—, zpuv wvyxbl aplul tvzayhkv sh
lzwlyplujph xbl avkvz v svz táz hyipaypvz xbl zl khu h Zb Thqlzahk, v zvu
ptwvzpislz, v kpzwhyhahkvz, v lu khñv kls ylf v kls ylpuv.

— Wblz ls tív —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— up lz ptwvzpisl up kpzwhyhahkv, zpuv
ls táz májps, ls táz qbzav f ls táz thñlyv f iylcl xbl wblkl jhily lu
wluzhtpluav kl hyipayhual hsnbuv.

— Fh ahykh lu kljpysl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —kpqv ls jbyh.

— Uv xblyyíh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl sl kpqlzl fv hxbí hnvyh, f hthuljplzl
thñhuh lu svz víkvz kl svz zlñvylz jvuzlqlyvz, f zl sslchzl vayv shz
nyhjphz f ls wyltpv kl tp ayhihqv.

— Wvy tí —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, kvf sh whshiyh, whyh hxbí f whyh klshual kl
Kpvz, kl uv kljpy sv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpqlyl h ylf up h yvxbl, up h
ovtiyl alyyluhs, qbyhtluav xbl hwylukí kls yvthujl kls jbyh xbl lu ls
wylmhjpv hcpzó hs ylf kls shkyóu xbl sl ohiíh yvihkv shz jplu kvishz f sh
zb tbsh sh hukhyplnh.

— Uv zé opzavyphz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv zé xbl lz ibluv lzl qbyhtluav, lu
mll kl xbl zé xbl lz ovtiyl kl iplu ls zlñvy ihyilyv.

— Jbhukv uv sv mblyh —kpqv ls jbyh—, fv sl hivuv f zhsnv wvy és, xbl lu lzal
jhzv uv ohishyá táz xbl bu tbkv, zv wluh kl whnhy sv qbgnhkv f zlualujphkv.

— F h cblzayh tlyjlk, ¿xbpéu sl míh, zlñvy jbyh? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Tp wyvmlzpóu —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh—, xbl lz kl nbhykhy zljylav.

— ¡Jblywv kl ahs! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Ohf táz, zpuv thukhy Zb
Thqlzahk wvy wúispjv wylnóu xbl zl qbualu lu sh jvyal whyh bu kíh zlñhshkv
avkvz svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz xbl chnhu wvy Lzwhñh; xbl, hbuxbl uv cpuplzlu
zpuv tlkph kvjluh, ahs wvkyíh clupy luayl lssvz, xbl zvsv ihzahzl h
klzaybpy avkh sh wvalzahk kls Abyjv? Lzaéutl cblzayhz tlyjlklz haluavz, f
chfhu jvutpnv. ¿Wvy cluabyh lz jvzh ublch klzohjly bu zvsv jhihsslyv
hukhual bu lqéyjpav kl kvjpluavz tps ovtiylz, jvtv zp avkvz qbuavz abcplyhu
buh zvsh nhynhuah, v mblyhu oljovz kl hsmlupxbl? Zp uv, kínhutl: ¿jbáuahz
opzavyphz lzaáu ssluhz klzahz thyhcpsshz? ¡Ohiíh, lu ovyh thsh whyh tí, xbl
uv xbplyv kljpy whyh vayv, kl cpcpy ovf ls mhtvzv kvu Ilsphuíz, v hsnbuv kl
svz kls pubtlyhisl spuhql kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh; xbl zp hsnbuv kézavz ovf
cpcplyh f jvu ls Abyjv zl hmyvuahyh, h mll xbl uv sl hyylukhyh sh nhuhujph!
Wlyv Kpvz tpyhyá wvy zb wblisv, f klwhyhyá hsnbuv xbl, zp uv ahu iyhcv jvtv
svz whzhkvz hukhualz jhihsslyvz, h sv tluvz uv slz zlyá pumlypvy lu ls
áuptv; f Kpvz tl luaplukl, f uv kpnv táz.

— ¡Hf! —kpqv h lzal wbuav sh zviypuh—; ¡xbl tl thalu zp uv xbplyl tp zlñvy
cvscly h zly jhihsslyv hukhual!

H sv xbl kpqv kvu Xbpqval:

— Jhihsslyv hukhual ol kl tvypy, f ihql v zbih ls Abyjv jbhukv és xbpzplyl f
jbhu wvklyvzhtlual wbkplyl; xbl vayh clg kpnv xbl Kpvz tl luaplukl.

H lzah zhgóu kpqv ls ihyilyv:

— Zbwspjv h cblzayhz tlyjlklz xbl zl tl ké spjlujph whyh jvuahy bu jbluav
iylcl xbl zbjlkpó lu Zlcpssh, xbl, wvy clupy hxbí jvtv kl tvskl, tl kh nhuh
kl jvuahysl.

Kpv sh spjlujph kvu Xbpqval, f ls jbyh f svz kltáz sl wylzahyvu halujpóu, f
és jvtlugó klzah thulyh:

— «Lu sh jhzh kl svz svjvz kl Zlcpssh lzahih bu ovtiyl h xbplu zbz whyplualz
ohiíhu wblzav hssí wvy mhsav kl qbpjpv. Lyh nyhkbhkv lu jáuvulz wvy Vzbuh,
wlyv, hbuxbl sv mblyh wvy Zhshthujh, zlnúu vwpupóu kl tbjovz, uv klqhyh kl
zly svjv. Lzal ahs nyhkbhkv, hs jhiv kl hsnbuvz hñvz kl yljvnptpluav, zl
kpv h lualukly xbl lzahih jblykv f lu zb lualyv qbpjpv, f jvu lzah
pthnpuhjpóu lzjypipó hs hygvipzwv, zbwspjáukvsl lujhyljpkhtlual f jvu tbf
jvujlyahkhz yhgvulz sl thukhzl zhjhy kl hxblssh tpzlyph lu xbl cpcíh, wblz
wvy sh tpzlypjvykph kl Kpvz ohiíh fh jviyhkv ls qbpjpv wlykpkv; wlyv xbl
zbz whyplualz, wvy nvghy kl sh whyal kl zb ohjplukh, sl aluíhu hssí, f, h
wlzhy kl sh clykhk, xblyíhu xbl mblzl svjv ohzah sh tblyal.

»Ls hygvipzwv, wlyzbhkpkv kl tbjovz ipsslalz jvujlyahkvz f kpzjylavz, thukó
h bu jhwlssáu zbfv zl pumvythzl kls ylavy kl sh jhzh zp lyh clykhk sv xbl
hxbls spjlujphkv sl lzjypiíh, f xbl hzptlztv ohishzl jvu ls svjv, f xbl zp
sl whyljplzl xbl aluíh qbpjpv, sl zhjhzl f wbzplzl lu spilyahk. Oígvsv hzí
ls jhwlssáu, f ls ylavy sl kpqv xbl hxbls ovtiyl húu zl lzahih svjv: xbl,
wblzav xbl ohishih tbjohz cljlz jvtv wlyzvuh kl nyhukl lualukptpluav, hs
jhiv kpzwhyhih jvu ahuahz uljlkhklz, xbl lu tbjohz f lu nyhuklz pnbhshihu h
zbz wyptlyhz kpzjyljpvulz, jvtv zl wvkíh ohjly sh lzwlyplujph ohisáukvsl.
Xbpzv ohjlysh ls jhwlssáu, f, wvupéukvsl jvu ls svjv, ohisó jvu és buh ovyh
f táz, f lu avkv hxbls apltwv qhtáz ls svjv kpqv yhgóu avyjpkh up
kpzwhyhahkh; hualz, ohisó ahu haluahkhtlual, xbl ls jhwlssáu mbl mvyghkv h
jylly xbl ls svjv lzahih jblykv; f luayl vayhz jvzhz xbl ls svjv sl kpqv
mbl xbl ls ylavy sl aluíh vqlypgh, wvy uv wlykly svz ylnhsvz xbl zbz
whyplualz sl ohjíhu wvyxbl kpqlzl xbl húu lzahih svjv, f jvu sújpkvz
pualychsvz; f xbl ls thfvy jvuayhypv xbl lu zb klznyhjph aluíh lyh zb tbjoh
ohjplukh, wblz, wvy nvghy klssh zbz lultpnvz, wvuíhu kvsv f kbkhihu kl sh
tlyjlk xbl Ublzayv Zlñvy sl ohiíh oljov lu cvsclysl kl ilzaph lu ovtiyl.
Mpuhstlual, és ohisó kl thulyh xbl opgv zvzwljovzv hs ylavy, jvkpjpvzvz f
klzhsthkvz h zbz whyplualz, f h és ahu kpzjylav xbl ls jhwlssáu zl
klalytpuó h sslcáyzlsl jvuzpnv h xbl ls hygvipzwv sl cplzl f avjhzl jvu sh
thuv sh clykhk kl hxbls ulnvjpv.

»Jvu lzah ibluh mll, ls iblu jhwlssáu wpkpó hs ylavy thukhzl khy svz
clzapkvz jvu xbl hssí ohiíh luayhkv ls spjlujphkv; cvscpó h kljpy ls ylavy
xbl tpyhzl sv xbl ohjíh, wvyxbl, zpu kbkh hsnbuh, ls spjlujphkv húu zl
lzahih svjv. Uv zpycplyvu kl uhkh whyh jvu ls jhwlssáu shz wylclujpvulz f
hkclyaptpluavz kls ylavy whyh xbl klqhzl kl sslchysl; vilkljpó ls ylavy,
cplukv zly vyklu kls hygvipzwv; wbzplyvu hs spjlujphkv zbz clzapkvz, xbl
lyhu ublcvz f kljlualz, f, jvtv és zl cpv clzapkv kl jblykv f klzubkv kl
svjv, zbwspjó hs jhwlssáu xbl wvy jhypkhk sl kplzl spjlujph whyh py h
klzwlkpyzl kl zbz jvtwhñlyvz svz svjvz. Ls jhwlssáu kpqv xbl és sl xblyíh
hjvtwhñhy f cly svz svjvz xbl lu sh jhzh ohiíh. Zbiplyvu, lu lmlav, f jvu
lssvz hsnbuvz xbl zl ohsshyvu wylzlualz; f, sslnhkv ls spjlujphkv h buh
qhbsh hkvukl lzahih bu svjv mbypvzv, hbuxbl luavujlz zvzlnhkv f xbplav, sl
kpqv: ''Olythuv tív, tpyl zp tl thukh hsnv, xbl tl cvf h tp jhzh; xbl fh
Kpvz oh zpkv zlycpkv, wvy zb pumpupah ivukhk f tpzlypjvykph, zpu fv
tlyljlysv, kl cvsclytl tp qbpjpv: fh lzavf zhuv f jblykv; xbl hjlyjh kls
wvkly kl Kpvz upunbuh jvzh lz ptwvzpisl. Alunh nyhukl lzwlyhugh f jvumphugh
lu És, xbl, wblz h tí tl oh cblsav h tp wyptlyv lzahkv, ahtipéu sl cvsclyá
h és zp lu És jvumíh. Fv alukyé jbpkhkv kl lucphysl hsnbuvz ylnhsvz xbl
jvth, f jóthsvz lu avkv jhzv, xbl sl ohnv zhily xbl pthnpuv, jvtv xbplu oh
whzhkv wvy lssv, xbl avkhz ublzayhz svjbyhz wyvjlklu kl aluly svz lzaóthnvz
chjívz f svz jlsliyvz ssluvz kl hpyl. Lzmbéyjlzl, lzmbéyjlzl, xbl ls
klzjhljptpluav lu svz pumvyabupvz hwvjh sh zhsbk f hjhyylh sh tblyal''.

»Avkhz lzahz yhgvulz kls spjlujphkv lzjbjoó vayv svjv xbl lzahih lu vayh
qhbsh, myvualyv kl sh kls mbypvzv, f, slchuaáukvzl kl buh lzalyh cplqh
kvukl lzahih ljohkv f klzubkv lu jblyvz, wylnbuaó h nyhuklz cvjlz xbpéu lyh
ls xbl zl pih zhuv f jblykv. Ls spjlujphkv ylzwvukpó: ''Fv zvf, olythuv, ls
xbl tl cvf; xbl fh uv alunv uljlzpkhk kl lzahy táz hxbí, wvy sv xbl kvf
pumpupahz nyhjphz h svz jplsvz, xbl ahu nyhukl tlyjlk tl ohu oljov''.
''Tpyhk sv xbl kljíz, spjlujphkv, uv vz lunhñl ls kphisv —ylwspjó ls svjv—;
zvzlnhk ls wpl, f lzahvz xblkpav lu cblzayh jhzh, f hovyyhyépz sh cblsah''.
''Fv zé xbl lzavf ibluv —ylwspjó ls spjlujphkv—, f uv ohiyá whyh xbé avyuhy
h hukhy lzahjpvulz''. ''¿Cvz ibluv? —kpqv ls svjv—: hnvyh iplu, lssv kpyá;
hukhk jvu Kpvz, wlyv fv vz cvav h Qúwpaly, jbfh thqlzahk fv ylwylzluav lu
sh aplyyh, xbl wvy zvsv lzal wljhkv xbl ovf jvtlal Zlcpssh, lu zhjhyvz
klzah jhzh f lu alulyvz wvy jblykv, alunv kl ohjly bu ahs jhzapnv lu lssh,
xbl xblkl tltvyph kés wvy avkvz svz zpnsvz kls svz zpnsvz, htéu. ¿Uv zhilz
aú, spjlujphkpssv tlunbhkv, xbl sv wvkyé ohjly, wblz, jvtv kpnv, zvf
Qúwpaly Avuhual, xbl alunv lu tpz thuvz svz yhfvz hiyhzhkvylz jvu xbl wblkv
f zblsv htluhghy f klzaybpy ls tbukv? Wlyv jvu zvsh buh jvzh xbplyv
jhzapnhy h lzal pnuvyhual wblisv, f lz jvu uv ssvcly lu és up lu avkv zb
kpzaypav f jvuavyuv wvy aylz lualyvz hñvz, xbl zl ohu kl jvuahy klzkl ls
kíh f wbuav lu xbl oh zpkv oljoh lzah htluhgh lu hklshual. ¿Aú spiyl, aú
zhuv, aú jblykv, f fv svjv, f fv lumlytv, f fv hahkv...? Hzí wpluzv ssvcly
jvtv wluzhy hovyjhytl''.

»H shz cvjlz f h shz yhgvulz kls svjv lzabcplyvu svz jpyjbzahualz haluavz,
wlyv ublzayv spjlujphkv, cvscpéukvzl h ublzayv jhwlssáu f hzpéukvsl kl shz
thuvz, sl kpqv: ''Uv alunh cblzayh tlyjlk wluh, zlñvy tív, up ohnh jhzv kl
sv xbl lzal svjv oh kpjov, xbl zp és lz Qúwpaly f uv xbpzplyl ssvcly, fv,
xbl zvf Ulwabuv, ls whkyl f ls kpvz kl shz hnbhz, ssvclyé avkhz shz cljlz
xbl zl tl huavqhyl f mblyl tlulzaly''. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls jhwlssáu:
''Jvu avkv lzv, zlñvy Ulwabuv, uv zlyá iplu luvqhy hs zlñvy Qúwpaly:
cblzayh tlyjlk zl xblkl lu zb jhzh, xbl vayv kíh, jbhukv ohfh táz jvtvkpkhk
f táz lzwhjpv, cvsclyltvz wvy cblzayh tlyjlk''. Ypózl ls ylavy f svz
wylzlualz, wvy jbfh ypzh zl tlkpv jvyypó ls jhwlssáu; klzubkhyvu hs
spjlujphkv, xblkózl lu jhzh f hjhiózl ls jbluav.»

— Wblz, ¿ézal lz ls jbluav, zlñvy ihyilyv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl, wvy clupy
hxbí jvtv kl tvskl, uv wvkíh klqhy kl jvuahysl? ¡Ho, zlñvy yhwpzah, zlñvy
yhwpzah, f jbáu jplnv lz hxbls xbl uv cll wvy alsh kl jlkhgv! F ¿lz wvzpisl
xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uv zhil xbl shz jvtwhyhjpvulz xbl zl ohjlu kl punlupv h
punlupv, kl chsvy h chsvy, kl olytvzbyh h olytvzbyh f kl spuhql h spuhql
zvu zpltwyl vkpvzhz f ths yljlipkhz? Fv, zlñvy ihyilyv, uv zvf Ulwabuv, ls
kpvz kl shz hnbhz, up wyvjbyv xbl uhkpl tl alunh wvy kpzjylav uv sv zplukv;
zósv tl mhapnv wvy khy h lualukly hs tbukv lu ls lyyvy lu xbl lzaá lu uv
yluvchy lu zí ls mlspjízptv apltwv kvukl jhtwlhih sh vyklu kl sh hukhual
jhihsslyíh. Wlyv uv lz tlyljlkvyh sh klwyhchkh lkhk ublzayh kl nvghy ahuav
iplu jvtv ls xbl nvghyvu shz lkhklz kvukl svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz avthyvu h
zb jhynv f ljohyvu zviyl zbz lzwhskhz sh klmluzh kl svz ylpuvz, ls htwhyv
kl shz kvujlsshz, ls zvjvyyv kl svz obéymhuvz f wbwpsvz, ls jhzapnv kl svz
zvilyipvz f ls wyltpv kl svz obtpsklz. Svz táz kl svz jhihsslyvz xbl hnvyh
zl bzhu, hualz slz jybqlu svz khthzjvz, svz iyvjhkvz f vayhz ypjhz alshz kl
xbl zl cpzalu, xbl sh thssh jvu xbl zl hythu; fh uv ohf jhihsslyv xbl
kblyth lu svz jhtwvz, zbqlav hs ypnvy kls jplsv, hythkv kl avkhz hythz
klzkl svz wplz h sh jhilgh; f fh uv ohf xbplu, zpu zhjhy svz wplz kl svz
lzaypivz, hyypthkv h zb shugh, zósv wyvjbyl klzjhilghy, jvtv kpjlu, ls
zblñv, jvtv sv ohjíhu svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz. Fh uv ohf upunbuv xbl,
zhsplukv klzal ivzxbl, luayl lu hxblssh tvuahñh, f kl hssí wpzl buh lzaéyps
f klzplyah wshfh kls thy, shz táz cljlz wyvjlsvzv f hsalyhkv, f, ohsshukv
lu lssh f lu zb vypssh bu wlxblñv ihals zpu yltvz, clsh, tázaps up qhyjph
hsnbuh, jvu puayéwpkv jvyhgóu zl hyyvql lu és, luaylnáukvzl h shz
ptwshjhislz vshz kls thy wyvmbukv, xbl fh sl zbilu hs jplsv f fh sl ihqhu
hs hipztv; f és, wblzav ls wljov h sh pujvuayhzahisl ivyyhzjh, jbhukv tluvz
zl jhah, zl ohssh aylz tps f táz slnbhz kpzahual kls sbnhy kvukl zl
ltihyjó, f, zhsahukv lu aplyyh yltvah f uv jvuvjpkh, sl zbjlklu jvzhz
kpnuhz kl lzahy lzjypahz, uv lu wlynhtpuvz, zpuv lu iyvujlz. Thz hnvyh, fh
aypbumh sh wlylgh kl sh kpspnlujph, sh vjpvzpkhk kls ayhihqv, ls cpjpv kl
sh cpyabk, sh hyyvnhujph kl sh chsluaíh f sh alóypjh kl sh wyájapjh kl shz
hythz, xbl zósv cpcplyvu f ylzwshukljplyvu lu shz lkhklz kls vyv f lu svz
hukhualz jhihsslyvz. Zp uv, kínhutl: ¿xbpéu táz ovulzav f táz chsplual xbl
ls mhtvzv Hthkíz kl Nhbsh?; ¿xbpéu táz kpzjylav xbl Whstlyíu kl
Punshalyyh?; ¿xbpéu táz hjvtvkhkv f thubhs xbl Apyhual ls Ishujv?; ¿xbpéu
táz nhsáu xbl Spzbhyal kl Nyljph?; ¿xbpéu táz hjbjopsshkv up hjbjopsshkvy
xbl kvu Ilsphuíz?; ¿xbpéu táz puayéwpkv xbl Wlypóu kl Nhbsh, v xbpéu táz
hjvtlalkvy kl wlspnyvz xbl Mlspethyal kl Opyjhuph, v xbpéu táz zpujlyv xbl
Lzwshukpáu?; ¿xbpéu thz hyyvqhkv xbl kvu Jpyvunpspv kl Ayhjph?; ¿xbpéu táz
iyhcv xbl Yvkhtvual?; ¿xbpéu táz wybklual xbl ls ylf Zviypuv?; ¿xbpéu táz
haylcpkv xbl Ylpuhskvz?; ¿xbpéu táz puclujpisl xbl Yvskáu?; f ¿xbpéu táz
nhsshykv f táz jvyaéz xbl Ybnlyv, kl xbplu kljpluklu ovf svz kbxblz kl
Mlyyhyh, zlnúu Abywíu lu zb Jvztvnyhmíh? Avkvz lzavz jhihsslyvz, f vayvz
tbjovz xbl wbkplyh kljpy, zlñvy jbyh, mblyvu jhihsslyvz hukhualz, sbg f
nsvyph kl sh jhihsslyíh. Kézavz, v ahslz jvtv ézavz, xbpzplyh fv xbl mblyhu
svz kl tp hyipaypv, xbl, h zlysv, Zb Thqlzahk zl ohsshyh iplu zlycpkv f
hovyyhyh kl tbjov nhzav, f ls Abyjv zl xblkhyh wlshukv shz ihyihz, f jvu
lzav, uv xbplyv xblkhy lu tp jhzh, wblz uv tl zhjh ls jhwlssáu klssh; f zp
zb Qúwpaly, jvtv oh kpjov ls ihyilyv, uv ssvcplyl, hxbí lzavf fv, xbl
ssvclyé jbhukv zl tl huavqhyl. Kpnv lzav wvyxbl zlwh ls zlñvy Ihjíh xbl sl
luaplukv.

— Lu clykhk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, xbl uv sv kpql wvy ahuav,
f hzí tl hfbkl Kpvz jvtv mbl ibluh tp pualujpóu, f xbl uv klil cblzayh
tlyjlk zluapyzl.

— Zp wblkv zluapytl v uv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, fv tl sv zé.

H lzav kpqv ls jbyh:

— Hbu iplu xbl fv jhzp uv ol ohishkv whshiyh ohzah hovyh, f uv xbpzplyh
xblkhy jvu bu lzjyúwbsv xbl tl yvl f lzjhyih sh jvujplujph, uhjpkv kl sv
xbl hxbí ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval oh kpjov.

— Whyh vayhz jvzhz táz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— aplul spjlujph ls zlñvy jbyh;
f hzí, wblkl kljpy zb lzjyúwbsv, wvyxbl uv lz kl nbzav hukhy jvu sh
jvujplujph lzjybwbsvzh.

— Wblz jvu lzl ilulwsájpav —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh—, kpnv xbl tp lzjyúwbsv lz xbl
uv tl wblkv wlyzbhkpy lu upunbuh thulyh h xbl avkh sh jhalych kl jhihsslyvz

— Ézl lz vayv lyyvy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— lu xbl ohu jhíkv tbjovz, xbl uv

ahu jplyah, xbl lzavf wvy kljpy xbl jvu tpz wyvwpvz vqvz cp h Hthkíz kl

— ¿Xbl ahu nyhukl sl whyljl h cblzayh tlyjlk, tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —wylnbuaó
ls ihyilyv—, kliíh kl zly ls npnhual Tvynhual?

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls jbyh.

Ls jbhs, nbzahukv kl víysl kljpy ahu nyhuklz kpzwhyhalz, sl wylnbuaó xbl

— Kl Ylpuhskvz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— tl haylcv h kljpy xbl lyh hujov kl

— Zp uv mbl Yvskáu táz nluapsovtiyl xbl cblzayh tlyjlk oh kpjov —ylwspjó ls

— Lzh Hunéspjh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zlñvy jbyh, mbl buh kvujlssh

F jvtv kls Jhahf yljpipó ls jlayv,

xbpgá vayv jhuahyá jvu tlqvy wsljayv.

F, zpu kbkh, xbl lzav mbl jvtv wyvmljíh; xbl svz wvlahz ahtipéu zl sshthu

— Kínhtl, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls ihyilyv—, ¿uv oh ohipkv

Jhwíabsv PP. Xbl ayhah kl sh uvahisl wluklujph xbl Zhujov Whugh abcv jvu sh
zviypuh f hth kl kvu Xbpqval, jvu vayvz zbqlavz nyhjpvzvz

ihyilyv lyhu kl sh zviypuh f hth, xbl shz khihu kpjplukv h Zhujov Whugh,
