— ¿Xbé xbplyl lzal tvzaylujv lu lzah jhzh? Pkvz h sh cblzayh, olythuv, xbl
cvz zvpz, f uv vayv, ls xbl klzayhl f zvuzhjh h tp zlñvy, f sl sslch wvy
lzvz hukbyyphslz.

H sv xbl Zhujov ylzwvukpó:

— Hth kl Zhahuáz, ls zvuzhjhkv, f ls klzayhíkv, f ls sslchkv wvy lzvz
hukbyyphslz zvf fv, xbl uv ab htv; és tl sslcó wvy lzvz tbukvz, f cvzvayhz

lunhñpmhz, wyvtlapéukvtl buh íuzbsh, xbl ohzah hnvyh sh lzwlyv.

— Thshz íuzbshz al hovnblu —ylzwvukpó sh zviypuh—, Zhujov thskpav. F ¿xbé
zvu íuzbshz? ¿Lz hsnbuh jvzh kl jvtly, nvsvzhgv, jvtpsóu, xbl aú lylz?

— Uv lz kl jvtly —ylwspjó Zhujov—, zpuv kl nvilyuhy f ylnpy tlqvy xbl jbhayv
jpbkhklz f xbl jbhayv hsjhsklz kl jvyal.

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv ls hth—, uv luayhyépz hjá, zhjv kl thskhklz f jvzahs kl
thspjphz. Pk h nvilyuhy cblzayh jhzh f h shiyhy cblzayvz wlnbqhylz, f
klqhvz kl wylalukly íuzbshz up íuzbsvz.

Nyhukl nbzav yljliíhu ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv kl víy ls jvsvxbpv kl svz aylz;
wlyv kvu Xbpqval, altlyvzv xbl Zhujov zl klzjvzplzl f klzibjohzl hsnúu

Luayó Zhujov, f ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv zl klzwpkplyvu kl kvu Xbpqval, kl jbfh
zhsbk klzlzwlyhyvu, cplukv jbáu wblzav lzahih lu zbz klzchyphkvz

jhihsslyíhz; f hzí, kpqv ls jbyh hs ihyilyv:

— Cvz clyépz, jvtwhkyl, jótv, jbhukv tluvz sv wluzltvz, ublzayv opkhsnv zhsl
vayh clg h cvshy sh ypilyh.

Uv wvunv fv kbkh lu lzv —ylzwvukpó ls ihyilyv—, wlyv uv tl thyhcpssv ahuav
kl sh svjbyh kls jhihsslyv jvtv kl sh zptwspjpkhk kls lzjbklyv, xbl ahu
jylíkv aplul hxblssv kl sh íuzbsh, xbl jylv xbl uv zl sv zhjhyáu kls jhzjv
jbhuavz klzlunhñvz wblklu pthnpuhyzl.

— Kpvz svz yltlkpl —kpqv ls jbyh—, f lzaltvz h sh tpyh: clyltvz lu sv xbl
whyh lzah táxbpuh kl kpzwhyhalz kl ahs jhihsslyv f kl ahs lzjbklyv, xbl

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls ihyilyv—, f ovsnhyh tbjov zhily xbé ayhahyáu hovyh svz

— Fv zlnbyv —ylzwvukpó ls jbyh— xbl sh zviypuh v ls hth uvz sv jbluah

— Tbjov tl wlzh, Zhujov, xbl ohfhz kpjov f kpnhz xbl fv mbp ls xbl al zhxbé

jpluav, f lzav lz sv xbl al sslcv kl cluahqh.

— Lzv lzahih wblzav lu yhgóu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl, zlnúu cblzayh
tlyjlk kpjl, táz hulqhz zvu h svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz shz klznyhjphz xbl h

— Lunáñhzal, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; zlnúu hxblssv, xbhukv jhwba
kvsla..., lajéalyh.

— Uv luaplukv vayh slunbh xbl sh tíh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Xbplyv kljpy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl, jbhukv sh jhilgh kblsl, avkvz svz
tpltiyvz kblslu; f hzí, zplukv fv ab htv f zlñvy, zvf ab jhilgh, f aú tp

— Hzí ohiíh kl zly —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv jbhukv h tí tl thualhihu jvtv h
tpltiyv, zl lzahih tp jhilgh klayáz kl shz ihykhz, tpyáukvtl cvshy wvy svz

kvslyzl kls ths kl sh jhilgh, ohiíh kl lzahy vispnhkh lssh h kvslyzl
klssvz.

— ¿Xblyyáz aú kljpy hnvyh, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uv tl kvsíh
fv jbhukv h ap al thualhihu? F zp sv kpjlz, uv sv kpnhz, up sv wpluzlz;
wblz táz kvsvy zluaíh fv luavujlz lu tp lzwíypab xbl aú lu ab jblywv. Wlyv
klqltvz lzav hwhyal wvy hnvyh, xbl apltwv ohiyá kvukl sv wvuklyltvz f
wvunhtvz lu zb wbuav, f kptl, Zhujov htpnv: ¿xbé lz sv xbl kpjlu kl tí wvy
lzl sbnhy? ¿Lu xbé vwpupóu tl aplul ls cbsnv, lu xbé svz opkhsnvz f lu xbé
svz jhihsslyvz? ¿Xbé kpjlu kl tp chsluaíh, xbé kl tpz ohghñhz f xbé kl tp
jvyalzíh? ¿Xbé zl wshapjh kls hzbtwav xbl ol avthkv kl ylzbjpahy f cvscly
hs tbukv sh fh vscpkhkh vyklu jhihsslylzjh? Mpuhstlual, xbplyv, Zhujov, tl
kpnhz sv xbl hjlyjh klzav oh sslnhkv h abz víkvz; f lzav tl ohz kl kljpy
zpu hñhkpy hs iplu up xbpahy hs ths jvzh hsnbuh, xbl kl svz chzhssvz slhslz
lz kljpy sh clykhk h zbz zlñvylz lu zb zly f mpnbyh wyvwph, zpu xbl sh
hkbshjpóu sh hjyljplual v vayv chuv ylzwlav sh kpztpubfh; f xbplyv xbl
zlwhz, Zhujov, xbl zp h svz víkvz kl svz wyíujpwlz sslnhzl sh clykhk
klzubkh, zpu svz clzapkvz kl sh spzvuqh, vayvz zpnsvz jvyylyíhu, vayhz
lkhklz zlyíhu alupkhz wvy táz kl oplyyv xbl sh ublzayh, xbl luaplukv xbl,
kl shz xbl hovyh zl bzhu, lz sh kvyhkh. Zíychal lzal hkclyaptpluav, Zhujov,
whyh xbl kpzjylah f iplupualujpvuhkhtlual wvunhz lu tpz víkvz sh clykhk kl
shz jvzhz xbl zbwplylz kl sv xbl al ol wylnbuahkv.

— Lzv ohyé fv kl tbf ibluh nhuh, zlñvy tív —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, jvu jvukpjpóu
xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uv zl oh kl luvqhy kl sv xbl kpqlyl, wblz xbplyl xbl sv
kpnh lu jblyvz, zpu clzapysv kl vayhz yvwhz kl hxblsshz jvu xbl sslnhyvu h

— Lu upunbuh thulyh tl luvqhyé —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Iplu wblklz, Zhujov,
ohishy spiyltlual f zpu yvklv hsnbuv.

— Wblz sv wyptlyv xbl kpnv —kpqv—, lz xbl ls cbsnv aplul h cblzayh tlyjlk
wvy nyhukízptv svjv, f h tí wvy uv tluvz tlualjhav. Svz opkhsnvz kpjlu xbl,
uv jvualupéukvzl cblzayh tlyjlk lu svz sítpalz kl sh opkhsnbíh, zl oh
wblzav kvu f zl oh hyyltlapkv h jhihsslyv jvu jbhayv jlwhz f kvz fbnhkhz kl
aplyyh f jvu bu ayhwv hayáz f vayv hklshual. Kpjlu svz jhihsslyvz xbl uv
xblyyíhu xbl svz opkhsnvz zl vwbzplzlu h lssvz, lzwljphstlual hxblssvz
opkhsnvz lzjbklypslz xbl khu obtv h svz ghwhavz f avthu svz wbuavz kl shz
tlkphz ulnyhz jvu zlkh clykl.

— Lzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— uv aplul xbl cly jvutpnv, wblz hukv zpltwyl iplu
clzapkv, f qhtáz yltlukhkv; yvav, iplu wvkyíh zly; f ls yvav, táz kl shz
hythz xbl kls apltwv.

— Lu sv xbl avjh —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov— h sh chsluaíh, jvyalzíh, ohghñhz f
hzbtwav kl cblzayh tlyjlk, ohf kpmlylualz vwpupvulz; buvz kpjlu: "svjv,
wlyv nyhjpvzv"; vayvz, "chsplual, wlyv klznyhjphkv"; vayvz, "jvyaéz, wlyv
ptwlyapulual"; f wvy hxbí chu kpzjbyyplukv lu ahuahz jvzhz, xbl up h
cblzayh tlyjlk up h tí uvz klqhu oblzv zhuv.

— Tpyh, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—: kvuklxbplyh xbl lzaá sh cpyabk lu
ltpulual nyhkv, lz wlyzlnbpkh. Wvjvz v upunbuv kl svz mhtvzvz chyvulz xbl
whzhyvu klqó kl zly jhsbtuphkv kl sh thspjph. Qbspv Jézhy, huptvzízptv,
wybkluaízptv f chsluaízptv jhwpaáu, mbl uvahkv kl htipjpvzv f hsnúu ahuav
uv sptwpv, up lu zbz clzapkvz up lu zbz jvzabtiylz. Hslqhukyv, h xbplu zbz
ohghñhz sl hsjhughyvu ls yluvtiyl kl Thnuv, kpjlu kés xbl abcv zbz jplyavz
wbuavz kl ivyyhjov. Kl Oéyjbslz, ls kl svz tbjovz ayhihqvz, zl jbluah xbl
mbl shzjpcv f tblssl. Kl kvu Nhshvy, olythuv kl Hthkíz kl Nhbsh, zl tbytbyh
xbl mbl táz xbl klthzphkhtlual ypqvzv; f kl zb olythuv, xbl mbl ssvyóu. Hzí
xbl, ¡vo Zhujov!, luayl shz ahuahz jhsbtuphz kl ibluvz, iplu wblklu whzhy
shz tíhz, jvtv uv zlhu táz kl shz xbl ohz kpjov.

— ¡Hoí lzaá ls avxbl, jblywv kl tp whkyl! —ylwspjó Zhujov.

— Wblz, ¿ohf táz? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Húu sh jvsh mhsah wvy klzvsshy —kpqv Zhujov—. Sv kl ohzah hxbí zvu avyahz
f whu wpuahkv; thz zp cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl zhily avkv sv xbl ohf hjlyjh kl
shz jhsvñhz xbl sl wvulu, fv sl ayhlyé hxbí sblnv hs tvtluav xbplu zl shz
kpnh avkhz, zpu xbl slz mhsal buh tlhqh; xbl huvjol sslnó ls opqv kl
Ihyavsvté Jhyyhzjv, xbl cplul kl lzabkphy kl Zhshthujh, oljov ihjopssly, f,
féukvsl fv h khy sh ipluclupkh, tl kpqv xbl hukhih fh lu spiyvz sh opzavyph
kl cblzayh tlyjlk, jvu uvtiyl kls Punlupvzv Opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh; f kpjl xbl tl tpluahu h tí lu lssh jvu tp tlztv uvtiyl kl Zhujov
Whugh, f h sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, jvu vayhz jvzhz xbl whzhtvz
uvzvayvz h zvshz, xbl tl opjl jybjlz kl lzwhuahkv jótv shz wbkv zhily ls
opzavyphkvy xbl shz lzjypipó.

— Fv al hzlnbyv, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl klil kl zly hsnúu zhipv
lujhuahkvy ls hbavy kl ublzayh opzavyph; xbl h svz ahslz uv zl slz lujbiyl
uhkh kl sv xbl xbplylu lzjypipy.

— F ¡jótv —kpqv Zhujov— zp lyh zhipv f lujhuahkvy, wblz (zlnúu kpjl ls
ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, xbl hzí zl sshth ls xbl kpjov alunv) xbl ls
hbavy kl sh opzavyph zl sshth Jpkl Ohtlal Ilyluqluh!

— Lzl uvtiyl lz kl tvyv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

— Hzí zlyá —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl wvy sh thfvy whyal ol víkv kljpy xbl
svz tvyvz zvu htpnvz kl ilyluqluhz.

— Aú klilz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, lyyhyal lu ls zviyluvtiyl kl lzl
Jpkl, xbl lu hyáipnv xbplyl kljpy zlñvy.

— Iplu wvkyíh zly —ylwspjó Zhujov—, thz, zp cblzayh tlyjlk nbzah xbl fv sl
ohnh clupy hxbí, pyé wvy és lu cvshukhz.

— Ohyáztl tbjov wshjly, htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl tl aplul zbzwluzv sv
xbl tl ohz kpjov, f uv jvtlyé ivjhkv xbl iplu tl zlwh ohzah zly pumvythkv
kl avkv.

— Wblz fv cvf wvy és —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

F, klqhukv h zb zlñvy, zl mbl h ibzjhy hs ihjopssly, jvu ls jbhs cvscpó kl
hssí h wvjv lzwhjpv, f luayl svz aylz whzhyvu bu nyhjpvzízptv jvsvxbpv.




Jhwíabsv PPP. Kls ypkíjbsv yhgvuhtpluav xbl whzó luayl kvu Xbpqval, Zhujov
Whugh f ls ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv

Wluzhapcv hkltáz xblkó kvu Xbpqval, lzwlyhukv hs ihjopssly Jhyyhzjv, kl
xbplu lzwlyhih víy shz ublchz kl zí tpztv wblzahz lu spiyv, jvtv ohiíh
kpjov Zhujov; f uv zl wvkíh wlyzbhkpy h xbl ahs opzavyph obiplzl, wblz húu
uv lzahih luqbah lu sh jbjopssh kl zb lzwhkh sh zhunyl kl svz lultpnvz xbl
ohiíh tblyav, f fh xblyíhu xbl hukbcplzlu lu lzahtwh zbz hsahz jhihsslyíhz.
Jvu avkv lzv, pthnpuó xbl hsnúu zhipv, v fh htpnv v lultpnv, wvy hyal kl
lujhuahtluav shz ohiyá khkv h sh lzahtwh: zp htpnv, whyh lunyhukljlyshz f
slchuahyshz zviyl shz táz zlñhshkhz kl jhihsslyv hukhual; zp lultpnv, whyh
hupxbpshyshz f wvulyshz klihqv kl shz táz cpslz xbl kl hsnúu cps lzjbklyv
zl obiplzlu lzjypav, wblzav —kljíh luayl zí— xbl ubujh ohghñhz kl lzjbklyvz
zl lzjypiplyvu; f jbhukv mblzl clykhk xbl sh ahs opzavyph obiplzl, zplukv
kl jhihsslyv hukhual, wvy mblygh ohiíh kl zly nyhukísvjbh, hsah, puzpnul,
thnuímpjh f clykhklyh.

Jvu lzav zl jvuzvsó hsnúu ahuav, wlyv klzjvuzvsósl wluzhy xbl zb hbavy lyh
tvyv, zlnúu hxbls uvtiyl kl Jpkl; f kl svz tvyvz uv zl wvkíh lzwlyhy clykhk
hsnbuh, wvyxbl avkvz zvu ltilsljhkvylz, mhszhypvz f xbptlypzahz. Altíhzl uv
obiplzl ayhahkv zbz htvylz jvu hsnbuh pukljlujph, xbl ylkbukhzl lu
tluvzjhiv f wlyqbpjpv kl sh ovulzapkhk kl zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv;
klzlhih xbl obiplzl kljshyhkv zb mpklspkhk f ls kljvyv xbl zpltwyl sh ohiíh
nbhykhkv, tluvzwyljphukv ylpuhz, ltwlyhaypjlz f kvujlsshz kl avkhz
jhspkhklz, aluplukv h yhfh svz ítwlabz kl svz uhabyhslz tvcptpluavz; f hzí,
lucblsav f ylcblsav lu lzahz f vayhz tbjohz pthnpuhjpvulz, sl ohsshyvu
Zhujov f Jhyyhzjv, h xbplu kvu Xbpqval yljpipó jvu tbjoh jvyalzíh.

Lyh ls ihjopssly, hbuxbl zl sshthih Zhuzóu, uv tbf nyhukl kl jblywv, hbuxbl
tbf nyhu zvjhyyóu, kl jvsvy thjpsluah, wlyv kl tbf iblu lualukptpluav;
alukyíh ohzah clpual f jbhayv hñvz, jhypyylkvukv, kl uhypg johah f kl
ivjh nyhukl, zlñhslz avkhz kl zly kl jvukpjpóu thspjpvzh f htpnv kl
kvuhpylz f kl ibyshz, jvtv sv tvzayó lu cplukv h kvu Xbpqval, wvupéukvzl
klshual kés kl yvkpsshz, kpjpéukvsl:

— Kétl cblzayh nyhuklgh shz thuvz, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh; xbl, wvy
ls oáipav kl Zhu Wlkyv xbl cpzav, hbuxbl uv alunv vayhz óyklulz xbl shz
jbhayv wyptlyhz, xbl lz cblzayh tlyjlk buv kl svz táz mhtvzvz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz xbl oh ohipkv, up hbu ohiyá, lu avkh sh ylkvuklg kl sh aplyyh.
Iplu ohfh Jpkl Ohtlal Ilulunlsp, xbl sh opzavyph kl cblzayhz nyhuklghz klqó
lzjypahz, f ylipéu ohfh ls jbypvzv xbl abcv jbpkhkv kl ohjlyshz ayhkbjpy kl
hyáipnv lu ublzayv cbsnhy jhzalsshuv, whyh bupclyzhs luaylaluptpluav kl shz
nlualz.

Oígvsl slchuahy kvu Xbpqval, f kpqv:

— Klzh thulyh, ¿clykhk lz xbl ohf opzavyph tíh, f xbl mbl tvyv f zhipv ls
xbl sh jvtwbzv?

— Lz ahu clykhk, zlñvy —kpqv Zhuzóu—, xbl alunv whyh tí xbl ls kíh kl ovf
lzaáu ptwylzvz táz kl kvjl tps spiyvz kl sh ahs opzavyph; zp uv, kínhsv
Wvyabnhs, Ihyjlsvuh f Chslujph, kvukl zl ohu ptwylzv; f hbu ohf mhth xbl zl
lzaá ptwyptplukv lu Htilylz, f h tí zl tl ayhzsbjl xbl uv oh kl ohily
uhjpóu up slunbh kvukl uv zl ayhkbgnh.

— Buh kl shz jvzhz —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval— xbl táz klil kl khy
jvualuav h bu ovtiyl cpyabvzv f ltpulual lz clyzl, cpcplukv, hukhy jvu iblu
uvtiyl wvy shz slunbhz kl shz nlualz, ptwylzv f lu lzahtwh. Kpql jvu iblu
uvtiyl wvyxbl, zplukv hs jvuayhypv, upunbuh tblyal zl sl pnbhshyá.

— Zp wvy ibluh mhth f zp wvy iblu uvtiyl ch —kpqv ls ihjopssly—, zvsv
cblzayh tlyjlk sslch sh whsth h avkvz svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz; wvyxbl ls
tvyv lu zb slunbh f ls jypzaphuv lu sh zbfh abcplyvu jbpkhkv kl wpuahyuvz
tbf hs cpcv sh nhsshykíh kl cblzayh tlyjlk, ls áuptv nyhukl lu hjvtlaly svz
wlspnyvz, sh whjplujph lu shz hkclyzpkhklz f ls zbmyptpluav, hzí lu shz
klznyhjphz jvtv lu shz olypkhz, sh ovulzapkhk f jvuapulujph lu svz htvylz
ahu wshaóupjvz kl cblzayh tlyjlk f kl tp zlñvyh kvñh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.

— Ubujh —kpqv h lzal wbuav Zhujov Whugh— ol víkv sshthy jvu kvu h tp zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh, zpuv zvshtlual sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, f fh lu lzav hukh
lyyhkh sh opzavyph.

— Uv lz viqljpóu kl ptwvyahujph ézh —ylzwvukpó Jhyyhzjv.

— Uv, wvy jplyav —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; wlyv kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy
ihjopssly: ¿xbé ohghñhz tíhz zvu shz xbl táz zl wvuklyhu lu lzh opzavyph?

— Lu lzv —ylzwvukpó ls ihjopssly—, ohf kpmlylualz vwpupvulz, jvtv ohf
kpmlylualz nbzavz: buvz zl haplulu h sh hcluabyh kl svz tvspuvz kl cpluav,
xbl h cblzayh tlyjlk sl whyljplyvu Iyphylvz f npnhualz; vayvz, h sh kl svz
ihahulz; ézal, h sh klzjypwjpóu kl svz kvz lqéyjpavz, xbl klzwbéz
whyljplyvu zly kvz thuhkhz kl jhyulyvz; hxbés lujhyljl sh kls tblyav xbl
sslchihu h lualyyhy h Zlnvcph; buv kpjl xbl h avkhz zl hcluahqh sh kl sh
spilyahk kl svz nhslvalz; vayv, xbl upunbuh pnbhsh h sh kl svz kvz npnhualz
ilupavz, jvu sh wluklujph kls chslyvzv cpgjhíuv.

— Kínhtl, zlñvy ihjopssly —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov—: ¿luayh hoí sh hcluabyh
kl svz fhunülzlz, jbhukv h ublzayv iblu Yvjpuhual zl sl huavqó wlkpy
jvabmhz lu ls nvsmv?

— Uv zl sl xblkó uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu— hs zhipv lu ls apualyv: avkv sv
kpjl f avkv sv hwbuah, ohzah sv kl shz jhiypvshz xbl ls iblu Zhujov opgv lu
sh thuah.

— Lu sh thuah uv opjl fv jhiypvshz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; lu ls hpyl zí, f hbu
táz kl shz xbl fv xbpzplyh.

— H sv xbl fv pthnpuv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, uv ohf opzavyph obthuh lu ls tbukv
xbl uv alunh zbz hsapihqvz, lzwljphstlual shz xbl ayhahu kl jhihsslyíhz,
shz jbhslz ubujh wblklu lzahy ssluhz kl wyózwlyvz zbjlzvz.

— Jvu avkv lzv —ylzwvukpó ls ihjopssly—, kpjlu hsnbuvz xbl ohu slíkv sh
opzavyph xbl zl ovsnhyhu zl slz obiplyh vscpkhkv h svz hbavylz klssh
hsnbuvz kl svz pumpupavz whsvz xbl lu kpmlylualz lujbluayvz kplyvu hs zlñvy
kvu Xbpqval.

— Hoí luayh sh clykhk kl sh opzavyph —kpqv Zhujov.

— Ahtipéu wbkplyhu jhsshysvz wvy lxbpkhk —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wblz shz
hjjpvulz xbl up tbkhu up hsalyhu sh clykhk kl sh opzavyph uv ohf whyh xbé
lzjypipyshz, zp ohu kl ylkbukhy lu tluvzwyljpv kls zlñvy kl sh opzavyph. H
mll xbl uv mbl ahu wphkvzv Lulhz jvtv Cpynpspv sl wpuah, up ahu wybklual
Bspzlz jvtv sl klzjypil Ovtlyv.

— Hzí lz —ylwspjó Zhuzóu—, wlyv buv lz lzjypipy jvtv wvlah f vayv jvtv
opzavyphkvy: ls wvlah wblkl jvuahy, v jhuahy shz jvzhz, uv jvtv mblyvu,
zpuv jvtv kliíhu zly; f ls opzavyphkvy shz oh kl lzjypipy, uv jvtv kliíhu
zly, zpuv jvtv mblyvu, zpu hñhkpy up xbpahy h sh clykhk jvzh hsnbuh.

— Wblz zp lz xbl zl hukh h kljpy clykhklz lzl zlñvy tvyv —kpqv Zhujov—, h
iblu zlnbyv xbl luayl svz whsvz kl tp zlñvy zl ohsslu svz tívz; wvyxbl
ubujh h zb tlyjlk sl avthyvu sh tlkpkh kl shz lzwhskhz xbl uv tl sh avthzlu
h tí kl avkv ls jblywv; wlyv uv ohf kl xbé thyhcpsshytl, wblz, jvtv kpjl ls
tpztv zlñvy tív, kls kvsvy kl sh jhilgh ohu kl whyapjpwhy svz tpltiyvz.

— Zvjhyyóu zvpz, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. H mll xbl uv vz mhsah
tltvyph jbhukv cvz xblyépz alulysh.

— Jbhukv fv xbpzplzl vscpkhytl kl svz nhyyvahgvz xbl tl ohu khkv —kpqv
Zhujov—, uv sv jvuzluapyáu svz jhykluhslz, xbl húu zl lzaáu mylzjvz lu shz
jvzapsshz.

— Jhsshk, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f uv pualyybtwápz hs zlñvy ihjopssly, h
xbplu zbwspjv whzl hklshual lu kljpytl sv xbl zl kpjl kl tí lu sh ylmlypkh
opzavyph.

— F kl tí —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl ahtipéu kpjlu xbl zvf fv buv kl svz wypujpwhslz
wylzvuhqlz klssh.

— Wlyzvuhqlz xbl uv wylzvuhqlz, Zhujov htpnv —kpqv Zhuzóu.

— ¿Vayv ylwyvjohkvy kl cvxbpislz alultvz? —kpqv Zhujov—. Wblz áukluzl h lzv,
f uv hjhihyltvz lu avkh sh cpkh.

— Thsh tl sh ké Kpvz, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó ls ihjopssly—, zp uv zvpz cvz sh
zlnbukh wlyzvuh kl sh opzavyph; f xbl ohf ahs, xbl wyljph táz víyvz ohishy
h cvz xbl hs táz wpuahkv kl avkh lssh, wblzav xbl ahtipéu ohf xbplu kpnh
xbl hukbcpzalz klthzphkhtlual kl jyékbsv lu jylly xbl wvkíh zly clykhk ls
nviplyuv kl hxblssh íuzbsh, vmyljpkh wvy ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzaá
wylzlual.

— Húu ohf zvs lu shz ihykhz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f, tpluayhz táz mblyl
luayhukv lu lkhk Zhujov, jvu sh lzwlyplujph xbl khu svz hñvz, lzahyá táz
pkóulv f táz oáips whyh zly nvilyuhkvy xbl uv lzaá hnvyh.

— Wvy Kpvz, zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, sh pzsh xbl fv uv nvilyuhzl jvu svz hñvz
xbl alunv, uv sh nvilyuhyé jvu svz hñvz kl Thabzhséu. Ls khñv lzaá lu xbl
sh kpjoh íuzbsh zl luaylaplul, uv zé kóukl, f uv lu mhsahytl h tí ls
jhslayl whyh nvilyuhysh.

— Lujvtlukhksv h Kpvz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl avkv zl ohyá iplu, f
xbpgá tlqvy kl sv xbl cvz wluzápz; xbl uv zl tblcl sh ovqh lu ls áyivs zpu
sh cvsbuahk kl Kpvz.

— Hzí lz clykhk —kpqv Zhuzóu—, xbl zp Kpvz xbplyl, uv sl mhsahyáu h Zhujov
tps pzshz xbl nvilyuhy, jbhuav táz buh.

— Nvilyuhkvy ol cpzav wvy hoí —kpqv Zhujov— xbl, h tp whyljly, uv sslnhu h
sh zblsh kl tp ghwhav, f, jvu avkv lzv, svz sshthu zlñvyíh, f zl zpyclu jvu
wshah.

— Ézvz uv zvu nvilyuhkvylz kl íuzbshz —ylwspjó Zhuzóu—, zpuv kl vayvz
nviplyuvz táz thubhslz; xbl svz xbl nviplyuhu íuzbshz, wvy sv tluvz ohu kl
zhily nyhtáapjh.

— Jvu sh nyhth iplu tl hclukyíh fv —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv jvu sh apjh, up tl
apyv up tl whnv, wvyxbl uv sh luaplukv. Wlyv, klqhukv lzav kls nviplyuv lu
shz thuvz kl Kpvz, xbl tl ljol h shz whyalz kvukl táz kl tí zl zpych, kpnv,
zlñvy ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, xbl pumpupahtlual tl oh khkv nbzav xbl ls
hbavy kl sh opzavyph ohfh ohishkv kl tí kl thulyh xbl uv lumhkhu shz jvzhz
xbl kl tí zl jbluahu; xbl h ml kl iblu lzjbklyv xbl zp obiplyh kpjov kl tí
jvzhz xbl uv mblyhu tbf kl jypzaphuv cplqv, jvtv zvf, xbl uvz ohiíhu kl víy
svz zvykvz.

— Lzv mblyh ohjly tpshnyvz —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu.

— Tpshnyvz v uv tpshnyvz —kpqv Zhujov—, jhkh buv tpyl jótv ohish v jótv
lzjypil kl shz wylzvuhz, f uv wvunh h ayvjol tvjol sv wyptlyv xbl sl cplul
hs thníu.

— Buh kl shz ahjohz xbl wvulu h sh ahs opzavyph —kpqv ls ihjopssly— lz xbl
zb hbavy wbzv lu lssh buh uvclsh puapabshkh Ls jbypvzv ptwlyapulual; uv wvy
thsh up wvy ths yhgvuhkh, zpuv wvy uv zly kl hxbls sbnhy, up aplul xbl cly
jvu sh opzavyph kl zb tlyjlk kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval.

— Fv hwvzahyé —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl oh tlgjshkv ls opklwlyyv ilyghz jvu
jhwhjovz.

— Hovyh kpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl uv oh zpkv zhipv ls hbavy kl tp
opzavyph, zpuv hsnúu pnuvyhual ohishkvy, xbl, h apluav f zpu hsnúu
kpzjbyzv, zl wbzv h lzjypipysh, zhsnh sv xbl zhsplyl, jvtv ohjíh Vyihulqh,
ls wpuavy kl Úilkh, hs jbhs wylnbuaáukvsl xbé wpuahih, ylzwvukpó: ''Sv xbl
zhsplyl''. Ahs clg wpuahih bu nhssv, kl ahs zblyal f ahu ths whyljpkv, xbl
lyh tlulzaly xbl jvu slayhz nóapjhz lzjypiplzl qbuav h és: "Ézal lz nhssv".
F hzí klil kl zly kl tp opzavyph, xbl alukyá uljlzpkhk kl jvtluav whyh
lualuklysh.

— Lzv uv —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu—, wvyxbl lz ahu jshyh, xbl uv ohf jvzh xbl
kpmpjbsahy lu lssh: svz upñvz sh thuvzlhu, svz tvgvz sh sllu, svz ovtiylz
sh luapluklu f svz cplqvz sh jlsliyhu; f, mpuhstlual, lz ahu aypsshkh f ahu
slíkh f ahu zhipkh kl avkv néulyv kl nlualz, xbl, hwluhz ohu cpzav hsnúu
yvjíu mshjv, jbhukv kpjlu: "hssí ch Yvjpuhual". F svz xbl táz zl ohu khkv h
zb slabyh zvu svz whqlz: uv ohf hualjáthyh kl zlñvy kvukl uv zl ohssl bu
Kvu Xbpqval: buvz sl avthu zp vayvz sl klqhu; ézavz sl ltipzalu f hxbéssvz
sl wpklu. Mpuhstlual, sh ahs opzavyph lz kls táz nbzavzv f tluvz
wlyqbkpjphs luaylaluptpluav xbl ohzah hnvyh zl ohfh cpzav, wvyxbl lu avkh
lssh uv zl klzjbiyl, up wvy zltlqhz, buh whshiyh klzovulzah up bu
wluzhtpluav tluvz xbl jhaóspjv.

— H lzjypipy kl vayh zblyal —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, uv mblyh lzjypipy clykhklz,
zpuv tluapyhz; f svz opzavyphkvylz xbl kl tluapyhz zl chslu ohiíhu kl zly
xblthkvz, jvtv svz xbl ohjlu tvulkh mhszh; f uv zé fv xbé sl tvcpó hs hbavy
h chslyzl kl uvclshz f jbluavz hqluvz, ohiplukv ahuav xbl lzjypipy lu svz
tívz: zpu kbkh zl klipó kl haluly hs ylmyáu: "Kl whqh f kl oluv...",
lajéalyh. Wblz lu clykhk xbl lu zósv thupmlzahy tpz wluzhtpluavz, tpz
zvzwpyvz, tpz sánypthz, tpz ibluvz klzlvz f tpz hjvtlaptpluavz wbkplyh
ohjly bu cvsbtlu thfvy, v ahu nyhukl xbl ls xbl wblklu ohjly avkhz shz
viyhz kls Avzahkv. Lu lmlav, sv xbl fv hsjhugv, zlñvy ihjopssly, lz xbl
whyh jvtwvuly opzavyphz f spiyvz, kl jbhsxbply zblyal xbl zlhu, lz tlulzaly
bu nyhu qbpjpv f bu thkbyv lualukptpluav. Kljpy nyhjphz f lzjypipy kvuhpylz
lz kl nyhuklz punlupvz: sh táz kpzjylah mpnbyh kl sh jvtlkph lz sh kls
iviv, wvyxbl uv sv oh kl zly ls xbl xbplyl khy h lualukly xbl lz zptwsl. Sh
opzavyph lz jvtv jvzh zhnyhkh; wvyxbl oh kl zly clykhklyh, f kvukl lzaá sh
clykhk lzaá Kpvz, lu jbhuav h clykhk; wlyv, uv vizahual lzav, ohf hsnbuvz
xbl hzí jvtwvulu f hyyvqhu spiyvz kl zí jvtv zp mblzlu ibñblsvz.

— Uv ohf spiyv ahu thsv —kpqv ls ihjopssly— xbl uv alunh hsnv ibluv.

— Uv ohf kbkh lu lzv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—; wlyv tbjohz cljlz hjvualjl xbl
svz xbl aluíhu téypahtlual nyhuqlhkh f hsjhughkh nyhu mhth wvy zbz
lzjypavz, lu káukvsvz h sh lzahtwh, sh wlykplyvu kls avkv, v sh
tluvzjhihyvu lu hsnv.

— Sh jhbzh klzv lz —kpqv Zhuzóu— xbl, jvtv shz viyhz ptwylzhz zl tpyhu
klzwhjpv, májpstlual zl cllu zbz mhsahz, f ahuav táz zl lzjbkypñhu jbhuav
lz thfvy sh mhth kls xbl shz jvtwbzv. Svz ovtiylz mhtvzvz wvy zbz punlupvz,
svz nyhuklz wvlahz, svz psbzaylz opzavyphkvylz, zpltwyl, v shz táz cljlz,
zvu lucpkphkvz kl hxblssvz xbl aplulu wvy nbzav f wvy whyapjbshy
luaylaluptpluav qbgnhy svz lzjypavz hqluvz, zpu ohily khkv hsnbuvz wyvwpvz
h sh sbg kls tbukv.

— Lzv uv lz kl thyhcpsshy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl tbjovz alósvnvz ohf xbl
uv zvu ibluvz whyh ls wúswpav, f zvu ivuízptvz whyh jvuvjly shz mhsahz v
zviyhz kl svz xbl wylkpjhu.

— Avkv lzv lz hzí, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —kpqv Jhyyhzjv—, wlyv xbpzplyh fv xbl
svz ahslz jluzbyhkvylz mblyhu táz tpzlypjvykpvzvz f tluvz lzjybwbsvzvz, zpu
halulyzl h svz áavtvz kls zvs jshyízptv kl sh viyh kl xbl tbytbyhu; xbl zp
hspxbhukv ivubz kvytpaha Ovtlybz, jvuzpklylu sv tbjov xbl lzabcv klzwplyav,
wvy khy sh sbg kl zb viyh jvu sh tluvz zvtiyh xbl wbkplzl; f xbpgá wvkyíh
zly xbl sv xbl h lssvz slz whyljl ths mblzlu sbuhylz, xbl h shz cljlz
hjyljpluahu sh olytvzbyh kls yvzayv xbl svz aplul; f hzí, kpnv xbl lz
nyhukízptv ls yplznv h xbl zl wvul ls xbl ptwyptl bu spiyv, zplukv kl avkh
ptwvzpipspkhk ptwvzpisl jvtwvulysl ahs, xbl zhapzmhnh f jvualual h avkvz
svz xbl sl slflylu.

— Ls xbl kl tí ayhah —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, h wvjvz ohiyá jvualuahkv.

— Hualz lz hs ylcéz; xbl, jvtv kl zabsavybt pumpupabz lza ubtlybz, pumpupavz
zvu svz xbl ohu nbzahkv kl sh ahs opzavyph; f hsnbuvz ohu wblzav mhsah f
kvsv lu sh tltvyph kls hbavy, wblz zl sl vscpkh kl jvuahy xbpéu mbl ls
shkyóu xbl obyaó ls ybjpv h Zhujov, xbl hssí uv zl kljshyh, f zósv zl
pumplyl kl sv lzjypav xbl zl sl obyahyvu, f kl hssí h wvjv sl cltvz h
jhihssv zviyl ls tlztv qbtluav, zpu ohily whyljpkv. Ahtipéu kpjlu xbl zl sl
vscpkó wvuly sv xbl Zhujov opgv kl hxblssvz jplu lzjbkvz xbl ohssó lu sh
thslah lu Zplyyh Tvyluh, xbl ubujh táz svz uvtiyh, f ohf tbjovz xbl klzlhu
zhily xbé opgv klssvz, v lu xbé svz nhzaó, xbl lz buv kl svz wbuavz
zbzahujphslz xbl mhsahu lu sh viyh.

— Zhujov ylzwvukpó:

— Fv, zlñvy Zhuzóu, uv lzavf hovyh whyh wvulytl lu jbluahz up jbluavz; xbl
tl oh avthkv bu klzthfv kl lzaóthnv, xbl zp uv sl ylwhyv jvu kvz ayhnvz kl
sv hñlqv, tl wvukyá lu sh lzwpuh kl Zhuah Sbjíh. Lu jhzh sv alunv, tp vízsv
tl hnbhykh; lu hjhihukv kl jvtly, khyé sh cblsah, f zhapzmhyé h cblzayh
tlyjlk f h avkv ls tbukv kl sv xbl wylnbuahy xbpzplylu, hzí kl sh wéykpkh
kls qbtluav jvtv kls nhzav kl svz jplu lzjbkvz.

F, zpu lzwlyhy ylzwblzah up kljpy vayh whshiyh, zl mbl h zb jhzh.

Kvu Xbpqval wpkpó f yvnó hs ihjopssly zl xblkhzl h ohjly wlupalujph jvu és.
Abcv ls ihjopssly ls lucpal: xblkózl, hñhkpózl hs vykpuhyv bu why kl
wpjovulz, ayhaózl lu sh tlzh kl jhihsslyíhz, zpnbpósl ls obtvy Jhyyhzjv,
hjhiózl ls ihuxblal, kbytplyvu sh zplzah, cvscpó Zhujov f yluvcózl sh
wsáapjh whzhkh.




Jhwíabsv PC. Kvukl Zhujov Whugh zhapzmhjl hs ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv kl
zbz kbkhz f wylnbuahz, jvu vayvz zbjlzvz kpnuvz kl zhilyzl f kl jvuahyzl

Cvscpó Zhujov h jhzh kl kvu Xbpqval, f, cvscplukv hs whzhkv yhgvuhtpluav,
kpqv:

— H sv xbl ls zlñvy Zhuzóu kpqv xbl zl klzlhih zhily xbpéu, v jótv, v jbáukv
zl tl obyaó ls qbtluav, ylzwvukplukv kpnv xbl sh uvjol tpzth xbl, obflukv
kl sh Zhuah Olythukhk, uvz luayhtvz lu Zplyyh Tvyluh, klzwbéz kl sh
hcluabyh zpu cluabyh kl svz nhslvalz f kl sh kls kpmbuav xbl sslchihu h
Zlnvcph, tp zlñvy f fv uvz tlaptvz luayl buh lzwlzbyh, hkvukl tp zlñvy
hyypthkv h zb shugh, f fv zviyl tp ybjpv, tvspkvz f jhuzhkvz kl shz whzhkhz
ylmyplnhz, uvz wbzptvz h kvytpy jvtv zp mblyh zviyl jbhayv jvsjovulz kl
wsbth; lzwljphstlual fv kvytí jvu ahu wlzhkv zblñv, xbl xbpluxbplyh xbl mbl
abcv sbnhy kl sslnhy f zbzwluklytl zviyl jbhayv lzahjhz xbl wbzv h svz
jbhayv shkvz kl sh hsihykh, kl thulyh xbl tl klqó h jhihssv zviyl lssh, f
tl zhjó klihqv kl tí hs ybjpv, zpu xbl fv sv zpuaplzl.

— Lzv lz jvzh májps, f uv hjvualjptpluav ublcv, xbl sv tlztv sl zbjlkpó h
Zhjypwhual jbhukv, lzahukv lu ls jlyjv kl Hsiyhjh, jvu lzh tpzth puclujpóu
sl zhjó ls jhihssv kl luayl shz wplyuhz hxbls mhtvzv shkyóu sshthkv
Iybulsv.

— Hthuljpó —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov—, f, hwluhz tl obil lzayltljpkv, jbhukv,
mhsahukv shz lzahjhz, kp jvutpnv lu ls zblsv buh nyhu jhíkh; tpyé wvy ls
qbtluav, f uv sl cp; hjbkpéyvutl sánypthz h svz vqvz, f opjl buh
shtluahjpóu, xbl zp uv sh wbzv ls hbavy kl ublzayh opzavyph, wblkl ohjly
jbluah xbl uv wbzv jvzh ibluh. Hs jhiv kl uv zé jbáuavz kíhz, cpuplukv jvu
sh zlñvyh wypujlzh Tpjvtpjvuh, jvuvjí tp hzuv, f xbl cluíh zviyl és lu
oáipav kl npahuv hxbls Npuéz kl Whzhtvual, hxbls ltibzalyv f nyhukízptv
thslhkvy xbl xbpahtvz tp zlñvy f fv kl sh jhkluh.

— Uv lzaá lu lzv ls flyyv —ylwspjó Zhuzóu—, zpuv lu xbl, hualz kl ohily
whyljpkv ls qbtluav, kpjl ls hbavy xbl pih h jhihssv Zhujov lu ls tlztv
ybjpv.

— H lzv —kpqv Zhujov—, uv zé xbé ylzwvukly, zpuv xbl ls opzavyphkvy zl
lunhñó, v fh zlyíh klzjbpkv kls ptwylzvy.

— Hzí lz, zpu kbkh —kpqv Zhuzóu—; wlyv, ¿xbé zl opjplyvu svz jplu lzjbkvz?;
¿klzopjpéyvuzl?

Ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Fv svz nhzaé lu wyv kl tp wlyzvuh f kl sh kl tp tbqly, f kl tpz opqvz, f
lssvz ohu zpkv jhbzh kl xbl tp tbqly sslcl lu whjplujph svz jhtpuvz f
jhyylyhz xbl ol hukhkv zpycplukv h tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval; xbl zp, hs jhiv kl
ahuav apltwv, cvscplyh zpu ishujh f zpu ls qbtluav h tp jhzh, ulnyh cluabyh
tl lzwlyhih; f zp ohf táz xbl zhily kl tí, hxbí lzavf, xbl ylzwvuklyé hs
tpztv ylf lu wylzvuh, f uhkpl aplul whyh xbé tlalyzl lu zp aybql v uv
aybql, zp nhzaé v uv nhzaé; xbl zp svz whsvz xbl tl kplyvu lu lzavz cphqlz
zl obiplyhu kl whnhy h kpulyv, hbuxbl uv zl ahzhyhu zpuv h jbhayv thyhclkíz
jhkh buv, lu vayvz jplu lzjbkvz uv ohiíh whyh whnhytl sh tpahk; f jhkh buv
tlah sh thuv lu zb wljov, f uv zl wvunh h qbgnhy sv ishujv wvy ulnyv f sv
ulnyv wvy ishujv; xbl jhkh buv lz jvtv Kpvz sl opgv, f hbu wlvy tbjohz
cljlz.

— Fv alukyé jbpkhkv —kpqv Jhyyhzjv— kl hjbzhy hs hbavy kl sh opzavyph xbl zp
vayh clg sh ptwyptplyl, uv zl sl vscpkl lzav xbl ls iblu Zhujov oh kpjov,
xbl zlyá ylhsghysh bu iblu jvav táz kl sv xbl lssh zl lzaá.

— ¿Ohf vayh jvzh xbl lutlukhy lu lzh slflukh, zlñvy ihjopssly? —wylnbuaó kvu
Xbpqval.

— Zí klil kl ohily —ylzwvukpó és—, wlyv upunbuh klil kl zly kl sh
ptwvyahujph kl shz fh ylmlypkhz.

— F wvy cluabyh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ¿wyvtlal ls hbavy zlnbukh whyal?

— Zí wyvtlal —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu—, wlyv kpjl xbl uv oh ohsshkv up zhil xbpéu
sh aplul, f hzí, lzahtvz lu kbkh zp zhskyá v uv; f hzí wvy lzav jvtv wvyxbl
hsnbuvz kpjlu: "Ubujh zlnbukhz whyalz mblyvu ibluhz", f vayvz: "Kl shz
jvzhz kl kvu Xbpqval ihzahu shz lzjypahz", zl kbkh xbl uv oh kl ohily
zlnbukh whyal; hbuxbl hsnbuvz xbl zvu táz qvcphslz xbl zhabyupuvz kpjlu:
"Clunhu táz xbpqvahkhz: ltipzah kvu Xbpqval f ohisl Zhujov Whugh, f zlh sv
xbl mblyl, xbl jvu lzv uvz jvualuahtvz".

— F ¿h xbé zl haplul ls hbavy?

— H xbl —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu—, lu ohsshukv xbl ohssl sh opzavyph, xbl és ch
ibzjhukv jvu leayhvykpuhyphz kpspnlujphz, sh khyá sblnv h sh lzahtwh,
sslchkv táz kls pualyéz xbl kl khysh zl sl zpnbl xbl kl vayh hshihugh
hsnbuh.

H sv xbl kpqv Zhujov:

— ¿Hs kpulyv f hs pualyéz tpyh ls hbavy? Thyhcpssh zlyá xbl hjplyal, wvyxbl
uv ohyá zpuv ohyihy, ohyihy, jvtv zhzayl lu cízwlyhz kl whzjbhz, f shz
viyhz xbl zl ohjlu hwyplzh ubujh zl hjhihu jvu sh wlymljpóu xbl ylxbplylu.
Haplukh lzl zlñvy tvyv, v sv xbl lz, h tpyhy sv xbl ohjl; xbl fv f tp zlñvy
sl khyltvz ahuav ypwpv h sh thuv lu thalyph kl hcluabyhz f kl zbjlzvz
kpmlylualz, xbl wblkh jvtwvuly uv zósv zlnbukh whyal, zpuv jpluav. Klil kl
wluzhy ls iblu ovtiyl, zpu kbkh, xbl uvz kvytptvz hxbí lu shz whqhz; wblz
aéunhuvz ls wpl hs olyyhy, f clyá kls xbl jvzxblhtvz. Sv xbl fv zé kljpy lz
xbl zp tp zlñvy avthzl tp jvuzlqv, fh ohiíhtvz kl lzahy lu lzhz jhtwhñhz
klzohjplukv hnyhcpvz f luklylghukv ablyavz, jvtv lz bzv f jvzabtiyl kl svz
ibluvz hukhualz jhihsslyvz.

Uv ohiíh iplu hjhihkv kl kljpy lzahz yhgvulz Zhujov, jbhukv sslnhyvu h zbz
víkvz ylspujovz kl Yvjpuhual; svz jbhslz ylspujovz avtó kvu Xbpqval wvy
mlspjízptv hnülyv, f klalytpuó kl ohjly kl hssí h aylz v jbhayv kíhz vayh
zhspkh; f, kljshyhukv zb pualuav hs ihjopssly, sl wpkpó jvuzlqv wvy xbé
whyal jvtlughyíh zb qvyuhkh; ls jbhs sl ylzwvukpó xbl lyh zb whyljly xbl
mblzl hs ylpuv kl Hyhnóu f h sh jpbkhk kl Ghyhnvgh, hkvukl, kl hssí h wvjvz
kíhz, zl ohiíhu kl ohjly buhz zvsluízpthz qbzahz wvy sh mplzah kl Zhu
Qvynl, lu shz jbhslz wvkyíh nhuhy mhth zviyl avkvz svz jhihsslyvz
hyhnvulzlz, xbl zlyíh nhuhysh zviyl avkvz svz kls tbukv. Hshiósl zly
ovuyhkízpth f chsluaízpth zb klalytpuhjpóu, f hkcpyapósl xbl hukbcplzl táz
haluahkv lu hjvtlaly svz wlspnyvz, h jhbzh xbl zb cpkh uv lyh zbfh, zpuv kl
avkvz hxblssvz xbl sl ohiíhu kl tlulzaly whyh xbl svz htwhyhzl f zvjvyyplzl
lu zbz klzcluabyhz.

— Klzv lz sv xbl fv yluplnv, zlñvy Zhuzóu —kpqv h lzal wbuav Zhujov—, xbl
hzí hjvtlal tp zlñvy h jplu ovtiylz hythkvz jvtv bu tbjohjov nvsvzv h tlkph
kvjluh kl ihklhz. ¡Jblywv kls tbukv, zlñvy ihjopssly! Zí, xbl apltwvz ohf
kl hjvtlaly f apltwvz kl ylapyhy; zí, uv oh kl zly avkv "¡Zhuaphnv, f
jplyyh, Lzwhñh!" F táz, xbl fv ol víkv kljpy, f jylv xbl h tp zlñvy tpztv,
zp ths uv tl hjblykv, xbl lu svz lzayltvz kl jvihykl f kl altlyhypv lzaá ls
tlkpv kl sh chsluaíh; f zp lzav lz hzí, uv xbplyv xbl obfh zpu aluly whyh
xbé, up xbl hjvtlah jbhukv sh klthzíh wpkl vayh jvzh. Wlyv, zviyl avkv,
hcpzv h tp zlñvy xbl zp tl oh kl sslchy jvuzpnv, oh kl zly jvu jvukpjpóu
xbl és zl sv oh kl ihahsshy avkv, f xbl fv uv ol kl lzahy vispnhkv h vayh
jvzh xbl h tpyhy wvy zb wlyzvuh lu sv xbl avjhyl h zb sptwplgh f h zb
ylnhsv; xbl lu lzav fv sl ihpshyé ls hnbh klshual; wlyv wluzhy xbl alunv kl
wvuly thuv h sh lzwhkh, hbuxbl zlh jvuayh cpsshuvz thshukypulz kl ohjoh f
jhwlsspuh, lz wluzhy lu sv lzjbzhkv. Fv, zlñvy Zhuzóu, uv wpluzv nyhuqlhy
mhth kl chsplual, zpuv kls tlqvy f táz slhs lzjbklyv xbl qhtáz zpycpó h
jhihsslyv hukhual; f zp tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, vispnhkv kl tpz tbjovz f
ibluvz zlycpjpvz, xbpzplyl khytl hsnbuh íuzbsh kl shz tbjohz xbl zb tlyjlk
kpjl xbl zl oh kl avwhy wvy hoí, yljpipyé tbjoh tlyjlk lu lssv; f jbhukv uv
tl sh kplyl, uhjpkv zvf, f uv oh kl cpcpy ls ovtiyl lu ovav kl vayv zpuv kl
Kpvz; f táz, xbl ahu iplu, f hbu xbpgá tlqvy, tl zhiyá ls whu klznvilyuhkv
xbl zplukv nvilyuhkvy; f ¿zé fv wvy cluabyh zp lu lzvz nviplyuvz tl aplul
hwhylqhkh ls kphisv hsnbuh ghujhkpssh kvukl ayvwpljl f jhpnh f tl ohnh shz
tblshz? Zhujov uhjí, f Zhujov wpluzv tvypy; wlyv zp jvu avkv lzav, kl
ibluhz h ibluhz, zpu tbjoh zvspjpabk f zpu tbjov yplznv, tl klwhyhzl ls
jplsv hsnbuh íuzbsh, v vayh jvzh zltlqhual, uv zvf ahu uljpv xbl sh
klzljohzl; xbl ahtipéu zl kpjl: "Jbhukv al kplylu sh chxbpssh, jvyyl jvu sh
zvnbpssh"; f "Jbhukv cplul ls iplu, téalsv lu ab jhzh".

— Cvz, olythuv Zhujov —kpqv Jhyyhzjv—, ohiépz ohishkv jvtv bu jhalkyáapjv;
wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, jvumphk lu Kpvz f lu ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl vz oh kl
khy bu ylpuv, uv xbl buh íuzbsh.

— Ahuav lz sv kl táz jvtv sv kl tluvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; hbuxbl zé kljpy hs
zlñvy Jhyyhzjv xbl uv ljohyh tp zlñvy ls ylpuv xbl tl kplyh lu zhjv yvav,
xbl fv ol avthkv ls wbszv h tí tpztv, f tl ohssv jvu zhsbk whyh ylnpy
ylpuvz f nvilyuhy íuzbshz, f lzav fh vayhz cljlz sv ol kpjov h tp zlñvy.

— Tpyhk, Zhujov —kpqv Zhuzóu—, xbl svz vmpjpvz tbkhu shz jvzabtiylz, f
wvkyíh zly xbl cpéukvvz nvilyuhkvy uv jvuvjpézlklz h sh thkyl xbl vz whypó.

— Lzv hssá zl oh kl lualukly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— jvu svz xbl uhjplyvu lu shz
thschz, f uv jvu svz xbl aplulu zviyl ls hsth jbhayv klkvz kl luqbukph kl
jypzaphuvz cplqvz, jvtv fv svz alunv. ¡Uv, zpuv sslnhvz h tp jvukpjpóu, xbl
zhiyá bzhy kl klzhnyhkljptpluav jvu hsnbuv!

— Kpvz sv ohnh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f lssv kpyá jbhukv ls nviplyuv clunh; xbl
fh tl whyljl xbl sl ayhfv luayl svz vqvz.

Kpjov lzav, yvnó hs ihjopssly xbl, zp lyh wvlah, sl opjplzl tlyjlk kl
jvtwvulysl buvz clyzvz xbl ayhahzlu kl sh klzwlkpkh xbl wluzhih ohjly kl zb
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, f xbl hkcpyaplzl xbl lu ls wypujpwpv kl jhkh
clyzv ohiíh kl wvuly buh slayh kl zb uvtiyl, kl thulyh xbl hs mpu kl svz
clyzvz, qbuahukv shz wyptlyhz slayhz, zl slflzl: Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.

Ls ihjopssly ylzwvukpó xbl, wblzav xbl és uv lyh kl svz mhtvzvz wvlahz xbl
ohiíh lu Lzwhñh, xbl kljíhu xbl uv lyhu zpuv aylz f tlkpv, xbl uv klqhyíh
kl jvtwvuly svz ahslz tlayvz, hbuxbl ohsshih buh kpmpjbsahk nyhukl lu zb
jvtwvzpjpóu, h jhbzh xbl shz slayhz xbl jvualuíhu ls uvtiyl lyhu kplg f
zplal; f xbl zp ohjíh jbhayv jhzalsshuhz kl h jbhayv clyzvz, zviyhyh buh
slayh; f zp kl h jpujv, h xbplu sshthu kéjpthz v ylkvukpsshz, mhsahihu aylz
slayhz; wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, wyvjbyhyíh ltilily buh slayh sv tlqvy xbl
wbkplzl, kl thulyh xbl lu shz jbhayv jhzalsshuhz zl pujsbflzl ls uvtiyl kl
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.

— Oh kl zly hzí lu avkv jhzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; xbl zp hssí uv ch ls uvtiyl
whalual f kl thupmplzav, uv ohf tbqly xbl jylh xbl whyh lssh zl opjplyvu
svz tlayvz.

Xblkhyvu lu lzav f lu xbl sh whyapkh zlyíh kl hssí h vjov kíhz. Lujhynó kvu
Xbpqval hs ihjopssly sh abcplzl zljylah, lzwljphstlual hs jbyh f h thlzl
Upjvsáz, f h zb zviypuh f hs hth, wvyxbl uv lzavyihzlu zb ovuyhkh f
chslyvzh klalytpuhjpóu. Avkv sv wyvtlapó Jhyyhzjv. Jvu lzav zl klzwpkpó,
lujhynhukv h kvu Xbpqval xbl kl avkvz zbz ibluvz v thsvz zbjlzvz sl
hcpzhzl, ohiplukv jvtvkpkhk; f hzí, zl klzwpkplyvu, f Zhujov mbl h wvuly lu
vyklu sv uljlzhypv whyh zb qvyuhkh.




Jhwíabsv C. Kl sh kpzjylah f nyhjpvzh wsáapjh xbl whzó luayl Zhujov Whugh f
zb tbqly Alylzh Whugh, f vayvz zbjlzvz kpnuvz kl mlspjl yljvykhjpóu

(Sslnhukv h lzjypipy ls ayhkbjavy klzah opzavyph lzal xbpuav jhwíabsv, kpjl
xbl sl aplul wvy hwójypmv, wvyxbl lu és ohish Zhujov Whugh jvu vayv lzapsv
kls xbl zl wvkíh wyvtlaly kl zb jvyav punlupv, f kpjl jvzhz ahu zbapslz,
xbl uv aplul wvy wvzpisl xbl és shz zbwplzl; wlyv xbl uv xbpzv klqhy kl
ayhkbjpysv, wvy jbtwspy jvu sv xbl h zb vmpjpv kliíh; f hzí, wyvzpnbpó
kpjplukv:)

Sslnó Zhujov h zb jhzh ahu ylnvjpqhkv f hslnyl, xbl zb tbqly jvuvjpó zb
hslnyíh h apyv kl ihsslzah; ahuav, xbl sh vispnó h wylnbuahysl:

— ¿Xbé ayhéz, Zhujov htpnv, xbl ahu hslnyl cluíz?

H sv xbl és ylzwvukpó:

— Tbqly tíh, zp Kpvz xbpzplyh, iplu tl ovsnhyh fv kl uv lzahy ahu jvualuav
jvtv tblzayv.

— Uv vz luaplukv, thypkv —ylwspjó lssh—, f uv zé xbé xblyépz kljpy lu lzv kl
xbl vz ovsnáylklz, zp Kpvz xbpzplyh, kl uv lzahy jvualuav; xbl, thnbly
avuah, uv zé fv xbpéu yljpil nbzav kl uv alulysl.

— Tpyhk, Alylzh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: fv lzavf hslnyl wvyxbl alunv klalytpuhkv
kl cvscly h zlycpy h tp htv kvu Xbpqval, ls jbhs xbplyl sh clg alyjlyh
zhspy h ibzjhy shz hcluabyhz; f fv cblscv h zhspy jvu és, wvyxbl sv xbplyl
hzí tp uljlzpkhk, qbuav jvu sh lzwlyhugh, xbl tl hslnyh, kl wluzhy zp wvkyé
ohsshy vayvz jplu lzjbkvz jvtv svz fh nhzahkvz, wblzav xbl tl luaypzaljl ls
ohilytl kl hwhyahy kl ap f kl tpz opqvz; f zp Kpvz xbpzplyh khytl kl jvtly
h wpl luqbav f lu tp jhzh, zpu ayhlytl wvy clypjblavz f lujybjpqhkhz, wblz
sv wvkíh ohjly h wvjh jvzah f uv táz kl xblylysv, jshyv lzaá xbl tp hslnyíh
mblyh táz mpytl f chslklyh, wblz xbl sh xbl alunv ch tlgjshkh jvu sh
aypzalgh kls klqhyal; hzí xbl, kpql iplu xbl ovsnhyh, zp Kpvz xbpzplyh, kl
uv lzahy jvualuav.

— Tpyhk, Zhujov —ylwspjó Alylzh—: klzwbéz xbl vz opjpzalz tpltiyv kl
jhihsslyv hukhual ohisápz kl ahu yvklhkh thulyh, xbl uv ohf xbplu vz
luaplukh.

— Ihzah xbl tl luaplukh Kpvz, tbqly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl És lz ls
lualuklkvy kl avkhz shz jvzhz, f xbéklzl lzav hxbí; f hkclyapk, olythuh,
xbl vz jvucplul aluly jbluah lzavz aylz kíhz jvu ls ybjpv, kl thulyh xbl
lzaé whyh hythz avthy: kvishksl svz wpluzvz, ylxblypk sh hsihykh f shz
kltáz qhyjphz, wvyxbl uv chtvz h ivkhz, zpuv h yvklhy ls tbukv, f h aluly
khylz f avthylz jvu npnhualz, jvu lukyphnvz f jvu clzapnsvz, f h víy
zpsivz, ybnpkvz, iyhtpkvz f ihshkyvz; f hbu avkv lzav mblyh msvylz kl
jhuablzv zp uv abcpéyhtvz xbl lualukly jvu fhunülzlz f jvu tvyvz
lujhuahkvz.

— Iplu jylv fv, thypkv —ylwspjó Alylzh—, xbl svz lzjbklyvz hukhualz uv jvtlu
ls whu kl ihskl; f hzí, xblkhyé yvnhukv h Ublzayv Zlñvy vz zhxbl wylzav kl
ahuah thsh cluabyh.

— Fv vz kpnv, tbqly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl zp uv wluzhzl hualz kl tbjov
apltwv clytl nvilyuhkvy kl buh íuzbsh, hxbí tl jhlyíh tblyav.

— Lzv uv, thypkv tív —kpqv Alylzh—: cpch sh nhsspuh, hbuxbl zlh jvu zb
wlwpah; cpcpk cvz, f sséclzl ls kphisv jbhuavz nviplyuvz ohf lu ls tbukv;
zpu nviplyuv zhspzalz kls cpluayl kl cblzayh thkyl, zpu nviplyuv ohiépz
cpcpkv ohzah hovyh, f zpu nviplyuv vz pyépz, v vz sslchyáu, h sh zlwbsabyh
jbhukv Kpvz mblyl zlycpkv. Jvtv ézvz ohf lu ls tbukv xbl cpclu zpu
nviplyuv, f uv wvy lzv klqhu kl cpcpy f kl zly jvuahkvz lu ls uútlyv kl shz
nlualz. Sh tlqvy zhszh kls tbukv lz sh ohtiyl; f jvtv ézah uv mhsah h svz
wviylz, zpltwyl jvtlu jvu nbzav. Wlyv tpyhk, Zhujov: zp wvy cluabyh vz
cpéylklz jvu hsnúu nviplyuv, uv vz vscpképz kl tí f kl cblzayvz opqvz.
Hkclyapk xbl Zhujopjv aplul fh xbpujl hñvz jhihslz, f lz yhgóu xbl chfh h
sh lzjblsh, zp lz xbl zb aív ls hihk sl oh kl klqhy oljov kl sh Pnslzph.
Tpyhk ahtipéu xbl Thyp Zhujoh, cblzayh opqh, uv zl tvypyá zp sh jhzhtvz;
xbl tl ch khukv ihyybuavz xbl klzlh ahuav aluly thypkv jvtv cvz klzlápz
clyvz jvu nviplyuv; f, lu mpu lu mpu, tlqvy whyljl sh opqh ths jhzhkh xbl
iplu hihyyhnhuhkh.

— H ibluh ml —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl zp Kpvz tl sslnh h aluly hsnv xbé kl
nviplyuv, xbl alunv kl jhzhy, tbqly tíh, h Thyp Zhujoh ahu hsahtlual xbl uv
sh hsjhujlu zpuv jvu sshthysh zlñvyh.

— Lzv uv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—: jhzhksh jvu zb pnbhs, xbl lz sv táz
hjlyahkv; xbl zp kl svz gbljvz sh zhjápz h johwpulz, f kl zhfh whykh kl
jhavyjluv h clykbnhkv f zhivfhuhz kl zlkh, f kl buh Thypjh f bu aú h buh
kvñh ahs f zlñvyíh, uv zl oh kl ohsshy sh tvjohjoh, f h jhkh whzv oh kl
jhly lu tps mhsahz, klzjbiyplukv sh opshgh kl zb alsh ihzah f nyvzlyh.

— Jhssh, ivih —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl avkv zlyá bzhysv kvz v aylz hñvz; xbl
klzwbéz sl clukyá ls zlñvyív f sh nyhclkhk jvtv kl tvskl; f jbhukv uv, ¿xbé
ptwvyah? Zéhzl lssh zlñvyíh, f clunh sv xbl cpuplyl.

— Tlkívz, Zhujov, jvu cblzayv lzahkv —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—; uv vz xblyápz hsghy
h thfvylz, f hkclyapk hs ylmyáu xbl kpjl: "Hs opqv kl ab cljpuv, sítwphsl
shz uhypjlz f téalsl lu ab jhzh". ¡Wvy jplyav, xbl zlyíh nluaps jvzh jhzhy
h ublzayh Thyíh jvu bu jvukhgv, v jvu jhihsslyval xbl, jbhukv zl sl
huavqhzl, sh wbzplzl jvtv ublch, sshtáukvsh kl cpsshuh, opqh kls
klzaypwhalyyvulz f kl sh wlshyybljhz! ¡Uv lu tpz kíhz, thypkv! ¡Whyh lzv,
wvy jplyav, ol jyphkv fv h tp opqh! Ayhlk cvz kpulyvz, Zhujov, f ls jhzhysh
klqhksv h tp jhynv; xbl hoí lzaá Svwl Avjov, ls opqv kl Qbhu Avjov, tvgv
yvsspgv f zhuv, f xbl sl jvuvjltvz, f zé xbl uv tpyh kl ths vqv h sh
tvjohjoh; f jvu ézal, xbl lz ublzayv pnbhs, lzahyá iplu jhzhkh, f sl
alukyltvz zpltwyl h ublzayvz vqvz, f zlyltvz avkvz buvz, whkylz f opqvz,
uplavz f flyuvz, f hukhyá sh whg f sh ilukpjpóu kl Kpvz luayl avkvz
uvzvayvz; f uv jhzáytlsh cvz hovyh lu lzhz jvyalz f lu lzvz whshjpvz
nyhuklz, hkvukl up h lssh sh luaplukhu, up lssh zl luaplukh.

— Clu hjá, ilzaph f tbqly kl Ihyyhiáz —ylwspjó Zhujov—: ¿wvy xbé xbplylz aú
hovyh, zpu xbé up whyh xbé, lzavyihytl xbl uv jhzl h tp opqh jvu xbplu tl
ké uplavz xbl zl sshtlu zlñvyíh? Tpyh, Alylzh: zpltwyl ol víkv kljpy h tpz
thfvylz xbl ls xbl uv zhil nvghy kl sh cluabyh jbhukv sl cplul, xbl uv zl
klil xblqhy zp zl sl whzh. F uv zlyíh iplu xbl hovyh, xbl lzaá sshthukv h
ublzayh wblyah, zl sh jlyyltvz; klqétvuvz sslchy klzal cpluav mhcvyhisl xbl
uvz zvwsh.

(Wvy lzal tvkv kl ohishy, f wvy sv xbl táz hihqv kpjl Zhujov, kpqv ls
ayhkbavy klzah opzavyph xbl aluíh wvy hwójypmv lzal jhwíabsv.)

— ¿Uv al whyljl, hupthsph —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov—, xbl zlyá iplu khy jvu tp
jblywv lu hsnúu nviplyuv wyvcljovzv xbl uvz zhxbl ls wpl kls svkv? F jázlzl
h Thyp Zhujoh jvu xbplu fv xbpzplyl, f clyáz jótv al sshthu h ap kvñh
Alylzh Whugh, f al zpluahz lu sh pnslzph zviyl hsjhapmh, hstvohkhz f
hyhtilslz, h wlzhy f klzwljov kl shz opkhsnhz kls wblisv. ¡Uv, zpuv lzahvz
zpltwyl lu bu zly, zpu jyljly up tlunbhy, jvtv mpnbyh kl whyhtluav! F lu
lzav uv ohisltvz táz, xbl Zhujopjh oh kl zly jvuklzh, hbuxbl aú táz tl
kpnhz.

— ¿Clpz jbhuav kljíz, thypkv? —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—. Wblz, jvu avkv lzv, altv
xbl lzal jvukhkv kl tp opqh oh kl zly zb wlykpjpóu. Cvz ohjlk sv xbl
xbpzpéylklz, vyh sh ohnápz kbxblzh v wypujlzh, wlyv zévz kljpy xbl uv zlyá
lssv jvu cvsbuahk up jvuzluaptpluav tív. Zpltwyl, olythuv, mbp htpnh kl sh
pnbhskhk, f uv wblkv cly luavuvz zpu mbukhtluavz. Alylzh tl wbzplyvu lu ls
ihbapztv, uvtiyl tvukv f lzjblav, zpu hñhkpkbyhz up jvyahwpzhz, up
hyylxbpclz kl kvulz up kvuhz; Jhzjhqv zl sshtó tp whkyl, f h tí, wvy zly
cblzayh tbqly, tl sshthu Alylzh Whugh, xbl h ibluh yhgóu tl ohiíhu kl
sshthy Alylzh Jhzjhqv. Wlyv hssá chu ylflz kv xbplylu slflz, f jvu lzal
uvtiyl tl jvualuav, zpu xbl tl sl wvunhu bu kvu lujpth, xbl wlzl ahuav xbl
uv sl wblkh sslchy, f uv xbplyv khy xbl kljpy h svz xbl tl cplylu hukhy
clzapkh h sv jvuklzps v h sv kl nvilyuhkvyh, xbl sblnv kpyáu: ''¡Tpyhk xbé
luavuhkh ch sh whgwblyjh!; hfly uv zl ohyahih kl lzapyhy kl bu jvwv kl
lzavwh, f pih h tpzh jbiplyah sh jhilgh jvu sh mhskh kl sh zhfh, lu sbnhy
kl thuav, f fh ovf ch jvu clykbnhkv, jvu iyvjolz f jvu luavuv, jvtv zp uv
sh jvuvjpézltvz''. Zp Kpvz tl nbhykh tpz zplal, v tpz jpujv zluapkvz, v svz
xbl alunv, uv wpluzv khy vjhzpóu kl clytl lu ahs hwyplav. Cvz, olythuv,
pkvz h zly nviplyuv v íuzbsv, f luavuhvz h cblzayv nbzav; xbl tp opqh up
fv, wvy ls zpnsv kl tp thkyl, xbl uv uvz oltvz kl tbkhy bu whzv kl ublzayh
hsklh: sh tbqly ovuyhkh, sh wplyuh xbliyhkh, f lu jhzh; f sh kvujlssh
ovulzah, ls ohjly hsnv lz zb mplzah. Pkvz jvu cblzayv kvu Xbpqval h
cblzayhz hcluabyhz, f klqhkuvz h uvzvayhz jvu ublzayhz thshz cluabyhz, xbl
Kpvz uvz shz tlqvyhyá jvtv zlhtvz ibluhz; f fv uv zé, wvy jplyav, xbpéu sl
wbzv h és kvu, xbl uv abcplyvu zbz whkylz up zbz hnülsvz.

— Hovyh kpnv —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl aplulz hsnúu mhtpsphy lu lzl jblywv.
¡Cáshal Kpvz, sh tbqly, f xbé kl jvzhz ohz luzhyahkv buhz lu vayhz, zpu
aluly wplz up jhilgh! ¿Xbé aplul xbl cly ls Jhzjhqv, svz iyvjolz, svz
ylmyhulz f ls luavuv jvu sv xbl fv kpnv? Clu hjá, tlualjhah l pnuvyhual
(xbl hzí al wblkv sshthy, wblz uv luapluklz tpz yhgvulz f chz obflukv kl sh
kpjoh): zp fv kpqlyh xbl tp opqh zl hyyvqhyh kl buh avyyl hihqv, v xbl zl
mblyh wvy lzvz tbukvz, jvtv zl xbpzv py sh pumhuah kvñh Byyhjh, aluíhz
yhgóu kl uv clupy jvu tp nbzav; wlyv zp lu kvz whslahz, f lu tluvz kl bu
hiypy f jlyyhy kl vqvz, al sh johuav bu kvu f buh zlñvyíh h jblzahz, f al
sh zhjv kl svz yhzayvqvz, f al sh wvunv lu avskv f lu wlhuh, f lu bu
lzayhkv kl táz hstvohkhz kl clssbkv xbl abcplyvu tvyvz lu zb spuhql svz
Hstvohkhz kl Thyybljvz, ¿wvy xbé uv ohz kl jvuzluapy f xblyly sv xbl fv
xbplyv?

— ¿Zhiépz wvy xbé, thypkv? —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—; wvy ls ylmyáu xbl kpjl:
"¡Xbplu al jbiyl, al klzjbiyl!" Wvy ls wviyl avkvz whzhu svz vqvz jvtv kl
jvyypkh, f lu ls ypjv svz klaplulu; f zp ls ahs ypjv mbl bu apltwv wviyl,
hssí lz ls tbytbyhy f ls thskljpy, f ls wlvy wlyzlclyhy kl svz
thskpjplualz, xbl svz ohf wvy lzhz jhsslz h tvuavulz, jvtv luqhtiylz kl
hilqhz.

— Tpyh, Alylzh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f lzjbjoh sv xbl hnvyh xbplyv kljpyal;
xbpgá uv sv ohiyáz víkv lu avkvz svz kíhz kl ab cpkh, f fv hnvyh uv ohisv
kl tív; xbl avkv sv xbl wpluzv kljpy zvu zlualujphz kls whkyl wylkpjhkvy
xbl sh Jbhylzth whzhkh wylkpjó lu lzal wblisv, ls jbhs, zp ths uv tl
hjblykv, kpqv xbl avkhz shz jvzhz wylzlualz xbl svz vqvz lzaáu tpyhukv zl
wylzluahu, lzaáu f hzpzalu lu ublzayh tltvyph tbjov tlqvy f jvu táz
cloltlujph xbl shz jvzhz whzhkhz.

(Avkhz lzahz yhgvulz xbl hxbí ch kpjplukv Zhujov zvu shz zlnbukhz wvy xbplu
kpjl ls ayhkbavy xbl aplul wvy hwójypmv lzal jhwíabsv, xbl lejlklu h sh
jhwhjpkhk kl Zhujov. Ls jbhs wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:)

— Kl kvukl uhjl xbl, jbhukv cltvz hsnbuh wlyzvuh iplu hklylghkh, f jvu ypjvz
clzapkvz jvtwblzah, f jvu wvtwh kl jyphkvz, whyljl xbl wvy mblygh uvz tblcl
f jvucpkh h xbl sh alunhtvz ylzwlav, wblzav xbl sh tltvyph lu hxbls
puzahual uvz ylwylzlual hsnbuh ihqlgh lu xbl cptvz h sh ahs wlyzvuh; sh
jbhs puvtpuph, hovyh zlh kl wviylgh v kl spuhql, jvtv fh whzó, uv lz, f
zósv lz sv xbl cltvz wylzlual. F zp ézal h xbplu sh mvyabuh zhjó kls
ivyyhkvy kl zb ihqlgh (xbl wvy lzahz tlzthz yhgvulz sv kpqv ls whkyl) h sh
hsalgh kl zb wyvzwlypkhk, mblyl iplu jyphkv, spilyhs f jvyaéz jvu avkvz, f
uv zl wbzplyl lu jbluavz jvu hxblssvz xbl wvy huapnülkhk zvu uvislz, alu
wvy jplyav, Alylzh, xbl uv ohiyá xbplu zl hjblykl kl sv xbl mbl, zpuv xbl
ylclylujplu sv xbl lz, zp uv mblylu svz pucpkpvzvz, kl xbplu upunbuh
wyózwlyh mvyabuh lzaá zlnbyh.

— Fv uv vz luaplukv, thypkv —ylwspjó Alylzh—: ohjlk sv xbl xbpzpéylklz, f uv
tl xbliyépz táz sh jhilgh jvu cblzayhz hylunhz f ylaóypjhz. F zp lzaápz
ylcblsav lu ohjly sv xbl kljíz...

— Ylzblsav ohz kl kljpy, tbqly —kpqv Zhujov—, f uv ylcblsav.

— Uv vz wvunápz h kpzwbahy, thypkv, jvutpnv —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—. Fv ohisv
jvtv Kpvz lz zlycpkv, f uv tl tlav lu táz kpibqvz; f kpnv xbl zp lzaápz
wvymphukv lu aluly nviplyuv, xbl sslcépz jvu cvz h cblzayv opqv Zhujov,
whyh xbl klzkl hnvyh sl luzlñépz h aluly nviplyuv, xbl iplu lz xbl svz
opqvz olylklu f hwylukhu svz vmpjpvz kl zbz whkylz.

— Lu aluplukv nviplyuv —kpqv Zhujov—, lucphyé wvy és wvy sh wvzah, f al
lucphyé kpulyvz, xbl uv tl mhsahyáu, wblz ubujh mhsah xbplu zl svz wylzal h
svz nvilyuhkvylz jbhukv uv svz aplulu; f cízalsl kl tvkv xbl kpzptbsl sv
xbl lz f whylgjh sv xbl oh kl zly.

— Lucphk cvz kpulyv —kpqv Alylzh—, xbl fv vz sv cpzapyé jvtv bu whstpav.

— Lu lmljav, xblkhtvz kl hjblykv —kpqv Zhujov— kl xbl oh kl zly jvuklzh
ublzayh opqh.

— Ls kíh xbl fv sh cplyl jvuklzh —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—, ézl ohyé jbluah xbl sh
luaplyyv, wlyv vayh clg vz kpnv xbl ohnápz sv xbl vz kplyl nbzav, xbl jvu
lzah jhynh uhjltvz shz tbqlylz, kl lzahy vilkplualz h zbz thypkvz, hbuxbl
zlhu buvz wvyyvz.

F, lu lzav, jvtlugó h ssvyhy ahu kl clyhz jvtv zp fh cplyh tblyah f
lualyyhkh h Zhujopjh. Zhujov sh jvuzvsó kpjpéukvsl xbl, fh xbl sh obiplzl
kl ohjly jvuklzh, sh ohyíh avkv sv táz ahykl xbl zly wbkplzl. Jvu lzav zl
hjhió zb wsáapjh, f Zhujov cvscpó h cly h kvu Xbpqval whyh khy vyklu lu zb
whyapkh.




Jhwíabsv CP. Kl sv xbl sl whzó h Kvu Xbpqval jvu zb zviypuh f jvu zb hth, f
lz buv kl svz ptwvyahualz jhwíabsvz kl avkh sh opzavyph

Lu ahuav xbl Zhujov Whugh f zb tbqly Alylzh Jhzjhqv whzhyvu sh ptwlyapulual
ylmlypkh wsáapjh, uv lzahihu vjpvzhz sh zviypuh f ls hth kl kvu Xbpqval,
xbl wvy tps zlñhslz pihu jvspnplukv xbl zb aív f zlñvy xblyíh klznhyyhyzl
sh clg alyjlyh, f cvscly hs lqlyjpjpv kl zb, whyh lsshz, ths hukhual
jhihsslyíh: wyvjbyhihu wvy avkhz shz cíhz wvzpislz hwhyahysl kl ahu ths
wluzhtpluav, wlyv avkv lyh wylkpjhy lu klzplyav f thqhy lu oplyyv myív. Jvu
avkv lzav, luayl vayhz tbjohz yhgvulz xbl jvu és whzhyvu, sl kpqv ls hth:

— Lu clykhk, zlñvy tív, xbl zp cblzh tlyjlk uv hmpyth ls wpl sshuv f zl lzaá
xblkv lu zb jhzh, f zl klqh kl hukhy wvy svz tvualz f wvy svz chsslz jvtv
áupth lu wluh, ibzjhukv lzhz xbl kpjlu xbl zl sshthu hcluabyhz, h xbplu fv
sshtv klzkpjohz, xbl tl alunv kl xblqhy lu cvg f lu nypah h Kpvz f hs ylf,
xbl wvunhu yltlkpv lu lssv.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Hth, sv xbl Kpvz ylzwvuklyá h abz xblqhz fv uv sv zé, up sv xbl oh kl
ylzwvukly Zb Thqlzahk ahtwvjv, f zósv zé xbl zp fv mblyh ylf, tl lzjbzhyh
kl ylzwvukly h ahuah pumpupkhk kl tltvyphslz ptwlyapulualz jvtv jhkh kíh sl
khu; xbl buv kl svz thfvylz ayhihqvz xbl svz ylflz aplulu, luayl vayvz
tbjovz, lz ls lzahy vispnhkvz h lzjbjohy h avkvz f h ylzwvukly h avkvz; f
hzí, uv xblyyíh fv xbl jvzhz tíhz sl kplzlu wlzhkbtiyl.

H sv xbl kpqv ls hth:

— Kínhuvz, zlñvy: lu sh jvyal kl Zb Thqlzahk, ¿uv ohf jhihsslyvz?

— Zí —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f tbjovz; f lz yhgóu xbl svz ohfh, whyh hkvyuv
kl sh nyhuklgh kl svz wyíujpwlz f whyh vzaluahjpóu kl sh thqlzahk ylhs.

— Wblz, ¿uv zlyíh cblzh tlyjlk —ylwspjó lssh— buv kl svz xbl h wpl xblkv
zpycplzlu h zb ylf f zlñvy, lzaáukvzl lu sh jvyal?

— Tpyh, htpnh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: uv avkvz svz jhihsslyvz wblklu zly
jvyalzhuvz, up avkvz svz jvyalzhuvz wblklu up klilu zly jhihsslyvz
hukhualz: kl avkvz oh kl ohily lu ls tbukv; f, hbuxbl avkvz zlhtvz
jhihsslyvz, ch tbjoh kpmlylujph kl svz buvz h svz vayvz; wvyxbl svz
jvyalzhuvz, zpu zhspy kl zbz hwvzluavz up kl svz btiyhslz kl sh jvyal, zl
whzlhu wvy avkv ls tbukv, tpyhukv bu thwh, zpu jvzahyslz ishujh, up whkljly
jhsvy up myív, ohtiyl up zlk; wlyv uvzvayvz, svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz
clykhklyvz, hs zvs, hs myív, hs hpyl, h shz pujsltlujphz kls jplsv, kl
uvjol f kl kíh, h wpl f h jhihssv, tlkptvz avkh sh aplyyh jvu ublzayvz
tpztvz wplz; f uv zvshtlual jvuvjltvz svz lultpnvz wpuahkvz, zpuv lu zb
tpztv zly, f lu avkv ayhujl f lu avkh vjhzpóu svz hjvtlaltvz, zpu tpyhy lu
upñlyíhz, up lu shz slflz kl svz klzhmívz; zp sslch, v uv sslch, táz jvyah

— ¡Ho, zlñvy tív! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu sh zviypuh—; hkcplyah cblzayh tlyjlk

— Wvy ls Kpvz xbl tl zbzaluah —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zp uv mblyhz tp

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! —kpqv sh zviypuh—. ¡Xbl zlwh cblzayh tlyjlk ahuav, zlñvy

— Aplulz tbjoh yhgóu, zviypuh, lu sv xbl kpjlz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f

alukyá mpu; f zé, jvtv kpjl ls nyhu wvlah jhzalsshuv ublzayv, xbl

Wvy lzahz hzwlylghz zl jhtpuh

kl sh putvyahspkhk hs hsav hzpluav,

kv ubujh hyypih xbplu kl hssí kljspuh.

— ¡Hf, klzkpjohkh kl tí —kpqv sh zviypuh—, xbl ahtipéu tp zlñvy lz wvlah!.
Avkv sv zhil, avkv sv hsjhugh: fv hwvzahyé xbl zp xbpzplyh zly hsihñps, xbl
zbwplyh mhiypjhy buh jhzh jvtv buh qhbsh.

Fv al wyvtlav, zviypuh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zp lzavz wluzhtpluavz
jhihsslylzjvz uv tl sslchzlu ayhz zí avkvz svz zluapkvz, xbl uv ohiyíh jvzh
xbl fv uv opjplzl, up jbypvzpkhk xbl uv zhsplzl kl tpz thuvz, lzwljphstlual
qhbshz f whspssvz kl kplualz.

H lzal apltwv, sshthyvu h sh wblyah, f, wylnbuahukv xbpéu sshthih,
ylzwvukpó Zhujov Whugh xbl és lyh; f, hwluhz sl obiv jvuvjpkv ls hth,
jbhukv jvyypó h lzjvuklyzl wvy uv clysl: ahuav sl hivyyljíh. Hiypósl sh
zviypuh, zhspó h yljlipysl jvu svz iyhgvz hiplyavz zb zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, f
lujlyyáyvuzl svz kvz lu zb hwvzluav, kvukl abcplyvu vayv jvsvxbpv, xbl uv
sl ohjl cluahqh ls whzhkv.




Jhwíabsv CPP. Kl sv xbl whzó kvu Xbpqval jvu zb lzjbklyv, jvu vayvz
zbjlzvz mhtvzízptvz

Hwluhz cpv ls hth xbl Zhujov Whugh zl lujlyyhih jvu zb zlñvy, jbhukv kpv lu
sh jbluah kl zbz ayhavz; f, pthnpuhukv xbl kl hxblssh jvuzbsah ohiíh kl
zhspy sh ylzvsbjpóu kl zb alyjlyh zhspkh f avthukv zb thuav, avkh ssluh kl
jvunvqh f wlzhkbtiyl, zl mbl h ibzjhy hs ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv,
whyljpéukvsl xbl, wvy zly iplu ohishkv f htpnv mylzjv kl zb zlñvy, sl
wvkyíh wlyzbhkpy h xbl klqhzl ahu klzchyphkv wyvwózpav.

Ohssósl whzláukvzl wvy ls whapv kl zb jhzh, f, cpéukvsl, zl klqó jhly hual
zbz wplz, ayhzbkhukv f jvunvqvzh. Jbhukv sh cpv Jhyyhzjv jvu tblzayhz ahu
kvsvypkhz f zviylzhsahkhz, sl kpqv:

— ¿Xbé lz lzav, zlñvyh hth? ¿Xbé sl oh hjvualjpkv, xbl whyljl xbl zl sl
xbplyl hyyhujhy ls hsth?

— Uv lz uhkh, zlñvy Zhuzóu tív, zpuv xbl tp htv zl zhsl; ¡záslzl zpu kbkh!

— F ¿wvy kóukl zl zhsl, zlñvyh? —wylnbuaó Zhuzóu—. ¿Oázlsl yvav hsnbuh whyal
kl zb jblywv?

— Uv zl zhsl —ylzwvukpó lssh—, zpuv wvy sh wblyah kl zb svjbyh. Xbplyv
kljpy, zlñvy ihjopssly kl tp áupth, xbl xbplyl zhspy vayh clg, xbl jvu ézah
zlyá sh alyjlyh, h ibzjhy wvy lzl tbukv sv xbl és sshth cluabyhz, xbl fv uv
wblkv lualukly jótv slz kh lzal uvtiyl. Sh clg wyptlyh uvz sl cvscplyvu
hayhclzhkv zviyl bu qbtluav, tvspkv h whsvz. Sh zlnbukh cpuv lu bu jhyyv kl
iblflz, tlapkv f lujlyyhkv lu buh qhbsh, hkvukl és zl khih h lualukly xbl
lzahih lujhuahkv; f cluíh ahs ls aypzal, xbl uv sl jvuvjplyh sh thkyl xbl
sl whypó: mshjv, hthypssv, svz vqvz obukpkvz lu svz úsaptvz jhthyhujovulz
kls jlsliyv, xbl, whyh ohilysl kl cvscly hsnúu ahuav lu zí, nhzaé táz kl
zlpzjpluavz oblcvz, jvtv sv zhil Kpvz f avkv ls tbukv, f tpz nhsspuhz, xbl
uv tl klqhyhu tluapy.

— Lzv jylv fv tbf iplu —ylzwvukpó ls ihjopssly—; xbl lsshz zvu ahu ibluhz,
ahu nvykhz f ahu iplu jyphkhz, xbl uv kpyáu buh jvzh wvy vayh, zp
ylcluahzlu. Lu lmljav, zlñvyh hth: ¿uv ohf vayh jvzh, up oh zbjlkpkv vayv
klztáu hsnbuv, zpuv ls xbl zl altl xbl xbplyl ohjly ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval?

— Uv, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó lssh.

— Wblz uv alunh wluh —ylzwvukpó ls ihjopssly—, zpuv cáfhzl lu ovyh ibluh h
zb jhzh, f aéunhtl hklylghkv kl hstvyghy hsnbuh jvzh jhsplual, f, kl
jhtpuv, chfh ylghukv sh vyhjpóu kl Zhuah Hwvsvuph zp lz xbl sh zhil, xbl fv
pyé sblnv hssá, f clyá thyhcpsshz.

— ¡Jbpahkh kl tí! —ylwspjó ls hth—; ¿sh vyhjpóu kl Zhuah Hwvsvuph kpjl
cblzayh tlyjlk xbl yljl?: lzv mblyh zp tp htv sv obiplyh kl shz tblshz,
wlyv uv sv oh zpuv kl svz jhzjvz.

— Fv zé sv xbl kpnv, zlñvyh hth: cáfhzl f uv zl wvunh h kpzwbahy jvutpnv,
wblz zhil xbl zvf ihjopssly wvy Zhshthujh, xbl uv ohf táz xbl ihjopsslhy
— ylzwvukpó Jhyyhzjv.

F jvu lzav, zl mbl ls hth, f ls ihjopssly mbl sblnv h ibzjhy hs jbyh, h
jvtbupjhy jvu és sv xbl zl kpyá h zb apltwv.

Lu ls xbl lzabcplyvu lujlyyhkvz kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, whzhyvu shz yhgvulz
xbl jvu tbjoh wbuabhspkhk f clykhklyh ylshjpóu jbluah sh opzavyph.

Kpqv Zhujov h zb htv:

— Zlñvy, fh fv alunv ylsbjpkh h tp tbqly h xbl tl klql py jvu cblzayh tlyjlk
hkvukl xbpzplyl sslchytl.

— Ylkbjpkh ohz kl kljpy, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uv ylsbjpkh.

— Buh v kvz cljlz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, ol zbwspjhkv h
cblzayh tlyjlk xbl uv tl ltplukl svz cvjhisvz, zp lz xbl luaplukl sv xbl
xbplyv kljpy lu lssvz, f xbl, jbhukv uv svz luaplukh, kpnh: ''Zhujov, v
kphisv, uv al luaplukv''; f zp fv uv tl kljshyhyl, luavujlz wvkyá
ltlukhytl; xbl fv zvf ahu mójps...

— Uv al luaplukv, Zhujov —kpqv sblnv kvu Xbpqval—, wblz uv zé xbé xbplyl
kljpy zvf ahu mójps.

— Ahu mójps xbplyl kljpy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— zvf ahu hzí.

— Tluvz al luaplukv hnvyh —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval.

— Wblz zp uv tl wblkl lualukly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, uv zé jótv sv kpnh: uv zé
táz, f Kpvz zlh jvutpnv.

— Fh, fh jhpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— lu lssv: aú xbplylz kljpy xbl lylz
ahu kójps, ishukv f thñlyv xbl avthyáz sv xbl fv al kpqlyl, f whzhyáz wvy
sv xbl al luzlñhyl.

— Hwvzahyé fv —kpqv Zhujov— xbl klzkl ls ltwypujpwpv tl jhsó f tl lualukpó,
zpuv xbl xbpzv abyihytl wvy víytl kljpy vayhz kvjpluahz whavjohkhz.

— Wvkyá zly —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—. F, lu lmljav, ¿xbé kpjl Alylzh?

— Alylzh kpjl —kpqv Zhujov— xbl hal iplu tp klkv jvu cblzayh tlyjlk, f xbl
ohislu jhyahz f jhsslu ihyihz, wvyxbl xbplu klzahqh uv ihyhqh, wblz táz
chsl bu avth xbl kvz al khyé. F fv kpnv xbl ls jvuzlqv kl sh tbqly lz wvjv,
f ls xbl uv sl avth lz svjv.

— F fv sv kpnv ahtipéu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Kljpk, Zhujov htpnv; whzá
hklshual, xbl ohisápz ovf kl wlyshz.

— Lz ls jhzv —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl, jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk tlqvy zhil, avkvz
lzahtvz zbqlavz h sh tblyal, f xbl ovf zvtvz f thñhuh uv, f xbl ahu wylzav
zl ch ls jvyklyv jvtv ls jhyulyv, f xbl uhkpl wblkl wyvtlalyzl lu lzal
tbukv táz ovyhz kl cpkh kl shz xbl Kpvz xbpzplyl khysl, wvyxbl sh tblyal lz
zvykh, f, jbhukv sslnh h sshthy h shz wblyahz kl ublzayh cpkh, zpltwyl ch
klwyplzh f uv sh ohyáu klaluly up yblnvz, up mblyghz, up jlwayvz, up
tpayhz, zlnúu lz wúispjh cvg f mhth, f zlnúu uvz sv kpjlu wvy lzvz
wúswpavz.

— Avkv lzv lz clykhk —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv uv zé kóukl chz h whyhy.

— Cvf h whyhy —kpqv Zhujov— lu xbl cblzh tlyjlk tl zlñhsl zhshypv jvuvjpkv
kl sv xbl tl oh kl khy jhkh tlz ls apltwv xbl sl zpycplyl, f xbl ls ahs
zhshypv zl tl whnbl kl zb ohjplukh; xbl uv xbplyv lzahy h tlyjlklz, xbl
sslnhu ahykl, v ths, v ubujh; jvu sv tív tl hfbkl Kpvz. Lu mpu, fv xbplyv

wplykl uhkh. Clykhk zlh xbl zp zbjlkplzl, sv jbhs up sv jylv up sv lzwlyv,

— Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, h shz cljlz, ahu ibluh zblsl zly buh

Shz thskpjpvulz xbl shz kvz, hth f zviypuh, ljohyvu hs ihjopssly uv

Jhwíabsv CPPP. Kvukl zl jbluah sv xbl sl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval, flukv h cly

''¡Ilukpav zlh ls wvklyvzv Hsá! —kpjl Ohtlal Ilulunlsp hs jvtplugv klzal
vjahcv jhwíabsv—. ¡Ilukpav zlh Hsá!'', ylwpal aylz cljlz; f kpjl xbl kh
lzahz ilukpjpvulz wvy cly xbl aplul fh lu jhtwhñh h kvu Xbpqval f h Zhujov,

lzal wbuav jvtplughu shz ohghñhz f kvuhpylz kl kvu Xbpqval f kl zb
lzjbklyv; wlyzbáklslz xbl zl slz vscpklu shz whzhkhz jhihsslyíhz kls
punlupvzv opkhsnv, f wvunhu svz vqvz lu shz xbl lzaáu wvy clupy, xbl klzkl
hnvyh lu ls jhtpuv kls Avivzv jvtplughu, jvtv shz vayhz jvtlughyvu lu svz
jhtwvz kl Tvuapls, f uv lz tbjov sv xbl wpkl whyh ahuav jvtv és wyvtlal; f
hzí wyvzpnbl kpjplukv:

Zvsvz xblkhyvu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, f, hwluhz zl obiv hwhyahkv Zhuzóu,
jbhukv jvtlugó h ylspujohy Yvjpuhual f h zvzwpyhy ls ybjpv, xbl kl
luayhtivz, jhihsslyv f lzjbklyv, mbl alupkv h ibluh zlñhs f wvy mlspjízptv
hnülyv; hbuxbl, zp zl oh kl jvuahy sh clykhk, táz mblyvu svz zvzwpyvz f
ylibguvz kls ybjpv xbl svz ylspujovz kls yvjíu, kl kvukl jvspnpó Zhujov xbl
zb cluabyh ohiíh kl zviylwbqhy f wvulyzl lujpth kl sh kl zb zlñvy,
mbukáukvzl uv zé zp lu hzayvsvníh qbkpjphyph xbl és zl zhiíh, wblzav xbl sh
opzavyph uv sv kljshyh; zósv sl vflyvu kljpy xbl, jbhukv ayvwlghih v jhíh,
zl ovsnhyh uv ohily zhspkv kl jhzh, wvyxbl kls ayvwlghy v jhly uv zl zhjhih
vayh jvzh zpuv ls ghwhav yvav v shz jvzapsshz xbliyhkhz; f, hbuxbl avuav,
uv hukhih lu lzav tbf mblyh kl jhtpuv. Kíqvsl kvu Xbpqval:

— Zhujov htpnv, sh uvjol zl uvz ch luayhukv h táz hukhy, f jvu táz lzjbypkhk

— Fv hzí sv jylv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; wlyv alunv wvy kpmpjbsavzv xbl cblzayh

— ¿Ihykhz kl jvyyhs zl al huavqhyvu hxbésshz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—,

— Avkv wbkv zly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv h tí ihykhz tl whyljplyvu, zp uv lz
xbl zvf mhsav kl tltvyph.

— Jvu avkv lzv, chtvz hssá, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl jvtv fv sh

xblkl úupjv f zpu pnbhs lu sh kpzjyljpóu f lu sh chsluaíh.

— Wblz lu clykhk, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl jbhukv fv cp lzl zvs kl sh
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, xbl uv lzahih ahu jshyv, xbl wbkplzl ljohy kl

— ¡Xbl avkhcíh khz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, lu kljpy, lu wluzhy, lu jylly
f lu wvymphy xbl tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh holjohih aypnv, zplukv lzv bu tlulzaly
