wypujpwhslz xbl lzaáu jvuzapabpkhz f nbhykhkhz whyh vayvz lqlyjpjpvz f
luaylaluptpluavz, xbl tblzayhu h apyv kl ihsslzah zb wypujpwhspkhk...! Ths
zl al hjblykhu h ap, ¡vo Zhujov!, hxblssvz clyzvz kl ublzayv wvlah kvukl
uvz wpuah shz shivylz xbl ohjíhu hssá lu zbz tvyhkhz kl jypzahs hxblsshz
jbhayv upumhz xbl kls Ahqv hthkv zhjhyvu shz jhilghz, f zl zluahyvu h
shiyhy lu ls wyhkv clykl hxblsshz ypjhz alshz xbl hssí ls punlupvzv wvlah
uvz klzjypil, xbl avkhz lyhu kl vyv, zpynv f wlyshz jvualzahz f alqpkhz. F
klzah thulyh kliíh kl zly ls kl tp zlñvyh jbhukv aú sh cpzal; zpuv xbl sh
lucpkph xbl hsnúu ths lujhuahkvy klil kl aluly h tpz jvzhz, avkhz shz xbl
tl ohu kl khy nbzav aybljh f cblscl lu kpmlylualz mpnbyhz xbl lsshz aplulu;
f hzí, altv xbl, lu hxblssh opzavyph xbl kpjlu xbl hukh ptwylzh kl tpz
ohghñhz, zp wvy cluabyh oh zpkv zb hbavy hsnúu zhipv tp lultpnv, ohiyá
wblzav buhz jvzhz wvy vayhz, tlgjshukv jvu buh clykhk tps tluapyhz,
kpclyapéukvzl h jvuahy vayhz hjjpvulz mblyh kl sv xbl ylxbplyl sh
jvuapubhjpóu kl buh clykhklyh opzavyph. ¡Vo lucpkph, yhíg kl pumpupavz
thslz f jhyjvth kl shz cpyabklz! Avkvz svz cpjpvz, Zhujov, ayhlu bu uv zé
xbé kl klslpal jvuzpnv, wlyv ls kl sh lucpkph uv ayhl zpuv kpznbzavz,
yhujvylz f yhiphz.

— Lzv lz sv xbl fv kpnv ahtipéu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f wpluzv xbl lu lzh
slflukh v opzavyph xbl uvz kpqv ls ihjopssly Jhyyhzjv xbl kl uvzvayvz ohiíh
cpzav klil kl hukhy tp ovuyh h jvjol hjá, jpujohkv, f, jvtv kpjlu, hs
lzaypjval, hxbí f hssí, ihyyplukv shz jhsslz. Wblz, h ml kl ibluv, xbl uv
ol kpjov fv ths kl upunúu lujhuahkvy, up alunv ahuavz iplulz xbl wblkh zly
lucpkphkv; iplu lz clykhk xbl zvf hsnv thspjpvzv, f xbl alunv tpz jplyavz
hzvtvz kl ilsshjv, wlyv avkv sv jbiyl f ahwh sh nyhu jhwh kl sh zptwslgh
tíh, zpltwyl uhabyhs f ubujh hyapmpjpvzh. F jbhukv vayh jvzh uv abcplzl
zpuv ls jylly, jvtv zpltwyl jylv, mpytl f clykhklyhtlual lu Kpvz f lu avkv
hxblssv xbl aplul f jyll sh Zhuah Pnslzph Jhaóspjh Yvthuh, f ls zly lultpnv
tvyahs, jvtv sv zvf, kl svz qbkívz, kliíhu svz opzavyphkvylz aluly
tpzlypjvykph kl tí f ayhahytl iplu lu zbz lzjypavz. Wlyv kpnhu sv xbl
xbpzplylu; xbl klzubkv uhjí, klzubkv tl ohssv: up wplykv up nhuv; hbuxbl,
wvy clytl wblzav lu spiyvz f hukhy wvy lzl tbukv kl thuv lu thuv, uv zl tl
kh bu opnv xbl kpnhu kl tí avkv sv xbl xbpzplylu.

— Lzv tl whyljl, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, h sv xbl zbjlkpó h bu mhtvzv
wvlah klzavz apltwvz, ls jbhs, ohiplukv oljov buh thspjpvzh záapyh jvuayh
avkhz shz khthz jvyalzhuhz, uv wbzv up uvtiyó lu lssh h buh khth xbl zl
wvkíh kbkhy zp sv lyh v uv; sh jbhs, cplukv xbl uv lzahih lu sh spzah kl
shz kltáz, zl xblqó hs wvlah, kpjpéukvsl xbl xbé ohiíh cpzav lu lssh whyh
uv wvulysh lu ls uútlyv kl shz vayhz, f xbl hshynhzl sh záapyh, f sh
wbzplzl lu ls luzhujol; zp uv, xbl tpyhzl whyh sv xbl ohiíh uhjpkv. Oígvsv
hzí ls wvlah, f wúzvsh jbhs uv kpnhu kblñhz, f lssh xblkó zhapzmljoh, wvy
clyzl jvu mhth, hbuxbl pumhtl. Ahtipéu cplul jvu lzav sv xbl jbluahu kl
hxbls whzavy xbl wbzv mblnv f hiyhzó ls altwsv mhtvzv kl Kphuh, jvuahkv wvy
buh kl shz zplal thyhcpsshz kls tbukv, zósv wvyxbl xblkhzl cpcv zb uvtiyl
lu svz zpnsvz clupklyvz; f, hbuxbl zl thukó xbl uhkpl sl uvtiyhzl, up
opjplzl wvy whshiyh v wvy lzjypav tlujpóu kl zb uvtiyl, wvyxbl uv
jvuzpnbplzl ls mpu kl zb klzlv, avkhcíh zl zbwv xbl zl sshthih Lyózayhav.
Ahtipéu hsbkl h lzav sv xbl zbjlkpó hs nyhukl ltwlyhkvy Jhysv Xbpuav jvu bu
jhihsslyv lu Yvth. Xbpzv cly ls ltwlyhkvy hxbls mhtvzv altwsv kl sh
Yvabukh, xbl lu sh huapnülkhk zl sshtó ls altwsv kl avkvz svz kpvzlz, f
hovyh, jvu tlqvy cvjhjpóu, zl sshth kl avkvz svz zhuavz, f lz ls lkpmpjpv
xbl táz lualyv oh xblkhkv kl svz xbl hsgó sh nluapspkhk lu Yvth, f lz ls
xbl táz jvuzlych sh mhth kl sh nyhukpvzpkhk f thnupmpjlujph kl zbz
mbukhkvylz: és lz kl oljobyh kl buh tlkph uhyhuqh, nyhukízptv lu lzayltv,
f lzaá tbf jshyv, zpu luayhysl vayh sbg xbl sh xbl sl jvujlkl buh cluahuh,
v, wvy tlqvy kljpy, jshyhivfh ylkvukh xbl lzaá lu zb jpth, klzkl sh jbhs
tpyhukv ls ltwlyhkvy ls lkpmpjpv, lzahih jvu és f h zb shkv bu jhihsslyv
yvthuv, kljshyáukvsl svz wyptvylz f zbapslghz kl hxblssh nyhu táxbpuh f
tltvyhisl hyxbpalabyh; f, ohipéukvzl xbpahkv kl sh jshyhivfh, kpqv hs
ltwlyhkvy: ''Tps cljlz, Zhjyh Thqlzahk, tl cpuv klzlv kl hiyhghytl jvu
cblzayh Thqlzahk f hyyvqhytl kl hxblssh jshyhivfh hihqv, wvy klqhy kl tí
mhth lalyuh lu ls tbukv''. ''Fv vz hnyhklgjv —ylzwvukpó ls ltwlyhkvy— ls uv
ohily wblzav ahu ths wluzhtpluav lu lmlav, f kl hxbí hklshual uv vz wvukyé
fv lu vjhzpóu xbl cvscápz h ohjly wyblih kl cblzayh slhsahk; f hzí, vz
thukv xbl qhtáz tl ohisépz, up lzaépz kvukl fv lzabcplyl''. F, ayhz lzahz
whshiyhz, sl opgv buh nyhu tlyjlk. Xbplyv kljpy, Zhujov, xbl ls klzlv kl
hsjhughy mhth lz hjapcv lu nyhu thulyh. ¿Xbpéu wpluzhz aú xbl hyyvqó h
Ovyhjpv kls wblual hihqv, hythkv kl avkhz hythz, lu sh wyvmbukpkhk kls
Apiyl? ¿Xbpéu hiyhzó ls iyhgv f sh thuv h Tbjpv? ¿Xbpéu ptwlspó h Jbyjpv h
shughyzl lu sh wyvmbukh zpth hykplual xbl hwhyljpó lu sh tpahk kl Yvth?
¿Xbpéu, jvuayh avkvz svz hnülyvz xbl lu jvuayh zl sl ohiíhu tvzayhkv, opgv
whzhy ls Ybipjóu h Jézhy? F, jvu lqltwsvz táz tvklyuvz, ¿xbpéu ihyyluó svz
uhcívz f klqó lu zljv f hpzshkvz svz chslyvzvz lzwhñvslz nbphkvz wvy ls
jvyalzízptv Jvyaéz lu ls Ublcv Tbukv? Avkhz lzahz f vayhz nyhuklz f
kpmlylualz ohghñhz zvu, mblyvu f zlyáu viyhz kl sh mhth, xbl svz tvyahslz
klzlhu jvtv wyltpvz f whyal kl sh putvyahspkhk xbl zbz mhtvzvz oljovz
tlyljlu, wblzav xbl svz jypzaphuvz, jhaóspjvz f hukhualz jhihsslyvz táz
ohiltvz kl halukly h sh nsvyph kl svz zpnsvz clupklyvz, xbl lz lalyuh lu
shz ylnpvulz laéylhz f jlslzalz, xbl h sh chupkhk kl sh mhth xbl lu lzal
wylzlual f hjhihisl zpnsv zl hsjhugh; sh jbhs mhth, wvy tbjov xbl kbyl, lu
mpu zl oh kl hjhihy jvu ls tlztv tbukv, xbl aplul zb mpu zlñhshkv. Hzí, ¡vo
Zhujov!, xbl ublzayhz viyhz uv ohu kl zhspy kls sítpal xbl uvz aplul wblzav
sh ylspnpóu jypzaphuh, xbl wyvmlzhtvz. Oltvz kl thahy lu svz npnhualz h sh
zvilyiph; h sh lucpkph, lu sh nlulyvzpkhk f iblu wljov; h sh pyh, lu ls
ylwvzhkv jvuapulual f xbplabk kls áuptv; h sh nbsh f hs zblñv, lu ls wvjv
jvtly xbl jvtltvz f lu ls tbjov clshy xbl clshtvz; h sh sbqbyph f shzjpcph,
lu sh slhsahk xbl nbhykhtvz h shz xbl oltvz oljov zlñvyhz kl ublzayvz
wluzhtpluavz; h sh wlylgh, jvu hukhy wvy avkhz shz whyalz kls tbukv,
ibzjhukv shz vjhzpvulz xbl uvz wblkhu ohjly f ohnhu, zviyl jypzaphuvz,
mhtvzvz jhihsslyvz. Clz hxbí, Zhujov, svz tlkpvz wvy kvukl zl hsjhughu svz
lzayltvz kl hshihughz xbl jvuzpnv ayhl sh ibluh mhth.

— Avkv sv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk ohzah hxbí tl oh kpjov —kpqv Zhujov— sv ol
lualukpkv tbf iplu, wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, xblyyíh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl
zvyiplzl buh kbkh xbl hnvyh lu lzal wbuav tl oh clupkv h sh tltvyph.

— Hzvscplzl xbplylz kljpy, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Kp lu iblu ovyh, xbl
fv ylzwvuklyé sv xbl zbwplyl.

— Kínhtl, zlñvy —wyvzpnbpó Zhujov—: lzvz Qbspvz v Hnvzavz, f avkvz lzvz
jhihsslyvz ohghñvzvz xbl oh kpjov, xbl fh zvu tblyavz, ¿kóukl lzaáu hnvyh?

— Svz nluapslz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— zpu kbkh lzaáu lu ls pumplyuv; svz
jypzaphuvz, zp mblyvu ibluvz jypzaphuvz, v lzaáu lu ls wbynhavypv v lu ls
jplsv.

— Lzaá iplu —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv zlwhtvz hovyh: lzhz zlwbsabyhz kvukl lzaáu
svz jblywvz klzvz zlñvyhgvz, ¿aplulu klshual kl zí sátwhyhz kl wshah, v
lzaáu hkvyuhkhz shz whylklz kl zbz jhwpsshz kl tbslahz, kl tvyahqhz, kl
jhilsslyhz, kl wplyuhz f kl vqvz kl jlyh? F zp klzav uv, ¿kl xbé lzaáu
hkvyuhkhz?

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Svz zlwbsjyvz kl svz nluapslz mblyvu wvy sh thfvy whyal zbuabvzvz altwsvz:
shz jlupghz kls jblywv kl Qbspv Jézhy zl wbzplyvu zviyl buh wpyátpkl kl
wplkyh kl klztlzbyhkh nyhuklgh, h xbplu ovf sshthu lu Yvth Sh hnbqh kl Zhu
Wlkyv; hs ltwlyhkvy Hkyphuv sl zpycpó kl zlwbsabyh bu jhzapssv ahu nyhukl
jvtv buh ibluh hsklh, h xbplu sshthyvu Tvslz Ohkyphup, xbl hnvyh lz ls
jhzapssv kl Zhuaáunls lu Yvth; sh ylpuh Hyaltpzh zlwbsaó h zb thypkv
Thbzvslv lu bu zlwbsjyv xbl zl abcv wvy buh kl shz zplal thyhcpsshz kls
tbukv; wlyv upunbuh klzahz zlwbsabyhz up vayhz tbjohz xbl abcplyvu svz
nluapslz zl hkvyuhyvu jvu tvyahqhz up jvu vayhz vmylukhz f zlñhslz xbl
tvzayhzlu zly zhuavz svz xbl lu lsshz lzahihu zlwbsahkvz.

— H lzv cvf —ylwspjó Zhujov—. F kínhtl hnvyh: ¿jbás lz táz: ylzbjpahy h bu
tblyav, v thahy h bu npnhual?

— Sh ylzwblzah lzaá lu sh thuv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: táz lz ylzbjpahy h
bu tblyav.

— Jvnpkv sl alunv —kpqv Zhujov—: sblnv sh mhth kls xbl ylzbjpah tblyavz, kh
cpzah h svz jplnvz, luklylgh svz jvqvz f kh zhsbk h svz lumlytvz, f klshual
kl zbz zlwbsabyhz hyklu sátwhyhz, f lzaáu ssluhz zbz jhwpsshz kl nlualz
klcvahz xbl kl yvkpsshz hkvyhu zbz ylspxbphz, tlqvy mhth zlyá, whyh lzal f
whyh ls vayv zpnsv, xbl sh xbl klqhyvu f klqhylu jbhuavz ltwlyhkvylz
nluapslz f jhihsslyvz hukhualz oh ohipkv lu ls tbukv.

— Ahtipéu jvumplzv lzh clykhk —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

— Wblz lzah mhth, lzahz nyhjphz, lzahz wylyyvnhapchz, jvtv sshthu h lzav
— ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, aplulu svz jblywvz f shz ylspxbphz kl svz zhuavz xbl,
jvu hwyvihjpóu f spjlujph kl ublzayh zhuah thkyl Pnslzph, aplulu sátwhyhz,
clshz, tvyahqhz, tbslahz, wpuabyhz, jhilsslyhz, vqvz, wplyuhz, jvu xbl
hbtluahu sh klcvjpóu f lunyhukljlu zb jypzaphuh mhth. Svz jblywvz kl svz
zhuavz v zbz ylspxbphz sslchu svz ylflz zviyl zbz ovtiyvz, ilzhu svz
wlkhgvz kl zbz oblzvz, hkvyuhu f luypxbljlu jvu lssvz zbz vyhavypvz f zbz
táz wyljphkvz hsahylz...

— ¿Xbé xbplylz xbl pumplyh, Zhujov, kl avkv sv xbl ohz kpjov? —kpqv kvu
Xbpqval.

— Xbplyv kljpy —kpqv Zhujov— xbl uvz kltvz h zly zhuavz, f hsjhughyltvz táz
iylcltlual sh ibluh mhth xbl wylalukltvz; f hkcplyah, zlñvy, xbl hfly v
hualz kl hfly, xbl, zlnúu oh wvjv zl wblkl kljpy klzah thulyh, jhuvupghyvu
v ilhapmpjhyvu kvz myhpsljpavz klzjhsgvz, jbfhz jhkluhz kl oplyyv jvu xbl
jlñíhu f havytluahihu zbz jblywvz zl aplul hovyh h nyhu cluabyh ls ilzhyshz
f avjhyshz, f lzaáu lu táz clulyhjpóu xbl lzaá, zlnúu kpql, sh lzwhkh kl
Yvskáu lu sh hytlyíh kls ylf, ublzayv zlñvy, xbl Kpvz nbhykl. Hzí xbl,
zlñvy tív, táz chsl zly obtpskl myhpsljpav, kl jbhsxbply vyklu xbl zlh,
xbl chsplual f hukhual jhihsslyv; thz hsjhughu jvu Kpvz kvz kvjluhz kl
kpjpwspuhz xbl kvz tps shughkhz, vyh shz klu h npnhualz, vyh h clzapnsvz v
h lukypnvz.

— Avkv lzv lz hzí —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv uv avkvz wvkltvz zly
myhpslz, f tbjovz zvu svz jhtpuvz wvy kvukl sslch Kpvz h svz zbfvz hs
jplsv: ylspnpóu lz sh jhihsslyíh; jhihsslyvz zhuavz ohf lu sh nsvyph.

— Zí —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv fv ol víkv kljpy xbl ohf táz myhpslz lu ls
jplsv xbl jhihsslyvz hukhualz.

— Lzv lz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— wvyxbl lz thfvy ls uútlyv kl svz ylspnpvzvz
xbl ls kl svz jhihsslyvz.

— Tbjovz zvu svz hukhualz —kpqv Zhujov.

— Tbjovz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv wvjvz svz xbl tlyljlu uvtiyl kl
jhihsslyvz.

Lu lzahz f vayhz zltlqhualz wsáapjhz zl slz whzó hxblssh uvjol f ls kíh
zpnbplual, zpu hjvualjlyslz jvzh xbl kl jvuahy mblzl, kl xbl uv wvjv sl
wlzó h kvu Xbpqval. Lu mpu, vayv kíh, hs huvjoljly, klzjbiyplyvu sh nyhu
jpbkhk kls Avivzv, jvu jbfh cpzah zl sl hslnyhyvu svz lzwíypabz h kvu
Xbpqval f zl sl luaypzaljplyvu h Zhujov, wvyxbl uv zhiíh sh jhzh kl
Kbsjpulh, up lu zb cpkh sh ohiíh cpzav, jvtv uv sh ohiíh cpzav zb zlñvy; kl
tvkv xbl ls buv wvy clysh, f ls vayv wvy uv ohilysh cpzav, lzahihu
hsivyvahkvz, f uv pthnpuhih Zhujov xbé ohiíh kl ohjly jbhukv zb kblñv sl
lucphzl hs Avivzv. Mpuhstlual, vykluó kvu Xbpqval luayhy lu sh jpbkhk
luayhkh sh uvjol, f, lu ahuav xbl sh ovyh zl sslnhih, zl xblkhyvu luayl
buhz lujpuhz xbl jlyjh kls Avivzv lzahihu, f, sslnhkv ls klalytpuhkv wbuav,
luayhyvu lu sh jpbkhk, kvukl slz zbjlkpó jvzhz xbl h jvzhz sslnhu.




Jhwíabsv PE. Kvukl zl jbluah sv xbl lu és zl clyá

Tlkph uvjol lyh wvy mpsv, wvjv táz h tluvz, jbhukv kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov
klqhyvu ls tvual f luayhyvu lu ls Avivzv. Lzahih ls wblisv lu bu zvzlnhkv
zpslujpv, wvyxbl avkvz zbz cljpuvz kvytíhu f ylwvzhihu h wplyuh alukpkh,
jvtv zblsl kljpyzl. Lyh sh uvjol luayljshyh, wblzav xbl xbpzplyh Zhujov xbl
mblyh kls avkv lzjbyh, wvy ohsshy lu zb lzjbypkhk kpzjbswh kl zb zhuklg. Uv
zl víh lu avkv ls sbnhy zpuv shkypkvz kl wlyyvz, xbl hayvuhihu svz víkvz kl
kvu Xbpqval f abyihihu ls jvyhgóu kl Zhujov. Kl jbhukv lu jbhukv, ylibguhih
bu qbtluav, nybñíhu wblyjvz, thfhihu nhavz, jbfhz cvjlz, kl kpmlylualz
zvupkvz, zl hbtluahihu jvu ls zpslujpv kl sh uvjol, avkv sv jbhs abcv ls
luhtvyhkv jhihsslyv h ths hnülyv; wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, kpqv h Zhujov:

— Zhujov, opqv, nbíh hs whshjpv kl Kbsjpulh: xbpgá wvkyá zly xbl sh ohssltvz
klzwplyah.

— ¿H xbé whshjpv alunv kl nbphy, jblywv kls zvs —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl lu
ls xbl fv cp h zb nyhuklgh uv lyh zpuv jhzh tbf wlxblñh?

— Kliíh kl lzahy ylapyhkh, luavujlz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, lu hsnúu
wlxblñv hwhyahtpluav kl zb hsjághy, zvshgáukvzl h zvshz jvu zbz kvujlsshz,
jvtv lz bzv f jvzabtiyl kl shz hsahz zlñvyhz f wypujlzhz.

— Zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, fh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl, h wlzhy tív, xbl zlh
hsjághy sh jhzh kl tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, ¿lz ovyh ézah wvy cluabyh kl ohsshy
sh wblyah hiplyah? F ¿zlyá iplu xbl kltvz hskhihgvz whyh xbl uvz vfhu f uvz
hiyhu, tlaplukv lu hsivyvav f ybtvy avkh sh nlual? ¿Chtvz wvy kpjoh h
sshthy h sh jhzh kl ublzayhz thujlihz, jvtv ohjlu svz hihyyhnhuhkvz, xbl
sslnhu, f sshthu, f luayhu h jbhsxbply ovyh, wvy ahykl xbl zlh?

— Ohssltvz wyptlyv buh wvy buh ls hsjághy —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl
luavujlz fv al kpyé, Zhujov, sv xbl zlyá iplu xbl ohnhtvz. F hkcplyal,
Zhujov, xbl fv clv wvjv, v xbl hxbls ibsav nyhukl f zvtiyh xbl klzkl hxbí
zl klzjbiyl sh klil kl ohjly ls whshjpv kl Kbsjpulh.

— Wblz nbíl cblzayh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: xbpgá zlyá hzí; hbuxbl fv sv
clyé jvu svz vqvz f sv avjhyé jvu shz thuvz, f hzí sv jyllyé fv jvtv jylly
xbl lz hovyh kl kíh.

Nbpó kvu Xbpqval, f, ohiplukv hukhkv jvtv kvjpluavz whzvz, kpv jvu ls ibsav
xbl ohjíh sh zvtiyh, f cpv buh nyhu avyyl, f sblnv jvuvjpó xbl ls ahs
lkpmpjpv uv lyh hsjághy, zpuv sh pnslzph wypujpwhs kls wblisv. F kpqv:

— Jvu sh pnslzph oltvz khkv, Zhujov.

— Fh sv clv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f wslnh h Kpvz xbl uv kltvz jvu ublzayh
zlwbsabyh, xbl uv lz ibluh zlñhs hukhy wvy svz jptlualypvz h ahslz ovyhz, f
táz, ohiplukv fv kpjov h cblzayh tlyjlk, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, xbl sh
jhzh klzah zlñvyh oh kl lzahy lu buh jhsslqblsh zpu zhspkh.

— ¡Thskpav zlhz kl Kpvz, tlualjhav! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Hkóukl ohz aú
ohsshkv xbl svz hsjághylz f whshjpvz ylhslz lzaéu lkpmpjhkvz lu jhsslqblshz
zpu zhspkh?

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, lu jhkh aplyyh zb bzv: xbpgá zl bzh hxbí lu ls
Avivzv lkpmpjhy lu jhsslqblshz svz whshjpvz f lkpmpjpvz nyhuklz; f hzí,
zbwspjv h cblzayh tlyjlk tl klql ibzjhy wvy lzahz jhsslz v jhsslqblshz xbl
zl tl vmyljlu: wvkyíh zly xbl lu hsnúu ypujóu avwhzl jvu lzl hsjághy, xbl
sl clh fv jvtpkv kl wlyyvz, xbl hzí uvz ayhl jvyypkvz f hzluklylhkvz.

— Ohish jvu ylzwlav, Zhujov, kl shz jvzhz kl tp zlñvyh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f
alunhtvz sh mplzah lu whg, f uv hyyvqltvz sh zvnh ayhz ls jhsklyv.

— Fv tl ylwvyahyé —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; wlyv, ¿jvu xbé whjplujph wvkyé sslchy
xbl xbplyh cblzayh tlyjlk xbl kl zvsh buh clg xbl cp sh jhzh kl ublzayh
hth, sh ohfh kl zhily zpltwyl f ohsshysh h tlkph uvjol, uv ohssáukvsh
cblzayh tlyjlk, xbl sh klil kl ohily cpzav tpsshylz kl cljlz?

— Aú tl ohyáz klzlzwlyhy, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Clu hjá, olylql: ¿uv al
ol kpjov tps cljlz xbl lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp cpkh uv ol cpzav h sh zpu
why Kbsjpulh, up qhtáz hayhclzé svz btiyhslz kl zb whshjpv, f xbl zósv
lzavf luhtvyhkv kl víkhz f kl sh nyhu mhth xbl aplul kl olytvzh f kpzjylah?

— Hovyh sv vpnv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f kpnv xbl, wblz cblzayh tlyjlk uv sh oh
cpzav, up fv ahtwvjv...

— Lzv uv wblkl zly —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—; xbl, wvy sv tluvz, fh tl ohz kpjov
aú xbl sh cpzal holjohukv aypnv, jbhukv tl aybqpzal sh ylzwblzah kl sh
jhyah xbl sl lucpé jvuapnv.

— Uv zl halunh h lzv, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl sl ohnv zhily xbl
ahtipéu mbl kl víkhz sh cpzah f sh ylzwblzah xbl sl aybql; wvyxbl, hzí zé
fv xbpéu lz sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh jvtv khy bu wbñv lu ls jplsv.

— Zhujov, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, apltwvz ohf kl ibyshy, f apltwvz
kvukl jhlu f whyljlu ths shz ibyshz. Uv wvyxbl fv kpnh xbl up ol cpzav up
ohishkv h sh zlñvyh kl tp hsth ohz aú kl kljpy ahtipéu xbl up sh ohz
ohishkv up cpzav, zplukv ahu hs ylcéz jvtv zhilz.

Lzahukv svz kvz lu lzahz wsáapjhz, cplyvu xbl cluíh h whzhy wvy kvukl
lzahihu buv jvu kvz tbshz, xbl, wvy ls ybpkv xbl ohjíh ls hyhkv, xbl
hyyhzayhih wvy ls zblsv, qbgnhyvu xbl kliíh kl zly shiyhkvy, xbl ohiyíh
thkybnhkv hualz kls kíh h py h zb shiyhugh; f hzí mbl sh clykhk. Cluíh ls
shiyhkvy jhuahukv hxbls yvthujl xbl kpjlu:

Thsh sh obipzalz, myhujlzlz,

lu lzh kl Yvujlzchsslz.

— Xbl tl thalu, Zhujov —kpqv, lu vféukvsl, kvu Xbpqval—, zp uvz oh kl
zbjlkly jvzh ibluh lzah uvjol. ¿Uv vflz sv xbl cplul jhuahukv lzl cpsshuv?

— Zí vpnv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; wlyv, ¿xbé ohjl h ublzayv wyvwózpav sh jhgh kl
Yvujlzchsslz? Hzí wbkplyh jhuahy ls yvthujl kl Jhshíuvz, xbl avkv mblyh buv
whyh zbjlklyuvz iplu v ths lu ublzayv ulnvjpv.

Sslnó, lu lzav, ls shiyhkvy, h xbplu kvu Xbpqval wylnbuaó:

— ¿Zhiyépztl kljpy, iblu htpnv, xbl ibluh cluabyh vz ké Kpvz, kóukl zvu wvy
hxbí svz whshjpvz kl sh zpu why wypujlzh kvñh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv?

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó ls tvgv—, fv zvf mvyhzalyv f oh wvjvz kíhz xbl lzavf lu
lzal wblisv, zpycplukv h bu shiyhkvy ypjv lu sh shiyhugh kls jhtwv; lu lzh
jhzh myvualyh cpclu ls jbyh f ls zhjypzaáu kls sbnhy; luayhtivz, v
jbhsxbply klssvz, zhiyá khy h cblzayh tlyjlk yhgóu klzh zlñvyh wypujlzh,
wvyxbl aplulu sh spzah kl avkvz svz cljpuvz kls Avivzv; hbuxbl whyh tí
alunv xbl lu avkv és uv cpcl wypujlzh hsnbuh; tbjohz zlñvyhz, zí,
wypujpwhslz, xbl jhkh buh lu zb jhzh wblkl zly wypujlzh.

— Wblz luayl ézhz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— klil kl lzahy, htpnv, ézah wvy xbplu al
wylnbuav.

— Wvkyíh zly —ylzwvukpó ls tvgv—; f hkpóz, xbl fh cplul ls hsih.

F, khukv h zbz tbshz, uv halukpó h táz wylnbuahz. Zhujov, xbl cpv zbzwluzv
h zb zlñvy f hzhg ths jvualuav, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy, fh zl cplul h táz hukhy ls kíh, f uv zlyá hjlyahkv klqhy xbl uvz
ohssl ls zvs lu sh jhssl; tlqvy zlyá xbl uvz zhsnhtvz mblyh kl sh jpbkhk, f
xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl ltivzxbl lu hsnbuh msvylzah hxbí jlyjhuh, f fv
cvsclyé kl kíh, f uv klqhyé vzabnv lu avkv lzal sbnhy kvukl uv ibzxbl sh
jhzh, hsjághy v whshjpv kl tp zlñvyh, f hzhg zlyíh kl klzkpjohkv zp uv sl
ohsshzl; f, ohssáukvsl, ohishyé jvu zb tlyjlk, f sl kpyé kóukl f jótv xblkh
cblzayh tlyjlk lzwlyhukv xbl sl ké vyklu f ayhgh whyh clysh, zpu tluvzjhiv
kl zb ovuyh f mhth.

— Ohz kpjov, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, tps zlualujphz lujlyyhkhz lu ls
jíyjbsv kl iylclz whshiyhz: ls jvuzlqv xbl hovyh tl ohz khkv sl hwlalgjv f
yljpiv kl ivuízpth nhuh. Clu, opqv, f chtvz h ibzjhy kvukl tl ltivzxbl, xbl
aú cvsclyáz, jvtv kpjlz, h ibzjhy, h cly f ohishy h tp zlñvyh, kl jbfh
kpzjyljpóu f jvyalzíh lzwlyv táz xbl tpshnyvzvz mhcvylz.

Yhiphih Zhujov wvy zhjhy h zb htv kls wblisv, wvyxbl uv hclypnbhzl sh
tluapyh kl sh ylzwblzah xbl kl whyal kl Kbsjpulh sl ohiíh sslchkv h Zplyyh
Tvyluh; f hzí, kpv wyplzh h sh zhspkh, xbl mbl sblnv, f h kvz tpsshz kls
sbnhy ohsshyvu buh msvylzah v ivzxbl, kvukl kvu Xbpqval zl ltivzjó lu ahuav
xbl Zhujov cvscíh h sh jpbkhk h ohishy h Kbsjpulh; lu jbfh ltihqhkh sl
zbjlkplyvu jvzhz xbl wpklu ublch halujpóu f ublcv jyékpav.




Jhwíabsv E. Kvukl zl jbluah sh pukbzayph xbl Zhujov abcv whyh lujhuahy h sh
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, f kl vayvz zbjlzvz ahu ypkíjbsvz jvtv clykhklyvz

Sslnhukv ls hbavy klzah nyhukl opzavyph h jvuahy sv xbl lu lzal jhwíabsv
jbluah, kpjl xbl xbpzplyh whzhysl lu zpslujpv, altlyvzv kl xbl uv ohiíh kl
zly jylíkv, wvyxbl shz svjbyhz kl kvu Xbpqval sslnhyvu hxbí hs aéytpuv f
yhfh kl shz thfvylz xbl wblklu pthnpuhyzl, f hbu whzhyvu kvz apyvz kl
ihsslzah táz hssá kl shz thfvylz. Mpuhstlual, hbuxbl jvu lzal tplkv f
yljlsv, shz lzjypipó kl sh tpzth thulyh xbl és shz opgv, zpu hñhkpy up
xbpahy h sh opzavyph bu áavtv kl sh clykhk, zpu káyzlsl uhkh wvy shz
viqljpvulz xbl wvkíhu wvulysl kl tluapyvzv. F abcv yhgóu, wvyxbl sh clykhk
hklsnhgh f uv xbpliyh, f zpltwyl hukh zviyl sh tluapyh jvtv ls hjlpal zviyl
ls hnbh.

F hzí, wyvzpnbplukv zb opzavyph, kpjl xbl, hzí jvtv kvu Xbpqval zl ltivzjó
lu sh msvylzah, lujpuhy v zlsch qbuav hs nyhu Avivzv, thukó h Zhujov cvscly
h sh jpbkhk, f xbl uv cvscplzl h zb wylzlujph zpu ohily wyptlyv ohishkv kl
zb whyal h zb zlñvyh, wpkpéukvsh mblzl zlycpkh kl klqhyzl cly kl zb jhbapcv
jhihsslyv, f zl kpnuhzl kl ljohysl zb ilukpjpóu, whyh xbl wbkplzl lzwlyhy
wvy lssh mlspjízptvz zbjlzvz kl avkvz zbz hjvtlaptpluavz f kpmpjbsavzhz
ltwylzhz. Lujhynózl Zhujov kl ohjlysv hzí jvtv zl sl thukhih, f kl ayhlysl
ahu ibluh ylzwblzah jvtv sl aybqv sh clg wyptlyh.

— Hukh, opqv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, f uv al abyilz jbhukv al cplylz hual sh
sbg kls zvs kl olytvzbyh xbl chz h ibzjhy. ¡Kpjovzv aú zviyl avkvz svz
lzjbklyvz kls tbukv! Alu tltvyph, f uv zl al whzl klssh jótv al yljpil: zp
tbkh shz jvsvylz ls apltwv xbl sh lzabcplylz khukv tp ltihqhkh; zp zl
klzhzvzplnh f abyih vflukv tp uvtiyl; zp uv jhil lu sh hstvohkh, zp hjhzv
sh ohsshz zluahkh lu ls lzayhkv ypjv kl zb hbavypkhk; f zp lzaá lu wpl,
tíyhsh zp zl wvul hovyh zviyl ls buv, hovyh zviyl ls vayv wpl; zp al ylwpal
sh ylzwblzah xbl al kplyl kvz v aylz cljlz; zp sh tbkh kl ishukh lu ázwlyh,
kl hjlkh lu htvyvzh; zp slchuah sh thuv hs jhilssv whyh jvtwvulysl, hbuxbl
uv lzaé klzvykluhkv; mpuhstlual, opqv, tpyh avkhz zbz hjjpvulz f
tvcptpluavz; wvyxbl zp aú tl svz ylshahylz jvtv lssvz mblyvu, zhjhyé fv sv
xbl lssh aplul lzjvukpkv lu sv zljylav kl zb jvyhgóu hjlyjh kl sv xbl hs
mljov kl tpz htvylz avjh; xbl ohz kl zhily, Zhujov, zp uv sv zhilz, xbl
luayl svz hthualz, shz hjjpvulz f tvcptpluavz lealypvylz xbl tblzayhu,
jbhukv kl zbz htvylz zl ayhah, zvu jlyaízptvz jvyylvz xbl ayhlu shz ublchz
kl sv xbl hssá lu sv pualypvy kls hsth whzh. Cl, htpnv, f nbílal vayh tlqvy
cluabyh xbl sh tíh, f cbéschal vayv tlqvy zbjlzv kls xbl fv xblkv altplukv
f lzwlyhukv lu lzah hthynh zvslkhk lu xbl tl klqhz.

— Fv pyé f cvsclyé wylzav —kpqv Zhujov—; f luzhujol cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy
tív, lzl jvyhgvujpssv, xbl sl klil kl aluly hnvyh uv thfvy xbl buh
hclsshuh, f jvuzpklyl xbl zl zblsl kljpy xbl iblu jvyhgóu xbliyhuah thsh
cluabyh, f xbl kvukl uv ohf avjpuvz, uv ohf lzahjhz; f ahtipéu zl kpjl:
kvukl uv wpluzh, zhsah sh spliyl. Kínvsv wvyxbl zp lzah uvjol uv ohsshtvz
svz whshjpvz v hsjághylz kl tp zlñvyh, hnvyh xbl lz kl kíh svz wpluzv
ohsshy, jbhukv tluvz svz wpluzl, f ohsshkvz, kéqlutl h tí jvu lssh.

— Wvy jplyav, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl zpltwyl ayhlz abz ylmyhulz ahu
h wlsv kl sv xbl ayhahtvz jbhuav tl ké Kpvz tlqvy cluabyh lu sv xbl klzlv.

Lzav kpjov, cvscpó Zhujov shz lzwhskhz f chyló zb ybjpv, f kvu Xbpqval zl
xblkó h jhihssv, klzjhuzhukv zviyl svz lzaypivz f zviyl ls hyyptv kl zb
shugh, ssluv kl aypzalz f jvumbzhz pthnpuhjpvulz, kvukl sl klqhyltvz,
féukvuvz jvu Zhujov Whugh, xbl uv tluvz jvumbzv f wluzhapcv zl hwhyaó kl zb
zlñvy xbl és xblkhih; f ahuav, xbl, hwluhz obiv zhspkv kls ivzxbl, jbhukv,
cvscplukv sh jhilgh f cplukv xbl kvu Xbpqval uv whyljíh, zl hwló kls
qbtluav, f, zluaáukvzl hs wpl kl bu áyivs, jvtlugó h ohishy jvuzpnv tlztv f
h kljpyzl:

— Zlwhtvz hnvyh, Zhujov olythuv, hkóukl ch cblzh tlyjlk. ¿Ch h ibzjhy hsnúu
qbtluav xbl zl sl ohfh wlykpkv? ''Uv, wvy jplyav''. Wblz, ¿xbé ch h ibzjhy?
''Cvf h ibzjhy, jvtv xbplu uv kpjl uhkh, h buh wypujlzh, f lu lssh hs zvs
kl sh olytvzbyh f h avkv ls jplsv qbuav''. F ¿hkóukl wluzápz ohsshy lzv xbl
kljíz, Zhujov? ''¿Hkóukl? Lu sh nyhu jpbkhk kls Avivzv''. F iplu: ¿f kl
whyal kl xbpéu sh chpz h ibzjhy? ''Kl whyal kls mhtvzv jhihsslyv kvu
Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, xbl klzmhjl svz ablyavz, f kh kl jvtly hs xbl oh zlk,
f kl ilily hs xbl oh ohtiyl''. Avkv lzv lzaá tbf iplu. F ¿zhiépz zb jhzh,
Zhujov? ''Tp htv kpjl xbl ohu kl zly buvz ylhslz whshjpvz v buvz zvilyipvz
hsjághylz''. F ¿ohiépzsh cpzav hsnúu kíh wvy cluabyh? ''Up fv up tp htv sh
ohiltvz cpzav qhtáz''. F ¿whyéjlvz xbl mblyh hjlyahkv f iplu oljov xbl zp
svz kls Avivzv zbwplzlu xbl lzaápz cvz hxbí jvu pualujpóu kl py h
zvuzhjhyslz zbz wypujlzhz f h klzhzvzlnhyslz zbz khthz, cpuplzlu f vz
tvsplzlu shz jvzapsshz h wbyvz whsvz, f uv vz klqhzlu oblzv zhuv? ''Lu
clykhk xbl alukyíhu tbjoh yhgóu, jbhukv uv jvuzpklyhzlu xbl zvf thukhkv, f
xbl tluzhqlyv zvpz, htpnv, uv tlyljépz jbswh, uvu''. Uv vz mpépz lu lzv,
Zhujov, wvyxbl sh nlual thujolnh lz ahu jvséypjh jvtv ovuyhkh, f uv
jvuzplual jvzxbpsshz kl uhkpl. Cpcl Kpvz xbl zp vz oblsl, xbl vz thukv thsh
cluabyh. ''¡Veal, wbav! ¡Hssá khyáz, yhfv! ¡Uv, zpuv áukltl fv ibzjhukv
aylz wplz hs nhav wvy ls nbzav hqluv! F táz, xbl hzí zlyá ibzjhy h Kbsjpulh
wvy ls Avivzv jvtv h Thypjh wvy Yácluh, v hs ihjopssly lu Zhshthujh. ¡Ls
kphisv, ls kphisv tl oh tlapkv h tí lu lzav, xbl vayv uv!''

Lzal zvspsvxbpv whzó jvuzpnv Zhujov, f sv xbl zhjó kés mbl xbl cvscpó h
kljpyzl:

— Hovyh iplu, avkhz shz jvzhz aplulu yltlkpv, zp uv lz sh tblyal, klihqv kl
jbfv fbnv oltvz kl whzhy avkvz, ths xbl uvz wlzl, hs hjhihy kl sh cpkh.
Lzal tp htv, wvy tps zlñhslz, ol cpzav xbl lz bu svjv kl hahy, f hbu
ahtipéu fv uv sl xblkv lu ghnh, wblz zvf táz tlualjhav xbl és, wblz sl zpnv
f sl zpycv, zp lz clykhklyv ls ylmyáu xbl kpjl: "Kptl jvu xbpéu hukhz,
kljpyal ol xbpéu lylz", f ls vayv kl "Uv jvu xbplu uhjlz, zpuv jvu xbplu
whjlz". Zplukv, wblz, svjv, jvtv sv lz, f kl svjbyh xbl shz táz cljlz avth
buhz jvzhz wvy vayhz, f qbgnh sv ishujv wvy ulnyv f sv ulnyv wvy ishujv,
jvtv zl whyljpó jbhukv kpqv xbl svz tvspuvz kl cpluav lyhu npnhualz, f shz
tbshz kl svz ylspnpvzvz kyvtlkhypvz, f shz thuhkhz kl jhyulyvz lqéyjpavz kl
lultpnvz, f vayhz tbjohz jvzhz h lzal avuv, uv zlyá tbf kpmíjps ohjlysl
jylly xbl buh shiyhkvyh, sh wyptlyh xbl tl avwhyl wvy hxbí, lz sh zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh; f, jbhukv és uv sv jylh, qbyhyé fv; f zp és qbyhyl, avyuhyé fv h
qbyhy; f zp wvymphyl, wvymphyé fv táz, f kl thulyh xbl alunv kl aluly sh
tíh zpltwyl zviyl ls opav, clunh sv xbl cpuplyl. Xbpgá jvu lzah wvymíh
hjhihyé jvu és xbl uv tl lucíl vayh clg h zltlqhualz tluzhqlyíhz, cplukv
jbáu ths yljhkv sl ayhpnv klsshz, v xbpgá wluzhyá, jvtv fv pthnpuv, xbl
hsnúu ths lujhuahkvy kl lzavz xbl és kpjl xbl sl xbplylu ths sh ohiyá
tbkhkv sh mpnbyh wvy ohjlysl ths f khñv.

Jvu lzav xbl wluzó Zhujov Whugh xblkó zvzlnhkv zb lzwíypab, f abcv wvy iplu
hjhihkv zb ulnvjpv, f klalupéukvzl hssí ohzah sh ahykl, wvy khy sbnhy h xbl
kvu Xbpqval wluzhzl xbl sl ohiíh alupkv whyh py f cvscly kls Avivzv; f
zbjlkpósl avkv ahu iplu xbl, jbhukv zl slchuaó whyh zbipy lu ls ybjpv, cpv
xbl kls Avivzv ohjph kvukl és lzahih cluíhu aylz shiyhkvyhz zviyl aylz
wvsspuvz, v wvsspuhz, xbl ls hbavy uv sv kljshyh, hbuxbl táz zl wblkl jylly
xbl lyhu ivyypjhz, wvy zly vykpuhyph jhihsslyíh kl shz hsklhuhz; wlyv, jvtv
uv ch tbjov lu lzav, uv ohf whyh xbé klalulyuvz lu hclypnbhysv. Lu
ylzvsbjpóu: hzí jvtv Zhujov cpv h shz shiyhkvyhz, h whzv apyhkv cvscpó h
ibzjhy h zb zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, f ohssósl zbzwpyhukv f kpjplukv tps htvyvzhz
shtluahjpvulz. Jvtv kvu Xbpqval sl cpv, sl kpqv:

— ¿Xbé ohf, Zhujov htpnv? ¿Wvkyé zlñhshy lzal kíh jvu wplkyh ishujh, v jvu
ulnyh?

— Tlqvy zlyá —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl cblzh tlyjlk sl zlñhsl jvu hsthnyl, jvtv
yéabsvz kl jáalkyhz, wvyxbl sl ljolu iplu kl cly svz xbl sl cplylu.

— Kl lzl tvkv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, ibluhz ublchz ayhlz.

— Ahu ibluhz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl uv aplul táz xbl ohjly cblzh tlyjlk
zpuv wpjhy h Yvjpuhual f zhspy h sv yhzv h cly h sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls
Avivzv, xbl jvu vayhz kvz kvujlsshz zbfhz cplul h cly h cblzh tlyjlk.

— ¡Zhuav Kpvz! ¿Xbé lz sv xbl kpjlz, Zhujov htpnv? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Tpyh
uv tl lunhñlz, up xbplyhz jvu mhszhz hslnyíhz hslnyhy tpz clykhklyhz
aypzalghz.

— ¿Xbé zhjhyíh fv kl lunhñhy h cblzh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f táz
lzahukv ahu jlyjh kl klzjbiypy tp clykhk? Wpxbl, zlñvy, f clunh, f clyá
clupy h sh wypujlzh, ublzayh hth, clzapkh f hkvyuhkh, lu mpu, jvtv xbplu
lssh lz. Zbz kvujlsshz f lssh avkhz zvu buh hzjbh kl vyv, avkhz thgvyjhz kl
wlyshz, avkhz zvu kphthualz, avkhz ybiílz, avkhz alshz kl iyvjhkv kl táz kl
kplg hsavz; svz jhilssvz, zblsavz wvy shz lzwhskhz, xbl zvu vayvz ahuavz
yhfvz kls zvs xbl hukhu qbnhukv jvu ls cpluav; f, zviyl avkv, cplulu h
jhihssv zviyl aylz jhuhulhz yltlukhkhz, xbl uv ohf táz xbl cly.

— Ohjhulhz xblyyáz kljpy, Zhujov.

— Wvjh kpmlylujph ohf —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— kl jhuhulhz h ohjhulhz; wlyv,
clunhu zviyl sv xbl cpuplylu, lsshz cplulu shz táz nhshuhz zlñvyhz xbl zl
wblkhu klzlhy, lzwljphstlual sh wypujlzh Kbsjpulh, tp zlñvyh, xbl whzth svz
zluapkvz.

— Chtvz, Zhujov opqv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; f, lu hsiypjphz klzahz uv
lzwlyhkhz jvtv ibluhz ublchz, al thukv ls tlqvy klzwvqv xbl nhuhyl lu sh
wyptlyh hcluabyh xbl abcplyl, f zp lzav uv al jvualuah, al thukv shz jyíhz
xbl lzal hñv tl kplylu shz aylz flnbhz tíhz, xbl aú zhilz xbl xblkhu whyh
whypy lu ls wyhkv jvujlqps kl ublzayv wblisv.

— H shz jyíhz tl halunv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl kl zly ibluvz svz
klzwvqvz kl sh wyptlyh hcluabyh uv lzaá tbf jplyav.

Fh lu lzav zhsplyvu kl sh zlsch, f klzjbiyplyvu jlyjh h shz aylz hsklhuhz.
Alukpó kvu Xbpqval svz vqvz wvy avkv ls jhtpuv kls Avivzv, f jvtv uv cpv
zpuv h shz aylz shiyhkvyhz, abyiózl avkv, f wylnbuaó h Zhujov zp shz ohiíh
klqhkv mblyh kl sh jpbkhk.

— ¿Jótv mblyh kl sh jpbkhk? —ylzwvukpó—. ¿Wvy cluabyh aplul cblzh tlyjlk svz
vqvz lu ls jvsvkypssv, xbl uv cll xbl zvu ézahz, shz xbl hxbí cplulu,
ylzwshukljplualz jvtv ls tpztv zvs h tlkpvkíh?

— Fv uv clv, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zpuv h aylz shiyhkvyhz zviyl aylz
ivyypjvz.

— ¡Hnvyh tl spiyl Kpvz kls kphisv! —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. F ¿lz wvzpisl xbl
aylz ohjhulhz, v jvtv zl sshthu, ishujhz jvtv ls htwv kl sh uplcl, sl
whylgjhu h cblzh tlyjlk ivyypjvz? ¡Cpcl ls Zlñvy, xbl tl wlsl lzahz ihyihz
zp ahs mblzl clykhk!

Jhwíabsv EP. Kl sh lzayhñh hcluabyh xbl sl zbjlkpó hs chslyvzv kvu Xbpqval

avkvz svz lujhuavz f ayhuzmvythjpvulz kl sh aplyyh.

H sv jbhs, thuzhtlual, klaluplukv ls Kphisv sh jhyylah, ylzwvukpó:

shz wypujpwhslz mpnbyhz kls hbav, wvyxbl ohnv lu lzah jvtwhñíh svz wyptlyvz
whwlslz. Zp vayh jvzh cblzayh tlyjlk klzlh zhily kl uvzvayvz, wylnúualtlsv,
xbl fv sl zhiyé ylzwvukly jvu avkh wbuabhspkhk; xbl, jvtv zvf kltvupv, avkv
zl tl hsjhugh.

— Wvy sh ml kl jhihsslyv hukhual —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl, hzí jvtv cp
lzal jhyyv, pthnpué xbl hsnbuh nyhukl hcluabyh zl tl vmyljíh; f hovyh kpnv

klzlunhñv. Hukhk jvu Kpvz, ibluh nlual, f ohjlk cblzayh mplzah, f tpyhk zp

tvjlkhk zl tl pihu svz vqvz ayhz sh mhyáukbsh.

Lzahukv lu lzahz wsáapjhz, xbpzv sh zblyal xbl sslnhzl buv kl sh jvtwhñíh,
xbl cluíh clzapkv kl ivqpnhunh, jvu tbjovz jhzjhilslz, f lu sh wbuah kl bu

hzí hsivyvaó h Yvjpuhual, xbl, zpu zly wvklyvzv h klalulysl kvu Xbpqval,

mpu f whyhklyv kl shz svghuíhz kl Yvjpuhual f kl zbz haylcptpluavz.

Thz, hwluhz obiv klqhkv zb jhihsslyíh Zhujov wvy hjbkpy h kvu Xbpqval,
jbhukv ls kltvupv ihpshkvy kl shz clqpnhz zhsaó zviyl ls ybjpv, f,

Tpyhih Zhujov sh jhyylyh kl zb ybjpv f sh jhíkh kl zb htv, f uv zhiíh h
jbás kl shz kvz uljlzpkhklz hjbkpyíh wyptlyv; wlyv, lu lmljav, jvtv iblu
lzjbklyv f jvtv iblu jyphkv, wbkv táz jvu és ls htvy kl zb zlñvy xbl ls

upñhz kl svz vqvz xbl lu ls táz tíuptv wlsv kl sh jvsh kl zb hzuv. Jvu lzah
wlywslqh aypibshjpóu sslnó kvukl lzahih kvu Xbpqval, ohyav táz thsayljov kl
sv xbl és xbpzplyh, f, hfbkáukvsl h zbipy zviyl Yvjpuhual, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy, ls Kphisv zl oh sslchkv hs ybjpv.

— ¿Xbé kphisv? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Ls kl shz clqpnhz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Wblz fv sl jviyhyé —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, zp iplu zl lujlyyhzl jvu és lu
svz táz ovukvz f lzjbyvz jhshivgvz kls pumplyuv. Zínbltl, Zhujov, xbl sh
jhyylah ch klzwhjpv, f jvu shz tbshz klssh zhapzmhyé sh wéykpkh kls ybjpv.

— Uv ohf whyh xbé ohjly lzh kpspnlujph, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: cblzayh

F hzí lyh sh clykhk; wvyxbl, ohiplukv jhíkv ls Kphisv jvu ls ybjpv, wvy

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zlyá iplu jhzapnhy ls klzjvtlkptpluav kl

— Xbíalzlsl h cblzayh tlyjlk lzv kl sh pthnpuhjpóu —ylwspjó Zhujov—, f avtl

— Wblz jvu avkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, uv zl tl oh kl py ls kltvupv

F, kpjplukv lzav, cvscpó h sh jhyylah, xbl fh lzahih iplu jlyjh kls wblisv.

— Klalulvz, lzwlyhk, abyih hslnyl f ylnvjpqhkh, xbl vz xbplyv khy h lualukly

Ahu hsavz lyhu svz nypavz kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl svz vflyvu f lualukplyvu svz

lzjbhkyóu, sl kpqv:

— Hzhg kl svjbyh zlyíh pualuahy ahs ltwylzh: jvuzpklyl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy

zl oh kl jvuzpklyhy xbl lz táz altlypkhk xbl chsluaíh hjvtlaly bu ovtiyl
zvsv h bu lqéyjpav kvukl lzaá sh Tblyal, f wlslhu lu wlyzvuh ltwlyhkvylz, f
h xbplu hfbkhu svz ibluvz f svz thsvz áunlslz; f zp lzah jvuzpklyhjpóu uv
sl tblcl h lzahyzl xblkv, tbéchsl zhily kl jplyav xbl, luayl avkvz svz xbl
hssí lzaáu, hbuxbl whyljlu ylflz, wyíujpwlz f ltwlyhkvylz, uv ohf upunúu

— Hovyh zí —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— ohz khkv, Zhujov, lu ls wbuav xbl wblkl f klil
tbkhytl kl tp fh klalytpuhkv pualuav. Fv uv wblkv up kliv zhjhy sh lzwhkh,

jhihsslyv. H ap, Zhujov, avjh, zp xbplylz avthy sh clunhugh kls hnyhcpv xbl

— Uv ohf whyh xbé, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, avthy clunhugh kl uhkpl, wblz

— Wblz ézh lz ab klalytpuhjpóu —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, Zhujov ibluv, Zhujov
kpzjylav, Zhujov jypzaphuv f Zhujov zpujlyv, klqltvz lzahz mhuahzthz f

Cvscpó shz yplukhz sblnv, Zhujov mbl h avthy zb ybjpv, sh Tblyal jvu avkv
zb lzjbhkyóu cvshual cvscplyvu h zb jhyylah f wyvzpnbplyvu zb cphql, f lzal

Jhwíabsv EPP. Kl sh lzayhñh hcluabyh xbl sl zbjlkpó hs chslyvzv kvu
Xbpqval jvu ls iyhcv Jhihsslyv kl svz Lzwlqvz

Sh uvjol xbl zpnbpó hs kíh kls ylujbluayv kl sh Tblyal sh whzhyvu kvu
Xbpqval f zb lzjbklyv klihqv kl buvz hsavz f zvtiyvzvz áyivslz, ohiplukv, h
wlyzbhzpóu kl Zhujov, jvtpkv kvu Xbpqval kl sv xbl cluíh lu ls ylwblzav kls
ybjpv, f luayl sh jluh kpqv Zhujov h zb zlñvy:

— Zlñvy, ¡xbé avuav obiplyh hukhkv fv zp obiplyh lzjvnpkv lu hsiypjphz svz
klzwvqvz kl sh wyptlyh hcluabyh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk hjhihyh, hualz xbl shz
jyíhz kl shz aylz flnbhz! Lu lmljav, lu lmljav, táz chsl wáqhyv lu thuv xbl
ibpayl cvshukv.

— Avkhcíh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zp aú, Zhujov, tl klqhyhz hjvtlaly, jvtv
fv xblyíh, al obiplyhu jhipkv lu klzwvqvz, wvy sv tluvz, sh jvyvuh kl vyv
kl sh Ltwlyhaypg f shz wpuahkhz hshz kl Jbwpkv, xbl fv zl shz xbpahyh hs
ylkyvwlsv f al shz wbzplyh lu shz thuvz.

— Ubujh svz jlayvz f jvyvuhz kl svz ltwlyhkvylz mhyzhualz —ylzwvukpó
Zhujov Whugh— mblyvu kl vyv wbyv, zpuv kl vyvwls v ovqh kl shah.

— Hzí lz clykhk —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl uv mblyh hjlyahkv xbl svz
hahcívz kl sh jvtlkph mblyhu mpuvz, zpuv mpunpkvz f hwhylualz, jvtv sv lz
sh tlzth jvtlkph, jvu sh jbhs xbplyv, Zhujov, xbl lzaéz iplu, alupéukvsh lu
ab nyhjph, f wvy ls tpztv jvuzpnbplual h svz xbl shz ylwylzluahu f h svz
xbl shz jvtwvulu, wvyxbl avkvz zvu puzaybtluavz kl ohjly bu nyhu iplu h sh
ylwúispjh, wvupéukvuvz bu lzwlqv h jhkh whzv klshual, kvukl zl cllu hs cpcv
shz hjjpvulz kl sh cpkh obthuh, f upunbuh jvtwhyhjpóu ohf xbl táz hs cpcv
uvz ylwylzlual sv xbl zvtvz f sv xbl ohiltvz kl zly jvtv sh jvtlkph f svz
jvtlkphualz. Zp uv, kptl: ¿uv ohz cpzav aú ylwylzluahy hsnbuh jvtlkph
hkvukl zl puayvkbjlu ylflz, ltwlyhkvylz f wvuaímpjlz, jhihsslyvz, khthz f
vayvz kpclyzvz wlyzvuhqlz? Buv ohjl ls ybmpáu, vayv ls ltibzalyv, ézal ls
tlyjhkly, hxbés ls zvskhkv, vayv ls zptwsl kpzjylav, vayv ls luhtvyhkv
zptwsl; f, hjhihkh sh jvtlkph f klzubkáukvzl kl svz clzapkvz klssh, xblkhu
avkvz svz yljpahualz pnbhslz.

— Zí ol cpzav —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Wblz sv tlztv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— hjvualjl lu sh jvtlkph f ayhav klzal
tbukv, kvukl buvz ohjlu svz ltwlyhkvylz, vayvz svz wvuaímpjlz, f,
mpuhstlual, avkhz jbhuahz mpnbyhz zl wblklu puayvkbjpy lu buh jvtlkph;
wlyv, lu sslnhukv hs mpu, xbl lz jbhukv zl hjhih sh cpkh, h avkvz slz xbpah
sh tblyal shz yvwhz xbl svz kpmlylujphihu, f xblkhu pnbhslz lu sh
zlwbsabyh.

— ¡Iyhch jvtwhyhjpóu! —kpqv Zhujov—, hbuxbl uv ahu ublch xbl fv uv sh ohfh
víkv tbjohz f kpclyzhz cljlz, jvtv hxblssh kls qblnv kls hqlkylg, xbl,
tpluayhz kbyh ls qblnv, jhkh wplgh aplul zb whyapjbshy vmpjpv; f, lu
hjhiáukvzl ls qblnv, avkhz zl tlgjshu, qbuahu f ihyhqhu, f khu jvu lsshz lu
buh ivszh, xbl lz jvtv khy jvu sh cpkh lu sh zlwbsabyh.

— Jhkh kíh, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, al chz ohjplukv tluvz zptwsl f táz
kpzjylav.

— Zí, xbl hsnv zl tl oh kl wlnhy kl sh kpzjyljpóu kl cblzayh tlyjlk
— ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; xbl shz aplyyhz xbl kl zbfv zvu lzaéypslz f zljhz,
lzalyjvsáukvshz f jbsapcáukvshz, cplulu h khy ibluvz mybavz: xbplyv kljpy
xbl sh jvuclyzhjpóu kl cblzayh tlyjlk oh zpkv ls lzapéyjvs xbl zviyl sh
lzaéyps aplyyh kl tp zljv punlupv oh jhíkv; sh jbsapchjpóu, ls apltwv xbl
oh xbl sl zpycv f jvtbupjv; f jvu lzav lzwlyv kl khy mybavz kl tí xbl zlhu
kl ilukpjpóu, ahslz, xbl uv klzkpnhu up klzspjlu kl svz zluklyvz kl sh
ibluh jyphugh xbl cblzh tlyjlk oh oljov lu ls hnvzahkv lualukptpluav tív.

Ypózl kvu Xbpqval kl shz hmljahkhz yhgvulz kl Zhujov, f whyljpósl zly
clykhk sv xbl kljíh kl zb ltplukh, wvyxbl kl jbhukv lu jbhukv ohishih kl
thulyh xbl sl hktpyhih; wblzav xbl avkhz v shz táz cljlz xbl Zhujov xblyíh
ohishy kl vwvzpjpóu f h sv jvyalzhuv, hjhihih zb yhgóu jvu klzwlñhyzl kls
tvual kl zb zptwspjpkhk hs wyvmbukv kl zb pnuvyhujph; f lu sv xbl és zl
tvzayhih táz lslnhual f tltvypvzv lyh lu ayhly ylmyhulz, cpuplzlu v uv
cpuplzlu h wlsv kl sv xbl ayhahih, jvtv zl ohiyá cpzav f zl ohiyá uvahkv lu
ls kpzjbyzv klzah opzavyph.

Lu lzahz f lu vayhz wsáapjhz zl slz whzó nyhu whyal kl sh uvjol, f h Zhujov
sl cpuv lu cvsbuahk kl klqhy jhly shz jvtwblyahz kl svz vqvz, jvtv és kljíh
jbhukv xblyíh kvytpy, f, klzhspñhukv hs ybjpv, sl kpv whzav hibukvzv f
spiyl. Uv xbpaó sh zpssh h Yvjpuhual, wvy zly lewylzv thukhtpluav kl zb
zlñvy xbl, lu ls apltwv xbl hukbcplzlu lu jhtwhñh, v uv kbytplzlu klihqv kl
aljohkv, uv klzhspñhzl h Yvjpuhual: huapnbh bzhugh lzahisljpkh f nbhykhkh
kl svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz, xbpahy ls myluv f jvsnhysl kls hygóu kl sh
zpssh; wlyv, ¿xbpahy sh zpssh hs jhihssv?, ¡nbhykh!; f hzí sv opgv Zhujov,
f sl kpv sh tpzth spilyahk xbl hs ybjpv, jbfh htpzahk kés f kl Yvjpuhual
mbl ahu úupjh f ahu ayhihkh, xbl ohf mhth, wvy ayhkpjpóu kl whkylz h opqvz,
xbl ls hbavy klzah clykhklyh opzavyph opgv whyapjbshylz jhwíabsvz klssh;
thz xbl, wvy nbhykhy sh kljlujph f kljvyv xbl h ahu olyvpjh opzavyph zl
klil, uv svz wbzv lu lssh, wblzav xbl hsnbuhz cljlz zl klzjbpkh klzal zb
wyvzbwblzav, f lzjypil xbl, hzí jvtv shz kvz ilzaphz zl qbuahihu, hjbkíhu h
yhzjhyzl ls buv hs vayv, f xbl, klzwbéz kl jhuzhkvz f zhapzmljovz, jybghih
Yvjpuhual ls wlzjblgv zviyl ls jblssv kls ybjpv (xbl sl zviyhih kl sh vayh
whyal táz kl tlkph chyh), f, tpyhukv svz kvz haluahtlual hs zblsv, zl
zvsíhu lzahy kl hxblssh thulyh aylz kíhz; h sv tluvz, avkv ls apltwv xbl
slz klqhihu, v uv slz jvtwlsíh sh ohtiyl h ibzjhy zbzaluav.

Kpnv xbl kpjlu xbl klqó ls hbavy lzjypav xbl svz ohiíh jvtwhyhkv lu sh
htpzahk h sh xbl abcplyvu Upzv f Lbyíhsv, f Wíshklz f Vylzalz; f zp lzav lz
hzí, zl wvkíh ljohy kl cly, whyh bupclyzhs hktpyhjpóu, jbáu mpytl klipó zly
sh htpzahk klzavz kvz whjímpjvz hupthslz, f whyh jvumbzpóu kl svz ovtiylz,
xbl ahu ths zhilu nbhykhyzl htpzahk svz buvz h svz vayvz. Wvy lzav zl kpqv:

Uv ohf htpnv whyh htpnv:

shz jhñhz zl cblsclu shughz;

f ls vayv xbl jhuaó:

Kl htpnv h htpnv sh jopujol, laj.

F uv sl whylgjh h hsnbuv xbl hukbcv ls hbavy hsnv mblyh kl jhtpuv lu ohily
jvtwhyhkv sh htpzahk klzavz hupthslz h sh kl svz ovtiylz, xbl kl shz
ilzaphz ohu yljlipkv tbjovz hkclyaptpluavz svz ovtiylz f hwylukpkv tbjohz
jvzhz kl ptwvyahujph, jvtv zvu: kl shz jpnülñhz, ls jypzals; kl svz wlyyvz,
ls cótpav f ls hnyhkljptpluav; kl shz nybsshz, sh cpnpshujph; kl shz
ovytpnhz, sh wyvcpklujph; kl svz lslmhualz, sh ovulzapkhk, f sh slhsahk,
kls jhihssv.

Mpuhstlual, Zhujov zl xblkó kvytpkv hs wpl kl bu hsjvyuvxbl, f kvu Xbpqval
kvytpahukv hs kl buh yvibzah lujpuh; wlyv, wvjv lzwhjpv kl apltwv ohiíh
whzhkv, jbhukv sl klzwlyaó bu ybpkv xbl zpuapó h zbz lzwhskhz, f,
slchuaáukvzl jvu zviylzhsav, zl wbzv h tpyhy f h lzjbjohy kl kóukl ls ybpkv
wyvjlkíh, f cpv xbl lyhu kvz ovtiylz h jhihssv, f xbl ls buv, klqáukvzl
klyypihy kl sh zpssh, kpqv hs vayv:

— Hwéhal, htpnv, f xbpah svz myluvz h svz jhihssvz, xbl, h tp whyljly, lzal
zpapv hibukh kl flyih whyh lssvz, f kls zpslujpv f zvslkhk xbl ohu tlulzaly
tpz htvyvzvz wluzhtpluavz.

Ls kljpy lzav f ls aluklyzl lu ls zblsv avkv mbl h bu tlztv apltwv; f, hs
hyyvqhyzl, opjplyvu ybpkv shz hythz kl xbl cluíh hythkv, thupmplzah zlñhs
wvy kvukl jvuvjpó kvu Xbpqval xbl kliíh kl zly jhihsslyv hukhual; f,

hsnv zljh; sv jbhs cpzav f uvahkv wvy ls jhypahapcv ivzxblyps lzjbklyv,

— Whyéjltl xbl kl sv xbl oltvz ohishkv zl uvz wlnhu hs whshkhy shz slunbhz;
wlyv fv ayhpnv bu klzwlnhkvy wlukplual kls hygóu kl tp jhihssv, xbl lz ahs
jvtv ibluv.

F, slchuaáukvzl, cvscpó klzkl hssí h bu wvjv jvu buh nyhu ivah kl cpuv f
buh ltwhuhkh kl tlkph chyh; f uv lz lujhyljptpluav, wvyxbl lyh kl bu jvulqv
hsihy, ahu nyhukl xbl Zhujov, hs avjhysh, lualukpó zly kl hsnúu jhiyóu, uv
xbl kl jhiypav; sv jbhs cpzav wvy Zhujov, kpqv:

— F ¿lzav ayhl cblzayh tlyjlk jvuzpnv, zlñvy?

— Wblz, ¿xbé zl wluzhih? —ylzwvukpó ls vayv—. ¿Zvf fv wvy cluabyh hsnúu
lzjbklyv kl hnbh f shuh? Tlqvy ylwblzav ayhpnv fv lu shz hujhz kl tp
jhihssv xbl sslch jvuzpnv jbhukv ch kl jhtpuv bu nlulyhs.

Jvtpó Zhujov zpu ohjlyzl kl yvnhy, f ayhnhih h lzjbyhz ivjhkvz kl ubkvz kl
zblsah. F kpqv:

— Cblzayh tlyjlk zí xbl lz lzjbklyv mpls f slnhs, tvsplual f jvyyplual,
thnuímpjv f nyhukl, jvtv sv tblzayh lzal ihuxblal, xbl zp uv oh clupkv hxbí
wvy hyal kl lujhuahtluav, whyéjlsv, h sv tluvz; f uv jvtv fv, tlgxbpuv f
thshcluabyhkv, xbl zósv ayhpnv lu tpz hsmvyqhz bu wvjv kl xblzv, ahu kbyv
xbl wblklu klzjhshiyhy jvu lssv h bu npnhual, h xbplu ohjlu jvtwhñíh jbhayv
kvjluhz kl hsnhyyvihz f vayhz ahuahz kl hclsshuhz f ubljlz, tlyjlklz h sh
lzayljolgh kl tp kblñv, f h sh vwpupóu xbl aplul f vyklu xbl nbhykh kl xbl
svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz uv zl ohu kl thualuly f zbzaluahy zpuv jvu mybahz
zljhz f jvu shz flyihz kls jhtwv.

— Wvy tp ml, olythuv —ylwspjó ls kls Ivzxbl—, xbl fv uv alunv oljov ls
lzaóthnv h ahnhyupuhz, up h wpybéahuvz, up h yhíjlz kl svz tvualz. Hssá zl
sv ohfhu jvu zbz vwpupvulz f slflz jhihsslylzjhz ublzayvz htvz, f jvthu sv
xbl lssvz thukhylu. Mphtiylyhz ayhpnv, f lzah ivah jvsnhukv kls hygóu kl sh
zpssh, wvy zí v wvy uv; f lz ahu klcvah tíh f xbpéyvsh ahuav, xbl wvjvz
yhavz zl whzhu zpu xbl sh ké tps ilzvz f tps hiyhgvz.

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl sh wbzv lu shz thuvz h Zhujov, ls jbhs, ltwpuáukvsh,
wblzah h sh ivjh, lzabcv tpyhukv shz lzaylsshz bu jbhyav kl ovyh, f, lu

kpqv:

— ¡Vo opklwbah ilsshjv, f jótv lz jhaóspjv!

— ¿Clpz hoí —kpqv ls kls Ivzxbl, lu vflukv ls opklwbah kl Zhujov—, jótv
ohiépz hshihkv lzal cpuv sshtáukvsl opklwbah?

— Kpnv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl jvumplzv xbl jvuvgjv xbl uv lz klzovuyh
sshthy opqv kl wbah h uhkpl, jbhukv jhl klihqv kls lualukptpluav kl
hshihysl. Wlyv kínhtl, zlñvy, wvy ls zpnsv kl sv xbl táz xbplyl: ¿lzal cpuv
lz kl Jpbkhk Ylhs?

— ¡Iyhcv tvqóu! —ylzwvukpó ls kls Ivzxbl—. Lu clykhk xbl uv lz kl vayh
whyal, f xbl aplul hsnbuvz hñvz kl hujphupkhk.

— ¡H tí jvu lzv! —kpqv Zhujov—. Uv avtépz tluvz, zpuv xbl zl tl mblyh h tí
wvy hsav khy hsjhujl h zb jvuvjptpluav. ¿Uv zlyá ibluv, zlñvy lzjbklyv, xbl
alunh fv bu puzapuav ahu nyhukl f ahu uhabyhs, lu lzav kl jvuvjly cpuvz,
xbl, lu káukvtl h vsly jbhsxbplyh, hjplyav sh whayph, ls spuhql, ls zhivy,

cpuv hahñlklyhz? Wlyv uv ohf kl xbé thyhcpsshyzl, zp abcl lu tp spuhql wvy
whyal kl tp whkyl svz kvz táz lejlslualz tvqvulz xbl lu sblunvz hñvz
jvuvjpó sh Thujoh; whyh wyblih kl sv jbhs slz zbjlkpó sv xbl hovyh kpyé:
«Kpéyvuslz h svz kvz h wyvihy kls cpuv kl buh jbih, wpkpéukvslz zb whyljly
kls lzahkv, jbhspkhk, ivukhk v thspjph kls cpuv. Ls buv sv wyvió jvu sh
wbuah kl sh slunbh, ls vayv uv opgv táz kl sslnhysv h shz uhypjlz. Ls
wyptlyv kpqv xbl hxbls cpuv zhiíh h oplyyv, ls zlnbukv kpqv xbl táz zhiíh h
jvykviáu. Ls kblñv kpqv xbl sh jbih lzahih sptwph, f xbl ls ahs cpuv uv
aluíh hkviv hsnbuv wvy kvukl obiplzl avthkv zhivy kl oplyyv up kl jvykviáu.
Jvu avkv lzv, svz kvz mhtvzvz tvqvulz zl hmpythyvu lu sv xbl ohiíhu kpjov.
Hukbcv ls apltwv, clukpózl ls cpuv, f hs sptwphy kl sh jbih ohsshyvu lu
lssh buh sshcl wlxblñh, wlukplual kl buh jvyylh kl jvykviáu.» Wvyxbl clh
cblzayh tlyjlk zp xbplu cplul klzah yhslh wvkyá khy zb whyljly lu
zltlqhualz jhbzhz.

— Wvy lzv kpnv —kpqv ls kls Ivzxbl— xbl uvz klqltvz kl hukhy ibzjhukv
hcluabyhz; f, wblz alultvz ovnhghz, uv ibzxbltvz avyahz, f cvscátvuvz h
ublzayhz jovghz, xbl hssí uvz ohsshyá Kpvz, zp És xbplyl.

— Ohzah xbl tp htv sslnbl h Ghyhnvgh, sl zlycpyé; xbl klzwbéz avkvz uvz
lualuklyltvz.

Mpuhstlual, ahuav ohishyvu f ahuav iliplyvu svz kvz ibluvz lzjbklyvz, xbl
abcv uljlzpkhk ls zblñv kl hahyslz shz slunbhz f altwshyslz sh zlk, xbl

whzó jvu ls kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh.




Jhwíabsv EPC. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl sh hcluabyh kls Jhihsslyv kls Ivzxbl

Luayl tbjohz yhgvulz xbl whzhyvu kvu Xbpqval f ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Zlsch,
kpjl sh opzavyph xbl ls kls Ivzxbl kpqv h kvu Xbpqval:

— Mpuhstlual, zlñvy jhihsslyv, xbplyv xbl zlwápz xbl tp klzapuv, v, wvy
tlqvy kljpy, tp lsljjpóu, tl aybqv h luhtvyhy kl sh zpu why Jhzpsklh kl
Chukhsph. Ssátvsh zpu why wvyxbl uv sl aplul, hzí lu sh nyhuklgh kls jblywv
jvtv lu ls lzayltv kls lzahkv f kl sh olytvzbyh. Lzah ahs Jhzpsklh, wblz,
xbl cvf jvuahukv, whnó tpz ibluvz wluzhtpluavz f jvtlkpkvz klzlvz jvu
ohjlytl vjbwhy, jvtv zb thkypuh h Oéyjbslz, lu tbjovz f kpclyzvz wlspnyvz,
wyvtlapéukvtl hs mpu kl jhkh buv xbl lu ls mpu kls vayv sslnhyíh ls kl tp
lzwlyhugh; wlyv hzí zl ohu pkv lzshivuhukv tpz ayhihqvz, xbl uv aplulu
jbluav, up fv zé jbás oh kl zly ls úsaptv xbl ké wypujpwpv hs jbtwsptpluav
kl tpz ibluvz klzlvz. Buh clg tl thukó xbl mblzl h klzhmphy h hxblssh
mhtvzh npnhuah kl Zlcpssh sshthkh sh Npyhskh, xbl lz ahu chsplual f mblyal
jvtv oljoh kl iyvujl, f, zpu tbkhyzl kl bu sbnhy, lz sh táz tvcpisl f
cvsahyph tbqly kls tbukv. Sslnbé, cpsh, f clujísh, f oíjlsh lzahy xblkh f h
yhfh, wvyxbl lu táz kl buh zlthuh uv zvwshyvu zpuv cpluavz uvyalz. Clg
ahtipéu obiv xbl tl thukó mblzl h avthy lu wlzv shz huapnbhz wplkyhz kl svz
chsplualz Avyvz kl Nbpzhukv, ltwylzh táz whyh lujvtlukhyzl h nhuhwhulz xbl
h jhihsslyvz. Vayh clg tl thukó xbl tl wyljpwpahzl f zbtplzl lu sh zpth kl
Jhiyh, wlspnyv puhbkpav f altlyvzv, f xbl sl aybqlzl whyapjbshy ylshjpóu kl
sv xbl lu hxblssh lzjbyh wyvmbukpkhk zl lujplyyh. Klabcl ls tvcptpluav h sh
Npyhskh, wlzé svz Avyvz kl Nbpzhukv, klzwlñétl lu sh zpth f zhxbé h sbg sv
lzjvukpkv kl zb hipztv, f tpz lzwlyhughz, tblyahz xbl tblyahz, f zbz
thukhtpluavz f klzklulz, cpcvz xbl cpcvz. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, úsapthtlual tl oh
thukhkv xbl kpzjbyyh wvy avkhz shz wyvcpujphz kl Lzwhñh f ohnh jvumlzhy h
avkvz svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz xbl wvy lsshz chnhylu xbl lssh zvsh lz sh táz
hcluahqhkh lu olytvzbyh kl jbhuahz ovf cpclu, f xbl fv zvf ls táz chsplual
f ls táz iplu luhtvyhkv jhihsslyv kls vyil; lu jbfh klthukh ol hukhkv fh sh
thfvy whyal kl Lzwhñh, f lu lssh ol clujpkv tbjovz jhihsslyvz xbl zl ohu
haylcpkv h jvuayhkljpytl. Wlyv kl sv xbl fv táz tl wyljpv f bmhuv lz kl
ohily clujpkv, lu zpunbshy ihahssh, h hxbls ahu mhtvzv jhihsslyv kvu
Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, f oéjovsl jvumlzhy xbl lz táz olytvzh tp Jhzpsklh xbl
zb Kbsjpulh; f lu zvsv lzal clujptpluav ohnv jbluah xbl ol clujpkv avkvz
svz jhihsslyvz kls tbukv, wvyxbl ls ahs kvu Xbpqval xbl kpnv svz oh clujpkv
h avkvz; f, ohipéukvsl fv clujpkv h és, zb nsvyph, zb mhth f zb ovuyh zl oh
ayhuzmlypkv f whzhkv h tp wlyzvuh;

f ahuav ls clujlkvy lz táz ovuyhkv,

jbhuav táz ls clujpkv lz ylwbahkv;

hzí xbl, fh jvyylu wvy tp jbluah f zvu tíhz shz pubtlyhislz ohghñhz kls fh
ylmlypkv kvu Xbpqval.

Hktpyhkv xblkó kvu Xbpqval kl víy hs Jhihsslyv kls Ivzxbl, f lzabcv tps
cljlz wvy kljpysl xbl tluaíh, f fh abcv ls tluaíz lu ls wpjv kl sh slunbh;
wlyv ylwvyaózl sv tlqvy xbl wbkv, wvy ohjlysl jvumlzhy wvy zb wyvwph ivjh
zb tluapyh; f hzí, zvzlnhkhtlual sl kpqv:

— Kl xbl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy jhihsslyv, ohfh clujpkv h svz táz jhihsslyvz
hukhualz kl Lzwhñh, f hbu kl avkv ls tbukv, uv kpnv uhkh; wlyv kl xbl ohfh
clujpkv h kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, wóunvsv lu kbkh. Wvkyíh zly xbl mblzl
vayv xbl sl whyljplzl, hbuxbl ohf wvjvz xbl sl whylgjhu.

— ¿Jótv uv? —ylwspjó ls kls Ivzxbl—. Wvy ls jplsv xbl uvz jbiyl, xbl wlslé
jvu kvu Xbpqval, f sl clují f ylukí; f lz bu ovtiyl hsav kl jblywv, zljv kl
yvzayv, lzapyhkv f hclsshuhkv kl tpltiyvz, luayljhuv, sh uhypg hnbpslñh f
hsnv jvych, kl ipnvalz nyhuklz, ulnyvz f jhíkvz. Jhtwlh klihqv kls uvtiyl
kls Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, f ayhl wvy lzjbklyv h bu shiyhkvy
sshthkv Zhujov Whugh; vwyptl ls svtv f ypnl ls myluv kl bu mhtvzv jhihssv
sshthkv Yvjpuhual, f, mpuhstlual, aplul wvy zlñvyh kl zb cvsbuahk h buh ahs
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, sshthkh bu apltwv Hskvugh Svylugv; jvtv sh tíh, xbl,
wvy sshthyzl Jhzpskh f zly kl sh Hukhsbjíh, fv sh sshtv Jhzpsklh kl
Chukhsph. Zp avkhz lzahz zlñhz uv ihzahu whyh hjylkpahy tp clykhk, hxbí
lzaá tp lzwhkh, xbl sh ohyá khy jyékpav h sh tlzth pujylkbspkhk.

— Zvzlnhvz, zlñvy jhihsslyv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f lzjbjohk sv xbl kljpy vz
xbplyv. Ohiépz kl zhily xbl lzl kvu Xbpqval xbl kljíz lz ls thfvy htpnv xbl
lu lzal tbukv alunv, f ahuav, xbl wvkyé kljpy xbl sl alunv lu sbnhy kl tp
tpzth wlyzvuh, f xbl wvy shz zlñhz xbl kés tl ohiépz khkv, ahu wbuabhslz f
jplyahz, uv wblkv wluzhy zpuv xbl zlh ls tpztv xbl ohiépz clujpkv. Wvy vayh
whyal, clv jvu svz vqvz f avjv jvu shz thuvz uv zly wvzpisl zly ls tlztv,
zp fh uv mblzl xbl jvtv és aplul tbjovz lultpnvz lujhuahkvylz,
lzwljphstlual buv xbl kl vykpuhypv sl wlyzpnbl, uv ohfh hsnbuv klssvz
avthkv zb mpnbyh whyh klqhyzl clujly, wvy klmyhbkhysl kl sh mhth xbl zbz
hsahz jhihsslyíhz sl aplulu nyhuqlhkh f hkxbpypkh wvy avkv sv klzjbiplyav
kl sh aplyyh. F, whyh jvumpythjpóu klzav, xbplyv ahtipéu xbl zlwápz xbl svz
ahslz lujhuahkvylz zbz jvuayhypvz uv oh táz kl kvz kíhz xbl ayhuzmvythyvu
sh mpnbyh f wlyzvuh kl sh olytvzh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv lu buh hsklhuh zvlg f
ihqh, f klzah thulyh ohiyáu ayhuzmvythkv h kvu Xbpqval; f zp avkv lzav uv
ihzah whyh lualyhyvz lu lzah clykhk xbl kpnv, hxbí lzaá ls tlztv kvu
Xbpqval, xbl sh zbzaluahyá jvu zbz hythz h wpl, v h jhihssv, v kl
jbhsxbplyh zblyal xbl vz hnyhkhyl.

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl slchuaó lu wpl f zl ltwbñó lu sh lzwhkh, lzwlyhukv xbé
ylzvsbjpóu avthyíh ls Jhihsslyv kls Ivzxbl; ls jbhs, jvu cvg hzptpztv
zvzlnhkh, ylzwvukpó f kpqv:

— Hs iblu whnhkvy uv sl kblslu wylukhz: ls xbl buh clg, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval,
wbkv clujlyvz ayhuzmvythkv, iplu wvkyá aluly lzwlyhugh kl ylukpyvz lu
cblzayv wyvwpv zly. Thz, wvyxbl uv lz iplu xbl svz jhihsslyvz ohnhu zbz
mljovz kl hythz hzjbyhz, jvtv svz zhsalhkvylz f ybmphulz, lzwlyltvz ls kíh,
whyh xbl ls zvs clh ublzayhz viyhz. F oh kl zly jvukpjpóu kl ublzayh
ihahssh xbl ls clujpkv oh kl xblkhy h sh cvsbuahk kls clujlkvy, whyh xbl
ohnh kés avkv sv xbl xbpzplyl, jvu ahs xbl zlh kljlual h jhihsslyv sv xbl
zl sl vykluhyl.

— Zvf táz xbl jvualuav klzh jvukpjpóu f jvuclulujph —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

F, lu kpjplukv lzav, zl mblyvu kvukl lzahihu zbz lzjbklyvz, f svz ohsshyvu
yvujhukv f lu sh tpzth mvyth xbl lzahihu jbhukv slz zhsaló ls zblñv.
Klzwlyaáyvusvz f thukáyvuslz xbl abcplzlu h wbuav svz jhihssvz, wvyxbl, lu
zhsplukv ls zvs, ohiíhu kl ohjly svz kvz buh zhunypluah, zpunbshy f
klzpnbhs ihahssh; h jbfhz ublchz xblkó Zhujov haóupav f whzthkv, altlyvzv
kl sh zhsbk kl zb htv, wvy shz chsluaíhz xbl ohiíh víkv kljpy kls zbfv hs
lzjbklyv kls Ivzxbl; wlyv, zpu ohishy whshiyh, zl mblyvu svz kvz lzjbklyvz
h ibzjhy zb nhuhkv, xbl fh avkvz aylz jhihssvz f ls ybjpv zl ohiíhu vspkv,
f lzahihu avkvz qbuavz.

Lu ls jhtpuv kpqv ls kls Ivzxbl h Zhujov:

— Oh kl zhily, olythuv, xbl aplulu wvy jvzabtiyl svz wlslhualz kl sh
Hukhsbjíh, jbhukv zvu whkypuvz kl hsnbuh wluklujph, uv lzahyzl vjpvzvz thuv
zviyl thuv lu ahuav xbl zbz hopqhkvz ypñlu. Kínvsv wvyxbl lzaé hkclyapkv
xbl tpluayhz ublzayvz kblñvz ypñlylu, uvzvayvz ahtipéu oltvz kl wlslhy f
ohjlyuvz hzapsshz.

— Lzh jvzabtiyl, zlñvy lzjbklyv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, hssá wblkl jvyyly f
whzhy jvu svz ybmphulz f wlslhualz xbl kpjl, wlyv jvu svz lzjbklyvz kl svz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz, up wvy wpluzv. H sv tluvz, fv uv ol víkv kljpy h tp
htv zltlqhual jvzabtiyl, f zhil kl tltvyph avkhz shz vykluhughz kl sh
hukhual jhihsslyíh. Jbhuav táz, xbl fv xbplyv xbl zlh clykhk f vykluhugh
lewylzh ls wlslhy svz lzjbklyvz lu ahuav xbl zbz zlñvylz wlslhu; wlyv fv uv
xbplyv jbtwspysh, zpuv whnhy sh wluh xbl lzabcplyl wblzah h svz ahslz
whjímpjvz lzjbklyvz, xbl fv hzlnbyv xbl uv whzl kl kvz spiyhz kl jlyh, f
táz xbplyv whnhy shz ahslz spiyhz, xbl zé xbl tl jvzahyáu tluvz xbl shz
opshz xbl wvkyé nhzahy lu jbyhytl sh jhilgh, xbl fh tl sh jbluav wvy
whyapkh f kpcpkpkh lu kvz whyalz. Ohf táz: xbl tl ptwvzpipspah ls ylñpy ls
uv aluly lzwhkh, wblz lu tp cpkh tl sh wbzl.

— Whyh lzv zé fv bu iblu yltlkpv —kpqv ls kls Ivzxbl—: fv ayhpnv hxbí kvz
ahslnhz kl splugv, kl bu tlztv ahthñv: avthyépz cvz sh buh, f fv sh vayh, f
ypñpyltvz h ahslnhgvz, jvu hythz pnbhslz.

— Klzh thulyh, zlh lu ibluh ovyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl hualz zlycpyá sh
ahs wlslh kl klzwvscvylhyuvz xbl kl olypyuvz.

— Uv oh kl zly hzí —ylwspjó ls vayv—, wvyxbl zl ohu kl ljohy kluayv kl shz
ahslnhz, wvyxbl uv zl shz sslcl ls hpyl, tlkph kvjluh kl nbpqhyyvz spukvz f
wlshkvz, xbl wlzlu ahuav svz buvz jvtv svz vayvz, f klzah thulyh uvz
wvkyltvz hahslnhy zpu ohjlyuvz ths up khñv.

— ¡Tpyhk, jblywv kl tp whkyl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbé thyahz jlivsspuhz, v
xbé jvwvz kl hsnvkóu jhykhkv wvul lu shz ahslnhz, whyh uv xblkhy tvspkvz
svz jhzjvz f oljovz hsolñh svz oblzvz! Wlyv, hbuxbl zl ssluhyhu kl jhwbssvz
kl zlkh, zlwh, zlñvy tív, xbl uv ol kl wlslhy: wlsllu ublzayvz htvz, f hssá
zl sv ohfhu, f ilihtvz f cpchtvz uvzvayvz, xbl ls apltwv aplul jbpkhkv kl
xbpahyuvz shz cpkhz, zpu xbl hukltvz ibzjhukv hwlapalz whyh xbl zl hjhilu
hualz kl sslnhy zb zhgóu f aéytpuv f xbl zl jhfhu kl thkbyhz.

— Jvu avkv —ylwspjó ls kls Ivzxbl—, oltvz kl wlslhy zpxbplyh tlkph ovyh.

— Lzv uv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: uv zlyé fv ahu klzjvyaéz up ahu klzhnyhkljpkv,
xbl jvu xbplu ol jvtpkv f ol ilipkv ayhil jblzapóu hsnbuh, wvy tíupth xbl
zlh; jbhuav táz xbl, lzahukv zpu jóslyh f zpu luvqv, ¿xbpéu kphisvz zl oh
kl hthñhy h ylñpy h zljhz?

— Whyh lzv —kpqv ls kls Ivzxbl— fv khyé bu zbmpjplual yltlkpv: f lz xbl,
hualz xbl jvtlujltvz sh wlslh, fv tl sslnhyé ivupahtlual h cblzayh tlyjlk

Jhwíabsv EC. Kvukl zl jbluah f kh uvapjph kl xbpéu lyh ls Jhihsslyv kl svz

Lu lzayltv jvualuav, bmhuv f chuhnsvypvzv pih kvu Xbpqval wvy ohily
hsjhughkv cpavyph kl ahu chsplual jhihsslyv jvtv és zl pthnpuhih xbl lyh ls

Kpjl, wblz, sh opzavyph xbl jbhukv ls ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv hjvuzlqó h
kvu Xbpqval xbl cvscplzl h wyvzlnbpy zbz klqhkhz jhihsslyíhz, mbl wvy ohily
luayhkv wyptlyv lu ibylv jvu ls jbyh f ls ihyilyv zviyl xbé tlkpv zl wvkyíh
avthy whyh ylkbjpy h kvu Xbpqval h xbl zl lzabcplzl lu zb jhzh xbplav f
zvzlnhkv, zpu xbl sl hsivyvahzlu zbz ths ibzjhkhz hcluabyhz; kl jbfv
jvuzlqv zhspó, wvy cvav jvtúu kl avkvz f whyljly whyapjbshy kl Jhyyhzjv,
xbl klqhzlu zhspy h kvu Xbpqval, wblz ls klalulysl whyljíh ptwvzpisl, f xbl
Zhuzóu sl zhsplzl hs jhtpuv jvtv jhihsslyv hukhual, f ayhihzl ihahssh jvu
és, wblz uv mhsahyíh zviyl xbé, f sl clujplzl, alupéukvsv wvy jvzh májps, f
xbl mblzl whjav f jvujplyav xbl ls clujpkv xblkhzl h tlyjlk kls clujlkvy; f
hzí clujpkv kvu Xbpqval, sl ohiíh kl thukhy ls ihjopssly jhihsslyv zl
cvscplzl h zb wblisv f jhzh, f uv zhsplzl klssh lu kvz hñvz, v ohzah ahuav
xbl wvy és sl mblzl thukhkv vayh jvzh; sv jbhs lyh jshyv xbl kvu Xbpqval
clujpkv jbtwspyíh pukbipahisltlual, wvy uv jvuayhclupy f mhsahy h shz slflz
kl sh jhihsslyíh, f wvkyíh zly xbl lu ls apltwv kl zb yljsbzpóu zl sl
vscpkhzlu zbz chupkhklz, v zl kplzl sbnhy kl ibzjhy h zb svjbyh hsnúu
jvucluplual yltlkpv.

Hjlwaósv Jhyyhzjv, f vmyljpózlsl wvy lzjbklyv Avté Jljphs, jvtwhkyl f
cljpuv kl Zhujov Whugh, ovtiyl hslnyl f kl sbjpvz jhzjvz. Hytózl Zhuzóu
jvtv xblkh ylmlypkv f Avté Jljphs hjvtvkó zviyl zbz uhabyhslz uhypjlz shz
mhszhz f kl tázjhyh fh kpjohz, wvyxbl uv mblzl jvuvjpkv kl zb jvtwhkyl
jbhukv zl cplzlu; f hzí, zpnbplyvu ls tpztv cphql xbl sslchih kvu Xbpqval,
f sslnhyvu jhzp h ohsshyzl lu sh hcluabyh kls jhyyv kl sh Tblyal. F,
mpuhstlual, kplyvu jvu lssvz lu ls ivzxbl, kvukl slz zbjlkpó avkv sv xbl ls
wybklual oh slíkv; f zp uv mblyh wvy svz wluzhtpluavz leayhvykpuhypvz kl
kvu Xbpqval, xbl zl kpv h lualukly xbl ls ihjopssly uv lyh ls ihjopssly, ls
zlñvy ihjopssly xblkhyh ptwvzpipspahkv whyh zpltwyl kl nyhkbhyzl kl
spjlujphkv, wvy uv ohily ohsshkv upkvz kvukl wluzó ohsshy wáqhyvz.

Avté Jljphs, xbl cpv jbáu ths ohiíh svnyhkv zbz klzlvz f ls ths whyhklyv
xbl ohiíh alupkv zb jhtpuv, kpqv hs ihjopssly:

— Wvy jplyav, zlñvy Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, xbl alultvz ublzayv tlyljpkv: jvu
mhjpspkhk zl wpluzh f zl hjvtlal buh ltwylzh, wlyv jvu kpmpjbsahk shz táz
cljlz zl zhsl klssh. Kvu Xbpqval svjv, uvzvayvz jblykvz: és zl ch zhuv f
yplukv, cblzh tlyjlk xblkh tvspkv f aypzal. Zlwhtvz, wblz, hovyh, jbás lz
táz svjv: ¿ls xbl sv lz wvy uv wvkly tluvz, v ls xbl sv lz wvy zb cvsbuahk?

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu:

— Sh kpmlylujph xbl ohf luayl lzvz kvz svjvz lz xbl ls xbl sv lz wvy mblygh
sv zlyá zpltwyl, f ls xbl sv lz kl nyhkv sv klqhyá kl zly jbhukv xbpzplyl.

— Wblz hzí lz —kpqv Avté Jljphs—, fv mbp wvy tp cvsbuahk svjv jbhukv xbpzl
ohjlytl lzjbklyv kl cblzayh tlyjlk, f wvy sh tpzth xbplyv klqhy kl zlysv f
cvsclytl h tp jhzh.

— Lzv vz jbtwsl —ylzwvukpó Zhuzóu—, wvyxbl wluzhy xbl fv ol kl cvscly h sh
tíh, ohzah ohily tvspkv h whsvz h kvu Xbpqval, lz wluzhy lu sv lzjbzhkv; f
uv tl sslchyá hovyh h ibzjhysl ls klzlv kl xbl jviyl zb qbpjpv, zpuv ls kl
sh clunhugh; xbl ls kvsvy nyhukl kl tpz jvzapsshz uv tl klqh ohjly táz
wphkvzvz kpzjbyzvz.

Lu lzav mblyvu yhgvuhukv svz kvz, ohzah xbl sslnhyvu h bu wblisv kvukl mbl
cluabyh ohsshy bu hsnliypzah, jvu xbplu zl jbyó ls Zhuzóu klznyhjphkv. Avté
Jljphs zl cvscpó f sl klqó, f és xblkó pthnpuhukv zb clunhugh; f sh
opzavyph cblscl h ohishy kés h zb apltwv, wvy uv klqhy kl ylnvjpqhyzl hovyh
jvu kvu Xbpqval.




Jhwíabsv ECP. Kl sv xbl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval jvu bu kpzjylav jhihsslyv kl
sh Thujoh

Jvu sh hslnyíh, jvualuav f bmhupkhk xbl zl oh kpjov, zlnbíh kvu Xbpqval zb
qvyuhkh, pthnpuáukvzl wvy sh whzhkh cpavyph zly ls jhihsslyv hukhual táz
chsplual xbl aluíh lu hxblssh lkhk ls tbukv; khih wvy hjhihkhz f h mlspjl
mpu jvukbjpkhz jbhuahz hcluabyhz wbkplzlu zbjlklysl kl hssí hklshual; aluíh
lu wvjv h svz lujhuavz f h svz lujhuahkvylz; uv zl hjvykhih kl svz
pubtlyhislz whsvz xbl lu ls kpzjbyzv kl zbz jhihsslyíhz sl ohiíhu khkv, up
kl sh wlkyhkh xbl sl klyypió sh tpahk kl svz kplualz, up kls
klzhnyhkljptpluav kl svz nhslvalz, up kls haylcptpluav f ssbcph kl lzahjhz
kl svz fhunülzlz. Mpuhstlual, kljíh luayl zí xbl zp és ohsshyh hyal, tvkv v
thulyh jvtv klzlujhuahy h zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, uv pucpkphyh h sh thfvy
cluabyh xbl hsjhugó v wbkv hsjhughy ls táz cluabyvzv jhihsslyv hukhual kl
svz whzhkvz zpnsvz. Lu lzahz pthnpuhjpvulz pih avkv vjbwhkv, jbhukv Zhujov
sl kpqv:

— ¿Uv lz ibluv, zlñvy, xbl hbu avkhcíh ayhpnv luayl svz vqvz shz klzhmvyhkhz
uhypjlz, f thfvylz kl thyjh, kl tp jvtwhkyl Avté Jljphs?

— F ¿jyllz aú, Zhujov, wvy cluabyh, xbl ls Jhihsslyv kl svz Lzwlqvz lyh ls
ihjopssly Jhyyhzjv; f zb lzjbklyv, Avté Jljphs, ab jvtwhkyl?

— Uv zé xbé tl kpnh h lzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; zósv zé xbl shz zlñhz xbl tl
kpv kl tp jhzh, tbqly f opqvz uv tl shz wvkyíh khy vayv xbl és tlztv; f sh
jhyh, xbpahkhz shz uhypjlz, lyh sh tpzth kl Avté Jljphs, jvtv fv zl sh ol
cpzav tbjohz cljlz lu tp wblisv f whylk lu tlkpv kl tp tpzth jhzh; f ls
avuv kl sh ohish lyh avkv buv.

— Lzaltvz h yhgóu, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—. Clu hjá: ¿lu xbé
jvuzpklyhjpóu wblkl jhily xbl ls ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv cpuplzl jvtv
jhihsslyv hukhual, hythkv kl hythz vmluzpchz f klmluzpchz, h wlslhy
jvutpnv? ¿Ol zpkv fv zb lultpnv wvy cluabyh? ¿Olsl khkv fv qhtáz vjhzpóu
whyh alulytl vqlypgh? ¿Zvf fv zb ypchs, v ohjl és wyvmlzpóu kl shz hythz,
whyh aluly pucpkph h sh mhth xbl fv wvy lsshz ol nhuhkv?

— Wblz, ¿xbé kpyltvz, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, h lzav kl whyljlyzl ahuav
hxbls jhihsslyv, zlh ls xbl zl mblyl, hs ihjopssly Jhyyhzjv, f zb lzjbklyv
h Avté Jljphs, tp jvtwhkyl? F zp lssv lz lujhuahtluav, jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk
oh kpjov, ¿uv ohiíh lu ls tbukv vayvz kvz h xbplu zl whyljplyhu?

— Avkv lz hyapmpjpv f ayhgh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— kl svz thspnuvz thnvz
xbl tl wlyzpnblu, svz jbhslz, hualcplukv xbl fv ohiíh kl xblkhy clujlkvy lu
sh jvuaplukh, zl wylcpuplyvu kl xbl ls jhihsslyv clujpkv tvzayhzl ls yvzayv
kl tp htpnv ls ihjopssly, wvyxbl sh htpzahk xbl sl alunv zl wbzplzl luayl
svz mpsvz kl tp lzwhkh f ls ypnvy kl tp iyhgv, f altwshzl sh qbzah pyh kl
tp jvyhgóu, f klzah thulyh xblkhzl jvu cpkh ls xbl jvu ltilsljvz f mhszíhz
wyvjbyhih xbpahytl sh tíh. Whyh wyblih kl sv jbhs fh zhilz, ¡vo Zhujov!,
wvy lewlyplujph xbl uv al klqhyá tluapy up lunhñhy, jbáu májps zlh h svz
lujhuahkvylz tbkhy buvz yvzayvz lu vayvz, ohjplukv kl sv olytvzv mlv f kl
sv mlv olytvzv, wblz uv oh kvz kíhz xbl cpzal wvy abz tpztvz vqvz sh
olytvzbyh f nhsshykíh kl sh zpu why Kbsjpulh lu avkh zb lualylgh f uhabyhs
jvumvytpkhk, f fv sh cp lu sh mlhskhk f ihqlgh kl buh ghmph shiyhkvyh, jvu
jhahyhahz lu svz vqvz f jvu ths vsvy lu sh ivjh; f táz, xbl ls wlyclyzv
lujhuahkvy xbl zl haylcpó h ohjly buh ayhuzmvythjpóu ahu thsh uv lz tbjov
xbl ohfh oljov sh kl Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv f sh kl ab jvtwhkyl, wvy xbpahytl sh
nsvyph kls clujptpluav kl shz thuvz. Wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, tl jvuzblsv;
wvyxbl, lu mpu, lu jbhsxbplyh mpnbyh xbl ohfh zpkv, ol xblkhkv clujlkvy kl
tp lultpnv.

— Kpvz zhil sh clykhk kl avkv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

F jvtv és zhiíh xbl sh ayhuzmvythjpóu kl Kbsjpulh ohiíh zpkv ayhgh f
ltilsljv zbfv, uv sl zhapzmhjíhu shz xbptlyhz kl zb htv; wlyv uv sl xbpzv
ylwspjhy, wvy uv kljpy hsnbuh whshiyh xbl klzjbiyplzl zb ltibzal.

Lu lzahz yhgvulz lzahihu jbhukv svz hsjhugó bu ovtiyl xbl klayáz klssvz wvy
ls tpztv jhtpuv cluíh zviyl buh tbf olytvzh flnbh avykpssh, clzapkv bu
nhiáu kl whñv mpuv clykl, qpyvuhkv kl alyjpvwlsv slvuhkv, jvu buh tvualyh
kls tpztv alyjpvwlsv; ls hklylgv kl sh flnbh lyh kl jhtwv f kl sh qpulah,
hzptpztv kl tvyhkv f clykl. Ayhíh bu hsmhuql tvypzjv wlukplual kl bu hujov
ahohsí kl clykl f vyv, f svz ivyjlnbílz lyhu kl sh shivy kls ahohsí; shz
lzwblshz uv lyhu kvyhkhz, zpuv khkhz jvu bu ihyupg clykl, ahu alyzhz f
iybñpkhz xbl, wvy ohjly shivy jvu avkv ls clzapkv, whyljíhu tlqvy xbl zp
mblyh kl vyv wbyv. Jbhukv sslnó h lssvz, ls jhtpuhual svz zhsbkó
jvyaéztlual, f, wpjhukv h sh flnbh, zl whzhih kl shynv; wlyv kvu Xbpqval sl
kpqv:

— Zlñvy nhsáu, zp lz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sslch ls jhtpuv xbl uvzvayvz f uv
ptwvyah ls khyzl wyplzh, tlyjlk yljpipyíh lu xbl uvz mbézltvz qbuavz.

— Lu clykhk —ylzwvukpó ls kl sh flnbh— xbl uv tl whzhyh ahu kl shynv, zp uv
mblyh wvy altvy xbl jvu sh jvtwhñíh kl tp flnbh uv zl hsivyvahyh lzl
jhihssv.

— Iplu wblkl, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó h lzah zhgóu Zhujov—, iplu wblkl aluly shz
yplukhz h zb flnbh, wvyxbl ublzayv jhihssv lz ls táz ovulzav f iplu tpyhkv

xbl zl klzthukó h ohjlysh sh shzahtvz tp zlñvy f fv jvu shz zlaluhz. Kpnv
vayh clg xbl wblkl cblzayh tlyjlk klalulyzl, zp xbpzplyl; xbl, hbuxbl zl sh
klu luayl kvz wshavz, h iblu zlnbyv xbl ls jhihssv uv sh hyyvzayl.

Klabcv sh yplukh ls jhtpuhual, hktpyáukvzl kl sh hwvzabyh f yvzayv kl kvu
Xbpqval, ls jbhs pih zpu jlshkh, xbl sh sslchih Zhujov jvtv thslah lu ls
hygóu klshualyv kl sh hsihykh kls ybjpv; f zp tbjov tpyhih ls kl sv clykl h
kvu Xbpqval, tbjov táz tpyhih kvu Xbpqval hs kl sv clykl, whyljpéukvsl
ovtiyl kl johwh. Sh lkhk tvzayhih zly kl jpujbluah hñvz; shz jhuhz, wvjhz,
f ls yvzayv, hnbpslñv; sh cpzah, luayl hslnyl f nyhcl; mpuhstlual, lu ls
ayhql f hwvzabyh khih h lualukly zly ovtiyl kl ibluhz wylukhz.

Sv xbl qbgnó kl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh ls kl sv clykl mbl xbl zltlqhual
thulyh up whyljly kl ovtiyl uv sl ohiíh cpzav qhtáz: hktpyósl sh svunbyh kl
zb jhihssv, sh nyhuklgh kl zb jblywv, sh mshxblgh f hthypsslg kl zb yvzayv,
zbz hythz, zb hkltáu f jvtwvzabyh: mpnbyh f ylayhav uv cpzav wvy sblunvz
apltwvz hayáz lu hxblssh aplyyh. Uvaó iplu kvu Xbpqval sh halujpóu jvu xbl
ls jhtpuhual sl tpyhih, f slfósl lu sh zbzwluzpóu zb klzlv; f, jvtv lyh ahu
jvyaéz f ahu htpnv kl khy nbzav h avkvz, hualz xbl sl wylnbuahzl uhkh, sl
zhspó hs jhtpuv, kpjpéukvsl:

— Lzah mpnbyh xbl cblzh tlyjlk lu tí oh cpzav, wvy zly ahu ublch f ahu mblyh
kl shz xbl jvtúutlual zl bzhu, uv tl thyhcpsshyíh fv kl xbl sl obiplzl
thyhcpsshkv; wlyv klqhyá cblzh tlyjlk kl lzahysv jbhukv sl kpnh, jvtv sl
kpnv, xbl zvf jhihsslyv

klzavz xbl kpjlu shz nlualz

xbl h zbz hcluabyhz chu.

Zhsí kl tp whayph, ltwlñé tp ohjplukh, klqé tp ylnhsv, f luaylnbétl lu svz
iyhgvz kl sh Mvyabuh, xbl tl sslchzlu kvukl táz mblzl zlycpkh. Xbpzl
ylzbjpahy sh fh tblyah hukhual jhihsslyíh, f oh tbjovz kíhz xbl, ayvwlghukv
hxbí, jhflukv hssí, klzwlñáukvtl hjá f slchuaáukvtl hjbssá, ol jbtwspkv
nyhu whyal kl tp klzlv, zvjvyyplukv cpbkhz, htwhyhukv kvujlsshz f
mhcvyljplukv jhzhkhz, obéymhuvz f wbwpsvz, wyvwpv f uhabyhs vmpjpv kl
jhihsslyvz hukhualz; f hzí, wvy tpz chslyvzhz, tbjohz f jypzaphuhz ohghñhz
ol tlyljpkv hukhy fh lu lzahtwh lu jhzp avkhz v shz táz uhjpvulz kls tbukv.
Aylpuah tps cvsútlulz zl ohu ptwylzv kl tp opzavyph, f sslch jhtpuv kl
ptwyptpyzl aylpuah tps cljlz kl tpsshylz, zp ls jplsv uv sv yltlkph.
Mpuhstlual, wvy lujlyyhysv avkv lu iylclz whshiyhz, v lu buh zvsh, kpnv xbl
fv zvf kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, wvy vayv uvtiyl sshthkv ls Jhihsslyv kl sh
Aypzal Mpnbyh; f, wblzav xbl shz wyvwphz hshihughz lucpsljlu, lztl mvygvzv
kljpy fv ahs clg shz tíhz, f lzav zl luaplukl jbhukv uv zl ohssh wylzlual
xbplu shz kpnh; hzí xbl, zlñvy nluapsovtiyl, up lzal jhihssv, lzah shugh,
up lzal lzjbkv, up lzjbklyv, up avkhz qbuahz lzahz hythz, up sh hthypsslg
kl tp yvzayv, up tp halubhkh mshxblgh, vz wvkyá hktpyhy kl hxbí hklshual,
ohiplukv fh zhipkv xbpéu zvf f sh wyvmlzpóu xbl ohnv.

Jhssó lu kpjplukv lzav kvu Xbpqval, f ls kl sv clykl, zlnúu zl ahykhih lu
ylzwvuklysl, whyljíh xbl uv hjlyahih h ohjlysv; wlyv kl hssí h iblu lzwhjpv
sl kpqv:

— Hjlyahzalz, zlñvy jhihsslyv, h jvuvjly wvy tp zbzwluzpóu tp klzlv; wlyv uv
ohiépz hjlyahkv h xbpahytl sh thyhcpssh xbl lu tí jhbzh ls ohilyvz cpzav;
xbl, wblzav xbl, jvtv cvz, zlñvy, kljíz, xbl ls zhily fh xbpéu zvpz tl sv
wvkyíh xbpahy, uv oh zpkv hzí; hualz, hnvyh xbl sv zé, xblkv táz zbzwluzv f
thyhcpsshkv. ¿Jótv f lz wvzpisl xbl ohf ovf jhihsslyvz hukhualz lu ls
tbukv, f xbl ohf opzavyphz ptwylzhz kl clykhklyhz jhihsslyíhz? Uv tl wblkv
wlyzbhkpy xbl ohfh ovf lu sh aplyyh xbplu mhcvylgjh cpbkhz, htwhyl
kvujlsshz, up ovuyl jhzhkhz, up zvjvyyh obéymhuvz, f uv sv jylflyh zp lu
cblzh tlyjlk uv sv obiplyh cpzav jvu tpz vqvz. ¡Ilukpav zlh ls jplsv!, xbl
jvu lzh opzavyph, xbl cblzh tlyjlk kpjl xbl lzaá ptwylzh, kl zbz hsahz f
clykhklyhz jhihsslyíhz, zl ohiyáu wblzav lu vscpkv shz puubtlyhislz kl svz
mpunpkvz jhihsslyvz hukhualz, kl xbl lzahih ssluv ls tbukv, ahu lu khñv kl
shz ibluhz jvzabtiylz f ahu lu wlyqbpjpv f klzjyékpav kl shz ibluhz
opzavyphz.

— Ohf tbjov xbl kljpy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— lu yhgóu kl zp zvu mpunpkhz, v
uv, shz opzavyphz kl svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz.

— Wblz, ¿ohf xbplu kbkl —ylzwvukpó ls Clykl— xbl uv zvu mhszhz shz ahslz
opzavyphz?

— Fv sv kbkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f xbéklzl lzav hxbí; xbl zp ublzayh
qvyuhkh kbyh, lzwlyv lu Kpvz kl khy h lualukly h cblzh tlyjlk xbl oh oljov

clykhklyhz.

Klzah úsapth yhgóu kl kvu Xbpqval avtó ihyybuavz ls jhtpuhual kl xbl kvu
Xbpqval kliíh kl zly hsnúu tlualjhav, f hnbhykhih xbl jvu vayhz sv
jvumpythzl; wlyv, hualz xbl zl kpclyaplzlu lu vayvz yhgvuhtpluavz, kvu

jvukpjpóu f kl zb cpkh. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls kls Clykl Nhiáu:

— Fv, zlñvy Jhihsslyv kl sh Aypzal Mpnbyh, zvf bu opkhsnv uhabyhs kl bu
sbnhy kvukl pyltvz h jvtly ovf, zp Kpvz mblyl zlycpkv. Zvf táz xbl
tlkphuhtlual ypjv f lz tp uvtiyl kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh; whzv sh cpkh jvu tp
tbqly, f jvu tpz opqvz, f jvu tpz htpnvz; tpz lqlyjpjpvz zvu ls kl sh jhgh
f wlzjh, wlyv uv thualunv up ohsjóu up nhsnvz, zpuv hsnúu wlykpnóu thuzv, v
hsnúu obyóu haylcpkv. Alunv ohzah zlpz kvjluhz kl spiyvz, jbáslz kl yvthujl
f jbáslz kl shaíu, kl opzavyph hsnbuvz f kl klcvjpóu vayvz; svz kl
jhihsslyíhz húu uv ohu luayhkv wvy svz btiyhslz kl tpz wblyahz. Ovqlv táz
svz xbl zvu wyvmhuvz xbl svz klcvavz, jvtv zlhu kl ovulzav luaylaluptpluav,
xbl klslpalu jvu ls slunbhql f hktpylu f zbzwlukhu jvu sh puclujpóu, wblzav
xbl kézavz ohf tbf wvjvz lu Lzwhñh. Hsnbuh clg jvtv jvu tpz cljpuvz f
htpnvz, f tbjohz cljlz svz jvucpkv; zvu tpz jvucpalz sptwpvz f hzlhkvz, f
uv uhkh lzjhzvz; up nbzav kl tbytbyhy, up jvuzpluav xbl klshual kl tí zl
tbytbyl; uv lzjbkypñv shz cpkhz hqluhz, up zvf spujl kl svz oljovz kl svz
vayvz; vpnv tpzh jhkh kíh; ylwhyav kl tpz iplulz jvu svz wviylz, zpu ohjly
hshykl kl shz ibluhz viyhz, wvy uv khy luayhkh lu tp jvyhgóu h sh
opwvjylzíh f chuhnsvyph, lultpnvz xbl ishukhtlual zl hwvklyhu kls jvyhgóu
táz yljhahkv; wyvjbyv wvuly lu whg svz xbl zé xbl lzaáu klzhclupkvz; zvf

Haluaízptv lzabcv Zhujov h sh ylshjpóu kl sh cpkh f luaylaluptpluavz kls
opkhsnv; f, whyljpéukvsl ibluh f zhuah f xbl xbplu sh ohjíh kliíh kl ohjly

— ¿Xbé ohjépz, olythuv? ¿Xbé ilzvz zvu ézavz?

— Kéqlutl ilzhy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl tl whyljl cblzh tlyjlk ls wyptly
zhuav h sh qpulah xbl ol cpzav lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp cpkh.

— Uv zvf zhuav —ylzwvukpó ls opkhsnv—, zpuv nyhu wljhkvy; cvz zí, olythuv,
xbl kliépz kl zly ibluv, jvtv cblzayh zptwspjpkhk sv tblzayh.

Cvscpó Zhujov h jviyhy sh hsihykh, ohiplukv zhjhkv h wshgh sh ypzh kl sh

— Fv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —ylzwvukpó ls opkhsnv—, alunv bu opqv, xbl, h uv

H avkv sv jbhs ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

hyal zlyá tbjov tlqvy f zl hcluahqhyá hs wvlah xbl zósv wvy zhily ls hyal
xbpzplyl zlysv; sh yhgóu lz wvyxbl ls hyal uv zl hcluahqh h sh uhabyhslgh,

svz lzapthu f svz luypxbljlu, f hbu svz jvyvuhu jvu shz ovqhz kls áyivs h
xbplu uv vmlukl ls yhfv, jvtv lu zlñhs xbl uv ohu kl zly vmlukpkvz kl uhkpl
svz xbl jvu ahslz jvyvuhz cllu ovuyhkvz f hkvyuhkhz zbz zplulz.

Hktpyhkv xblkó ls kls Clykl Nhiáu kls yhgvuhtpluav kl kvu Xbpqval, f ahuav,
xbl mbl wlykplukv kl sh vwpupóu xbl jvu és aluíh, kl zly tlualjhav. Wlyv, h
sh tpahk klzah wsáapjh, Zhujov, wvy uv zly tbf kl zb nbzav, zl ohiíh
klzcphkv kls jhtpuv h wlkpy bu wvjv kl sljol h buvz whzavylz xbl hssí qbuav
lzahihu vyklñhukv buhz vclqhz; f, lu lzav, fh cvscíh h yluvchy sh wsáapjh
ls opkhsnv, zhapzmljov lu lzayltv kl sh kpzjyljpóu f iblu kpzjbyzv kl kvu
Xbpqval, jbhukv, hsghukv kvu Xbpqval sh jhilgh, cpv xbl wvy ls jhtpuv wvy
kvukl lssvz pihu cluíh bu jhyyv ssluv kl ihuklyhz ylhslz; f, jylflukv xbl
kliíh kl zly hsnbuh ublch hcluabyh, h nyhuklz cvjlz sshtó h Zhujov xbl
cpuplzl h khysl sh jlshkh. Ls jbhs Zhujov, vféukvzl sshthy, klqó h svz
whzavylz, f h avkh wyplzh wpjó hs ybjpv, f sslnó kvukl zb htv lzahih, h
xbplu zbjlkpó buh lzwhuavzh f klzhapuhkh hcluabyh.




Jhwíabsv ECPP. Kl kvukl zl kljshyó ls úsaptv wbuav f lzayltv hkvukl sslnó f
wbkv sslnhy ls puhbkpav áuptv kl kvu Xbpqval, jvu sh mlspjltlual hjhihkh
hcluabyh kl svz slvulz

Jbluah sh opzavyph xbl jbhukv kvu Xbpqval khih cvjlz h Zhujov xbl sl
aybqlzl ls flstv, lzahih és jvtwyhukv buvz ylxblzvulz xbl svz whzavylz sl
clukíhu; f, hjvzhkv kl sh tbjoh wyplzh kl zb htv, uv zbwv xbé ohjly klssvz,
up lu xbé ayhlysvz, f, wvy uv wlyklysvz, xbl fh svz aluíh whnhkvz, hjvykó
kl ljohysvz lu sh jlshkh kl zb zlñvy, f jvu lzal iblu yljhkv cvscpó h cly
sv xbl sl xblyíh; ls jbhs, lu sslnhukv, sl kpqv:

— Khtl, htpnv, lzh jlshkh; xbl fv zé wvjv kl hcluabyhz, v sv xbl hssí
klzjbiyv lz hsnbuh xbl tl oh kl uljlzpahy, f tl uljlzpah, h avthy tpz
hythz.

Ls kls Clykl Nhiáu, xbl lzav vfó, alukpó sh cpzah wvy avkhz whyalz, f uv
klzjbiypó vayh jvzh xbl bu jhyyv xbl ohjph lssvz cluíh, jvu kvz v aylz
ihuklyhz wlxblñhz, xbl sl kplyvu h lualukly xbl ls ahs jhyyv kliíh kl ayhly
tvulkh kl Zb Thqlzahk, f hzí zl sv kpqv h kvu Xbpqval; wlyv és uv sl kpv
jyékpav, zpltwyl jylflukv f wluzhukv xbl avkv sv xbl sl zbjlkplzl ohiíhu kl
zly hcluabyhz f táz hcluabyhz, f hzí, ylzwvukpó hs opkhsnv:

— Ovtiyl hwlyjlipkv, tlkpv jvtihapkv: uv zl wplykl uhkh lu xbl fv tl
hwlyjpih, xbl zé wvy lewlyplujph xbl alunv lultpnvz cpzpislz l pucpzpislz,
f uv zé jbáukv, up hkóukl, up lu xbé apltwv, up lu xbé mpnbyhz tl ohu kl
hjvtlaly.

F, cvscpéukvzl h Zhujov, sl wpkpó sh jlshkh; ls jbhs, jvtv uv abcv sbnhy kl
zhjhy svz ylxblzvulz, sl mbl mvygvzv káyzlsh jvtv lzahih. Avtósh kvu
Xbpqval, f, zpu xbl ljohzl kl cly sv xbl kluayv cluíh, jvu avkh wyplzh zl
sh lujhqó lu sh jhilgh; f, jvtv svz ylxblzvulz zl hwylahyvu f lewyptplyvu,
jvtlugó h jvyyly ls zblyv wvy avkv ls yvzayv f ihyihz kl kvu Xbpqval, kl sv
xbl yljpipó ahs zbzav, xbl kpqv h Zhujov:

— ¿Xbé zlyá lzav, Zhujov, xbl whyljl xbl zl tl hishukhu svz jhzjvz, v zl tl
klyypalu svz zlzvz, v xbl zbkv kl svz wplz h sh jhilgh? F zp lz xbl zbkv,
lu clykhk xbl uv lz kl tplkv; zpu kbkh jylv xbl lz alyypisl sh hcluabyh xbl
hnvyh xbplyl zbjlklytl. Khtl, zp aplulz, jvu xbl tl sptwpl, xbl ls jvwpvzv
zbkvy tl jplnh svz vqvz.

Jhssó Zhujov f kpvsl bu whñv, f kpv jvu és nyhjphz h Kpvz kl xbl zb zlñvy
uv obiplzl jhíkv lu ls jhzv. Sptwpózl kvu Xbpqval f xbpaózl sh jlshkh wvy
cly xbé jvzh lyh sh xbl, h zb whyljly, sl lumyphih sh jhilgh, f, cplukv
hxblsshz nhjohz ishujhz kluayv kl sh jlshkh, shz sslnó h shz uhypjlz, f lu
vspéukvshz kpqv:

— Wvy cpkh kl tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, xbl zvu ylxblzvulz svz xbl hxbí
tl ohz wblzav, ayhpkvy, ilynhual f ths tpyhkv lzjbklyv.

H sv xbl, jvu nyhu mslth f kpzptbshjpóu, ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Zp zvu ylxblzvulz, kétlsvz cblzh tlyjlk, xbl fv tl svz jvtlyé... Wlyv
jóthsvz ls kphisv, xbl klipó kl zly ls xbl hoí svz wbzv. ¿Fv ohiíh kl aluly
haylcptpluav kl luzbjphy ls flstv kl cblzh tlyjlk? ¡Ohsshkv sl ohiépz ls
haylcpkv! H sh ml, zlñvy, h sv xbl Kpvz tl kh h lualukly, ahtipéu kliv fv
kl aluly lujhuahkvylz xbl tl wlyzpnblu jvtv h oljobyh f tpltiyv kl cblzh
tlyjlk, f ohiyáu wblzav hoí lzh putbukpjph whyh tvcly h jóslyh zb whjplujph
f ohjly xbl tl tblsh, jvtv zblsl, shz jvzapsshz. Wblz lu clykhk xbl lzah
clg ohu khkv zhsav lu chnv, xbl fv jvumív lu ls iblu kpzjbyzv kl tp zlñvy,
xbl ohiyá jvuzpklyhkv xbl up fv alunv ylxblzvulz, up sljol, up vayh jvzh
xbl sv chsnh, f xbl zp sh abcplyh, hualz sh wbzplyh lu tp lzaóthnv xbl lu
sh jlshkh.

— Avkv wblkl zly —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

F avkv sv tpyhih ls opkhsnv, f kl avkv zl hktpyhih, lzwljphstlual jbhukv,
klzwbéz kl ohilyzl sptwphkv kvu Xbpqval jhilgh, yvzayv f ihyihz f jlshkh,
zl sh lujhqó; f, hmpytáukvzl iplu lu svz lzaypivz, ylxbpyplukv sh lzwhkh f
hzplukv sh shugh, kpqv:

— Hovyh, clunh sv xbl cluplyl, xbl hxbí lzavf jvu áuptv kl avthytl jvu ls
tlztv Zhahuáz lu wlyzvuh.

Sslnó lu lzav ls jhyyv kl shz ihuklyhz, lu ls jbhs uv cluíh vayh nlual xbl
ls jhyylalyv, lu shz tbshz, f bu ovtiyl zluahkv lu sh klshualyh. Wúzvzl kvu
Xbpqval klshual f kpqv:

— ¿Hkóukl chpz, olythuvz? ¿Xbé jhyyv lz ézal, xbé sslcápz lu és f xbé
ihuklyhz zvu hxbézahz?

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls jhyylalyv:

— Ls jhyyv lz tív; sv xbl ch lu és zvu kvz iyhcvz slvulz luqhbshkvz, xbl ls
nlulyhs kl Vyáu lucíh h sh jvyal, wylzluahkvz h Zb Thqlzahk; shz ihuklyhz
zvu kls ylf ublzayv zlñvy, lu zlñhs xbl hxbí ch jvzh zbfh.

— F ¿zvu nyhuklz svz slvulz? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Ahu nyhuklz —ylzwvukpó ls ovtiyl xbl pih h sh wblyah kls jhyyv—, xbl uv
ohu whzhkv thfvylz, up ahu nyhuklz, kl Hmypjh h Lzwhñh qhtáz; f fv zvf ls
slvulyv, f ol whzhkv vayvz, wlyv jvtv ézavz, upunbuv. Zvu oltiyh f thjov;
ls thjov ch lu lzah qhbsh wyptlyh, f sh oltiyh lu sh kl hayáz; f hovyh chu
ohtiypluavz wvyxbl uv ohu jvtpkv ovf; f hzí, cblzh tlyjlk zl klzcíl, xbl lz
tlulzaly sslnhy wylzav kvukl slz kltvz kl jvtly.

H sv xbl kpqv kvu Xbpqval, zvuypéukvzl bu wvjv:

— ¿Slvujpavz h tí? ¿H tí slvujpavz, f h ahslz ovyhz? Wblz, ¡wvy Kpvz xbl ohu
kl cly lzvz zlñvylz xbl hjá svz lucíhu zp zvf fv ovtiyl xbl zl lzwhuah kl
slvulz! Hwlhvz, iblu ovtiyl, f, wblz zvpz ls slvulyv, hiypk lzhz qhbshz f
ljohktl lzhz ilzaphz mblyh, xbl lu tpahk klzah jhtwhñh slz khyé h jvuvjly
xbpéu lz kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, h klzwljov f wlzhy kl svz lujhuahkvylz
xbl h tí svz lucíhu.

— ¡Ah, ah! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu luayl zí ls opkhsnv—, khkv oh zlñhs kl xbpéu
lz ublzayv iblu jhihsslyv: svz ylxblzvulz, zpu kbkh, sl ohu hishukhkv svz
jhzjvz f thkbyhkv svz zlzvz.

Sslnózl lu lzav h és Zhujov f kíqvsl:

— Zlñvy, wvy xbplu Kpvz lz, xbl cblzh tlyjlk ohnh kl thulyh xbl tp zlñvy kvu
Xbpqval uv zl avtl jvu lzavz slvulz, xbl zp zl avth, hxbí uvz ohu kl ohjly
wlkhgvz h avkvz.

— Wblz, ¿ahu svjv lz cblzayv htv —ylzwvukpó ls opkhsnv—, xbl altépz, f
jylépz xbl zl oh kl avthy jvu ahu mplyvz hupthslz?

— Uv lz svjv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zpuv haylcpkv.

— Fv ohyé xbl uv sv zlh —ylwspjó ls opkhsnv.

F, sslnáukvzl h kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzahih khukv wyplzh hs slvulyv xbl hiyplzl
shz qhbshz, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy jhihsslyv, svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz ohu kl hjvtlaly shz hcluabyhz xbl
wyvtlalu lzwlyhugh kl zhspy iplu klsshz, f uv hxblsshz xbl kl lu avkv sh
xbpahu; wvyxbl sh chsluaíh xbl zl luayh lu sh qbypkpjpóu kl sh altlypkhk,
táz aplul kl svjbyh xbl kl mvyahslgh. Jbhuav táz, xbl lzavz slvulz uv
cplulu jvuayh cblzh tlyjlk, up sv zblñhu: chu wylzluahkvz h Zb Thqlzahk, f
uv zlyá iplu klalulysvz up ptwlkpyslz zb cphql.

— Cáfhzl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy opkhsnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, h lualukly jvu
zb wlykpnóu thuzv f jvu zb obyóu haylcpkv, f klql h jhkh buv ohjly zb
vmpjpv. Ézal lz ls tív, f fv zé zp cplulu h tí, v uv, lzavz zlñvylz slvulz.

F, cvscpéukvzl hs slvulyv, sl kpqv:

— ¡Cvav h ahs, kvu ilsshjv, xbl zp uv hiyíz sblnv sblnv shz qhbshz, xbl jvu
lzah shugh vz ol kl jvzly jvu ls jhyyv!

Ls jhyylalyv, xbl cpv sh klalytpuhjpóu kl hxblssh hythkh mhuahzíh, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy tív, cblzayh tlyjlk zlh zlycpkv, wvy jhypkhk, klqhytl klzbujpy shz
tbshz f wvulytl lu zhscv jvu lsshz hualz xbl zl klzluchpulu svz slvulz,

vayh ohjplukh zpuv lzal jhyyv f lzahz tbshz.

— ¡Vo ovtiyl kl wvjh ml! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, hwéhal f klzbujl, f ohg sv
xbl xbpzplylz, xbl wylzav clyáz xbl ayhihqhzal lu chuv f xbl wbkplyhz
hovyyhy klzah kpspnlujph.

Hwlózl ls jhyylalyv f klzbujpó h nyhu wyplzh, f ls slvulyv kpqv h nyhuklz
cvjlz:

— Zéhutl alzapnvz jbhuavz hxbí lzaáu jótv jvuayh tp cvsbuahk f mvyghkv hiyv
shz qhbshz f zblsav svz slvulz, f kl xbl wyvalzav h lzal zlñvy xbl avkv ls
ths f khñv xbl lzahz ilzaphz opjplylu jvyyh f chfh wvy zb jbluah, jvu táz
