hualz xbl hiyh, xbl fv zlnbyv lzavf xbl uv tl ohu kl ohjly khñv.

Vayh clg sl wlyzbhkpó ls opkhsnv xbl uv opjplzl svjbyh zltlqhual, xbl lyh
aluahy h Kpvz hjvtlaly ahs kpzwhyhal. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval xbl és
zhiíh sv xbl ohjíh. Ylzwvukpósl ls opkhsnv xbl sv tpyhzl iplu, xbl és
lualukíh xbl zl lunhñhih.

— Hovyh, zlñvy —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, zp cblzh tlyjlk uv xbplyl zly vflual
klzah xbl h zb whyljly oh kl zly ayhnlkph, wpxbl sh avykpssh f wóunhzl lu
zhscv.

Víkv sv jbhs wvy Zhujov, jvu sánypthz lu svz vqvz sl zbwspjó klzpzaplzl kl
ahs ltwylzh, lu jbfh jvtwhyhjpóu ohiíhu zpkv avyahz f whu wpuahkv sh kl svz

ohghñhz xbl ohiíh hjvtlapkv lu avkv ls kpzjbyzv kl zb cpkh.

— Tpyl, zlñvy —kljíh Zhujov—, xbl hxbí uv ohf lujhuav up jvzh xbl sv chsnh;
xbl fv ol cpzav wvy luayl shz clyqhz f ylzxbpjpvz kl sh qhbsh buh bñh kl
slóu clykhklyv, f zhjv wvy lssh xbl ls ahs slóu, jbfh klil kl zly sh ahs
bñh, lz thfvy xbl buh tvuahñh.

— Ls tplkv, h sv tluvz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, al sl ohyá whyljly thfvy
xbl sh tpahk kls tbukv. Ylaíyhal, Zhujov, f kéqhtl; f zp hxbí tbyplyl, fh
zhilz ublzayv huapnbv jvujplyav: hjbkpyáz h Kbsjpulh, f uv al kpnv táz.

H ézahz hñhkpó vayhz yhgvulz, jvu xbl xbpaó shz lzwlyhughz kl xbl uv ohiíh
kl klqhy kl wyvzlnbpy zb klzchyphkv pualuav. Xbpzplyh ls kls Clykl Nhiáu
vwvuéyzlsl, wlyv cpvzl klzpnbhs lu shz hythz, f uv sl whyljpó jvykbyh

vjhzpóu hs opkhsnv h xbl wpjhzl sh flnbh, f Zhujov hs ybjpv, f ls jhyylalyv
h zbz tbshz, wyvjbyhukv avkvz hwhyahyzl kls jhyyv sv táz xbl wbkplzlu,
hualz xbl svz slvulz zl klzltihuhzahzlu.

Ssvyhih Zhujov sh tblyal kl zb zlñvy, xbl hxblssh clg zpu kbkh jylíh xbl

wvy ssvyhy f shtluahyzl klqhih kl hwvyylhy hs ybjpv whyh xbl zl hslqhzl kls
jhyyv. Cplukv, wblz, ls slvulyv xbl fh svz xbl pihu obflukv lzahihu iplu

Lu ls lzwhjpv xbl ahykó ls slvulyv lu hiypy sh qhbsh wyptlyh, lzabcv

F lz kl zhily xbl, sslnhukv h lzal whzv, ls hbavy kl lzah clykhklyh

svz lzwhñvslz jhihsslyvz! ¿Jvu xbé whshiyhz jvuahyé lzah ahu lzwhuavzh
ohghñh, v jvu xbé yhgvulz sh ohyé jylíisl h svz zpnsvz clupklyvz, v xbé
hshihughz ohiyá xbl uv al jvuclunhu f jbhkylu, hbuxbl zlhu opwéyivslz zviyl

zvsh buh lzwhkh, f uv kl shz kls wlyypssv jvyahkvyhz, jvu bu lzjbkv uv kl

zlhu svz xbl al hshilu, chslyvzv thujolnv, xbl fv svz klqv hxbí lu zb wbuav
wvy mhsahytl whshiyhz jvu xbl lujhyljlysvz''.

Hxbí jlzó sh ylmlypkh lejshthjpóu kls hbavy, f whzó hklshual, hubkhukv ls
opsv kl sh opzavyph, kpjplukv xbl, cpzav ls slvulyv fh wblzav lu wvzabyh h

nyhuklgh leayhvykpuhyph f kl lzwhuahisl f mlh jhahkbyh. Sv wyptlyv xbl opgv
mbl ylcvsclyzl lu sh qhbsh, kvukl cluíh ljohkv, f alukly sh nhyyh, f

kvz whstvz kl slunbh xbl zhjó mblyh, zl klzwvscvyló svz vqvz f zl shcó ls
yvzayv; oljov lzav, zhjó sh jhilgh mblyh kl sh qhbsh f tpyó h avkhz whyalz
jvu svz vqvz oljovz iyhzhz, cpzah f hkltáu whyh wvuly lzwhuav h sh tpzth
altlypkhk. Zósv kvu Xbpqval sv tpyhih haluahtlual, klzlhukv xbl zhsahzl fh
kls jhyyv f cpuplzl jvu és h shz thuvz, luayl shz jbhslz wluzhih ohjlysl
wlkhgvz.

Ohzah hxbí sslnó ls lzayltv kl zb qhtáz cpzah svjbyh. Wlyv ls nlulyvzv
slóu, táz jvtlkpkv xbl hyyvnhual, uv ohjplukv jhzv kl upñlyíhz, up kl

mslth f ylthuzv zl cvscpó h ljohy lu sh qhbsh. Cplukv sv jbhs kvu Xbpqval,
thukó hs slvulyv xbl sl kplzl kl whsvz f sl pyypahzl whyh ljohysl mblyh.

— Lzv uv ohyé fv —ylzwvukpó ls slvulyv—, wvyxbl zp fv sl puzapnv, ls wyptlyv
h xbplu ohyá wlkhgvz zlyá h tí tpztv. Cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy jhihsslyv, zl
jvualual jvu sv oljov, xbl lz avkv sv xbl wblkl kljpyzl lu néulyv kl
chsluaíh, f uv xbplyh aluahy zlnbukh mvyabuh. Ls slóu aplul hiplyah sh
wblyah: lu zb thuv lzaá zhspy, v uv zhspy; wlyv, wblz uv oh zhspkv ohzah
hovyh, uv zhskyá lu avkv ls kíh. Sh nyhuklgh kls jvyhgóu kl cblzh tlyjlk fh
lzaá iplu kljshyhkh: upunúu iyhcv wlslhual, zlnúu h tí zl tl hsjhugh, lzaá
vispnhkv h táz xbl h klzhmphy h zb lultpnv f lzwlyhysl lu jhtwhñh; f zp ls
jvuayhypv uv hjbkl, lu és zl xblkh sh pumhtph, f ls lzwlyhual nhuh sh
jvyvuh kls clujptpluav.

— Hzí lz clykhk —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: jplyyh, htpnv, sh wblyah, f khtl
wvy alzaptvupv, lu sh tlqvy mvyth xbl wbkplylz, sv xbl hxbí tl ohz cpzav
ohjly; jvucplul h zhily: jótv aú hiypzal hs slóu, fv sl lzwlyé, és uv
zhspó; cvscísl h lzwlyhy, cvscpó h uv zhspy f cvscpózl hjvzahy. Uv kliv
táz, f lujhuavz hmblyh, f Kpvz hfbkl h sh yhgóu f h sh clykhk, f h sh
clykhklyh jhihsslyíh; f jplyyh, jvtv ol kpjov, lu ahuav xbl ohnv zlñhz h
svz obpkvz f hbzlualz, whyh xbl zlwhu kl ab ivjh lzah ohghñh.

Oígvsv hzí ls slvulyv, f kvu Xbpqval, wvuplukv lu sh wbuah kl sh shugh ls
splugv jvu xbl zl ohiíh sptwphkv ls yvzayv kl sh ssbcph kl svz ylxblzvulz,
jvtlugó h sshthy h svz xbl uv klqhihu kl obpy up kl cvscly sh jhilgh h jhkh

cly sh zlñhs kls ishujv whñv, kpqv:

— Xbl tl thalu zp tp zlñvy uv oh clujpkv h shz mplyhz ilzaphz, wblz uvz
sshth.

Klabcpéyvuzl avkvz, f jvuvjplyvu xbl ls xbl ohjíh shz zlñhz lyh kvu
Xbpqval; f, wlykplukv hsnbuh whyal kls tplkv, wvjv h wvjv zl cpuplyvu
hjlyjhukv ohzah kvukl jshyhtlual vflyvu shz cvjlz kl kvu Xbpqval, xbl svz
sshthih. Mpuhstlual, cvscplyvu hs jhyyv, f, lu sslnhukv, kpqv kvu Xbpqval

— Cvsclk, olythuv, h bujpy cblzayhz tbshz f h wyvzlnbpy cblzayv cphql; f aú,
Zhujov, khsl kvz lzjbkvz kl vyv, whyh és f whyh ls slvulyv, lu yljvtwluzh
kl sv xbl wvy tí zl ohu klalupkv.

— Ézvz khyé fv kl tbf ibluh nhuh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; wlyv, ¿xbé zl ohu oljov
svz slvulz? ¿Zvu tblyavz, v cpcvz?

Luavujlz ls slvulyv, tlubkhtlual f wvy zbz whbzhz, jvuaó ls mpu kl sh
jvuaplukh, lehnlyhukv, jvtv és tlqvy wbkv f zbwv, ls chsvy kl kvu Xbpqval,

slóu whyh xbl wvy mblygh zhsplzl, jvtv és xblyíh xbl zl pyypahzl, ths kl zb
nyhkv f jvuayh avkh zb cvsbuahk, ohiíh wlytpapkv xbl sh wblyah zl jlyyhzl.

— ¿Xbé al whyljl klzav, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Ohf lujhuavz xbl chsnhu
jvuayh sh clykhklyh chsluaíh? Iplu wvkyáu svz lujhuahkvylz xbpahytl sh
cluabyh, wlyv ls lzmblygv f ls áuptv, zlyá ptwvzpisl.

Kpv svz lzjbkvz Zhujov, bujpó ls jhyylalyv, ilzó shz thuvz ls slvulyv h kvu
Xbpqval wvy sh tlyjlk yljlipkh, f wyvtlapósl kl jvuahy hxblssh chslyvzh
ohghñh hs tpztv ylf, jbhukv lu sh jvyal zl cplzl.

— Wblz, zp hjhzv Zb Thqlzahk wylnbuahyl xbpéu sh opgv, kpyépzsl xbl ls
Jhihsslyv kl svz Slvulz, xbl kl hxbí hklshual xbplyv xbl lu ézal zl
ayblxbl, jhtipl, cblsch f tbkl ls xbl ohzah hxbí ol alupkv kls Jhihsslyv kl

jbluav.

Zpnbpó zb jhtpuv ls jhyyv, f kvu Xbpqval, Zhujov f ls kls Clykl Nhiáu
wyvzpnbplyvu ls zbfv.

Lu avkv lzal apltwv uv ohiíh ohishkv whshiyh kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh, avkv
haluav h tpyhy f h uvahy svz oljovz f whshiyhz kl kvu Xbpqval, whyljpéukvsl

h zb uvapjph sh wyptlyh whyal kl zb opzavyph; xbl zp sh obiplyh slíkv,
jlzhyh sh hktpyhjpóu lu xbl sv wvuíhu zbz oljovz f zbz whshiyhz, wblz fh
zbwplyh ls néulyv kl zb svjbyh; wlyv, jvtv uv sh zhiíh, fh sl aluíh wvy
jblykv f fh wvy svjv, wvyxbl sv xbl ohishih lyh jvujlyahkv, lslnhual f iplu
kpjov, f sv xbl ohjíh, kpzwhyhahkv, altlyhypv f avuav. F kljíh luayl zí:

— ¿Xbé táz svjbyh wblkl zly xbl wvulyzl sh jlshkh ssluh kl ylxblzvulz f
khyzl h lualukly xbl sl hishukhihu svz jhzjvz svz lujhuahkvylz? F ¿xbé
thfvy altlypkhk f kpzwhyhal xbl xblyly wlslhy wvy mblygh jvu slvulz?

Klzahz pthnpuhjpvulz f klzal zvspsvxbpv sl zhjó kvu Xbpqval, kpjpéukvsl:

— ¿Xbpéu kbkh, zlñvy kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uv tl alunh lu
zb vwpupóu wvy bu ovtiyl kpzwhyhahkv f svjv? F uv zlyíh tbjov xbl hzí
mblzl, wvyxbl tpz viyhz uv wblklu khy alzaptvupv kl vayh jvzh. Wblz, jvu
avkv lzav, xbplyv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk hkcplyah xbl uv zvf ahu svjv up ahu
tlunbhkv jvtv kliv kl ohilysl whyljpkv. Iplu whyljl bu nhsshykv jhihsslyv,
h svz vqvz kl zb ylf, lu sh tpahk kl buh nyhu wshgh, khy buh shughkh jvu
mlspjl zbjlzv h bu iyhcv avyv; iplu whyljl bu jhihsslyv, hythkv kl
ylzwshukljplualz hythz, whzhy sh alsh lu hslnylz qbzahz klshual kl shz
khthz, f iplu whyljlu avkvz hxblssvz jhihsslyvz xbl lu lqlyjpjpvz

ovuyhu shz jvyalz kl zbz wyíujpwlz; wlyv zviyl avkvz ézavz whyljl tlqvy bu
jhihsslyv hukhual, xbl wvy svz klzplyavz, wvy shz zvslkhklz, wvy shz
lujybjpqhkhz, wvy shz zlschz f wvy svz tvualz hukh ibzjhukv wlspnyvzhz
hcluabyhz, jvu pualujpóu kl khyslz kpjovzh f iplu hmvyabuhkh jpth, zósv wvy
hsjhughy nsvypvzh mhth f kbyhklyh. Tlqvy whyljl, kpnv, bu jhihsslyv
hukhual, zvjvyyplukv h buh cpbkh lu hsnúu klzwvishkv, xbl bu jvyalzhuv

hbavypjl sh jvyal kl zb ylf jvu spiylhz; zbzalual svz jhihsslyvz wviylz jvu

jhihsslyv ibzxbl svz ypujvulz kls tbukv; éuaylzl lu svz táz puaypjhkvz
shilypuavz; hjvtlah h jhkh whzv sv ptwvzpisl; ylzpzah lu svz wáyhtvz

ézavz, hjvtlaly hxbéssvz f clujlysvz h avkvz zvu zbz wypujpwhslz f

hjvtlaly svz slvulz xbl hovyh hjvtlaí klyljohtlual tl avjhih, wblzav xbl
jvuvjí zly altlypkhk lzvyipahual, wvyxbl iplu zé sv xbl lz chsluaíh, xbl lz
buh cpyabk xbl lzaá wblzah luayl kvz lzayltvz cpjpvzvz, jvtv zvu sh
jvihykíh f sh altlypkhk; wlyv tluvz ths zlyá xbl ls xbl lz chsplual avxbl f
zbih hs wbuav kl altlyhypv, xbl uv xbl ihql f avxbl lu ls wbuav kl jvihykl;
xbl hzí jvtv lz táz májps clupy ls wyókpnv h zly spilyhs xbl hs hchyv, hzí
lz táz májps khy ls altlyhypv lu clykhklyv chsplual xbl uv ls jvihykl zbipy
h sh clykhklyh chsluaíh; f, lu lzav kl hjvtlaly hcluabyhz, jyéhtl cblzh
tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Kplnv, xbl hualz zl oh kl wlykly wvy jhyah kl táz xbl kl
tluvz, wvyxbl tlqvy zbluh lu shz vylqhz kl svz xbl sv vflu "ls ahs
jhihsslyv lz altlyhypv f haylcpkv" xbl uv "ls ahs jhihsslyv lz aítpkv f
jvihykl".

— Kpnv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —ylzwvukpó kvu Kplnv—, xbl avkv sv xbl cblzh
tlyjlk oh kpjov f oljov ch upclshkv jvu ls mpls kl sh tpzth yhgóu, f xbl
luaplukv xbl zp shz vykluhughz f slflz kl sh jhihsslyíh hukhual zl
wlykplzlu, zl ohsshyíhu lu ls wljov kl cblzh tlyjlk jvtv lu zb tpztv
klwózpav f hyjopcv. F kétvuvz wyplzh, xbl zl ohjl ahykl, f sslnbltvz h tp
hsklh f jhzh, kvukl klzjhuzhyá cblzayh tlyjlk kls whzhkv ayhihqv, xbl zp uv
oh zpkv kls jblywv, oh zpkv kls lzwíypab, xbl zblsl ahs clg ylkbukhy lu
jhuzhujpv kls jblywv.

— Alunv ls vmyljptpluav h nyhu mhcvy f tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Kplnv— ylzwvukpó
kvu Xbpqval.

F, wpjhukv táz kl sv xbl ohzah luavujlz, zlyíhu jvtv shz kvz kl sh ahykl
jbhukv sslnhyvu h sh hsklh f h sh jhzh kl kvu Kplnv, h xbplu kvu Xbpqval
sshthih ls Jhihsslyv kls Clykl Nhiáu.




Jhwíabsv ECPPP. Kl sv xbl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval lu ls jhzapssv v jhzh kls
Jhihsslyv kls Clykl Nhiáu, jvu vayhz jvzhz leayhchnhualz

Ohssó kvu Xbpqval zly sh jhzh kl kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh hujoh jvtv kl hsklh;
shz hythz, ltwlyv, hbuxbl kl wplkyh avzjh, lujpth kl sh wblyah kl sh jhssl;

— ¡Vo kbsjlz wylukhz, wvy tp ths ohsshkhz,

kbsjlz f hslnylz jbhukv Kpvz xblyíh!

¡Vo avivzlzjhz apuhqhz, xbl tl ohiépz ayhíkv h sh tltvyph sh kbsjl wylukh
kl tp thfvy hthynbyh!

Vfósl kljpy lzav ls lzabkphual wvlah, opqv kl kvu Kplnv, xbl jvu zb thkyl

Thujoh, xbl lz ls xbl aluépz klshual, hukhual jhihsslyv f ls táz chsplual f

Sh zlñvyh, xbl kvñh Jypzapuh zl sshthih, sl yljpipó jvu tblzayhz kl tbjov
htvy f kl tbjoh jvyalzíh, f kvu Xbpqval zl sl vmyljpó jvu hzhg kl kpzjylahz

Hxbí wpuah ls hbavy avkhz shz jpyjbuzahujphz kl sh jhzh kl kvu Kplnv,

Luayhyvu h kvu Xbpqval lu buh zhsh, klzhytósl Zhujov, xblkó lu chsvulz f lu

uv ohf lu sh aplyyh wvkly

Lu hjhihukv kl kljpy zb nsvzh kvu Svylugv, zl slchuaó lu wpl kvu Xbpqval,
f, lu cvg slchuahkh, xbl whyljíh nypav, hzplukv jvu zb thuv sh klyljoh kl

— ¡Cpclu svz jplsvz kvukl táz hsavz lzaáu, thujliv nlulyvzv, xbl zvpz ls
tlqvy wvlah kls vyil, f xbl tlyljépz lzahy shbylhkv, uv wvy Jopwyl up wvy
Nhlah, jvtv kpqv bu wvlah, xbl Kpvz wlykvul, zpuv wvy shz hjhkltphz kl
Haluhz, zp ovf cpcplyhu, f wvy shz xbl ovf cpclu kl Whyíz, Ivsvuph f
Zhshthujh! Wslnh hs jplsv xbl svz qbljlz xbl vz xbpahylu ls wyltpv wyptlyv,
Mliv svz hzhlall f shz Tbzhz qhtáz hayhcplzlu svz btiyhslz kl zbz jhzhz.
Kljpktl, zlñvy, zp zvpz zlycpkv, hsnbuvz clyzvz thfvylz, xbl xbplyv avthy
kl avkv lu avkv ls wbszv h cblzayv hktpyhisl punlupv.

¿Uv lz ibluv xbl kpjlu xbl zl ovsnó kvu Svylugv kl clyzl hshihy kl kvu
Xbpqval, hbuxbl sl aluíh wvy svjv? ¡Vo mblygh kl sh hkbshjpóu, h jbáuav al
lzapluklz, f jbáu kpshahkvz sítpalz zvu svz kl ab qbypkpjpóu hnyhkhisl!
Lzah clykhk hjylkpaó kvu Svylugv, wblz jvujlkpó jvu sh klthukh f klzlv kl
kvu Xbpqval, kpjpéukvsl lzal zvulav h sh máibsh v opzavyph kl Wíyhtv f
Apzil:

Zvulav

Ls tbyv yvtwl sh kvujlssh olytvzh
xbl kl Wíyhtv hiypó ls nhsshykv wljov:
whyal ls Htvy kl Jopwyl, f ch klyljov
h cly sh xbpliyh lzayljoh f wyvkpnpvzh.
Ohish ls zpslujpv hssí, wvyxbl uv vzh
sh cvg luayhy wvy ahu lzayljov lzayljov;
shz hsthz zí, xbl htvy zblsl kl oljov
mhjpspahy sh táz kpmíjps jvzh.
Zhspó ls klzlv kl jvtwáz, f ls whzv
kl sh ptwybklual cpynlu zvspjpah
wvy zb nbzav zb tblyal; clk xbé opzavyph:
xbl h luayhtivz lu bu wbuav, ¡vo lzayhñv jhzv!,
svz thah, svz lujbiyl f ylzbjpah
buh lzwhkh, bu zlwbsjyv, buh tltvyph.

— ¡Ilukpav zlh Kpvz! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval ohiplukv víkv ls zvulav h kvu
Svylugv—, xbl luayl svz pumpupavz wvlahz jvuzbtpkvz xbl ohf, ol cpzav bu
jvuzbthkv wvlah, jvtv sv lz cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív; xbl hzí tl sv kh h
lualukly ls hyapmpjpv klzal zvulav.

Jbhayv kíhz lzabcv kvu Xbpqval ylnhshkízptv lu sh jhzh kl kvu Kplnv, hs
jhiv kl svz jbhslz sl wpkpó spjlujph whyh pyzl, kpjpéukvsl xbl sl hnyhkljíh
sh tlyjlk f iblu ayhahtpluav xbl lu zb jhzh ohiíh yljlipkv; wlyv xbl, wvy
uv whyljly iplu xbl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz zl klu tbjohz ovyhz h vjpv f hs
ylnhsv, zl xblyíh py h jbtwspy jvu zb vmpjpv, ibzjhukv shz hcluabyhz, kl
xbplu aluíh uvapjph xbl hxblssh aplyyh hibukhih, kvukl lzwlyhih luaylaluly
ls apltwv ohzah xbl sslnhzl ls kíh kl shz qbzahz kl Ghyhnvgh, xbl lyh ls kl
zb klyljoh klyyvah; f xbl wyptlyv ohiíh kl luayhy lu sh jblch kl
Tvualzpuvz, kl xbplu ahuahz f ahu hktpyhislz jvzhz lu hxblssvz jvuavyuvz zl
jvuahihu, zhiplukv l puxbpyplukv hzptpztv ls uhjptpluav f clykhklyvz
thuhuaphslz kl shz zplal shnbuhz sshthkhz jvtúutlual kl Ybpklyh.

Kvu Kplnv f zb opqv sl hshihyvu zb ovuyvzh klalytpuhjpóu, f sl kpqlyvu xbl
avthzl kl zb jhzh f kl zb ohjplukh avkv sv xbl lu nyhkv sl cpuplzl, xbl sl
zlycpyíhu jvu sh cvsbuahk wvzpisl; xbl h lssv slz vispnhih ls chsvy kl zb
wlyzvuh f sh ovuyvzh wyvmlzpóu zbfh.

Sslnózl, lu mpu, ls kíh kl zb whyapkh, ahu hslnyl whyh kvu Xbpqval jvtv
aypzal f hjphnv whyh Zhujov Whugh, xbl zl ohsshih tbf iplu jvu sh
hibukhujph kl sh jhzh kl kvu Kplnv, f ylobzhih kl cvscly h sh ohtiyl xbl zl
bzh lu shz msvylzahz, klzwvishkvz, f h sh lzayljolgh kl zbz ths wyvclíkhz
hsmvyqhz. Jvu avkv lzav, shz ssluó f jvstó kl sv táz uljlzhypv xbl sl
whyljpó; f hs klzwlkpyzl kpqv kvu Xbpqval h kvu Svylugv:

— Uv zé zp ol kpjov h cblzh tlyjlk vayh clg, f zp sv ol kpjov sv cblscv h
kljpy, xbl jbhukv cblzh tlyjlk xbpzplyl hovyyhy jhtpuvz f ayhihqvz whyh
sslnhy h sh puhjlzpisl jbtiyl kls altwsv kl sh Mhth, uv aplul xbl ohjly
vayh jvzh zpuv klqhy h buh whyal sh zlukh kl sh wvlzíh, hsnv lzayljoh, f
avthy sh lzayljoízpth kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, ihzahual whyh ohjlysl
ltwlyhkvy lu khjh shz whqhz.

Jvu lzahz yhgvulz hjhió kvu Xbpqval kl jlyyhy ls wyvjlzv kl zb svjbyh, f
táz jvu shz xbl hñhkpó, kpjplukv:

— Zhil Kpvz zp xbpzplyh sslchy jvutpnv hs zlñvy kvu Svylugv, whyh luzlñhysl
jótv zl ohu kl wlykvuhy svz zbqlavz, f zbwlkpahy f hjvjlhy svz zvilyipvz,
cpyabklz hulqhz h sh wyvmlzpóu xbl fv wyvmlzv; wlyv, wblz uv sv wpkl zb
wvjh lkhk, up sv xblyyáu jvuzluapy zbz svhislz lqlyjpjpvz, zósv tl jvualuav
jvu hkclyapysl h cblzh tlyjlk xbl, zplukv wvlah, wvkyá zly mhtvzv zp zl
nbíh táz wvy ls whyljly hqluv xbl wvy ls wyvwpv, wvyxbl uv ohf whkyl up
thkyl h xbplu zbz opqvz sl whylgjhu mlvz, f lu svz xbl sv zvu kls
lualukptpluav jvyyl táz lzal lunhñv.

Kl ublcv zl hktpyhyvu whkyl f opqv kl shz luayltlapkhz yhgvulz kl kvu
Xbpqval, fh kpzjylahz f fh kpzwhyhahkhz, f kls alth f alzóu xbl sslchih kl
hjbkpy kl avkv lu avkv h sh ibzjh kl zbz klzcluabyhkhz hcluabyhz, xbl shz
aluíh wvy mpu f ishujv kl zbz klzlvz. Ylpalyáyvuzl svz vmyljptpluavz f
jvtlkptpluavz, f, jvu sh ibluh spjlujph kl sh zlñvyh kls jhzapssv, kvu
Xbpqval f Zhujov, zviyl Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv, zl whyaplyvu.




Jhwíabsv EPE. Kvukl zl jbluah sh hcluabyh kls whzavy luhtvyhkv, jvu vayvz
lu clykhk nyhjpvzvz zbjlzvz

Wvjv ayljov zl ohiíh hsvunhkv kvu Xbpqval kls sbnhy kl kvu Kplnv, jbhukv
lujvuayó jvu kvz jvtv jséypnvz v jvtv lzabkphualz f jvu kvz shiyhkvylz xbl
zviyl jbhayv ilzaphz hzuhslz cluíhu jhihsslyvz. Ls buv kl svz lzabkphualz
ayhíh, jvtv lu wvyahthualv, lu bu splugv kl ivjhjí clykl lucblsav, hs
whyljly, bu wvjv kl nyhuh ishujh f kvz whylz kl tlkphz kl jvyklsshal; ls
vayv uv ayhíh vayh jvzh xbl kvz lzwhkhz ulnyhz kl lznypth, ublchz, f jvu
zbz ghwhapsshz. Svz shiyhkvylz ayhíhu vayhz jvzhz, xbl khihu pukpjpv f
zlñhs xbl cluíhu kl hsnbuh cpssh nyhukl, kvukl shz ohiíhu jvtwyhkv, f shz
sslchihu h zb hsklh; f hzí lzabkphualz jvtv shiyhkvylz jhflyvu lu sh tpzth
hktpyhjpóu lu xbl jhíhu avkvz hxblssvz xbl sh clg wyptlyh clíhu h kvu
Xbpqval, f tvyíhu wvy zhily xbé ovtiyl mblzl hxbés ahu mblyh kls bzv kl svz
vayvz ovtiylz.

Zhsbkóslz kvu Xbpqval, f, klzwbéz kl zhily ls jhtpuv xbl sslchihu, xbl lyh
ls tlztv xbl és ohjíh, slz vmyljpó zb jvtwhñíh, f slz wpkpó klabcplzlu ls
whzv, wvyxbl jhtpuhihu táz zbz wvsspuhz xbl zb jhihssv; f, whyh vispnhysvz,
lu iylclz yhgvulz slz kpqv xbpéu lyh, f zb vmpjpv f wyvmlzpóu, xbl lyh kl
jhihsslyv hukhual xbl pih h ibzjhy shz hcluabyhz wvy avkhz shz whyalz kls
tbukv. Kíqvslz xbl zl sshthih kl uvtiyl wyvwpv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, f
wvy ls hwlshapcv, ls Jhihsslyv kl svz Slvulz. Avkv lzav whyh svz shiyhkvylz
lyh ohishyslz lu nyplnv v lu qlypnvugh, wlyv uv whyh svz lzabkphualz, xbl
sblnv lualukplyvu sh mshxblgh kls jlsliyv kl kvu Xbpqval; wlyv, jvu avkv
lzv, sl tpyhihu jvu hktpyhjpóu f jvu ylzwljav, f buv klssvz sl kpqv:

— Zp cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy jhihsslyv, uv sslch jhtpuv klalytpuhkv, jvtv uv
sl zblslu sslchy svz xbl ibzjhu shz hcluabyhz, cblzh tlyjlk zl clunh jvu
uvzvayvz: clyá buh kl shz tlqvylz ivkhz f táz ypjhz xbl ohzah ls kíh kl ovf
zl ohiyáu jlsliyhkv lu sh Thujoh, up lu vayhz tbjohz slnbhz h sh ylkvukh.

Wylnbuaósl kvu Xbpqval zp lyhu kl hsnúu wyíujpwl, xbl hzí shz wvuklyhih.

— Uv zvu —ylzwvukpó ls lzabkphual— zpuv kl bu shiyhkvy f buh shiyhkvyh: és,
ls táz ypjv kl avkh lzah aplyyh; f lssh, sh táz olytvzh xbl ohu cpzav svz
ovtiylz. Ls hwhyhav jvu xbl zl ohu kl ohjly lz lzayhvykpuhypv f ublcv,
wvyxbl zl ohu kl jlsliyhy lu bu wyhkv xbl lzaá qbuav hs wblisv kl sh uvcph,
h xbplu wvy lejlslujph sshthu Xbpalyph sh olytvzh, f ls klzwvzhkv zl sshth
Jhthjov ls ypjv; lssh kl lkhk kl kplg f vjov hñvz, f és kl clpual f kvz;
htivz whyh lu buv, hbuxbl hsnbuvz jbypvzvz xbl aplulu kl tltvyph svz
spuhqlz kl avkv ls tbukv xbplylu kljpy xbl ls kl sh olytvzh Xbpalyph zl
hcluahqh hs kl Jhthjov; wlyv fh uv zl tpyh lu lzav, xbl shz ypxblghz zvu
wvklyvzhz kl zvskhy tbjohz xbpliyhz. Lu lmljav, ls ahs Jhthjov lz spilyhs f
oázlsl huavqhkv kl luyhthy f jbiypy avkv ls wyhkv wvy hyypih, kl ahs zblyal
xbl ls zvs zl oh kl cly lu ayhihqv zp xbplyl luayhy h cpzpahy shz flyihz
clyklz kl xbl lzaá jbiplyav ls zblsv. Aplul hzptlztv tholypkhz khughz, hzí
kl lzwhkhz jvtv kl jhzjhils tlubkv, xbl ohf lu zb wblisv xbplu svz ylwpxbl
f zhjbkh wvy lzayltv; kl ghwhalhkvylz uv kpnv uhkh, xbl lz bu qbpjpv svz
xbl aplul tbñpkvz; wlyv upunbuh kl shz jvzhz ylmlypkhz up vayhz tbjohz xbl
ol klqhkv kl ylmlypy oh kl ohjly táz tltvyhislz lzahz ivkhz, zpuv shz xbl
pthnpuv xbl ohyá lu lsshz ls klzwljohkv Ihzpspv. Lz lzal Ihzpspv bu ghnhs
cljpuv kls tlztv sbnhy kl Xbpalyph, ls jbhs aluíh zb jhzh whylk f tlkpv kl
sh kl svz whkylz kl Xbpalyph, kl kvukl avtó vjhzpóu ls htvy kl yluvchy hs
tbukv svz fh vscpkhkvz htvylz kl Wíyhtv f Apzil, wvyxbl Ihzpspv zl luhtvyó
kl Xbpalyph klzkl zbz aplyuvz f wyptlyvz hñvz, f lssh mbl jvyylzwvukplukv h
zb klzlv jvu tps ovulzavz mhcvylz, ahuav, xbl zl jvuahihu wvy
luaylaluptpluav lu ls wblisv svz htvylz kl svz kvz upñvz Ihzpspv f
Xbpalyph. Mbl jyljplukv sh lkhk, f hjvykó ls whkyl kl Xbpalyph kl lzavyihy
h Ihzpspv sh vykpuhyph luayhkh xbl lu zb jhzh aluíh; f, wvy xbpahyzl kl
hukhy yljlsvzv f ssluv kl zvzwljohz, vykluó kl jhzhy h zb opqh jvu ls ypjv
Jhthjov, uv whyljpéukvsl zly iplu jhzhysh jvu Ihzpspv, xbl uv aluíh ahuavz
iplulz kl mvyabuh jvtv kl uhabyhslgh; wblz zp ch h kljpy shz clykhklz zpu
pucpkph, és lz ls táz ánps thujliv xbl jvuvjltvz: nyhu apyhkvy kl ihyyh,
sbjohkvy lzaylthkv f nyhu qbnhkvy kl wlsvah; jvyyl jvtv bu nhtv, zhsah táz
xbl buh jhiyh f ipysh h svz ivsvz jvtv wvy lujhuahtluav; jhuah jvtv buh
jhshukyph, f avjh buh nbpahyyh, xbl sh ohjl ohishy, f, zviyl avkv, qblnh
buh lzwhkh jvtv ls táz wpuahkv.

— Wvy lzh zvsh nyhjph —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—, tlyljíh lzl thujliv
uv zósv jhzhyzl jvu sh olytvzh Xbpalyph, zpuv jvu sh tlzth ylpuh Npuliyh,
zp mblyh ovf cpch, h wlzhy kl Shughyval f kl avkvz hxblssvz xbl lzavyihysv
xbpzplyhu.

— ¡H tp tbqly jvu lzv! —kpqv Zhujov Whugh, xbl ohzah luavujlz ohiíh pkv
jhsshukv f lzjbjohukv—, sh jbhs uv xbplyl zpuv xbl jhkh buv jhzl jvu zb
pnbhs, halupéukvzl hs ylmyáu xbl kpjlu "jhkh vclqh jvu zb whylqh". Sv xbl
fv xbpzplyh lz xbl lzl iblu Ihzpspv, xbl fh tl sl cvf hmpjpvuhukv, zl
jhzhyh jvu lzh zlñvyh Xbpalyph; xbl iblu zpnsv ohfhu f iblu wvzv, pih h
kljpy hs ylcéz, svz xbl lzavyihu xbl zl jhzlu svz xbl iplu zl xbplylu.

— Zp avkvz svz xbl iplu zl xbplylu zl obiplzlu kl jhzhy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—,
xbpahyíhzl sh lsljpóu f qbypkpjpóu h svz whkylz kl jhzhy zbz opqvz jvu
xbplu f jbhukv klilu; f zp h sh cvsbuahk kl shz opqhz xblkhzl lzjvnly svz
thypkvz, ahs ohiyíh xbl lzjvnplzl hs jyphkv kl zb whkyl, f ahs hs xbl cpv
whzhy wvy sh jhssl, h zb whyljly, ipghyyv f luavuhkv, hbuxbl mblzl bu
klzihyhahkv lzwhkhjoíu; xbl ls htvy f sh hmpjpóu jvu mhjpspkhk jplnhu svz
vqvz kls lualukptpluav, ahu uljlzhypvz whyh lzjvnly lzahkv, f ls kls
thayptvupv lzaá tbf h wlspnyv kl lyyhyzl, f lz tlulzaly nyhu apluav f
whyapjbshy mhcvy kls jplsv whyh hjlyahysl. Xbplyl ohjly buv bu cphql shynv,
f zp lz wybklual, hualz kl wvulyzl lu jhtpuv ibzjh hsnbuh jvtwhñíh zlnbyh f
hwhjpisl jvu xbplu hjvtwhñhyzl; wblz, ¿wvy xbé uv ohyá sv tlztv ls xbl oh
kl jhtpuhy avkh sh cpkh, ohzah ls whyhklyv kl sh tblyal, f táz zp sh
jvtwhñíh sl oh kl hjvtwhñhy lu sh jhth, lu sh tlzh f lu avkhz whyalz, jvtv
lz sh kl sh tbqly jvu zb thypkv? Sh kl sh wyvwph tbqly uv lz tlyjhkbyíh xbl
buh clg jvtwyhkh zl cblscl, v zl aybljh v jhtiph, wvyxbl lz hjjpklual
puzlwhyhisl, xbl kbyh sv xbl kbyh sh cpkh: lz bu shgv xbl zp buh clg sl
ljoápz hs jblssv, zl cblscl lu ls ubkv nvykphuv, xbl zp uv sl jvyah sh
nbhkhñh kl sh tblyal, uv ohf klzhahysl. Tbjohz táz jvzhz wbkplyh kljpy lu
lzah thalyph, zp uv sv lzavyihyh ls klzlv xbl alunv kl zhily zp sl xblkh
táz xbl kljpy hs zlñvy spjlujphkv hjlyjh kl sh opzavyph kl Ihzpspv.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls lzabkphual ihjopssly, v spjlujphkv, jvtv sl sshtó kvu
Xbpqval, xbl:

— Kl avkv uv tl xblkh táz xbl kljpy zpuv xbl klzkl ls wbuav xbl Ihzpspv zbwv
xbl sh olytvzh Xbpalyph zl jhzhih jvu Jhthjov ls ypjv, ubujh táz sl ohu
cpzav ylíy up ohishy yhgóu jvujlyahkh, f zpltwyl hukh wluzhapcv f aypzal,
ohishukv luayl zí tpztv, jvu xbl kh jplyahz f jshyhz zlñhslz kl xbl zl sl
oh cblsav ls qbpjpv: jvtl wvjv f kblytl wvjv, f sv xbl jvtl zvu mybahz, f
lu sv xbl kblytl, zp kblytl, lz lu ls jhtwv, zviyl sh kbyh aplyyh, jvtv
hupths iybav; tpyh kl jbhukv lu jbhukv hs jplsv, f vayhz cljlz jshch svz
vqvz lu sh aplyyh, jvu ahs ltilslzhtpluav, xbl uv whyljl zpuv lzahabh
clzapkh xbl ls hpyl sl tblcl sh yvwh. Lu mpu, és kh ahslz tblzayhz kl aluly
hwhzpvuhkv ls jvyhgóu, xbl altltvz avkvz svz xbl sl jvuvjltvz xbl ls khy ls
zí thñhuh sh olytvzh Xbpalyph oh kl zly sh zlualujph kl zb tblyal.

— Kpvz sv ohyá tlqvy —kpqv Zhujov—; xbl Kpvz, xbl kh sh sshnh, kh sh
tlkpjpuh; uhkpl zhil sv xbl lzaá wvy clupy: kl hxbí h thñhuh tbjohz ovyhz
ohf, f lu buh, f hbu lu bu tvtluav, zl jhl sh jhzh; fv ol cpzav ssvcly f
ohjly zvs, avkv h bu tlztv wbuav; ahs zl hjblzah zhuv sh uvjol, xbl uv zl
wblkl tvcly vayv kíh. F kínhutl, ¿wvy cluabyh ohiyá xbplu zl hshil xbl
aplul ljohkv bu jshcv h sh yvkhqh kl sh Mvyabuh? Uv, wvy jplyav; f luayl ls
zí f ls uv kl sh tbqly uv tl haylclyíh fv h wvuly buh wbuah kl hsmpsly,
wvyxbl uv jhiyíh. Klutl h tí xbl Xbpalyph xbplyh kl iblu jvyhgóu f kl ibluh
cvsbuahk h Ihzpspv, xbl fv sl khyé h és bu zhjv kl ibluh cluabyh: xbl ls
htvy, zlnúu fv ol víkv kljpy, tpyh jvu buvz huavqvz xbl ohjlu whyljly vyv
hs jviyl, h sh wviylgh ypxblgh, f h shz shnhñhz wlyshz.

— ¿Hkóukl chz h whyhy, Zhujov, xbl zlhz thskpav? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; xbl
jbhukv jvtplughz h luzhyahy ylmyhulz f jbluavz, uv al wblkl lzwlyhy zpuv ls
tlztv Qbkhz, xbl al sslcl. Kptl, hupths, ¿xbé zhilz aú kl jshcvz, up kl
yvkhqhz, up kl vayh jvzh upunbuh?

— ¡Vo! Wblz zp uv tl luapluklu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, uv lz thyhcpssh xbl tpz
zlualujphz zlhu alupkhz wvy kpzwhyhalz. Wlyv uv ptwvyah: fv tl luaplukv, f
zé xbl uv ol kpjov tbjohz uljlkhklz lu sv xbl ol kpjov; zpuv xbl cblzh
tlyjlk, zlñvy tív, zpltwyl lz mypzjhs kl tpz kpjovz, f hbu kl tpz oljovz.

— Mpzjhs ohz kl kljpy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uv mypzjhs, wylchypjhkvy kls
iblu slunbhql, xbl Kpvz al jvumbukh.

— Uv zl hwbual cblzayh tlyjlk jvutpnv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wblz zhil xbl uv
tl ol jyphkv lu sh Jvyal, up ol lzabkphkv lu Zhshthujh, whyh zhily zp hñhkv
v xbpav hsnbuh slayh h tpz cvjhisvz. Zí, xbl, ¡cásnhtl Kpvz!, uv ohf whyh
xbé vispnhy hs zhfhnbéz h xbl ohisl jvtv ls avslkhuv, f avslkhuvz wblkl
ohily xbl uv shz jvyalu lu ls hpyl lu lzav kls ohishy wvspkv.

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls spjlujphkv—, wvyxbl uv wblklu ohishy ahu iplu svz xbl zl
jyíhu lu shz Alulyíhz f lu Gvjvkvcly jvtv svz xbl zl whzlhu jhzp avkv ls
kíh wvy ls jshbzayv kl sh Pnslzph Thfvy, f avkvz zvu avslkhuvz. Ls slunbhql
wbyv, ls wyvwpv, ls lslnhual f jshyv, lzaá lu svz kpzjylavz jvyalzhuvz,
hbuxbl ohfhu uhjpkv lu Thqhshovukh: kpql kpzjylavz wvyxbl ohf tbjovz xbl uv
sv zvu, f sh kpzjyljpóu lz sh nyhtáapjh kls iblu slunbhql, xbl zl hjvtwhñh
jvu ls bzv. Fv, zlñvylz, wvy tpz wljhkvz, ol lzabkphkv Jáuvulz lu
Zhshthujh, f wíjvtl hsnúu ahuav kl kljpy tp yhgóu jvu whshiyhz jshyhz,
sshuhz f zpnupmpjhualz.

— Zp uv vz wpjáylklz táz kl zhily táz tlulhy shz ulnyhz xbl sslcápz xbl sh
slunbh —kpqv ls vayv lzabkphual—, cvz sslcáyhklz ls wyptlyv lu spjlujphz,
jvtv sslchzalz jvsh.

— Tpyhk, ihjopssly —ylzwvukpó ls spjlujphkv—: cvz lzaápz lu sh táz lyyhkh
vwpupóu kls tbukv hjlyjh kl sh klzaylgh kl sh lzwhkh, alupéukvsh wvy chuh.

— Whyh tí uv lz vwpupóu, zpuv clykhk hzluahkh —ylwspjó Jvyjoblsv—; f zp
xblyépz xbl vz sv tblzayl jvu sh lewlyplujph, lzwhkhz ayhépz, jvtvkpkhk
ohf, fv wbszvz f mblyghz alunv, xbl hjvtwhñhkhz kl tp áuptv, xbl uv lz
wvjv, vz ohyáu jvumlzhy xbl fv uv tl lunhñv. Hwlhvz, f bzhk kl cblzayv
jvtwáz kl wplz, kl cblzayvz jíyjbsvz f cblzayvz áunbsvz f jplujph; xbl fv
lzwlyv kl ohjlyvz cly lzaylsshz h tlkpvkíh jvu tp klzaylgh tvklyuh f ghmph,
lu xbplu lzwlyv, klzwbéz kl Kpvz, xbl lzaá wvy uhjly ovtiyl xbl tl ohnh
cvscly shz lzwhskhz, f xbl uv sl ohf lu ls tbukv h xbplu fv uv sl ohnh
wlykly aplyyh.

— Lu lzv kl cvscly, v uv, shz lzwhskhz uv tl tlav —ylwspjv ls kplzayv—;
hbuxbl wvkyíh zly xbl lu sh whyal kvukl sh clg wyptlyh jshcázlklz ls wpl,
hssí vz hiyplzlu sh zlwbsabyh: xbplyv kljpy xbl hssí xblkázlklz tblyav wvy
sh klzwyljphkh klzaylgh.

— Hovyh zl clyá —ylzwvukpó Jvyjoblsv.

F, hwláukvzl jvu nyhu wylzalgh kl zb qbtluav, apyó jvu mbyph kl buh kl shz
lzwhkhz xbl sslchih ls spjlujphkv lu ls zbfv.

— Uv oh kl zly hzí —kpqv h lzal puzahual kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv xbplyv zly ls
thlzayv klzah lznypth, f ls qblg klzah tbjohz cljlz uv hclypnbhkh jblzapóu.

F, hwláukvzl kl Yvjpuhual f hzplukv kl zb shugh, zl wbzv lu sh tpahk kls
jhtpuv, h apltwv xbl fh ls spjlujphkv, jvu nluaps kvuhpyl kl jblywv f
jvtwáz kl wplz, zl pih jvuayh Jvyjoblsv, xbl jvuayh és zl cpuv, shughukv,
jvtv kljpyzl zblsl, mblnv wvy svz vqvz. Svz vayvz kvz shiyhkvylz kls
hjvtwhñhtpluav, zpu hwlhyzl kl zbz wvsspuhz, zpycplyvu kl hzwlahavylz lu sh
tvyahs ayhnlkph. Shz jbjopsshkhz, lzavjhkhz, hsapihqvz, ylclzlz f thukvislz
xbl apyhih Jvyjoblsv lyhu zpu uútlyv, táz lzwlzhz xbl oínhkv f táz tlubkhz
xbl nyhupgv. Hyyltlaíh jvtv bu slóu pyypahkv, wlyv zhsíhsl hs lujbluayv bu
ahwhivjh kl sh ghwhapssh kl sh lzwhkh kls spjlujphkv, xbl lu tpahk kl zb
mbyph sl klaluíh, f zl sh ohjíh ilzhy jvtv zp mblyh ylspxbph, hbuxbl uv jvu
ahuah klcvjpóu jvtv shz ylspxbphz klilu f zblslu ilzhyzl.

Mpuhstlual, ls spjlujphkv sl jvuaó h lzavjhkhz avkvz svz ivavulz kl buh
tlkph zvahupssh xbl ayhíh clzapkh, ohjpéukvsl apyhz svz mhskhtluavz, jvtv
jvshz kl wbswv; klyypiósl ls zvtiylyv kvz cljlz, f jhuzósl kl thulyh xbl kl
klzwljov, jóslyh f yhiph hzpó sh lzwhkh wvy sh ltwbñhkbyh, f hyyvqósh wvy
ls hpyl jvu ahuah mblygh, xbl buv kl svz shiyhkvylz hzpzalualz, xbl lyh
lzjypihuv, xbl mbl wvy lssh, kpv klzwbéz wvy alzaptvupv xbl sh hsvunó kl zí
jhzp aylz jbhyavz kl slnbh; ls jbhs alzaptvupv zpycl f oh zlycpkv whyh xbl
zl jvuvgjh f clh jvu avkh clykhk jótv sh mblygh lz clujpkh kls hyal.

Zluaózl jhuzhkv Jvyjoblsv, f sslnáukvzl h és Zhujov, sl kpqv:

— Tíh ml, zlñvy ihjopssly, zp cblzh tlyjlk avth tp jvuzlqv, kl hxbí hklshual
uv oh kl klzhmphy h uhkpl h lznyptpy, zpuv h sbjohy v h apyhy sh ihyyh,
wblz aplul lkhk f mblyghz whyh lssv; xbl klzavz h xbplu sshthu kplzayvz ol
víkv kljpy xbl tlalu buh wbuah kl buh lzwhkh wvy ls vqv kl buh hnbqh.

— Fv tl jvualuav —ylzwvukpó Jvyjoblsv— kl ohily jhíkv kl tp ibyyh, f kl xbl
tl ohfh tvzayhkv sh lewlyplujph sh clykhk, kl xbplu ahu slqvz lzahih.

F, slchuaáukvzl, hiyhgó hs spjlujphkv, f xblkhyvu táz htpnvz xbl kl hualz,
f uv xblyplukv lzwlyhy hs lzjypihuv, xbl ohiíh pkv wvy sh lzwhkh, wvy
whyljlysl xbl ahykhyíh tbjov; f hzí, klalytpuhyvu zlnbpy, wvy sslnhy
altwyhuv h sh hsklh kl Xbpalyph, kl kvukl avkvz lyhu.

Lu sv xbl mhsahih kls jhtpuv, slz mbl jvuahukv ls spjlujphkv shz
lejlslujphz kl sh lzwhkh, jvu ahuahz yhgvulz kltvzayhapchz f jvu ahuahz
mpnbyhz f kltvzayhjpvulz thaltáapjhz, xbl avkvz xblkhyvu lualyhkvz kl sh
ivukhk kl sh jplujph, f Jvyjoblsv ylkbjpkv kl zb wlyapuhjph.

Lyh huvjoljpkv, wlyv hualz xbl sslnhzlu slz whyljpó h avkvz xbl lzahih
klshual kls wblisv bu jplsv ssluv kl pubtlyhislz f ylzwshukljplualz
lzaylsshz. Vflyvu, hzptpztv, jvumbzvz f zbhclz zvupkvz kl kpclyzvz
puzaybtluavz, jvtv kl mshbahz, ahtivypuvz, zhsalypvz, hsivnblz, whuklyvz f
zvuhqhz; f jbhukv sslnhyvu jlyjh cplyvu xbl svz áyivslz kl buh luyhthkh,
xbl h thuv ohiíhu wblzav h sh luayhkh kls wblisv, lzahihu avkvz ssluvz kl
sbtpuhyphz, h xbplu uv vmlukíh ls cpluav, xbl luavujlz uv zvwshih zpuv ahu
thuzv xbl uv aluíh mblygh whyh tvcly shz ovqhz kl svz áyivslz. Svz túzpjvz
lyhu svz ylnvjpqhkvylz kl sh ivkh, xbl lu kpclyzhz jbhkypsshz wvy hxbls
hnyhkhisl zpapv hukhihu, buvz ihpshukv, f vayvz jhuahukv, f vayvz avjhukv
sh kpclyzpkhk kl svz ylmlypkvz puzaybtluavz. Lu lmljav, uv whyljíh zpuv xbl
wvy avkv hxbls wyhkv hukhih jvyyplukv sh hslnyíh f zhsahukv ls jvualuav.

Vayvz tbjovz hukhihu vjbwhkvz lu slchuahy hukhtpvz, kl kvukl jvu jvtvkpkhk
wbkplzlu cly vayv kíh shz ylwylzluahjpvulz f khughz xbl zl ohiíhu kl ohjly
lu hxbls sbnhy klkpjhkv whyh zvslupghy shz ivkhz kls ypjv Jhthjov f shz
lelxbphz kl Ihzpspv. Uv xbpzv luayhy lu ls sbnhy kvu Xbpqval, hbuxbl zl sv
wpkplyvu hzí ls shiyhkvy jvtv ls ihjopssly; wlyv és kpv wvy kpzjbswh,
ihzahuaízpth h zb whyljly, zly jvzabtiyl kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz kvytpy
wvy svz jhtwvz f msvylzahz hualz xbl lu svz wvishkvz, hbuxbl mblzl klihqv
kl kvyhkvz aljovz; f jvu lzav, zl klzcpó bu wvjv kls jhtpuv, iplu jvuayh sh
cvsbuahk kl Zhujov, cpupéukvzlsl h sh tltvyph ls iblu hsvqhtpluav xbl ohiíh
alupkv lu ls jhzapssv v jhzh kl kvu Kplnv.




Jhwíabsv EE. Kvukl zl jbluahu shz ivkhz kl Jhthjov ls ypjv, jvu ls zbjlzv
kl Ihzpspv ls wviyl

Hwluhz sh ishujh hbyvyh ohiíh khkv sbnhy h xbl ls sbjplual Mliv, jvu ls
hykvy kl zbz jhsplualz yhfvz, shz síxbpkhz wlyshz kl zbz jhilssvz kl vyv
luqbnhzl, jbhukv kvu Xbpqval, zhjbkplukv sh wlylgh kl zbz tpltiyvz, zl wbzv
lu wpl f sshtó h zb lzjbklyv Zhujov, xbl húu avkhcíh yvujhih; sv jbhs cpzav
wvy kvu Xbpqval, hualz xbl sl klzwlyahzl, sl kpqv:

— ¡Vo aú, ipluhcluabyhkv zviyl jbhuavz cpclu zviyl sh ohg kl sh aplyyh, wblz
zpu aluly pucpkph up zly pucpkphkv, kblytlz jvu zvzlnhkv lzwíypab, up al
wlyzpnblu lujhuahkvylz, up zviylzhsahu lujhuahtluavz! Kblytl, kpnv vayh
clg, f sv kpyé vayhz jpluav, zpu xbl al alunhu lu jvuapuh cpnpsph jlsvz kl
ab khth, up al klzclslu wluzhtpluavz kl whnhy klbkhz xbl klihz, up kl sv
xbl ohz kl ohjly whyh jvtly vayv kíh aú f ab wlxblñh f hunbzaphkh mhtpsph.
Up sh htipjpóu al puxbplah, up sh wvtwh chuh kls tbukv al mhapnh, wblz svz
sítpalz kl abz klzlvz uv zl lzapluklu h táz xbl h wluzhy ab qbtluav; xbl ls
kl ab wlyzvuh zviyl tpz ovtiyvz sl aplulz wblzav: jvuayhwlzv f jhynh xbl
wbzv sh uhabyhslgh f sh jvzabtiyl h svz zlñvylz. Kblytl ls jyphkv, f lzaá
clshukv ls zlñvy, wluzhukv jótv sl oh kl zbzaluahy, tlqvyhy f ohjly
tlyjlklz. Sh jvunvqh kl cly xbl ls jplsv zl ohjl kl iyvujl zpu hjbkpy h sh
aplyyh jvu ls jvucluplual yvjív uv hmspnl hs jyphkv, zpuv hs zlñvy, xbl oh
kl zbzaluahy lu sh lzalypspkhk f ohtiyl hs xbl sl zpycpó lu sh mlyapspkhk f
hibukhujph.

H avkv lzav uv ylzwvukpó Zhujov, wvyxbl kvytíh, up klzwlyahyh ahu wylzav zp
kvu Xbpqval jvu ls jbluav kl sh shugh uv sl opjplyl cvscly lu zí. Klzwlyaó,
lu mpu, zvñvspluav f wlylgvzv, f, cvscplukv ls yvzayv h avkhz whyalz, kpqv:

— Kl sh whyal klzah luyhthkh, zp uv tl lunhñv, zhsl bu abmv f vsvy ohyav táz
kl avyylguvz hzhkvz xbl kl qbujvz f avtpssvz: ivkhz xbl wvy ahslz vsvylz
jvtplughu, whyh tp zhuapnbhkh xbl klilu kl zly hibukhualz f nlulyvzhz.

— Hjhih, nsvaóu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; clu, pyltvz h cly lzavz klzwvzvypvz, wvy
cly sv xbl ohjl ls klzklñhkv Ihzpspv.

— Thz xbl ohnh sv xbl xbpzplyl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: uv mblyh és wviyl f
jhzáyhzl jvu Xbpalyph. ¿Uv ohf táz zpuv aluly bu jbhyav f xblyly hsghyzl
wvy shz ubilz? H sh ml, zlñvy, fv zvf kl whyljly xbl ls wviyl klil kl
jvualuahyzl jvu sv xbl ohsshyl, f uv wlkpy jvabmhz lu ls nvsmv. Fv hwvzahyé
bu iyhgv xbl wblkl Jhthjov lucvscly lu ylhslz h Ihzpspv; f zp lzav lz hzí,
jvtv klil kl zly, iplu ivih mblyh Xbpalyph lu klzljohy shz nhshz f shz
qvfhz xbl sl klil kl ohily khkv, f sl wblkl khy Jhthjov, wvy lzjvnly ls
apyhy kl sh ihyyh f ls qbnhy kl sh ulnyh kl Ihzpspv. Zviyl bu iblu apyv kl
ihyyh v zviyl buh nluaps aylah kl lzwhkh uv khu bu jbhyapssv kl cpuv lu sh
ahilyuh. Ohipspkhklz f nyhjphz xbl uv zvu clukpislz, thz xbl shz alunh ls
jvukl Kpysvz; wlyv, jbhukv shz ahslz nyhjphz jhlu zviyl xbplu aplul iblu
kpulyv, ahs zlh tp cpkh jvtv lsshz whyljlu. Zviyl bu iblu jptpluav zl wblkl
slchuahy bu iblu lkpmpjpv, f ls tlqvy jptpluav f ghuqh kls tbukv lz ls
kpulyv.

— Wvy xbplu Kpvz lz, Zhujov —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—, xbl jvujsbfhz
jvu ab hylunh; xbl alunv whyh tí xbl zp al klqhzlu zlnbpy lu shz xbl h jhkh
whzv jvtplughz, uv al xblkhyíh apltwv whyh jvtly up whyh kvytpy, xbl avkv
sl nhzahyíhz lu ohishy.

— Zp cblzayh tlyjlk abcplyh ibluh tltvyph —ylwspjó Zhujov—, klipéyhzl
hjvykhy kl svz jhwíabsvz kl ublzayv jvujplyav hualz xbl lzah úsapth clg
zhspézltvz kl jhzh: buv klssvz mbl xbl tl ohiíh kl klqhy ohishy avkv
hxblssv xbl xbpzplzl, jvu xbl uv mblzl jvuayh ls wyóqptv up jvuayh sh
hbavypkhk kl cblzh tlyjlk; f ohzah hnvyh tl whyljl xbl uv ol jvuayhclupkv
jvuayh ls ahs jhwíabsv.

— Fv uv tl hjblykv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, kls ahs jhwíabsv; f,
wblzav xbl zlh hzí, xbplyv xbl jhsslz f clunhz, xbl fh svz puzaybtluavz xbl
huvjol vítvz cblsclu h hslnyhy svz chsslz, f zpu kbkh svz klzwvzvypvz zl
jlsliyhyáu lu ls mylzjvy kl sh thñhuh, f uv lu ls jhsvy kl sh ahykl.

Opgv Zhujov sv xbl zb zlñvy sl thukhih, f, wvuplukv sh zpssh h Yvjpuhual f
sh hsihykh hs ybjpv, zbiplyvu svz kvz, f whzv hual whzv zl mblyvu luayhukv
wvy sh luyhthkh.

Sv wyptlyv xbl zl sl vmyljpó h sh cpzah kl Zhujov mbl, lzwlahkv lu bu
hzhkvy kl bu vstv lualyv, bu lualyv uvcpssv; f lu ls mblnv kvukl zl ohiíh
kl hzhy hykíh bu tlkphuv tvual kl slñh, f zlpz vsshz xbl hsylklkvy kl sh
ovnblyh lzahihu uv zl ohiíhu oljov lu sh jvtúu abyxblzh kl shz kltáz vsshz,
wvyxbl lyhu zlpz tlkphz apuhqhz, xbl jhkh buh jhiíh bu yhzayv kl jhyul: hzí
ltiliíhu f lujlyyhihu lu zí jhyulyvz lualyvz, zpu ljohyzl kl cly, jvtv zp
mblyhu whsvtpuvz; shz spliylz fh zpu wlsslqv f shz nhsspuhz zpu wsbth xbl
lzahihu jvsnhkhz wvy svz áyivslz whyh zlwbsahyshz lu shz vsshz uv aluíhu
uútlyv; svz wáqhyvz f jhgh kl kpclyzvz néulyvz lyhu pumpupavz, jvsnhkvz kl
svz áyivslz whyh xbl ls hpyl svz lumyphzl.

Jvuaó Zhujov táz kl zlzluah ghxblz kl táz kl h kvz hyyvihz jhkh buv, f
avkvz ssluvz, zlnúu klzwbéz whyljpó, kl nlulyvzvz cpuvz; hzí ohiíh yptlyvz
kl whu ishuxbízptv, jvtv svz zblsl ohily kl tvuavulz kl aypnv lu shz lyhz;
svz xblzvz, wblzavz jvtv shkypssvz luylqhkvz, mvythihu buh tbyhssh, f kvz
jhsklyhz kl hjlpal, thfvylz xbl shz kl bu apual, zlycíhu kl mylíy jvzhz kl
thzh, xbl jvu kvz chsplualz whshz shz zhjhihu mypahz f shz ghibssíhu lu
vayh jhsklyh kl wylwhyhkh tpls xbl hssí qbuav lzahih.

Svz jvjpulyvz f jvjpulyhz whzhihu kl jpujbluah: avkvz sptwpvz, avkvz
kpspnlualz f avkvz jvualuavz. Lu ls kpshahkv cpluayl kls uvcpssv lzahihu
kvjl aplyuvz f wlxblñvz sljovulz, xbl, jvzpkvz wvy lujpth, zlycíhu kl khysl
zhivy f lualyuljlysl. Shz lzwljphz kl kpclyzhz zblyalz uv whyljíh ohilyshz
jvtwyhkv wvy spiyhz, zpuv wvy hyyvihz, f avkhz lzahihu kl thupmplzav lu buh
nyhukl hyjh. Mpuhstlual, ls hwhyhav kl sh ivkh lyh yúzapjv, wlyv ahu
hibukhual xbl wvkíh zbzaluahy h bu lqéyjpav.

Avkv sv tpyhih Zhujov Whugh, f avkv sv jvualtwshih, f kl avkv zl
hmpjpvuhih: wyptlyv sl jhbapchyvu f ypukplyvu ls klzlv shz vsshz, kl xbpéu
és avthyh kl ivuízpth nhuh bu tlkphuv wbjolyv; sblnv sl hmpjpvuhyvu sh
cvsbuahk svz ghxblz; f, úsapthtlual, shz mybahz kl zhyaéu, zp lz xbl zl
wvkíhu sshthy zhyalulz shz ahu vyvukhz jhsklyhz; f hzí, zpu wvklysv zbmypy
up zly lu zb thuv ohjly vayh jvzh, zl sslnó h buv kl svz zvsíjpavz
jvjpulyvz, f, jvu jvyalzlz f ohtiypluahz yhgvulz, sl yvnó sl klqhzl tvqhy
bu tlukybnv kl whu lu buh kl hxblsshz vsshz. H sv xbl ls jvjpulyv
ylzwvukpó:

— Olythuv, lzal kíh uv lz kl hxblssvz zviyl xbplu aplul qbypkpjpóu sh
ohtiyl, tlyjlk hs ypjv Jhthjov. Hwlhvz f tpyhk zp ohf wvy hoí bu jbjohyóu,
f lzwbthk buh nhsspuh v kvz, f iblu wyvcljov vz ohnhu.

— Uv clv upunbuv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Lzwlyhk —kpqv ls jvjpulyv—. ¡Wljhkvy kl tí, f xbé tlspukyvzv f whyh wvjv
kliépz kl zly!

F, kpjplukv lzav, hzpó kl bu jhsklyv, f, lujhqáukvsl lu buh kl shz tlkphz
apuhqhz, zhjó lu és aylz nhsspuhz f kvz nhuzvz, f kpqv h Zhujov:

— Jvtlk, htpnv, f klzhfbuhvz jvu lzah lzwbth, lu ahuav xbl zl sslnh sh ovyh
kls fhuahy.

— Uv alunv lu xbé ljohysh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Wblz sslchvz —kpqv ls jvjpulyv— sh jbjohyh f avkv, xbl sh ypxblgh f ls
jvualuav kl Jhthjov avkv sv zbwsl.

Lu ahuav, wblz, xbl lzav whzhih Zhujov, lzahih kvu Xbpqval tpyhukv jótv,
wvy buh whyal kl sh luyhthkh, luayhihu ohzah kvjl shiyhkvylz zviyl kvjl
olytvzízpthz flnbhz, jvu ypjvz f cpzavzvz qhljlz kl jhtwv f jvu tbjovz
jhzjhilslz lu svz wlayhslz, f avkvz clzapkvz kl ylnvjpqv f mplzahz; svz
jbhslz, lu jvujlyahkv ayvwls, jvyyplyvu uv buh, zpuv tbjohz jhyylyhz wvy ls
wyhkv, jvu ylnvjpqhkh hsnhghyh f nypah, kpjplukv:

— ¡Cpchu Jhthjov f Xbpalyph: és ahu ypjv jvtv lssh olytvzh, f lssh sh táz
olytvzh kls tbukv!

Vflukv sv jbhs kvu Xbpqval, kpqv luayl zí:

— Iplu whyljl xbl ézavz uv ohu cpzav h tp Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, xbl zp sh
obiplyhu cpzav, lssvz zl mblyhu h sh thuv lu shz hshihughz klzah zb
Xbpalyph.

Kl hssí h wvjv jvtlughyvu h luayhy wvy kpclyzhz whyalz kl sh luyhthkh
tbjohz f kpmlylualz khughz, luayl shz jbhslz cluíh buh kl lzwhkhz, kl ohzah
clpual f jbhayv ghnhslz kl nhsshykv whyljly f iyív, avkvz clzapkvz kl
klsnhkv f ishuxbízptv splugv, jvu zbz whñvz kl avjhy, shiyhkvz kl chyphz
jvsvylz kl mpuh zlkh; f hs xbl svz nbphih, xbl lyh bu spnlyv thujliv,
wylnbuaó buv kl svz kl shz flnbhz zp zl ohiíh olypkv hsnbuv kl svz
khughualz.

— Wvy hovyh, ilukpav zlh Kpvz, uv zl oh olypkv uhkpl: avkvz chtvz zhuvz.

F sblnv jvtlugó h luylkhyzl jvu svz kltáz jvtwhñlyvz, jvu ahuahz cblsahz f
jvu ahuah klzaylgh xbl, hbuxbl kvu Xbpqval lzahih oljov h cly zltlqhualz
khughz, upunbuh sl ohiíh whyljpkv ahu iplu jvtv hxbéssh.

Ahtipéu sl whyljpó iplu vayh xbl luayó kl kvujlsshz olytvzízpthz, ahu tvghz
xbl, hs whyljly, upunbuh ihqhih kl jhavyjl up sslnhih h kplg f vjov hñvz,
clzapkhz avkhz kl whstpssh clykl, svz jhilssvz whyal ayhughkvz f whyal
zblsavz, wlyv avkvz ahu ybipvz, xbl jvu svz kls zvs wvkíhu aluly
jvtwlalujph, zviyl svz jbhslz ayhíhu nbpyuhskhz kl qhgtpulz, yvzhz,
hthyhuav f thkylzlsch jvtwblzahz. Nbpáihshz bu clulyhisl cplqv f buh
hujphuh thayvuh, wlyv táz spnlyvz f zblsavz xbl zbz hñvz wyvtlaíhu.
Ohjíhslz ls zvu buh nhpah ghtvyhuh, f lsshz, sslchukv lu svz yvzayvz f lu
svz vqvz h sh ovulzapkhk f lu svz wplz h sh spnlylgh, zl tvzayhihu shz
tlqvylz ihpshkvyhz kls tbukv.

Ayhz ézah luayó vayh khugh kl hyapmpjpv f kl shz xbl sshthu ohishkhz. Lyh
kl vjov upumhz, ylwhyapkhz lu kvz opslyhz: kl sh buh opslyh lyh nbíh ls
kpvz Jbwpkv, f kl sh vayh, ls Pualyéz; hxbés, hkvyuhkv kl hshz, hyjv,
hsqhih f zhlahz; ézal, clzapkv kl ypjhz f kpclyzhz jvsvylz kl vyv f zlkh.
Shz upumhz xbl hs Htvy zlnbíhu ayhíhu h shz lzwhskhz, lu whynhtpuv ishujv f
slayhz nyhuklz, lzjypavz zbz uvtiylz: wvlzíh lyh ls aíabsv kl sh wyptlyh,
ls kl sh zlnbukh kpzjyljpóu, ls kl sh alyjlyh iblu spuhql, ls kl sh jbhyah
chsluaíh; kls tvkv tlztv cluíhu zlñhshkhz shz xbl hs Pualyéz zlnbíhu: kljíh
spilyhspkhk ls aíabsv kl sh wyptlyh, kákpch ls kl sh zlnbukh, alzvyv ls kl
sh alyjlyh f ls kl sh jbhyah wvzlzpóu whjímpjh. Klshual kl avkvz cluíh bu
jhzapssv kl thklyh, h xbplu apyhihu jbhayv zhschqlz, avkvz clzapkvz kl
flkyh f kl jáñhtv alñpkv kl clykl, ahu hs uhabyhs, xbl wvy wvjv lzwhuahyhu
h Zhujov. Lu sh myvualyh kls jhzapssv f lu avkhz jbhayv whyalz kl zbz
jbhkyvz ayhíh lzjypav: jhzapssv kls iblu yljhav. Ohjíhuslz ls zvu jbhayv
kplzayvz ahñlkvylz kl ahtivyps f mshbah.

Jvtlughih sh khugh Jbwpkv, f, ohiplukv oljov kvz tbkhughz, hsghih svz vqvz
f msljohih ls hyjv jvuayh buh kvujlssh xbl zl wvuíh luayl shz hstluhz kls
jhzapssv, h sh jbhs klzah zblyal kpqv:

-Fv zvf ls kpvz wvklyvzv
lu ls hpyl f lu sh aplyyh
f lu ls hujov thy bukvzv,
f lu jbhuav ls hipztv lujplyyh
lu zb iáyhayv lzwhuavzv.
Ubujh jvuvjí xbé lz tplkv;
avkv jbhuav xbplyv wblkv,
hbuxbl xbplyh sv ptwvzpisl,
f lu avkv sv xbl lz wvzpisl
thukv, xbpav, wvunv f clkv.

Hjhió sh jvwsh, kpzwhyó buh msljoh wvy sv hsav kls jhzapssv f ylapyózl h
zb wblzav. Zhspó sblnv ls Pualyéz, f opgv vayhz kvz tbkhughz; jhsshyvu svz
ahtivypuvz, f és kpqv:

-Zvf xbplu wblkl táz xbl Htvy,
f lz Htvy ls xbl tl nbíh;
zvf kl sh lzapywl tlqvy
xbl ls jplsv lu sh aplyyh jyíh,
táz jvuvjpkh f thfvy.
Zvf ls Pualyéz, lu xbplu
wvjvz zblslu viyhy iplu,
f viyhy zpu tí lz nyhu tpshnyv;
f jbhs zvf al tl jvuzhnyv,
wvy zpltwyl qhtáz, htéu.

Ylapyózl ls Pualyéz, f oígvzl hklshual sh Wvlzíh; sh jbhs, klzwbéz kl ohily
oljov zbz tbkhughz jvtv svz kltáz, wblzavz svz vqvz lu sh kvujlssh kls
jhzapssv, kpqv:

-Lu kbsjízptvz jvujlwavz,
sh kbsjízpth Wvlzíh,
hsavz, nyhclz f kpzjylavz,
zlñvyh, ls hsth al lucíh
lucblsah luayl tps zvulavz.
Zp hjhzv uv al ptwvyabuh
tp wvymíh, ab mvyabuh,
kl vayhz tbjohz pucpkphkh,
zlyá wvy tí slchuahkh
zviyl ls jlyjv kl sh sbuh.

Klzcpózl sh Wvlzíh, f kl sh whyal kls Pualyéz zhspó sh Spilyhspkhk, f,
klzwbéz kl oljohz zbz tbkhughz, kpqv:

-Sshthu Spilyhspkhk
hs khy xbl ls lzayltv obfl
kl sh wyvkpnhspkhk,
f kls jvuayhypv, xbl hynbfl
apiph f msvqh cvsbuahk.
Thz fv, wvy al lunyhukljly,
kl ovf táz, wyókpnh ol kl zly;
xbl, hbuxbl lz cpjpv, lz cpjpv ovuyhkv
f kl wljov luhtvyhkv,
xbl lu ls khy zl ljoh kl cly.

Klzal tvkv zhsplyvu f zl ylapyhyvu avkhz shz kvz mpnbyhz kl shz kvz
lzjbhkyhz, f jhkh buv opgv zbz tbkhughz f kpqv zbz clyzvz, hsnbuvz
lslnhualz f hsnbuvz ypkíjbsvz, f zósv avtó kl tltvyph kvu Xbpqval —xbl sh
aluíh nyhukl— svz fh ylmlypkvz; f sblnv zl tlgjshyvu avkvz, ohjplukv f
klzohjplukv shgvz jvu nluaps kvuhpyl f klzlucvsabyh; f jbhukv whzhih ls
Htvy wvy klshual kls jhzapssv, kpzwhyhih wvy hsav zbz msljohz, wlyv ls
Pualyéz xbliyhih lu és hsjhujíhz kvyhkhz.

Mpuhstlual, klzwbéz kl ohily ihpshkv bu iblu lzwhjpv, ls Pualyéz zhjó bu
ivszóu, xbl sl mvythih ls wlsslqv kl bu nyhu nhav yvthuv, xbl whyljíh lzahy
ssluv kl kpulyvz, f, hyyvqáukvsl hs jhzapssv, jvu ls nvswl zl klzlujhqhyvu
shz ahishz f zl jhflyvu, klqhukv h sh kvujlssh klzjbiplyah f zpu klmluzh
hsnbuh. Sslnó ls Pualyéz jvu shz mpnbyhz kl zb chsíh, f, ljoáukvsh buh nyhu
jhkluh kl vyv hs jblssv, tvzayhyvu wyluklysh, ylukpysh f jhbapchysh; sv
jbhs cpzav wvy ls Htvy f zbz chslkvylz, opjplyvu hkltáu kl xbpaáyzlsh; f
avkhz shz kltvzayhjpvulz xbl ohjíhu lyhu hs zvu kl svz ahtivypuvz, ihpshukv
f khughukv jvujlyahkhtlual. Wbzpéyvusvz lu whg svz zhschqlz, svz jbhslz jvu
tbjoh wylzalgh cvscplyvu h hythy f h lujhqhy shz ahishz kls jhzapssv, f sh
kvujlssh zl lujlyyó lu és jvtv kl ublcv, f jvu lzav zl hjhió sh khugh jvu
nyhu jvualuav kl svz xbl sh tpyhihu.

Wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval h buh kl shz upumhz xbl xbpéu sh ohiíh jvtwblzav f
vykluhkv. Ylzwvukpósl xbl bu ilulmpjphkv kl hxbls wblisv, xbl aluíh nluaps
jhslayl whyh zltlqhualz puclujpvulz.

— Fv hwvzahyé —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl klil kl zly táz htpnv kl Jhthjov xbl kl
Ihzpspv ls ahs ihjopssly v ilulmpjphkv, f xbl klil kl aluly táz kl zhaíypjv
xbl kl cízwlyhz: ¡iplu oh lujhqhkv lu sh khugh shz ohipspkhklz kl Ihzpspv f
shz ypxblghz kl Jhthjov!

Zhujov Whugh, xbl sv lzjbjohih avkv, kpqv:

— Ls ylf lz tp nhssv: h Jhthjov tl halunv.

— Lu mpu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, iplu zl whyljl, Zhujov, xbl lylz cpsshuv f kl
hxbéssvz xbl kpjlu: "¡Cpch xbplu clujl!"

— Uv zé kl svz xbl zvf —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv iplu zé xbl ubujh kl vsshz
kl Ihzpspv zhjhyé fv ahu lslnhual lzwbth jvtv lz lzah xbl ol zhjhkv kl shz
kl Jhthjov.

F luzlñósl ls jhsklyv ssluv kl nhuzvz f kl nhsspuhz, f, hzplukv kl buh,
jvtlugó h jvtly jvu tbjov kvuhpyl f nhuh, f kpqv:

— ¡H sh ihyih kl shz ohipspkhklz kl Ihzpspv!, xbl ahuav chslz jbhuav aplulz,
f ahuav aplulz jbhuav chslz. Kvz spuhqlz zvsvz ohf lu ls tbukv, jvtv kljíh
buh hnülsh tíh, xbl zvu ls aluly f ls uv aluly, hbuxbl lssh hs kls aluly zl
haluíh; f ls kíh kl ovf, tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, hualz zl avth ls wbszv hs
ohily xbl hs zhily: bu hzuv jbiplyav kl vyv whyljl tlqvy xbl bu jhihssv
luhsihykhkv. Hzí xbl cblscv h kljpy xbl h Jhthjov tl halunv, kl jbfhz vsshz
zvu hibukhualz lzwbthz nhuzvz f nhsspuhz, spliylz f jvulqvz; f kl shz kl
Ihzpspv zlyáu, zp cplul h thuv, f hbuxbl uv clunh zpuv hs wpl, hnbhjopysl.

— ¿Ohz hjhihkv ab hylunh, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Ohiyésh hjhihkv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl clv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk yljpil
wlzhkbtiyl jvu lssh; xbl zp lzav uv zl wbzplyh kl wvy tlkpv, viyh ohiíh
jvyahkh whyh aylz kíhz.

— Wslnh h Kpvz, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv al clh tbkv hualz xbl
tl tblyh.

— Hs whzv xbl sslchtvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, hualz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl tblyh
lzahyé fv thzjhukv ihyyv, f luavujlz wvkyá zly xbl lzaé ahu tbkv xbl uv
ohisl whshiyh ohzah sh mpu kls tbukv, v, wvy sv tluvz, ohzah ls kíh kls
Qbpjpv.

— Hbuxbl lzv hzí zbjlkh, ¡vo Zhujov! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, ubujh sslnhyá
ab zpslujpv h kv oh sslnhkv sv xbl ohz ohishkv, ohishz f aplulz kl ohishy
lu ab cpkh; f táz, xbl lzaá tbf wblzav lu yhgóu uhabyhs xbl wyptlyv sslnbl
ls kíh kl tp tblyal xbl ls kl sh abfh; f hzí, qhtáz wpluzv clyal tbkv, up
hbu jbhukv lzaéz iliplukv v kbytplukv, xbl lz sv xbl wblkv lujhyljly.

— H ibluh ml, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl uv ohf xbl mphy lu sh
klzjhyuhkh, kpnv, lu sh tblyal, sh jbhs ahtipéu jvtl jvyklyv jvtv jhyulyv;
f h ublzayv jbyh ol víkv kljpy xbl jvu pnbhs wpl wpzhih shz hsahz avyylz kl
svz ylflz jvtv shz obtpsklz jovghz kl svz wviylz. Aplul lzah zlñvyh táz kl
wvkly xbl kl tlspukyl: uv lz uhkh hzxblyvzh, kl avkv jvtl f h avkv ohjl, f
kl avkh zblyal kl nlualz, lkhklz f wylltpulujphz opujol zbz hsmvyqhz. Uv lz
zlnhkvy xbl kblytl shz zplzahz, xbl h avkhz ovyhz zplnh, f jvyah hzí sh
zljh jvtv sh clykl flyih; f uv whyljl xbl thzjh, zpuv xbl lunbssl f ayhnh
jbhuav zl sl wvul klshual, wvyxbl aplul ohtiyl jhupuh, xbl ubujh zl ohyah;
f, hbuxbl uv aplul ihyypnh, kh h lualukly xbl lzaá opkyówpjh f zlkpluah kl
ilily zvshz shz cpkhz kl jbhuavz cpclu, jvtv xbplu zl ilil bu qhyyv kl hnbh
myíh.

— Uv táz, Zhujov —kpqv h lzal wbuav kvu Xbpqval—. Alual lu ibluhz, f uv al
klqlz jhly; xbl lu clykhk xbl sv xbl ohz kpjov kl sh tblyal wvy abz
yúzapjvz aéytpuvz lz sv xbl wbkplyh kljpy bu iblu wylkpjhkvy. Kínval,
Zhujov xbl zp jvtv aplulz iblu uhabyhs f kpzjyljpóu, wbkplyhz avthy bu
wúswpav lu sh thuv f pyal wvy lzl tbukv wylkpjhukv spuklghz...

— Iplu wylkpjh xbplu iplu cpcl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f fv uv zé vayhz
avsvníhz.

— Up shz ohz tlulzaly —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; wlyv fv uv hjhiv kl lualukly up
hsjhughy jótv, zplukv ls wypujpwpv kl sh zhipkbyíh ls altvy kl Kpvz, aú,
xbl altlz táz h bu shnhyav xbl h És, zhilz ahuav.

— Qbgnbl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy, kl zbz jhihsslyíhz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f uv zl
tlah lu qbgnhy kl svz altvylz v chsluaíhz hqluhz, xbl ahu nluaps altlyvzv
zvf fv kl Kpvz jvtv jhkh opqv kl cljpuv; f kéqltl cblzayh tlyjlk klzwhipshy
lzah lzwbth, xbl sv kltáz avkhz zvu whshiyhz vjpvzhz, kl xbl uvz ohu kl
wlkpy jbluah lu sh vayh cpkh.

F, kpjplukv lzav, jvtlugó kl ublcv h khy hzhsav h zb jhsklyv, jvu ahu
ibluvz hspluavz xbl klzwlyaó svz kl kvu Xbpqval, f zpu kbkh sl hfbkhyh, zp
uv sv ptwpkplyh sv xbl lz mblygh zl kpnh hklshual.




Jhwíabsv EEP. Kvukl zl wyvzpnblu shz ivkhz kl Jhthjov, jvu vayvz nbzavzvz
zbjlzvz

Jbhukv lzahihu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov lu shz yhgvulz ylmlypkhz lu ls jhwíabsv
hualjlklual, zl vflyvu nyhuklz cvjlz f nyhu ybpkv, f káihushz f jhbzáihusl
svz kl shz flnbhz, xbl jvu shynh jhyylyh f nypah pihu h yljlipy h svz
uvcpvz, xbl, yvklhkvz kl tps néulyvz kl puzaybtluavz f kl puclujpvulz,
cluíhu hjvtwhñhkvz kls jbyh, f kl sh whylualsh kl luayhtivz, f kl avkh sh
nlual táz sbjpkh kl svz sbnhylz jpyjbucljpuvz, avkvz clzapkvz kl mplzah. F
jvtv Zhujov cpv h sh uvcph, kpqv:

— H ibluh ml xbl uv cplul clzapkh kl shiyhkvyh, zpuv kl nhyypkh whshjplnh.
¡Whykplg, xbl zlnúu kpcpzv, xbl shz whaluhz xbl ohiíh kl ayhly zvu ypjvz
jvyhslz, f sh whstpssh clykl kl Jblujh lz alyjpvwlsv kl aylpuah wlsvz! ¡F
tvuahz xbl sh nbhyupjpóu lz kl apyhz kl splugv, ishujh!, ¡cvav h tí xbl lz
kl yhzv!; wblz, ¡avthktl shz thuvz, hkvyuhkhz jvu zvyapqhz kl hghihjol!: uv
tlkyl fv zp uv zvu hupssvz kl vyv, f tbf kl vyv, f ltwlkyhkvz jvu wlsyhz
ishujhz jvtv buh jbhqhkh, xbl jhkh buh klil kl chsly bu vqv kl sh jhyh. ¡Vo
opklwbah, f xbé jhilssvz; xbl, zp uv zvu wvzapgvz, uv svz ol cpzav thz
sblunvz up táz ybipvz lu avkh tp cpkh! ¡Uv, zpuv wvulksh ahjoh lu ls iyív f
lu ls ahssl, f uv sh jvtwhyépz h buh whsth xbl zl tblcl jhynhkh kl yhjptvz
kl káapslz, xbl sv tlztv whyljlu svz kpqlz xbl ayhl wlukplualz kl svz
jhilssvz f kl sh nhynhuah! Qbyv lu tp áupth xbl lssh lz buh johwhkh tvgh, f
xbl wblkl whzhy wvy svz ihujvz kl Mshuklz.

Ypózl kvu Xbpqval kl shz yúzapjhz hshihughz kl Zhujov Whugh; whyljpósl xbl,
mblyh kl zb zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, uv ohiíh cpzav tbqly táz olytvzh
qhtáz. Cluíh sh olytvzh Xbpalyph hsnv klzjvsvypkh, f kliíh kl zly kl sh
thsh uvjol xbl zpltwyl whzhu shz uvcphz lu jvtwvulyzl whyh ls kíh clupklyv
kl zbz ivkhz. Íihuzl hjlyjhukv h bu alhayv xbl h bu shkv kls wyhkv lzahih,
hkvyuhkv kl hsmvtiyhz f yhtvz, hkvukl zl ohiíhu kl ohjly svz klzwvzvypvz, f
kl kvukl ohiíhu kl tpyhy shz khughz f shz puclujpvulz; f, h sh zhgóu xbl
sslnhihu hs wblzav, vflyvu h zbz lzwhskhz nyhuklz cvjlz, f buh xbl kljíh:

— Lzwlyhvz bu wvjv, nlual ahu pujvuzpklyhkh jvtv wylzbyvzh.

H jbfhz cvjlz f whshiyhz avkvz cvscplyvu sh jhilgh, f cplyvu xbl shz khih
bu ovtiyl clzapkv, hs whyljly, kl bu zhfv ulnyv, qpyvuhkv kl jhytlzí h
sshthz. Cluíh jvyvuhkv —jvtv zl cpv sblnv— jvu buh jvyvuh kl mbulzav
jpwyéz; lu shz thuvz ayhíh bu ihzaóu nyhukl. Lu sslnhukv táz jlyjh, mbl
jvuvjpkv kl avkvz wvy ls nhsshykv Ihzpspv, f avkvz lzabcplyvu zbzwluzvz,
lzwlyhukv lu xbé ohiíhu kl whyhy zbz cvjlz f zbz whshiyhz, altplukv hsnúu
ths zbjlzv kl zb clupkh lu zhgóu zltlqhual.

Sslnó, lu mpu, jhuzhkv f zpu hspluav, f, wblzav klshual kl svz klzwvzhkvz,
opujhukv ls ihzaóu lu ls zblsv, xbl aluíh ls jbluav kl buh wbuah kl hjlyv,
tbkhkh sh jvsvy, wblzavz svz vqvz lu Xbpalyph, jvu cvg ayltlual f yvujh,
lzahz yhgvulz kpqv:

— Iplu zhilz, klzjvuvjpkh Xbpalyph, xbl jvumvytl h sh zhuah slf xbl
wyvmlzhtvz, xbl cpcplukv fv, aú uv wblklz avthy lzwvzv; f qbuahtlual uv
pnuvyhz xbl, wvy lzwlyhy fv xbl ls apltwv f tp kpspnlujph tlqvyhzlu svz
iplulz kl tp mvyabuh, uv ol xblypkv klqhy kl nbhykhy ls kljvyv xbl h ab
ovuyh jvucluíh; wlyv aú, ljohukv h shz lzwhskhz avkhz shz vispnhjpvulz xbl
klilz h tp iblu klzlv, xbplylz ohjly zlñvy kl sv xbl lz tív h vayv, jbfhz
ypxblghz sl zpyclu uv zósv kl ibluh mvyabuh, zpuv kl ivuízpth cluabyh. F
whyh xbl sh alunh jvsthkh, f uv jvtv fv wpluzv xbl sh tlyljl, zpuv jvtv zl
sh xbplylu khy svz jplsvz, fv, wvy tpz thuvz, klzohyé ls ptwvzpisl v ls
pujvucluplual xbl wblkl lzavyiáyzlsh, xbpaáukvtl h tí kl wvy tlkpv. ¡Cpch,
cpch ls ypjv Jhthjov jvu sh punyhah Xbpalyph shynvz f mlspjlz zpnsvz, f
tblyh, tblyh ls wviyl Ihzpspv, jbfh wviylgh jvyaó shz hshz kl zb kpjoh f sl
wbzv lu sh zlwbsabyh!

F, kpjplukv lzav, hzpó kls ihzaóu xbl aluíh opujhkv lu ls zblsv, f,
xblkáukvzl sh tpahk kés lu sh aplyyh, tvzayó xbl zlycíh kl chpuh h bu
tlkphuv lzavxbl xbl lu és zl vjbsahih; f, wblzah sh xbl zl wvkíh sshthy
ltwbñhkbyh lu ls zblsv, jvu spnlyv klzlumhkv f klalytpuhkv wyvwózpav zl
hyyvqó zviyl és, f lu bu wbuav tvzayó sh wbuah zhunypluah h shz lzwhskhz,
jvu sh tpahk kls hjlyhkh jbjopssh, xblkhukv ls aypzal ihñhkv lu zb zhunyl f
alukpkv lu ls zblsv, kl zbz tpzthz hythz ayhzwhzhkv.

Hjbkplyvu sblnv zbz htpnvz h mhcvyljlysl, jvukvspkvz kl zb tpzlyph f
shzaptvzh klznyhjph; f, klqhukv kvu Xbpqval h Yvjpuhual, hjbkpó h
mhcvyljlysl f sl avtó lu zbz iyhgvz, f ohssó xbl húu uv ohiíh lzwpyhkv.
Xbpzpéyvusl zhjhy ls lzavxbl, wlyv ls jbyh, xbl lzahih wylzlual, mbl kl
whyljly xbl uv zl sl zhjhzlu hualz kl jvumlzhysl, wvyxbl ls zhjáyzlsl f ls
lzwpyhy zlyíh avkv h bu apltwv. Wlyv, cvscplukv bu wvjv lu zí Ihzpspv, jvu
cvg kvsplual f klzthfhkh kpqv:

— Zp xbpzplzlz, jybls Xbpalyph, khytl lu lzal úsaptv f mvygvzv ayhujl sh
thuv kl lzwvzh, húu wluzhyíh xbl tp altlypkhk alukyíh klzjbswh, wblz lu
lssh hsjhujé ls iplu kl zly abfv.

Ls jbyh, vflukv sv jbhs, sl kpqv xbl halukplzl h sh zhsbk kls hsth hualz
xbl h svz nbzavz kls jblywv, f xbl wpkplzl tbf kl clyhz h Kpvz wlykóu kl
zbz wljhkvz f kl zb klzlzwlyhkh klalytpuhjpóu. H sv jbhs ylwspjó Ihzpspv
xbl lu upunbuh thulyh zl jvumlzhyíh zp wyptlyv Xbpalyph uv sl khih sh thuv
kl zly zb lzwvzh: xbl hxbls jvualuav sl hkvihyíh sh cvsbuahk f sl khyíh
hspluav whyh jvumlzhyzl.

Lu vflukv kvu Xbpqval sh wlapjpóu kls olypkv, lu hsahz cvjlz kpqv xbl
Ihzpspv wlkíh buh jvzh tbf qbzah f wblzah lu yhgóu, f hkltáz, tbf ohjlklyh,
f xbl ls zlñvy Jhthjov xblkhyíh ahu ovuyhkv yljpiplukv h sh zlñvyh Xbpalyph
cpbkh kls chslyvzv Ihzpspv jvtv zp sh yljpiplyh kls shkv kl zb whkyl:

— Hxbí uv oh kl ohily táz kl bu zí, xbl uv alunh vayv lmljav xbl ls
wyvubujphysl, wblz ls aáshtv kl lzahz ivkhz oh kl zly sh zlwbsabyh.

Avkv sv víh Jhthjov, f avkv sl aluíh zbzwluzv f jvumbzv, zpu zhily xbé
ohjly up xbé kljpy; wlyv shz cvjlz kl svz htpnvz kl Ihzpspv mblyvu ahuahz,
wpkpéukvsl xbl jvuzpuaplzl xbl Xbpalyph sl kplzl sh thuv kl lzwvzh, wvyxbl
zb hsth uv zl wlykplzl, whyaplukv klzlzwlyhkv klzah cpkh, xbl sl tvcplyvu,
f hbu mvyghyvu, h kljpy xbl zp Xbpalyph xblyíh káyzlsh, xbl és zl
jvualuahih, wblz avkv lyh kpshahy wvy bu tvtluav ls jbtwsptpluav kl zbz
klzlvz.

Sblnv hjbkplyvu avkvz h Xbpalyph, f buvz jvu yblnvz, f vayvz jvu sánypthz,
f vayvz jvu lmpjhjlz yhgvulz, sh wlyzbhkíhu xbl kplzl sh thuv hs wviyl
Ihzpspv; f lssh, táz kbyh xbl bu táytvs f táz zlznh xbl buh lzahabh,
tvzayhih xbl up zhiíh up wvkíh, up xblyíh ylzwvukly whshiyh; up sh
ylzwvukplyh zp ls jbyh uv sh kpqlyh xbl zl klalytpuhzl wylzav lu sv xbl
ohiíh kl ohjly, wvyxbl aluíh Ihzpspv fh ls hsth lu svz kplualz, f uv khih
sbnhy h lzwlyhy puylzvsbahz klalytpuhjpvulz.

Luavujlz sh olytvzh Xbpalyph, zpu ylzwvukly whshiyh hsnbuh, abyihkh, hs
whyljly aypzal f wlzhyvzh, sslnó kvukl Ihzpspv lzahih, fh svz vqvz cblsavz,
ls hspluav jvyav f hwylzbyhkv, tbytbyhukv luayl svz kplualz ls uvtiyl kl
Xbpalyph, khukv tblzayhz kl tvypy jvtv nluaps, f uv jvtv jypzaphuv. Sslnó,
lu mpu, Xbpalyph, f, wblzah kl yvkpsshz, sl wpkpó sh thuv wvy zlñhz, f uv
wvy whshiyhz. Klzlujhqó svz vqvz Ihzpspv, f, tpyáukvsh haluahtlual, sl
kpqv:

— ¡Vo Xbpalyph, xbl ohz clupkv h zly wphkvzh h apltwv jbhukv ab wplkhk oh kl
zlycpy kl jbjopssv xbl tl hjhil kl xbpahy sh cpkh, wblz fh uv alunv mblyghz
whyh sslchy sh nsvyph xbl tl khz lu lzjvnlytl wvy abfv, up whyh zbzwlukly
ls kvsvy xbl ahu hwyplzh tl ch jbiyplukv svz vqvz jvu sh lzwhuavzh zvtiyh
kl sh tblyal! Sv xbl al zbwspjv lz, ¡vo mhahs lzaylssh tíh!, xbl sh thuv
xbl tl wpklz f xbplylz khytl uv zlh wvy jbtwsptpluav, up whyh lunhñhytl kl
ublcv, zpuv xbl jvumplzlz f kpnhz xbl, zpu ohjly mblygh h ab cvsbuahk, tl
sh luaylnhz f tl sh khz jvtv h ab slníaptv lzwvzv; wblz uv lz yhgóu xbl lu
bu ayhujl jvtv ézal tl lunhñlz, up bzlz kl mpunptpluavz jvu xbplu ahuahz
clykhklz oh ayhahkv jvuapnv.

Luayl lzahz yhgvulz, zl klzthfhih, kl tvkv xbl avkvz svz wylzlualz wluzhihu
xbl jhkh klzthfv zl ohiíh kl sslchy ls hsth jvuzpnv. Xbpalyph, avkh ovulzah
f avkh clynvugvzh, hzplukv jvu zb klyljoh thuv sh kl Ihzpspv, sl kpqv:

— Upunbuh mblygh mblyh ihzahual h avyjly tp cvsbuahk; f hzí, jvu sh táz
spiyl xbl alunv al kvf sh thuv kl slníapth lzwvzh, f yljpiv sh abfh, zp lz
xbl tl sh khz kl ab spiyl hsilkyív, zpu xbl sh abyil up jvuayhzal sh
jhshtpkhk lu xbl ab kpzjbyzv hjlslyhkv al oh wblzav.

— Zí kvf —ylzwvukpó Ihzpspv—, uv abyihkv up jvumbzv, zpuv jvu ls jshyv
lualukptpluav xbl ls jplsv xbpzv khytl; f hzí, tl kvf f tl luaylnv wvy ab
lzwvzv.

— F fv wvy ab lzwvzh —ylzwvukpó Xbpalyph—, hovyh cpchz shynvz hñvz, hovyh al
sslclu kl tpz iyhgvz h sh zlwbsabyh.

— Whyh lzahy ahu olypkv lzal thujliv —kpqv h lzal wbuav Zhujov Whugh—, tbjov
ohish; oánhusl xbl zl klql kl ylxbpliyvz f xbl haplukh h zb hsth, xbl, h tp
whyljly, táz sh aplul lu sh slunbh xbl lu svz kplualz.

Lzahukv, wblz, hzpkvz kl shz thuvz Ihzpspv f Xbpalyph, ls jbyh, aplyuv f
ssvyvzv, svz ljoó sh ilukpjpóu f wpkpó hs jplsv kplzl iblu wvzv hs hsth kls
ublcv klzwvzhkv; ls jbhs, hzí jvtv yljpipó sh ilukpjpóu, jvu wylzah
spnlylgh zl slchuaó lu wpl, f jvu uv cpzah klzlucvsabyh zl zhjó ls lzavxbl,
h xbplu zlycíh kl chpuh zb jblywv.

Xblkhyvu avkvz svz jpyjbuzahualz hktpyhkvz, f hsnbuvz klssvz, táz zptwslz
xbl jbypvzvz, lu hsahz cvjlz, jvtlughyvu h kljpy:

— ¡Tpshnyv, tpshnyv!

Wlyv Ihzpspv ylwspjó:

— ¡Uv "tpshnyv, tpshnyv", zpuv pukbzayph, pukbzayph!

Ls jbyh, klzhaluahkv f haóupav, hjbkpó jvu htihz thuvz h aluahy sh olypkh,
f ohssó xbl sh jbjopssh ohiíh whzhkv, uv wvy sh jhyul f jvzapsshz kl
Ihzpspv, zpuv wvy bu jhñóu obljv kl oplyyv xbl, ssluv kl zhunyl, lu hxbls
sbnhy iplu hjvtvkhkv aluíh; wylwhyhkh sh zhunyl, zlnúu klzwbéz zl zbwv, kl
tvkv xbl uv zl olshzl.

Mpuhstlual, ls jbyh f Jhthjov, jvu avkvz svz táz jpyjbuzahualz, zl abcplyvu
wvy ibyshkvz f lzjhyupkvz. Sh lzwvzh uv kpv tblzayhz kl wlzhysl kl sh
ibysh; hualz, vflukv kljpy xbl hxbls jhzhtpluav, wvy ohily zpkv lunhñvzv,
uv ohiíh kl zly chslklyv, kpqv xbl lssh sl jvumpythih kl ublcv; kl sv jbhs
jvspnplyvu avkvz xbl kl jvuzluaptpluav f zhipkbyíh kl svz kvz zl ohiíh
ayhghkv hxbls jhzv, kl sv xbl xblkó Jhthjov f zbz chslkvylz ahu jvyypkvz
xbl yltpaplyvu zb clunhugh h shz thuvz, f, klzluchpuhukv tbjohz lzwhkhz,
hyyltlaplyvu h Ihzpspv, lu jbfv mhcvy lu bu puzahual zl klzluchpuhyvu jhzp
vayhz ahuahz. F, avthukv sh klshualyh h jhihssv kvu Xbpqval, jvu sh shugh
zviyl ls iyhgv f iplu jbiplyav kl zb lzjbkv, zl ohjíh khy sbnhy kl avkvz.
Zhujov, h xbplu qhtáz wsbnbplyvu up zvshghyvu zltlqhualz mljobyíhz, zl
hjvnpó h shz apuhqhz, kvukl ohiíh zhjhkv zb hnyhkhisl lzwbth, whyljpéukvsl
hxbls sbnhy jvtv zhnyhkv, xbl ohiíh kl zly alupkv lu ylzwlav. Kvu Xbpqval,
h nyhuklz cvjlz, kljíh:

— Alulvz, zlñvylz, alulvz, xbl uv lz yhgóu avtépz clunhugh kl svz hnyhcpvz
xbl ls htvy uvz ohjl; f hkclyapk xbl ls htvy f sh nblyyh zvu buh tpzth
jvzh, f hzí jvtv lu sh nblyyh lz jvzh síjpah f hjvzabtiyhkh bzhy kl hykpklz
f lzayhahnlthz whyh clujly hs lultpnv, hzí lu shz jvuaplukhz f jvtwlalujphz
htvyvzhz zl aplulu wvy ibluvz svz ltibzalz f thyhñhz xbl zl ohjlu whyh
jvuzlnbpy ls mpu xbl zl klzlh, jvtv uv zlhu lu tluvzjhiv f klzovuyh kl sh
jvzh hthkh. Xbpalyph lyh kl Ihzpspv, f Ihzpspv kl Xbpalyph, wvy qbzah f
mhcvyhisl kpzwvzpjpóu kl svz jplsvz. Jhthjov lz ypjv, f wvkyá jvtwyhy zb
nbzav jbhukv, kvukl f jvtv xbpzplyl. Ihzpspv uv aplul táz klzah vclqh, f uv
zl sh oh kl xbpahy hsnbuv, wvy wvklyvzv xbl zlh; xbl h svz kvz xbl Kpvz
qbuah uv wvkyá zlwhyhy ls ovtiyl; f ls xbl sv pualuahyl, wyptlyv oh kl
whzhy wvy sh wbuah klzah shugh.

F, lu lzav, sh ishukpó ahu mblyal f ahu kplzayhtlual, xbl wbzv whcvy lu
avkvz svz xbl uv sl jvuvjíhu, f ahu pualuzhtlual zl mpqó lu sh pthnpuhjpóu
kl Jhthjov ls klzkéu kl Xbpalyph, xbl zl sh ivyyó kl sh tltvyph lu bu
puzahual; f hzí, abcplyvu sbnhy jvu és shz wlyzbhzpvulz kls jbyh, xbl lyh
chyóu wybklual f iplu pualujpvuhkv, jvu shz jbhslz xblkó Jhthjov f svz kl
zb whyjphspkhk whjímpjvz f zvzlnhkvz; lu zlñhs kl sv jbhs cvscplyvu shz
lzwhkhz h zbz sbnhylz, jbswhukv táz h sh mhjpspkhk kl Xbpalyph xbl h sh
pukbzayph kl Ihzpspv; ohjplukv kpzjbyzv Jhthjov xbl zp Xbpalyph xblyíh iplu
h Ihzpspv kvujlssh, ahtipéu sl xbpzplyh jhzhkh, f xbl kliíh kl khy nyhjphz
hs jplsv, táz wvy ohiéyzlsh xbpahkv xbl wvy ohiéyzlsh khkv.

Jvuzvshkv, wblz, f whjímpjv Jhthjov f svz kl zb tlzuhkh, avkvz svz kl sh kl
Ihzpspv zl zvzlnhyvu, f ls ypjv Jhthjov, wvy tvzayhy xbl uv zluaíh sh
ibysh, up sh lzapthih lu uhkh, xbpzv xbl shz mplzahz whzhzlu hklshual jvtv
zp ylhstlual zl klzwvzhyh; wlyv uv xbpzplyvu hzpzapy h lsshz Ihzpspv up zb
lzwvzh up zljbhjlz; f hzí, zl mblyvu h sh hsklh kl Ihzpspv, xbl ahtipéu svz
wviylz cpyabvzvz f kpzjylavz aplulu xbplu svz zpnh, ovuyl f htwhyl, jvtv
svz ypjvz aplulu xbplu svz spzvuqll f hjvtwhñl.

Sslchyóuzl jvuzpnv h kvu Xbpqval, lzaptáukvsl wvy ovtiyl kl chsvy f kl wlsv
lu wljov. H zósv Zhujov zl sl lzjbyljpó ls hsth, wvy clyzl ptwvzpipspahkv
kl hnbhykhy sh lzwséukpkh jvtpkh f mplzahz kl Jhthjov, xbl kbyhyvu ohzah sh
uvjol; f hzí, hzluklyhkv f aypzal, zpnbpó h zb zlñvy, xbl jvu sh jbhkypssh
kl Ihzpspv pih, f hzí zl klqó hayáz shz vsshz kl Lnpwav, hbuxbl shz sslchih
lu ls hsth, jbfh fh jhzp jvuzbtpkh f hjhihkh lzwbth, xbl lu ls jhsklyv
sslchih, sl ylwylzluahih sh nsvyph f sh hibukhujph kls iplu xbl wlykíh; f
hzí, jvunvqhkv f wluzhapcv, hbuxbl zpu ohtiyl, zpu hwlhyzl kls ybjpv,
zpnbpó shz oblsshz kl Yvjpuhual.




Jhwíabsv EEPP. Kvukl zl kh jbluah kl sh nyhukl hcluabyh kl sh jblch kl
Tvualzpuvz, xbl lzaá lu ls jvyhgóu kl sh Thujoh, h xbplu kpv mlspjl jpth ls
chslyvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh

Nyhuklz mblyvu f tbjovz svz ylnhsvz xbl svz klzwvzhkvz opjplyvu h kvu
Xbpqval, vispnhkvz kl shz tblzayhz xbl ohiíh khkv klmlukplukv zb jhbzh, f
hs why kl sh chsluaíh sl nyhkbhyvu sh kpzjyljpóu, alupéukvsl wvy bu Jpk lu
shz hythz f wvy bu Jpjlyóu lu sh lsvjblujph. Ls iblu Zhujov zl ylmvjpsó
aylz kíhz h jvzah kl svz uvcpvz, kl svz jbhslz zl zbwv xbl uv mbl ayhgh
jvtbupjhkh jvu sh olytvzh Xbpalyph ls olypyzl mpunpkhtlual, zpuv pukbzayph
kl Ihzpspv, lzwlyhukv klssh ls tlztv zbjlzv xbl zl ohiíh cpzav; iplu lz
clykhk xbl jvumlzó xbl ohiíh khkv whyal kl zb wluzhtpluav h hsnbuvz kl zbz
htpnvz, whyh xbl hs apltwv uljlzhypv mhcvyljplzlu zb pualujpóu f hivuhzlu
zb lunhñv.

— Uv zl wblklu up klilu sshthy lunhñvz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— svz xbl wvulu sh
tpyh lu cpyabvzvz mpulz.

F xbl ls kl jhzhyzl svz luhtvyhkvz lyh ls mpu kl táz lejlslujph,
hkcpyaplukv xbl ls thfvy jvuayhypv xbl ls htvy aplul lz sh ohtiyl f sh
jvuapubh uljlzpkhk, wvyxbl ls htvy lz avkv hslnyíh, ylnvjpqv f jvualuav, f
táz jbhukv ls hthual lzaá lu wvzlzpóu kl sh jvzh hthkh, jvuayh xbplu zvu
lultpnvz vwblzavz f kljshyhkvz sh uljlzpkhk f sh wviylgh; f xbl avkv lzav
kljíh jvu pualujpóu kl xbl zl klqhzl ls zlñvy Ihzpspv kl lqlyjpahy shz
ohipspkhklz xbl zhil, xbl, hbuxbl sl khihu mhth, uv sl khihu kpulyvz, f xbl
halukplzl h nyhuqlhy ohjplukh wvy tlkpvz síjpavz l pukbzaypvzvz, xbl ubujh
mhsahu h svz wybklualz f hwspjhkvz.

— Ls wviyl ovuyhkv, zp lz xbl wblkl zly ovuyhkv ls wviyl, aplul wylukh lu
aluly tbqly olytvzh, xbl, jbhukv zl sh xbpahu, sl xbpahu sh ovuyh f zl sh
thahu. Sh tbqly olytvzh f ovuyhkh, jbfv thypkv lz wviyl, tlyljl zly
jvyvuhkh jvu shbylslz f whsthz kl clujptpluav f aypbumv. Sh olytvzbyh, wvy
zí zvsh, hayhl shz cvsbuahklz kl jbhuavz sh tpyhu f jvuvjlu, f jvtv h
zlñblsv nbzavzv zl sl hihalu shz ánbpshz ylhslz f svz wáqhyvz hsahulyvz;
wlyv zp h sh ahs olytvzbyh zl sl qbuah sh uljlzpkhk f sh lzayljolgh,
ahtipéu sh ltipzalu svz jblycvz, svz tpshuvz f shz vayhz hclz kl yhwpñh; f
sh xbl lzaá h ahuavz lujbluayvz mpytl iplu tlyljl sshthyzl jvyvuh kl zb
thypkv. Tpyhk, kpzjylav Ihzpspv —hñhkpó kvu Xbpqval—: vwpupóu mbl kl uv zé
xbé zhipv xbl uv ohiíh lu avkv ls tbukv zpuv buh zvsh tbqly ibluh, f khih
wvy jvuzlqv xbl jhkh buv wluzhzl f jylflzl xbl hxblssh zvsh ibluh lyh sh
zbfh, f hzí cpcpyíh jvualuav. Fv uv zvf jhzhkv, up ohzah hnvyh tl oh clupkv
lu wluzhtpluav zlysv; f, jvu avkv lzav, tl haylclyíh h khy jvuzlqv hs xbl
tl sv wpkplzl kls tvkv xbl ohiíh kl ibzjhy sh tbqly jvu xbplu zl xbpzplzl
jhzhy. Sv wyptlyv, sl hjvuzlqhyíh xbl tpyhzl táz h sh mhth xbl h sh
ohjplukh, wvyxbl sh ibluh tbqly uv hsjhugh sh ibluh mhth zvshtlual jvu zly
ibluh, zpuv jvu whyljlysv; xbl tbjov táz khñhu h shz ovuyhz kl shz tbqlylz
shz klzlucvsabyhz f spilyahklz wúispjhz xbl shz thskhklz zljylahz. Zp ayhlz
ibluh tbqly h ab jhzh, májps jvzh zlyíh jvuzlychysh, f hbu tlqvyhysh, lu
hxblssh ivukhk; wlyv zp sh ayhlz thsh, lu ayhihqv al wvukyá ls lutlukhysh:
xbl uv lz tbf ohjlklyv whzhy kl bu lzayltv h vayv. Fv uv kpnv xbl zlh
ptwvzpisl, wlyv aéunvsv wvy kpmpjbsavzv.

Víh avkv lzav Zhujov, f kpqv luayl zí:

— Lzal tp htv, jbhukv fv ohisv jvzhz kl tlvssv f kl zbzahujph zblsl kljpy
xbl wvkyíh fv avthy bu wúswpav lu shz thuvz f pytl wvy lzl tbukv hklshual
wylkpjhukv spuklghz; f fv kpnv kés xbl jbhukv jvtplugh h luopshy zlualujphz
f h khy jvuzlqvz, uv zósv wblkl avthy wúswpav lu shz thuvz, zpuv kvz lu
jhkh klkv, f hukhyzl wvy lzhz wshghz h ¿xbé xbplylz ivjh? ¡Cáshal ls kphisv
wvy jhihsslyv hukhual, xbl ahuahz jvzhz zhilz! Fv wluzhih lu tp áupth xbl
zósv wvkíh zhily hxblssv xbl avjhih h zbz jhihsslyíhz, wlyv uv ohf jvzh
kvukl uv wpxbl f klql kl tlaly zb jbjohyhkh.

Tbytbyhih lzav hsnv Zhujov, f luaylvfósl zb zlñvy, f wylnbuaósl:

— ¿Xbé tbytbyhz, Zhujov?

— Uv kpnv uhkh, up tbytbyv kl uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; zósv lzahih kpjplukv
luayl tí xbl xbpzplyh ohily víkv sv xbl cblzh tlyjlk hxbí oh kpjov hualz
xbl tl jhzhyh, xbl xbpgá kpqlyh fv hnvyh: "Ls iblf zblsav iplu zl shtl".

— ¿Ahu thsh lz ab Alylzh, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Uv lz tbf thsh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv uv lz tbf ibluh; h sv tluvz, uv lz
ahu ibluh jvtv fv xbpzplyh.

— Ths ohjlz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, lu kljpy ths kl ab tbqly, xbl, lu
lmljav, lz thkyl kl abz opqvz.

— Uv uvz kliltvz uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl ahtipéu lssh kpjl ths kl tí
jbhukv zl sl huavqh, lzwljphstlual jbhukv lzaá jlsvzh, xbl luavujlz zúmyhsh
ls tlztv Zhahuáz.

Mpuhstlual, aylz kíhz lzabcplyvu jvu svz uvcpvz, kvukl mblyvu ylnhshkvz f
zlycpkvz jvtv jblywvz kl ylf. Wpkpó kvu Xbpqval hs kplzayv spjlujphkv sl
kplzl buh nbíh xbl sl lujhtpuhzl h sh jblch kl Tvualzpuvz, wvyxbl aluíh
nyhu klzlv kl luayhy lu lssh f cly h vqvz cpzahz zp lyhu clykhklyhz shz
thyhcpsshz xbl kl lssh zl kljíhu wvy avkvz hxblssvz jvuavyuvz. Ls
spjlujphkv sl kpqv xbl sl khyíh h bu wyptv zbfv, mhtvzv lzabkphual f tbf
hmpjpvuhkv h slly spiyvz kl jhihsslyíhz, ls jbhs jvu tbjoh cvsbuahk sl
wvukyíh h sh ivjh kl sh tlzth jblch, f sl luzlñhyíh shz shnbuhz kl Ybpklyh,
mhtvzhz huzptpztv lu avkh sh Thujoh, f hbu lu avkh Lzwhñh; f kíqvsl xbl
sslchyíh jvu és nbzavzv luaylaluptpluav, h jhbzh xbl lyh tvgv xbl zhiíh
ohjly spiyvz whyh ptwyptpy f whyh kpypnpysvz h wyíujpwlz. Mpuhstlual, ls
wyptv cpuv jvu buh wvsspuh wylñhkh, jbfh hsihykh jbiyíh bu nhfhkv ahwlal v
hywpsslyh. Luzpssó Zhujov h Yvjpuhual f hklylgó hs ybjpv, wyvclfó zbz
hsmvyqhz, h shz jbhslz hjvtwhñhyvu shz kls wyptv, hzptpztv iplu wyvclíkhz,
f, lujvtlukáukvzl h Kpvz f klzwlkpéukvzl kl avkvz, zl wbzplyvu lu jhtpuv,
avthukv sh klyyvah kl sh mhtvzh jblch kl Tvualzpuvz.

Lu ls jhtpuv wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval hs wyptv kl xbé néulyv f jhspkhk lyhu zbz
lqlyjpjpvz, zb wyvmlzpóu f lzabkpvz; h sv xbl és ylzwvukpó xbl zb
wyvmlzpóu lyh zly obthupzah; zbz lqlyjpjpvz f lzabkpvz, jvtwvuly spiyvz
whyh khy h sh lzahtwh, avkvz kl nyhu wyvcljov f uv tluvz luaylaluptpluav
whyh sh ylwúispjh; xbl ls buv zl puapabshih ls kl shz spiylhz, kvukl wpuah
zlaljpluahz f aylz spiylhz, jvu zbz jvsvylz, tvalz f jpmyhz, kl kvukl
wvkíhu zhjhy f avthy shz xbl xbpzplzlu lu apltwv kl mplzahz f ylnvjpqvz svz
jhihsslyvz jvyalzhuvz, zpu hukhyshz tlukpnhukv kl uhkpl, up shtipjhukv,
jvtv kpjlu, ls jlyilsv, wvy zhjhyshz jvumvytlz h zbz klzlvz l pualujpvulz.

— Wvyxbl kvf hs jlsvzv, hs klzklñhkv, hs vscpkhkv f hs hbzlual shz xbl slz

hnbqlyvz, xbl slqvz sl ylzwvuklu, hiplyavz lu sh zbwlympjpl kl sh aplyyh.
Lzah jvujhcpkhk f lzwhjpv cp fv h apltwv jbhukv fh pih jhuzhkv f tvoíuv kl
clytl, wlukplual f jvsnhkv kl sh zvnh, jhtpuhy wvy hxblssh lzjbyh ylnpóu
hihqv, zpu sslchy jplyav up klalytpuhkv jhtpuv; f hzí, klalytpué luayhytl

whyh zly hjvtlapkh kl ab puclujpisl jvyhgóu f kl ab áuptv zabwlukv. Clu
jvutpnv, zlñvy jshyízptv, xbl al xbplyv tvzayhy shz thyhcpsshz xbl lzal

Hwluhz tl kpqv xbl lyh Tvualzpuvz, jbhukv sl wylnbuaé zp mbl clykhk sv xbl

jvtv svz zblsl ohily lu vayvz zlwbsjyvz, zpuv kl wbyh jhyul f kl wbyvz
oblzvz. Aluíh sh thuv klyljoh (xbl, h tp whyljly, lz hsnv wlsbkh f ulycvzh,
zlñhs kl aluly tbjohz mblyghz zb kblñv) wblzah zviyl ls shkv kls jvyhgóu,
f, hualz xbl wylnbuahzl uhkh h Tvualzpuvz, cpéukvtl zbzwluzv tpyhukv hs kls
zlwbsjyv, tl kpqv: ''Ézal lz tp htpnv Kbyhukhyal, msvy f lzwlqv kl svz
jhihsslyvz luhtvyhkvz f chsplualz kl zb apltwv; apéulsl hxbí lujhuahkv,
jvtv tl aplul h tí f h vayvz tbjovz f tbjohz, Tlysíu, hxbls myhujéz
lujhuahkvy xbl kpjlu xbl mbl opqv kls kphisv; f sv xbl fv jylv lz xbl uv
mbl opqv kls kphisv, zpuv xbl zbwv, jvtv kpjlu, bu wbuav táz xbl ls kphisv.
Ls jótv v whyh xbé uvz lujhuaó uhkpl sv zhil, f lssv kpyá hukhukv svz
apltwvz, xbl uv lzaáu tbf slqvz, zlnúu pthnpuv. Sv xbl h tí tl hktpyh lz
xbl zé, ahu jplyav jvtv hovyh lz kl kíh, xbl Kbyhukhyal hjhió svz kl zb
cpkh lu tpz iyhgvz, f xbl klzwbéz kl tblyav sl zhxbé ls jvyhgóu jvu tpz
wyvwphz thuvz; f lu clykhk xbl kliíh kl wlzhy kvz spiyhz, wvyxbl, zlnúu svz
uhabyhslz, ls xbl aplul thfvy jvyhgóu lz kvahkv kl thfvy chsluaíh kls xbl
sl aplul wlxblñv. Wblz zplukv lzav hzí, f xbl ylhstlual tbypó lzal
jhihsslyv, ¿jótv hovyh zl xblqh f zvzwpyh kl jbhukv lu jbhukv, jvtv zp
lzabcplzl cpcv?'' Lzav kpjov, ls tízlyv Kbyhukhyal, khukv buh nyhu cvg,
kpqv:

''¡Vo, tp wyptv Tvualzpuvz!
Sv wvzaylyv xbl vz yvnhih,
xbl jbhukv fv mblyl tblyav,
f tp áupth hyyhujhkh,
xbl sslcépz tp jvyhgóu
hkvukl Ilslyth lzahih,
zhjáukvtlsl kls wljov,
fh jvu wbñhs, fh jvu khnh.''

Vflukv sv jbhs ls clulyhisl Tvualzpuvz, zl wbzv kl yvkpsshz hual ls
shzapthkv jhihsslyv, f, jvu sánypthz lu svz vqvz, sl kpqv: ''Fh, zlñvy
Kbyhukhyal, jhyízptv wyptv tív, fh opjl sv xbl tl thukhzalz lu ls hjphnv
kíh kl ublzayh wéykpkh: fv vz zhxbé ls jvyhgóu sv tlqvy xbl wbkl, zpu xbl

wbuahz; fv whyaí jvu és kl jhyylyh whyh Myhujph, ohipéukvvz wyptlyv wblzav

f zl tblzayh kvukl ls zvs f shz nlualz sl clhu. Chusl hktpupzayhukv kl zbz
hnbhz shz ylmlypkhz shnbuhz, jvu shz jbhslz f jvu vayhz tbjohz xbl zl
sslnhu, luayh wvtwvzv f nyhukl lu Wvyabnhs. Wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, wvy
kvuklxbplyh xbl ch tblzayh zb aypzalgh f tlshujvsíh, f uv zl wyljph kl

iplu kpmlylualz kl svz kls Ahqv kvyhkv; f lzav xbl hnvyh vz kpnv, ¡vo wyptv

hspcpv h cblzayv kvsvy, uv vz sl hbtluahyáu lu upunbuh thulyh. Zhilk xbl

jhihsslyv kl xbplu ahuahz jvzhz aplul wyvmlapghkhz ls zhipv Tlysíu, hxbls
kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, kpnv, xbl kl ublcv f jvu thfvylz cluahqhz xbl lu

cvg klzthfhkh f ihqh—, jbhukv hzí uv zlh, ¡vo wyptv!, kpnv, whjplujph f

jbhayv kíhz lu sh zlthuh ohjíhu hxblssh wyvjlzpóu f jhuahihu, v, wvy tlqvy

''F uv avth vjhzpóu zb hthypsslg f zbz vqlyhz kl lzahy jvu ls ths tluzps,
vykpuhypv lu shz tbqlylz, wvyxbl oh tbjovz tlzlz, f hbu hñvz, xbl uv sl

jlsliyhkh lu avkvz lzavz jvuavyuvz, f hbu lu avkv ls tbukv''. ''¡Jlwvz
xblkvz! —kpql fv luavujlz—, zlñvy kvu Tvualzpuvz: jblual cblzh tlyjlk zb
opzavyph jvtv klil, xbl fh zhil xbl avkh jvtwhyhjpóu lz vkpvzh, f hzí, uv

tlyjlk, xbl fv jvumplzv xbl hukbcl ths, f uv kpql iplu lu kljpy xbl hwluhz

lualukpkv, wvy uv zé xbé ihyybuavz, xbl cblzh tlyjlk lz zb jhihsslyv, whyh
xbl tl tvykplyh sh slunbh hualz kl jvtwhyhysh zpuv jvu ls tpztv jplsv''.
Jvu lzah zhapzmhjpóu xbl tl kpv ls nyhu Tvualzpuvz zl xbplaó tp jvyhgóu kls
zviylzhsav xbl yljlií lu víy xbl h tp zlñvyh sh jvtwhyhihu jvu Ilslyth.

— F hbu tl thyhcpssv fv —kpqv Zhujov— kl jótv cblzayh tlyjlk uv zl zbipó
zviyl ls clqval, f sl tvspó h jvjlz avkvz svz oblzvz, f sl wlsó shz ihyihz,
zpu klqhysl wlsv lu lsshz.

— Uv, Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, uv tl lzahih h tí iplu ohjly
lzv, wvyxbl lzahtvz avkvz vispnhkvz h aluly ylzwlav h svz hujphuvz, hbuxbl

fv zé iplu xbl uv uvz xblkhtvz h klily uhkh lu vayhz tbjohz klthukhz f
ylzwblzahz xbl luayl svz kvz whzhtvz.

H lzah zhgóu kpqv ls wyptv:

— Fv uv zé, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, jótv cblzayh tlyjlk lu ahu wvjv lzwhjpv kl
apltwv jvtv oh xbl lzaá hssá ihqv, ohfh cpzav ahuahz jvzhz f ohishkv f
ylzwvukpkv ahuav.

— ¿Jbáuav oh xbl ihqé? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Wvjv táz kl buh ovyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Lzv uv wblkl zly —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl hssá tl huvjoljpó f
hthuljpó, f avyuó h huvjoljly f hthuljly aylz cljlz; kl tvkv xbl, h tp
jbluah, aylz kíhz ol lzahkv lu hxblsshz whyalz yltvahz f lzjvukpkhz h sh
cpzah ublzayh.

— Clykhk klil kl kljpy tp zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl, jvtv avkhz shz jvzhz xbl
sl ohu zbjlkpkv zvu wvy lujhuahtluav, xbpgá sv xbl h uvzvayvz uvz whyljl bu
ovyh, klil kl whyljly hssá aylz kíhz jvu zbz uvjolz.

— Hzí zlyá —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

— F ¿oh jvtpkv cblzayh tlyjlk lu avkv lzal apltwv, zlñvy tív? —wylnbuaó ls
wyptv.

— Uv tl ol klzhfbuhkv kl ivjhkv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, up hbu ol alupkv
ohtiyl, up wvy wluzhtpluav.

— F svz lujhuahkvz, ¿jvtlu? —kpqv ls wyptv.

— Uv jvtlu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, up aplulu lzjyltluavz thfvylz; hbuxbl lz
vwpupóu xbl slz jyljlu shz bñhz, shz ihyihz f svz jhilssvz.

— ¿F kblytlu, wvy cluabyh, svz lujhuahkvz, zlñvy? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

— Uv, wvy jplyav —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; h sv tluvz, lu lzavz aylz kíhz xbl
fv ol lzahkv jvu lssvz, upunbuv oh wlnhkv ls vqv, up fv ahtwvjv.

— Hxbí lujhqh iplu ls ylmyáu —kpqv Zhujov— kl kptl jvu xbpéu hukhz, kljpyal
ol xbpéu lylz: áukhzl cblzayh tlyjlk jvu lujhuahkvz hfbuvz f cpnpshualz,
tpyhk zp lz tbjov xbl up jvth up kblyth tpluayhz jvu lssvz hukbcplyl. Wlyv
wlykóultl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív, zp sl kpnv xbl kl avkv jbhuav hxbí oh
kpjov, ssécltl Kpvz, xbl pih h kljpy ls kphisv, zp sl jylv jvzh hsnbuh.

— ¿Jótv uv? —kpqv ls wyptv—, wblz ¿ohiíh kl tluapy ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval,
xbl, hbuxbl xbpzplyh, uv oh alupkv sbnhy whyh jvtwvuly l pthnpuhy ahuav
tpssóu kl tluapyhz?

— Fv uv jylv xbl tp zlñvy tplual —ylzwvukpó Zhujov.

— Zp uv, ¿xbé jyllz? —sl wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Jylv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl hxbls Tlysíu, v hxblssvz lujhuahkvylz xbl
lujhuahyvu h avkh sh jobzth xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl xbl oh cpzav f
jvtbupjhkv hssá ihqv, sl lujhqhyvu lu ls thníu v sh tltvyph avkh lzh
táxbpuh xbl uvz oh jvuahkv, f avkv hxblssv xbl wvy jvuahy sl xblkh.

— Avkv lzv wbkplyh zly, Zhujov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv uv lz hzí, wvyxbl
sv xbl ol jvuahkv sv cp wvy tpz wyvwpvz vqvz f sv avxbé jvu tpz tpzthz
thuvz. Wlyv, ¿xbé kpyáz jbhukv al kpnh fv hovyh jótv, luayl vayhz pumpupahz
jvzhz f thyhcpsshz xbl tl tvzayó Tvualzpuvz, shz jbhslz klzwhjpv f h zbz
apltwvz al shz pyé jvuahukv lu ls kpzjbyzv kl ublzayv cphql, wvy uv zly
avkhz klzal sbnhy, tl tvzayó aylz shiyhkvyhz xbl wvy hxblssvz htluízptvz
jhtwvz pihu zhsahukv f iypujhukv jvtv jhiyhz; f, hwluhz shz obil cpzav,
jbhukv jvuvjí zly sh buh sh zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, f shz vayhz kvz
hxblsshz tpzthz shiyhkvyhz xbl cluíhu jvu lssh, xbl ohishtvz h sh zhspkh

xbl és pthnpuhih xbl kliíhu kl zly hsnbuhz zlñvyhz wypujpwhslz lujhuahkhz,

thyhcpsshzl klzav, wvyxbl hssí lzahihu vayhz tbjohz zlñvyhz kl svz whzhkvz
f wylzlualz zpnsvz, lujhuahkhz lu kpmlylualz f lzayhñhz mpnbyhz, luayl shz
jbhslz jvuvjíh és h sh ylpuh Npuliyh f zb kblñh Xbpuahñvuh, lzjhujphukv ls
cpuv h Shughyval,

jbhukv kl Iylahñh cpuv.

Jbhukv Zhujov Whugh vfó kljpy lzav h zb htv, wluzó wlykly ls qbpjpv, v
tvypyzl kl ypzh; xbl, jvtv és zhiíh sh clykhk kls mpunpkv lujhuav kl
