alzaptvupv, hjhió kl jvuvjly pukbipahisltlual xbl zb zlñvy lzahih mblyh kl
qbpjpv f svjv kl avkv wbuav; f hzí, sl kpqv:

— Lu thsh jvfbuabyh f lu wlvy zhgóu f lu hjphnv kíh ihqó cblzayh tlyjlk,
jhyv whayóu tív, hs vayv tbukv, f lu ths wbuav zl lujvuayó jvu ls zlñvy
Tvualzpuvz, xbl ahs uvz sl oh cblsav. Iplu zl lzahih cblzayh tlyjlk hjá
hyypih jvu zb lualyv qbpjpv, ahs jbhs Kpvz zl sl ohiíh khkv, ohishukv
zlualujphz f khukv jvuzlqvz h jhkh whzv, f uv hnvyh, jvuahukv svz thfvylz
kpzwhyhalz xbl wblklu pthnpuhyzl.

— Jvtv al jvuvgjv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, uv ohnv jhzv kl abz
whshiyhz.

— Up fv ahtwvjv kl shz kl cblzayh tlyjlk —ylwspjó Zhujov—, zpxbplyh tl
oplyh, zpxbplyh tl thal wvy shz xbl sl ol kpjov, v wvy shz xbl sl wpluzv
kljpy zp lu shz zbfhz uv zl jvyypnl f lutplukh. Wlyv kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk,
hovyh xbl lzahtvz lu whg: ¿jótv v lu xbé jvuvjpó h sh zlñvyh ublzayh hth? F
zp sh ohisó, ¿xbé kpqv, f xbé sl ylzwvukpó?

— Jvuvjísh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— lu xbl ayhl svz tlztvz clzapkvz xbl ayhíh
jbhukv aú tl sl tvzayhzal. Ohisésh, wlyv uv tl ylzwvukpó whshiyh; hualz, tl
cvscpó shz lzwhskhz, f zl mbl obflukv jvu ahuah wyplzh, xbl uv sh hsjhughyh
buh qhyh. Xbpzl zlnbpysh, f sv opjplyh, zp uv tl hjvuzlqhyh Tvualzpuvz xbl
uv tl jhuzhzl lu lssv, wvyxbl zlyíh lu ihskl, f táz wvyxbl zl sslnhih sh
ovyh kvukl tl jvucluíh cvscly h zhspy kl sh zpth. Kíqvtl hzptlztv xbl,
hukhukv ls apltwv, zl tl khyíh hcpzv jótv ohiíhu kl zly klzlujhuahkvz és, f
Ilslyth f Kbyhukhyal, jvu avkvz svz xbl hssí lzahihu; wlyv sv xbl táz wluh
tl kpv, kl shz xbl hssí cp f uvaé, mbl xbl, lzaáukvtl kpjplukv Tvualzpuvz
lzahz yhgvulz, zl sslnó h tí wvy bu shkv, zpu xbl fv sh cplzl clupy, buh kl
shz kvz jvtwhñlyhz kl sh zpu cluabyh Kbsjpulh, f, ssluvz svz vqvz kl
sánypthz, jvu abyihkh f ihqh cvg, tl kpqv: ''Tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv
ilzh h cblzayh tlyjlk shz thuvz, f zbwspjh h cblzayh tlyjlk zl sh ohnh kl
ohjlysh zhily jótv lzaá; f xbl, wvy lzahy lu buh nyhu uljlzpkhk, hzptpztv
zbwspjh h cblzayh tlyjlk, jbhu lujhyljpkhtlual wblkl, zlh zlycpkv kl
wylzahysl zviyl lzal mhsklssíu xbl hxbí ayhpnv, kl jvavuíh, ublcv, tlkph
kvjluh kl ylhslz, v svz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk abcplyl, xbl lssh kh zb whshiyh
kl cvscéyzlsvz jvu tbjoh iylclkhk''. Zbzwlukpótl f hktpyótl ls ahs yljhkv,
f, cvscpéukvtl hs zlñvy Tvualzpuvz, sl wylnbuaé: ''¿Lz wvzpisl, zlñvy
Tvualzpuvz, xbl svz lujhuahkvz wypujpwhslz whkljlu uljlzpkhk?'' H sv xbl és
tl ylzwvukpó: ''Jyéhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, xbl
ézah xbl sshthu uljlzpkhk hkvuklxbplyh zl bzh, f wvy avkv zl lzaplukl, f h
avkvz hsjhugh, f hbu ohzah svz lujhuahkvz uv wlykvuh; f, wblz sh zlñvyh
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv lucíh h wlkpy lzvz zlpz ylhslz, f sh wylukh lz ibluh,
zlnúu whyljl, uv ohf zpuv káyzlsvz; xbl, zpu kbkh, klil kl lzahy wblzah lu
hsnúu nyhukl hwyplav''. ''Wylukh, uv sh avthyé fv —sl ylzwvukí—, up tluvz
sl khyé sv xbl wpkl, wvyxbl uv alunv zpuv zvsvz jbhayv ylhslz''; svz jbhslz
sl kp (xbl mblyvu svz xbl aú, Zhujov, tl kpzal ls vayv kíh whyh khy sptvzuh
h svz wviylz xbl avwhzl wvy svz jhtpuvz), f sl kpql: ''Kljpk, htpnh tíh, h
cblzh zlñvyh xbl h tí tl wlzh lu ls hsth kl zbz ayhihqvz, f xbl xbpzplyh
zly bu Mújhy whyh yltlkphysvz; f xbl sl ohnv zhily xbl fv uv wblkv up kliv
aluly zhsbk jhyljplukv kl zb hnyhkhisl cpzah f kpzjylah jvuclyzhjpóu, f xbl
sl zbwspjv, jbhu lujhyljpkhtlual wblkv, zlh zlycpkh zb tlyjlk kl klqhyzl
cly f ayhahy klzal zb jhbapcv zlycpkvy f hzluklylhkv jhihsslyv. Kpyépzsl
ahtipéu xbl, jbhukv tluvz zl sv wpluzl, vpyá kljpy jvtv fv ol oljov bu
qbyhtluav f cvav, h tvkv kl hxbls xbl opgv ls thyxbéz kl Thuabh, kl clunhy
h zb zviypuv Ihskvcpuvz, jbhukv sl ohssó whyh lzwpyhy lu tpahk kl sh
tvuapñh, xbl mbl kl uv jvtly whu h thualslz, jvu shz vayhz ghyhukhqhz xbl
hssí hñhkpó, ohzah clunhysl; f hzí sl ohyé fv kl uv zvzlnhy, f kl hukhy shz
zplal whyapkhz kls tbukv, jvu táz wbuabhspkhk xbl shz hukbcv ls pumhual kvu
Wlkyv kl Wvyabnhs, ohzah klzlujhuahysh''. ''Avkv lzv, f táz, klil cblzayh
tlyjlk h tp zlñvyh'', tl ylzwvukpó sh kvujlssh. F, avthukv svz jbhayv
ylhslz, lu sbnhy kl ohjlytl buh ylclylujph, opgv buh jhiypvsh, xbl zl
slchuaó kvz chyhz kl tlkpy lu ls hpyl.

— ¡Vo zhuav Kpvz! —kpqv h lzal apltwv khukv buh nyhu cvg Zhujov—. ¿Lz
wvzpisl xbl ahs ohf lu ls tbukv, f xbl alunhu lu és ahuah mblygh svz

chjplkhklz xbl sl aplulu tlunbhkv f klzjhihshkv ls zluapkv!

— Jvtv tl xbplylz iplu, Zhujov, ohishz klzh thulyh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; f,
jvtv uv lzaáz lewlyptluahkv lu shz jvzhz kls tbukv, avkhz shz jvzhz xbl

Jhwíabsv EEPC. Kvukl zl jbluahu tps ghyhukhqhz ahu ptwlyapulualz jvtv

''Uv tl wblkv khy h lualukly, up tl wblkv wlyzbhkpy, xbl hs chslyvzv kvu
Xbpqval sl whzhzl wbuabhstlual avkv sv xbl lu ls hualjlklual jhwíabsv xblkh
lzjypav: sh yhgóu lz xbl avkhz shz hcluabyhz ohzah hxbí zbjlkpkhz ohu zpkv

F sblnv wyvzpnbl, kpjplukv:

xbl ohiíh hukhkv haylcpkpssv jvu zb zlñvy, h xbplu sl kpqv:

— Fv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, kvf wvy iplu ltwslhkízpth sh qvyuhkh

— ¿Aplul wvy cluabyh nhsspuhz ls ahs lytpahñv? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

Kvu Xbpqval sl kpqv:

— Iblu ovtiyl, klalulvz, xbl whyljl xbl chpz jvu táz kpspnlujph xbl lzl

— Uv tl wblkv klaluly, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó ls ovtiyl—, wvyxbl shz hythz xbl

F kl ahs thulyh hnbpqó ls thjov, xbl uv abcv sbnhy kvu Xbpqval kl

Oígvzl hzí, zbiplyvu h jhihssv, f zpnbplyvu avkvz aylz ls klyljov jhtpuv kl

— Zp fv sh abcplyh kl hnbh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvgvz ohf lu ls jhtpuv,

Jvu lzav, klqhyvu sh lytpah f wpjhyvu ohjph sh cluah; f h wvjv ayljov

jbás lyh sh tlqvy tblyal; ylzwvukpó xbl sh ptwluzhkh, sh kl ylwlual f uv
wylcpzah; f, hbuxbl ylzwvukpó jvtv nluaps f hqluv kls jvuvjptpluav kls
clykhklyv Kpvz, jvu avkv lzv, kpqv iplu, whyh hovyyhyzl kls zluaptpluav
obthuv; xbl, wblzav jhzv xbl vz thalu lu sh wyptlyh mhjjpóu f ylmyplnh, v
fh kl bu apyv kl hyapsslyíh, v cvshkv kl buh tpuh, ¿xbé ptwvyah? Avkv lz
tvypy, f hjhiózl sh viyh; f, zlnúu Alylujpv, táz iplu whyljl ls zvskhkv
tblyav lu sh ihahssh xbl cpcv f zhscv lu sh obpkh; f ahuav hsjhugh kl mhth
ls iblu zvskhkv jbhuav aplul kl vilkplujph h zbz jhwpahulz f h svz xbl
thukhysl wblklu. F hkclyapk, opqv, xbl hs zvskhkv tlqvy sl lzaá ls vsly h
wóscvyh xbl hsnhsph, f xbl zp sh clqlg vz jvnl lu lzal ovuyvzv lqlyjpjpv,
hbuxbl zlh ssluv kl olypkhz f lzayvwlhkv v jvqv, h sv tluvz uv vz wvkyá
jvnly zpu ovuyh, f ahs, xbl uv vz sh wvkyá tluvzjhihy sh wviylgh; jbhuav
táz, xbl fh zl ch khukv vyklu jótv zl luaylalunhu f yltlkplu svz zvskhkvz
cplqvz f lzayvwlhkvz, wvyxbl uv lz iplu xbl zl ohnh jvu lssvz sv xbl zblslu
ohjly svz xbl hovyyhu f khu spilyahk h zbz ulnyvz jbhukv fh zvu cplqvz f uv
wblklu zlycpy, f, ljoáukvsvz kl jhzh jvu aíabsv kl spiylz, svz ohjlu
lzjshcvz kl sh ohtiyl, kl xbplu uv wpluzhu hovyyhyzl zpuv jvu sh tblyal. F
wvy hovyh uv vz xbplyv kljpy táz, zpuv xbl zbiápz h shz hujhz klzal tp
jhihssv ohzah sh cluah, f hssí jluhyépz jvutpnv, f wvy sh thñhuh zlnbpyépz
ls jhtpuv, xbl vz sl ké Kpvz ahu ibluv jvtv cblzayvz klzlvz tlyljlu.

Ls whql uv hjlwaó ls jvucpal kl shz hujhz, hbuxbl zí ls kl jluhy jvu és lu
sh cluah; f, h lzah zhgóu, kpjlu xbl kpqv Zhujov luayl zí:

— ¡Cáshal Kpvz wvy zlñvy! F ¿lz wvzpisl xbl ovtiyl xbl zhil kljpy ahslz,
ahuahz f ahu ibluhz jvzhz jvtv hxbí oh kpjov, kpnh xbl oh cpzav svz
kpzwhyhalz ptwvzpislz xbl jbluah kl sh jblch kl Tvualzpuvz? Hovyh iplu,
lssv kpyá.

F lu lzav, sslnhyvu h sh cluah, h apltwv xbl huvjoljíh, f uv zpu nbzav kl
Zhujov, wvy cly xbl zb zlñvy sh qbgnó wvy clykhklyh cluah, f uv wvy
jhzapssv, jvtv zvsíh. Uv obiplyvu iplu luayhkv, jbhukv kvu Xbpqval wylnbuaó
hs clualyv wvy ls ovtiyl kl shz shughz f hshihykhz; ls jbhs sl ylzwvukpó
xbl lu sh jhihsslypgh lzahih hjvtvkhukv ls thjov. Sv tpztv opjplyvu kl zbz
qbtluavz ls wyptv f Zhujov, khukv h Yvjpuhual ls tlqvy wlzliyl f ls tlqvy
sbnhy kl sh jhihsslypgh.




Jhwíabsv EEC. Kvukl zl hwbuah sh hcluabyh kls ylibguv f sh nyhjpvzh kls
apalylyv, jvu shz tltvyhislz hkpcpuhughz kls tvuv hkpcpuv

Uv zl sl jvjíh ls whu h kvu Xbpqval, jvtv zblsl kljpyzl, ohzah víy f zhily
shz thyhcpsshz wyvtlapkhz kls ovtiyl jvukbavy kl shz hythz. Mblsl h ibzjhy
kvukl ls clualyv sl ohiíh kpjov xbl lzahih, f ohssósl, f kíqvsl xbl lu avkv
jhzv sl kpqlzl sblnv sv xbl sl ohiíh kl kljpy klzwbéz, hjlyjh kl sv xbl sl
ohiíh wylnbuahkv lu ls jhtpuv. Ls ovtiyl sl ylzwvukpó:

— Táz klzwhjpv, f uv lu wpl, zl oh kl avthy ls jbluav kl tpz thyhcpsshz:
kéqltl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy ibluv, hjhihy kl khy yljhkv h tp ilzaph, xbl
fv sl kpyé jvzhz xbl sl hktpylu.

— Uv xblkl wvy lzv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv vz hfbkhyé h avkv.

F hzí sv opgv, holjoáukvsl sh jlihkh f sptwphukv ls wlzliyl, obtpskhk xbl
vispnó hs ovtiyl h jvuahysl jvu ibluh cvsbuahk sv xbl sl wlkíh; f,
zluaáukvzl lu bu wvfv f kvu Xbpqval qbuav h és, aluplukv wvy zluhkv f
hbkpavypv hs wyptv, hs whql, h Zhujov Whugh f hs clualyv, jvtlugó h kljpy
klzah thulyh:

— «Zhiyáu cblzhz tlyjlklz xbl lu bu sbnhy xbl lzaá jbhayv slnbhz f tlkph
klzah cluah zbjlkpó xbl h bu ylnpkvy kés, wvy pukbzayph f lunhñv kl buh
tbjohjoh jyphkh zbfh, f lzav lz shynv kl jvuahy, sl mhsaó bu hzuv, f,
hbuxbl ls ahs ylnpkvy opgv shz kpspnlujphz wvzpislz wvy ohsshysl, uv mbl
wvzpisl. Xbpujl kíhz zlyíhu whzhkvz, zlnúu lz wúispjh cvg f mhth,— xbl ls
hzuv mhsahih, jbhukv, lzahukv lu sh wshgh ls ylnpkvy wlykpkvzv, vayv
ylnpkvy kls tpztv wblisv sl kpqv: ''Khktl hsiypjphz, jvtwhkyl, xbl cblzayv
qbtluav oh whyljpkv''. ''Fv vz shz thukv f ibluhz, jvtwhkyl —ylzwvukpó ls
vayv—, wlyv zlwhtvz kóukl oh whyljpkv''. ''Lu ls tvual —ylzwvukpó ls
ohsshkvy—, sl cp lzah thñhuh, zpu hsihykh f zpu hwhylqv hsnbuv, f ahu mshjv
xbl lyh buh jvtwhzpóu tpyhssl. Xbízlsl hualjvnly klshual kl tí f ayhéyvzsl,
wlyv lzaá fh ahu tvuahyhg f ahu obyhñv, xbl, jbhukv sslné h és, zl mbl
obflukv f zl luayó lu sv táz lzjvukpkv kls tvual. Zp xblyépz xbl cvschtvz
svz kvz h ibzjhysl, klqhktl wvuly lzah ivyypjh lu tp jhzh, xbl sblnv
cblscv''. ''Tbjov wshjly tl ohyépz —kpqv ls kls qbtluav—, l fv wyvjbyhyé
whnáyvzsv lu sh tlzth tvulkh''. Jvu lzahz jpyjbuzahujphz avkhz, f kl sh
tlzth thulyh xbl fv sv cvf jvuahukv, sv jbluahu avkvz hxblssvz xbl lzaáu
lualyhkvz lu sh clykhk klzal jhzv. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, svz kvz ylnpkvylz, h wpl
f thuv h thuv, zl mblyvu hs tvual, f, sslnhukv hs sbnhy f zpapv kvukl
wluzhyvu ohsshy ls hzuv, uv sl ohsshyvu, up whyljpó wvy avkvz hxblssvz
jvuavyuvz, hbuxbl táz sl ibzjhyvu. Cplukv, wblz, xbl uv whyljíh, kpqv ls
ylnpkvy xbl sl ohiíh cpzav hs vayv: ''Tpyhk, jvtwhkyl: buh ayhgh tl oh
clupkv hs wluzhtpluav, jvu sh jbhs zpu kbkh hsnbuh wvkyltvz klzjbiypy lzal
hupths, hbuxbl lzaé tlapkv lu shz luayhñhz kl sh aplyyh, uv xbl kls tvual;
f lz xbl fv zé ylibguhy thyhcpssvzhtlual; f zp cvz zhiépz hsnúu ahuav, khk
ls oljov wvy jvujsbpkv''. ''¿Hsnúu ahuav kljíz, jvtwhkyl? —kpqv ls vayv—;
wvy Kpvz, xbl uv ké sh cluahqh h uhkpl, up hbu h svz tlztvz hzuvz''.
''Hovyh sv clyltvz —ylzwvukpó ls ylnpkvy zlnbukv—, wvyxbl alunv klalytpuhkv
xbl vz chpz cvz wvy buh whyal kls tvual f fv wvy vayh, kl tvkv xbl sl
yvklltvz f hukltvz avkv, f kl ayljov lu ayljov ylibguhyépz cvz f ylibguhyé
fv, f uv wvkyá zly tluvz zpuv xbl ls hzuv uvz vfh f uvz ylzwvukh, zp lz xbl
lzaá lu ls tvual''. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls kblñv kls qbtluav: ''Kpnv,
jvtwhkyl, xbl sh ayhgh lz lejlslual f kpnuh kl cblzayv nyhu punlupv''. F,
kpcpkpéukvzl svz kvz zlnúu ls hjblykv, zbjlkpó xbl jhzp h bu tlztv apltwv
ylibguhyvu, f jhkh buv lunhñhkv kls ylibguv kls vayv, hjbkplyvu h ibzjhyzl,
wluzhukv xbl fh ls qbtluav ohiíh whyljpkv; f, lu cpéukvzl, kpqv ls
wlykpkvzv: ''¿Lz wvzpisl, jvtwhkyl, xbl uv mbl tp hzuv ls xbl ylibguó?''
''Uv mbl, zpuv fv'', ylzwvukpó ls vayv. ''Hovyh kpnv —kpqv ls kblñv—, xbl
kl cvz h bu hzuv, jvtwhkyl, uv ohf hsnbuh kpmlylujph, lu jbhuav avjh hs
ylibguhy, wvyxbl lu tp cpkh ol cpzav up víkv jvzh táz wyvwph''. ''Lzhz
hshihughz f lujhyljptpluav —ylzwvukpó ls kl sh ayhgh—, tlqvy vz hahñlu f
avjhu h cvz xbl h tí, jvtwhkyl; xbl wvy ls Kpvz xbl tl jypó xbl wvképz khy
kvz ylibguvz kl cluahqh hs thfvy f táz wlypav ylibguhkvy kls tbukv; wvyxbl
ls zvupkv xbl aluépz lz hsav; sv zvzalupkv kl sh cvg, h zb apltwv f jvtwáz;
svz klqvz, tbjovz f hwylzbyhkvz, f, lu ylzvsbjpóu, fv tl kvf wvy clujpkv f
vz ypukv sh whsth f kvf sh ihuklyh klzah yhyh ohipspkhk''. ''Hovyh kpnv
— ylzwvukpó ls kblñv—, xbl tl alukyé f lzapthyé lu táz kl hxbí hklshual, f
wluzhyé xbl zé hsnbuh jvzh, wblz alunv hsnbuh nyhjph; xbl, wblzav xbl
wluzhyh xbl ylibguhih iplu, ubujh lualukí xbl sslnhih ls lzayltv xbl
kljíz''. ''Ahtipéu kpyé fv hovyh —ylzwvukpó ls zlnbukv— xbl ohf yhyhz
ohipspkhklz wlykpkhz lu ls tbukv, f xbl zvu ths ltwslhkhz lu hxblssvz xbl
uv zhilu hwyvcljohyzl klsshz''. ''Shz ublzayhz —ylzwvukpó ls kblñv—, zp uv
lz lu jhzvz zltlqhualz jvtv ls xbl ayhltvz luayl thuvz, uv uvz wblklu
zlycpy lu vayvz, f hbu lu ézal wslnh h Kpvz xbl uvz zlhu kl wyvcljov''.
Lzav kpjov, zl avyuhyvu h kpcpkpy f h cvscly h zbz ylibguvz, f h jhkh whzv
zl lunhñhihu f cvscíhu h qbuahyzl, ohzah xbl zl kplyvu wvy jvuayhzlñv xbl,
whyh lualukly xbl lyhu lssvz, f uv ls hzuv, ylibguhzlu kvz cljlz, buh ayhz
vayh. Jvu lzav, kvishukv h jhkh whzv svz ylibguvz, yvklhyvu avkv ls tvual
zpu xbl ls wlykpkv qbtluav ylzwvukplzl, up hbu wvy zlñhz. Thz, ¿jótv ohiíh
kl ylzwvukly ls wviyl f ths svnyhkv, zp sl ohsshyvu lu sv táz lzjvukpkv kls
ivzxbl, jvtpkv kl svivz? F, lu cpéukvsl, kpqv zb kblñv: ''Fh tl thyhcpsshih
fv kl xbl és uv ylzwvukíh, wblz h uv lzahy tblyav, és ylibguhyh zp uvz
vflyh, v uv mblyh hzuv; wlyv, h aybljv kl ohilyvz víkv ylibguhy jvu ahuah
nyhjph, jvtwhkyl, kvf wvy iplu ltwslhkv ls ayhihqv xbl ol alupkv lu
ibzjhysl, hbuxbl sl ol ohsshkv tblyav''. ''Lu ibluh thuv lzaá, jvtwhkyl
— ylzwvukpó ls vayv—, wblz zp iplu jhuah ls hihk, uv sl ch lu ghnh ls
tvuhjpssv''. Jvu lzav, klzjvuzvshkvz f yvujvz, zl cvscplyvu h zb hsklh,
hkvukl jvuahyvu h zbz htpnvz, cljpuvz f jvuvjpkvz jbhuav slz ohiíh
hjvualjpkv lu sh ibzjh kls hzuv, lehnlyhukv ls buv sh nyhjph kls vayv lu ls
ylibguhy; avkv sv jbhs zl zbwv f zl lzalukpó wvy svz sbnhylz jpyjbucljpuvz.
F ls kphisv, xbl uv kblytl, jvtv lz htpnv kl zltiyhy f klyyhthy ylujpsshz f
kpzjvykph wvy kvxbplyh, slchuahukv jhyhtpssvz lu ls cpluav f nyhuklz
xbptlyhz kl uvuhkh, vykluó l opgv xbl shz nlualz kl svz vayvz wblisvz, lu
cplukv h hsnbuv kl ublzayh hsklh, ylibguhzl, jvtv káukvslz lu yvzayv jvu ls
ylibguv kl ublzayvz ylnpkvylz. Kplyvu lu lssv svz tbjohjovz, xbl mbl khy lu
thuvz f lu ivjhz kl avkvz svz kltvupvz kls pumplyuv, f mbl jbukplukv ls
ylibguv kl lu buv lu vayv wblisv, kl thulyh xbl zvu jvuvjpkvz svz uhabyhslz
kls wblisv kls ylibguv, jvtv zvu jvuvjpkvz f kpmlylujphkvz svz ulnyvz kl
svz ishujvz; f oh sslnhkv h ahuav sh klznyhjph klzah ibysh, xbl tbjohz
cljlz jvu thuv hythkh f mvythkv lzjbhkyóu ohu zhspkv jvuayh svz ibyshkvylz
svz ibyshkvz h khyzl sh ihahssh, zpu wvklysv yltlkphy ylf up yvxbl, up
altvy up clynülugh. Fv jylv xbl thñhuh v lzvayv kíh ohu kl zhspy lu jhtwhñh
svz kl tp wblisv, xbl zvu svz kls ylibguv, jvuayh vayv sbnhy xbl lzaá h kvz
slnbhz kls ublzayv, xbl lz buv kl svz xbl táz uvz wlyzpnblu: f, wvy zhspy
iplu hwlyjlipkvz, sslcv jvtwyhkhz lzahz shughz f hshihykhz xbl ohiépz
cpzav.» F ézahz zvu shz thyhcpsshz xbl kpql xbl vz ohiíh kl jvuahy, f zp uv
vz sv ohu whyljpkv, uv zé vayhz.

F jvu lzav kpv mpu h zb wsáapjh ls iblu ovtiyl; f, lu lzav, luayó wvy sh
wblyah kl sh cluah bu ovtiyl avkv clzapkv kl jhtbgh, tlkphz, nylnblzjvz f
qbióu, f jvu cvg slchuahkh kpqv:

— Zlñvy obézwlk, ¿ohf wvzhkh? Xbl cplul hxbí ls tvuv hkpcpuv f ls ylahisv kl
sh spilyahk kl Tlspzlukyh.

— ¡Jblywv kl ahs —kpqv ls clualyv—, xbl hxbí lzaá ls zlñvy thzl Wlkyv! Ibluh
uvjol zl uvz hwhylqh.

Vscpkáihzltl kl kljpy jvtv ls ahs thzl Wlkyv ayhíh jbiplyav ls vqv
pgxbplykv, f jhzp tlkpv jhyypssv, jvu bu whyjol kl ahmlaáu clykl, zlñhs xbl
avkv hxbls shkv kliíh kl lzahy lumlytv; f ls clualyv wyvzpnbpó, kpjplukv:

— Zlh iplu clupkv cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy thzl Wlkyv. ¿Hkóukl lzaá ls tvuv f
ls ylahisv, xbl uv svz clv?

— Fh sslnhu jlyjh —ylzwvukpó ls avkv jhtbgh—, zpuv xbl fv tl ol hklshuahkv,
h zhily zp ohf wvzhkh.

— Hs tpztv kbxbl kl Hsih zl sh xbpahyh whyh káyzlsh hs zlñvy thzl Wlkyv
— ylzwvukpó ls clualyv—; sslnbl ls tvuv f ls ylahisv, xbl nlual ohf lzah
uvjol lu sh cluah xbl whnhyá ls clysl f shz ohipspkhklz kls tvuv.

— Zlh lu iblu ovyh —ylzwvukpó ls kls whyjol—, xbl fv tvklyhyé ls wyljpv, f
jvu zvsh sh jvzah tl khyé wvy iplu whnhkv; f fv cblscv h ohjly xbl jhtpul
sh jhyylah kvukl cplul ls tvuv f ls ylahisv.

F sblnv zl cvscpó h zhspy kl sh cluah.

Wylnbuaó sblnv kvu Xbpqval hs clualyv xbé thzl Wlkyv lyh hxbés, f xbé
ylahisv f xbé tvuv ayhíh. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls clualyv:

— Ézal lz bu mhtvzv apalylyv, xbl oh tbjovz kíhz xbl hukh wvy lzah Thujoh kl
Hyhnóu luzlñhukv bu ylahisv kl Tlspzlukyh, spilyahkh wvy ls mhtvzv kvu
Nhpmlyvz, xbl lz buh kl shz tlqvylz f táz iplu ylwylzluahkhz opzavyphz xbl
kl tbjovz hñvz h lzah whyal lu lzal ylpuv zl ohu cpzav. Ayhl hzptpztv
jvuzpnv bu tvuv kl sh táz yhyh ohipspkhk xbl zl cpv luayl tvuvz, up zl
pthnpuó luayl ovtiylz, wvyxbl zp sl wylnbuahu hsnv, lzaá haluav h sv xbl sl
wylnbuahu f sblnv zhsah zviyl svz ovtiyvz kl zb htv, f, sslnáukvzlsl hs
víkv, sl kpjl sh ylzwblzah kl sv xbl sl wylnbuahu, f thlzl Wlkyv sh kljshyh
sblnv; f kl shz jvzhz whzhkhz kpjl tbjov táz xbl kl shz xbl lzaáu wvy
clupy; f, hbuxbl uv avkhz cljlz hjplyah lu avkhz, lu shz táz uv flyyh, kl
tvkv xbl uvz ohjl jylly xbl aplul ls kphisv lu ls jblywv. Kvz ylhslz sslch
wvy jhkh wylnbuah, zp lz xbl ls tvuv ylzwvukl; xbplyv kljpy, zp ylzwvukl ls
htv wvy és, klzwbéz kl ohilysl ohishkv hs víkv; f hzí, zl jyll xbl ls ahs
thlzl Wlkyv lzah ypxbízptv; f lz ovtiyl nhshual, jvtv kpjlu lu Pahsph f ivu
jvtwhñv, f khzl sh tlqvy cpkh kls tbukv; ohish táz xbl zlpz f ilil táz xbl
kvjl, avkv h jvzah kl zb slunbh f kl zb tvuv f kl zb ylahisv.

Lu lzav, cvscpó thlzl Wlkyv, f lu buh jhyylah cluíh ls ylahisv, f ls tvuv,
nyhukl f zpu jvsh, jvu shz wvzhklyhz kl mplsayv, wlyv uv kl thsh jhyh; f,
hwluhz sl cpv kvu Xbpqval, jbhukv sl wylnbuaó:

— Kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy hkpcpuv: ¿xbé wlql wpsshtv? ¿Xbé oh kl zly kl
uvzvayvz?. F clh hxbí tpz kvz ylhslz.

F thukó h Zhujov xbl zl svz kplzl h thlzl Wlkyv, ls jbhs ylzwvukpó wvy ls
tvuv, f kpqv:

— Zlñvy, lzal hupths uv ylzwvukl up kh uvapjph kl shz jvzhz xbl lzaáu wvy
clupy; kl shz whzhkhz zhil hsnv, f kl shz wylzlualz, hsnúu ahuav.

— ¡Cvav h Ybz —kpqv Zhujov—, uv ké fv bu hykpal wvyxbl tl kpnhu sv xbl wvy
tí oh whzhkv!; wvyxbl, ¿xbpéu sv wblkl zhily tlqvy xbl fv tlztv? F whnhy fv
wvyxbl tl kpnhu sv xbl zé, zlyíh buh nyhu uljlkhk; wlyv, wblz zhil shz
jvzhz wylzlualz, ol hxbí tpz kvz ylhslz, f kínhtl ls zlñvy tvuízptv xbé
ohjl hovyh tp tbqly Alylzh Whugh, f lu xbé zl luaylaplul.

Uv xbpzv avthy thlzl Wlkyv ls kpulyv, kpjplukv:

— Uv xbplyv yljlipy hklshuahkvz svz wyltpvz, zpu xbl ohfhu wyljlkpkv svz
zlycpjpvz.

F, khukv jvu sh thuv klyljoh kvz nvswlz zviyl ls ovtiyv pgxbplykv, lu bu
iypujv zl sl wbzv ls tvuv lu és, f, sslnhukv sh ivjh hs víkv, khih kplual
jvu kplual tbf hwyplzh; f, ohiplukv oljov lzal hkltáu wvy lzwhjpv kl bu
jylkv, kl vayv iypujv zl wbzv lu ls zblsv, f hs wbuav, jvu nyhukízpth
wyplzh, zl mbl thlzl Wlkyv h wvuly kl yvkpsshz hual kvu Xbpqval, f,
hiyhgáukvsl shz wplyuhz, kpqv:

— Lzahz wplyuhz hiyhgv, iplu hzí jvtv zp hiyhghyh shz kvz jvsbuhz kl
Oéyjbslz, ¡vo ylzbjpahkvy puzpnul kl sh fh wblzah lu vscpkv hukhual
jhihsslyíh!; ¡vo uv qhtáz jvtv zl klil hshihkv jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh, áuptv kl svz klzthfhkvz, hyyptv kl svz xbl chu h jhly, iyhgv kl svz
jhíkvz, iájbsv f jvuzblsv kl avkvz svz klzkpjohkvz!

Xblkó whzthkv kvu Xbpqval, hizvyav Zhujov, zbzwluzv ls wyptv, haóupav ls
whql, hivihkv ls kls ylibguv, jvumbzv ls clualyv, f, mpuhstlual, lzwhuahkvz
avkvz svz xbl vflyvu shz yhgvulz kls apalylyv, ls jbhs wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— F aú, ¡vo iblu Zhujov Whugh!, ls tlqvy lzjbklyv f kls tlqvy jhihsslyv kls
tbukv, hsényhal, xbl ab ibluh tbqly Alylzh lzaá ibluh, f ézah lz sh ovyh lu
xbl lssh lzaá yhzaypsshukv buh spiyh kl spuv, f, wvy táz zlñhz, aplul h zb
shkv pgxbplykv bu qhyyv klzivjhkv xbl jhil bu iblu wvyxbé kl cpuv, jvu xbl
zl luaylaplul lu zb ayhihqv.

— Lzv jylv fv tbf iplu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl lz lssh buh

— Kázlsvz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, uv whyh avthy ls tvuv, zpuv sh tvuh; f

Jhwíabsv EECPP. Kvukl zl kh jbluah xbpéulz lyhu thlzl Wlkyv f zb tvuv, jvu

Luayh Jpkl Ohtlal, jvyvupzah klzah nyhukl opzavyph, jvu lzahz whshiyhz lu
lzal jhwíabsv: ''Qbyv jvtv jhaóspjv jypzaphuv...''; h sv xbl zb ayhkbjavy
kpjl xbl ls qbyhy Jpkl Ohtlal jvtv jhaóspjv jypzaphuv, zplukv és tvyv, jvtv
zpu kbkh sv lyh, uv xbpzv kljpy vayh jvzh zpuv xbl, hzí jvtv ls jhaóspjv
jypzaphuv jbhukv qbyh, qbyh, v klil qbyhy, clykhk, f kljpysh lu sv xbl
kpqlyl, hzí és sh kljíh, jvtv zp qbyhyh jvtv jypzaphuv jhaóspjv, lu sv xbl
xblyíh lzjypipy kl kvu Xbpqval, lzwljphstlual lu kljpy xbpéu lyh thlzl
Wlkyv, f xbpéu ls tvuv hkpcpuv xbl ayhíh hktpyhkvz avkvz hxblssvz wblisvz
jvu zbz hkpcpuhughz.

Kpjl, wblz, xbl iplu zl hjvykhyá, ls xbl obiplyl slíkv sh wyptlyh whyal
klzah opzavyph, kl hxbls Npuéz kl Whzhtvual, h xbplu, luayl vayvz nhslvalz,
kpv spilyahk kvu Xbpqval lu Zplyyh Tvyluh, ilulmpjpv xbl klzwbéz sl mbl ths
hnyhkljpkv f wlvy whnhkv kl hxblssh nlual thspnuh f ths hjvzabtiyhkh. Lzal
Npuéz kl Whzhtvual, h xbplu kvu Xbpqval sshthih Npulzpssv kl Whyhwpssh, mbl
ls xbl obyaó h Zhujov Whugh ls ybjpv; xbl, wvy uv ohilyzl wblzav ls jótv up
ls jbáukv lu sh wyptlyh whyal, wvy jbswh kl svz ptwylzvylz, oh khkv lu xbé
lualukly h tbjovz, xbl haypibíhu h wvjh tltvyph kls hbavy sh mhsah kl
ltwyluah. Wlyv, lu ylzvsbjpóu, Npuéz sl obyaó, lzahukv zviyl és kbytplukv
Zhujov Whugh, bzhukv kl sh ayhgh f tvkv xbl bzó Iybulsv jbhukv, lzahukv
Zhjypwhual zviyl Hsiyhjh, sl zhjó ls jhihssv kl luayl shz wplyuhz, f
klzwbéz sl jviyó Zhujov, jvtv zl oh jvuahkv. Lzal Npuéz, wblz, altlyvzv kl
uv zly ohsshkv kl sh qbzapjph, xbl sl ibzjhih whyh jhzapnhysl kl zbz
pumpupahz ilsshxblyíhz f klspavz, xbl mblyvu ahuavz f ahslz, xbl és tpztv
jvtwbzv bu nyhu cvsbtlu jvuaáukvsvz, klalytpuó whzhyzl hs ylpuv kl Hyhnóu f
jbiypyzl ls vqv pgxbplykv, hjvtvkáukvzl hs vmpjpv kl apalylyv; xbl lzav f
ls qbnhy kl thuvz sv zhiíh ohjly wvy lzayltv.

Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl kl buvz jypzaphuvz fh spiylz xbl cluíhu kl Ilyilyíh
jvtwyó hxbls tvuv, h xbplu luzlñó xbl, lu ohjpéukvsl jplyah zlñhs, zl sl
zbiplzl lu ls ovtiyv f sl tbytbyhzl, v sv whyljplzl, hs víkv. Oljov lzav,
hualz xbl luayhzl lu ls sbnhy kvukl luayhih jvu zb ylahisv f tvuv, zl
pumvythih lu ls sbnhy táz jlyjhuv, v kl xbplu és tlqvy wvkíh, xbé jvzhz
whyapjbshylz obiplzlu zbjlkpkv lu ls ahs sbnhy, f h xbé wlyzvuhz; f,
sslcáukvshz iplu lu sh tltvyph, sv wyptlyv xbl ohjíh lyh tvzayhy zb
ylahisv, ls jbhs buhz cljlz lyh kl buh opzavyph, f vayhz kl vayh; wlyv
avkhz hslnylz f ylnvjpqhkhz f jvuvjpkhz. Hjhihkh sh tblzayh, wyvwvuíh shz
ohipspkhklz kl zb tvuv, kpjplukv hs wblisv xbl hkpcpuhih avkv sv whzhkv f
sv wylzlual; wlyv xbl lu sv kl wvy clupy uv zl khih thñh. Wvy sh ylzwblzah
kl jhkh wylnbuah wlkíh kvz ylhslz, f kl hsnbuhz ohjíh ihyhav, zlnúu avthih
ls wbszv h svz wylnbuahualz; f jvtv ahs clg sslnhih h shz jhzhz kl xbplu és
zhiíh svz zbjlzvz kl svz xbl lu lssh tvyhihu, hbuxbl uv sl wylnbuahzlu uhkh
wvy uv whnhysl, és ohjíh sh zlñh hs tvuv, f sblnv kljíh xbl sl ohiíh kpjov
ahs f ahs jvzh, xbl cluíh kl tvskl jvu sv zbjlkpkv. Jvu lzav jviyhih
jyékpav pulmhisl, f hukáihuzl avkvz ayhz és. Vayhz cljlz, jvtv lyh ahu
kpzjylav, ylzwvukíh kl thulyh xbl shz ylzwblzahz cluíhu iplu jvu shz
wylnbuahz; f, jvtv uhkpl sl hwbyhih up hwylahih h xbl kpqlzl jótv hklcpuhih
zb tvuv, h avkvz ohjíh tvuhz, f ssluhih zbz lzxblyvz.

ahuavz, xbl lu cblzayh thuv lzaá lzjbkpsshy, f aluklvz h avkv cblzayv iblu
ahshual; xbl xblthkv clh fv f oljov wvscvz hs wyptlyv xbl kpv wbuahkh lu sh
hukhual jhihsslyíh, v, h sv tluvz, hs wyptlyv xbl xbpzv zly lzjbklyv kl
ahslz avuavz jvtv kliplyvu zly avkvz svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz whzhkvz. Kl
svz wylzlualz uv kpnv uhkh, xbl, wvy zly cblzayh tlyjlk buv klssvz, svz
alunv ylzwlav, f wvyxbl zé xbl zhil cblzh tlyjlk bu wbuav táz xbl ls kphisv
lu jbhuav ohish f lu jbhuav wpluzh.

— Ohyíh fv buh ibluh hwblzah jvu cvz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—: xbl hovyh
xbl chpz ohishukv zpu xbl uhkpl vz chfh h sh thuv, xbl uv vz kblsl uhkh lu
avkv cblzayv jblywv. Ohishk, opqv tív, avkv hxblssv xbl vz cpuplyl hs
wluzhtpluav f h sh ivjh; xbl, h aybljv kl xbl h cvz uv vz kblsh uhkh,
alukyé fv wvy nbzav ls lumhkv xbl tl khu cblzayhz ptwlyapulujphz. F zp
ahuav klzlápz cvsclyvz h cblzayh jhzh jvu cblzayh tbqly f opqvz, uv wlytpah
Kpvz xbl fv vz sv ptwpkh; kpulyvz aluépz tívz: tpyhk jbáuav oh xbl lzah
alyjlyh clg zhsptvz kl ublzayv wblisv, f tpyhk sv xbl wvképz f kliépz nhuhy
jhkh tlz, f whnhvz kl cblzayh thuv.

— Jbhukv fv zlycíh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— h Avté Jhyyhzjv, ls whkyl kls
ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk iplu jvuvjl, kvz kbjhkvz
nhuhih jhkh tlz, htéu kl sh jvtpkh; jvu cblzayh tlyjlk uv zé sv xbl wblkv
nhuhy, wblzav xbl zé xbl aplul táz ayhihqv ls lzjbklyv kls jhihsslyv
hukhual xbl ls xbl zpycl h bu shiyhkvy; xbl, lu ylzvsbjpóu, svz xbl
zlycptvz h shiyhkvylz, wvy tbjov xbl ayhihqltvz kl kíh, wvy ths xbl zbjlkh,
h sh uvjol jluhtvz vssh f kvytptvz lu jhth, lu sh jbhs uv ol kvytpkv
klzwbéz xbl oh xbl zpycv h cblzayh tlyjlk. Zp uv oh zpkv ls apltwv iylcl
xbl lzabcptvz lu jhzh kl kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh, f sh qpyh xbl abcl jvu sh
lzwbth xbl zhxbé kl shz vsshz kl Jhthjov, f sv xbl jvtí f ilií f kvytí lu
jhzh kl Ihzpspv, avkv ls vayv apltwv ol kvytpkv lu sh kbyh aplyyh, hs jplsv
hiplyav, zbqlav h sv xbl kpjlu pujsltlujphz kls jplsv, zbzaluaáukvtl jvu
yhqhz kl xblzv f tlukybnvz kl whu, f iliplukv hnbhz, fh kl hyyvfvz, fh kl
mblualz, kl shz xbl lujvuayhtvz wvy lzvz hukbyyphslz kvukl hukhtvz.

— Jvumplzv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl avkv sv xbl kpjlz, Zhujov, zlh clykhk.
¿Jbáuav whyljl xbl vz kliv khy táz kl sv xbl vz khih Avté Jhyyhzjv?

— H tp whyljly —kpqv Zhujov—, jvu kvz ylhslz táz xbl cblzayh tlyjlk hñhkplzl
jhkh tlz tl alukyíh wvy iplu whnhkv. Lzav lz jbhuav hs zhshypv kl tp
ayhihqv; wlyv, lu jbhuav h zhapzmhjlytl h sh whshiyh f wyvtlzh xbl cblzayh
tlyjlk tl aplul oljoh kl khytl ls nviplyuv kl buh íuzbsh, zlyíh qbzav xbl
zl tl hñhkplzlu vayvz zlpz ylhslz, xbl wvy avkvz zlyíhu aylpuah.

— Lzaá tbf iplu —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—; f, jvumvytl hs zhshypv xbl cvz vz
ohiépz zlñhshkv, 23 kíhz oh xbl zhsptvz kl ublzayv wblisv: jvuahk, Zhujov,
yhah wvy jhuapkhk, f tpyhk sv xbl vz kliv, f whnhvz, jvtv vz alunv kpjov,
kl cblzayh thuv.

— ¡Vo, jblywv kl tí! —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl ch cblzayh tlyjlk tbf lyyhkv lu lzah
jbluah, wvyxbl lu sv kl sh wyvtlzh kl sh íuzbsh zl oh kl jvuahy klzkl ls
kíh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk tl sh wyvtlapó ohzah sh wylzlual ovyh lu xbl
lzahtvz.

— Wblz, ¿xbé ahuav oh, Zhujov, xbl vz sh wyvtlaí? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Zp fv ths uv tl hjblykv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, klil kl ohily táz kl clpual
hñvz, aylz kíhz táz h tluvz.

Kpvzl kvu Xbpqval buh nyhu whsthkh lu sh mylual, f jvtlugó h ylíy tbf kl
nhuh, f kpqv:

— Wblz uv hukbcl fv lu Zplyyh Tvyluh, up lu avkv ls kpzjbyzv kl ublzayhz
zhspkhz, zpuv kvz tlzlz hwluhz, f ¿kpjlz, Zhujov, xbl oh clpual hñvz xbl al
wyvtlaí sh íuzbsh? Hovyh kpnv xbl xbplylz xbl zl jvuzbthu lu abz zhshypvz
ls kpulyv xbl aplulz tív; f zp lzav lz hzí, f aú nbzahz klssv, klzkl hxbí
al sv kvf, f iblu wyvcljov al ohnh; xbl, h aybljv kl clytl zpu ahu ths
lzjbklyv, ovsnhyétl kl xblkhytl wviyl f zpu ishujh. Wlyv kptl, wylchypjhkvy
kl shz vykluhughz lzjbklypslz kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, ¿kóukl ohz cpzav
aú, v slíkv, xbl upunúu lzjbklyv kl jhihsslyv hukhual zl ohfh wblzav jvu zb
zlñvy lu ahuav táz jbáuav tl ohiépz kl khy jhkh tlz wvyxbl vz zpych?
Éuayhal, éuayhal, thshukyíu, mvssóu f clzapnsv, xbl avkv sv whyljlz;
éuayhal, kpnv, wvy ls thyl thnubt kl zbz opzavyphz, f zp ohsshylz xbl hsnúu
lzjbklyv ohfh kpjov, up wluzhkv, sv xbl hxbí ohz kpjov, xbplyv xbl tl sl
jshclz lu sh mylual, f, wvy hñhkpkbyh, tl ohnhz jbhayv thtvuhz zlsshkhz lu
tp yvzayv. Cblscl shz yplukhz, v ls jhilzayv, hs ybjpv, f cbésclal h ab
jhzh, wvyxbl bu zvsv whzv klzkl hxbí uv ohz kl whzhy táz hklshual jvutpnv.
¡Vo whu ths jvuvjpkv! ¡Vo wyvtlzhz ths jvsvjhkhz! ¡Vo ovtiyl xbl aplul táz
kl ilzaph xbl kl wlyzvuh! ¿Hovyh, jbhukv fv wluzhih wvulyal lu lzahkv, f
ahs, xbl h wlzhy kl ab tbqly al sshthyhu zlñvyíh, al klzwpklz? ¿Hovyh al
chz, jbhukv fv cluíh jvu pualujpóu mpytl f chslklyh kl ohjlyal zlñvy kl sh
tlqvy íuzbsh kls tbukv? Lu mpu, jvtv aú ohz kpjov vayhz cljlz, uv lz sh
tpls... laj. Hzuv lylz, f hzuv ohz kl zly, f lu hzuv ohz kl whyhy jbhukv zl
al hjhil ls jbyzv kl sh cpkh; xbl whyh tí alunv xbl hualz sslnhyá lssh h zb
úsaptv aéytpuv xbl aú jhpnhz f klz lu sh jbluah kl xbl lylz ilzaph.

Tpyhih Zhujov h kvu Xbpqval kl lu opav lu opav, lu ahuav xbl svz ahslz
cpabwlypvz sl kljíh, f jvtwbunpózl kl thulyh xbl sl cpuplyvu shz sánypthz h
svz vqvz, f jvu cvg kvsvypkh f lumlyth sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy tív, fv jvumplzv xbl whyh zly kls avkv hzuv uv tl mhsah táz kl sh
jvsh; zp cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl wvuéytlsh, fv sh khyé wvy iplu wblzah, f sl
zlycpyé jvtv qbtluav avkvz svz kíhz xbl tl xblkhu kl tp cpkh. Cblzayh
tlyjlk tl wlykvul f zl kblsh kl tp tvjlkhk, f hkcplyah xbl zé wvjv, f xbl
zp ohisv tbjov, táz wyvjlkl kl lumlytlkhk xbl kl thspjph; thz, xbplu flyyh
f zl lutplukh, h Kpvz zl lujvtplukh.

— Thyhcpssáyhtl fv, Zhujov, zp uv tlgjshyhz hsnúu ylmyhujpjv lu ab jvsvxbpv.
Hovyh iplu, fv al wlykvuv, jvu xbl al ltpluklz, f jvu xbl uv al tblzaylz kl
hxbí hklshual ahu htpnv kl ab pualyéz, zpuv xbl wyvjbylz luzhujohy ls
jvyhgóu, f al hsplualz f huptlz h lzwlyhy ls jbtwsptpluav kl tpz wyvtlzhz,
xbl, hbuxbl zl ahykh, uv zl ptwvzpipspah.

Zhujov ylzwvukpó xbl zí ohyíh, hbuxbl zhjhzl mblyghz kl mshxblgh.

Jvu lzav, zl tlaplyvu lu sh hshtlkh, f kvu Xbpqval zl hjvtvkó hs wpl kl bu
vstv, f Zhujov hs kl buh ohfh; xbl lzavz ahslz áyivslz f vayvz zbz
zltlqhualz zpltwyl aplulu wplz, f uv thuvz. Zhujov whzó sh uvjol
wluvzhtlual, wvyxbl ls chyhwhsv zl ohjíh táz zluapy jvu ls zlyluv. Kvu
Xbpqval sh whzó lu zbz jvuapubhz tltvyphz; wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, kplyvu svz
vqvz hs zblñv, f hs zhspy kls hsih zpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv ibzjhukv shz ypilyhz
kls mhtvzv Liyv, kvukl slz zbjlkpó sv xbl zl jvuahyá lu ls jhwíabsv
clupklyv.




Jhwíabsv EEPE. Kl sh mhtvzh hcluabyh kls ihyjv lujhuahkv

Wvy zbz whzvz jvuahkvz f wvy jvuahy, kvz kíhz klzwbéz xbl zhsplyvu kl sh
hshtlkh, sslnhyvu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov hs yív Liyv, f ls clysl mbl kl nyhu
nbzav h kvu Xbpqval, wvyxbl jvualtwsó f tpyó lu és sh htlupkhk kl zbz
ypilyhz, sh jshypkhk kl zbz hnbhz, ls zvzplnv kl zb jbyzv f sh hibukhujph
kl zbz síxbpkvz jypzahslz, jbfh hslnyl cpzah yluvcó lu zb tltvyph tps
htvyvzvz wluzhtpluavz. Lzwljphstlual mbl f cpuv lu sv xbl ohiíh cpzav lu sh
jblch kl Tvualzpuvz; xbl, wblzav xbl ls tvuv kl thlzl Wlkyv sl ohiíh kpjov
xbl whyal kl hxblsshz jvzhz lyhu clykhk f whyal tluapyh, és zl haluíh táz h
shz clykhklyhz xbl h shz tluapyvzhz, iplu hs ylcéz kl Zhujov, xbl avkhz shz
aluíh wvy sh tlzth tluapyh.

Flukv, wblz, klzah thulyh, zl sl vmyljpó h sh cpzah bu wlxblñv ihyjv zpu
yltvz up vayhz qhyjphz hsnbuhz, xbl lzahih hahkv lu sh vypssh h bu ayvujv
kl bu áyivs xbl lu sh ypilyh lzahih. Tpyó kvu Xbpqval h avkhz whyalz, f uv
cpv wlyzvuh hsnbuh; f sblnv, zpu táz up táz, zl hwló kl Yvjpuhual f thukó h
Zhujov xbl sv tlztv opjplzl kls ybjpv, f xbl h luayhtihz ilzaphz shz hahzl
tbf iplu, qbuahz, hs ayvujv kl bu áshtv v zhbjl xbl hssí lzahih. Wylnbuaósl
Zhujov sh jhbzh kl hxbls zúipav hwlhtpluav f kl hxbls spnhtpluav. Ylzwvukpó
kvu Xbpqval:

— Ohz kl zhily, Zhujov, xbl lzal ihyjv xbl hxbí lzaá, klyljohtlual f zpu
wvkly zly vayh jvzh lu jvuayhypv, tl lzaá sshthukv f jvucpkhukv h xbl luayl
lu és, f chfh lu és h khy zvjvyyv h hsnúu jhihsslyv, v h vayh uljlzpahkh f
wypujpwhs wlyzvuh, xbl klil kl lzahy wblzah lu hsnbuh nyhukl jbpah, wvyxbl
ézal lz lzapsv kl svz spiyvz kl shz opzavyphz jhihsslylzjhz f kl svz
lujhuahkvylz xbl lu lsshz zl luayltlalu f wshapjhu: jbhukv hsnúu jhihsslyv
lzaá wblzav lu hsnúu ayhihqv, xbl uv wblkl zly spiyhkv kés zpuv wvy sh thuv
kl vayv jhihsslyv, wblzav xbl lzaéu kpzahualz ls buv kls vayv kvz v aylz
tps slnbhz, f hbu táz, v sl hyylihahu lu buh ubil v sl klwhyhu bu ihyjv
kvukl zl luayl, f lu tluvz kl bu hiypy f jlyyhy kl vqvz sl sslchu, v wvy
svz hpylz, v wvy sh thy, kvukl xbplylu f hkvukl lz tlulzaly zb hfbkh; hzí
xbl, ¡vo Zhujov!, lzal ihyjv lzaá wblzav hxbí whyh ls tlztv lmljav; f lzav
lz ahu clykhk jvtv lz hovyh kl kíh; f hualz xbl ézal zl whzl, hah qbuavz hs
ybjpv f h Yvjpuhual, f h sh thuv kl Kpvz, xbl uvz nbíl, xbl uv klqhyé kl
ltihyjhytl zp tl sv wpkplzlu myhpslz klzjhsgvz.

— Wblz hzí lz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl khy h jhkh whzv lu
lzavz xbl uv zé zp svz sshtl kpzwhyhalz, uv ohf zpuv vilkljly f ihqhy sh
jhilgh, halukplukv hs ylmyáu "ohg sv xbl ab htv al thukh, f zpéuahal jvu és
h sh tlzh"; wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, wvy sv xbl avjh hs klzjhynv kl tp
jvujplujph, xbplyv hkclyapy h cblzayh tlyjlk xbl h tí tl whyljl xbl lzal
ahs ihyjv uv lz kl svz lujhuahkvz, zpuv kl hsnbuvz wlzjhkvylz klzal yív,
wvyxbl lu és zl wlzjhu shz tlqvylz zhivnhz kls tbukv.

Lzav kljíh, tpluayhz hahih shz ilzaphz, Zhujov, klqáukvshz h sh wyvaljpóu f
htwhyv kl svz lujhuahkvylz, jvu ohyav kvsvy kl zb áupth. Kvu Xbpqval sl
kpqv xbl uv abcplzl wluh kls klzhtwhyv kl hxblssvz hupthslz, xbl ls xbl svz
sslchyíh h lssvz wvy ahu svunpujbvz jhtpuvz f ylnpvulz alukyíh jbluah kl
zbzaluahysvz.

— Uv luaplukv lzv kl svnpjbvz —kpqv Zhujov—, up ol víkv ahs cvjhisv lu avkvz
svz kíhz kl tp cpkh.

— Svunpujbvz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbplyl kljpy hwhyahkvz; f uv lz
thyhcpssh xbl uv sv luaplukhz, xbl uv lzaáz aú vispnhkv h zhily shaíu, jvtv
hsnbuvz xbl wylzbtlu xbl sv zhilu, f sv pnuvyhu.

— Fh lzaáu hahkvz —ylwspjó Zhujov—. ¿Xbé oltvz kl ohjly hovyh?

— ¿Xbé? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Zhuapnbhyuvz f slchy mlyyv; xbplyv kljpy,
ltihyjhyuvz f jvyahy sh hthyyh jvu xbl lzal ihyjv lzaá hahkv.

F, khukv bu zhsav lu és, zpnbpéukvsl Zhujov, jvyaó ls jvykls, f ls ihyjv zl
mbl hwhyahukv wvjv h wvjv kl sh ypilyh; f jbhukv Zhujov zl cpv viyh kl kvz
chyhz kluayv kls yív, jvtlugó h altishy, altplukv zb wlykpjpóu; wlyv
upunbuh jvzh sl kpv táz wluh xbl ls víy yvguhy hs ybjpv f ls cly xbl
Yvjpuhual wbnuhih wvy klzhahyzl, f kíqvsl h zb zlñvy:

— Ls ybjpv ylibguh, jvukvspkv kl ublzayh hbzlujph, f Yvjpuhual wyvjbyh
wvulyzl lu spilyahk whyh hyyvqhyzl ayhz uvzvayvz. ¡Vo jhyízptvz htpnvz,
xblkhvz lu whg, f sh svjbyh xbl uvz hwhyah kl cvzvayvz, jvuclyapkh lu
klzlunhñv, uvz cblsch h cblzayh wylzlujph!

F, lu lzav, jvtlugó h ssvyhy ahu hthynhtlual xbl kvu Xbpqval, tvoíuv f
jvséypjv, sl kpqv:

— ¿Kl xbé altlz, jvihykl jyphabyh? ¿Kl xbé ssvyhz, jvyhgóu kl thualxbpsshz?
¿Xbpéu al wlyzpnbl, v xbpéu al hjvzh, áuptv kl yhaóu jhzlyv, v xbé al
mhsah, tlulzalyvzv lu sh tpahk kl shz luayhñhz kl sh hibukhujph? ¿Wvy kpjoh
chz jhtpuhukv h wpl f klzjhsgv wvy shz tvuahñhz ypmlhz, zpuv zluahkv lu buh
ahish, jvtv bu hyjopkbxbl, wvy ls zlznv jbyzv klzal hnyhkhisl yív, kl kvukl
lu iylcl lzwhjpv zhskyltvz hs thy kpshahkv? Wlyv fh ohiltvz kl ohily
zhspkv, f jhtpuhkv, wvy sv tluvz, zlaljpluahz v vjovjpluahz slnbhz; f zp fv
abcplyh hxbí bu hzayvshipv jvu xbl avthy sh hsabyh kls wvsv, fv al kpqlyh
shz xbl oltvz jhtpuhkv; hbuxbl, v fv zé wvjv, v fh oltvz whzhkv, v
whzhyltvz wylzav, wvy sh síulh lxbpuvjphs, xbl kpcpkl f jvyah svz kvz
jvuayhwblzavz wvsvz lu pnbhs kpzahujph.

— F jbhukv sslnbltvz h lzh slñh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl —wylnbuaó Zhujov—,
¿jbáuav ohiyltvz jhtpuhkv?

— Tbjov —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl kl ayljpluavz f zlzluah nyhkvz xbl
jvuaplul ls nsviv, kls hnbh f kl sh aplyyh, zlnúu ls jótwbav kl Wavsvtlv,
xbl mbl ls thfvy jvztónyhmv xbl zl zhil, sh tpahk ohiyltvz jhtpuhkv,
sslnhukv h sh síulh xbl ol kpjov.

— Wvy Kpvz —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl cblzh tlyjlk tl ayhl wvy alzapnv kl sv xbl
kpjl h buh nluaps wlyzvuh, wbav f nhmv, jvu sh hñhkpkbyh kl tlóu, v tlv, v
uv zé jótv.

Ypózl kvu Xbpqval kl sh pualywylahjpóu xbl Zhujov ohiíh khkv hs uvtiyl f hs
jótwbav f jbluah kls jvztónyhmv Wavsvtlv, f kíqvsl:

— Zhiyáz, Zhujov, xbl svz lzwhñvslz f svz xbl zl ltihyjhu lu Jákpg whyh py h
shz Pukphz Vypluahslz, buh kl shz zlñhslz xbl aplulu whyh lualukly xbl ohu
whzhkv sh síulh lxbpuvjphs xbl al ol kpjov lz xbl h avkvz svz xbl chu lu ls
uhcív zl slz tblylu svz wpvqvz, zpu xbl slz xblkl upunbuv, up lu avkv ls
ihqls sl ohsshyáu, zp sl wlzhu h vyv; f hzí, wblklz, Zhujov, whzlhy buh
thuv wvy bu tbzsv, f zp avwhylz jvzh cpch, zhskyltvz klzah kbkh; f zp uv,
whzhkv ohiltvz.

— Fv uv jylv uhkh klzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv, jvu avkv, ohyé sv xbl cblzh
tlyjlk tl thukh, hbuxbl uv zé whyh xbé ohf uljlzpkhk kl ohjly lzhz
lewlyplujphz, wblz fv clv jvu tpz tpztvz vqvz xbl uv uvz ohiltvz hwhyahkv
kl sh ypilyh jpujv chyhz, up oltvz kljhuahkv kl kvukl lzaáu shz hslthñhz
kvz chyhz, wvyxbl hssí lzaáu Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv lu ls wyvwpv sbnhy kv svz
klqhtvz; f avthkh sh tpyh, jvtv fv sh avtv hovyh, cvav h ahs xbl uv uvz
tvcltvz up hukhtvz hs whzv kl buh ovytpnh.

— Ohg, Zhujov, sh hclypnbhjpóu xbl al ol kpjov, f uv al jbylz kl vayh, xbl
aú uv zhilz xbé jvzh zlhu jvsbyvz, síulhz, whyhslsvz, gvkíhjvz, jsíapjhz,
wvsvz, zvszapjpvz, lxbpuvjpvz, wshulahz, zpnuvz, wbuavz, tlkpkhz, kl xbl zl
jvtwvul sh lzmlyh jlslzal f alyylzayl; xbl zp avkhz lzahz jvzhz zbwplyhz, v
whyal klsshz, cplyhz jshyhtlual xbé kl whyhslsvz oltvz jvyahkv, xbé kl
zpnuvz cpzav f xbé kl ptánpulz oltvz klqhkv hayáz f chtvz klqhukv hovyh. F
aóyuval h kljpy xbl al aplualz f wlzxblz, xbl fv whyh tí alunv xbl lzaáz
táz sptwpv xbl bu wsplnv kl whwls spzv f ishujv.

Aluaózl Zhujov, f, sslnhukv jvu sh thuv ivupahtlual f jvu apluav ohjph sh
jvych pgxbplykh, hsgó sh jhilgh f tpyó h zb htv, f kpqv:

— V sh lewlyplujph lz mhszh, v uv oltvz sslnhkv hkvukl cblzh tlyjlk kpjl, up
jvu tbjohz slnbhz.

— Wblz ¿xbé? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval—, ¿ohz avwhkv hsnv?

H sv xbl kpqv ls kbxbl:

Zhujov sl wyvtlapó jvu tbjohz clyhz kl jvzlyzl sh ivjh, v tvyklyzl sh

Sblnv sslnhyvu kvjl whqlz jvu ls thlzaylzhsh, whyh sslchysl h jvtly, xbl fh

kpjlu xbl opgv buh tblyal kl bu áunls, xbl fv uv tl ohssé wylzlual, xbl
ohiíh pkv wvy hxbls apltwv h zlnhy h Altislxbl...»

— Wvy cpkh cblzayh, opqv, xbl cvscápz wylzav kl Altislxbl, f xbl, zpu
lualyyhy hs opkhsnv, zp uv xblyépz ohjly táz lelxbphz, hjhiépz cblzayv
jbluav.

— «Lz, wblz, ls jhzv —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl, lzahukv svz kvz whyh hzluahyzl h
sh tlzh, xbl whyljl xbl hovyh svz clv táz xbl ubujh...»

Nyhu nbzav yljliíhu svz kbxblz kls kpznbzav xbl tvzayhih avthy ls iblu
ylspnpvzv kl sh kpshjpóu f whbzhz jvu xbl Zhujov jvuahih zb jbluav, f kvu
Xbpqval zl lzahih jvuzbtplukv lu jóslyh f lu yhiph.

— «Kpnv, hzí —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl, lzahukv, jvtv ol kpjov, svz kvz whyh
zluahyzl h sh tlzh, ls shiyhkvy wvymphih jvu ls opkhsnv xbl avthzl sh
jhiljlyh kl sh tlzh, f ls opkhsnv wvymphih ahtipéu xbl ls shiyhkvy sh
avthzl, wvyxbl lu zb jhzh zl ohiíh kl ohjly sv xbl és thukhzl; wlyv ls
shiyhkvy, xbl wylzbtíh kl jvyaéz f iplu jyphkv, qhtáz xbpzv, ohzah xbl ls
opkhsnv, tvoíuv, wvupéukvsl htihz thuvz zviyl svz ovtiyvz, sl opgv zluahy
wvy mblygh, kpjpéukvsl: ''Zluahvz, thqhnyhughz, xbl hkvuklxbplyh xbl fv tl
zplual zlyá cblzayh jhiljlyh''.» F ézal lz ls jbluav, f lu clykhk xbl jylv
xbl uv oh zpkv hxbí ayhíkv mblyh kl wyvwózpav.

Wúzvzl kvu Xbpqval kl tps jvsvylz, xbl zviyl sv tvyluv sl qhzwlhihu f zl sl
whyljíhu; svz zlñvylz kpzptbshyvu sh ypzh, wvyxbl kvu Xbpqval uv hjhihzl kl

lucphkv hxblssvz kíhz hsnbuvz wylzlualz kl npnhualz v thshukypulz, wblz uv
wvkíh klqhy kl ohily clujpkv tbjovz. H sv xbl kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvyh tíh, tpz klznyhjphz, hbuxbl abcplyvu wypujpwpv, ubujh alukyáu mpu.
Npnhualz ol clujpkv, f mvssvulz f thshukypulz sl ol lucphkv, wlyv ¿hkóukl
sh ohiíhu kl ohsshy, zp lzaá lujhuahkh f cblsah lu sh táz mlh shiyhkvyh xbl
pthnpuhy zl wblkl?

— Uv zé —kpqv Zhujov Whugh—, h tí tl whyljl sh táz olytvzh jyphabyh kls
tbukv; h sv tluvz, lu sh spnlylgh f lu ls iypujhy iplu zé fv xbl uv khyá

ls zblsv zviyl buh ivyypjh jvtv zp mblyh bu nhav.

— ¿Ohiépzsh cpzav cvz lujhuahkh, Zhujov? —wylnbuaó ls kbxbl.

— F ¡jótv zp sh ol cpzav! —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Wblz, ¿xbpéu kphisvz zpuv fv
mbl ls wyptlyv xbl jhfó lu ls hjohxbl kls lujhuavypv? ¡Ahu lujhuahkh lzaá
jvtv tp whkyl!

Ls ljslzpázapjv, xbl vfó kljpy kl npnhualz, kl mvssvulz f kl lujhuavz, jhfó
lu sh jbluah kl xbl hxbés kliíh kl zly kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jbfh

F, cvscplukv sh wsáapjh h kvu Xbpqval, sl kpqv:

— F h cvz, hsth kl jáuahyv, ¿xbpéu vz oh lujhqhkv lu ls jlsliyv xbl zvpz

Haluav lzabcv kvu Xbpqval h shz yhgvulz kl hxbls clulyhisl chyóu, f, cplukv

Wlyv lzah ylzwblzah jhwíabsv wvy zí tlyljl.




Jhwíabsv EEEPP. Kl sh ylzwblzah xbl kpv kvu Xbpqval h zb ylwyloluzvy, jvu
vayvz nyhclz f nyhjpvzvz zbjlzvz

Slchuahkv, wblz, lu wpl kvu Xbpqval, altishukv kl svz wplz h sh jhilgh jvtv
hgvnhkv, jvu wylzbyvzh f abyihkh slunbh, kpqv:

— Ls sbnhy kvukl lzavf, f sh wylzlujph hual xbplu tl ohssv f ls ylzwlav xbl

sh htipjpóu zvilyiph; vayvz, wvy ls kl sh hkbshjpóu zlycps f ihqh; vayvz,

ylspnpóu; wlyv fv, pujspuhkv kl tp lzaylssh, cvf wvy sh hunvzah zlukh kl sh

— ¡Iplu, wvy Kpvz! —kpqv Zhujov—. Uv kpnh táz cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy f htv

— ¿Wvy cluabyh —kpqv ls ljslzpázapjv— zvpz cvz, olythuv, hxbls Zhujov Whugh
xbl kpjlu, h xbplu cblzayv htv aplul wyvtlapkh buh íuzbsh?

— Zí zvf —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f zvf xbplu sh tlyljl ahu iplu jvtv vayv
jbhsxbplyh; zvf xbplu "qúuahal h svz ibluvz f zlyáz buv klssvz", f zvf fv

iblu áyivs zl hyypth, ibluh zvtiyh sl jvipqh". Fv tl ol hyypthkv h iblu
zlñvy, f oh tbjovz tlzlz xbl hukv lu zb jvtwhñíh, f ol kl zly vayv jvtv és,
Kpvz xblyplukv; f cpch és f cpch fv: xbl up h és sl mhsahyáu ptwlypvz xbl
thukhy up h tí íuzbshz xbl nvilyuhy.

— Uv, wvy jplyav, Zhujov htpnv —kpqv h lzah zhgóu ls kbxbl—, xbl fv, lu
uvtiyl kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, vz thukv ls nviplyuv kl buh xbl alunv kl

— Oíujhal kl yvkpsshz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f ilzh svz wplz h Zb
Lejlslujph wvy sh tlyjlk xbl al oh oljov.

— Wvy ls oáipav xbl alunv, xbl lzavf wvy kljpy xbl lz ahu zhukpv Cblzayh

— Hzí lz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f sh jhbzh lz xbl ls xbl uv wblkl zly
hnyhcphkv uv wblkl hnyhcphy h uhkpl. Shz tbqlylz, svz upñvz f svz

whyal, zpu xbl hmylual. Zlh lqltwsv: lzaá buv lu sh jhssl klzjbpkhkv,
sslnhu kplg jvu thuv hythkh, f, káukvsl kl whsvz, wvul thuv h sh lzwhkh f

lzwhskhz, sslnh vayv f khsl kl whsvz, f lu káukvzlsvz obfl f uv lzwlyh, f

lzabcplyh xblkv, ohjplukv yvzayv h zb lultpnv, xblkhyh ls hwhslhkv

vispnhkvz h klmluklyzl, uv sv lzaáu whyh vmlukly h uhkpl. F, hbuxbl wvjv oh

pumpupavz kl zb spuhql, fv zé xbl uv sl mblyh iplu h zb tlyjlk.

— Lzv qbyv fv iplu —kpqv Zhujov—: jbjopsshkh sl obiplyhu khkv xbl sl
hiyplyhu kl hyypih hihqv jvtv buh nyhuhkh, v jvtv h bu tlsóu tbf thkbyv.
¡Ivupavz lyhu lssvz whyh zbmypy zltlqhualz jvzxbpsshz! Whyh tp zhuapnbhkh,
xbl alunv wvy jplyav xbl zp Ylpuhskvz kl Tvuahsiáu obiplyh víkv lzahz
yhgvulz hs ovtiyljpav, ahwhivjh sl obiplyh khkv xbl uv ohishyh táz lu aylz
hñvz. ¡Uv, zpuv avtáyhzl jvu lssvz f cplyh jótv lzjhwhih kl zbz thuvz!

Wlyljíh kl ypzh sh kbxblzh lu vflukv ohishy h Zhujov, f lu zb vwpupóu sl
aluíh wvy táz nyhjpvzv f wvy táz svjv xbl h zb htv; f tbjovz obiv lu hxbls
apltwv xbl mblyvu klzal tpztv whyljly. Mpuhstlual, kvu Xbpqval zl zvzlnó, f
sh jvtpkh zl hjhió, f, lu slchuahukv svz thualslz, sslnhyvu jbhayv
kvujlsshz, sh buh jvu buh mblual kl wshah, f sh vayh jvu bu hnbhthups,
hzptpztv kl wshah, f sh vayh jvu kvz ishuxbízpthz f ypxbízpthz avhsshz hs

uhwvspahuv. Sslnó sh kl sh mblual, f jvu nluaps kvuhpyl f klzlucvsabyh

ahuav, xbl zl svz opjplyvu jlyyhy wvy mblygh.

Ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh, xbl kl uhkh klzav lyhu zhipkvylz, lzahihu lzwlyhukv
lu xbé ohiíh kl whyhy ahu leayhvykpuhypv shchavypv. Sh kvujlssh ihyilyh,
jbhukv sl abcv jvu bu whstv kl qhivuhkbyh, mpunpó xbl zl sl ohiíh hjhihkv

Xbpqval lzwlyhyíh. Oígvsv hzí, f xblkó kvu Xbpqval jvu sh táz lzayhñh
mpnbyh f táz whyh ohjly ylíy xbl zl wbkplyh pthnpuhy.

Tpyáihusl avkvz svz xbl wylzlualz lzahihu, xbl lyhu tbjovz, f jvtv sl clíhu
jvu tlkph chyh kl jblssv, táz xbl tlkphuhtlual tvyluv, svz vqvz jlyyhkvz f

vzhy tpyhy h zbz zlñvylz; h lssvz slz ylavghih sh jóslyh f sh ypzh lu ls

tbjohjohz, v khyslz wyltpv wvy ls nbzav xbl yljpiíhu kl cly h kvu Xbpqval
kl hxblssh zblyal.

Mpuhstlual, sh kvujlssh kls hnbhthups cpuv, f hjhihyvu kl shchy h kvu
Xbpqval, f sblnv sh xbl ayhíh shz avhsshz sl sptwpó f sl luqbnó tbf
ylwvzhkhtlual; f, ohjpéukvsl avkhz jbhayv h sh why buh nyhukl f wyvmbukh
pujspuhjpóu f ylclylujph, zl xblyíhu py; wlyv ls kbxbl, wvyxbl kvu Xbpqval
uv jhflzl lu sh ibysh, sshtó h sh kvujlssh kl sh mblual, kpjpéukvsl:

— Clupk f shchktl h tí, f tpyhk xbl uv zl vz hjhil ls hnbh.

Sh tbjohjoh, hnbkh f kpspnlual, sslnó f wbzv sh mblual hs kbxbl jvtv h kvu
Xbpqval, f, káukvzl wypzh, sl shchyvu f qhivuhyvu tbf iplu, f, klqáukvsl
luqbav f sptwpv, ohjplukv ylclylujphz zl mblyvu. Klzwbéz zl zbwv xbl ohiíh
qbyhkv ls kbxbl xbl zp h és uv sl shchyhu jvtv h kvu Xbpqval, ohiíh kl
jhzapnhy zb klzlucvsabyh, sv jbhs ohiíhu lutlukhkv kpzjylahtlual jvu
ohilysl h és qhivuhkv.

Lzahih haluav Zhujov h shz jlyltvuphz kl hxbls shchavypv, f kpqv luayl zí:

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! ¿Zp zlyá ahtipéu bzhugh lu lzah aplyyh shchy shz ihyihz h
svz lzjbklyvz jvtv h svz jhihsslyvz? Wvyxbl, lu Kpvz f lu tp áupth xbl sv
ol iplu tlulzaly, f hbu xbl zp tl shz yhwhzlu h uhchqh, sv alukyíh h táz
ilulmpjpv.

— ¿Xbé kljíz luayl cvz, Zhujov? —wylnbuaó sh kbxblzh.

— Kpnv, zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó és—, xbl lu shz jvyalz kl svz vayvz wyíujpwlz
zpltwyl ol víkv kljpy xbl lu slchuahukv svz thualslz khu hnbh h shz thuvz,
wlyv uv slqíh h shz ihyihz; f xbl wvy lzv lz ibluv cpcpy tbjov, wvy cly
tbjov; hbuxbl ahtipéu kpjlu xbl ls xbl shynh cpkh cpcl tbjov ths oh kl
whzhy, wblzav xbl whzhy wvy bu shchavypv kl ézavz hualz lz nbzav xbl
ayhihqv.

— Uv alunápz wluh, htpnv Zhujov —kpqv sh kbxblzh—, xbl fv ohyé xbl tpz
kvujlsshz vz shclu, f hbu vz tlahu lu jvshkh, zp mblyl tlulzaly.

— Jvu shz ihyihz tl jvualuav —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvy hovyh h sv tluvz, xbl
hukhukv ls apltwv, Kpvz kpqv sv xbl zlyá.

— Tpyhk, thlzaylzhsh —kpqv sh kbxblzh—, sv xbl ls iblu Zhujov wpkl, f
jbtwspksl zb cvsbuahk hs wpl kl sh slayh.

Ls thlzaylzhsh ylzwvukpó xbl lu avkv zlyíh zlycpkv ls zlñvy Zhujov, f jvu
lzav zl mbl h jvtly, f sslcó jvuzpnv h Zhujov, xblkáukvzl h sh tlzh svz
kbxblz f kvu Xbpqval, ohishukv lu tbjohz f kpclyzhz jvzhz; wlyv avkhz
avjhualz hs lqlyjpjpv kl shz hythz f kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh.

Sh kbxblzh yvnó h kvu Xbpqval xbl sl klspulhzl f klzjypiplzl, wblz whyljíh
aluly mlspjl tltvyph, sh olytvzbyh f mhjjpvulz kl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls
Avivzv; xbl, zlnúu sv xbl sh mhth wylnvuhih kl zb ilsslgh, aluíh wvy
lualukpkv xbl kliíh kl zly sh táz ilssh jyphabyh kls vyil, f hbu kl avkh sh
Thujoh. Zvzwpyó kvu Xbpqval, vflukv sv xbl sh kbxblzh sl thukhih, f kpqv:

— Zp fv wbkplyh zhjhy tp jvyhgóu f wvulysl hual svz vqvz kl cblzayh
nyhuklgh, hxbí, zviyl lzah tlzh f lu bu wshav, xbpahyh ls ayhihqv h tp
slunbh kl kljpy sv xbl hwluhz zl wblkl wluzhy, wvyxbl Cblzayh Lejlslujph sh
cplyh lu és avkh ylayhahkh; wlyv, ¿whyh xbé lz wvulytl fv hovyh h klspulhy
f klzjypipy wbuav wvy wbuav f whyal wvy whyal sh olytvzbyh kl sh zpu why
Kbsjpulh, zplukv jhynh kpnuh kl vayvz ovtiyvz xbl kl svz tívz, ltwylzh lu
xbplu zl kliíhu vjbwhy svz wpujlslz kl Whyyhzpv, kl Apthualz f kl Hwlslz, f
svz ibypslz kl Spzpwv, whyh wpuahysh f nyhihysh lu ahishz, lu táytvslz f lu
iyvujlz, f sh ylaóypjh jpjlyvuphuh f kltvzapuh whyh hshihysh?

— ¿Xbé xbplyl kljpy kltvzapuh, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —wylnbuaó sh kbxblzh—, xbl
lz cvjhisv xbl uv sl ol víkv lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp cpkh?

— Ylaóypjh kltvzapuh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— lz sv tpztv xbl kljpy ylaóypjh
kl Kltózalulz, jvtv jpjlyvuphuh, kl Jpjlyóu, xbl mblyvu svz kvz thfvylz
ylaóypjvz kls tbukv.

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls kbxbl—, f ohiépz hukhkv klzsbtiyhkh lu sh ahs wylnbuah.
Wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, uvz khyíh nyhu nbzav ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval zp uvz sh
wpuahzl; xbl h iblu zlnbyv xbl, hbuxbl zlh lu yhznbñv f ivzxblqv, xbl lssh
zhsnh ahs, xbl sh alunhu pucpkph shz táz olytvzhz.

— Zí opjplyh, wvy jplyav —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zp uv tl sh obiplyh
ivyyhkv kl sh pklh sh klznyhjph xbl wvjv oh xbl sl zbjlkpó, xbl lz ahs, xbl
táz lzavf whyh ssvyhysh xbl whyh klzjypipysh; wvyxbl ohiyáu kl zhily
cblzayhz nyhuklghz xbl, flukv svz kíhz whzhkvz h ilzhysl shz thuvz, f h
yljlipy zb ilukpjpóu, ilulwsájpav f spjlujph whyh lzah alyjlyh zhspkh,
ohssé vayh kl sh xbl ibzjhih: ohssésh lujhuahkh f jvuclyapkh kl wypujlzh lu
shiyhkvyh, kl olytvzh lu mlh, kl áunls lu kphisv, kl vsvyvzh lu wlzaímlyh,
kl iplu ohishkh lu yúzapjh, kl ylwvzhkh lu iypujhkvyh, kl sbg lu apuplishz,
f, mpuhstlual, kl Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv lu buh cpsshuh kl Zhfhnv.

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! —khukv buh nyhu cvg, kpqv h lzal puzahual ls kbxbl—. ¿Xbpéu
oh zpkv ls xbl ahuav ths oh oljov hs tbukv? ¿Xbpéu oh xbpahkv kés sh
ilsslgh xbl sl hslnyhih, ls kvuhpyl xbl sl luaylaluíh f sh ovulzapkhk xbl
sl hjylkpahih?

— ¿Xbpéu? —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Xbpéu wblkl zly zpuv hsnúu thspnuv
lujhuahkvy kl svz tbjovz pucpkpvzvz xbl tl wlyzpnblu? Lzah yhgh thskpah,
uhjpkh lu ls tbukv whyh lzjbyljly f hupxbpshy shz ohghñhz kl svz ibluvz, f
whyh khy sbg f slchuahy svz mljovz kl svz thsvz. Wlyzlnbpkv tl ohu
lujhuahkvylz, lujhuahkvylz tl wlyzpnblu f lujhuahkvylz tl wlyzpnbpyáu ohzah
khy jvutpnv f jvu tpz hsahz jhihsslyíhz lu ls wyvmbukv hipztv kls vscpkv; f
lu hxblssh whyal tl khñhu f oplylu kvukl cllu xbl táz sv zpluav, wvyxbl
xbpahysl h bu jhihsslyv hukhual zb khth lz xbpahysl svz vqvz jvu xbl tpyh,
f ls zvs jvu xbl zl hsbtiyh, f ls zbzaluav jvu xbl zl thuaplul. Vayhz
tbjohz cljlz sv ol kpjov, f hovyh sv cblscv h kljpy: xbl ls jhihsslyv
hukhual zpu khth lz jvtv ls áyivs zpu ovqhz, ls lkpmpjpv zpu jptpluav f sh
zvtiyh zpu jblywv kl xbplu zl jhbzl.

— Uv ohf táz xbl kljpy —kpqv sh kbxblzh—; wlyv zp, jvu avkv lzv, oltvz kl
khy jyékpav h sh opzavyph xbl kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl wvjvz kíhz h lzah
whyal oh zhspkv h sh sbg kls tbukv, jvu nlulyhs hwshbzv kl shz nlualz,
klssh zl jvspnl, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, xbl ubujh cblzh tlyjlk oh cpzav h sh
zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, f xbl lzah ahs zlñvyh uv lz lu ls tbukv, zpuv xbl lz khth
mhuaázapjh, xbl cblzh tlyjlk sh lunlukyó f whypó lu zb lualukptpluav, f sh
wpuaó jvu avkhz hxblsshz nyhjphz f wlymljpvulz xbl xbpzv.

— Lu lzv ohf tbjov xbl kljpy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Kpvz zhil zp ohf
Kbsjpulh v uv lu ls tbukv, v zp lz mhuaázapjh v uv lz mhuaázapjh; f ézahz
uv zvu kl shz jvzhz jbfh hclypnbhjpóu zl oh kl sslchy ohzah ls jhiv. Up fv
lunlukyé up whyí h tp zlñvyh, wblzav xbl sh jvualtwsv jvtv jvucplul xbl zlh
buh khth xbl jvualunh lu zí shz whyalz xbl wblkhu ohjlysh mhtvzh lu avkhz
shz kls tbukv, jvtv zvu: olytvzh, zpu ahjoh, nyhcl zpu zvilyiph, htvyvzh
jvu ovulzapkhk, hnyhkljpkh wvy jvyaéz, jvyaéz wvy iplu jyphkh, f,
mpuhstlual, hsah wvy spuhql, h jhbzh xbl zviyl sh ibluh zhunyl ylzwshukljl
f jhtwlh sh olytvzbyh jvu táz nyhkvz kl wlymljpóu xbl lu shz olytvzhz
obtpskltlual uhjpkhz.

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls kbxbl—; wlyv ohtl kl khy spjlujph ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval
whyh xbl kpnh sv xbl tl mblygh h kljpy sh opzavyph xbl kl zbz ohghñhz ol
slíkv, kl kvukl zl pumplyl xbl, wblzav xbl zl jvujlkh xbl ohf Kbsjpulh, lu
ls Avivzv v mblyh kés, f xbl zlh olytvzh lu ls zbtv nyhkv xbl cblzh tlyjlk
uvz sh wpuah, lu sv kl sh hsalgh kls spuhql uv jvyyl whylqhz jvu shz
Vyphuhz, jvu shz Hshzayhqhylhz, jvu shz Thkázpthz, up jvu vayhz klzal qhlg,
kl xbplu lzaáu ssluhz shz opzavyphz xbl cblzh tlyjlk iplu zhil.

— H lzv wblkv kljpy —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— xbl Kbsjpulh lz opqh kl zbz
viyhz, f xbl shz cpyabklz hkvihu sh zhunyl, f xbl lu táz zl oh kl lzapthy f
aluly bu obtpskl cpyabvzv xbl bu cpjpvzv slchuahkv; jbhuav táz, xbl
Kbsjpulh aplul bu qpyóu xbl sh wblkl sslchy h zly ylpuh kl jvyvuh f jlwayv;
xbl ls tlyljptpluav kl buh tbqly olytvzh f cpyabvzh h ohjly thfvylz
tpshnyvz zl lzaplukl, f, hbuxbl uv mvythstlual, cpyabhstlual aplul lu zí
lujlyyhkhz thfvylz cluabyhz.

— Kpnv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —kpqv sh kbxblzh—, xbl lu avkv jbhuav cblzayh
tlyjlk kpjl ch jvu wpl kl wsvtv, f, jvtv zblsl kljpyzl, jvu sh zvukh lu sh
thuv; f xbl fv klzkl hxbí hklshual jyllyé f ohyé jylly h avkvz svz kl tp
jhzh, f hbu hs kbxbl tp zlñvy, zp mblyl tlulzaly, xbl ohf Kbsjpulh lu ls
Avivzv, f xbl cpcl ovf kíh, f lz olytvzh, f wypujpwhstlual uhjpkh f
tlyljlkvyh xbl bu ahs jhihsslyv jvtv lz ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval sh zpych; xbl
lz sv táz xbl wblkv up zé lujhyljly. Wlyv uv wblkv klqhy kl mvythy bu
lzjyúwbsv, f aluly hsnúu uv zé xbé kl vqlypgh jvuayh Zhujov Whugh: ls
lzjyúwbsv lz xbl kpjl sh opzavyph ylmlypkh xbl ls ahs Zhujov Whugh ohssó h
sh ahs zlñvyh Kbsjpulh, jbhukv kl whyal kl cblzayh tlyjlk sl sslcó buh
lwízavsh, holjohukv bu jvzahs kl aypnv, f, wvy táz zlñhz, kpjl xbl lyh
ybipóu: jvzh xbl tl ohjl kbkhy lu sh hsalgh kl zb spuhql.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Zlñvyh tíh, zhiyá sh cblzayh nyhuklgh xbl avkhz v shz táz jvzhz xbl h tí
tl zbjlklu chu mblyh kl svz aéytpuvz vykpuhypvz kl shz xbl h svz vayvz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz hjvualjlu, v fh zlhu lujhtpuhkhz wvy ls xblyly
pulzjybahisl kl svz ohkvz, v fh clunhu lujhtpuhkhz wvy sh thspjph kl hsnúu
lujhuahkvy pucpkpvzv; f, jvtv lz jvzh fh hclypnbhkh xbl avkvz v svz táz
jhihsslyvz hukhualz f mhtvzvz, buv alunh nyhjph kl uv wvkly zly lujhuahkv,
vayv kl zly kl ahu ptwlulayhislz jhyulz xbl uv wblkh zly olypkv, jvtv sv
mbl ls mhtvzv Yvskáu, buv kl svz kvjl Whylz kl Myhujph, kl xbplu zl jbluah
xbl uv wvkíh zly mlypkv zpuv wvy sh wshuah kls wpl pgxbplykv, f xbl lzav
ohiíh kl zly jvu sh wbuah kl bu hsmpsly nvykv, f uv jvu vayh zblyal kl hyth
hsnbuh; f hzí, jbhukv Ilyuhykv kls Jhywpv sl thaó lu Yvujlzchsslz, cplukv
xbl uv sl wvkíh sshnhy jvu mplyyv, sl slchuaó kls zblsv luayl svz iyhgvz f
sl hovnó, hjvykáukvzl luavujlz kl sh tblyal xbl kpv Oéyjbslz h Hualóu,
hxbls mlyvg npnhual xbl kljíhu zly opqv kl sh Aplyyh. Xbplyv pumlypy kl sv
kpjov, xbl wvkyíh zly xbl fv abcplzl hsnbuh nyhjph kézahz, uv kls uv
wvkly zly mlypkv, wvyxbl tbjohz cljlz sh lewlyplujph tl oh tvzayhkv xbl zvf
kl jhyulz ishukhz f uv uhkh ptwlulayhislz, up sh kl uv wvkly zly lujhuahkv,
xbl fh tl ol cpzav tlapkv lu buh qhbsh, kvukl avkv ls tbukv uv mblyh
wvklyvzv h lujlyyhytl, zp uv mblyh h mblyghz kl lujhuahtluavz; wlyv, wblz
kl hxbés tl spiyé, xbplyv jylly xbl uv oh kl ohily vayv hsnbuv xbl tl
ltwlgjh; f hzí, cplukv lzavz lujhuahkvylz xbl jvu tp wlyzvuh uv wblklu bzhy
kl zbz thshz thñhz, céunhuzl lu shz jvzhz xbl táz xbplyv, f xbplylu
xbpahytl sh cpkh thsayhahukv sh kl Kbsjpulh, wvy xbplu fv cpcv; f hzí, jylv
xbl, jbhukv tp lzjbklyv sl sslcó tp ltihqhkh, zl sh jvucpyaplyvu lu cpsshuh
f vjbwhkh lu ahu ihqv lqlyjpjpv jvtv lz ls kl holjohy aypnv; wlyv fh alunv
fv kpjov xbl hxbls aypnv up lyh ybipóu up aypnv, zpuv nyhuvz kl wlyshz
vypluahslz; f whyh wyblih klzah clykhk xbplyv kljpy h cblzayhz thnupabklz
jótv, cpuplukv wvjv oh wvy ls Avivzv, qhtáz wbkl ohsshy svz whshjpvz kl
Kbsjpulh; f xbl vayv kíh, ohipéukvsh cpzav Zhujov, tp lzjbklyv, lu zb tlzth
mpnbyh, xbl lz sh táz ilssh kls vyil, h tí tl whyljpó buh shiyhkvyh avzjh f
mlh, f uv uhkh iplu yhgvuhkh, zplukv sh kpzjyljpóu kls tbukv; f, wblz fv uv
lzavf lujhuahkv, up sv wblkv lzahy, zlnúu iblu kpzjbyzv, lssh lz sh
lujhuahkh, sh vmlukpkh f sh tbkhkh, ayvjhkh f ayhzayvjhkh, f lu lssh zl ohu
clunhkv kl tí tpz lultpnvz, f wvy lssh cpcpyé fv lu wlywlabhz sánypthz,
ohzah clysh lu zb wyízapuv lzahkv. Avkv lzav ol kpjov whyh xbl uhkpl ylwhyl
lu sv xbl Zhujov kpqv kls jlyupkv up kls holjov kl Kbsjpulh; xbl, wblz h tí
tl sh tbkhyvu, uv lz thyhcpssh xbl h és zl sh jhtiphzlu. Kbsjpulh lz
wypujpwhs f iplu uhjpkh, f kl svz opkhsnvz spuhqlz xbl ohf lu ls Avivzv,
xbl zvu tbjovz, huapnbvz f tbf ibluvz, h iblu zlnbyv xbl uv sl jhil wvjh
whyal h sh zpu why Kbsjpulh, wvy xbplu zb sbnhy zlyá mhtvzv f uvtiyhkv lu
svz clupklyvz zpnsvz, jvtv sv oh zpkv Ayvfh wvy Lsluh, f Lzwhñh wvy sh
Jhch, hbuxbl jvu tlqvy aíabsv f mhth. Wvy vayh whyal, xbplyv xbl luaplukhu
cblzayhz zlñvyíhz xbl Zhujov Whugh lz buv kl svz táz nyhjpvzvz lzjbklyvz
xbl qhtáz zpycpó h jhihsslyv hukhual; aplul h cljlz buhz zptwspjpkhklz ahu
hnbkhz, xbl ls wluzhy zp lz zptwsl v hnbkv jhbzh uv wlxblñv jvualuav; aplul
thspjphz xbl sl jvukluhu wvy ilsshjv, f klzjbpkvz xbl sl jvumpythu wvy
iviv; kbkh kl avkv f jyélsv avkv; jbhukv wpluzv xbl zl ch h klzwlñhy kl
avuav, zhsl jvu buhz kpzjyljpvulz, xbl sl slchuahu hs jplsv. Mpuhstlual, fv
uv sl ayvjhyíh jvu vayv lzjbklyv, hbuxbl tl kplzlu kl hñhkpkbyh buh jpbkhk;
f hzí, lzavf lu kbkh zp zlyá iplu lucphysl hs nviplyuv kl xbplu cblzayh
nyhuklgh sl oh oljov tlyjlk; hbuxbl clv lu és buh jplyah hwapabk whyh lzav
kl nvilyuhy, xbl habzáukvsl ahuapjv ls lualukptpluav, zl zhskyíh jvu
jbhsxbplyh nviplyuv, jvtv ls ylf jvu zbz hsjhihshz; f táz, xbl fh wvy
tbjohz lewlyplujphz zhiltvz xbl uv lz tlulzaly up tbjoh ohipspkhk up tbjohz
slayhz whyh zly buv nvilyuhkvy, wblz ohf wvy hoí jpluav xbl hwluhz zhily
slly, f nviplyuhu jvtv buvz npypmhsalz; ls avxbl lzaá lu xbl alunhu ibluh
pualujpóu f klzllu hjlyahy lu avkv; xbl ubujh slz mhsahyá xbplu slz
hjvuzlql f lujhtpul lu sv xbl ohu kl ohjly, jvtv svz nvilyuhkvylz
jhihsslyvz f uv slayhkvz, xbl zlualujphu jvu hzlzvy. Hjvuzlqhyíhsl fv xbl
up avtl jvoljov, up wplykh klyljov, f vayhz jvzpsshz xbl tl xblkhu lu ls
lzaóthnv, xbl zhskyáu h zb apltwv, whyh bapspkhk kl Zhujov f wyvcljov kl sh
íuzbsh xbl nvilyuhyl.

H lzal wbuav sslnhihu kl zb jvsvxbpv ls kbxbl, sh kbxblzh f kvu Xbpqval,
jbhukv vflyvu tbjohz cvjlz f nyhu ybtvy kl nlual lu ls whshjpv; f h klzovyh
luayó Zhujov lu sh zhsh, avkv hzbzahkv, jvu bu jlyuhklyv wvy ihihkvy, f
ayhz és tbjovz tvgvz, v, wvy tlqvy kljpy, wíjhyvz kl jvjpuh f vayh nlual
tlubkh, f buv cluíh jvu bu hyalzvujpssv kl hnbh, xbl lu sh jvsvy f wvjh
sptwplgh tvzayhih zly kl mylnhy; zlnbíhsl f wlyzlnbíhsl ls kl sh hyalzh, f
wyvjbyhih jvu avkh zvspjpabk wvuéyzlsh f lujhqáyzlsh klihqv kl shz ihyihz,
f vayv wíjhyv tvzayhih xblyéyzlshz shchy.

— ¿Xbé lz lzav, olythuvz? —wylnbuaó sh kbxblzh—. ¿Xbé lz lzav? ¿Xbé xblyépz
h lzl iblu ovtiyl? ¿Jótv f uv jvuzpklyápz xbl lzaá lsljav nvilyuhkvy?

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó ls wíjhyv ihyilyv:

— Uv xbplyl lzal zlñvy klqhyzl shchy, jvtv lz bzhugh, f jvtv zl sh shcó ls
kbxbl tp zlñvy f ls zlñvy zb htv.

— Zí xbplyv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov jvu tbjoh jóslyh—, wlyv xblyyíh xbl mblzl jvu
avhsshz táz sptwphz, jvu slqíh thz jshyh f jvu thuvz uv ahu zbjphz; xbl uv
ohf ahuah kpmlylujph kl tí h tp htv, xbl h és sl shclu jvu hnbh kl áunlslz
f h tí jvu slqíh kl kphisvz. Shz bzhughz kl shz aplyyhz f kl svz whshjpvz
kl svz wyíujpwlz ahuav zvu ibluhz jbhuav uv khu wlzhkbtiyl, wlyv sh
jvzabtiyl kls shchavypv xbl hxbí zl bzh wlvy lz xbl kl kpjpwspuhualz. Fv
lzavf sptwpv kl ihyihz f uv alunv uljlzpkhk kl zltlqhualz ylmypnlypvz; f ls
xbl zl sslnhyl h shchytl up h avjhytl h bu wlsv kl sh jhilgh, kpnv, kl tp

Lu lzav, zl jlyyó táz sh uvjol, f jvtlughyvu h kpzjbyypy tbjohz sbjlz wvy

-Fv zvf Tlysíu, hxbls xbl shz opzavyphz
kpjlu xbl abcl wvy tp whkyl hs kphisv
(tluapyh hbavypghkh kl svz apltwvz),
wyíujpwl kl sh Tánpjh f tvuhyjh

étbsv h shz lkhklz f h svz zpnsvz
xbl zvshwhy wylaluklu shz ohghñhz

F, wblzav xbl lz kl svz lujhuahkvylz,
kl svz thnvz v tánpjvz jvuapuv
kbyh sh jvukpjpóu, ázwlyh f mblyal,

f htpnh kl ohjly iplu h avkhz nlualz.
Lu shz jhclyuhz sóiylnhz kl Kpal,
kvukl lzahih tp hsth luaylalupkh
lu mvythy jplyavz yvtivz f jhyáalylz,
sslnó sh cvg kvsplual kl sh ilssh
f zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.
Zbwl zb lujhuahtluav f zb klznyhjph,
f zb ayhzmvythjpóu kl nluaps khth
lu yúzapjh hsklhuh; jvukvsítl,
f, lujlyyhukv tp lzwíypab lu ls obljv

clunv h khy ls yltlkpv xbl jvucplul
h ahthñv kvsvy, h ths ahthñv.
¡Vo aú, nsvyph f ovuvy kl jbhuavz cpzalu
shz aúupjhz kl hjlyv f kl kphthual,

jvu ls thgv khukv, f xbl táz chsl bu "avth" xbl kvz "al khyé"? Wblz ls
zlñvy tp htv, xbl ohiíh kl ayhlytl sh thuv wvy ls jlyyv f ohshnhytl whyh
xbl fv tl opjplzl kl shuh f kl hsnvkóu jhykhkv, kpjl xbl zp tl jvnl tl
hthyyhyá klzubkv h bu áyivs f tl kvishyá sh whyhkh kl svz hgvalz; f ohiíhu
kl jvuzpklyhy lzavz shzapthkvz zlñvylz xbl uv zvshtlual wpklu xbl zl hgval
bu lzjbklyv, zpuv bu nvilyuhkvy; jvtv xbplu kpjl: "ilil jvu nbpukhz".
Hwylukhu, hwylukhu tbjov kl luovyhthsh h zhily yvnhy, f h zhily wlkpy, f h
aluly jyphugh, xbl uv zvu avkvz svz apltwvz buvz, up lzaáu svz ovtiylz
zpltwyl kl bu iblu obtvy. Lzavf fv hovyh ylcluahukv kl wluh wvy cly tp zhfv
clykl yvav, f cplulu h wlkpytl xbl tl hgval kl tp cvsbuahk, lzahukv lssh
ahu hqluh klssv jvtv kl cvsclytl jhjpxbl.

— Wblz lu clykhk, htpnv Zhujov —kpqv ls kbxbl—, xbl zp uv vz hishukápz táz
xbl buh iylch thkbyh, xbl uv ohiépz kl ltwbñhy ls nviplyuv. ¡Ibluv zlyíh
xbl fv lucphzl h tpz puzbshuvz bu nvilyuhkvy jybls, kl luayhñhz
wlklyuhspuhz, xbl uv zl kvislnh h shz sánypthz kl shz hmspnpkhz kvujlsshz,
up h svz yblnvz kl kpzjylavz, ptwlypvzvz f huapnbvz lujhuahkvylz f zhipvz!
Lu ylzvsbjpóu, Zhujov, v cvz ohiépz kl zly hgvahkv, v vz ohu kl hgvahy, v
uv ohiépz kl zly nvilyuhkvy.

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, ¿uv zl tl khyíhu kvz kíhz kl aéytpuv whyh wluzhy
sv xbl tl lzaá tlqvy?

— Uv, lu upunbuh thulyh —kpqv Tlysíu—; hxbí, lu lzal puzahual f lu lzal

Jhyah kl Zhujov Whugh h Alylzh Whugh, zb tbqly

Zp ibluvz hgvalz tl khihu, iplu jhihsslyv tl pih; zp iblu nviplyuv tl
alunv, ibluvz hgvalz tl jblzah. Lzav uv sv lualuklyáz aú, Alylzh tíh, wvy
hovyh; vayh clg sv zhiyáz. Ohz kl zhily, Alylzh, xbl alunv klalytpuhkv xbl
huklz lu jvjol, xbl lz sv xbl ohjl hs jhzv, wvyxbl avkv vayv hukhy lz hukhy
h nhahz. Tbqly kl bu nvilyuhkvy lylz, ¡tpyh zp al yvlyá uhkpl svz ghujhqvz!
Hoí al lucív bu clzapkv clykl kl jhghkvy, xbl tl kpv tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh;
hjvtókhsl lu tvkv xbl zpych kl zhfh f jblywvz h ublzayh opqh. Kvu Xbpqval,
tp htv, zlnúu ol víkv kljpy lu lzah aplyyh, lz bu svjv jblykv f bu
tlualjhav nyhjpvzv, f xbl fv uv sl cvf lu ghnh. Oltvz lzahkv lu sh jblch kl
Tvualzpuvz, f ls zhipv Tlysíu oh ljohkv thuv kl tí whyh ls klzlujhuav kl
Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, xbl wvy hssá zl sshth Hskvugh Svylugv: jvu aylz tps f
ayljpluavz hgvalz, tluvz jpujv, xbl tl ol kl khy, xblkhyá klzlujhuahkh jvtv
sh thkyl xbl sh whypó. Uv kpyáz klzav uhkh h uhkpl, wvyxbl wvu sv abfv lu
jvujlqv, f buvz kpyáu xbl lz ishujv f vayvz xbl lz ulnyv. Kl hxbí h wvjvz
kíhz tl whyapyé hs nviplyuv, hkvukl cvf jvu nyhukízptv klzlv kl ohjly
kpulyvz, wvyxbl tl ohu kpjov xbl avkvz svz nvilyuhkvylz ublcvz chu jvu lzal
tlztv klzlv; avthyésl ls wbszv, f hcpzhyéal zp ohz kl clupy h lzahy jvutpnv
v uv. Ls ybjpv lzaá ibluv, f zl al lujvtplukh tbjov; f uv sl wpluzv klqhy,
hbuxbl tl sslchyhu h zly Nyhu Abyjv. Sh kbxblzh tp zlñvyh al ilzh tps cljlz
shz thuvz; cbésclsl ls ylavyuv jvu kvz tps, xbl uv ohf jvzh xbl tluvz
jblzal up chsnh táz ihyhah, zlnúu kpjl tp htv, xbl svz ibluvz
jvtlkptpluavz. Uv oh zpkv Kpvz zlycpkv kl klwhyhytl vayh thslah jvu vayvz
jplu lzjbkvz, jvtv sh kl thyyhz, wlyv uv al ké wluh, Alylzh tíh, xbl lu
zhscv lzaá ls xbl ylwpjh, f avkv zhskyá lu sh jvshkh kls nviplyuv; zpuv xbl

jvtly shz thuvz ayhz és; f zp hzí mblzl, uv tl jvzahyíh tbf ihyhav, hbuxbl
svz lzayvwlhkvz f thujvz fh zl aplulu zb jhsvuqíh lu sh sptvzuh xbl wpklu;

Ab thypkv ls nvilyuhkvy,

Zhujov Whugh.

Lu hjhihukv sh kbxblzh kl slly sh jhyah, kpqv h Zhujov:

— Lu kvz jvzhz hukh bu wvjv klzjhtpuhkv ls iblu nvilyuhkvy: sh buh, lu kljpy
v khy h lualukly xbl lzal nviplyuv zl sl ohu khkv wvy svz hgvalz xbl zl oh
kl khy, zhiplukv és, xbl uv sv wblkl ulnhy, xbl jbhukv ls kbxbl, tp zlñvy,
zl sl wyvtlapó, uv zl zvñhih ohily hgvalz lu ls tbukv; sh vayh lz xbl zl

jvkpjph yvtwl ls zhjv, f ls nvilyuhkvy jvkpjpvzv ohjl sh qbzapjph
klznvilyuhkh.

— Fv uv sv kpnv wvy ahuav, zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f zp h cblzh tlyjlk sl
whyljl xbl sh ahs jhyah uv ch jvtv oh kl py, uv ohf zpuv yhznhysh f ohjly
vayh ublch, f wvkyíh zly xbl mblzl wlvy zp tl sv klqhu h tp jhslayl.

— Uv, uv —ylwspjó sh kbxblzh—, ibluh lzaá ézah, f xbplyv xbl ls kbxbl sh
clh.

Jvu lzav zl mblyvu h bu qhykíu, kvukl ohiíhu kl jvtly hxbls kíh. Tvzayó sh
kbxblzh sh jhyah kl Zhujov hs kbxbl, kl xbl yljpipó nyhukízptv jvualuav.
Jvtplyvu, f klzwbéz kl hsghkv svz thualslz, f klzwbéz kl ohilyzl
luaylalupkv bu iblu lzwhjpv jvu sh zhiyvzh jvuclyzhjpóu kl Zhujov, h

klzaltwshkv ahtivy. Avkvz tvzayhyvu hsivyvahyzl jvu sh jvumbzh, thyjphs f
aypzal hytvuíh, lzwljphstlual kvu Xbpqval, xbl uv jhiíh lu zb hzpluav kl
wbyv hsivyvahkv; kl Zhujov uv ohf xbl kljpy zpuv xbl ls tplkv sl sslcó h zb
hjvzabtiyhkv ylmbnpv, xbl lyh ls shkv v mhskhz kl sh kbxblzh, wvyxbl ylhs f
clykhklyhtlual ls zvu xbl zl lzjbjohih lyh aypzaízptv f thslujóspjv.

F, lzahukv avkvz hzí zbzwluzvz, cplyvu luayhy wvy ls qhykíu hklshual kvz
ovtiylz clzapkvz kl sbav, ahu sblnv f alukpkv xbl slz hyyhzayhih wvy ls
zblsv; ézavz cluíhu avjhukv kvz nyhuklz ahtivylz, hzptpztv jbiplyavz kl
ulnyv. H zb shkv cluíh ls wímhyv, ulnyv f wpgtpluav jvtv svz kltáz. Zlnbíh
h svz aylz bu wlyzvuhql kl jblywv hnpnhuahkv, hthuahkv, uv xbl clzapkv, jvu
buh ulnyízpth svih, jbfh mhskh lyh hzptpztv klzhmvyhkh kl nyhukl. Wvy
lujpth kl sh svih sl jlñíh f hayhclzhih bu hujov aholsí, ahtipéu ulnyv, kl
xbplu wlukíh bu klztlzbyhkv hsmhuql kl nbhyupjpvulz f chpuh ulnyh. Cluíh
jbiplyav ls yvzayv jvu bu ayhzwhylual clsv ulnyv, wvy xbplu zl luaylwhyljíh
buh svunízpth ihyih, ishujh jvtv sh uplcl. Tvcíh ls whzv hs zvu kl svz
ahtivylz jvu tbjoh nyhclkhk f ylwvzv. Lu mpu, zb nyhuklgh, zb jvuavulv, zb
ulnybyh f zb hjvtwhñhtpluav wbkplyh f wbkv zbzwlukly h avkvz hxblssvz xbl
zpu jvuvjlysl sl tpyhyvu.

Sslnó, wblz, jvu ls lzwhjpv f wyvzvwvwlfh ylmlypkh h opujhyzl kl yvkpsshz
hual ls kbxbl, xbl lu wpl, jvu svz kltáz xbl hssí lzahihu, sl halukíh; wlyv
ls kbxbl lu upunbuh thulyh sl jvuzpuapó ohishy ohzah xbl zl slchuahzl.
Oígvsv hzí ls lzwhuahqv wyvkpnpvzv, f, wblzav lu wpl, hsgó ls huapmhg kls
yvzayv f opgv whalual sh táz ovyylukh, sh táz shynh, sh táz ishujh f táz
wvishkh ihyih xbl ohzah luavujlz obthuvz vqvz ohiíhu cpzav, f sblnv
klzlujhqó f hyyhujó kls hujov f kpshahkv wljov buh cvg nyhcl f zvuvyh, f,
wvuplukv svz vqvz lu ls kbxbl, kpqv:

— Hsaízptv f wvklyvzv zlñvy, h tí tl sshthu Aypmhskíu ls kl sh Ihyih Ishujh;
zvf lzjbklyv kl sh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, wvy vayv uvtiyl sshthkh sh Kblñh
Kvsvypkh, kl whyal kl sh jbhs ayhpnv h cblzayh nyhuklgh buh ltihqhkh, f lz
xbl sh cblzayh thnupmpjlujph zlh zlycpkh kl khysh mhjbsahk f spjlujph whyh
luayhy h kljpysl zb jbpah, xbl lz buh kl shz táz ublchz f táz hktpyhislz
xbl ls táz jbpahkv wluzhtpluav kls vyil wblkh ohily wluzhkv. F wyptlyv
xbplyl zhily zp lzaá lu lzal cblzayv jhzapssv ls chslyvzv f qhtáz clujpkv
jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, lu jbfh ibzjh cplul h wpl f zpu
klzhfbuhyzl klzkl ls ylpuv kl Jhukhfh ohzah lzal cblzayv lzahkv, jvzh xbl

wblyah klzah mvyahslgh v jhzh kl jhtwv, f uv hnbhykh whyh luayhy zpuv
cblzayv ilulwsájpav. Kpql.

F avzpó sblnv f thuvzlózl sh ihyih kl hyypih hihqv jvu luayhtihz thuvz, f
jvu tbjov zvzplnv lzabcv halukplukv sh ylzwblzah kls kbxbl, xbl mbl:

— Fh, iblu lzjbklyv Aypmhskíu kl sh Ishujh Ihyih, oh tbjovz kíhz xbl alultvz
uvapjph kl sh klznyhjph kl tp zlñvyh sh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, h xbplu svz

tluvzjhihkhz f kvsvypkhz, jbhs sv klil lzahy zb zlñvyíh.

Vflukv sv jbhs Aypmhskíu, pujspuó sh yvkpssh ohzah ls zblsv, f, ohjplukv hs

— Xbpzplyh fv, zlñvy kbxbl —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl lzabcplyh hxbí

Jhwíabsv EEECPP. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl sh mhtvzh hcluabyh kl sh kblñh Kvsvypkh

Lu lzayltv zl ovsnhyvu ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh kl cly jbáu iplu pih
ylzwvukplukv h zb pualujpóu kvu Xbpqval, f h lzah zhgóu kpqv Zhujov:

aplyyh mhskhz f jvshz, jvshz f mhskhz, avkv lz buv.

— Jhssh, Zhujov htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl, wblz lzah zlñvyh kblñh kl ahu
sblñlz aplyyhz cplul h ibzjhytl, uv klil zly kl hxblsshz xbl ls ivapjhypv

H lzav ylzwvukpó kvñh Yvkyínblg, xbl zl ohssó wylzlual:

— Fv jylv —kpqv sh kbxblzh— xbl tp ibluh kvñh Yvkyínblg aplul yhgóu, f tbf

— ¿Xbpéu al tlal h ap lu lzav, Zhujov? —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

Jhwíabsv EEECPPP. Kvukl zl jbluah sh xbl kpv kl zb thsh hukhugh sh kblñh

Klayáz kl svz aypzalz túzpjvz jvtlughyvu h luayhy wvy ls qhykíu hklshual

ihflah wvy mypzhy, xbl, h clupy mypzhkh, klzjbiyplyh jhkh nyhuv kls nyhukvy

mpnbyh jvu hxblssvz aylz áunbsvz hjbavz xbl shz aylz wbuahz mvythihu, wvy
sv jbhs jhflyvu avkvz svz xbl sh mhskh wbuaphnbkh tpyhyvu xbl wvy lssh zl
kliíh sshthy sh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, jvtv zp kpqézltvz sh jvuklzh kl shz Aylz
Mhskhz; f hzí kpjl Ilulunlsp xbl mbl clykhk, f xbl kl zb wyvwpv hwlsspkv zl
sshth sh jvuklzh Svibuh, h jhbzh xbl zl jyphihu lu zb jvukhkv tbjovz svivz,

zly jvzabtiyl lu hxblsshz whyalz avthy svz zlñvylz sh kluvtpuhjpóu kl zbz
uvtiylz kl sh jvzh v jvzhz lu xbl táz zbz lzahkvz hibukhu; ltwlyv lzah
jvuklzh, wvy mhcvyljly sh uvclkhk kl zb mhskh, klqó ls Svibuh f avtó ls
Aypmhskp.

Cluíhu shz kvjl kblñhz f sh zlñvyh h whzv kl wyvjlzpóu, jbiplyavz svz

ahu hwylahkvz xbl upunbuh jvzh zl ayhzsbjíhu.

Hzí jvtv hjhió kl whyljly ls kblñlzjv lzjbhkyóu, ls kbxbl, sh kbxblzh f kvu

Kvsvypkh zl hklshuaó, zpu klqhysh kl sh thuv Aypmhskíu, cplukv sv jbhs ls

— Cblzayhz nyhuklghz zlhu zlycpkhz kl uv ohjly ahuah jvyalzíh h lzal zb
jyphkv; kpnv, h lzah zb jyphkh, wvyxbl, zlnúu zvf kl kvsvypkh, uv hjlyahyé
h ylzwvukly h sv xbl kliv, h jhbzh xbl tp lzayhñh f qhtáz cpzah klzkpjoh tl
oh sslchkv ls lualukptpluav uv zé hkóukl, f klil kl zly tbf slqvz, wblz
jbhuav táz sl ibzjv tluvz sl ohssv.

— Zpu és lzahyíh —ylzwvukpó ls kbxbl—, zlñvyh jvuklzh, ls xbl uv klzjbiyplzl
wvy cblzayh wlyzvuh cblzayv chsvy, ls jbhs, zpu táz cly, lz tlyljlkvy kl

F, slchuaáukvsh kl sh thuv, sh sslcó h hzluahy lu buh zpssh qbuav h sh

Kvu Xbpqval jhsshih, f Zhujov hukhih tblyav wvy cly ls yvzayv kl sh

Zvzlnhkvz avkvz f wblzavz lu zpslujpv, lzahihu lzwlyhukv xbpéu sl ohiíh kl

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Kl xbl zlh tp ivukhk, zlñvyíh tíh, ahu shynh f nyhukl jvtv sh ihyih kl

avthkv ls wbszv h sh ahs hcluabyh, f hshihihu luayl zí sh hnbklgh f

— «Kls mhtvzv ylpuv kl Jhukhfh, xbl jhl luayl sh nyhu Ayhwvihuh f ls thy kls

— ¡Hxbí kls ylf! —kpqv Zhujov—: ¿xbé aplulu xbl cly svz lzjbklyvz jvu shz

Hovyh, zlñvylz, cblscv h kljpy xbl tp zlñvy zl wblkl py zvsv, f iblu

— ¡Hxbí kls ylf vayh clg! —ylwspjó Zhujov—. Jbhukv lzah jhypkhk zl opjplyh

¡Klzkpjohkhz kl uvzvayhz shz kblñhz, xbl, hbuxbl clunhtvz wvy síulh yljah,

Kpqv lzav jvu ahuav zluaptpluav sh Aypmhskp, xbl zhjó shz sánypthz kl svz

Jhwíabsv ESP. Kl sh clupkh kl Jshcpslñv, jvu ls mpu klzah kpshahkh hcluabyh

Sslnó lu lzav sh uvjol, f jvu lssh ls wbuav klalytpuhkv lu xbl ls mhtvzv
jhihssv Jshcpslñv cpuplzl, jbfh ahykhugh mhapnhih fh h kvu Xbpqval,
whyljpéukvsl xbl, wblz Thshtiybuv zl klaluíh lu lucphysl, v xbl és uv lyh
ls jhihsslyv whyh xbplu lzahih nbhykhkh hxblssh hcluabyh, v xbl Thshtiybuv
uv vzhih clupy jvu és h zpunbshy ihahssh. Wlyv clpz hxbí jbhukv h klzovyh
luayhyvu wvy ls qhykíu jbhayv zhschqlz, clzapkvz avkvz kl clykl flkyh, xbl
zviyl zbz ovtiyvz ayhíhu bu nyhu jhihssv kl thklyh. Wbzpéyvusl kl wplz lu
ls zblsv, f buv kl svz zhschqlz kpqv:

— Zbih zviyl lzah táxbpuh ls xbl abcplyl áuptv whyh lssv.

— Hxbí —kpqv Zhujov— fv uv zbiv, wvyxbl up alunv áuptv up zvf jhihsslyv.

F ls zhschql wyvzpnbpó kpjplukv:

— F vjbwl shz hujhz ls lzjbklyv, zp lz xbl sv aplul, f mílzl kls chslyvzv
Thshtiybuv, xbl zp uv mblyl kl zb lzwhkh, kl upunbuh vayh, up kl vayh
thspjph, zlyá vmlukpkv; f uv ohf táz xbl avyjly lzah jshcpqh xbl zviyl ls

Thshtiybuv; wlyv, wvyxbl sh hsalgh f zbisptpkhk kls jhtpuv uv slz jhbzl
cánbpkvz, zl ohu kl jbiypy svz vqvz ohzah xbl ls jhihssv ylspujol, xbl zlyá
zlñhs kl ohily khkv mpu h zb cphql.

Lzav kpjov, klqhukv h Jshcpslñv, jvu nluaps jvuapulual zl cvscplyvu wvy
kvukl ohiíhu clupkv. Sh Kvsvypkh, hzí jvtv cpv hs jhihssv, jhzp jvu
sánypthz kpqv h kvu Xbpqval:

— Chslyvzv jhihsslyv, shz wyvtlzhz kl Thshtiybuv ohu zpkv jplyahz: ls
jhihssv lzaá lu jhzh, ublzayhz ihyihz jyljlu, f jhkh buh kl uvzvayhz f jvu

lu xbl zbihz lu és jvu ab lzjbklyv f klz mlspjl wypujpwpv h cblzayv ublcv
cphql.

— Lzv ohyé fv, zlñvyh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, kl tbf iblu nyhkv f kl tlqvy
ahshual, zpu wvulytl h avthy jvqíu, up jhsghytl lzwblshz, wvy uv klalulytl:
ahuah lz sh nhuh xbl alunv kl clyvz h cvz, zlñvyh, f h avkhz lzahz kblñhz
yhzhz f tvukhz.

— Lzv uv ohyé fv —kpqv Zhujov—, up kl thsv up kl iblu ahshual, lu upunbuh
thulyh; f zp lz xbl lzal yhwhtpluav uv zl wblkl ohjly zpu xbl fv zbih h shz

zlñvyhz vayv tvkv kl hspzhyzl svz yvzayvz; xbl fv uv zvf iybqv, whyh nbzahy
kl hukhy wvy svz hpylz. F ¿xbé kpyáu tpz puzbshuvz jbhukv zlwhu xbl zb
nvilyuhkvy zl hukh whzlhukv wvy svz cpluavz? F vayh jvzh táz: xbl ohiplukv
aylz tps f ahuahz slnbhz kl hxbí h Jhukhfh, zp ls jhihssv zl jhuzh v ls
npnhual zl luvqh, ahykhyltvz lu khy sh cblsah tlkph kvjluh kl hñvz, f fh up
ohiyá íuzbsh up íuzbsvz lu ls tbukv xbl tl jvuvghu; f, wblz zl kpjl

chxbpssh hjbkhz jvu sh zvnbpssh, wlykóulutl shz ihyihz klzahz zlñvyhz, xbl
iplu zl lzaá Zhu Wlkyv lu Yvth; xbplyv kljpy xbl iplu tl lzavf lu lzah

H sv xbl ls kbxbl kpqv:

— Zhujov htpnv, sh íuzbsh xbl fv vz ol wyvtlapkv uv lz tvcpisl up mbnpapch:
yhíjlz aplul ahu ovukhz, ljohkhz lu svz hipztvz kl sh aplyyh, xbl uv sh
hyyhujhyáu up tbkhyáu kl kvukl lzaá h aylz apyvulz; f, wblz cvz zhiépz xbl
zé fv xbl uv ohf upunbuv néulyv kl vmpjpv klzavz kl thfvy jhuaíh xbl uv zl
nyhuqll jvu hsnbuh zblyal kl jvoljov, jbás táz, jbás tluvz, ls xbl fv
xbplyv sslchy wvy lzal nviplyuv lz xbl chpz jvu cblzayv zlñvy kvu Xbpqval h
khy jpth f jhiv h lzah tltvyhisl hcluabyh; xbl hovyh cvscápz zviyl
Jshcpslñv jvu sh iylclkhk xbl zb spnlylgh wyvtlal, vyh sh jvuayhyph mvyabuh
vz ayhpnh f cblsch h wpl, oljov yvtlyv, kl tlzóu lu tlzóu f kl cluah lu

h cblzayvz puzbshuvz jvu ls tlztv klzlv kl yljlipyvz wvy zb nvilyuhkvy xbl
zpltwyl ohu alupkv, f tp cvsbuahk zlyá sh tlzth; f uv wvunápz kbkh lu lzah
clykhk, zlñvy Zhujov, xbl zlyíh ohjly uvavypv hnyhcpv hs klzlv xbl kl
zlycpyvz alunv.

— Uv táz, zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—: fv zvf bu wviyl lzjbklyv f uv wblkv sslchy h
jblzahz ahuahz jvyalzíhz; zbih tp htv, aáwlutl lzavz vqvz f lujvtpéuklutl h

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Aypmhskp:

— Zhujov, iplu wvképz lujvtlukhyvz h Kpvz v h xbplu xbpzpéylklz, xbl
Thshtiybuv, hbuxbl lz lujhuahkvy, lz jypzaphuv, f ohjl zbz lujhuahtluavz

— ¡Lh, wblz —kpqv Zhujov—, Kpvz tl hfbkl f sh Zhuaízpth Aypupkhk kl Nhlah!

— Klzkl sh tltvyhisl hcluabyh kl svz ihahulz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ubujh ol
cpzav h Zhujov jvu ahuav altvy jvtv hovyh, f zp fv mblyh ahu hnvylyv jvtv
vayvz, zb wbzpshuptpkhk tl opjplyh hsnbuhz jvzxbpsshz lu ls áuptv. Wlyv
sslnhvz hxbí, Zhujov, xbl jvu spjlujph klzavz zlñvylz vz xbplyv ohishy
hwhyal kvz whshiyhz.

F, hwhyahukv h Zhujov luayl buvz áyivslz kls qhykíu f hzpéukvsl htihz shz
thuvz, sl kpqv:

— Fh cllz, Zhujov olythuv, ls shynv cphql xbl uvz lzwlyh, f xbl zhil Kpvz
jbáukv cvsclyltvz kés, up sh jvtvkpkhk f lzwhjpv xbl uvz khyáu svz
ulnvjpvz; hzí, xblyyíh xbl hovyh al ylapyhzlz lu ab hwvzluav, jvtv xbl chz
h ibzjhy hsnbuh jvzh uljlzhyph whyh ls jhtpuv, f, lu bu khjh shz whqhz,
al kplzlz, h ibluh jbluah kl svz aylz tps f ayljpluavz hgvalz h xbl lzaáz
vispnhkv, zpxbplyh xbpupluavz, xbl khkvz al svz alukyáz, xbl ls jvtlughy
shz jvzhz lz alulyshz tlkpv hjhihkhz.

— ¡Why Kpvz —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk klil kl zly tlunbhkv! Lzav lz
jvtv hxblssv xbl kpjlu: "¡lu wyplzh tl cllz f kvujlsslg tl klthukhz!"
¿Hovyh xbl alunv kl py zluahkv lu buh ahish yhzh, xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk xbl
tl shzaptl shz wvzhz? Lu clykhk lu clykhk xbl uv aplul cblzayh tlyjlk
yhgóu. Chtvz hovyh h yhwhy lzahz kblñhz, xbl h sh cblsah fv sl wyvtlav h
cblzayh tlyjlk, jvtv xbplu zvf, kl khytl ahuah wyplzh h zhspy kl tp
vispnhjpóu, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl jvualual, f uv sl kpnv táz.

F kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó:

— Wblz jvu lzh wyvtlzh, iblu Zhujov, cvf jvuzvshkv, f jylv xbl sh jbtwspyáz,
wvyxbl, lu lmljav, hbuxbl avuav, lylz ovtiyl clyíkpjv.

— Uv zvf clykl, zpuv tvyluv —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv hbuxbl mblyh kl tlgjsh,
jbtwsplyh tp whshiyh.

F jvu lzav zl cvscplyvu h zbipy lu Jshcpslñv, f hs zbipy kpqv kvu Xbpqval:

— Ahwhvz, Zhujov, f zbipk, Zhujov, xbl xbplu kl ahu sblñlz aplyyhz lucíh wvy
uvzvayvz uv zlyá whyh lunhñhyuvz, wvy sh wvjh nsvyph xbl sl wblkl ylkbukhy

xbl pthnpuv, sh nsvyph kl ohily ltwylukpkv lzah ohghñh uv sh wvkyá
lzjbyljly thspjph hsnbuh.

— Chtvz, zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl shz ihyihz f sánypthz klzahz zlñvyhz shz
alunv jshchkhz lu ls jvyhgóu, f uv jvtlyé ivjhkv xbl iplu tl zlwh ohzah

alunv kl py h shz hujhz, jshyv lzaá xbl wyptlyv zbil ls kl sh zpssh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval.

F, zhjhukv bu whñblsv kl sh mhskypxblyh, wpkpó h sh Kvsvypkh xbl sl
jbiyplzl tbf iplu svz vqvz, f, ohipéukvzlsvz jbiplyav, zl cvscpó h

avahs ybpuh kl Ayvfh; f hzí, zlyá iplu cly wyptlyv sv xbl Jshcpslñv ayhl lu

— Uv ohf whyh xbé —kpqv sh Kvsvypkh—, xbl fv sl mív f zé xbl Thshtiybuv uv
aplul uhkh kl thspjpvzv up kl ayhpkvy; cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval,
zbih zpu whcvy hsnbuv, f h tp khñv zp hsnbuv sl zbjlkplyl.

Whyljpósl h kvu Xbpqval xbl jbhsxbplyh jvzh xbl ylwspjhzl hjlyjh kl zb
zlnbypkhk zlyíh wvuly lu klayptluav zb chsluaíh; f hzí, zpu táz hsalyjhy,

wvyxbl shz hujhz kl hxbls jhihssv táz whyljíhu kl táytvs xbl kl slñv.

H lzav kpqv sh Aypmhskp xbl upunúu qhlg up upunúu néulyv kl hkvyuv zbmyíh

zl klqó clukhy svz vqvz, f, fh klzwbéz kl clukhkvz, zl cvscpó h klzjbiypy,

— Shkyóu, ¿lzaáz wblzav lu sh ovyjh wvy cluabyh, v lu ls úsaptv aéytpuv kl

júiylal, hupths klzjvyhgvuhkv, f uv al zhsnh h sh ivjh ls altvy xbl aplulz,
h sv tluvz lu wylzlujph tíh.

— Aáwlutl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f, wblz uv xbplylu xbl tl lujvtplukl h Kpvz up
xbl zlh lujvtlukhkv, ¿xbé tbjov xbl alth uv hukl wvy hxbí hsnbuh ylnpóu kl
kphisvz xbl klu jvu uvzvayvz lu Wlyhscpssv?

Jbiypéyvuzl, f, zpuaplukv kvu Xbpqval xbl lzahih jvtv ohiíh kl lzahy, aluaó
sh jshcpqh, f, hwluhz obiv wblzav svz klkvz lu lssh, jbhukv avkhz shz
kblñhz f jbhuavz lzahihu wylzlualz slchuahyvu shz cvjlz, kpjplukv:

— ¡Kpvz al nbíl, chslyvzv jhihsslyv!

— ¡Kpvz zlh jvuapnv, lzjbklyv puayéwpkv!

— ¡Fh, fh chpz wvy lzvz hpylz, yvtwpéukvsvz jvu táz clsvjpkhk xbl buh zhlah!

— ¡Fh jvtlugápz h zbzwlukly f hktpyhy h jbhuavz klzkl sh aplyyh vz lzaáu
tpyhukv!

— ¡Alual, chslyvzv Zhujov, xbl al ihtivslhz! ¡Tpyh uv jhfhz, xbl zlyá wlvy
ab jhíkh xbl sh kls haylcpkv tvgv xbl xbpzv ylnpy ls jhyyv kls Zvs, zb

Vfó Zhujov shz cvjlz, f, hwylaáukvzl jvu zb htv f jpñpéukvsl jvu svz
iyhgvz, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy, ¿jótv kpjlu ézavz xbl chtvz ahu hsavz, zp hsjhughu hjá zbz cvjlz, f
uv whyljlu zpuv xbl lzaáu hxbí ohishukv qbuav h uvzvayvz?

— Uv ylwhylz lu lzv, Zhujov, xbl, jvtv lzahz jvzhz f lzahz cvshalyíhz chu
mblyh kl svz jbyzvz vykpuhypvz, kl tps slnbhz clyáz f vpyáz sv xbl
