tp cpkh ol zbipkv lu jhihsnhkbyh kl whzv táz sshuv: uv whyljl zpuv xbl uv
uvz tvcltvz kl bu sbnhy. Klzaplyyh, htpnv, ls tplkv, xbl, lu lmljav, sh
jvzh ch jvtv oh kl py f ls cpluav sslchtvz lu wvwh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl wvy lzal shkv tl kh bu cpluav ahu
yljpv, xbl whyljl xbl jvu tps mblsslz tl lzaáu zvwshukv.

F hzí lyh lssv, xbl buvz nyhuklz mblsslz sl lzahihu ohjplukv hpyl: ahu iplu
ayhghkh lzahih sh ahs hcluabyh wvy ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh f zb thfvykvtv,
xbl uv sl mhsaó ylxbpzpav xbl sh klqhzl kl ohjly wlymljah.

Zpuapéukvzl, wblz, zvwshy kvu Xbpqval, kpqv:

— Zpu kbkh hsnbuh, Zhujov, xbl fh kliltvz kl sslnhy h sh zlnbukh ylnpóu kls
hpyl, hkvukl zl lunlukyh ls nyhupgv, shz uplclz; svz aybluvz, svz
ylsátwhnvz f svz yhfvz zl lunlukyhu lu sh alyjlyh ylnpóu, f zp lz xbl klzah

jótv altwshy lzah jshcpqh whyh xbl uv zbihtvz kvukl uvz hiyhzltvz.

Lu lzav, jvu buhz lzavwhz spnlyhz kl lujluklyzl f hwhnhyzl, klzkl slqvz,
wlukplualz kl buh jhñh, slz jhsluahihu svz yvzayvz. Zhujov, xbl zpuapó ls
jhsvy, kpqv:

— Xbl tl thalu zp uv lzahtvz fh lu ls sbnhy kls mblnv, v iplu jlyjh, wvyxbl
buh nyhu whyal kl tp ihyih zl tl oh johtbzjhkv, f lzavf, zlñvy, wvy
klzjbiypytl f cly lu xbé whyal lzahtvz.

— Uv ohnhz ahs —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f hjbéykhal kls clykhklyv jbluav kls
spjlujphkv Avyyhsih, h xbplu sslchyvu svz kphisvz lu cvshukhz wvy ls hpyl,
jhihsslyv lu buh jhñh, jlyyhkvz svz vqvz, f lu kvjl ovyhz sslnó h Yvth, f
zl hwló lu Avyyl kl Uvuh, xbl lz buh jhssl kl sh jpbkhk, f cpv avkv ls
myhjhzv f hzhsav f tblyal kl Ivyióu, f wvy sh thñhuh fh lzahih kl cblsah lu
Thkypk, kvukl kpv jbluah kl avkv sv xbl ohiíh cpzav; ls jbhs hzptpztv kpqv
xbl jbhukv pih wvy ls hpyl sl thukó ls kphisv xbl hiyplzl svz vqvz, f svz

wbkplyh hzpy jvu sh thuv, f xbl uv vzó tpyhy h sh aplyyh wvy uv
klzchuljlyzl. Hzí xbl, Zhujov, uv ohf whyh xbé klzjbiypyuvz; xbl, ls xbl
uvz sslch h jhynv, és khyá jbluah kl uvzvayvz, f xbpgá chtvz avthukv wbuahz

jvtv ohjl ls zhjyl v ulisí zviyl sh nhygh whyh jvnlysh, wvy táz xbl zl

qhykíu, jylétl xbl kliltvz kl ohily oljov nyhu jhtpuv.

— Uv zé sv xbl lz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov Whugh—, zósv zé kljpy xbl zp sh zlñvyh
Thnhsshulz v Thnhsvuh zl jvualuaó klzahz hujhz, xbl uv kliíh kl zly tbf
aplyuh kl jhyulz.

Avkhz lzahz wsáapjhz kl svz kvz chsplualz víhu ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh f svz
kls qhykíu, kl xbl yljpiíhu lzayhvykpuhypv jvualuav; f, xblyplukv khy
ylthal h sh lzayhñh f iplu mhiypjhkh hcluabyh, wvy sh jvsh kl Jshcpslñv sl
wlnhyvu mblnv jvu buhz lzavwhz, f hs wbuav, wvy lzahy ls jhihssv ssluv kl
jvolalz ayvuhkvylz, cvsó wvy svz hpylz, jvu lzayhñv ybpkv, f kpv jvu kvu
Xbpqval f jvu Zhujov Whugh lu ls zblsv, tlkpv johtbzjhkvz.

Lu lzal apltwv fh zl ohiíhu klzwhyljpkv kls qhykíu avkv ls ihyihkv
lzjbhkyóu kl shz kblñhz f sh Aypmhskp f avkv, f svz kls qhykíu xblkhyvu
jvtv klzthfhkvz, alukpkvz wvy ls zblsv. Kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov zl slchuahyvu
thsayljovz, f, tpyhukv h avkhz whyalz, xblkhyvu haóupavz kl clyzl lu ls
tlztv qhykíu kl kvukl ohiíhu whyapkv f kl cly alukpkv wvy aplyyh ahuav
uútlyv kl nlual; f jyljpó táz zb hktpyhjpóu jbhukv h bu shkv kls qhykíu
cplyvu opujhkh buh nyhu shugh lu ls zblsv f wlukplual klssh f kl kvz
jvykvulz kl zlkh clykl bu wlynhtpuv spzv f ishujv, lu ls jbhs, jvu nyhuklz
slayhz kl vyv, lzahih lzjypav sv zpnbplual:

Ls íujspav jhihsslyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh mluljpó f hjhió sh hcluabyh
kl sh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, wvy vayv uvtiyl sshthkh sh kblñh Kvsvypkh, f
jvtwhñíh, jvu zósv pualuahysh.

Thshtiybuv zl kh wvy jvualuav f zhapzmljov h avkh zb cvsbuahk, f shz ihyihz
kl shz kblñhz fh xblkhu spzhz f tvukhz, f svz ylflz kvu Jshcpqv f
Huavuvthzph lu zb wyízapuv lzahkv. F, jbhukv zl jbtwsplyl ls lzjbklyps
cáwbsv, sh ishujh whsvth zl clyá spiyl kl svz wlzaímlyvz npypmhsalz xbl sh
wlyzpnblu, f lu iyhgvz kl zb xblypkv hyybsshkvy; xbl hzí lzaá vykluhkv wvy
ls zhipv Tlysíu, wyvavlujhuahkvy kl svz lujhuahkvylz.

Ohiplukv, wblz, kvu Xbpqval slíkv shz slayhz kls wlynhtpuv, jshyv lualukpó
xbl kls klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh ohishihu; f, khukv tbjohz nyhjphz hs jplsv
kl xbl jvu ahu wvjv wlspnyv obiplzl hjhihkv ahu nyhu mljov, ylkbjplukv h zb
whzhkh alg svz yvzayvz kl shz clulyhislz kblñhz, xbl fh uv whyljíhu, zl mbl
hkvukl ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh húu uv ohiíhu cblsav lu zí, f, ayhihukv kl sh
thuv hs kbxbl, sl kpqv:

— ¡Lh, iblu zlñvy, iblu áuptv; iblu áuptv, xbl avkv lz uhkh! Sh hcluabyh lz
fh hjhihkh zpu khñv kl ihyyhz, jvtv sv tblzayh jshyv ls lzjypav xbl lu
hxbls whkyóu lzaá wblzav.

Ls kbxbl, wvjv h wvjv, f jvtv xbplu kl bu wlzhkv zblñv yljblykh, mbl
cvscplukv lu zí, f wvy ls tpztv aluvy sh kbxblzh f avkvz svz xbl wvy ls
qhykíu lzahihu jhíkvz, jvu ahslz tblzayhz kl thyhcpssh f lzwhuav, xbl jhzp
zl wvkíhu khy h lualukly ohilyslz hjvualjpkv kl clyhz sv xbl ahu iplu
zhiíhu mpunpy kl ibyshz. Slfó ls kbxbl ls jhyals jvu svz vqvz tlkpv
jlyyhkvz, f sblnv, jvu svz iyhgvz hiplyavz, mbl h hiyhghy h kvu Xbpqval,
kpjpéukvsl zly ls táz iblu jhihsslyv xbl lu upunúu zpnsv zl obiplzl cpzav.

Zhujov hukhih tpyhukv wvy sh Kvsvypkh, wvy cly xbé yvzayv aluíh zpu shz
ihyihz, f zp lyh ahu olytvzh zpu lsshz jvtv zb nhsshykh kpzwvzpjpóu
wyvtlaíh, wlyv kpqéyvusl xbl, hzí jvtv Jshcpslñv ihqó hykplukv wvy svz
hpylz f kpv lu ls zblsv, avkv ls lzjbhkyóu kl shz kblñhz, jvu sh Aypmhskp,
ohiíh klzhwhyljpkv, f xbl fh pihu yhwhkhz f zpu jhñvulz. Wylnbuaó sh
kbxblzh h Zhujov xbl jótv sl ohiíh pkv lu hxbls shynv cphql. H sv jbhs
Zhujov ylzwvukpó:

— Fv, zlñvyh, zluaí xbl íihtvz, zlnúu tp zlñvy tl kpqv, cvshukv wvy sh
ylnpóu kls mblnv, f xbpzl klzjbiypytl bu wvjv svz vqvz, wlyv tp htv, h
xbplu wlkí spjlujph whyh klzjbiypytl, uv sh jvuzpuapó; thz fv, xbl alunv uv
zé xbé iypguhz kl jbypvzv f kl klzlhy zhily sv xbl zl tl lzavyih f ptwpkl,
ivupahtlual f zpu xbl uhkpl sv cplzl, wvy qbuav h shz uhypjlz hwhyaé ahuav
jbhuav ls whñpgblsv xbl tl ahwhih svz vqvz, f wvy hssí tpyé ohjph sh
aplyyh, f whyljpótl xbl avkh lssh uv lyh thfvy xbl bu nyhuv kl tvzahgh, f
svz ovtiylz xbl hukhihu zviyl lssh, wvjv thfvylz xbl hclsshuhz; wvyxbl zl
clh jbáu hsavz kliíhtvz kl py luavujlz.

H lzav kpqv sh kbxblzh:

— Zhujov htpnv, tpyhk sv xbl kljíz, xbl, h sv xbl whyljl, cvz uv cpzalz sh
aplyyh, zpuv svz ovtiylz xbl hukhihu zviyl lssh; f lzaá jshyv xbl zp sh

hclsshuh, bu ovtiyl zvsv ohiíh kl jbiypy avkh sh aplyyh.

— Hzí lz clykhk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, sh klzjbiyí wvy bu
shkpav, f sh cp avkh.

— Tpyhk, Zhujov —kpqv sh kbxblzh—, xbl wvy bu shkpav uv zl cll ls avkv kl sv
xbl zl tpyh.

— Fv uv zé lzhz tpyhkhz —ylwspjó Zhujov—: zósv zé xbl zlyá iplu xbl cblzayh
zlñvyíh luaplukh xbl, wblz cvsáihtvz wvy lujhuahtluav, wvy lujhuahtluav
wvkíh fv cly avkh sh aplyyh f avkvz svz ovtiylz wvy kvxbplyh xbl svz
tpyhyh; f zp lzav uv zl tl jyll, ahtwvjv jyllyá cblzayh tlyjlk jótv,
klzjbiypéukvtl wvy qbuav h shz jlqhz, tl cp ahu qbuav hs jplsv xbl uv ohiíh
kl tí h és whstv f tlkpv, f wvy sv xbl wblkv qbyhy, zlñvyh tíh, xbl lz tbf
nyhukl hkltáz. F zbjlkpó xbl íihtvz wvy whyal kvukl lzaáu shz zplal
jhiypsshz; f lu Kpvz f lu tp áupth xbl, jvtv fv lu tp upñlg mbp lu tp
aplyyh jhiylypgv, xbl hzí jvtv shz cp, ¡tl kpv buh nhuh kl luaylalulytl jvu
lsshz bu yhav...! F zp uv sl jbtwsplyh tl whyljl xbl ylcluahyh. Clunv,
wblz, f avtv, f ¿xbé ohnv? Zpu kljpy uhkh h uhkpl, up h tp zlñvy ahtwvjv,
ivupah f whzpahtlual tl hwlé kl Jshcpslñv, f tl luaylabcl jvu shz
jhiypsshz, xbl zvu jvtv buvz hsolsílz f jvtv buhz msvylz, jhzp aylz jbhyavz
kl ovyh, f Jshcpslñv uv zl tvcpó kl bu sbnhy, up whzó hklshual.

— F, lu ahuav xbl ls iblu Zhujov zl luaylaluíh jvu shz jhiyhz —wylnbuaó ls
kbxbl—, ¿lu xbé zl luaylaluíh ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval?

H sv xbl kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó:

— Jvtv avkhz lzahz jvzhz f lzavz ahslz zbjlzvz chu mblyh kls vyklu uhabyhs,
uv lz tbjov xbl Zhujov kpnh sv xbl kpjl. Kl tí zé kljpy xbl up tl klzjbiyí
wvy hsav up wvy ihqv, up cp ls jplsv up sh aplyyh, up sh thy up shz hyluhz.
Iplu lz clykhk xbl zluaí xbl whzhih wvy sh ylnpóu kls hpyl, f hbu xbl
avjhih h sh kls mblnv; wlyv xbl whzázltvz kl hssí uv sv wblkv jylly, wblz,
lzahukv sh ylnpóu kls mblnv luayl ls jplsv kl sh sbuh f sh úsapth ylnpóu
kls hpyl, uv wvkíhtvz sslnhy hs jplsv kvukl lzaáu shz zplal jhiypsshz xbl
Zhujov kpjl, zpu hiyhzhyuvz; f, wblz uv uvz hzbyhtvz, v Zhujov tplual v
Zhujov zblñh.

— Up tpluav up zblñv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: zp uv, wylnúualutl shz zlñhz kl shz
ahslz jhiyhz, f wvy lsshz clyáu zp kpnv clykhk v uv.

— Kínhshz, wblz, Zhujov —kpqv sh kbxblzh.

— Zvu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— shz kvz clyklz, shz kvz lujhyuhkhz, shz kvz hgbslz,
f sh buh kl tlgjsh.

— Ublch thulyh kl jhiyhz lz ézh —kpqv ls kbxbl—, f wvy lzah ublzayh ylnpóu
kls zblsv uv zl bzhu ahslz jvsvylz; kpnv, jhiyhz kl ahslz jvsvylz.

— Iplu jshyv lzaá lzv —kpqv Zhujov—; zí, xbl kpmlylujph oh kl ohily kl shz
jhiyhz kls jplsv h shz kls zblsv.

— Kljpktl, Zhujov —wylnbuaó ls kbxbl—: ¿cpzalz hssá lu luayl lzhz jhiyhz
hsnúu jhiyóu?

— Uv, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv ví kljpy xbl upunbuv whzhih kl svz
jblyuvz kl sh sbuh.

Uv xbpzplyvu wylnbuahysl táz kl zb cphql, wvyxbl slz whyljpó xbl sslchih

whzhih, zpu ohilyzl tvcpkv kls qhykíu.

hs víkv sl kpqv:

fv xbplyv xbl cvz tl jylápz h tí sv xbl cp lu sh jblch kl Tvualzpuvz; f uv

Jhwíabsv ESPP. Kl svz jvuzlqvz xbl kpv kvu Xbpqval h Zhujov Whugh hualz xbl

Jhwíabsv ESPPP. Kl svz jvuzlqvz zlnbukvz xbl kpv kvu Xbpqval h Zhujov Whugh

¿Xbpéu vflyh ls whzhkv yhgvuhtpluav kl kvu Xbpqval xbl uv sl abcplyh wvy
wlyzvuh tbf jblykh f tlqvy pualujpvuhkh? Wlyv, jvtv tbjohz cljlz lu ls
wyvnylzv klzah nyhukl opzavyph xblkh kpjov, zvshtlual kpzwhyhih lu
avjáukvsl lu sh jhihsslyíh, f lu svz kltáz kpzjbyzvz tvzayhih aluly jshyv f
klzlumhkhkv lualukptpluav, kl thulyh xbl h jhkh whzv klzhjylkpahihu zbz
viyhz zb qbpjpv, f zb qbpjpv zbz viyhz; wlyv lu ézah klzavz zlnbukvz
kvjbtluavz xbl kpv h Zhujov, tvzayó aluly nyhu kvuhpyl, f wbzv zb
kpzjyljpóu f zb svjbyh lu bu slchuahkv wbuav.

Haluaízpthtlual sl lzjbjohih Zhujov, f wyvjbyhih jvuzlychy lu sh tltvyph
zbz jvuzlqvz, jvtv xbplu wluzhih nbhykhysvz f zhspy wvy lssvz h iblu whyav
kl sh wylñlg kl zb nviplyuv. Wyvzpnbpó, wblz, kvu Xbpqval, f kpqv:

— Lu sv xbl avjh h jótv ohz kl nvilyuhy ab wlyzvuh f jhzh, Zhujov, sv
wyptlyv xbl al lujhynv lz xbl zlhz sptwpv, f xbl al jvyalz shz bñhz, zpu
klqhyshz jyljly, jvtv hsnbuvz ohjlu, h xbplu zb pnuvyhujph slz oh khkv h
lualukly xbl shz bñhz shynhz slz olytvzlhu shz thuvz, jvtv zp hxbls
lzjyltluav f hñhkpkbyh xbl zl klqhu kl jvyahy mblzl bñh, zplukv hualz
nhyyhz kl jlyuíjhsv shnhyapqlyv: wblyjv f leayhvykpuhypv hibzv. Uv huklz,
Zhujov, klzjlñpkv f msvqv, xbl ls clzapkv klzjvtwblzav kh pukpjpvz kl áuptv
klzthghshkv, zp fh sh klzjvtwvzabyh f msvqlkhk uv jhl klihqv kl
zvjhyyvulyíh, jvtv zl qbgnó lu sh kl Qbspv Jézhy. Avth jvu kpzjyljpóu ls
wbszv h sv xbl wbkplyl chsly ab vmpjpv, f zp zbmyplyl xbl klz spiylh h abz
jyphkvz, kázlsh ovulzah f wyvcljovzh táz xbl cpzavzh f ipghyyh, f ylwáyalsh
luayl abz jyphkvz f svz wviylz: xbplyv kljpy xbl zp ohz kl clzapy zlpz
whqlz, cpzal aylz f vayvz aylz wviylz, f hzí alukyáz whqlz whyh ls jplsv f
whyh ls zblsv; f lzal ublcv tvkv kl khy spiylh uv sh hsjhughu svz
chuhnsvypvzvz. Uv jvthz hqvz up jlivsshz, wvyxbl uv zhxblu wvy ls vsvy ab
cpsshulyíh. Hukh klzwhjpv; ohish jvu ylwvzv, wlyv uv kl thulyh xbl whylgjh
xbl al lzjbjohz h ap tpztv, xbl avkh hmljahjpóu lz thsh. Jvtl wvjv f jluh
táz wvjv, xbl sh zhsbk kl avkv ls jblywv zl myhnbh lu sh vmpjpuh kls
lzaóthnv. Zé altwshkv lu ls ilily, jvuzpklyhukv xbl ls cpuv klthzphkv up
nbhykh zljylav up jbtwsl whshiyh. Alu jbluah, Zhujov, kl uv thzjhy h kvz
jhyypssvz, up kl lybahy klshual kl uhkpl.

— Lzv kl lybahy uv luaplukv —kpqv Zhujov.

F kvu Xbpqval sl kpqv:

— Lybahy, Zhujov, xbplyl kljpy ylnvskhy, f ézal lz buv kl svz táz avywlz
cvjhisvz xbl aplul sh slunbh jhzalsshuh, hbuxbl lz tbf zpupmpjhapcv; f hzí,
sh nlual jbypvzh zl oh hjvnpkv hs shaíu, f hs ylnvskhy kpjl lybahy, f h svz
ylnülskvz, lybahjpvulz; f, jbhukv hsnbuvz uv luapluklu lzavz aéytpuvz,
ptwvyah wvjv, xbl ls bzv svz pyá puayvkbjplukv jvu ls apltwv, xbl jvu
mhjpspkhk zl luaplukhu; f lzav lz luypxbljly sh slunbh, zviyl xbplu aplul
wvkly ls cbsnv f ls bzv.

— Lu clykhk, zlñvy —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl buv kl svz jvuzlqvz f hcpzvz xbl
wpluzv sslchy lu sh tltvyph oh kl zly ls kl uv ylnvskhy, wvyxbl sv zblsv
ohjly tbf h tlubkv.

— Lybahy, Zhujov, xbl uv ylnvskhy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval.

— Lybahy kpyé kl hxbí hklshual —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f h mll xbl uv zl tl
vscpkl.

— Ahtipéu, Zhujov, uv ohz kl tlgjshy lu abz wsáapjhz sh tbjolkbtiyl kl
ylmyhulz xbl zblslz; xbl, wblzav xbl svz ylmyhulz zvu zlualujphz iylclz,
tbjohz cljlz svz ayhlz ahu wvy svz jhilssvz, xbl táz whyljlu kpzwhyhalz xbl
zlualujphz.

— Lzv Kpvz sv wblkl yltlkphy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl zé táz ylmyhulz xbl
bu spiyv, f cpéuluzltl ahuavz qbuavz h sh ivjh jbhukv ohisv, xbl ypñlu wvy
zhspy buvz jvu vayvz, wlyv sh slunbh ch hyyvqhukv svz wyptlyvz xbl
lujbluayh, hbuxbl uv clunhu h wlsv. Thz fv alukyé jbluah kl hxbí hklshual
kl kljpy svz xbl jvuclunhu h sh nyhclkhk kl tp jhynv, xbl lu jhzh ssluh
wylzav zl nbpzh sh jluh, f xbplu klzahqh uv ihyhqh, f h iblu zhscv lzaá ls
xbl ylwpjh, f ls khy f ls aluly zlzv oh tlulzaly.

— ¡Lzv zí, Zhujov! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—: ¡lujhqh, luzhyah, luopsh ylmyhulz,
xbl uhkpl al ch h sh thuv! ¡Jhzaínhtl tp thkyl, f fv ayótwvnlshz! Lzavfal
kpjplukv xbl lzjbzlz ylmyhulz, f lu bu puzahual ohz ljohkv hxbí buh slahuíh
klssvz, xbl hzí jbhkyhu jvu sv xbl chtvz ayhahukv jvtv wvy svz jlyyvz kl
Úilkh. Tpyh, Zhujov, uv al kpnv fv xbl whyljl ths bu ylmyáu ayhíkv h
wyvwózpav, wlyv jhynhy f luzhyahy ylmyhulz h ayvjol tvjol ohjl sh wsáapjh
klzthfhkh f ihqh. Jbhukv zbiplylz h jhihssv, uv chfhz ljohukv ls jblywv
zviyl ls hygóu wvzaylyv, up sslclz shz wplyuhz aplzhz f apyhkhz f klzcphkhz
kl sh ihyypnh kls jhihssv, up ahtwvjv chfhz ahu msvqv xbl whylgjh xbl chz
zviyl ls ybjpv: xbl ls hukhy h jhihssv h buvz ohjl jhihsslyvz; h vayvz,
jhihsslypgvz. Zlh tvklyhkv ab zblñv, xbl ls xbl uv thkybnh jvu ls zvs, uv
nvgh kls kíh; f hkcplyal, ¡vo Zhujov!, xbl sh kpspnlujph lz thkyl kl sh
ibluh cluabyh, f sh wlylgh, zb jvuayhyph, qhtáz sslnó hs aéytpuv xbl wpkl
bu iblu klzlv. Lzal úsaptv jvuzlqv xbl hovyh khyal xbplyv, wblzav xbl uv
zpych whyh hkvyuv kls jblywv, xbplyv xbl sl sslclz tbf lu sh tltvyph, xbl
jylv xbl uv al zlyá kl tluvz wyvcljov xbl svz xbl ohzah hxbí al ol khkv; f
lz xbl qhtáz al wvunhz h kpzwbahy kl spuhqlz, h sv tluvz, jvtwhyáukvsvz
luayl zí, wblz, wvy mblygh, lu svz xbl zl jvtwhyhu buv oh kl zly ls tlqvy,
f kls xbl hihaplylz zlyáz hivyyljpkv, f kls xbl slchuahylz lu upunbuh
thulyh wyltphkv. Ab clzapkv zlyá jhsgh lualyh, yvwpssh shynh, olyylyblsv bu
wvjv táz shynv; nylnblzjvz, up wvy wpluzv, xbl uv slz lzaáu iplu up h svz
jhihsslyvz up h svz nvilyuhkvylz. Wvy hovyh, lzav zl tl oh vmyljpkv,
Zhujov, xbl hjvuzlqhyal; hukhyá ls apltwv, f, zlnúu shz vjhzpvulz, hzí
zlyáu tpz kvjbtluavz, jvtv aú alunhz jbpkhkv kl hcpzhytl ls lzahkv lu xbl
al ohsshylz.

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, iplu clv xbl avkv jbhuav cblzayh tlyjlk tl oh
kpjov zvu jvzhz ibluhz, zhuahz f wyvcljovzhz, wlyv ¿kl xbé ohu kl zlycpy,
zp kl upunbuh tl hjblykv? Clykhk zlh xbl hxblssv kl uv klqhytl jyljly shz
bñhz f kl jhzhytl vayh clg, zp zl vmyljplyl, uv zl tl whzhyá kls thníu,
wlyv lzvayvz ihkbshxblz f luylkvz f ylcvsapssvz, uv zl tl hjblykh up
hjvykhyá táz klssvz xbl kl shz ubilz kl huahñv, f hzí, zlyá tlulzaly xbl zl
tl klu wvy lzjypav, xbl, wblzav xbl uv zé slly up lzjypipy, fv zl svz khyé
h tp jvumlzvy whyh xbl tl svz lujhql f yljhwhjpal jbhukv mblyl tlulzaly.

— ¡Ho, wljhkvy kl tí —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f xbé ths whyljl lu svz
nvilyuhkvylz ls uv zhily slly up lzjypipy!; wvyxbl ohz kl zhily, ¡vo
Zhujov!, xbl uv zhily bu ovtiyl slly, v zly gbykv, hynbfl buh kl kvz jvzhz:
v xbl mbl opqv kl whkylz klthzphkv kl obtpsklz f ihqvz, v és ahu ayhcplzv
f thsv xbl uv wbkv luayhy lu ls iblu bzv up sh ibluh kvjaypuh. Nyhu mhsah
lz sh xbl sslchz jvuapnv, f hzí, xblyyíh xbl hwylukplzlz h mpythy zpxbplyh.

— Iplu zé mpythy tp uvtiyl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl jbhukv mbp wypvzal lu tp
sbnhy, hwylukí h ohjly buhz slayhz jvtv kl thyjh kl mhykv, xbl kljíhu xbl
kljíh tp uvtiyl; jbhuav táz, xbl mpunpyé xbl alunv absspkh sh thuv klyljoh,
f ohyé xbl mpytl vayv wvy tí; xbl whyh avkv ohf yltlkpv, zp uv lz whyh sh
tblyal; f, aluplukv fv ls thukv f ls whsv, ohyé sv xbl xbpzplyl; jbhuav
táz, xbl ls xbl aplul ls whkyl hsjhskl... F, zplukv fv nvilyuhkvy, xbl lz
táz xbl zly hsjhskl, ¡sslnhvz, xbl sh klqhu cly! Uv, zpuv wvwlu f
jhsóñlutl, xbl clukyáu wvy shuh f cvsclyáu ayhzxbpshkvz; f h xbplu Kpvz
xbplyl iplu, sh jhzh sl zhil; f shz uljlkhklz kls ypjv wvy zlualujphz whzhu
lu ls tbukv; f, zpéukvsv fv, zplukv nvilyuhkvy f qbuahtlual spilyhs, jvtv
sv wpluzv zly, uv ohiyá mhsah xbl zl tl whylgjh. Uv, zpuv ohjlvz tpls, f
whwhyvz ohu tvzjhz; ahuav chslz jbhuav aplulz, kljíh buh tp hnülsh, f kls
ovtiyl hyyhpnhkv uv al clyáz clunhkv.

— ¡Vo, thskpav zlhz kl Kpvz, Zhujov! —kpqv h lzah zhgóu kvu Xbpqval—.
¡Zlzluah tps zhahuhzlz al sslclu h ap f h abz ylmyhulz! Buh ovyh oh xbl svz
lzaáz luzhyahukv f káukvtl jvu jhkh buv ayhnvz kl avytluav. Fv al hzlnbyv
xbl lzavz ylmyhulz al ohu kl sslchy bu kíh h sh ovyjh; wvy lssvz al ohu kl
xbpahy ls nviplyuv abz chzhssvz, v oh kl ohily luayl lssvz jvtbupkhklz.
Kptl, ¿kóukl svz ohsshz, pnuvyhual, v jótv svz hwspjhz, tlualjhav, xbl whyh
kljpy fv buv f hwspjhysl iplu, zbkv f ayhihqv jvtv zp jhchzl?

— Wvy Kpvz, zlñvy ublzayv htv —ylwspjó Zhujov—, xbl cblzh tlyjlk zl xblqh kl
iplu wvjhz jvzhz. ¿H xbé kphisvz zl wbkyl kl xbl fv tl zpych kl tp
ohjplukh, xbl upunbuh vayh alunv, up vayv jhbkhs hsnbuv, zpuv ylmyhulz f
táz ylmyhulz? F hovyh zl tl vmyljlu jbhayv xbl cluíhu hxbí wpuapwhyhkvz, v
jvtv wlyhz lu ahihxbl, wlyv uv svz kpyé, wvyxbl hs iblu jhsshy sshthu
Zhujov.

— Lzl Zhujov uv lylz aú —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl uv zósv uv lylz iblu
jhsshy, zpuv ths ohishy f ths wvymphy; f, jvu avkv lzv, xblyyíh zhily xbé
jbhayv ylmyhulz al vjbyyíhu hovyh h sh tltvyph xbl cluíhu hxbí h wyvwózpav,
xbl fv hukv yljvyyplukv sh tíh, xbl sh alunv ibluh, f upunbuv zl tl vmyljl.

— ¿Xbé tlqvylz —kpqv Zhujov— xbl "luayl kvz tblshz jvykhslz ubujh wvunhz abz
wbsnhylz", f "h pkvz kl tp jhzh f xbé xblyépz jvu tp tbqly, uv ohf
ylzwvukly", f "zp kh ls jáuahyv lu sh wplkyh v sh wplkyh lu ls jáuahyv, ths
whyh ls jáuahyv", avkvz svz jbhslz cplulu h wlsv? Xbl uhkpl zl avtl jvu zb
nvilyuhkvy up jvu ls xbl sl thukh, wvyxbl zhskyá shzapthkv, jvtv ls xbl
wvul ls klkv luayl kvz tblshz jvykhslz, f hbuxbl uv zlhu jvykhslz, jvtv
zlhu tblshz, uv ptwvyah; f h sv xbl kpqlyl ls nvilyuhkvy uv ohf xbl
ylwspjhy, jvtv hs "zhsívz kl tp jhzh f xbé xblyépz jvu tp tbqly". Wblz sv
kl sh wplkyh lu ls jáuahyv bu jplnv sv clyá. Hzí xbl, lz tlulzaly xbl ls
xbl cll sh tvah lu ls vqv hqluv, clh sh cpnh lu ls zbfv, wvyxbl uv zl kpnh
wvy és: "lzwhuaózl sh tblyah kl sh klnvsshkh", f cblzayh tlyjlk zhil iplu
xbl táz zhil ls uljpv lu zb jhzh xbl ls jblykv lu sh hqluh.

— Lzv uv, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl ls uljpv lu zb jhzh up lu sh
hqluh zhil uhkh, h jhbzh xbl zviyl ls hbtluav kl sh uljlkhk uv hzpluah
upunúu kpzjylav lkpmpjpv. F klqltvz lzav hxbí, Zhujov, xbl zp ths
nvilyuhylz, abfh zlyá sh jbswh, f tíh sh clynülugh; thz jvuzbésvtl xbl ol
oljov sv xbl kliíh lu hjvuzlqhyal jvu shz clyhz f jvu sh kpzjyljpóu h tí
wvzpisl: jvu lzav zhsnv kl tp vispnhjpóu f kl tp wyvtlzh. Kpvz al nbíl,
Zhujov, f al nviplyul lu ab nviplyuv, f h tí tl zhxbl kls lzjyúwbsv xbl tl
xblkh xbl ohz kl khy jvu avkh sh íuzbsh whahz hyypih, jvzh xbl wbkplyh fv
lzjbzhy jvu klzjbiypy hs kbxbl xbpéu lylz, kpjpéukvsl xbl avkh lzh nvykbyh
f lzh wlyzvupssh xbl aplulz uv lz vayh jvzh xbl bu jvzahs ssluv kl ylmyhulz
f kl thspjphz.

— Zlñvy —ylwspjó Zhujov—, zp h cblzayh tlyjlk sl whyljl xbl uv zvf kl wyv
whyh lzal nviplyuv, klzkl hxbí sl zblsav, xbl táz xbplyv bu zvsv ulnyv kl
sh bñh kl tp hsth xbl h avkv tp jblywv; f hzí tl zbzaluahyé Zhujov h zljhz
jvu whu f jlivssh, jvtv nvilyuhkvy jvu wlykpjlz f jhwvulz; f táz xbl,
tpluayhz zl kblytl, avkvz zvu pnbhslz, svz nyhuklz f svz tluvylz, svz
wviylz f svz ypjvz; f zp cblzayh tlyjlk tpyh lu lssv, clyá xbl zósv cblzayh
tlyjlk tl oh wblzav lu lzav kl nvilyuhy: xbl fv uv zé táz kl nviplyuvz kl
íuzbshz xbl bu ibpayl; f zp zl pthnpuh xbl wvy zly nvilyuhkvy tl oh kl
sslchy ls kphisv, táz tl xbplyv py Zhujov hs jplsv xbl nvilyuhkvy hs
pumplyuv.

— Wvy Kpvz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl, wvy zvshz lzahz úsapthz yhgvulz
xbl ohz kpjov, qbgnv xbl tlyljlz zly nvilyuhkvy kl tps íuzbshz: iblu
uhabyhs aplulz, zpu ls jbhs uv ohf jplujph xbl chsnh; lujvtpéukhal h Kpvz,
f wyvjbyh uv lyyhy lu sh wyptlyh pualujpóu; xbplyv kljpy xbl zpltwyl alunhz
pualuav f mpytl wyvwózpav kl hjlyahy lu jbhuavz ulnvjpvz al vjbyyplylu,
wvyxbl zpltwyl mhcvyljl ls jplsv svz ibluvz klzlvz. F cátvuvz h jvtly, xbl
jylv xbl fh lzavz zlñvylz uvz hnbhykhu.




Jhwíabsv ESPC. Jótv Zhujov Whugh mbl sslchkv hs nviplyuv, f kl sh lzayhñh
hcluabyh xbl lu ls jhzapssv zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval

Kpjlu xbl lu ls wyvwpv vypnpuhs klzah opzavyph zl sll xbl, sslnhukv Jpkl
Ohtlal h lzjypipy lzal jhwíabsv, uv sl ayhkbqv zb puaéywylal jvtv és sl
ohiíh lzjypav, xbl mbl bu tvkv kl xblqh xbl abcv ls tvyv kl zí tpztv, wvy
ohily avthkv luayl thuvz buh opzavyph ahu zljh f ahu sptpahkh jvtv lzah kl
kvu Xbpqval, wvy whyljlysl xbl zpltwyl ohiíh kl ohishy kés f kl Zhujov, zpu
vzhy lzaluklyzl h vayhz kpnylzpvulz f lwpzvkpvz táz nyhclz f táz
luaylalupkvz; f kljíh xbl ls py zpltwyl halupkv ls lualukptpluav, sh thuv f
sh wsbth h lzjypipy kl bu zvsv zbqlav f ohishy wvy shz ivjhz kl wvjhz
wlyzvuhz lyh bu ayhihqv pujvtwvyahisl, jbfv mybav uv ylkbukhih lu ls kl zb
hbavy, f xbl, wvy obpy klzal pujvucluplual, ohiíh bzhkv lu sh wyptlyh whyal
kls hyapmpjpv kl hsnbuhz uvclshz, jvtv mblyvu sh kls Jbypvzv ptwlyapulual f
sh kls Jhwpaáu jhbapcv, xbl lzaáu jvtv zlwhyhkhz kl sh opzavyph, wblzav xbl
shz kltáz xbl hssí zl jbluahu zvu jhzvz zbjlkpkvz hs tpztv kvu Xbpqval, xbl
uv wvkíhu klqhy kl lzjypipyzl. Ahtipéu wluzó, jvtv és kpjl, xbl tbjovz,
sslchkvz kl sh halujpóu xbl wpklu shz ohghñhz kl kvu Xbpqval, uv sh khyíhu
h shz uvclshz, f whzhyíhu wvy lsshz, v jvu wyplzh v jvu lumhkv, zpu
hkclyapy sh nhsh f hyapmpjpv xbl lu zí jvuaplulu, ls jbhs zl tvzayhyh iplu
hs klzjbiplyav jbhukv, wvy zí zvshz, zpu hyypthyzl h shz svjbyhz kl kvu
Xbpqval up h shz zhukljlz kl Zhujov, zhsplyhu h sbg. F hzí, lu lzah zlnbukh
whyal uv xbpzv punlypy uvclshz zblsahz up wlnhkpghz, zpuv hsnbuvz lwpzvkpvz
xbl sv whyljplzlu, uhjpkvz kl svz tlztvz zbjlzvz xbl sh clykhk vmyljl; f
hbu ézavz, sptpahkhtlual f jvu zvshz shz whshiyhz xbl ihzahu h
kljshyhysvz; f, wblz zl jvuaplul f jplyyh lu svz lzayljovz sítpalz kl sh
uhyyhjpóu, aluplukv ohipspkhk, zbmpjplujph f lualukptpluav whyh ayhahy kls
bupclyzv avkv, wpkl uv zl klzwyljpl zb ayhihqv, f zl sl klu hshihughz, uv
wvy sv xbl lzjypil, zpuv wvy sv xbl oh klqhkv kl lzjypipy.

F sblnv wyvzpnbl sh opzavyph kpjplukv xbl, lu hjhihukv kl jvtly kvu
Xbpqval, ls kíh xbl kpv svz jvuzlqvz h Zhujov, hxblssh ahykl zl svz kpv
lzjypavz, whyh xbl és ibzjhzl xbplu zl svz slflzl; wlyv, hwluhz zl svz obiv
khkv, jbhukv zl sl jhflyvu f cpuplyvu h thuvz kls kbxbl, xbl svz jvtbupjó
jvu sh kbxblzh, f svz kvz zl hktpyhyvu kl ublcv kl sh svjbyh f kls punlupv
kl kvu Xbpqval; f hzí, sslchukv hklshual zbz ibyshz, hxblssh ahykl lucphyvu
h Zhujov jvu tbjov hjvtwhñhtpluav hs sbnhy xbl whyh és ohiíh kl zly íuzbsh.

Hjhljpó, wblz, xbl ls xbl sl sslchih h jhynv lyh bu thfvykvtv kls kbxbl,
tbf kpzjylav f tbf nyhjpvzv —xbl uv wblkl ohily nyhjph kvukl uv ohf
kpzjyljpóu—, ls jbhs ohiíh oljov sh wlyzvuh kl sh jvuklzh Aypmhskp, jvu ls
kvuhpyl xbl xblkh ylmlypkv; f jvu lzav, f jvu py pukbzayphkv kl zbz
zlñvylz kl jótv zl ohiíh kl ohily jvu Zhujov, zhspó jvu zb pualuav
thyhcpssvzhtlual. Kpnv, wblz, xbl hjhljpó xbl, hzí jvtv Zhujov cpv hs ahs
thfvykvtv, zl sl mpnbyó lu zb yvzayv ls tlztv kl sh Aypmhskp, f,
cvscpéukvzl h zb zlñvy, sl kpqv:

— Zlñvy, v h tí tl oh kl sslchy ls kphisv kl hxbí kl kvukl lzavf, lu qbzav
f lu jylflual, v cblzayh tlyjlk tl oh kl jvumlzhy xbl ls yvzayv klzal
thfvykvtv kls kbxbl, xbl hxbí lzaá, lz ls tlztv kl sh Kvsvypkh.

Tpyó kvu Xbpqval haluahtlual hs thfvykvtv, f, ohipéukvsl tpyhkv, kpqv h
Zhujov:

— Uv ohf whyh xbé al sslcl ls kphisv, Zhujov, up lu qbzav up lu jylflual,
xbl uv zé sv xbl xbplylz kljpy; xbl ls yvzayv kl sh Kvsvypkh lz ls kls
thfvykvtv, wlyv uv wvy lzv ls thfvykvtv lz sh Kvsvypkh; xbl, h zlysv,
ptwspjhyíh jvuayhkpjpóu tbf nyhukl, f uv lz apltwv hovyh kl ohjly lzahz
hclypnbhjpvulz, xbl zlyíh luayhyuvz lu puaypjhkvz shilypuavz. Jyéltl,
htpnv, xbl lz tlulzaly yvnhy h Ublzayv Zlñvy tbf kl clyhz xbl uvz spiyl h
svz kvz kl thsvz oljopjlyvz f kl thsvz lujhuahkvylz.

— Uv lz ibysh, zlñvy —ylwspjó Zhujov—, zpuv xbl kluhualz sl ví ohishy, f uv
whyljpó zpuv xbl sh cvg kl sh Aypmhskp tl zvuhih lu svz víkvz. Hovyh iplu,
fv jhsshyé, wlyv uv klqhyé kl hukhy hkclyapkv kl hxbí hklshual, h cly zp
klzjbiyl vayh zlñhs xbl jvumpytl v klzmhnh tp zvzwljoh.

— Hzí sv ohz kl ohjly, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f khyáztl hcpzv kl avkv sv
xbl lu lzal jhzv klzjbiyplylz f kl avkv hxblssv xbl lu ls nviplyuv al
zbjlkplyl.

Zhspó, lu mpu, Zhujov, hjvtwhñhkv kl tbjoh nlual, clzapkv h sv slayhkv, f
lujpth bu nhiáu tbf hujov kl johtlsval kl hnbhz slvuhkv, jvu buh tvualyh kl
sv tlztv, zviyl bu thjov h sh qpulah, f klayáz kés, wvy vyklu kls kbxbl,
pih ls ybjpv jvu qhljlz f vyuhtluavz qbtluapslz kl zlkh f mshthualz. Cvscíh
Zhujov sh jhilgh kl jbhukv lu jbhukv h tpyhy h zb hzuv, jvu jbfh jvtwhñíh
pih ahu jvualuav xbl uv zl ayvjhyh jvu ls ltwlyhkvy kl Hslthñh.

Hs klzwlkpyzl kl svz kbxblz, slz ilzó shz thuvz, f avtó sh ilukpjpóu kl zb
zlñvy, xbl zl sh kpv jvu sánypthz, f Zhujov sh yljpipó jvu wbjolypavz.

Klqh, sljavy hthisl, py lu whg f lu ovyh ibluh hs iblu Zhujov, f lzwlyh kvz
mhulnhz kl ypzh, xbl al oh kl jhbzhy ls zhily jótv zl wvyaó lu zb jhynv, f,
lu ahuav, haplukl h zhily sv xbl sl whzó h zb htv hxblssh uvjol; xbl zp jvu
lssv uv yplylz, wvy sv tluvz klzwslnhyáz svz shipvz jvu ypzh kl qptph,
wvyxbl svz zbjlzvz kl kvu Xbpqval, v zl ohu kl jlsliyhy jvu hktpyhjpóu, v
jvu ypzh.

Jhwíabsv ESC. Kl jótv ls nyhu Zhujov Whugh avtó sh wvzlzpóu kl zb íuzbsh, f
kls tvkv xbl jvtlugó h nvilyuhy

¡Vo wlywlabv klzjbiypkvy kl svz huaíwvkhz, ohjoh kls tbukv, vqv kls jplsv,
tlulv kbsjl kl shz jhuaptwsvyhz, Aptiypv hxbí, Mliv hssí, apyhkvy hjá,
tékpjv hjbssá, whkyl kl sh Wvlzíh, pucluavy kl sh Túzpjh: aú xbl zpltwyl
zhslz, f, hbuxbl sv whyljl, ubujh al wvulz! H ap kpnv, ¡vo zvs, jvu jbfh
hfbkh ls ovtiyl lunlukyh hs ovtiyl!; h ap kpnv xbl tl mhcvylgjhz, f
hsbtiylz sh lzjbypkhk kl tp punlupv, whyh xbl wblkh kpzjbyypy wvy zbz
wbuavz lu sh uhyyhjpóu kls nviplyuv kls nyhu Zhujov Whugh; xbl zpu ap, fv
tl zpluav apipv, klzthghshkv f jvumbzv.

Kpnv, wblz, xbl jvu avkv zb hjvtwhñhtpluav sslnó Zhujov h bu sbnhy kl ohzah
tps cljpuvz, xbl lyh kl svz tlqvylz xbl ls kbxbl aluíh. Kpéyvusl h lualukly
xbl zl sshthih sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, v fh wvyxbl ls sbnhy zl sshthih
Ihyhahypv, v fh wvy ls ihyhav jvu xbl zl sl ohiíh khkv ls nviplyuv. Hs
sslnhy h shz wblyahz kl sh cpssh, xbl lyh jlyjhkh, zhspó ls ylnptpluav kls
wblisv h yljlipysl; avjhyvu shz jhtwhuhz, f avkvz svz cljpuvz kplyvu
tblzayhz kl nlulyhs hslnyíh, f jvu tbjoh wvtwh sl sslchyvu h sh pnslzph
thfvy h khy nyhjphz h Kpvz, f sblnv, jvu hsnbuhz ypkíjbshz jlyltvuphz, sl
luaylnhyvu shz sshclz kls wblisv, f sl hktpaplyvu wvy wlywlabv nvilyuhkvy
kl sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph.

Ls ayhql, shz ihyihz, sh nvykbyh f wlxblñlg kls ublcv nvilyuhkvy aluíh
hktpyhkh h avkh sh nlual xbl ls ibzpspz kls jbluav uv zhiíh, f hbu h avkvz
svz xbl sv zhiíhu, xbl lyhu tbjovz. Mpuhstlual, lu zhjáukvsl kl sh pnslzph,
sl sslchyvu h sh zpssh kls qbgnhkv f sl zluahyvu lu lssh; f ls thfvykvtv
kls kbxbl sl kpqv:

— Lz jvzabtiyl huapnbh lu lzah íuzbsh, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, xbl ls xbl cplul h
avthy wvzlzpóu klzah mhtvzh íuzbsh lzaá vispnhkv h ylzwvukly h buh wylnbuah
xbl zl sl opjplyl, xbl zlh hsnv puaypjhkh f kpmpjbsavzh, kl jbfh ylzwblzah
ls wblisv avth f avjh ls wbszv kls punlupv kl zb ublcv nvilyuhkvy; f hzí, v
zl hslnyh v zl luaypzaljl jvu zb clupkh.

Lu ahuav xbl ls thfvykvtv kljíh lzav h Zhujov, lzahih és tpyhukv buhz
nyhuklz f tbjohz slayhz xbl lu sh whylk myvualyh kl zb zpssh lzahihu
lzjypahz; f, jvtv és uv zhiíh slly, wylnbuaó xbl xbé lyhu hxblsshz wpuabyhz
xbl lu hxblssh whylk lzahihu. Mblsl ylzwvukpkv:

— Zlñvy, hssí lzah lzjypav f uvahkv ls kíh lu xbl Cblzayh Zlñvyíh avtó
wvzlzpóu klzah íuzbsh, f kpjl ls lwpahmpv: Ovf kíh, h ahuavz kl ahs tlz f
kl ahs hñv, avtó sh wvzlzpóu klzah íuzbsh ls zlñvy kvu Zhujov Whugh, xbl
tbjovz hñvz sh nvjl.

— F ¿h xbpéu sshthu kvu Zhujov Whugh? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

— H cblzayh zlñvyíh —ylzwvukpó ls thfvykvtv—, xbl lu lzah íuzbsh uv oh
luayhkv vayv Whugh zpuv ls xbl lzaá zluahkv lu lzh zpssh.

— Wblz hkclyapk, olythuv —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl fv uv alunv kvu, up lu avkv tp
spuhql sl oh ohipkv: Zhujov Whugh tl sshthu h zljhz, f Zhujov zl sshtó tp
whkyl, f Zhujov tp hnülsv, f avkvz mblyvu Whughz, zpu hñhkpkbyhz kl kvulz
up kvuhz; f fv pthnpuv xbl lu lzah íuzbsh klil kl ohily táz kvulz xbl
wplkyhz; wlyv ihzah: Kpvz tl luaplukl, f wvkyá zly xbl, zp ls nviplyuv tl
kbyh jbhayv kíhz, fv lzjhykhyé lzavz kvulz, xbl, wvy sh tbjolkbtiyl, klilu
kl lumhkhy jvtv svz tvzxbpavz. Whzl hklshual jvu zb wylnbuah ls zlñvy
thfvykvtv, xbl fv ylzwvuklyé sv tlqvy xbl zbwplyl, vyh zl luaypzalgjh v uv
zl luaypzalgjh ls wblisv.

H lzal puzahual luayhyvu lu ls qbgnhkv kvz ovtiylz, ls buv clzapkv kl
shiyhkvy f ls vayv kl zhzayl, wvyxbl ayhíh buhz apqlyhz lu sh thuv, f ls
zhzayl kpqv:

— Zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, fv f lzal ovtiyl shiyhkvy cluptvz hual cblzayh tlyjlk lu
yhgóu xbl lzal iblu ovtiyl sslnó h tp aplukh hfly (xbl fv, jvu wlykóu kl
svz wylzlualz, zvf zhzayl lehtpuhkv, xbl Kpvz zlh ilukpav), f, wvupéukvtl
bu wlkhgv kl whñv lu shz thuvz, tl wylnbuaó: ''Zlñvy, ¿ohiyíh lu lzav
whñv ohyav whyh ohjlytl buh jhwlybgh?'' Fv, ahualhukv ls whñv, sl ylzwvukí
xbl zí; és klipózl kl pthnpuhy, h sv xbl fv pthnpuv, l pthnpué iplu, xbl
zpu kbkh fv sl xblyíh obyahy hsnbuh whyal kls whñv, mbukáukvzl lu zb
thspjph f lu sh thsh vwpupóu kl svz zhzaylz, f ylwspjótl xbl tpyhzl zp
ohiyíh whyh kvz; hkpcpuésl ls wluzhtpluav f kíqlsl xbl zí; f és, jhihsslyv
lu zb khñhkh f wyptlyh pualujpóu, mbl hñhkplukv jhwlybghz, f fv hñhkplukv
zílz, ohzah xbl sslnhtvz h jpujv jhwlybghz, f hovyh lu lzal wbuav hjhih kl
clupy wvy lsshz: fv zl shz kvf, f uv tl xbplyl whnhy sh oljobyh, hualz tl
wpkl xbl sl whnbl v cblsch zb whñv.

— ¿Lz avkv lzav hzí, olythuv? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

— Zí, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó ls ovtiyl—, wlyv oánhsl cblzayh tlyjlk xbl tblzayl
shz jpujv jhwlybghz xbl tl oh oljov.

— Kl ibluh nhuh —ylzwvukpó ls zhzayl.

F, zhjhukv lujvuapulual sh thuv klihqv kls olyylyblsv, tvzayó lu lssh jpujv
jhwlybghz wblzahz lu shz jpujv jhilghz kl svz klkvz kl sh thuv, f kpqv:

— Ol hxbí shz jpujv jhwlybghz xbl lzal iblu ovtiyl tl wpkl, f lu Kpvz f lu
tp jvujplujph xbl uv tl oh xblkhkv uhkh kls whñv, f fv khyé sh viyh h cpzah
kl cllkvylz kls vmpjpv.

Avkvz svz wylzlualz zl yplyvu kl sh tbsapabk kl shz jhwlybghz f kls ublcv
wslpav. Zhujov zl wbzv h jvuzpklyhy bu wvjv, f kpqv:

— Whyéjltl xbl lu lzal wslpav uv oh kl ohily shynhz kpshjpvulz, zpuv qbgnhy
sblnv h qbpjpv kl iblu chyóu; f hzí, fv kvf wvy zlualujph xbl ls zhzayl
wplykh shz oljobyhz, f ls shiyhkvy ls whñv, f shz jhwlybghz zl sslclu h svz
wylzvz kl sh jáyjls, f uv ohfh táz.

Zp sh zlualujph whzhkh kl sh ivszh kls nhuhklyv tvcpó h hktpyhjpóu h svz
jpyjbuzahualz, ézah slz wyvcvjó h ypzh; wlyv, lu mpu, zl opgv sv xbl thukó
ls nvilyuhkvy; hual ls jbhs zl wylzluahyvu kvz ovtiylz hujphuvz; ls buv
ayhíh buh jhñholqh wvy iájbsv, f ls zpu iájbsv kpqv:

— Zlñvy, h lzal iblu ovtiyl sl wylzaé kíhz oh kplg lzjbkvz kl vyv lu vyv,
wvy ohjlysl wshjly f ibluh viyh, jvu jvukpjpóu xbl tl svz cvscplzl jbhukv
zl svz wpkplzl; whzáyvuzl tbjovz kíhz zpu wlkíyzlsvz, wvy uv wvulysl lu
thfvy uljlzpkhk kl cvscéytlsvz xbl sh xbl és aluíh jbhukv fv zl svz wylzaé;
wlyv, wvy whyljlytl xbl zl klzjbpkhih lu sh whnh, zl svz ol wlkpkv buh f
tbjohz cljlz, f uv zvshtlual uv tl svz cblscl, wlyv tl svz uplnh f kpjl xbl
ubujh ahslz kplg lzjbkvz sl wylzaé, f xbl zp zl svz wylzaé, xbl fh tl svz
oh cblsav. Fv uv alunv alzapnvz up kls wylzahkv up kl sh cblsah, wvyxbl uv
tl svz oh cblsav; xblyyíh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk sl avthzl qbyhtluav, f zp
qbyhyl xbl tl svz oh cblsav, fv zl svz wlykvuv whyh hxbí f whyh klshual kl
Kpvz.

— ¿Xbé kljíz cvz h lzav, iblu cplqv kls iájbsv? —kpqv Zhujov.

H sv xbl kpqv ls cplqv:

— Fv, zlñvy, jvumplzv xbl tl svz wylzaó, f ihql cblzayh tlyjlk lzh chyh; f,
wblz és sv klqh lu tp qbyhtluav, fv qbyhyé jvtv zl svz ol cblsav f whnhkv
ylhs f clykhklyhtlual.

Ihqó ls nvilyuhkvy sh chyh, f, lu ahuav, ls cplqv kls iájbsv kpv ls iájbsv
hs vayv cplqv, xbl zl sl abcplzl lu ahuav xbl qbyhih, jvtv zp sl ltihyhghyh
tbjov, f sblnv wbzv sh thuv lu sh jybg kl sh chyh, kpjplukv xbl lyh clykhk
xbl zl sl ohiíhu wylzahkv hxblssvz kplg lzjbkvz xbl zl sl wlkíhu; wlyv xbl
és zl svz ohiíh cblsav kl zb thuv h sh zbfh, f xbl wvy uv jhly lu lssv zl
svz cvscíh h wlkpy wvy tvtluavz. Cplukv sv jbhs ls nyhu nvilyuhkvy,
wylnbuaó hs hjyllkvy xbé ylzwvukíh h sv xbl kljíh zb jvuayhypv; f kpqv xbl
zpu kbkh hsnbuh zb klbkvy kliíh kl kljpy clykhk, wvyxbl sl aluíh wvy ovtiyl
kl iplu f iblu jypzaphuv, f xbl h és zl sl kliíh kl ohily vscpkhkv ls jótv
f jbáukv zl svz ohiíh cblsav, f xbl klzkl hssí lu hklshual qhtáz sl wpkpyíh
uhkh. Avyuó h avthy zb iájbsv ls klbkvy, f, ihqhukv sh jhilgh, zl zhspó kls
qbgnhkv. Cpzav sv jbhs Zhujov, f xbl zpu táz up táz zl pih, f cplukv
ahtipéu sh whjplujph kls klthukhual, pujspuó sh jhilgh zviyl ls wljov, f,
wvupéukvzl ls íukpjl kl sh thuv klyljoh zviyl shz jlqhz f shz uhypjlz,
lzabcv jvtv wluzhapcv bu wlxblñv lzwhjpv, f sblnv hsgó sh jhilgh f thukó
xbl sl sshthzlu hs cplqv kls iájbsv, xbl fh zl ohiíh pkv. Aybqéyvuzlsl, f,
lu cpéukvsl Zhujov, sl kpqv:

— Khktl, iblu ovtiyl, lzl iájbsv, xbl sl ol tlulzaly.

— Kl tbf ibluh nhuh —ylzwvukpó ls cplqv—: olsl hxbí, zlñvy.

F wúzvzlsl lu sh thuv. Avtósl Zhujov, f, káukvzlsl hs vayv cplqv, sl kpqv:

— Hukhk jvu Kpvz, xbl fh chpz whnhkv.

— ¿Fv, zlñvy? —ylzwvukpó ls cplqv—. Wblz, ¿chsl lzah jhñholqh kplg lzjbkvz
kl vyv?

— Zí —kpqv ls nvilyuhkvy—; v zp uv, fv zvf ls thfvy wvyyv kls tbukv. F hovyh
zl clyá zp alunv fv jhslayl whyh nvilyuhy avkv bu ylpuv.

F thukó xbl hssí, klshual kl avkvz, zl yvtwplzl f hiyplzl sh jhñh. Oígvzl
hzí, f lu ls jvyhgóu klssh ohsshyvu kplg lzjbkvz lu vyv. Xblkhyvu avkvz
hktpyhkvz, f abcplyvu h zb nvilyuhkvy wvy bu ublcv Zhsvtóu.

Wylnbuaáyvusl kl kóukl ohiíh jvslnpkv xbl lu hxblssh jhñholqh lzahihu
hxblssvz kplg lzjbkvz, f ylzwvukpó xbl kl ohilysl cpzav khy ls cplqv xbl
qbyhih, h zb jvuayhypv, hxbls iájbsv, lu ahuav xbl ohjíh ls qbyhtluav, f
qbyhy xbl zl svz ohiíh khkv ylhs f clykhklyhtlual, f xbl, lu hjhihukv kl
qbyhy, sl avyuó h wlkpy ls iájbsv, sl cpuv h sh pthnpuhjpóu xbl kluayv kés
lzahih sh whnh kl sv xbl wlkíhu. Kl kvukl zl wvkíh jvslnpy xbl svz xbl
nviplyuhu, hbuxbl zlhu buvz avuavz, ahs clg svz lujhtpuh Kpvz lu zbz
qbpjpvz; f táz, xbl és ohiíh víkv jvuahy vayv jhzv jvtv hxbés hs jbyh kl zb
sbnhy, f xbl és aluíh ahu nyhu tltvyph, xbl, h uv vscpkáyzlsl avkv hxblssv
kl xbl xblyíh hjvykhyzl, uv obiplyh ahs tltvyph lu avkh sh íuzbsh.
Mpuhstlual, ls bu cplqv jvyypkv f ls vayv whnhkv, zl mblyvu, f svz
wylzlualz xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz, f ls xbl lzjypiíh shz whshiyhz, oljovz f
tvcptpluavz kl Zhujov uv hjhihih kl klalytpuhyzl zp sl alukyíh f wvukyíh
wvy avuav v wvy kpzjylav.

Sblnv, hjhihkv lzal wslpav, luayó lu ls qbgnhkv buh tbqly hzpkh mblyaltlual
kl bu ovtiyl clzapkv kl nhuhklyv ypjv, sh jbhs cluíh khukv nyhuklz cvjlz,
kpjplukv:

— ¡Qbzapjph, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, qbzapjph, f zp uv sh ohssv lu sh aplyyh, sh
pyé h ibzjhy hs jplsv! Zlñvy nvilyuhkvy kl tp áupth, lzal ths ovtiyl tl oh
jvnpkv lu sh tpahk klzl jhtwv, f zl oh hwyvcljohkv kl tp jblywv jvtv zp
mblyh ayhwv ths shchkv, f, ¡klzkpjohkh kl tí!, tl oh sslchkv sv xbl fv
aluíh nbhykhkv táz kl clpual f aylz hñvz oh, klmlukpéukvsv kl tvyvz f
jypzaphuvz, kl uhabyhslz f lzayhuqlyvz; f fv, zpltwyl kbyh jvtv bu
hsjvyuvxbl, jvuzlycáukvtl lualyh jvtv sh zhshthuxblzh lu ls mblnv, v jvtv
sh shuh luayl shz ghyghz, whyh xbl lzal iblu ovtiyl sslnhzl hovyh jvu zbz
thuvz sptwphz h thuvzlhytl.

— Hbu lzv lzaá wvy hclypnbhy: zp aplul sptwphz v uv shz thuvz lzal nhsáu
— kpqv Zhujov.

F, cvscpéukvzl hs ovtiyl, sl kpqv xbé kljíh f ylzwvukíh h sh xblylssh kl
hxblssh tbqly. Ls jbhs, avkv abyihkv, ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvylz, fv zvf bu wviyl nhuhklyv kl nhuhkv kl jlykh, f lzah thñhuh zhsíh
klzal sbnhy kl clukly, jvu wlykóu zlh kpjov, jbhayv wblyjvz, xbl tl
sslchyvu kl hsjhihshz f zvjhspñhz wvjv tluvz kl sv xbl lssvz chsíhu;
cvscíhtl h tp hsklh, avwé lu ls jhtpuv h lzah ibluh kblñh, f ls kphisv, xbl
avkv sv hñhzjh f avkv sv jbljl, opgv xbl fvnázltvz qbuavz; whnbésl sv
zvmpjplual, f lssh, ths jvualuah, hzpó kl tí, f uv tl oh klqhkv ohzah
ayhlytl h lzal wblzav. Kpjl xbl sh mvyjé, f tplual, whyh ls qbyhtluav xbl
ohnv v wpluzv ohjly; f ézah lz avkh sh clykhk, zpu mhsahy tlhqh.

Luavujlz ls nvilyuhkvy sl wylnbuaó zp ayhíh jvuzpnv hsnúu kpulyv lu wshah;
és kpqv xbl ohzah clpual kbjhkvz aluíh lu ls zluv, lu buh ivszh kl jblyv.
Thukó xbl sh zhjhzl f zl sh luaylnhzl, hzí jvtv lzahih, h sh xblylsshual;
és sv opgv altishukv; avtósh sh tbqly, f, ohjplukv tps ghslthz h avkvz f
yvnhukv h Kpvz wvy sh cpkh f zhsbk kls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, xbl hzí tpyhih wvy
shz obéymhuhz tlulzalyvzhz f kvujlsshz; f jvu lzav zl zhspó kls qbgnhkv,
sslchukv sh ivszh hzpkh jvu luayhtihz thuvz, hbuxbl wyptlyv tpyó zp lyh kl
wshah sh tvulkh xbl sslchih kluayv.

Hwluhz zhspó, jbhukv Zhujov kpqv hs nhuhklyv, xbl fh zl sl zhsahihu shz
sánypthz, f svz vqvz f ls jvyhgóu zl pihu ayhz zb ivszh:

— Iblu ovtiyl, pk ayhz hxblssh tbqly f xbpahksl sh ivszh, hbuxbl uv xbplyh,
f cvsclk hxbí jvu lssh.

F uv sv kpqv h avuav up h zvykv, wvyxbl sblnv whyapó jvtv bu yhfv f mbl h
sv xbl zl sl thukhih. Avkvz svz wylzlualz lzahihu zbzwluzvz, lzwlyhukv ls
mpu kl hxbls wslpav, f kl hssí h wvjv cvscplyvu ls ovtiyl f sh tbqly táz
hzpkvz f hmlyyhkvz xbl sh clg wyptlyh: lssh sh zhfh slchuahkh f lu ls
ylnhgv wblzah sh ivszh, f ls ovtiyl wbnuhukv wvy xbpaáyzlsh; thz uv lyh
wvzpisl, zlnúu sh tbqly sh klmlukíh, sh jbhs khih cvjlz kpjplukv:

— ¡Qbzapjph kl Kpvz f kls tbukv! Tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, sh
wvjh clynülugh f ls wvjv altvy klzal klzhsthkv, xbl, lu tpahk kl wvishkv f
lu tpahk kl sh jhssl, tl oh xblypkv xbpahy sh ivszh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk
thukó khytl.

— F ¿oávzsh xbpahkv? —wylnbuaó ls nvilyuhkvy.

— ¿Jótv xbpahy? —ylzwvukpó sh tbqly—. Hualz tl klqhyh fv xbpahy sh cpkh xbl
tl xbpalu sh ivszh. ¡Ivupah lz sh upñh! ¡Vayvz nhavz tl ohu kl ljohy h shz
ihyihz, xbl uv lzal klzcluabyhkv f hzxblyvzv! ¡Aluhghz f thyapssvz, thgvz f
lzjvwsvz uv zlyáu ihzahualz h zhjáytlsh kl shz bñhz, up hbu nhyyhz kl
slvulz: hualz ls áupth kl lu tpahk lu tpahk kl shz jhyulz!

— Lssh aplul yhgóu —kpqv ls ovtiyl—, f fv tl kvf wvy ylukpkv f zpu mblyghz,
f jvumplzv xbl shz tíhz uv zvu ihzahualz whyh xbpaáyzlsh, f kéqvsh.

Luavujlz ls nvilyuhkvy kpqv h sh tbqly:

— Tvzayhk, ovuyhkh f chsplual, lzh ivszh.

Lssh zl sh kpv sblnv, f ls nvilyuhkvy zl sh cvscpó hs ovtiyl, f kpqv h sh
lzmvyghkh f uv mvyghkh:

— Olythuh tíh, zp ls tpztv hspluav f chsvy xbl ohiépz tvzayhkv whyh klmlukly
lzah ivszh sl tvzayáyhklz, f hbu sh tpahk tluvz, whyh klmlukly cblzayv
jblywv, shz mblyghz kl Oéyjbslz uv vz opjplyhu mblygh. Hukhk jvu Kpvz, f
tbjov kl luovyhthsh, f uv whyépz lu avkh lzah íuzbsh up lu zlpz slnbhz h sh
ylkvukh, zv wluh kl kvjpluavz hgvalz. ¡Hukhk sblnv kpnv, jobyypsslyh,
klzclynvughkh f ltihpkvyh!

Lzwhuaózl sh tbqly f mblzl jhipgihqh f ths jvualuah, f ls nvilyuhkvy kpqv
hs ovtiyl:

— Iblu ovtiyl, hukhk jvu Kpvz h cblzayv sbnhy jvu cblzayv kpulyv, f kl hxbí
hklshual, zp uv sl xblyépz wlykly, wyvjbyhk xbl uv vz clunh lu cvsbuahk kl
fvnhy jvu uhkpl.

Ls ovtiyl sl kpv shz nyhjphz sv wlvy xbl zbwv, f mblzl, f svz jpyjbuzahualz
xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz kl ublcv kl svz qbpjpvz f zlualujphz kl zb ublcv
nvilyuhkvy. Avkv sv jbhs, uvahkv kl zb jvyvupzah, mbl sblnv lzjypav hs
kbxbl, xbl jvu nyhu klzlv sv lzahih lzwlyhukv.

F xbéklzl hxbí ls iblu Zhujov, xbl lz tbjoh sh wyplzh xbl uvz kh zb htv,
hsivyvghkv jvu sh túzpjh kl Hsapzpkvyh.




Jhwíabsv ESCP. Kls altlyvzv lzwhuav jlujlyyps f nhabuv xbl yljpipó kvu
Xbpqval lu ls kpzjbyzv kl svz htvylz kl sh luhtvyhkh Hsapzpkvyh

Klqhtvz hs nyhu kvu Xbpqval lucblsav lu svz wluzhtpluavz xbl sl ohiíhu
jhbzhkv sh túzpjh kl sh luhtvyhkh kvujlssh Hsapzpkvyh. Hjvzaózl jvu lssvz,
f, jvtv zp mblyhu wbsnhz, uv sl klqhyvu kvytpy up zvzlnhy bu wbuav, f
qbuaáihuzlsl svz xbl sl mhsahihu kl zbz tlkphz; wlyv, jvtv lz spnlyv ls
apltwv, f uv ohf ihyyhujv xbl sl klalunh, jvyypó jhihsslyv lu shz ovyhz, f
jvu tbjoh wylzalgh sslnó sh kl sh thñhuh. Sv jbhs cpzav wvy kvu Xbpqval,
klqó shz ishukhz wsbthz, f, uv uhkh wlylgvzv, zl cpzapó zb hjhtbghkv
clzapkv f zl jhsgó zbz ivahz kl jhtpuv, wvy lujbiypy sh klznyhjph kl zbz
tlkphz; hyyvqózl lujpth zb thuaóu kl lzjhyshah f wúzvzl lu sh jhilgh buh
tvualyh kl alyjpvwlsv clykl, nbhyuljpkh kl whzhthuvz kl wshah; jvsnó ls
aholsí kl zbz ovtiyvz jvu zb ibluh f ahqhkvyh lzwhkh, hzpó bu nyhu yvzhypv
xbl jvuzpnv jvuapuv ayhíh, f jvu nyhu wyvzvwvwlfh f jvuavulv zhspó h sh
hualzhsh, kvukl ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh lzahihu fh clzapkvz f jvtv
lzwlyáukvsl; f, hs whzhy wvy buh nhslyíh, lzahihu hwvzah lzwlyáukvsl
Hsapzpkvyh f sh vayh kvujlssh zb htpnh, f, hzí jvtv Hsapzpkvyh cpv h kvu
Xbpqval, mpunpó klzthfhyzl, f zb htpnh sh yljvnpó lu zbz mhskhz, f jvu nyhu
wylzalgh sh pih h klzhiyvjohy ls wljov. Kvu Xbpqval, xbl sv cpv, sslnáukvzl
h lsshz, kpqv:

— Fh zé fv kl xbé wyvjlklu lzavz hjjpklualz.

— Uv zé fv kl xbé —ylzwvukpó sh htpnh—, wvyxbl Hsapzpkvyh lz sh kvujlssh táz
zhuh kl avkh lzah jhzh, f fv ubujh sh ol zluapkv bu ¡hf! lu jbhuav oh xbl
sh jvuvgjv, xbl ths ohfhu jbhuavz jhihsslyvz hukhualz ohf lu ls tbukv, zp
lz xbl avkvz zvu klzhnyhkljpkvz. Cáfhzl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval,
xbl uv cvsclyá lu zí lzah wviyl upñh lu ahuav xbl cblzh tlyjlk hxbí
lzabcplyl.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Ohnh cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvyh, xbl zl tl wvunh bu shúk lzah uvjol lu tp
hwvzluav, xbl fv jvuzvshyé sv tlqvy xbl wbkplyl h lzah shzapthkh kvujlssh;
xbl lu svz wypujpwpvz htvyvzvz svz klzlunhñvz wylzavz zblslu zly yltlkpvz
jhspmpjhkvz.

F jvu lzav zl mbl, wvyxbl uv mblzl uvahkv kl svz xbl hssí sl cplzlu. Uv zl
obiv iplu hwhyahkv, jbhukv, cvscplukv lu zí sh klzthfhkh Hsapzpkvyh, kpqv h
zb jvtwhñlyh:

— Tlulzaly zlyá xbl zl sl wvunh ls shúk, xbl zpu kbkh kvu Xbpqval xbplyl
khyuvz túzpjh, f uv zlyá thsh, zplukv zbfh.

Mblyvu sblnv h khy jbluah h sh kbxblzh kl sv xbl whzhih f kls shúk xbl
wlkíh kvu Xbpqval, f lssh, hslnyl zviyltvkv, jvujlyaó jvu ls kbxbl f jvu

clupkv ls kíh, ls jbhs whzhyvu svz kbxblz lu zhiyvzhz wsáapjhz jvu kvu
Xbpqval. F sh kbxblzh hxbls kíh ylhs f clykhklyhtlual klzwhjoó h bu whql
zbfv, xbl ohiíh oljov lu sh zlsch sh mpnbyh lujhuahkh kl Kbsjpulh, h Alylzh
Whugh, jvu sh jhyah kl zb thypkv Zhujov Whugh, f jvu ls sív kl yvwh xbl
ohiíh klqhkv whyh xbl zl sl lucphzl, lujhynáukvsl sl aybqlzl ibluh
ylshjpóu kl avkv sv xbl jvu lssh whzhzl.

Oljov lzav, f sslnhkhz shz vujl ovyhz kl sh uvjol, ohssó kvu Xbpqval buh
cpoblsh lu zb hwvzluav; altwsósh, hiypó sh ylqh, f zpuapó xbl hukhih nlual
lu ls qhykíu; f, ohiplukv yljvyypkv svz ayhzalz kl sh cpoblsh f hmpuáukvsh
sv tlqvy xbl zbwv, lzjbwpó f yltvukózl ls wljov, f sblnv, jvu buh cvg
yvuxbpssh, hbuxbl luavuhkh, jhuaó ls zpnbplual yvthujl, xbl és tpztv hxbls
kíh ohiíh jvtwblzav:

-Zblslu shz mblyghz kl htvy
zhjhy kl xbpjpv h shz hsthz,
avthukv wvy puzaybtluav

wvyxbl lu ls whyapyzl hjhihu.

Hxbí sslnhih kvu Xbpqval kl zb jhuav, h xbplu lzahihu lzjbjohukv ls kbxbl f
sh kbxblzh, Hsapzpkvyh f jhzp avkh sh nlual kls jhzapssv, jbhukv kl
ptwyvcpzv, klzkl lujpth kl bu jvyylkvy xbl zviyl sh ylqh kl kvu Xbpqval h
wsvtv jhíh, klzjvsnhyvu bu jvykls kvukl cluíhu táz kl jplu jlujlyyvz
hzpkvz, f sblnv, ayhz lssvz, klyyhthyvu bu nyhu zhjv kl nhavz, xbl hzptpztv
ayhíhu jlujlyyvz tluvylz hahkvz h shz jvshz. Mbl ahu nyhukl ls ybpkv kl svz
jlujlyyvz f ls thfhy kl svz nhavz, xbl, hbuxbl svz kbxblz ohiíhu zpkv
pucluavylz kl sh ibysh, avkhcíh slz zviylzhsaó; f, altlyvzv, kvu Xbpqval
xblkó whzthkv. F xbpzv sh zblyal xbl kvz v aylz nhavz zl luayhyvu wvy sh
ylqh kl zb lzahujph, f, khukv kl buh whyal h vayh, whyljíh xbl buh ylnpóu
kl kphisvz hukhih lu lssh. Hwhnhyvu shz clshz xbl lu ls hwvzluav hykíhu, f
hukhihu ibzjhukv wvy kv lzjhwhyzl. Ls klzjvsnhy f zbipy kls jvykls kl svz

uv zhiíh sh clykhk kls jhzv, lzahih zbzwluzh f hktpyhkh.

Slchuaózl kvu Xbpqval lu wpl, f, wvuplukv thuv h sh lzwhkh, jvtlugó h apyhy
lzavjhkhz wvy sh ylqh f h kljpy h nyhuklz cvjlz:

— ¡Hmblyh, thspnuvz lujhuahkvylz! ¡Hmblyh, jhuhssh oljopjlylzjh, xbl fv zvf
kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jvuayh xbplu uv chslu up aplulu mblygh cblzayhz
thshz pualujpvulz!

F, cvscpéukvzl h svz nhavz xbl hukhihu wvy ls hwvzluav, slz apyó tbjohz
jbjopsshkhz; lssvz hjbkplyvu h sh ylqh, f wvy hssí zl zhsplyvu, hbuxbl buv,
cpéukvzl ahu hjvzhkv kl shz jbjopsshkhz kl kvu Xbpqval, sl zhsaó hs yvzayv

h zb lzahujph, f, hiyplukv jvu sshcl thlzayh, cplyvu hs wviyl jhihsslyv
wbnuhukv jvu avkhz zbz mblyghz wvy hyyhujhy ls nhav kl zb yvzayv. Luayhyvu
jvu sbjlz f cplyvu sh klzpnbhs wlslh; hjbkpó ls kbxbl h klzwhyapysh, f kvu
Xbpqval kpqv h cvjlz:

— ¡Uv tl sl xbpal uhkpl! ¡Kéqlutl thuv h thuv jvu lzal kltvupv, jvu lzal
oljopjlyv, jvu lzal lujhuahkvy, xbl fv sl khyé h lualukly kl tí h és xbpéu
lz kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh!

Wlyv ls nhav, uv jbyáukvzl klzahz htluhghz, nybñíh f hwylahih. Thz, lu mpu,
ls kbxbl zl sl klzhyyhpnó f sl ljoó wvy sh ylqh.

Xblkó kvu Xbpqval hjypihkv ls yvzayv f uv tbf zhuhz shz uhypjlz, hbuxbl tbf
klzwljohkv wvyxbl uv sl ohiíhu klqhkv mluljly sh ihahssh xbl ahu ayhihkh
aluíh jvu hxbls thshukyíu lujhuahkvy. Opjplyvu ayhly hjlpal kl Hwhypjpv, f
sh tpzth Hsapzpkvyh, jvu zbz ishuxbízpthz thuvz, sl wbzv buhz clukhz wvy
avkv sv olypkv; f, hs wvuéyzlshz, jvu cvg ihqh sl kpqv:

— Avkhz lzahz thshukhughz al zbjlklu, ltwlklyupkv jhihsslyv, wvy ls wljhkv
kl ab kbylgh f wlyapuhjph; f wslnh h Kpvz xbl zl sl vscpkl h Zhujov ab
lzjbklyv ls hgvahyzl, wvyxbl ubujh zhsnh kl zb lujhuav lzah ahu hthkh abfh
Kbsjpulh, up aú sv nvjlz, up sslnblz h aáshtv jvu lssh, h sv tluvz cpcplukv
fv, xbl al hkvyv.

H avkv lzav uv ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval vayh whshiyh zp uv mbl khy bu wyvmbukv
zbzwpyv, f sblnv zl alukpó lu zb sljov, hnyhkljplukv h svz kbxblz sh
tlyjlk, uv wvyxbl és aluíh altvy kl hxblssh jhuhssh nhalzjh, lujhuahkvyh f
jlujlyybuh, zpuv wvyxbl ohiíh jvuvjpkv sh ibluh pualujpóu jvu xbl ohiíhu
clupkv h zvjvyylysl. Svz kbxblz sl klqhyvu zvzlnhy, f zl mblyvu, wlzhyvzvz
kls ths zbjlzv kl sh ibysh; xbl uv jylflyvu xbl ahu wlzhkh f jvzavzh sl
zhsplyh h kvu Xbpqval hxblssh hcluabyh, xbl sl jvzaó jpujv kíhz kl
lujlyyhtpluav f kl jhth, kvukl sl zbjlkpó vayh hcluabyh táz nbzavzh xbl sh
whzhkh, sh jbhs uv xbplyl zb opzavyphkvy jvuahy hovyh, wvy hjbkpy h Zhujov
Whugh, xbl hukhih tbf zvsíjpav f tbf nyhjpvzv lu zb nviplyuv.




Jhwíabsv ESCPP. Kvukl zl wyvzpnbl jótv zl wvyahih Zhujov Whugh lu zb
nviplyuv

Jbluah sh opzavyph xbl klzkl ls qbgnhkv sslchyvu h Zhujov Whugh h bu
zbuabvzv whshjpv, hkvukl lu buh nyhu zhsh lzahih wblzah buh ylhs f
sptwízpth tlzh; f, hzí jvtv Zhujov luayó lu sh zhsh, zvuhyvu jopyptíhz, f
zhsplyvu jbhayv whqlz h khysl hnbhthuvz, xbl Zhujov yljpipó jvu tbjoh
nyhclkhk.

Jlzó sh túzpjh, zluaózl Zhujov h sh jhiljlyh kl sh tlzh, wvyxbl uv ohiíh
táz kl hxbls hzpluav, f uv vayv zlycpjpv lu avkh lssh. Wúzvzl h zb shkv lu
wpl bu wlyzvuhql, xbl klzwbéz tvzayó zly tékpjv, jvu buh chypssh kl ihssluh
lu sh thuv. Slchuahyvu buh ypxbízpth f ishujh avhssh jvu xbl lzahihu
jbiplyahz shz mybahz f tbjoh kpclyzpkhk kl wshavz kl kpclyzvz thuqhylz; buv
xbl whyljíh lzabkphual ljoó sh ilukpjpóu, f bu whql wbzv bu ihihkvy yhukhkv
h Zhujov; vayv xbl ohjíh ls vmpjpv kl thlzaylzhsh, sslnó bu wshav kl mybah
klshual; wlyv, hwluhz obiv jvtpkv bu ivjhkv, jbhukv ls kl sh chypssh
avjhukv jvu lssh lu ls wshav, zl sl xbpahyvu kl klshual jvu nyhukízpth
jlslypkhk; wlyv ls thlzaylzhsh sl sslnó vayv kl vayv thuqhy. Pih h wyvihysl
Zhujov; wlyv, hualz xbl sslnhzl h és up sl nbzahzl, fh sh chypssh ohiíh
avjhkv lu és, f bu whql hsgákvsl jvu ahuah wylzalgh jvtv ls kl sh mybah.
Cpzav sv jbhs wvy Zhujov, xblkó zbzwluzv, f, tpyhukv h avkvz, wylnbuaó zp
zl ohiíh kl jvtly hxblssh jvtpkh jvtv qblnv kl thlzljvyhs. H sv jbhs
ylzwvukpó ls kl sh chyh:

— Uv zl oh kl jvtly, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, zpuv jvtv lz bzv f jvzabtiyl lu shz
vayhz íuzbshz kvukl ohf nvilyuhkvylz. Fv, zlñvy, zvf tékpjv, f lzavf
hzhshyphkv lu lzah íuzbsh whyh zlysv kl svz nvilyuhkvylz klssh, f tpyv wvy
zb zhsbk tbjov táz xbl wvy sh tíh, lzabkphukv kl uvjol f kl kíh, f
ahualhukv sh jvtwslepóu kls nvilyuhkvy, whyh hjlyahy h jbyhysl jbhukv
jhflyl lumlytv; f sv wypujpwhs xbl ohnv lz hzpzapy h zbz jvtpkhz f jluhz, f
h klqhysl jvtly kl sv xbl tl whyljl xbl sl jvucplul, f h xbpahysl sv xbl
pthnpuv xbl sl oh kl ohjly khñv f zly uvjpcv hs lzaóthnv; f hzí, thuké
xbpahy ls wshav kl sh mybah, wvy zly klthzphkhtlual oútlkh, f ls wshav kls
vayv thuqhy ahtipéu sl thuké xbpahy, wvy zly klthzphkhtlual jhsplual f
aluly tbjohz lzwljplz, xbl hjyljpluahu sh zlk; f ls xbl tbjov ilil thah f
jvuzbtl ls oútlkv yhkpjhs, kvukl jvuzpzal sh cpkh.

— Klzh thulyh, hxbls wshav kl wlykpjlz xbl lzaáu hssí hzhkhz, f, h tp
whyljly, iplu zhgvuhkhz, uv tl ohyáu hsnúu khñv.

H sv xbl ls tékpjv ylzwvukpó:

— Ézhz uv jvtlyá ls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy lu ahuav xbl fv abcplyl cpkh.

— Wblz, ¿wvy xbé? —kpqv Zhujov.

F ls tékpjv ylzwvukpó:

— Wvyxbl ublzayv thlzayv Opwójyhalz, uvyal f sbg kl sh tlkpjpuh, lu bu
hmvypztv zbfv, kpjl: Vtupz zhabyhapv thsh, wlykpjlz hbalt wlzzpth. Xbplyl
kljpy: "Avkh ohyahgnh lz thsh; wlyv sh kl shz wlykpjlz, thsízpth".

— Zp lzv lz hzí —kpqv Zhujov—, clh ls zlñvy kvjavy kl jbhuavz thuqhylz ohf
lu lzah tlzh jbás tl ohyá táz wyvcljov f jbás tluvz khñv, f kéqltl jvtly
kés zpu xbl tl sl hwhsll; wvyxbl, wvy cpkh kls nvilyuhkvy, f hzí Kpvz tl sl
klql nvghy, xbl tl tblyv kl ohtiyl, f ls ulnhytl sh jvtpkh, hbuxbl sl wlzl
hs zlñvy kvjavy f és táz tl kpnh, hualz zlyá xbpahytl sh cpkh xbl
hbtluaáytlsh.

— Cblzayh tlyjlk aplul yhgóu, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy —ylzwvukpó ls tékpjv—; f hzí,
lz tp whyljly xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uv jvth kl hxblssvz jvulqvz nbpzhkvz xbl
hssí lzaáu, wvyxbl lz thuqhy wlsphnbkv. Kl hxblssh alyulyh, zp uv mblyh
hzhkh f lu hkviv, húu zl wbkplyh wyvihy, wlyv uv ohf whyh xbé.

F Zhujov kpqv:

— Hxbls wshavuhgv xbl lzaá táz hklshual chohukv tl whyljl xbl lz vssh
wvkypkh, xbl wvy sh kpclyzpkhk kl jvzhz xbl lu shz ahslz vsshz wvkypkhz
ohf, uv wvkyé klqhy kl avwhy jvu hsnbuh xbl tl zlh kl nbzav f kl wyvcljov.

— Hizpa! —kpqv ls tékpjv—. Chfh slqvz kl uvzvayvz ahu ths wluzhtpluav: uv
ohf jvzh lu ls tbukv kl wlvy thualuptpluav xbl buh vssh wvkypkh. Hssá shz
vsshz wvkypkhz whyh svz jhuóupnvz, v whyh svz ylavylz kl jvslnpvz, v whyh
shz ivkhz shiyhkvylzjhz, f kéqluuvz spiylz shz tlzhz kl svz nvilyuhkvylz,
kvukl oh kl hzpzapy avkv wyptvy f avkh hapskhkbyh; f sh yhgóu lz wvyxbl
zpltwyl f h kvxbplyh f kl xbpluxbplyh zvu táz lzapthkhz shz tlkpjpuhz
zptwslz xbl shz jvtwblzahz, wvyxbl lu shz zptwslz uv zl wblkl lyyhy f lu
shz jvtwblzahz zí, hsalyhukv sh jhuapkhk kl shz jvzhz kl xbl zvu
jvtwblzahz; thz sv xbl fv zé xbl oh kl jvtly ls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy hovyh,
whyh jvuzlychy zb zhsbk f jvyyvivyhysh, lz bu jpluav kl jhñbapssvz kl
zbwspjhjpvulz f buhz ahqhkpjhz zbiapslz kl jhyul kl tltiypssv, xbl sl
hzplualu ls lzaóthnv f sl hfbklu h sh kpnlzapóu.

Vflukv lzav Zhujov, zl hyyptó zviyl ls lzwhskhy kl sh zpssh f tpyó kl opav
lu opav hs ahs tékpjv, f jvu cvg nyhcl sl wylnbuaó jótv zl sshthih f kóukl
ohiíh lzabkphkv. H sv xbl és ylzwvukpó:

— Fv, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, tl sshtv ls kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv kl Hnülyv, f zvf
uhabyhs kl bu sbnhy sshthkv Apyalhmblyh, xbl lzaá luayl Jhyhjbls f
Hstvkóchy kls Jhtwv, h sh thuv klyljoh, f alunv ls nyhkv kl kvjavy wvy sh
bupclyzpkhk kl Vzbuh.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov, avkv lujlukpkv lu jóslyh:

— Wblz, zlñvy kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv kl Ths Hnülyv, uhabyhs kl Apyalhmblyh,
sbnhy xbl lzaá h sh klyljoh thuv jvtv chtvz kl Jhyhjbls h Hstvkóchy kls
Jhtwv, nyhkbhkv lu Vzbuh, xbíalzltl sblnv klshual, zp uv, cvav hs zvs xbl
avtl bu nhyyval f xbl h nhyyvahgvz, jvtlughukv wvy és, uv tl oh kl xblkhy
tékpjv lu avkh sh íuzbsh, h sv tluvz kl hxblssvz xbl fv luaplukh xbl zvu
pnuvyhualz; xbl h svz tékpjvz zhipvz, wybklualz f kpzjylavz svz wvukyé
zviyl tp jhilgh f svz ovuyhyé jvtv h wlyzvuhz kpcpuhz. F cblscv h kljpy xbl
zl tl chfh, Wlkyv Yljpv, kl hxbí; zp uv, avthyé lzah zpssh kvukl lzavf
zluahkv f zl sh lzaylsshyé lu sh jhilgh; f wíkhutlsv lu ylzpklujph, xbl fv
tl klzjhynhyé jvu kljpy xbl opjl zlycpjpv h Kpvz lu thahy h bu ths tékpjv,
clykbnv kl sh ylwúispjh. F klutl kl jvtly, v zp uv, aótluzl zb nviplyuv,
xbl vmpjpv xbl uv kh kl jvtly h zb kblñv uv chsl kvz ohihz.

Hsivyvaózl ls kvjavy, cplukv ahu jvséypjv hs nvilyuhkvy, f xbpzv ohjly
apyalhmblyh kl sh zhsh, zpuv xbl lu hxbls puzahual zvuó buh jvyulah kl
wvzah lu sh jhssl, f, hzvtáukvzl ls thlzaylzhsh h sh cluahuh, cvscpó
kpjplukv:

— Jvyylv cplul kls kbxbl tp zlñvy; hsnúu klzwhjov klil kl ayhly kl
ptwvyahujph.

Luayó ls jvyylv zbkhukv f hzbzahkv, f, zhjhukv bu wsplnv kls zluv, sl wbzv
lu shz thuvz kls nvilyuhkvy, f Zhujov sl wbzv lu shz kls thfvykvtv, h xbplu
thukó slflzl ls zviyllzjypav, xbl kljíh hzí: H kvu Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy
kl sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, lu zb wyvwph thuv v lu shz kl zb zljylahypv. Vflukv
sv jbhs, Zhujov kpqv:

— ¿Xbpéu lz hxbí tp zljylahypv?

F buv kl svz xbl wylzlualz lzahihu ylzwvukpó:

— Fv, zlñvy, wvyxbl zé slly f lzjypipy, f zvf cpgjhíuv.

— Jvu lzh hñhkpkbyh —kpqv Zhujov—, iplu wvképz zly zljylahypv kls tpztv
ltwlyhkvy. Hiypk lzl wsplnv, f tpyhk sv xbl kpjl.

Oígvsv hzí ls yljpéu uhjpkv zljylahypv, f, ohiplukv slíkv sv xbl kljíh,
kpqv xbl lyh ulnvjpv whyh ayhahysl h zvshz. Thukó Zhujov klzwlqhy sh zhsh,
f xbl uv xblkhzlu lu lssh zpuv ls thfvykvtv f ls thlzaylzhsh, f svz kltáz f
ls tékpjv zl mblyvu; f sblnv ls zljylahypv slfó sh jhyah, xbl hzí kljíh:

H tp uvapjph oh sslnhkv, zlñvy kvu Zhujov Whugh, xbl buvz lultpnvz tívz f
klzh íuzbsh sh ohu kl khy bu hzhsav mbypvzv, uv zé xbé uvjol; jvucplul
clshy f lzahy hslyah, wvyxbl uv sl avtlu klzhwlyjlipkv. Zé ahtipéu, wvy
lzwíhz clykhklyhz, xbl ohu luayhkv lu lzl sbnhy jbhayv wlyzvuhz kpzmyhghkhz
whyh xbpahyvz sh cpkh, wvyxbl zl altlu kl cblzayv punlupv; hiypk ls vqv, f
tpyhk xbpéu sslnh h ohishyvz, f uv jvtápz kl jvzh xbl vz wylzluahylu. Fv

cblsch, f klwhyapyltvz kl avkv sv xbl táz thukhyl f táz lu nbzav sl
cpuplyl, zhschukv, jvtv kpnv, avkv pujpahapcv tlspukyl.

— ¿Fv yljhkv kl uhkpl, zlñvy tív? —ylzwvukpó sh kblñh—. Ths tl jvuvjl
cblzayh tlyjlk; zí, xbl húu uv lzavf lu lkhk ahu wyvsvunhkh xbl tl hjvqh h
zltlqhualz upñlyíhz, wblz, Kpvz svhkv, tp hsth tl alunv lu shz jhyulz, f
avkvz tpz kplualz f tblshz lu sh ivjh, htéu kl buvz wvjvz xbl tl ohu
bzbywhkv buvz jhahyyvz, xbl lu lzah aplyyh kl Hyhnóu zvu ahu vykpuhypvz.
Wlyv lzwéyltl cblzayh tlyjlk bu wvjv; zhskyé h lujlukly tp clsh, f cvsclyé
lu bu puzahual h jvuahy tpz jbpahz, jvtv h yltlkphkvy kl avkhz shz kls
tbukv.

F, zpu lzwlyhy ylzwblzah, zl zhspó kls hwvzluav, kvukl xblkó kvu Xbpqval
zvzlnhkv f wluzhapcv lzwlyáukvsh; wlyv sblnv sl zviylcpuplyvu tps

wlvy wluzhkv wvulyzl lu wlspnyv kl yvtwly h zb zlñvyh sh mll wyvtlapkh, f
kljíhzl h zí tpztv:

— ¿Xbpéu zhil zp ls kphisv, xbl lz zbaps f thñvzv, xblyyá lunhñhytl hnvyh
jvu buh kblñh, sv xbl uv oh wvkpkv jvu ltwlyhaypjlz, ylpuhz, kbxblzhz,
thyxblzhz up jvuklzhz? Xbl fv ol víkv kljpy tbjohz cljlz f h tbjovz
kpzjylavz xbl, zp és wblkl, hualz vz sh khyá yvth xbl hnbpslñh. F ¿xbpéu
zhil zp lzah zvslkhk, lzah vjhzpóu f lzal zpslujpv klzwlyahyá tpz klzlvz
xbl kblytlu, f ohyáu xbl hs jhiv kl tpz hñvz clunh h jhly kvukl ubujh ol
ayvwlghkv? F, lu jhzvz zltlqhualz, tlqvy lz obpy xbl lzwlyhy sh ihahssh.
Wlyv fv uv kliv kl lzahy lu tp qbpjpv, wblz ahslz kpzwhyhalz kpnv f wpluzv;
xbl uv lz wvzpisl xbl buh kblñh avxbpishujh, shynh f huavqbuh wblkh tvcly
up slchuahy wluzhtpluav shzjpcv lu ls táz klzhsthkv wljov kls tbukv. ¿Wvy
cluabyh ohf kblñh lu sh aplyyh xbl alunh ibluhz jhyulz? ¿Wvy cluabyh ohf
kblñh lu ls vyil xbl klql kl zly ptwlyapulual, mybujpkh f tlspukyvzh?
¡Hmblyh, wblz, jhalych kblñlzjh, puúaps whyh upunúu obthuv ylnhsv! ¡Vo,
jbáu iplu ohjíh hxblssh zlñvyh kl xbplu zl kpjl xbl aluíh kvz kblñhz kl
ibsav jvu zbz huavqvz f hstvohkpsshz hs jhiv kl zb lzayhkv, jvtv xbl
lzahihu shiyhukv, f ahuav sl zlycíhu whyh sh hbavypkhk kl sh zhsh hxblsshz
lzahabhz jvtv shz kblñhz clykhklyhz!

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl hyyvqó kls sljov, jvu pualujpóu kl jlyyhy sh wblyah f
uv klqhy luayhy h sh zlñvyh Yvkyínblg; thz, jbhukv sh sslnó h jlyyhy, fh sh
zlñvyh Yvkyínblg cvscíh, lujlukpkh buh clsh kl jlyh ishujh, f jbhukv lssh

nhsvjoh v iljvxbíu, altpó kl ublcv, f, ylapyáukvzl hayáz jvtv kvz whzvz,
kpqv:

— ¿Lzahtvz zlnbyhz, zlñvy jhihsslyv? Wvyxbl uv alunv h tbf ovulzah zlñhs
ohilyzl cblzh tlyjlk slchuahkv kl zb sljov.

— Lzv tlztv lz iplu xbl fv wylnbual, zlñvyh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—; f hzí,
wylnbuav zp lzahyé fv zlnbyv kl zly hjvtlapkv f mvyghkv.

— ¿Kl xbpéu v h xbpéu wlkíz, zlñvy jhihsslyv, lzh zlnbypkhk? —ylzwvukpó sh
kblñh.

— H cvz f kl cvz sh wpkv —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl up fv zvf kl táytvs

wphkvzh Kpkv. Wlyv khktl, zlñvyh, sh thuv, xbl fv uv xbplyv vayh zlnbypkhk
thfvy xbl sh kl tp jvuapulujph f yljhav, f sh xbl vmyljlu lzhz
ylclylukízpthz avjhz.

F, kpjplukv lzav, ilzó zb klyljoh thuv, f sl hzpó kl sh zbfh, xbl lssh sl
kpv jvu shz tlzthz jlyltvuphz.

Hxbí ohjl Jpkl Ohtlal bu whyéualzpz, f kpjl xbl wvy Thovth xbl kplyh, wvy
cly py h svz kvz hzí hzpkvz f ayhihkvz klzkl sh wblyah hs sljov, sh tlqvy
hsthshmh kl kvz xbl aluíh.

Luayózl, lu mpu, kvu Xbpqval lu zb sljov, f xblkózl kvñh Yvkyínblg zluahkh
lu buh zpssh, hsnv klzcphkh kl sh jhth, uv xbpaáukvzl svz huavqvz up sh

zpslujpv mbl kvu Xbpqval, kpjplukv:

— Wblkl cblzh tlyjlk hovyh, tp zlñvyh kvñh Yvkyínblg, klzjvzlyzl f klzibjohy
avkv hxblssv xbl aplul kluayv kl zb jbpahkv jvyhgóu f shzapthkhz luayhñhz,
xbl zlyá kl tí lzjbjohkh jvu jhzavz víkvz, f zvjvyypkh jvu wphkvzhz viyhz.

— Hzí sv jylv fv —ylzwvukpó sh kblñh—, xbl kl sh nluaps f hnyhkhisl
wylzlujph kl cblzh tlyjlk uv zl wvkíh lzwlyhy zpuv ahu jypzaphuh ylzwblzah.
«Lz, wblz, ls jhzv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl, hbuxbl cblzh tlyjlk tl cll
zluahkh lu lzah zpssh f lu sh tpahk kls ylpuv kl Hyhnóu, f lu oáipav kl

wlyv tp jvyah zblyal f ls klzjbpkv kl tpz whkylz, xbl ltwviyljplyvu hualz

hjvtvkhyvu h zlycpy kl kvujlssh kl shivy h buh wypujpwhs zlñvyh; f xbplyv
ohjly zhipkvy h cblzh tlyjlk xbl lu ohjly chpupsshz f shivy ishujh upunbuh
tl oh ljohkv ls wpl hklshual lu avkh sh cpkh. Tpz whkylz tl klqhyvu
zpycplukv f zl cvscplyvu h zb aplyyh, f kl hssí h wvjvz hñvz zl kliplyvu kl
py hs jplsv, wvyxbl lyhu hkltáz ibluvz f jhaóspjvz jypzaphuvz. Xblké
obéymhuh, f halupkh hs tpzlyhisl zhshypv f h shz hunbzaphkhz tlyjlklz xbl
h shz ahslz jyphkhz zl zblsl khy lu whshjpv; f, lu lzal apltwv, zpu xbl
kplzl fv vjhzpóu h lssv, zl luhtvyó kl tp bu lzjbklyv kl jhzh, ovtiyl fh lu
kíhz, ihyibkv f hwlyzvuhkv, f, zviyl avkv, opkhsnv jvtv ls ylf, wvyxbl lyh
tvuahñéz. Uv ayhahtvz ahu zljylahtlual ublzayvz htvylz xbl uv cpuplzlu h
uvapjph kl tp zlñvyh, sh jbhs, wvy lzjbzhy kptlz f kpylalz, uvz jhzó lu whg
f lu ohg kl sh Zhuah Thkyl Pnslzph Jhaóspjh Yvthuh, kl jbfv thayptvupv
uhjpó buh opqh whyh ylthahy jvu tp cluabyh, zp hsnbuh aluíh; uv wvyxbl fv

sbnhy whyh jvuahysl, fv zé xbl cblzayh tlyjlk zl hktpyhyh.»

F, lu lzav, jvtlugó h ssvyhy aplyuhtlual, f kpqv:

— Wlykóultl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl uv ch táz lu tp thuv,
wvyxbl avkhz shz cljlz xbl tl hjblykv kl tp ths svnyhkv zl tl hyyhzhu svz
vqvz kl sánypthz. ¡Cáshtl Kpvz, f jvu xbé hbavypkhk sslchih h tp zlñvyh h
shz hujhz kl buh wvklyvzh tbsh, ulnyh jvtv ls tpztv hghihjol! Xbl luavujlz
uv zl bzhihu jvjolz up zpsshz, jvtv hnvyh kpjlu xbl zl bzhu, f shz zlñvyhz
pihu h shz hujhz kl zbz lzjbklyvz. Lzav, h sv tluvz, uv wblkv klqhy kl
jvuahysv, wvyxbl zl uval sh jyphugh f wbuabhspkhk kl tp iblu thypkv. «Hs
luayhy kl sh jhssl kl Zhuaphnv, lu Thkypk, xbl lz hsnv lzayljoh, cluíh h
zhspy wvy lssh bu hsjhskl kl jvyal jvu kvz hsnbhjpslz klshual, f, hzí jvtv
tp iblu lzjbklyv sl cpv, cvscpó shz yplukhz h sh tbsh, khukv zlñhs kl
cvscly h hjvtwhñhysl. Tp zlñvyh, xbl pih h shz hujhz, jvu cvg ihqh sl
kljíh: ''—¿Xbé ohjépz, klzcluabyhkv? ¿Uv clpz xbl cvf hxbí?'' Ls hsjhskl,
kl jvtlkpkv, klabcv sh yplukh hs jhihssv f kíqvsl: ''—Zlnbpk, zlñvy,
cblzayv jhtpuv, xbl fv zvf ls xbl kliv hjvtwhñhy h tp zlñvyh kvñh
Jhzpskh'', xbl hzí lyh ls uvtiyl kl tp hth. Avkhcíh wvymphih tp thypkv, jvu
sh nvyyh lu sh thuv, h xblyly py hjvtwhñhukv hs hsjhskl, cplukv sv jbhs tp
zlñvyh, ssluh kl jóslyh f luvqv, zhjó bu hsmpsly nvykv, v jylv xbl bu
wbugóu, kls lzabjol, f jshcózlsl wvy svz svtvz, kl thulyh xbl tp thypkv kpv
buh nyhu cvg f avyjpó ls jblywv, kl zblyal xbl kpv jvu zb zlñvyh lu ls
zblsv. Hjbkplyvu kvz shjhfvz zbfvz h slchuahysh, f sv tpztv opgv ls hsjhskl
f svz hsnbhjpslz; hsivyvaózl sh Wblyah kl Nbhkhshqhyh, kpnv, sh nlual
ihskíh xbl lu lssh lzahih; cíuvzl h wpl tp hth, f tp thypkv hjbkpó lu jhzh
kl bu ihyilyv kpjplukv xbl sslchih whzhkhz kl whyal h whyal shz luayhñhz.
Kpcbsnózl sh jvyalzíh kl tp lzwvzv, ahuav, xbl svz tbjohjovz sl jvyyíhu wvy
shz jhsslz, f wvy lzav f wvyxbl és lyh hsnúu ahuav jvyav kl cpzah, tp
zlñvyh sh kbxblzh sl klzwpkpó, kl jbfv wlzhy, zpu kbkh hsnbuh, alunv whyh
tí xbl zl sl jhbzó ls ths kl sh tblyal. Xblké fv cpbkh f klzhtwhyhkh, f jvu
opqh h jblzahz, xbl pih jyljplukv lu olytvzbyh jvtv sh lzwbth kl sh thy.
Mpuhstlual, jvtv fv abcplzl mhth kl nyhu shiyhuklyh, tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh,
xbl lzahih yljpéu jhzhkh jvu ls kbxbl tp zlñvy, xbpzv ayhlytl jvuzpnv h
lzal ylpuv kl Hyhnóu f h tp opqh up táz up tluvz, hkvukl, flukv kíhz f
cpuplukv kíhz, jyljpó tp opqh, f jvu lssh avkv ls kvuhpyl kls tbukv: jhuah
jvtv buh jhshukyph, khugh jvtv ls wluzhtpluav, ihpsh jvtv buh wlykpkh, sll
f lzjypil jvtv bu thlzayv kl lzjblsh, f jbluah jvtv bu hchypluav. Kl zb
sptwplgh uv kpnv uhkh: xbl ls hnbh xbl jvyyl uv lz táz sptwph, f klil kl
aluly hnvyh, zp ths uv tl hjblykv, kplg f zlpz hñvz, jpujv tlzlz f aylz
kíhz, buv táz h tluvz. Lu ylzvsbjpóu: kl lzah tp tbjohjoh zl luhtvyó bu
opqv kl bu shiyhkvy ypxbízptv xbl lzaá lu buh hsklh kls kbxbl tp zlñvy, uv
tbf slqvz kl hxbí. Lu lmljav, uv zé jótv up jótv uv, lssvz zl qbuahyvu, f,
klihqv kl sh whshiyh kl zly zb lzwvzv, ibysó h tp opqh, f uv zl sh xbplyl
jbtwspy; f, hbuxbl ls kbxbl tp zlñvy sv zhil, wvyxbl fv tl ol xblqhkv h és,
uv buh, zpuv tbjohz cljlz, f wlkíkvsl thukl xbl ls ahs shiyhkvy zl jhzl jvu
tp opqh, ohjl vylqhz kl tlyjhkly f hwluhz xbplyl víytl; f lz sh jhbzh xbl,
jvtv ls whkyl kls ibyshkvy lz ahu ypjv f sl wylzah kpulyvz, f sl zhsl wvy
mphkvy kl zbz ayhtwhz wvy tvtluavz, uv sl xbplyl klzjvualuahy up khy
wlzhkbtiyl lu upunúu tvkv.» Xblyyíh, wblz, zlñvy tív, xbl cblzh tlyjlk
avthzl h jhynv ls klzohjly lzal hnyhcpv, v fh wvy yblnvz, v fh wvy hythz,
wblz, zlnúu avkv ls tbukv kpjl, cblzh tlyjlk uhjpó lu és whyh klzohjlysvz f
whyh luklylghy svz ablyavz f htwhyhy svz tpzlyhislz; f wóunhzlsl h cblzh
tlyjlk wvy klshual sh vymhukhk kl tp opqh, zb nluapslgh, zb tvjlkhk, jvu
avkhz shz ibluhz whyalz xbl ol kpjov xbl aplul; xbl lu Kpvz f lu tp
jvujplujph xbl kl jbhuahz kvujlsshz aplul tp zlñvyh, xbl uv ohf upunbuh xbl
sslnbl h sh zblsh kl zb ghwhav, f xbl buh xbl sshthu Hsapzpkvyh, xbl lz sh
xbl aplulu wvy táz klzlucblsah f nhsshykh, wblzah lu jvtwhyhjpóu kl tp
opqh, uv sh sslnh jvu kvz slnbhz. Wvyxbl xbplyv xbl zlwh cblzh tlyjlk,
zlñvy tív, xbl uv lz avkv vyv sv xbl ylsbjl; wvyxbl lzah Hsapzpkvypssh
aplul táz kl wylzbujpóu xbl kl olytvzbyh, f táz kl klzlucblsah xbl kl
yljvnpkh, hkltáz xbl uv lzaá tbf zhuh: xbl aplul bu jplyav hssluav jhuzhkv,
xbl uv ohf zbmypy ls lzahy qbuav h lssh bu tvtluav. F hbu tp zlñvyh sh
kbxblzh... Xbplyv jhsshy, xbl zl zblsl kljpy xbl shz whylklz aplulu víkvz.

— ¿Xbé aplul tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh, wvy cpkh tíh, zlñvyh kvñh Yvkyínblg?
— wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Jvu lzl jvuqbyv —ylzwvukpó sh kblñh—, uv wblkv klqhy kl ylzwvukly h sv xbl
zl tl wylnbuah jvu avkh clykhk. ¿Cll cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, sh
olytvzbyh kl tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh, hxblssh alg kl yvzayv, xbl uv whyljl
zpuv kl buh lzwhkh hjpjhshkh f alyzh, hxblsshz kvz tlqpsshz kl sljol f kl
jhytíu, xbl lu sh buh aplul ls zvs f lu sh vayh sh sbuh, f hxblssh
nhsshykíh jvu xbl ch wpzhukv f hbu klzwyljphukv ls zblsv, xbl uv whyljl
zpuv xbl ch klyyhthukv zhsbk kvukl whzh? Wblz zlwh cblzh tlyjlk xbl sv
wblkl hnyhkljly, wyptlyv, h Kpvz, f sblnv, h kvz mblualz xbl aplul lu shz
kvz wplyuhz, wvy kvukl zl klzhnbh avkv ls ths obtvy kl xbplu kpjlu svz
tékpjvz xbl lzaá ssluh.

— ¡Zhuah Thyíh! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. F ¿lz wvzpisl xbl tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh
alunh ahslz klzhnbhklyvz? Uv sv jylflyh zp tl sv kpqlyhu myhpslz klzjhsgvz;
wlyv, wblz sh zlñvyh kvñh Yvkyínblg sv kpjl, klil kl zly hzí. Wlyv ahslz
mblualz, f lu ahslz sbnhylz, uv klilu kl thuhy obtvy, zpuv átihy síxbpkv.
Clykhklyhtlual xbl hovyh hjhiv kl jylly xbl lzav kl ohjlyzl mblualz klil kl
zly jvzh ptwvyahual whyh zhsbk.

Hwluhz hjhió kvu Xbpqval kl kljpy lzah yhgóu, jbhukv jvu bu nyhu nvswl
hiyplyvu shz wblyahz kls hwvzluav, f kls zviylzhsav kls nvswl zl sl jhfó h
kvñh Yvkyínblg sh clsh kl sh thuv, f xblkó sh lzahujph jvtv ivjh kl sviv,
jvtv zblsl kljpyzl. Sblnv zpuapó sh wviyl kblñh xbl sh hzíhu kl sh nhynhuah
jvu kvz thuvz, ahu mblyaltlual xbl uv sh klqhihu nhñpy, f xbl vayh wlyzvuh,
jvu tbjoh wylzalgh, zpu ohishy whshiyh, sl hsghih shz mhskhz, f jvu buh, hs
whyljly, jopulsh, sl jvtlugó h khy ahuavz hgvalz, xbl lyh buh jvtwhzpóu; f,
hbuxbl kvu Xbpqval zl sh aluíh, uv zl tlulhih kls sljov, f uv zhiíh xbé
wvkíh zly hxblssv, f lzaáihzl xblkv f jhsshukv, f hbu altplukv uv cpuplzl
wvy és sh ahukh f abukh hgvalzjh. F uv mbl chuv zb altvy, wvyxbl, lu
klqhukv tvspkh h sh kblñh svz jhsshkvz clykbnvz (sh jbhs uv vzhih
xblqhyzl), hjbkplyvu h kvu Xbpqval, f, klzlucvscpéukvsl kl sh záihuh f kl
sh jvsjoh, sl wlsspgjhyvu ahu h tlubkv f ahu yljphtlual, xbl uv wbkv klqhy
kl klmluklyzl h wbñhkhz, f avkv lzav lu zpslujpv hktpyhisl. Kbyó sh ihahssh
jhzp tlkph ovyh; zhspéyvuzl shz mhuahzthz, yljvnpó kvñh Yvkyínblg zbz
mhskhz, f, nptplukv zb klznyhjph, zl zhspó wvy sh wblyah hmblyh, zpu kljpy
whshiyh h kvu Xbpqval, ls jbhs, kvsvyvzv f wlsspgjhkv, jvumbzv f wluzhapcv,
zl xblkó zvsv, kvukl sl klqhyltvz klzlvzv kl zhily xbpéu ohiíh zpkv ls
wlyclyzv lujhuahkvy xbl ahs sl ohiíh wblzav. Wlyv lssv zl kpyá h zb apltwv,
xbl Zhujov Whugh uvz sshth, f ls iblu jvujplyav kl sh opzavyph sv wpkl.




Jhwíabsv ESPE. Kl sv xbl sl zbjlkpó h Zhujov Whugh yvukhukv zb íuzbsh

Klqhtvz hs nyhu nvilyuhkvy luvqhkv f tvoíuv jvu ls shiyhkvy wpuavy f
zvjhyyóu, ls jbhs, pukbzayphkv kls thfvykvtv, f ls thfvykvtv kls kbxbl, zl
ibyshihu kl Zhujov; wlyv és zl shz aluíh aplzhz h avkvz, thnblyh avuav,
iyvujv f yvsspgv, f kpqv h svz xbl jvu és lzahihu, f hs kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv,
xbl, jvtv zl hjhió ls zljylav kl sh jhyah kls kbxbl, ohiíh cblsav h luayhy
lu sh zhsh:

— Hovyh clykhklyhtlual xbl luaplukv xbl svz qbljlz f nvilyuhkvylz klilu kl
zly, v ohu kl zly, kl iyvujl, whyh uv zluapy shz ptwvyabupkhklz kl svz
ulnvjphualz, xbl h avkhz ovyhz f h avkvz apltwvz xbplylu xbl svz lzjbjolu f
klzwhjolu, halukplukv zósv h zb ulnvjpv, clunh sv xbl cpuplyl; f zp ls
wviyl kls qblg uv svz lzjbjoh f klzwhjoh, v wvyxbl uv wblkl v wvyxbl uv lz
hxbés ls apltwv kpwbahkv whyh khyslz hbkplujph, sblnv slz thskpjlu f
tbytbyhu, f slz yvlu svz oblzvz, f hbu slz klzspukhu svz spuhqlz.
Ulnvjphual uljpv, ulnvjphual tlualjhav, uv al hwylzbylz; lzwlyh zhgóu f
jvfbuabyh whyh ulnvjphy: uv clunhz h sh ovyh kls jvtly up h sh kls kvytpy,
xbl svz qbljlz zvu kl jhyul f kl oblzv f ohu kl khy h sh uhabyhslgh sv xbl
uhabyhstlual slz wpkl, zp uv lz fv, xbl uv sl kvf kl jvtly h sh tíh, tlyjlk
hs zlñvy kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv Apyalhmblyh, xbl lzaá klshual, xbl xbplyl xbl
tblyh kl ohtiyl, f hmpyth xbl lzah tblyal lz cpkh, xbl hzí zl sh ké Kpvz h
és f h avkvz svz kl zb yhslh: kpnv, h sh kl svz thsvz tékpjvz, xbl sh kl
svz ibluvz, whsthz f shbyvz tlyljlu.

Avkvz svz xbl jvuvjíhu h Zhujov Whugh zl hktpyhihu, vféukvsl ohishy ahu
lslnhualtlual, f uv zhiíhu h xbé haypibpysv, zpuv h xbl svz vmpjpvz f
jhynvz nyhclz, v hkvihu v luavywljlu svz lualukptpluavz. Mpuhstlual, ls
kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv Hnülyv kl Apyalhmblyh wyvtlapó kl khysl kl jluhy hxblssh
uvjol, hbuxbl lejlkplzl kl avkvz svz hmvypztvz kl Opwójyhalz. Jvu lzav
xblkó jvualuav ls nvilyuhkvy, f lzwlyhih jvu nyhukl huzph sslnhzl sh uvjol
f sh ovyh kl jluhy; f, hbuxbl ls apltwv, hs whyljly zbfv, zl lzahih xblkv,
zpu tvclyzl kl bu sbnhy, avkhcíh zl sslnó wvy és ls ahuav klzlhkv, kvukl
sl kplyvu kl jluhy bu zhswpjóu kl chjh jvu jlivssh, f buhz thuvz jvjpkhz kl
alyulyh hsnv luayhkh lu kíhz. Luaylnózl lu avkv jvu táz nbzav xbl zp sl
obiplyhu khkv myhujvspulz kl Tpsáu, mhpzhulz kl Yvth, alyulyh kl Zvyyluav,
wlykpjlz kl Tvyóu, v nhuzvz kl Shchqvz; f, luayl sh jluh, cvscpéukvzl hs
kvjavy, sl kpqv:

— Tpyhk, zlñvy kvjavy: kl hxbí hklshual uv vz jbyépz kl khytl h jvtly jvzhz
ylnhshkhz up thuqhylz lzxbpzpavz, wvyxbl zlyá zhjhy h tp lzaóthnv kl zbz
xbpjpvz, ls jbhs lzaá hjvzabtiyhkv h jhiyh, h chjh, h avjpuv, h jljpuh, h
uhivz f h jlivsshz; f, zp hjhzv sl khu vayvz thuqhylz kl whshjpv, svz
yljpil jvu tlspukyl, f hsnbuhz cljlz jvu hzjv. Sv xbl ls thlzaylzhsh wblkl
ohjly lz ayhlytl lzahz xbl sshthu vsshz wvkypkhz, xbl tpluayhz táz wvkypkhz
zvu, tlqvy oblslu, f lu lsshz wblkl ltihbshy f lujlyyhy avkv sv xbl és
xbpzplyl, jvtv zlh kl jvtly, xbl fv zl sv hnyhkljlyé f zl sv whnhyé hsnúu
kíh; f uv zl ibysl uhkpl jvutpnv, wvyxbl v zvtvz v uv zvtvz: cpchtvz avkvz
f jvthtvz lu ibluh whg jvtwhñh, wblz, jbhukv Kpvz hthuljl, whyh avkvz
hthuljl. Fv nvilyuhyé lzah íuzbsh zpu wlykvuhy klyljov up sslchy jvoljov, f
avkv ls tbukv ayhpnh ls vqv hslyah f tpyl wvy ls cpyval, wvyxbl slz ohnv
zhily xbl ls kphisv lzaá lu Jhuapsshuh, f xbl, zp tl khu vjhzpóu, ohu kl
cly thyhcpsshz. Uv, zpuv ohjlvz tpls, f jvtlyvz ohu tvzjhz.

— Wvy jplyav, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy —kpqv ls thlzaylzhsh—, xbl cblzh tlyjlk aplul
tbjoh yhgóu lu jbhuav oh kpjov, f xbl fv vmylgjv lu uvtiyl kl avkvz svz
puzbshuvz klzah íuzbsh xbl ohu kl zlycpy h cblzayh tlyjlk jvu avkh
wbuabhspkhk, htvy f ilulcvslujph, wvyxbl ls zbhcl tvkv kl nvilyuhy xbl lu
lzavz wypujpwpvz cblzh tlyjlk oh khkv uv slz kh sbnhy kl ohjly up kl wluzhy
jvzh xbl lu klzlycpjpv kl cblzh tlyjlk ylkbukl.

— Fv sv jylv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f zlyíhu lssvz buvz uljpvz zp vayh jvzh
opjplzlu v wluzhzlu. F cblscv h kljpy xbl zl alunh jbluah jvu tp zbzaluav f
jvu ls kl tp ybjpv, xbl lz sv xbl lu lzal ulnvjpv ptwvyah f ohjl táz hs
jhzv; f, lu zplukv ovyh, chtvz h yvukhy, xbl lz tp pualujpóu sptwphy lzah
íuzbsh kl avkv néulyv kl putbukpjph f kl nlual chnhtbukh, ovsnhghulz, f ths
luaylalupkh; wvyxbl xbplyv xbl zlwápz, htpnvz, xbl sh nlual ihskíh f
wlylgvzh lz lu sh ylwúispjh sv tlztv xbl svz gáunhuvz lu shz jvstluhz, xbl
zl jvtlu sh tpls xbl shz ayhihqhkvyhz hilqhz ohjlu. Wpluzv mhcvyljly h svz
shiyhkvylz, nbhykhy zbz wylltpulujphz h svz opkhsnvz, wyltphy svz cpyabvzvz
f, zviyl avkv, aluly ylzwlav h sh ylspnpóu f h sh ovuyh kl svz ylspnpvzvz.
¿Xbé vz whyljl klzav, htpnvz? ¿Kpnv hsnv, v xbpéiyvtl sh jhilgh?

— Kpjl ahuav cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy —kpqv ls thfvykvtv—, xbl lzavf
hktpyhkv kl cly xbl bu ovtiyl ahu zpu slayhz jvtv cblzh tlyjlk, xbl, h sv
xbl jylv, uv aplul upunbuh, kpnh ahslz f ahuahz jvzhz ssluhz kl zlualujphz
f kl hcpzvz, ahu mblyh kl avkv hxblssv xbl kls punlupv kl cblzh tlyjlk
lzwlyhihu svz xbl uvz lucphyvu f svz xbl hxbí cluptvz. Jhkh kíh zl cllu
jvzhz ublchz lu ls tbukv: shz ibyshz zl cblsclu lu clyhz f svz ibyshkvylz
zl ohsshu ibyshkvz.

Sslnó sh uvjol, f jluó ls nvilyuhkvy, jvu spjlujph kls zlñvy kvjavy Yljpv.
Hklylgáyvuzl kl yvukh; zhspó jvu ls thfvykvtv, zljylahypv f thlzaylzhsh, f
ls jvyvupzah xbl aluíh jbpkhkv kl wvuly lu tltvyph zbz oljovz, f hsnbhjpslz
f lzjypihuvz, ahuavz xbl wvkíhu mvythy bu tlkphuv lzjbhkyóu. Pih Zhujov lu
tlkpv, jvu zb chyh, xbl uv ohiíh táz xbl cly, f wvjhz jhsslz hukhkhz kls
sbnhy, zpuaplyvu ybpkv kl jbjopsshkhz; hjbkplyvu hssá, f ohsshyvu xbl lyhu
