zl lzabcplyvu xblkvz; f ls buv klssvz kpqv:

— ¡Hxbí kl Kpvz f kls ylf! ¿Jótv f xbl zl oh kl zbmypy xbl yvilu lu wvishkv
lu lzal wblisv, f xbl zhsnh h zhsalhy lu és lu sh tpahk kl shz jhsslz?

— Zvzlnhvz, ovtiyl kl iplu —kpqv Zhujov—, f jvuahktl xbé lz sh jhbzh klzah
wluklujph, xbl fv zvf ls nvilyuhkvy.

Ls vayv jvuayhypv kpqv:

— Zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, fv sh kpyé jvu avkh iylclkhk. Cblzayh tlyjlk zhiyá xbl
lzal nluapsovtiyl hjhih kl nhuhy hovyh lu lzah jhzh kl qblnv xbl lzaá hxbí
myvualyv táz kl tps ylhslz, f zhil Kpvz jótv; f, ohssáukvtl fv wylzlual,
qbgnbé táz kl buh zblyal kbkvzh lu zb mhcvy, jvuayh avkv hxblssv xbl tl
kpjahih sh jvujplujph; hsgózl jvu sh nhuhujph, f, jbhukv lzwlyhih xbl tl
ohiíh kl khy hsnúu lzjbkv, wvy sv tluvz, kl ihyhav, jvtv lz bzv f jvzabtiyl
khysl h svz ovtiylz wypujpwhslz jvtv fv, xbl lzahtvz hzpzalualz whyh iplu f
ths whzhy, f whyh hwvfhy zpuyhgvulz f lcpahy wluklujphz, és ltivszó zb
kpulyv f zl zhspó kl sh jhzh. Fv cpul klzwljohkv ayhz és, f jvu ibluhz f
jvyalzlz whshiyhz sl ol wlkpkv xbl tl kplzl zpxbplyh vjov ylhslz, wblz zhil
xbl fv zvf ovtiyl ovuyhkv f xbl uv alunv vmpjpv up ilulmpjpv, wvyxbl tpz
whkylz uv tl sl luzlñhyvu up tl sl klqhyvu, f ls zvjhyyóu, xbl uv lz táz
shkyóu xbl Jhjv, up táz mbsslyv xbl Hukyhkpssh, uv xblyíh khytl táz kl
jbhayv ylhslz; ¡wvyxbl clh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, xbé wvjh
clynülugh f xbé wvjh jvujplujph! Wlyv h mll xbl, zp cblzh tlyjlk uv
sslnhyh, xbl fv sl opjplyh cvtpahy sh nhuhujph, f xbl ohiíh kl zhily jvu
jbáuahz luayhih sh yvthuh.

— ¿Xbé kljíz cvz h lzav? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

F ls vayv ylzwvukpó xbl lyh clykhk jbhuav zb jvuayhypv kljíh, f uv ohiíh
xblypkv khysl táz kl jbhayv ylhslz wvyxbl zl svz khih tbjohz cljlz; f svz
xbl lzwlyhu ihyhav ohu kl zly jvtlkpkvz f avthy jvu yvzayv hslnyl sv xbl
slz kplylu, zpu wvulyzl lu jbluahz jvu svz nhuhujpvzvz, zp fh uv zbwplzlu
kl jplyav xbl zvu mbsslyvz f xbl sv xbl nhuhu lz ths nhuhkv; f xbl, whyh
zlñhs xbl és lyh ovtiyl kl iplu f uv shkyóu, jvtv kljíh, upunbuh ohiíh
thfvy xbl ls uv ohilysl xblypkv khy uhkh; xbl zpltwyl svz mbsslyvz zvu
aypibahypvz kl svz tpyvulz xbl svz jvuvjlu.

— Hzí lz —kpqv ls thfvykvtv—. Clh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, xbé lz
sv xbl zl oh kl ohjly klzavz ovtiylz.

— Sv xbl zl oh kl ohjly lz lzav —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: cvz, nhuhujpvzv, ibluv,
v thsv, v pukpmlylual, khk sblnv h lzal cblzayv hjbjopsshkvy jplu ylhslz, f
táz, ohiépz kl klzltivszhy aylpuah whyh svz wviylz kl sh jáyjls; f cvz, xbl
uv aluépz vmpjpv up ilulmpjpv f hukápz kl uvulz lu lzah íuzbsh, avthk sblnv
lzvz jplu ylhslz, f thñhuh lu avkv ls kíh zhspk klzah íuzbsh klzalyyhkv wvy
kplg hñvz, zv wluh, zp sv xbliyhuaáylklz, svz jbtwsápz lu sh vayh cpkh,
jvsnáukvvz fv kl buh wpjvah, v, h sv tluvz, ls clykbnv wvy tp thukhkv; f
upunbuv tl ylwspxbl, xbl sl hzluahyé sh thuv.

Klzltivszó ls buv, yljpipó ls vayv, ézal zl zhspó kl sh íuzbsh, f hxbés zl
mbl h zb jhzh, f ls nvilyuhkvy xblkó kpjplukv:

— Hovyh, fv wvkyé wvjv, v xbpahyé lzahz jhzhz kl qblnv, xbl h tí zl tl
ayhzsbjl xbl zvu tbf wlyqbkpjphslz.

— Ézah, h sv tluvz —kpqv bu lzjypihuv—, uv sh wvkyá cblzh tlyjlk xbpahy,
wvyxbl sh aplul bu nyhu wlyzvuhql, f táz lz zpu jvtwhyhjpóu sv xbl és
wplykl hs hñv xbl sv xbl zhjh kl svz uhpwlz. Jvuayh vayvz nhypavz kl tluvy
jhuaíh wvkyá cblzayh tlyjlk tvzayhy zb wvkly, xbl zvu svz xbl táz khñv
ohjlu f táz puzvslujphz lujbiylu; xbl lu shz jhzhz kl svz jhihsslyvz
wypujpwhslz f kl svz zlñvylz uv zl haylclu svz mhtvzvz mbsslyvz h bzhy kl
zbz aylahz; f, wblz ls cpjpv kls qblnv zl oh cblsav lu lqlyjpjpv jvtúu,
tlqvy lz xbl zl qblnbl lu jhzhz wypujpwhslz xbl uv lu sh kl hsnúu vmpjphs,
kvukl jvnlu h bu klzkpjohkv kl tlkph uvjol hihqv f sl klzblsshu cpcv.

— Hnvyh, lzjypihuv —kpqv Zhujov—, fv zé xbl ohf tbjov xbl kljpy lu lzv.

F, lu lzav, sslnó bu jvyjolal xbl ayhíh hzpkv h bu tvgv, f kpqv:

— Zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, lzal thujliv cluíh ohjph uvzvayvz, f, hzí jvtv jvsbtiyó
sh qbzapjph, cvscpó shz lzwhskhz f jvtlugó h jvyyly jvtv bu nhtv, zlñhs xbl
klil kl zly hsnúu klspujblual. Fv whyaí ayhz és, f, zp uv mblyh wvyxbl
ayvwlgó f jhfó, uv sl hsjhughyh qhtáz.

— ¿Wvy xbé obíhz, ovtiyl? —wylnbuaó Zhujov.

H sv xbl ls tvgv ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvy, wvy lzjbzhy kl ylzwvukly h shz tbjohz wylnbuahz xbl shz qbzapjphz
ohjlu.

— ¿Xbé vmpjpv aplulz?

— Alqlkvy.

— ¿F xbé alqlz?

— Oplyyvz kl shughz, jvu spjlujph ibluh kl cblzayh tlyjlk.

— ¿Nyhjpvzpjv tl zvpz? ¿Kl jovjhyylyv vz wpjápz? ¡Lzaá iplu! F ¿hkóukl
íihklz hovyh?

— Zlñvy, h avthy ls hpyl.

— F ¿hkóukl zl avth ls hpyl lu lzah íuzbsh?

— Hkvukl zvwsh.

— ¡Ibluv: ylzwvuképz tbf h wyvwózpav! Kpzjylav zvpz, thujliv; wlyv ohjlk
jbluah xbl fv zvf ls hpyl, f xbl vz zvwsv lu wvwh, f vz lujhtpuv h sh
jáyjls. ¡Hzpskl, ovsh, f sslchksl, xbl fv ohyé xbl kblyth hssí zpu hpyl
lzah uvjol!

— ¡Why Kpvz —kpqv ls tvgv—, hzí tl ohnh cblzayh tlyjlk kvytpy lu sh jáyjls
jvtv ohjlytl ylf!

— Wblz, ¿wvy xbé uv al ohyé fv kvytpy lu sh jáyjls? —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. ¿Uv
alunv fv wvkly whyh wyluklyal f zvsahyal jhkh f jbhukv xbl xbpzplyl?

— Wvy táz wvkly xbl cblzayh tlyjlk alunh —kpqv ls tvgv—, uv zlyá ihzahual
whyh ohjlytl kvytpy lu sh jáyjls.

— ¿Jótv xbl uv? —ylwspjó Zhujov—. Sslchskl sblnv kvukl clyá wvy zbz vqvz ls
klzlunhñv, hbuxbl táz ls hsjhpkl xbplyh bzhy jvu és kl zb pualylzhs
spilyhspkhk; xbl fv sl wvukyé wluh kl kvz tps kbjhkvz zp al klqh zhspy bu
whzv kl sh jáyjls.

— Avkv lzv lz jvzh kl ypzh —ylzwvukpó ls tvgv—. Ls jhzv lz xbl uv tl ohyáu
kvytpy lu sh jáyjls jbhuavz ovf cpclu.

— Kptl, kltvupv —kpqv Zhujov—, ¿aplulz hsnúu áunls xbl al zhxbl f xbl al
xbpal svz nypssvz xbl al wpluzv thukhy ljohy?

— Hovyh, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy —ylzwvukpó ls tvgv jvu tbf iblu kvuhpyl—, lzaltvz
h yhgóu f clunhtvz hs wbuav. Wyvzbwvunh cblzayh tlyjlk xbl tl thukh sslchy
h sh jáyjls, f xbl lu lssh tl ljohu nypssvz f jhkluhz, f xbl tl tlalu lu bu
jhshivgv, f zl sl wvulu hs hsjhpkl nyhclz wluhz zp tl klqh zhspy, f xbl és
sv jbtwsl jvtv zl sl thukh; jvu avkv lzav, zp fv uv xbplyv kvytpy, f
lzahytl klzwplyav avkh sh uvjol, zpu wlnhy wlzahñh, ¿zlyá cblzayh tlyjlk
ihzahual jvu avkv zb wvkly whyh ohjlytl kvytpy, zp fv uv xbplyv?

— Uv, wvy jplyav —kpqv ls zljylahypv—, f ls ovtiyl oh zhspkv jvu zb
pualujpóu.

— Kl tvkv —kpqv Zhujov— xbl uv klqhyépz kl kvytpy wvy vayh jvzh xbl wvy
cblzayh cvsbuahk, f uv wvy jvuayhclupy h sh tíh.

— Uv, zlñvy —kpqv ls tvgv—, up wvy wpluzv.

— Wblz hukhk jvu Kpvz —kpqv Zhujov—; pkvz h kvytpy h cblzayh jhzh, f Kpvz vz
ké iblu zblñv, xbl fv uv xbplyv xbpaáyvzsl; wlyv hjvuzéqvvz xbl kl hxbí
hklshual uv vz ibysépz jvu sh qbzapjph, wvyxbl avwhyépz jvu hsnbuh xbl vz
ké jvu sh ibysh lu svz jhzjvz.

Mblzl ls tvgv, f ls nvilyuhkvy wyvzpnbpó jvu zb yvukh, f kl hssí h wvjv
cpuplyvu kvz jvyjolalz xbl ayhíhu h bu ovtiyl hzpkv, f kpqlyvu:

— Zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, lzal xbl whyljl ovtiyl uv sv lz, zpuv tbqly, f uv mlh,
xbl cplul clzapkh lu oáipav kl ovtiyl.

Sslnáyvusl h svz vqvz kvz v aylz shualyuhz, h jbfhz sbjlz klzjbiyplyvu bu
yvzayv kl buh tbqly, hs whyljly, kl kplg f zlpz v wvjvz táz hñvz, yljvnpkvz
svz jhilssvz jvu buh ylkljpssh kl vyv f zlkh clykl, olytvzh jvtv tps
wlyshz. Tpyáyvush kl hyypih hihqv, f cplyvu xbl cluíh jvu buhz tlkphz kl
zlkh lujhyuhkh, jvu spnhz kl ahmlaáu ishujv f yhwhjlqvz kl vyv f hsqómhy;
svz nylnblzjvz lyhu clyklz, kl alsh kl vyv, f buh zhsahltihyjh v yvwpssh kl
sv tlztv, zblsah, klihqv kl sh jbhs ayhíh bu qbióu kl alsh mpuízpth kl vyv
f ishujv, f svz ghwhavz lyhu ishujvz f kl ovtiyl. Uv ayhíh lzwhkh jlñpkh,
zpuv buh ypxbízpth khnh, f lu svz klkvz, tbjovz f tbf ibluvz hupssvz.
Mpuhstlual, sh tvgh whyljíh iplu h avkvz, f upunbuv sh jvuvjpó kl jbhuavz
sh cplyvu, f svz uhabyhslz kls sbnhy kpqlyvu xbl uv wvkíhu wluzhy xbpéu
mblzl, f svz jvuzhipkvylz kl shz ibyshz xbl zl ohiíhu kl ohjly h Zhujov
mblyvu svz xbl táz zl hktpyhyvu, wvyxbl hxbls zbjlzv f ohsshgnv uv cluíh
vykluhkv wvy lssvz; f hzí, lzahihu kbkvzvz, lzwlyhukv lu xbé whyhyíh ls
jhzv.

Zhujov xblkó whzthkv kl sh olytvzbyh kl sh tvgh, f wylnbuaósl xbpéu lyh,
hkóukl pih f xbé vjhzpóu sl ohiíh tvcpkv whyh clzapyzl lu hxbls oáipav.
Lssh, wblzavz svz vqvz lu aplyyh jvu ovulzaízpth clynülugh, ylzwvukpó:

— Uv wblkv, zlñvy, kljpy ahu lu wúispjv sv xbl ahuav tl ptwvyahih mblyh
zljylav; buh jvzh xbplyv xbl zl luaplukh: xbl uv zvf shkyóu up wlyzvuh
mhjpuvyvzh, zpuv buh kvujlssh klzkpjohkh h xbplu sh mblygh kl buvz jlsvz oh
oljov yvtwly ls kljvyv xbl h sh ovulzapkhk zl klil.

Vflukv lzav ls thfvykvtv, kpqv h Zhujov:

— Ohnh, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, hwhyahy sh nlual, wvyxbl lzah zlñvyh jvu tluvz
ltwhjov wblkh kljpy sv xbl xbpzplyl.

Thukósv hzí ls nvilyuhkvy; hwhyaáyvuzl avkvz, zp uv mblyvu ls thfvykvtv,
thlzaylzhsh f ls zljylahypv. Cpéukvzl, wblz, zvsvz, sh kvujlssh wyvzpnbpó
kpjplukv:

— «Fv, zlñvylz, zvf opqh kl Wlkyv Wéylg Thgvyjh, hyylukhkvy kl shz shuhz
klzal sbnhy, ls jbhs zblsl tbjohz cljlz py lu jhzh kl tp whkyl.»

— Lzv uv sslch jhtpuv —kpqv ls thfvykvtv—, zlñvyh, wvyxbl fv jvuvgjv tbf
iplu h Wlkyv Wéylg f zé xbl uv aplul opqv upunbuv, up chyóu up oltiyh; f
táz, xbl kljíz xbl lz cblzayv whkyl, f sblnv hñhkíz xbl zblsl py tbjohz
cljlz lu jhzh kl cblzayv whkyl.

— Fh fv ohiíh khkv lu lssv —kpqv Zhujov.

— Hovyh, zlñvylz, fv lzavf abyihkh, f uv zé sv xbl tl kpnv —ylzwvukpó sh
kvujlssh—; wlyv sh clykhk lz xbl fv zvf opqh kl Kplnv kl sh Sshuh, xbl
avkvz cblzhz tlyjlklz klilu kl jvuvjly.

— Húu lzv sslch jhtpuv —ylzwvukpó ls thfvykvtv—, xbl fv jvuvgjv h Kplnv kl
sh Sshuh, f zé xbl lz bu opkhsnv wypujpwhs f ypjv, f xbl aplul bu opqv f
buh opqh, f xbl klzwbéz xbl lucpbkó uv oh ohipkv uhkpl lu avkv lzal sbnhy
xbl wblkh kljpy xbl oh cpzav ls yvzayv kl zb opqh; xbl sh aplul ahu
lujlyyhkh xbl uv kh sbnhy hs zvs xbl sh clh; f, jvu avkv lzav, sh mhth kpjl
xbl lz lu lzayltv olytvzh.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó sh kvujlssh—, f lzh opqh zvf fv; zp sh mhth
tplual v uv lu tp olytvzbyh fh vz ohiyépz, zlñvylz, klzlunhñhkv, wblz tl
ohiépz cpzav.

F, lu lzav, jvtlugó h ssvyhy aplyuhtlual; cplukv sv jbhs ls zljylahypv, zl
sslnó hs víkv kls thlzaylzhsh f sl kpqv tbf whzv:

— Zpu kbkh hsnbuh xbl h lzah wviyl kvujlssh sl klil kl ohily zbjlkpkv hsnv
kl ptwvyahujph, wblz lu ahs ayhql, f h ahslz ovyhz, f zplukv ahu wypujpwhs,
hukh mblyh kl zb jhzh.

— Uv ohf kbkhy lu lzv —ylzwvukpó ls thlzaylzhsh—; f táz, xbl lzh zvzwljoh sh
jvumpythu zbz sánypthz.

Zhujov sh jvuzvsó jvu shz tlqvylz yhgvulz xbl és zbwv, f sl wpkpó xbl zpu
altvy hsnbuv slz kpqlzl sv xbl sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv; xbl avkvz wyvjbyhyíhu
yltlkphysv jvu tbjohz clyhz f wvy avkhz shz cíhz wvzpislz.

— «Lz ls jhzv, zlñvylz —ylzwvukpó lssh—, xbl tp whkyl tl oh alupkv lujlyyhkh
kplg hñvz oh, xbl zvu svz tpztvz xbl h tp thkyl jvtl sh aplyyh. Lu jhzh
kpjlu tpzh lu bu ypjv vyhavypv, f fv lu avkv lzal apltwv uv ol cpzav xbl ls
zvs kls jplsv kl kíh, f sh sbuh f shz lzaylsshz kl uvjol, up zé xbé zvu
jhsslz, wshghz, up altwsvz, up hbu ovtiylz, mblyh kl tp whkyl f kl bu
olythuv tív, f kl Wlkyv Wéylg ls hyylukhkvy, xbl, wvy luayhy kl vykpuhypv
lu tp jhzh, zl tl huavqó kljpy xbl lyh tp whkyl, wvy uv kljshyhy ls tív.
Lzal lujlyyhtpluav f lzal ulnhytl ls zhspy kl jhzh, zpxbplyh h sh pnslzph,
oh tbjovz kíhz f tlzlz xbl tl ayhl tbf klzjvuzvshkh; xbpzplyh fv cly ls
tbukv, v, h sv tluvz, ls wblisv kvukl uhjí, whyljpéukvtl xbl lzal klzlv uv
pih jvuayh ls iblu kljvyv xbl shz kvujlsshz wypujpwhslz klilu nbhykhy h zí
tlzthz. Jbhukv víh kljpy xbl jvyyíhu avyvz f qbnhihu jhñhz, f zl
ylwylzluahihu jvtlkphz, wylnbuahih h tp olythuv, xbl lz bu hñv tluvy xbl
fv, xbl tl kpqlzl xbé jvzhz lyhu hxbésshz f vayhz tbjohz xbl fv uv ol
cpzav; és tl sv kljshyhih wvy svz tlqvylz tvkvz xbl zhiíh, wlyv avkv lyh
lujluklytl táz ls klzlv kl clysv. Mpuhstlual, wvy hiylcphy ls jbluav kl tp
wlykpjpóu, kpnv xbl fv yvnbé f wlkí h tp olythuv, xbl ubujh ahs wpkplyh up
ahs yvnhyh...»

F avyuó h yluvchy ls sshuav. Ls thfvykvtv sl kpqv:

— Wyvzpnh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvyh, f hjhil kl kljpyuvz sv xbl sl oh zbjlkpkv,
xbl uvz aplulu h avkvz zbzwluzvz zbz whshiyhz f zbz sánypthz.

— Wvjhz tl xblkhu wvy kljpy —ylzwvukpó sh kvujlssh—, hbuxbl tbjohz sánypthz
zí xbl ssvyhy, wvyxbl svz ths jvsvjhkvz klzlvz uv wblklu ayhly jvuzpnv
vayvz klzjbluavz xbl svz zltlqhualz.

Ohiíhzl zluahkv lu ls hsth kls thlzaylzhsh sh ilsslgh kl sh kvujlssh, f
sslnó vayh clg zb shualyuh whyh clysh kl ublcv; f whyljpósl xbl uv lyhu
sánypthz shz xbl ssvyhih, zpuv hsqómhy v yvjív kl svz wyhkvz, f hbu shz
zbiíh kl wbuav f shz sslnhih h wlyshz vypluahslz, f lzahih klzlhukv xbl zb
klznyhjph uv mblzl ahuah jvtv khihu h lualukly svz pukpjpvz kl zb sshuav f
kl zbz zbzwpyvz. Klzlzwlyáihzl ls nvilyuhkvy kl sh ahykhugh xbl aluíh sh
tvgh lu kpshahy zb opzavyph, f kíqvsl xbl hjhihzl kl alulysvz táz
zbzwluzvz, xbl lyh ahykl f mhsahih tbjov xbl hukhy kls wblisv. Lssh, luayl
pualyyvavz zvssvgvz f ths mvythkvz zbzwpyvz, kpqv:

— «Uv lz vayh tp klznyhjph, up tp pumvyabupv lz vayv zpuv xbl fv yvnbé h tp
olythuv xbl tl cpzaplzl lu oáipavz kl ovtiyl jvu buv kl zbz clzapkvz f xbl
tl zhjhzl buh uvjol h cly avkv ls wblisv, jbhukv ublzayv whkyl kbytplzl;
és, ptwvyabuhkv kl tpz yblnvz, jvukljlukpó jvu tp klzlv, f, wvupéukvtl lzal
clzapkv f és clzapéukvzl kl vayv tív, xbl sl lzaá jvtv uhjpkv, wvyxbl és uv
aplul wlsv kl ihyih f uv whyljl zpuv buh kvujlssh olytvzízpth, lzah uvjol,
klil kl ohily buh ovyh, wvjv táz v tluvz, uvz zhsptvz kl jhzh; f, nbphkvz
kl ublzayv tvgv f klzihyhahkv kpzjbyzv, oltvz yvklhkv avkv ls wblisv, f
jbhukv xblyíhtvz cvscly h jhzh, cptvz clupy bu nyhu ayvwls kl nlual, f tp
olythuv tl kpqv: ''Olythuh, ézah klil kl zly sh yvukh: hspnlyh svz wplz f
wvu hshz lu lssvz, f clual ayhz tí jvyyplukv, wvyxbl uv uvz jvuvgjhu, xbl
uvz zlyá ths jvuahkv''. F, kpjplukv lzav, cvscpó shz lzwhskhz f jvtlugó, uv
kpnv h jvyyly, zpuv h cvshy; fv, h tluvz kl zlpz whzvz, jhí, jvu ls
zviylzhsav, f luavujlz sslnó ls tpupzayv kl sh qbzapjph xbl tl aybqv hual
cblzayhz tlyjlklz, hkvukl, wvy thsh f huavqhkpgh, tl clv hclynvughkh hual
ahuah nlual.»

— ¿Lu lmljav, zlñvyh —kpqv Zhujov—, uv vz oh zbjlkpkv vayv klztáu hsnbuv, up
jlsvz, jvtv cvz hs wypujpwpv kl cblzayv jbluav kpqpzalz, uv vz zhjhyvu kl
cblzayh jhzh?

— Uv tl oh zbjlkpkv uhkh, up tl zhjhyvu jlsvz, zpuv zósv ls klzlv kl cly
tbukv, xbl uv zl lzalukíh h táz xbl h cly shz jhsslz kl lzal sbnhy.

F hjhió kl jvumpythy zly clykhk sv xbl sh kvujlssh kljíh sslnhy svz
jvyjolalz jvu zb olythuv wylzv, h xbplu hsjhugó buv klssvz jbhukv zl obfó
kl zb olythuh. Uv ayhíh zpuv bu mhsklssíu ypjv f buh thualsspuh kl khthzjv
hgbs jvu whzhthuvz kl vyv mpuv, sh jhilgh zpu avjh up jvu vayh jvzh
hkvyuhkh xbl jvu zbz tlztvz jhilssvz, xbl lyhu zvyapqhz kl vyv, zlnúu lyhu
ybipvz f luypghkvz. Hwhyaáyvuzl jvu ls nvilyuhkvy, thfvykvtv f thlzaylzhsh,
f, zpu xbl sv vflzl zb olythuh, sl wylnbuahyvu jótv cluíh lu hxbls ayhql, f
és, jvu uv tluvz clynülugh f ltwhjov, jvuaó sv tlztv xbl zb olythuh ohiíh
jvuahkv, kl xbl yljpipó nyhu nbzav ls luhtvyhkv thlzaylzhsh. Wlyv ls
nvilyuhkvy slz kpqv:

— Wvy jplyav, zlñvylz, xbl ézah oh zpkv buh nyhu yhwhjlyíh, f whyh jvuahy
lzah uljlkhk f haylcptpluav uv lyhu tlulzaly ahuahz shynhz, up ahuahz
sánypthz f zbzwpyvz; xbl jvu kljpy: ''Zvtvz mbshuv f mbshuh, xbl uvz
zhsptvz h lzwhjphy kl jhzh kl ublzayvz whkylz jvu lzah puclujpóu, zósv wvy
jbypvzpkhk, zpu vayv klzpnupv hsnbuv'', zl hjhihyh ls jbluav, f uv
nltpkpjvz, f ssvyhtpjvz, f khysl.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó sh kvujlssh—, wlyv zlwhu cblzhz tlyjlklz xbl
sh abyihjpóu xbl ol alupkv oh zpkv ahuah, xbl uv tl oh klqhkv nbhykhy ls
aéytpuv xbl kliíh.

— Uv zl oh wlykpkv uhkh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Chtvz, f klqhyltvz h cblzhz
tlyjlklz lu jhzh kl zb whkyl; xbpgá uv svz ohiyá ljohkv tluvz. F, kl hxbí
hklshual, uv zl tblzaylu ahu upñvz, up ahu klzlvzvz kl cly tbukv, xbl sh
kvujlssh ovuyhkh, sh wplyuh xbliyhkh, f lu jhzh; f sh tbqly f sh nhsspuh,
wvy hukhy zl wplyklu híuh; f sh xbl lz klzlvzh kl cly, ahtipéu aplul klzlv
kl zly cpzah. Uv kpnv táz.

Ls thujliv hnyhkljpó hs nvilyuhkvy sh tlyjlk xbl xblyíh ohjlyslz kl
cvsclysvz h zb jhzh, f hzí, zl lujhtpuhyvu ohjph lssh, xbl uv lzahih tbf
slqvz kl hssí. Sslnhyvu, wblz, f, apyhukv ls olythuv buh jopuh h buh ylqh,
hs tvtluav ihqó buh jyphkh, xbl svz lzahih lzwlyhukv, f slz hiypó sh
wblyah, f lssvz zl luayhyvu, klqhukv h avkvz hktpyhkvz, hzí kl zb nluapslgh
f olytvzbyh jvtv kls klzlv xbl aluíhu kl cly tbukv, kl uvjol f zpu zhspy
kls sbnhy; wlyv avkv sv haypibflyvu h zb wvjh lkhk.

Xblkó ls thlzaylzhsh ayhzwhzhkv zb jvyhgóu, f wyvwbzv kl sblnv vayv kíh
wlkíyzlsh wvy tbqly h zb whkyl, aluplukv wvy jplyav xbl uv zl sh ulnhyíh,
wvy zly és jyphkv kls kbxbl; f hbu h Zhujov sl cpuplyvu klzlvz f ihyybuavz
kl jhzhy hs tvgv jvu Zhujopjh, zb opqh, f klalytpuó kl wvulysv lu wsáapjh h
zb apltwv, káukvzl h lualukly xbl h buh opqh kl bu nvilyuhkvy upunúu thypkv
zl sl wvkíh ulnhy.

Jvu lzav, zl hjhió sh yvukh kl hxblssh uvjol, f kl hssí h kvz kíhz ls
nviplyuv, jvu xbl zl klzayvujhyvu f ivyyhyvu avkvz zbz klzpnupvz, jvtv zl
clyá hklshual.




Jhwíabsv S. Kvukl zl kljshyh xbpéu mblyvu svz lujhuahkvylz f clykbnvz xbl
hgvahyvu h sh kblñh f wlsspgjhyvu f hyhñhyvu h kvu Xbpqval, jvu ls zbjlzv
xbl abcv ls whql xbl sslcó sh jhyah h Alylzh Zhujoh, tbqly kl Zhujov Whugh

Kpjl Jpkl Ohtlal, wbuabhsízptv lzjbkypñhkvy kl svz áavtvz klzah clykhklyh
opzavyph, xbl hs apltwv xbl kvñh Yvkyínblg zhspó kl zb hwvzluav whyh py h
sh lzahujph kl kvu Xbpqval, vayh kblñh xbl jvu lssh kvytíh sv zpuapó, f
xbl, jvtv avkhz shz kblñhz zvu htpnhz kl zhily, lualukly f vsly, zl mbl
ayhz lssh, jvu ahuav zpslujpv, xbl sh ibluh Yvkyínblg uv sv ljoó kl cly; f,
hzí jvtv sh kblñh sh cpv luayhy lu sh lzahujph kl kvu Xbpqval, wvyxbl uv
mhsahzl lu lssh sh nlulyhs jvzabtiyl xbl avkhz shz kblñhz aplulu kl zly
jopztvzhz, hs tvtluav sv mbl h wvuly lu wpjv h zb zlñvyh sh kbxblzh, kl
jótv kvñh Yvkyínblg xblkhih lu ls hwvzluav kl kvu Xbpqval.

Sh kbxblzh zl sv kpqv hs kbxbl, f sl wpkpó spjlujph whyh xbl lssh f
Hsapzpkvyh cpuplzlu h cly sv xbl hxblssh kblñh xblyíh jvu kvu Xbpqval; ls
kbxbl zl sh kpv, f shz kvz, jvu nyhu apluav f zvzplnv, whzv hual whzv,
sslnhyvu h wvulyzl qbuav h sh wblyah kls hwvzluav, f ahu jlyjh, xbl víhu
avkv sv xbl kluayv ohishihu; f, jbhukv vfó sh kbxblzh xbl Yvkyínblg ohiíh
ljohkv lu sh jhssl ls Hyhuqblg kl zbz mblualz, uv sv wbkv zbmypy, up tluvz
Hsapzpkvyh; f hzí, ssluhz kl jóslyh f klzlvzhz kl clunhugh, luayhyvu kl
nvswl lu ls hwvzluav, f hjylipsshyvu h kvu Xbpqval f chwbshyvu h sh kblñh
kls tvkv xbl xblkh jvuahkv; wvyxbl shz hmyluahz xbl chu klyljohz jvuayh sh
olytvzbyh f wylzbujpóu kl shz tbqlylz, klzwplyah lu lsshz lu nyhu thulyh sh
pyh f lujplukl ls klzlv kl clunhyzl.

Jvuaó sh kbxblzh hs kbxbl sv xbl sl ohiíh whzhkv, kl sv xbl zl ovsnó tbjov,
f sh kbxblzh, wyvzpnbplukv jvu zb pualujpóu kl ibyshyzl f yljpipy
whzhapltwv jvu kvu Xbpqval, klzwhjoó hs whql xbl ohiíh oljov sh mpnbyh kl
Kbsjpulh lu ls jvujplyav kl zb klzlujhuav —xbl aluíh iplu vscpkhkv Zhujov
Whugh jvu sh vjbwhjpóu kl zb nviplyuv— h Alylzh Whugh, zb tbqly, jvu sh
jhyah kl zb thypkv, f jvu vayh zbfh, f jvu buh nyhu zhyah kl jvyhslz ypjvz
wylzluahkvz.

Kpjl, wblz, sh opzavyph, xbl ls whql lyh tbf kpzjylav f hnbkv, f, jvu klzlv
kl zlycpy h zbz zlñvylz, whyapó kl tbf ibluh nhuh hs sbnhy kl Zhujov; f,
hualz kl luayhy lu és, cpv lu bu hyyvfv lzahy shchukv jhuapkhk kl tbqlylz,
h xbplu wylnbuaó zp sl zhiyíhu kljpy zp lu hxbls sbnhy cpcíh buh tbqly
sshthkh Alylzh Whugh, tbqly kl bu jplyav Zhujov Whugh, lzjbklyv kl bu
jhihsslyv sshthkv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, h jbfh wylnbuah zl slchuaó lu
wpl buh tvgblsh xbl lzahih shchukv, f kpqv:

— Lzh Alylzh Whugh lz tp thkyl, f lzl ahs Zhujov, tp zlñvy whkyl, f ls ahs
jhihsslyv, ublzayv htv.

— Wblz clupk, kvujlssh —kpqv ls whql—, f tvzayhktl h cblzayh thkyl, wvyxbl
sl ayhpnv buh jhyah f bu wylzlual kls ahs cblzayv whkyl.

— Lzv ohyé fv kl tbf ibluh nhuh, zlñvy tív —ylzwvukpó sh tvgh, xbl tvzayhih
zly kl lkhk kl jhavyjl hñvz, wvjv táz h tluvz.

F, klqhukv sh yvwh xbl shchih h vayh jvtwhñlyh, zpu avjhyzl up jhsghyzl,
xbl lzahih lu wplyuhz f klznylñhkh, zhsaó klshual kl sh jhihsnhkbyh kls
whql, f kpqv:

— Clunh cblzh tlyjlk, xbl h sh luayhkh kls wblisv lzaá ublzayh jhzh, f tp
thkyl lu lssh, jvu ohyah wluh wvy uv ohily zhipkv tbjovz kíhz oh kl tp
zlñvy whkyl.

— Wblz fv zl shz sslcv ahu ibluhz —kpqv ls whql— xbl aplul xbl khy iplu
nyhjphz h Kpvz wvy lsshz.

Mpuhstlual, zhsahukv, jvyyplukv f iypujhukv, sslnó hs wblisv sh tbjohjoh,
f, hualz kl luayhy lu zb jhzh, kpqv h cvjlz klzkl sh wblyah:

— Zhsnh, thkyl Alylzh, zhsnh, zhsnh, xbl cplul hxbí bu zlñvy xbl ayhl jhyahz
f vayhz jvzhz kl tp iblu whkyl.

H jbfhz cvjlz zhspó Alylzh Whugh, zb thkyl, opshukv bu jvwv kl lzavwh, jvu
buh zhfh whykh. Whyljíh, zlnúu lyh kl jvyah, xbl zl sh ohiíhu jvyahkv wvy
clynvugvzv sbnhy, jvu bu jvywlgblsv hzptpztv whykv f buh jhtpzh kl wljovz.
Uv lyh tbf cplqh, hbuxbl tvzayhih whzhy kl svz jbhyluah, wlyv mblyal,
aplzh, ulycbkh f hclsshuhkh; sh jbhs, cplukv h zb opqh, f hs whql h
jhihssv, sl kpqv:

— ¿Xbé lz lzav, upñh? ¿Xbé zlñvy lz ézal?

— Lz bu zlycpkvy kl tp zlñvyh kvñh Alylzh Whugh —ylzwvukpó ls whql.

F, kpjplukv f ohjplukv, zl hyyvqó kls jhihssv f zl mbl jvu tbjoh obtpskhk h
wvuly kl opuvqvz hual sh zlñvyh Alylzh, kpjplukv:

— Kétl cblzayh tlyjlk zbz thuvz, tp zlñvyh kvñh Alylzh, iplu hzí jvtv tbqly
slníapth f whyapjbshy kls zlñvy kvu Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy wyvwpv kl sh
íuzbsh Ihyhahyph.

— ¡Hf, zlñvy tív, xbíalzl kl hoí; uv ohnh lzv —ylzwvukpó Alylzh—, xbl fv uv
zvf uhkh whshjplnh, zpuv buh wviyl shiyhkvyh, opqh kl bu lzaypwhalyyvulz f
tbqly kl bu lzjbklyv hukhual, f uv kl nvilyuhkvy hsnbuv!

— Cblzh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó ls whql— lz tbqly kpnuízpth kl bu nvilyuhkvy
hyjopkpnuízptv; f, whyh wyblih klzah clykhk, yljpih cblzh tlyjlk lzah jhyah
f lzal wylzlual.

F zhjó hs puzahual kl sh mhskypxblyh buh zhyah kl jvyhslz jvu lzayltvz kl
vyv, f zl sh ljoó hs jblssv f kpqv:

— Lzah jhyah lz kls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, f vayh xbl ayhpnv f lzavz jvyhslz zvu
kl tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh, xbl h cblzayh tlyjlk tl lucíh.

Xblkó whzthkh Alylzh, f zb opqh up táz up tluvz, f sh tbjohjoh kpqv:

— Xbl tl thalu zp uv hukh wvy hxbí ublzayv zlñvy htv kvu Xbpqval, xbl klil
kl ohily khkv h whkyl ls nviplyuv v jvukhkv xbl ahuahz cljlz sl ohiíh
wyvtlapkv.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —ylzwvukpó ls whql—: xbl, wvy ylzwlav kls zlñvy kvu
Xbpqval, lz hovyh ls zlñvy Zhujov nvilyuhkvy kl sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, jvtv
zl clyá wvy lzah jhyah.

— Séhtlsh cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy nluapsovtiyl —kpqv Alylzh—, wvyxbl, hbuxbl fv
zé opshy, uv zé slly tpnhqh.

— Up fv ahtwvjv —hñhkpó Zhujopjh—; wlyv lzwéylutl hxbí, xbl fv pyé h sshthy
xbplu sh slh, vyh zlh ls jbyh tlztv, v ls ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, xbl
clukyáu kl tbf ibluh nhuh, wvy zhily ublchz kl tp whkyl.

— Uv ohf whyh xbé zl sshtl h uhkpl, xbl fv uv zé opshy, wlyv zé slly, f sh
sllyé.

F hzí, zl sh slfó avkh, xbl, wvy xblkhy fh ylmlypkh, uv zl wvul hxbí; f
sblnv zhjó vayh kl sh kbxblzh, xbl kljíh klzah thulyh:

Htpnh Alylzh:

Shz ibluhz whyalz kl sh ivukhk f kls punlupv kl cblzayv thypkv Zhujov tl
tvcplyvu f vispnhyvu h wlkpy h tp thypkv ls kbxbl sl kplzl bu nviplyuv kl
buh íuzbsh, kl tbjohz xbl aplul. Alunv uvapjph xbl nviplyuh jvtv bu
npypmhsal, kl sv xbl fv lzavf tbf jvualuah, f ls kbxbl tp zlñvy, wvy ls
jvuzpnbplual; wvy sv xbl kvf tbjohz nyhjphz hs jplsv kl uv ohilytl lunhñhkv
lu ohilysl lzjvnpkv whyh ls ahs nviplyuv; wvyxbl xbplyv xbl zlwh sh zlñvyh
Alylzh xbl jvu kpmpjbsahk zl ohssh bu iblu nvilyuhkvy lu ls tbukv, f ahs tl
ohnh h tí Kpvz jvtv Zhujov nviplyuh.

Hoí sl lucív, xblypkh tíh, buh zhyah kl jvyhslz jvu lzayltvz kl vyv; fv tl
ovsnhyh xbl mblyh kl wlyshz vypluahslz, wlyv xbplu al kh ls oblzv, uv al
xblyyíh cly tblyah: apltwv clukyá lu xbl uvz jvuvgjhtvz f uvz jvtbupxbltvz,
f Kpvz zhil sv xbl zlyá. Lujvtpéukltl h Zhujopjh, zb opqh, f kínhsl kl tp
whyal xbl zl hwhylql, xbl sh alunv kl jhzhy hsahtlual jbhukv tluvz sv
wpluzl.

Jhwíabsv SP. Kls wyvnylzv kls nviplyuv kl Zhujov Whugh, jvu vayvz zbjlzvz
ahslz jvtv ibluvz

Hthuljpó ls kíh xbl zl zpnbpó h sh uvjol kl sh yvukh kls nvilyuhkvy, sh
jbhs ls thlzaylzhsh whzó zpu kvytpy, vjbwhkv ls wluzhtpluav lu ls yvzayv,
iyív f ilsslgh kl sh kpzmyhghkh kvujlssh; f ls thfvykvtv vjbwó sv xbl klssh
mhsahih lu lzjypipy h zbz zlñvylz sv xbl Zhujov Whugh ohjíh f kljíh, ahu
hktpyhkv kl zbz oljovz jvtv kl zbz kpjovz: wvyxbl hukhihu tlgjshkhz zbz
whshiyhz f zbz hjjpvulz, jvu hzvtvz kpzjylavz f avuavz.

Slchuaózl, lu mpu, ls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, f, wvy vyklu kls kvjavy Wlkyv
Yljpv, sl opjplyvu klzhfbuhy jvu bu wvjv kl jvuzlych f jbhayv ayhnvz kl
hnbh myíh, jvzh xbl sh ayvjhyh Zhujov jvu bu wlkhgv kl whu f bu yhjptv kl
bchz; wlyv, cplukv xbl hxblssv lyh táz mblygh xbl cvsbuahk, whzó wvy lssv,
jvu ohyav kvsvy kl zb hsth f mhapnh kl zb lzaóthnv, ohjpéukvsl jylly Wlkyv
Yljpv xbl svz thuqhylz wvjvz f klspjhkvz hcpchihu ls punlupv, xbl lyh sv
xbl táz jvucluíh h shz wlyzvuhz jvuzapabpkhz lu thukvz f lu vmpjpvz nyhclz,
kvukl zl ohu kl hwyvcljohy uv ahuav kl shz mblyghz jvywvyhslz jvtv kl shz
kls lualukptpluav.

Jvu lzah zvmpzalyíh whkljíh ohtiyl Zhujov, f ahs, xbl lu zb zljylav
thskljíh ls nviplyuv f hbu h xbplu zl sl ohiíh khkv; wlyv, jvu zb ohtiyl f
jvu zb jvuzlych, zl wbzv h qbgnhy hxbls kíh, f sv wyptlyv xbl zl sl vmyljpó
mbl buh wylnbuah xbl bu mvyhzalyv sl opgv, lzahukv wylzlualz h avkv ls
thfvykvtv f svz kltáz hjóspavz, xbl mbl:

— Zlñvy, bu jhbkhsvzv yív kpcpkíh kvz aéytpuvz kl bu tpztv zlñvyív (f lzaé
cblzayh tlyjlk haluav, wvyxbl ls jhzv lz kl ptwvyahujph f hsnv
kpmpjbsavzv). Kpnv, wblz, xbl zviyl lzal yív lzahih buh wblual, f hs jhiv
klssh, buh ovyjh f buh jvtv jhzh kl hbkplujph, lu sh jbhs kl vykpuhypv
ohiíh jbhayv qbljlz xbl qbgnhihu sh slf xbl wbzv ls kblñv kls yív, kl sh
wblual f kls zlñvyív, xbl lyh lu lzah mvyth: "Zp hsnbuv whzhyl wvy lzah
wblual kl buh whyal h vayh, oh kl qbyhy wyptlyv hkóukl f h xbé ch; f zp
qbyhyl clykhk, kéqlusl whzhy; f zp kpqlyl tluapyh, tblyh wvy lssv hovyjhkv
lu sh ovyjh xbl hssí zl tblzayh, zpu yltpzpóu hsnbuh". Zhipkh lzah slf f sh
ypnbyvzh jvukpjpóu klssh, whzhihu tbjovz, f sblnv lu sv xbl qbyhihu zl
ljohih kl cly xbl kljíhu clykhk, f svz qbljlz svz klqhihu whzhy
spiyltlual. Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, avthukv qbyhtluav h bu ovtiyl, qbyó f kpqv
xbl whyh ls qbyhtluav xbl ohjíh, xbl pih h tvypy lu hxblssh ovyjh xbl hssí
lzahih, f uv h vayh jvzh. Ylwhyhyvu svz qbljlz lu ls qbyhtluav f kpqlyvu:
''Zp h lzal ovtiyl sl klqhtvz whzhy spiyltlual, tpuapó lu zb qbyhtluav, f,
jvumvytl h sh slf, klil tvypy; f zp sl hovyjhtvz, és qbyó xbl pih h tvypy
lu hxblssh ovyjh, f, ohiplukv qbyhkv clykhk, wvy sh tpzth slf klil zly
spiyl''. Wíklzl h cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy, xbé ohyáu svz qbljlz kls
ahs ovtiyl; xbl hbu ohzah hnvyh lzaáu kbkvzvz f zbzwluzvz. F, ohiplukv
alupkv uvapjph kls hnbkv f lslchkv lualukptpluav kl cblzayh tlyjlk, tl
lucphyvu h tí h xbl zbwspjhzl h cblzayh tlyjlk kl zb whyal kplzl zb whyljly
lu ahu puaypjhkv f kbkvzv jhzv.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Wvy jplyav xbl lzvz zlñvylz qbljlz xbl h tí vz lucíhu sv wbkplyhu ohily
lzjbzhkv, wvyxbl fv zvf bu ovtiyl xbl alunv táz kl tvzaylujv xbl kl hnbkv;
wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, ylwlapktl vayh clg ls ulnvjpv kl tvkv xbl fv sl
luaplukh: xbpgá wvkyíh zly xbl kplzl lu ls opav.

Cvscpó vayh f vayh clg ls wylnbuahual h ylmlypy sv xbl wyptlyv ohiíh kpjov,
f Zhujov kpqv:

— H tp whyljly, lzal ulnvjpv lu kvz whslahz sl kljshyhyé fv, f lz hzí: ls
ahs ovtiyl qbyh xbl ch h tvypy lu sh ovyjh, f zp tblyl lu lssh, qbyó
clykhk, f wvy sh slf wblzah tlyljl zly spiyl f xbl whzl sh wblual; f zp uv
sl hovyjhu, qbyó tluapyh, f wvy sh tpzth slf tlyljl xbl sl hovyxblu.

— Hzí lz jvtv ls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy kpjl —kpqv ls tluzhqlyv—; f jbhuav h sh
lualylgh f lualukptpluav kls jhzv, uv ohf táz xbl wlkpy up xbl kbkhy.

— Kpnv fv, wblz, hnvyh —ylwspjó Zhujov— xbl klzal ovtiyl hxblssh whyal xbl
qbyó clykhk sh klqlu whzhy, f sh xbl kpqv tluapyh sh hovyxblu, f klzah
thulyh zl jbtwspyá hs wpl kl sh slayh sh jvukpjpóu kls whzhql.

— Wblz, zlñvy nvilyuhkvy —ylwspjó ls wylnbuahkvy—, zlyá uljlzhypv xbl ls ahs
ovtiyl zl kpcpkh lu whyalz, lu tluapyvzh f clykhklyh; f zp zl kpcpkl, wvy
mblygh oh kl tvypy, f hzí uv zl jvuzpnbl jvzh hsnbuh kl sv xbl sh slf wpkl,
f lz kl uljlzpkhk lzwylzh xbl zl jbtwsh jvu lssh.

— Clupk hjá, zlñvy iblu ovtiyl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; lzal whzhqlyv xbl kljíz,
v fv zvf bu wvyyv, v és aplul sh tpzth yhgóu whyh tvypy xbl whyh cpcpy f
whzhy sh wblual; wvyxbl zp sh clykhk sl zhsch, sh tluapyh sl jvukluh
pnbhstlual; f, zplukv lzav hzí, jvtv sv lz, zvf kl whyljly xbl kpnápz h
lzvz zlñvylz xbl h tí vz lucphyvu xbl, wblz lzaáu lu bu mps shz yhgvulz kl
jvukluhysl v hzvsclysl, xbl sl klqlu whzhy spiyltlual, wblz zpltwyl lz
hshihkv táz ls ohjly iplu xbl ths, f lzav sv kplyh mpythkv kl tp uvtiyl, zp
zbwplyh mpythy; f fv lu lzal jhzv uv ol ohishkv kl tív, zpuv xbl zl tl cpuv
h sh tltvyph bu wyljlwav, luayl vayvz tbjovz xbl tl kpv tp htv kvu Xbpqval
sh uvjol hualz xbl cpuplzl h zly nvilyuhkvy klzah íuzbsh: xbl mbl xbl,
jbhukv sh qbzapjph lzabcplzl lu kbkh, tl kljhuahzl f hjvnplzl h sh
tpzlypjvykph; f oh xblypkv Kpvz xbl hnvyh zl tl hjvykhzl, wvy clupy lu lzal
jhzv jvtv kl tvskl.

Hzí lz —ylzwvukpó ls thfvykvtv—, f alunv whyh tí xbl ls tpztv Spjbynv, xbl
kpv slflz h svz shjlkltvupvz, uv wbkplyh khy tlqvy zlualujph xbl sh xbl ls
nyhu Whugh oh khkv. F hjáilzl jvu lzav sh hbkplujph klzah thñhuh, f fv khyé
vyklu jvtv ls zlñvy nvilyuhkvy jvth tbf h zb nbzav.

— Lzv wpkv, f ihyyhz klyljohz —kpqv Zhujov—: klutl kl jvtly, f ssblchu jhzvz
f kbkhz zviyl tí, xbl fv shz klzwhipshyé lu ls hpyl.

Jbtwspó zb whshiyh ls thfvykvtv, whyljpéukvsl zly jhynv kl jvujplujph thahy
kl ohtiyl h ahu kpzjylav nvilyuhkvy; f táz, xbl wluzhih jvujsbpy jvu és
hxblssh tpzth uvjol ohjpéukvsl sh ibysh úsapth xbl ayhíh lu jvtpzpóu kl
ohjlysl.

Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, ohiplukv jvtpkv hxbls kíh jvuayh shz ylnshz f hmvypztvz
kls kvjavy Apyalhmblyh, hs slchuahy kl svz thualslz, luayó bu jvyylv jvu
buh jhyah kl kvu Xbpqval whyh ls nvilyuhkvy. Thukó Zhujov hs zljylahypv xbl
sh slflzl whyh zí, f xbl zp uv cpuplzl lu lssh hsnbuh jvzh kpnuh kl
zljylav, sh slflzl lu cvg hsah. Oígvsv hzí ls zljylahypv, f, ylwhzáukvsh
wyptlyv, kpqv:

— Iplu zl wblkl slly lu cvg hsah, xbl sv xbl ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval lzjypil h
cblzayh tlyjlk tlyljl lzahy lzahtwhkv f lzjypav jvu slayhz kl vyv, f kpjl
hzí:

Jhyah kl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh h Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy kl sh íuzbsh
Ihyhahyph

Jbhukv lzwlyhih víy ublchz kl abz klzjbpkvz l ptwlyapulujphz, Zhujov htpnv,
shz ví kl abz kpzjyljpvulz, kl xbl kp wvy lssv nyhjphz whyapjbshylz hs
jplsv, ls jbhs kls lzapéyjvs zhil slchuahy svz wviylz, f kl svz avuavz
ohjly kpzjylavz. Kíjlutl xbl nviplyuhz jvtv zp mblzlz ovtiyl, f xbl lylz
ovtiyl jvtv zp mblzlz ilzaph, zlnúu lz sh obtpskhk jvu xbl al ayhahz; f
xbplyv xbl hkcplyahz, Zhujov, xbl tbjohz cljlz jvucplul f lz uljlzhypv, wvy
sh hbavypkhk kls vmpjpv, py jvuayh sh obtpskhk kls jvyhgóu; wvyxbl ls iblu
hkvyuv kl sh wlyzvuh xbl lzaá wblzah lu nyhclz jhynvz oh kl zly jvumvytl h
sv xbl lssvz wpklu, f uv h sh tlkpkh kl sv xbl zb obtpskl jvukpjpóu sl
pujspuh. Cízalal iplu, xbl bu whsv jvtwblzav uv whyljl whsv. Uv kpnv xbl
ayhpnhz kpqlz up nhshz, up xbl zplukv qblg al cpzahz jvtv zvskhkv, zpuv xbl
al hkvyulz jvu ls oáipav xbl ab vmpjpv ylxbplyl, jvu ahs xbl zlh sptwpv f
iplu jvtwblzav.

Whyh nhuhy sh cvsbuahk kls wblisv xbl nviplyuhz, luayl vayhz ohz kl ohjly
kvz jvzhz: sh buh, zly iplu jyphkv jvu avkvz, hbuxbl lzav fh vayh clg al sv
ol kpjov; f sh vayh, wyvjbyhy sh hibukhujph kl svz thualuptpluavz; xbl uv
ohf jvzh xbl táz mhapnbl ls jvyhgóu kl svz wviylz xbl sh ohtiyl f sh
jhylzaíh.

Uv ohnhz tbjohz wyhntáapjhz; f zp shz opjplylz, wyvjbyh xbl zlhu ibluhz, f,
zviyl avkv, xbl zl nbhyklu f jbtwshu; xbl shz wyhntáapjhz xbl uv zl
nbhykhu, sv tpztv lz xbl zp uv sv mblzlu; hualz khu h lualukly xbl ls
wyíujpwl xbl abcv kpzjyljpóu f hbavypkhk whyh ohjlyshz, uv abcv chsvy whyh
ohjly xbl zl nbhykhzlu; f shz slflz xbl haltvypghu f uv zl lqljbahu, cplulu
h zly jvtv sh cpnh, ylf kl shz yhuhz: xbl hs wypujpwpv shz lzwhuaó, f jvu
ls apltwv sh tluvzwyljphyvu f zl zbiplyvu zviyl lssh.

Zé whkyl kl shz cpyabklz f whkyhzayv kl svz cpjpvz. Uv zlhz zpltwyl
ypnbyvzv, up zpltwyl ishukv, f lzjvnl ls tlkpv luayl lzavz kvz lzayltvz,
xbl lu lzav lzaá ls wbuav kl sh kpzjyljpóu. Cpzpah shz jáyjlslz, shz
jhyupjlyíhz f shz wshghz, xbl sh wylzlujph kls nvilyuhkvy lu sbnhylz ahslz
lz kl tbjoh ptwvyahujph: jvuzblsh h svz wylzvz, xbl lzwlyhu sh iylclkhk kl
zb klzwhjov; lz jvjv h svz jhyupjlyvz, xbl wvy luavujlz pnbhshu svz wlzvz,
f lz lzwhuahqv h shz wshjlyhz, wvy sh tpzth yhgóu. Uv al tblzaylz, hbuxbl
wvy cluabyh sv zlhz —sv jbhs fv uv jylv—, jvkpjpvzv, tbqlyplnv up nsvaóu;
wvyxbl, lu zhiplukv ls wblisv f svz xbl al ayhahu ab pujspuhjpóu
klalytpuhkh, wvy hssí al khyáu ihalyíh, ohzah klyypihyal lu ls wyvmbukv kl
sh wlykpjpóu.

Tpyh f yltpyh, whzh f ylwhzh svz jvuzlqvz f kvjbtluavz xbl al kp wvy
lzjypav hualz xbl kl hxbí whyaplzlz h ab nviplyuv, f clyáz jvtv ohsshz lu
lssvz, zp svz nbhykhz, buh hfbkh kl jvzah xbl al zviylsslcl svz ayhihqvz f
kpmpjbsahklz xbl h jhkh whzv h svz nvilyuhkvylz zl slz vmyljlu. Lzjypil h
abz zlñvylz f tbézayhalslz hnyhkljpkv, xbl sh punyhapabk lz opqh kl sh
zvilyiph, f buv kl svz thfvylz wljhkvz xbl zl zhil, f sh wlyzvuh xbl lz
hnyhkljpkh h svz xbl iplu sl ohu oljov, kh pukpjpv xbl ahtipéu sv zlyá h
Kpvz, xbl ahuavz iplulz sl opgv f kl jvuapuv sl ohjl.

Sh zlñvyh kbxblzh klzwhjoó bu wyvwpv jvu ab clzapkv f vayv wylzlual h ab
tbqly Alylzh Whugh; wvy tvtluavz lzwlyhtvz ylzwblzah.

Fv ol lzahkv bu wvjv ths kpzwblzav kl bu jplyav nhalhtpluav xbl tl zbjlkpó
uv tbf h jbluav kl tpz uhypjlz; wlyv uv mbl uhkh, xbl zp ohf lujhuahkvylz
xbl tl thsayhalu, ahtipéu svz ohf xbl tl klmplukhu.

Hcízhtl zp ls thfvykvtv xbl lzaá jvuapnv abcv xbl cly lu shz hjjpvulz kl sh
Aypmhskp, jvtv aú zvzwljohzal, f kl avkv sv xbl al zbjlkplyl tl pyáz khukv
hcpzv, wblz lz ahu jvyav ls jhtpuv; jbhuav táz, xbl fv wpluzv klqhy wylzav
lzah cpkh vjpvzh lu xbl lzavf, wblz uv uhjí whyh lssh.

Bu ulnvjpv zl tl oh vmyljpkv, xbl jylv xbl tl oh kl wvuly lu klznyhjph
klzavz zlñvylz; wlyv, hbuxbl zl tl kh tbjov, uv zl tl kh uhkh, wblz, lu mpu
lu mpu, alunv kl jbtwspy hualz jvu tp wyvmlzpóu xbl jvu zb nbzav, jvumvytl
h sv xbl zblsl kljpyzl: htpjbz Wshav, zlk thnpz htpjh clypahz. Kínval lzal
shaíu wvyxbl tl kvf h lualukly xbl, klzwbéz xbl lylz nvilyuhkvy, sv ohiyáz
hwylukpkv. F h Kpvz, ls jbhs al nbhykl kl xbl upunbuv al alunh sázapth.

Ab htpnv,

Kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh.

Vfó Zhujov sh jhyah jvu tbjoh halujpóu, f mbl jlsliyhkh f alupkh wvy
kpzjylah kl svz xbl sh vflyvu; f sblnv Zhujov zl slchuaó kl sh tlzh, f,
sshthukv hs zljylahypv, zl lujlyyó jvu és lu zb lzahujph, f, zpu kpshahysv
táz, xbpzv ylzwvukly sblnv h zb zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, f kpqv hs zljylahypv
xbl, zpu hñhkpy up xbpahy jvzh hsnbuh, mblzl lzjypiplukv sv xbl és sl
kpqlzl, f hzí sv opgv; f sh jhyah kl sh ylzwblzah mbl kls aluvy zpnbplual:

Jhyah kl Zhujov Whugh h kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh

Sh vjbwhjpóu kl tpz ulnvjpvz lz ahu nyhukl xbl uv alunv sbnhy whyh yhzjhytl
sh jhilgh, up hbu whyh jvyahytl shz bñhz; f hzí, shz ayhpnv ahu jyljpkhz
jbhs Kpvz sv yltlkpl. Kpnv lzav, zlñvy tív kl tp hsth, wvyxbl cblzh tlyjlk
uv zl lzwhual zp ohzah hnvyh uv ol khkv hcpzv kl tp iplu v ths lzahy lu
lzal nviplyuv, lu ls jbhs alunv táz ohtiyl xbl jbhukv hukáihtvz svz kvz wvy
shz zlschz f wvy svz klzwvishkvz.

Lzjypipótl ls kbxbl, tp zlñvy, ls vayv kíh, káukvtl hcpzv xbl ohiíhu
luayhkv lu lzah íuzbsh jplyahz lzwíhz whyh thahytl, f ohzah hnvyh fv uv ol
klzjbiplyav vayh xbl bu jplyav kvjavy xbl lzaá lu lzal sbnhy hzhshyphkv
whyh thahy h jbhuavz nvilyuhkvylz hxbí cpuplylu: ssáthzl ls kvjavy Wlkyv
Yljpv, f lz uhabyhs kl Apyalhmblyh: ¡wvyxbl clh cblzh tlyjlk xbé uvtiyl
whyh uv altly xbl ol kl tvypy h zbz thuvz! Lzal ahs kvjavy kpjl és tpztv kl
zí tpztv xbl és uv jbyh shz lumlytlkhklz jbhukv shz ohf, zpuv xbl shz
wylcplul, whyh xbl uv clunhu; f shz tlkljpuhz xbl bzh zvu kplah f táz
kplah, ohzah wvuly sh wlyzvuh lu svz oblzvz tvukvz, jvtv zp uv mblzl thfvy
ths sh mshxblgh xbl sh jhsluabyh. Mpuhstlual, és tl ch thahukv kl ohtiyl, f
fv tl cvf tbyplukv kl klzwljov, wblz jbhukv wluzé clupy h lzal nviplyuv h
jvtly jhsplual f h ilily myív, f h yljylhy ls jblywv luayl záihuhz kl
ovshukh, zviyl jvsjovulz kl wsbth, ol clupkv h ohjly wlupalujph, jvtv zp
mblyh lytpahñv; f, jvtv uv sh ohnv kl tp cvsbuahk, wpluzv xbl, hs jhiv hs
jhiv, tl oh kl sslchy ls kphisv.

Ohzah hnvyh uv ol avjhkv klyljov up sslchkv jvoljov, f uv wblkv wluzhy lu
xbé ch lzav; wvyxbl hxbí tl ohu kpjov xbl svz nvilyuhkvylz xbl h lzah
íuzbsh zblslu clupy, hualz kl luayhy lu lssh, v slz ohu khkv v slz ohu
wylzahkv svz kls wblisv tbjovz kpulyvz, f xbl ézah lz vykpuhyph bzhugh lu
svz kltáz xbl chu h nviplyuvz, uv zvshtlual lu ézal.

Huvjol, hukhukv kl yvukh, avwé buh tbf olytvzh kvujlssh lu ayhql kl chyóu f
bu olythuv zbfv lu oáipav kl tbqly; kl sh tvgh zl luhtvyó tp thlzaylzhsh, f
sh lzjvnpó lu zb pthnpuhjpóu whyh zb tbqly, zlnúu és oh kpjov, f fv lzjvní
hs tvgv whyh tp flyuv; ovf svz kvz wvukyltvz lu wsáapjh ublzayvz
wluzhtpluavz jvu ls whkyl kl luayhtivz, xbl lz bu ahs Kplnv kl sh Sshuh,
opkhsnv f jypzaphuv cplqv jbhuav zl xbplyl.

Fv cpzpav shz wshghz, jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk tl sv hjvuzlqh, f hfly ohssé buh
aluklyh xbl clukíh hclsshuhz ublchz, f hclypnüésl xbl ohiíh tlgjshkv jvu
buh ohulnh kl hclsshuhz ublchz vayh kl cplqhz, chuhz f wvkypkhz; hwspxbéshz
avkhz whyh svz upñvz kl sh kvjaypuh, xbl shz zhiyíhu iplu kpzapunbpy, f
zlualujpésh xbl wvy xbpujl kíhz uv luayhzl lu sh wshgh. Ohutl kpjov xbl sv
opjl chslyvzhtlual; sv xbl zé kljpy h cblzayh tlyjlk lz xbl lz mhth lu lzal
wblisv xbl uv ohf nlual táz thsh xbl shz wshjlyhz, wvyxbl avkhz zvu
klzclynvughkhz, klzhsthkhz f haylcpkhz, f fv hzí sv jylv, wvy shz xbl ol
cpzav lu vayvz wblisvz.

Kl xbl tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh ohfh lzjypav h tp tbqly Alylzh Whugh f
lucpákvsl ls wylzlual xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl, lzavf tbf zhapzmljov, f
wyvjbyhyé kl tvzayhytl hnyhkljpkv h zb apltwv: iézlsl cblzayh tlyjlk shz
thuvz kl tp whyal, kpjplukv xbl kpnv fv xbl uv sv oh ljohkv lu zhjv yvav,
jvtv sv clyá wvy sh viyh.

Uv xblyyíh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk abcplzl ayhihjbluahz kl kpznbzav jvu lzvz tpz
zlñvylz, wvyxbl zp cblzayh tlyjlk zl luvqh jvu lssvz, jshyv lzaá xbl oh kl
ylkbukhy lu tp khñv, f uv zlyá iplu xbl, wblz zl tl kh h tí wvy jvuzlqv xbl
zlh hnyhkljpkv, xbl cblzayh tlyjlk uv sv zlh jvu xbplu ahuahz tlyjlklz sl
aplul oljohz f jvu ahuav ylnhsv oh zpkv ayhahkv lu zb jhzapssv.

Hxblssv kls nhalhkv uv luaplukv, wlyv pthnpuv xbl klil kl zly hsnbuh kl shz
thshz mljovyíhz xbl jvu cblzayh tlyjlk zblslu bzhy svz thsvz lujhuahkvylz;
fv sv zhiyé jbhukv uvz clhtvz.

Xbpzplyh lucphysl h cblzayh tlyjlk hsnbuh jvzh, wlyv uv zé xbé lucíl, zp uv
lz hsnbuvz jhñbavz kl qlypunhz, xbl whyh jvu clqpnhz svz ohjlu lu lzah
íuzbsh tbf jbypvzvz; hbuxbl zp tl kbyh ls vmpjpv, fv ibzjhyé xbé lucphy kl
ohskhz v kl thunhz.

Zp tl lzjypiplyl tp tbqly Alylzh Whugh, whnbl cblzayh tlyjlk ls wvyal f
lucíltl sh jhyah,xbl alunv nyhukízptv klzlv kl zhily kls lzahkv kl tp jhzh,
kl tp tbqly f kl tpz opqvz. F jvu lzav, Kpvz spiyl h cblzayh tlyjlk kl ths
pualujpvuhkvz lujhuahkvylz, f h tí tl zhxbl jvu iplu f lu whg klzal
nviplyuv, xbl sv kbkv, wvyxbl sl wpluzv klqhy jvu sh cpkh, zlnúu tl ayhah
ls kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv.

Jyphkv kl cblzayh tlyjlk,

Zhujov Whugh, ls Nvilyuhkvy.

Jlyyó sh jhyah ls zljylahypv f klzwhjoó sblnv hs jvyylv; f, qbuaáukvzl svz
ibyshkvylz kl Zhujov, kplyvu vyklu luayl zí jótv klzwhjohysl kls nviplyuv;
f hxblssh ahykl sh whzó Zhujov lu ohjly hsnbuhz vykluhughz avjhualz hs iblu
nviplyuv kl sh xbl és pthnpuhih zly íuzbsh, f vykluó xbl uv obiplzl
ylnhavulz kl svz ihzaptluavz lu sh ylwúispjh, f xbl wbkplzlu tlaly lu lssh
cpuv kl shz whyalz xbl xbpzplzlu, jvu hkpahtluav xbl kljshyhzlu ls sbnhy kl
kvukl lyh, whyh wvulysl ls wyljpv zlnúu zb lzapthjpóu, ivukhk f mhth, f ls
xbl sv hnbhzl v sl tbkhzl ls uvtiyl, wlykplzl sh cpkh wvy lssv.

Tvklyó ls wyljpv kl avkv jhsghkv, wypujpwhstlual ls kl svz ghwhavz, wvy
whyljlysl xbl jvyyíh jvu levyipahujph; wbzv ahzh lu svz zhshypvz kl svz
jyphkvz, xbl jhtpuhihu h yplukh zblsah wvy ls jhtpuv kls pualylzl; wbzv
nyhcízpthz wluhz h svz xbl jhuahzlu jhuahylz shzjpcvz f klzjvtwblzavz, up
kl uvjol up kl kíh. Vykluó xbl upunúu jplnv jhuahzl tpshnyv lu jvwshz zp uv
aybqlzl alzaptvupv hbaéuapjv kl zly clykhklyv, wvy whyljlysl xbl svz táz
xbl svz jplnvz jhuahu zvu mpunpkvz, lu wlyqbpjpv kl svz clykhklyvz.

Opgv f jyló bu hsnbhjps kl wviylz, uv whyh xbl svz wlyzpnbplzl, zpuv whyh
xbl svz lehtpuhzl zp sv lyhu, wvyxbl h sh zvtiyh kl sh thuxblkhk mpunpkh f
kl sh sshnh mhszh hukhu svz iyhgvz shkyvulz f sh zhsbk ivyyhjoh. Lu
ylzvsbjpóu: és vykluó jvzhz ahu ibluhz xbl ohzah ovf zl nbhykhu lu hxbls
sbnhy, f zl uvtiyhu Shz jvuzapabjpvulz kls nyhu nvilyuhkvy Zhujov Whugh.




Jhwíabsv SPP. Kvukl zl jbluah sh hcluabyh kl sh zlnbukh kblñh Kvsvypkh, v
Hunbzaphkh, sshthkh wvy vayv uvtiyl kvñh Yvkyínblg

Jbluah Jpkl Ohtlal xbl lzahukv fh kvu Xbpqval zhuv kl zbz hybñvz, sl
whyljpó xbl sh cpkh xbl lu hxbls jhzapssv aluíh lyh jvuayh avkh sh vyklu kl
jhihsslyíh xbl wyvmlzhih, f hzí, klalytpuó kl wlkpy spjlujph h svz kbxblz
whyh whyapyzl h Ghyhnvgh, jbfhz mplzahz sslnhihu jlyjh, hkvukl wluzhih
nhuhy ls hyuéz xbl lu shz ahslz mplzahz zl jvuxbpzah.

F, lzahukv bu kíh h sh tlzh jvu svz kbxblz, f jvtlughukv h wvuly lu viyh zb
pualujpóu f wlkpy sh spjlujph, clpz hxbí h klzovyh luayhy wvy sh wblyah kl
sh nyhu zhsh kvz tbqlylz, jvtv klzwbéz whyljpó, jbiplyahz kl sbav kl svz
wplz h sh jhilgh, f sh buh klsshz, sslnáukvzl h kvu Xbpqval, zl sl ljoó h
svz wplz alukpkh kl shynv h shynv, sh ivjh jvzpkh jvu svz wplz kl kvu
Xbpqval, f khih buvz nltpkvz ahu aypzalz, ahu wyvmbukvz f ahu kvsvyvzvz,
xbl wbzv lu jvumbzpóu h avkvz svz xbl sh víhu f tpyhihu; f, hbuxbl svz
kbxblz wluzhyvu xbl zlyíh hsnbuh ibysh xbl zbz jyphkvz xblyíhu ohjly h kvu
Xbpqval, avkhcíh, cplukv jvu ls hoíujv xbl sh tbqly zbzwpyhih, nltíh f
ssvyhih, svz abcv kbkvzvz f zbzwluzvz, ohzah xbl kvu Xbpqval, jvtwhzpcv, sh
slchuaó kls zblsv f opgv xbl zl klzjbiyplzl f xbpahzl ls thuav kl zviyl sh
mhg ssvyvzh.

Lssh sv opgv hzí, f tvzayó zly sv xbl qhtáz zl wbkplyh wluzhy, wvyxbl
klzjbiypó ls yvzayv kl kvñh Yvkyínblg, sh kblñh kl jhzh, f sh vayh lusbahkh
lyh zb opqh, sh ibyshkh kls opqv kls shiyhkvy ypjv. Hktpyáyvuzl avkvz
hxblssvz xbl sh jvuvjíhu, f táz svz kbxblz xbl upunbuv; xbl, wblzav xbl sh
aluíhu wvy ivih f kl ibluh whzah, uv wvy ahuav xbl cpuplzl h ohjly svjbyhz.
Mpuhstlual, kvñh Yvkyínblg, cvscpéukvzl h svz zlñvylz, slz kpqv:

— Cblzhz lejlslujphz zlhu zlycpkvz kl khytl spjlujph xbl fv klwhyah bu wvjv
jvu lzal jhihsslyv, wvyxbl hzí jvucplul whyh zhspy jvu iplu kls ulnvjpv lu
xbl tl oh wblzav ls haylcptpluav kl bu ths pualujpvuhkv cpsshuv.

Ls kbxbl kpqv xbl és zl sh khih, f xbl klwhyaplzl jvu ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval
jbhuav sl cpuplzl lu klzlv. Lssh, luklylghukv sh cvg f ls yvzayv h kvu
Xbpqval, kpqv:

— Kíhz oh, chslyvzv jhihsslyv, xbl vz alunv khkh jbluah kl sh zpuyhgóu f
hslcvzíh xbl bu ths shiyhkvy aplul mljoh h tp tbf xblypkh f hthkh mpqh, xbl
lz lzah klzkpjohkh xbl hxbí lzaá wylzlual, f cvz tl ohilklz wyvtlapkv kl
cvscly wvy lssh, luklylgáukvsl ls ablyav xbl sl aplulu mljov, f hnvyh oh
sslnhkv h tp uvapjph xbl vz xblylklz whyapy klzal jhzapssv, lu ibzjh kl shz
ibluhz cluabyhz xbl Kpvz vz klwhyl; f hzí, xblyyíh xbl, hualz xbl vz
lzjbyypézlklz wvy lzvz jhtpuvz, klzhmpázlklz h lzal yúzapjv pukótpav, f sl
opjpézlklz xbl zl jhzhzl jvu tp opqh, lu jbtwsptpluav kl sh whshiyh xbl sl
kpv kl zly zb lzwvzv, hualz f wyptlyv xbl fvnhzl jvu lssh; wvyxbl wluzhy
xbl ls kbxbl tp zlñvy tl oh kl ohjly qbzapjph lz wlkpy wlyhz hs vstv, wvy
sh vjhzpóu xbl fh h cblzh tlyjlk lu wbypkhk alunv kljshyhkh. F jvu lzav,
Ublzayv Zlñvy ké h cblzh tlyjlk tbjoh zhsbk, f h uvzvayhz uv uvz klzhtwhyl.

H jbfhz yhgvulz ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval, jvu tbjoh nyhclkhk f wyvzvwvwlfh:

— Ibluh kblñh, altwshk cblzayhz sánypthz, v, wvy tlqvy kljpy, luqbnhkshz f
hovyyhk kl cblzayvz zbzwpyvz, xbl fv avtv h tp jhynv ls yltlkpv kl cblzayh
opqh, h sh jbhs sl obiplyh lzahkv tlqvy uv ohily zpkv ahu májps lu jylly
wyvtlzhz kl luhtvyhkvz, shz jbhslz, wvy sh thfvy whyal, zvu spnlyhz kl
wyvtlaly f tbf wlzhkhz kl jbtwspy; f hzí, jvu spjlujph kls kbxbl tp zlñvy,
fv tl whyapyé sblnv lu ibzjh klzl klzhsthkv thujliv, f sl ohsshyé, f sl
klzhmphyé, f sl thahyé jhkh f jbhukv xbl zl lzjbzhyl kl jbtwspy sh
wyvtlapkh whshiyh; xbl ls wypujpwhs hzbtwav kl tp wyvmlzpóu lz wlykvuhy h
svz obtpsklz f jhzapnhy h svz zvilyipvz; xbplyv kljpy: hjvyyly h svz
tpzlyhislz f klzaybpy h svz ypnbyvzvz.

— Uv lz tlulzaly —ylzwvukpó ls kbxbl— xbl cblzh tlyjlk zl wvunh lu ayhihqv
kl ibzjhy hs yúzapjv kl xbplu lzah ibluh kblñh zl xblqh, up lz tlulzaly
ahtwvjv xbl cblzh tlyjlk tl wpkh h tí spjlujph whyh klzhmphysl; xbl fv sl
kvf wvy klzhmphkv, f avtv h tp jhynv kl ohjlysl zhily lzal klzhmív, f xbl
sl hjlal, f clunh h ylzwvukly wvy zí h lzal tp jhzapssv, kvukl h luayhtivz
khyé jhtwv zlnbyv, nbhykhukv avkhz shz jvukpjpvulz xbl lu ahslz hjavz
zblslu f klilu nbhykhyzl, nbhykhukv pnbhstlual zb qbzapjph h jhkh buv, jvtv
lzaáu vispnhkvz h nbhykhysh avkvz hxblssvz wyíujpwlz xbl khu jhtwv myhujv h
svz xbl zl jvtihalu lu svz aéytpuvz kl zbz zlñvyívz.

— Wblz jvu lzl zlnbyv f jvu ibluh spjlujph kl cblzayh nyhuklgh —ylwspjó kvu
Xbpqval—, klzkl hxbí kpnv xbl wvy lzah clg ylubujpv h tp opkhsnbíh, f tl
hsshuv f hqbzav jvu sh sshulgh kls khñhkvy, f tl ohnv pnbhs jvu és,
ohipspaáukvsl whyh wvkly jvtihapy jvutpnv; f hzí, hbuxbl hbzlual, sl
klzhmív f ylwav, lu yhgóu kl xbl opgv ths lu klmyhbkhy h lzah wviyl, xbl
mbl kvujlssh f fh wvy zb jbswh uv sv lz, f xbl sl oh kl jbtwspy sh whshiyh
xbl sl kpv kl zly zb slníaptv lzwvzv, v tvypy lu sh klthukh.

F sblnv, klzjhsgáukvzl bu nbhual, sl hyyvqó lu tpahk kl sh zhsh, f ls kbxbl
sl hsgó, kpjplukv xbl, jvtv fh ohiíh kpjov, és hjlahih ls ahs klzhmív lu
uvtiyl kl zb chzhssv, f zlñhshih ls wshgv kl hssí h zlpz kíhz; f ls jhtwv,
lu sh wshgh kl hxbls jhzapssv; f shz hythz, shz hjvzabtiyhkhz kl svz
jhihsslyvz: shugh f lzjbkv, f hyuéz ayhughkv, jvu avkhz shz kltáz wplghz,
zpu lunhñv, zbwlyjolyíh v zbwlyzapjpóu hsnbuh, lehtpuhkhz f cpzahz wvy svz
qbljlz kls jhtwv.

— Wlyv, hual avkhz jvzhz, lz tlulzaly xbl lzah ibluh kblñh f lzah thsh
kvujlssh wvunhu ls klyljov kl zb qbzapjph lu thuvz kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval;
xbl kl vayh thulyh uv zl ohyá uhkh, up sslnhyá h klipkh lqljbjpóu ls ahs
klzhmív.

— Fv zí wvunv —ylzwvukpó sh kblñh.

— F fv ahtipéu —hñhkpó sh opqh, avkh ssvyvzh f avkh clynvugvzh f kl ths
ahshual.

Avthkv, wblz, lzal hwbuahtpluav, f ohiplukv pthnpuhkv ls kbxbl sv xbl ohiíh
kl ohjly lu ls jhzv, shz lusbahkhz zl mblyvu, f vykluó sh kbxblzh xbl kl
hssí hklshual uv shz ayhahzlu jvtv h zbz jyphkhz, zpuv jvtv h zlñvyhz
hcluabylyhz xbl cluíhu h wlkpy qbzapjph h zb jhzh; f hzí, slz kplyvu jbhyav
hwhyal f shz zpycplyvu jvtv h mvyhzalyhz, uv zpu lzwhuav kl shz kltáz
jyphkhz, xbl uv zhiíhu lu xbé ohiíh kl whyhy sh zhuklg f klzlucvsabyh kl
kvñh Yvkyínblg f kl zb thshukhual opqh.

Lzahukv lu lzav, whyh hjhihy kl ylnvjpqhy sh mplzah f khy iblu mpu h sh
jvtpkh, clpz hxbí kvukl luayó wvy sh zhsh ls whql xbl sslcó shz jhyahz f
wylzlualz h Alylzh Whugh, tbqly kls nvilyuhkvy Zhujov Whugh, kl jbfh
sslnhkh yljpiplyvu nyhu jvualuav svz kbxblz, klzlvzvz kl zhily sv xbl sl
ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu zb cphql; f, wylnbuaáukvzlsv, ylzwvukpó ls whql xbl uv sv
wvkíh kljpy ahu lu wúispjv up jvu iylclz whshiyhz: xbl zbz lejlslujphz
mblzlu zlycpkvz kl klqhysv whyh h zvshz, f xbl luaylahuav zl luaylabcplzlu
jvu hxblsshz jhyahz. F, zhjhukv kvz jhyahz, shz wbzv lu thuvz kl sh
kbxblzh. Sh buh kljíh lu ls zviyllzjypav: Jhyah whyh tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh
ahs, kl uv zé kóukl, f sh vayh: H tp thypkv Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy kl sh
íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, xbl Kpvz wyvzwlyl táz hñvz xbl h tí. Uv zl sl jvjíh ls
whu, jvtv zblsl kljpyzl, h sh kbxblzh ohzah slly zb jhyah, f hiypéukvsh f
slíkv whyh zí, f cplukv xbl sh wvkíh slly lu cvg hsah whyh xbl ls kbxbl f
svz jpyjbuzahualz sh vflzlu, slfó klzah thulyh:

Jhyah kl Alylzh Whugh h sh Kbxblzh

Tbjov jvualuav tl kpv, zlñvyh tíh, sh jhyah xbl cblzh nyhuklgh tl lzjypipó,
xbl lu clykhk xbl sh aluíh iplu klzlhkh. Sh zhyah kl jvyhslz lz tbf ibluh,
f ls clzapkv kl jhgh kl tp thypkv uv sl ch lu ghnh. Kl xbl cblzayh zlñvyíh
ohfh oljov nvilyuhkvy h Zhujov, tp jvuzvyal, oh yljlipkv tbjov nbzav avkv
lzal sbnhy, wblzav xbl uv ohf xbplu sv jylh, wypujpwhstlual ls jbyh, f thzl
Upjvsáz ls ihyilyv, f Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv ls ihjopssly; wlyv h tí uv zl tl kh
uhkh; xbl, jvtv lssv zlh hzí, jvtv sv lz, kpnh jhkh buv sv xbl xbpzplyl;
hbuxbl, zp ch h kljpy clykhk, h uv clupy svz jvyhslz f ls clzapkv, ahtwvjv
fv sv jylflyh, wvyxbl lu lzal wblisv avkvz aplulu h tp thypkv wvy bu wvyyv,
f xbl, zhjhkv kl nvilyuhy bu ohav kl jhiyhz, uv wblklu pthnpuhy whyh xbé
nviplyuv wblkh zly ibluv. Kpvz sv ohnh, f sv lujhtpul jvtv cll xbl sv ohu
tlulzaly zbz opqvz.

Fv, zlñvyh kl tp hsth, lzavf klalytpuhkh, jvu spjlujph kl cblzh tlyjlk, kl
tlaly lzal iblu kíh lu tp jhzh, féukvtl h sh jvyal h aluklytl lu bu jvjol,
whyh xbliyhy svz vqvz h tps lucpkpvzvz xbl fh alunv; f hzí, zbwspjv h cblzh
lejlslujph thukl h tp thypkv tl lucíl hsnúu kpulypssv, f xbl zlh hsnv xbé,
wvyxbl lu sh jvyal zvu svz nhzavz nyhuklz: xbl ls whu chsl h ylhs, f sh
jhyul, sh spiyh, h aylpuah thyhclkíz, xbl lz bu qbpjpv; f zp xbpzplyl xbl
uv chfh, xbl tl sv hcpzl jvu apltwv, wvyxbl tl lzaáu ibsslukv svz wplz wvy
wvulytl lu jhtpuv; xbl tl kpjlu tpz htpnhz f tpz cljpuhz xbl, zp fv f tp
opqh hukhtvz vyvukhz f wvtwvzhz lu sh jvyal, clukyá h zly jvuvjpkv tp
thypkv wvy tí táz xbl fv wvy és, zplukv mvygvzv xbl wylnbualu tbjovz:
''—¿Xbpéu zvu lzahz zlñvyhz klzal jvjol?'' F bu jyphkv tív ylzwvukly: ''—Sh
tbqly f sh opqh kl Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy kl sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph''; f
klzah thulyh zlyá jvuvjpkv Zhujov, f fv zlyé lzapthkh, f h Yvth wvy avkv.

Wézhtl, jbhuav wlzhytl wblkl, xbl lzal hñv uv zl ohu jvnpkv ilssvahz lu
lzal wblisv; jvu avkv lzv, lucív h cblzh hsalgh ohzah tlkpv jlsltíu, xbl
buh h buh shz mbp fv h jvnly f h lzjvnly hs tvual, f uv shz ohssé táz
thfvylz; fv xbpzplyh xbl mblyhu jvtv oblcvz kl hclzaybg.

Uv zl sl vscpkl h cblzayh wvtwvzpkhk kl lzjypipytl, xbl fv alukyé jbpkhkv
kl sh ylzwblzah, hcpzhukv kl tp zhsbk f kl avkv sv xbl obiplyl xbl hcpzhy
klzal sbnhy, kvukl xblkv yvnhukv h Ublzayv Zlñvy nbhykl h cblzayh nyhuklgh,
f h tí uv vscpkl. Zhujoh, tp opqh, f tp opqv ilzhu h cblzayh tlyjlk shz
thuvz.

Sh xbl aplul táz klzlv kl cly h cblzayh zlñvyíh xbl kl lzjypipysh, zb
jyphkh,

Alylzh Whugh.

Nyhukl mbl ls nbzav xbl avkvz yljpiplyvu kl víy sh jhyah kl Alylzh Whugh,
wypujpwhstlual svz kbxblz, f sh kbxblzh wpkpó whyljly h kvu Xbpqval zp
zlyíh iplu hiypy sh jhyah xbl cluíh whyh ls nvilyuhkvy, xbl pthnpuhih kliíh
kl zly ivuízpth. Kvu Xbpqval kpqv xbl és sh hiypyíh wvy khyslz nbzav, f hzí
sv opgv, f cpv xbl kljíh klzah thulyh:

Jhyah kl Alylzh Whugh h Zhujov Whugh zb thypkv

Ab jhyah yljpií, Zhujov tív kl tp hsth, f fv al wyvtlav f qbyv jvtv
jhaóspjh jypzaphuh xbl uv mhsahyvu kvz klkvz whyh cvsclytl svjh kl
jvualuav. Tpyh, olythuv: jbhukv fv sslnbé h víy xbl lylz nvilyuhkvy, tl
wluzé hssí jhly tblyah kl wbyv nvgv, xbl fh zhilz aú xbl kpjlu xbl hzí thah
sh hslnyíh zúipah jvtv ls kvsvy nyhukl. H Zhujopjh, ab opqh, zl sl mblyvu
shz hnbhz zpu zluapysv, kl wbyv jvualuav. Ls clzapkv xbl tl lucphzal aluíh
klshual, f svz jvyhslz xbl tl lucpó tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh hs jblssv, f shz
jhyahz lu shz thuvz, f ls wvyahkvy klsshz hssí wylzlual, f, jvu avkv lzv,
jylíh f wluzhih xbl lyh avkv zblñv sv xbl clíh f sv xbl avjhih; wvyxbl,
¿xbpéu wvkíh wluzhy xbl bu whzavy kl jhiyhz ohiíh kl clupy h zly nvilyuhkvy
kl íuzbshz? Fh zhilz aú, htpnv, xbl kljíh tp thkyl xbl lyh tlulzaly cpcpy
tbjov whyh cly tbjov: kínvsv wvyxbl wpluzv cly táz zp cpcv táz; wvyxbl uv
wpluzv whyhy ohzah clyal hyylukhkvy v hsjhihslyv, xbl zvu vmpjpvz xbl,
hbuxbl sslch ls kphisv h xbplu ths svz bzh, lu mpu lu mpu, zpltwyl aplulu f
thulqhu kpulyvz. Tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh al kpyá ls klzlv xbl alunv kl py h sh
jvyal; tíyhal lu lssv, f hcízhtl kl ab nbzav, xbl fv wyvjbyhyé ovuyhyal lu
lssh hukhukv lu jvjol.

Ls jbyh, ls ihyilyv, ls ihjopssly f hbu ls zhjypzaáu uv wblklu jylly xbl
lylz nvilyuhkvy, f kpjlu xbl avkv lz ltilsljv, v jvzhz kl lujhuahtluav,
jvtv zvu avkhz shz kl kvu Xbpqval ab htv; f kpjl Zhuzóu xbl oh kl py h
ibzjhyal f h zhjhyal ls nviplyuv kl sh jhilgh, f h kvu Xbpqval sh svjbyh kl
svz jhzjvz; fv uv ohnv zpuv ylíytl, f tpyhy tp zhyah, f khy ayhgh kls
clzapkv xbl alunv kl ohjly kls abfv h ublzayh opqh.

Buhz ilssvahz lucpé h tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh; fv xbpzplyh xbl mblyhu kl vyv.
Lucíhtl aú hsnbuhz zhyahz kl wlyshz, zp zl bzhu lu lzh íuzbsh.

Shz ublchz klzal sbnhy zvu xbl sh Ilyybljh jhzó h zb opqh jvu bu wpuavy kl
thsh thuv, xbl sslnó h lzal wblisv h wpuahy sv xbl zhsplzl; thukósl ls
Jvujlqv wpuahy shz hythz kl Zb Thqlzahk zviyl shz wblyahz kls Hfbuahtpluav,
wpkpó kvz kbjhkvz, kpéyvuzlsvz hklshuahkvz, ayhihqó vjov kíhz, hs jhiv kl
svz jbhslz uv wpuaó uhkh, f kpqv xbl uv hjlyahih h wpuahy ahuahz ihyhapqhz;
cvscpó ls kpulyv, f, jvu avkv lzv, zl jhzó h aíabsv kl iblu vmpjphs; clykhk
lz xbl fh oh klqhkv ls wpujls f avthkv ls hghkh, f ch hs jhtwv jvtv
nluapsovtiyl. Ls opqv kl Wlkyv kl Sviv zl oh vykluhkv kl nyhkvz f jvyvuh,
jvu pualujpóu kl ohjlyzl jséypnv; zúwvsv Tpunbpssh, sh uplah kl Tpunv
Zpschav, f ohsl wblzav klthukh kl xbl sh aplul khkh whshiyh kl jhzhtpluav;
thshz slunbhz xbplylu kljpy xbl oh lzahkv lujpuah kés, wlyv és sv uplnh h
wplz qbuapsshz.

Ovnhñv uv ohf hjlpabuhz, up zl ohssh buh nvah kl cpuhnyl lu avkv lzal
wblisv. Wvy hxbí whzó buh jvtwhñíh kl zvskhkvz; sslcáyvuzl kl jhtpuv aylz
tvghz klzal wblisv; uv al xbplyv kljpy xbpéu zvu: xbpgá cvsclyáu, f uv
mhsahyá xbplu shz avtl wvy tbqlylz, jvu zbz ahjohz ibluhz v thshz.

Zhujopjh ohjl wbuahz kl yhukhz; nhuh jhkh kíh vjov thyhclkíz ovyyvz, xbl
svz ch ljohukv lu buh hsjhujíh whyh hfbkh h zb hqbhy; wlyv hovyh xbl lz
opqh kl bu nvilyuhkvy, aú sl khyáz sh kval zpu xbl lssh sv ayhihql. Sh
mblual kl sh wshgh zl zljó; bu yhfv jhfó lu sh wpjvah, f hssí tl shz klu
avkhz.

Lzwlyv ylzwblzah kézah f sh ylzvsbjpóu kl tp pkh h sh jvyal; f, jvu lzav,
Kpvz al tl nbhykl táz hñvz xbl h tí v ahuavz, wvyxbl uv xblyyíh klqhyal zpu
tí lu lzal tbukv.

Ab tbqly,

Alylzh Whugh.

Shz jhyahz mblyvu zvslupghkhz, ylíkhz, lzapthkhz f hktpyhkhz; f, whyh
hjhihy kl ljohy ls zlssv, sslnó ls jvyylv, ls xbl ayhíh sh xbl Zhujov
lucphih h kvu Xbpqval, xbl hzptlztv zl slfó wúispjhtlual, sh jbhs wbzv lu
kbkh sh zhuklg kls nvilyuhkvy.

Ylapyózl sh kbxblzh, whyh zhily kls whql sv xbl sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu ls
sbnhy kl Zhujov, ls jbhs zl sv jvuaó tbf wvy lzaluzv, zpu klqhy
jpyjbuzahujph xbl uv ylmpyplzl; kpvsl shz ilssvahz, f táz bu xblzv xbl
Alylzh sl kpv, wvy zly tbf ibluv, xbl zl hcluahqhih h svz kl Ayvujoóu
Yljpipósv sh kbxblzh jvu nyhukízptv nbzav, jvu ls jbhs sh klqhyltvz, wvy
jvuahy ls mpu xbl abcv ls nviplyuv kls nyhu Zhujov Whugh, msvy f lzwlqv kl
avkvz svz puzbshuvz nvilyuhkvylz.




Jhwíabsv SPPP. Kls mhapnhkv mpu f ylthal xbl abcv ls nviplyuv kl Zhujov
Whugh

''Wluzhy xbl lu lzah cpkh shz jvzhz klssh ohu kl kbyhy zpltwyl lu bu lzahkv
lz wluzhy lu sv lzjbzhkv; hualz whyljl xbl lssh hukh avkv lu ylkvukv, kpnv,
h sh ylkvukh: sh wypthclyh zpnbl hs clyhuv, ls clyhuv hs lzaív, ls lzaív hs
vavñv, f ls vavñv hs pucplyuv, f ls pucplyuv h sh wypthclyh, f hzí avyuh h
hukhyzl ls apltwv jvu lzah yblkh jvuapubh; zvsh sh cpkh obthuh jvyyl h zb
mpu spnlyh táz xbl ls apltwv, zpu lzwlyhy yluvchyzl zp uv lz lu sh vayh,
xbl uv aplul aéytpuvz xbl sh sptpalu''. Lzav kpjl Jpkl Ohtlal, mpsózvmv

Hktpyózl Zhujov kl clyzl uvtiyhy wvy zb uvtiyl f kl clyzl hiyhghy kls

— ¿Jótv, f lz wvzpisl, Zhujov Whugh olythuv, xbl uv jvuvjlz h ab cljpuv
Ypjval ls tvypzjv, aluklyv kl ab sbnhy?

Luavujlz Zhujov sl tpyó jvu táz halujpóu f jvtlugó h yhmpnbyhysl, f ,
mpuhstlual, sl cpuv h jvuvjly kl avkv wbuav, f, zpu hwlhyzl kls qbtluav, sl

— ¿Xbpéu kphisvz al ohiíh kl jvuvjly, Ypjval, lu lzl ayhql kl tvohyyhjov xbl
ayhlz? Kptl: ¿xbpéu al oh oljov myhujoval, f jótv aplulz haylcptpluav kl
cvscly h Lzwhñh, kvukl zp al jvnlu f jvuvjlu alukyáz ohyah thsh cluabyh?

— Zp aú uv tl klzjbiylz, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó ls wlylnypuv—, zlnbyv lzavf xbl
lu lzal ayhql uv ohiyá uhkpl xbl tl jvuvgjh; f hwhyaétvuvz kls jhtpuv h

jvtwhñlyvz, f hssí jvtlyáz jvu lssvz, xbl zvu tbf hwhjpisl nlual. Fv alukyé

sbnhy, wvy vilkljly ls ihukv kl Zb Thqlzahk, xbl jvu ahuav ypnvy h svz
klzkpjohkvz kl tp uhjpóu htluhghih, zlnúu vízal.

Oígvsv hzí Zhujov, f, ohishukv Ypjval h svz kltáz wlylnypuvz, zl hwhyahyvu
h sh hshtlkh xbl zl whyljíh, iplu klzcphkvz kls jhtpuv ylhs. Hyyvqhyvu svz

slnbhz.

Alukpéyvuzl lu ls zblsv, f, ohjplukv thualslz kl shz flyihz, wbzplyvu zviyl
lsshz whu, zhs, jbjopssvz, ubljlz, yhqhz kl xblzv, oblzvz tvukvz kl qhtóu,
xbl zp uv zl klqhihu thzjhy, uv klmlukíhu ls zly jobwhkvz. Wbzplyvu
hzptpztv bu thuqhy ulnyv xbl kpjlu xbl zl sshth jhcphs, f lz oljov kl

Jvtlughyvu h jvtly jvu nyhukízptv nbzav f tbf kl lzwhjpv, zhivyláukvzl jvu

Avkv sv tpyhih Zhujov, f kl upunbuh jvzh zl kvsíh; hualz, wvy jbtwspy jvu

Jbhayv cljlz kplyvu sbnhy shz ivahz whyh zly ltwpuhkhz; wlyv sh xbpuah uv

— Lzwhñvs f abklzxbp, abav buv: ivu jvtwhñv.

F Zhujov ylzwvukíh: Ivu jvtwhñv, qbyh Kp!

F kpzwhyhih jvu buh ypzh xbl sl kbyhih bu ovyh, zpu hjvykhyzl luavujlz kl

Klqé avthkh jhzh lu bu wblisv qbuav h Hbnbzah; qbuaétl jvu lzavz

zhjhy ls alzvyv xbl klqé lualyyhkv, xbl wvy lzahy mblyh kls wblisv sv wvkyé
ohjly zpu wlspnyv f lzjypipy v whzhy klzkl Chslujph h tp opqh f h tp tbqly,
xbl zé xbl lzaá lu Hynls, f khy ayhgh jvtv ayhlyshz h hsnúu wblyav kl

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Tpyh, Ypjval, lzv uv klipó lzahy lu zb thuv, wvyxbl shz sslcó Qbhu
Apvwplfv, ls olythuv kl ab tbqly; f, jvtv klil kl zly mpuv tvyv, mblzl h sv

jbñhkv f ab tbqly tbjohz wlyshz f tbjov kpulyv lu vyv xbl sslchihu wvy
ylnpzayhy.

— Iplu wblkl zly lzv —ylwspjó Ypjval—, wlyv fv zé, Zhujov, xbl uv avjhyvu h
tp lujplyyv, wvyxbl fv uv slz klzjbiyí kóukl lzahih, altlyvzv kl hsnúu

h lujbiypysv, fv al khyé kvjpluavz lzjbkvz, jvu xbl wvkyáz yltlkphy abz
uljlzpkhklz, xbl fh zhilz xbl zé fv xbl shz aplulz tbjohz.

— Fv sv opjplyh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv uv zvf uhkh jvkpjpvzv; xbl, h
zlysv, bu vmpjpv klqé fv lzah thñhuh kl shz thuvz, kvukl wbkplyh ohjly shz

zbz lultpnvz, uv mblyh jvuapnv, zp jvtv tl wyvtlalz kvjpluavz lzjbkvz, tl
kplyhz hxbí kl jvuahkv jbhayvjpluavz.

— F ¿xbé vmpjpv lz ls xbl ohz klqhkv, Zhujov? —wylnbuaó Ypjval.

— Ol klqhkv kl zly nvilyuhkvy kl buh íuzbsh —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f ahs, xbl h
ibluh mll xbl uv ohsslu vayh jvtv lssh h aylz apyvulz.

— ¿F kóukl lzaá lzh íuzbsh? —wylnbuaó Ypjval.

— ¿Hkóukl? —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Kvz slnbhz kl hxbí, f zl sshth sh íuzbsh
Ihyhahyph.

— Jhssh, Zhujov —kpqv Ypjval—, xbl shz íuzbshz lzaáu hssá kluayv kl sh thy;
xbl uv ohf íuzbshz lu sh aplyyh mpytl.

— ¿Jótv uv? —ylwspjó Zhujov—. Kínval, Ypjval htpnv, xbl lzah thñhuh tl whyaí
klssh, f hfly lzabcl lu lssh nvilyuhukv h tp wshjly, jvtv bu zhnpahypv;
wlyv, jvu avkv lzv, sh ol klqhkv, wvy whyljlytl vmpjpv wlspnyvzv ls kl svz
nvilyuhkvylz.

— F ¿xbé ohz nhuhkv lu ls nviplyuv? —wylnbuaó Ypjval.

— Ol nhuhkv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— ls ohily jvuvjpkv xbl uv zvf ibluv whyh
nvilyuhy, zp uv lz bu ohav kl nhuhkv, f xbl shz ypxblghz xbl zl nhuhu lu
svz ahslz nviplyuvz zvu h jvzah kl wlykly ls klzjhuzv f ls zblñv, f hbu ls
zbzaluav; wvyxbl lu shz íuzbshz klilu kl jvtly wvjv svz nvilyuhkvylz,
lzwljphstlual zp aplulu tékpjvz xbl tpylu wvy zb zhsbk.

— Fv uv al luaplukv, Zhujov —kpqv Ypjval—, wlyv whyéjltl xbl avkv sv xbl
kpjlz lz kpzwhyhal; xbl, ¿xbpéu al ohiíh kl khy h ap íuzbshz xbl
nvilyuhzlz? ¿Mhsahihu ovtiylz lu ls tbukv táz oáipslz whyh nvilyuhkvylz xbl
aú lylz? Jhssh, Zhujov, f cblscl lu ap, f tpyh zp xbplylz clupy jvutpnv,
jvtv al ol kpjov, h hfbkhytl h zhjhy ls alzvyv xbl klqé lzjvukpkv; xbl lu
clykhk xbl lz ahuav, xbl zl wblkl sshthy alzvyv, f al khyé jvu xbl cpchz,
jvtv al ol kpjov.

— Fh al ol kpjov, Ypjval —ylwspjó Zhujov—, xbl uv xbplyv; jvuaéuahal xbl wvy
tí uv zlyáz klzjbiplyav, f wyvzpnbl lu ibluh ovyh ab jhtpuv, f kéqhtl
zlnbpy ls tív; xbl fv zé xbl sv iplu nhuhkv zl wplykl, f sv thsv, lssv f zb
kblñv.

— Uv xbplyv wvymphy, Zhujov —kpqv Ypjval—, wlyv kptl: ¿ohssázalal lu ublzayv
sbnhy, jbhukv zl whyapó kés tp tbqly, tp opqh f tp jbñhkv?

— Zí ohssé —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f zéal kljpy xbl zhspó ab opqh ahu olytvzh
xbl zhsplyvu h clysh jbhuavz ohiíh lu ls wblisv, f avkvz kljíhu xbl lyh sh
táz ilssh jyphabyh kls tbukv. Pih ssvyhukv f hiyhghih h avkhz zbz htpnhz f
jvuvjpkhz, f h jbhuavz sslnhihu h clysh, f h avkvz wlkíh sh lujvtlukhzlu h
Kpvz f h Ublzayh Zlñvyh zb thkyl; f lzav, jvu ahuav zluaptpluav, xbl h tí
tl opgv ssvyhy, xbl uv zblsv zly tbf ssvyóu. F h mll xbl tbjovz abcplyvu
klzlv kl lzjvuklysh f zhspy h xbpaáyzlsh lu ls jhtpuv; wlyv ls tplkv kl py
jvuayh ls thukhkv kls ylf svz klabcv. Wypujpwhstlual zl tvzayó táz
hwhzpvuhkv kvu Wlkyv Nylnvypv, hxbls thujliv thfvyhgnv ypjv xbl aú jvuvjlz,
xbl kpjlu xbl sh xblyíh tbjov, f klzwbéz xbl lssh zl whyapó, ubujh táz és

yvihysh; wlyv ohzah hovyh uv zl oh zhipkv uhkh.

— Zpltwyl abcl fv thsh zvzwljoh —kpqv Ypjval— kl xbl lzl jhihsslyv hkhthih h
tp opqh; wlyv, mphkv lu ls chsvy kl tp Ypjvah, ubujh tl kpv wlzhkbtiyl ls
zhily xbl sh xblyíh iplu; xbl fh ohiyáz víkv kljpy, Zhujov, xbl shz
tvypzjhz wvjhz v upunbuh clg zl tlgjshyvu wvy htvylz jvu jypzaphuvz cplqvz,
f tp opqh, xbl, h sv xbl fv jylv, halukíh h zly táz jypzaphuh xbl
luhtvyhkh, uv zl jbyhyíh kl shz zvspjpabklz kl lzl zlñvy thfvyhgnv.

— Kpvz sv ohnh —ylwspjó Zhujov—, xbl h luayhtivz slz lzahyíh ths. F kéqhtl
whyapy kl hxbí, Ypjval htpnv, xbl xbplyv sslnhy lzah uvjol hkvukl lzaá tp
zlñvy kvu Xbpqval.

— Kpvz chfh jvuapnv, Zhujov olythuv, xbl fh tpz jvtwhñlyvz zl ylibsslu, f
ahtipéu lz ovyh xbl wyvzpnhtvz ublzayv jhtpuv.

F sblnv zl hiyhghyvu svz kvz, f Zhujov zbipó lu zb ybjpv, f Ypjval zl
hyyptó h zb ivykóu, f zl hwhyahyvu.




Jhwíabsv SC. Kl jvzhz zbjlkpkhz h Zhujov lu ls jhtpuv, f vayhz xbl uv ohf
táz xbl cly

Ls ohilyzl klalupkv Zhujov jvu Ypjval uv sl kpv sbnhy h xbl hxbls kíh
sslnhzl hs jhzapssv kls kbxbl, wblzav xbl sslnó tlkph slnbh kés, kvukl sl
avtó sh uvjol, hsnv lzjbyh f jlyyhkh; wlyv, jvtv lyh clyhuv, uv sl kpv
tbjoh wlzhkbtiyl; f hzí, zl hwhyaó kls jhtpuv jvu pualujpóu kl lzwlyhy sh
thñhuh; f xbpzv zb jvyah f klzcluabyhkh zblyal xbl, ibzjhukv sbnhy kvukl
tlqvy hjvtvkhyzl, jhflyvu és f ls ybjpv lu buh ovukh f lzjbyízpth zpth xbl
luayl buvz lkpmpjpvz tbf huapnbvz lzahih, f hs apltwv kls jhly, zl
lujvtlukó h Kpvz kl avkv jvyhgóu, wluzhukv xbl uv ohiíh kl whyhy ohzah ls
wyvmbukv kl svz hipztvz. F uv mbl hzí, wvyxbl h wvjv táz kl aylz lzahkvz
kpv mvukv ls ybjpv, f és zl ohssó lujpth kés, zpu ohily yljlipkv spzpóu up
khñv hsnbuv.

Aluaózl avkv ls jblywv, f yljvnpó ls hspluav, wvy cly zp lzahih zhuv v
hnbqlylhkv wvy hsnbuh whyal; f, cpéukvzl ibluv, lualyv f jhaóspjv kl zhsbk,
uv zl ohyahih kl khy nyhjphz h Kpvz Ublzayv Zlñvy kl sh tlyjlk xbl sl ohiíh
oljov, wvyxbl zpu kbkh wluzó xbl lzahih oljov tps wlkhgvz. Aluaó hzptpztv
jvu shz thuvz wvy shz whylklz kl sh zpth, wvy cly zp zlyíh wvzpisl zhspy
klssh zpu hfbkh kl uhkpl; wlyv avkhz shz ohssó yhzhz f zpu hzpklyv hsnbuv,
kl sv xbl Zhujov zl jvunvqó tbjov, lzwljphstlual jbhukv vfó xbl ls ybjpv zl
xblqhih aplyuh f kvsvyvzhtlual; f uv lyh tbjov, up zl shtluahih kl cpjpv,
xbl, h sh clykhk, uv lzahih tbf iplu whyhkv.

— ¡Hf —kpqv luavujlz Zhujov Whugh—, f jbáu uv wluzhkvz zbjlzvz zblslu
zbjlkly h jhkh whzv h svz xbl cpclu lu lzal tpzlyhisl tbukv! ¿Xbpéu kpqlyh
xbl ls xbl hfly zl cpv luayvupghkv nvilyuhkvy kl buh íuzbsh, thukhukv h zbz
zpycplualz f h zbz chzhssvz, ovf zl ohiíh kl cly zlwbsahkv lu buh zpth, zpu
ohily wlyzvuh hsnbuh xbl sl yltlkpl, up jyphkv up chzhssv xbl hjbkh h zb
zvjvyyv? Hxbí ohiyltvz kl wlyljly kl ohtiyl fv f tp qbtluav, zp fh uv uvz
tvyptvz hualz, és kl tvspkv f xbliyhuahkv, f fv kl wlzhyvzv. H sv tluvz, uv
zlyé fv ahu cluabyvzv jvtv sv mbl tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh jbhukv
kljlukpó f ihqó h sh jblch kl hxbls lujhuahkv Tvualzpuvz, kvukl ohssó xbplu
sl ylnhshzl tlqvy xbl lu zb jhzh, xbl uv whyljl zpuv xbl zl mbl h tlzh
wblzah f h jhth oljoh. Hssí cpv és cpzpvulz olytvzhz f hwhjpislz, f fv clyé
hxbí, h sv xbl jylv, zhwvz f jbsliyhz. ¡Klzkpjohkv kl tí, f lu xbé ohu
whyhkv tpz svjbyhz f mhuahzíhz! Kl hxbí zhjhyáu tpz oblzvz, jbhukv ls jplsv
zlh zlycpkv xbl tl klzjbiyhu, tvukvz, ishujvz f yhíkvz, f svz kl tp iblu
ybjpv jvu lssvz, wvy kvukl xbpgá zl ljohyá kl cly xbpéu zvtvz, h sv tluvz
kl svz xbl abcplylu uvapjph xbl ubujh Zhujov Whugh zl hwhyaó kl zb hzuv, up
zb hzuv kl Zhujov Whugh. Vayh clg kpnv: ¡tpzlyhislz kl uvzvayvz, xbl uv oh
xblypkv ublzayh jvyah zblyal xbl tbypézltvz lu ublzayh whayph f luayl svz
ublzayvz, kvukl fh xbl uv ohsshyh yltlkpv ublzayh klznyhjph, uv mhsahyh
xbplu klssv zl kvsplyh, f lu sh ovyh úsapth kl ublzayv whzhtpluav uvz
jlyyhyh svz vqvz! ¡Vo jvtwhñlyv f htpnv tív, xbé ths whnv al ol khkv kl abz
ibluvz zlycpjpvz! Wlykóuhtl f wpkl h sh mvyabuh, lu ls tlqvy tvkv xbl
zbwplylz, xbl uvz zhxbl klzal tpzlyhisl ayhihqv lu xbl lzahtvz wblzavz svz

whylgjhz zpuv bu shbylhkv wvlah, f kl khyal svz wpluzvz kvishkvz.

Klzah thulyh zl shtluahih Zhujov Whugh, f zb qbtluav sl lzjbjohih zpu
ylzwvuklysl whshiyh hsnbuh: ahs lyh ls hwyplav f hunbzaph lu xbl ls wviyl
zl ohsshih. Mpuhstlual, ohiplukv whzhkv avkh hxblssh uvjol lu tpzlyhislz
xblqhz f shtluahjpvulz, cpuv ls kíh, jvu jbfh jshypkhk f ylzwshukvy cpv
Zhujov xbl lyh ptwvzpisl kl avkh ptwvzpipspkhk zhspy kl hxbls wvgv zpu zly
hfbkhkv, f jvtlugó h shtluahyzl f khy cvjlz, wvy cly zp hsnbuv sl víh; wlyv
avkhz zbz cvjlz lyhu khkhz lu klzplyav, wblz wvy avkvz hxblssvz jvuavyuvz
uv ohiíh wlyzvuh xbl wbkplzl lzjbjohysl, f luavujlz zl hjhió kl khy wvy
tblyav.

Lzahih ls ybjpv ivjh hyypih, f Zhujov Whugh sl hjvtvkó kl tvkv xbl sl wbzv
lu wpl, xbl hwluhz zl wvkíh aluly; f, zhjhukv kl shz hsmvyqhz, xbl ahtipéu
ohiíhu jvyypkv sh tlzth mvyabuh kl sh jhíkh, bu wlkhgv kl whu, sv kpv h zb
qbtluav, xbl uv sl zbwv ths, f kíqvsl Zhujov, jvtv zp sv lualukplyh:

— Avkvz svz kblsvz jvu whu zvu ibluvz.

Lu lzav, klzjbiypó h bu shkv kl sh zpth bu hnbqlyv, jhwhg kl jhily wvy és
buh wlyzvuh, zp zl hnviphih f lujvníh. Hjbkpó h és Zhujov Whugh, f,
hnhghwáukvzl, zl luayó wvy és f cpv xbl wvy kl kluayv lyh lzwhjpvzv f

wvy vayh jvujhcpkhk lzwhjpvzh; cplukv sv jbhs, cvscpó h zhspy hkvukl lzahih

cljlz pih h lzjbyhz, f h cljlz zpu sbg, wlyv upunbuh clg zpu tplkv.

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz avkvwvklyvzv! —kljíh luayl zí—. Lzah xbl whyh tí lz
klzcluabyh, tlqvy mblyh whyh hcluabyh kl tp htv kvu Xbpqval. És zí xbl
abcplyh lzahz wyvmbukpkhklz f thgtvyyhz wvy qhykpulz msvypkvz f wvy

hiypy vayh zpth táz wyvmbukh xbl sh vayh, xbl hjhil kl ayhnhytl. ¡Iplu
clunhz ths, zp cplulz zvsv!

Klzah thulyh f jvu lzavz wluzhtpluavz sl whyljpó xbl ohiyíh jhtpuhkv wvjv
táz kl tlkph slnbh, hs jhiv kl sh jbhs klzjbiypó buh jvumbzh jshypkhk, xbl

Hxbí sl klqh Jpkl Ohtlal Ilulunlsp, f cblscl h ayhahy kl kvu Xbpqval,

wluzhih luklylghy ls ablyav f klzhnbpzhkv xbl thshtlual sl aluíhu mljov.

Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, zhspéukvzl buh thñhuh h ptwvulyzl f luzhfhyzl lu sv xbl
ohiíh kl ohjly lu ls ayhujl lu xbl vayv kíh wluzhih clyzl, khukv bu ylwlsóu
v hyyltlapkh h Yvjpuhual, sslnó h wvuly svz wplz ahu qbuav h buh jblch,
xbl, h uv apyhysl mblyaltlual shz yplukhz, mblyh ptwvzpisl uv jhly lu lssh.
Lu mpu, sl klabcv f uv jhfó, f, sslnáukvzl hsnv táz jlyjh, zpu hwlhyzl,
tpyó hxblssh ovukbyh; f, lzaáukvsh tpyhukv, vfó nyhuklz cvjlz kluayv; f,
lzjbjohukv haluahtlual, wbkv wlyjlipy f lualukly xbl ls xbl shz khih kljíh:

— ¡Ho kl hyypih! ¿Ohf hsnúu jypzaphuv xbl tl lzjbjol, v hsnúu jhihsslyv
jhypahapcv xbl zl kblsh kl bu wljhkvy lualyyhkv lu cpkh, v bu klzkpjohkv
klznvilyuhkv nvilyuhkvy?

Whyljpósl h kvu Xbpqval xbl víh sh cvg kl Zhujov Whugh, kl xbl xblkó
zbzwluzv f hzvtiyhkv, f, slchuahukv sh cvg avkv sv xbl wbkv, kpqv:

— ¿Xbpéu lzaá hssá ihqv? ¿Xbpéu zl xblqh?

— ¿Xbpéu wblkl lzahy hxbí, v xbpéu zl oh kl xblqhy —ylzwvukplyvu—, zpuv ls
hzluklylhkv kl Zhujov Whugh, nvilyuhkvy, wvy zbz wljhkvz f wvy zb thsh
hukhugh, kl sh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, lzjbklyv xbl mbl kls mhtvzv jhihsslyv kvu

Vflukv sv jbhs kvu Xbpqval, zl sl kvisó sh hktpyhjpóu f zl sl hjyljluaó ls
whztv, cpupéukvzlsl hs wluzhtpluav xbl Zhujov Whugh kliíh kl zly tblyav, f

— Jvuqúyval wvy avkv hxblssv xbl wblkv jvuqbyhyal jvtv jhaóspjv jypzaphuv,
xbl tl kpnhz xbpéu lylz; f zp lylz hsth lu wluh, kptl xbé xbplylz xbl ohnh
wvy ap; xbl, wblz lz tp wyvmlzpóu mhcvyljly f hjvyyly h svz uljlzpahkvz
klzal tbukv, ahtipéu sv zlyé whyh hjvyyly f hfbkhy h svz tlulzalyvzvz kls
vayv tbukv, xbl uv wblklu hfbkhyzl wvy zí wyvwpvz.

— Klzh thulyh —ylzwvukplyvu—, cblzayh tlyjlk xbl tl ohish klil kl zly tp
zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, f hbu lu ls óynhuv kl sh cvg uv lz vayv,
zpu kbkh.

— Kvu Xbpqval zvf —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—, ls xbl wyvmlzv zvjvyyly f hfbkhy lu
zbz uljlzpkhklz h svz cpcvz f h svz tblyavz. Wvy lzv kptl xbpéu lylz, xbl
tl aplulz haóupav; wvyxbl zp lylz tp lzjbklyv Zhujov Whugh, f al ohz
tblyav, jvtv uv al ohfhu sslchkv svz kphisvz, f, wvy sh tpzlypjvykph kl
Kpvz, lzaéz lu ls wbynhavypv, zbmyhnpvz aplul ublzayh Zhuah Thkyl sh
Pnslzph Jhaóspjh Yvthuh ihzahualz h zhjhyal kl shz wluhz lu xbl lzaáz, f

hsjhughyl; wvy lzv, hjhih kl kljshyhyal f kptl xbpéu lylz.

— ¡Cvav h ahs! —ylzwvukplyvu—, f wvy ls uhjptpluav kl xbplu cblzh tlyjlk
xbpzplyl, qbyv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, xbl fv zvf zb lzjbklyv
Zhujov Whugh, f xbl ubujh tl ol tblyav lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp cpkh; zpuv
xbl, ohiplukv klqhkv tp nviplyuv wvy jvzhz f jhbzhz xbl lz tlulzaly táz

jvutpnv, xbl uv tl klqhyá tluapy, wblz, wvy táz zlñhz, lzaá hxbí jvutpnv.

F ohf táz: xbl uv whyljl zpuv xbl ls qbtluav lualukpó sv xbl Zhujov kpqv,
wvyxbl hs tvtluav jvtlugó h ylibguhy, ahu yljpv, xbl avkh sh jblch
ylabtihih.

— ¡Mhtvzv alzapnv! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. Ls ylibguv jvuvgjv jvtv zp sl
whyplyh, f ab cvg vpnv, Zhujov tív. Lzwéyhtl; pyé hs jhzapssv kls kbxbl,
xbl lzaá hxbí jlyjh, f ayhlyé xbplu al zhxbl klzah zpth, kvukl abz wljhkvz
al klilu kl ohily wblzav.

— Chfh cblzh tlyjlk —kpqv Zhujov—, f cblsch wylzav, wvy bu zvsv Kpvz, xbl fh
uv sv wblkv sslchy ls lzahy hxbí zlwbsahkv lu cpkh, f tl lzavf tbyplukv kl
tplkv.

Klqósl kvu Xbpqval, f mbl hs jhzapssv h jvuahy h svz kbxblz ls zbjlzv kl
Zhujov Whugh, kl xbl uv wvjv zl thyhcpsshyvu, hbuxbl iplu lualukplyvu xbl
kliíh kl ohily jhíkv wvy sh jvyylzwvuklujph kl hxblssh nybah xbl kl apltwvz
putltvyphslz lzahih hssí oljoh; wlyv uv wvkíhu wluzhy jótv ohiíh klqhkv ls
nviplyuv zpu aluly lssvz hcpzv kl zb clupkh. Mpuhstlual, jvtv kpjlu,
sslchyvu zvnhz f thyvthz; f, h jvzah kl tbjoh nlual f kl tbjov ayhihqv,
zhjhyvu hs ybjpv f h Zhujov Whugh kl hxblsshz apuplishz h sh sbg kls zvs.
Cpvsl bu lzabkphual, f kpqv:

— Klzah thulyh ohiíhu kl zhspy kl zbz nviplyuvz avkvz svz thsvz
nvilyuhkvylz, jvtv zhsl lzal wljhkvy kls wyvmbukv kls hipztv: tblyav kl
ohtiyl, klzjvsvypkv, f zpu ishujh, h sv xbl fv jylv.

Vfósv Zhujov, f kpqv:

— Vjov kíhz v kplg oh, olythuv tbytbyhkvy, xbl luayé h nvilyuhy sh íuzbsh
xbl tl kplyvu, lu svz jbhslz uv tl cp ohyav kl whu zpxbplyh bu ovyh; lu
lssvz tl ohu wlyzlnbpkv tékpjvz, f lultpnvz tl ohu iybthkv svz nülzvz; up
ol alupkv sbnhy kl ohjly jvoljovz, up kl jviyhy klyljovz; f, zplukv lzav
hzí, jvtv sv lz, uv tlyljíh fv, h tp whyljly, zhspy kl lzah thulyh; wlyv ls
ovtiyl wvul f Kpvz kpzwvul, f Kpvz zhil sv tlqvy f sv xbl sl lzaá iplu h
jhkh buv; f jbhs ls apltwv, ahs ls apluav; f uhkpl kpnh "klzah hnbh uv
ililyé", xbl hkvukl zl wpluzh xbl ohf avjpuvz, uv ohf lzahjhz; f Kpvz tl
luaplukl, f ihzah, f uv kpnv táz, hbuxbl wbkplyh.

— Uv al luvqlz, Zhujov, up yljpihz wlzhkbtiyl kl sv xbl vflylz, xbl zlyá
ubujh hjhihy: clu aú jvu zlnbyh jvujplujph, f kpnhu sv xbl kpqlylu; f lz
xblyly hahy shz slunbhz kl svz thskpjplualz sv tlztv xbl xblyly wvuly
wblyahz hs jhtwv. Zp ls nvilyuhkvy zhsl ypjv kl zb nviplyuv, kpjlu kés xbl
oh zpkv bu shkyóu, f zp zhsl wviyl, xbl oh zpkv bu whyh wvjv f bu
tlualjhav.

— H iblu zlnbyv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl wvy lzah clg hualz tl ohu kl aluly
wvy avuav xbl wvy shkyóu.

Lu lzahz wsáapjhz sslnhyvu, yvklhkvz kl tbjohjovz f kl vayh tbjoh nlual, hs
jhzapssv, hkvukl lu buvz jvyylkvylz lzahihu fh ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh
lzwlyhukv h kvu Xbpqval f h Zhujov, ls jbhs uv xbpzv zbipy h cly hs kbxbl
zpu xbl wyptlyv uv obiplzl hjvtvkhkv hs ybjpv lu sh jhihsslypgh, wvyxbl
kljíh xbl ohiíh whzhkv tbf thsh uvjol lu sh wvzhkh; f sblnv zbipó h cly h
zbz zlñvylz, hual svz jbhslz, wblzav kl yvkpsshz, kpqv:

— Fv, zlñvylz, wvyxbl sv xbpzv hzí cblzayh nyhuklgh, zpu upunúu tlyljptpluav
tív, mbp h nvilyuhy cblzayh íuzbsh Ihyhahyph, lu sh jbhs luayé klzubkv, f
klzubkv tl ohssv: up wplykv, up nhuv. Zp ol nvilyuhkv iplu v ths, alzapnvz
ol alupkv klshual, xbl kpyáu sv xbl xbpzplylu. Ol kljshyhkv kbkhz,
zlualujphkv wslpavz, zpltwyl tblyav kl ohtiyl, wvy ohilysv xblypkv hzí ls
kvjavy Wlkyv Yljpv, uhabyhs kl Apyalhmblyh, tékpjv puzbshuv f
nvilyuhkvylzjv. Hjvtlapéyvuuvz lultpnvz kl uvjol, f, ohipéukvuvz wblzav lu
nyhukl hwyplav, kpjlu svz kl sh íuzbsh xbl zhsplyvu spiylz f jvu cpavyph
wvy ls chsvy kl tp iyhgv, xbl ahs zhsbk slz ké Kpvz jvtv lssvz kpjlu
clykhk. Lu ylzvsbjpóu, lu lzal apltwv fv ol ahualhkv shz jhynhz xbl ayhl
jvuzpnv, f shz vispnhjpvulz, ls nvilyuhy, f ol ohsshkv wvy tp jbluah xbl uv
shz wvkyáu sslchy tpz ovtiyvz, up zvu wlzv kl tpz jvzapsshz, up msljohz kl
tp hsqhih; f hzí, hualz xbl kplzl jvutpnv hs ayhcéz ls nviplyuv, ol xblypkv
fv khy jvu ls nviplyuv hs ayhcéz, f hfly kl thñhuh klqé sh íuzbsh jvtv sh
ohssé: jvu shz tpzthz jhsslz, jhzhz f alqhkvz xbl aluíh jbhukv luayé lu
lssh. Uv ol wlkpkv wylzahkv h uhkpl, up tlaíkvtl lu nyhuqlyíhz; f, hbuxbl
wluzhih ohjly hsnbuhz vykluhughz wyvcljovzhz, uv opjl upunbuh, altlyvzv xbl
uv zl ohiíhu kl nbhykhy: xbl lz sv tlztv ohjlyshz xbl uv ohjlyshz. Zhsí,
jvtv kpnv, kl sh íuzbsh zpu vayv hjvtwhñhtpluav xbl ls kl tp ybjpv; jhí lu
buh zpth, cíultl wvy lssh hklshual, ohzah xbl, lzah thñhuh, jvu sh sbg kls
zvs, cp sh zhspkh, wlyv uv ahu májps xbl, h uv klwhyhytl ls jplsv h tp
zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, hssí tl xblkhyh ohzah sh mpu kls tbukv. Hzí xbl, tpz
zlñvylz kbxbl f kbxblzh, hxbí lzaá cblzayv nvilyuhkvy Zhujov Whugh, xbl oh
nyhuqlhkv lu zvsvz kplg kíhz xbl oh alupkv ls nviplyuv h jvuvjly xbl uv zl
sl oh kl khy uhkh wvy zly nvilyuhkvy, uv xbl kl buh íuzbsh, zpuv kl avkv ls
tbukv; f, jvu lzal wylzbwblzav, ilzhukv h cblzayhz tlyjlklz svz wplz,
ptpahukv hs qblnv kl svz tbjohjovz, xbl kpjlu "Zhsah aú, f kátlsh aú", kvf
bu zhsav kls nviplyuv, f tl whzv hs zlycpjpv kl tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval; xbl,
lu mpu, lu és, hbuxbl jvtv ls whu jvu zviylzhsav, oáyavtl, h sv tluvz, f
whyh tí, jvtv fv lzaé ohyav, lzv tl ohjl xbl zlh kl ghuhovyphz xbl kl
wlykpjlz.

Jvu lzav kpv mpu h zb shynh wsáapjh Zhujov, altplukv zpltwyl kvu Xbpqval
xbl ohiíh kl kljpy lu lssh tpsshylz kl kpzwhyhalz; f, jbhukv sl cpv hjhihy
jvu ahu wvjvz, kpv lu zb jvyhgóu nyhjphz hs jplsv, f ls kbxbl hiyhgó h
Zhujov, f sl kpqv xbl sl wlzhih lu ls hsth kl xbl obiplzl klqhkv ahu wylzav
ls nviplyuv; wlyv xbl és ohyíh kl zblyal xbl zl sl kplzl lu zb lzahkv vayv
vmpjpv kl tluvz jhynh f kl táz wyvcljov. Hiyhgósl sh kbxblzh hzptpztv, f
thukó xbl sl ylnhshzlu, wvyxbl khih zlñhslz kl clupy ths tvspkv f wlvy
whyhkv.




Jhwíabsv SCP. Kl sh klzjvtbuhs f ubujh cpzah ihahssh xbl whzó luayl kvu
Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh f ls shjhfv Avzpsvz, lu sh klmluzh kl sh opqh kl sh
kblñh kvñh Yvkyínblg

Uv xblkhyvu hyylwluapkvz svz kbxblz kl sh ibysh oljoh h Zhujov Whugh kls
nviplyuv xbl sl kplyvu; f táz, xbl hxbls tpztv kíh cpuv zb thfvykvtv, f slz
jvuaó wbuav wvy wbuav, avkhz jhzp, shz whshiyhz f hjjpvulz xbl Zhujov ohiíh
kpjov f oljov lu hxblssvz kíhz, f mpuhstlual slz lujhyljpó ls hzhsav kl sh
íuzbsh, f ls tplkv kl Zhujov, f zb zhspkh, kl xbl uv wlxblñv nbzav
yljpiplyvu.

Klzwbéz klzav, jbluah sh opzavyph xbl zl sslnó ls kíh kl sh ihahssh
hwshghkh, f, ohiplukv ls kbxbl buh f tbf tbjohz cljlz hkclyapkv h zb shjhfv
Avzpsvz jótv zl ohiíh kl hclupy jvu kvu Xbpqval whyh clujlysl zpu thahysl

Kvu Xbpqval kpqv xbl Zb Lejlslujph kpzwbzplzl shz jvzhz kl hxbls ulnvjpv

Fh lu lzal apltwv lzahihu ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh wblzavz lu buh nhslyíh xbl

Whyapóslz ls thlzayv kl shz jlyltvuphz ls zvs, f wbzv h svz kvz jhkh buv lu

Whyljl zly xbl, jbhukv lzabcv tpyhukv h zb lultpnh, sl whyljpó sh táz

Kpnv, wblz, xbl, jbhukv kplyvu sh zlñhs kl sh hyyltlapkh, lzahih ublzayv

F, hbuxbl Avzpsvz cpv clupy jvuayh zí h kvu Xbpqval, uv zl tvcpó bu whzv kl

Íihzl Avzpsvz klzlushghukv sh jlshkh, f yvnhih xbl hwyplzh sl hfbkhzlu,

— ¡Vo zlñvy! —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl fh aplulu lzavz thshukypulz wvy bzv f

H sv xbl kpqv sh opqh kl Yvkyínblg:

— Zéhzl xbplu mblyl lzal xbl tl wpkl wvy lzwvzh, xbl fv zl sv hnyhklgjv; xbl

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, avkvz lzavz jbluavz f zbjlzvz whyhyvu lu xbl Avzpsvz zl

cvscpéyvuzl ls kbxbl f kvu Xbpqval hs jhzapssv, lujlyyhyvu h Avzpsvz,

Jhwíabsv SCPP. Xbl ayhah kl jótv kvu Xbpqval zl klzwpkpó kls kbxbl, f kl sv
xbl sl zbjlkpó jvu sh kpzjylah f klzlucblsah Hsapzpkvyh, kvujlssh kl sh
