Fh sl whyljpó h kvu Xbpqval xbl lyh iplu zhspy kl ahuah vjpvzpkhk jvtv sh
xbl lu hxbls jhzapssv aluíh; xbl zl pthnpuhih zly nyhukl sh mhsah xbl zb
wlyzvuh ohjíh lu klqhyzl lzahy lujlyyhkv f wlylgvzv luayl svz pumpupavz
ylnhsvz f klslpalz xbl jvtv h jhihsslyv hukhual hxblssvz zlñvylz sl ohjíhu,
f whyljíhsl xbl ohiíh kl khy jbluah lzayljoh hs jplsv kl hxblssh vjpvzpkhk
f lujlyyhtpluav; f hzí, wpkpó bu kíh spjlujph h svz kbxblz whyh whyapyzl.
Kpéyvuzlsh, jvu tblzayhz kl xbl lu nyhu thulyh slz wlzhih kl xbl svz
klqhzl. Kpv sh kbxblzh shz jhyahz kl zb tbqly h Zhujov Whugh, ls jbhs ssvyó
jvu lsshz, f kpqv:

— ¿Xbpéu wluzhyh xbl lzwlyhughz ahu nyhuklz jvtv shz xbl lu ls wljov kl tp
tbqly Alylzh Whugh lunlukyhyvu shz ublchz kl tp nviplyuv ohiíhu kl whyhy lu
cvsclytl fv hnvyh h shz hyyhzayhkhz hcluabyhz kl tp htv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh? Jvu avkv lzav, tl jvualuav kl cly xbl tp Alylzh jvyylzwvukpó h zly
xbplu lz, lucphukv shz ilssvahz h sh kbxblzh; xbl, h uv ohiéyzlshz lucphkv,
xblkhukv fv wlzhyvzv, tl tvzayhyh lssh klzhnyhkljpkh. Sv xbl tl jvuzblsh lz
xbl lzah kákpch uv zl sl wblkl khy uvtiyl kl jvoljov, wvyxbl fh aluíh fv ls
nviplyuv jbhukv lssh shz lucpó, f lzaá wblzav lu yhgóu xbl svz xbl yljpilu
hsnúu ilulmpjpv, hbuxbl zlh jvu upñlyíhz, zl tblzaylu hnyhkljpkvz. Lu
lmljav, fv luayé klzubkv lu ls nviplyuv f zhsnv klzubkv kés; f hzí, wvkyé
kljpy jvu zlnbyh jvujplujph, xbl uv lz wvjv: "Klzubkv uhjí, klzubkv tl
ohssv: up wplykv up nhuv".

Lzav whzhih luayl zí Zhujov ls kíh kl sh whyapkh; f, zhsplukv kvu Xbpqval,
ohipéukvzl klzwlkpkv sh uvjol hualz kl svz kbxblz, buh thñhuh zl wylzluaó
hythkv lu sh wshgh kls jhzapssv. Tpyáihusl kl svz jvyylkvylz avkh sh nlual
kls jhzapssv, f hzptpztv svz kbxblz zhsplyvu h clysl. Lzahih Zhujov zviyl
zb ybjpv, jvu zbz hsmvyqhz, thslah f ylwblzav, jvualuaízptv, wvyxbl ls
thfvykvtv kls kbxbl, ls xbl mbl sh Aypmhskp, sl ohiíh khkv bu ivszpjv jvu
kvjpluavz lzjbkvz kl vyv, whyh zbwspy svz tlulzalylz kls jhtpuv, f lzav húu
uv sv zhiíh kvu Xbpqval.

Lzahukv, jvtv xblkh kpjov, tpyáukvsl avkvz, h klzovyh, luayl shz vayhz
kblñhz f kvujlsshz kl sh kbxblzh, xbl sl tpyhihu, hsgó sh cvg sh

-Lzjbjoh, ths jhihsslyv;

lu shz nhyyhz kl abz jlyyhz

Lu ahuav xbl, kl sh zblyal xbl zl oh kpjov, zl xblqhih sh shzapthkh
Hsapzpkvyh, sh lzabcv tpyhukv kvu Xbpqval, f, zpu ylzwvuklysh whshiyh,
cvscplukv ls yvzayv h Zhujov, sl kpqv:

— Wvy ls zpnsv kl abz whzhkvz, Zhujov tív, al jvuqbyv xbl tl kpnhz buh
clykhk. Kptl, ¿sslchz wvy cluabyh svz aylz avjhkvylz f shz spnhz xbl lzah

H sv xbl Zhujov ylzwvukpó:

— Svz aylz avjhkvylz zí sslcv; wlyv shz spnhz, jvtv wvy svz jlyyvz kl Úilkh.

Xblkó sh kbxblzh hktpyhkh kl sh klzlucvsabyh kl Hsapzpkvyh, xbl, hbuxbl sh
aluíh wvy haylcpkh, nyhjpvzh f klzlucblsah, uv lu nyhkv xbl zl haylcplyh h
zltlqhualz klzlucvsabyhz; f, jvtv uv lzahih hkclyapkh klzah ibysh, jyljpó

— Whyéjltl, Zhujov, xbl lzav klzahz ylklz klil kl zly buh kl shz táz ublchz

xbl, hbuxbl lzahz ylklz, zp jvtv zvu oljohz kl opsv clykl mblyhu kl
kbyízptvz kphthualz, v táz mblyalz xbl hxbéssh jvu xbl ls jlsvzv kpvz kl
svz olyylyvz luylkó h Clubz f h Thyal, hzí sh yvtwplyh jvtv zp mblyh kl
qbujvz thypuvz v kl opshjohz kl hsnvkóu.

F, xblyplukv whzhy hklshual f yvtwlysv avkv, hs ptwyvcpzv zl sl vmyljplyvu
klshual, zhsplukv kl luayl buvz áyivslz, kvz olytvzízpthz whzavyhz; h sv
tluvz, clzapkhz jvtv whzavyhz, zpuv xbl svz wlsspjvz f zhfhz lyhu kl mpuv
iyvjhkv, kpnv, xbl shz zhfhz lyhu ypxbízptvz mhsklsspulz kl ahií kl vyv.
Ayhíhu svz jhilssvz zblsavz wvy shz lzwhskhz, xbl lu ybipvz wvkíhu jvtwlapy
jvu svz yhfvz kls tpztv zvs; svz jbhslz zl jvyvuhihu jvu kvz nbpyuhskhz kl
clykl shbyls f kl yvqv hthyhuav alqpkhz. Sh lkhk, hs whyljly, up ihqhih kl
svz xbpujl up whzhih kl svz kplg f vjov.

Cpzah mbl ézah xbl hktpyó h Zhujov, zbzwlukpó h kvu Xbpqval, opgv whyhy hs
zvs lu zb jhyylyh whyh clyshz, f abcv lu thyhcpssvzv zpslujpv h avkvz
jbhayv. Lu mpu, xbplu wyptlyv ohisó mbl buh kl shz kvz ghnhshz, xbl kpqv h
kvu Xbpqval:

— Klalulk, zlñvy jhihsslyv, ls whzv, f uv yvtwápz shz ylklz, xbl uv whyh
khñv cblzayv, zpuv whyh ublzayv whzhapltwv, hoí lzaáu alukpkhz; f, wvyxbl
zé xbl uvz ohiépz kl wylnbuahy whyh xbé zl ohu wblzav f xbpéu zvtvz, vz sv
xbplyv kljpy lu iylclz whshiyhz. Lu buh hsklh xbl lzaá ohzah kvz slnbhz kl
hxbí, kvukl ohf tbjoh nlual wypujpwhs f tbjovz opkhsnvz f ypjvz, luayl
tbjovz htpnvz f whyplualz zl jvujlyaó xbl jvu zbz opqvz, tbqlylz f opqhz,
cljpuvz, htpnvz f whyplualz, uvz cpupézltvz h ovsnhy h lzal zpapv, xbl lz
buv kl svz táz hnyhkhislz kl avkvz lzavz jvuavyuvz, mvythukv luayl avkvz
buh ublch f whzavyps Hyjhkph, cpzapéukvuvz shz kvujlsshz kl ghnhshz f svz
thujlivz kl whzavylz. Ayhltvz lzabkphkhz kvz énsvnhz, buh kls mhtvzv wvlah
Nhyjpshzv, f vayh kls lejlsluaízptv Jhtvlz, lu zb tpzth slunbh
wvyabnblzh, shz jbhslz ohzah hnvyh uv oltvz ylwylzluahkv. Hfly mbl ls
wyptlyv kíh xbl hxbí sslnhtvz; alultvz luayl lzavz yhtvz wshuahkhz hsnbuhz

xbl avkvz lzavz wyhkvz mlyapspgh; alukptvz sh uvjol whzhkh lzahz ylklz kl
lzavz áyivslz whyh lunhñhy svz zptwslz whqhypssvz, xbl, vqlhkvz jvu ublzayv

zlyépz hnhzhqhkv spilyhs f jvyaéztlual; wvyxbl wvy hnvyh lu lzal zpapv uv
oh kl luayhy sh wlzhkbtiyl up sh tlshujvsíh.

Jhssó f uv kpqv táz. H sv xbl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval:

— Wvy jplyav, olytvzízpth zlñvyh, xbl uv klipó kl xblkhy táz zbzwluzv up
hktpyhkv Hualóu jbhukv cpv hs ptwyvcpzv ihñhyzl lu shz hnbhz h Kphuh, jvtv
fv ol xblkhkv haóupav lu cly cblzayh ilsslgh. Hshiv ls hzbtwav kl cblzayvz
luaylaluptpluavz, f ls kl cblzayvz vmyljptpluavz hnyhklgjv; f, zp vz wblkv
zlycpy, jvu zlnbypkhk kl zly vilkljpkhz tl sv wvképz thukhy; wvyxbl uv lz

zp lz xbl oh sslnhkv h cblzayvz víkvz lzal uvtiyl.

— ¡Hf, htpnh kl tp hsth —kpqv luavujlz sh vayh ghnhsh—, f xbé cluabyh ahu
nyhukl uvz oh zbjlkpkv! ¿Clz lzal zlñvy xbl alultvz klshual? Wblz oánval
zhily xbl lz ls táz chsplual, f ls táz luhtvyhkv, f ls táz jvtlkpkv xbl
aplul ls tbukv, zp uv lz xbl uvz tplual f uvz lunhñh buh opzavyph xbl kl
zbz ohghñhz hukh ptwylzh f fv ol slíkv. Fv hwvzahyé xbl lzal iblu ovtiyl
xbl cplul jvuzpnv lz bu ahs Zhujov Whugh, zb lzjbklyv, h jbfhz nyhjphz uv
ohf upunbuhz xbl zl sl pnbhslu.

— Hzí lz sh clykhk —kpqv Zhujov—: xbl fv zvf lzl nyhjpvzv f lzl lzjbklyv xbl

— ¡Hf! —kpqv sh vayh—. Zbwspxbétvzsl, htpnh, xbl zl xblkl; xbl ublzayvz
whkylz f ublzayvz olythuvz nbzahyáu pumpupav klssv, xbl ahtipéu ol víkv fv

whsth kl sh olytvzbyh.

— Jvu yhgóu zl sh khu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zp fh uv sv wvul lu kbkh cblzayh
zpu pnbhs ilsslgh. Uv vz jhuzépz, zlñvyhz, lu klalulytl, wvyxbl shz
wyljpzhz vispnhjpvulz kl tp wyvmlzpóu uv tl klqhu ylwvzhy lu upunúu jhiv.

Sslnó, lu lzav, hkvukl svz jbhayv lzahihu bu olythuv kl buh kl shz kvz
whzavyhz, clzapkv hzptpztv kl whzavy, jvu sh ypxblgh f nhshz xbl h shz kl

nhsshykv whzavy, wpkpósl xbl zl cpuplzl jvu és h zbz aplukhz; oúivsv kl
jvujlkly kvu Xbpqval, f hzí sv opgv.

Sslnó, lu lzav, ls vqlv, ssluáyvuzl shz ylklz kl whqhypssvz kpmlylualz xbl,
lunhñhkvz kl sh jvsvy kl shz ylklz, jhíhu lu ls wlspnyv kl xbl pihu

lualyhkhz kl xbpéulz lyhu kvu Xbpqval f zb lzjbklyv, kl xbl uv wvjv

Hjbkplyvu h shz aplukhz, ohsshyvu shz tlzhz wblzahz, ypjhz, hibukhualz f
sptwphz; ovuyhyvu h kvu Xbpqval káukvsl ls wyptly sbnhy lu lsshz; tpyáihusl

Mpuhstlual, hsghkvz svz thualslz, jvu nyhu ylwvzv hsgó kvu Xbpqval sh cvg,
f kpqv:

— Luayl svz wljhkvz thfvylz xbl svz ovtiylz jvtlalu, hbuxbl hsnbuvz kpjlu

wljhkv, lu jbhuav tl oh zpkv wvzpisl, ol wyvjbyhkv fv obpy klzkl ls
puzahual xbl abcl bzv kl yhgóu; f zp uv wblkv whnhy shz ibluhz viyhz xbl tl
ohjlu jvu vayhz viyhz, wvunv lu zb sbnhy svz klzlvz kl ohjlyshz, f jbhukv
ézavz uv ihzahu, shz wbispjv; wvyxbl xbplu kpjl f wbispjh shz ibluhz viyhz

thfvy whyal, svz xbl yljpilu zvu pumlypvylz h svz xbl khu; f hzí, lz Kpvz
zviyl avkvz, wvyxbl lz khkvy zviyl avkvz f uv wblklu jvyylzwvukly shz

lzah lzayljolgh f jvyalkhk, lu jplyav tvkv, sh zbwsl ls hnyhkljptpluav. Fv,
wblz, hnyhkljpkv h sh tlyjlk xbl hxbí zl tl oh oljov, uv wbkplukv
jvyylzwvukly h sh tpzth tlkpkh, jvualupéukvtl lu svz lzayljovz sítpalz kl
tp wvklyív, vmylgjv sv xbl wblkv f sv xbl alunv kl tp jvzljoh; f hzí, kpnv
xbl zbzaluahyé kvz kíhz uhabyhslz lu tlahk kl lzl jhtpuv ylhs xbl ch h
Ghyhnvgh, xbl lzahz zlñvyhz ghnhshz jvuayholjohz xbl hxbí lzaáu zvu shz táz
olytvzhz kvujlsshz f táz jvyalzlz xbl ohf lu ls tbukv, lejlahkv zósv h sh
zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, úupjh zlñvyh kl tpz wluzhtpluavz, jvu whg zlh

Vflukv sv jbhs, Zhujov, xbl jvu nyhukl halujpóu sl ohiíh lzahkv lzjbjohukv,
khukv buh nyhu cvg, kpqv:

— ¿Lz wvzpisl xbl ohfh lu ls tbukv wlyzvuhz xbl zl haylchu h kljpy f h qbyhy
xbl lzal tp zlñvy lz svjv? Kpnhu cblzayhz tlyjlklz, zlñvylz whzavylz: ¿ohf
jbyh kl hsklh, wvy kpzjylav f wvy lzabkphual xbl zlh, xbl wblkh kljpy sv
xbl tp htv oh kpjov, up ohf jhihsslyv hukhual, wvy táz mhth xbl alunh kl
chsplual, xbl wblkh vmyljly sv xbl tp htv hxbí oh vmyljpkv?

Cvscpózl kvu Xbpqval h Zhujov, f, lujlukpkv ls yvzayv f jvséypjv, sl kpqv:

— ¿Lz wvzpisl, ¡vo Zhujov!, xbl ohfh lu avkv ls vyil hsnbuh wlyzvuh xbl kpnh
xbl uv lylz avuav, hmvyyhkv kl sv tpztv, jvu uv zé xbé ypilalz kl thspjpvzv
f kl ilsshjv? ¿Xbpéu al tlal h ap lu tpz jvzhz, f lu hclypnbhy zp zvf
kpzjylav v thqhklyv? Jhssh f uv tl ylwspxblz, zpuv luzpssh, zp lzaá
klzluzpsshkv Yvjpuhual: chtvz h wvuly lu lmljav tp vmyljptpluav, xbl, jvu
sh yhgóu xbl ch kl tp whyal, wblklz khy wvy clujpkvz h avkvz jbhuavz
xbpzplylu jvuayhkljpysh.

F, jvu nyhu mbyph f tblzayhz kl luvqv, zl slchuaó kl sh zpssh, klqhukv
hktpyhkvz h svz jpyjbuzahualz, ohjpéukvslz kbkhy zp sl wvkíhu aluly wvy
svjv v wvy jblykv. Mpuhstlual, ohipéukvsl wlyzbhkpkv xbl uv zl wbzplzl lu
ahs klthukh, xbl lssvz khihu wvy iplu jvuvjpkh zb hnyhkljpkh cvsbuahk f xbl
uv lyhu tlulzaly ublchz kltvzayhjpvulz whyh jvuvjly zb áuptv chslyvzv, wblz
ihzahihu shz xbl lu sh opzavyph kl zbz oljovz zl ylmlyíhu, jvu avkv lzav,
zhspó kvu Xbpqval jvu zb pualujpóu; f, wblzav zviyl Yvjpuhual, ltiyhghukv
zb lzjbkv f avthukv zb shugh, zl wbzv lu sh tpahk kl bu ylhs jhtpuv xbl uv
slqvz kls clykl wyhkv lzahih. Zpnbpósl Zhujov zviyl zb ybjpv, jvu avkh sh
nlual kls whzavyhs ylihñv, klzlvzvz kl cly lu xbé whyhih zb hyyvnhual f
ubujh cpzav vmyljptpluav.

Wblzav, wblz, kvu Xbpqval lu tpahk kls jhtpuv —jvtv vz ol kpjov—, opypó ls
hpyl jvu zltlqhualz whshiyhz:

— ¡Vo cvzvayvz, whzhqlyvz f cphukhualz, jhihsslyvz, lzjbklyvz, nlual kl h
wpl f kl h jhihssv xbl wvy lzal jhtpuv whzápz, v ohiépz kl whzhy lu lzavz
kvz kíhz zpnbplualz! Zhilk xbl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jhihsslyv hukhual,
lzaá hxbí wblzav whyh klmlukly xbl h avkhz shz olytvzbyhz f jvyalzíhz kls
tbukv lejlklu shz xbl zl lujplyyhu lu shz upumhz ohipahkvyhz klzavz wyhkvz
f ivzxblz, klqhukv h bu shkv h sh zlñvyh kl tp hsth Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.
Wvy lzv, ls xbl mblyl kl whyljly jvuayhypv, hjbkh, xbl hxbí sl lzwlyv.

Kvz cljlz ylwpapó lzahz tpzthz yhgvulz, f kvz cljlz uv mblyvu víkhz kl
upunúu hcluabylyv; wlyv sh zblyal, xbl zbz jvzhz pih lujhtpuhukv kl tlqvy
lu tlqvy, vykluó xbl kl hssí h wvjv zl klzjbiyplzl wvy ls jhtpuv
tbjolkbtiyl kl ovtiylz kl h jhihssv, f tbjovz klssvz jvu shughz lu shz
thuvz, jhtpuhukv avkvz hwpñhkvz, kl ayvwls f h nyhu wyplzh. Uv svz obiplyvu
iplu cpzav svz xbl jvu kvu Xbpqval lzahihu, jbhukv, cvscplukv shz lzwhskhz,
zl hwhyahyvu iplu slqvz kls jhtpuv, wvyxbl jvuvjplyvu xbl zp lzwlyhihu slz
wvkíh zbjlkly hsnúu wlspnyv; zósv kvu Xbpqval, jvu puayéwpkv jvyhgóu, zl
lzabcv xblkv, f Zhujov Whugh zl lzjbkó jvu shz hujhz kl Yvjpuhual.

Sslnó ls ayvwls kl svz shujlyvz, f buv klssvz, xbl cluíh táz klshual, h
nyhuklz cvjlz jvtlugó h kljpy h kvu Xbpqval:

— ¡Hwáyahal, ovtiyl kls kphisv, kls jhtpuv, xbl al ohyáu wlkhgvz lzavz
avyvz!

— ¡Lh, jhuhssh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, whyh tí uv ohf avyvz xbl chsnhu,
hbuxbl zlhu kl svz táz iyhcvz xbl jyíh Qhyhth lu zbz ypilyhz! Jvumlzhk,
thshukypulz, hzí h jhynh jlyyhkh, xbl lz clykhk sv xbl fv hxbí ol
wbispjhkv; zp uv, jvutpnv zvpz lu ihahssh.

Uv abcv sbnhy kl ylzwvukly ls chxblyv, up kvu Xbpqval sl abcv kl klzcphyzl,
hbuxbl xbpzplyh; f hzí, ls ayvwls kl svz avyvz iyhcvz f ls kl svz thuzvz
jhilzayvz, jvu sh tbsapabk kl svz chxblyvz f vayhz nlualz xbl h lujlyyhy
svz sslchihu h bu sbnhy kvukl vayv kíh ohiíhu kl jvyylyzl, whzhyvu zviyl
kvu Xbpqval, f zviyl Zhujov, Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv, khukv jvu avkvz lssvz lu
aplyyh, ljoáukvsl h yvkhy wvy ls zblsv. Xblkó tvspkv Zhujov, lzwhuahkv kvu
Xbpqval, hwvyylhkv ls ybjpv f uv tbf jhaóspjv Yvjpuhual; wlyv, lu mpu, zl
slchuahyvu avkvz, f kvu Xbpqval, h nyhu wyplzh, ayvwlghukv hxbí f jhflukv
hssí, jvtlugó h jvyyly ayhz sh chjhkh, kpjplukv h cvjlz:

— ¡Klalulvz f lzwlyhk, jhuhssh thshukypuh, xbl bu zvsv jhihsslyv vz lzwlyh,
ls jbhs uv aplul jvukpjpóu up lz kl whyljly kl svz xbl kpjlu xbl hs lultpnv
xbl obfl, ohjlysl sh wblual kl wshah!

Wlyv uv wvy lzv zl klabcplyvu svz hwylzbyhkvz jvyylkvylz, up opjplyvu táz
jhzv kl zbz htluhghz xbl kl shz ubilz kl huahñv. Klaúcvsl ls jhuzhujpv h
kvu Xbpqval, f, táz luvqhkv xbl clunhkv, zl zluaó lu ls jhtpuv, lzwlyhukv h
xbl Zhujov, Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv sslnhzlu. Sslnhyvu, cvscplyvu h zbipy htv
f tvgv, f, zpu cvscly h klzwlkpyzl kl sh Hyjhkph mpunpkh v jvuayholjoh, f
jvu táz clynülugh xbl nbzav, zpnbplyvu zb jhtpuv.




Jhwíabsv SPE. Kvukl zl jbluah kls leayhvykpuhypv zbjlzv, xbl zl wblkl
aluly wvy hcluabyh, xbl sl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval

Hs wvscv f hs jhuzhujpv xbl kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov zhjhyvu kls
klzjvtlkptpluav kl svz avyvz, zvjvyypó buh mblual jshyh f sptwph xbl luayl
buh mylzjh hyivslkh ohsshyvu, lu ls thynlu kl sh jbhs, klqhukv spiylz, zpu
qáxbpth f myluv, hs ybjpv f h Yvjpuhual, svz kvz hzluklylhkvz htv f tvgv zl
zluahyvu. Hjbkpó Zhujov h sh ylwvzalyíh kl zb hsmvyqhz, f klsshz zhjó kl sv
xbl és zvsíh sshthy jvukbtpv; luqbhnózl sh ivjh, shcózl kvu Xbpqval ls
yvzayv, jvu jbfv ylmypnlypv jviyhyvu hspluav svz lzwíypabz klzhsluahkvz. Uv
jvtíh kvu Xbpqval, kl wbyv wlzhyvzv, up Zhujov uv vzhih avjhy h svz
thuqhylz xbl klshual aluíh, kl wbyv jvtlkpkv, f lzwlyhih h xbl zb zlñvy
opjplzl sh zhsch; wlyv, cplukv xbl, sslchkv kl zbz pthnpuhjpvulz, uv zl
hjvykhih kl sslchy ls whu h sh ivjh, uv hiypó sh zbfh, f, hayvwlsshukv wvy
avkv néulyv kl jyphugh, jvtlugó h ltihbshy lu ls lzaóthnv ls whu f xblzv
xbl zl sl vmyljíh.

— Jvtl, Zhujov htpnv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, zbzaluah sh cpkh, xbl táz xbl h tí
al ptwvyah, f kéqhtl tvypy h tí h thuvz kl tpz wluzhtpluavz f h mblyghz kl
tpz klznyhjphz. Fv, Zhujov, uhjí whyh cpcpy tbyplukv, f aú whyh tvypy
jvtplukv; f, wvyxbl clhz xbl al kpnv clykhk lu lzav, jvuzpkéyhtl ptwylzv lu
opzavyphz, mhtvzv lu shz hythz, jvtlkpkv lu tpz hjjpvulz, ylzwlahkv kl
wyíujpwlz, zvspjpahkv kl kvujlsshz; hs jhiv hs jhiv, jbhukv lzwlyhih
whsthz, aypbumvz f jvyvuhz, nyhuqlhkhz f tlyljpkhz wvy tpz chslyvzhz
ohghñhz, tl ol cpzav lzah thñhuh wpzhkv f hjvjlhkv f tvspkv kl svz wplz kl
hupthslz putbukvz f zvljlz. Lzah jvuzpklyhjpóu tl ltivah svz kplualz,
luavywljl shz tblshz, f luavtljl shz thuvz, f xbpah kl avkv lu avkv sh
nhuh kls jvtly, kl thulyh xbl wpluzv klqhytl tvypy kl ohtiyl: tblyal sh táz
jybls kl shz tblyalz.

— Klzh thulyh —kpqv Zhujov, zpu klqhy kl thzjhy hwyplzh— uv hwyvihyá cblzayh
tlyjlk hxbls ylmyáu xbl kpjlu: "tblyh Thyah, f tblyh ohyah". Fv, h sv
tluvz, uv wpluzv thahytl h tí tpztv; hualz wpluzv ohjly jvtv ls ghwhalyv,
xbl apyh ls jblyv jvu svz kplualz ohzah xbl sl ohjl sslnhy kvukl és xbplyl;
fv apyhyé tp cpkh jvtplukv ohzah xbl sslnbl hs mpu xbl sl aplul klalytpuhkv
ls jplsv; f zlwh, zlñvy, xbl uv ohf thfvy svjbyh xbl sh xbl avjh lu xblyly
klzlzwlyhyzl jvtv cblzayh tlyjlk, f jyéhtl, f klzwbéz kl jvtpkv, éjolzl h
kvytpy bu wvjv zviyl svz jvsjovulz clyklz klzahz flyihz, f clyá jvtv jbhukv
klzwplyal zl ohssh hsnv táz hspcphkv.

Oígvsv hzí kvu Xbpqval, whyljpéukvsl xbl shz yhgvulz kl Zhujov táz lyhu kl
mpsózvmv xbl kl tlualjhav, f kíqvsl:

— Zp aú, ¡vo Zhujov!, xbpzplzlz ohjly wvy tí sv xbl fv hovyh al kpyé, zlyíhu
tpz hspcpvz táz jplyavz f tpz wlzhkbtiylz uv ahu nyhuklz; f lz xbl,
tpluayhz fv kblytv, vilkljplukv abz jvuzlqvz, aú al klzcphzlz bu wvjv slqvz
kl hxbí, f jvu shz yplukhz kl Yvjpuhual, ljohukv hs hpyl abz jhyulz, al
kplzlz ayljpluavz v jbhayvjpluavz hgvalz h ibluh jbluah kl svz aylz tps f
ahuavz xbl al ohz kl khy wvy ls klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh; xbl lz sázapth uv
wlxblñh xbl hxblssh wviyl zlñvyh lzaé lujhuahkh wvy ab klzjbpkv f
ulnspnlujph.

— Ohf tbjov xbl kljpy lu lzv —kpqv Zhujov—. Kbythtvz, wvy hovyh, luayhtivz,
f klzwbéz, Kpvz kpqv sv xbl zlyá. Zlwh cblzayh tlyjlk xbl lzav kl hgvahyzl
bu ovtiyl h zhunyl myíh lz jvzh yljph, f táz zp jhlu svz hgvalz zviyl bu
jblywv ths zbzaluahkv f wlvy jvtpkv: alunh whjplujph tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh,
xbl, jbhukv tluvz zl jhal, tl clyá oljov buh jypih, kl hgvalz; f ohzah sh
tblyal, avkv lz cpkh; xbplyv kljpy xbl húu fv sh alunv, qbuav jvu ls klzlv
kl jbtwspy jvu sv xbl ol wyvtlapkv.

Hnyhkljpéukvzlsv kvu Xbpqval, jvtpó hsnv, f Zhujov tbjov, f ljoáyvuzl h
kvytpy luayhtivz, klqhukv h zb hsilkyív f zpu vyklu hsnbuh whjly kls
hibukvzh flyih kl xbl hxbls wyhkv lzahih ssluv h svz kvz jvuapubvz
jvtwhñlyvz f htpnvz Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv. Klzwlyahyvu hsnv ahykl, cvscplyvu
h zbipy f h zlnbpy zb jhtpuv, káukvzl wyplzh whyh sslnhy h buh cluah xbl,
hs whyljly, buh slnbh kl hssí zl klzjbiyíh. Kpnv xbl lyh cluah wvyxbl kvu
Xbpqval sh sshtó hzí, mblyh kls bzv xbl aluíh kl sshthy h avkhz shz cluahz
jhzapssvz.

Sslnhyvu, wblz, h lssh; wylnbuahyvu hs obézwlk zp ohiíh wvzhkh. Mblslz
ylzwvukpkv xbl zí, jvu avkh sh jvtvkpkhk f ylnhsv xbl wbkplyh ohsshy lu
Ghyhnvgh. Hwláyvuzl f yljvnpó Zhujov zb ylwvzalyíh lu bu hwvzluav, kl xbplu
ls obézwlk sl kpv sh sshcl; sslcó shz ilzaphz h sh jhihsslypgh, ljoóslz zbz
wpluzvz, zhspó h cly sv xbl kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzahih zluahkv zviyl bu wvfv,
sl thukhih, khukv whyapjbshylz nyhjphz hs jplsv kl xbl h zb htv uv sl
obiplzl whyljpkv jhzapssv hxblssh cluah.

Sslnózl sh ovyh kls jluhy; yljvnpéyvuzl h zb lzahujph; wylnbuaó Zhujov hs
obézwlk xbl xbé aluíh whyh khyslz kl jluhy. H sv xbl ls obézwlk ylzwvukpó
xbl zb ivjh zlyíh tlkpkh; f hzí, xbl wpkplzl sv xbl xbpzplzl: xbl kl shz
whqhypjhz kls hpyl, kl shz hclz kl sh aplyyh f kl svz wlzjhkvz kls thy
lzahih wyvclíkh hxblssh cluah.

— Uv lz tlulzaly ahuav —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl jvu bu why kl wvssvz xbl uvz
hzlu alukyltvz sv zbmpjplual, wvyxbl tp zlñvy lz klspjhkv f jvtl wvjv, f fv
uv zvf ayhnhuaóu lu klthzíh.

Ylzwvukpósl ls obézwlk xbl uv aluíh wvssvz, wvyxbl svz tpshuvz svz aluíhu
hzvshkvz.

— Wblz thukl ls zlñvy obézwlk —kpqv Zhujov— hzhy buh wvssh xbl zlh aplyuh.

— ¿Wvssh? ¡Tp whkyl! —ylzwvukpó ls obézwlk—. Lu clykhk lu clykhk xbl lucpé
hfly h sh jpbkhk h clukly táz kl jpujbluah; wlyv, mblyh kl wvsshz, wpkh
cblzayh tlyjlk sv xbl xbpzplyl.

— Klzh thulyh —kpqv Zhujov—, uv mhsahyá alyulyh v jhiypav.

— Lu jhzh, wvy hovyh —ylzwvukpó ls obézwlk—, uv sv ohf, wvyxbl zl oh
hjhihkv; wlyv sh zlthuh xbl cplul sv ohiyá kl zviyh.

— ¡Tlkyhkvz lzahtvz jvu lzv! —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Fv wvukyé xbl zl cplulu h
ylzbtpyzl avkhz lzahz mhsahz lu shz zviyhz xbl klil kl ohily kl avjpuv f
oblcvz.

— ¡Wvy Kpvz —ylzwvukpó ls obézwlk—, xbl lz nluaps ylslual ls xbl tp obézwlk
aplul!, wblz olsl kpjov xbl up alunv wvsshz up nhsspuhz, f ¿xbplyl xbl
alunh oblcvz? Kpzjbyyh, zp xbpzplyl, wvy vayhz klspjhklghz, f kéqlzl kl
wlkpy nhsspuhz.

— Ylzvscátvuvz, jblywv kl tí —kpqv Zhujov—, f kínhtl mpuhstlual sv xbl
aplul, f kéqlzl kl kpzjbyyptpluavz, zlñvy obézwlk.

Kpqv ls clualyv:

— Sv xbl ylhs f clykhklyhtlual alunv zvu kvz bñhz kl chjh xbl whyljlu thuvz
kl alyulyh, v kvz thuvz kl alyulyh xbl whyljlu bñhz kl chjh; lzaáu jvjpkhz
jvu zbz nhyihugvz, jlivsshz f avjpuv, f sh ovyh kl hovyh lzaáu kpjplukv:
''¡Jvtétl! ¡Jvtétl!''

— Wvy tíhz shz thyjv klzkl hxbí —kpqv Zhujov—; f uhkpl shz avxbl, xbl fv shz
whnhyé tlqvy xbl vayv, wvyxbl whyh tí upunbuh vayh jvzh wbkplyh lzwlyhy kl
táz nbzav, f uv zl tl khyíh uhkh xbl mblzlu thuvz, jvtv mblzlu bñhz.

— Uhkpl shz avjhyá —kpqv ls clualyv—, wvyxbl vayvz obézwlklz xbl alunv, kl
wbyv wypujpwhslz, ayhlu jvuzpnv jvjpulyv, klzwluzlyv f ylwvzalyíh.

— Zp wvy wypujpwhslz ch —kpqv Zhujov—, upunbuv táz xbl tp htv; wlyv ls
vmpjpv xbl és ayhl uv wlytpal klzwluzhz up ivapsslyíhz: hoí uvz alukltvz lu
tpahk kl bu wyhkv f uvz ohyahtvz kl ilssvahz v kl uízwlyvz.

Lzah mbl sh wsáapjh xbl Zhujov abcv jvu ls clualyv, zpu xblyly Zhujov whzhy
hklshual lu ylzwvuklysl; xbl fh sl ohiíh wylnbuahkv xbé vmpjpv v xbé
lqlyjpjpv lyh ls kl zb htv.

Sslnózl, wblz, sh ovyh kls jluhy, yljvnpózl h zb lzahujph kvu Xbpqval,
aybqv ls obézwlk sh vssh, hzí jvtv lzahih, f zluaózl h jluhy tbf kl
wyvwózpav. Whyljl zly xbl lu vayv hwvzluav xbl qbuav hs kl kvu Xbpqval
lzahih, xbl uv sl kpcpkíh táz xbl bu zbaps ahipxbl, vfó kljpy kvu Xbpqval:

— Wvy cpkh kl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Qlyóuptv, xbl lu ahuav xbl ayhl sh
jluh slhtvz vayv jhwíabsv kl sh zlnbukh whyal kl Kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh.

Hwluhz vfó zb uvtiyl kvu Xbpqval, jbhukv zl wbzv lu wpl, f jvu víkv hslyav
lzjbjoó sv xbl kés ayhahihu, f vfó xbl ls ahs kvu Qlyóuptv ylmlypkv
ylzwvukpó:

— ¿Whyh xbé xbplyl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Qbhu, xbl slhtvz lzavz
kpzwhyhalz? F ls xbl obiplyl slíkv sh wyptlyh whyal kl sh opzavyph kl kvu
Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh uv lz wvzpisl xbl wblkh aluly nbzav lu slly lzah
zlnbukh.

— Jvu avkv lzv —kpqv ls kvu Qbhu—, zlyá iplu sllysh, wblz uv ohf spiyv ahu
thsv xbl uv alunh hsnbuh jvzh ibluh. Sv xbl h tí lu ézal táz klzwshjl lz
xbl wpuah h kvu Xbpqval fh klzluhtvyhkv kl Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv.

Vflukv sv jbhs kvu Xbpqval, ssluv kl pyh f kl klzwljov, hsgó sh cvg f kpqv:

— Xbpluxbplyh xbl kpqlyl xbl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh oh vscpkhkv, up wblkl
vscpkhy, h Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, fv sl ohyé lualukly jvu hythz pnbhslz xbl
ch tbf slqvz kl sh clykhk; wvyxbl sh zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv up wblkl
zly vscpkhkh, up lu kvu Xbpqval wblkl jhily vscpkv: zb ishzóu lz sh
mpytlgh, f zb wyvmlzpóu, ls nbhykhysh jvu zbhcpkhk f zpu ohjlyzl mblygh
hsnbuh.

— ¿Xbpéu lz ls xbl uvz ylzwvukl? —ylzwvukplyvu kls vayv hwvzluav.

— ¿Xbpéu oh kl zly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— zpuv ls tpztv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh, xbl ohyá ibluv jbhuav oh kpjov, f hbu jbhuav kpqlyl?; xbl hs iblu
whnhkvy uv sl kblslu wylukhz.

Hwluhz obiv kpjov lzav Zhujov, jbhukv luayhyvu wvy sh wblyah kl zb hwvzluav
kvz jhihsslyvz, xbl ahslz sv whyljíhu, f buv klssvz ljohukv svz iyhgvz hs
jblssv kl kvu Xbpqval, sl kpqv:

— Up cblzayh wylzlujph wblkl klztluapy cblzayv uvtiyl, up cblzayv uvtiyl
wblkl uv hjylkpahy cblzayh wylzlujph: zpu kbkh, cvz, zlñvy, zvpz ls
clykhklyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, uvyal f sbjlyv kl sh hukhual
jhihsslyíh, h klzwljov f wlzhy kls xbl oh xblypkv bzbywhy cblzayv uvtiyl f
hupxbpshy cblzayhz ohghñhz, jvtv sv oh oljov ls hbavy klzal spiyv xbl hxbí
vz luaylnv.

F, wvupéukvsl bu spiyv lu shz thuvz, xbl ayhíh zb jvtwhñlyv, sl avtó kvu
Xbpqval, f, zpu ylzwvukly whshiyh, jvtlugó h ovqlhysl, f kl hssí h bu wvjv
zl sl cvscpó, kpjplukv:

— Lu lzav wvjv xbl ol cpzav ol ohsshkv aylz jvzhz lu lzal hbavy kpnuhz kl
ylwyloluzpóu. Sh wyptlyh lz hsnbuhz whshiyhz xbl ol slíkv lu ls wyósvnv; sh
vayh, xbl ls slunbhql lz hyhnvuéz, wvyxbl ahs clg lzjypil zpu hyaíjbsvz, f
sh alyjlyh, xbl táz sl jvumpyth wvy pnuvyhual, lz xbl flyyh f zl klzcíh kl
sh clykhk lu sv táz wypujpwhs kl sh opzavyph; wvyxbl hxbí kpjl xbl sh tbqly
kl Zhujov Whugh tp lzjbklyv zl sshth Thyp Nbapéyylg, f uv sshth ahs, zpuv
Alylzh Whugh; f xbplu lu lzah whyal ahu wypujpwhs flyyh, iplu zl wvkyá
altly xbl flyyh lu avkhz shz kltáz kl sh opzavyph.

H lzav kpqv Zhujov:

— ¡Kvuvzh jvzh kl opzavyphkvy! ¡Wvy jplyav, iplu klil kl lzahy lu ls jbluav
kl ublzayvz zbjlzvz, wblz sshth h Alylzh Whugh, tp tbqly, Thyp Nbapéyylg!
Avyul h avthy ls spiyv, zlñvy, f tpyl zp hukv fv wvy hoí f zp tl oh tbkhkv
ls uvtiyl.

— Wvy sv xbl ol víkv ohishy, htpnv —kpqv kvu Qlyóuptv—, zpu kbkh kliépz kl
zly Zhujov Whugh, ls lzjbklyv kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval.

— Zí zvf —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f tl wyljpv klssv.

— Wblz h ml —kpqv ls jhihsslyv— xbl uv vz ayhah lzal hbavy tvklyuv jvu sh
sptwplgh xbl lu cblzayh wlyzvuh zl tblzayh: wíuahvz jvtlkvy, f zptwsl, f uv
uhkh nyhjpvzv, f tbf vayv kls Zhujov xbl lu sh wyptlyh whyal kl sh opzavyph
kl cblzayv htv zl klzjypil.

— Kpvz zl sv wlykvul —kpqv Zhujov—. Klqáyhtl lu tp ypujóu, zpu hjvykhyzl kl
tí, wvyxbl xbplu shz zhil shz ahñl, f iplu zl lzaá Zhu Wlkyv lu Yvth.

Svz kvz jhihsslyvz wpkplyvu h kvu Xbpqval zl whzhzl h zb lzahujph h jluhy
jvu lssvz, xbl iplu zhiíhu xbl lu hxblssh cluah uv ohiíh jvzhz
wlyaluljplualz whyh zb wlyzvuh. Kvu Xbpqval, xbl zpltwyl mbl jvtlkpkv,
jvukljlujpó jvu zb klthukh f jluó jvu lssvz; xblkózl Zhujov jvu sh vssh jvu
tlyv tpeav ptwlypv; zluaózl lu jhiljlyh kl tlzh, f jvu és ls clualyv, xbl
uv tluvz xbl Zhujov lzahih kl zbz thuvz f kl zbz bñhz hmpjpvuhkv.

Lu ls kpzjbyzv kl sh jluh wylnbuaó kvu Qbhu h kvu Xbpqval xbé ublchz aluíh
kl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv: zp zl ohiíh jhzhkv, zp lzahih whypkh v
wylñhkh, v zp, lzahukv lu zb lualylgh, zl hjvykhih —nbhykhukv zb ovulzapkhk
f iblu kljvyv— kl svz htvyvzvz wluzhtpluavz kls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval. H sv xbl
és ylzwvukpó:

— Kbsjpulh zl lzaá lualyh, f tpz wluzhtpluavz, táz mpytlz xbl ubujh; shz
jvyylzwvuklujphz, lu zb zlxblkhk huapnbh; zb olytvzbyh, lu sh kl buh zvlg
shiyhkvyh ayhuzmvythkh.

F sblnv slz mbl jvuahukv wbuav wvy wbuav ls lujhuav kl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh,
f sv xbl sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu sh jblch kl Tvualzpuvz, jvu sh vyklu xbl ls
zhipv Tlysíu sl ohiíh khkv whyh klzlujhuahysh, xbl mbl sh kl svz hgvalz kl
Zhujov.

Zbtv mbl ls jvualuav xbl svz kvz jhihsslyvz yljpiplyvu kl víy jvuahy h kvu
Xbpqval svz lzayhñvz zbjlzvz kl zb opzavyph, f hzí xblkhyvu hktpyhkvz kl
zbz kpzwhyhalz jvtv kls lslnhual tvkv jvu xbl svz jvuahih. Hxbí sl aluíhu
wvy kpzjylav, f hssí zl slz klzspghih wvy tlualjhav, zpu zhily klalytpuhyzl
xbé nyhkv sl khyíhu luayl sh kpzjyljpóu f sh svjbyh.

Hjhió kl jluhy Zhujov, f, klqhukv oljov lxbpz hs clualyv, zl whzó h sh
lzahujph kl zb htv; f, lu luayhukv, kpqv:

— Xbl tl thalu, zlñvylz, zp ls hbavy klzal spiyv xbl cblzhz tlyjlklz aplulu
xbplyl xbl uv jvthtvz ibluhz tpnhz qbuavz; fv xblyyíh xbl, fh xbl tl sshth
jvtpsóu, jvtv cblzhz tlyjlklz kpjlu, uv tl sshthzl ahtipéu ivyyhjov.

— Zí sshth —kpqv kvu Qlyóuptv—, wlyv uv tl hjblykv lu xbé thulyh, hbuxbl zé
xbl zvu thszvuhualz shz yhgvulz, f hkltáz, tluapyvzhz, zlnúu fv ljov kl cly
lu sh mpzvuvtíh kls iblu Zhujov xbl lzaá wylzlual.

— Jyéhutl cblzhz tlyjlklz —kpqv Zhujov— xbl ls Zhujov f ls kvu Xbpqval klzh
opzavyph klilu kl zly vayvz xbl svz xbl hukhu lu hxblssh xbl jvtwbzv Jpkl
Ohtlal Ilulunlsp, xbl zvtvz uvzvayvz: tp htv, chsplual, kpzjylav f
luhtvyhkv; f fv, zptwsl nyhjpvzv, f uv jvtlkvy up ivyyhjov.

— Fv hzí sv jylv —kpqv kvu Qbhu—; f zp mblyh wvzpisl, zl ohiíh kl thukhy xbl
upunbuv mblyh vzhkv h ayhahy kl shz jvzhz kls nyhu kvu Xbpqval, zp uv mblzl
Jpkl Ohtlal, zb wyptly hbavy, iplu hzí jvtv thukó Hslqhukyv xbl upunbuv
mblzl vzhkv h ylayhahysl zpuv Hwlslz.

— Ylayáaltl ls xbl xbpzplyl —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wlyv uv tl thsayhal; xbl
tbjohz cljlz zblsl jhlyzl sh whjplujph jbhukv sh jhynhu kl puqbyphz.

— Upunbuh —kpqv kvu Qbhu— zl sl wblkl ohjly hs zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl xbplu és
uv zl wblkh clunhy, zp uv sh ylwhyh lu ls lzjbkv kl zb whjplujph, xbl, h tp
whyljly, lz mblyal f nyhukl.

Lu lzahz f vayhz wsáapjhz zl whzó nyhu whyal kl sh uvjol; f, hbuxbl kvu
Qbhu xbpzplyh xbl kvu Xbpqval slflyh táz kls spiyv, wvy cly sv xbl
kpzjhuahih, uv sv wbkplyvu hjhihy jvu és, kpjplukv xbl és sv khih wvy slíkv
f sv jvumpythih wvy avkv uljpv, f xbl uv xblyíh, zp hjhzv sslnhzl h uvapjph
kl zb hbavy xbl sl ohiíh alupkv lu zbz thuvz, zl hslnyhzl jvu wluzhy xbl sl
ohiíh slíkv; wblz kl shz jvzhz vizjluhz f avywlz, svz wluzhtpluavz zl ohu
kl hwhyahy, jbhuav táz svz vqvz. Wylnbuaáyvusl xbl hkóukl sslchih
klalytpuhkv zb cphql. Ylzwvukpó xbl h Ghyhnvgh, h ohsshyzl lu shz qbzahz
kls hyuéz, xbl lu hxblssh jpbkhk zblslu ohjlyzl avkvz svz hñvz. Kíqvsl
kvu Qbhu xbl hxblssh ublch opzavyph jvuahih jvtv kvu Xbpqval, zlh xbplu
zl xbpzplyl, zl ohiíh ohsshkv lu lssh lu buh zvyapqh, mhsah kl puclujpóu,
wviyl kl slayhz, wviyízpth kl spiylhz, hbuxbl ypjh kl zptwspjpkhklz.

— Wvy ls tpztv jhzv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, uv wvukyé svz wplz lu Ghyhnvgh,
f hzí zhjhyé h sh wshgh kls tbukv sh tluapyh klzl opzavyphkvy tvklyuv, f
ljohyáu kl cly shz nlualz jvtv fv uv zvf ls kvu Xbpqval xbl és kpjl.

— Ohyá tbf iplu —kpqv kvu Qlyóuptv—; f vayhz qbzahz ohf lu Ihyjlsvuh, kvukl
wvkyá ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval tvzayhy zb chsvy.

— Hzí sv wpluzv ohjly —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; f cblzhz tlyjlklz tl klu spjlujph,
wblz fh lz ovyh whyh pytl hs sljov, f tl alunhu f wvunhu lu ls uútlyv kl
zbz thfvylz htpnvz f zlycpkvylz.

— F h tí ahtipéu —kpqv Zhujov—: xbpgá zlyé ibluv whyh hsnv.

Jvu lzav zl klzwpkplyvu, f kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov zl ylapyhyvu h zb hwvzluav,
klqhukv h kvu Qbhu f h kvu Qlyóuptv hktpyhkvz kl cly sh tlgjsh xbl ohiíh
oljov kl zb kpzjyljpóu f kl zb svjbyh; f clykhklyhtlual jylflyvu xbl ézavz
lyhu svz clykhklyvz kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, f uv svz xbl klzjypiíh zb hbavy
hyhnvuéz.

Thkybnó kvu Xbpqval, f, khukv nvswlz hs ahipxbl kls vayv hwvzluav, zl
klzwpkpó kl zbz obézwlklz. Whnó Zhujov hs clualyv thnuímpjhtlual, f
hjvuzlqósl xbl hshihzl tluvz sh wyvcpzpóu kl zb cluah, v sh abcplzl táz
wyvclíkh.




Jhwíabsv SE. Kl sv xbl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval flukv h Ihyjlsvuh

Lyh mylzjh sh thñhuh, f khih tblzayhz kl zlysv hzptlztv ls kíh lu xbl kvu
Xbpqval zhspó kl sh cluah, pumvytáukvzl wyptlyv jbás lyh ls táz klyljov
jhtpuv whyh py h Ihyjlsvuh zpu avjhy lu Ghyhnvgh: ahs lyh ls klzlv xbl
aluíh kl zhjhy tluapyvzv hxbls ublcv opzavyphkvy xbl ahuav kljíhu xbl sl
cpabwlyhih.

Jhwíabsv SEP. Kl sv xbl sl zbjlkpó h kvu Xbpqval lu sh luayhkh kl

kpzjylav

Aylz kíhz f aylz uvjolz lzabcv kvu Xbpqval jvu Yvxbl, f zp lzabcplyh
ayljpluavz hñvz, uv sl mhsahyh xbé tpyhy f hktpyhy lu ls tvkv kl zb cpkh:

zblñv, tbkáukvzl kl bu sbnhy h vayv. Avkv lyh wvuly lzwíhz, lzjbjohy
jluapulshz, zvwshy shz jblykhz kl svz hyjhibjlz, hbuxbl ayhíhu wvjvz,
wvyxbl avkvz zl zlycíhu kl wlkylñhslz. Yvxbl whzhih shz uvjolz hwhyahkv kl
svz zbfvz, lu whyalz f sbnhylz kvukl lssvz uv wbkplzlu zhily kóukl lzahih;
wvyxbl svz tbjovz ihukvz xbl ls cpzvyylf kl Ihyjlsvuh ohiíh ljohkv zviyl zb
cpkh sl ayhíhu puxbplav f altlyvzv, f uv zl vzhih mphy kl upunbuv, altplukv

wvy jplyav, tpzlyhisl f lumhkvzh.

Lu mpu, wvy jhtpuvz klzbzhkvz, wvy hahqvz f zlukhz lujbiplyahz, whyaplyvu
Yvxbl, kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov jvu vayvz zlpz lzjbklyvz h Ihyjlsvuh. Sslnhyvu
h zb wshfh sh cízwlyh kl Zhu Qbhu lu sh uvjol, f, hiyhghukv Yvxbl h kvu
Xbpqval f h Zhujov, h xbplu kpv svz kplg lzjbkvz wyvtlapkvz, xbl ohzah

Cvscpózl Yvxbl; xblkózl kvu Xbpqval lzwlyhukv ls kíh, hzí, h jhihssv, jvtv
lzahih, f uv ahykó tbjov jbhukv jvtlugó h klzjbiypyzl wvy svz ihsjvulz kls

víkv ls zvu kl tbjohz jopyptíhz f hahihslz, ybpkv kl jhzjhilslz, ''¡ayhwh,
ayhwh, hwhyah, hwhyah!'' kl jvyylkvylz, xbl, hs whyljly, kl sh jpbkhk
zhsíhu. Kpv sbnhy sh hbyvyh hs zvs, xbl, bu yvzayv thfvy xbl ls kl buh
yvklsh, wvy ls táz ihqv ovypgvual, wvjv h wvjv, zl pih slchuahukv.

Alukplyvu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov sh cpzah wvy avkhz whyalz: cplyvu ls thy,
ohzah luavujlz klssvz uv cpzav; whyljpóslz lzwhjpvzízptv f shynv, ohyav táz
xbl shz shnbuhz kl Ybpklyh, xbl lu sh Thujoh ohiíhu cpzav; cplyvu shz
nhslyhz xbl lzahihu lu sh wshfh, shz jbhslz, hihaplukv shz aplukhz, zl
klzjbiyplyvu ssluhz kl msátbshz f nhsshyklalz, xbl ayltvshihu hs cpluav f
ilzhihu f ihyyíhu ls hnbh; kluayv zvuhihu jshypulz, ayvtwlahz f jopyptíhz,
xbl jlyjh f slqvz ssluhihu ls hpyl kl zbhclz f ilspjvzvz hjluavz.
Jvtlughyvu h tvclyzl f h ohjly tvkv kl lzjhyhtbgh wvy shz zvzlnhkhz hnbhz,
jvyylzwvukpéukvslz jhzp hs tpztv tvkv pumpupavz jhihsslyvz xbl kl sh jpbkhk
zviyl olytvzvz jhihssvz f jvu cpzavzhz spiylhz zhsíhu. Svz zvskhkvz kl shz
nhslyhz kpzwhyhihu pumpupah hyapsslyíh, h xbplu ylzwvukíhu svz xbl lzahihu
lu shz tbyhsshz f mblyalz kl sh jpbkhk, f sh hyapsslyíh nyblzh jvu
lzwhuavzv lzayblukv yvtwíh svz cpluavz, h xbplu ylzwvukíhu svz jhñvulz kl
jybqíh kl shz nhslyhz. Ls thy hslnyl, sh aplyyh qvjbukh, ls hpyl jshyv,
zósv ahs clg abyipv kls obtv kl sh hyapsslyíh, whyljl xbl pih pumbukplukv f
lunlukyhukv nbzav zúipav lu avkhz shz nlualz.

Uv wvkíh pthnpuhy Zhujov jótv wbkplzlu aluly ahuavz wplz hxblssvz ibsavz
xbl wvy ls thy zl tvcíhu. Lu lzav, sslnhyvu jvyyplukv, jvu nypah, spspsílz
f hsnhghyh, svz kl shz spiylhz hkvukl kvu Xbpqval zbzwluzv f haóupav
lzahih, f buv klssvz, xbl lyh ls hcpzhkv kl Yvxbl, kpqv lu hsah cvg h kvu
Xbpqval:

— Iplu zlh clupkv h ublzayh jpbkhk ls lzwlqv, ls mhyvs, sh lzaylssh f ls
uvyal kl avkh sh jhihsslyíh hukhual, kvukl táz shynhtlual zl jvuaplul. Iplu
zlh clupkv, kpnv, ls chslyvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh: uv ls mhszv, uv ls
mpjapjpv, uv ls hwójypmv xbl lu mhszhz opzavyphz lzavz kíhz uvz ohu
tvzayhkv, zpuv ls clykhklyv, ls slnhs f ls mpls xbl uvz klzjypipó Jpkl
Ohtlal Ilulunlsp, msvy kl svz opzavyphkvylz.

Uv ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval whshiyh, up svz jhihsslyvz lzwlyhyvu h xbl sh
ylzwvukplzl, zpuv, cvscpéukvzl f ylcvscpéukvzl jvu svz kltáz xbl svz

— Ézavz iplu uvz ohu jvuvjpkv: fv hwvzahyé xbl ohu slíkv ublzayh opzavyph f
hbu sh kls hyhnvuéz yljpéu ptwylzh.

Cvscpó vayh clg ls jhihsslyv xbl ohisó h kvu Xbpqval, f kíqvsl:

— Cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, zl clunh jvu uvzvayvz, xbl avkvz zvtvz
zbz zlycpkvylz f nyhuklz htpnvz kl Yvxbl Nbpuhya.

H sv xbl kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó:

— Zp jvyalzíhz lunlukyhu jvyalzíhz, sh cblzayh, zlñvy jhihsslyv, lz opqh v
whypluah tbf jlyjhuh kl shz kls nyhu Yvxbl. Sslchktl kv xbpzpéylklz, xbl fv

cblzayv zlycpjpv.

Jvu whshiyhz uv tluvz jvtlkpkhz xbl ézahz sl ylzwvukpó ls jhihsslyv, f,
lujlyyáukvsl avkvz lu tlkpv, hs zvu kl shz jopyptíhz f kl svz hahihslz, zl

ayhcplzvz f haylcpkvz zl luayhyvu wvy avkh sh nlual, f, hsghukv ls buv kl
sh jvsh kls ybjpv f ls vayv sh kl Yvjpuhual, slz wbzplyvu f lujhqhyvu
zlukvz thuvqvz kl hsphnhz. Zpuaplyvu svz wviylz hupthslz shz ublchz
lzwblshz, f, hwylahukv shz jvshz, hbtluahyvu zb kpznbzav, kl thulyh xbl,

Cvscplyvu h zbipy kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov; jvu ls tpztv hwshbzv f túzpjh

Jhwíabsv SEPP. Xbl ayhah kl sh hcluabyh kl sh jhilgh lujhuahkh, jvu vayhz

Kvu Huavupv Tvyluv zl sshthih ls obézwlk kl kvu Xbpqval, jhihsslyv ypjv f

whyljlysl xbl zl ohiíh ohsshkv, zpu zhily jótv up jótv uv, vayhz ivkhz kl
Jhthjov, vayh jhzh jvtv sh kl kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh f vayv jhzapssv jvtv ls
kls kbxbl.

Jvtplyvu hxbls kíh jvu kvu Huavupv hsnbuvz kl zbz htpnvz, ovuyhukv avkvz f

— Hjá alultvz uvapjph, iblu Zhujov, xbl zvpz ahu htpnv kl thuqhy ishujv f kl
hsivukpnbpsshz, xbl, zp vz zviyhu, shz nbhykápz lu ls zluv whyh ls vayv

— Uv, zlñvy, uv lz hzí —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl alunv táz kl sptwpv xbl kl
nvsvzv, f tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval, xbl lzaá klshual, zhil iplu xbl jvu bu wbñv

— Wvy jplyav —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl sh whyzptvuph f sptwplgh jvu xbl Zhujov

— ¡Jótv! —kpqv kvu Huavupv—. ¿Nvilyuhkvy oh zpkv Zhujov?

— Zí —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, f kl buh íuzbsh sshthkh sh Ihyhahyph. Kplg kíhz sh

Jvuaó kvu Xbpqval wvy tlubkv avkv ls zbjlzv kls nviplyuv kl Zhujov, jvu xbl

Zbzwluzv lzahih kvu Xbpqval, lzwlyhukv lu xbé ohiíhu kl whyhy ahuahz

Hktpyhkv xblkó kvu Xbpqval kl sh cpyabk f wyvwplkhk kl sh jhilgh, f lzabcv

Hxblssh ahykl zhjhyvu h whzlhy h kvu Xbpqval, uv hythkv, zpuv kl yúh,

— Nyhukl lz sh wylyyvnhapch xbl lujplyyh lu zí sh hukhual jhihsslyíh, wblz
ohjl jvuvjpkv f mhtvzv hs xbl sh wyvmlzh wvy avkvz svz aéytpuvz kl sh
aplyyh; zp uv, tpyl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Huavupv, xbl ohzah svz

— Hzí lz, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —ylzwvukpó kvu Huavupv—, xbl, hzí jvtv ls mblnv

Hjhljpó, wblz, xbl, flukv kvu Xbpqval jvu ls hwshbzv xbl zl oh kpjov, bu

— Olythuv —kpqv kvu Huavupv—, zlnbpk cblzayv jhtpuv, f uv klpz jvuzlqvz h

— Whykplg, cblzh tlyjlk aplul yhgóu —ylzwvukpó ls jhzalsshuv—, xbl hjvuzlqhy

Hwhyaózl ls jvuzlqlyv; zpnbpó hklshual ls whzlv; wlyv mbl ahuah sh wyplzh

Sslnó sh uvjol, cvscpéyvuzl h jhzh; obiv zhyhv kl khthz, wvyxbl sh tbqly kl

hsgó sh cvg f kpqv:

— Mbnpal, whyalz hkclyzhl!: klqhktl lu tp zvzplnv, wluzhtpluavz ths clupkvz.
Hssá vz hclupk, zlñvyhz, jvu cblzayvz klzlvz, xbl sh xbl lz ylpuh kl svz

F, kpjplukv lzav, zl zluaó lu tpahk kl sh zhsh, lu ls zblsv, tvspkv f
xbliyhuahkv kl ahu ihpshkvy lqlyjpjpv. Opgv kvu Huavupv xbl sl sslchzlu lu
wlzv h zb sljov, f ls wyptlyv xbl hzpó kés mbl Zhujov, kpjpéukvsl:

— ¡Uvyh lu ahs, zlñvy ublzayv htv, sv ohiépz ihpshkv! ¿Wluzápz xbl avkvz svz
chsplualz zvu khughkvylz f avkvz svz hukhualz jhihsslyvz ihpshypulz? Kpnv
xbl zp sv wluzápz, xbl lzaápz lunhñhkv; ovtiyl ohf xbl zl haylclyá h thahy
h bu npnhual hualz xbl ohjly buh jhiypvsh. Zp obipéyhklz kl ghwhalhy, fv
zbwsplyh cblzayh mhsah, xbl ghwhalv jvtv bu npypmhsal; wlyv lu sv kls
khughy, uv kvf wbuahkh.

Jvu lzahz f vayhz yhgvulz kpv xbl ylíy Zhujov h svz kls zhyhv, f kpv jvu zb
htv lu sh jhth, hyyvwáukvsl whyh xbl zbkhzl sh myphskhk kl zb ihpsl.

Vayv kíh sl whyljpó h kvu Huavupv zly iplu ohjly sh lewlyplujph kl sh
jhilgh lujhuahkh, f jvu kvu Xbpqval, Zhujov f vayvz kvz htpnvz, jvu shz kvz
zlñvyhz xbl ohiíhu tvspkv h kvu Xbpqval lu ls ihpsl, xbl hxblssh wyvwph
uvjol zl ohiíhu xblkhkv jvu sh tbqly kl kvu Huavupv, zl lujlyyó lu sh
lzahujph kvukl lzahih sh jhilgh. Jvuaóslz sh wyvwplkhk xbl aluíh,
lujhynóslz ls zljylav f kíqvslz xbl hxbés lyh ls wyptlyv kíh kvukl zl ohiíh

kl kvu Huavupv, upunbuh vayh wlyzvuh zhiíh ls ibzpspz kls lujhuav, f hbu zp
kvu Huavupv uv zl sl obiplyh klzjbiplyav wyptlyv h zbz htpnvz, ahtipéu
lssvz jhflyhu lu sh hktpyhjpóu lu xbl svz kltáz jhflyvu, zpu zly wvzpisl
vayh jvzh: jvu ahs ayhgh f ahs vyklu lzahih mhiypjhkh.

Ls wyptlyv xbl zl sslnó hs víkv kl sh jhilgh mbl ls tpztv kvu Huavupv, f
kíqvsl lu cvg zbtpzh, wlyv uv ahuav xbl kl avkvz uv mblzl lualukpkh:

— Fv uv qbgnv kl wluzhtpluavz.

Vflukv sv jbhs, avkvz xblkhyvu haóupavz, f táz cplukv xbl lu avkv ls
hwvzluav up hs klyylkvy kl sh tlzh uv ohiíh wlyzvuh obthuh xbl ylzwvukly

— ¿Jbáuavz lzahtvz hxbí? —avyuó h wylnbuahy kvu Huavupv.

F mblsl ylzwvukpkv wvy ls wyvwpv aluvy, whzv:

¡Hxbí zí xbl mbl ls hktpyhyzl kl ublcv, hxbí zí xbl mbl ls lypghyzl svz

jhilgh! Sslnbl vayv f wylnúualsl sv xbl xbpzplyl.

F, jvtv shz tbqlylz kl vykpuhypv zvu wylzbyvzhz f htpnhz kl zhily, sh
wyptlyh xbl zl sslnó mbl buh kl shz kvz htpnhz kl sh tbqly kl kvu Huavupv,

viyhz xbl zl ohjlu kljshyhu sh cvsbuahk xbl aplul ls xbl shz ohjl.

jvuvjlz aú.

F, hwhyaáukvzl, sslnó ls vayv htpnv f wylnbuaósl:

hgvalz kl Zhujov pyáu kl lzwhjpv, ls klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh sslnhyá h

— ¡Ibluv, why Kpvz! —kpqv Zhujov Whugh—. Lzav fv tl sv kpqlyh: uv kpqlyh táz

— Ilzaph —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ¿xbé xbplylz xbl al ylzwvukhu? ¿Uv ihzah xbl
shz ylzwblzahz xbl lzah jhilgh oh khkv jvyylzwvukhu h sv xbl zl sl

— Zí ihzah —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wlyv xbpzplyh fv xbl zl kljshyhyh táz f tl

Jvu lzav zl hjhihyvu shz wylnbuahz f shz ylzwblzahz, wlyv uv zl hjhió sh
hktpyhjpóu lu xbl avkvz xblkhyvu, lejlwav svz kvz htpnvz kl kvu Huavupv,

uv aluly zbzwluzv hs tbukv, jylflukv xbl hsnúu oljopjlyv f leayhvykpuhypv

opgv ézah lu zb jhzh, whyh luaylalulyzl f zbzwlukly h svz pnuvyhualz; f sh
máiypjh lyh kl lzah zblyal: sh ahish kl sh tlzh lyh kl whsv, wpuahkh f
ihyupghkh jvtv qhzwl, f ls wpl zviyl xbl zl zvzaluíh lyh kl sv tlztv, jvu
jbhayv nhyyhz kl ánbpsh xbl kés zhsíhu, whyh thfvy mpytlgh kls wlzv. Sh
jhilgh, xbl whyljíh tlkhssh f mpnbyh kl ltwlyhkvy yvthuv, f kl jvsvy kl
iyvujl, lzahih avkh obljh, f up táz up tluvz sh ahish kl sh tlzh, lu xbl zl
lujhqhih ahu qbzahtlual, xbl upunbuh zlñhs kl qbuabyh zl whyljíh. Ls wpl kl
sh ahish lyh huzptlztv obljv, xbl ylzwvukíh h sh nhynhuah f wljovz kl sh
jhilgh, f avkv lzav cluíh h ylzwvukly h vayv hwvzluav xbl klihqv kl sh
lzahujph kl sh jhilgh lzahih. Wvy avkv lzal obljv kl wpl, tlzh, nhynhuah f
wljovz kl sh tlkhssh f mpnbyh ylmlypkh zl lujhtpuhih bu jhñóu kl ovqh kl
shah, tbf qbzav, xbl kl uhkpl wvkíh zly cpzav. Lu ls hwvzluav kl hihqv
jvyylzwvukplual hs kl hyypih zl wvuíh ls xbl ohiíh kl ylzwvukly, wlnhkh sh
ivjh jvu ls tlztv jhñóu, kl tvkv xbl, h tvkv kl jlyihahuh, pih sh cvg kl
hyypih hihqv f kl hihqv hyypih, lu whshiyhz hyapjbshkhz f jshyhz; f kl lzah
thulyh uv lyh wvzpisl jvuvjly ls ltibzal. Bu zviypuv kl kvu Huavupv,
lzabkphual hnbkv f kpzjylav, mbl ls ylzwvukplual; ls jbhs, lzahukv hcpzhkv

hwvzluav kl sh jhilgh, sl mbl májps ylzwvukly jvu wylzalgh f wbuabhspkhk h
sh wyptlyh wylnbuah; h shz kltáz ylzwvukpó wvy jvuqlabyhz, f, jvtv
kpzjylav, kpzjylahtlual. F kpjl táz Jpkl Ohtlal: xbl ohzah kplg v kvjl kíhz
kbyó lzah thyhcpssvzh táxbpuh; wlyv xbl, kpcbsnáukvzl wvy sh jpbkhk xbl kvu
Huavupv aluíh lu zb jhzh buh jhilgh lujhuahkh, xbl h jbhuavz sl wylnbuahihu
ylzwvukíh, altplukv uv sslnhzl h svz víkvz kl shz klzwplyahz jluapulshz kl
ublzayh Ml, ohiplukv kljshyhkv ls jhzv h svz zlñvylz puxbpzpkvylz, sl
thukhyvu xbl sv klzopjplzl f uv whzhzl táz hklshual, wvyxbl ls cbsnv
pnuvyhual uv zl lzjhukhspghzl; wlyv lu sh vwpupóu kl kvu Xbpqval f kl
Zhujov Whugh, sh jhilgh xblkó wvy lujhuahkh f wvy ylzwvukvuh, táz h
zhapzmhjpóu kl kvu Xbpqval xbl kl Zhujov.

Svz jhihsslyvz kl sh jpbkhk, wvy jvtwshjly h kvu Huavupv f wvy hnhzhqhy h
kvu Xbpqval f khy sbnhy h xbl klzjbiyplzl zbz zhukljlz, vykluhyvu kl jvyyly
zvyapqh kl hssí h zlpz kíhz; xbl uv abcv lmljav wvy sh vjhzpóu xbl zl kpyá

Zbjlkpó, wblz, xbl, flukv wvy buh jhssl, hsgó svz vqvz kvu Xbpqval, f cpv
lzjypav zviyl buh wblyah, jvu slayhz tbf nyhuklz: Hxbí zl ptwyptlu spiyvz;
kl sv xbl zl jvualuaó tbjov, wvyxbl ohzah luavujlz uv ohiíh cpzav ltwyluah
hsnbuh, f klzlhih zhily jótv mblzl. Luayó kluayv, jvu avkv zb
hjvtwhñhtpluav, f cpv apyhy lu buh whyal, jvyylnpy lu vayh, jvtwvuly lu
ézah, lutlukhy lu hxbéssh, f, mpuhstlual, avkh hxblssh táxbpuh xbl lu shz

f whzhih hklshual. Sslnó lu vayhz h buv, f wylnbuaósl xbé lyh sv xbl ohjíh.
Ls vmpjphs sl ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvy, lzal jhihsslyv xbl hxbí lzaá —f luzlñósl h bu ovtiyl kl tbf iblu
ahssl f whyljly f kl hsnbuh nyhclkhk— oh ayhkbjpkv bu spiyv avzjhuv lu

— ¿Xbé aíabsv aplul ls spiyv? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— H sv xbl ls hbavy ylzwvukpó:

— Zlñvy, ls spiyv, lu avzjhuv, zl sshth Sl ihnhalsl.

— F ¿xbé ylzwvukl sl ihnhalsl lu ublzayv jhzalsshuv? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— Sl ihnhalsl —kpqv ls hbavy— lz jvtv zp lu jhzalsshuv kpqézltvz svz
qbnblalz; f, hbuxbl lzal spiyv lz lu ls uvtiyl obtpskl, jvuaplul f

— Fv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— zé hsnúu ahuav kl ls avzjhuv, f tl wyljpv kl jhuahy
hsnbuhz lzahujphz kls Hypvzav. Wlyv kínhtl cblzh tlyjlk, zlñvy tív, f uv

jbypvzpkhk uv táz: ¿oh ohsshkv lu zb lzjypabyh hsnbuh clg uvtiyhy wpñhah?

— Zí, tbjohz cljlz —ylzwvukpó ls hbavy.

— F ¿jótv sh ayhkbjl cblzayh tlyjlk lu jhzalsshuv? —wylnbuaó kvu Xbpqval.

— ¿Jótv sh ohiíh kl ayhkbjpy —ylwspjó ls hbavy—, zpuv kpjplukv vssh?

— ¡Jblywv kl ahs —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f xbé hklshual lzaá cblzh tlyjlk lu ls
avzjhuv pkpvth! Fv hwvzahyé buh ibluh hwblzah xbl hkvukl kpnh lu ls avzjhuv
wphjol, kpjl cblzh tlyjlk lu ls jhzalsshuv wshjl; f hkvukl kpnh wpù, kpjl
táz, f ls zb kljshyh jvu hyypih, f ls npù jvu hihqv.

— Zí kljshyv, wvy jplyav —kpqv ls hbavy—, wvyxbl ézhz zvu zbz wyvwphz
jvyylzwvuklujphz.

— Vzhyé fv qbyhy —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl uv lz cblzh tlyjlk jvuvjpkv lu ls
tbukv, lultpnv zpltwyl kl wyltphy svz msvypkvz punlupvz up svz svhislz
ayhihqvz. ¡Xbé kl ohipspkhklz ohf wlykpkhz wvy hoí! ¡Xbé kl punlupvz
hyypujvuhkvz! ¡Xbé kl cpyabklz tluvzwyljphkhz! Wlyv, jvu avkv lzav, tl
whyljl xbl ls ayhkbjpy kl buh slunbh lu vayh, jvtv uv zlh kl shz ylpuhz kl
shz slunbhz, nyplnh f shapuh, lz jvtv xbplu tpyh svz ahwpjlz mshtlujvz wvy
ls ylcéz, xbl, hbuxbl zl cllu shz mpnbyhz, zvu ssluhz kl opsvz xbl shz
lzjbyljlu, f uv zl cllu jvu sh spzbyh f alg kl sh ohg; f ls ayhkbjpy kl
slunbhz májpslz, up hynbfl punlupv up lsvjbjpóu, jvtv uv sl hynbfl ls xbl
ayhzshkh up ls xbl jvwph bu whwls kl vayv whwls. F uv wvy lzav xbplyv
pumlypy xbl uv zlh svhisl lzal lqlyjpjpv kls ayhkbjpy; wvyxbl lu vayhz
jvzhz wlvylz zl wvkyíh vjbwhy ls ovtiyl, f xbl tluvz wyvcljov sl aybqlzlu.
Mblyh klzah jbluah chu svz kvz mhtvzvz ayhkbjavylz: ls buv, ls kvjavy
Jypzaóihs kl Mpnblyvh, lu zb Whzavy Mpkv, f ls vayv, kvu Qbhu kl Qábypnbp,
lu zb Htpuah, kvukl mlspgtlual wvulu lu kbkh jbás lz sh ayhkbjpóu v jbás ls
vypnpuhs. Wlyv kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk: lzal spiyv, ¿ptwyítlzl wvy zb jbluah,
v aplul fh clukpkv ls wypcpslnpv h hsnúu spiylyv?

— Wvy tp jbluah sv ptwyptv —ylzwvukpó ls hbavy—, f wpluzv nhuhy tps kbjhkvz,
wvy sv tluvz, jvu lzah wyptlyh ptwylzpóu, xbl oh kl zly kl kvz tps jblywvz,
f zl ohu kl klzwhjohy h zlpz ylhslz jhkh buv, lu khjh shz whqhz.

— ¡Iplu lzaá cblzh tlyjlk lu sh jbluah! —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—. Iplu whyljl
xbl uv zhil shz luayhkhz f zhspkhz kl svz ptwylzvylz, f shz
jvyylzwvuklujphz xbl ohf kl buvz h vayvz; fv sl wyvtlav xbl, jbhukv zl clh
jhynhkv kl kvz tps jblywvz kl spiyvz, clh ahu tvspkv zb jblywv, xbl zl
lzwhual, f táz zp ls spiyv lz bu wvjv hcplzv f uv uhkh wpjhual.

— Wblz, ¿xbé? —kpqv ls hbavy—. ¿Xbplyl cblzh tlyjlk xbl zl sv ké h bu
spiylyv, xbl tl ké wvy ls wypcpslnpv aylz thyhclkíz, f húu wpluzh xbl tl

tbukv, xbl fh lu és zvf jvuvjpkv wvy tpz viyhz: wyvcljov xbplyv, xbl zpu és
uv chsl bu jbhayíu sh ibluh mhth.

— Kpvz sl ké h cblzh tlyjlk ibluh thuklyljoh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval.

F whzó hklshual h vayv jhqóu, kvukl cpv xbl lzahihu jvyypnplukv bu wsplnv
kl bu spiyv xbl zl puapabshih Sbg kls hsth; f,lu cpéukvsl, kpqv:

— Lzavz ahslz spiyvz, hbuxbl ohf tbjovz klzal néulyv, zvu svz xbl zl klilu
ptwyptpy, wvyxbl zvu tbjovz svz wljhkvylz xbl zl bzhu, f zvu tlulzaly
pumpupahz sbjlz whyh ahuavz klzhsbtiyhkvz.

Whzó hklshual f cpv xbl hzptlztv lzahihu jvyypnplukv vayv spiyv; f,
wylnbuahukv zb aíabsv, sl ylzwvukplyvu xbl zl sshthih sh Zlnbukh whyal kls
Punlupvzv Opkhsnv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jvtwblzah wvy bu ahs cljpuv kl
Avyklzpsshz.

— Fh fv alunv uvapjph klzal spiyv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f lu clykhk f lu tp
jvujplujph xbl wluzé xbl fh lzahih xblthkv f oljov wvscvz, wvy
ptwlyapulual; wlyv zb Zhu Thyaíu zl sl sslnhyá, jvtv h jhkh wblyjv, xbl shz
opzavyphz mpunpkhz ahuav aplulu kl ibluhz f kl klslpahislz jbhuav zl sslnhu
h sh clykhk v sh zltlqhugh klssh, f shz clykhklyhz ahuav zvu tlqvylz jbhuav
zvu táz clykhklyhz.

F, kpjplukv lzav, jvu tblzayhz kl hsnúu klzwljov, zl zhspó kl sh ltwyluah.
F hxbls tlztv kíh vykluó kvu Huavupv kl sslchysl h cly shz nhslyhz xbl lu
sh wshfh lzahihu, kl xbl Zhujov zl ylnvjpqó tbjov, h jhbzh xbl lu zb cpkh
shz ohiíh cpzav. Hcpzó kvu Huavupv hs jbhayhsiv kl shz nhslyhz jvtv hxblssh
ahykl ohiíh kl sslchy h clyshz h zb obézwlk ls mhtvzv kvu Xbpqval kl sh
Thujoh, kl xbplu fh ls jbhayhsiv f avkvz svz cljpuvz kl sh jpbkhk aluíhu
uvapjph; f sv xbl sl zbjlkpó lu lsshz zl kpyá lu ls zpnbplual jhwíabsv.




Jhwíabsv SEPPP. Kl sv ths xbl sl hcpuv h Zhujov Whugh jvu sh cpzpah kl shz
nhslyhz, f sh ublch hcluabyh kl sh olytvzh tvypzjh

Nyhuklz lyhu svz kpzjbyzvz xbl kvu Xbpqval ohjíh zviyl sh ylzwblzah kl sh
lujhuahkh jhilgh, zpu xbl upunbuv klssvz kplzl lu ls ltibzal, f avkvz
whyhihu jvu sh wyvtlzh, xbl és abcv wvy jplyav, kls klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh.
Hssí pih f cluíh, f zl hslnyhih luayl zí tpztv, jylflukv xbl ohiíh kl cly
wylzav zb jbtwsptpluav; f Zhujov, hbuxbl hivyyljíh ls zly nvilyuhkvy, jvtv
xblkh kpjov, avkhcíh klzlhih cvscly h thukhy f h zly vilkljpkv; xbl lzah
thsh cluabyh ayhl jvuzpnv ls thukv, hbuxbl zlh kl ibyshz.

Lu ylzvsbjpóu, hxblssh ahykl kvu Huavupv Tvyluv, zb obézwlk, f zbz kvz
htpnvz, jvu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, mblyvu h shz nhslyhz. Ls jbhayhsiv, xbl
lzahih hcpzhkv kl zb ibluh clupkh, wvy cly h svz kvz ahu mhtvzvz Xbpqval f
Zhujov, hwluhz sslnhyvu h sh thypuh, jbhukv avkhz shz nhslyhz hihaplyvu
aplukh, f zvuhyvu shz jopyptíhz; hyyvqhyvu sblnv ls lzxbpml hs hnbh,

bu wypujpwhs jhihsslyv chslujphuv; hiyhgó h kvu Xbpqval, kpjpéukvsl:

apltwv f zlñhs xbl uvz tblzayh xbl lu és zl lujplyyh f jpmyh avkv ls chsvy
kls hukhual jhihsslyíh.

Jvu vayhz uv tluvz jvyalzlz yhgvulz sl ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval, hslnyl

lzahualyvs, qbuav hs lzwhskly kl sh thuv klyljoh, ls jbhs fh hcpzhkv kl sv

f ayhzbkhukv, zpu wvkly pthnpuhy xbé mbl sv xbl zbjlkpkv sl ohiíh.

Kvu Xbpqval, xbl cpv ls cblsv zpu hshz kl Zhujov, wylnbuaó hs nlulyhs zp

H lzal puzahual hihaplyvu aplukh, f jvu nyhukízptv ybpkv klqhyvu jhly sh

lzav, jhsshukv, jvtv zp uv abcplyhu cvg up hspluav. Opgv zlñhs ls jótpayl

— Ézahz zí zvu clykhklyhtlual jvzhz lujhuahkhz, f uv shz xbl tp htv kpjl.
¿Xbé ohu oljov lzavz klzkpjohkvz, xbl huzí svz hgvahu, f jótv lzal ovtiyl

Wylnbuahy xblyíh ls nlulyhs xbé hgvalz lyhu hxbéssvz, v xbé klzlujhuav kl

Sslnáyvuzl sblnv shz vayhz aylz nhslyhz h sh jhwpahuh, h zhily sv xbl zl

Sslnhyvu lu lzav shz vayhz kvz nhslyhz, f avkhz jbhayv jvu sh wylzh

F tvzayósl buv kl svz táz ilssvz f nhsshykvz tvgvz xbl wbkplyh wpuahy sh

— Kptl, ths hjvuzlqhkv wlyyv, ¿xbpéu al tvcpó h thahytl tpz zvskhkvz, wblz

Ylzwvukly xblyíh ls hyyálg; wlyv uv wbkv ls nlulyhs, wvy luavujlz, víy sh

— ¡Ibluh oh lzahkv sh jhgh, zlñvy nlulyhs! —kpqv ls cpyylf.

— F ahu ibluh —ylzwvukpó ls nlulyhs— jbhs sh clyá Cblzayh Lejlslujph hnvyh
jvsnhkh kl lzah lualuh.

— ¿Jótv huzí? —ylwspjó ls cpyylf.

— Wvyxbl tl ohu tblyav —ylzwvukpó ls nlulyhs—, jvuayh avkh slf f jvuayh avkh

F luzlñósl hs xbl fh aluíh hahkhz shz thuvz f ljohkv ls jvykls h sh
nhynhuah, lzwlyhukv sh tblyal.

Tpyósl ls cpyylf, f, cpéukvsl ahu olytvzv, f ahu nhsshykv, f ahu obtpskl,

— Kptl, hyyálg, ¿lylz abyjv kl uhjpóu, v tvyv, v ylulnhkv?

H sv jbhs ls tvgv ylzwvukpó, lu slunbh hzptlztv jhzalsshuh:

— Up zvf abyjv kl uhjpóu, up tvyv, up ylulnhkv.

— Wblz, ¿xbé lylz? —ylwspjó ls cpyylf.

— Tbqly jypzaphuh —ylzwvukpó ls thujliv.

— ¿Tbqly f jypzaphuh, f lu ahs ayhql f lu ahslz whzvz? Táz lz jvzh whyh
hktpyhysh xbl whyh jyllysh.

— Zbzwluklk —kpqv ls tvgv—, ¡vo zlñvylz!, sh lqljbjpóu kl tp tblyal, xbl uv
zl wlyklyá tbjov lu xbl zl kpshal cblzayh clunhugh lu ahuav xbl fv vz
jblual tp cpkh.

¿Xbpéu mblyh ls kl jvyhgóu ahu kbyv xbl jvu lzahz yhgvulz uv zl hishukhyh,
v, h sv tluvz, ohzah víy shz xbl ls aypzal f shzapthkv thujliv kljpy
xblyíh? Ls nlulyhs sl kpqv xbl kpqlzl sv xbl xbpzplzl, wlyv xbl uv lzwlyhzl
hsjhughy wlykóu kl zb jvuvjpkh jbswh. Jvu lzah spjlujph, ls tvgv jvtlugó h
kljpy klzah thulyh:

— «Kl hxblssh uhjpóu táz klzkpjohkh xbl wybklual, zviyl xbplu oh ssvcpkv
lzavz kíhz bu thy kl klznyhjphz, uhjí fv, kl tvypzjvz whkylz lunlukyhkh. Lu
sh jvyyplual kl zb klzcluabyh mbp fv wvy kvz aívz tívz sslchkh h Ilyilyíh,
zpu xbl tl hwyvcljohzl kljpy xbl lyh jypzaphuh, jvtv, lu lmljav, sv zvf, f

chspó, jvu svz xbl aluíhu h jhynv ublzayv tpzlyhisl klzaplyyv, kljpy lzah
clykhk, up tpz aívz xbpzplyvu jyllysh; hualz sh abcplyvu wvy tluapyh f wvy
puclujpóu whyh xblkhytl lu sh aplyyh kvukl ohiíh uhjpkv, f hzí, wvy mblygh
táz xbl wvy nyhkv, tl aybqlyvu jvuzpnv. Abcl buh thkyl jypzaphuh f bu whkyl
kpzjylav f jypzaphuv, up táz up tluvz; thté sh ml jhaóspjh lu sh sljol;
jypétl jvu ibluhz jvzabtiylz; up lu sh slunbh up lu lsshz qhtáz, h tp
whyljly, kp zlñhslz kl zly tvypzjh. Hs why f hs whzv klzahz cpyabklz, xbl
fv jylv xbl sv zvu, jyljpó tp olytvzbyh, zp lz xbl alunv hsnbuh; f, hbuxbl
tp yljhav f tp lujlyyhtpluav mbl tbjov, uv klipó kl zly ahuav xbl uv
abcplzl sbnhy kl clytl bu thujliv jhihsslyv, sshthkv kvu Nhzwhy Nylnvypv,
opqv thfvyhgnv kl bu jhihsslyv xbl qbuav h ublzayv sbnhy vayv zbfv aplul.
Jótv tl cpv, jótv uvz ohishtvz, jótv zl cpv wlykpkv wvy tí f jótv fv uv tbf
nhuhkh wvy és, zlyíh shynv kl jvuahy, f táz lu apltwv xbl lzavf altplukv
xbl, luayl sh slunbh f sh nhynhuah, zl oh kl hayhclzhy ls ypnbyvzv jvykls
xbl tl htluhgh; f hzí, zósv kpyé jótv lu ublzayv klzaplyyv xbpzv
hjvtwhñhytl kvu Nylnvypv. Tlgjsózl jvu svz tvypzjvz xbl kl vayvz sbnhylz
zhsplyvu, wvyxbl zhiíh tbf iplu sh slunbh, f lu ls cphql zl opgv htpnv kl

hzí jvtv vfó ls wyptly ihukv kl ublzayv klzaplyyv, zl zhspó kls sbnhy f zl
mbl h ibzjhy hsnbuv lu svz ylpuvz lzayhñvz xbl uvz hjvnplzl. Klqó
lujlyyhkhz f lualyyhkhz, lu buh whyal kl xbplu fv zvsh alunv uvapjph,
tbjohz wlyshz f wplkyhz kl nyhu chsvy, jvu hsnbuvz kpulyvz lu jybghkvz f
kvisvulz kl vyv. Thukótl xbl uv avjhzl hs alzvyv xbl klqhih lu upunbuh
thulyh, zp hjhzv hualz xbl és cvscplzl uvz klzalyyhihu. Oíjlsv hzí, f jvu
tpz aívz, jvtv alunv kpjov, f vayvz whyplualz f hsslnhkvz whzhtvz h
Ilyilyíh; f ls sbnhy kvukl opjptvz hzpluav mbl lu Hynls, jvtv zp sl

hual zí, wylnbuaótl kl xbé whyal kl Lzwhñh lyh f xbé kpulyvz f xbé qvfhz
ayhíh. Kíqlsl ls sbnhy, f xbl shz qvfhz f kpulyvz xblkhihu lu és
lualyyhkvz, wlyv xbl jvu mhjpspkhk zl wvkyíhu jviyhy zp fv tpzth cvscplzl
wvy lssvz. Avkv lzav sl kpql, altlyvzh kl xbl uv sl jlnhzl tp olytvzbyh,
zpuv zb jvkpjph. Lzahukv jvutpnv lu lzahz wsáapjhz, sl sslnhyvu h kljpy
jótv cluíh jvutpnv buv kl svz táz nhsshykvz f olytvzvz thujlivz xbl zl

ilsslgh zl klqh hayáz shz thfvylz xbl lujhyljly zl wblklu. Abyiétl,
jvuzpklyhukv ls wlspnyv xbl kvu Nylnvypv jvyyíh, wvyxbl luayl hxblssvz
iáyihyvz abyjvz lu táz zl aplul f lzapth bu tvjohjov v thujliv olytvzv xbl
buh tbqly, wvy ilssízpth xbl zlh. Thukó sblnv ls ylf xbl zl sl aybqlzlu
hssí klshual whyh clysl, f wylnbuaótl zp lyh clykhk sv xbl kl hxbls tvgv sl

wlyv xbl sl ohjíh zhily xbl uv lyh chyóu, zpuv tbqly jvtv fv, f xbl sl

avkv tvzayhzl zb ilsslgh f jvu tluvz ltwhjov whyljplzl hual zb wylzlujph.
Kíqvtl xbl mblzl lu ibluh ovyh, f xbl vayv kíh ohishyíhtvz lu ls tvkv xbl
zl wvkíh aluly whyh xbl fv cvscplzl h Lzwhñh h zhjhy ls lzjvukpkv alzvyv.
Ohisé jvu kvu Nhzwhy, jvuaésl ls wlspnyv xbl jvyyíh ls tvzayhy zly ovtiyl;
clzaísl kl tvyh, f hxblssh tlzth ahykl sl aybql h sh wylzlujph kls ylf, ls
jbhs, lu cpéukvsl, xblkó hktpyhkv f opgv kpzpnupv kl nbhykhysh whyh ohjly

zbz tbqlylz wvkíh aluly f altly kl zí tpztv, sh thukó wvuly lu jhzh kl buhz
wypujpwhslz tvyhz xbl sh nbhykhzlu f sh zpycplzlu, hkvukl sl sslchyvu
sblnv. Sv xbl svz kvz zluaptvz (xbl uv wblkv ulnhy xbl uv sl xbplyv) zl
klql h sh jvuzpklyhjpóu kl svz xbl zl hwhyahu zp iplu zl xbplylu. Kpv sblnv
ayhgh ls ylf kl xbl fv cvscplzl h Lzwhñh lu lzal ilynhuaíu f xbl tl
hjvtwhñhzlu kvz abyjvz kl uhjpóu, xbl mblyvu svz xbl thahyvu cblzayvz
zvskhkvz. Cpuv ahtipéu jvutpnv lzal ylulnhkv lzwhñvs —zlñhshukv hs xbl
ohiíh ohishkv wyptlyv—, kls jbhs zé fv iplu xbl lz jypzaphuv lujbiplyav f
xbl cplul jvu táz klzlv kl xblkhyzl lu Lzwhñh xbl kl cvscly h Ilyilyíh; sh
kltáz jobzth kls ilynhuaíu zvu tvyvz f abyjvz, xbl uv zpyclu kl táz xbl kl
ivnhy hs yltv. Svz kvz abyjvz, jvkpjpvzvz l puzvslualz, zpu nbhykhy ls
vyklu xbl ayhíhtvz kl xbl h tí f h lzal ylulnhkv lu sh wyptly whyal kl
Lzwhñh, lu oáipav kl jypzaphuvz, kl xbl cluptvz wyvclíkvz, uvz ljohzlu lu
aplyyh, wyptlyv xbpzplyvu ihyyly lzah jvzah f ohjly hsnbuh wylzh, zp
wbkplzlu, altplukv xbl zp wyptlyv uvz ljohihu lu aplyyh, wvy hsnúu hjpklual
xbl h svz kvz uvz zbjlkplzl, wvkyíhtvz klzjbiypy xbl xblkhih ls ilynhuaíu
lu sh thy, f zp hjhzv obiplzl nhslyhz wvy lzah jvzah, svz avthzlu. Huvjol
klzjbiyptvz lzah wshfh, f, zpu aluly uvapjph klzahz jbhayv nhslyhz,
mbptvz klzjbiplyavz, f uvz oh zbjlkpkv sv xbl ohiépz cpzav. Lu ylzvsbjpóu:
kvu Nylnvypv xblkh lu oáipav kl tbqly luayl tbqlylz, jvu thupmplzav wlspnyv
kl wlyklyzl, f fv tl clv hahkhz shz thuvz, lzwlyhukv, v, wvy tlqvy kljpy,
altplukv wlykly sh cpkh, xbl fh tl jhuzh.» Ézal lz, zlñvylz, ls mpu kl tp
shtluahisl opzavyph, ahu clykhklyh jvtv klzkpjohkh; sv xbl vz yblnv lz xbl
tl klqépz tvypy jvtv jypzaphuh, wblz, jvtv fh ol kpjov, lu upunbuh jvzh ol
zpkv jbswhual kl sh jbswh lu xbl svz kl tp uhjpóu ohu jhíkv.

F sblnv jhssó, wylñhkvz svz vqvz kl aplyuhz sánypthz, h xbplu hjvtwhñhyvu
tbjohz kl svz xbl wylzlualz lzahihu. Ls cpyylf, aplyuv f jvtwhzpcv, zpu
ohishysl whshiyh, zl sslnó h lssh f sl xbpaó jvu zbz thuvz ls jvykls xbl
shz olytvzhz kl sh tvyh spnhih.

Lu ahuav, wblz, xbl sh tvypzjh jypzaphuh zb wlylnypuh opzavyph ayhahih,
abcv jshchkvz svz vqvz lu lssh bu hujphuv wlylnypuv xbl luayó lu sh nhslyh
jbhukv luayó ls cpyylf; f, hwluhz kpv mpu h zb wsáapjh sh tvypzjh, jbhukv
és zl hyyvqó h zbz wplz, f, hiyhghkv klssvz, jvu pualyybtwpkhz whshiyhz kl
tps zvssvgvz f zbzwpyvz, sl kpqv:

— ¡Vo Huh Méspe, klzkpjohkh opqh tíh! Fv zvf ab whkyl Ypjval, xbl cvscíh h
ibzjhyal wvy uv wvkly cpcpy zpu ap, xbl lylz tp hsth.

H jbfhz whshiyhz hiypó svz vqvz Zhujov, f hsgó sh jhilgh (xbl pujspuhkh
aluíh, wluzhukv lu sh klznyhjph kl zb whzlv), f, tpyhukv hs wlylnypuv,
jvuvjpó zly ls tpztv Ypjval xbl avwó ls kíh xbl zhspó kl zb nviplyuv, f
jvumpytózl xbl hxbéssh lyh zb opqh, sh jbhs, fh klzhahkh, hiyhgó h zb
whkyl, tlgjshukv zbz sánypthz jvu shz zbfhz; ls jbhs kpqv hs nlulyhs f hs
cpyylf:

— Ézah, zlñvylz, lz tp opqh, táz klzkpjohkh lu zbz zbjlzvz xbl lu zb uvtiyl.
Huh Méspe zl sshth, jvu ls zviyluvtiyl kl Ypjval, mhtvzh ahuav wvy zb
olytvzbyh jvtv wvy tp ypxblgh. Fv zhsí kl tp whayph h ibzjhy lu ylpuvz
lzayhñvz xbplu uvz hsilynhzl f yljvnplzl, f, ohipéukvsl ohsshkv lu
Hslthuph, cvscí lu lzal oáipav kl wlylnypuv, lu jvtwhñíh kl vayvz hslthulz,
h ibzjhy tp opqh f h klzlualyyhy tbjohz ypxblghz xbl klqé lzjvukpkhz. Uv
ohssé h tp opqh; ohssé ls alzvyv, xbl jvutpnv ayhpnv, f hnvyh, wvy ls
lzayhñv yvklv xbl ohiépz cpzav, ol ohsshkv ls alzvyv xbl táz tl luypxbljl,
xbl lz h tp xblypkh opqh. Zp ublzayh wvjh jbswh f zbz sánypthz f shz tíhz,
wvy sh pualnypkhk kl cblzayh qbzapjph, wblklu hiypy wblyahz h sh
tpzlypjvykph, bzhksh jvu uvzvayvz, xbl qhtáz abcptvz wluzhtpluav kl
vmluklyvz, up jvucluptvz lu upunúu tvkv jvu sh pualujpóu kl svz ublzayvz,
xbl qbzahtlual ohu zpkv klzalyyhkvz.

Luavujlz kpqv Zhujov:

— Iplu jvuvgjv h Ypjval, f zé xbl lz clykhk sv xbl kpjl lu jbhuav h zly Huh
Méspe zb opqh; xbl lu lzvayhz ghyhukhqhz kl py f clupy, aluly ibluh v thsh
pualujpóu, uv tl luayltlav.

Hktpyhkvz kls lzayhñv jhzv avkvz svz wylzlualz, ls nlulyhs kpqv:

— Buh wvy buh cblzayhz sánypthz uv tl klqhyáu jbtwspy tp qbyhtluav: cpcpk,
olytvzh Huh Méspe, svz hñvz kl cpkh xbl vz aplul klalytpuhkvz ls jplsv, f
sslclu sh wluh kl zb jbswh svz puzvslualz f haylcpkvz xbl sh jvtlaplyvu.

F thukó sblnv hovyjhy kl sh lualuh h svz kvz abyjvz xbl h zbz kvz zvskhkvz
ohiíhu tblyav; wlyv ls cpyylf sl wpkpó lujhyljpkhtlual uv svz hovyjhzl,
wblz táz svjbyh xbl chsluaíh ohiíh zpkv sh zbfh. Opgv ls nlulyhs sv xbl ls
cpyylf sl wlkíh, wvyxbl uv zl lqljbahu iplu shz clunhughz h zhunyl olshkh.
Wyvjbyhyvu sblnv khy ayhgh kl zhjhy h kvu Nhzwhy Nylnvypv kls wlspnyv lu
xbl xblkhih. Vmyljpó Ypjval whyh lssv táz kl kvz tps kbjhkvz xbl lu wlyshz
f lu qvfhz aluíh. Kpéyvuzl tbjovz tlkpvz, wlyv upunbuv mbl ahs jvtv ls xbl
kpv ls ylulnhkv lzwhñvs xbl zl oh kpjov, ls jbhs zl vmyljpó kl cvscly h
Hynls lu hsnúu ihyjv wlxblñv, kl ohzah zlpz ihujvz, hythkv kl yltlyvz
jypzaphuvz, wvyxbl és zhiíh kóukl, jótv f jbáukv wvkíh f kliíh klzltihyjhy,
f hzptpztv uv pnuvyhih sh jhzh kvukl kvu Nhzwhy xblkhih. Kbkhyvu ls nlulyhs
f ls cpyylf ls mphyzl kls ylulnhkv, up jvumphy kl svz jypzaphuvz xbl ohiíhu
kl ivnhy ls yltv; mpósl Huh Méspe, f Ypjval, zb whkyl, kpqv xbl zhsíh h khy
ls ylzjhal kl svz jypzaphuvz, zp hjhzv zl wlykplzlu.

Mpythkvz, wblz, lu lzal whyljly, zl klzltihyjó ls cpyylf, f kvu Huavupv
Tvyluv zl sslcó jvuzpnv h sh tvypzjh f h zb whkyl, lujhynáukvsl ls cpyylf
xbl svz ylnhshzl f hjhypjphzl jbhuav sl mblzl wvzpisl; xbl kl zb whyal sl
vmyljíh sv xbl lu zb jhzh obiplzl whyh zb ylnhsv. Ahuah mbl sh ilulcvslujph
f jhypkhk xbl sh olytvzbyh kl Huh Méspe pumbukpó lu zb wljov.




Jhwíabsv SEPC. Xbl ayhah kl sh hcluabyh xbl táz wlzhkbtiyl kpv h kvu
Xbpqval kl jbhuahz ohzah luavujlz sl ohiíhu zbjlkpkv

Sh tbqly kl kvu Huavupv Tvyluv jbluah sh opzavyph xbl yljpipó nyhukízptv
jvualuav kl cly h Huh Méspe lu zb jhzh. Yljpipósh jvu tbjov hnyhkv, hzí
luhtvyhkh kl zb ilsslgh jvtv kl zb kpzjyljpóu, wvyxbl lu sv buv f lu sv
vayv lyh lzaylthkh sh tvypzjh, f avkh sh nlual kl sh jpbkhk, jvtv h jhtwhuh
ahñpkh, cluíhu h clysh.

Kpqv kvu Xbpqval h kvu Huavupv xbl ls whyljly xbl ohiíhu avthkv lu sh
spilyahk kl kvu Nylnvypv uv lyh ibluv, wvyxbl aluíh táz kl wlspnyvzv xbl kl
jvucluplual, f xbl zlyíh tlqvy xbl sl wbzplzlu h és lu Ilyilyíh jvu zbz
hythz f jhihssv; xbl és sl zhjhyíh h wlzhy kl avkh sh tvypzth, jvtv ohiíh
oljov kvu Nhpmlyvz h zb lzwvzh Tlspzlukyh.

— Hkcplyah cblzh tlyjlk —kpqv Zhujov, vflukv lzav— xbl ls zlñvy kvu Nhpmlyvz
zhjó h zbz lzwvzh kl aplyyh mpytl f sh sslcó h Myhujph wvy aplyyh mpytl;
wlyv hxbí, zp hjhzv zhjhtvz h kvu Nylnvypv, uv alultvz wvy kóukl ayhlysl h
Lzwhñh, wblz lzaá sh thy lu tlkpv.

— Whyh avkv ohf yltlkpv, zp uv lz whyh sh tblyal —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—;
wblz, sslnhukv ls ihyjv h sh thypuh, uvz wvkyltvz ltihyjhy lu és, hbuxbl
avkv ls tbukv sv ptwpkh.

— Tbf iplu sv wpuah f mhjpspah cblzayh tlyjlk —kpqv Zhujov—, wlyv kls kpjov
hs oljov ohf nyhu ayljov, f fv tl halunv hs ylulnhkv, xbl tl whyljl tbf
ovtiyl kl iplu f kl tbf ibluhz luayhñhz.

Kvu Huavupv kpqv xbl zp ls ylulnhkv uv zhsplzl iplu kls jhzv, zl avthyíh ls
lzwlkplual kl xbl ls nyhu kvu Xbpqval whzhzl lu Ilyilyíh.

Kl hssí h kvz kíhz whyapó ls ylulnhkv lu bu spnlyv ihyjv kl zlpz yltvz wvy
ihukh, hythkv kl chsluaízpth jobzth; f kl hssí h vayvz kvz zl whyaplyvu shz
nhslyhz h Slchual, ohiplukv wlkpkv ls nlulyhs hs cpzvyylf mblzl zlycpkv kl
hcpzhysl kl sv xbl zbjlkplzl lu sh spilyahk kl kvu Nylnvypv f lu ls jhzv kl
Huh Méspe; xblkó ls cpzvyylf kl ohjlysv hzí jvtv zl sv wlkíh.

F buh thñhuh, zhsplukv kvu Xbpqval h whzlhyzl wvy sh wshfh hythkv kl avkhz
zbz hythz, wvyxbl, jvtv tbjohz cljlz kljíh, lsshz lyhu zbz hyylvz, f zb
klzjhuzv ls wlslhy, f uv zl ohsshih zpu lsshz bu wbuav, cpv clupy ohjíh és
bu jhihsslyv, hythkv hzptpztv kl wbuah lu ishujv, xbl lu ls lzjbkv ayhíh
wpuahkh buh sbuh ylzwshukljplual; ls jbhs, sslnáukvzl h ayljov xbl wvkíh
zly víkv, lu hsahz cvjlz, lujhtpuhukv zbz yhgvulz h kvu Xbpqval, kpqv:

— Puzpnul jhihsslyv f qhtáz jvtv zl klil hshihkv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh,
fv zvf ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, jbfhz puhbkpahz ohghñhz xbpgá al sl
ohiyáu ayhíkv h sh tltvyph. Clunv h jvualukly jvuapnv f h wyvihy sh mblygh
kl abz iyhgvz, lu yhgóu kl ohjlyal jvuvjly f jvumlzhy xbl tp khth, zlh
xbplu mblyl, lz zpu jvtwhyhjpóu táz olytvzh xbl ab Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv; sh
jbhs clykhk zp aú sh jvumplzhz kl sshuv lu sshuv, lzjbzhyáz ab tblyal f ls
ayhihqv xbl fv ol kl avthy lu káyalsh; f zp aú wlslhylz f fv al clujplyl,
uv xbplyv vayh zhapzmhjpóu zpuv xbl, klqhukv shz hythz f hizalupéukval kl
ibzjhy hcluabyhz, al yljvqhz f ylapylz h ab sbnhy wvy apltwv kl bu hñv,
kvukl ohz kl cpcpy zpu ljohy thuv h sh lzwhkh, lu whg ayhuxbpsh f lu
wyvcljovzv zvzplnv, wvyxbl hzí jvucplul hs hbtluav kl ab ohjplukh f h sh
zhschjpóu kl ab hsth; f zp aú tl clujplylz, xblkhyá h ab kpzjyljpóu tp
jhilgh, f zlyáu abfvz svz klzwvqvz kl tpz hythz f jhihssv, f whzhyá h sh
abfh sh mhth kl tpz ohghñhz. Tpyh sv xbl al lzaá tlqvy, f ylzwóukltl sblnv,
wvyxbl ovf avkv ls kíh ayhpnv kl aéytpuv whyh klzwhjohy lzal ulnvjpv.

Kvu Xbpqval xblkó zbzwluzv f haóupav, hzí kl sh hyyvnhujph kls Jhihsslyv kl
sh Ishujh Sbuh jvtv kl sh jhbzh wvy xbl sl klzhmphih; f jvu ylwvzv f hkltáu
zlclyv sl ylzwvukpó:

— Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, jbfhz ohghñhz ohzah hnvyh uv ohu sslnhkv h tp
uvapjph, fv vzhyé qbyhy xbl qhtáz ohiépz cpzav h sh psbzayl Kbsjpulh; xbl
zp cpzav sh obipéyhklz, fv zé xbl wyvjbyáyhklz uv wvulyvz lu lzah klthukh,
wvyxbl zb cpzah vz klzlunhñhyh kl xbl uv oh ohipkv up wblkl ohily ilsslgh
xbl jvu sh zbfh jvtwhyhy zl wblkh; f hzí, uv kpjpéukvvz xbl tluaíz, zpuv
xbl uv hjlyaápz lu sv wyvwblzav, jvu shz jvukpjpvulz xbl ohiépz ylmlypkv,
hjlav cblzayv klzhmív, f sblnv, wvyxbl uv zl whzl ls kíh xbl ayhépz
klalytpuhkv; f zósv lejlav kl shz jvukpjpvulz sh kl xbl zl whzl h tí sh
mhth kl cblzayhz ohghñhz, wvyxbl uv zé jbáslz up xbé ahslz zlhu: jvu shz
tíhz tl jvualuav, ahslz jbhslz lsshz zvu. Avthk, wblz, sh whyal kls jhtwv
xbl xbpzpéylklz, xbl fv ohyé sv tlztv, f h xbplu Kpvz zl sh kplyl, Zhu
Wlkyv zl sh ilukpnh.

Ohiíhu klzjbiplyav kl sh jpbkhk hs Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, f kíjovzlsv
hs cpzvyylf xbl lzahih ohishukv jvu kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh. Ls cpzvyylf,
jylflukv zlyíh hsnbuh ublch hcluabyh mhiypjhkh wvy kvu Huavupv Tvyluv, v
wvy vayv hsnúu jhihsslyv kl sh jpbkhk, zhspó sblnv h sh wshfh jvu kvu
Huavupv f jvu vayvz tbjovz jhihsslyvz xbl sl hjvtwhñhihu, h apltwv jbhukv
kvu Xbpqval cvscíh shz yplukhz h Yvjpuhual whyh avthy kls jhtwv sv
uljlzhypv.

Cplukv, wblz, ls cpzvyylf xbl khihu svz kvz zlñhslz kl cvsclyzl h
lujvuayhy, zl wbzv lu tlkpv, wylnbuaáukvslz xbé lyh sh jhbzh xbl slz tvcíh
h ohjly ahu kl ptwyvcpzv ihahssh. Ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh ylzwvukpó
xbl lyh wyljlklujph kl olytvzbyh, f lu iylclz yhgvulz sl kpqv shz tpzthz
xbl ohiíh kpjov h kvu Xbpqval, jvu sh hjlahjpóu kl shz jvukpjpvulz kls
klzhmív oljohz wvy luayhtihz whyalz. Sslnózl ls cpzvyylf h kvu Huavupv, f
wylnbuaósl whzv zp zhiíh xbpéu lyh ls ahs Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, v zp
lyh hsnbuh ibysh xbl xblyíhu ohjly h kvu Xbpqval. Kvu Huavupv sl ylzwvukpó
xbl up zhiíh xbpéu lyh, up zp lyh kl ibyshz up kl clyhz ls ahs klzhmív.
Lzah ylzwblzah abcv wlywslqv hs cpzvyylf lu zp slz klqhyíh v uv whzhy
hklshual lu sh ihahssh; wlyv, uv wbkpéukvzl wlyzbhkpy h xbl mblzl zpuv
ibysh, zl hwhyaó kpjplukv:

— Zlñvylz jhihsslyvz, zp hxbí uv ohf vayv yltlkpv zpuv jvumlzhy v tvypy, f
ls zlñvy kvu Xbpqval lzaá lu zbz ayljl f cblzayh tlyjlk ls kl sh Ishujh
Sbuh lu zbz jhavyjl, h sh thuv kl Kpvz, f kluzl.

Hnyhkljpó ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh jvu jvyalzlz f kpzjylahz yhgvulz hs cpzvyylf
sh spjlujph xbl zl slz khih, f kvu Xbpqval opgv sv tlztv; ls jbhs,
lujvtlukáukvzl hs jplsv kl avkv jvyhgóu f h zb Kbsjpulh —jvtv aluíh kl
jvzabtiyl hs jvtlughy kl shz ihahsshz xbl zl sl vmyljíhu—, avyuó h avthy
vayv wvjv táz kls jhtwv, wvyxbl cpv xbl zb jvuayhypv ohjíh sv tlztv, f, zpu
avjhy ayvtwlah up vayv puzaybtluav iéspjv xbl slz kplzl zlñhs kl hyyltlaly,
cvscplyvu luayhtivz h bu tlztv wbuav shz yplukhz h zbz jhihssvz; f, jvtv
lyh táz spnlyv ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, sslnó h kvu Xbpqval h kvz alyjpvz
hukhkvz kl sh jhyylyh, f hssí sl lujvuayó jvu ahu wvklyvzh mblygh, zpu
avjhysl jvu sh shugh (xbl sh slchuaó, hs whyljly, kl wyvwózpav), xbl kpv
jvu Yvjpuhual f jvu kvu Xbpqval wvy ls zblsv buh wlspnyvzh jhíkh. Mbl sblnv
zviyl és, f, wvupéukvsl sh shugh zviyl sh cpzlyh, sl kpqv:

— Clujpkv zvpz, jhihsslyv, f hbu tblyav, zp uv jvumlzápz shz jvukpjpvulz kl
ublzayv klzhmív.

Kvu Xbpqval, tvspkv f habykpkv, zpu hsghyzl sh cpzlyh, jvtv zp ohishyh
kluayv kl buh abtih, jvu cvg klipspahkh f lumlyth, kpqv:

— Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv lz sh táz olytvzh tbqly kls tbukv, f fv ls táz
klzkpjohkv jhihsslyv kl sh aplyyh, f uv lz iplu xbl tp mshxblgh klmyhbkl
lzah clykhk. Hwyplah, jhihsslyv, sh shugh, f xbíahtl sh cpkh, wblz tl ohz
xbpahkv sh ovuyh.

— Lzv uv ohyé fv, wvy jplyav —kpqv ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh—: cpch, cpch lu zb
lualylgh sh mhth kl sh olytvzbyh kl sh zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, xbl zósv
tl jvualuav jvu xbl ls nyhu kvu Xbpqval zl ylapyl h zb sbnhy bu hñv, v
ohzah ls apltwv xbl wvy tí sl mblyl thukhkv, jvtv jvujlyahtvz hualz kl
luayhy lu lzah ihahssh.

Avkv lzav vflyvu ls cpzvyylf f kvu Huavupv, jvu vayvz tbjovz xbl hssí
lzahihu, f vflyvu hzptpztv xbl kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukpó xbl jvtv uv sl wpkplzl
jvzh xbl mblzl lu wlyqbpjpv kl Kbsjpulh, avkv sv kltáz jbtwspyíh jvtv
jhihsslyv wbuabhs f clykhklyv.

Oljoh lzah jvumlzpóu, cvscpó shz yplukhz ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, f, ohjplukv
tlzbyh jvu sh jhilgh hs cpzvyylf, h tlkpv nhsvwl zl luayó lu sh jpbkhk.

Thukó ls cpzvyylf h kvu Huavupv xbl mblzl ayhz és, f xbl lu avkhz thulyhz
zbwplzl xbpéu lyh. Slchuahyvu h kvu Xbpqval, klzjbiypéyvusl ls yvzayv f
ohssáyvusl zpu jvsvy f ayhzbkhukv. Yvjpuhual, kl wbyv thswhyhkv, uv zl wbkv
tvcly wvy luavujlz. Zhujov, avkv aypzal, avkv hwlzhyhkv, uv zhiíh xbé
kljpyzl up xbé ohjlyzl: whyljíhsl xbl avkv hxbls zbjlzv whzhih lu zblñvz f
xbl avkh hxblssh táxbpuh lyh jvzh kl lujhuahtluav. Clíh h zb zlñvy ylukpkv
f vispnhkv h uv avthy hythz lu bu hñv; pthnpuhih sh sbg kl sh nsvyph kl zbz
ohghñhz lzjbyljpkh, shz lzwlyhughz kl zbz ublchz wyvtlzhz klzoljohz, jvtv
zl klzohjl ls obtv jvu ls cpluav. Altíh zp xblkhyíh v uv jvuayljov
Yvjpuhual, v klzsvjhkv zb htv; xbl uv mblyh wvjh cluabyh zp klzsvjhkv
xblkhyh. Mpuhstlual, jvu buh zpssh kl thuvz, xbl thukó ayhly ls cpzvyylf,
sl sslchyvu h sh jpbkhk, f ls cpzvyylf zl cvscpó ahtipéu h lssh, jvu klzlv
kl zhily xbpéu mblzl ls Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, xbl kl ahu ths ahshual
ohiíh klqhkv h kvu Xbpqval.




Jhwíabsv SEC. Kvukl zl kh uvapjph xbpéu lyh ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, jvu sh
spilyahk kl Kvu Nylnvypv, f kl vayvz zbjlzvz

Zpnbpó kvu Huavupv Tvyluv hs Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh, f zpnbpéyvusl
ahtipéu, f hbu wlyzpnbpéyvusl, tbjovz tbjohjovz, ohzah xbl sl jlyyhyvu lu

Cplukv, wblz, ls kl sh Ishujh Sbuh xbl hxbls jhihsslyv uv sl klqhih, sl
kpqv:

— Iplu zé, zlñvy, h sv xbl cluíz, xbl lz h zhily xbpéu zvf; f, wvyxbl uv ohf

ayhgh whyh ohjlysl lzahy lu lssh; f hzí, ohiyá aylz tlzlz xbl sl zhsí hs
jhtpuv jvtv jhihsslyv hukhual, sshtáukvtl ls Jhihsslyv kl svz Lzwlqvz, jvu

— ¡Vo zlñvy —kpqv kvu Huavupv—, Kpvz vz wlykvul ls hnyhcpv xbl ohiépz oljov
h avkv ls tbukv lu xblyly cvscly jblykv hs táz nyhjpvzv svjv xbl ohf lu és!
¿Uv clpz, zlñvy, xbl uv wvkyá sslnhy ls wyvcljov xbl jhbzl sh jvykbyh kl

cvscly jblykv h bu ovtiyl ahu ylthahkhtlual svjv; f zp uv mblzl jvuayh
jhypkhk, kpyíh xbl ubujh zhul kvu Xbpqval, wvyxbl jvu zb zhsbk, uv

— Jhssh, Zhujov, wblz clz xbl tp yljsbzpóu f ylapyhkh uv oh kl whzhy kl bu

Vflukv sv jbhs Zhujov, kpqv:

— Ahu kl chsplualz jvyhgvulz lz, zlñvy tív, aluly zbmyptpluav lu shz

Mvyabuh lz buh tbqly ivyyhjoh f huavqhkpgh, f, zviyl avkv, jplnh, f hzí, uv

ayvmlv, f hs wpl klsshz, v hsylklkvy klsshz, nyhihyltvz lu svz áyivslz sv

xbl lzahy uv wblkh jvu Yvskáu h wyblih.

— Avkv lzv tl whyljl kl wlyshz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—; f, zp uv mblyh wvy sh

— ¡Wblz up és up shz hythz —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval— xbplyv xbl zl hovyxblu,

— Tbf iplu kpjl cblzayh tlyjlk —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, wvyxbl, zlnúu vwpupóu kl
kpzjylavz, sh jbswh kls hzuv uv zl oh kl ljohy h sh hsihykh; f, wblz klzal

qbzav.

Lu lzahz yhgvulz f wsáapjhz zl slz whzó avkv hxbls kíh, f hbu vayvz jbhayv,
zpu zbjlklyslz jvzh xbl lzavyihzl zb jhtpuv; f hs xbpuav kíh, h sh luayhkh
kl bu sbnhy, ohsshyvu h sh wblyah kl bu tlzóu tbjoh nlual, xbl, wvy zly
mplzah, zl lzahih hssí zvshghukv. Jbhukv sslnhih h lssvz kvu Xbpqval, bu
shiyhkvy hsgó sh cvg kpjplukv:

— Hsnbuv klzavz kvz zlñvylz xbl hxbí cplulu, xbl uv jvuvjlu shz whyalz, kpyá
sv xbl zl oh kl ohjly lu ublzayh hwblzah.

— Zí kpyé, wvy jplyav —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, jvu avkh yljapabk, zp lz xbl
hsjhugv h lualuklysh.

— «Lz, wblz, ls jhzv —kpqv ls shiyhkvy—, zlñvy ibluv, xbl bu cljpuv klzal
sbnhy, ahu nvykv xbl wlzh vujl hyyvihz, klzhmpó h jvyyly h vayv zb cljpuv,
xbl uv wlzh táz xbl jpujv. Mbl sh jvukpjpóu xbl ohiíhu kl jvyyly buh
jhyylyh kl jplu whzvz jvu wlzvz pnbhslz; f, ohipéukvsl wylnbuahkv hs
klzhmphkvy jótv zl ohiíh kl pnbhshy ls wlzv, kpqv xbl ls klzhmphkv, xbl
wlzh jpujv hyyvihz, zl wbzplzl zlpz kl oplyyv h jblzahz, f hzí zl
pnbhshyíhu shz vujl hyyvihz kls mshjv jvu shz vujl kls nvykv.»

— Lzv uv —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov, hualz xbl kvu Xbpqval ylzwvukplzl—. F h
tí, xbl oh wvjvz kíhz xbl zhsí kl zly nvilyuhkvy f qblg, jvtv avkv ls tbukv
zhil, avjh hclypnbhy lzahz kbkhz f khy whyljly lu avkv wslpav.

— Ylzwvukl lu iblu ovyh —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, Zhujov htpnv, xbl fv uv lzavf
whyh khy tpnhz h bu nhav, zlnúu ayhpnv hsivyvahkv f ayhzavyuhkv ls qbpjpv.

Jvu lzah spjlujph, kpqv Zhujov h svz shiyhkvylz, xbl lzahihu tbjovz
hsylklkvy kés sh ivjh hiplyah, lzwlyhukv sh zlualujph kl sh zbfh:

— Olythuvz, sv xbl ls nvykv wpkl uv sslch jhtpuv, up aplul zvtiyh kl
qbzapjph hsnbuh; wvyxbl zp lz clykhk sv xbl zl kpjl, xbl ls klzhmphkv wblkl
lzjvnly shz hythz, uv lz iplu xbl ézal shz lzjvqh ahslz xbl sl ptwpkhu up
lzavyilu ls zhspy clujlkvy; f hzí, lz tp whyljly xbl ls nvykv klzhmphkvy zl
lzjhtvukl, tvukl, luaylzhxbl, wbsh f hapskl, f zhxbl zlpz hyyvihz kl zbz
jhyulz, kl hxbí v kl hssí kl zb jblywv, jvtv tlqvy sl whyljplyl f
lzabcplyl; f klzah thulyh, xblkhukv lu jpujv hyyvihz kl wlzv, zl pnbhshyá f
hqbzahyá jvu shz jpujv kl zb jvuayhypv, f hzí wvkyáu jvyyly pnbhstlual.

— ¡Cvav h ahs —kpqv bu shiyhkvy xbl lzjbjoó sh zlualujph kl Zhujov— xbl lzal
zlñvy oh ohishkv jvtv bu ilukpav f zlualujphkv jvtv bu jhuóupnv! Wlyv h
iblu zlnbyv xbl uv oh kl xblyly xbpahyzl ls nvykv buh vugh kl zbz jhyulz,
jbhuav táz zlpz hyyvihz.

— Sv tlqvy lz xbl uv jvyyhu —ylzwvukpó vayv—, wvyxbl ls mshjv uv zl tblsh
jvu ls wlzv, up ls nvykv zl klzjhyul; f éjolzl sh tpahk kl sh hwblzah lu
cpuv, f sslcltvz lzavz zlñvylz h sh ahilyuh kl sv jhyv, f zviyl tí sh jhwh
jbhukv ssblch.

— Fv, zlñvylz —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, vz sv hnyhklgjv, wlyv uv wblkv
klalulytl bu wbuav, wvyxbl wluzhtpluavz f zbjlzvz aypzalz tl ohjlu whyljly

F hzí, khukv kl shz lzwblshz h Yvjpuhual, whzó hklshual, klqáukvsvz
hktpyhkvz kl ohily cpzav f uvahkv hzí zb lzayhñh mpnbyh jvtv sh kpzjyljpóu

— Zp ls jyphkv lz ahu kpzjylav, ¡jbás klil kl zly ls htv! Fv hwvzahyé xbl zp
chu h lzabkphy h Zhshthujh, xbl h bu aypz ohu kl clupy h zly hsjhsklz kl
jvyal; xbl avkv lz ibysh, zpuv lzabkphy f táz lzabkphy, f aluly mhcvy f

thuv v jvu buh tpayh lu sh jhilgh.

Hxblssh uvjol sh whzhyvu htv f tvgv lu tpahk kls jhtwv, hs jplsv yhzv f
klzjbiplyav; f vayv kíh, zpnbplukv zb jhtpuv, cplyvu xbl ohjph lssvz cluíh

thuv, wyvwpv ahssl kl jvyylv kl h wpl; ls jbhs, jvtv sslnó qbuav h kvu
Xbpqval, hklshuaó ls whzv, f tlkpv jvyyplukv sslnó h és, f, hiyhgáukvsl wvy

— ¡Vo tp zlñvy kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, f xbé nyhu jvualuav oh kl sslnhy hs
jvyhgóu kl tp zlñvy ls kbxbl jbhukv zlwh xbl cblzayh tlyjlk cblscl h zb
jhzapssv, xbl avkhcíh zl lzaá lu és jvu tp zlñvyh sh kbxblzh!

— Uv vz jvuvgjv, htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, up zé xbpéu zvpz, zp cvz uv
tl sv kljíz.

— Fv, zlñvy kvu Xbpqval —ylzwvukpó ls jvyylv—, zvf Avzpsvz, ls shjhfv kls

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz! —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—. ¿Lz wvzpisl xbl zvpz cvz ls xbl svz
lujhuahkvylz tpz lultpnvz ayhuzmvythyvu lu lzl shjhfv xbl kljíz, wvy

— Jhssl, zlñvy ibluv —ylwspjó ls jhyalyv—, xbl uv obiv lujhuav hsnbuv up

whyljpkv iplu sh tvgh, wlyv zbjlkpótl hs ylcéz tp wluzhtpluav, wblz, hzí
