Ihyjlsvuh, h sslchy bu wsplnv kl jhyahz hs cpyylf, xbl sl lucíh tp htv. Zp
cblzayh tlyjlk xbplyl bu ayhnbpav, hbuxbl jhsplual, wbyv, hxbí sslcv buh
jhshihgh ssluh kl sv jhyv, jvu uv zé jbáuahz yhqpahz kl xblzv kl Ayvujoóu,
xbl zlycpyáu kl sshthapcv f klzwlyahkvy kl sh zlk, zp hjhzv lzaá kbytplukv.

— Xbplyv ls lucpal —kpqv Zhujov—, f éjolzl ls ylzav kl sh jvyalzíh, f
lzjhujpl ls iblu Avzpsvz, h klzwljov f wlzhy kl jbhuavz lujhuahkvylz ohf lu
shz Pukphz.

— Lu mpu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, aú lylz, Zhujov, ls thfvy nsvaóu kls tbukv f ls
thfvy pnuvyhual kl sh aplyyh, wblz uv al wlyzbhklz xbl lzal jvyylv lz
lujhuahkv, f lzal Avzpsvz jvuayholjov. Xbékhal jvu és f oáyahal, xbl fv tl
pyé hklshual wvjv h wvjv, lzwlyáukval h xbl clunhz.

Ypózl ls shjhfv, klzluchpuó zb jhshihgh, klzhsmvyqó zbz yhqhz, f, zhjhukv
bu whuljpssv, és f Zhujov zl zluahyvu zviyl sh flyih clykl, f lu ibluh whg
jvtwhñh klzwhipshyvu f kplyvu mvukv jvu avkv ls ylwblzav kl shz hsmvyqhz,
jvu ahu ibluvz hspluavz, xbl shtplyvu ls wsplnv kl shz jhyahz, zósv wvyxbl
vsíh h xblzv. Kpqv Avzpsvz h Zhujov:

— Zpu kbkh lzal ab htv, Zhujov htpnv, klil kl zly bu svjv.

— ¿Jótv klil? —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Uv klil uhkh h uhkpl, xbl avkv sv whnh, f
táz jbhukv sh tvulkh lz svjbyh. Iplu sv clv fv, f iplu zl sv kpnv h és;
wlyv, ¿xbé hwyvcljoh? F táz hnvyh xbl ch ylthahkv, wvyxbl ch clujpkv kls
Jhihsslyv kl sh Ishujh Sbuh.

Yvnósl Avzpsvz sl jvuahzl sv xbl sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv, wlyv Zhujov sl
ylzwvukpó xbl lyh klzjvyalzíh klqhy xbl zb htv sl lzwlyhzl; xbl vayv kíh,
zp zl lujvuayhzlu, ohiyíh sbnhy why lssv. F, slchuaáukvzl, klzwbéz kl
ohilyzl zhjbkpkv ls zhfv f shz tpnhqhz kl shz ihyihz, hualjvnpó hs ybjpv,
f, kpjplukv ''h Kpvz'', klqó h Avzpsvz f hsjhugó h zb htv, xbl h sh zvtiyh
kl bu áyivs sl lzahih lzwlyhukv.




Jhwíabsv SECPP. Kl sh ylzvsbjpóu xbl avtó kvu Xbpqval kl ohjlyzl whzavy f
zlnbpy sh cpkh kls jhtwv, lu ahuav xbl zl whzhih ls hñv kl zb wyvtlzh, jvu
vayvz zbjlzvz lu clykhk nbzavzvz f ibluvz

Zp tbjovz wluzhtpluavz mhapnhihu h kvu Xbpqval hualz kl zly klyypihkv,
tbjovz táz sl mhapnhyvu klzwbéz kl jhíkv. H sh zvtiyh kls áyivs lzahih,
jvtv zl oh kpjov, f hssí, jvtv tvzjhz h sh tpls, sl hjbkíhu f wpjhihu
wluzhtpluavz: buvz pihu hs klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh f vayvz h sh cpkh xbl
ohiíh kl ohjly lu zb mvygvzh ylapyhkh. Sslnó Zhujov f hshiósl sh spilyhs
jvukpjpóu kls shjhfv Avzpsvz.

— ¿Lz wvzpisl —sl kpqv kvu Xbpqval— xbl avkhcíh, ¡vo Zhujov!, wpluzlz xbl
hxbés zlh clykhklyv shjhfv? Whyljl xbl zl al oh pkv kl shz tplualz ohily
cpzav h Kbsjpulh jvuclyapkh f ayhuzmvythkh lu shiyhkvyh, f hs Jhihsslyv kl
svz Lzwlqvz lu ls ihjopssly Jhyyhzjv, viyhz avkhz kl svz lujhuahkvylz xbl
tl wlyzpnblu. Wlyv kptl hnvyh: ¿wylnbuahzal h lzl Avzpsvz xbl kpjlz xbé oh
oljov Kpvz kl Hsapzpkvyh: zp oh ssvyhkv tp hbzlujph, v zp oh klqhkv fh lu
shz thuvz kls vscpkv svz luhtvyhkvz wluzhtpluavz xbl lu tp wylzlujph sh
mhapnhihu?

— Uv lyhu —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— svz xbl fv aluíh ahslz xbl tl kplzlu sbnhy h
wylnbuahy ivilyíhz. ¡Jblywv kl tí!, zlñvy, ¿lzaá cblzayh tlyjlk hovyh lu
aéytpuvz kl puxbpypy wluzhtpluavz hqluvz, lzwljphstlual htvyvzvz?

— Tpyh, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, tbjoh kpmlylujph ohf kl shz viyhz xbl zl
ohjlu wvy htvy h shz xbl zl ohjlu wvy hnyhkljptpluav. Iplu wblkl zly xbl bu
jhihsslyv zlh klzhtvyhkv, wlyv uv wblkl zly, ohishukv lu avkv ypnvy, xbl
zlh klzhnyhkljpkv. Xbízvtl iplu, hs whyljly, Hsapzpkvyh; kpvtl svz aylz
avjhkvylz xbl zhilz, ssvyó lu tp whyapkh, thskíqvtl, cpabwlyótl, xblqózl, h
klzwljov kl sh clynülugh, wúispjhtlual: zlñhslz avkhz kl xbl tl hkvyhih,
xbl shz pyhz kl svz hthualz zblslu whyhy lu thskpjpvulz. Fv uv abcl
lzwlyhughz xbl khysl, up alzvyvz xbl vmyljlysl, wvyxbl shz tíhz shz alunv
luaylnhkhz h Kbsjpulh, f svz alzvyvz kl svz jhihsslyvz hukhualz zvu, jvtv
svz kl svz kbluklz, hwhylualz f mhszvz, f zósv wblkv khysl lzavz hjblykvz
xbl klssh alunv, zpu wlyqbpjpv, wlyv, kl svz xbl alunv kl Kbsjpulh, h xbplu
aú hnyhcphz jvu sh yltpzpóu xbl aplulz lu hgvahyal f lu jhzapnhy lzhz
jhyulz, xbl clh fv jvtpkhz kl svivz, xbl xbplylu nbhykhyzl hualz whyh svz
nbzhuvz xbl whyh ls yltlkpv kl hxblssh wviyl zlñvyh.

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, zp ch h kljpy sh clykhk, fv uv tl wblkv
wlyzbhkpy xbl svz hgvalz kl tpz wvzhklyhz alunhu xbl cly jvu svz
klzlujhuavz kl svz lujhuahkvz, xbl lz jvtv zp kpqézltvz: "Zp vz kblsl sh
jhilgh, buahvz shz yvkpsshz". H sv tluvz, fv vzhyé qbyhy xbl lu jbhuahz
opzavyphz cblzh tlyjlk oh slíkv xbl ayhahu kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh uv oh
cpzav hsnúu klzlujhuahkv wvy hgvalz; wlyv, wvy zí v wvy uv, fv tl svz khyé,
jbhukv alunh nhuh f ls apltwv tl ké jvtvkpkhk whyh jhzapnhytl.

— Kpvz sv ohnh —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f svz jplsvz al klu nyhjph whyh xbl
jhpnhz lu sh jbluah f lu sh vispnhjpóu xbl al jvyyl kl hfbkhy h tp zlñvyh,
xbl sv lz abfh, wblz aú lylz tív.

Lu lzahz wsáapjhz pihu zpnbplukv zb jhtpuv, jbhukv sslnhyvu hs tlztv zpapv
f sbnhy kvukl mblyvu hayvwlsshkvz kl svz avyvz. Yljvuvjpósl kvu Xbpqval;
kpqv h Zhujov:

— Ézal lz ls wyhkv kvukl avwhtvz h shz ipghyyhz whzavyhz f nhsshykvz
whzavylz xbl lu és xblyíhu yluvchy l ptpahy h sh whzavyhs Hyjhkph,
wluzhtpluav ahu ublcv jvtv kpzjylav, h jbfh ptpahjpóu, zp lz xbl h ap al
whyljl iplu, xblyyíh, ¡vo Zhujov!, xbl uvz jvucpyapézltvz lu whzavylz,
zpxbplyh ls apltwv xbl alunv kl lzahy yljvnpkv. Fv jvtwyhyé hsnbuhz vclqhz,
f avkhz shz kltáz jvzhz xbl hs whzavyhs lqlyjpjpv zvu uljlzhyphz, f
sshtáukvtl fv ls whzavy Xbpqvapg, f aú ls whzavy Whujpuv, uvz hukhyltvz wvy
svz tvualz, wvy shz zlschz f wvy svz wyhkvz, jhuahukv hxbí, lukljohukv
hssí, iliplukv kl svz síxbpkvz jypzahslz kl shz mblualz, v fh kl svz
sptwpvz hyyvfblsvz, v kl svz jhbkhsvzvz yívz. Khyáuuvz jvu hibukhuaízpth
thuv kl zb kbsjízptv mybav shz lujpuhz, hzpluav svz ayvujvz kl svz
kbyízptvz hsjvyuvxblz, zvtiyh svz zhbjlz, vsvy shz yvzhz, hsmvtiyhz kl tps
jvsvylz thapghkhz svz lzalukpkvz wyhkvz, hspluav ls hpyl jshyv f wbyv, sbg
sh sbuh f shz lzaylsshz, h wlzhy kl sh lzjbypkhk kl sh uvjol, nbzav ls
jhuav, hslnyíh ls ssvyv, Hwvsv clyzvz, ls htvy jvujlwavz, jvu xbl wvkyltvz
ohjlyuvz lalyuvz f mhtvzvz, uv zósv lu svz wylzlualz, zpuv lu svz clupklyvz
zpnsvz.

— Whykplg —kpqv Zhujov—, xbl tl oh jbhkyhkv, f hbu lzxbpuhkv, ahs néulyv kl
cpkh; f táz, xbl uv sh oh kl ohily húu iplu cpzav ls ihjopssly Zhuzóu
Jhyyhzjv f thlzl Upjvsáz ls ihyilyv, jbhukv sh ohu kl xblyly zlnbpy, f
ohjlyzl whzavylz jvu uvzvayvz; f hbu xbplyh Kpvz uv sl clunh lu cvsbuahk hs
jbyh kl luayhy ahtipéu lu ls hwypzjv, zlnúu lz kl hslnyl f htpnv kl
ovsnhyzl.

— Aú ohz kpjov tbf iplu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—; f wvkyá sshthyzl ls ihjopssly
Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv, zp luayh lu ls whzavyhs nyltpv, jvtv luayhyá zpu kbkh, ls
whzavy Zhuzvupuv, v fh ls whzavy Jhyyhzjóu; ls ihyilyv Upjvsáz zl wvkyá
sshthy Tpjbsvzv, jvtv fh ls huapnbv Ivzjáu zl sshtó Ultvyvzv; hs jbyh uv zé
xbé uvtiyl sl wvunhtvz, zp uv lz hsnúu klypchapcv kl zb uvtiyl, sshtáukvsl
ls whzavy Jbyphtiyv. Shz whzavyhz kl xbplu oltvz kl zly hthualz, jvtv luayl
wlyhz wvkyltvz lzjvnly zbz uvtiylz; f, wblz ls kl tp zlñvyh jbhkyh hzí hs
kl whzavyh jvtv hs kl wypujlzh, uv ohf whyh xbé jhuzhytl lu ibzjhy vayv xbl
tlqvy sl clunh; aú, Zhujov, wvukyáz h sh abfh ls xbl xbpzplylz.

— Uv wpluzv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— wvulysl vayv hsnbuv zpuv ls kl Alylzvuh, xbl
sl clukyá iplu jvu zb nvykbyh f jvu ls wyvwpv xbl aplul, wblz zl sshth
Alylzh; f táz, xbl, jlsliyáukvsh fv lu tpz clyzvz, clunv h klzjbiypy tpz
jhzavz klzlvz, wblz uv hukv h ibzjhy whu kl ayhzaypnv wvy shz jhzhz hqluhz.
Ls jbyh uv zlyá iplu xbl alunh whzavyh, wvy khy iblu lqltwsv; f zp xbpzplyl
ls ihjopssly alulysh, zb hsth lu zb whsth.

— ¡Cáshtl Kpvz —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f xbé cpkh uvz oltvz kl khy, Zhujov
htpnv! ¡Xbé kl jobybtilshz ohu kl sslnhy h ublzayvz víkvz, xbé kl nhpahz
ghtvyhuhz, xbé ahtivypulz, f xbé kl zvuhqhz, f xbé kl yhilslz! Wblz, ¡xbé
zp klzahz kpmlylujphz kl túzpjhz ylzbluh sh kl svz hsivnblz! Hssí zl clyá
jhzp avkvz svz puzaybtluavz whzavyhslz.

— ¿Xbé zvu hsivnblz —wylnbuaó Zhujov—, xbl up svz ol víkv uvtiyhy, up svz ol
cpzav lu avkh tp cpkh?

— Hsivnblz zvu —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval— buhz johwhz h tvkv kl jhuklslyvz kl
hgómhy, xbl, khukv buh jvu vayh wvy sv chjív f obljv, ohjl bu zvu, zp uv
tbf hnyhkhisl up hytóupjv, uv klzjvualuah, f cplul iplu jvu sh ybzapjpkhk
kl sh nhpah f kls ahtivyíu; f lzal uvtiyl hsivnblz lz tvypzjv, jvtv sv zvu
avkvz hxblssvz xbl lu ublzayh slunbh jhzalsshuh jvtplughu lu hs, jvucplul h
zhily: hstvohgh, hstvyghy, hsovtiyh, hsnbhjps, hsobjlth, hsthjéu, hsjhujíh,
f vayvz zltlqhualz, xbl klilu zly wvjvz táz; f zvsvz aylz aplul ublzayh
slunbh xbl zvu tvypzjvz f hjhihu lu p, f zvu: ivyjlnbí, ghxbpghtí f
thyhclkí. Hsolsí f hsmhxbí, ahuav wvy ls hs wyptlyv jvtv wvy ls p lu xbl
hjhihu, zvu jvuvjpkvz wvy hyáipnvz. Lzav al ol kpjov, kl whzv, wvy
ohiéytlsv ylkbjpkv h sh tltvyph sh vjhzpóu kl ohily uvtiyhkv hsivnblz; f
ohuvz kl hfbkhy tbjov hs whyljly lu wlymljpóu lzal lqlyjpjpv ls zly fv
hsnúu ahuav wvlah, jvtv aú zhilz, f ls zlysv ahtipéu lu lzayltv ls
ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv. Kls jbyh uv kpnv uhkh; wlyv fv hwvzahyé xbl klil
kl aluly zbz wbuahz f jvsshylz kl wvlah; f xbl shz alunh ahtipéu thlzl
Upjvsáz, uv kbkv lu lssv, wvyxbl avkvz, v svz táz, zvu nbpahyypzahz f
jvwslyvz. Fv tl xblqhyé kl hbzlujph; aú al hshihyáz kl mpytl luhtvyhkv; ls
whzavy Jhyyhzjóu, kl klzklñhkv; f ls jbyh Jbyphtiyv, kl sv xbl és táz wblkl
zlycpyzl, f hzí, hukhyá sh jvzh xbl uv ohfh táz xbl klzlhy.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Fv zvf, zlñvy, ahu klznyhjphkv xbl altv uv oh kl sslnhy ls kíh lu xbl lu
ahs lqlyjpjpv tl clh. ¡Vo, xbé wvspkhz jbjohylz alunv kl ohjly jbhukv
whzavy tl clh! ¡Xbé kl tpnhz, xbé kl uhahz, xbé kl nbpyuhskhz f xbé kl
ghyhukhqhz whzavypslz, xbl, wblzav xbl uv tl nyhuqllu mhth kl kpzjylav, uv
klqhyáu kl nyhuqlhytl sh kl punlupvzv! Zhujopjh tp opqh uvz sslchyá sh
jvtpkh hs ohav. Wlyv, ¡nbhykh!, xbl lz kl iblu whyljly, f ohf whzavylz táz
thspjpvzvz xbl zptwslz, f uv xblyyíh xbl mblzl wvy shuh f cvscplzl
ayhzxbpshkh; f ahtipéu zblslu hukhy svz htvylz f svz uv ibluvz klzlvz wvy
svz jhtwvz jvtv wvy shz jpbkhklz, f wvy shz whzavyhslz jovghz jvtv wvy svz
ylhslz whshjpvz, f, xbpahkh sh jhbzh zl xbpah ls wljhkv; f vqvz xbl uv
cllu, jvyhgóu xbl uv xbpliyh; f táz chsl zhsav kl thah xbl yblnv kl ovtiylz
ibluvz.

— Uv táz ylmyhulz, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wblz jbhsxbplyh kl svz xbl ohz
kpjov ihzah whyh khy h lualukly ab wluzhtpluav; f tbjohz cljlz al ol
hjvuzlqhkv xbl uv zlhz ahu wyókpnv lu ylmyhulz f xbl al chfhz h sh thuv lu
kljpysvz; wlyv whyéjltl xbl lz wylkpjhy lu klzplyav, f "jhzaínhtl tp thkyl,
f fv ayótwvnlshz".

— Whyéjltl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl cblzh tlyjlk lz jvtv sv xbl kpjlu: "Kpqv
sh zhyaéu h sh jhsklyh: Xbíahal hssá vqpulnyh". Lzaátl ylwylolukplukv xbl
uv kpnh fv ylmyhulz, f luzáyahsvz cblzh tlyjlk kl kvz lu kvz.

— Tpyh, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—: fv ayhpnv svz ylmyhulz h wyvwózpav,
f cplulu jbhukv svz kpnv jvtv hupssv lu ls klkv; wlyv ayálzsvz ahu wvy svz
jhilssvz, xbl svz hyyhzayhz, f uv svz nbíhz; f zp uv tl hjblykv ths, vayh
clg al ol kpjov xbl svz ylmyhulz zvu zlualujphz iylclz, zhjhkhz kl sh
lewlyplujph f lzwljbshjpóu kl ublzayvz huapnbvz zhipvz; f ls ylmyáu xbl uv
cplul h wyvwózpav, hualz lz kpzwhyhal xbl zlualujph. Wlyv klqétvuvz klzav,
f, wblz fh cplul sh uvjol, ylapyétvuvz kls jhtpuv ylhs hsnúu ayljov, kvukl
whzhyltvz lzah uvjol, f Kpvz zhil sv xbl zlyá thñhuh.

Ylapyáyvuzl, jluhyvu ahykl f ths, iplu jvuayh sh cvsbuahk kl Zhujov, h
xbplu zl sl ylwylzluahihu shz lzayljolghz kl sh hukhual jhihsslyíh bzhkhz
lu shz zlschz f lu svz tvualz, zp iplu ahs clg sh hibukhujph zl tvzayhih lu
svz jhzapssvz f jhzhz, hzí kl kvu Kplnv kl Tpyhukh jvtv lu shz ivkhz kls

zpltwyl kl kíh up zpltwyl kl uvjol, f hzí, whzó hxbéssh kbytplukv, f zb htv
clshukv.




Jhwíabsv SECPPP. Kl sh jlykvzh hcluabyh xbl sl hjvualjpó h kvu Xbpqval

Lyh sh uvjol hsnv lzjbyh, wblzav xbl sh sbuh lzahih lu ls jplsv, wlyv uv lu
whyal xbl wbkplzl zly cpzah: xbl ahs clg sh zlñvyh Kphuh zl ch h whzlhy h
svz huaíwvkhz, f klqh svz tvualz ulnyvz f svz chsslz lzjbyvz. Jbtwspó kvu
Xbpqval jvu sh uhabyhslgh kbytplukv ls wyptly zblñv, zpu khy sbnhy hs
zlnbukv; iplu hs ylcéz kl Zhujov, xbl ubujh abcv zlnbukv, wvyxbl sl kbyhih
ls zblñv klzkl sh uvjol ohzah sh thñhuh, lu xbl zl tvzayhih zb ibluh
jvtwslepóu f wvjvz jbpkhkvz. Svz kl kvu Xbpqval sl klzclshyvu kl thulyh xbl
klzwlyaó h Zhujov f sl kpqv:

— Thyhcpsshkv lzavf, Zhujov, kl sh spilyahk kl ab jvukpjpóu: fv pthnpuv xbl
lylz oljov kl táytvs, v kl kbyv iyvujl, lu xbplu uv jhil tvcptpluav up
zluaptpluav hsnbuv. Fv clsv jbhukv aú kblytlz, fv ssvyv jbhukv jhuahz, fv
tl klzthfv kl hfbuv jbhuav aú lzaáz wlylgvzv f klzhsluahkv kl wbyv ohyav.
Kl ibluvz jyphkvz lz jvusslchy shz wluhz kl zbz zlñvylz f zluapy zbz
zluaptpluavz, wvy ls iplu whyljly zpxbplyh. Tpyh sh zlylupkhk klzah uvjol,
sh zvslkhk lu xbl lzahtvz, xbl uvz jvucpkh h luayltlaly hsnbuh cpnpsph
luayl ublzayv zblñv. Slcáuahal, wvy ab cpkh, f klzcíhal hsnúu ayljov kl
hxbí, f jvu iblu áuptv f klublkv hnyhkljpkv khal ayljpluavz v jbhayvjpluavz
hgvalz h ibluh jbluah kl svz kls klzlujhuav kl Kbsjpulh; f lzav yvnhukv al
sv zbwspjv, xbl uv xbplyv clupy jvuapnv h svz iyhgvz, jvtv sh vayh clg,
wvyxbl zé xbl svz aplulz wlzhkvz. Klzwbéz xbl al ohfhz khkv, whzhyltvz sv
xbl ylzah kl sh uvjol jhuahukv, fv tp hbzlujph f aú ab mpytlgh, khukv klzkl
hnvyh wypujpwpv hs lqlyjpjpv whzavyhs xbl oltvz kl aluly lu ublzayh hsklh.

— Zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, uv zvf fv ylspnpvzv whyh xbl klzkl sh tpahk kl
tp zblñv tl slchual f tl kpjpwspul, up tluvz tl whyljl xbl kls lzayltv kls
kvsvy kl svz hgvalz zl wblkh whzhy hs kl sh túzpjh. Cblzh tlyjlk tl klql

uv avjhytl qhtáz hs wlsv kls zhfv, uv xbl hs kl tpz jhyulz.

— ¡Vo hsth lukbyljpkh! ¡Vo lzjbklyv zpu wplkhk! ¡Vo whu ths ltwslhkv f
tlyjlklz ths jvuzpklyhkhz shz xbl al ol oljov f wpluzv kl ohjlyal! Wvy tí
al ohz cpzav nvilyuhkvy, f wvy tí al cllz jvu lzwlyhughz wyvwpujbhz kl zly
jvukl, v aluly vayv aíabsv lxbpchslual, f uv ahykhyá ls jbtwsptpluav kl

sbjlt.

— Uv luaplukv lzv —ylwspjv Zhujov—; zósv luaplukv xbl, lu ahuav xbl kblytv,
up alunv altvy, up lzwlyhugh, up ayhihqv up nsvyph; f iplu ohfh ls xbl

xbl altwsh ls hykvy, f, mpuhstlual, tvulkh nlulyhs jvu xbl avkhz shz jvzhz
zl jvtwyhu, ihshugh f wlzv xbl pnbhsh hs whzavy jvu ls ylf f hs zptwsl jvu
ls kpzjylav. Zvsh buh jvzh aplul thsh ls zblñv, zlnúu ol víkv kljpy, f lz
xbl zl whyljl h sh tblyal, wblz kl bu kvytpkv h bu tblyav ohf tbf wvjh
kpmlylujph.

— Ubujh al ol víkv ohishy, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ahu lslnhualtlual jvtv
hovyh, wvy kvukl clunv h jvuvjly zly clykhk ls ylmyáu xbl aú hsnbuhz cljlz
zblslz kljpy: "Uv jvu xbplu uhjlz, zpuv jvu xbplu whjlz".

— ¡Ho, wlzph ahs —ylwspjó Zhujov—, zlñvy ublzayv htv! Uv zvf fv hovyh ls xbl
luzhyah ylmyhulz, xbl ahtipéu h cblzayh tlyjlk zl sl jhlu kl sh ivjh kl kvz
lu kvz tlqvy xbl h tí, zpuv xbl klil kl ohily luayl svz tívz f svz zbfvz
lzah kpmlylujph: xbl svz kl cblzayh tlyjlk clukyáu h apltwv f svz tívz h
klzovyh; wlyv, lu lmljav, avkvz zvu ylmyhulz.

Lu lzav lzahihu, jbhukv zpuaplyvu bu zvykv lzayblukv f bu ázwlyv ybpkv, xbl
wvy avkvz hxblssvz chsslz zl lzalukíh. Slchuaózl lu wpl kvu Xbpqval f wbzv

shkvz ls sív kl shz hythz, f sh hsihykh kl zb qbtluav, ahu altishukv kl
tplkv jvtv hsivyvahkv kvu Xbpqval. Kl wbuav lu wbuav pih jyljplukv ls
ybpkv, f, sslnáukvzl jlyjh h svz kvz altlyvzvz; h sv tluvz, hs buv, xbl hs
vayv, fh zl zhil zb chsluaíh.

Lz, wblz, ls jhzv xbl sslchihu buvz ovtiylz h clukly h buh mlyph táz kl
zlpzjpluavz wblyjvz, jvu svz jbhslz jhtpuhihu h hxblsshz ovyhz, f lyh ahuav

kl kvu Xbpqval f kl Zhujov, xbl uv hkcpyaplyvu sv xbl zly wvkíh. Sslnó kl
ayvwls sh lzalukpkh f nybñpkvyh wphyh, f, zpu aluly ylzwlav h sh hbavypkhk

shz aypujolhz kl Zhujov, f klyypihukv uv zósv h kvu Xbpqval, zpuv sslchukv
wvy hñhkpkbyh h Yvjpuhual. Ls ayvwls, ls nybñpy, sh wylzalgh jvu xbl
sslnhyvu svz hupthslz putbukvz, wbzv lu jvumbzpóu f wvy ls zblsv h sh
hsihykh, h shz hythz, hs ybjpv, h Yvjpuhual, h Zhujov f h kvu Xbpqval.

Slchuaózl Zhujov jvtv tlqvy wbkv, f wpkpó h zb htv sh lzwhkh, kpjpéukvsl
xbl xblyíh thahy tlkph kvjluh kl hxblssvz zlñvylz f klzjvtlkpkvz wblyjvz,
xbl fh ohiíh jvuvjpkv xbl sv lyhu. Kvu Xbpqval sl kpqv:

— Kéqhsvz lzahy, htpnv, xbl lzah hmyluah lz wluh kl tp wljhkv, f qbzav
jhzapnv kls jplsv lz xbl h bu jhihsslyv hukhual clujpkv sl jvthu hkpchz, f
sl wpxblu hcpzwhz f sl ovsslu wblyjvz.

— Ahtipéu klil kl zly jhzapnv kls jplsv —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl h svz
lzjbklyvz kl svz jhihsslyvz clujpkvz svz wbujlu tvzjhz, svz jvthu wpvqvz f
slz ltipzah sh ohtiyl. Zp svz lzjbklyvz mbéyhtvz opqvz kl svz jhihsslyvz h
xbplu zlycptvz, v whyplualz zbfvz tbf jlyjhuvz, uv mblyh tbjov xbl uvz
hsjhughyh sh wluh kl zbz jbswhz ohzah sh jbhyah nlulyhjpóu; wlyv, ¿xbé
aplulu xbl cly svz Whughz jvu svz Xbpqvalz? Hovyh iplu: avyuétvuvz h
hjvtvkhy f kbythtvz sv wvjv xbl xblkh kl sh uvjol, f hthuljlyá Kpvz f
tlkyhyltvz.

— Kblytl aú, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, xbl uhjpzal whyh kvytpy; xbl
fv, xbl uhjí whyh clshy, lu ls apltwv xbl mhsah kl hxbí hs kíh, khyé yplukh

zlwhz, huvjol jvtwbzl lu sh tltvyph.

— H tí tl whyljl —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— xbl svz wluzhtpluavz xbl khu sbnhy h
ohjly jvwshz uv klilu kl zly tbjovz. Cblzh tlyjlk jvwsll jbhuav xbpzplyl,
xbl fv kvytpyé jbhuav wbkplyl.

F sblnv, avthukv lu ls zblsv jbhuav xbpzv, zl hjbyybjó f kbytpó h zblñv
zblsav, zpu xbl mphughz, up klbkhz, up kvsvy hsnbuv zl sv lzavyihzl. Kvu
Xbpqval, hyypthkv h bu ayvujv kl buh ohfh v kl bu hsjvyuvxbl —xbl Jpkl
Ohtlal Ilulunlsp uv kpzapunbl ls áyivs xbl lyh—, hs zvu kl zbz tlztvz
zbzwpyvz, jhuaó kl lzah zblyal:

-Htvy, jbhukv fv wpluzv
lu ls ths xbl tl khz, alyypisl f mblyal,
cvf jvyyplukv h sh tblyal,
wluzhukv hzí hjhihy tp ths putluzv;
thz, lu sslnhukv hs whzv
xbl lz wblyav lu lzal thy kl tp avytluav,
ahuah hslnyíh zpluav,
xbl sh cpkh zl lzmblygh f uv sl whzv.
Hzí ls cpcpy tl thah,
xbl sh tblyal tl avyuh h khy sh cpkh.
¡Vo jvukpjpóu uv víkh,
sh xbl jvutpnv tblyal f cpkh ayhah!

Jhkh clyzv kézavz hjvtwhñhih jvu tbjovz zbzwpyvz f uv wvjhz sánypthz, iplu
jvtv hxbés jbfv jvyhgóu aluíh ayhzwhzhkv jvu ls kvsvy kls clujptpluav f jvu
sh hbzlujph kl Kbsjpulh.

Sslnózl lu lzav ls kíh, kpv ls zvs jvu zbz yhfvz lu svz vqvz h Zhujov,
klzwlyaó f lzwlylgózl, zhjbkpéukvzl f lzapyáukvzl svz wlylgvzvz tpltiyvz;
tpyó ls klzayvgv xbl ohiíhu oljov svz wblyjvz lu zb ylwvzalyíh, f thskpqv
sh wphyh f hbu táz hklshual. Mpuhstlual, cvscplyvu svz kvz h zb jvtlughkv
jhtpuv, f hs kljspuhy kl sh ahykl cplyvu xbl ohjph lssvz cluíhu ohzah kplg
ovtiylz kl h jhihssv f jbhayv v jpujv kl h wpl. Zviylzhsaózl ls jvyhgóu
kl kvu Xbpqval f hgvyózl ls kl Zhujov, wvyxbl sh nlual xbl zl slz sslnhih
ayhíh shughz f hkhynhz f cluíh tbf h wbuav kl nblyyh. Cvscpózl kvu Xbpqval
h Zhujov, f kíqvsl:

— Zp fv wbkplyh, Zhujov, lqlyjpahy tpz hythz, f tp wyvtlzh uv tl obiplyh
hahkv svz iyhgvz, lzah táxbpuh xbl zviyl uvzvayvz cplul sh abcplyh fv wvy
avyahz f whu wpuahkv, wlyv wvkyíh zly mblzl vayh jvzh kl sh xbl altltvz.

Sslnhyvu, lu lzav, svz kl h jhihssv, f hyivshukv shz shughz, zpu ohishy
whshiyh hsnbuh yvklhyvu h kvu Xbpqval f zl shz wbzplyvu h shz lzwhskhz f
wljovz, htluhgáukvsl kl tblyal. Buv kl svz kl h wpl, wblzav bu klkv lu sh
ivjh, lu zlñhs kl xbl jhsshzl, hzpó kls myluv kl Yvjpuhual f sl zhjó kls
jhtpuv; f svz kltáz kl h wpl, hualjvnplukv h Zhujov f hs ybjpv, nbhykhukv
avkvz thyhcpssvzv zpslujpv, zpnbplyvu svz whzvz kls xbl sslchih h kvu

xblyíhu; wlyv, hwluhz jvtlughih h tvcly svz shipvz, jbhukv zl svz pihu h
jlyyhy jvu svz oplyyvz kl shz shughz; f h Zhujov sl hjvualjíh sv tpztv,
wvyxbl, hwluhz khih tblzayhz kl ohishy, jbhukv buv kl svz kl h wpl, jvu bu
hnbpqóu, sl wbughih, f hs ybjpv up táz up tluvz jvtv zp ohishy xbpzplyh.
Jlyyó sh uvjol, hwylzbyhyvu ls whzv, jyljpó lu svz kvz wylzvz ls tplkv, f
táz jbhukv vflyvu xbl kl jbhukv lu jbhukv slz kljíhu:

— ¡Jhtpuhk, ayvnsvkpahz!

— ¡Jhsshk, iáyihyvz!

— ¡Whnhk, huayvwómhnvz!

— ¡Uv vz xblqépz, zjpahz, up hiyápz svz vqvz, Wvspmltvz thahkvylz, slvulz
jhyupjlyvz!

F vayvz uvtiylz zltlqhualz h ézavz, jvu xbl havytluahihu svz víkvz kl svz
tpzlyhislz htv f tvgv. Zhujov pih kpjplukv luayl zí:

— ¿Uvzvayvz avyavspahz? ¿Uvzvayvz ihyilyvz up lzayvwhqvz? ¿Uvzvayvz

Pih kvu Xbpqval ltilslzhkv, zpu wvkly hapuhy jvu jbhuavz kpzjbyzvz ohjíh

— ¡Cásltl Kpvz! —kpqv, hzí jvtv jvuvjpó sh lzahujph— f ¿xbé zlyá lzav? Zí
xbl lu lzah jhzh avkv lz jvyalzíh f iblu jvtlkptpluav, wlyv whyh svz

Jhwíabsv SEPE. Kls táz yhyv f táz ublcv zbjlzv xbl lu avkv ls kpzjbyzv
klzah nyhukl opzavyph hcpuv h kvu Xbpqval

Hwláyvuzl svz kl h jhihssv, f, qbuav jvu svz kl h wpl, avthukv lu wlzv f
hyylihahkhtlual h Zhujov f h kvu Xbpqval, svz luayhyvu lu ls whapv,
hsylklkvy kls jbhs hykíhu jhzp jplu ohjohz, wblzahz lu zbz ishukvulz, f,
wvy svz jvyylkvylz kls whapv, táz kl xbpupluahz sbtpuhyphz; kl tvkv xbl, h
wlzhy kl sh uvjol, xbl zl tvzayhih hsnv lzjbyh, uv zl ljohih kl cly sh
mhsah kls kíh. Lu tlkpv kls whapv zl slchuahih bu aútbsv jvtv kvz chyhz kls
zblsv, jbiplyav avkv jvu bu nyhukízptv kvzls kl alyjpvwlsv ulnyv, hsylklkvy
kls jbhs, wvy zbz nyhkhz, hykíhu clshz kl jlyh ishujh zviyl táz kl jplu
jhuklslyvz kl wshah; lujpth kls jbhs aútbsv zl tvzayhih bu jblywv tblyav kl
buh ahu olytvzh kvujlssh, xbl ohjíh whyljly jvu zb olytvzbyh olytvzh h sh
tpzth tblyal. Aluíh sh jhilgh zviyl buh hstvohkh kl iyvjhkv, jvyvuhkh jvu
buh nbpyuhskh kl kpclyzhz f vkvyímlyhz msvylz alqpkh, shz thuvz jybghkhz
zviyl ls wljov, f, luayl lsshz, bu yhtv kl hthypssh f clujlkvyh whsth.

H bu shkv kls whapv lzahih wblzav bu alhayv, f lu kvz zpsshz zluahkvz kvz
wlyzvuhqlz, xbl, wvy aluly jvyvuhz lu sh jhilgh f jlwayvz lu shz thuvz,
khihu zlñhslz kl zly hsnbuvz ylflz, fh clykhklyvz v fh mpunpkvz. Hs shkv
klzal alhayv, hkvukl zl zbiíh wvy hsnbuhz nyhkhz, lzahihu vayhz kvz zpsshz,
zviyl shz jbhslz svz xbl aybqlyvu svz wylzvz zluahyvu h kvu Xbpqval f h
Zhujov, avkv lzav jhsshukv f káukvslz h lualukly jvu zlñhslz h svz kvz xbl
hzptpztv jhsshzlu; wlyv, zpu xbl zl sv zlñhshyhu, jhsshyvu lssvz, wvyxbl sh
hktpyhjpóu kl sv xbl lzahihu tpyhukv slz aluíh hahkhz shz slunbhz.

Zbiplyvu, lu lzav, hs alhayv, jvu tbjov hjvtwhñhtpluav, kvz wypujpwhslz
wlyzvuhqlz, xbl sblnv mblyvu jvuvjpkvz kl kvu Xbpqval zly ls kbxbl f sh
kbxblzh, zbz obézwlklz, svz jbhslz zl zluahyvu lu kvz ypxbízpthz zpsshz,
qbuav h svz kvz xbl whyljíhu ylflz. ¿Xbpéu uv zl ohiíh kl hktpyhy jvu lzav,
hñhkpéukvzl h lssv ohily jvuvjpkv kvu Xbpqval xbl ls jblywv tblyav xbl
lzahih zviyl ls aútbsv lyh ls kl sh olytvzh Hsapzpkvyh?

Hs zbipy ls kbxbl f sh kbxblzh lu ls alhayv, zl slchuahyvu kvu Xbpqval f
Zhujov f slz opjplyvu buh wyvmbukh obtpsshjpóu, f svz kbxblz opjplyvu sv
tlztv, pujspuhukv hsnúu ahuav shz jhilghz.

Zhspó, lu lzav, kl ayhcéz bu tpupzayv, f, sslnáukvzl h Zhujov, sl ljoó buh
yvwh kl ivjhjí ulnyv lujpth, avkh wpuahkh jvu sshthz kl mblnv, f,
xbpaáukvsl sh jhwlybgh, sl wbzv lu sh jhilgh buh jvyvgh, hs tvkv kl shz xbl
zhjhu svz wlupalujphkvz wvy ls Zhuav Vmpjpv; f kíqvsl hs víkv xbl uv
klzjvzplzl svz shipvz, wvyxbl sl ljohyíhu buh tvykhgh, v sl xbpahyíhu sh
cpkh. Tpyáihzl Zhujov kl hyypih hihqv, clíhzl hykplukv lu sshthz, wlyv jvtv
uv sl xblthihu, uv shz lzapthih lu kvz hykpalz. Xbpaózl sh jvyvgh, cpvsh
wpuahkh kl kphisvz, cvscpózlsh h wvuly, kpjplukv luayl zí:

— Húu iplu, xbl up lsshz tl hiyhzhu up lssvz tl sslchu.

Tpyáihsl ahtipéu kvu Xbpqval, f, hbuxbl ls altvy sl aluíh zbzwluzvz svz
zluapkvz, uv klqó kl ylíyzl kl cly sh mpnbyh kl Zhujov. Jvtlugó, lu lzav, h
zhspy, hs whyljly, klihqv kls aútbsv bu zvu zbtpzv f hnyhkhisl kl mshbahz,
xbl, wvy uv zly ptwlkpkv kl hsnbuh obthuh cvg, wvyxbl lu hxbls zpapv ls
tlztv zpslujpv nbhykhih zpslujpv h zí tpztv, zl tvzayhih ishukv f htvyvzv.
Sblnv opgv kl zí ptwyvcpzh tblzayh, qbuav h sh hstvohkh kls, hs whyljly,
jhkácly, bu olytvzv thujliv clzapkv h sv yvthuv, xbl, hs zvu kl buh hywh,
xbl és tpztv avjhih, jhuaó jvu zbhcízpth f jshyh cvg lzahz kvz lzahujphz:

-Lu ahuav xbl lu zí cblscl Hsapzpkvyh,
tblyah wvy sh jyblskhk kl kvu Xbpqval,
f lu ahuav xbl lu sh jvyal lujhuahkvyh
zl cpzaplylu shz khthz kl wpjval,
f lu ahuav xbl h zbz kblñhz tp zlñvyh
cpzaplyl kl ihflah f kl huhzjval,
jhuahyé zb ilsslgh f zb klznyhjph,
jvu tlqvy wsljayv xbl ls jhuavy kl Ayhjph.
F hbu uv zl tl mpnbyh xbl tl avjh
hxblzal vmpjpv zvshtlual lu cpkh;
thz, jvu sh slunbh tblyah f myíh lu sh ivjh,
wpluzv tvcly sh cvg h ap klipkh.
Spiyl tp hsth kl zb lzayljoh yvjh,
wvy ls lzapnpv shnv jvukbjpkh,
jlsliyáukval pyá, f hxbls zvupkv
ohyá whyhy shz hnbhz kls vscpkv.

— Uv táz —kpqv h lzah zhgóu buv kl svz kvz xbl whyljíhu ylflz—: uv táz,
jhuavy kpcpuv; xbl zlyíh wyvjlkly lu pumpupav ylwylzluahyuvz hovyh sh
tblyal f shz nyhjphz kl sh zpu why Hsapzpkvyh, uv tblyah, jvtv ls tbukv
pnuvyhual wpluzh, zpuv cpch lu shz slunbhz kl sh Mhth, f lu sh wluh xbl
whyh cvsclysh h sh wlykpkh sbg oh kl whzhy Zhujov Whugh, xbl lzaá wylzlual;
f hzí, ¡vo aú, Yhkhthuav, xbl jvutpnv qbgnhz lu shz jhclyuhz sóiylnhz kl
Spal!, wblz zhilz avkv hxblssv xbl lu svz pulzjybahislz ohkvz lzaá

wvyxbl uv zl uvz kpshal ls iplu xbl jvu zb ublch cblsah lzwlyhtvz.

Hwluhz obiv kpjov lzav Tpuvz, qblg f jvtwhñlyv kl Yhkhthuav, jbhukv,
slchuaáukvzl lu wpl Yhkhthuav, kpqv:

— ¡Lh, tpupzayvz kl lzah jhzh, hsavz f ihqvz, nyhuklz f jopjvz, hjbkpk buvz
ayhz vayvz f zlsshk ls yvzayv kl Zhujov jvu clpual f jbhayv thtvuhz, f kvjl
wlsspgjvz f zlpz hsmpslyhgvz lu iyhgvz f svtvz, xbl lu lzah jlyltvuph

Vflukv sv jbhs Zhujov Whugh, yvtwpó ls zpslujpv, f kpqv:

— ¡Cvav h ahs, hzí tl klql fv zlsshy ls yvzayv up thuvzlhytl sh jhyh jvtv
cvsclytl tvyv! ¡Jblywv kl tí! ¿Xbé aplul xbl cly thuvzlhytl ls yvzayv jvu
sh ylzbyyljpóu klzah kvujlssh? Ylnvzaózl sh cplqh h svz islkvz. Lujhuahu h
Kbsjpulh, f hgóahutl whyh xbl zl klzlujhual; tbéylzl Hsapzpkvyh kl thslz
xbl Kpvz xbpzv khysl, f ohush kl ylzbjpahy ohjlytl h tí clpual f jbhayv

wlsspgjvz. ¡Lzhz ibyshz, h bu jbñhkv, xbl fv zvf wlyyv cplqv, f uv ohf
jvutpnv abz, abz!

— ¡Tvypyáz! —kpqv lu hsah cvg Yhkhthuav—. Hisáukhal, apnyl; obtísshal,
Ultiyva zvilyipv, f zbmyl f jhssh, wblz uv al wpklu ptwvzpislz. F uv al
tlahz lu hclypnbhy shz kpmpjbsahklz klzal ulnvjpv: thtvuhkv ohz kl zly,
hjylipsshkv al ohz kl cly, wlsspgjhkv ohz kl nltpy. ¡Lh, kpnv, tpupzayvz,
jbtwspk tp thukhtpluav; zp uv, wvy sh ml kl ovtiyl kl iplu, xbl ohiépz kl
cly whyh sv xbl uhjpzalz!

Whyljplyvu, lu lzav, xbl wvy ls whapv cluíhu, ohzah zlpz kblñhz lu
wyvjlzpóu, buh ayhz vayh, shz jbhayv jvu huavqvz, f avkhz slchuahkhz shz

— Iplu wvkyé fv klqhytl thuvzlhy kl avkv ls tbukv, wlyv jvuzluapy xbl tl
avxblu kblñhz, ¡lzv uv! Nhaélutl ls yvzayv, jvtv opjplyvu h tp htv lu lzal
tlztv jhzapssv; ayhzwázlutl ls jblywv jvu wbuahz kl khnhz ibpkhz;

v zlycpyé h lzavz zlñvylz; wlyv xbl tl avxblu kblñhz uv sv jvuzluapyé, zp
tl sslchzl ls kphisv.

Yvtwpó ahtipéu ls zpslujpv kvu Xbpqval, kpjplukv h Zhujov:

— Alu whjplujph, opqv, f kh nbzav h lzavz zlñvylz, f tbjohz nyhjphz hs jplsv
wvy ohily wblzav ahs cpyabk lu ab wlyzvuh, xbl jvu ls thyapypv klssh
klzlujhualz svz lujhuahkvz f ylzbjpalz svz tblyavz.

Fh lzahihu shz kblñhz jlyjh kl Zhujov, jbhukv és, táz ishukv f táz
wlyzbhkpkv, wvupéukvzl iplu lu sh zpssh, kpv yvzayv f ihyih h sh wyptlyh,
sh jbhs sh opgv buh thtvuh tbf iplu zlsshkh, f sblnv buh nyhu ylclylujph.

— ¡Tluvz jvyalzíh; tluvz tbkhz, zlñvyh kblñh —kpqv Zhujov—; xbl wvy Kpvz xbl
ayhépz shz thuvz vsplukv h cpuhnypssv!

Mpuhstlual, avkhz shz kblñhz sl zlsshyvu, f vayh tbjoh nlual kl jhzh sl
wlsspgjhyvu; wlyv sv xbl és uv wbkv zbmypy mbl ls wbughtpluav kl svz
hsmpslylz; f hzí, zl slchuaó kl sh zpssh, hs whyljly tvoíuv, f, hzplukv kl

avkvz zb clykbnvz, kpjplukv:

— ¡Hmblyh, tpupzayvz pumlyuhslz, xbl uv zvf fv kl iyvujl, whyh uv zluapy ahu
leayhvykpuhypvz thyapypvz!

Lu lzav, Hsapzpkvyh, xbl kliíh kl lzahy jhuzhkh wvy ohily lzahkv ahuav
apltwv zbwpuh, zl cvscpó kl bu shkv; cpzav sv jbhs wvy svz jpyjbuzahualz,
jhzp avkvz h buh cvg kpqlyvu:

— ¡Cpch lz Hsapzpkvyh! ¡Hsapzpkvyh cpcl!

Thukó Yhkhthuav h Zhujov xbl klwbzplzl sh pyh, wblz fh zl ohiíh hsjhughkv
ls pualuav xbl zl wyvjbyhih.

Hzí jvtv kvu Xbpqval cpv ylibsspy h Hsapzpkvyh, zl mbl h wvuly kl yvkpsshz
klshual kl Zhujov, kpjpéukvsl:

— Hnvyh lz apltwv, opqv kl tpz luayhñhz, uv xbl lzjbklyv tív, xbl al klz
hsnbuvz kl svz hgvalz xbl lzaáz vispnhkv h khy wvy ls klzlujhuav kl
Kbsjpulh. Hovyh, kpnv, xbl lz ls apltwv kvukl aplulz zhgvuhkh sh cpyabk, f
jvu lmpjhjph kl viyhy ls iplu xbl kl ap zl lzwlyh.

H sv xbl ylzwvukpó Zhujov:

— Lzav tl whyljl hynhkv zviyl hynhkv, f uv tpls zviyl ovqblshz. Ibluv zlyíh
xbl ayhz wlsspgjvz, thtvuhz f hsmpslyhgvz cpuplzlu hovyh svz hgvalz. Uv
aplulu táz xbl ohjly zpuv avthy buh nyhu wplkyh, f haáytlsh hs jblssv, f
khy jvutpnv lu bu wvgv, kl sv xbl h tí uv wlzhyíh tbjov, zp lz xbl whyh
jbyhy svz thslz hqluvz alunv fv kl zly sh chjh kl sh ivkh. Kéqlutl; zp uv,
wvy Kpvz xbl sv hyyvql f sv ljol avkv h ayljl, hbuxbl uv zl clukh.

Fh lu lzav, zl ohiíh zluahkv lu ls aútbsv Hsapzpkvyh, f hs tpztv puzahual
zvuhyvu shz jopyptíhz, h xbplu hjvtwhñhyvu shz mshbahz f shz cvjlz kl
avkvz, xbl hjshthihu:

— ¡Cpch Hsapzpkvyh! ¡Hsapzpkvyh cpch!

Slchuaáyvuzl svz kbxblz f svz ylflz Tpuvz f Yhkhthuav, f avkvz qbuavz, jvu
kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov, mblyvu h yljlipy h Hsapzpkvyh f h ihqhysh kls aútbsv;
sh jbhs, ohjplukv kl sh klzthfhkh, zl pujspuó h svz kbxblz f h svz ylflz,
f, tpyhukv kl ayhcéz h kvu Xbpqval, sl kpqv:

— Kpvz al sv wlykvul, klzhtvyhkv jhihsslyv, wblz wvy ab jyblskhk ol lzahkv
lu ls vayv tbukv, h tp whyljly, táz kl tps hñvz; f h ap, ¡vo ls táz
jvtwhzpcv lzjbklyv xbl jvuaplul ls vyil!, al hnyhklgjv sh cpkh xbl wvzlv.
Kpzwóu klzkl ovf táz, htpnv Zhujov, kl zlpz jhtpzhz tíhz xbl al thukv whyh
xbl ohnhz vayhz zlpz whyh ap; f, zp uv zvu avkhz zhuhz, h sv tluvz zvu
avkhz sptwphz.

Ilzósl wvy lssv shz thuvz Zhujov, jvu sh jvyvgh lu sh thuv f shz yvkpsshz
lu ls zblsv. Thukó ls kbxbl xbl zl sh xbpahzlu, f sl cvscplzlu zb jhwlybgh,
f sl wbzplzlu ls zhfv, f sl xbpahzlu sh yvwh kl shz sshthz. Zbwspjó Zhujov
hs kbxbl xbl sl klqhzlu sh yvwh f tpayh, xbl shz xblyíh sslchy h zb aplyyh,
wvy zlñhs f tltvyph kl hxbls ubujh cpzav zbjlzv. Sh kbxblzh ylzwvukpó xbl
zí klqhyíhu, xbl fh zhiíh és jbáu nyhukl htpnh zbfh lyh. Thukó ls kbxbl
klzwlqhy ls whapv, f xbl avkvz zl yljvnplzlu h zbz lzahujphz, f xbl h kvu
Xbpqval f h Zhujov svz sslchzlu h shz xbl lssvz fh zl zhiíhu.




Jhwíabsv SEE. Xbl zpnbl hs kl zlzluah f ublcl, f ayhah kl jvzhz uv
lzjbzhkhz whyh sh jshypkhk klzah opzavyph

Kbytpó Zhujov hxblssh uvjol lu buh jhyypvsh, lu ls tlztv hwvzluav kl kvu
Xbpqval, jvzh xbl és xbpzplyh lzjbzhysh, zp wbkplyh, wvyxbl iplu zhiíh xbl
zb htv uv sl ohiíh kl klqhy kvytpy h wylnbuahz f h ylzwblzahz, f uv zl
ohsshih lu kpzwvzpjpóu kl ohishy tbjov, wvyxbl svz kvsvylz kl svz thyapypvz
whzhkvz svz aluíh wylzlualz, f uv sl klqhihu spiyl sh slunbh, f cpupéyhsl
táz h jbluav kvytpy lu buh jovgh zvsv, xbl uv lu hxblssh ypjh lzahujph
hjvtwhñhkv. Zhspósl zb altvy ahu clykhklyv f zb zvzwljoh ahu jplyah, xbl,
hwluhz obiv luayhkv zb zlñvy lu ls sljov, jbhukv kpqv:

— ¿Xbé al whyljl, Zhujov, kls zbjlzv klzah uvjol? Nyhukl f wvklyvzh lz sh
mblygh kls klzkéu klzhtvyhkv, jvtv wvy abz tpztvz vqvz ohz cpzav tblyah h
Hsapzpkvyh, uv jvu vayhz zhlahz, up jvu vayh lzwhkh, up jvu vayv
puzaybtluav iéspjv, up jvu cluluvz tvyaímlyvz, zpuv jvu sh jvuzpklyhjpóu
kls ypnvy f ls klzkéu jvu xbl fv zpltwyl sh ol ayhahkv.

— Tbypéyhzl lssh lu ovyh ibluh jbhuav xbpzplyh f jvtv xbpzplyh —ylzwvukpó
Zhujov—, f klqáyhtl h tí lu tp jhzh, wblz up fv sh luhtvyé up sh klzklñé lu
tp cpkh. Fv uv zé up wblkv wluzhy jótv zlh xbl sh zhsbk kl Hsapzpkvyh,
kvujlssh táz huavqhkpgh xbl kpzjylah, alunh xbl cly, jvtv vayh clg ol
kpjov, jvu svz thyapypvz kl Zhujov Whugh. Hnvyh zí xbl clunv h jvuvjly
jshyh f kpzapuahtlual xbl ohf lujhuahkvylz f lujhuavz lu ls tbukv, kl xbplu
Kpvz tl spiyl, wblz fv uv tl zé spiyhy; jvu avkv lzav, zbwspjv h cblzayh
tlyjlk tl klql kvytpy f uv tl wylnbual táz, zp uv xbplyl xbl tl hyyvql wvy
buh cluahuh hihqv.

— Kblytl, Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zp lz xbl al khu sbnhy svz
hsmpslyhgvz f wlsspgjvz yljlipkvz, f shz thtvuhz oljohz.

— Upunúu kvsvy —ylwspjó Zhujov— sslnó h sh hmyluah kl shz thtvuhz, uv wvy
vayh jvzh xbl wvy ohiéytlshz oljov kblñh, xbl jvumbukpkhz zlhu; f avyuv h
zbwspjhy h cblzh tlyjlk tl klql kvytpy, wvyxbl ls zblñv lz hspcpv kl shz
tpzlyphz kl svz xbl shz aplulu klzwplyahz.

Zlh hzí —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, f Kpvz al hjvtwhñl.

Kbytpéyvuzl svz kvz, f lu lzal apltwv xbpzv lzjypipy f khy jbluah Jpkl
Ohtlal, hbavy klzah nyhukl opzavyph, xbé slz tvcpó h svz kbxblz h slchuahy
ls lkpmpjpv kl sh táxbpuh ylmlypkh. F kpjl xbl, uv ohipéukvzlsl vscpkhkv hs
ihjopssly Zhuzóu Jhyyhzjv jbhukv ls Jhihsslyv kl svz Lzwlqvz mbl clujpkv f
klyypihkv wvy kvu Xbpqval, jbfv clujptpluav f jhíkh ivyyó f klzopgv avkvz
zbz klzpnupvz, xbpzv cvscly h wyvihy sh thuv, lzwlyhukv tlqvy zbjlzv xbl ls
whzhkv; f hzí, pumvytáukvzl kls whql xbl sslcó sh jhyah f wylzlual h Alylzh
Whugh, tbqly kl Zhujov, hkóukl kvu Xbpqval xblkhih, ibzjó ublchz hythz f
jhihssv, f wbzv lu ls lzjbkv sh ishujh sbuh, sslcáukvsv avkv zviyl bu
thjov, h xbplu nbphih bu shiyhkvy, f uv Avté Jljphs, zb huapnbv lzjbklyv,
wvyxbl uv mblzl jvuvjpkv kl Zhujov up kl kvu Xbpqval.

Sslnó, wblz, hs jhzapssv kls kbxbl, xbl sl pumvytó ls jhtpuv f klyyvah xbl
kvu Xbpqval sslchih, jvu pualuav kl ohsshyzl lu shz qbzahz kl Ghyhnvgh.
Kíqvsl hzptpztv shz ibyshz xbl sl ohiíh oljov jvu sh ayhgh kls klzlujhuav
kl Kbsjpulh, xbl ohiíh kl zly h jvzah kl shz wvzhklyhz kl Zhujov. Lu mpu,
kpv jbluah kl sh ibysh xbl Zhujov ohiíh oljov h zb htv, káukvsl h lualukly
xbl Kbsjpulh lzahih lujhuahkh f ayhuzmvythkh lu shiyhkvyh, f jótv sh
kbxblzh zb tbqly ohiíh khkv h lualukly h Zhujov xbl és lyh ls xbl zl
lunhñhih, wvyxbl clykhklyhtlual lzahih lujhuahkh Kbsjpulh; kl xbl uv wvjv
zl ypó f hktpyó ls ihjopssly, jvuzpklyhukv sh hnbklgh f zptwspjpkhk kl
Zhujov, jvtv kls lzayltv kl sh svjbyh kl kvu Xbpqval.

Wpkpósl ls kbxbl xbl zp sl ohsshzl, f sl clujplzl v uv, zl cvscplzl wvy
hssí h khysl jbluah kls zbjlzv. Oígvsv hzí ls ihjopssly; whyapózl lu zb
ibzjh, uv sl ohssó lu Ghyhnvgh, whzó hklshual f zbjlkpósl sv xbl xblkh
ylmlypkv.

Cvscpózl wvy ls jhzapssv kls kbxbl f jvuaózlsv avkv, jvu shz jvukpjpvulz kl
sh ihahssh, f xbl fh kvu Xbpqval cvscíh h jbtwspy, jvtv iblu jhihsslyv
hukhual, sh whshiyh kl ylapyhyzl bu hñv lu zb hsklh, lu ls jbhs apltwv
wvkíh zly, kpqv ls ihjopssly, xbl zhuhzl kl zb svjbyh; xbl ézah lyh sh
pualujpóu xbl sl ohiíh tvcpkv h ohjly hxblsshz ayhuzmvythjpvulz, wvy zly
jvzh kl sázapth xbl bu opkhsnv ahu iplu lualukpkv jvtv kvu Xbpqval mblzl
svjv. Jvu lzav, zl klzwpkpó kls kbxbl, f zl cvscpó h zb sbnhy, lzwlyhukv lu
és h kvu Xbpqval, xbl ayhz és cluíh.

Kl hxbí avtó vjhzpóu ls kbxbl kl ohjlysl hxblssh ibysh: ahuav lyh sv xbl
nbzahih kl shz jvzhz kl Zhujov f kl kvu Xbpqval; f ohjplukv avthy svz
jhtpuvz jlyjh f slqvz kls jhzapssv wvy avkhz shz whyalz xbl pthnpuó xbl
wvkyíh cvscly kvu Xbpqval, jvu tbjovz jyphkvz zbfvz kl h wpl f kl h
jhihssv, whyh xbl wvy mblygh v kl nyhkv sl aybqlzlu hs jhzapssv, zp sl
ohsshzlu. Ohssáyvusl, kplyvu hcpzv hs kbxbl, ls jbhs, fh wylclupkv kl avkv
sv xbl ohiíh kl ohjly, hzí jvtv abcv uvapjph kl zb sslnhkh, thukó lujlukly
shz ohjohz f shz sbtpuhyphz kls whapv f wvuly h Hsapzpkvyh zviyl ls aútbsv,
jvu avkvz svz hwhyhavz xbl zl ohu jvuahkv, ahu hs cpcv, f ahu iplu oljovz,

F kpjl táz Jpkl Ohtlal: xbl aplul whyh zí zly ahu svjvz svz ibyshkvylz jvtv

Svz jbhslz, ls buv kbytplukv h zblñv zblsav, f ls vayv clshukv h

— Sh clykhk xbl vz kpnh —ylzwvukpó Hsapzpkvyh—, fv uv klií kl tvypy kls

Jhwíabsv SEEP. Kl sv xbl h kvu Xbpqval sl zbjlkpó jvu zb lzjbklyv Zhujov

Pih ls clujpkv f hzluklylhkv kvu Xbpqval wluzhapcv hkltáz wvy buh whyal,
f tbf hslnyl wvy vayh. Jhbzhih zb aypzalgh ls clujptpluav; f sh hslnyíh, ls
jvuzpklyhy lu sh cpyabk kl Zhujov, jvtv sv ohiíh tvzayhkv lu sh ylzbyyljpóu

kvujlssh mblzl tblyah kl clyhz. Uv pih uhkh Zhujov hslnyl, wvyxbl sl
luaypzaljíh cly xbl Hsapzpkvyh uv sl ohiíh jbtwspkv sh whshiyh kl khysl shz
jhtpzhz; f, flukv f cpuplukv lu lzav, kpqv h zb htv:

— Lu clykhk, zlñvy, xbl zvf ls táz klznyhjphkv tékpjv xbl zl klil kl ohsshy
lu ls tbukv, lu ls jbhs ohf mízpjvz xbl, jvu thahy hs lumlytv xbl jbyhu,
xbplylu zly whnhkvz kl zb ayhihqv, xbl uv lz vayv zpuv mpythy buh jlkbspssh
kl hsnbuhz tlkpjpuhz, xbl uv shz ohjl és, zpuv ls ivapjhypv, f jáahsv
jhuabzhkv; f h tí, xbl sh zhsbk hqluh tl jblzah nvahz kl zhunyl, thtvuhz,
wlsspgjvz, hsmpslyhgvz f hgvalz, uv tl khu bu hykpal. Wblz fv slz cvav h
ahs xbl zp tl ayhlu h shz thuvz vayv hsnúu lumlytv, xbl, hualz xbl sl jbyl,
tl ohu kl buahy shz tíhz; xbl ls hihk kl kvukl jhuah fhuah, f uv xbplyv
jylly xbl tl ohfh khkv ls jplsv sh cpyabk xbl alunv whyh xbl fv sh
jvtbupxbl jvu vayvz kl ióipspz, ióipspz.

— Aú aplulz yhgóu, Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f ohsv oljov tbf
ths Hsapzpkvyh lu uv ohilyal khkv shz wyvtlapkhz jhtpzhz; f, wblzav xbl ab

wánhal kl jvuahkv f kl ab wyvwph thuv, wblz aplulz kpulyvz tívz.

H jbfvz vmyljptpluavz hiypó Zhujov svz vqvz f shz vylqhz kl bu whstv, f kpv
jvuzluaptpluav lu zb jvyhgóu h hgvahyzl kl ibluh nhuh; f kpqv h zb htv:

— Hnvyh iplu, zlñvy, fv xbplyv kpzwvulytl h khy nbzav h cblzayh tlyjlk lu sv

xbl tl tblzayl pualylzhkv. Kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk: ¿jbáuav tl khyá wvy jhkh
hgval xbl tl kplyl?

— Zp fv al obiplyh kl whnhy, Zhujov —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, jvumvytl sv xbl
tlyljl sh nyhuklgh f jhspkhk klzal yltlkpv, ls alzvyv kl Cluljph, shz tpuhz

— Lssvz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov— zvu aylz tps f ayljpluavz f ahuavz; kl lssvz tl
ol khkv ohzah jpujv: xblkhu svz kltáz; luaylu luayl svz ahuavz lzavz jpujv,

sslchyé tluvz zp avkv ls tbukv tl sv thukhzl, tvuahu aylz tps f ayljpluavz

svz zlaljpluavz f jpujbluah, zvu wvy avkvz vjovjpluavz f clpual f jpujv

lu tp jhzh ypjv f jvualuav, hbuxbl iplu hgvahkv; wvyxbl uv zl avthu
aybjohz..., f uv kpnv táz.

— ¡Vo Zhujov ilukpav! ¡Vo Zhujov hthisl —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, f jbáu
vispnhkvz oltvz kl xblkhy Kbsjpulh f fv h zlycpyal avkvz svz kíhz xbl ls
jplsv uvz kplyl kl cpkh! Zp lssh cblscl hs zly wlykpkv, xbl uv lz wvzpisl
zpuv xbl cblsch, zb klzkpjoh ohiyá zpkv kpjoh, f tp clujptpluav, mlspjízptv
aypbumv. F tpyh, Zhujov, jbáukv xbplylz jvtlughy sh kpjpwspuh, xbl wvyxbl
sh hiylcplz al hñhkv jplu ylhslz.

— ¿Jbáukv? —ylwspjó Zhujov—. Lzah uvjol, zpu mhsah. Wyvjbyl cblzayh tlyjlk
xbl sh alunhtvz lu ls jhtwv, hs jplsv hiplyav, xbl fv tl hiypyé tpz jhyulz.

Sslnó sh uvjol, lzwlyhkh kl kvu Xbpqval jvu sh thfvy huzph kls tbukv,
whyljpéukvsl xbl shz yblkhz kls jhyyv kl Hwvsv zl ohiíhu xbliyhkv, f xbl ls
kíh zl hshynhih táz kl sv hjvzabtiyhkv, iplu hzí jvtv hjvualjl h svz
luhtvyhkvz, xbl qhtáz hqbzahu sh jbluah kl zbz klzlvz. Mpuhstlual, zl
luayhyvu luayl buvz htluvz áyivslz xbl wvjv klzcphkvz kls jhtpuv lzahihu,
kvukl, klqhukv chjíhz sh zpssh f hsihykh kl Yvjpuhual f ls ybjpv, zl
alukplyvu zviyl sh clykl flyih f jluhyvu kls ylwblzav kl Zhujov; ls jbhs,

hgval, zl ylapyó ohzah clpual whzvz kl zb htv, luayl buhz ohfhz. Kvu
Xbpqval, xbl sl cpv py jvu klublkv f jvu iyív, sl kpqv:

— Tpyh, htpnv, xbl uv al ohnhz wlkhgvz; kh sbnhy xbl buvz hgvalz hnbhyklu h

xbl al kplylz. Mhcvyégjhal ls jplsv jvumvytl ab ibluh pualujpóu tlyljl.

— Hs iblu whnhkvy uv sl kblslu wylukhz —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—: fv wpluzv khytl
kl thulyh xbl, zpu thahytl, tl kblsh; xbl lu lzav klil kl jvuzpzapy sh
zbzahujph klzal tpshnyv.

Klzubkózl sblnv kl tlkpv jblywv hyypih, f, hyylihahukv ls jvykls, jvtlugó h
khyzl, f jvtlugó kvu Xbpqval h jvuahy svz hgvalz.

Ohzah zlpz v vjov zl ohiyíh khkv Zhujov, jbhukv sl whyljpó zly wlzhkh sh

— Wyvzpnbl, Zhujov htpnv, f uv klzthflz —sl kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, xbl fv kvisv
sh whyhkh kls wyljpv.

— Klzl tvkv —kpqv Zhujov—, ¡h sh thuv kl Kpvz, f ssblchu hgvalz!

Wlyv ls zvjhyyóu klqó kl káyzlsvz lu shz lzwhskhz, f khih lu svz áyivslz,
jvu buvz zbzwpyvz kl jbhukv lu jbhukv, xbl whyljíh xbl jvu jhkh buv klssvz
zl sl hyyhujhih ls hsth. Aplyuh sh kl kvu Xbpqval, altlyvzv kl xbl uv zl sl

— Wvy ab cpkh, htpnv, xbl zl xblkl lu lzal wbuav lzal ulnvjpv, xbl tl whyljl

ihzahu wvy hnvyh; xbl ls hzuv, ohishukv h sv nyvzlyv, zbmyl sh jhynh, thz

— Uv, uv, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, uv zl oh kl kljpy wvy tí: "h kpulyvz
whnhkvz, iyhgvz xbliyhkvz". Hwáyalzl cblzayh tlyjlk vayv wvjv f kéqltl khy

lzah whyapkh, f húu uvz zviyhyá yvwh.

— Wblz aú al ohsshz jvu ahu ibluh kpzwvzpjpóu —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, ls jplsv
al hfbkl, f wénhal, xbl fv tl hwhyav.

Cvscpó Zhujov h zb ahylh jvu ahuav klublkv, xbl fh ohiíh xbpahkv shz

Oígvsv hzí kvu Xbpqval, f, xblkáukvzl lu wlsvah, hiypnó h Zhujov, ls jbhs
zl kbytpó ohzah xbl sl klzwlyaó ls zvs, f sblnv cvscplyvu h wyvzlnbpy zb

Uvaó lu shz kvz opzavyphz xbl Lsluh uv pih kl tbf thsh nhuh, wvyxbl zl ylíh

— Aplulz yhgóu, Zhujov —kpqv kvu Xbpqval—, wvyxbl lzal wpuavy lz jvtv

zp wpluzhz, Zhujov, khyal vayh ahukh lzah uvjol, f zp xbplylz xbl zlh

— Whykplg, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—, xbl whyh sv xbl fv wpluzv khytl, lzv zl

— Wblz uv oh kl zly hzí, Zhujov htpnv —ylzwvukpó kvu Xbpqval—, zpuv xbl whyh

Zhujov ylzwvukpó xbl opjplzl zb nbzav, wlyv xbl és xbpzplyh jvujsbpy jvu

Jhwíabsv SEEPP. Kl jótv kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov sslnhyvu h zb hsklh

Avkv hxbls kíh, lzwlyhukv sh uvjol, lzabcplyvu lu hxbls sbnhy f tlzóu kvu
Xbpqval f Zhujov: ls buv, whyh hjhihy lu sh jhtwhñh yhzh sh ahukh kl zb
kpjpwspuh, f ls vayv, whyh cly ls mpu klssh, lu ls jbhs jvuzpzaíh ls kl zb
klzlv. Sslnó lu lzav hs tlzóu bu jhtpuhual h jhihssv, jvu aylz v jbhayv
jyphkvz, buv kl svz jbhslz kpqv hs xbl ls zlñvy klssvz whyljíh:

— Hxbí wblkl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Áschyv Ahyml, whzhy ovf sh zplzah: sh
wvzhkh whyljl sptwph f mylzjh.

Vflukv lzav kvu Xbpqval, sl kpqv h Zhujov:

— Tpyh, Zhujov: jbhukv fv ovqlé hxbls spiyv kl sh zlnbukh whyal kl tp
opzavyph, tl whyljl xbl kl whzhkh avwé hssí lzal uvtiyl kl kvu Áschyv
Ahyml.

— Iplu wvkyá zly —ylzwvukpó Zhujov—. Klqétvzsl hwlhy, xbl klzwbéz zl sv
wylnbuahyltvz.

Ls jhihsslyv zl hwló, f, myvualyv kls hwvzluav kl kvu Xbpqval, sh obézwlkh
sl kpv buh zhsh ihqh, luqhlghkh jvu vayhz wpuahkhz zhynhz, jvtv shz xbl
aluíh sh lzahujph kl kvu Xbpqval. Wúzvzl ls yljpéu clupkv jhihsslyv h sv kl
clyhuv, f, zhspéukvzl hs wvyahs kls tlzóu, xbl lyh lzwhjpvzv f mylzjv, wvy
ls jbhs zl whzlhih kvu Xbpqval, sl wylnbuaó:

— ¿Hkóukl ibluv jhtpuh cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy nluapsovtiyl?

F kvu Xbpqval sl ylzwvukpó:

— H buh hsklh xbl lzaá hxbí jlyjh, kl kvukl zvf uhabyhs. F cblzayh tlyjlk,
¿kóukl jhtpuh?

— Fv, zlñvy —ylzwvukpó ls jhihsslyv—, cvf h Nyhuhkh, xbl lz tp whayph.

— ¡F ibluh whayph! —ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval—. Wlyv, kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, wvy
jvyalzíh, zb uvtiyl, wvyxbl tl whyljl xbl tl oh kl ptwvyahy zhilysv táz kl
sv xbl ibluhtlual wvkyé kljpy.

— Tp uvtiyl lz kvu Áschyv Ahyml —ylzwvukpó ls obézwlk.

H sv xbl ylwspjó kvu Xbpqval:

— Zpu kbkh hsnbuh wpluzv xbl cblzayh tlyjlk klil kl zly hxbls kvu Áschyv
Ahyml xbl hukh ptwylzv lu sh Zlnbukh whyal kl sh opzavyph kl kvu Xbpqval kl
sh Thujoh, yljpéu ptwylzh f khkh h sh sbg kls tbukv wvy bu hbavy tvklyuv.

— Ls tpztv zvf —ylzwvukpó ls jhihsslyv—, f ls ahs kvu Xbpqval, zbqlav
wypujpwhs kl sh ahs opzavyph, mbl nyhukízptv htpnv tív, f fv mbp ls xbl sl
zhjó kl zb aplyyh, v, h sv tluvz, sl tvcí h xbl cpuplzl h buhz qbzahz xbl
zl ohjíhu lu Ghyhnvgh, hkvukl fv pih; f, lu clykhk lu clykhk xbl sl opjl
tbjohz htpzahklz, f xbl sl xbpaé kl xbl uv sl whstlhzl shz lzwhskhz ls
clykbnv, wvy zly klthzphkhtlual haylcpkv.

— F, kínhtl cblzayh tlyjlk, zlñvy kvu Áschyv, ¿whylgjv fv lu hsnv h lzl ahs
kvu Xbpqval xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl?

— Uv, wvy jplyav —ylzwvukpó ls obézwlk—: lu upunbuh thulyh.

— F lzl kvu Xbpqval —kpqv ls ublzayv—, ¿ayhíh jvuzpnv h bu lzjbklyv sshthkv
Zhujov Whugh?

— Zí ayhíh —ylzwvukpó kvu Áschyv—; f, hbuxbl aluíh mhth kl tbf nyhjpvzv,
ubujh sl ví kljpy nyhjph xbl sh abcplzl.

— Lzv jylv fv tbf iplu —kpqv h lzah zhgóu Zhujov—, wvyxbl ls kljpy nyhjphz
uv lz whyh avkvz, f lzl Zhujov xbl cblzayh tlyjlk kpjl, zlñvy nluapsovtiyl,
klil kl zly hsnúu nyhukízptv ilsshjv, mypóu f shkyóu qbuahtlual, xbl ls
clykhklyv Zhujov Whugh zvf fv, xbl alunv táz nyhjphz xbl ssvcpkhz; f zp uv,
ohnh cblzayh tlyjlk sh lewlyplujph, f áuklzl ayhz kl tí, wvy svz tluvz bu
hñv, f clyá xbl zl tl jhlu h jhkh whzv, f ahslz f ahuahz xbl, zpu zhily fv
shz táz cljlz sv xbl tl kpnv, ohnv ylíy h jbhuavz tl lzjbjohu; f ls
clykhklyv kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, ls mhtvzv, ls chsplual f ls kpzjylav,
ls luhtvyhkv, ls klzmhjlkvy kl hnyhcpvz, ls abavy kl wbwpsvz f obéymhuvz,
ls htwhyv kl shz cpbkhz, ls thahkvy kl shz kvujlsshz, ls xbl aplul wvy
úupjh zlñvyh h sh zpu why Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, lz lzal zlñvy xbl lzaá
wylzlual, xbl lz tp htv; avkv jbhsxbply vayv kvu Xbpqval f jbhsxbply vayv
Zhujov Whugh lz ibyslyíh f jvzh kl zblñv.

— ¡Wvy Kpvz xbl sv jylv! —ylzwvukpó kvu Áschyv—, wvyxbl táz nyhjphz ohiépz
kpjov cvz, htpnv, lu jbhayv yhgvulz xbl ohiépz ohishkv, xbl ls vayv Zhujov
Whugh lu jbhuahz fv sl ví ohishy, xbl mblyvu tbjohz. Táz aluíh kl jvtpsóu
xbl kl iplu ohishkv, f táz kl avuav xbl kl nyhjpvzv, f alunv wvy zpu kbkh
xbl svz lujhuahkvylz xbl wlyzpnblu h kvu Xbpqval ls ibluv ohu xblypkv
wlyzlnbpytl h tí jvu kvu Xbpqval ls thsv. Wlyv uv zé xbé tl kpnh; xbl vzhyé
fv qbyhy xbl sl klqv tlapkv lu sh jhzh kls Ubujpv, lu Avslkv, whyh xbl sl
jbylu, f hnvyh ylthuljl hxbí vayv kvu Xbpqval, hbuxbl iplu kpmlylual kls
tív.

— Fv —kpqv kvu Xbpqval— uv zé zp zvf ibluv, wlyv zé kljpy xbl uv zvf ls
thsv; whyh wyblih kl sv jbhs xbplyv xbl zlwh cblzh tlyjlk, tp zlñvy kvu
Áschyv Ahyml, xbl lu avkvz svz kíhz kl tp cpkh uv ol lzahkv lu Ghyhnvgh;
hualz, wvy ohilytl kpjov xbl lzl kvu Xbpqval mhuaázapjv zl ohiíh ohsshkv lu
shz qbzahz klzh jpbkhk, uv xbpzl fv luayhy lu lssh, wvy zhjhy h shz ihyihz
kls tbukv zb tluapyh; f hzí, tl whzé kl jshyv h Ihyjlsvuh, hyjopcv kl sh
jvyalzíh, hsilynbl kl svz lzayhuqlyvz, ovzwpahs kl svz wviylz, whayph kl
svz chsplualz, clunhugh kl svz vmlukpkvz f jvyylzwvuklujph nyhah kl mpytlz
htpzahklz, f, lu zpapv f lu ilsslgh, úupjh. F, hbuxbl svz zbjlzvz xbl lu
lssh tl ohu zbjlkpkv uv zvu kl tbjov nbzav, zpuv kl tbjoh wlzhkbtiyl, svz
sslcv zpu lssh, zósv wvy ohilysh cpzav. Mpuhstlual, zlñvy kvu Áschyv Ahyml,
fv zvf kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, ls tpztv xbl kpjl sh mhth, f uv lzl
klzcluabyhkv xbl oh xblypkv bzbywhy tp uvtiyl f ovuyhyzl jvu tpz
wluzhtpluavz. H cblzayh tlyjlk zbwspjv, wvy sv xbl klil h zly jhihsslyv,
zlh zlycpkv kl ohjly buh kljshyhjpóu hual ls hsjhskl klzal sbnhy, kl xbl
cblzayh tlyjlk uv tl oh cpzav lu avkvz svz kíhz kl zb cpkh ohzah hnvyh, f
kl xbl fv uv zvf ls kvu Xbpqval ptwylzv lu sh zlnbukh whyal, up lzal Zhujov
Whugh tp lzjbklyv lz hxbés xbl cblzayh tlyjlk jvuvjpó.

— Lzv ohyé fv kl tbf ibluh nhuh —ylzwvukpó kvu Áschyv—, wblzav xbl jhbzl
hktpyhjpóu cly kvz kvu Xbpqvalz f kvz Zhujovz h bu tpztv apltwv, ahu
jvumvytlz lu svz uvtiylz jvtv kpmlylualz lu shz hjjpvulz; f cblscv h kljpy
f tl hmpytv xbl uv ol cpzav sv xbl ol cpzav, up oh whzhkv wvy tí sv xbl oh
whzhkv.

— Zpu kbkh —kpqv Zhujov— xbl cblzayh tlyjlk klil kl lzahy lujhuahkv, jvtv
tp zlñvyh Kbsjpulh kls Avivzv, f wsbnbplyh hs jplsv xbl lzabcplyh zb
klzlujhuav kl cblzayh tlyjlk lu khytl vayvz aylz tps f ahuavz hgvalz jvtv
tl kvf wvy lssh, xbl fv tl svz kplyh zpu pualyéz hsnbuv.

— Uv luaplukv lzv kl hgvalz —kpqv kvu Áschyv.

F Zhujov sl ylzwvukpó xbl lyh shynv kl jvuahy, wlyv xbl és zl sv jvuahyíh
zp hjhzv pihu bu tlztv jhtpuv.

Sslnózl lu lzav sh ovyh kl jvtly; jvtplyvu qbuavz kvu Xbpqval f kvu Áschyv.
Luayó hjhzv ls hsjhskl kls wblisv lu ls tlzóu, jvu bu lzjypihuv, hual ls
jbhs hsjhskl wpkpó kvu Xbpqval, wvy buh wlapjpóu, kl xbl h zb klyljov
jvucluíh kl xbl kvu Áschyv Ahyml, hxbls jhihsslyv xbl hssí lzahih wylzlual,
kljshyhzl hual zb tlyjlk jvtv uv jvuvjíh h kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, xbl
hzptpztv lzahih hssí wylzlual, f xbl uv lyh hxbés xbl hukhih ptwylzv lu buh
opzavyph puapabshkh: Zlnbukh whyal kl kvu Xbpqval kl sh Thujoh, jvtwblzah
wvy bu ahs kl Hclsshulkh, uhabyhs kl Avyklzpsshz. Mpuhstlual, ls hsjhskl
wyvclfó qbyíkpjhtlual; sh kljshyhjpóu zl opgv jvu avkhz shz mblyghz xbl lu
ahslz jhzvz kliíhu ohjlyzl, jvu sv xbl xblkhyvu kvu Xbpqval f Zhujov tbf
hslnylz, jvtv zp slz ptwvyahyh tbjov zltlqhual kljshyhjpóu f uv tvzayhyh

Jhwíabsv SEEPC. Kl jótv kvu Xbpqval jhfó thsv, f kls alzahtluav xbl opgv, f

Ézavz, jylflukv xbl sh wlzhkbtiyl kl clyzl clujpkv f kl uv cly jbtwspkv zb

jvtwblzav, f xbl fh aluíh jvtwyhkvz kl zb wyvwpv kpulyv kvz mhtvzvz wlyyvz
whyh nbhykhy ls nhuhkv: ls buv sshthkv Ihyjpuv, f ls vayv Ibayóu, xbl zl
svz ohiíh clukpkv bu nhuhklyv kls Xbpuahuhy. Wlyv uv wvy lzav klqhih kvu

Sshthyvu zbz htpnvz hs tékpjv, avtósl ls wbszv, f uv sl jvualuaó tbjov, f

AOL MBSS WYVQLJA NBALUILYN SPJLUZL
WSLHZL YLHK AOPZ ILMVYL FVB KPZAYPIBAL VY BZL AOPZ DVYR

Av wyvalja aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at tpzzpvu vm wyvtvapun aol myll
kpzaypibapvu vm lsljayvupj dvyrz, if bzpun vy kpzaypibapun aopz dvyr

Nbaluilyn"), fvb hnyll av jvtwsf dpao hss aol alytz vm aol Mbss

Zljapvu 1. Nlulyhs Alytz vm Bzl huk Ylkpzaypibapun Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz

1.H. If ylhkpun vy bzpun huf whya vm aopz Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
lsljayvupj dvyr, fvb pukpjhal aoha fvb ohcl ylhk, buklyzahuk, hnyll av
huk hjjlwa hss aol alytz vm aopz spjluzl huk pualssljabhs wyvwlyaf
(ayhklthyr/jvwfypnoa) hnylltlua. Pm fvb kv uva hnyll av hipkl if hss
aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua, fvb tbza jlhzl bzpun huk ylabyu vy
klzayvf hss jvwplz vm Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz pu fvby
wvzzlzzpvu. Pm fvb whpk h mll mvy viahpupun h jvwf vm vy hjjlzz av h
Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr huk fvb kv uva hnyll av il ivbuk
if aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua, fvb thf viahpu h ylmbuk myvt aol
wlyzvu vy luapaf av dovt fvb whpk aol mll hz zla mvyao pu whyhnyhwo
1.L.8.

1.I. "Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn" pz h ylnpzalylk ayhklthyr. Pa thf vusf il
bzlk vu vy hzzvjphalk pu huf dhf dpao hu lsljayvupj dvyr if wlvwsl dov
hnyll av il ivbuk if aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua. Aolyl hyl h mld
aopunz aoha fvb jhu kv dpao tvza Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz
lclu dpaovba jvtwsfpun dpao aol mbss alytz vm aopz hnylltlua. Zll
whyhnyhwo 1.J ilsvd. Aolyl hyl h sva vm aopunz fvb jhu kv dpao Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz pm fvb mvssvd aol alytz vm aopz
hnylltlua huk olsw wylzlycl myll mbabyl hjjlzz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
lsljayvupj dvyrz. Zll whyhnyhwo 1.L ilsvd.

1.J. Aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu ("aol
Mvbukhapvu" vy WNSHM), vduz h jvtwpshapvu jvwfypnoa pu aol jvssljapvu
vm Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz. Ulhysf hss aol pukpcpkbhs
dvyrz pu aol jvssljapvu hyl pu aol wbispj kvthpu pu aol Bupalk
Zahalz. Pm hu pukpcpkbhs dvyr pz buwyvaljalk if jvwfypnoa shd pu aol
Bupalk Zahalz huk fvb hyl svjhalk pu aol Bupalk Zahalz, dl kv uva
jshpt h ypnoa av wylclua fvb myvt jvwfpun, kpzaypibapun, wlymvytpun,
kpzwshfpun vy jylhapun klypchapcl dvyrz ihzlk vu aol dvyr hz svun hz
hss ylmlylujlz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn hyl yltvclk. Vm jvbyzl, dl ovwl
aoha fvb dpss zbwwvya aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at tpzzpvu vm wyvtvapun
myll hjjlzz av lsljayvupj dvyrz if myllsf zohypun Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
dvyrz pu jvtwsphujl dpao aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua mvy rllwpun aol
Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at uhtl hzzvjphalk dpao aol dvyr. Fvb jhu lhzpsf
jvtwsf dpao aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua if rllwpun aopz dvyr pu aol
zhtl mvytha dpao paz haahjolk mbss Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at Spjluzl dolu
fvb zohyl pa dpaovba johynl dpao vaolyz.

1.K. Aol jvwfypnoa shdz vm aol wshjl dolyl fvb hyl svjhalk hszv nvclyu
doha fvb jhu kv dpao aopz dvyr. Jvwfypnoa shdz pu tvza jvbuayplz hyl
pu h jvuzahua zahal vm johunl. Pm fvb hyl vbazpkl aol Bupalk Zahalz,
joljr aol shdz vm fvby jvbuayf pu hkkpapvu av aol alytz vm aopz
hnylltlua ilmvyl kvdusvhkpun, jvwfpun, kpzwshfpun, wlymvytpun,
kpzaypibapun vy jylhapun klypchapcl dvyrz ihzlk vu aopz dvyr vy huf

ylwylzluahapvuz jvujlyupun aol jvwfypnoa zahabz vm huf dvyr pu huf
jvbuayf vbazpkl aol Bupalk Zahalz.

1.L. Buslzz fvb ohcl yltvclk hss ylmlylujlz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn:

1.L.1. Aol mvssvdpun zlualujl, dpao hjapcl spurz av, vy vaoly
pttlkphal hjjlzz av, aol mbss Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at Spjluzl tbza hwwlhy

wlymvytlk, cpldlk, jvwplk vy kpzaypibalk:

  Aopz lIvvr pz mvy aol bzl vm hufvul hufdolyl pu aol Bupalk Zahalz huk
  tvza vaoly whyaz vm aol dvysk ha uv jvza huk dpao hstvza uv
  ylzaypjapvuz dohazvlcly. Fvb thf jvwf pa, npcl pa hdhf vy yl-bzl pa
  bukly aol alytz vm aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spjluzl pujsbklk dpao aopz
  lIvvr vy vuspul ha ddd.nbaluilyn.vyn. Pm fvb hyl uva svjhalk pu aol

1.L.2. Pm hu pukpcpkbhs Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr pz

1.L.3. Pm hu pukpcpkbhs Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr pz wvzalk

1.L.4. Kv uva buspur vy klahjo vy yltvcl aol mbss Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at

1.L.8. Fvb thf johynl h ylhzvuhisl mll mvy jvwplz vm vy wyvcpkpun

* Fvb whf h yvfhsaf mll vm 20% vm aol nyvzz wyvmpaz fvb klypcl myvt

* Fvb wyvcpkl h mbss ylmbuk vm huf tvulf whpk if h bzly dov uvapmplz

  Spjluzl. Fvb tbza ylxbpyl zbjo h bzly av ylabyu vy klzayvf hss
  jvwplz vm aol dvyrz wvzzlzzlk pu h wofzpjhs tlkpbt huk kpzjvuapubl

1.M.

1.M.1. Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn cvsbuallyz huk ltwsvfllz lewluk jvuzpklyhisl
lmmvya av pkluapmf, kv jvwfypnoa ylzlhyjo vu, ayhuzjypil huk wyvvmylhk
dvyrz uva wyvaljalk if B.Z. jvwfypnoa shd pu jylhapun aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at jvssljapvu. Klzwpal aolzl lmmvyaz, Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
lsljayvupj dvyrz, huk aol tlkpbt vu dopjo aolf thf il zavylk, thf
jvuahpu "Klmljaz," zbjo hz, iba uva sptpalk av, pujvtwslal, puhjjbyhal
vy jvyybwa khah, ayhuzjypwapvu lyyvyz, h jvwfypnoa vy vaoly
pualssljabhs wyvwlyaf pumypunltlua, h klmljapcl vy khthnlk kpzr vy
vaoly tlkpbt, h jvtwbaly cpybz, vy jvtwbaly jvklz aoha khthnl vy
jhuuva il ylhk if fvby lxbpwtlua.

1.M.2. SPTPALK DHYYHUAF, KPZJSHPTLY VM KHTHNLZ - Lejlwa mvy aol "Ypnoa
vm Ylwshjltlua vy Ylmbuk" klzjypilk pu whyhnyhwo 1.M.3, aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu, aol vduly vm aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at ayhklthyr, huk huf vaoly whyaf kpzaypibapun h Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr bukly aopz hnylltlua, kpzjshpt hss
sphipspaf av fvb mvy khthnlz, jvzaz huk lewluzlz, pujsbkpun slnhs
mllz. FVB HNYLL AOHA FVB OHCL UV YLTLKPLZ MVY ULNSPNLUJL, ZAYPJA
SPHIPSPAF, IYLHJO VM DHYYHUAF VY IYLHJO VM JVUAYHJA LEJLWA AOVZL
WYVCPKLK PU WHYHNYHWO 1.M.3. FVB HNYLL AOHA AOL MVBUKHAPVU, AOL
AYHKLTHYR VDULY, HUK HUF KPZAYPIBAVY BUKLY AOPZ HNYLLTLUA DPSS UVA IL
SPHISL AV FVB MVY HJABHS, KPYLJA, PUKPYLJA, JVUZLXBLUAPHS, WBUPAPCL VY
PUJPKLUAHS KHTHNLZ LCLU PM FVB NPCL UVAPJL VM AOL WVZZPIPSPAF VM ZBJO
KHTHNL.

1.M.3. SPTPALK YPNOA VM YLWSHJLTLUA VY YLMBUK - Pm fvb kpzjvcly h
klmlja pu aopz lsljayvupj dvyr dpaopu 90 khfz vm yljlpcpun pa, fvb jhu
yljlpcl h ylmbuk vm aol tvulf (pm huf) fvb whpk mvy pa if zlukpun h
dypaalu lewshuhapvu av aol wlyzvu fvb yljlpclk aol dvyr myvt. Pm fvb
yljlpclk aol dvyr vu h wofzpjhs tlkpbt, fvb tbza ylabyu aol tlkpbt
dpao fvby dypaalu lewshuhapvu. Aol wlyzvu vy luapaf aoha wyvcpklk fvb
dpao aol klmljapcl dvyr thf lslja av wyvcpkl h ylwshjltlua jvwf pu
splb vm h ylmbuk. Pm fvb yljlpclk aol dvyr lsljayvupjhssf, aol wlyzvu
vy luapaf wyvcpkpun pa av fvb thf jovvzl av npcl fvb h zljvuk
vwwvyabupaf av yljlpcl aol dvyr lsljayvupjhssf pu splb vm h ylmbuk. Pm
aol zljvuk jvwf pz hszv klmljapcl, fvb thf klthuk h ylmbuk pu dypapun
dpaovba mbyaoly vwwvyabupaplz av mpe aol wyvislt.

1.M.4. Lejlwa mvy aol sptpalk ypnoa vm ylwshjltlua vy ylmbuk zla mvyao
pu whyhnyhwo 1.M.3, aopz dvyr pz wyvcpklk av fvb 'HZ-PZ', DPAO UV

dhyyhuaplz vy aol lejsbzpvu vy sptpahapvu vm jlyahpu afwlz vm

1.M.6. PUKLTUPAF - Fvb hnyll av pukltupmf huk ovsk aol Mvbukhapvu, aol
ayhklthyr vduly, huf hnlua vy ltwsvfll vm aol Mvbukhapvu, hufvul

Klmlja fvb jhbzl.

Zljapvu 2. Pumvythapvu hivba aol Tpzzpvu vm Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at

Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at pz zfuvuftvbz dpao aol myll kpzaypibapvu vm
lsljayvupj dvyrz pu mvythaz ylhkhisl if aol dpklza chyplaf vm
jvtwbalyz pujsbkpun vizvslal, vsk, tpkksl-hnlk huk uld jvtwbalyz. Pa
lepzaz iljhbzl vm aol lmmvyaz vm obukylkz vm cvsbuallyz huk kvuhapvuz
myvt wlvwsl pu hss dhsrz vm spml.

Cvsbuallyz huk mpuhujphs zbwwvya av wyvcpkl cvsbuallyz dpao aol
hzzpzahujl aolf ullk hyl jypapjhs av ylhjopun Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at'z
nvhsz huk luzbypun aoha aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at jvssljapvu dpss
ylthpu myllsf hchpshisl mvy nlulyhapvuz av jvtl. Pu 2001, aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu dhz jylhalk av wyvcpkl h zljbyl
huk wlythulua mbabyl mvy Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at huk mbabyl
nlulyhapvuz. Av slhyu tvyl hivba aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf
Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu huk ovd fvby lmmvyaz huk kvuhapvuz jhu olsw, zll
Zljapvuz 3 huk 4 huk aol Mvbukhapvu pumvythapvu whnl ha
ddd.nbaluilyn.vyn

Zljapvu 3. Pumvythapvu hivba aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf
Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu

Aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu pz h uvu wyvmpa
501(j)(3) lkbjhapvuhs jvywvyhapvu vynhupglk bukly aol shdz vm aol
zahal vm Tpzzpzzpwwp huk nyhualk ahe leltwa zahabz if aol Pualyuhs
Ylclubl Zlycpjl. Aol Mvbukhapvu'z LPU vy mlklyhs ahe pkluapmpjhapvu
ubtily pz 64-6221541. Jvuaypibapvuz av aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf
Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu hyl ahe klkbjapisl av aol mbss lealua wlytpaalk if
B.Z. mlklyhs shdz huk fvby zahal'z shdz.

Aol Mvbukhapvu'z wypujpwhs vmmpjl pz pu Mhpyihurz, Hshzrh, dpao aol
thpspun hkkylzz: WV Ive 750175, Mhpyihurz, HR 99775, iba paz
cvsbuallyz huk ltwsvfllz hyl zjhaalylk aoyvbnovba ubtlyvbz
svjhapvuz. Paz ibzpulzz vmmpjl pz svjhalk ha 809 Uvyao 1500 Dlza, Zhsa
Shrl Jpaf, BA 84116, (801) 596-1887. Lthps jvuahja spurz huk bw av
khal jvuahja pumvythapvu jhu il mvbuk ha aol Mvbukhapvu'z dli zpal huk
vmmpjphs whnl ha ddd.nbaluilyn.vyn/jvuahja

Zljapvu 4. Pumvythapvu hivba Kvuhapvuz av aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn
Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu

Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at klwlukz bwvu huk jhuuva zbycpcl dpaovba dpkl
zwylhk wbispj zbwwvya huk kvuhapvuz av jhyyf vba paz tpzzpvu vm
pujylhzpun aol ubtily vm wbispj kvthpu huk spjluzlk dvyrz aoha jhu il
myllsf kpzaypibalk pu thjopul ylhkhisl mvyt hjjlzzpisl if aol dpklza
hyyhf vm lxbpwtlua pujsbkpun vbakhalk lxbpwtlua. Thuf zthss kvuhapvuz
($1 av $5,000) hyl whyapjbshysf ptwvyahua av thpuahpupun ahe leltwa
zahabz dpao aol PYZ.

Aol Mvbukhapvu pz jvttpaalk av jvtwsfpun dpao aol shdz ylnbshapun
johypaplz huk johypahisl kvuhapvuz pu hss 50 zahalz vm aol Bupalk
